 bandầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ cờʔidất vả dất vôhìɲ cốŋxôŋ tốʔi cên vựk tʰầnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi vậɲàɲ cên mặtnướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ fảʔi kó sáŋ tʰìkó sáŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi sáŋ tốtlàɲ fân sáŋ za kùŋ tốʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt sáŋ ŋàʔi tốʔi dêm vậʔi kó buổʔi ciềʔu buổʔimaj ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲứt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ fảʔi kó xɔảŋxôŋ ɣiữʔa nướk dặŋ fânzẽ nướk kác vớʔi nướk ŋàʔi xɔảŋxôŋ fânzẽ nướk zướʔi xɔảŋxôŋ kác vớʔi nướk cên xɔảŋxôŋ tʰìkó ɲưvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt xɔảŋxôŋ cờʔi vậʔi kó buổʔi ciềʔu buổʔimaj ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ ɲữŋ nướk zướʔi cờʔi fảʔi lạʔi nơʔi fảʔi kó cỗ xô kạn bàʔi za tʰìkó ɲưvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt cỗ xô kạn dất kòn nơʔi nướk lạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tốtlàɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ fảʔi sɛɲ kâʔicỏ kỏ ɣiốŋ kâʔi cáʔi kếtkwả tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kó ɣiốŋ cɔŋ mìɲ cên dất tʰìkó ɲưvậʔi sɛɲ kâʔicỏ kỏ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kâʔi kếtkwả kó cɔŋ mìɲ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tốtlàɲ vậʔi kó buổʔi ciềʔu buổʔimaj ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰứba Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ fảʔi kó kák sáŋ cɔŋ xɔảŋxôŋ cên cờʔi dặŋ fân za ŋàʔi vớʔi dêm zùŋ làmzấʔu dể dịɲ tʰì ŋàʔi lạʔi zùŋ sáŋ cɔŋ xɔảŋxôŋ cên cờʔi dể sɔj suốŋ dất tʰìkó ɲưvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi haj sáŋ dể kaicị banŋàʔi ɲỏ dể kaicị bandêm ŋàʔi kũŋ kák ŋôʔisaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt kák dó cɔŋ xɔảŋxôŋ cên cờʔi dặŋ sɔj sáŋ dất dặŋ kaicị banŋàʔi bandêm dặŋ fân za sáŋ vớʔi tốʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tốtlàɲ vậʔi kó buổʔi ciềʔu buổʔimaj ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰứtư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ nướk fảʔi sɛɲ kák sốŋ cɔ ɲiềʔu kák lɔàʔi cim fảʔi băj cên mặtdất cɔŋ xɔảŋxôŋ cên cờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ kák lɔàʔi ká kák sốŋ hăj dộŋ ɲờ nướk sɛɲ ɲiềʔu za tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kák lɔàʔi cim hăj băj tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tốtlàɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fướk cɔ kák lɔàʔi dó fán zằŋ hãʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cɔ dầʔizẫʔi zướʔi kòn kák lɔàʔi cim hãʔi sɛɲ cên dất cɔ ɲiềʔu vậʔi kó buổʔi ciềʔu buổʔimaj ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰứnăm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ fảʔi sɛɲ kák sốŋ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi tứk súkvật kôncùŋ tʰúzừŋ dềʔu tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi tʰìkó ɲưvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák lɔàʔi tʰúzừŋ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi súkvật tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kák kôncùŋ cên dất tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tốtlàɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲư hìɲ tʰeo tượŋ dặŋ kwảncị lɔàʔi ká lɔàʔi cim cờʔi lɔàʔi súkvật lɔàʔi kôncùŋ cên mặtdất xắp kả dất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲư hìɲ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi zựŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư hìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi zựŋ nênŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fướk cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cɔ dầʔizẫʔi dất hãʔi cɔ dất fụktùŋ hãʔi kwảncị lɔàʔi ká zướʔi lɔàʔi cim cên cờʔi kùŋ kák sốŋ hàɲdộŋ cên mặtdất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ nầʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi mọʔi tʰứ kỏ mọk xắp mặtdất kák lɔàʔi kâʔi sɛɲ kwả kó ɣiốŋ ấʔi dồăn cɔ kák ŋươʔi kòn kák lɔàʔi tʰú ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kák lɔàʔi cim cên cờʔi kák dộŋvật xák cên mặtdất fàm ɣiốŋ nàʔɔ kó sốŋ tʰì cɔ mọʔi tʰứ kỏ sɛɲ dặŋ zùŋ dồăn tʰìkó ɲưvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi kák việk ŋàʔi dã tʰật zất tốtlàɲ vậʔi kó buổʔi ciềʔu buổʔimaj ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰứsáʔu Ấʔi vậʔi cờʔidất dã zựŋ sɔŋ zồʔi ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sɔŋ kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi dã ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi dã zồʔi ŋàʔi fướk cɔ ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi dặt ŋàʔi tʰáɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋàʔi ŋỉ kák kôŋviệk dã zựŋ dã sɔŋ zồʔi Ấʔilà ɣốktíc cờʔi dất xi dã zựŋ cɔŋ lúk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ cờʔi dất vả lúk dó cưʔa kó kâʔi ɲỏ nàʔɔ mọk ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kũŋ cưʔa kó ŋọn kỏ nàʔɔ mọk ŋɔàʔi zuộŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cưʔa kó cɔ mưʔa suốŋ cên dất kũŋ cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kàʔicấʔi dất nữʔa sɔŋ kó hơʔinướk zướʔi dất băj tướʔi xắp kùŋ mặtdất ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi bụʔi dất hìɲ ŋườʔi sɛɲ xí vàʔɔ mũʔi tʰì ŋườʔi cởnên lɔàʔi sɛɲ liɲ Ðʔɔạn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảɲ tạʔi dɛn hướŋ Ðôŋ dặt ŋườʔi ŋàʔi vừʔa zựŋ dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến dất mọk kák tʰứ kâʔi dẹpmắt cáʔi tʰì ŋɔn ɣiữʔa lạʔi kó kâʔi sốŋ kùŋ kâʔi biếtdiềʔu tʰiện diềʔu ák một kɔn sôŋ dɛn cảʔi za dặŋ tướʔi zồʔi dó ciə za ŋả tên ŋả tʰứ ɲứt bisôn ŋả dó cảʔi kwɛɲ sứ havila nơʔi kó vàŋ vàŋ sứ nầʔi zất kaw dó lạʔi kó ɲũhươŋ bíɲ ŋọk tên sôŋ tʰứ ɲì ɣihôn cảʔi kwɛɲ sứ kusơ tên sôŋ tʰứba hidêkɛ cảʔi fíʔa dôŋ bờkõʔi ʔasizi kòn sôŋ tʰứtư sôŋ fơzát ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɛm ŋườʔiở vàʔɔ kảɲ dɛn dể cồŋ ɣiữ zồʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zạʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dượk tựzɔ hwakwả kák tʰứ kâʔi cɔŋ ɲưŋ kâʔi biếtdiềʔu tʰiện diềʔu ák tʰìcớ dến mộtmaj ŋươʔi cắk cết ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi mộtmìɲ tʰì xôŋ ɣiúpdỡ ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi dất kák lɔàʔi tʰú dồŋ kák lɔàʔi cim cờʔi zồʔi zẫn dến cướk ʔadam dặŋ tʰử sɛm ŋườʔi dặt cúŋnó làmsaw hầʔu cɔ nàʔɔ ʔadam dặt cɔ mỗʔi sốŋ dềʔu tʰàɲ tênziêŋ cɔ ʔadam dặt kák lɔàʔi súkvật kák lɔàʔi cim cờʔi kùŋ kák lɔàʔi tʰú dồŋ ɲưŋ fần ʔadam tʰì cẳŋ dượk ʔaj ɣiúpdỡ ɣiốŋ ɲư mìɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ʔadam ŋủmê lấʔi sươŋ sườŋ zồʔi tʰịt tʰế vàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zùŋ sươŋ sườŋ dã lấʔi nơʔi ʔadam ŋườʔi dưʔa dếnkùŋ ʔadam ʔadam nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi sươŋ bởʔi sươŋ tôʔi tʰịt bởʔi tʰịt tôʔi za ŋườʔi nầʔi dượk ɣọʔilà ŋườʔi zɔ nơʔi ŋườʔi kó bởʔivậʔi cɔ nênŋườʔi lìʔa camẹ zíɲ zíʔu kùŋ mìɲ kả haj cởnên tʰịt vả ʔadam kả haj dềʔu cầncuồŋ cẳŋ hổtʰẹn vả cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi tʰú dồŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kó kɔn zắn ɣiốŋ kwỉkwiệt zắn nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ mà ci Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fán zặn kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk fép ăncáʔi kák kâʔi cɔŋ saw ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ cúŋta dượk ăncáʔi kák kâʔi cɔŋ sɔŋ fần cáʔi kủʔa kâʔi mọk ɣiữʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fán zằŋ haj ŋươʔi cẳŋ dến kũŋ cẳŋ dá dộŋ dến ʔɛ xi haj ŋươʔi fảʔi cết căŋ zắn nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ haj ŋươʔi cẳŋ cết dâʔu ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ haj ŋươʔi cáʔicâʔi dó mìɲ za ɲư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi biếtdiềʔu tʰiện diềʔu ák ŋườʔi tʰấʔi cáʔi kủʔa kâʔi dó ŋɔn lạʔi dẹpmắt kwí dể cíxôn háʔi zồʔi caw cɔ cồŋ dứŋ ɣần mìɲ cồŋ kũŋ nữʔa Ðʔɔạn haj ŋườʔi dềʔu za zằŋ mìɲ lỏʔa lấʔi kâʔi dóŋ xố cɛ tʰân lốʔi ciềʔu ŋɛ tiếŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi di ŋaŋ kwa ʔadam mìɲ ɣiữʔa bụʔi kâʔi dể cáɲmặt ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kêʔu ʔadam fán hỏʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu ʔadam tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi kó ŋɛ tiếŋ cúʔa cɔŋ bởʔivì tôʔi lỏʔa di mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán hỏʔi ʔaj dã cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ mìɲ lỏʔa ŋươʔi kóăn cáʔicâʔi dã zặn xôŋ dó căŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ ŋườʔi cúʔa dã dể ɣần tôʔi cɔ tôʔi cáʔicâʔi dó tôʔi dã zồʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi kó diềʔu ci vậʔi ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kɔn zắn zỗzàɲ tôʔi tôʔi dã zồʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ zắn zằŋ vì mầʔi dã diềʔu ɲưvậʔi mầʔi zủʔasả cɔŋ vòŋ kák lɔàʔi súkvật kák lɔàʔi tʰú dồŋ mầʔi bằŋ bụŋ bụʔi dất cọn kả dờʔi ta cɔ mầʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zòŋzõʔi mầʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi ŋịc tʰù ɲăw ŋườʔi ɣiàʔidạp dầʔu mầʔi kòn mầʔi kắn ɣót cân ŋườʔi ŋàʔi fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ta tʰêm diềʔu kựkxổ bộʔifần cɔŋ kơn tʰaiŋén ŋươʔi cịʔu dăwdớn mỗʔi xi sɛɲ kɔn zụkvọŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi suhướŋ cồŋ cồŋ kaicị ŋươʔi ŋàʔi lạʔi fán kùŋ ʔadam zằŋ vì ŋươʔi ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi cáʔicâʔi dã zặn xôŋ vậʔi dất zủʔasả ŋươʔi cọn dờʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cịʔu xóɲọk mớʔi kó dất sɛɲ za sɛɲ côŋɣaj kâʔi ŋươʔi zăw kủʔa dồŋzuộŋ ŋươʔi dổ mồhôʔi cán mớʔi kó cɔdến ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi cởvề dất nơʔi kó ŋươʔi za ŋươʔi bụʔi ŋươʔi cởvề bụʔi ʔadam ɣọʔi kủʔa kả lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi za tʰú tʰàɲ áʔɔzàʔi cɔ vợcồŋ ʔadam mặk lấʔi cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ nầʔi fânbiệt diềʔu tʰiện diềʔu ák lɔàʔiŋườʔi dã tʰàɲ bựk ɲư cúŋta vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi kɔicừŋ ʔɛ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiơ tăj xiến kũŋ háʔi cáʔicâʔi sốŋ dượk sốŋ dờʔidờʔi căŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi duổʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi za xỏʔi dɛn dặŋ kàʔicấʔi dất nơʔi kó ŋườʔi za vậʔi ŋàʔi duổʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi za xỏʔi zồʔi dặt tạʔi fíʔa dôŋ dɛn kák tʰần cê zubin vớʔi ɣươm lưỡʔi cóʔilòʔa dể ɣiữ kɔn dườŋ di dến kâʔi sốŋ ʔadam vớʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kain nóʔi zằŋ ɲờÐứkzê ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi mớʔi sɛɲ dượk ŋườʔi lạʔi sɛɲ ʔɛm kain ʔabên ʔabên ŋề cănciên kòn kain tʰì ŋề làmzuộŋ vả kác ítlâʔu kain zùŋ tʰổsản kủʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔabên kũŋ zâŋ ciên dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ bầʔi mìɲ kùŋ Ðứkzê dɔáʔi sɛm ʔabên ɲận kủʔa ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ dɔáʔi dến kain kũŋ cẳŋ ɲận kủʔa ŋườʔi cɔnên kain ɣiận ɣằm Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi kain zằŋ kớsaw ŋươʔi ɣiận kớsaw ŋươʔi ɣằm suốŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi làmlàɲ cẳŋ ŋướk saw kòn ɲư cẳŋ làmlàɲ tʰì tộʔilỗʔi zìɲ dợʔi cướk kửʔa tʰèm ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi kwảncị kain tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ ʔabên ʔɛm mìɲ vả xi haj ŋườʔi dươŋ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ tʰì kain sôŋ dến ʔabên ʔɛm mìɲ ɣiết di Ðứkzê hỏʔi kain zằŋ ʔabên ʔɛm ŋươʔi dâʔu tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi ɣiữ ʔɛm tôʔi saw Ðứkzê hỏʔi ŋươʔi dã diềʔu ci vậʔi tiếŋ kủʔa máʔu ʔɛm ŋươʔi zướʔi dất kêʔu tʰấʔu dến bâʔizờ ŋươʔi dất zủʔasả dất dã miệŋ cịʔu máʔu kủʔa ʔɛm ŋươʔi bởʔi cíɲ tăj ŋươʔi dổ za xi ŋươʔi cồŋtỉʔa dất cẳŋ sɛɲ hwalợʔi cɔ ŋươʔi nữʔa ŋươʔi lưʔulạk cốncáɲ cên mặtdất kain tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ sự hìɲfạt tôʔi nặŋ kwá maŋ xôŋ nổʔi nầʔi ŋàʔinăj cúʔa dã duổʔi tôʔi za xỏʔi dất nầʔi tôʔi láɲmặt cúʔa di lưʔulạk cốncáɲ cên dất zồʔi sảʔi kó ʔaj ɣặp tôʔi ɣiết di Ðứkzê fán zằŋ bởʔi kớ ấʔi nếʔu ʔaj ɣiết kain tʰì báʔɔtʰù bảʔi Ðứkzê dáɲ dấʔu cên mìɲ kain hầʔu cɔ ʔaj ɣặp kain tʰì cẳŋ ɣiết kain luj za xỏʔi Ðứkzê tạʔi sứ nốt fíʔa dôŋ kủʔa dɛn Ðʔɔạn kain kùŋ mìɲ nàŋ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ dượk hênók kain sâʔi káʔi tʰàɲ dặt hênók tùʔi tʰeo kɔncaj mìɲ zồʔi hênók sɛɲ ʔizát ʔizát sɛɲ nêhudaên nêhudaên sɛɲ mêtusaên mêtusaên sɛɲ lêmék lêmék kướʔi haj ŋườʔi ʔada ŋườʔi sila ʔada sɛɲ zabɛɲ zabɛɲ tổfụ kủʔa kák zân cạʔi nuôʔi bầʔi súkvật ʔɛm ŋườʔi zubɛɲ tổfụ kủʔa ɲữŋ dáɲ dờn tʰổʔi sáʔɔ kònsi kũŋ sɛɲ tubɛɲkain ŋườʔi zèn dủ tʰứ xíɣiớʔi bằŋ dồŋ bằŋ ʔɛmɣáʔi kủʔa tubɛɲkain naama lêmék nóʔi vớʔi haj mìɲ zằŋ hỡʔi ʔada sila hãʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ nầʔi lêmék hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi ta dã ɣiết ŋườʔi tʰươŋ và ŋườʔi cẻ dáɲ sưŋ nếʔuka ʔin dượk bảʔi báʔɔtʰù lêmék dượk bảʔi mươʔi bảʔi báʔɔán ʔadam kòn vớʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj dặt sết zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ tôʔi kɔncaj xák tʰế cɔ ʔabên dã kain ɣiết zồʔi sết kũŋ sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj dặt từ dâʔi ŋườʔita bắtdầʔu kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ Ðứkzê Ðâʔi sác cép zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ʔadam ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi zựŋ nênŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi fướk cɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dã zựŋ dặt ŋườʔi vả ʔadam dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj ɣiốŋ ɲư hìɲtượŋ mìɲ dặt sết săw xi ʔadam sɛɲ sết zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk támcăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi ʔadam hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín căm bamươʔi tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi sết dượk mộtcăm nămtuổʔi sɛɲ săw xi sết sɛɲ zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk támcăm bảʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi sết hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín căm mườʔihaj tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi dượk cín mươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ kênan săw xi sɛɲ kênan zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk támcăm mườʔilăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín cămnăm tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi kênan dượk bảʔi mươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ mahalalɛ săw xi kênan sɛɲ mahalalɛ zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk támcăm mươʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi kênan hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín căm mườʔi tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi mahalalɛ dượk sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ ɣiêzệt săw xi mahalalɛ sɛɲ ɣiêzệt zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk támcăm bamươʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi mahalalɛ hưởŋtʰọ dượk támcăm cín mươʔi tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi ɣiêzệt dượk mộtcăm sáʔu mươʔi haj tuổʔi sɛɲ hênók săw xi ɣiêzệt sɛɲ hênót zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk támcăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi ɣiêzệt hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín căm sáʔu mươʔi haj tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi hênók dượk sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ mêtusêla săw xi hênók sɛɲ mêtusêla zồʔi dồŋ di kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ bɛcăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔihê nók hưởŋtʰọ dượk căm sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi hênók dồŋ di kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi bởʔivì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi di mêtusêla dượk mộtcăm mươʔi bảʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ lêmék săw xi mêtusêla sɛɲ lêmék zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk bảʔicăm mươʔi haj sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi mêtusêla hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín căm sáʔu mươʔi cín tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi lêmék dượk mộtcăm mươʔi haj tuổʔi sɛɲ caj nô nóʔi zằŋ Ðứʔa nầʔi ʔanủʔi lòŋ kôŋviệk ɲọkɲằn dất bắttăj fảʔi dất Ðứkzê dã zủʔasả săw xi lêmék sɛɲ nô zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk nămcăm cín mươʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi vậʔi lêmék hưởŋtʰọ dượk bảʔicăm bảʔi mươʔi bảʔi tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi kònnô xi dến cămtuổʔi sɛɲ sɛmcam zafết vả xi lɔàʔiŋườʔi xởʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu cên mặtdất xi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dã sɛɲ dượk kɔŋáʔi zồʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi kɔŋáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi tốtdẹp kướʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vừʔalòŋ mìɲ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ tʰần cẳŋ hằŋ cɔŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cɔŋ diềʔu lầmlạk lɔàʔiŋườʔi cỉ sáktʰịt dờʔi ŋườʔi mộtcăm haimươʔi tʰôʔi Ðờʔi dó dờʔi săw kó ŋườʔi kawlớn cên mặtdất kɔncaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ kɔŋáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi sɛɲ kɔnkáʔi ấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋàʔisưʔa tăj ʔɛɲhùŋ kó zɛɲ Ðứkzê tʰấʔi huŋák kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi cên mặtdất zất ɲiềʔu kák ýtưởŋ kủʔa lòŋ cỉ sấʔu tʰì các dã zựŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cên mặtdất buồnzầʔu cɔŋ lòŋ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ta hủʔiziệt xỏʔi mặtdất lɔàʔiŋườʔi dã zựŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cɔdến lɔàʔi súkvật lɔàʔi kôncùŋ lɔàʔi cim cờʔi các dã zựŋ kák lɔàʔi dó ɲưŋnô dượk cướk Ðứkzê nầʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa nô nô cɔŋ dờʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tɔànvẹn dồŋ di kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nô sɛɲ kɔncaj sɛm cam zafết tʰếzan bấʔizờ dềʔu bạʔihɔạʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dầʔizẫʔi huŋák nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲìn sɛm tʰếzan tʰấʔi diềʔu bạʔihɔạʔi hếttʰảʔi sáktʰịt cɔ dườŋ mìɲ cên dất fảʔi bạʔihɔạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ nô zằŋ kỳkuốʔi kùŋ kủʔa mọʔi sáktʰịt dã dưʔa dến cướk kớ lɔàʔiŋườʔi dất fảʔi dầʔizẫʔi diềʔu huŋăŋ vậʔi ziệt cừ kùŋ dất ŋươʔi hãʔi dóŋ ciếk tàʔu bằŋ kâʔi ɣô fɛ dóŋ kó từŋ fòŋ zồʔi cét caj cɔŋ kùŋ bềŋɔàʔi vậʔi hãʔi tʰeo tʰế nầʔi bề zàʔi tàʔu bɛcăm tʰướk ŋaŋ nămmươʔi tʰướk kaw bamươʔi tʰướk cên tàʔu ŋươʔi kửʔasổ kaw tʰướk cừʔa kửʔa hôŋ ŋươʔi từŋ zướʔi từŋ ɣiữʔa từŋ cên kòn tadâʔi zẫn nướk xắp cên mặtdất dặŋ ziệt twiệt kák sáktʰịt kó sɛɲ xí zướʔi cờʔi hếttʰảʔi ci cên mặtdất dềʔu cết ɲưŋ zawướk kùŋ ŋươʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi kák kɔn kák zâʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi dềʔu hãʔi vàʔɔ tàʔu về kák lɔàʔi sɛɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi zẫn suốŋ tàʔu mỗʔi lɔàʔi kặp kó dựk kó káʔi kó cốŋ kó máʔi hầʔu cɔ kùŋ ŋươʔi dặŋ ɣiữ còn sốŋ cim tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi súkvật tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kôncùŋ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi mỗʔi tʰứhaj kɔn dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi ɣiữ còn sốŋ cɔ lạʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi kák tʰứ dồăn dɛm tʰeo dặŋ dể zàŋ lươŋtʰựk cɔ ŋươʔi kák lɔàʔi dó nô kák diềʔu nầʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zặn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ nô zằŋ ŋươʔi kả ɲàŋươʔi hãʔi vàʔɔ tàʔu dờʔi nầʔi tʰấʔi ŋươʔi kôŋbìɲ cướk cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi tʰɛɲsạc hãʔi dɛm tʰeo mỗʔi lɔàʔi bảʔi kặp dựk káʔi kòn lɔàʔi xôŋ tʰɛɲsạc mỗʔi lɔàʔi kặp dựk káʔi kũŋ hãʔi dɛm tʰeo ɲữŋ cim cờʔi mỗʔi tʰứbảʔi kặp cốŋ máʔi dể ɣiữ ɣiốŋ cên xắp mặtdất vì kòn bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa mưʔa suốŋ mặtdất cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm twiệtziệt xỏʔi dất kák lɔàʔi kủʔa dã zựŋ Ðʔɔạn nô tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ vả xi sảʔiza nướk càn cên mặtdất tʰì nô dã dượk sáʔu cămtuổʔi vì kớ nướk nô vàʔɔ tàʔu kùŋ kák kɔncaj kák zâʔu mìɲ lɔàʔi tʰɛɲsạc lɔàʔi xôŋ tʰɛɲsạc lɔàʔi cim lɔàʔi kôncùŋ cên mặtdất từŋ kặp dựk káʔi cốŋ máʔi dềʔu dếnkùŋ nô vàʔɔ tàʔu ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zặn ŋườʔi săw bảʔi ŋàʔi nướk sảʔi kó cên mặtdất ɲằm sáʔu căm kủʔa dờʔi nô tʰáŋ haj ŋàʔi mườʔibảʔi cáɲ ŋàʔi dó kák ŋuồn kủʔa vựk za kák dập cên cờʔi suốŋ mưʔa cên mặtdất cọn mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm lạʔi kũŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó nô vớʔi kɔncaj sɛm cam zafết kùŋ zâʔu mìɲ dồŋ vàʔɔ tàʔu họ kák lɔàʔi tʰúzừŋ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi súkvật tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kôncùŋ cên mặtdất tùʔi tʰeo lɔàʔi cim tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi hếttʰảʔi nàʔɔ kó káɲ dềʔu từŋ kặp tʰeo nô vàʔɔ tàʔu ŋĩʔalà mọʔi sáktʰịt nàʔɔ kó sɛɲ xí dựk káʔi cốŋ máʔi dềʔu dến vàʔɔ tàʔu ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zặn dɔạn Ðứkzê dóŋkửʔa tàʔu lạʔi nướk fủ mặtdất mươʔi ŋàʔi nướk zưŋ tʰêm nâŋ hỏŋ tàʔu xỏʔi mặtdất cên mặtdất nướklớn zưŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu ciếk tàʔu nổʔi cên mặtnướk nướk kàŋ zưŋ bộʔifần cên mặtdất hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋọn núʔi kaw zướʔi cờʔi dềʔu ŋập nướk zưŋ mườʔilăm tʰướk kaw mấʔi ŋọn núʔi dềʔu ŋập kák sáktʰịt hàɲdộŋ cên mặtdất dềʔu cết ŋột nàʔɔ cim nàʔɔ súkvật nàʔɔ tʰúzừŋ nàʔɔ kôncùŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi kák kó sɛɲ xí cɔŋ mũʔi kák cên dấtliền dềʔu cết mọʔi lɔàʔi cên mặtdất dềʔu hủʔiziệt lɔàʔiŋườʔi cɔdến lɔàʔi tʰú lɔàʔi kôncùŋ kùŋ lɔàʔi cim cờʔi cỉ kòn nô kák lɔàʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ tàʔu tʰôʔi nướk zưŋ cên mặtdất cọn mộtcăm nămmươʔi ŋàʔi vả Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲớ lạʔi nô kùŋ kák lɔàʔi tʰú súkvật cɔŋ tàʔu vớʔi ŋườʔi xiến cận ɣió tʰổʔi ŋaŋ kwa cên dất tʰì nướk zừŋ lạʔi kák ŋuồn kủʔa vựk kák dập cên cờʔi ŋăn lạʔi mưʔa cên cờʔi xôŋ suốŋ nữʔa nướk ɣiựt xỏʔi mặtdất vừʔa vừʔa ɣiựt cɔŋ mộtcăm nămmươʔi ŋàʔi nướk mớʔi suốŋ tʰáŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi mườʔibảʔi ciếk tàʔu cên núʔi ʔazazát nướk kứ cɔdến tʰáŋ mườʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ dó mấʔi dỉɲ núʔi mớʔi za Ðượk mươʔi ŋàʔi nô kửʔasổ mìɲ dã cên tàʔu tʰả kɔn kwạ za kwạ liệŋ di liệŋ lạʔi cɔdến xi nướk ɣiựt xô cên mặtdất ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰả kɔn kâʔu za dặŋ sɛm tʰử nướk cên mặtdất cưʔa ɲưŋ kâʔu cẳŋ dượk nơʔi nàʔɔ dáp cơn suốŋ băj cởvề cɔŋ tàʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi nướk kòn xắp kả cên mặtdất nô ɣiơ tăj lấʔi kâʔu dɛm vàʔɔ tàʔu lạʔi vớʔi mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dợʔi bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa lạʔi tʰả kâʔu za xỏʔi tàʔu dến ciềʔu kâʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi cɔŋ tʰa livɛ tươʔi nô hiểʔu zằŋ nướk dã ɣiảm cên mặtdất ŋườʔi dợʔi bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa tʰả kâʔu za ɲưŋ cwiến nầʔi kâʔu cẳŋ cởvề kùŋ ŋườʔi nữʔa ɲằm sáʔu căm kủʔa dờʔi nô ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋzêŋ nướk dã ɣiựt bàʔi mặtdất xô nô ɣiở muj tàʔu ɲìn nầʔi mặtdất dã sɛ tʰáŋ haj ŋàʔi haimươʔibảʔi dất dã xô zồʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ nô zằŋ hãʔi za xỏʔi tàʔu ŋươʔi kák kɔn kák zâʔu ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰả za vớʔi ŋươʔi mọʔi sốŋ kủʔa kák sáktʰịt dã kùŋ ŋươʔi nàʔɔ cim nàʔɔ tʰú nàʔɔ kôncùŋ cên dất hầʔu cɔ cúŋnó sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cên mặtdất vậʔi nô kùŋ ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj kák zâʔu ŋườʔi za xỏʔi tàʔu kák tʰú zắn cim kùŋ mọʔi hàɲdộŋ cên mặtdất tùʔi tʰeo ɣiốŋ dềʔu za xỏʔi tàʔu nô bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê ŋườʔi kák súkvật tʰɛɲsạc kák lɔàʔi cim tʰɛɲsạc bàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu zâŋ bàntʰờ Ðứkzê hưởŋ lấʔi mùʔi tʰơm ŋĩ tʰầm zằŋ ta cẳŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi zủʔasả dất nữʔa táɲ lɔàʔiŋườʔi sấʔusa xi kòn tuổʔicẻ kũŋ cẳŋ hàɲ kák sốŋ ɲư dã hễ dất kòn tʰì mùʔa zeo ɣiốŋ kùŋ mùʔa ɣặtʰáʔi lạɲ nóŋ mùʔa kùŋ mùʔadôŋ ŋàʔi dêm cẳŋ bawzờ twiệt dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fướk cɔ nô kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cɔ dầʔizẫʔi cên mặtdất kák lɔàʔi cên dất kák lɔàʔi cim cờʔi kák hàɲdộŋ cên dất kùŋ kák ká dềʔu kiɲxủŋ ŋươʔi fú vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi fàm ci hàɲdộŋ kó sốŋ tʰì zùŋ dồăn cɔ kák ŋươʔi ta cɔ mọʔi dó ɲư dã cɔ tʰứ kỏ sɛɲ sɔŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰịt kòn sốŋ ŋĩʔalà kó máʔu kwảtʰật dòʔi máʔu kủʔa sốŋ ŋươʔi lạʔi hɔặk nơʔi kák lɔàʔi tʰúvật hɔặk nơʔi tăj ŋườʔi hɔặk nơʔi tăj kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi hễ nàʔɔ dổmáʔu ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi xák dổmáʔu lạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi ɲư hìɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cɔ dầʔizẫʔi cên mặtdất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ fán kùŋ nô kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ kòn fần tadâʔi zawướk kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi kùŋ mọʔi sốŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi nàʔɔ lɔàʔi cim nàʔɔ súkvật nàʔɔ lɔàʔi tʰú cên dất tứklà kák lɔàʔi cɔŋ tàʔu za cɔdến kák lɔàʔi cên dất vậʔi zawướk kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kák lɔàʔi sáktʰịt cẳŋ bawzờ lạʔi nướk hủʔiziệt kũŋ cẳŋ kó nướk dể hủʔihɔạʔi dất nữʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ Ðâʔi zấʔu cỉ zawướk kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kùŋ hếttʰảʔi sốŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi mãʔimãʔi ta dặt mốŋ kủʔa cên từŋ mâʔi zùŋ làmzấʔu cỉ zawướk kủʔa vớʔi dất fàm lúknàʔɔ ɣóp kák dám mâʔi cên mặtdất fàm mốŋ mọk cên từŋ mâʔi tʰì ɲớ lạʔi zawướk kủʔa dã kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kùŋ kák lɔàʔi sáktʰịt kó sốŋ tʰì nướk cẳŋ bawzờ lạʔi cởnên hủʔiziệt kák lɔàʔi sáktʰịt nữʔa vậʔi káʔi mốŋ cên mâʔi ɲìn sɛm dặŋ ɲớ lạʔi zawướk dờʔidờʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ kák lɔàʔi sáktʰịt kó sốŋ cên dất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán kùŋ nô zằŋ zấʔu cỉ zawướk dã ɣiữʔa kák sáktʰịt cên mặtdất kák kɔncaj kủʔa nô cɔŋ tàʔu za sɛm cam zafết vả cam ca kủʔa kanaan Ấʔi dó kɔncaj kủʔa nô kũŋ zɔ nơʔi kó lɔàʔiŋườʔi xắp cên mặtdất vả nô xởʔi kàʔi dất cồŋ ɲɔ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ zượʔu săj zồʔi lõʔatʰể ɣiữʔa cạʔi mìɲ cam ca kanaan tʰấʔi cầncuồŋ kủʔa ca tʰìza ŋɔàʔi tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ haj ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ɲưŋsɛm zafết dềʔu lấʔi áʔɔcɔàŋ cên vaj mìɲ di tʰùʔi luj dến dắp xuất tʰân cɔ ca bởʔi sâʔi kwa fíʔa xák cẳŋ tʰấʔi cầncuồŋ kủʔa ca cút nàʔɔ xinô tỉɲ zượʔu zồʔi hăj dượk diềʔu kɔntʰứ haj dã cɔ mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ kanaan dáŋ zủʔasả nó mọʔi cɔ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa sɛm tʰăj kanaan fảʔi tôʔi cɔ kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mởzộŋ dất cɔ zafết cɔ ŋườʔiở nơʔi cạʔi kủʔa sɛm kòn kanaan fảʔi tôʔi kủʔa săw xi nô kòn sốŋ bɛcăm nămmươʔi vậʔi nô hưởŋtʰọ dượk cín căm nămmươʔi tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa sɛm cam zafết kɔncaj kủʔa nô săw xi sɛɲ kɔnkáʔi kɔncaj kủʔa zafết ɣômɛ maɣốk madaj zavan tubɛɲ mêsiếk tiza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣômɛ Ác zifát tôɣama kɔncaj kủʔa zavan tazêsi kítsim danim zɔ kó ŋườʔita càn za kák kùlaw kủʔa kák zân tùʔi tʰeo sứ tiếŋnóʔi cifáʔi zântộk kủʔa ciə za kɔncaj kủʔa cam kúk míczaim fút kanaan kɔncaj kủʔa kúk sêba havila sápta zaêma sáptêka kɔncaj kủʔa zaêma sêla dan kúk sɛɲ nimzốt ấʔilà ŋườʔi bắtdầʔu ʔɛɲhùŋ cên mặtdất ŋườʔi tăj tʰợsăn kandảm cướk Ðứkzê bởʔi kớ dó kó tụkŋữ zằŋ hệt ɲư nimzốt tăj tʰợsăn kandảm cướk Ðứkzê nướk ŋườʔi babên zết ʔakát kanɛ tạʔi sứ sinê ʔa từ sứ dó ŋườʔi dến sứ ʔasizi zồʔi tʰàɲ ninivɛ zêhôbôti kalác và tʰàɲ zêsɛn tʰàɲ zất ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ tʰàɲ ninivɛ kalác míczaim sɛɲ ludim ʔanamim lêhabim náptuhim bácusim kácluhim bởʔi dó sɛɲ filitin káptôzim kanaan sɛɲ sidôn kɔn cưởŋnam hếc kùŋ ɣiêbusít ʔamôzít ɣizêɣasít hêvít ʔazêkít sinít ʔavadít sêmazít hamatít kế dó ci tộk kanaan di lạk kòn dịʔa fận kanaan hướŋ ɣêza cạʔi sidôn tớʔi ɣasa hướŋ sôdôm ɣômôzơ sêbôʔim cạʔi dến lêsa kɔncáʔu kủʔa cam tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tiếŋnóʔi sứ zântộk kủʔa sɛm tổfụ kủʔa hêbɛ ʔɛɲkả kủʔa zafết kũŋ kó sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔncaj kủʔa sɛm ʔasựzơ ʔabáksát lút ʔazam kɔncaj kủʔa ʔazam ʔusơ hulơ ɣêtɛ mác kòn ʔabáksát sɛɲ sêlác sêlác sɛɲ hêbɛ hêbɛ sɛɲ dượk haj kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi bêlék dất cɔŋ dờʔi ŋườʔi dó dã ciə za cên kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔɛm ɣiốktan ɣiốktan sɛɲ ʔamôdát sêlép hasamavết ɣiêzác hadôzam ʔusa Ðʔiếk bɛɲ ʔabimaên sêba fiə havila ɣiôbáp hếttʰảʔi kák ŋườʔi dó kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiốktan kõʔi dất kủʔa kák ŋườʔi dó fíʔa sêfa cạʔi mêsa cɔdến núʔi Ðôŋ fươŋ kɔncáʔu kủʔa sɛm tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tiếŋnóʔi sứ zântộk kủʔa Ấʔilà kák họhàŋ kủʔa kɔncaj nô tùʔi tʰeo dờʔi zântộk kủʔa lạʔi kũŋ zɔ nơʔi kák zân ciə za cên mặtdất săw kơn nướk vả kả tʰiêɲạ dềʔu kó ɣiọŋ nóʔi tʰứ tiếŋ ɲưŋ xi Ðôŋ fươŋ zờʔi di ŋườʔita ɣặp dồŋbằŋ cɔŋ sứ sinê ʔa zồʔi tạʔi dó ŋườʔi nầʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kiə zằŋ hè cúŋta hãʔi ɣạc cɔŋ lửʔa lúk dó ɣạc tʰế cɔ dá kòn caj tʰế cɔ lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ nàʔɔ cúŋta hãʔi sâʔi káʔi tʰàɲ zựŋ káʔi tʰáp cót kaw dến cờʔi hãʔi lɔ cɔ zạŋ zɛɲ ʔɛ xi fảʔi lạk xắp cên mặtdất Ðứkzê ŋự suốŋ dặŋ sɛm káʔi tʰàɲ tʰáp kủʔa kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi sâʔi Ðứkzê fán zằŋ nầʔi cỉ kó tʰứzân kùŋ dồŋ tʰứ tiếŋ kiə kìʔa kôŋviệk cúŋnó dươŋ xởʔi bâʔizờ cẳŋ kòn ci ŋăn cúŋnó kák diềʔu dã kwiếtdịɲ dượk tʰôʔi cúŋta hãʔi suốŋ lộnsộn tiếŋnóʔi kủʔa cúŋnó cɔ ŋɛ xôŋ dượk tiếŋnóʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kiə zồʔi dó Ðứkzê cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi za xắp cên mặtdất tʰôʔi kôŋviệk sâʔicất tʰàɲ bởʔi kớ dó dặt tʰàɲ babên nơʔi dó Ðứkzê lộnsộn tiếŋnóʔi kủʔa kả tʰếzan dâʔi ŋàʔi cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi za xắp cên mặtdất Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa sɛm kác haj săw kơn nướk sɛm dượk cămtuổʔi sɛɲ ʔabáksát săw xi sɛm sɛɲ ʔabáksát zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk cămnăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ʔabáksát dượk bamươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ sêlác săw xi ʔabáksát sɛɲ sêlác zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk bốncăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi sêlác dượk bamươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ hêbɛ săw xi sêlác sɛɲ hêbɛ zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk bốncăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi hêbɛ dượk bamươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ bêlék săw xi hêbɛ sɛɲ bêlék zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk bốncăm bamươʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi bêlék dượk bamươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ zêhu săw xi bêlék sɛɲ zêhu zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk haj căm cín sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi zêhu dượk bamươʔi haj tuổʔi sɛɲ sêzúk săw xi zêhu sɛɲ sêzúk zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk haj căm bảʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi sêzúk dượk bamươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ nakô săw xi sêzúk sɛɲ nakô zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk haj cămnăm sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi nakô dượk haimươʔi cín tuổʔi sɛɲ tʰazê săw xi nakô sɛɲ tʰazê zồʔi kòn sốŋ dượk mộtcăm mườʔi cín sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kòntʰa zê dượk bảʔi mươʔi tuổʔi sɛɲ zam nakô hazan Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa tʰazê tʰazê sɛɲ zam nakô hazan hazan sɛɲ lót hazan kwadờʔi tạʔi kwêhươŋ mìɲ tứklà ʔuzu tʰuộk sứ kɛɲdê xi ca ŋườʔi tʰazê hãʔi kòn sốŋ zam nakô kướʔi zam sazaj kòn nakô miɲka miɲka zícka tứklà kɔŋáʔi kủʔa hazan vả sazaj sɔnsẻ nênŋườʔi xôŋ kó kɔn tʰazê zẫn zam kɔncaj mìɲ lót kɔncaj hazan cáʔu mìɲ sazaj zam tứk zâʔu mìɲ dồŋ za xỏʔi ʔuzơ tʰuộk sứ kɛɲdê dặŋ kwa sứ kanaan xi dến cazan tʰì zakư tạʔi dó tʰazê hưởŋtʰọ dượk haj cămnăm tuổʔi zồʔi kwadờʔi tạʔi cazan vả Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ zam zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi za xỏʔi kwêhươŋ vòŋ bàkɔn ɲà ca ŋươʔi di dến sứ cỉ cɔ ta cɔ ŋươʔi zân fướk cɔ ŋươʔi kùŋ nổʔizɛɲ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi tʰàɲ ŋuồn fướk ta fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cúk fướk cɔ ŋươʔi zủʔasả nàʔɔ zủʔasả ŋươʔi kák ci tộk nơʔi tʰếzan ɲờ ŋươʔi dượk fướk zồʔiÁp zam di tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zạʔi lót dồŋ di vớʔi ŋườʔi xiÁp zam za xỏʔi cazan tuổʔi ŋườʔi dượk bảʔi mươʔi zam zẫn sazaj mìɲ lót cáʔu mìɲ kả zatàʔi dã tʰâʔu ɣóp kák dầʔitớ dã dượk tạʔi cazan dó za dể di dến sứ kanaan zồʔi cúŋ dềʔu dến sứ kanaan zam cảʔi kwa sứ nầʔi dến kâʔi zẻ kủʔa môzê tạʔi sicɛm vả lúk dó zân kanaan tạʔi sứ Ðứkzê za kùŋ zam fán zằŋ ta cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dất nầʔi zồʔi tạʔi dó zam bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi từ dó ŋườʔi di kwa núʔi fíʔa dôŋ bêtên zồʔi dóŋ cạʔi fíʔa tâʔi kó bêtên fíʔa dôŋ kó ʔahi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi tạʔi dó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ ŋàʔi kế săw zam vừʔa di vừʔa dóŋ cạʔi dến nam fươŋ bấʔizờ cɔŋ sứ kơn dóʔicém dóʔicém ấʔi zam suốŋ sứ zíptô kiềʔu ŋụ xi hầʔu vàʔɔ dất zíptô zam nóʔi kùŋ sazaj mìɲ zằŋ nầʔi ŋươʔi ŋườʔi dờn dẹp ɣặp xi nàʔɔ zân zíptô tʰấʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà dó ɣiết ɲưŋ dể cɔ ŋươʔi sốŋ ta sin hãʔi sưŋ ŋươʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi dượk cọŋdãʔi ɣiữ tɔàn mạŋ zam vừʔa dến sứ zíptô zân zíptô ɲìn tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dờn dó dẹp kák ciềʔutʰần kủʔa fazaôn kùŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi cằm cồ cướk vwa dɔạn ŋườʔi dờn zẫn vàʔɔ kuŋ fazaôn vì kớ ŋườʔi fazaôn hậʔudãʔi zam zam dượk ɲiềʔu ciên lừʔa dựk lừʔa káʔi lạkdà tôʔi caj ɣáʔi sɔŋ sazaj zam Ðứkzê hàɲ fạt fazaôn kùŋ ɲà ŋườʔi tajhọʔa fazaôn dòʔi zam hỏʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dã làmci cɔ vậʔi saw xôŋ tâʔu vớʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi saw dã nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi dó ʔɛmɣáʔi tôʔi nỗʔi dã lấʔi nàŋ bâʔizờ ŋươʔi dâʔi hãʔi ɲận lấʔi didi Ðʔɔạn fazaôn lịɲ cɔ kwankwân dưʔa vợcồŋ zam kùŋ hếttʰảʔi tàʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi di zam zíptô zẫn kùŋ kák tàʔi mìɲ lót dồŋ cởlên nam fươŋ vả zam zất ɣiàʔukó súkvật vàŋ bạk ŋườʔi vừʔa di vừʔa dóŋ cạʔi nam fươŋ cởvề bêtên ʔahi nơʔi dã bàntʰờ lúk cướk dó zam kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ Ðứkzê vả lót kùŋ di vớʔi zam kũŋ kó ciên cạʔi sứ dó xôŋ dủ cỗ cɔ haj ŋườʔiở cuŋ tàʔi zất ɲiềʔu cɔdến dỗʔi xôŋ cuŋ ɲăw dượk cɔŋ xi zân kanaan zân fêzêsít cɔŋ sứ sảʔi kó cwiện cɛɲzàɲ kủʔa cănciên zam kùŋ cănciên lót zam nóʔi kùŋ lót zằŋ cúŋta kốtɲụk sin ŋươʔi kùŋ cẳŋ kãʔilẫʔi ɲăw cănciên kùŋ cănciên ŋươʔi kũŋ dừŋ cɛɲzàɲ ɲăw nữʔa tɔàn sứ cẳŋ cướk ŋươʔi saw vậʔi hãʔi lìʔa xỏʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi lấʔi hữʔu kwa lót ŋướk tʰấʔi xắp káɲ dồŋbằŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ nơʔi cướk xi Ðứkzê cưʔa fáhủʔi tʰàɲ sôdôm ɣômôzơ tʰảʔi dềʔu kó nướk cảʔi tướʔi xắp dến swa dồŋ kũŋɲư kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲư sứ zíptô vậʔi lót cọn lấʔi cɔ mìɲ káɲ dồŋbằŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ di kwa fíʔa Ðôŋ vậʔi haj ŋườʔi ciəzẽ ɲăw zam cɔŋ sứ kanaan kòn lót cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa dồŋbằŋ zờʔi cạʔi mìɲ dến sôdôm vả zân sôdôm dộkák fạmtộʔi cọŋ kùŋ Ðứkzê săw xi lót lìʔa xỏʔi zam zồʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zam zằŋ hãʔi ɲướŋ ɲìn cỗ ŋươʔi cɔdến fươŋ bắk fươŋ fươŋ dôŋ fươŋ tâʔi vì kả sứ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dờʔidờʔi ta cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ɲư bụʔi cên dất tʰếtʰì nếʔu nàʔɔ dếm dặŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di xắp cɔŋ sứ zàʔi ŋaŋ cɔ ŋươʔi sứ nầʔi Ðʔɔạn zam dờʔi cạʔi mìɲ dến nơʔi kâʔi zẻ tạʔi mamzê tʰuộk hếpzôn tạʔi dó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ dờʔi ʔamzafên vwa sinê ʔa ʔaziók vwa kếcôlaw mɛ vwa tidɛɲ vwa ɣôʔim vwa lạʔi cɛɲ ciến kùŋ bêza vwa sôdôm bizêsa vwa ɣômôzơ sinêáp vwa sêmêbê vwa sêbôʔim vwa bêla tứklà swa kák vwa nầʔi lạʔi tạʔi cũŋ sidiêm bâʔizờ muốʔi cɔŋ mườʔihaj kák vwa nầʔi dềʔu cư hầʔu kủʔa vwa kếcôlaw mɛ ɲưŋ kwa tʰứ mườʔiba tʰì zấʔi lɔạn ɲằm tʰứ mườʔibốn kếcôlawmɛ kùŋ kák vwa dồŋmiɲ kéʔɔ kwân dến zẹp zân zêfaim dất Ác têzótkanaim zân susin tạʔi dất ham zân cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ kiziətaim zân hôzít tạʔi núʔi sê ʔizơ cɔ dếnnơʔi ʔɛânbazan ɣần dồŋ vắŋ Ðʔɔạn kák vwa tʰâʔu biɲ cởvề dến suốʔisử dɔán tứk kadɛ dáɲ xắp zân ʔamalék zân ʔamôzít tạʔi hátsát sôntʰama kák vwa kủʔa sôdôm ɣômôzơ sêbôʔim vwa bêla tứklà swa suấtcận zàn biɲ dóŋ tạʔi cũŋ sidiêm dặŋ cốŋkự kùŋ kếcôlawmɛ vwa tidɛɲ vwa ɣôʔim ʔamzafên vwa sinê ʔa ʔaziók vwa dươŋ dịc kùŋ vả cɔŋ cũŋ sidiêm kó ɲiềʔu ɲựʔa caj vwa sôdôm vwa ɣômôzơ tʰwa cạʔi suốŋ kòn nàʔɔ tʰɔát dượk cạʔi cốn cên núʔi bên tʰắŋ cận kướp lấʔi kủʔakảʔi lươŋtʰựk kủʔa sôdôm ɣômôzơ zồʔi di ɣiặk kũŋ lót cáʔu kủʔa zam tạʔi sôdôm hếttʰảʔi zatàʔi ŋườʔi zồʔi dɛm di kó ŋườʔi tʰɔát dượk cạʔi dến báʔɔ diềʔu dó kùŋ zam ŋườʔi hêbơzơ zam tạʔi kâʔi zẻ kủʔa mamzê ŋườʔi ʔamôzít ʔɛɲ kủʔa Ếc kôn ʔanɛ ŋườʔi nầʔi dã kó ướk kùŋ zam xiÁp zam hăj dượk cáʔu mìɲ kwân ɣiặk ciêʔutập bɛcăm mườʔitám zɛɲân dã tậplwiện sɛɲ dẻ nơʔi ɲà mìɲ duổʔi tʰeo kák vwa dó dến dất Ðʔan ÐʔɔạnÁp zam ciə dầʔitớ mìɲ za tʰừʔa bandêm sôŋ kwân ŋịc dáɲduổʔi tʰeo dến dất hôba fíʔa Ðʔa mác ŋườʔi tʰâʔu dủ kák tàʔi kwân ɣiặk dã kướp lấʔi lạʔi kũŋ zẫn cáʔu mìɲ lót kùŋ zatàʔi ŋườʔi dờn zâncúŋ cởvề săw xi zam dáɲbạʔi kếcôlawmɛ kák vwa dồŋmiɲ tʰắŋ cận cởvề tʰì vwa sôdôm za dónzướk ŋườʔi tạʔi cũŋ savɛ tứklà cũŋ vwa mêncisêdék vwa salɛm saj dɛm báɲ zượʔu za vả vwa nầʔi tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔicí kaw cúk fướk cɔ zam nóʔi zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔicí kaw Ðấŋ zựŋ cờʔi dất fướk cɔ zam Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn tʰăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔicí kaw dã fó tʰùŋịc vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn zam lấʔi fần mườʔi kả kủʔa ɣiặk zâŋ cɔ vwa dó vwa sô dôm nóʔi kùŋ zam zằŋ hãʔi zaw ŋườʔi cɔ kòn kủʔakảʔi tʰì ŋươʔi tʰâʔu lấʔi zam dáp lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi ɣiơ tăj cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔicí kaw cúʔatể kủʔa cờʔi dất tʰề zằŋ hễ kủʔa ci tʰuộk vwa zầʔu dến sợʔi cỉ hăjlà sợʔi zâʔi ɣiàʔi dinữʔa tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ lấʔi ʔɛ vwa nóʔi dượk zằŋ ɲờ cɔ zam ɣiàʔukó cỉ ci kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cẻ dã fần kủʔa kák ŋườʔi kùŋ di vớʔi tôʔi ʔanɛ Ếc kôn mamzê fần hãʔi lấʔi fần kủʔa di săw kák việk dó cɔŋ tʰấʔi kó lờʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zam zằŋ hỡʔiÁp zam ŋươʔi cớ ci tadâʔi káʔi tʰuẫn dỡ cɔ ŋươʔi fầntʰưởŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi zất zam tʰưʔa zằŋ lạʔicúʔazê cúʔa cɔ tôʔi ci tôʔi cết xôŋ kɔn nốʔiŋiệp ɲà tôʔi liêsɛ ŋườʔi Ðʔa mác zam lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi cúʔa cɔ tôʔi twiệt tôʔitớ sɛɲ dẻ tạʔi ɲà tôʔi ŋườʔi kếŋiệp tôʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zam zằŋ kẻ dó cẳŋ fảʔi kếŋiệp ŋươʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ ʔaj cɔŋ ɣanzuột ŋươʔi za ŋườʔi kếŋiệp ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋàʔi zẫn ŋườʔi za ŋɔàʔi fán zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi ŋó cờʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi dếm dượk kák ŋôʔisaw tʰì hãʔi dếm di ŋàʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi zam Ðứkzê tʰì ŋàʔi dó kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ zam zằŋ ta Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã zẫn ŋươʔi za xỏʔi ʔuzơ tʰuộk sứ kɛɲdê dể cɔ ŋươʔi sứ nầʔi sảnŋiệp zam tʰưʔa zằŋ lạʔicúʔazê bởʔi kớ ci tôʔi zằŋ tôʔi dượk sứ nầʔi sảnŋiệp Ðứkzê dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi dɛm cɔ kɔn káʔi tuổʔi kɔn zê káʔi tuổʔi kɔnciên dựk tuổʔi kɔn ku zừŋ kɔn kâʔu kɔn zam dủ kák lɔàʔi dó haj dể mỗʔi nửʔa kɔn mỗʔi dốʔivớʔi ɲăw ɲưŋ xôŋ kák lɔàʔi cim za haj kó ɲữŋ cim mồʔi băj dáp cên mấʔi kɔn tʰú cết dó sɔŋ zam duổʔi di vả xi mặtcờʔi vừʔa tʰì zam ŋủmê nầʔi kơn kiɲhãʔi tốʔităm ɲập vàʔɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zam zằŋ fảʔibiết zằŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ŋụ cɔŋ sứ cẳŋ tʰuộk cúŋnó tôʔimọʔi cɔ zân sứ dó bốncăm ɲưŋ dɔán fạt zân zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi tôʔimọʔi dó zồʔi xi za xỏʔi sứ tʰì dượk kủʔakảʔi zất ɲiềʔu kòn ŋươʔi bìɲiên nơʔi tổfụ hưởŋ lộk ɣià suŋsướŋ zồʔi kwadờʔi dờʔi tʰứtư zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi cởlạʔi dâʔi tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa zân ʔamôzít cưʔa dượk dầʔizẫʔi xi mặtcờʔi dã tʰìɲlìɲ tốʔimịt ɣiáŋ suốŋ kìʔa kó xóʔi ŋọn lửʔa lòʔɛ ŋaŋ kwa kák sáktʰịt dã ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê zawướk kùŋ zam fán zằŋ ta cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi sứ nầʔi sôŋ zíptô cɔdến sôŋ kiə tứk sôŋ fơzát sứ kủʔa kák zân kênít kênêsít kátmônít hêtít fêzêsít zêfaim ʔamônít kanaan ɣiêɣasít ɣiêbusít vả sazaj kủʔa zam xôŋ sɛɲ kɔn nàŋ kó kɔndòʔi zíptô ʔaɣa sazaj nóʔi kùŋ zam zằŋ nầʔi Ðứkzê dã cɔ tôʔi sɔnsẻ vậʔi sin ôŋ hãʔi lạʔi kùŋ kɔndòʔi tôʔi kólẽ tôʔi ɲờ kó kɔn căŋ zam ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa sazaj săw xi zam dã cúŋụ mườʔi tạʔi sứ kanaan sazaj ŋườʔi ʔaɣa kɔndòʔi zíptô mìɲ dưʔa cɔ cồŋ hầʔu ŋườʔi lạʔi kùŋ kɔndòʔi tʰì nàŋ tʰọtʰaj xi kɔndòʔi tʰấʔi mìɲ tʰọtʰaj tʰì xiɲbỉ củ mìɲ sazaj nóʔi kùŋ zam zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu sỉɲụk tôʔi dâʔi dổ lạʔi cên ôŋ tôʔi dã fú kɔndòʔi tôʔi vàʔɔ lòŋ ôŋ xi tʰấʔi mìɲ tʰọtʰaj tʰì lạʔi xiɲ tôʔi kầʔuÐứkzê sétdɔán ɣiữʔa tôʔi vớʔi ôŋ zam dáp kùŋ sazaj zằŋ nầʔi kɔndòʔi dó cɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi fânsử tʰểnàʔɔ mặký ŋươʔi cɔ vừʔa zạ Ðʔɔạnsa zaj hàɲhạ ʔaɣa tʰì nàŋ cốn di xỏʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰấʔi nàŋ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɣần suốʔi nướk nơʔi dườŋ di suzơ tʰì hỏʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ʔaɣa dòʔi kủʔa sazaj ŋươʔi dâʔu dến di dâʔu nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi láɲ sa sazaj củ tôʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê zạʔi nàŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi cởvề củ ŋươʔi cịʔu lụʔi zướʔi tăj ŋườʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi fán zằŋ ta tʰêm zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu dôŋdảʔɔ dến dỗʔi ŋườʔita dếm xôŋ dặŋ nữʔa lạʔi fán zằŋ nầʔi ŋươʔi dươŋ kótʰaj sɛɲ caj dặt Íc Ðứkzê kó ŋɛ sầʔu xổ kủʔa ŋươʔi Ðứʔa cẻ dó ɲư kɔn lừʔa zừŋ tăj dịc kùŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi tăj mọʔi ŋườʔi dịc lạʔi nó fíʔa dôŋ dốʔimặt kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ nàŋ ɣọʔi Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ mìɲ zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj dɔáʔi sɛm nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ cíɲ tạʔi dâʔi tôʔi cẳŋ kó tʰấʔi dượk Ðắŋ dɔáʔi sɛm tôʔi saw bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi káʔi ɣiếŋ nầʔi ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ kủʔa kadɛ bêzɛ ɣiếŋ lɛcajzɔj zồʔi nàŋ ʔaɣa sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj zam dặt dứʔa caj dó Íc vảlạʔi xi ʔaɣa sɛɲ Íc cɔ zam tʰì zam dã dượk mươʔi sáʔu tuổʔi xiÁp zam dượk cín mươʔi cín tuổʔi tʰì Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi fán zằŋ ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi diở cướk ŋườʔi cọnvẹn ta zawướk kùŋ ŋươʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu kwá bộʔi zam mìɲ suốŋ dất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ nầʔi fần tadâʔi dã zawướk kùŋ ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi cởnên tổfụ kủʔa ɲiềʔu zântộk tʰiêɲạ cẳŋ kòn ɣọʔi ŋươʔi zam nữʔa ɲưŋ ŋươʔi zaham dặt ŋươʔi tổfụ kủʔa ɲiềʔu zântộk ta cɔ ŋươʔi sɛɲ zất ɲiềʔu cɔ ŋươʔi tʰàɲ ɲiềʔu nướk kák vwa zɔ nơʔi ŋươʔi za ta zawướk kùŋ ŋươʔi kùŋ hậʔu ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi ấʔilà zawướk dờʔidờʔi hầʔu cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi kủʔa zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ta cɔ ŋươʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi sứ ŋươʔi dươŋ kiềʔu ŋụ tứk tɔàn sứ kanaan kơŋiệp dờʔidờʔi vậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa Ðʔɔạn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ zaham zằŋ fần ŋươʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dờʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə ɣiữ zawướk kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cịʔufép kắt ấʔilà zawướk kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ tứk zawướk ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi săw ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cịʔu kắt fép dó zấʔuhiệʔu kủʔa zawướk ɣiữʔa kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi hɔặk sɛɲ dẻ tạʔi ɲà hɔặk dɛm za mwa nơʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cẳŋ tʰuộk zòŋzốŋ ŋươʔi dượk ŋàʔi zồʔi dềʔu fảʔi cịʔufép kắt cớ xá làmfép kắt cɔ ʔaj sɛɲ tạʔi cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi hăj dɛm za mwa zawướk kủʔa dờʔidờʔi cɔŋ sáktʰịt kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vậʔi một ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ cịʔufép kắt nơʔi sáktʰịt mìɲ cuất za xỏʔi ŋɔàʔi zânsự mìɲ ŋườʔi dó bộʔi lờʔi zawướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ zaham zằŋ kòn sazaj ŋươʔi cớ ɣọʔilà sazaj nữʔa ɲưŋ saza ŋườʔi dó ta fướk cɔ nàŋ lạʔi zɔ nơʔi nàŋ cɔ ŋươʔi kɔncaj ta fướk cɔ nàŋ nàŋ kák zântộk ɲữŋ vwa kủʔa kák zântộk zɔ nơʔi nàŋ za zaham mìɲ suốŋ dất kườʔi nóʔitʰầm zằŋ hồzễ ŋườʔi dã cămtuổʔi zồʔi sɛɲ kɔn dượk căŋ kònsa za tuổʔi dã cín mươʔi sɛɲ dượk saw zaham tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛc ʔi zằŋ cớci Íc dượk sốŋ cướk ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ tʰật vậʔi saza ŋươʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj zồʔi ŋươʔi dặt ʔisák ta zawướk kùŋ dể zawướk dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ta kũŋ ɲậm lờʔi ŋươʔi sin cɔ Íc nầʔi fướk cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ ŋườʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu kwá bộʔi ŋườʔi tổfụ kủʔa mườʔihaj kôŋ hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi tʰàɲ zân ɲưŋ zawướk kùŋ ʔisák dộ xɔảŋ nầʔi tớʔi saza fảʔi sɛɲ cɔ ŋươʔi xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán sɔŋ tʰì ŋàʔi zaham ŋự cáɲ ŋàʔi dó zaham Íc kɔncaj mìɲ hếttʰảʔi kák ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲà hɔặk sɛɲ tạʔi dó hɔặk dɛm za mwa làmfép kắt cɔ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fảʔi zặn vả xi zaham cịʔufép kắt tʰì dã dượk cín mươʔi cín tuổʔi kòn Íc kɔnŋườʔi xi cịʔufép kắt tʰì dượk mườʔiba tuổʔi kũŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zaham Íc cịʔufép kắt mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲà hɔặk sɛɲ tạʔi dó hɔặk dɛm za mwa nơʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ dồŋ cịʔufép kắt vớʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkzê za kùŋ zaham nơʔi kâʔi zẻ kủʔa mamzê dươŋ xi ŋồʔi nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi lúk cờʔi nắŋ banŋàʔi zaham ɲướŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ cướk vừʔa xi tʰấʔi kửʔa cạʔi cạʔi dến cướk ŋườʔi dó mìɲ suốŋ dất tʰưʔa zằŋ lạʔicúʔa nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk cúʔa sin hãʔi ɣé lạʔi ɲà tôʔitớ cúʔa dừŋ di sin kák dấŋ hãʔi cɔfép ŋườʔita lấʔi cút nướk zửʔa cơn kák dấŋ sin hãʔi ŋỉmát zướʔi kộʔi kâʔi nầʔi tôʔi di dɛm miếŋ báɲ cɔ kák dấŋ vữŋlòŋ zồʔi zờʔi ɣót lêndườŋ kớ ấʔi mớʔi kwábộ lạʔi ɲà tôʔitớ kák dấŋ vậʔi kák dấŋ fán zằŋ hãʔi kứviệk ɲư ŋươʔi dã nóʔi Ðʔɔạn zaham lậtdật vàʔɔ cạʔi dếnkùŋ saza zằŋ hãʔi măw măw lấʔi dấʔu lọk ɲồʔi di zồʔi báɲ ɲỏ zaham cạʔi lạʔi bầʔi kɔn kɔn ŋɔn zaw cɔ dầʔitớ măw măw nấʔu zọn zồʔi lấʔi sữʔa sữʔa kùŋ kɔn kɔn dã nấʔu sɔŋ zọn ŋăj cướk kák dấŋ kòn ŋườʔi tʰì dứŋ hầʔu cướk zướʔi kộʔi kâʔi vậʔi kák dấŋ dó kák dấŋ hỏʔi zaham zằŋ saza ŋươʔi dâʔu zằŋ kìʔa nàŋ cɔŋ cạʔi kiə một dấŋ nóʔi zằŋ cɔŋ dộ nữʔa cởlạʔi dâʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ saj cừŋ dó saza ŋươʔi kó kɔncaj saza nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi săw lưŋ dấŋ dó ŋɛ kák lờʔi nầʔi vả zaham kùŋ saza dã ɣià tuổʔiták dã kaw saza xôŋ kòn ci nữʔa ɲư tʰếtʰườŋ ŋườʔi dờn saza kườʔi tʰầm zằŋ ɣià ɲư tôʔi tʰế nầʔi zễ kòn dượk diềʔu vuj dó saw kòn cúʔa tôʔi kũŋ dã ɣià zồʔi Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi zaham zằŋ kớsaw saza kườʔi ɲư vậʔimà zằŋ kó kwảtʰật zằŋ tôʔi ɣià dến tʰế nầʔi lạʔi kòn sɛɲ căŋ há diềʔu ci Ðứkzê xôŋ dượk căŋ dã dịɲ cɔŋ nữʔa cởlạʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi saza kó kɔncaj vìsa za cốʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi kó kườʔi dâʔu ɲưŋŋàʔi fán zằŋ tʰật ŋươʔi kó kườʔi dó kák dấŋ dềʔu dứŋzậʔi di ŋó fíʔa sôdôm zaham kũŋ tʰeo dể bướk kák dấŋ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ lẽnàʔɔ ɣiấʔu zaham diềʔu ci làmsaw zaham cắk dượk cởnên zân kườŋ tʰạɲ kák zântộk cên tʰếzan dềʔu ɲờ ŋườʔi dượk fướk ta dã cọn ŋườʔi dặŋ ŋườʔi xiến zạʔi kák kɔn kùŋ nộʔi ɲà ŋườʔi ɣiữ tʰeo dạʔɔ Ðứkzê kák diềʔu kôŋbìɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰếtʰì Ðứkzê cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa kùŋ zaham Ðứkzê fán zằŋ tiếŋ kêʔuwan sôdôm ɣômôzơ tʰậtlà kwá tộʔilỗʔi kák tʰàɲ dó tʰậtlà cọŋ ta ŋự suốŋ dể sɛmsét cúŋnó kó tʰật ɲư tiếŋ dã kêʔu tʰấʔu dến căŋ nếʔu cẳŋ tʰật tʰì vậʔi tʰì dấŋ dó di kwa hướŋ sôdôm ɲưŋ zaham hãʔi kòn dứŋ cầʔu cướk Ðứkzê zaham lạʔi ɣần tʰưʔa zằŋ cúʔa ziệt ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ vớʔi ŋườʔi dộkák saw ŋộ cɔŋ tʰàɲ kó nămmươʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cúʔa kũŋ ziệt saw há cẳŋ tʰatʰứ cɔ tʰàɲ dó kớ nămmươʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔŋ saw xôŋlẽnàʔɔ cúʔa diềʔu ɲưvậʔi ziệt ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ vớʔi dộkák dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kũŋɲư ŋườʔi dộkák xôŋ cúʔa cẳŋ diềʔu ɲưvậʔi bawzờ Ðấŋ dɔán sét tɔàn tʰếzan lạʔi xôŋ kôŋbìɲ saw Ðứkzê fán zằŋ nếʔu dượk cɔŋ sôdôm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tìɲtʰươŋ bấʔiɲiêʔu ŋườʔi dó tʰa kả tʰàɲ zaham lạʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ mặkzầʔu tôʔi dâʔi cɔ bụʔi sɔŋ tôʔi kũŋ zám kảɣan tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ cúʔa hãʔi cɔŋ nămmươʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ zủʔi tʰiếʔu kớ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔu cúʔa ziệt kả tʰàɲ căŋ ŋàʔi cảlờʔi zằŋ nếʔu dượk kó mươʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ ziệt tʰàɲ dâʔu zaham kứ tʰưʔa zằŋ ŋộ cɔŋ tʰàɲ cỉ kó mươʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰì zasaw ŋàʔi fán zằŋ ta cẳŋ ziệt dâʔu tìɲtʰươŋ mươʔi nầʔi zaham kứ tôʔi sin cúʔa dừŋ ɣiận tʰì tôʔi tʰưʔa ŋộ cɔŋ dó cỉ kó bamươʔi ŋườʔi tʰì zasaw ŋàʔi fán nếʔu cɔŋ dó kó bamươʔi ŋườʔi tʰì cẳŋ ziệt dâʔu zaham tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi dâʔi kũŋ kảɣan tʰưʔa kùŋ cúʔa nếʔu cỉ kó haimươʔi ŋườʔi tʰì lạʔi làmsaw ŋàʔi zằŋ vì tìɲtʰươŋ haimươʔi ŋườʔi dó cẳŋ ziệt tʰàɲ dâʔu zaham lạʔi tʰưʔa sincúʔa dừŋ ɣiận dể cɔ tôʔi tʰưʔa cỉ nầʔi nữʔa ŋộ cỉ kó mườʔi ŋườʔi tʰì ŋĩ làmsaw ŋàʔi fán zằŋ ta kũŋ cẳŋ ziệt tʰàɲ dâʔu tìɲtʰươŋ mườʔi ŋườʔi dó xiÐứkzê fán sɔŋ kùŋ zaham tʰì ŋàʔi ŋự di kòn zaham cởvề cạʔi mìɲ lốʔi ciềʔu haj tʰiênsứ dến sôdôm lúk dó lót dươŋ ŋồʔi tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ xilót tʰấʔi haj tʰiênsứ dến dứŋzậʔi dónzướk mìɲ suốŋ dất ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ nầʔi lạʔi haj cúʔa sin hãʔi dến ɲà kủʔa tôʔitớ hãʔi ŋỉ dêm tạʔi dó haj cúʔa hãʔi zửʔa cơn zồʔi sáŋmaj tʰứkzậʔi lêndườŋ haj tʰiênsứ fán zằŋ xôŋ dêm nầʔi ŋɔàʔi dườŋ ɲưŋlót kố mờʔi cɔdến dỗʔi haj tʰiênsứ fảʔi dilạʔi vàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ ŋườʔi zâŋ bữʔa tiệk báɲ xôŋ mɛn haj tʰiênsứ zùŋ tiệk haj tʰiênsứ cưʔa di kák ŋườʔi sôdôm cẻ dến ɣià tứk kả zân dềʔu cạʔi dến baw cuŋkwɛɲ ɲà bọn dó ɣọʔi lót hỏʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ xák dã vàʔɔ ɲàŋươʔi buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi năj dâʔu hãʔi zẫn za dâʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋta dượk lót za dếnkùŋ zâncúŋ ŋɔàʔi kửʔa zồʔi dóŋkửʔa lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi sin ʔɛɲɛm dừŋ diềʔu ák dó Ðâʔi tôʔi kó haj kɔŋáʔi cưʔa cồŋ tôʔi dưʔa cúŋnó cɔ ʔɛɲɛm zồʔi mặktìɲ ʔɛɲɛm tíɲ làmsaw tùʔiý dừŋ cɔ hạʔi cɔ haj ŋườʔi kiə kớ dó dến núpbóŋ máʔi ɲà tôʔi bọn zâncúŋ nóʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi cáɲ cỗ xák lạʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi dến dâʔi ɲư kiềʔu ŋụ lạʔi dɔán sét nữʔa saw vậʔi tʰôʔi cúŋta dãʔi ŋươʔi bạk haj xác kiə Ðʔɔạn lót mạɲ kwá càn dến dặŋ fá kửʔa ɲưŋ haj tʰiênsứ ɣiơ tăj za dɛm lót vàʔɔ ɲà dóŋkửʔa lạʔi dɔạn hàɲ fạt zâncúŋ ŋɔàʔi kửʔa cẻ dến ɣià dềʔu kwáŋ lòʔa cɔdến dỗʔi kửʔa xôŋ dượk haj tʰiênsứ hỏʔi lót zằŋ ŋươʔi kòn kó ʔaj tạʔi dâʔi nữʔa căŋ zể kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ʔaj cɔŋ tʰàɲtʰuộk ŋươʔi hãʔi dɛm za xỏʔi di cúŋta hủʔiziệt cỗ nầʔi tiếŋ kêʔuwan zân tʰàɲ nầʔi dã tʰấʔu dến Ðứkzê ŋàʔi saj cúŋta suốŋ hủʔiziệt lót di za nóʔi kùŋ zể dã kướʔi kɔŋáʔi mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di za xỏʔi cốn nầʔi Ðứkzê hủʔiziệt tʰàɲ ɲưŋ kák càŋ zể tưởŋ ŋườʔi nóʔicơʔi sáŋ haj tʰiênsứ hốʔi lót fán zằŋ hãʔi tʰứkzậʔi zẫn haj kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi dươŋ dâʔi za ʔɛ xi ŋươʔi kũŋ cết lâʔi việk hìɲfạt kủʔa tʰàɲ nữʔa căŋ ɲưŋlót lầnlữʔa kớ Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót lót haj tʰiênsứ lấʔi taj kéʔɔ ŋườʔi kùŋ haj kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi zẫn za xỏʔi tʰàɲ vả xi haj tʰiênsứ zẫn za xỏʔi zồʔi cɔŋ haj nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cạʔi cốn kứʔu lấʔi mạŋ dừŋ ŋó lạʔi săw kũŋ dừŋ zừŋ bướk lạʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ ŋɔàʔi dồŋbằŋ hãʔi cạʔi cốn núʔi kẻʔɔ fảʔi bỏmìɲ căŋ lót dáp lạʔi zằŋ lạʔicúʔa xôŋ dượk nầʔi tôʔitớ dã dượk cướk cúʔa cúʔa dã lòŋ ɲơn zất kùŋ tôʔi kứʔu còn sốŋ tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cạʔi cốn núʔi xôŋ cướk xi tainạn dến tʰì tôʔi fảʔi cết kìʔa tʰàɲ kiə dã ɲỏ lạʔi kũŋ ɣần dặŋ tôʔi kó tʰế mìɲ Ôʔi cớci cúʔa cɔ tôʔi dó dặŋ kứʔu còn sốŋ tôʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ɲỏ saw tʰiênsứ fán zằŋ Ðâʔi nầʔi cɔ ŋươʔi nữʔa xôŋ hủʔiziệt tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi dã nóʔi dó dâʔu măw măw hãʔi lạʔi dó xôŋ làmci dượk xi ŋươʔi cưʔa vàʔɔ dếnnơʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi swa xi mặtcờʔi mọk xỏʔi dất tʰì lót vàʔɔ dến tʰàɲ swa Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ mưʔa ziêm sɛɲ lửʔa nơʔi ŋàʔi cên cờʔi suốŋ sôdôm ɣômôzơ hủʔiziệt haj tʰàɲ nầʔi kả dồŋbằŋ hếttʰảʔi zânsự kùŋ kák kâʔicỏ nơʔi dất dó ɲưŋ kủʔa lót kwăj ŋó lạʔi dặŋ săw mìɲ hóʔaza tượŋ muốʔi zaham zậʔi di dếnnơʔi ŋườʔi dã dứŋ cầʔu Ðứkzê ŋó hướŋ sôdôm ɣômôzơ kùŋ xắp sứ dồŋbằŋ tʰì tʰấʔi zướʔi dất băj luồŋ xóʔi ɲư xóʔi kủʔa lửʔa vả xi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hủʔiziệt kák tʰàɲ nơʔi dồŋbằŋ tứklà tʰàɲ lót tʰì ɲớ dến zaham kứʔu lót za xỏʔi cốn fá dó lót swa tʰì sợhãʔi kùŋ haj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ dó núʔi cɔŋ haŋ dá kiə kô nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛm mìɲ zằŋ ca dã ɣià xôŋ kòn ʔaj cên mặtdất dến sáɲzwiên kùŋ tʰeo ɲư tʰếtʰườŋ tʰiêɲạ hè cúŋta hãʔi fụk zượʔu cɔ ca lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dể lưʔucwiền zòŋzốŋ ca lạʔi dó haj nàŋ fụk zượʔu cɔ ca mìɲ nàŋ dến kùŋ ca ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ hăj lúknàʔɔ nàŋ lúknàʔɔ nàŋ zậʔi kwa ŋàʔimaj cị nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛm zằŋ nầʔi dêmhôm kwa dã kùŋ ca zồʔi hômnăj cúŋta hãʔi fụk zượʔu cɔ ca nữʔa zồʔi ʔɛm hãʔi lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dể lưʔucwiền zòŋzốŋ ca lạʔi dó haj nàŋ lạʔi fụk zượʔu cɔ ca mìɲ nữʔa zồʔi nàŋ ɲỏ tʰứkzậʔi lạʔi kùŋ ca ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ hăj lúknàʔɔ nàŋ lúknàʔɔ nàŋ zậʔi vậʔi haj kɔŋáʔi kủʔa lót zɔ nơʔi ca mìɲ tʰọtʰaj nàŋ sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj dặt môáp ấʔilà tổfụ kủʔa zân môáp dến bâʔizờ ŋườʔi ʔɛm kũŋ sɛɲ dặŋ kɔncaj dặt cên bênammi ấʔilà tổfụ kủʔa zân ʔammôn dến bâʔizờ zaham dó di dến nam kiềʔu ŋụ tạʔi ɣêza ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ kadɛ suzơ zaham nóʔi saza mìɲ zằŋ nó ʔɛmɣáʔi tôʔi ʔabimêlék vwa ɣêza saj ŋườʔi saza ɲưŋ cɔŋ kơn ciêmbaw bandêm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dếnkùŋ vwa ʔabimêlék fán zằŋ nầʔi ŋươʔi cết bởʔi kớ ŋườʔi dờn ŋươʔi dã dến nàŋ kó cồŋ zồʔi vả vwa ʔabimêlék cưʔa dến ɣần ŋườʔi dó tʰưʔa zằŋ lạʔicúʔa cúʔa hủʔiziệt kả zân kôŋbìɲ căŋ ŋườʔi dó cẳŋ nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ ấʔilà ʔɛmɣáʔi tôʔi căŋ cáɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ nóʔi zằŋ ấʔilà ʔɛɲ tôʔi saw tôʔi nầʔi bởʔi lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ tăj tʰɛɲxiết kủʔa tôʔi cɔŋ kơn ciêmbaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán nữʔa zằŋ ta kũŋ ŋươʔi lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ diềʔu dó bởʔi kớ ấʔi mớʔi ŋăncở ŋươʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ xôŋ cɔ dộŋ dến ŋườʔi dó bâʔizờ hãʔi zaw dờn dó lạʔi cɔ cồŋ cồŋ dấŋ tiênci kầʔuŋwiện cɔ ŋươʔi tʰì ŋươʔi mớʔi dượk sốŋ kòn ɲưxôŋ zaw lạʔi tʰìfảʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi ʔaj tʰuộk ŋươʔi kwả cết vwa ʔabimêlék zậʔi dòʔi kák tôʔitớ mìɲ dến tʰuật lạʔi mọʔi lờʔi tʰì lấʔilàm kiɲŋạk zồʔi ʔabimêlék dòʔi zaham nóʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dã làmɣì cɔ vậʔi ta kó diềʔu ci mấtlòŋ căŋ ŋươʔi cɔ kả nướk fảʔi việk fạmtộʔi zườŋ nầʔi Ðốʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi dã ɲữŋ việk xôŋ dó vwa ʔabimêlék lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ zaham zằŋ ŋươʔi kó ɣì ɲưvậʔi zaham dáp tôʔi ŋĩ zằŋ cɔŋ sứ nầʔi tʰật xôŋ kó ʔaj kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì kớ tôʔi ɣiết tôʔi căŋ ɲưŋ kũŋ tʰậtlà ʔɛmɣáʔi tôʔi ʔɛm ca xák tôʔi kướʔi xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ tôʔi fảʔi lưʔulạk sa ɲà ca tʰì tôʔi kó nóʔi vớʔi nàŋ zằŋ nầʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi cɔ hễ cỗ nàʔɔ cúŋta di dến hãʔi nóʔi Ấʔilà ʔɛɲ tôʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa ʔabimêlék dɛm ciên tôʔi caj kùŋ ɣáʔi cɔ zaham cả saza ŋườʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ nầʔi sứ zàɲ cɔ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi tʰíc dâʔu tʰì dó zồʔi vwa fán kùŋ saza zằŋ Ðâʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi mộtŋàn miếŋ bạk dó zùŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ɲư bứk cɛ cướkmắt mọʔi việk dã sảʔiza kùŋ ŋươʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu cɔ ŋươʔi kôŋbìɲ zaham kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì ŋàʔi cữʔa bịɲ cɔ vwa ʔabimêlék kùŋ kák kɔndòʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi dềʔu kó kɔn vả lúk cướk saza zaham Ðứkzê cɔ kả ɲà ʔabimêlék dềʔu sɔnsẻ Ðứkzê dến viếŋ saza tʰeo ɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán cɔ nàŋ ɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã nóʔi saza tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj cɔ zaham cɔŋ xi tuổʔi dã ɣià dúŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dịɲ zaham dặt dứʔa caj saza dã sɛɲ cɔ mìɲ ʔisák Ðúŋ ŋàʔi zaham làmfép kắt cɔ ʔisák tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zặn vả xi ʔisák zadờʔi tʰì zaham dã dượk cămtuổʔi saza nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ tôʔi việk vuikườʔi hếttʰảʔi ʔaj hăj dượk kũŋ vuikườʔi kủʔa tôʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ há ʔaj zám nóʔi vớʔi zaham zằŋ saza cɔ kɔn tôʔi dã sɛɲ dứʔa caj cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi ɣiàʔiếʔu zồʔi Ðứʔa cẻ tʰìtʰôʔi cáɲ ŋàʔi ʔisák tʰôʔi zaham bàʔi tiệk ănmừŋ saza tʰấʔi dứʔa caj kủʔa ʔaɣa ŋườʔi zíptô dã sɛɲ cɔ zaham kườʔicợt tʰì ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi zaham zằŋ hãʔi duổʔi kɔndòʔi vớʔi kɔn didi dứʔa caj kủʔa kɔndòʔi nầʔi cẳŋ dượk kếŋiệp kùŋ kɔncaj tôʔi ʔisák dâʔu lờʔi nầʔi lấʔilàm lòŋ zaham kớ kɔncaj mìɲ ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ zaham zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ buồnbựk kɔncaj kɔndòʔi ŋươʔi saza nóʔi tʰểnàʔɔ hãʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zɔ nơʔi ʔisák sɛɲ za zòŋzõʔi lưʔuzɛɲ ŋươʔi ta kũŋ cɔ dứʔa caj kủʔa kɔndòʔi cởnên zân kũŋ zɔ nơʔi ŋươʔi za zaham zậʔi lấʔi báɲ bầʔu nướk dưʔa cɔ ʔaɣa dể kák dó cên vaj nàŋ zaw dứʔa caj cɔ nàŋ zồʔi duổʔi di nàŋ zadi di zôŋzàʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ bê ʔɛsêba xi nướk cɔŋ bầʔu dã nàŋ dể dứʔa cẻ zướʔi kộʔi kâʔi ɲỏ kiə di ŋồʔi dốʔiziện kác sasa zàʔi cừŋ xɔảŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ôʔi tôʔi nỡnàʔɔ tʰấʔi dứʔa cẻ fảʔi cết nàŋ ŋồʔi dốʔiziện dó kấttiếŋ xók Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ dứʔa cẻ xók tʰì tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi kêʔu nàŋ ʔaɣa fán zằŋ hỡʔi ʔaɣa ŋươʔi kódiềʔu ɣì vậʔi cớ ci Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã ŋɛ tiếŋ dứʔa cẻ dâʔudó zồʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi dỡ lấʔi dứʔa cẻ ɣiơ tăj cɔ zân Ðʔɔạn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nàŋ za nàŋ tʰấʔi káʔi ɣiếŋ nướk dilạʔi múk dầʔi bầʔu cɔ dứʔa cẻ ʔuốŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vùʔa ɣiúp dứʔa cẻ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ kó tàʔi kuŋ nó tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ fazan kướʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kwê sứ zíptô về tʰuở dó vwa ʔabimêlék ficôn kwan tổŋbiɲ mìɲ nóʔi kùŋ zaham zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vùʔa ɣiúp ŋươʔi cɔŋ mọʔi việk ŋươʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi cỉ zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰề zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ ɣạt kɔn kùŋ zòŋzốŋ ɲưŋ ŋươʔi dãʔi sứ ŋươʔi dươŋ cúŋụ mộtlòŋ ɲư dã dãʔi ŋươʔi vậʔi zaham dáp zằŋ tôʔi sin tʰề zaham fànnàn kùŋ vwa ʔabimêlék ɣiếŋ kiə dầʔitớ ŋườʔi ciếmdɔạt vwa ʔabimêlék nóʔi zằŋ ta cẳŋ hăj ʔaj dã nôŋnổʔi dó cíɲ ŋươʔi cẳŋ cɔ hăj cướk ŋàʔinăj mớʔi zõ dâʔi tʰôʔi Ðʔɔạn zaham ciên zâŋ cɔ vwa ʔabimêlék zồʔi haj ŋườʔi kếtướk kùŋ ɲăw zaham lựʔa dể ziêŋ za bảʔi kɔnciên cɔŋ bầʔi tʰì vwa ʔabimêlék hỏʔi zằŋ làmci dể bảʔi kɔnciên dó ziêŋ za vậʔi zằŋ sin vwa hãʔi ɲận lấʔi bảʔi kɔnciên nầʔi cáɲ tăj tôʔi zâŋ cɔ dặŋ làmcứŋ zằŋ tôʔi dã dàʔɔ káʔi ɣiếŋ nầʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi dặt cỗ nầʔi bê ʔɛsêba tạʔi dó haj ŋườʔi dềʔu dã tʰề ŋwiện kùŋ ɲăw vậʔi haj ŋườʔi kếtướk kùŋ ɲăw tạʔi bê ʔɛsêba Ðʔɔạn vwa ʔabimêlék kùŋ kwan tổŋbiɲ ficôn dứŋzậʔi cởvề sứ filitin zaham cồŋ kâʔi mɛ tạʔi bê ʔɛsêba dó ŋườʔi kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋữʔu zaham cúŋụ lâʔu ŋàʔi tạʔi sứ filitin xi mọʔi việk kiə dã sɔŋ tʰì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰử zaham ŋàʔi fán zằŋ hỡʔiÁp zaham ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi dứʔa kɔnmột ŋươʔi ʔiêʔuzấʔu ʔisák di dến sứ môzi ʔa nơʔi dó zâŋ dứʔa kɔn kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên núʔi kiəmà cỉ cɔ zaham zậʔi tʰắŋ lừʔa dɛm haj dầʔitớ kɔn mìɲ ʔisák kùŋ di ŋườʔi kũŋ cặt kủʔi dể zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zồʔi di dếnnơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cwiền zạʔi kwa dến ŋàʔi tʰứba zaham ɲướŋ tʰấʔi nơʔi dó lốʔi dằŋ sa tʰì nóʔi kùŋ haj dầʔitớ zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi dâʔi vớʔi kɔn lừʔa kùŋ dứʔa cẻ di dến cốn kiə dặŋ tʰờ fượŋ zồʔi cởlạʔi vớʔi haj ŋươʔi zaham lấʔi kủʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu cất cên ʔisák kɔn mìɲ zồʔi ŋườʔi kầm lửʔa zaw cɔŋ tăj kả haj cakɔn dồŋ di ʔisák nóʔi kùŋ zaham ca mìɲ zằŋ hỡʔica ŋườʔi dáp kɔn ơʔi ca dâʔi ʔisák nóʔi kủʔi dâʔi lửʔa dâʔi ɲưŋ ciên kɔn dâʔi kó dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zaham zằŋ kɔn ơʔi cíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi ciên kɔn dặŋ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zồʔi kả haj cakɔn kứ dồŋ di họ dến cốn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zạʔi tạʔi dó zaham bàntʰờ cất kủʔi cóʔi ʔisák kɔn mìɲ lạʔi dể dốŋ kủʔi cên bàntʰờ zaham ɣiơ tăj za kầm lấʔi zaw dặŋ ɣiết kɔn mìɲ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê cên cờʔi kêʔu suốŋ zằŋ hỡʔiÁp zaham zaham ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi tʰiênsứ fán zằŋ Ðừŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ kɔncẻ cớ làmci hạʔi dến bâʔizờ zằŋ ŋươʔi tʰật kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bởʔi kớ xôŋ tiếk vớʔi kɔnŋươʔi tứk kɔnmột ŋươʔi zaham ɲướŋ sɛm tʰấʔi săw lưŋ kɔnciên dựk sừŋ mắk cɔŋ bụʔi kâʔi kɔnciên dựk dó zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰăj cɔ kɔn mìɲ zaham ɣọʔi cỗ dó ɣiêhôva zizê bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋàʔinăj kó tụkŋữ zằŋ cên núʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kó tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê cên cờʔi kêʔu zaham tʰứ ɲì zằŋ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ vì ŋươʔi dã diềʔu dó xôŋ tiếk kɔnŋươʔi tứk kɔnmột ŋươʔi tʰì lấʔi cáɲ mìɲ tʰề zằŋ fướk cɔ ŋươʔi tʰêm zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu ɲư saw cên cờʔi dôŋ ɲư kát zòŋzõʔi dó ciếm dượk kửʔa tʰàɲ kwân ŋịc bởʔivì ŋươʔi dã vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi zặn kák zân tʰếzan dềʔu ɲờ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dượk fướk ÐʔɔạnÁp zaham cởvề nơʔi haj ŋườʔi dầʔitớ dứŋzậʔi dồŋ ɲăw divề bê ʔɛsêba zaham kứ tạʔi bê ʔɛsêba săw kák việk dó ŋườʔita tʰuật lạʔi vớʔi zaham nầʔi zằŋ nầʔi nàŋ miɲka kũŋ sɛɲ kɔn cɔ ʔɛm ŋươʔi nakô kɔn cưởŋnam ʔuùtsơ ʔɛmcaj busơ kêmuên ca kủʔa ʔazam kêsết hasô findát zípláp bêtuên bêtuên ŋườʔi sɛɲ zêbɛca miɲka sɛɲ ŋườʔi kɔncaj dó cɔ nakô ʔɛm kủʔa zaham kòn ŋườʔi vợɲỏ zê ʔuma kũŋ sɛɲ kɔn têla ɣaham tahác maaka saza hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm haimươʔibảʔi tuổʔi Ấʔilà bawɲiêʔu kủʔa dờʔi saza saza kwadờʔi tạʔi kiziátazaba tứklà hếpzôn tʰuộk sứ kanaan zaham dến cịʔutaŋ cɔ saza tʰanxók ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn zaham dứŋzậʔi cướk ŋườʔi cết mìɲ nóʔi kùŋzân hếc zằŋ ta xác kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi sin hãʔi cɔ nơʔi mộdịʔa cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi dể côn ŋườʔi tʰák kủʔa zân hếc dáp zằŋ lạʔicúʔa sin hãʔi ŋɛ cúŋtôʔi ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi cúʔa tứklà kwân cưởŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi côn ŋườʔi cết kủʔa cúʔa nơʔi mộdịʔa nàʔɔ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj tiếk mộdịʔa mìɲ dặŋ côn ŋườʔi cết kủʔa cúʔa dâʔu zaham dứŋzậʔi mìɲ suốŋ cướk kák zân kủʔa sứ tứk zân hếc nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi bằŋlòŋ cɔ côn ŋườʔi cết tʰì hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔusin zôn kɔn kủʔa sôha ɣiùm dặŋ ŋườʔi ɲượŋ cɔ haŋ dá mặkbêla dầʔu dồŋ ŋườʔi dể lạʔi cɔ dúŋ ɣiá hầʔu cɔ dượk cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi nơʔi mộdịʔa vả zôn ŋườʔi hêtít dươŋ ŋồʔi cɔŋ zân hếc dáp lạʔi kùŋ zaham cướk zân hếc ŋɛ cướk mọʔi ŋườʔi dếnnơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ zằŋ xôŋ tʰưʔa cúʔa hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi hiện cướk zân tôʔi tôʔi sin zâŋ cɔ cúʔa káɲ dồŋ kũŋ zâŋ káʔi haŋ dá cɔŋ dó nữʔa hãʔi côn ŋườʔi cết kủʔa cúʔa di zaham mìɲ suốŋ cướk zân kủʔa sứ nóʔi lạʔi kùŋ zôn cướk zân kủʔa sứ dươŋ ŋɛ zằŋ sin hãʔi ŋɛ cảɣiá káʔi dồŋ hãʔi ɲận lấʔi di tʰì mớʔi côn ŋườʔi cết zôn dáp zằŋ tʰưʔɛcúʔa hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi miếŋ dất ɣiá dáŋ bốncăm siếk bạk tôʔi kùŋ cúʔa tʰì kóɣiá ci dâʔu sin hãʔi côn ŋườʔi cết kủʔa cúʔa di zaham ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi zôn cướk zân hếc kân bốncăm siếk bạk cɔ ŋườʔi bạk tʰôŋzụŋ nơʔi kák tăj vậʔi káʔi dồŋ kủʔa zôn tạʔi mặkbêla ŋaŋ mamzê ŋĩʔalà káʔi dồŋzuộŋ haŋ dá kák kâʔicốʔi cɔŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰeo ɣiớʔihạn dồŋ dềʔu cướk kó kák zân hếc kùŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi dến kửʔa tʰàɲ ɲận cắk cɔ zaham sảnŋiệp săw kák việk dó zaham côn saza mìɲ cɔŋ haŋ dá kủʔa dồŋ mặkbêla ŋaŋ namzê tạʔi hếpzôn tʰuộk sứ kanaan Ðồŋ haŋ dá dềʔu kó kák ŋườʔi hếc ɲận cắk dể lạʔi cɔ zaham zùŋ mộdịʔa vả zaham dã ɣià tuổʔi dã kaw cɔŋ mọʔi việk Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ ŋườʔi zaham nóʔi kũŋ ŋườʔi dầʔitớ lâʔu cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ kó kwiền kwảncị kák zatàʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi dặt tăj dùʔi biểʔu ŋươʔi cỉ Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cờʔi dất tʰề zằŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ kướʔi kô nàʔɔ cɔŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa zân kanaan tứk ɣiữʔa zân ấʔi cúŋụ cɔ kɔncaj ɲưŋ hãʔi divề kwêhươŋ cɔŋ vòŋ bàkɔn kướʔi ŋườʔi cɔ ʔisák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dầʔitớ tʰưʔa zằŋ kólẽ ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi xôŋ xứŋ tʰeo tôʔi sứ nầʔi vậʔi kó fảʔi tôʔi zẫn kɔncaj ôŋ dến sứ ôŋ dã zadi xỏʔi căŋ zaham nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi kẩntʰận dừŋ zẫn kɔn sứ dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm za xỏʔi ɲà ca sứsở kó fán tʰề zằŋ ta cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi sứ nầʔi cáɲŋàʔi saj tʰiênsứ di cướk ŋươʔi nơʔi dó ŋươʔi hãʔi kướʔi cɔ kɔncaj nếʔu ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi xôŋ xứŋ tʰeo tʰì ŋươʔi xỏʔi mắk lờʔi kủʔa biểʔu ŋươʔi tʰề zẫʔu tʰếnàʔɔ dinữʔa cớ dɛm kɔn cốn dó Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dầʔitớ dể tăj dùʔi zaham củ mìɲ tʰề tʰeo ɲư lờʔi ŋườʔi dã zặn biểʔu Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dầʔitớ mườʔi kɔn lạkdà cɔŋ bầʔi kủʔa củ mìɲ dɛm tʰeo dủ kák tàʔi kủʔa củ dã zaw zồʔi dứŋzậʔi di kwa sứ mêsôbôtami dến tʰàɲ kủʔa nakô ŋườʔi cɔ lạkdà kwì ɣốʔi suốŋ ŋỉ ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ ɣần ɣiếŋ kiə vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔu dến ɣiờ kủʔa ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi zadi sác nướk ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa củ zaham tôʔi ơʔi sin ŋàʔinăj cɔ tôʔi ɣặp diềʔu tôʔi hãʔi cɔ củ zaham tôʔi nầʔi tôʔi dứŋ ɣần ɣiếŋ nầʔi kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa zân cɔŋ tʰàɲ zadi sác nướk sin cɔ ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ nàʔɔ tôʔi nóʔi ɲưvầʔi sin nàŋ hãʔi ŋiêŋ bìɲ cɔ tôʔi ʔuốŋ ɲờ nướk nàŋ cảlờʔi zằŋ hãʔi ʔuốŋ di zồʔi tôʔi cɔ kák lạkdà ŋươʔi ʔuốŋ nữʔa cáɲ ŋườʔi cúʔa dã dịɲ cɔ ʔisák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi ɲờ dó tôʔi zằŋ cúʔa dã cɔ củ tôʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi dầʔitớ cưʔa zứt lờʔi nầʔi nàŋ zêbɛca vák bìɲ cên vaj di za nàŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bêtuên bêtuên kɔncaj kủʔa miɲka nakô ʔɛmcaj kủʔa zaham ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dó tʰật zất dẹp kòn dồŋciɲ cưʔa ɣả cɔ ʔaj nàŋ suốŋ ɣiếŋ ɲận dầʔi bìɲ nướk zồʔi cởlên Ðầʔi cạʔi lạʔi cướk nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi ʔuốŋ nướk cɔŋ bìɲ nàŋ dáp zằŋ tʰưʔa cúʔa hãʔi ʔuốŋ di zồʔi nàŋ lậtdật dỡ bìɲ suốŋtăj cɔ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ xi dỡ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ sɔŋ zồʔi nàŋ lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi kũŋ sác cɔ mấʔi kɔn lạkdà cúʔa ʔuốŋ nữʔa cừŋ nàʔɔ ʔuốŋ dã tʰìtʰôʔi nàŋ lậtdật dổ nướk bìɲ za máŋ cạʔi suốŋ ɣiếŋ sác nướk tʰêm nữʔa cɔ hếttʰảʔi kák kɔn lạkdà ʔuốŋ kòn ŋườʔi ŋồʔi làmtʰiɲ ɲìn nàŋ dể cɔbiết Ðứkzê tʰàɲkôŋ việk mìɲ di dâʔi hăj căŋ xi lạkdà vừʔa tʰôʔi ʔuốŋ ŋườʔi dầʔitớ lấʔi xwɛɲ vàŋ nặŋ dượk nửʔa siếk dôʔi swiến nặŋ dượk mườʔi siếk nóʔi zằŋ nàŋ kɔn ʔaj sin nóʔi cɔ tôʔi cɔŋ ɲà ca nàŋ kó cỗ nàʔɔ cɔ tôʔi ŋỉ bandêm căŋ nàŋ dáp zằŋ tôʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bêtuên cáʔu nộʔi kủʔa miɲka nakô zồʔi lạʔi nóʔi ɲà cúŋtôʔi kó ɲiềʔu zơm kỏ kũŋ kó cỗ dể cɔ ŋỉ nữʔa ŋườʔi kúʔi dầʔu mìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn tʰăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa củ zaham tôʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ ŋớt tʰươŋsót tʰàɲtʰựk dốʔi kùŋ củ tôʔi xi dươŋ di Ðứkzê zẫnzắt tôʔi dến ɲà ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa củ tôʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dó cạʔi tʰuật cwiện nầʔi lạʔi cɔ nộʔi ɲà mìɲ vả nàŋ zêbɛca kó ʔɛɲ laban laban cạʔi dến ŋườʔi dầʔitớ dó ɣần ɣiếŋ vừʔa tʰấʔi xwɛɲ vàŋ dôʔi swiến nơʔi tăj ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ dã ŋɛ cwiện zêbɛca tʰuật lạʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi nóʔi vậʔi tʰì di dến ŋườʔi dươŋ dứŋ ɣần mấʔi kɔn lạkdà nơʔi ɣiếŋ nướk tʰưʔa zằŋ hởʔi ŋườʔi dã dượk Ðứkzê fướk sin mờʔi vàʔɔ saw dứŋ ŋɔàʔi nầʔi vậʔi tôʔi dã sửʔasɔạn ɲà zọn zẹp nơʔi cɔ mấʔi kɔn lạkdà zồʔi ŋườʔi dầʔitớ vàʔɔ ɲà laban kổʔi ʔiên cɔ lạkdà dɛm kỏ kùŋ zơm cɔ kák tʰú dó zồʔi lấʔi nướk dặŋ zửʔa cơn cɔ ŋườʔi dầʔitớ mấʔi di tʰeo Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔiɲà bàʔi bữʔa mờʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dầʔitớ nóʔi xôŋ tôʔi xôŋ dâʔu nếʔu cưʔa nóʔi dượk ɲữŋ diềʔu tôʔi kần fảʔi nóʔi laban dáp zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi di ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dầʔitớ kủʔa zaham Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ củ tôʔi bộʔifần cởnên tʰạɲ vượŋ ŋàʔi cɔ củ tôʔi ciên bạk vàŋ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi lạkdà lừʔa vả saza củ tôʔi cởvề ɣià kó sɛɲ kɔncaj cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã zaw zatàʔi mìɲ lạʔi cɔ kɔncaj dó củ tôʔi lạʔi kó tôʔi tʰề zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ kướʔi cɔ kɔncaj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa zân kanaan sứ dươŋ cúŋụ ɲưŋ hãʔi ɲà ca cɔŋ vòŋ bàkɔn kướʔi cɔ ŋườʔi tạʔi dó tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ củ tôʔi zằŋ kólẽ ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi xôŋ xứŋ tʰeo tôʔi củ dáp zằŋ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ fụk saj tʰiênsứ tʰeo ŋươʔi cɔ tʰàɲkôŋ việk ŋươʔi di ŋươʔi kướʔi cɔ kɔncaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ bàkɔn tạʔi ɲà ca vậʔi nếʔu xi ŋươʔi divề bàkɔn xôŋ xứŋ ɣả cɔ tʰì ŋươʔi dượk ɣỡ lờʔi tʰề nặŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi dã tʰề kùŋ dó ŋàʔinăj xi di dến ɣiếŋ kiə tôʔi kó kầʔu zằŋ lạʔiÐứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa củ zaham tôʔi sin dɔáʔi dến ɣiúp kôŋviệk kủʔa tôʔi di dâʔi cɔ dượk tʰàɲ nầʔi tôʔi ŋồʔi ɣần ɣiếŋ nầʔi kầʔusin ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ nàʔɔ za sác nướk tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ sin cɔ tôʔi ʔuốŋ nướk cɔŋ bìɲ cảlờʔi zằŋ hãʔi ʔuốŋ di cướk tôʔi sác cɔ kák lạkdà ŋươʔi ʔuốŋ nữʔa sin cɔ ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dó Ðứkzê dã dịɲ cɔ kɔncaj kủʔa củ tôʔi cưʔa zứt lờʔi tʰầm ŋwiện bỗŋdâʔu nàŋ zêbɛca vák bìɲ cên vaj di za suốŋ ɣiếŋ sác nướk tôʔi nóʔi vớʔi nàŋ zằŋ sin cɔ tôʔi ʔuốŋ nướk nàŋ lậtdật bìɲ cên vaj suốŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi ʔuốŋ di zồʔi tôʔi cɔ kák lạkdà ŋươʔi ʔuốŋ nữʔa vậʔi tôʔi kó ʔuốŋ nàŋ kũŋ kó cɔ kák lạkdà ʔuốŋ nữʔa tôʔi hỏʔi nàŋ zằŋ nàŋ kɔŋáʔi ʔaj nàŋ dáp tôʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bêtuên cáʔu nộʔi kủʔa nakô miɲka tôʔi deo káʔi xwɛɲ nơʔi mũʔi dôʔi swiến vàʔɔ tăj nàŋ Ðʔɔạn tôʔi kúʔi dầʔu mìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa củ zaham tôʔi dã zẫn tôʔi vàʔɔ dườŋ cáɲ dáŋ dể cọn dượk cɔ kɔncaj ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔɛm củ tôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu kák ôŋ lấʔilòŋ cuŋtín dốʔi kùŋ củ tôʔi sin hãʔi diềʔu dó cɔ zầʔu xôŋ sin kũŋ nóʔi cɔbiết hầʔu cɔ tôʔi sâʔi hữʔu hăjlà laban bêtuên dáp zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu dó zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê za cúŋtôʔi dâʔu nóʔi dượk kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ kwấʔi hăj zằŋ fảʔi kìʔa zêbɛca dươŋ cướk ŋươʔi hãʔi zẫn di dể dượk kủʔa kɔncaj củ ŋươʔi tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê fán dịɲ Ðầʔi kủʔa zaham vừʔa ŋɛ lờʔi haj ŋườʔi nóʔi sɔŋ mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk Ðứkzê ŋườʔi lấʔi dồ caŋsứk bằŋ bạk vàŋ áʔɔsốŋ caw cɔ zêbɛca zồʔi kùŋ lấʔi kák kwí zâŋ cɔ ʔɛɲ nàŋ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dầʔitớ kùŋ kák ŋườʔi di tʰeo ŋồʔi ănuốŋ zồʔi ŋủ tạʔi dó kwaŋàʔi săw xi dã tʰứkzậʔi ŋườʔi dầʔitớ nóʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi cởvề củ ɲưŋ ʔɛɲ nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ lạʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa dộ cừŋ mườʔi bữʔa zồʔi di Ðầʔi dáp zằŋ sin cớ kầm tôʔi cễ lạʔi Ðứkzê kó làmviệk di dườŋ tôʔi dượk tʰàɲ hãʔi cɔ tôʔi di cởvề ɲà củ tôʔi họ dáp zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi ɣọʔi ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dó hỏʔi zasaw kêʔu zêbɛca nóʔi zằŋ kɔn di kùŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi căŋ nàŋ zằŋ tôʔi di Ðʔɔạn cɔ zêbɛca ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi kủʔa nàŋ divề tʰeo ŋườʔi dầʔitớ kủʔa zaham kák di tʰeo họ cúk fướk cɔ zêbɛca zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi cúŋta cúk cɔ ʔɛm dượk cởnên kủʔa ứk ciệʔu ŋườʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi ʔɛm dượk ciếm lấʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kủʔa kwân ŋịc zêbɛca kák dòʔi nàŋ dứŋzậʔi kỡʔi lạkdà di tʰeo ŋườʔi dầʔitớ dó vậʔi ŋườʔi dầʔitớ zẫn zêbɛca di bấʔizờ ʔisák tạʔi fươŋ ɣiếŋ lɛcajzɔj cởvề lốʔi ciềʔu ŋườʔi di za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ dặŋ swiŋẫm ɲướŋ kìʔa ŋó tʰấʔi lạkdà dâʔu di dến nàŋzê bɛca kũŋ ɲướŋ cợt tʰấʔi ʔisák ɲảʔi suốŋ lạkdà hỏʔi dầʔitớ zằŋ ŋườʔiở dằŋ cướk tôʔi dilạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ dó ʔaj Ðầʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ Ấʔilà củ tôʔi dó nàŋ lấʔi cɛ lạʔi zồʔi dầʔitớ tʰuật cɔ ʔisák ŋɛ kák việk mìɲ dã ʔisák zẫn zêbɛca vàʔɔ cạʔi kủʔa saza mìɲ kướʔi ʔiêʔumến nàŋ vậʔi ʔisák dượk ɣiảʔifiền săw xi mìɲ kwadờʔi zaham kướʔi ŋườʔi xák kêtuza ŋườʔi sɛɲ cɔ zaham simzam ɣiốkcan mêdan madiən zícbák suác ɣiốkcan sɛɲ sêba dan kɔncáʔu kủʔa dan ʔɛcuzim lêtucim lêʔummim kɔncaj kủʔa madiən fa fɛ hanók ʔabida ʔɛânda kák ŋườʔi cên dâʔi dềʔu zòŋzõʔi kủʔa kêtuza zaham cɔ ʔisák hếttʰảʔi zatàʔi mìɲ kòn cɔ kák kɔnzòŋ tʰứ ɲữŋ tiềnkủʔa zồʔi xi kòn sốŋ ŋườʔi saj kwa dôŋ fươŋ kác sa kɔnzòŋ cáɲ ʔisák zaham hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm bảʔi mươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi tuổʔi kaw ták dã tʰỏʔa dờʔi mìɲ tắtʰơʔi dượk kwi nơʔi tổtôŋ haj kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔisák Íc côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ haŋ dá mặkbêla tạʔi nơʔi dồŋ kủʔa zôn kɔncaj sôha ŋườʔi hêtít ŋaŋ mamzê Ấʔilà káʔi dồŋ lúk cướk zaham mwa lạʔi kủʔa zân hếc nơʔi dó côn zaham kùŋ saza ŋườʔi săw xi zaham kwadờʔi Ðứkzê fướk cɔ ʔisák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔisák ɣần káʔi ɣiếŋ lɛcajzɔj Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa Íc kɔncaj kủʔa zaham zɔ nơʔi nàŋ ʔaɣa ŋườʔi zíptô kɔndòʔi kủʔa saza dã sɛɲ và dâʔi cên kák kɔncaj kủʔa Íc tʰứtự tʰeo ŋàʔi zadờʔi kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa Íc nêbazốt săw kêda mibôsam mícma Ðʔu masa hada tʰêma ɣiêtʰu nafíc kếtma kák kɔncaj kủʔa Íc kủʔa tùʔi tʰeo làŋ nơʔi dóŋ cạʔi dặt Ấʔilà mườʔihaj kôŋầʔu cɔŋ zântộk kủʔa Íc hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi bảʔi tuổʔi zồʔi tắtʰơʔi kwadờʔi dượk kwi nơʔi tổtôŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔiở cướk ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ havila cɔdến susơ dốʔi ŋaŋ zíptô cạʔi kwa ʔasizi Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ʔisák kɔncaj zaham zaham sɛɲ ʔisák vả xi ʔisák dượk mươʔi tuổʔi tʰì kướʔi zêbɛca kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bêtuên ʔɛmɣáʔi kủʔa laban dềʔu zân ʔazam tạʔi sứ fadanazam ʔisák xẩnkầʔu Ðứkzê cɔ mìɲ nàŋ sɔnsẻ Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ lờʔi xẩnkầʔu dó cɔ zêbɛca tʰọtʰaj ɲưŋ tʰaj dôʔi cɔ dụŋ ɲăw cɔŋ bụŋ tʰì nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu kwảtʰật vậʔi kớsaw dềʔu nầʔi sảʔi dến làmci Ðʔɔạn nàŋ di hỏʔi Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán zằŋ haj nướk cɔŋ bụŋ ŋươʔi haj tʰứzân zɔ lòŋ ŋươʔi za zân nầʔi mạɲ zân kiə dứʔa fảʔi fụk dứʔa ɲỏ ŋàʔi nàŋ fảʔi sɛɲ nầʔi haj dứʔa sɛɲ dôʔi cɔŋ bụŋ nàŋ za Ðứʔa za cướk dỏ hồŋ lôŋ kùŋ mìɲ ɲư áʔɔtơʔi lôŋ dặt săw kế ʔɛm lạʔi za săw tăj lấʔi ɣót săw dặt zakốp xi sɛɲ haj dứʔa kɔn nầʔi tʰì ʔisák dã dượk sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi xi haj dứʔa caj nầʔi tʰì săw cởnên tʰợsăn ɣiỏʔi tʰườŋ zɔŋzuổʔi nơʔi dồŋzuộŋ kòn zakốp ŋườʔi hiềnlàɲ kứ lạʔi cạʔi ʔisák ʔiêʔu săw ŋườʔi kó táɲ ưʔa tʰịt zừŋ ɲưŋ zêbɛca lạʔi ʔiêʔu zakốp một ŋàʔiciə zakốp dươŋ nấʔu kɛɲ săw ŋɔàʔi dồŋ lấʔilàm mệtmỏʔi nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ ʔɛm hãʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ kɛɲ ɣì dỏ dó vớʔi ʔɛɲ mệtmỏʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi săw dôm zakốp dáp zằŋ năj ʔɛɲ hãʔi kwiền cưởŋnam cɔ tôʔi di săw dáp zằŋ nầʔi ʔɛɲ ɣần tʰák kwiền cưởŋnam dể cɔ ʔɛɲ zùŋ làmci zakốp dáp lạʔi zằŋ ʔɛɲ hãʔi tʰề cướk di ŋườʔi tʰề vậʔi ŋườʔi kwiền cưởŋnam cɔ zakốp zồʔi zakốp cɔ săw báɲ kɛɲ fạn dậʔu ănuốŋ sɔŋ ŋườʔi dứŋzậʔi di vậʔi săw xiɲ kwiền cưởŋnam tʰế cừ kơn dóʔicém tʰứ ɲứt cɔŋ dờʔi zaham bấʔizờ tạʔi sứ lạʔi kó nữʔa ʔisák di dến ʔabimêlék vwa filitin tạʔi ɣêza Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi fán zằŋ cớ suốŋ sứ zíptô hãʔi lạʔi sứ cỉ cɔ hãʔi ŋụ cɔŋ sứ nầʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi kák sứ nầʔi tʰàɲ lờʔi dã tʰề kùŋ zaham ca ŋươʔi ta tʰêm zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu ɲư saw cên cờʔi cɔ kák sứ nầʔi hếttʰảʔi zân tʰếzan dềʔu ɲờ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dượk fướk zaham dã vâŋ lờʔi dã ɣiữ diềʔu fán zạʔi lịɲ kủʔa vậʔi ʔisák tạʔi ɣêza bởʔi nàŋ zêbɛca sắksảʔɔ zuŋɲan xi zân sứ dó hỏʔitʰăm ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà ʔɛmɣáʔi tôʔi ʔɛ xi nóʔi Ấʔilà tôʔi tʰì ɣiết mìɲ căŋ vả ŋườʔi ŋụ tạʔi sứ dó kũŋ dã lâʔu ŋàʔiciə ʔabimêlék vwa filitin ŋó ŋaŋ kwa kửʔasổ tʰấʔi ʔisák dươŋ ɣiỡn cơʔi kùŋ zêbɛca ŋườʔi dòʔi ʔisák zằŋ kwảtʰật ŋươʔi dó saw kó nóʔi Ấʔilà ʔɛmɣáʔi tôʔi ʔisák dáp zằŋ vì tôʔi kó tʰầm nóʔi cớ xá nàŋ tôʔi fảʔi bỏmìɲ ʔabimêlék hỏʔi ŋươʔi làmci cɔ cúŋta vậʔi ŋộ kó ŋườʔizân dến kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cɔ cúŋta fảʔi fạmtộʔi ʔabimêlék cwiền lịɲ cɔ kả zâncúŋ zằŋ kẻ nàʔɔ dộŋ dến ŋườʔi nầʔi hăjlà ŋườʔi nầʔi tʰì sửtử ʔisák zeo ɣiốŋ cɔŋ sứ dó ấʔi ɣặt dượk bộʔi căm fần Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ ŋườʔi tʰạɲ vượŋ kủʔakảʔi kàŋŋàʔicàŋ tʰêm cɔdến dỗʔi ŋườʔi cởnên zất ŋườʔi kó ɲiềʔu bầʔi ciên bầʔi tôʔitớ zất dôŋ bởʔi kớ ấʔi zân filitin dɛmlòŋ ɣɛɲɣẻ mấʔi káʔi ɣiếŋ lúk cướk dầʔitớ kủʔa zaham ca ŋườʔi dã dàʔɔ bâʔizờ dềʔu zân filitin dất lạʔi ʔabimêlék nóʔi kùŋ ʔisák zằŋ hãʔi za xỏʔi nơʔi ŋươʔi tʰạɲ vượŋ cúŋta bộʔifần vậʔi ʔisák cốn nầʔi di dến dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi cũŋ ɣêza dó ʔisák dàʔɔ lạʔi mấʔi káʔi ɣiếŋ ŋườʔita dã dàʔɔ cɔŋ dờʔi zaham ca mìɲ zân filitin dất lạʔi xi zaham kwadờʔi dặt mấʔi ɣiếŋ dó ɲư kủʔa ca mìɲ dã dặt kák dầʔitớ kủʔa ʔisák kòn dàʔɔ tʰêm ɣiếŋ nơʔi cũŋ ɣặp dượk ɣiếŋ nướk mạc ɲưŋ cănciên ɣêza cɛɲzàɲ kùŋ cănciên kủʔa ʔisák zằŋ ŋườʔi dó kủʔa cúŋta nênŋườʔi dặt ɣiếŋ nầʔi vì cănciên dó kó cɛɲzàɲ kùŋ mìɲ kế ấʔi kák dầʔitớ dàʔɔ ɣiếŋ xák tʰì cɛɲzàɲ ɲăw nữʔa ŋườʔi dặt ɣiếŋ nầʔi sítna Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cỗ dó di dàʔɔ ɣiếŋ xák ɣiếŋ nầʔi xôŋ cɛɲzàɲ ɲăw nênŋườʔi dặt zêhôbốt zằŋ bâʔizờ Ðứkzê dã dể cɔ cúŋta dượk zộŋzãʔi dặŋ tʰịɲvượŋ cɔŋ sứ ʔisák dó di zờʔi bê ʔɛsêba dó Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi fán zằŋ ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham ca ŋươʔi cớ ci kùŋ ŋươʔi fướk cɔ tʰêm zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi kớ zaham tôʔitớ ʔisák bàntʰờ kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ Ðứkzê dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dó Ðʔɔạn kák
