dầʔitớ ŋườʔi dàʔɔ káʔi ɣiếŋ tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi vwa ʔabimêlék ɣêza di dến viếŋ ʔisák kó ʔahusát mìɲ ficôn kwan tổŋbiɲ mìɲ di tʰeo ʔisák hỏʔi zằŋ kák ŋườʔi ɣét tôʔi dã duổʔi tôʔi za xỏʔi nơʔi mìɲ saw kòn di dến tôʔi ci cúŋ dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰấʔi zõzàŋ Ðứkzê fùhộ ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ fảʔi kó lờʔi tʰề ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi ŋườʔi dể cúŋta zawướk vớʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi tʰề zằŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ bawzờ hạʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲư cúŋtôʔi dã xôŋ dộŋ dến ŋườʔi cỉ hậʔudãʔi ŋườʔi cɔ di bìɲiên bâʔizờ ŋườʔi dượk Ðứkzê fướk cɔ ʔisák bàʔi bữʔa tiệk kák ŋườʔi dồŋ ănuốŋ kwaŋàʔi săw cúŋ dậʔi lờʔi tʰề vớʔi ɲăw zồʔi ʔisák dưʔa kák ŋườʔi dó divề bìɲiên kùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kák dầʔitớ kủʔa ʔisák dến dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi hăj ɣiếŋ dã dàʔɔ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰấʔi kó nướk ŋườʔi dặt káʔi ɣiếŋ dó siba vì kớ dó tʰàɲ ấʔilà bê ʔɛsêba cɔdến ŋàʔinăj xi săw dượk mươʔi tuổʔi kướʔi zudít kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bê ʔɛzi ŋườʔi hêtít bácmát kɔŋáʔi kủʔa kũŋ ŋườʔi hêtít haj zâʔu dó kăjdắŋ lòŋ cɔ ʔisák zêbɛca bởʔi ʔisák dã ɣià làŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi dượk nữʔa ɣọʔi săw kɔn cưởŋnam zằŋ hỡʔi kɔn săw tʰưʔa zằŋ kó kɔn dâʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi ca dã ɣià zồʔi cẳŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ fảʔi cết vậʔi bâʔizờ ca sin kɔn hãʔi lấʔi xíɣiớʔi ốŋ kuŋ kɔn za dồŋ tʰịt zừŋ cɔ ca zọn ŋɔn tùʔi tʰeo ca sởtʰíc zồʔi zâŋ cɔ ca dặŋ liɲhồn ca cúk fướk cɔ kɔn cướk xi cết vả dươŋ xi ʔisák nóʔi kùŋ săw kɔncaj mìɲ tʰì zêbɛca kó ŋɛ săw za dồŋ tʰịt zừŋ dặŋ dɛm cɔ ca zêbɛca nóʔi kùŋ zakốp kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ nầʔi kó ŋɛ ca nóʔi kùŋ săw ʔɛɲ kɔn zặn zằŋ hãʔi dɛm tʰịt zừŋ cɔ ca zọn ŋɔn ca dặŋ cướk xi kwadờʔi ca cúk fướk cɔ kɔn cướk Ðứkzê vậʔi kɔn ơʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi biểʔu hãʔi za ŋɔàʔi bầʔi haj zê kɔn zồʔi zọn cɔ cakɔn ŋɔn tùʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi sởtʰíc kɔn dɛm cɔ ca dặŋ ŋườʔi cúk fướk kɔn cướk xi kwadờʔi zakốp tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ zằŋ tʰưʔa săw ʔɛɲ kɔn kó lôŋ kòn kɔn lạʔi xôŋ kólẽ ca zờ mìɲ căŋ kɔj kɔn ɲư fỉɲ ɣạt tʰì kɔn cắk lấʔi cɔ mìɲ zủʔasả cớ cẳŋ fảʔi cúk fướk dâʔu mẹ dáp zằŋ kɔn ơʔi sin zủʔasả dó dể cɔ cịʔu hãʔi kứ ŋɛ lờʔi za haj zê kɔn vậʔi zakốp di haj zê kɔn dɛm lạʔi cɔ ŋɔn tùʔi tʰeo ca sởtʰíc Ðʔɔạnzê bɛca lấʔi kwầnáʔɔ ɲứt kủʔa săw kɔn cưởŋnam dể cɔŋ ɲà mặk vàʔɔ cɔ zakốp kɔn mìɲ zồʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi za zê kɔn baw haj tăj kổ tăj kổ zakốp xôŋ kó lôŋ zêbɛca dể ŋɔn báɲ kủʔa mìɲ dã zọn vàʔɔ tăj kɔn mìɲ zakốp bưŋ dến ca mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ tʰưʔa ca ʔisák dáp kó ca dâʔi kɔn dứʔa nàʔɔdó zakốp tʰưʔa tôʔi săw kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ca kɔn dã tʰeo lờʔi ca zặn biểʔu sin ca zậʔi ŋồʔi lấʔi tʰịt kủʔa kɔn dặŋ liɲhồn ca cúk fướk cɔ kɔn ʔisák hỏʔi zằŋ saw kɔn di dượk măw tʰế tʰưʔa zằŋ Ấʔi ɲờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca suj tôʔi ɣặp măw vậʔi ʔisák nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi lạʔi ɣần dặŋ ca zờ tʰử sɛm kó fảʔi săw kɔn kủʔa ca căŋ zakốp lạʔi ɣần ʔisák ŋườʔi zờ nóʔi zằŋ tiếŋnóʔi tʰì kủʔa zakốp kòn haj tăj lạʔi kủʔa săw ŋườʔi cẳŋ ɲậnbiết dặŋ haj tăj kũŋ kó lôŋ ɲư kủʔa ʔɛɲ săw vậʔi ʔisák cúk fướk cɔ ŋườʔi lạʔi hỏʔi zằŋ Ấʔi kɔn tʰậtlà săw kɔncaj fảʔicăŋ zakốp tʰưʔa fảʔi kɔn dâʔi ʔisák nóʔi hãʔi zọn cɔ ca lấʔi tʰịt kủʔa kɔn dặŋ liɲhồn ca cúk fướk cɔ kɔn zakốp zọn cɔ ŋườʔi kũŋ kó dɛm zượʔu cɔ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ nữʔa zồʔi ʔisák ca ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi lạʔi ɣần ca zakốp lạʔi ɣần ŋườʔi ʔisák dáɲmùʔi tʰơm kủʔa áʔɔ kɔn cúk fướk cɔ nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi mùʔi hươŋ kủʔa kɔn xáknàʔɔ mùʔi hươŋ kủʔa káɲ dồŋ Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ kɔn sươŋmók cên cờʔi suốŋ Ðượk màʔumỡ kủʔa dất zưzật lúʔamì kùŋ zượʔu muônzân fảʔi fụk kɔn kák nướk fảʔi kwì lạʔi cướk kɔn hãʔi dượk kwiền củ kák ʔɛɲɛm kák kɔncaj kủʔa mẹkɔn fảʔi kwì lạʔi cướk kɔn ʔaj zủʔasả kɔn zủʔasả lạʔi ʔaj kầʔu fướk cɔ kɔn dượk fướk lạʔi vừʔa xi ʔisák cúk fướk cɔ zakốp suốŋ vừʔa xi zakốp lùʔi za xỏʔi nơʔi ca mìɲ tʰì săw ʔɛɲ ŋườʔi di cởvề ŋườʔi kũŋ zọn ŋɔn zâŋ cɔ ca tʰưʔa zằŋ sin zậʔi ŋồʔi tʰịt kủʔa kɔncaj ca dặŋ liɲhồn ca cúk fướk cɔ kɔn ʔisák ca ŋườʔi hỏʔi kɔn dứʔa nàʔɔ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi săw kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ca ʔisák lấʔilàm kảmdộŋ kwa dỗʔi nóʔi zằŋ vậʔi kòn dứʔa nàʔɔ dã tʰịt zừŋ dã zâŋ cɔ ca dó cướk xi kɔn ca dã zồʔi cúk fướk cɔ lạʔi dượk fướk vậʔi vừʔa ŋɛ zứt lờʔi ca tʰì săw tiếŋ zất zất tʰảmtʰiết tʰưʔa kùŋ ca zằŋ ca ơʔi sin hãʔi cúk fướk cɔ kɔn nữʔa ɲưŋ ʔisák lạʔi dáp ʔɛm kɔn dã zùŋ mưʔukế dến kướp cúk fướk kủʔa kɔn zồʔi săw nóʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi zakốp dó haj ciếm lấʔi tôʔi zồʔi căŋ nó dã ciếm kwiền cưởŋnam tôʔi lạʔi bâʔizờ kòn ciếm fướk làɲ kủʔa tôʔi nữʔa tiếp zằŋ ca cẳŋ kó zàɲ cúk fướk ci cɔ tôʔi saw ʔisák dáp zằŋ nầʔi cɔ dã làmcủ kɔn dã cɔ kák ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi dã zựbị lúʔamì zượʔu cɔ vậʔi ca làmci cɔ kɔn dâʔi săw tʰưʔa zằŋ ca ơʔi ca cỉ kó cúk fướk dó tʰôʔi saw hãʔi cúk fướk cɔ kɔn vớʔi ca zồʔi săw kấttiếŋ xók ʔisák ca ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ nầʔi nơʔi kɔn tʰiếʔu màʔumỡ kủʔa dất kùŋ sươŋ mók cên cờʔi suốŋ kɔn ɲờ ɣươm mớʔi dượk sốŋ và tôʔitớ cɔ ʔɛm kɔn sɔŋ xi kɔn lưʔulạk zàʔi dó majdâʔi sẽ káʔi ác kủʔa ʔɛm cên kổ kɔn vậʔi săw cở lòŋ ɣét zakốp kớ ca mìɲ cúk fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nóʔitʰầm cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ ŋàʔi taŋ kủʔa ca dã hầʔu ɣần vậʔi ɣiết zakốp ʔɛm di họ dɛm lờʔi săw kɔn tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ zêbɛca tʰì ŋườʔi saj ɣọʔi zakốp kɔn mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi săw ʔɛɲ kɔn twan ɣiết kɔn dể báʔɔtʰù vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi dứŋzậʔi cạʔi cốn kwa ɲà laban kậʔu kɔn tạʔi cazan hãʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ítlâʔu cɔdến lúknàʔɔ kơn ɣiận kủʔa ʔɛɲ kɔn kwa xi kơn ɣiận ʔɛɲ kɔn bỏkwa zồʔi kwên việk kɔn dã ɣâʔi vớʔi tʰì biểʔu kɔn kólẽ dâʔu fảʔi cịʔu kả haj dứʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi zêbɛca nóʔi kùŋ ʔisák zằŋ tôʔi dã cán xôŋ sốŋ nữʔa kớ mấʔi kɔŋáʔi hếc nếʔuza kốp kướʔi cɔŋ mấʔi kɔŋáʔi hếc tứk ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi cɔŋ sứ ɲư kák zân dó tʰôʔi tôʔi kòn sốŋ ci ʔisák ɣọʔi zakốp cúk fướk cɔ zặn zằŋ kɔn cớ cọn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ kɔŋáʔi kanaan hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di kwa sứ fadanazam tạʔi ɲà bêtuên ôŋ ŋɔạʔi kɔn kướʔi dó ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa laban kậʔu kɔn kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ fướk cɔ kɔn kɔn sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cởnên dám zân dôŋ kầʔusin ŋàʔi cɔ kɔn zòŋzõʔi kɔn fướk làɲ kủʔa zaham hầʔu cɔ sứ kɔn dã kiềʔu ŋụ sảnŋiệp cɔ kɔn tứk sứ ŋàʔi dã cɔ zaham zồʔi ʔisák saj zakốp di kwa sứ fadanazam dến ɲà laban kɔncaj bêtuên ŋườʔi ʔazam lạʔi ʔɛɲ kủʔa zêbêka kủʔa zakốp săw săw tʰấʔi ʔisák dã cúk fướk cɔ zakốp saj di kwa sứ fadanazam dặŋ kướʔi cɔŋ lúk dươŋ cúk fướk kó zặn zằŋ cớ kướʔi cɔŋ kɔŋáʔi kanaan lạʔi dã tʰấʔi zakốp vâŋ lờʔi ca mɛ di kwa sứ fadanazam dó tʰì zằŋ kɔŋáʔi kanaan xôŋ vừʔaý ʔisák ca mìɲ nênŋườʔi di dến ɲà Íc ŋɔàʔi haj ŋườʔi dã kó zồʔi kướʔi tʰêm nàŋ mabalát kɔŋáʔi kủʔa Íc cáʔu nộʔi kủʔa zaham ʔɛm kủʔa nêbazốt zakốp bê ʔɛsêba di dến cazan tớʔi cỗ kiə mặtcờʔi dã xuất tʰì kwa dêm tạʔi dó ŋườʔi lấʔi dá ɣốʔidầʔu ŋủ tạʔi dó ciêmbaw tʰấʔi káʔi tʰaŋ bắk zướʔi dất dầʔu dến cờʔi kák tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi di suốŋ cên tʰaŋ dó nầʔi Ðứkzê ŋự cên dầʔu tʰaŋ fán zằŋ ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham tổfụ ŋươʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisák ta cɔ ŋươʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dất ŋươʔi dươŋ ŋủ dâʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dôŋ ɲư kát bụʔi cên mặtdất càn za dến dôŋ tâʔi bắk kák ci tʰếzan ɲờ ŋươʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dượk fướk nầʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi di dâʔu tʰeo ɣìŋiữ dó dɛm ŋươʔi sứ nầʔi xôŋbawzờ ŋươʔi cɔdến xi sɔŋ ɲữŋ diềʔu dã hứʔa kùŋ ŋươʔi zakốp tʰứkzấk nóʔi zằŋ tʰậtÐứkzê kó cɔŋ nơʔi dâʔi tôʔi xôŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cốn nầʔi dáŋ kiɲxủŋ tʰăj tʰậtlà dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰậtlà kửʔa kủʔa cờʔi ŋườʔi zậʔi lấʔi dá kủʔa mìɲ zùŋ ɣốʔidầʔu zựŋdứŋ kâʔi cụ dổ zầʔu cên cót cụ dó zồʔi dặt cốn nầʔi bêtên kòn ŋwiên xi cướk tʰàɲ lusơ zakốp xấnváʔi zằŋ nếʔuÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ tôʔi ɣìŋiữ tôʔi cɔŋ lúk di dườŋ cɔ báɲ áʔɔ mặk nếʔu tôʔi cởvề bìɲan dến ɲà ca tôʔi tʰì Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi hòn dá dã zùŋ cụ dâʔi dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và tôʔi lạʔi cɔ ŋàʔi fần mườʔi mọʔi kủʔakảʔi ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi Ðʔɔạn zakốp lêndườŋ di dến sứ kủʔa zân Ðôŋ fươŋ ŋườʔi ɲìn sɛm tʰấʔi káʔi ɣiếŋ cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ ɣần dó kó bầʔi ciên ŋỉ nơʔi nầʔi cốn ŋườʔita cɔ kák bầʔi ciên ʔuốŋ nướk hòn dá dậʔi cên miệŋ ɣiếŋ zất kák bầʔi ciên dềʔu lạʔi dó zồʔi dá cên miệŋ ɣiếŋ za cɔ kák bầʔi ʔuốŋ nướk dɔạn dá lạʔi cỗ kũ dậʔi cên miệŋ ɣiếŋ zakốp hỏʔi mấʔi tăj cănciên zằŋ hỡʔi kák ʔɛɲ kák ʔɛɲ dâʔudâʔi bọn dó dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi cazan dến ŋườʔi hỏʔi kák ʔɛɲ kó laban kɔncaj nakô căŋ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi lạʔi hỏʔi ŋườʔi dó dượk mạɲzỏʔi căŋ zằŋ ŋườʔi dượk mạɲzỏʔi nầʔi zɛcên kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi zươŋ di dếnkùŋ bầʔi ciên kiə ŋươʔi nóʔi nầʔi cờʔi hãʔi kòn cưʔa fảʔi ɣiờ ɲóm kák súkvật vậʔi kák ʔɛɲ hãʔi cɔ bầʔi ciên ʔuốŋ nướk zồʔi tʰả di lạʔi di zằŋ cúŋtôʔi ɲưvậʔi cẳŋ dượk fảʔi dợʔi kák bầʔi lạʔi dủ zồʔi bấʔizờ mớʔi dá cên miệŋ ɣiếŋ za cɔ bầʔi ʔuốŋ nướk dượk vả dươŋ lúk ŋườʔi kòn nóʔicwiện kùŋ dó tʰì zɛcên zắt bầʔi ciên kủʔa ca nàŋ dến nàŋ ŋườʔi cănciên xi vừʔa tʰấʔi zɛcên kɔn ɣàʔi laban kậʔu mìɲ tʰì ŋườʔi lạʔi ɣần dá za xỏʔi miệŋ ɣiếŋ cɔ bầʔi ciên kủʔa laban kậʔu mìɲ ʔuốŋ nướk zakốp zɛcên kấttiếŋ xók zồʔi nóʔi cɔ nàŋ zằŋ mìɲ bàkɔn vớʔi ca nàŋ tứk kɔncaj kủʔa zêbêka nàŋ cạʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ca hăj vừʔa xi ŋɛnóʔi zakốp kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ tʰì laban cạʔi dến cướk ŋườʔi cɔàŋ lấʔi zồʔi mớʔi vàʔɔ ɲà zakốp tʰuật lạʔi cɔ laban ŋɛ kák việk dã sảʔi kwa laban dáp zằŋ tʰật vậʔi cáʔu kốtɲụk kủʔa kậʔu zồʔi zakốp tʰáŋ kùŋ kậʔu Ðʔɔạn laban nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ kớ cáʔu bàkɔn kủʔa kậʔu cáʔu ɣiúp kôŋ xôŋ cɔ kậʔu tʰôʔi saw tiềnkôŋ bawɲiêʔu hãʔi nóʔi cɔ kậʔu vả laban kó haj kɔŋáʔi kɔn lê ʔa kɔnɲỏ zɛcên mắtlê ʔa ʔiếʔu kòn zɛcên hìɲzuŋ dẹpdẽ tốttươʔi zakốp ʔiêʔu zɛcên nóʔi zằŋ vì nàŋ zɛcên kɔn kậʔu tôʔi ɣiúpviệk cɔŋ bảʔi laban cảlờʔi zằŋ tʰà kậʔu ɣả cɔ cáʔu ɣả cɔ ŋườʔi xák hãʔi vớʔi kậʔu vậʔi zakốp zɛcên fảʔi ɣiúpviệk cɔŋ bảʔi ɲưŋ bởʔi ʔiêʔu nàŋ kɔj bảʔi bằŋ cừŋ dôʔi bữʔa kế dó zakốp nóʔi kùŋ laban zằŋ hạn tôʔi dã zồʔi dâʔu sin kậʔu hãʔi zaw tôʔi lạʔi dặŋ tôʔi dến ɣần kùŋ nàŋ laban mờʔi kák ŋườʔi cɔŋ sóm bàʔi bữʔa tiệk dến ciềʔutốʔi lê ʔa kɔŋáʔi mìɲ dưʔa cɔ zakốp zồʔi càŋ dếnkùŋ nàŋ laban lạʔi kắt kɔndòʔi siɲba tʰeo hầʔu lê ʔa kɔŋáʔi mìɲ sáŋ bữʔa săw mớʔi nàŋ lê ʔa tʰì zakốp hỏʔi laban zằŋ kậʔu dã dãʔi tôʔi kác ci vậʔi kó fảʔi zɛcên tôʔi mớʔi ɣiúpviệk cɔ ɲà kậʔu căŋ saw kậʔu lừʔa ɣạt tôʔi laban dáp zằŋ fɔŋtụk dâʔi cẳŋ fảʔi dượk ɣả ʔɛmút cướk zồʔi cị kả săw hãʔi vớʔi dứʔa nầʔi cọn di zồʔi ɣả dứʔa kiə cɔ dứʔa kiə cáʔu fảʔi ɣiúp kôŋ cɔ kậʔu tʰêm bảʔi nữʔa zakốp tʰeo lờʔi kùŋ lê ʔa cọn zồʔi laban ɣả zɛcên kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ càŋ kắt kɔndòʔi bila tʰeo hầʔu zɛcên kɔŋáʔi mìɲ zakốp dilạʔi kùŋ zɛcên tʰươŋiêʔu nàŋ lê ʔa vậʔi ŋườʔiở ɣiúpviệk ɲà laban tʰêm bảʔi nữʔa Ðứkzê tʰấʔi lê ʔa ɣét cɔ nàŋ sɛɲ kòn zɛcên lạʔi sɔnsẻ lê ʔa tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj dặt zubên nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã tʰấʔi kựkxổ tôʔi bâʔizờ cồŋ ʔiêʔumến tôʔi nàŋ tʰọtʰaj nữʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj dặt simêôn nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê kó ŋɛ tôʔi ɣét cɔ tʰêm dứʔa nàʔi nàŋ tʰọtʰaj nữʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj nàŋ zằŋ lần nầʔi cồŋ zíɲ zíʔu kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi dã sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kɔncaj bởʔi kớ dó dặt lêvi nàŋ tʰọtʰaj nữʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj nóʔi zằŋ lần nầʔi tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê kớ ấʔi dặt zuza Ðʔɔạn nàŋ tʰôʔi tʰaiŋén zɛcên tʰấʔi mìɲ cẳŋ sɛɲ kɔn cɔ zakốp tʰì dɛmlòŋ ɣɛŋét cị nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ hãʔi cɔ tôʔi kó kɔn bằŋxôŋ tôʔi cết zakốp nổʔizận kùŋ zɛcên zằŋ há dượk tʰăj kwiền Ðứkzê xôŋ cɔ ŋươʔi sɛɲ saw zɛcên zằŋ nầʔi kɔndòʔi bila kủʔa tôʔi hãʔi lạʔi kùŋ hầʔu cɔ sɛɲ dẻ tʰăj cɔ tôʔi dặŋ fần tôʔi bởʔi kũŋ kó kɔn nữʔa vậʔi zɛcên dưʔa bila hầʔu zakốp ŋườʔi dilạʔi kùŋ nàŋ bila tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj cɔ zakốp zɛcên zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã sét tôʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi cɔ tôʔi kɔncaj kớ ấʔi nàŋ dặt dứʔa caj dó Ðʔan bila kɔndòʔi kủʔa zɛcên tʰọtʰaj nữʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰứ ɲì cɔ zakốp zɛcên zằŋ tôʔi dã hếtsứk cốŋkự vớʔi cị tôʔi tôʔi dượk tʰắŋ kớ ấʔi nàŋ dặt dứʔa caj nầʔi néptali lê ʔa tʰấʔi mìɲ tʰôʔi sɛɲ siɲba kɔndòʔi mìɲ hầʔu cɔ zakốp siɲba kɔndòʔi kủʔa lê ʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj cɔ zakốp lê ʔa zằŋ fướk zườŋ baw zồʔi dặt dứʔa caj dó ɣát siɲ kɔndòʔi kủʔa lê ʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰứ ɲì cɔ zakốp tʰì lê ʔa zằŋ tôʔi lấʔilàm vuimừŋ zườŋ baw kák kɔŋáʔi sưŋ dượk fướk nàŋ dặt dứʔa caj dó ʔasɛ ɲằm mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamì zubên di za dồŋ ɣặp dượk ɲữŋ cáʔi fɔŋ ɣià dɛm zâŋ cɔ lê ʔa mìɲ zɛcên nóʔi kùŋ lê ʔa zằŋ sin cị hãʔi cɔ tôʔi ɲữŋ cáʔi fɔŋ ɣià kủʔa kɔn cị dó zằŋ kướp cồŋ taw việk ɲỏ saw mầʔi kòn lấʔi cáʔi fɔŋ ɣià kủʔa kɔncaj taw nữʔa zɛcên zằŋ tʰôʔi cồŋ hãʔi kùŋ cị tốʔi dêm năj dổʔi cɔ cáʔi fɔŋ ɣià kủʔa kɔn cị dó ciềʔu zakốp ŋɔàʔi dồŋ tʰì lê ʔa dến cướk ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ càŋ hãʔi lạʔi kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi dã zùŋ cáʔi fɔŋ ɣià kủʔa kɔn tôʔi cịʔu tʰuê dượk càŋ vậʔi dêm dó ŋườʔi lạʔi kùŋ nàŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲậm lờʔi lê ʔa nàŋ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ cɔ zakốp kɔncaj tʰứnăm nàŋ zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dền kôŋ tôʔi kớ tôʔi dã caw kɔndòʔi cɔ cồŋ vậʔi nàŋ dặt dứʔa kɔncaj dó ʔisaka lê ʔa tʰọtʰaj nữʔa sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰứsáʔu cɔ zakốp nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ tôʔi kwíbáʔu nầʔi cồŋ kùŋ tôʔi dã sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi sáʔu kɔncaj zồʔi nàŋ dặt dứʔa kɔncaj nầʔi sabulôn kế dó nàŋ sɛɲ kɔŋáʔi dặt Ðʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲớ lạʔi zɛcên ɲậm lờʔi cɔ nàŋ sɛɲ nàŋ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã zửʔa sấʔuhổ cɔ tôʔi zồʔi dặt dứʔa caj dó ɣiôsép lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ kầʔusin Ðứkzê tʰêm cɔ kɔncaj nữʔa xiza cên dã sɛɲ ɣiôsép tʰì zakốp tʰưʔa kùŋ laban zằŋ sin kậʔu cɔ tôʔi tʰôʔi dặŋ cởvề kwêhươŋ tôʔi sin zaw kɔn lạʔi cɔ tôʔi tôʔi dã dặŋ kớ ɣiúp kậʔu dể tôʔi di bởʔi kậʔu kũŋ zằŋ tôʔi dã ɣiúp kôŋviệk cɔ kậʔu tʰểnàʔɔ laban dáp zằŋ Ướk ɣì kậʔu dượk ɲờ cáʔu kậʔu kũŋ dɔán zõzàŋ Ðứkzê dã cáʔu fướk cɔ kậʔu vậʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ cáʔu hãʔi dịɲ kôŋ ɣiá cáʔu di zồʔi kậʔu cả cɔ zakốp dáp kậʔu tôʔi ɣiúpdỡ kậʔu tʰểnàʔɔ tăj tôʔi bầʔi súkvật kậʔu dượk zasaw cướk xi tôʔi dến súkvật kủʔa kậʔu tʰật ɲưŋ xi tôʔi dến tʰì tʰêm ɲiềʔu kwá bộʔi Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ kậʔu xi tôʔi bướk cơn vàʔɔ ɲà nầʔi bâʔizờ biếtcừŋnàʔɔ tôʔi dượk lɔ việk ɲà tôʔi laban zằŋ kậʔu cɔ cáʔu káʔi ɣì bâʔizờ zằŋ sẽ cẳŋ cɔ tôʔi ci kả nếʔu tʰuận tʰeo lờʔi nầʔi tʰì tôʔi cɔ căn bầʔi súkvật kậʔu nữʔa ŋàʔinăj tôʔi di kiểmsɔát kák bầʔi ciên bầʔi zê kủʔa kậʔu cɔŋ bầʔi ciên bầʔi zê kɔn nàʔɔ kó zằn kó dốm kùŋ ciên sắk dɛn tʰì tôʔi dể ziêŋ za ấʔi fần kôŋ ɣiá kủʔa tôʔi dó mộtmaj kậʔu di sɛmsét kôŋ ɣiá tôʔi tʰì lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ tôʔi làmcứŋ cướk kậʔu hễ fần tôʔi kák kɔn zê nàʔɔ xôŋ kó zằn dốm kák ciên kɔn nàʔɔ xôŋ kó sắk dɛn tʰì cɔ ănkắp laban dáp tʰôʔi dượk ɲư lờʔi cáʔu nóʔi cáɲ ŋàʔi dó laban dể ziêŋ kák zê dựk kó sọk kó dốm kák zê káʔi dó zằn kó dốm kák nàʔɔ kó dém cắŋ kák ciên kɔn kó sắk dɛn zaw cɔ mấʔi kɔncaj mìɲ zồʔi dể zakốp kùŋ mìɲ kác sa ɲăw cừŋ ŋàʔidườŋ zakốp căn bầʔi súkvật kủʔa laban cỉ kòn lạʔi Ðʔɔạn zakốp lấʔi ɲàɲ bạczươŋ ɲàɲ bồdàʔɔ ɲàɲ tươʔi dể bàʔi za cắŋ cɔŋ za ŋườʔi dể ɲữŋ ɲàɲ dã cɔŋ máŋ cướk kɔnciên nơʔi kák tʰú dó dến ʔuốŋ xi dến ʔuốŋ nướk tʰì kɔnciên kó zaw ɲăw kák kɔnciên ŋó tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ɲàɲ dó zaw ɲăw tʰì sɛɲ ciên kɔn kó sọk kó zằn kó dốm zakốp dể ziêŋ ciên kɔn za zồʔi dể ciên káʔi cɔŋ bầʔi kủʔa laban cướk kák kɔn kó sọk kó sắk dɛn ɲưŋ bầʔi mìɲ tʰì ziêŋ za xôŋ dể ɣần bầʔi kủʔa laban vả mọʔi kák kɔnciên mạɲ zaw tʰì zakốp dể kák ɲàɲ dó zướʔi cɔŋ máŋ ʔuốŋ nướk dặŋ cúŋnó dốʔi ɲàɲ zaw kùŋ ɲăw ɲưŋ xi nàʔɔ kɔnciên ɣầʔiốm tʰì ŋườʔi xôŋ dể ɲàɲ ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì kák ciên kɔn ɣầʔiốm dể fần laban kòn ciên kɔn mạɲ lạʔi fần zakốp vậʔi ŋườʔi cởnên zất ɣiàʔu kó ɲiềʔu bầʔi súkvật tôʔi caj ɣáʔi lạkdà lừʔa zakốp dượk ŋɛ lờʔi kák kɔn laban nóʔi zằŋ zakốp dã lấʔi zatàʔi ca ɲờ kủʔa ca mớʔi dượk ɣiàʔukó zườŋ ấʔi zakốp kũŋ dểý kɔj kậʔu ɲậnbiết zằŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ dốʔi vớʔi mìɲ ɲư cướk nữʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zakốp zằŋ hãʔi cởvề sứ kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi cốn kɔnŋươʔi fùhộ ŋươʔi zakốp saj ŋườʔi ɣọʔi zɛcên lê ʔa dếnnơʔi kầm bầʔi súkvật kủʔa mìɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ ta tʰấʔi sắk ca haj ŋươʔi dốʔi kùŋ cẳŋ kòn ɲư cướk nữʔa ɲưŋ ɲờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca fùhộ cáɲ haj ŋươʔi kũŋ zằŋ dã ɣiúp ca haj ŋươʔi hếtsứk kòn ca haj ŋươʔi lạʔi xiɲbạk mườʔi tʰăjdổʔi kôŋ ɣiá ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ cɔfép ŋườʔilàm hạʔi cút nàʔɔ xi ŋườʔi zạʔi zằŋ kák kɔnciên kó dốm zùŋ làmkôŋ ɣiá ŋươʔi kwả kák kɔnciên dềʔu sɛɲ kɔn za kó sọk tʰếtʰì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã súkvật kủʔa ca haj ŋươʔi cɔ dó Ðươŋ cɔŋ lúk ciên zaw ɲăw ɲướŋ ciêmbaw tʰấʔi kák ciên dựk dươŋ zaw kùŋ ciên káʔi dềʔu kó sọk kó zằn kó dốm tʰiênsứ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ cɔŋ mộŋ zằŋ hỡʔiza kốp ta tʰưʔa kó tôʔi dâʔi tʰiênsứ zằŋ hỡʔi ɲướŋ ɲìn hếttʰảʔi ciên dựk dươŋ zaw kùŋ ciên káʔi dềʔu kó sọk kó zằn kó dốm dã tʰấʔi kác laban kùŋ ŋươʔi zồʔi tadâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa bêtên tứk nơʔi ŋươʔi dã tʰwa zầʔu dầʔu kâʔi cụ dã xấnváʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi za xỏʔi sứ bầʔi cởvề sứ kủʔa kɔnŋươʔi zɛcên lê ʔa dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kòn fần ci hăjlà kơŋiệp ci nơʔi ɲà ca cúŋtôʔi căŋ vì ŋườʔi dã ɣảbán cúŋtôʔi ănsàʔi tiềnbạk nữʔa ŋườʔi cẳŋ dãʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲư ŋườʔizưŋ kák tàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɔạt nơʔi tăj ca cúŋtôʔi tứklà kủʔa cúŋtôʔi kủʔa kɔnkáʔi cúŋtôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ càŋ hãʔi tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fảʔi zạʔi zakốp dứŋzậʔi dỡ kɔn lưŋ lạkdà zẫn hếttʰảʔi súkvật kủʔakảʔi mìɲ tứk súkvật mìɲ dã ɣâʔizựŋ fadanazam dặŋ cởvề kùŋ ʔisák ca mìɲ kanaan cɔŋ lúk laban mắk di lôŋ ciên ŋườʔi tʰì zɛcên ănkắp kák fɔ tượŋ tʰờ cɔŋ ɲà kủʔa ca mìɲ zakốp ɣạt laban xôŋ nóʔi zằŋ mìɲ di cốn vậʔi ŋườʔi dứŋzậʔi dɛm tʰeo hếttʰảʔi tàʔi mìɲ cốn di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ tʰẳŋ núʔi ɣalaát ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋườʔita họk lạʔi kùŋ laban zằŋ zakốp dã cốn di zồʔi ŋườʔi dɛm kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ duổʔi tʰeo zakốp cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔidườŋ tʰeo tạʔi núʔi ɣalaát ɲưŋ cɔŋ kơn ciêmbaw lúk bandêm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dếnkùŋ laban ŋườʔi ʔazam fán zằŋ zầʔu làɲ zầʔu zữ tʰếnàʔɔ ŋươʔi xá ɣiữmìɲ dừŋ nóʔi ci kùŋ zakốp vậʔi laban tʰeo zakốp vả zakốp dươŋ dóŋ cạʔi cên núʔi laban kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kũŋ dóŋ cạʔi cên núʔi ɣalaát laban nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ cáʔu dã làmci vậʔi cáʔu dã ɣạt kậʔu zẫn mấʔi dứʔa ɣáʔi kậʔu ɲư fu ɣiặk saw cốn ɲẹm ɣạt xôŋ cɔ kậʔu hăj cướk kólẽ kậʔu dưʔa di zất vujvẻ tiếŋ tiếŋ dờn tiếŋ cốŋ fụ dưʔa cáʔu kác zạʔizột vậʔi xôŋ dể cɔ kậʔu kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kậʔu tăj kậʔu kó dủ kwiền hạʔi cáʔu ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca cáʔu dã mácbảʔɔ kùŋ kậʔu tốʔi hômkwa zằŋ zầʔu làɲ zầʔu zữ ŋươʔi xá ɣiữmìɲ dừŋ nóʔi ci kùŋ zakốp bâʔizờ lòŋ cáʔu mɔŋmỏʔi ɲà ca cáʔu dã zadi ɲưŋ kớsaw cáʔu lạʔi ănkắp kák fɔ tượŋ kậʔu zakốp dáp zằŋ vì kớ tôʔi ʔɛ kậʔu haj ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi lạʔi căŋ ɲưŋ nơʔi ʔaj dượk kák fɔ tượŋ kủʔa kậʔu tʰì ʔaj dó cết di tạʔi cướk kák ʔɛɲɛm cúŋta kậʔu hãʔi kiểmsɔát kák nơʔi tôʔi di hãʔi lấʔi ci tʰuộk kậʔu vả zakốp xôŋ hăj zằŋ zɛcên dã cộm mấʔi fɔ tượŋ dó vậʔi laban vàʔɔ cạʔi zakốp cạʔi lê ʔa cạʔi haj ŋườʔi dòʔi cẳŋ dượk ci kả Ðʔɔạn cạʔi lê ʔa bướk zadi vàʔɔ cạʔi zɛcên vả zɛcên kó lấʔi mấʔi fɔ tượŋ dó ɣiấʔu zướʔi bàɲ lạkdà zồʔi ŋồʔi cên laban sɔát lụk xắp cạʔi cẳŋ ɣặp fɔ tượŋ nàŋ tʰưʔa kùŋ ca zằŋ vì cɔŋ mìɲ kɔn kó việk ziêŋ kủʔa dờn dứŋzậʔi zướk cẳŋ dượk sin cúʔa cớ ɣiận kɔn ci ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi fɔ tượŋ dâʔu zakốp nổʔizận zầʔi kùŋ laban zằŋ tôʔi kó ɣì tộʔiɣì kậʔu duổʔi tʰeo ɲưvậʔi kậʔu dã sɔát lụk kák dồ hàɲlý tôʔi kó dượk ci tʰuộk ɲà kậʔu căŋ hãʔi dɛm dó za cướk ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm kậʔu dặŋ sétdɔán dôʔi kìʔa dã haimươʔi tôʔi nơʔi ɲà kậʔu ciên kùŋ zê kậʔu nàʔɔ kó sảʔɔ tʰaj tôʔi cẳŋ tʰịt ciên dựk kủʔa bầʔi kậʔu bawzờ kũŋ cẳŋ dɛm cɔ kậʔu kɔn nàʔɔ sé bằŋ kó cíɲ tôʔi cịʔu dền dó tʰôʔi kậʔu kớ dòʔi ɲữŋ kɔn ănkắp banŋàʔi ăncộm bandêm banŋàʔi tôʔi cịʔu nắŋ nồŋ bandêm cịʔu lạɲlùŋ ŋủ nàʔɔ kó ʔaŋiấk dượk dâʔu cɔŋ haimươʔi tôʔi tạʔi ɲà kậʔu tʰế cɔŋ mườʔibốn ɣiúpviệk dể dượk haj kɔŋáʔi kậʔu sáʔu dặŋ lãɲ lấʔi bầʔi súkvật kủʔa kậʔu kậʔu lạʔi kòn tʰăjdổʔi mườʔi kôŋ ɣiá tôʔi nếʔuÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham Ðấŋ ʔisák kíɲ xôŋ fùhộ tôʔi cắk bâʔizờ kậʔu duổʔi tôʔi zatăj xôŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã sɛm tʰấʔi nỗʔi dăw xổ tôʔi kùŋ kôŋviệk haj tăj tôʔi dêm kwa ŋàʔi dã sét kôŋbìɲ zồʔi dó laban dáp kùŋ zakốp zằŋ kák dứʔa ɣáʔi nầʔi kɔn kủʔa kậʔu kák dứʔa cẻ nầʔi cẻ kủʔa kậʔu kák bầʔi súkvật tứklà bầʔi súkvật kủʔa kậʔu kák ci cáʔu tʰấʔi dượk tứklà kủʔa kậʔu ŋàʔinăj kậʔu làmci dượk kùŋ kák kɔŋáʔi haj kák cáʔu kậʔu dó vậʔi bâʔizờ cúŋta ướk kùŋ ɲăw dể zùŋ làmcứŋ cɔ kậʔu cáʔu zakốp lấʔi dá zựŋdứŋ cụ nóʔi kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi ɣóp dá lạʔi cúŋ ɣóp dá lạʔi cất tʰàɲ dốŋ zồʔi ŋồʔi cên bữʔa laban dặt cên dốŋ dá dó ʔiêɣa sahazuta kòn zakốp kêʔu ɣalét laban nóʔi zằŋ Ðốŋ dá nầʔi ŋàʔinăj làmcứŋ cɔ kậʔu cáʔu dó cɔnên cúŋ ɣọʔilà ɣalét mà kũŋ ɣọʔilà mícba laban kó nóʔi tʰêm zằŋ xi cúŋta fânkác ɲăw kầʔusin Ðứkzê kɔjsók kậʔu cáʔu nếʔu cáʔu hàɲhạ kák kɔŋáʔi kậʔu nếʔu kướʔi xák nữʔa tʰì hãʔi ɣiữmìɲ cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi tʰườŋ sɔjsét dâʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi làmcứŋ cɔ cúŋta vậʔi laban lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ nầʔi dốŋ dá nầʔi kâʔi cụ mìɲ kậʔu dã zựŋ ɣiữʔa kậʔu cáʔu dâʔi Ðốŋ dá nầʔi kâʔi cụ nầʔi làmcứŋ zằŋ kậʔu cẳŋkwa xỏʔi dâʔi di dếnnơʔi cáʔu cáʔu kũŋ cẳŋ xỏʔi dâʔi di dếnnơʔi kậʔu cɔŋ xi kó hạʔi ɲăw kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa nakô Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca kák ŋườʔi dó dɔán sét cɔ cúŋta zakốp cỉ Ðấŋ kủʔa ʔisák ca mìɲ kíɲ tʰề Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa tạʔi cên núʔi mờʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zùŋ báɲ vậʔi cúŋ zùŋ báɲ zồʔi bandêm cên núʔi laban zậʔi kák kɔncaj kák kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cúk fướk cɔ zồʔi di cởvề ɲà mìɲ zakốp kứ di dườŋ kó tʰiênsứ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣặp ŋườʔi xiza kốp tʰấʔi kák nầʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà cạʔi kwân kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nênŋườʔi dặt cỗ dó mahanaim zakốp saj sứɣiả dến cướk kùŋ săw ʔɛɲ mìɲ cɔŋ sứ sê ʔizơ tʰuộk dịʔa fận dôm ŋườʔi zặn zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ săw cúʔa ɲưvầʔi zakốp tôʔitớ cúʔa kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã ŋụ tạʔi ɲà laban dến ŋàʔinăj kó lừʔa ciên tôʔi caj ɣáʔi vậʔi sin saj di nóʔi cɔ cúʔa hăj cướk hầʔu cɔ ɲờ dượk cướk cúʔa tôʔi kák sứɣiả cởvề nóʔi kùŋ zakốp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã di dến săw ʔɛɲ kủʔa củ nầʔi ŋườʔi dươŋ dɛm bốncăm ŋườʔi dến dể zướk củ zakốp zất sợhãʔi sầʔunãʔɔ ciə kák zân di tʰeo kùŋ kák bầʔi ciên lạkdà za haj dộʔi zằŋ nếʔu săw dến dáɲ cɔŋ haj dộʔi tʰì dộʔi kòn lạʔi tʰɔát dượk Ðʔɔạn zakốp kầʔu zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ zaham tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca ʔisák tôʔi tứklà Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kó fán zạʔi tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi cởvề sứ ŋươʔi nơʔi kɔnŋươʔi zồʔi cɔ ŋươʔi tôʔi lấʔilàm xôŋ dáŋ cịʔu kák kák diềʔu tʰàɲtʰựk ŋàʔi dã cɔ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi lúk cướk xi kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cỉ kó kâʔi ɣậʔi tôʔi ŋàʔinăj tôʔi lạʔi cởnên haj dộʔi kwân nầʔi vậʔi kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tăj săw ʔɛɲ tôʔi ʔɛ ŋườʔi dến dáɲ tôʔi dáɲ vớʔi kɔn nữʔa vả ŋàʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ kwảtʰật vậʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dôŋ ɲư kát bãʔibiển ŋườʔita xôŋ saw dếm dượk dôŋdúk kwá ŋườʔiở bandêm tạʔi dó lấʔi kák kó cɔŋ tăj dể kủʔa zâŋ cɔ săw ʔɛɲ mìɲ haj căm zê káʔi haicụk zê dựk haj căm ciên káʔi haicụk ciên dựk cụk lạkdà káʔi kó kɔn dươŋ cụk káʔi mườʔi dựk haicụk kɔn lừʔa káʔi mườʔi lừʔa kɔn zồʔi zaw mỗʔi bầʔi ziêŋ za nơʔi tăj dầʔitớ mìɲ zặn zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi di cướk zẫn bầʔi nầʔi kác xɔảŋ dến bầʔi kiə ŋườʔi zặn zẫn bầʔi di cướcết ɲưvầʔi xi săw sɛɲ ɣặp hỏʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi vớʔi ʔaj di dâʔu bầʔi súkvật cướk ŋươʔi dó tʰuộk ʔaj tʰì hãʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kủʔaza kốp tôʔitớ cúʔa ấʔilà ɣởʔi zâŋ cɔ săw cúʔa tôʔi nầʔi cáɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi dươŋ tʰeo săw zakốp kũŋ zặn ʔi lờʔi cɔ zẫn bầʔi tʰứ ɲì tʰứba hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi tʰeo kɔicừŋ kák bầʔi lạʔi nóʔi xi ɣặp săw kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲớ lờʔi dó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi nầʔi zakốp tôʔitớ cúʔa dươŋ tʰeo săw cúŋtôʔi vì ŋườʔi tʰầm ŋĩ zằŋ mìɲ dɛm nầʔi zâŋ cướk cɔ săw ŋuôʔi ɣiận dã zồʔi mìɲ ɣiápmặt săw kólẽ ŋườʔi tiếpzướk mìɲ mộtkác tʰuận dó vậʔi nầʔi dɛm di cướk kòn ŋườʔi dêm dó lạʔi cạʔi bandêm ŋườʔi tʰứkzậʔi zẫn haj haj dòʔi mườʔimột dứʔa kɔn mìɲ di kwa zạc zabốk ŋườʔi dɛm kwa zạc hếttʰảʔi kủʔakảʔi mìɲ kwa nữʔa vả mộtmìɲ zakốp lạʔi tʰìkó ŋườʔi vớʔi mìɲ dượk zạŋdôŋ xi ŋườʔi dó tʰấʔi mìɲ xôŋ tʰắŋ nổʔi dáɲ vàʔɔ sươŋ hôŋ zakốp sươŋ hôŋ cặt cɔŋ xi ŋườʔi dó nóʔi cờʔi dã zạŋdôŋ zồʔi tʰôʔi dể cɔ di ɲưŋ zakốp dáp zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ cɔ ŋườʔi di dâʔu nếʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ fướk cɔ tôʔi ŋườʔi dó hỏʔi tên ŋươʔi ci zằŋ tên tôʔi zakốp ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi tên ŋươʔi cẳŋ zakốp nữʔa ɲưŋ ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi dã kó kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔita ŋươʔi dềʔu dượk tʰắŋ zakốp hỏʔi sin cɔ tôʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ làmsaw ŋươʔi hỏʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi fướk cɔ zakốp tạʔi dó zakốp dặt cỗ dó fêniên nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã tʰấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dốʔimặt kùŋ tôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi dượk ɣiảʔicứʔu xi kwa nơʔi finiên tʰấʔi mặtcờʔi mọk zồʔi ŋườʔi di ɣiẹʔɔ kẳŋ bởʔi kớ dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ bawzờ ɣân kủʔa lốʔi sươŋ hôŋ ŋườʔi dó kó dáɲ vàʔɔ sươŋ hôŋ zakốp nơʔi ɣân kủʔa zakốp ɲướŋ ɲìn kìʔa săw zẫn bốncăm ŋườʔi di dến ŋườʔi ciə kák kɔn cɔ lê ʔa zɛcên cɔ haj dòʔi haj dòʔi kɔnkáʔi cướk dến lê ʔa kɔnkáʔi nàŋ zɛcên kùŋ ɣiôsép săw cót kòn ŋườʔi tʰì di cướk mìɲ suốŋ dất bảʔi cɔdến xi tớʔi ɣần ʔɛɲ mìɲ ɲưŋ săw cạʔi dến cướk ŋườʔi cɔàŋ kổ zồʔi haj ʔɛɲɛm dềʔu xók Ðʔɔạn săw ɲướŋ tʰấʔi mấʔi ŋườʔi dờn kɔnkáʔi tʰì hỏʔi zằŋ kák ŋườʔi ʔɛm kó dó ʔaj zằŋ Ấʔilà kɔnkáʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ tôʔitớ ʔɛɲ haj dòʔi kɔnkáʔi lạʔi ɣần ŋườʔi mìɲ suốŋ lê ʔa kák kɔnkáʔi nàŋ kũŋ lạʔi ɣần mìɲ suốŋ dɔạn zɛcên ɣiôsép lạʔi ɣần mìɲ suốŋ săw hỏʔi tɔán kwân ʔɛɲ dã ɣặp di cướk dó ʔɛm tíɲ làmci zằŋ Ấʔi dể ɲờ dượk cướk cúʔa tôʔi săw nóʔi hỡʔi ʔɛm ʔɛɲ dã dượk dủ zồʔi vậʔi hãʔi lấʔi lạʔi ci kủʔa ʔɛm di tʰưʔa zằŋ sin ʔɛɲ xôŋ nếʔu ʔɛm dượk cướk ʔɛɲ hãʔi ɲậm lấʔi bởʔi tăj ʔɛm zadi ʔɛm tʰấʔi dượk ʔɛɲ xáknàʔɔ ŋườʔita tʰấʔi dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔɛɲ dã dẹplòŋ tiếpzướk ʔɛm sin ʔɛɲ hãʔi ɲậm lấʔi ʔɛm dã zâŋ cɔ ʔɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ʔɛm dầʔizẫʔi ʔɛm kó dủ ŋườʔi nàʔisin săw kwá dến dỗʔi fảʔi cịʔu ɲậm lấʔi săw nóʔi hè hãʔi lêndườŋ ʔɛɲ di cướk ʔɛm zakốp dáp cúʔa zằŋ kák dứʔa cả ʔiếʔu ʔɛm lạʔi mắk kɔicừŋ ciên káʔi dươŋ kó kɔn nếʔu di măw cỉ cɔŋ ŋàʔi cắk kả bầʔi fảʔi cết sin cúʔa hãʔi di cướk tôʔitớ cúʔa kòn tôʔi di tớʔi cậm cậm tʰeo bướk kủʔa súkvật di cướk kủʔa kák cẻ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tớʔi ɲàcúʔa tạʔi sứ sê ʔizơ săw nóʔi vậʔi ʔɛɲ sin dể lạʔi kùŋ ʔɛm mộtvàʔi ŋườʔi tùʔitùŋ kủʔa ʔɛɲ zakốp dáp zằŋ ci vậʔi ʔɛm dượk ɲờ cướk cúʔa tʰôʔi nộʔi ŋàʔi dó săw dườŋ cởvề sê ʔizơ zakốp di dến sukốt kất ɲà cɔ mìɲ mấʔi káʔi lềʔu cɔ súkvật cɔnên dặt cốn nầʔi sukốt zakốp sứ fazanazam dến tʰàɲ sicɛm tʰuộk sứ kanaan dượk bìɲan ŋườʔi dóŋ tạʔi cướk tʰàɲ mwa miếŋ dất cỗ ŋườʔi dóŋ cạʔi ɣiá mộtcăm miếŋ bạk kủʔa kɔn hêmô ca sicɛm nơʔi dó ŋườʔi bàntʰờ dặt cên ʔɛnɛânôhê ʔisơzaên nàŋÐʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa lê ʔa sɛɲ cɔ zakốp di za tʰăm kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sứ dó sicɛm kɔncaj hêmô ŋườʔi hêvít hɔàŋtử sứ dó tʰấʔi nàŋ tʰì kướp di vớʔi nàŋ diếmɲụk nàŋ tâmhồn càŋ kùŋ Ðʔi kɔŋáʔi zakốp tʰươŋmến kɔŋáʔi dó lấʔi lờʔi ŋɔnŋọt nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ sicɛm nóʔi kùŋ hêmô ca mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi cɔ tôʔi kɔŋáʔi nầʔi vả zakốp hăj dượk zằŋ càŋ hưzɛɲ ɣiá Ðʔi kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ɲưŋ kák kɔncaj mìɲ mắk ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kùŋ súkvật nênŋườʔi làmtʰiɲ dến xi cởvề lúk dó hêmê ca sicɛm dếnkùŋ zakốp dặŋ nóʔicwiện kùŋ ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj zakốp ŋɔàʔi dồŋ cởvề vừʔa hăj dượkviệk ấʔi nổʔinóŋ ɣiận việk ôzɛɲ sicɛm dã suj cɔ ʔisơzaên kùŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa zakốp việk cẳŋ bawzờ hêmô nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ tâmhồn sicɛm kɔncaj tôʔi dã zan zíʔu kùŋ kɔŋáʔi kák ôŋ sin hãʔi ɣả nàŋ cɔ hãʔi suj za kùŋ ɲăw kák ôŋ ɣả kɔŋáʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi zồʔi kướʔi kák kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi lạʔi hãʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi sứ zàɲ cɔ kák ôŋ hãʔi zựŋ kơŋiệp tạʔi dó sicɛm tʰưʔa kùŋ ca kák ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi zằŋ sin cɔ tôʔi dượk cướk kák ôŋ diềʔu ci kák ôŋ nóʔi tôʔi sin cɔ sin hãʔi dòʔi kướʔi cɔ síɲŋi cɔ kaw tôʔi sin tʰeo ʔi lờʔi kák ôŋ nóʔi ɲưŋ hãʔi ɣả kɔŋáʔi dó cɔ tôʔi kák kɔncaj zakốp dáp lạʔi kùŋ sicɛm hêmô ca càŋ kùŋ zùŋ mưʔu nóʔicwiện vớʔi sicɛm dã zɛɲzá kủʔa Ðʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ kák ŋườʔi ấʔi nóʔi zằŋ ɣả ʔɛmɣáʔi cúŋtôʔi cɔ ʔaj cẳŋ cịʔufép kắt ấʔilà việk cúŋtôʔi xôŋ dượk nỗʔi ɲuốkɲa cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲậm lờʔi kák ôŋ dượk xi nàʔɔ kák ôŋ cởnên ɣiốŋ ɲư cúŋtôʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cịʔufép kắt vậʔi cúŋtôʔi ɣả kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi cɔ kák ôŋ kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kák ôŋ lạʔi dɔạn cuŋ ɲăw tʰàɲza zân tʰôʔi kòn nếʔuxôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi xôŋ cịʔufép kắt tʰì cúŋtôʔi kɔŋáʔi lạʔi diở nơʔi xák bawɲiêʔu lờʔi nóʔi cɔ dẹp zạ hêmô sicɛm kɔncaj ŋườʔi càŋ cẻ tuổʔi dó xôŋ ŋầnŋạʔi kák việk dã dịɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa zakốp dẹplòŋ càŋ vả càŋ dâʔi ŋườʔi kwícọŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲà ca mìɲ vậʔi hêmô sicɛm kɔncaj ŋườʔi di dến kửʔa tʰàɲ mìɲ nóʔi kùŋzân cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɲưvầʔi kák ŋườʔi dó hòʔatʰuận ɣiữʔa vòŋ cúŋta vậʔi cɔ cɔŋ sứ dặŋ nầʔi sứ kũŋ zộŋ cɔ cúŋta kướʔi kɔŋáʔi ɣả kák kɔŋáʔi cúŋta lạʔi ɲưŋ bằŋlòŋ kùŋ cúŋta dặŋ tʰàɲ zân xi nàʔɔ kák ŋườʔi cɔŋ mìɲ fảʔi cịʔufép kắt cíɲ ɲư mọʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa vậʔi tʰếtʰì zằŋ kák súkvật kák tàʔisản kák bầʔi kủʔa cẳŋ tʰuộk cúŋta saw tʰôʔi hãʔi ɲận tʰeo diềʔu dó di dể cuŋ kùŋ cúŋta mọʔi ŋườʔi di za kửʔa tʰàɲ mìɲ dềʔu ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi hêmô sicɛm kɔncaj ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi di za kửʔa tʰàɲ mìɲ dềʔu cịʔufép kắt ŋàʔi tʰứba xi mọʔi ŋườʔi dươŋ dăwdớn tʰì haj kɔncaj zakốp simêôn lêvi ʔɛɲ nàŋ Ðʔi kầm mỗʔi ŋườʔi tʰɛɲ ɣươm tʰừʔa xi ʔainấʔi ʔiênổn sôŋ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi haj ŋườʔi lạʔi lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết hêmô sicɛm kɔncaj ŋườʔi dɛm nàŋ Ðʔi za xỏʔi ɲà sicɛm zồʔi di vì kớ zɛɲzá ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ kák kɔncaj zakốp sôŋ vàʔɔ ɲữŋ sákcết fá kướp tʰàɲ kák bầʔi ciên lừʔa kùŋ ci cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kướp dɛm di tàʔi kák kɔncẻ dờn kùŋ mọʔi ci cɔŋ ɲà vậʔi zakốp nóʔi kùŋ simêôn lêvi zằŋ băj suj cɔ taw bốʔizốʔi cɔ zân sứ nầʔi ŋườʔi kanaan ŋườʔi fêzêsít ʔɔáŋét taw vậʔi taw dâʔi cỉ kó ŋườʔi nếʔu lạʔi dáɲ taw tʰì cắk taw nộʔi ɲà dềʔu tàɲạʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi cịʔu ŋườʔita dãʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲư kɔn dĩ saw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ zakốp zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di bêtên hãʔi nơʔi dó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ za kùŋ ŋươʔi dươŋ lúk cạʔi cốn xỏʔi săw ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi zakốp nóʔi kùŋ vợkɔn mọʔi di tʰeo mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi zẹp kák tượŋ tʰần ŋɔạʔibaŋ xỏʔi ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔ mìɲ dượk tʰɛɲsạc tʰăj áʔɔsốŋ di Ðʔɔạn cúŋta hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di dến bêtên nơʔi dó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ dã cảlờʔi cɔŋ lúk ŋwihiểm dã fùhộ cɔŋ xi di dườŋ họ dưʔa cɔ zakốp kák tượŋ tʰần ŋɔạʔibaŋ kủʔa mìɲ kák vòŋ deo nơʔi taj zồʔi ŋườʔi côn mấʔi dó zướʔi ɣốk kâʔi zẻ ɣần tʰàɲ sicɛm Ðʔɔạn cúŋ xởʔihàɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiáŋ kiɲhãʔi cɔ kák tʰàɲ cuŋkwɛɲ dó cẳŋ zám duổʔi tʰeo kák kɔncaj kủʔa zakốp zakốp kùŋ mọʔi di tʰeo dến tạʔi lusơ tʰàɲ bêtên tʰuộk sứ kanaan ŋườʔi tạʔi dó bàntʰờ dặt cốn nầʔi ʔɛânbêtên nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã za kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk cạʔi cốn xỏʔi ʔɛɲ mìɲ xi dó bôza kủʔa zêbɛca kwadờʔi dượk côn tʰân zướʔi tʰàɲ bêtên tạʔi ɣốk zẻ ɲơn dó ŋườʔita ɣọʔilà kâʔi ʔalônbakút xi sứ fadanazam dến Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi za kùŋ zakốp nữʔa fướk cɔ ŋườʔi fán zằŋ tên ŋươʔi zakốp săw nầʔi cẳŋ ɣọʔi zakốp nữʔa ɲưŋ dặt ʔisơzaên zồʔiŋàʔi dặt ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu zân cɔdến ɲiềʔu zân dềʔu zɔ nơʔi ŋươʔi sɛɲ kùŋ kák vwa zɔ nơʔi mìɲ ŋươʔi za sứ dã cɔ zaham ʔisák tʰì cɔ ŋươʔi kùŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋự xỏʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi dã fảʔi kùŋ zakốp ŋườʔi zựŋ kâʔi cụ dó tạʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán kùŋ mìɲ zâŋ kwán tướʔi zầʔu vàʔɔ Ðʔɔạn zakốp dặt nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán kùŋ mìɲ bêtên bêtên di kòn kác ʔɛânfùhộzát cừŋ vàʔɔ tʰôʔi dườŋ tʰì zɛcên sɛɲ việk sɛɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰật dăwdớn cɔŋ xi xó sɛɲ nóʔi zằŋ Ðừŋ ci nàŋ kòn kɔncaj nữʔa vả bởʔi zɛcên ɣần cút liɲhồn dươŋ kơn hấfốʔi nênŋườʔi dặt dứʔa kɔncaj dó bênôni kòn ca lạʔi dặt bêŋiəmin vậʔi zɛcên kwadờʔi dượk côn kɔn dườŋ divề fơzát tứklà bếtlêhɛm zakốp zựŋ biə ấʔilà biə kủʔa zɛcên dến ŋàʔinăj hãʔi kòn zitíc kế dó ʔisơzaên di dóŋ cạʔi ŋɔàʔi nơʔi tʰáp dể vả ɲầm xi ʔisơzaên ŋụ tạʔi sứ nầʔi tʰì zubên kó dến kùŋ bila kủʔa ca mìɲ ʔisơzaên hăj dượkviệk dó vả zakốp kó dượk mườʔihaj kɔncaj kɔn kủʔa lê ʔa zubên cưởŋnam kủʔa zakốp nữʔalà simêôn lêvi zuda ʔisaka sabulôn kɔn kủʔa zɛcên ɣiôsép bêŋiəmin kɔn kủʔa bila dòʔi kủʔa zɛcên Ðʔan néptali kɔn kủʔa siɲba dòʔi kủʔa lê ʔa ɣát ʔasɛ Ấʔi dó kák kɔncaj kủʔa zakốp sɛɲ tạʔi sứ fadanazam zakốp dếnkùŋ ʔisák ca mìɲ mamzê tạʔi tʰàɲ kiziátazaba tứklà hếpzôn nơʔi zaham ʔisák dã kiềʔu ŋụ ʔisák hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm mươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi tuổʔi kaw ták tʰỏʔamãn dờʔi mìɲ tắtʰơʔi dượk kùŋ tổfụ săw zakốp haj kɔncaj côn ŋườʔi Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa săw tứklà dôm vậʔi săw kướʔi kák cɔŋ kɔŋáʔi sứ kanaan ʔada kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi hêtít kɔŋáʔi ʔana cáʔu ŋɔạʔi kủʔa sibêôn ŋườʔi hêvít kùŋ bácmát kɔŋáʔi Íc ʔɛmɣáʔi kủʔa nêbazốt ʔada sɛɲ lifa cɔ săw bácmát sɛɲ zê ʔuên kòn sɛɲ ɣiêúk zalam kôza Ấʔi dó kák kɔncaj kủʔa săw sɛɲ tạʔi sứ kanaan săw zẫn kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ mọʔi ŋườʔiɲà kák bầʔi ciên lụksúk tàʔi mìɲ dã ɣâʔizựŋ tạʔi sứ kanaan zờʔi kwa sứ xák kác sa zakốp ʔɛm mìɲ vả kớ haj ʔɛɲɛm kủʔakảʔi ɲiềʔu bầʔi súkvật dôŋ sứ dươŋ kiềʔu ŋụ xôŋ dủ dất zùŋ nữʔa cuŋ ɲăw cẳŋ dượk vậʔi săw tứklà dôm cên núʔi sê ʔizơ Ðâʔi zòŋzõʔi săw tổfụ zân dôm cên núʔi sê ʔizơ Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj săw ʔadavợ ŋườʔi sɛɲ lifa bácmát kũŋ ŋườʔi sɛɲ zê ʔuên kɔncaj kủʔa lifa tʰêma sêfô ɣatʰam kêna tʰimna lifa kɔncaj kủʔa săw sɛɲ ʔamalék cɔ ŋườʔi cáʔu kủʔa ʔada săw kòn dâʔi kɔncaj kủʔa zê ʔuên nahát sêzác samma mícsa Ấʔilà kák cáʔu kủʔa bácmát kùŋ săw và mấʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi kɔncaj kủʔa kủʔa săw kɔŋáʔi ʔana cáʔu ŋɔạʔi sibêôn nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ săw ɣiêúk ɣajlam kôza Ðâʔi kák cưởŋtộk cɔŋ vòŋ kɔncáʔu săw kák kɔncaj lifa kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa săw cưởŋtộk tʰêman cưởŋtộk cưởŋtộk sêfô cưởŋtộk kêna cưởŋtộk ʔamalék kák cưởŋtộk zɔ nơʔi lifa sɛɲ tạʔi sứ dôm kák cáʔu kủʔa ʔada Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa zê ʔuên kɔn săw cưởŋtộk nahát cưởŋtộk sêzác cưởŋtộk samma cưởŋtộk mícsa kák cưởŋtộk zɔ nơʔi zê ʔuên sɛɲ za tạʔi sứ dôm kák cáʔu kủʔa bácmát Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa lɔlibama săw cưởŋtộk ɣiêúk cưởŋtộk zalam cưởŋtộk kôza mấʔi cưởŋtộk zɔ săw kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔana sɛɲ za Ấʔilà kák kɔncaj kủʔa săw tứklà dôm dó mấʔi cưởŋtộk kủʔa Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa sê ʔizơ ŋườʔi hôzít tʰuở sưʔa tạʔi sứ dó lôtʰan sôbɛɲ sibêôn ʔana Ðʔi sɛ Ðʔi mấʔi kɔncaj kủʔa sê ʔizơ cưởŋtộk zân hôzít tạʔi sứ dôm kák kɔncaj kủʔa lôtʰan hôzi hêman kòn tʰimna ʔɛm kủʔa ɣáʔi lôtʰan Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa sôbɛɲ ʔɛɲvan manahát bɛɲ sêfô Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa sibêôn ʔajza ʔana Ấʔilà ʔana kó dặŋ suốʔi nướk sôʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ cɔŋ xi căn lừʔa cɔ sibêôn ca nàŋ Ðâʔi kɔnkáʔi kủʔa ʔana Ðʔi kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi Ðâʔi kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔi hɛmdan Ếc zícan kêzan Ðâʔi kɔncaj kủʔa sɛ biɲhan savan ʔakan Ðâʔi kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔi ʔuùtsơ ʔazan kòn dâʔi kák cưởŋtộk zân hôzít cưởŋtộk lôtʰan cưởŋtộk sôbɛɲ cưởŋtộk sibêôn cưởŋtộk ʔana cưởŋtộk Ðʔi cưởŋtộk sɛ cưởŋtộk Ðʔi kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa zân hôzít tạʔi sứ sê ʔizơ cướk xi zân ʔisơzaên cưʔa kó vwa nàʔɔ kaicị tʰì dâʔi kák vwa cịvì sứ dôm bêla kɔncaj bê cì sứ dôm tʰàɲ ŋườʔi Ðʔin vwa bê băŋ ɣiôbáp kɔncaj sêzác ŋườʔi bốca vwa ɣiô băŋ husam ŋườʔi sứ tʰêman vwa hu băŋ hadát kɔncaj bêdát Ấʔilà vwa nầʔi dáɲ tʰắŋ zân madiən tạʔi dồŋ môáp tʰàɲ ŋườʔi ʔavít vwa ha dát băŋ samla ŋườʔi mazêka vwa sam băŋ săwlơ ŋườʔi zêhôbốt cên sôŋ vwa săw băŋ baɛɲhaman kɔncaj ʔaï kbồ vwa baɛɲhanan băŋ hada tên tʰàɲ ŋườʔi ba ʔu ŋườʔi mêhêtabêên kɔŋáʔi kủʔa mácết cáʔu ŋɔạʔi mêsaháp Ðâʔi cưởŋtộk zɔ nơʔi săw sɛɲ za tʰeo ci tộk dịʔahạt mìɲ cưởŋtộk tʰimna cưởŋtộk ʔɛɲva cưởŋtộk ɣiêhết cưởŋtộk cưởŋtộk cưởŋtộk finôn cưởŋtộk kêna cưởŋtộk tʰêman cưởŋtộk mépsa cưởŋtộk mákdiên cưởŋtộk ʔizam kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa dôm tùʔi tʰeo ɲàở cɔŋ sứ kủʔa tổfụ kủʔa zân dôm săw zakốp tạʔi sứ kủʔa ca mìɲ dã kiềʔu ŋụ sứ kanaan Ðâʔi cwiện zòŋzõʔi kủʔa zakốp ɣiôsép tuổʔi mườʔibảʔi cănciên vớʔi kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi di kùŋ kɔncaj bila kɔn siɲba haj ca mìɲ ɣiôsép tʰuật lạʔi vớʔi ca kák cwiện sấʔu kủʔa nóʔi vả ʔisơzaên tʰươŋiêʔu ɣiôsép ɲữŋ kɔncaj xák kɔn mìɲ măj cɔ càŋ káʔi áʔɔzàʔi kó ɲiềʔu sắk kák ʔɛɲ tʰấʔi ca tʰươŋ ɣiôsép mìɲ sɛɲ lòŋ ɣɛɲɣét cẳŋ kó tʰế lấʔi lờʔi nóʔi kùŋ càŋ dượk ɣiôsép kó ciêmbaw tʰuật lạʔi cɔ kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ ŋɛ kàŋ tʰêm ɣɛɲɣét nữʔa ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó diềm ciêmbaw sin kák ʔɛɲ hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi tʰuật cúŋta dươŋ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ lúʔa nầʔi lúʔa tôʔi dứŋ zựŋ kòn lúʔa kủʔa kák ʔɛɲ dềʔu dến cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ suốŋ cướk lúʔa tôʔi kák ʔɛɲ ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ vậʔi mầʔi kaicị cúŋta saw mầʔi hàɲ kwiền cên cúŋta saw họ kàŋ ɣɛɲɣét hơnnữʔa diềm ciêmbaw lờʔinóʔi kủʔa càŋ ɣiôsép lạʔi ciêmbaw nữʔa tʰuật kùŋ kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ zằŋ tôʔi kòn diềm ciêmbaw nữʔa nầʔi mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ mườʔimột ŋôʔisaw dềʔu mìɲ suốŋ cướk tôʔi càŋ tʰuật ciêmbaw dó lạʔi cɔ ca kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ ŋɛ ɲưŋ ca càŋ kwở hỏʔi zằŋ Ðʔiềm ciêmbaw kủʔa mầʔi dó kóŋĩʔa ci kó fảʔi taw kák ʔɛɲ mầʔi dềʔu fảʔi dến mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk mầʔi căŋ kák ʔɛɲ lấʔilàm ɣɛɲɣét càŋ kòn ca lạʔi ɣiɲớ lấʔi diềʔu dó kák ʔɛɲcàŋ di cănciên kủʔa ca tạʔi sicɛm ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ kák ʔɛɲ kɔn kó căn bầʔi ciên tạʔi sicɛm căŋ lạʔi dâʔi dặŋ ca saj kɔn di dến cúŋnó ɣiôsép dáp zằŋ kó kɔn dâʔi ʔisơzaên biểʔu zằŋ kɔn hãʔi di sɛm tʰử kák ʔɛɲ kɔn zasaw kák bầʔi ciên tʰểnàʔɔ zồʔi dɛm cɔ ca hăj vậʔi cũŋ hếpzôn ŋườʔi saj ɣiôsép di dến sicɛm kó ŋườʔi ɣặp càŋ di lạk cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ hỏʔi nóʔi kùŋ càŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi ci zằŋ tôʔi kák ʔɛɲ tôʔi sin hãʔi cỉ ɣiùm tôʔi căn bầʔi ciên nơʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi nóʔi kák ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi dâʔi di zồʔi tôʔi kó ŋɛ nóʔi zằŋ ta hãʔi di dến tain vậʔi ɣiôsép di kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ ɣặp dượk tạʔi tain kák ʔɛɲ tʰấʔi càŋ diở dàŋ sa cưʔa dến ɣần tʰì dã lậpmưʔu dể ɣiết càŋ cúŋ nóʔi ɲăw zằŋ kìʔa tʰằŋ nằmmộŋ dến kiə bâʔizờ nàʔɔ cúŋta hãʔi ɣiết di kwăŋ suốŋ káʔi nướk nàʔɔdó dɔạn nóʔi zằŋ dã tʰúzừŋ sé zồʔi sɛm kák diềm ciêmbaw kủʔa zasaw zubên ŋɛ kwa lờʔi dó ɣiảʔicứʔu càŋ za xỏʔi za kák ʔɛɲ zằŋ cúŋta dừŋ ɣiết cết lạʔi cúŋta cớ dổmáʔu za hãʔi liệŋ cɔŋ káʔi nướk nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ kiə dừŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi vậʔi kó ɣiảʔicứʔu càŋ xỏʔi tăj dể cả càŋ kùŋ ca mìɲ vừʔa xi ɣiôsép dến ɣần kák ʔɛɲ áʔɔ càŋ áʔɔ kó ɲiềʔu sắk dươŋ mặk cɔŋ mìɲ zồʔi càŋ dɛm kwăŋ cɔŋ nướk vả xô kạn cẳŋ kó nướk Ðʔɔạn ŋồʔi lạʔi ɲướŋ cợt tʰấʔi dɔàn zân Íc fíʔa ɣalaát di dến cên lưŋ lạkdà cở dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm ɲũhươŋ zượk dươŋ dɛm di dến sứ zíptô zuda nóʔi kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm zằŋ ɣiết ʔɛm ɣiấʔu máʔu kó zùŋ cɔ dượkviệk ci hè hãʔi dɛm cɔ zân Íc dừŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ ʔɛm kốtɲụk kủʔa cúŋta kák ʔɛɲɛm dềʔu ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi vả xi ɲữŋ láʔi madiən di ŋaŋ kwa kák ʔɛɲ kéʔɔ ɣiôsép xỏʔi nướk zồʔi càŋ ɣiá haimươʔi miếŋ bạk cɔ zân Íc dɛm kwa sứ zíptô zubên cởlạʔi nầʔi ɣiôsép dâʔu zồʔi sé áʔɔ mìɲ cởlạʔi nơʔi kák ʔɛm mìɲ zằŋ Ôʔi dứʔa cẻ dâʔu zồʔi kòn tôʔi di dâʔu kák ʔɛɲ ɣiết kɔn zê dựk zồʔi lấʔi áʔɔ ɣiôsép ɲúŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ máʔu dɔạn ɣởʔi káʔi áʔɔ ɲiềʔu sắk dó dɛm cɔ ca mìɲ zặn nóʔi zằŋ Ðâʔi cúŋtôʔi dã dượk vậʔi sin hãʔi ɲìn kɔj kó fảʔi áʔɔ kủʔa kɔncaj ca căŋ zakốp ɲìn nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà áʔɔ kủʔa kɔncaj dó tʰúzữ dã sé kấʔu kwảtʰật ɣiôsép dã fân tʰâʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ za lấʔi baw kwấn ŋaŋ hôŋ dểtaŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi cɔ kɔncaj mìɲ hếttʰảʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi lạʔi ʔanủʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ cịʔu nóʔi zằŋ ta dểtaŋ suốŋ cốn âmfủ kùŋ kɔn Ấʔi dó ca ɣiôsép xóktʰan càŋ ɲưvậʔi kák láʔibuôn madiən dɛm ɣiôsép dến sứ zíptô cɔ fôtifa kwan tʰịvệ kủʔa fazaôn cɔŋ lúk dó zuda lìʔa sa kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dến kùŋ ŋườʔi ʔadulam hiza tạʔi dó zuda tʰấʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi kanaan su ʔa kướʔi kùŋ nàŋ nàŋ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj dặt zơ nàŋ tʰọtʰaj nữʔa sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj dặt lạʔi sɛɲ tʰêm kɔncaj dặt sêla vả lúk sɛɲ tʰì zuda ŋụ tạʔi kêsíp zuda kướʔi cɔ zơ kɔn cưởŋnam ŋườʔi tama ɲưŋ zơ dộkák cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi di zuda biểʔu zằŋ kɔn hãʔi lạʔi ɣần ʔɛɲ kɔn kùŋ nàŋ ɲư ʔɛm cồŋ dặŋ nốʔi zòŋzõʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ zằŋ zòŋzõʔi nầʔi cẳŋ tʰuộk mìɲ dươŋ xi dếnkùŋ nàŋ tʰì zơʔizớt suốŋ dất dể dừŋ sɛɲ zòŋzõʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ ɲưŋ diềʔu ŋườʔi làmvậʔi xôŋ dẹplòŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kũŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi di Ðʔɔạn zuda biểʔu tama zâʔu mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi ởɣóʔa ɲà cakɔn cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ sêla kɔncaj ca cởnên xônlớn vì ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi kɔicừŋ ʔɛ xi kũŋ cết ɲư haj ʔɛɲ căŋ tama divề ɲà ca mìɲ ŋàʔicwatʰáŋlạʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa su ʔa zuda kwadờʔi xi dã ŋuôʔi lòŋ tʰì zuda di kùŋ hiza ŋườʔi ʔadulam dếnnơʔi mấʔi tʰợ lôŋ ciên mìɲ tạʔi tʰimna ŋườʔita cɔ nàŋ tama hăj diềʔu dó zằŋ nầʔi ôŋza ŋươʔi di xiến tʰimna dặŋ lôŋ ciên nàŋ kổʔi áʔɔ ɣóʔabụʔa mìɲ lạʔi zồʔi ŋồʔi cướk kửʔa tʰàɲ naim kɔn dườŋ divề tʰimna làmvậʔi nàŋ dã tʰấʔi sêla xônlớn zồʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ ɣả mìɲ cɔ càŋ zuda tʰấʔi nàŋ cɔ nàŋ cɛ lạʔi ɣần nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ dếnkùŋ nàŋ kớ ŋươʔi xôŋ nàŋ zâʔu mìɲ nàŋ dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi cɔ tôʔi ci dặŋ di dếnkùŋ tôʔi zằŋ ta ɣởʔi cɔ nàŋ kɔn zê kɔn kủʔa bầʔi nàŋ hỏʔi ŋườʔi cɔ tôʔi kủʔa ci cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ɣởʔi kɔn zê zằŋ ta cɔ nàŋ kủʔa ci bâʔizờ nàŋ dáp kɔn zầʔu zâʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dươŋ kầm nơʔi tăj ŋườʔi cɔ dilạʔi kùŋ nàŋ nàŋ tʰọtʰaj ŋườʔi vậʔi Ðʔɔạn nàŋ dứŋzậʔi di kổʔi za mặk kwầnáʔɔ ɣóʔabụʔa lạʔi zuda kậʔi ʔadulam mìɲ dɛm cɔ kɔn zê kɔn dặŋ cuộk mấʔi nơʔi tăj ŋườʔi dờn nầʔi ɲưŋ nàŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi bạn hỏʔi zân tạʔi nơʔi nàŋ zằŋ ŋườʔi xi cướk ŋɔàʔi dườŋ nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ naim dâʔu zồʔi họ dáp zằŋ dâʔi cẳŋ kó nàʔɔ bạn cởvề zuda zằŋ tôʔi nàŋ xôŋ dặŋ zân nơʔi dó kó nóʔi dâʔi cẳŋ kó nàʔɔ zuda zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi dã ɣởʔi zê kɔn dến cẳŋ tʰấʔi nàŋ vậʔi dể cɔ nàŋ ɣiữ lấʔi kủʔa dó cẳŋ ɣâʔi diềʔu ɲơɲuốk cɔ cúŋta kác cừŋ batʰáŋ săw ŋườʔita kóhọk lạʔi kùŋ zuda zằŋ tama zâʔu ŋươʔi dã nôŋnổʔi dó nàŋ dã hwaŋ tʰaj zuda dáp hãʔi dɛm za tʰiêʔu di Ðươŋ xi ŋườʔita dɛm nàŋ za tʰì nàŋ saj dến nóʔi kùŋ ôŋza zằŋ sin ca hãʔi ɲìn lạʔi kɔnzấʔu zâʔi ɣậʔi nầʔi kủʔa ʔaj tôʔi tʰọtʰaj zɔ nơʔi ŋườʔi kó kák nầʔi zuda ɲìn biếtmấʔi dó nóʔi zằŋ nàŋ fảʔi xôŋ dưʔa sêla kɔncaj cɔ nàŋ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi xôŋ kùŋ nàŋ nữʔa sɛɲ nầʔi cɔŋ bụŋ nàŋ kótʰaj dôʔi Ðươŋ lúk sɛɲ cɔŋ haj dứʔa dưʔa tăj za cướk lấʔi tăj buộk sợʔi cỉ diềʔu nóʔi zằŋ Ðứʔa nầʔi za cướk ɲưŋ zút tăj vàʔɔ tʰì dâʔi ʔɛɲ lạʔi za bàmụ nóʔi zằŋ mầʔi tôŋ zác zườŋ nầʔi họ dặt fêzết kế ʔɛm za săw dứʔa nơʔi tăj kó sợʔi cỉ diềʔu dặt sêzác vả ɣiôsép dɛm kwa sứ zíptô tʰì fôtifa ŋườʔi sứ kwan tʰịvệ kủʔa fazaôn mwa càŋ nơʔi tʰăj zân Íc dã zẫn dến ɣiôsép cɔŋ ɲà củ mìɲ ŋườʔi zíptô dượk Ðứkzê fùhộ tʰạɲ lợʔi củ tʰấʔi Ðứkzê fùhộ càŋ suj cɔ mọʔi việk ci càŋ lãɲ nơʔi tăj dềʔu dượk tʰạɲ vượŋ vậʔi ɣiôsép dượk cướk củ mìɲ củ kắt càŋ hầʔu việk dặt kaikwản kửʔɛɲà fó kủʔakảʔi mìɲ cɔ càŋ từ xi ŋườʔi dặt ɣiôsép kaikwản kửʔɛɲà kùŋ hếttʰảʔi kủʔakảʔi mìɲ zồʔi tʰì Ðứkzê ɣiôsép fướk cɔ ɲà ŋườʔi fướk kủʔa Ðứkzê bủʔa xắp mọʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi làmcủ hɔặk cɔŋ ɲà hɔặk ŋɔàʔi dồŋ ŋườʔi zaw kủʔakảʔi mìɲ cɔ ɣiôsép kɔjsók cẳŋ lɔ dến việk nàʔɔ nữʔa cừ za kák fần tʰựk kủʔa mìɲ tʰôʔi vả ɣiôsép hìɲzuŋ dẹpdẽ mặtmàʔi tốttươʔi săw kák việk nầʔi củ dưʔamắt kùŋ ɣiôsép nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi kùŋ càŋ từcốʔi dáp zằŋ củ dã zaw nơʔi tăj tôʔimọʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi củ cẳŋ lɔ dến việk ci cɔŋ ɲà nữʔa cɔŋ ɲà nầʔi cẳŋ ʔaj tôʔi củ kùŋ xôŋ kấm ci tôʔi cừ za mộtmìɲ ŋươʔi kủʔa củ tôʔi tʰếnàʔɔ tôʔi zám diềʔu dạʔi ák zườŋ ấʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saw tʰườŋŋàʔi ŋườʔi zỗzàɲ mặkzầʔu tʰì ɣiôsép cẳŋ xấŋ ŋɛ lờʔi zụzỗ kùŋ hăjlà kùŋ ŋườʔi cút nàʔɔ một ŋàʔiciə ɣiôsép vàʔɔ ɲà dặŋ kôŋviệk cẳŋ kó ŋườʔiɲà nàʔɔ dó tʰì ŋườʔi áʔɔ càŋ zằŋ hãʔi kùŋ ɲưŋ càŋ áʔɔ dể lạʔi cɔŋ tăj ŋườʔi cạʔi cốn za ŋɔàʔi xi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi áʔɔ kòn lạʔi nơʔi tăj mìɲ càŋ dã cạʔi cốn za ŋɔàʔi ɲưvậʔi ɣọʔi ŋườʔiɲà nóʔi zằŋ băj kɔj họ xéʔɔ dɛm vàʔɔ ɲà tʰằŋ hêbơzơ dể cọkɣẹʔɔ nó lạʔi ɣần twan kùŋ ɲưŋ vừʔa xi ŋɛ kấttiếŋ tʰì áʔɔ lạʔi cạʔi cốn za ŋɔàʔi ŋườʔi dể áʔɔ kủʔa ɣiôsép mìɲ dợʔi xi củ ɲà họk lạʔi kùŋ củ ʔiɲư lờʔi cướk zằŋ tʰằŋ hêbơzơ ôŋ xéʔɔ dɛm ɲà dã dến ɣần dặŋ cọkɣẹʔɔ tôʔi ɲưŋ xi tôʔi kấttiếŋ áʔɔ lạʔi tôʔi zồʔi cạʔi cốn za ŋɔàʔi vừʔa xi củ kủʔa ɣiôsép ŋɛ lờʔi nóʔi zằŋ ôŋ diềʔu ɲưvậʔi tʰì nổʔizận fừŋfừŋ càŋ dɛm vàʔɔ nơʔi kầm kák fạmtộʔi kủʔa vwa vậʔi c ŋ tạʔi dó Ðứkzê fùhộ ɣiôsép lòŋ ɲântừ kùŋ càŋ cɔ dượk cướk củ ŋụk củ ŋụk zaw kák cɔŋ tăj ɣiôsép cẳŋ việk ci kwa xỏʔi dượk càŋ củ ŋụk cẳŋ sɔát lạʔi ɲữŋ việk dã nơʔi tăj ɣiôsép kó Ðứkzê fùhộ càŋ suj cɔ việk ci càŋ kũŋ dượk tʰạɲ vượŋ mấʔi việk nầʔi kwa zồʔi sảʔi kó kwan tửʔu cáɲ kwan tʰượŋ tʰiện kủʔa vwa zíptô fạm dến cúʔa mìɲ fazaôn nổʔizận kùŋ haj kwan mìɲ tửʔu cáɲ tʰượŋ tʰiện dɛm kần ŋụk tạʔi ziɲ kwan tʰịvệ nơʔi dươŋ kầm ɣiôsép kwan tʰịvệ kắt fần ɣiôsép hầʔu việk haj kwan dó ŋồʔi ŋụk ítlâʔu kùŋ cɔŋ dêm kwan tửʔu cáɲ kwan tʰượŋ tʰiện kủʔa vwa zíptô dươŋ kầm ŋụk tʰấʔi diềm ciêmbaw mỗʔi ŋườʔi ciêmbaw mỗʔi ciêmbaw kó ýŋĩʔa zõzàŋ sáŋmaj ɣiôsép dếnkùŋ ɲìn tʰấʔi sắk buồnbựk hỏʔi zằŋ ŋàʔinăj saw haj kwan kó sắk âʔusầʔu vậʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó tʰấʔi diềm ciêmbaw xôŋ ʔaj ɣiùm ɣiôsép zằŋ sự ciêmbaw cẳŋ zɔ nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin hãʔi tʰuật lạʔi diềm ciêmbaw kủʔa haj kwan cɔ tôʔi ŋɛ di kwan tửʔu cáɲ tʰuật diềm ciêmbaw mìɲ lạʔi cɔ ɣiôsép zằŋ cɔŋ ciêmbaw tôʔi tʰấʔi ɣốk ɲɔ cướk tôʔi ɣốk ɲɔ dó lạʔi kó ɲàɲ zườŋɲư tʰấʔi ɲàɲ nảʔi cồʔi cổ bôŋ cùm kó cáʔi cín tʰìfảʔi tăj tôʔi dươŋ kầm káʔi cén kủʔa fazaôn tôʔi háʔi ɲɔ dó nướk ɲɔ vàʔɔ zồʔi zâŋ tửʔu bôʔi vàʔɔ tăj fazaôn ɣiôsép nóʔi ŋĩʔa ciêmbaw dó tʰể nầʔi ba ɲàɲ ɲɔ tứklà ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi nữʔa fazaôn tʰa kwan za xỏʔi ŋụk fụkcứk lạʔi kwan zâŋ káʔi cén kủʔa fazaôn vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi ɲư kũ ɲư xi kòn cứk tửʔu cáɲ sɔŋ xi kwan dượk hưởŋlạk lạʔi zồʔi sin ɲớ dến tôʔi tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn nổʔi tôʔi dɛm tôʔi za xỏʔi cốn nầʔi vì tôʔi ŋườʔita dɛm za xỏʔi sứ kủʔa ŋườʔi hêbơzơ tạʔi dâʔi tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó làmɣì kầm nơʔi law luŋ nầʔi kwan tʰượŋ tʰiện tʰấʔi ɣiôsép mộŋ dượk nóʔi kòn cɔŋ diềm ciêmbaw kủʔa tôʔi dâʔi tôʔi dộʔi ɣiỏ báɲ cắŋ cên dầʔu cɔŋ ɣiỏ kaw kó dủ tʰựkvật kủʔa tʰợ báɲ cɔ fazaôn cim dáp vàʔɔ ɣiỏ cên dầʔu tôʔi kák dó ɣiôsép dáp zằŋ ŋĩʔa ciêmbaw nầʔi ɣiỏ tứklà ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi nữʔa fazaôn sửcảm kwan saj dɛm ceo kâʔi cɔ cimcók tʰịt kwan vậʔi ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋàʔi sɛɲ ɲựt kủʔa fazaôn ŋườʔi bàʔi tiệk dãʔi kả kwầntʰần tʰa kwan tửʔu cáɲ kùŋ kwan tʰượŋ tʰiện za xỏʔi ŋụk fazaôn fụkcứk kwan tửʔu cáɲ lạʔi ɲư sưʔa dặŋ kwan nầʔi zân tửʔu bôʔi vàʔɔ tăj mìɲ ɲưŋ lạʔi lịɲ dɛm ceo kwan tʰượŋ tʰiện ʔiɲư lờʔi ɣiôsép dã bànza Ðʔɔạn kwan tửʔu cáɲ cẳŋ kòn ɲớ dến ɣiôsép nữʔa kwên ŋườʔi di kác haj săw fazaôn ciêmbaw tʰấʔi mìɲ dứŋ sôŋ nầʔi dâʔu zướʔi sôŋ di bảʔi kɔn kỏ cɔŋ buŋ zồʔi nầʔi bảʔi kɔn xák sấʔu zạŋ ɣầʔiɣuộk zướʔi sôŋ di tʰeo săw dến dứŋ ɣần kák kɔn cướk cên sôŋ bảʔi kɔn sấʔu zạŋ ɣầʔiɣuộk bảʔi kɔn fazaôn tʰứkzấk vwa ŋủ lạʔi ciêmbaw tʰứ ɲì tʰấʔi bảʔi ɣié lúʔa cắk tốttươʔi mọk cuŋ cên kộŋ zạ kế dó bảʔi ɣié lúʔa xák ɣió dôŋ tʰổʔi mọk tʰeo bảʔi ɣié lúʔa kiə bảʔi ɣié lúʔa bảʔi ɣié lúʔa cắk fazaôn tʰứkzấk nầʔi tʰàɲza diềm ciêmbaw sáŋmaj tâmtʰần ŋườʔi bấtdịɲ cwiền dòʔi kák fáp kák tăj báksĩ sứ zíptô dến tʰuật lạʔi diềm ciêmbaw mìɲ cɔ ŋɛ ɲưŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj dượk diềm ciêmbaw dó cɔ vwa kwan tửʔu cáɲ tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ bâʔizờ tôʔi ɲớ dến lỗʔi kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔicướk nổʔizận kùŋ kwầntʰần kó kầm ŋụk kwan tʰượŋ tʰiện tôʔi nơʔi ziɲ kwan tʰịvệ cɔŋ lúk dó kùŋ dêm kiə cúŋtôʔi kó tʰấʔi diềm ciêmbaw ciêmbaw mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu kó ýŋĩʔa ziêŋ zõzàŋ tạʔi dó kùŋ cuŋ ŋụk kó ŋườʔi hêbơzơ kòn cẻ za diɲ kủʔa kwan tʰịvệ cúŋtôʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ càŋ ŋɛ diềm ciêmbaw kủʔa mìɲ càŋ zõ za cɔ ʔaj mỗʔi ciêmbaw nấʔi zồʔiza kôŋviệk sảʔi dến ʔiɲư lờʔi càŋ fụkcứk tôʔi lạʔi sử ceo kwan kiə fazaôn saj di dòʔi ɣiôsép lậptứk tʰa ŋườʔi za xỏʔi ŋụk kạʔɔ mặtmàʔi cɔ biểʔu tʰăjdổʔi áʔɔsốŋ zồʔi vàʔɔ cầʔu fazaôn fazaôn fán kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ cẫm kó tʰấʔi diềm ciêmbaw cẳŋ ʔaj bànza vậʔi cẫm ŋɛ zằŋ xi ŋườʔita tʰuật diềm ciêmbaw lạʔi cɔ tʰì ŋươʔi dượk ɣiôsép tâʔu zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tôʔi ɲưŋ ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɛm bìɲan dáp cɔ vậʔi fazaôn fán zằŋ nầʔi cɔŋ diềm ciêmbaw cẫm dươŋ dứŋ sôŋ nầʔi dâʔu bảʔi kɔn zướʔi sôŋ di dến kỏ cɔŋ bưŋ zồʔi bảʔi kɔn xák sấʔu zạŋ ɣầʔiɣuộk di tʰeo săw tʰật cẫm cẳŋ tʰấʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô nầʔi kó sấʔu zạŋ ɲưvậʔi bawzờ bảʔi kɔn sấʔu zạŋ ɣầʔiɣuộk dó bảʔi kɔn cướkkiə vàʔɔ bụŋ zườŋɲư xôŋ kó kák kɔn dó sấʔu zạŋ ɲư sưʔa cẫm tʰứkzấk zồʔi lạʔi tʰấʔi diềm ciêmbaw xák bảʔi ɣié lúʔa cắk tốttươʔi mọk cuŋ cên kộŋ zạ kế dó bảʔi ɣié lúʔa xák xô ɣió dôŋ tʰổʔi mọk tʰeo bảʔi ɣié lúʔa kiə bảʔi ɣié lúʔa dó lạʔi bảʔi ɣié lúʔa cắk cẫm dã tʰuật diềm ciêmbaw nầʔi cɔ kák fáp ɲưŋ xôŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa za dượk ɣiôsép tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ haj diềm ciêmbaw kủʔa tʰấʔi dó dồŋ ŋĩʔa tʰôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mác cɔ cướk ɲữŋ việk ŋàʔi bảʔi kɔn dó tứklà bảʔi bảʔi ɣié lúʔa cắk dó kũŋ bảʔi Ấʔi cỉ dồŋ diềm ciêmbaw vậʔi bảʔi kɔn sấʔu zạŋ ɣầʔiɣuộk tʰeo săw bảʔi kɔn kiə tứklà bảʔi bảʔi ɣié lúʔa ɣió dôŋ tʰổʔi dó tứklà bảʔi dóʔicém Ấʔilà diềʔu tôʔi dã tâʔu kùŋ zồʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó cɔ tʰấʔi ɲữŋ việk ŋàʔi nầʔi cɔŋ xắp sứ zíptô kó bảʔi dượkmùʔa zưzật ɲưŋ bảʔi dó lạʔi bảʔi dóʔicém zân sứ dềʔu kwên zưzật dó ác dóʔicém cɔ tɔàn sứ hawmòn và dóʔicém nầʔi kwá tʰiêɲạ cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi ci zưzật dó nữʔa nếʔu diềm ciêmbaw dến haj cɔ ấʔi bởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kwiếtdịɲ diềʔu dó zồʔi ŋàʔi măw măw lɔ cɔ tʰàɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ xá cọn ŋườʔi tʰôŋmiɲ cí ŋườʔi làmdầʔu cɔŋ sứ zíptô kùŋ kák ủʔiviên cɔŋ sứ dể ɣóp fần kủʔa tʰâʔu vàʔɔ cɔŋ bảʔi dượkmùʔa zưzật dó họ hãʔi tʰâʔu ɣóp hếttʰảʔi mùʔamàŋ cɔŋ bảʔi dượkmùʔa zưzật dến săw nầʔi kùŋ tʰâʔu tʰập lúʔamì zàɲ cɔ fazaôn zùŋ lươŋ dểzàɲ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ hãʔi ɣiữɣìn lấʔi kák lươŋtʰựk nầʔi fảʔi dểzàɲ cɔ bảʔi dóʔicém dến cɔŋ sứ zíptô hầʔu cɔ sứ nầʔi xỏʔi ziệt bởʔi dóʔicém dó kák lờʔi nầʔi dẹp fazaôn kwầntʰần fazaôn fán kùŋ kwầntʰần zằŋ cúŋta zễ ŋườʔi ɲư ŋườʔi nầʔi kó tʰần miɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dượk saw fazaôn fán kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi suj cɔ ŋươʔi mọʔi việk nầʔi tʰì cẳŋ kòn ʔaj dượk tʰôŋmiɲ cí ɲư ŋươʔi nữʔa vậʔi ŋươʔi kaicị ɲà cẫm hếttʰảʔi zânsự kủʔa cẫm dềʔu vâŋ lờʔi ŋươʔi cẫm ŋươʔi cỉ ŋự ŋôʔi vwa tʰôʔi fazaôn lạʔi fán kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ hãʔi sɛm cẫm ŋươʔi kầmkwiền cên kả sứ zíptô vwa kổʔi ciếk ɲẫn cɔŋ tăj mìɲ deo vàʔɔ tăj ɣiôsép cwiền mặk áʔɔ vảʔi ɣaj deo vòŋ vàŋ vàʔɔ kổ ŋườʔi zồʔi cwiền cɔ ŋồʔi săw sɛ vwa kó ŋườʔi di cướk zằŋ hãʔi kwì suốŋ Ấʔi ɣiôsép dượk kầmkwiền kả sứ zíptô vậʔi fazaôn fán kùŋ ɣiôsép ta fazaôn ɲưŋ nếʔu cẳŋ kó ŋươʔi tʰì cɔŋ kả sứ zíptô xôŋ kó ʔaj ɣiơ tăj dưʔa cơn dượk fazaôn dặt ɣiôsép safơnátfanêác dưʔa nàŋ Ác kɔŋáʔi fôtifêza tʰầʔicả tʰàɲ cɔ ŋườʔilàm ŋườʔi tʰườŋ tuầɲàɲ cɔŋ sứ zíptô vả xi ɣiôsép zamắt fazaôn vwa zíptô tʰì ŋườʔi dã bamươʔi tuổʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi fazaôn di xắp sứ zíptô cɔŋ bảʔi dượkmùʔa zưzật dất sɛɲ za dầʔizẫʔi ɣiôsép tʰâʔu ɣóp hếttʰảʔi lươŋtʰựk kủʔa bảʔi dó cɔŋ sứ zíptô cứʔa lươŋtʰựk nầʔi xắp kák tʰàɲ cɔŋ mỗʔi tʰàɲ dềʔu zàɲ cứʔa hwalợʔi kủʔa kák zuộŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ dó vậʔi ɣiôsép tʰâʔu ɣóp lúʔamì zất ɲiềʔu ɲư kát nơʔi cɔdến dỗʔi ŋườʔita dếm xôŋ dượk dầʔizẫʔi cướk xi dến dóʔicém tʰì Ác kɔŋáʔi fôtifêza tʰầʔicả tʰàɲ sɛɲ cɔ ɣiôsép haj kɔncaj ɣiôsép dặt dứʔa dầʔulòŋ manasɛ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ kwên diềʔu kựkɲọk kả ɲà ca ŋườʔi dặt dứʔa tʰứ ɲì zaim nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ dượk hưŋvượŋ cɔŋ sứ xốnxổ bảʔi dượkmùʔa zưzật cɔŋ sứ zíptô kwa tʰì bảʔi dóʔicém xởʔi dến ʔiɲư lờʔi ɣiôsép dã cướk xắp kák sứ xák kũŋ dềʔu dóʔi ɲưŋ cɔŋ kả sứ zíptô lạʔi kó báɲ Ðʔɔạn kả sứ zíptô dềʔu dóʔi zâncúŋ dến kêʔukầʔu fazaôn sin lươŋ fazaôn fán kùŋ zân zằŋ hãʔi di dến ɣiôsép zồʔi tʰeo lờʔi ŋườʔi cỉbảʔɔ cɔ xi xắp sứ dóʔicém tʰì ɣiôsép mọʔi xɔ lúʔa cɔ zân zíptô sứ kàŋ dóʔi ɲiềʔu nữʔa xắp tʰếzan dềʔu dóʔi kwá dâʔudâʔu kũŋ dổ dến zíptô mùʔa lúʔa nơʔi ɣiôsép zakốp tʰấʔi sứ zíptô kó lúʔa za nóʔi kùŋ kák kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ saw băj ŋơŋẩn ɲìn ɲăw vậʔi lạʔi zằŋ nầʔi ca ŋɛ zướʔi sứ zíptô kó lúʔa băj hãʔi suốŋ dó mwa lúʔa cɔ cúŋta hầʔu cɔ cúŋta sốŋ xỏʔi cết cớ mườʔi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲ kủʔa ɣiôsép suốŋ zíptô dặŋ mwa lúʔa ɲưŋza kốp xôŋ cɔ bêŋiəmin ʔɛm ɣiôsép di kùŋ kák ʔɛɲ ŋĩ zằŋ ta ɣiữ cừŋ kẻʔɔ sảʔi zadiềʔu zủʔizɔ cɔ sứka naan bấʔizờ kũŋ dóʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên kũŋ dổ suốŋ zíptô mwa lúʔa ɲư kák ŋườʔi xák vả lúk nầʔi cáɲ ɣiôsép kaicị cɔŋ nướk lúʔa cɔ kả zân sứ kák ʔɛɲ ɣiôsép dến mìɲ suốŋ cướk ŋườʔi ɣiôsép tʰấʔi ɲìn kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ ɲưŋ ɣiả kùŋ nóʔi mộtkác sẳŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dâʔu dến zằŋ sứ kanaan dến dặŋ mwa lúʔa vậʔi ɣiôsép ɲìn kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ ɲưŋ ɲìn lạʔi cẳŋ za ɣiôsép ɲớ lạʔi diềm ciêmbaw mìɲ dã tʰấʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tʰét zằŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰámtử dến dâʔi dặŋ zòm hàɲ ɲữŋ nơʔi ʔiếʔu kủʔa sứ zằŋ tʰưʔa cúʔa cẳŋ fảʔi vậʔi kák tôʔitớ cúʔa dến dặŋ mwa lúʔa tʰôʔi cúŋtôʔi dâʔi dềʔu kɔnmột ca ɲà lươŋtʰiện cẳŋ fảʔi tʰámtử dâʔu ŋườʔi dáp lạʔi zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kák ŋươʔi dến dặŋ zòm hàɲ ɲữŋ nơʔi ʔiếʔu kủʔa sứ nầʔi zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ cúʔa kó mườʔihaj ʔɛɲɛm kɔn kủʔa ca ŋwiên sứ kanaan nầʔi ŋườʔi dã di kòn ŋườʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi tạʔi ɲà kùŋ ca cúŋtôʔi ɣiôsép nóʔi Ấʔi kwảtʰật ɲư nóʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰámtử Ðâʔi diềʔu tʰử kák ŋươʔi ta cỉ mạŋ fazaôn tʰề zằŋ ʔɛmút kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dến dâʔi tʰì cẳŋ bawzờ kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi cốn nầʔi dượk hãʔi saj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi zẫn ʔɛmút suốŋ kòn bawɲiêʔu tʰìfảʔi lạʔi dâʔi lờʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰử dã zồʔi kák ŋươʔi nóʔi dó kó kwảtʰật căŋ nếʔu cẳŋ tʰật tʰì cỉ mạŋ fazaôn tʰề zằŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰámtử dó Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsép cwiền dɛm zam cuŋ cɔŋ ŋụk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứba ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ ta kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi ɲư diềʔu nầʔi tʰì dượk sốŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi ɲà lươŋtʰiện tʰì hãʔi dể ŋườʔi nàʔɔ lạʔi dâʔi kòn bawɲiêʔu dɛm lươŋtʰựk nuôʔi dóʔi cɔ ɲà kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn hãʔi zẫn ʔɛmút suốŋ dâʔi tʰì lờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ tʰật kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi cết vậʔi ŋɛ tʰeo họ nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ kwảtʰật cúŋta kam tộʔi kùŋ ʔɛm za lúk cướk tʰấʔi buồntʰảm xi sin ɲờ ɲưŋ xôŋ xứŋ cɔ vậʔi tajvạ nầʔi mớʔi sảʔi dến cɔ cúŋta zubên dáp zằŋ ʔɛɲ xôŋ kó nóʔi kùŋ kák ʔɛm zằŋ cớ fạmtộʔi nầʔi kùŋ dứʔa cẻ dó saw ɲưŋ kák ʔɛm xôŋ ŋɛ bâʔizờ hwiết dòʔi cúŋta tʰườŋ lạʔi vả ɣiôsép zùŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋŋôn nóʔicwiện lạʔi kùŋ kák ʔɛɲ tưởŋ ɣiôsép cẳŋ ŋɛ hiểʔu ɣiôsép sâʔi kwa cỗ xák xók Ðʔɔạn sâʔi lạʔi nóʔicwiện kùŋ simêôn cɔŋ vòŋ ʔɛɲɛm cwiền cóʔi lạʔi cướk ɣiôsép cwiền dầʔitớ súk lúʔa dổ dầʔi baw dể bạk lạʔi cɔŋ dó cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm kũŋ dể tʰêm lươŋtʰựk zùŋ zọk dườŋ Ðầʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðʔɔạn ʔɛɲɛm cất mấʔi baw lúʔa lưŋ lừʔa zồʔi di kwán ŋườʔi cɔŋ baw za cɔ lừʔa tʰók tʰấʔi bạk mìɲ tạʔi miệŋ baw nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm zằŋ bạk kủʔa tôʔi cả lạʔi cɔŋ baw tôʔi dâʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm ɲátɣan vừʔa nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw vừʔa zun zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã làmci cɔ cúŋta dâʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm cởvề kùŋ zakốp ca mìɲ tạʔi sứ kanaan tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋɛ mọʔi nỗʔi dã sảʔi dến zằŋ ŋườʔi dươŋ cúʔa tạʔi sứ zíptô nóʔi vớʔi cúŋtôʔi kác sẳŋ sớm cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰámtử sɔŋ cúŋtôʔi kó tʰưʔa kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi ɲà lươŋtʰiện nàʔɔ kó fảʔi tʰámtử dâʔu cúŋtôʔi dượk mườʔihaj ʔɛɲɛm kɔnmột ca ŋườʔi dã di kòn ŋườʔi bâʔizờ ɲà kùŋ ca tạʔi sứ kanaan ŋườʔilàm cúʔa sứ dó zạʔi zằŋ làm ɲưvầʔi mớʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi lươŋtʰiện hãʔi dể lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kòn bawɲiêʔu dɛm lươŋtʰựk nuôʔi dóʔi cɔ ɲà kák ŋươʔi dɔạn hãʔi zẫn ʔɛmút dến cɔ vậʔi mớʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi tʰámtử ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lươŋtʰiện zaw ʔɛm lạʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk cɔŋ sứ nầʔi vả dươŋ xi kák ʔɛɲɛm cút lúʔamì za baw nầʔi dâʔu cɔŋ mỗʔi baw kó ɣóʔi bạk kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi ca kák ʔɛɲɛm tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ɣóʔi bạk mìɲ dềʔu lấʔilàm sợhãʔi zakốp ca nóʔi zằŋ băj kák kɔn taw ɣiôsép dã simêôn kũŋ bâʔizờ lạʔi zẫn bêzamin dinữʔa saw kák nôŋnỗʔi nầʔi dềʔu dổ lạʔi cɔ taw zubên tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ ca zằŋ ca hãʔi zaw ʔɛm nơʔi tôʔi tôʔi zẫn cɔ víbằŋ cẳŋ zẫn ʔɛm tʰì ca hãʔi ɣiết haj dứʔa kɔncaj tôʔi di ɲưŋza kốp dáp zằŋ kɔn taw cẳŋ di suốŋ vớʔi băj dâʔu ʔɛɲ dã cết zồʔi cỉ kòn mộtmìɲ tʰôʔi nếʔu diềʔu zủʔizɔ ci sảʔi dến cɔ nơʔi zọk dườŋbăj di tứk ɲiên băj cɔ tók bạk nầʔi dăwlòŋ sót zạ suốŋ âmfủ vả dóʔicém cɔŋ sứ xi nộʔi ɲà dã lươŋtʰựk sứ zíptô dɛm zồʔi tʰì ca kák ŋườʔi ấʔi zạʔi zằŋ băj hãʔi cở suốŋ mwa lươŋtʰựk cɔ cúŋta zuda tʰưʔa ŋườʔi dó kó nóʔi kwiết kùŋ kák kɔn zằŋ ví ʔɛmút xôŋ tʰeo suốŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰì xôŋbawzờ tʰấʔi nếʔu ca cɔ ʔɛm di vớʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi mớʔi suốŋ zíptô mwa lươŋtʰựk cɔ ca dượk bằŋxôŋ tʰì cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ cở suốŋ dâʔu ŋườʔi dó dã nóʔi zằŋ ví ʔɛmút xôŋ tʰeo suốŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰì xôŋbawzờ tʰấʔi ʔisơzaên kwở zằŋ saw băj xéʔɔ kùŋ taw cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi zằŋ băj kòn ʔɛm nữʔa tʰưʔa zằŋ ŋườʔi dó hỏʔi kỹkàŋ cúŋtôʔi bàkɔn cúŋtôʔi zằŋ tʰânfụ kák ŋươʔi kòn sốŋ căn kò kó ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm nàʔɔ nữʔa căŋ cúŋtôʔi kó dáp kák lờʔi hỏʔi dó há zễ ŋườʔi dó zặn cúŋtôʔi zằŋ hãʔi dɛm ʔɛmút suốŋ dâʔi saw zuda lạʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ ʔisơzaên ca mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi cɔ dứʔa cẻ tʰeo kɔn tʰì cúŋtôʔi dứŋzậʔi di hầʔu cɔ cúŋta nàʔɔ kák kɔn nàʔɔ ca nàʔɔ kák cáʔu kủʔa ca dâʔi dềʔu dượk sốŋ xỏʔi cết kɔn bảʔɔlãɲ ʔɛm cɔ ca kứ nơʔi kɔn dòʔi ʔɛm nếʔuxôŋ zẫn ʔɛm xôŋ dể ʔɛm cướk ca tʰì kɔn dâʔi kam tộʔi kùŋ ca mãʔimãʔi vả nếʔuxôŋ kódiềʔu zùŋzằŋ tʰì cúŋtôʔi dã di dượk haj zồʔi Ðʔɔạn ʔisơzaên ca kák ʔɛɲɛm nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu việk dã tʰể kiə tʰì băj fảʔi tʰể nầʔi hãʔi lấʔi cɔŋ dồ hàɲlý ɲữŋ tʰổsản kwí ɲứt kủʔa sứ ɲũhươŋ mậtɔŋ kák hươŋwa zượk fi hạɲɲân dɛm zâŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dó kủʔa hãʔi dɛm tʰeo bằŋ haj dặŋ tʰốʔi hồʔi dã dể lạʔi nơʔi miệŋ baw kủʔa băj kólẽ căŋ băj hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di zẫn ʔɛmút tʰeo cở suốŋ dến ŋườʔi dó kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ suj cɔ băj dượk cướk ŋườʔi tʰa dứʔa ʔɛm kiə bêŋiəmin cɔ băj kòn fần ca nếʔu fảʔi kɔn tʰì ca cịʔu fận vậʔi vậʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm dɛm tʰeo kủʔa bằŋ haj kùŋ zẫn bêŋiəmin dồŋ dứŋzậʔi di suốŋ zíptô zamắt ɣiôsép vừʔa xi ɣiôsép tʰấʔi bêŋiəmin di tʰeo suốŋ vớʔi cwiền cɔ kwảŋiə zằŋ hãʔi dwa kák ŋườʔi nầʔi vàʔɔ ɲà cɔŋ kɔn ɣì làmtʰịt nấʔu zọn di cưʔa nầʔi zùŋbữʔa kùŋ kwảŋiə tʰeo ʔiɲư lờʔi zặn dưʔa vàʔɔ ɲà ɣiôsép ʔɛɲɛm tʰấʔi mìɲ fảʔi dưʔa vàʔɔ ɲà ɣiôsép tʰì sợhãʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ Ấʔi kũŋ dã dể lạʔi vàʔɔ baw cúŋta cướk mớʔi dɛm cúŋta vàʔɔ cốn nầʔi dặŋ kớ sôŋ vàʔɔ dáɲ cúŋta cúŋta tôʔimọʔi ciếmdɔạt mấʔi kɔn lừʔa kủʔa cúŋta mấʔi ʔɛɲɛm dến ɣần kwảŋiə kủʔa ɣiôsép tʰưʔa kùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi ŋɔàʔi kửʔa zằŋ sin cúʔa tʰa lỗʔi cɔ ʔɛɲɛm cúŋtôʔi dã dến dâʔi zồʔi dặŋ mwa lươŋtʰựk xi cởvề dến ɲà kwán kák baw za nầʔi bạk kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu tạʔi miệŋ baw mìɲ kân nặŋ bawɲiêʔu dềʔu ʔiɲư bấʔiɲiêʔu nầʔi cúŋtôʔi kó dɛm lạʔi bạk dó kũŋ kó dɛm tʰêm bạk nữʔa dặŋ mwa lươŋtʰựk cẳŋ ʔaj dể bạk lạʔi cɔŋ baw cúŋtôʔi kwảŋiə dáp zằŋ mọʔi việk dềʔu bìɲiên dừŋ ci kả Ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tứk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca kák ŋươʔi dã kwí vàʔɔ baw kòn bạk kák ŋươʔi tʰì dã kó zaw cɔ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi zẫn simêôn dếnkùŋ ʔɛɲɛm zồʔi dưʔa ʔɛɲɛm vàʔɔ ɲà ɣiôsép dɛm nướk za cɔ zửʔa cơn kũŋ cɔ ɲữŋ lừʔa kỏ nữʔa kák ʔɛɲɛm sửʔasɔạn kủʔa dợʔi cưʔa ɣiôsép kó hăj zằŋ mìɲ bữʔa tạʔi ɲà nầʔi xizô cởvề kák ʔɛɲɛm lấʔi kủʔa dã dɛm tʰeo zâŋ cɔ ɣiôsép tạʔi ɲà zồʔi kùŋ mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi hỏʔitʰăm mạɲzỏʔi tʰểnàʔɔ nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi ca ɣià kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi kùŋ dó dượk mạɲxỏʔɛ căŋ kòn sốŋ căŋ zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ cáʔu ca cúŋtôʔi mạɲxỏʔɛ kòn sốŋ Ðʔɔạn kùʔi dầʔu lạʔi ɣiôsép ɲướŋ mắttʰấʔi bêŋiəmin ʔɛm zuột kɔncaj kủʔa mìɲ tʰì hỏʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ʔɛmút kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi kùŋ căŋ và zằŋ kɔn ơʔi kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋươʔi vì tʰấʔi ʔɛm mìɲ ɣiôsép lòŋ kảmdộŋ lậtdật bướk za ŋɔàʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ dặŋ xók ŋườʔi vàʔɔ fòŋ ɲà cɔŋ xók Ðʔɔạn zửʔa bướk za cắk ɣan nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi zọn bữʔa di ŋườʔita zọn cɔ ɣiôsép ziêŋ cɔ kák ʔɛɲɛm ziêŋ ŋườʔi zíptô cuŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ zọn cɔ ŋồʔi ziêŋ nữʔa ŋườʔi zíptô kó táɲ ɣớm ŋườʔi hêbơzơ xôŋ cuŋ dượk vậʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋồʔi lạʔi cướk ɣiôsép lớnɲỏ tùʔi tʰeo tʰứtự mìɲ ŋơŋẩn ɲìn ɲăw ɣiôsép saj dɛm mấʔi dồăn cướk mìɲ cɔ kák ʔɛɲɛm ɲưŋ fần bêŋiəmin lạʔi ɲiềʔu ɣấp kủʔa kák ŋườʔi xák họ ʔuốŋ ŋɔn vuj kùŋ ɣiôsép ɣiôsép cwiền lịɲ cɔ kwảŋiə zằŋ hễ kák ŋườʔi dó cở nổʔi bawɲiêʔu tʰì hãʔi dổ lươŋtʰựk cɔ dầʔi baw bấʔiɲiêʔu zồʔi dể bạk kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi nơʔi miệŋ baw lạʔi hãʔi dể káʔi cén bằŋ bạk tạʔi miệŋ baw cuŋ vớʔi bạk mwa lúʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi nữʔa kwảŋiə ʔiɲư lờʔi ɣiôsép zặn mìɲ ŋàʔimaj cờʔi vừʔa sáŋ ŋườʔita cɔ kák ŋườʔi dó lừʔa xi di za xỏʔi tʰàɲ cưʔa sa ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ kwảŋiə zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi duổʔi tʰeo mấʔi ŋườʔi dó xi tʰeo zồʔi hãʔi nóʔi zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi lấʔi ʔɔán cả ɲưvậʔi kó fảʔicáʔi cén nầʔi kủʔa cúʔa tʰườŋ zùŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu bóʔi căŋ kák ŋươʔi dã việk cẳŋ tʰiện dó kwảŋiə tʰeo lạʔi mấʔi lờʔi ấʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm dáp zằŋ saw cúʔa nóʔi ɲưvậʔi cẳŋ bawzờ tôʔitớ cúʔa kó tưởŋ dến việk tʰế nầʔi Ðâʔi sứ kanaan cúŋtôʔi kó dɛm bạk dã dượk nơʔi miệŋ baw suốŋ zaw lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi tʰăj zễ nàʔɔ lạʔi kó mɔŋ ănkắp bạk hăj vàŋ kủʔa ziɲ củ ŋườʔi saw sin cɔ tôʔitớ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi dượkkáʔi cén dó fảʔi cết di cíɲ cúŋtôʔi tôʔimọʔi cɔ cúʔa kwảŋiə dáp tʰôʔi hãʔi ɲư lờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi dượk cén nơʔi ʔaj tʰì ŋườʔi dó tôʔimọʔi cɔ dó kòn kák ŋườʔi tʰì vôtộʔi tứktʰì mỗʔi ŋườʔi lậtdật baw mìɲ suốŋ dất za kwảŋiə lụksɔát baw ʔɛɲkả dến baw ʔɛmút káʔi cén dặŋ cɔŋ baw bêzamin mỗʔi ŋườʔi sé áʔɔ mìɲ za cất baw lúʔa lưŋ lừʔa zồʔi kùŋ cởlạʔi tʰàɲ zuda kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm dồŋ vàʔɔ dến ɲà ɣiôsép ŋườʔi hãʔi kòn nơʔi dó mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk ŋườʔi ɣiôsép hỏʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣâʔi nôŋnỗʔi ci vậʔi há cẳŋ ɲư tadâʔi kó tàʔi bóʔi saw zuda dáp cúŋtôʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúʔa làmsaw fân lạʔi làmsaw cữʔa mìɲ cúŋtôʔi làmsaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã tʰấʔu zõ diềʔu zanák kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa zồʔi nầʔi cúŋtôʔi kùŋ dã dượk cén nơʔi tăj dềʔu tôʔitớ cɔ cúʔa ɲưŋzô dáp zằŋ ta cẳŋ kó ɲưvậʔi dâʔu ŋườʔi dã dượk cén nơʔi tăj tôʔimọʔi kòn kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cởvề ɲà ca mìɲ bìɲiên zuda lạʔi ɣần ɣiôsép tʰưʔa zằŋ vì cúʔa ŋaŋ vaj fazaôn sinlỗʔi cúʔa cớ nổʔizận kùŋ tôʔitớ dể tôʔi nóʔi lờʔi cɔ cúʔa ŋɛ cúʔa kó hỏʔi tôʔitớ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kòn ca hăjlà ʔɛɲɛm nàʔɔ căŋ kó tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ cúʔa zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kòn ca ɣià kùŋ kɔncaj dã sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲ zuột dứʔa nầʔi dã cết zồʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák kɔn kủʔa kòn mộtmìɲ ca tʰươŋ vả cúʔa kó zặn zằŋ hãʔi zẫn suốŋ dến hầʔu cɔ tʰấʔi dượk và cúŋtôʔi kó tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ cúʔa zằŋ Ðứʔa cẻ cẳŋ lìʔa ca dượk nếʔu lìʔa za tʰì ca cết ɲưŋ cúʔa lạʔi zạʔi nếʔu ʔɛmút xôŋ tʰeo kák ŋươʔi suốŋ dâʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi nữʔa nên xi cúŋtôʔi cởvề ɲà tôʔitớ cúʔa ca tôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi kó tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa kế ấʔi ca lạʔi biểʔu cúŋtôʔi zằŋ hãʔi cở suốŋ dặŋ mwa lươŋtʰựk cúŋtôʔi tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ xôŋ dượk ɲưŋ nếʔu ʔɛmút di tʰeo kùŋ tʰì mớʔi cở suốŋ dượk bằŋxôŋ tʰì cúŋtôʔi xôŋ tʰế zamắt ŋườʔi dó kẻ tôʔitớ cúʔa ca tôʔi dáp zằŋ bâʔi zằŋ sɛɲ cɔ haj dứʔa kɔncaj dứʔa dã di kũŋ dã nóʔi cắk dã tʰúzữ sé zồʔi dến bâʔizờ cưʔa tʰấʔi lạʔi nếʔu bâʔi kòn zắt dứʔa nầʔi di xỏʔi nữʔa zủʔi kódiềʔu tajhạʔi ci sảʔi dến cɔ tứk ɲiên bâʔi cɔ tók bạk nầʔi dăwlòŋ sót zạ suốŋ âmfủ ca tʰươŋ ʔɛmút tôʔi dến dỗʔi haj liɲhồn xắŋxít ɲăw nếʔu bâʔizờ xi tôʔi cởvề nơʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa ca tôʔi xôŋ kó ʔɛmút dó tʰì xi vừʔa tʰấʔi kɔn xôŋ kòn nữʔa cắk ŋườʔi cết nếʔuvậʔi kák tôʔitớ cúʔa ca ɣià tók bạk kủʔa cúŋtôʔi kũŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa dăwlòŋ sót zạ suốŋ âmfủ vì tôʔitớ nầʔi kó cịʔu bảʔɔlãɲ dứʔa kɔn dó tʰưʔa zằŋ nếʔu kɔn xôŋ dɛm ʔɛm cɔ ca tʰì kam tộʔi kùŋ ca mãʔimãʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ sin cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa tôʔimọʔi tʰế cɔ dứʔa cẻ dặŋ tʰeo cởlên kùŋ kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ vì nếʔu dứʔa cẻ xôŋ tʰeo làmsaw tôʔi zám kùŋ ca tôʔi Ôʔi tôʔi nỡnàʔɔ tʰấʔi diềʔu tajhọʔa kủʔa ca tôʔi bâʔizờ ɣiôsép xôŋ kòn tʰểnàʔɔ kầmlòŋ cɔ dậʔu dượk cướk kák ŋườʔi hầʔu cuŋkwɛɲ zằŋ hãʔi duổʔi za hếttʰảʔi xizô tʰật kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tʰì xôŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xák tạʔi dó ŋườʔi kấttiếŋ xók zân zíptô ŋɛ ɲà fazaôn ŋɛ nữʔa ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm zằŋ tôʔi ɣiôsép ca tôʔi kòn sốŋ căŋ ɲưŋ cướk ŋườʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm bốʔizốʔi cẳŋ dáp lờʔi dượk ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm hãʔi lạʔi ɣần tôʔi họ lạʔi ɣần ŋườʔi nóʔi tôʔi ɣiôsép ʔɛm kák ʔɛɲ dã dặŋ zẫn kwa sứ zíptô bâʔizờ dừŋ sầʔunãʔɔ kũŋ dừŋ tiếk ci diềʔu kák ʔɛɲ dã tôʔi dặŋ zẫn dến sứ nầʔi dể ɣiữɣìn sốŋ kák ʔɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã saj tôʔi dến dâʔi cướk kák ʔɛɲ kìʔa haj zồʔi cɔŋ sứ dã dóʔicém kòn nữʔa xôŋ kòn kàʔicấʔi ci ɣặtʰáʔi ci dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj tôʔi dến dâʔi cướk dặŋ cɔ kák ʔɛɲ kòn nốʔi zòŋ cên mặtdất nươŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu dặŋ ɣiữɣìn sốŋ cɔ ʔɛɲɛm xôŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kák ʔɛɲ saj tôʔi dến dâʔi dâʔu ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi zườŋ dặt tôʔi ca fazaôn kaikwản kả ɲà ŋườʔi cị xắp sứ zíptô kák ʔɛɲ hãʔi măw măw cởvề ca tôʔi di nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ɣiôsép kɔn kủʔa ca kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dặt tôʔi cúʔa kả sứ zíptô ca hãʔi suốŋ vớʔi tôʔi sin dừŋ cậmcễ ca kák kɔn kák cáʔu kák ciên kùŋ tàʔi kủʔa ca tạʔi sứ ɣôsɛn ɣần tôʔi dâʔi dó tôʔi nuôʔi ca kòn dóʔicém nữʔa ʔɛ xi ca ŋườʔiɲà ca hếttʰảʔi lɔàʔi kủʔa ca fảʔi ác hawmòn nàʔi kák ʔɛɲ bêŋiəmin ʔɛm tôʔi dã tʰấʔi zằŋ cáɲ miệŋ tôʔi dã nóʔicwiện kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm dó vậʔi hãʔi tʰuật lạʔi kák diềʔu viɲhiển kủʔa tôʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô kùŋ mọʔi việk ʔɛɲɛm dã tʰấʔi cɔ ca ŋɛ hãʔi măw măw zờʔi ca suốŋ dâʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi lấʔi kổ bêŋiəmin ʔɛm mìɲ xók bêŋiəmin kũŋ kổ ŋườʔi xók ŋườʔi kũŋ kák ʔɛɲ mìɲ xók Ðʔɔạn ʔɛɲɛm nóʔicwiện kùŋ ŋườʔi lậptứk tiếŋ dồn dến ɲà fazaôn zằŋ ʔɛɲɛm ɣiôsép dã dến fazaôn kwầntʰần ŋɛ lấʔi làmdẹp zạ fazaôn fán kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ hãʔi zặn kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi zằŋ hãʔi cỡ dồ lừʔa di cởvề sứ kanaan zướk ca ŋườʔiɲà kủʔa kák ŋươʔi suốŋ kùŋ ta ɲượŋ cɔ ɲất cɔŋ sứ zíptô kák ŋươʔi hưỡŋ mầʔumỡ kủʔa dất kòn zặn ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi lạʔi kùŋ ɲưvậʔi hãʔi dɛm sɛcộ sứ zíptô cɔ kɔnɲỏ mìɲ kùŋ zờʔi ca kák ŋươʔi suốŋ dâʔi Ðừŋ tiếk tàʔi mìɲ ɲất kủʔa sứ zíptô fần kák ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư lờʔi ɣiôsép vâŋ mạŋ fazaôn dưʔa ɲữŋ sɛcộ cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tʰựk zùŋ cɔŋ lúk di dườŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ dưʔa áʔɔsốŋ mặk dổʔitʰăj cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi kòn bêŋiəmin ŋườʔi cɔ căm miếŋ bạk kùŋ áʔɔsốŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ saj dɛm cɔ ca mìɲ mườʔi kɔn lừʔa cỡ kák kwí ɲất cɔŋ sứ zíptô mườʔi kɔn lừʔa káʔi cỡ lúʔa báɲ lươŋtʰựk dểzàɲ zùŋ cɔŋ xi ca di dườŋ vậʔi ɣiôsép dưʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ lêndườŋ lạʔi zặn zằŋ sin ʔɛɲɛm dừŋ kảʔi lẫʔi ɲăw zọk dườŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm zíptô cởlên dến sứ kanaan nơʔi zakốp ca mìɲ tʰuật lạʔi lờʔi nầʔi zằŋ ɣiôsép hãʔi kòn sốŋ lạʔi ấʔilà ŋườʔi daŋ kaicị kả sứ zíptô ɲưŋ lòŋ zakốp vôtìɲ ŋườʔi xôŋ lờʔi nóʔi ʔɛɲɛm tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋɛ mọʔi lờʔi ɣiôsép dã nóʔi zakốp vừʔa tʰấʔi kák sɛcộ kủʔa ɣiôsép saj dɛm dặŋ zướk mìɲ tʰì tâmtʰần ŋườʔi tỉɲ lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ tʰôʔi zồʔi ɣiôsép kɔncaj hãʔi kòn sốŋ di tʰăm cướk xi kwadờʔi ʔisơzaên zadi dɛm tʰeo kák tàʔi mìɲ Ðếnbê ʔɛsêba ŋườʔi bàʔi kủʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisák ca mìɲ cɔŋ tʰấʔi bandêm kiə Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fán kùŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ hỡʔiza kốp zakốp ʔisơzaên dáp zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca ŋươʔi hãʔi suốŋ zíptô dừŋ ci tạʔi dó cɔ ŋươʔi tʰàɲ nướklớn cáɲ suốŋ dến dó vớʔi ŋươʔi cáɲ kũŋ zẫn ŋươʔi cẳŋ saj ɣiôsép ŋươʔi ɲắm lạʔi từbê ʔɛsêba zakốp xởʔi di kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên dể zakốp ca mìɲ kùŋ kák kɔn mìɲ sɛcộ
