kủʔa fazaôn dã saj dến zướk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó cúŋ kũŋ dɛm tʰeo kák súkvật kủʔakảʔi mìɲ dã ɣâʔizựŋ tạʔi sứ kanaan di dến kứ zíptô vậʔi zakốp kùŋ kả ɲà ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kák kɔncaj nàʔɔ kák cáʔu caj nàʔɔ kák kɔŋáʔi nàʔɔ kák cáʔu ɣáʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu suốŋ sứ zíptô Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên tứklà zakốp dến sứ zíptô kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zakốp zubên kák kɔncaj kủʔa zubên hênók falu hếcôn kạtmi kák kɔncaj kủʔa simêôn ɣiêmuên zamin zakin sôha săwlơ tứk kɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi sứ kanaan kák kɔncaj kủʔa lêvi ɣẹtsôn kêhát mêzazi kák kɔncaj kủʔa zuda zơ ʔɔnan sêla fêzết sêzác ɲưŋ zơ ʔɔnan dã tʰák tạʔi sứ kanaan kɔn kủʔa fêzết hếcôn hamun kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaka tʰôla fuva ɣióp simzôn kák kɔncaj kủʔa sabulôn sêzết zalêên vả kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi Ðʔi lê ʔa sɛɲ cɔ zakốp xi tạʔi fadanazam kùŋ kák cáʔu dó hếttʰảʔi bamươʔi ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɣát sifiôn haɣi suni zi ʔazôdi ʔazêli kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasɛ zimna zícvà zícvi bêzi ʔa kùŋ sêzác ʔɛmɣáʔi kák ŋườʔi dó kɔn kủʔa bêzi ʔa hêbɛ mɛɲkiên vả kák kɔn kủʔa nàŋ siɲba sɛɲ cɔ zakốp kùŋ kák cáʔu dó hếttʰảʔi mườʔisáʔu ŋườʔi nàŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa kủʔa laban dã cɔ tʰeo hầʔu lê ʔa kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kák kɔncaj kủʔa zɛcên zakốp ɣiôsép bêŋiəmin ɣiôsép dã kó kɔn tạʔi sứ zíptô manasɛ zaim Ác kɔŋáʔi kủʔa fôtifêza tʰầʔicả tʰàɲ dã sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa bêŋiəmin bêla bêkê Ác ɣiêza naaman zôsơ mốpbim hốpbim ʔazết vả kák kɔncaj kủʔa zɛcên sɛɲ cɔ zakốp kùŋ kák cáʔu dó hếttʰảʔi mườʔibốn ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔan husim kák kɔncaj kủʔa néptali ɣiátsêên ɣuni zítsɛ silɛm vả kák kɔncaj kủʔa nàŋ bila sɛɲ cɔ zakốp kùŋ kák cáʔu dó hếttʰảʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi nàŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa laban dã cɔ tʰeo hầʔu zɛcên kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kák ŋườʔi di dến sứ zíptô vớʔi zakốp tứklà kák ŋườʔi zɔ nơʔi zakốp sɛɲ nếʔuxôŋ kák nàŋ zâʔu tʰì hếttʰảʔi sáʔu mươʔi sáʔu ŋườʔi kɔn kủʔa ɣiôsép dã sɛɲ tạʔi zíptô dượk haj vậʔi kák ŋườʔi tʰuộk ɲà zakốp di dến zíptô kọŋ hếttʰảʔi bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi zakốp saj zuda di dến cướk dặŋ sin ɣiôsép dưʔa mìɲ vàʔɔ bờkõʔi ɣôsɛn vậʔi dềʔu vàʔɔ sứ ɣôsɛn ɣiôsép tʰắŋ sɛ di ɣôsɛn dón ʔisơzaên ca mìɲ ŋườʔi zamắt ca cɔàŋ lấʔi ŋườʔi xók hồʔi lâʔu ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ cớci cɔ ca cết bâʔizờ di ca dã tʰấʔi dượk kɔn kɔn kòn sốŋ Ðʔɔạŋiô nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔiɲà ca mìɲ zằŋ tôʔi cướk tâʔu cɔ fazaôn hăj zằŋ ʔɛɲɛm kả ɲà ca tôʔi sứ kanaan dã dếnkùŋ tôʔi họ ŋề cănciên nuôʔi bầʔi súkvật kó zẫn tʰeo bầʔi ciên kák tàʔi kủʔa mìɲ và xi fazaôn cwiền ɣọʔi ʔɛɲɛm hỏʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi ŋề ci tʰì hãʔi tâʔu zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ cúʔa kùŋ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi ŋề nuôʔi súkvật tʰuở kòn ɲỏ cɔdến ɣiờ Ấʔi hầʔu cɔ ʔɛɲɛm dặŋ lạʔi sứ ɣôsɛn zân zíptô kó táɲ ɣớmɣê hếttʰảʔi cănciên ɣiôsép dến tâʔu mọʔi diềʔu dó cɔ fazaôn hăj nóʔi zằŋ ca ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi dã sứ kanaan dến kó dɛm tʰeo ciên kùŋ kák tàʔi kủʔa mìɲ hiện bâʔizờ dươŋ cɔŋ sứ ɣôsɛn ŋườʔi dưʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ vàʔɔ ʔiếtkiến fazaôn fazaôn hỏʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋề ci tâʔu zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ cănciên ɲư tổfụ cúŋtôʔi xi cướk zồʔi lạʔi tâʔu zằŋ Ấʔi dặŋ kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ tôʔitớ dã dến sứ kanaan dóʔicém xôŋ kòn dồŋkỏ ci cɔ bầʔi súkvật vậʔi sinfép cɔ tôʔitớ ŋụ tạʔi sứ ɣôsɛn fazaôn fán kùŋ ɣiôsép ɲưvầʔi ca ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi dã dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi vậʔi sứ zíptô zàɲ cɔ ŋươʔi hãʔi cɔ ca ʔɛɲɛm cốn nàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ hãʔi cɔ tạʔi sứ ɣôsɛn vậʔi và nếʔu cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi dó ŋươʔi ʔaj ɣiỏʔi hãʔi dặt căn kák bầʔi súkvật kủʔa Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsép zẫn zakốp ca mìɲ dến ʔiết fazaôn zakốp cúk fướk cɔ fazaôn fazaôn hỏʔi zakốp zằŋ ŋươʔi hưởŋtʰọ dượk bawɲiêʔu tuổʔi zakốp tâʔu zằŋ ŋườʔi tôʔi sốŋ dờʔi fiêʔulưʔu hếttʰảʔi mộtcăm bamươʔi kák kủʔa dờʔi tôʔi lấʔilàm ŋắn ŋủʔi lạʔi ɲọkɲằn cẳŋ bằŋ ɲữŋ bìɲ sɛɲ kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi xi ŋườʔiở fiêʔulưʔu dó zakốp cúk fướk cɔ fazaôn nữʔa zồʔi luj za xỏʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi ɣiôsép vâŋ mạŋ fazaôn dịɲ cỗ cɔ ca ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔ dất ɲứt cɔŋ sứ zíptô sảnŋiệp tạʔi zamsɛ ɣiôsép tùʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi kấp lươŋtʰựk cɔ ca ʔɛɲɛm kả ɲà ca mìɲ vả dóʔicém cɔŋ xắp sứ cẳŋ kòn lươŋtʰựk nữʔa sứ zíptô sứ kanaan dềʔu hawmòn ác dóʔicém dó ɣiôsép tʰâʔu bạk cɔŋ sứ zíptô sứ kanaan tứk ɣiá tiềnkủʔa muônzân mwa lúʔa zồʔi cứʔa bạk dó vàʔɔ xɔ fazaôn xi bạk cɔŋ sứ zíptô sứ kanaan dã tʰì tấtkả zân zíptô dềʔu dếnkùŋ ɣiôsép kêʔu zằŋ sin cɔ cúŋtôʔi lươŋtʰựk lẽnàʔɔ kớ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cết cướk cúʔa saw ɣiôsép dáp zằŋ nếʔu bạk zồʔi hãʔi zaw súkvật kák ŋươʔi cɔ fát lươŋtʰựk dổʔi lạʔi Ðʔɔạn zâncúŋ zẫn súkvật lạʔi cɔ ɣiôsép ɣiôsép fát lươŋtʰựk dổʔi lấʔi ŋựʔa bầʔi ciên bầʔi lừʔa năm dó ŋườʔi tʰâʔu kák bầʔi súkvật kủʔa dổʔi tʰế lươŋtʰựk cɔ mãn zồʔi săw zâncúŋ lạʔi dến kêʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ tiềnbạk sạccơn bầʔi súkvật dã zaw cɔ cúʔa bâʔizờ cỉ zàɲ cɔ cúʔa tʰân dất zuộŋ lẽnàʔɔ cúŋtôʔi dất zuộŋ fảʔi hawmòn cướk cúʔa saw hãʔi mwa dổʔi lấʔi lươŋtʰựk cúŋtôʔi dất zuộŋ di vậʔi cúŋtôʔi kùŋ dất zuộŋ tôʔimọʔi cɔ fazaôn hãʔi cɔ ɣiốŋ ci dặŋ zeo hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi sốŋ xỏʔi cết dất xôŋ fảʔi bỏhwaŋ ɣiôsép mwa hếttʰảʔi zuộŋdất cɔŋ sứ zíptô cɔ fazaôn dóʔicém tʰúkzụk mọʔi ŋườʔi zíptô dềʔu dɛm zuộŋ mìɲ vậʔi zuộŋdất dềʔu tʰuộk fazaôn kòn zâncúŋ dầʔu nầʔi dến dầʔu kiə ŋườʔi dềʔu zờʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ sɔŋ zuộŋdất kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả tʰì ɣiôsép xôŋ mwa dến ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả kó lãɲ fần lươŋ kủʔa fazaôn dã dịɲ vậʔi fần lươŋtʰựk kủʔa fazaôn dã kấp cɔ tʰế cɔnên ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả cẳŋ dɛm dất kủʔa mìɲ ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ zâncúŋ zằŋ nầʔi dã mwa kák ŋươʔi zuộŋdất cɔ fazaôn dâʔi ɣiốŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi dặŋ zeo cɔŋ zuộŋ dó mùʔa ɣặt fảʔi cɔ fazaôn fần kòn fần kiə dể cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɣiốŋ zeo zùŋ lươŋtʰựk cɔ mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔiɲà kùŋ cɔ kák kɔnɲỏ mìɲ zâncúŋ nóʔi zằŋ cúʔa dã kứʔumạŋ cúŋtôʔi kầʔusin cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk ɲờ cướk cúʔa tʰì tôʔimọʔi cɔ fazaôn về việk dó ɣiôsép dịɲ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj hãʔi kòn buộk dất zíptô fảʔi tʰuế cɔ fazaôn fần hwalợʔi mìɲ cỉ dất zuộŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả cẳŋ tʰuộk fazaôn vậʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋụ tạʔi ɣôsɛn tʰuộk sứ zíptô ɣâʔi dượk kơŋiệp tạʔi dó sɛɲ tʰêm bộʔifần zakốp kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ zíptô dượk mườʔibảʔi hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm mươʔi bảʔi tuổʔi xi ŋàʔi ɣần cết ʔisơzaên ɣọʔi ɣiôsép kɔncaj mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu ca dượk ɲờ cướk kɔn sin hãʔi dể tăicên dùʔi ca kậʔi hếtlòŋ ɲơn tʰàɲtʰựk kùŋ ca sin kɔn dừŋ côn ca tạʔi dất zíptô xi ca ʔan ɣiấk kùŋ tổfụ zồʔi hãʔi dɛm ca za xỏʔi zíptô côn cuŋ kùŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣiôsép tʰưʔa zằŋ kɔn ʔi tʰeo lờʔi ca zặn ɣiôsép nóʔi kɔn hãʔi tʰề di ɣiôsép tʰề Ðʔɔạn ʔisơzaên kwì lạʔi nơʔi dầʔu ɣiườŋ mìɲ vả xi kák việk dó kwa zồʔi kó ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ nầʔi ca ŋườʔi dăw ɣiôsép dɛm manasɛ zaim haj dứʔa kɔncaj mìɲ kùŋ di dến họ cɔ zakốp hăj nóʔi zằŋ nầʔizô kɔncaj ôŋ dến tʰăm ôŋ dó ʔisơzaên kố ɣượŋ ŋồʔi zậʔi cên ɣiườŋ zakốp nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ dã za fướk cɔ ca tạʔi lusơ cɔŋ sứ kanaan fán zằŋ nầʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu tʰàɲ hộʔi zân cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi sứ nầʔi kơŋiệp dờʔidờʔi bâʔizờ haj dứʔa kɔncaj dã sɛɲ cɔ kɔn tạʔi sứ zíptô cướk xi ca dến zaim manasɛ kũŋ tʰuộk ca ɲư zubên simêôn vậʔi kòn mấʔi dứʔa kɔn sɛɲ dó tʰì tʰuộk kɔn fần hưởŋ kơŋiệp cúŋnó dồŋ mộttʰể kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ xi ca fadan cởvề sứ kanaan tʰì zɛcên cết zọk dườŋ kómặt ca ɣần fơzát ca côn ŋườʔiở kɔn dườŋ divề fơzát tứklà bếtlêhɛm ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi kák kɔncaj ɣiôsép hỏʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ dứʔa nầʔi ʔaj ɣiôsép tʰưʔa zằŋ Ấʔilà ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa kɔn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ tạʔi sứ nầʔi ʔisơzaên lạʔi nóʔi sin hãʔi dɛm dến dâʔi dặŋ ca cúk fướk cɔ cúŋnó vả kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɣià làŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ci nữʔa biểʔu cúŋnó lạʔi ɣần cɔàŋ ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ cướk ca tưởŋ cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi dượk kɔn ɲưŋ bâʔizờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi cɔ ca tʰấʔi dượk dến zòŋzõʔi kɔn nữʔa ɣiôsép zẫn haj dứʔa kɔncaj za xỏʔi haj dầʔuɣốʔi ca mìɲ zồʔi mìɲ suốŋ dất Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi zẫn haj dứʔa cẻ lạʔi ɣần ca tăj hữʔu tʰì zẫn zaim saŋ kwa fíʔa kủʔa ca kòn tăj zắt manasɛ saŋ kwa fíʔa hữʔu ʔisơzaên dưʔa tăimặt za dể cên dầʔu zaim dứʔa ɲỏ kòn tăicáʔi lạʔi dể cên dầʔu manasɛ ŋườʔi kó ziêŋ dể tăj ɲưvậʔi manasɛ dứʔa zồʔi ŋườʔi cúk fướk cɔ ɣiôsép zằŋ kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tổfụ tôʔi zaham ʔisák dã tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cănnuôʔi tôʔi xi mớʔi lọtlòŋ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj tʰiênsứ dã kứʔu tôʔi za ŋɔàʔi vòŋ hɔạnnạn hãʔi fướk cɔ haj dứʔa cẻ nầʔi nốʔi zɛɲ tôʔi tổfụ tôʔi zaham ʔisák cɔ cúŋnó tʰêm ɲiềʔu cên mặtdất ɲưŋzô tʰấʔi ca mìɲ dể tăj hữʔu cên dầʔu zaim tʰìkó bấtbìɲ lấʔi tăj ca dã dể dầʔu zaim cáʔɔdổʔi kwa dấʔu manasɛ zồʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi vậʔi ca Ðứʔa nầʔi dầʔulòŋ dể tăj hữʔu ca cên dầʔu mớʔifảʔi cớ ɲưŋ ca ŋườʔi xôŋ cịʔu kãʔi zằŋ ca kɔn ca nó cởnên zân kũŋ vậʔi kɔn sɔŋ tʰểnàʔɔ ʔɛm kũŋ zòŋzõʔi tʰàɲza nướk cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi cúk fướk cɔ haj dứʔa kɔncaj nầʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔi ŋươʔi zân ʔisơzaên cúk fướk ɲăw zằŋ kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dượk ɣiốŋ ɲư zaim manasɛ vậʔi zakốp dặt zaim cướk manasɛ ʔisơzaên lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ nầʔi ca tʰák ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fùhộ dɛm kák kɔn cởvề sứ tổfụ kòn ca cɔ kɔnmột fần dất cổʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm fần dất kủʔa ca dã zùŋ kuŋ dɔạt lấʔi kủʔa zân ʔamôzít dó zakốp ɣọʔi kák kɔncaj mìɲ lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi hộʔi lạʔi dâʔi ca nóʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu fảʔi sảʔi dến cɔ kák kɔn ŋàʔisăw hỡʔi kák kɔncaj zakốp hãʔi hộʔi lạʔi ŋɛ ŋɛ lờʔi ʔisơzaên ca kủʔa kák kɔn hỡʔizu kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ca sứklựk ca dầʔutiên mạɲmẽ ca vốn kó tôncọŋ kwiềnnăŋ cúŋ kɔn sôʔi càʔɔ ɲư nướk cẳŋ fần ʔaj vì kɔn dã ɣiườŋ ca kɔn ɣiườŋ ca zơ dó simêôn lêvi ʔɛɲɛm zuột tʰɛɲ ɣươm cúŋnó tʰật xíɣiớʔi huŋtàn kầʔu cɔ ca cớ kó dồŋmưʔu viɲhiển ca cớ kùŋ hộʔi vì dã ɣiết ŋườʔi cɔŋ kơn ɣiậnzữ kắt ɲượŋ dựk ziêŋ mìɲ Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj kơn ɣiậnzữ tʰậtlà huŋ mạɲ Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj xí ɣiận zữzằn tʰăj ta fânciə za cɔŋ ɲà zakốp tan lạk cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên hỡʔizu da kák ʔɛɲɛm xɛnŋợʔi kɔn tăj kɔn cận kổ kwân ŋịc kák kɔncaj ca kwì lạʔi cướk kɔn zuda hỡʔi kɔn kɔn dượk mồʔi zồʔi tʰa nó ɣốʔi xáknàʔɔ dựk ɲư káʔi ʔaj zám xiến ŋồʔi kâʔi fủ cẳŋ zờʔi xỏʔi zuda kẻ lậpfáp xôŋ zứt xỏʔi ɣiữʔa cơn cɔdến cừŋ Ðấŋsi tớʔi và kák zân vâŋ fụk Ðấŋ dó ŋườʔi buộk lừʔa mìɲ vàʔɔ ɣốk ɲɔ lừʔa kɔn mìɲ vàʔɔ ɲàɲ ɲɔ ɲứt ŋườʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ vàʔɔ zượʔuɲɔ kùŋ lấʔi hwiết ɲɔ lăw áʔɔtơʔi mìɲ mắt ŋườʔi dỏ kớ zượʔu zăŋ ɲiềʔu cắŋ kớ sữʔa sabulôn nơʔi ɣàɲ tứklà nơʔi kó tàʔu dậʔu bờkõʔi ŋườʔi cạʔi hướŋ sidôn ʔisaka kɔn lừʔa mạɲmẽ nằm ŋỉ ɣiữʔa cuồŋ tʰấʔi zằŋ ʔiênổn tốtlàɲ và dất daj dẹp tʰăj ŋườʔi dã zùn vaj vák ɣáɲ nặŋ fảʔi vâŋ fụk ɲữŋ diềʔu sưʔu zịc Ðʔan sử dɔán zân cúŋmìɲ ɲư cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên Ðʔan kɔn zắn cên dườŋ một kɔn zắnlụk cɔŋ cốn nẻʔɔ kùŋ kắn ŋựʔa làm cɔ kỡʔi fảʔi ɲàʔɔ hỡʔizê tôʔi côŋ cửŋ kứʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi kòŋát dạʔɔ biɲ sôŋ dáɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi sôŋ dáɲ lạʔi duổʔi tʰeo zɔ nơʔi ʔasɛ kó tʰựkvật ŋɔn ŋườʔi kuŋkấp cɔ kák vwa néptali naj káʔi tʰả cuồŋ nóʔi bàʔi ɲiềʔu lờʔi văɲwa ɣiôsép cồʔi kủʔa kâʔi tươʔitốt mọk ɣần suốʔi nướk ɲàɲ ɲáɲ fủ baw cên ŋọn tườŋ kẻ kầm kuŋ dã ɣẹʔɔ cọk ŋườʔi bắn vàʔɔ dáɲ ɲờ tăj Ðấŋ tɔànnăŋ kủʔa zakốp nên kuŋ ŋườʔi cắk ɲờÐấŋcăn ciên kủʔa ʔisơzaên nên haj tăj ŋườʔi tʰêm mạɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca ɣiúpdỡ kɔn Ðấŋ tɔànnăŋ fướk cɔ kɔn tứklà fướk làɲ cốn cờʔi kaw suốŋ kùŋ fướk làɲ nơʔi vựk zộŋ tʰẳm fướk làɲ kủʔa kủʔa lòŋ fướk làɲ ca cúk cɔ kɔn kaw kák fướk làɲ kủʔa tổfụ ca cɔdến kák cót núʔi dờʔidờʔi kák fướk nầʔi nơʔi dầʔu ɣiôsép nơʔi cán kủʔa cúʔa kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ bêŋiəmin kɔn cósóʔi hăj kấʔu sé banmaj di dáɲ cết mồʔi ciềʔu fânciə mồʔi dã dượk kák ŋườʔi dó dầʔu cưởŋ kủʔa mườʔihaj cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dó lờʔi kủʔa ca nóʔi dươŋ xi cúk fướk cɔ cúk lờʔi fướk ziêŋ cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi za lịɲ cɔ kák kɔncaj zằŋ ca nơʔi tổtôŋ kák kɔn hãʔi côn ca cuŋ kùŋ tổfụ nơʔi haŋ dá tạʔi dồŋzuộŋ zôn ŋườʔi hêtít tứklà haŋ dá cɔŋ dồŋ mặkbêla ŋaŋ mamzê tʰuộk sứ kanaan zaham dã mwa mộdịʔa vớʔi dồŋzuộŋ kủʔa zôn Ấʔi nơʔi dó ŋườʔita dã côn zaham saza ŋườʔi ʔisák zêbɛca ŋườʔi màlạʔi nơʔi dó ca kũŋ dã côn lê ʔa nữʔa káʔi dồŋzuộŋ kùŋ haŋ dá tạʔi dó dã mwa kủʔa zân hếc vậʔi xi cốʔi mấʔi lờʔi nầʔi cɔ kák kɔn mìɲ sɔŋ tʰì zakốp dể cơn vàʔɔ ɣiườŋ lạʔi zồʔi tắtʰơʔi dượk kùŋ tổtôŋ mìɲ ɣiôsép kúʔi dầʔu suốŋ ca mìɲ ŋườʔi xók Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsép biểʔu mấʔi tʰầʔitʰuốk hầʔu việk mìɲ zùŋ tʰuốk tʰơm sôŋ cɔ sák ca tʰầʔitʰuốk sôŋ cɔ ʔisơzaên bốn mươʔi ŋàʔi sôŋ tʰuốk hầʔu kwa ấʔilà ŋàʔi zùŋ sôŋ tʰuốk zân zíptô xók ŋườʔi cɔŋ bảʔi mươʔi ŋàʔi xi taŋ zồʔi ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ kwầntʰần fazaôn zằŋ nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk kák ŋươʔi sin hãʔi tʰuật lạʔi lờʔi nầʔi cɔ fazaôn ŋɛ ca tôʔi kó biểʔu tôʔi tʰề zằŋ nầʔi ca cết kɔn hãʔi côn ca nơʔi mộdịʔa dã mwa zồʔi cɔŋ sứ kanaan vậʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi fảʔi dó côn ca tôʔi zồʔi cở suốŋ fazaôn fán zằŋ hãʔi cởlên côn ca ŋươʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋườʔi dã tʰề dó ɣiôsép zờʔi sák ca mìɲ cởlên côn kwầntʰần fazaôn kák bựk cưởŋlãʔɔ cɔŋ dền kák bựk cưởŋlãʔɔ cɔŋ sứ zíptô hếttʰảʔi nộʔi ɲà ɣiôsép kák ʔɛɲɛm nộʔi ɲà ca mìɲ dềʔu di tʰeo dưʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɣôsɛn cỉ kòn ɲữŋ dứʔa cẻ ciên kùŋ kủʔa tʰôʔi lạʔi kũŋ kó dɛm ŋựʔa sɛ tʰeo nữʔa tʰậtlà dám sák zất dôŋ tʰăj xi dến dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔatát kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰì xóktʰan zất cọŋtʰể tạʔi dó dɔạn ɣiôsép dểtaŋ ca cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi zânka naan tứklà zân sứ ấʔi tʰấʔi xóktʰan nơʔi dạp lúʔa ʔatát tʰì nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà dám xóktʰan cọŋtʰể kủʔa zân zíptô dó bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi káʔi nầʔi ʔabênmíczaim kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vậʔi kák kɔncaj zakốp tʰeo lờʔi ca cốʔi lạʔi zờʔi sák ŋườʔi sứ kanaan côn cɔŋ hɛɲ dá kủʔa dồŋ mặkbêla ŋaŋ mamzê zaham dã mwa vớʔi dồŋzuộŋ zôn ŋườʔi hêtít dể zùŋ mộdịʔa côn ca sɔŋ zồʔi ɣiôsép kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋườʔi di tʰeo dưʔa sák ca dềʔu cở suốŋ sứ zíptô kák ʔɛɲ ɣiôsép tʰấʔi ca mìɲ cết zồʔi tʰì nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ kólẽ ɣiôsép ɣɛɲɣét cúŋta cảtʰù việk ák cúŋta dã cɔ ŋườʔi căŋ kák ʔɛɲ saj ŋườʔi dến nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép zằŋ cướk xi kwadờʔi ca ʔɛm kó cốʔi zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi lạʔi cɔ ɣiôsép ɲưvầʔi Ôʔi sin hãʔi tʰa diềʔu ák tộʔifạm kủʔa kák ʔɛɲ kɔn di cúŋnó dã lỗʔi kũŋ kɔn dó ɲưŋ bâʔizờ ca sin kɔn hãʔi tʰa tộʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ca ŋɛ kwa mấʔi lờʔi nầʔi ɣiôsép xók cáɲ kák ʔɛɲ ŋườʔi dến mìɲ suốŋ zướʔi cơn nóʔi zằŋ kák ʔɛɲ dâʔi tʰậtlà tôʔitớ kủʔa ʔɛm dó ɣiôsép dáp zằŋ kák ʔɛɲ dừŋ ci tôʔi tʰăimặt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saw kák ʔɛɲ twan hạʔi tôʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi twan diềʔu íc cɔ tôʔi hầʔu cɔ kứʔu sốŋ cɔ ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ʔiɲư dã sảʔi dến ŋàʔinăj ɣiữɣìn sốŋ kủʔa zânsự dôŋdảʔɔ vậʔi dừŋ tôʔi kấpzưỡŋ kák ʔɛɲ kɔnkáʔi kák ʔɛɲ Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsép ʔanủʔi kák ʔɛɲ lấʔi lờʔi êmzịʔu nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsép kùŋ ɲà ca mìɲ kiềʔu ŋụ tạʔi sứ zíptô ŋườʔi hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm mườʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi dượk kák kɔncáʔu zaim dến dờʔi tʰứba kũŋ kó dượk nâŋniw cên ɣốʔi mìɲ kák kɔn kủʔa maki tứk kɔncaj kủʔa manasɛ nữʔa kế ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm zằŋ ʔɛm cết ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến viếŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm tʰật dɛm kák ʔɛɲɛm sứ ŋàʔi dã tʰề hứʔa kùŋ zaham ʔisák zakốp ɣiôsép biểʔu kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰề zằŋ kwảtʰật Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến ŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm sin ʔɛɲɛm hãʔi zờʔi hàʔicốt tôʔi xỏʔi sứ nầʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsép kwadờʔi hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm mườʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔita sôŋ tʰuốk tʰơm cɔ sák ɣiôsép cɔŋ kwantàʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu zẫn ŋườʔiɲà mìɲ di vớʔi zakốp dến sứ zíptô zubên simêôn lêvi zuda ʔisaka sabulôn bêŋiəmin Ðʔan néptali ɣát ʔasɛ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi bởʔi zakốp sɛɲ za dượk bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi ɣiôsép dã tạʔi sứ zíptô vả ɣiôsép ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kùŋ mọʔi dồŋ dờʔi dó dềʔu cết kɔncáʔu ʔisơzaên tʰêm ɲiềʔu lạlùŋ nẩʔinở za cởnên zất kườŋ tʰạɲ kả sứ dềʔu dầʔizẫʔi ɲưŋ bấʔizờ tạʔi nướk zíptô kó vwa mớʔi lênŋôʔi cẳŋ kwɛnbiết ɣiôsép vwa fán kùŋzân mìɲ zằŋ nầʔi zân ʔisơzaên dôŋ mạɲ cúŋta hãʔi zùŋ cướk xônŋwan dốʔi kùŋ kẻʔɔ tʰêm ɲiềʔu mộtmaj nếʔu kó kơn ciɲciến sảʔi dến kùŋ kwân ŋịc dáɲ lạʔi za xỏʔi sứ căŋ vậʔi ŋườʔi zíptô dặt kák dầʔu sâʔu dể zân ʔisơzaên sâʔu xóɲọk sâʔi tʰàɲ fitʰɔm zamsɛ zùŋ xɔtàŋ cɔ fazaôn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi zíptô kàŋ xóɲọk cừŋ nàʔɔ zân ʔisơzaên kàŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu càn za cừŋ nấʔi ŋườʔi zíptô dɛmlòŋ ɣɛŋét zân ʔisơzaên kôŋviệk ɲọkɲằn ɣâʔi cɔ dờʔi zân ấʔi kăjdắŋ nỗʔi xổsở ɲồʔi dất ɣạc mọʔi việk xák ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kák kôŋviệk nầʔi ŋườʔi zíptô zân ʔisơzaên ɲọkɲằn vwa sứ zíptô kũŋ fán kùŋ kák kủʔa zân hêbơzơ ŋườʔi siếpza ŋườʔi fu ʔa zằŋ xi kák ŋươʔi di zướk tʰaj cɔ ŋườʔi dànbà hêbơzơ tʰấʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰì hãʔi cɔ cết di kòn kɔŋáʔi tʰì hãʔi dể cɔ sốŋ ɲưŋ kák kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ tʰeo lờʔi vwa zíptô fán zặn dềʔu dể cɔ kák kɔncaj sốŋ vwa sứ zíptô dòʔi ɲữŋ fán zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi dể cɔ ɲữŋ kɔncaj sốŋ kák tâʔu zằŋ Ấʔi tạʔi ŋườʔi dànbà hêbơzơ cẳŋ fảʔi ɲư ŋườʔi dànbà zíptô mạɲxỏʔɛ dã sɛɲ cướk xi dến Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ɲữŋ zânsự za tʰêm cởnên dôŋdúk Ấʔi vậʔi kó lòŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi cɔ ɲà dượk tʰạɲ vượŋ fazaôn cwiền lịɲ cɔ kả zân mìɲ zằŋ fàm kɔncaj kủʔa zân hêbơzơ mớʔi sɛɲ hãʔi liệŋ suốŋ sôŋ kòn kɔŋáʔi tʰì dể cɔ sốŋ vả kó ŋườʔi cɔŋ lêvi di kướʔi kɔŋáʔi lêvi nàŋ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰấʔi kɔn ŋộ dɛm di ɣiấʔu cɔŋ batʰáŋ ɲưŋ ɣiấʔu lâʔu hơnnữʔa xôŋ dượk nàŋ lấʔi káʔi zươŋ mâʔi cét caj ɲựʔa tʰôŋ zồʔi dể dứʔa cẻ vàʔɔ dɛm tʰả cɔŋ dám sậʔi zựʔa sôŋ ŋườʔi cị dứʔa cẻ dứŋ sa nơʔi dó dặŋ cɔbiết zasaw vả bấʔizờ kɔŋáʔi fazaôn suốŋ sôŋ kòn kák kɔndòʔi di zạʔɔ cơʔi cên sôŋ kôŋcúʔa tʰấʔi káʔi zươŋ mâʔi dó ɣiữʔa dám sậʔi saj kɔndòʔi mìɲ di kôŋcúʔa zươŋ za tʰấʔi dứʔa cẻ dứʔa kɔncaj ɲỏ dươŋ xók dộŋlòŋ tʰươŋsót zằŋ Ấʔilà dứʔa kɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi hêbơzơ ŋườʔi cị dứʔa cẻ nóʔi kùŋ kôŋcúʔa zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi di kêʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ dànbà hêbơzơ dặŋ cɔ zứʔa cẻ cớ kôŋcúʔa dáp zằŋ hãʔi didi ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dó kêʔu kủʔa dứʔa cẻ kôŋcúʔa nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dɛm dứʔa cẻ nầʔi nuôʔi cɔ cả tiềnkôŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dànbà dứʔa cẻ cɔ xi lớnxôn zồʔi ŋườʔi zẫn vàʔɔ cɔ kôŋcúʔa nàŋ ɲận kɔn dặt môʔisɛ nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ ta dã xỏʔi nướk vả daŋ lúk dó môʔisɛ dã lớnxôn zồʔi zadi dếnkùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ sɛm tʰấʔi kôŋviệk ɲọkɲằn kủʔa kũŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi zíptô dáɲ ŋườʔi hêbơzơ cɔŋ vòŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋó kwɛɲkwất cẳŋ tʰấʔi ʔaj ɣiết ŋườʔi zíptô dɛm vùʔi cɔŋ kát kwaŋàʔi săw môʔisɛ di za nữʔa tʰấʔi haj ŋườʔi hêbơzơ dáɲlộn nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kó lỗʔi zằŋ saw ŋươʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi dồŋlɔạʔi mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dó dáp zằŋ ʔaj dặt ŋươʔi vwa kwan cɔ cúŋta kó fảʔi ɣiết ɲư dã ɣiết ŋườʔi zíptô kiə căŋ môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ cắk tʰật việk nầʔi fảʔi lậʔu zồʔi fazaôn hăj việk dó tʰì ɣiết môʔisɛ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cốn di xỏʔi fazaôn zừŋ cân tạʔi sứ madiən ŋồʔi ɣần káʔi ɣiếŋ vả tʰầʔi sứ madiən kó bảʔi kɔŋáʔi kák nàŋ dó dến ɣiếŋ sác nướk dổ dầʔi máŋ dặŋ cɔ bầʔi ciên ca mìɲ ʔuốŋ ɲưŋ kák cănciên dến duổʔi di môʔisɛ dứŋzậʔi biɲ vựk kák nàŋ dó cɔ ɲữŋ bầʔi ciên ʔuốŋ nướk xi mấʔi nàŋ cởvề ɲà zê ʔuên ca mìɲ tʰì ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ saw bữʔanăj kák kɔn vậʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ một ŋườʔi zíptô kứʔu cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi tăj cănciên kũŋ kó sác nướk ɲiềʔu kwá cɔ bầʔi ciên ʔuốŋ nữʔa ca lạʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi dó bâʔizờ dâʔu saw kák kɔn ŋườʔi di hãʔi mờʔi dến dặŋ báɲ môʔisɛ ưŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi ɣả sêfôza kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ môʔisɛ nàŋ sɛɲ kɔncaj môʔisɛ dặt ɣẹtsôn nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kiềʔu ŋụ nơʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ săw kác lâʔu vwa sứ zíptô băŋ zân ʔisơzaên tʰantʰở kêʔuvan fảʔi fụkzịc xổsở tiếŋ kêʔuvan tʰấʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tʰantʰở cúŋ ɲớ dến zawướk mìɲ kùŋ zaham ʔisák zakốp Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɔáʔi lạʔi zân ʔisơzaên ɲậnbiết kảɲŋộ kủʔa cúŋ vả môʔisɛ căn bầʔi ciên cɔ ɣiêcô ôŋza mìɲ tʰầʔi tạʔi sứ madiən zẫn bầʔi ciên kwa fíʔa kiə dồŋ vắŋ dến núʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi núʔi hôzếp tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê za kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋọn lửʔa ɣiữʔa bụʔi ɣaj kiə ŋườʔi ɲìn tʰấʔi kả bụʔi ɣaj daŋ cáʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ ta hãʔi bướk lạʔi dặŋ sɛm nầʔi kớsaw bụʔi ɣaj cẳŋ cút nàʔɔ Ðứkzê tʰấʔi ŋườʔi bướk lạʔi sɛm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiữʔa bụʔi ɣaj ɣọʔi zằŋ hỡʔimôʔi sɛ hỡʔi môʔisɛ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ cớ lạʔi ɣần cốn nầʔi hãʔi kổʔi ɣiầʔi ŋươʔi za cỗ ŋươʔi daŋ dứŋ dấttʰáɲ zồʔiŋàʔi lạʔi nóʔi ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisák Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp môʔisɛ cɛ ɲìn dến Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ta dã tʰấʔi zõzàŋ kựkxổ kủʔa zân tạʔi sứ zíptô kó ŋɛ tʰấʔu tiếŋ kêʔuzêʔu kớ ŋườʔi dốkkôŋ kủʔa fảʔi dượk nỗʔi dăwdớn kủʔa ta ŋự suốŋ dặŋ kứʔu zân nầʔi xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô zẫn sứ ấʔi dến sứ kiə dẹpdẽ zộŋzãʔi dượm sữʔa tứklà nơʔi zân kanaan zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít nầʔi tiếŋ kêʔuzêʔu kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tʰấʔu dến dã tʰấʔi zân zíptô cúŋnó tʰểnàʔɔ vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi lạʔi dâʔi dặŋ saj ŋươʔi di dến fazaôn dể zắt zân zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi ʔaj zám di dến fazaôn dặŋ zắt zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ ta kùŋ ŋươʔi nầʔi diềʔu làmzấʔu cɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ dã saj ŋươʔi di xi ŋươʔi zắt zânsự za xỏʔi sứ zíptô zồʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi fụŋsự Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi cên núʔi nầʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi di dến zân ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi saj dếnkùŋ kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu hỏʔi tênŋàʔi ci tʰì tôʔi nóʔi vớʔi làmsaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ ta Ðấŋtựhữʔuhằŋữʔu zồʔi ŋàʔi lạʔi zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvầʔi Ðấŋtựhữʔu dã saj dếnkùŋ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi nóʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisák Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp saj dếnkùŋ kák ŋươʔi Ấʔi dó zɛɲ dờʔidờʔi kủʔa ấʔi kủʔa cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi hãʔi di hộʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisák Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp dã za kùŋ fán zằŋ tʰật vậʔi dã tʰămviếŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dãʔi kák ŋươʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô dã fán zằŋ ta zút kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi kảɲ xổ tạʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ dɛm sứ kủʔa zân kanaan zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa zânsự vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên hãʔi di ʔiết vwa sứ zíptô tâʔu zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân hêbơzơ dã za kùŋ cúŋtôʔi vâʔi bâʔizờ sin dể cɔ cúŋtôʔi di dếnnơʔi dồŋ vắŋ kác cừŋ ŋàʔidườŋ dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi vả zằŋ zẫʔu lấʔi kwiềnlựk épbuộk vwa zíptô tʰì ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ bawzờ cɔ kák ŋươʔi di ɲưŋ ɣiơ tăj za hàɲ sứ zíptô bằŋ kák fép ɣiữʔa sứ dó săw zồʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi di ta cɔ zân nầʔi dượk cướkmắt ŋườʔi zíptô vậʔi xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi zadi tʰì cẳŋ zadi tăjxôŋ ɲưŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi dànbà hỏʔi sin ŋườʔi lânkận kùŋ ɲà mìɲ ɲữŋ dồ bằŋ vàŋ bằŋ bạk kwầnáʔɔ mặk lấʔi cɔ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kák ŋươʔi lộtcần zân zíptô ɲưvậʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ ɲưŋ zân dó cẳŋ cẳŋ vâŋ lờʔi tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê cẳŋ kó za kùŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu Ðứkzê fán zằŋ cɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi kầm ci tʰưʔa zằŋ một kâʔi ɣậʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi suốŋ dất di ŋườʔi suốŋ dất ɣậʔi hóʔaza kɔn zắn môʔisɛ cạʔi cốn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj ŋươʔi za duôʔi ŋườʔi ɣiơ tăj za tʰì lạʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi cɔŋ tăj Ðứkzê fán zằŋ Ấʔi dể cɔ cúŋnó zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisák Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp dã za kùŋ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi dặt tăj ŋươʔi vàʔɔ lòŋ ŋườʔi dặt vàʔɔ zồʔi lấʔi za nầʔi tăj ŋườʔi nổʔi fuŋ cắŋ ɲư twiết Ðʔɔạn ŋàʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi dặt tăj ŋươʔi vàʔɔ lòŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi dặt vàʔɔ zồʔi lấʔi za kìʔa tăj cởlạʔi ɲư tʰịt mìɲ lạʔi fán nếʔu xi nàʔɔ zân dó cẳŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa zấʔu tʰứ ɲất tʰì tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa zấʔu tʰứ ɲì vảlạʔi nếʔu zân cẳŋ kả haj zấʔu nầʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi lấʔi nướk zướʔi sôŋ cànŋập cên mặtdất nướk ŋươʔi dã lấʔi zướʔi sôŋ dó tʰàɲ máʔu cên mặtdất vậʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ Ôʔi lạʔi cúʔa hômkwa hômkiə hăjlà lúk cúʔa fán zạʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa tôʔi cẳŋ fảʔi tăj nóʔi ɣiỏʔi miệŋ lưỡʔi tôʔi hăj ŋậpŋừŋ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ʔaj tạʔɔ miệŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi za hăjlà ʔaj dã kâm diếk sáŋ kó fảʔi Ðứkzê căŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi di kùŋ miệŋ ŋươʔi zạʔi ŋươʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi fảʔi nóʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ Ôʔi lạʔi cúʔa cúʔa saj ʔaj di tʰì saj Ðứkzê nổʔizận kùŋ môʔisɛ fán zằŋ kó fảʔi ʔazôn ŋườʔi lêvi ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi căŋ ta ŋườʔi dó kó tàʔi nóʔi ɣiỏʔi kìʔa ŋườʔi daŋ di dến dón ŋươʔi kìʔa xi tʰấʔi ŋươʔi cắk vuimừŋ cɔŋ lòŋ vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dể ɲữŋ lờʔi cɔŋ miệŋ ŋườʔi xi haj ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ miệŋ ŋươʔi miệŋ ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi zạʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu ɣì fảʔi Ấʔilà ŋườʔi dó nóʔi kùŋzân sựtʰế cɔ ŋươʔi zùŋ miệŋ ŋươʔi kòn ŋươʔi zườŋɲư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋườʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kầm lấʔi ɣậʔi nầʔi nơʔi tăj dể zùŋ kák zấʔu môʔisɛ di cởvề ɣiêcô ôŋza mìɲ tʰưʔa zằŋ sin ca hãʔi cɔ tôʔi cởvề nơʔi ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ tʰăm tʰử kòn sốŋ căŋ ɣiêcô nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kɔn hãʔi di bìɲiên vả Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi madiən zằŋ hãʔi cởvề sứ zíptô mấʔi ŋườʔi ɣiết ŋươʔi dã cết zồʔi môʔisɛ dỡ kɔn mìɲ lưŋ lừʔa cởvề sứ zíptô ŋườʔi kũŋ kầm kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰeo cɔŋ tăj Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ xi cởvề sứ zíptô hãʔi kẩntʰận kák zấʔu kủʔa dã zaw nơʔi tăj ŋươʔi cướk fazaôn ɲưŋ xiến ŋườʔi kứŋ lòŋ cẳŋ cɔ zânsự di vậʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi ʔisơzaên kɔn tứk cưởŋnam kó fán kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ kɔn di dể fụŋsự ŋươʔi dã từcốʔi xôŋ cɔ di nầʔi ɣiết kɔncaj ŋươʔi kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ŋươʔi vả daŋ xi di dườŋ Ðứkzê za cướk môʔisɛ nơʔi ɲà kwán tʰế ɣiết ŋườʔi di sêfôza lấʔi kɔn zaw bằŋ dá kắt zươŋ kủʔa kɔn mìɲ kwăŋ zướʔi cân môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ tʰật càŋ hwiết laŋ cɔ tôʔi Ðứkzê tʰa cồŋ nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ hwiết laŋ kớ fép kắt Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi di dến dồŋ vắŋ dónzướk môʔisɛ ʔazôn di ɣặp môʔisɛ tạʔi núʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi môʔisɛ tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ʔazôn mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê saj mìɲ cwiền kák zấʔu ŋàʔi dã zạʔi mìɲ vậʔi môʔisɛ di kùŋ ʔazôn ɲóm lạʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zân ʔisơzaên ʔazôn tʰuật kák lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ɲữŋ zấʔu cướk zânsự cúŋ hiểʔu zằŋ Ðứkzê dã tʰămviếŋ zân ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi diềʔu kựkxổ kủʔa mìɲ cúŋ kúʔi dầʔu tʰờ lạʔi kế săw môʔisɛ ʔazôn dến tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi cɔ zân di dặŋ ɣiữ cɔ tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ ɲưŋfa zaôn dáp zằŋ ɣiêhôva ʔaj cẫm fảʔi vâŋ lờʔi ŋườʔi dể cɔ zân ʔisơzaên di cẫm cẳŋ ɣiêhôva nàʔɔ kũŋ cẳŋ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dinữʔa môʔisɛ ʔazôn tâʔu zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân hêbơzơ dã dếnkùŋ cúŋtôʔi sin hãʔi cɔfép cúŋtôʔi di vàʔɔ nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ kác cừŋ ŋàʔidườŋ dặŋ zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kẻʔɔ ŋàʔi xiến bịɲ zịc hăj việk ɣươm zaw hàɲ cúŋtôʔi căŋ vwa sứ zíptô fán zằŋ hỡʔimôʔi sɛ ʔazôn saw kák ŋươʔi suj cɔ zâncúŋ kôŋviệk ɲưvậʔi hãʔi di kôŋviệk mìɲ di fazaôn lạʔi fán zằŋ kìʔa zânsự cɔŋ sứ bâʔizờ dôŋdúk kwá haj ŋườʔilàm cɔ cúŋnó fảʔi ŋỉviệk cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó fazaôn cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák dốk zịc fáʔiviên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dừŋ fát zơm cɔ zânsự ɣạc ɲư lúk cướk nữʔa cúŋnó fảʔi di ɣóp lấʔi ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣạc ʔiɲư kũ cớ cừ ci kả biếŋɲák lấʔi kớ dồŋ kêʔu zằŋ hè di zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta hãʔi ɣán kôŋviệk nặŋ cɔ cúŋnó hầʔu cɔ cúŋnó mắkkôŋ việk cẳŋ siêʔu lờʔi ɣiảzốʔi nữʔa kák dốk zịc fáʔiviên za nóʔi kùŋ zâncúŋ zằŋ fazaôn kó fán ɲưvầʔi ta cẳŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi zơm nữʔa hãʔi di lấʔi zơm dâʔu di sɔŋ cẳŋ cừ kôŋviệk kák ŋươʔi cút nàʔɔ bấʔizờ zâncúŋ di zảʔi xắp sứ zíptô dặŋ ɣóp ɣốk zạ tʰế cɔ zơm kák dốk zịc lạʔi hốʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔsɔŋ fần việk kák ŋươʔi ʔi kốdịɲ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ cɔzồʔi ŋàʔi nấʔi kũŋɲư xi kó fát zơm ɲữŋ fáʔiviên cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên kák dốk zịc kủʔa fazaôn dã cên zân dó dáɲ kwở zằŋ saw hômkwa ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ sɔŋ fần dịɲ việk mìɲ ɣạc ʔiɲư cướk kák fáʔiviên kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên dến kêʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ saw dãʔi tôʔitớ ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔita cẳŋ fát zơm cɔ lạʔi kứ biểʔu cúŋtôʔi zằŋ hãʔi ɣạc di nầʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa dâʔi dòn lỗʔi tạʔi zân kủʔa ɲưŋ vwa dáp zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dồ biếŋɲák dồ biếŋɲák bởʔi kớ dó nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ hè di Ðứkzê vậʔi bâʔizờ kứ di làmviệk di ŋườʔita cẳŋ fát zơm cɔ dâʔu ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣạc cɔ dủ vậʔi kák fáʔiviên kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên lấʔilàm bốʔizốʔi ŋườʔita kó nóʔi kùŋ mìɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ dượk cừ ɣạc dã dịɲ cɔ mìɲ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ zồʔi ŋàʔi nấʔi xi luj za xỏʔi fazaôn tʰì ɣặp môʔisɛ ʔazôn dợʔi tạʔi dó nóʔi zằŋ haj ŋươʔi dã cɔ cúŋtôʔi za mùʔi hôʔihám cướk fazaôn kwầntʰần caw tʰɛɲ ɣươm vàʔɔ tăj dặŋ ɣiết cúŋtôʔi kầʔusin Ðứkzê sɛmsét sử dɔán haj ŋươʔi môʔisɛ cởvề kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰưʔa zằŋ lạʔicúʔa saw cúʔa dã hạʔi cɔ zânsự nầʔi cúʔa saj tôʔi dến ci từ xi tôʔi di ʔiếtkiến fazaôn dặŋ ɲânzɛɲ cúʔa nóʔi tʰì ŋườʔi lạʔi ŋượkdãʔi zân nầʔi cúʔa cẳŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu zân kủʔa cúʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ bâʔizờ ŋươʔi hãʔi sɛm ɲữŋ diềʔu hàɲ fazaôn ɲờ tăj kwiềnnăŋ épbuộk vwa dó tʰa duổʔi zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ta Ðứkzê ta dã za kùŋ zaham kùŋ ʔisák kùŋ zakốp mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ sɔŋ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva tʰì cưʔa cɔ ta kũŋ kó zawướk kùŋ dể sứ kanaan cɔ sứ dã kiềʔu ŋụ ɲư xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ ta kũŋ kó ŋɛ lờʔi tʰantʰở kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi zíptô tôʔimọʔi ɲớ lạʔi zawướk kủʔa vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ta Ðứkzê zút kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi ɣáɲ nặŋ ŋườʔi zíptô dã ɣán cɔ kùŋ ɣiảʔitʰɔát xỏʔi vòŋ tôʔimọʔi ɣiơ tʰẳŋtăj za zùŋ dɔán fạt nặŋ cuộk kák ŋươʔi ta ɲận kák ŋươʔi zân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dã zút kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi ɣáɲ nặŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô ta zắt kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ dã tʰề cɔ zaham cɔ ʔisák cɔ zakốp cɔ kák ŋươʔi sứ dó kơŋiệp ta Ðứkzê môʔisɛ nóʔi lạʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ sầʔunãʔɔ việk tôʔimọʔi nặŋnề cẳŋ ŋɛ môʔisɛ cút nàʔɔ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi di tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô fảʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ mìɲ ɲưŋmôʔi sɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi vụŋ miệŋ zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi fazaôn xứŋ ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi saw Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn cwiền cɔ haj ŋườʔi fảʔi di dến zân ʔisơzaên fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô dặŋ dɛm zân dó za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðâʔi kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ họhàŋ zân ʔisơzaên kák kɔncaj kủʔa zubên tứklà cưởŋnam ʔisơzaên hênók falu hếcôn kạtmi ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa zubên kák kɔncaj kủʔa simêôn ɣiêmuên zamin zakin sôha săwlơ kɔn kủʔa sứ kanaan họhàŋ kủʔa simêôn Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa lêvi tùʔi tʰeo zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ɣẹtsôn kêhát mêzazi lêvi hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi bảʔi tuổʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɣẹtsôn tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ lípni simê ʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa kêhát ʔamzam zítsêha hếpzôn ʔusiên kêhát hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi tuổʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa mêzazi mácli musi kák họhàŋ kủʔa lêvi tùʔi tʰeo zòŋzõʔi kủʔa vả ʔamzam lấʔi ɣiôkêbết kômìɲ nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔazôn môʔisɛ ʔamzam hưởŋtʰọ dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi bảʔi tuổʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa zítsêha kôzê nêfết siếkzi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusiên misaên ʔɛânsafan síci ʔazôn kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔaminadáp ʔɛm kủʔa nahasôn nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi nadáp ʔabihu lêʔasa ʔitʰama kák kɔncaj kủʔa kôzê ʔɛânkana ʔabiəsáp kák họhàŋ kủʔa zân kôzê lêʔasa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔazôn kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa futiên nàŋ sɛɲ finê ʔa cɔ ŋườʔi kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲà tổfụ ŋườʔi lêvi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ vậʔi Ấʔi ʔazôn môʔisɛ nầʔi tứklà ŋườʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zạʔi zằŋ hãʔi tùʔi tʰeo kơ dộʔi dɛm zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ấʔilà haj ŋườʔi tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô dặŋ dɛm zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ dó ấʔilà môʔisɛ ʔazôn nầʔi vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi sứ zíptô tʰì ŋàʔi kó cwiền zằŋ ta Ðứkzê hãʔi tâʔu lạʔi kùŋ fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô hếttʰảʔi mọʔi lờʔi fán kùŋ ŋươʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi ŋườʔi vụŋ miệŋ fazaôn ŋɛ tôʔi saw Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi sɛm ŋươʔi ɲưlà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ fazaôn kòn ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi tiênci kủʔa ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi lạʔi mọʔi lờʔi cwiền zạʔi ŋươʔi zồʔi ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn dặŋ ŋườʔi tʰả zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ mìɲ ta cɔ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu zấʔu fép kủʔa cɔŋ sứ zíptô ɲưŋfa zaôn cẳŋ ŋɛ kák ŋươʔi dâʔu ca tăj vàʔɔ dất zíptô zùŋ ɲữŋ dɔán fạt nằŋ dặŋ zút xỏʔi sứ dó kák kwândộʔi zân ʔisơzaên xi nàʔɔ ca tăj vàʔɔ sứ zíptô zút zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi ɣiữʔa vòŋ ŋườʔi zíptô tʰì Ðứkzê môʔisɛ ʔazôn ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn vả xi haj ŋườʔi tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn tʰì môʔisɛ tuổʔi dã dượk mươʔi kòn ʔazôn mươʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ xi nàʔɔ fazaôn cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi làmfép di tʰì ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa ʔɛɲ liệŋ cướk fazaôn ɣậʔi hóʔa tʰàɲ kɔn zắn vậʔi môʔisɛ fazaôn dếnkùŋ fazaôn ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ʔazôn liệŋ kâʔi ɣậʔi mìɲ cướk fazaôn kwầntʰần ɣậʔi hóʔa tʰàɲ kɔn zắn kònfa zaôn dòʔi kák báksĩ tʰầʔi fùcú ɲữŋ tʰuật zíptô fần kũŋ kậʔi fép fùcú mìɲ ɣiốŋ ʔin ɲưvậʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi liệŋ ɣậʔi mìɲ hóʔa tʰàɲ zắn ɲưŋ ɣậʔi kủʔa ʔazôn kák ɣậʔi kủʔa tʰếmà lòŋ fazaôn kứŋkỏʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ môʔisɛ ʔazôn ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ fazaôn dã zắn lòŋ từcốʔi xôŋ dể cɔ zânsự di sớmmaj fazaôn ŋự za sôŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi zamắt ŋườʔi kầm tʰeo tăj kâʔi ɣậʔi dã za kɔn zắn dó ŋươʔi hãʔi tâʔu zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân hêbơzơ saj tôʔi dến ɣần dặŋ tâʔu zằŋ hãʔi tʰa cɔ zân di dể cúŋnó hầʔu việk cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ dến bâʔizờ ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ cút nàʔɔ Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi vì việk nầʔi ŋươʔi Ðứkzê nầʔi lấʔi ɣậʔi cɔŋ tăj dập nướk zướʔi sôŋ nướk cởnên hwiết ká zướʔi sôŋ cết sôŋ hôʔi tʰúʔi di ŋườʔi zíptô ʔuốŋ nướk sôŋ lấʔilàm ɣêɣớm Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ʔazôn zằŋ kầm lấʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi ʔɛɲ ɣiơ tăj za cên nướk sứ zíptô cên zạc sôŋ bàʔu xắp mọʔi nơʔi kó nướk cɔŋ sứ hầʔu cɔ nướk hóʔa tʰàɲ hwiết kả sứ zíptô cɔŋ ɲữŋ bìɲ cứʔa nướk bằŋ ɣỗ bằŋ dá dềʔu kó hwiết hếttʰảʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã zặn mìɲ cướk fazaôn kwầntʰần ʔazôn ɣiơ ɣậʔi dập nướk sôŋ hếttʰảʔi nướk sôŋ hóʔa tʰàɲ hwiết ká zướʔi sôŋ cết nướk sôŋ hôʔi tʰúʔi ŋườʔi zíptô xôŋtʰể ʔuốŋ dượk vậʔi hwiết xắp kả sứ zíptô sɔŋ kák tʰuậtsĩ kậʔi fùcú mìɲ kũŋ dượk ɲưvậʔi lòŋ fazaôn kứŋkỏʔi xôŋ ŋɛ môʔisɛ ʔazôn cút nàʔɔ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán fazaôn sâʔi divề dền mìɲ lòŋ cẳŋ dể mấʔi diềʔu dó cút nàʔɔ vả hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zíptô ʔuốŋ nướk sôŋ cẳŋ dượk dàʔɔ suŋkwɛɲ sôŋ nướk ʔuốŋ săw xi Ðứkzê dập sôŋ tʰì dượk bảʔi ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi di zamắt fazaôn tâʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi tʰa cɔ zân di dể cúŋnó hầʔu việk nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰa cɔ di nầʔi ɣiáŋ tainạn ếcɲáʔi xắp bờkõʔi ŋươʔi sôŋ sɛɲ dôŋdúk ếcɲáʔi vàʔɔ kuŋdiện fòŋ ŋủ cên ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ɲà dầʔitớ zânsự ŋươʔi cɔŋ kùŋ nơʔi ɲồʔi báɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi Ếcɲáʔi mìɲ ŋươʔi mìɲ zânsự mọʔi dầʔitớ ŋươʔi vậʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi kầm ɣậʔi ɣiơ tăj za cên zạc cên sôŋ cên bàʔu xiến ếcɲáʔi càn sứ zíptô ʔazôn ɣiơ tăj mìɲ cên kák sôŋzạc sứ zíptô ếcɲáʔi xắp sứ kák tʰuậtsĩ kũŋ kậʔi fùcú mìɲ ʔi ɲưvậʔi dặŋ xiến ếcɲáʔi sứ zíptô fazaôn dòʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn fán zằŋ hãʔi kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê dể ŋàʔi xiến ếcɲáʔi kác sa zânsự tʰì tʰa zân hêbơzơ di Ðứkzê môʔisɛ tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ sin hãʔi dịɲ cừŋ nàʔɔ tôʔi fảʔi dầʔitớ kùŋzân kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê dể cừ ếcɲáʔi lìʔa xỏʔi kuŋdiện cỉ kòn zướʔi sôŋ tʰôʔi vwa dáp zằŋ ŋàʔimaj môʔisɛ zằŋ sẽ ʔi tʰeo lờʔi hầʔu cɔ zằŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi vậʔi ếcɲáʔi lìʔa sa kuŋdiện tôʔitớ kùŋzân kủʔa cỉ kòn lạʔi zướʔi sôŋ tʰôʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn luj za xỏʔi fazaôn môʔisɛ kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê việk ếcɲáʔi ŋàʔi dã xiến dến cɔ fazaôn Ðứkzê ʔi tʰeo lờʔi môʔisɛ ếcɲáʔi cɔŋ ɲà cɔŋ làŋ ŋɔàʔi dồŋdềʔu cết ŋườʔita zồn ếcɲáʔi lạʔi dốŋ kả sứ hôʔi tʰúʔi ɲưŋfa zaôn tʰấʔi dượk xỏʔi zắn lòŋ cẳŋ ŋɛ môʔisɛ ʔazôn cút nàʔɔ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ ɣậʔi ʔɛɲ za dập bụʔi cên dất bụʔi hóʔa muỗʔi xắp kả sứ zíptô haj ŋườʔilàm ʔi ɲưvậʔi ʔazôn kầm ɣậʔi ɣiơ tăj za dập bụʔi cên dất bụʔi hóʔa tʰàɲ muỗʔi ŋườʔi súkvật hếttʰảʔi bụʔi dềʔu hóʔa tʰàɲ muỗʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô kák tʰuậtsĩ kũŋ kậʔi fùcú mìɲ ɲưvậʔi dể hóʔa sɛɲ muỗʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ dặŋ vậʔi muỗʔi ŋườʔi súkvật kák tʰuậtsĩ tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ Ấʔilà ŋóntăj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưŋ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ cẳŋ ŋɛ môʔisɛ ʔazôn cút nàʔɔ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán kế dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔifa zaôn ŋự za sôŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi zậʔi di zamắt ŋườʔi tâʔu zằŋ Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi tʰa cɔ zân di dể cúŋnó hầʔu việk vì nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ cɔ di nầʔi saj zuồʔi mòŋ nơʔi ŋươʔi kwầntʰần zânsự kuŋdiện ŋươʔi ɲà kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô dềʔu zuồʔi mòŋ dầʔi xắp cên dất nữʔa ɲưŋ ŋàʔi dó fân biệtsứ ɣôsɛn za nơʔi zân xôŋ kó zuồʔi mòŋ hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva kó ɣiữʔa sứ ta fânbiệt zân kùŋzân ŋươʔi maj zấʔu nầʔi kó Ðứkzê ʔiɲư lờʔi vậʔi cɔŋ kuŋdiện fazaôn ɲàkửʔa kủʔa kwầntʰần ŋườʔi kùŋ kả sứ zíptô dềʔu kó zuồʔi mòŋ dất zuồʔi mòŋ hủʔihɔạʔi fazaôn dòʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn fán zằŋ hãʔi di zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ɲưŋmôʔi sɛ tâʔu zằŋ làm ɲưvậʔi cẳŋ kák kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi diềʔu ɣớmɣê cɔ ŋườʔi zíptô nếʔu cúŋtôʔi zâŋ kủʔa ɣớmɣê cướkmắt ŋườʔi zíptô cẳŋ liệŋ dá cúŋtôʔi saw cúŋtôʔi di cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cừŋ ŋàʔidườŋ zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi cỉbảʔɔ fazaôn fán zằŋ ta tʰa kák ŋươʔi di zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ ɲưŋ dừŋ di sa hãʔi kầʔuŋwiện cɔ vớʔi môʔisɛ tâʔu zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi luj za xỏʔi kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê cɔ ŋàʔimaj zuồʔi mòŋ lìʔa sa fazaôn kwầntʰần zânsự ŋườʔi ɲưŋ sin fazaôn cớ kứ ɣạt cúŋtôʔi xôŋ tʰa zânsự di zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê môʔisɛ luj za xỏʔi fazaôn kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi môʔisɛ zuồʔi mòŋ lìʔa sa fazaôn kwầntʰần zânsự ŋườʔi xôŋ kòn lạʔi kɔn nàʔɔ ɲưŋ nầʔi fazaôn lạʔi kứŋ lòŋ nữʔa xôŋ cɔ zânsự di Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi di zamắt fazaôn tâʔu zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân hêbơzơ kó fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi tʰa zân di dặŋ cúŋnó hầʔu việk nếʔu ŋươʔi từcốʔi xôŋ tʰa di kòn kầm lạʔinữʔa nầʔi tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê ca vàʔɔ kák súkvật kủʔa ŋườʔiŋɔàʔi dồŋ vàʔɔ ŋựʔa lừʔa lạkdà ciên kó zịclệ zất Ðứkzê fânbiệt súkvật kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên kùŋ súkvật kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô cẳŋ kó kɔn nàʔɔ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cết Ðứkzê dịɲkỳ zằŋ maj Ðứkzê dó tạʔi cɔŋ sứ vừʔa dến maj Ðứkzê dó hếttʰảʔi súkvật kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô dềʔu cết ɲưŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ cết kɔn nàʔɔ fazaôn saj ŋườʔi di sét tʰấʔi cẳŋ kó kɔn súkvật nàʔɔ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cết ɲưŋfa zaôn zắn lòŋ cẳŋ cɔ zânsự di Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi cɔŋ cɔŋ dầʔi tăj kák ŋươʔi zồʔi tạʔi cướk fazaôn môʔisɛ vảʔi cɔ dó cờʔi cɔ hóʔa tʰàɲ bụʔi xắp kả sứ zíptô sɛɲ ɲiềʔu ɣẻ cốk kươŋ cên mìɲ ŋườʔi súkvật cɔŋ xắp kả sứ zíptô vậʔi haj ŋườʔi cɔ cɔŋ dứŋ cướk fazaôn zồʔi môʔisɛ vảʔi cɔ cờʔi tʰì sɛɲ za ɣẻ cốk kươŋ cên mìɲ ŋườʔita súkvật kák tʰuậtsĩ dứŋ cướk môʔisɛ xôŋ dượk kớ ɣẻ cốk dã sɛɲ cên mìɲ kák tʰuậtsĩ ɲư cên mìɲ kủʔa hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zíptô Ðứkzê cɔ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ xôŋ ŋɛ môʔisɛ ʔazôn cút nàʔɔ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰứkzậʔi zamắt fazaôn tâʔu zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân hêbơzơ kó fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi tʰa zân di dể cúŋnó hầʔu việk nầʔi ɣiáŋ kák tainạn cɔ lòŋ ŋươʔi kwầntʰần zânsự ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ xắp tʰếzan cẳŋ kó ʔaj bằŋ nếʔu bâʔizờ dã ɣiơ tăj za hàɲ hạʔi ŋươʔi bịɲ zịc tʰì ŋươʔi kùŋzân ŋươʔi dềʔu dã ziệt xỏʔi dất zồʔi ɲưŋ kớ nầʔi dể ŋươʔi kòn sốŋ cɔ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa hầʔu cɔ zɛɲ dồn xắp kả tʰiêɲạ nếʔu ŋươʔi kòn kảncở xôŋ dể cɔ zân di tʰì maj tạʔi ɣiờ nầʔi dám mưʔadá dến dỗʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô xi xajsáŋ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ kó dám mưʔa nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì bâʔizờ hãʔi saj dɛm lụksúk mọʔi tʰuộk ŋươʔi ŋɔàʔi dồŋ vàʔɔ cɔ xỏʔi hiểmŋèʔɔ mưʔadá zớt suốŋ cên mọʔi ŋườʔi daŋ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ xôŋ vàʔɔ ɲà tʰì cết ɲữŋ nàʔɔ cɔŋ kwầntʰần fazaôn kó lòŋ kíɲ lờʔi Ðứkzê lậtdật zút dầʔitớ súkvật mìɲ ɲà kòn nàʔɔ cẳŋ cúý lờʔi Ðứkzê tʰì dể dầʔitớ súkvật mìɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj ŋươʔi cờʔi mưʔadá zớt suốŋ cên kả sứ zíptô cên mìɲ ŋườʔi súkvật xắp zăwkỏ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ môʔisɛ ɣiơ ɣậʔi mìɲ cờʔi Ðứkzê cɔ dộŋ mưʔadá lửʔa cạʔi cên mặtdất vậʔi Ðứkzê xiến mưʔadá cên sứ zíptô vả kó mưʔadá suốŋ lửʔa cáʔi zất mạɲ fa vớʔi dếnnỗʔi xi sứ zíptô lậpkwốk dến ɣiờ cẳŋ kó ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì cɔŋ kả sứ zíptô mưʔadá hạʔi mọʔi ŋɔàʔi dồŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔita nàʔɔ súkvật nàʔɔ zăw kỏ ɣãʔi kâʔicốʔi nữʔa cỉ dất ɣôsɛn nơʔi zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó mưʔadá tʰôʔi fazaôn cwiền dòʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn fán zằŋ lần nầʔi cẫm dã fạmtộʔi Ðứkzê kôŋbìɲ cẫm kùŋzân cẫm fạmtộʔi hãʔi kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ mưʔadá zồʔi cẫm tʰa kák ŋươʔi di xôŋ dợʔi lâʔu nữʔa dâʔu môʔisɛ dáp zằŋ vừʔa xi tôʔi za xỏʔi tʰàɲ tôʔi ɣiơ tăj Ðứkzê lặŋ mưʔadá hầʔu cɔ zằŋ cáʔidất tʰuộk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ tôʔi zằŋ kwầntʰần cưʔa kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vả cɔŋ lúk dó lúʔamạc cổ bôŋ kâʔi ɣaj kó hwa lúʔamạc ɣaj dập kòn lúʔamì tiểʔumạc cổ xôŋ dập vậʔi môʔisɛ luj xỏʔi fazaôn di za tʰàɲ ɣiơ tăj Ðứkzê mưʔadá tạɲ mưʔa ŋớt cên mặtdất xifa zaôn tʰấʔi mưʔa mưʔadá dã tạɲ zồʔi ŋườʔi kwầntʰần lạʔi zắn lòŋ kứ fạmtộʔi nữʔa vậʔifa zaôn kứŋ lòŋ xôŋ tʰa zân ʔisơzaên di ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ fán Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi di dến fazaôn dã zắn lòŋ ŋườʔi lòŋ kwầntʰần dể cɔ kák zấʔu kủʔa za ɣiữʔa hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi tʰuật kùŋ kɔn cáʔu mìɲ ɲữŋ kôŋviệk tɔtát dã cên zân zíptô kák zấʔu dã ɣiữʔa vòŋ dặŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê môʔisɛ ʔazôn di dến fazaôn tâʔu zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zân hêbơzơ kó fán ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ cịʔu hạmìɲ cướk cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ hãʔi tʰa zân di dể cúŋnó hầʔu việk nếʔu từcốʔi xôŋ cɔ zân di nầʔi ŋàʔimaj saj kàʔɔkàʔɔ dến dịʔafận ŋươʔi fủ zợp cên mặtdất ŋườʔita cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi dất nữʔa kắn sả ɲữŋ ci kòn lạʔi tứk nàʔɔ cận mưʔadá kòn cừʔa lạʔi kũŋ kắn sả ɲữŋ kâʔi mọk ŋɔàʔi dồŋzuộŋ kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ dầʔi kuŋdiện ŋươʔi ziɲ tʰất kủʔa kwầntʰần ŋươʔi ɲàkửʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô ấʔilà diềʔu tổfụ ŋươʔi dếnnỗʔi tʰỉ ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ bawzờ tʰấʔi xi dã kó cên mặtdất cɔdến ŋàʔinăj Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ sâʔi luj za xỏʔi fazaôn kwầntʰần fazaôn tâʔu zằŋ cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi mớʔi tʰôʔi ɣàʔi bẫʔi hãʔi tʰa zân ấʔi di dể cúŋnó hầʔu việk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó bệhạ cưʔa zằŋ nướk zíptô dã ŋwivɔŋ saw họ cwiền dòʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn cởlạʔi kùŋ fazaôn ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi di hầʔu việk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋaj ŋườʔi fảʔi di môʔisɛ tâʔu zằŋ cúŋtôʔi di dɛm namfụlãʔɔấʔu ciên tʰeo fần cúŋtôʔi ấʔilà kủʔa Ðứkzê fazaôn nóʔi zằŋ kầʔusin Ðứkzê kùŋ kák ŋươʔi hồzễ cɔ kák ŋươʔi kùŋ kɔnkáʔi dềʔu di saw xôŋ kwảtʰật xôŋ cɔ dâʔu kák ŋươʔi kó mưʔu ák xôŋ dượk vậʔi dâʔu cỉ kák ŋươʔi dànôŋ fảʔi di hầʔu việk Ðứkzê diềʔu kák ŋươʔi dã sin Ðʔɔạn duổʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn xỏʔi cướk fazaôn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj ŋươʔi za cên sứ zíptô dặŋ xiến kàʔɔkàʔɔ càn sứ dó kắn sả zăwkỏ mọʔi ci cên dất mưʔadá kòn cừʔa lạʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ ɣiơ ɣậʔi mìɲ za cên sứ zíptô tʰì Ðứkzê zẫn ŋọn ɣió dôŋ tʰổʔi cên sứ sòŋ ŋàʔi dêm dó kwa sáŋmaj ɣió dôŋ dã zẫn kàʔɔkàʔɔ dến kàʔɔkàʔɔ càn xắp kả sứ zíptô suốŋ cɔŋ dịʔahạt sứ ấʔi ɲiềʔu cướkkiə cẳŋ bawzờ kó bằŋ dó săw nầʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó bằŋ ɲưvậʔi kàʔɔkàʔɔ bawfủ xắp mặtdất kủʔa kả sứ sứ tʰàɲza tốʔităm kắn sả kák zăwkỏ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kùŋ cáʔicâʔi mưʔadá kòn cừʔa lạʔi cɔŋ xắp sứ zíptô cẳŋ kòn cút sɛɲtươʔi ci cɔ kâʔicốʔi hăjlà cɔ kỏ zăw ŋɔàʔi dồŋzuộŋ nữʔa fazaôn vộʔi dòʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn dến fán zằŋ cẫm dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi nữʔa ɲưŋ bâʔizờ sin sá tộʔi cɔ cẫm nầʔi hãʔi kầʔu ɣiùm ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ítnữʔa ŋàʔi xiến sa cẫm káʔi cết nầʔi môʔisɛ luj za xỏʔi fazaôn xẩn ŋwiện Ðứkzê Ðứkzê zẫn ŋọn ɣió tâʔi dến zất mạɲ dɛm kàʔɔkàʔɔ di duổʔi suốŋ biển dỏ xắp dịʔahạt zíptô cẳŋ kòn kɔn kàʔɔkàʔɔ nàʔɔ ɲưŋÐứkzê cɔ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰa zân ʔisơzaên di Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj ŋươʔi cờʔi hầʔu cɔ cên sứ zíptô kó tốʔităm zàʔi dếnnỗʔi ŋườʔita zờ dụŋ dến dượk vậʔi môʔisɛ ɣiơ tăj mìɲ cờʔi kó tốʔităm zất zàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰấʔi ɲăw dượk xôŋ ʔaj ɲớm xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ dượk ɲưŋ cɔŋ cốn zân ʔisơzaên tʰìkó áɲsáŋ cɔ fazaôn dòʔi môʔisɛ fán zằŋ hãʔi di hầʔu việk Ðứkzê kɔncẻ kák ŋươʔi di tʰeo nữʔa cỉ bầʔi ciên lạʔi tʰôʔi ɲưŋmôʔi sɛ tâʔu zằŋ cíɲ hãʔi kấp cɔ cúŋtôʔi kák kɔn siɲ cizùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dể zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kák bầʔi lụksúk tʰeo cúŋtôʔi nữʔa xôŋ kòn dể lạʔi móŋ cân nàʔɔ cúŋtôʔi zùŋ mấʔi kɔn tʰú dó hầʔu việk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi cizùŋ dể tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkzê cỉ xi nàʔɔ dếnnơʔi dó ɲưŋÐứkzê cɔ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ nênŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên di fazaôn nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi luj za xỏʔi cɔ zảɲ xá ɣiữmìɲ dừŋ tʰấʔi nữʔa ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi tʰì cết môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ bệhạ nóʔi fảʔi tôʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi nữʔa dâʔu vả Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ta ɣiáŋ cɔ fazaôn sứ zíptô tajvạ nữʔa dɔạn ŋườʔi tʰa kák ŋươʔi di xỏʔi dâʔi xi ŋườʔi dịɲ tʰa di tʰì duổʔi kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi dâʔi vậʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân zặn zằŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi hăj fảʔi sin lânkận mìɲ ɲữŋ dồ bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ Ðứkzê cɔ zânsự dượk cướk ŋườʔi zíptô môʔisɛ kũŋ ŋườʔi zất tôncọŋ cɔŋ sứ zíptô cướkmắt kwầntʰần kủʔa fazaôn cướkmắt zân ấʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi cừŋ ɣiữʔa dêm za tuầɲàɲ sứ zíptô hếttʰảʔi kɔn cưởŋnam cɔŋ sứ zíptô cết tʰáʔitử kủʔa fazaôn ŋồʔi cên ŋaj mìɲ cɔdến kɔnkả kủʔa ŋườʔi dòʔi săw kốʔi mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa súkvật nữʔa cɔŋ kả sứ zíptô kótiếŋ kêʔula ʔiɲỏʔi cɔdến dỗʔi cưʔa kó kũŋ cẳŋ bawzờ kó ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi nữʔa ɲưŋ cɔŋ kả zân ʔisơzaên zầʔu dến kɔn có kũŋ cẳŋ sủʔa hɔặk ŋườʔi hɔặk hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fânbiệt zân ʔisơzaên kùŋ ŋườʔi zíptô zườŋ nàʔɔ nầʔi kwầntʰần kủʔa suốŋ kùŋ tôʔi mìɲ cướk tôʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kả zânsự tʰeo ŋươʔi hãʔi didi Ðʔɔạn tôʔi di za môʔisɛ luj za xỏʔi fazaôn lấʔilàm ɣiận vả Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ fazaôn cẳŋ xứŋ ŋɛ ŋươʔi dâʔu hầʔu cɔ kák zấʔu tʰêm cɔŋ sứ zíptô môʔisɛ ʔazôn kák zấʔu cướk fazaôn ɲưŋ Ðứkzê cɔ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ nênŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰa zân ʔisơzaên di xỏʔi sứ mìɲ tạʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ tʰáŋ nầʔi dịɲ tʰáŋ dầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi tứklà tʰáŋzêŋ cɔŋ kwɛɲnăm hãʔi nóʔi cɔ tɔàn hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ ŋàʔi mồŋ mườʔi tʰáŋ nầʔi mỗʔi zɛcưởŋ tùʔi tʰeo ɲà mìɲ fảʔi kɔnciên kɔn nếʔu ɲà ŋườʔi kwá ănxôŋ ciên kɔn hãʔi cuŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi zất lânkận mìɲ tùʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi hãʔi tíɲ cɔ mỗʔi ciên kɔn tùʔi sứk ŋườʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi hɔặk cɔŋ bầʔi ciên hɔặk cɔŋ bầʔi zê ciên kɔn dựk hăjlà zê kɔn dựk tuổʔi ɣiáp cẳŋ ci dɔạn dểzàɲ cɔdến ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋ nầʔi zồʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ɣiết vàʔɔ lốʔi ciềʔutốʔi họ lấʔi hwiết dɛm bôʔi cên haj kâʔi kột màʔi kửʔa kủʔa ɲà nàʔɔ tʰịt ciên kɔn dó ấʔi tʰịt ciên kwăj vớʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn zăw dắŋ cớ tʰịt nửʔa cín nửʔa sốŋ hăjlà luộk cɔŋ nướk ɲưŋ fảʔi kwăj cên lửʔa kả dầʔu ɣiò vớʔi lòŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ dể ci kòn lạʔi dến sáŋmaj nếʔu kòn lạʔi hãʔi tʰiêʔu di vậʔi tʰịt dó fảʔi ɲưvầʔi zâʔilưŋ kột cân maŋ ɣiàʔi tăikầm ɣậʔi hốʔihả ấʔilà vượtkwa kủʔa Ðứkzê dó di kwa sứ zíptô hàɲ hạʔi mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ sứ zíptô ŋườʔita cɔdến súkvật sétdɔán kák tʰần kủʔa sứ zíptô Ðứkzê hwiết bôʔi cên ɲà kák ŋươʔi zùŋ zấʔuhiệʔu xi hàɲ hạʔi sứ zíptô tʰấʔi hwiết dó tʰì kwa cẳŋ kó tainạn hủʔiziệt kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣi ŋàʔi dó cảʔi kák dờʔi hãʔi ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê tứklà za dờʔidờʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi fảʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn vừʔa dến ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲất hãʔi zẹp mɛn xỏʔi ɲà di ʔaj báɲ kó mɛn ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲất cɔdến ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰì cuất za xỏʔi ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲất kó ɲóm tʰáɲ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kák ŋươʔi kũŋ kó ɲóm tʰáɲ nữʔa cɔŋ mấʔi ŋàʔi dó cẳŋ kôŋviệk ci cỉ lɔ dồăn cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi kần tʰôʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn cáɲ ŋàʔi dó zút kwândộʔi kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô nênci cảʔi kák dờʔi fảʔi ɣiữ ŋàʔi dó ɲư za dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋzêŋ ciềʔu lạʔi kák ŋươʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔdến ciềʔu ŋàʔi haimươʔi tʰáŋ dó cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ kòn tʰấʔi mɛn tạʔi ɲà kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ hăjlà ŋườʔi sứ ʔaj báɲ kó mɛn cuất xỏʔi hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên cớ báɲ kó mɛn xắpnơʔi kák ŋươʔi dềʔu fảʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn vậʔi môʔisɛ ɲóm lạʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi di kɔn cɔŋ bầʔi cɔ mọʔi ɲà kák ŋươʔi ɣiết vượtkwa zồʔi hãʔi lấʔi cùm kiɲzớʔi ɲúŋ vàʔɔ hwiết cɔŋ cậʔu bôʔi mâʔi haj kâʔi kột kửʔa dɔạn cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ ʔaj za xỏʔi kửʔɛɲà mìɲ cɔdến sáŋmaj Ðứkzê di kwa dặŋ hàɲ hạʔi sứ zíptô xi tʰấʔi hwiết nơʔi màʔi haj kâʔi kột kửʔa ŋàʔi kwa xôŋ cɔ tiêʔuziệt vàʔɔ ɲà kák ŋươʔi dặŋ hàɲ hạʔi hãʔi ɣiữ nầʔi ɲư za dờʔidờʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ Ðứkzê cɔ ɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán tʰì hãʔi ɣiữ nầʔi xi kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi hỏʔi zằŋ lễ nầʔi ŋĩʔa ci hãʔi dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà kủʔa vượtkwa kủʔa Ðứkzê xi ŋàʔi hàɲ hạʔi sứ zíptô tʰì ŋàʔi di kwa kák ɲà zân ʔisơzaên kứʔu ɲà cúŋta dó zân ʔisơzaên kúʔi dầʔu lạʔi zồʔi di tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ʔazôn vả xi ɣiữʔa dêm Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ tạʔi sứ zíptô tʰáʔitử kủʔa fazaôn ŋồʔi cên ŋaj mìɲ cɔdến kɔnkả ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa súkvật Ðʔaŋ lúk bandêm fazaôn kwầntʰần kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zíptô dềʔu cờ zậʔi kótiếŋ kêʔula ʔiɲỏʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô cẳŋ ɲà nàʔɔlà xôŋ kó ŋườʔi cết cɔŋ dêm dó fazaôn dòʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn fán zằŋ haj ŋươʔi zân ʔisơzaên hãʔi cờ zậʔi za xỏʔi ɣiữʔa vòŋ zân di hầʔu việk Ðứkzê ɲư kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi kũŋ hãʔi zẫn ciên di ɲư lờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi kầʔu fướk cɔ nữʔa ŋườʔi zíptô tʰúkzụk zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ măw măw nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta dềʔu cết vậʔi zânsự dềʔu dɛm ɲồʔi zồʔi cưʔa mɛn di bọk ɲữŋ tʰùŋ ɲồʔi cɔŋ áʔɔtơʔi vák vaj mìɲ vả zân ʔisơzaên kó ʔi tʰeo lờʔi môʔisɛ dã zặn sin ŋườʔi zíptô ɲữŋ dồ bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ kùŋ áʔɔsốŋ Ðứkzê cɔ zânsự dượk cướkmắt ŋườʔi zíptô bằŋlòŋ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên lộtcần ŋườʔi zíptô vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên di zamsɛ dến sukốt sốxôŋ kɔnnít dượk cừŋ sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi dànôŋ di lạʔi kó ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ di cuŋ vớʔi ciên súkvật zất ɲiềʔu cúŋ báɲ xôŋ mɛn bằŋ kủʔa mìɲ dã dɛm tʰeo sứ zíptô xôŋ mɛn kớ duổʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô xôŋ tʰế cậmcễ kũŋ cẳŋ lươŋ tʰựkci dượk vả tʰì kiềʔu ŋụ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi sứ zíptô dượk bốncăm bamươʔi xi bốncăm bamươʔi zồʔi tʰì kũŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kák kwândộʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ấʔilà dêm ŋườʔita fảʔi ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi zút zân ʔisơzaên xỏʔi sứ zíptô cảʔi kák dờʔi kả zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi ɣiữ dêm dó dể tôncọŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ Ðâʔi vượtkwa fàm ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cẳŋ dượk dó kòn fần tôʔimọʔi ŋườʔi za mwa ŋươʔi hãʔi làmfép kắt cɔ tʰì mớʔi dượk xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ làmtʰuê kũŋ cẳŋ dượk fép dâʔu lễ dó cỉ nộʔi cɔŋ ɲà ŋươʔi dừŋ dɛm tʰịt za ŋɔàʔi kũŋ dừŋ ɣãʔi káʔi sươŋ nàʔɔ hếttʰảʔi hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên fảʔi ɣiữ vượtkwa xi xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ nàʔɔ kiềʔu ŋụ ɲàŋươʔi ɣiữ vượtkwa kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì mọʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa fảʔi cịʔufép kắt dɔạn mớʔi dượk dến ɣần ɣiữ nầʔi dượk kɔj ɲư ŋườʔi sɛɲ cɔŋ sứ ɲưŋ ʔaj xôŋ cịʔufép kắt tʰì cẳŋ dượk dâʔu kũŋ dồŋ cɔ ŋườʔi sɛɲ cɔŋ sứ kùŋ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ nàʔɔ dến kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi tɔàn zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ʔazôn kũŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê zút zân ʔisơzaên tùʔi tʰeo kwândộʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi hăj hãʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ bởʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ tʰuộk môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ hãʔi ŋàʔi nầʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê zùŋ tăj kwiềnnăŋ zút kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứklà xỏʔi ɲà cớ ʔaj báɲ kó mɛn ŋàʔinăj ɲằm tʰáŋ lúʔa cỗ kák ŋươʔi zadi vậʔi xi nàʔɔ Ðứkzê dưʔa ŋươʔi vàʔɔ bờkõʔi sứ zân kanaan zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít zồʔi sứ dượm sữʔa sứ ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cɔ ŋươʔi tʰì dến cɔŋ tʰáŋ nầʔi hãʔi ɣiữ tʰáɲ dó cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi hãʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn dến ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kó kíɲ Ðứkzê fảʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi xắp kả dịʔahạt ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi báɲ kó mɛn hɔặk mɛn tạʔi nơʔi ŋươʔi nữʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó hãʔi ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa cɔ kɔncaj ŋươʔi zằŋ Ấʔi việk Ðứkzê cɔ xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðʔiềʔu dó zấʔuhiệʔu nơʔi tăj ŋươʔi ɣi nơʔi cán ɣiữʔa kặp ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê nơʔi miệŋ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê dã zùŋ tăj kwiềnnăŋ zút ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô hằŋ dến ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ nầʔi xiÐứkzê dã dưʔa ŋươʔi vàʔɔ bờkõʔi sứ kanaan ɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ ŋươʔi tổfụ ŋươʔi xi ŋàʔi dã sứ dó cɔzồʔi tʰì hãʔi dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ kɔn cưởŋnam kùŋ kả kɔn dầʔulòŋ dựk kủʔa súkvật ŋươʔi cúŋnó dềʔu tʰuộk k ɣiêhôva ɲưŋ mỗʔi kɔn lừʔa dầʔulòŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi ciên kɔn hăjlà zê kɔn cuộk bằŋxôŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi kổ ŋươʔi kũŋ cuộk mọʔi cưởŋnam cɔŋ vòŋ kɔncaj ŋươʔi vả mộtmaj kɔncaj ŋươʔi hỏʔi zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu dó kó ýŋĩʔa ci tʰì hãʔi dáp zằŋ Ấʔi kớ Ðứkzê dã zùŋ tăj kwiềnnăŋ zút cúŋta za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứklà ɲà xi fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ xôŋ tʰa cúŋta di ŋàʔi ɣiết kák kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ sứ dó kɔn cưởŋnam ŋườʔita cɔdến kɔn dầʔulòŋ súkvật vì kớ dó zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê mọʔi kɔn dựk sɛɲ dầʔulòŋ cuộk kɔn cưởŋnam cɔŋ vòŋ kɔncaj Ấʔi zấʔuhiệʔu nơʔi tăj ŋươʔi cí nơʔi cán ɣiữʔa kặp ŋươʔi dể ɲắk cɔ ɲớ zằŋ Ðứkzê dã zùŋ tăj kwiềnnăŋ zút cúŋta za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vả xi fazaôn tʰa zân ʔisơzaên di Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ zẫn zân ấʔi di tʰeo dườŋ sứ filitin dườŋ ɣần ŋàʔi nóʔi zằŋ ʔɛ xi zân tʰấʔi cậnmạk zờʔi lòŋ cởvề sứ zíptô căŋ cɔnên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zẫn cúŋ di vòŋ tʰeo dườŋ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ hướŋ biểnzỏ zân ʔisơzaên kầm xíɣiớʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô môʔisɛ zờʔi hàʔicốt ɣiôsép tʰeo mìɲ ɣiôsép kó zân ʔisơzaên tʰề kwiết zằŋ cắkÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi viếŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi zờʔi hàʔicốt tʰeo kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi dâʔi vả cúŋ di xỏʔi sukốt dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi kuốʔi dầʔu dồŋ vắŋ Ðứkzê di cướk zânsự banŋàʔi cɔŋ cụ mâʔi dể zẫn dườŋ di bandêm cɔŋ cụ lửʔa dể sɔj sáŋ cɔ cúŋ hầʔu cɔ dượk di ŋàʔi dêm banŋàʔi cụ mâʔi cẳŋ bawzờ kác sa zânsự cụ lửʔa bandêm kũŋ vậʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cởlạʔi dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi cướk fihahizốt ŋaŋ baɛɲsêfôn ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ mítdôn kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dóŋ cạʔi dốʔiziện nơʔi nầʔi ɣần cắkfa zaôn nóʔi zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ zân dó lạk dườŋ xốn cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ zồʔi ta cɔ fazaôn kứŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo zân dó ɲưŋ fazaôn kả tɔán biɲ ŋườʔi dượk zạŋ zɛɲ ŋườʔi zíptô Ðứkzê zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvậʔi vả báʔɔ kùŋ vwa zíptô zằŋ zân hêbơzơ dã cốn di zồʔi lòŋfa zaôn kwầntʰần dốʔi kùŋzân dó tʰăjdổʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta dã làmci vậʔi tʰa zân ʔisơzaên di dể xỏʔi fụkzịc nữʔa saw fazaôn tʰắŋ sɛ dɛm zân mìɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi dɛm sáʔu căm sɛ tʰượŋạŋ hếttʰảʔi sɛ cɔŋ sứ zíptô cên mỗʔi sɛ dềʔu kó ciếnbiɲ kả Ðứkzê cɔ fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô kứŋ lòŋ duổʔi tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ zân nầʔi dã zadi mộtkác zạnzĩ ŋườʔi zíptô kả ŋựʔasɛ líɲ kùŋ tɔán biɲ kủʔa fazaôn dềʔu duổʔi tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên ɣặp daŋ dóŋ dồn nơʔi ɣần fihahizốt ŋaŋ baɛɲsêfôn vả xi fazaôn dến ɣần zân ʔisơzaên ŋướk tʰấʔi zân zíptô duổʔi tʰeo lấʔilàm hãʔihùŋ kêʔuvan Ðứkzê cúŋ lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ sứ zíptô cẳŋ kó nơʔi mộfần nỗʔi ŋườʔi mớʔi zẫn cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ dồŋ vắŋ dặŋ cết saw ŋườʔi dưʔa cúŋtôʔi za sứ zíptô dể làmci cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô zằŋ mặk cúŋtôʔi fụkzịc zân zíptô tʰàzằŋ fụkzịc kòn fảʔi cết nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ môʔisɛ dáp kùŋzân zằŋ cớ ci hãʔi dó zồʔi ŋàʔinăj sɛm ɣiảʔicứʔu Ðứkzê cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔi zíptô kák ŋươʔi ŋó tʰấʔi ŋàʔinăj tʰì cẳŋ bawzờ ŋó tʰấʔi nữʔa Ðứkzê ciến kự cɔ kòn kák ŋươʔi kứ ʔiênlặŋ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ saw ŋươʔi kêʔuvan hãʔi bảʔɔ zân ʔisơzaên kứ di kòn ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiơ ɣậʔi dưʔa tăicên fânzẽ nướk za tʰì zân ʔisơzaên suốŋ di ɲư cên dất kạn kòn cɔ zân zíptô kứŋ lòŋ tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên suốŋ zồʔi dượk zạŋ zɛɲ fazaôn kả dạʔɔ biɲ biɲ sa líɲ ŋườʔi xi nàʔɔ dượk zạŋ zɛɲ fazaôn biɲ sa kùŋ líɲ ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi zíptô zõzàŋ Ðứkzê vậʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã di cướk cạʔi kwân kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi disăw kòn cụ mâʔi di cướk cạʔi kwân lạʔi săw cụ mâʔi dứŋ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ cạʔi ŋườʔi zíptô cạʔi zân ʔisơzaên áŋ mâʔi tốʔităm cɔ dàŋ nầʔi sɔj sáŋ bandêm cɔ dàŋ kiə cọn kả dêm haj cạʔi cẳŋ sáp ɣần ɲăw dượk vả môʔisɛ ɣiơ tăj za cên Ðứkzê zẫn cận ɣió dôŋ tʰổʔi mạɲ dến dùʔa lạʔi cọn kả dêm ŋàʔi cɔ bàʔi za xô nướk fânzẽ zân ʔisơzaên suốŋ di ɲư cên dất kạn kòn nướk tʰàɲ vác ŋăn hữʔu ŋườʔi zíptô duổʔi tʰeo hếttʰảʔi ŋựʔa biɲ sa kùŋ líɲ kủʔa fazaôn dềʔu tʰeo suốŋ ɣiữʔa vả dến kɛɲ sáŋ Ðứkzê cɔŋ lòŋ cụ mâʔi lửʔa ɲìn za tʰấʔi cạʔi kwân zíptô cɔ fảʔi zốʔilɔạn ŋàʔi tʰáʔɔ báɲsɛ kủʔa xiến zẫnzắt kựkɲọk ŋườʔi zíptô nóʔi ɲăw zằŋ ta hãʔi cốn xỏʔi zân ʔisơzaên di Ðứkzê tʰế zân dó ciến kự kùŋ cúŋta Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj ŋươʔi za cên nướk cở ŋườʔi zíptô biɲ sa líɲ kủʔa cúŋnó môʔisɛ ɣiơ tăj mìɲ za cên lốʔi sáŋmaj nướk cở fủ dáʔi lạʔi ŋườʔi zíptô cạʔi cốn nướk cận vậʔi Ðứkzê sô suốŋ ɣiữʔa tʰếtʰì nướk cởlạʔi bawfủ biɲ sa líɲ kủʔa kả dạʔɔ biɲ fazaôn dã tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên suốŋ cẳŋ kòn lạʔi ʔaj sɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên di ɣiữʔa ɲư cên dất kạn nướk tʰàɲ vác ŋăn hữʔu cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê ɣiảʔicứʔu zân ʔisơzaên tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô zân ấʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi zíptô cết cên bãʔibiển zân ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi việk lớnlaw Ðứkzê dã cɔ ŋườʔi zíptô kíɲ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên bàʔi ka nầʔi cɔ Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi katụŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi zất viɲhiển waiŋiêm ŋàʔi dã liệŋ suốŋ ŋựʔa ŋườʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa Ðứkzê sứkmạɲ katụŋ kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi dã cởnên Ðấŋ kứʔu tôʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi tôʔi tônkíɲ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ciếnsĩ zɛɲŋàʔi ɣiêhôva ŋàʔi dã suốŋ biɲ sa fazaôn kả dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi kwan tướŋ kéncọn kủʔa ŋườʔi dã dắm nơʔi biển dỏ ɲữŋ sóŋ dã vùʔi zồʔi họ cìm dến dáʔi ɲư dá vậʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê tăj hữʔu ŋàʔi kó sứkmạɲ viɲhiển tʰăj hỡʔiÐứkzê tăj hữʔu ŋàʔi hủʔi kwân ŋịc di bởʔi kảtʰể kủʔa waiŋiêm ŋàʔi Ðáɲ dổ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ mìɲ ŋàʔi nổʔizận fừŋfừŋ cáʔi ɲư zơm za lỗ mũʔi ŋàʔi tʰở hơʔi za nướk zồn lạʔi lượn sóŋ dổ zựŋ ɲư dê vựk sâʔu dọŋ lạʔi nơʔi zún kwân ŋịc zằŋ ta duổʔi tʰeo duổʔi ta ciə fân kủʔa ɣiặk tâmhồn tʰỏʔaŋwiện nơʔi ta zút ɣươm za tăj hủʔiziệt ŋàʔi dã tʰở hơʔi za biển vùʔi kwân ŋịc lạʔi họ cìm ɲư kụk cì nơʔi dáʔi nướk sâʔu hỡʔiÐứkzê cɔŋ vòŋ kák tʰần ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋàʔi cɔŋ tʰáɲ xiết ʔaj dượk viɲhiển ɲư ŋàʔi Ðáŋ dáŋ xɛn hăj kák fép ŋàʔi dã dưʔa tăj hữʔu za dã cúŋnó ŋàʔi lấʔilòŋ tʰươŋsót zìʔuzắt zân nầʔi ŋàʔi dã cuộk lạʔi ŋàʔi dã zùŋ năŋlựk dưʔa về nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi kák zântộk ŋɛ việk nầʔi dềʔu zunsợ kơn kiɲhãʔi zân sứ falêtin kák kwan cưởŋ sứ dôm lấʔilàm bốʔizốʔi mấʔi ʔɛɲhùŋ nơʔi môáp dềʔu kiɲhồn kả zân kanaan dềʔu mấtvíʔa sự hɔảŋốt kiɲhãʔi ɣiáŋ cɔ cúŋnó hỡʔiÐứkzê kwiền kaw nơʔi káɲtăj ŋàʔi cúŋnó dềʔu kâm ɲư dá cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ zân ŋàʔi kwa cɔdến xi zân ŋàʔi dã cuộk kwa zồʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi dưʔa zân ấʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi núʔi kơŋiệp ŋàʔi tứklà cốn ŋàʔi dã dể nơʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔicúʔa dền tʰáɲ tăj ŋàʔi dã Ðứkzê kaicị dờʔidờʔiciếpkiếp vì ŋựʔa kủʔa fazaôn biɲ sa kùŋ líɲ ŋườʔi dã suốŋ vàÐứkzê dã vùʔizập nướkbiển cên ɲưŋ zân ʔisơzaên di ɣiữʔa ɲư di cên dất kạn nữ tiênci miziəm ʔɛmɣáʔi ʔazôn tăikầm cốŋkơm kák dànbà dềʔu di za tʰeo ŋườʔi kầm cốŋkơm múʔa miziəm dáp lạʔi zằŋ hãʔi katụŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi zất viɲhiển waiŋiêm ŋàʔi dã liệŋ suốŋ ŋựʔa ŋườʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ dɛm zân ʔisơzaên di xỏʔi biển dỏ dếnnơʔi dồŋ vắŋ suzơ cọn ŋàʔi di cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cẳŋ dượk nướk dâʔu kả kế dến dất maza ɲưŋ nướk tạʔi dó dắŋ ʔuốŋ cẳŋ dượk nênci cỗ nầʔi ɣọʔilà maza zânsự ʔɔáncác môʔisɛ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi lấʔi ci ʔuốŋ môʔisɛ kêʔuvan Ðứkzê ŋàʔi cỉ cɔ ŋườʔi kâʔiɣỗ ŋườʔi lấʔi liệŋ suốŋnướk nướk hóʔaza ŋọt Ấʔi tạʔi dó Ðứkzê dịɲ kùŋ lậpfáp dộ cɔ zânsự tạʔi dó ŋàʔi tʰử ŋàʔi fán zằŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi cămcỉ ŋɛ lờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk ŋàʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ kák diềʔu zăn ɣiữ mọʔi ŋàʔi tʰì cẳŋ ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák bịɲ nàʔɔ dã ɣiáŋ cɔ sứ zíptô Ðứkzê Ðấŋ cữʔa bịɲ cɔ ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn zânsự dến dất nơʔi dó kó mườʔihaj suốʔi nướk bảʔi mươʔi kâʔi càlà zânsự dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dó ɣần suốʔi nướk ɲằm ŋàʔi mườʔilăm tʰáŋ haj săw xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên nơʔi di dến dồŋ vắŋ sin ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ sina ʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ʔɔáncác môʔisɛ ʔazôn tạʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ nóʔi kùŋ haj ŋườʔi zằŋ Ôʔi tʰàzằŋ cúŋtôʔi cịʔu cết tăj Ðứkzê tạʔi sứ zíptô xi kòn ŋồʔi nồʔi tʰịt báɲ cán vì haj ŋườʔi zẫnzắt cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ nầʔi dềʔu cết dóʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi cên cờʔi kaw mưʔa báɲ suốŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi zânsự di za mỗʔi ŋàʔi nàʔɔ tʰâʔu báɲ dủ cɔ ŋàʔi nấʔi dặŋ tʰử zân kɔj kó di tʰeo kủʔa hăj căŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứsáʔu zânsự zựbị fần dã ɣóp dượk fần ɣấp bằŋ haj kủʔa mìɲ tʰườŋ tʰâʔu hằŋ ŋàʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ciềʔu năj kák ŋươʔi ɲậnbiết zằŋ ấʔilà Ðứkzê dã zút kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô sáŋmaj tʰấʔi viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã ŋɛ lờʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔɔáncác ŋàʔi zồʔi vảlạʔi cúŋta ʔaj kák ŋươʔi ʔɔáncác cúŋta môʔisɛ nóʔi ciềʔu nầʔi Ðứkzê fát tʰịt cɔ kák ŋươʔi zồʔi sáŋmaj báɲ ɲiềʔu zưzật ŋàʔi dã ŋɛ lờʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔɔáncác ŋàʔi zồʔi tʰếtʰì cúŋta ʔaj ɲữŋ lờʔi ʔɔáncác cẳŋ fảʔi dổ cúŋta dâʔu ɲưŋ Ðứkzê vậʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dến cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã ŋɛ lờʔi ʔɔáncác kủʔa kák ŋươʔi zồʔi vả xi ʔazôn nóʔi kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên tʰì sâʔi fíʔa dồŋ vắŋ tʰấʔi viɲkwaŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi za cɔŋ dám mâʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ta dã ŋɛ lờʔi ʔɔáncác kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋnó zằŋ lốʔi ciềʔu kák ŋươʔi tʰịt sáŋmaj báɲ nɔnê ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vậʔi ciềʔu lạʔi kó cimkút băj fủ cên cạʔi kwân dến sáŋmaj lạʔi kó sươŋ cuŋkwɛɲ cạʔi kwân lớp sươŋ dó di cên dồŋ vắŋ tʰấʔi kó ci ɲỏ còn ɲư sươŋ dóŋ cên mặtdất xi zân ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi hỏʔi ɲăw zằŋ káʔi ci vậʔi vì cẳŋ dó ɣì môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ Ấʔilà báɲ Ðứkzê cɔ kák ŋươʔi lươŋtʰựk dó nầʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn hãʔi tùʔi sứk kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi tùʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cạʔi ɣóp cɔ mỗʔi mɛ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvậʔi tʰì ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi tʰì kứ lườŋ mɛ ʔaj ɲiềʔu cẳŋ dượk cộʔi ʔaj kũŋ cẳŋ tʰiếʔu mỗʔi ŋườʔi vừʔa dủ sứk mìɲ môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ Ðừŋ ʔaj dể zư lạʔi cɔdến sáŋmaj ɲưŋ zânsự cẳŋ ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi môʔisɛ mộtvàʔi ŋườʔi dể zư lạʔi dến sáŋmaj tʰì sâʔu hóʔa cɔŋ sɛɲ mùʔi hôʔihám môʔisɛ nổʔizận kùŋ vậʔi hằŋ buổʔi sớmmaj mỗʔi ŋườʔi vừʔa dủ sứk mìɲ xi mặtcờʔi nắŋnóŋ tʰì dó za ŋàʔi tʰứsáʔu zânsự lươŋtʰựk ɣấp haj mỗʔi ŋườʔi haj mɛ kák hộʔicưởŋ dến tʰuật lạʔi cɔ môʔisɛ zõ ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zằŋ maj ŋàʔi ŋỉ tứk ŋàʔi sabát tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi nướŋ ci kák ŋươʔi nướŋ hãʔi nấʔu ci kák ŋươʔi nấʔu kòn zư hãʔi dểzàɲ dến sáŋmaj zânsự dểzàɲ cɔdến sáŋmaj ʔiɲư lờʔi môʔisɛ dã cwiền dó cẳŋ sɛɲ mùʔi hôʔihám kũŋ cẳŋ hóʔa sâʔu cút nàʔɔ môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ bữʔanăj hãʔi dồ dó di ŋàʔi sabát kủʔa Ðứkzê hômnăj kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi dó cɔŋ dồŋ dâʔu kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi sabát cẳŋ kó dâʔu ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi mộtvàʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ zânsự za dặŋ lấʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ci Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ cịʔu vâŋ ɣiữ diềʔu zăn luậtfáp cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ hãʔi swiŋĩ zằŋ Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi sabát vậʔi dến ŋàʔi tʰứsáʔu ŋàʔi lạʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi lươŋtʰựk dủ haj ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi ʔiên cỗ mìɲ cớ ʔaj za xỏʔi ɲà tʰếtʰì ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi zânsự dềʔu ŋỉŋơʔi ɲà ʔisơzaên dặt lươŋtʰựk nầʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋò sắk cắŋ mùʔi ɲư báɲ ŋọt fa mậtɔŋ môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ lờʔiÐứkzê dã fán zặn ɲưvầʔi hãʔi dổ dầʔi mɛ dặŋ lưʔucwiền cảʔi kák dờʔi hầʔu cɔ tʰiêɲạ tʰấʔi tʰứ báɲ dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ xi zút kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô môʔisɛ lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi káʔi bìɲ dựŋ dầʔi mɛ dể cướk Ðứkzê dặŋ lưʔucwiền kák dờʔi ʔazôn dể bìɲ dó cướk cứŋkớ hầʔu cɔ dượk lưʔucwiền ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên cảʔi mươʔi cɔdến xi vàʔɔ bờkõʔi sứ kanaan sứ kó ŋườʔita vả ômɛ fần mườʔi kủʔa fa kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên di dồŋ vắŋ sin di từŋ cạm tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ Ðứkzê dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zêfidim dó cẳŋ kó nướk cɔ zânsự ʔuốŋ zânsự kớ kãʔilộn kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi nướk ʔuốŋ môʔisɛ dáp zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi kớ kãʔilộn kùŋ saw tʰử Ðứkzê vậʔi zânsự dó xôŋ kó nướk xát ʔɔáncác môʔisɛ zằŋ saw ŋườʔi xiến cúŋtôʔi za sứ zíptô hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi kɔn kák bầʔi súkvật fảʔi cịʔu cết xát tʰế nầʔi môʔisɛ kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi sửtʰế nàʔɔ kùŋzân nầʔi tʰiếʔudiềʔu dá tôʔi Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi kầm ɣậʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi dã dập zướʔi sôŋ zẫn tʰeo ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên zồʔi di cướk zânsự nầʔi dứŋ dằŋ cướk ŋươʔi cên dá tạʔi hôzếp kiə ŋươʔi hãʔi dập dá tʰì nướk dó cảʔi za zânsự ʔuốŋ lấʔi môʔisɛ ɲưvậʔi cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi dặt nơʔi nầʔi masa mêziba kớ việk kãʔilộn zân ʔisơzaên kớ ɣâʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dã tʰử Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ kóÐứkzê ɣiữʔa cúŋta hăj căŋ vả xi dó zân ʔamalék dến xêʔu ciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên tạʔi zêfidim môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi cọn lấʔi cáŋsĩ cɔ cúŋta za ciếndấʔu kùŋzân ʔamalék ŋàʔimaj dứŋ nơʔi dầʔu nổŋ kầm ɣậʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ tăj ɣiôsuê ʔiɲư lờʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi dể kự ciến zân ʔamalék kòn môʔisɛ ʔazôn huzơ cên dầʔu nổŋ vả daŋ xi môʔisɛ ɣiơ tăj tʰì zân ʔisơzaên tʰắŋ ɲưŋ xi ŋườʔi sụʔi tăj suốŋ zân ʔamalék lạʔi tʰắŋ tăimôʔi sɛ mỏʔi ʔazôn huzơ lấʔi dá cɔ ŋườʔi ŋồʔi zồʔi haj dỡ tăj ŋườʔi tăj ŋườʔi cẳŋ lăjdộŋ cɔdến xi mặtcờʔi ɣiôsuê lấʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm dáɲbạʔi ʔamalék zânsự ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cép diềʔu nầʔi cɔŋ sác hãʔi nóʔi cɔ ɣiôsuê zằŋ bôʔi sạc ʔamalék cɔŋ tʰiêɲạ môʔisɛ bàntʰờ dặt ɣiêhôva kờsí kủʔa tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ bởʔivì ʔamalék kó ɣiơ tăj ŋịc kùŋ ŋôʔi Ðứkzê Ðứkzê ciɲciến vớʔi ʔamalék dờʔi nầʔi kwadờʔi kiə ɣiêcô tʰầʔi sứ madiən ôŋza kủʔa môʔisɛ hăj dượk mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ môʔisɛ kùŋ ʔisơzaên zânsự ŋàʔi ŋɛ ŋàʔi dã zẫn zân ấʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ŋườʔi zẫn sêfôza môʔisɛ dã cɔ cởvề ɲà ca kùŋ haj kɔncaj ɣẹtsôn môʔisɛ dã nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kiềʔu ŋụ nơʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ liêsɛ ŋườʔi lạʔi kó nóʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi dã vùʔa ɣiúp ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi ɣươm fazaôn vậʔi ɣiêcô ôŋza kủʔa môʔisɛ dến vớʔi haj kɔncaj môʔisɛ tʰăm ŋườʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ cỗ dóŋ cạʔi ɣần núʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi saj báʔɔ kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ta ɣiêcô ôŋza kủʔa ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi haj kɔncaj nàŋ dến tʰăm ŋươʔi môʔisɛ za dónzướk ôŋza mìɲ suốŋ ŋườʔi hỏʔitʰăm ɲăw zồʔi vàʔɔ cạʔi môʔisɛ tʰuật cɔ ôŋza mìɲ mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê ʔisơzaên dã cɔ fazaôn ŋườʔi zíptô mọʔi diềʔu xổ ɲọk sảʔi dến cɔ mìɲ zọk dườŋ Ðứkzê dã ɣiảʔitʰɔát zân ʔisơzaên tʰếnàʔɔ ɣiêcô lấʔilàm vuimừŋ kák Ðứkzê dã cɔ ʔisơzaên ɣiảʔicứʔu zân ấʔi xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô ɣiêcô nóʔi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰăj Ðấŋ dã ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô tăj fazaôn
