ɣiảʔicứʔu zânsự za xỏʔi kwiền kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô bâʔizờ zằŋ Ðứkzê kák tʰần xi ŋườʔi zíptô kậʔi lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ zấʔi tʰì ŋàʔi tʰắŋ dượk cúŋnó ɣiêcô ôŋza kủʔa môʔisɛ bàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi ʔazôn kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên dến báɲ kùŋ ôŋza kủʔa môʔisɛ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwaŋàʔi săw môʔisɛ za ŋồʔi sétdɔán zânsự zânsự dứŋ cựk cướk ŋườʔi sớmmaj dến ciềʔu Ôŋza tʰấʔi mọʔi diềʔu ŋườʔilàm cɔ zânsự hỏʔi zằŋ kɔn làmci kùŋzân dó saw kɔn cỉ ŋồʔi mộtmìɲ kòn kả zânsự dứŋ cựk cướk sớmmaj cɔdến ciềʔu ɲưvậʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ Ấʔi zânsự dếnkùŋ tôʔi dặŋ hỏʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xi nàʔɔ kó việk ci tʰì dếnkùŋ tôʔi tôʔi sétdɔán ŋườʔi nầʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kiə cɔ ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưŋ ôŋza lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu kɔn dó cẳŋ kwảtʰật kɔn kùŋzân vớʔi kɔn duốʔi cẳŋ saj việk dó nặŋnề kwásứk kɔn mộtmìɲ ɣáɲ cẳŋ nổʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ ca xwiên kɔnmột lờʔi kầʔusin Ðứkzê fùhộ cɔ về fần kɔn hãʔi tʰăimặt cɔ zânsự cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɛm cìɲ mọʔi việk cɔ ŋàʔi hăj hãʔi lấʔi mạŋ lịɲ luậtfáp ŋàʔi zạʔi cỉ cɔbiết kɔn dườŋ nàʔɔ fảʔi di diềʔu ci fảʔi ɲưŋ hãʔi cọn lấʔi cɔŋ vòŋ zânsự mấʔi ŋườʔi tàʔinăŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cântʰật ɣét tʰam lợʔi cên zânsự cưởŋ kaicị hɔặk ŋàn ŋườʔi hɔặk căm ŋườʔi hɔặk nămmươʔi ŋườʔi hɔặk mườʔi ŋườʔi dặŋ sétdɔán zânsự hằŋ ŋàʔi nếʔu kó việk kɛɲệ hãʔi ɣiảʔi cɔ kɔn kòn ɲữŋ việk ɲỏmọn cíɲ hãʔi sétdɔán lấʔi hãʔi ɣáɲ cɔ ɲẹ dặŋ ciə ɣáɲ kùŋ kɔn nếʔu kɔn làmviệk nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lịɲ cɔ kɔn kɔn cắk cịʔu nổʔi dượk kả zânsự nấʔi dến cỗ mìɲ bìɲiên môʔisɛ vâŋ lờʔi ôŋza mìɲ ʔiɲư lọʔi diềʔu ŋườʔi dã zạʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ cọn cɔŋ kả ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tàʔinăŋ cên zânsự cưởŋ kaicị hɔặk ŋàn ŋườʔi hɔặk căm ŋườʔi hɔặk nămmươʔi ŋườʔi hɔặk mườʔi ŋườʔi sétdɔán zânsự hằŋ ŋàʔi kák việk xó ɣiãʔi cɔ môʔisɛ ɲưŋ cíɲ sét lấʔi kák việk ɲỏ Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ dể cɔ ôŋza mìɲ cởvề sứ ŋườʔi tʰáŋ tʰứba săw xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zân ʔisơzaên dếnnơʔi dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi từzê fidim zadi dếnnơʔi dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dó dốʔiziện kùŋ núʔi môʔisɛ dến Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkzê cên núʔi ɣọʔi ŋườʔi fán zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi ɲưvầʔi cɔ ɲà zakốp diềʔu nầʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi diềʔu cɔ ŋườʔi zíptô cở kák ŋươʔi cên káɲ cim ưŋ làmsaw zẫn kák ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ tʰểnàʔɔ vậʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi vâŋ lờʔi ɣiữ zawướk tʰì cɔŋ muônzân kák ŋươʔi tʰuộk ziêŋ kả tʰếzan dềʔu tʰuộk kák ŋươʔi tʰàɲ nướk tʰầʔi kùŋ zântộk tʰáɲ cɔ bấʔiɲiêʔu lờʔi dó ŋươʔi nóʔi lạʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên môʔisɛ dến dòʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ cɔŋ zânsự tʰuật kùŋ mọʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê dã zặn mìɲ nóʔi lạʔi kả zânsự dồŋ tʰiɲ dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi sin mọʔi việk Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ tʰuật lạʔi lờʔi kủʔa zânsự kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi fán zằŋ nầʔi cɔŋ dám mâʔi di dến ŋươʔi dặŋ xi nàʔɔ fán kùŋ ŋươʔi tʰì zânsự ŋɛ tinkậʔi ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ dɛm lờʔi kủʔa zânsự tʰưʔa lạʔi cɔ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi di dếnkùŋ zânsự xiến zân ɣiữmìɲ tʰáɲ sạc ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔimaj kùŋ fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ kwaŋàʔi tʰứba zân xá sẵnsàŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cướkmắt zânsự tạʔi núʔi sina ʔi vả ŋươʔi hãʔi fândịɲ ɣiớʔihạn cɔ zânsự cuŋkwɛɲ núʔi zặn zằŋ xá ɣiữmìɲ dừŋ núʔi hɔặk dụŋ dến cân nàʔɔ dụŋ dến tʰì sửtử cớ ʔaj ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi dó ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dó fảʔi liệŋ dá hɔặk hăj ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ dể cɔ sốŋ dâʔu xi tʰổʔi zânsự dến ɣần núʔi môʔisɛ suốŋ núʔi dếnkùŋ zânsự xiến ɣiữmìɲ tʰáɲ sạc ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi zặn zânsự zằŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi sẵnsàŋ cớ dến ɣần dànbà kwa sáŋ ŋàʔi tʰứba kó vaŋ cớpɲɔáŋ áŋ mâʔi cên núʔi tiếŋ tʰổʔi zất vaŋdộŋ kả zânsự cɔŋ cạʔi kwân dềʔu zun hãʔi môʔisɛ biểʔu zân za xỏʔi cạʔi kwân ŋiɲtiếp Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zânsự zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi cân núʔi vả bấʔizờ xắp núʔi sina ʔi dềʔu za xóʔi Ðứkzê cɔŋ lửʔa ɣiáŋ nơʔi dó xóʔi za xáknàʔɔ xóʔi kủʔa lửʔa kiə kả núʔi dềʔu zuŋdộŋ kác kịcliệt tiếŋ kàŋ vaŋdộŋ môʔisɛ nóʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp tiếŋ lạʔi Ðứkzê ɣiáŋlâm cên cót núʔi sina ʔi dòʔi môʔisɛ môʔisɛ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ hãʔi suốŋ kấm zânsự dừŋ sôŋfa dến ɣần Ðứkzê ɲìn ʔɛ ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ fảʔi cết căŋ zầʔu ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dến ɣần Ðứkzê kũŋ fảʔi ɣiữmìɲ tʰáɲ sạc kẻʔɔ ŋàʔi hạʔi căŋ môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ zânsự cẳŋ dượk núʔi sina ʔi dâʔu ŋàʔi kó kấm cúŋtôʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi fândịɲ ɣiớʔihạn cuŋkwɛɲ núʔi fânbiệt nơʔi dó dấttʰáɲ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ hãʔi di suốŋ zồʔi dɛm ʔazôn kùŋ ŋươʔi sɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zânsự cớ sôŋfa dặŋ dến ɣần Ðứkzê ʔɛ ŋàʔi hạʔi căŋ vậʔi môʔisɛ di suốŋ nóʔi lạʔi cɔ zânsự ŋɛ bấʔizờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán mọʔi lờʔi nầʔi zằŋ ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã zút ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ɲà cướk ŋươʔi cớ kó kák tʰần xák ŋươʔi cớ tượŋ cạm cɔ mìɲ kũŋ cớ tượŋ nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲữŋ cên cờʔi kaw kiə hɔặk nơʔi dất tʰấp nầʔi hɔặk cɔŋ nướk zướʔi dất ŋươʔi cớ kwì lạʔi cướk kák hìɲtượŋ dó kũŋ dừŋ hầʔu việk cúŋnó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔaj ɣét ɲơn tộʔi tổfụ fạt lạʔi kɔncáʔu dến dờʔi dến ŋàn dờʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ʔiêʔumến ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋươʔi cớ lấʔi zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cơʔi Ðứkzê cẳŋ kầmbằŋ vôtộʔi nàʔɔ lấʔi zɛɲ ŋàʔi cơʔi hãʔi ɲớ ŋàʔi ŋỉ dặŋ ŋàʔi tʰáɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋươʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi tôʔi caj ɣáʔi súkvật kủʔa ŋươʔi hɔặk xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi dềʔu cớ kôŋviệk ci cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dã zựŋ cờʔi dất cɔŋ dó kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰì ŋàʔi ŋỉ vậʔi Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ ŋàʔi ŋỉ ŋàʔi tʰáɲ hãʔi hiếʔu kíɲ camẹ ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu cên dất ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cớ ɣiết ŋườʔi ŋươʔi cớ fạmtộʔi tàzâm ŋươʔi cớ cộmkướp ŋươʔi cớ nóʔi cứŋ zốʔi cɔ lânkận mìɲ ŋươʔi cớ tʰam ɲà lânkận ŋươʔi kũŋ dừŋ tʰam ŋườʔi hɔặk tôʔi caj ɣáʔi lừʔa hăjlà ci tʰuộk lânkận ŋươʔi vả kả zânsự ŋɛ vaŋ tiếŋ tʰổʔi tʰấʔi cớpɲɔáŋ núʔi za xóʔi tʰì zunzẩʔi dứŋ kác sa zânsự nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ cíɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi ŋɛ ɲưŋ kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cớ fán kùŋ ʔɛ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cết căŋ môʔisɛ dáp zằŋ Ðừŋ ci Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiáŋ dặŋ tʰử kák ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ kíɲ ŋàʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ fạmtộʔi vậʔi zânsự dứŋ kác sa kòn môʔisɛ dến ɣần dám mâʔi dɛnkịt kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋự cɔŋ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi cên cờʔi fán suốŋ kùŋ vậʔi cớ dúk tượŋ tʰần bằŋ bạk hăj bằŋ vàŋ sáɲ vớʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi cɔ bàntʰờ bằŋ dất cên dó fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kùŋ kủʔa tʰù kủʔa ŋươʔi hɔặk ciên hăj fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ kó ɣiɲớ zɛɲ dến fướk cɔ ŋươʔi tạʔi dó nếʔu ŋươʔi cɔ bàntʰờ bằŋ dá cớ zùŋ dá cạm nếʔu ŋươʔi zùŋ dồ dể cạm tʰì dá dó za ôʔuế ŋươʔi cớ di bựk tʰaŋ bàntʰờ hầʔu cɔ lõʔalồ ŋươʔi xôŋ Ðâʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cwiền cɔ zânsự nếʔu ŋươʔi mwa ŋườʔi dầʔitớ hêbơzơ hầʔu việk cɔ sáʔu ɲưŋ kwa tʰứbảʔi dượk tʰả za xôŋ fảʔi tʰốʔi nếʔu vàʔɔ mộtmìɲ tʰì za mộtmìɲ nếʔu kó tʰì za vớʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi củ kướʔi cɔ nếʔu sɛɲ dượk kɔncaj hăj ɣáʔi tʰì za mộtmìɲ kɔn tʰuộk củ nếʔu tôʔimọʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi tʰươŋ củ kɔn tôʔi xôŋ za dượk tựzɔ tʰì ŋườʔi củ zẫn dến cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi biểʔu lạʔi ɣần kửʔa hăjlà kột zồʔi lấʔi mũʔizùʔi sỏ taj hầʔu việk ŋườʔi củ dó cọn dờʔi nếʔu ʔaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kɔndòʔi kɔŋáʔi dó xôŋ dượk za ɲư kák dầʔitớ kiə nếʔu củ cướk dã ưŋ lấʔi kɔndòʔi hầʔu zồʔi săw lạʔi cẳŋ tʰì củ fảʔi biểʔu cuộk nàŋ lạʔi cớ xôŋ kó fép ɣạt zồʔi dɛm nàŋ cɔ ŋɔạʔibaŋ ɲưŋ nếʔu củdịɲ dể cɔ kɔncaj mìɲ tʰìfảʔi sử vớʔi nàŋ tʰeo fép ɲư kɔŋáʔi mìɲ vậʔi nếʔu củ kó lấʔi ŋườʔi xák tʰì dốʔivớʔi ŋườʔi tʰứ ɲất cẳŋ dượk fép ɣiảm dồăn dồ mặk tìɲŋĩʔa vợcồŋ cút nàʔɔ nếʔu ŋườʔi củ xôŋ tʰeo diềʔu nầʔi nàŋ dượk fép za xôŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tʰốʔi lạʔi kẻ nàʔɔ dáɲ cết ŋườʔi sửtử ɲượkbằŋ dó cẳŋ fảʔi mưʔu ɣiết ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fú ŋườʔi ɣiết vàʔɔ tăj dó tʰì cɔ ŋươʔi cỗ dặŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi tʰân kòn ɲượkbằŋ nàʔɔ zấʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lânkận lậpmưʔu ɣiết ŋườʔi tʰì zẫʔu zằŋ nơʔi bàntʰờ ŋươʔi kũŋ ɣiết di kẻ nàʔɔ dáɲ ca hăj mìɲ sửtử kẻ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi hɔặk ɣiữ lạʔi cɔŋ tăj mìɲ sửtử kẻ nàʔɔ mắŋ ca hăj mìɲ sửtử xi haj ŋườʔi dáɲlộn ɲăw ŋườʔi nầʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi kiə bằŋ dá hăjlà dấm kú xôŋ dến dỗʔi fảʔi cết ɲưŋ fảʔi liệtzườŋ nếʔu dứŋzậʔi cốŋ ɣậʔi di za ŋɔàʔi dượk ŋườʔi dáɲ dó dượk tʰa tộʔi ɲưŋ cỉ fảʔi dền tʰiệtʰạʔi cɔŋ mấʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ nuôʔi cɔdến xi làɲmạɲ xi ŋườʔi củ lấʔi ɣậʔi dáɲ dầʔitớ caj hăj ɣáʔi mìɲ cết tʰeo tăj tʰì cắk fảʔi fạt sɔŋ nếʔu dầʔitớ caj hăj ɣáʔi kòn sốŋ mộtʰaj ŋàʔi ŋườʔi củ xỏʔi tộʔi tàʔisản kủʔa củ nếʔu ŋườʔita dáɲ ɲăw dụŋ ɲằm ŋườʔi dànbà kótʰaj cɔ fảʔi sảʔɔ ɲưŋ cẳŋ hạʔi ci xák tʰì dáɲ ɲằm dó fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ tʰeo lờʔi cồŋ ŋườʔi dịɲ cả cướk kwan kòn nếʔu kó hạʔi ci tʰì ŋươʔi lấʔi mạŋ tʰườŋ mạŋ lấʔi tʰườŋ lấʔi zăŋ tʰườŋ zăŋ lấʔi tăj tʰườŋ tăj lấʔi cân tʰườŋ cân lấʔi fỏŋ tʰườŋ fỏŋ lấʔi tʰườŋ lấʔi tʰươŋ tʰườŋ tʰươŋ nếʔu ʔaj dáɲ ɲằm kɔn dầʔitớ caj hăj ɣáʔi mìɲ cɔ di tʰì hãʔi tʰa za tựzɔ kớ kɔn nếʔu ʔaj zụŋ zăŋ kủʔa dầʔitớ caj hăj ɣáʔi mìɲ tʰì hãʔi tʰa za tựzɔ kớ zăŋ ví kó kɔn báŋ ɲằm ŋườʔi dànôŋ hăj dànbà fảʔi cết di kɔn dá cết ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰịt kòn ŋườʔi củ dượk vôtộʔi ɲưŋ ŋộ cướk kɔn kó hăj báŋ củ dã mắŋ xôŋ kầmzữ nếʔu nầʔi kòn ɣiết ŋườʔi dànôŋ hăj dànbà tʰì dá củ sửtử nữʔa ɲượkbằŋ ŋườʔita dịɲzá cɔ củ cuộk mạŋ củ fảʔi cuộk mạŋ mìɲ ʔiɲư ɣiá dã dịɲ nếʔu báŋ ɲằm dứʔa kɔncaj hăjlà kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔita kũŋ ciếʔu tʰeo nầʔi kɔn báŋ ɲằm dứʔa dầʔitớ caj hăj ɣáʔi củ fảʔi cả cụk siếk bạk cɔ củ zồʔi dá cết nếʔu ʔaj mởmiệŋ hăjlà dàʔɔ cẳŋ dậʔi lạʔi nếʔu kó hăjlà lừʔa suốŋ dó củ bồʔitʰườŋ ɣiá cɔ củ kủʔa súkvật ɲưŋ súkvật ɣiết dó fần mìɲ bằŋ kủʔa ʔaj báŋ ɲằm kủʔa lânkận mìɲ fảʔi cết di haj ŋườʔi hãʔi sốŋ dó ciə ciə kɔn cết nữʔa nếʔu ŋườʔi củ dã tỏtườŋ cướk zằŋ mìɲ kó hăj báŋ xôŋ lɔ kầmzữ củ fảʔi lấʔi tʰườŋ ɲưŋ cết fần ŋườʔi ví ʔaj cộm hăj ciên zồʔi ɣiết hɔặk di tʰìfảʔi tʰườŋ kɔn cɔ kɔn kɔnciên cɔ kɔn nếʔu kẻcộm daŋ kạʔi kửʔa dáɲ cết di tʰì dáɲ cết cẳŋ fảʔitộʔi sátɲân sɔŋ nếʔu dáɲ cết cɔŋ xi mặtcờʔi dã mọk zồʔi tʰì tộʔi sátɲân kẻcộm fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ bằŋ cẳŋ kó ci tʰì tộʔi cộmkắp mìɲ nếʔu kẻcộm dã lấʔi hɔặk lừʔa hăj ciên hãʔi kòn tʰấʔi sốŋ cɔŋ tăj tʰì kẻcộm fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ ɣấp haj ŋộ ʔaj hưhạʔi cɔŋ zuộŋ hăjlà ɲɔ tʰả súkvật mìɲ vàʔɔ cɔŋ zuộŋ ŋườʔi xák tʰì ʔaj dó fảʔi lấʔi hwalợʔi ɲất kủʔa zuộŋ hăjlà ɲɔ mìɲ tʰườŋ bồʔi nếʔu lửʔa nổʔi dốt bụʔi ɣaj cáʔi kwa lúʔa dã mùʔamàŋ hăjlà dồŋzuộŋ tʰì nổʔi lửʔa dó fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ cọn mọʔi dã cáʔi xi ʔaj zaw tiềnbạk băj dồvật cɔ lânkận mìɲ ɣiữ zủʔi cộmkắp tạʔi ɲà lânkận dó nếʔu cộm dã dượk tʰì fảʔi tʰườŋ ɣấp haj nếʔu kẻcộm xôŋ dượk tʰì củ ɲà cɔ ɣởʔi fảʔi zẫn dến cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặŋ tʰề zằŋ mìɲ cẳŋ dặt tăj vàʔɔ tàʔi kủʔa lânkận mìɲ cɔŋ mọʔi việk zanlận nàʔɔ hɔặk kɔn kɔn lừʔa kɔnciên áʔɔsốŋ hăjlà ci kó ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ kwảtʰật dồ dó tʰìfảʔi dɛm zwiênkớ haj dàŋ dến cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nàʔɔ ŋàʔi sửfạt fảʔi tʰườŋ bồʔi cɔ lânkận mìɲ ɣấp haj ɲượkbằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zaw lừʔa ciên hɔặk súkvật nàʔɔ xák cɔ lânkận mìɲ ɣiữ cết ɣãʔi ɣiò hăjlà duổʔi di xôŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi tʰì haj dàŋ fảʔi lấʔi zɛɲ Ðứkzê tʰề hầʔu cɔbiết zằŋ ŋườʔi ɣiữ súkvật kó dặt tăj cêntàʔi kủʔa lânkận mìɲ căŋ ŋườʔi củ kɔn fảʔi ɲậnlờʔi tʰề ŋườʔi kiə cẳŋ bồʔitʰườŋ kòn nếʔu kɔn cộm tʰì ŋườʔi lãɲ ɣiữ fảʔi tʰườŋ bồʔi cɔ củ nếʔu kɔn tʰúzừŋ sé cết ŋườʔi lãɲ ɣiữ fảʔi dɛm za làmcứŋ xôŋ fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ sé dó vì ʔaimượn ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ kɔn ɣãʔi ɣiò hɔặk cết xôŋ kómặt củ tʰì ʔaj dó fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ nếʔu củ kómặt tạʔi dó tʰì xôŋ fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ nếʔu kɔn dã cɔ tʰì ɣiá tʰế cɔ bồʔitʰườŋ nếʔu nàʔɔ hòʔa zụ vớʔi ŋườʔi ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ cưʔa hứʔa ɣiá tʰì dó fảʔi síɲ kướʔi nàŋ ɲượkbằŋ ca nàŋ kwiết từcốʔi xôŋ ɣả tʰì dó fảʔi bằŋ síɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ ŋươʔi cớ dể kák dồŋkốt sốŋ kẻ nàʔɔ kùŋ kɔn sửtử kẻ nàʔɔ kák tʰần xák mộtmìɲ Ðứkzê ziệt ŋươʔi cớ bạkdãʔi xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kũŋ cẳŋ kák ŋươʔi dã làmxác kiềʔu ŋụ tạʔi sứ zíptô kák ŋươʔi cớ ứciếp ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa hăjlà mồkôʔi nàʔɔ nếʔu ứciếp kêʔuvan cắk ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔu kủʔa kơn nóŋzận fừŋ lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi cởnên ɣóʔabụʔa kɔn kák ŋươʔi mồkôʔi cɔŋ zân kó ŋèʔɔnàn kùŋ ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cớ sử vớʔi ɲư ŋườʔi cɔ văj kũŋ cẳŋ cịʔulờʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi kầm áʔɔsốŋ kủʔa lânkận mìɲ kủʔa tʰìfảʔi cả cɔ cướk xi mặtcờʔi dồ cỉ kó cɛ tʰân áʔɔsốŋ cɛdậʔi za mìɲ ŋườʔi lấʔi ci ŋủ nếʔu ŋườʔi dến kêʔuvan ŋɛ lờʔi ŋườʔi Ðấŋ hăj tʰươŋsót ŋươʔi cớ nóʔi lộŋŋôn kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ dừŋ zủʔasả vwɛcúʔa kủʔa zânsự ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ cễnảʔi zâŋ cɔ ɲữŋ hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa ŋươʔi cứʔa cɔŋ vựʔa zượʔu cảʔi nơʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ cɔ kɔncaj dầʔulòŋ ŋươʔi về fần ciên ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi dầʔu kɔn dầʔulòŋ kùŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋươʔi hãʔi zâŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa cớ tʰịt ci tʰúzừŋ sé ŋɔàʔi dồŋ hãʔi liệŋ cɔ có ŋươʔi cớ dồn hwiễn cớ hùʔa kùŋ huŋák dặŋ làmcứŋ zốʔi ŋươʔi cớ hùʔa dảŋ dôŋ dặŋ kwấʔi xi ŋươʔi làmcứŋ cɔŋ việk kiệnkáʔɔ cớ cở tʰeo fɛ dôŋ fạm kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi cớ ŋèʔɔ cɔŋ việk kiệnkáʔɔ ɲượkbằŋ ŋươʔi ɣặp hăj lừʔa kủʔa tʰùŋịc mìɲ di lạk tʰì buộk fảʔi dɛm cɔ ŋộ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi lừʔa kủʔa ɣét mìɲ cở nặŋ fảʔi kwị cớ xá ŋơ fảʔi kứʔu cɔ dượk ɲẹ cɔŋ kơn kiệnkáʔɔ ŋươʔi cớ fạm kwiềnlợʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ ɣiữʔa vòŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cáɲ sa kák lờʔi ɣiảzốʔi cớ ɣiết vôtộʔi kôŋbìɲ cẳŋ tʰa zanák dâʔu ŋươʔi cớ ɲậm kủʔa hốʔilộ kủʔa hốʔilộ ŋườʔi tʰượŋ cí zwiênzɔ kủʔa kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi cớ hiếpdáp ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ kák ŋươʔi dã kiềʔu ŋụ tạʔi sứ zíptô cíɲ kák ŋươʔi hiểʔubiết lòŋ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ tʰếnàʔɔ cảʔi sáʔu ŋươʔi hãʔi zeo cɔŋ dất tʰâʔu lấʔi hwalợʔi ɲưŋ kwa tʰứbảʔi hãʔi dể dất hwaŋ cɔ ŋỉ hầʔu cɔ ŋèʔɔxổ cɔŋ zânsự ŋươʔi dượk ɲờ lấʔi hwakwả dất dó kòn zư lạʔi bawɲiêʔu tʰúvật ŋɔàʔi dồŋ lấʔi kũŋ hãʔi ɲưvậʔi ɲɔ kâʔi livɛ luôn cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi hãʔi ŋỉ hầʔu cɔ lừʔa ŋươʔi dượk ŋỉ kùŋ kɔncaj kủʔa dầʔitớ ɣáʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ dượk zưỡŋsứk lạʔi ŋươʔi xá ɣiữ mọʔi lờʔi fán kùŋ ŋươʔi cớ sưŋ dến zɛɲ kák tʰần xák cớ cɔ ŋɛ zɛɲ dó nơʔi miệŋ ŋươʔi za mỗʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữ kíɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn fảʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi mùʔa tʰáŋ lúʔa cỗ ɲư lờʔi dã fán zặn cɔŋ tʰáŋ dó ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô lạʔi cẳŋ ʔaj tăjxôŋ dến cướk ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ mùʔamàŋ tứklà mùʔa hwakwả dầʔutiên kủʔa kôŋlaw ŋươʔi kák ɣiốŋ ŋươʔi dã zeo ŋɔàʔi dồŋ ɣiữ mùʔa ɣặt lúk kuốʔi xi kák ŋươʔi dã háʔi hwakwả kủʔa kôŋlaw mìɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ zồʔi mỗʔi kák ŋườʔi fảʔi dến cướk cúʔa tứklà Ðứkzê ŋươʔi cớ zâŋ hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuŋ vớʔi báɲ kó fa mɛn kòn kủʔa zâŋ ɲằm ŋàʔi kíɲ cớ dể cọn dêm dến sáŋmaj ɲữŋ hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa dất ŋươʔi fảʔi dɛm dến dền tʰờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ nấʔu zê kɔn cɔŋ sữʔa Ðâʔi nầʔi saj tʰiênsứ di cướk ŋươʔi dặŋ fùhộ cɔŋ lúk di dườŋ dưʔa ŋươʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi dã zựbị cướk ŋườʔi ŋươʔi xá ɣiữmìɲ fảʔi ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi cớ fảnŋịc ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰa tộʔi ŋươʔi dâʔu zɛɲ ŋự cɔŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi cămcỉ ŋɛ lờʔi ŋườʔi kùŋ tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi fán tʰùŋịc kùŋ tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi dốʔidịc vớʔi dốʔidịc ŋươʔi vì tʰiênsứ di cướkmắt dưʔa ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ kủʔa zân ʔamôzít zân hêtít zân fêzêsít zân kanaan zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít zồʔi ziệt cúŋnó ŋươʔi cớ kwì lạʔi hầʔu việk kák tʰần cúŋnó cớ bắtcướk kôŋviệk ɲưŋ fảʔi ziệt kák tʰần dó dạp kák fɔ tượŋ di ŋươʔi hãʔi hầʔu việk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋàʔi cɔ ănuốŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi tiêʔucừ kák bịɲ hɔạn ɣiữʔa vòŋ ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó dànbà sảʔɔ tʰaj hăjlà dànbà sɔnsẻ ta cɔ ŋươʔi dượk cườŋtʰọ ta saj kiɲ xiếp di cướk ŋươʔi dến zân nàʔɔ cɔ zân ấʔi cạʔi lạk dườŋ cɔ tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi sâʔi lưŋ cướk ŋươʔi ta saj ʔɔŋ di cướk dáɲduổʔi zân hêvít zân kanaan zân hêtít xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ta cẳŋ duổʔi cúŋnó di cɔŋ dâʔu ʔɛ xi sứ cởnên dồŋ vắŋ lɔàʔi tʰúzừŋ sɛɲ za dôŋ hạʔi ŋươʔi căŋ ɲưŋ duổʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu kótʰể kầm dất dó sảnŋiệp ta fândịɲ bờkõʔi ŋươʔi biển dỏ cí filitin dồŋ vắŋ dến sôŋkáʔi zaw fú zân dó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi mìɲ ŋươʔi dừŋ kếtzaw ướk kùŋ cúŋnó hɔặk kùŋ kák tʰần kủʔa cúŋnó họ cẳŋ cɔŋ sứ ŋươʔi dâʔu ʔɛ xi cúŋnó suj cɔ ŋươʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ hầʔu việk kák tʰần căŋ diềʔu dó cắk tʰàɲ káʔi bẫʔi cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi ʔazôn nadáp ʔabihu kùŋ bảʔi mươʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên hãʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê dằŋ sa lạʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ môʔisɛ dến ɣần Ðứkzê tʰôʔi kòn xôŋ dến ɣần zânsự kùŋ xôŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi môʔisɛ dến tʰuật lạʔi cɔ zânsự mọʔi lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê kák tʰì cúŋ dồŋ tʰiɲ dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi mọʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê fán zạʔi môʔisɛ cép mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê zồʔi zậʔi sâʔi bàntʰờ nơʔi cân núʔi zựŋ mườʔihaj kâʔi cụ cỉ mườʔihaj cifáʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi saj caicẻ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên di zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê bằŋ kɔn môʔisɛ lấʔi fânnửʔa hwiết dựŋ cɔŋ kák cậʔu kòn fânnửʔa tʰì zướʔi cên bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi kầm kwiển sác zawướk dọk cɔ zânsự ŋɛ tʰì zânsự nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi vâŋ tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê fán cỉ môʔisɛ lấʔi hwiết zướʔi cên mìɲ zânsự nóʔi zằŋ Ðâʔi hwiết zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔi tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi nầʔi Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ ʔazôn nadáp ʔabihu kùŋ bảʔi mươʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu núʔi ŋó tʰấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên zướʔi cân ŋàʔi kó ɣiốŋ bícŋọk cɔŋ ŋần xáknàʔɔ ɲư sắk cờʔi tʰɛɲ kwaŋ ŋàʔi cẳŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tôncọŋ cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ ŋó tʰấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì ʔuốŋ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi núʔi dếnkùŋ lạʔi dó cɔ ŋươʔi bảŋ dá luậtfáp kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa dã cép dặŋ zạʔi zânsự môʔisɛ cờ zậʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê hầʔu mìɲ zồʔi môʔisɛ di núʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi dợʔi cúŋtôʔi tạʔi dâʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ cởvề kùŋ kák ŋươʔi nầʔi ʔazôn huzơ lạʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔaj kó việk ci hãʔi hỏʔi haj ŋườʔi dó vậʔi môʔisɛ núʔi mâʔi cɛfủ núʔi sự viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi núʔi sina ʔi cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi mâʔi fủ núʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi Ðứkzê ŋự cɔŋ dám mâʔi ɣọʔi môʔisɛ kảɲ cạŋ kủʔa viɲkwaŋ Ðứkzê nơʔi dỉɲ núʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên xáknàʔɔ ɲư dám lửʔa hừŋ môʔisɛ vàʔɔ ɣiữʔa dám mâʔi núʔi tạʔi dó cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên dặŋ zâŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲận lấʔi kủʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi kó lòŋtʰàɲ zâŋ cɔ nầʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi kủʔa vàŋ bạk dồŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj lôŋ zê za ciên dựk ɲuộm dỏ za ká nượk kâʔi zầʔu tʰắp hươŋliệʔu dặŋ zầʔu sứk hươŋ bícŋọk kùŋ kák tʰứ ŋọk xák dể ɣắn vàʔɔ fót bảŋ deo ŋựk họ cɔ dền tʰáɲ ɣiữʔa hãʔi diềʔu dó ʔiɲư kiểʔu dền kùŋ kiểʔu kák dồzùŋ cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi cúŋ hãʔi dóŋ káʔi bằŋ kâʔi zàʔi haj tʰướk zưỡʔi ŋaŋ tʰướk zưỡʔi kaw kũŋ tʰướk zưỡʔi lấʔi vàŋzòŋ bọk cɔŋ bọk ŋɔàʔi cạʔi dườŋ cuŋkwɛɲ bằŋ vàŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi dúk xwen bằŋ vàŋ dể tạʔi ɣók haj káʔi hôŋ nầʔi haj káʔi hôŋ kiə kùŋ haj kâʔi dòn bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ zồʔi dòn vàʔɔ xwen haj hôŋ dể zùŋ dòn xiêŋ cɔŋ xwen xôŋ zút za ŋươʔi hãʔi kất vàʔɔ cɔŋ bảŋ cứŋ cɔ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi káʔi tʰiân bằŋ vàŋzòŋ zàʔi haj tʰướk zưỡʔi ŋaŋ tʰướk zưỡʔi lạʔi haj tượŋ cê zubin bằŋ vàŋ ɣiát mỏŋ dể haj dầʔu tʰiân za ŋɔàʔi tượŋ dầʔu nầʔi tượŋ dầʔu kiə haj cê zubin káɲ za cɛ cên tʰiân dốʔiziện ɲăw sâʔi vàʔɔ tʰiân ŋươʔi hãʔi dể tʰiân cên zồʔi dể vàʔɔ cɔŋ bảŋ cứŋ cɔ ta ɣặp ŋươʔi tạʔi dó cên tʰiân ɣiữʔa haj tượŋ cê zubin cên bảŋ cứŋ cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi kák mạŋ lịɲ zân ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi dóŋ káʔi bằŋ kâʔi zàʔi haj tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw tʰướk zưỡʔi bọk bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cạʔi dườŋ cuŋkwɛɲ zồʔi bɛ cɔ kaw cừŋ ŋóntăj cạʔi cɔ bɛ dườŋ vàŋ lạʔi dúk káʔi xwen vàŋ ca vàʔɔ ɣók nơʔi cân xwen ɣần bɛ dể sỏ dòn xiêŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi cuốt dòn bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ zồʔi ŋườʔita zùŋ xiêŋ dó lạʔi hãʔi lấʔi vàŋzòŋ zĩʔa cén cậʔu li dặŋ zùŋ kwán cên ŋươʔi dể báɲ cầntʰiết cɔ kó cướk ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi cân dèn bằŋ vàŋzòŋ káʔi cân káʔi tʰân káʔi dàʔi káʔi bầʔu kùŋ káʔi hwa kủʔa dèn dềʔu làmbằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát haj tʰân dèn kó sáʔu ɲáɲ za ɲáɲ nầʔi ɲáɲ kiə cɔŋ sáʔu ɲáɲ za cên cân dèn mỗʔi ɲáɲ dềʔu kó káʔi dàʔi hìɲɲư hạɲɲân kùŋ bầʔu hwa cên tʰân cân dèn lạʔi kũŋ kó káʔi dàʔi hìɲ hạɲɲân bầʔu hwa cɔŋ sáʔu ɲáɲ tʰân cân dèn za kứ mỗʔi haj ɲáɲ tʰì zướʔi kó káʔi bầʔu bầʔu kùŋ ɲáɲ kủʔa cân dèn dềʔu bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ŋwiên miếŋ dáɲ ɣiát ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi bảʔi káʔi tʰếp dèn dặŋ xi tʰắp tʰì ciếʔu cướk cân dèn kéʔɔ kùŋdồ dựŋ dèn kũŋ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ŋườʔita zùŋ lâŋ vàŋzòŋ cân dèn nầʔi kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa cân dèn vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi sɛm kứ ʔiɲư kiểʔu dã cỉ cɔ cên núʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi zùŋ mườʔi bứk dền zệt bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ kó tʰêʔu kák hìɲ cê zubin kựk sảʔɔ mỗʔi bứk zàʔi haimươʔitám tʰướk zộŋ tʰướk kák bứk dềʔu dồŋ kỡ vớʔi ɲăw mỗʔi bứk kếtzíɲ lạʔi ɲăw ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰắt vòŋ cỉ nơʔi ciêŋ kủʔa bứk tʰứ ɲất dầʔu bứk ŋwiên kũŋ ɲưvậʔi cɔ dầʔu cót kủʔa bứk kuốʔi cɔŋ bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲì lạʔi nămcụk káʔi vòŋ cɔ bứk tʰứ ɲất nămcụk káʔi vòŋ nơʔi dầʔu ciêŋ bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲì kák vòŋ haj dốʔi ɲăw kũŋ hãʔi nămmươʔi káʔi mók bằŋ vàŋ zồʔi mók bứk ŋwiên nầʔi kwa bứk ŋwiên kiə hầʔu cɔ dền lạʔi tʰàɲ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi mườʔimột bứk bằŋ lôŋ zê dể zùŋ bɔŋ cɛ cên dền bề zàʔi mỗʔi bứk cụk tʰướk zộŋ tʰướk mườʔimột bứk dồŋ kỡ vớʔi ɲăw ŋươʔi hãʔi bứk nầʔi ziêŋ za sáʔu bứk kiə ziêŋ za ɲưŋ hãʔi ɣấp dôʔi bứk tʰứsáʔu cướk dền lạʔi tʰắt nămcụk káʔi vòŋ nơʔi ciêŋ tʰứ ɲất kuốʔi kủʔa bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲất nămcụk káʔi vòŋ nơʔi ciêŋ kủʔa bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲì kũŋ nămcụk káʔi mók bằŋ dồŋ mók vàʔɔ vòŋ zồʔi káʔi bɔŋ lạʔi dể tʰàɲza ɲưŋ kòn zư tứklà fânnửʔa kủʔa bứk zư cɔŋ bứk bɔŋ ŋwiên tʰì sủ suốŋ fíʔa săw dền fần zàʔi zư cɔŋ kák bứk kủʔa bɔŋ nầʔi tʰướk kiə tʰướk tʰì sủ suốŋ haj hôŋ dền dặŋ cɛ vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi fủ bằŋ za ciên dựk ɲuộm dỏ dể cên bɔŋ fủ bằŋ za ká nượk dắp cên nữʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi ɲữŋ cɔ vác dền bằŋ kâʔi mỗʔi cướŋ mườʔi tʰướk hɔàɲ tʰướk zưỡʔi kó haj káʔi mộŋ ɲăw hếttʰảʔi kák vác dền ŋươʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi về fíʔa dền ŋươʔi hãʔi haimươʔi zướʔi haimươʔi hãʔi dặt mươʔi mộŋ bằŋ bạk kứ haj mộŋ zướʔi dể cịʔu haj káʔi mộŋ kủʔa mỗʔi lạʔi hãʔi haimươʔi fíʔa bắk dền mươʔi mộŋ bằŋ bạk kứ zướʔi mỗʔi kó haj mộŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi sáʔu fíʔa săw dền tứklà hướŋ tâʔi về haj ɣók fíʔa săw dền fảʔi haj xít ɲăw zướʔi cí cên bởʔi káʔi xwen nơʔi dầʔu haj káʔi ɣók dềʔu ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì kó mườʔisáʔu mộŋ bằŋ bạk kứ haj mộŋ zướʔi mỗʔimột lạʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kâʔi sàŋaŋ bằŋ ɣỗ cɔ ɲữŋ fíʔa nầʔi kâʔi sàŋaŋ fíʔa kiə kâʔi sàŋaŋ xák nữʔa fíʔa săw kủʔa dền tứklà hướŋ tâʔi kâʔi sàŋaŋ ɣiữʔa tʰân ɣiữʔa ɲữŋ cạʔi dầʔu nầʔi dến dầʔu kiə kũŋ hãʔi lấʔi vàŋ bọk kùŋ sàŋaŋ ɲữŋ xwen bằŋ vàŋ dặŋ sỏ kák kâʔi sàŋaŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi zựŋ dền ʔiɲư kiểʔu dã cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi cên núʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi bứk bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ kó tʰêʔu ɲữŋ hìɲ cê zubin kựk sảʔɔ zồʔi sủ dó cên cụ bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ zựŋ cên cụ bằŋ bạk kák mók cụ dềʔu bằŋ vàŋ ŋươʔi ceo dó vàʔɔ mók zướʔi bứk bɔŋ zồʔi fíʔa cɔŋ dể bảŋ cứŋ nầʔi zùŋ fânbiệt cɔ kák ŋươʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ Ðʔɔạn hãʔi dể káʔi tʰiân cên bảŋ cứŋ dặt cɔŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ bên ŋɔàʔi bứk fíʔa bắk dền tʰì dể káʔi kòn kâʔi cân dèn tʰì dể fíʔa dốʔi ŋaŋ káʔi về kửʔa cạʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi bứk bằŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu kó tʰêʔu kựk sảʔɔ zồʔi cɔ bứk nầʔi káʔi cụ bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ diɲ kũŋ bằŋ vàŋ dúk cụ bằŋ dồŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi dóŋ bàntʰờ bằŋ kâʔi hìɲvuôŋ tʰướk zàʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ kaw tʰướk nơʔi ɣók bàntʰờ hãʔi sừŋ za bọk dồŋ ɲữŋ dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ tʰì hãʔi làmbằŋ dồŋ bìɲ dựŋ cɔ ảŋ nỉʔa bìɲ hươŋ lạʔi cɔ bàntʰờ zá bằŋ lướʔi dồŋ nơʔi ɣók zá káʔi xwen bằŋ dồŋ zồʔi dể zá dó zướʔi tʰàɲ bàntʰờ zướʔi cân dến nửʔa kaw kũŋ hãʔi cuốt dòn xiêŋ bàntʰờ bằŋ kâʔi bọk dồŋ zồʔi sỏ vàʔɔ ɲữŋ xwen xi xiêŋ di dòn haj bàntʰờ bàntʰờ dóŋ bằŋ cốŋ bộŋ ʔiɲư dã cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi cên núʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi káʔi hàɲlaŋ cɔ dền về fíʔa kủʔa hàɲlaŋ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu zàʔi căm tʰướk kùŋ haicụk kâʔi cụ haicụk cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ nuôŋ cụ tʰì bằŋ bạk về fíʔa bắk kũŋ vậʔi dó kó căm tʰướk zàʔi haicụk kâʔi cụ haicụk cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ nuôŋ cụ tʰì bằŋ bạk bố kủʔa hàɲlaŋ fíʔa tâʔi kó nămcụk tʰướk zàʔi mườʔi kâʔi cụ mườʔi cụ bề ŋaŋ kủʔa hàɲlaŋ fíʔa cướk tứklà fíʔa dôŋ kó nămcụk tʰướk fíʔa hữʔu kó mườʔilăm tʰướk kâʔi cụ cụ fíʔa kó mườʔilăm tʰướk kâʔi cụ cụ kòn kửʔa hàɲlaŋ kó bứk zàʔi haicụk tʰướk bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ kó tʰêʔu kùŋ kâʔi cụ cụ hếttʰảʔi cụ suŋkwɛɲ hàɲlaŋ dềʔu kó ɲờ nuôŋ bạk cắp lạʔi vớʔi ɲăw diɲ cụ tʰì bằŋ bạk cụ tʰì bằŋ dồŋ bề zàʔi kủʔa hàɲlaŋ dượk mộtcăm tʰướk ŋaŋ mỗʔi fíʔa nămcụk tʰướk kaw tʰướk bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu kòn ɲữŋ cụ tʰì bằŋ dồŋ hếttʰảʔi dồ fụtùŋ zùŋ kák việk fụŋsự cɔŋ dền kùŋ kâʔi nọk kủʔa dền kâʔi nọk kủʔa hàɲlaŋ dềʔu làmbằŋ dồŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dɛm dến zầʔu lọk livɛ dặŋ tʰắp dèn cɔ dèn sáŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ŋɔàʔi cướk bảŋ cứŋ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi lɔ sửʔasɔạn dèn hầʔu cɔ cướk Ðứkzê dèn cáʔi tốʔi cɔdến sáŋ Ấʔilà dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi ɣiữ cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi hãʔi cọn ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi nadáp ʔabihu lêʔasa ʔitʰama cứk cướk ŋươʔi hãʔi cế áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi dể ŋườʔi dượk viɲhiển caŋsứk hãʔi cwiền cɔ hếttʰảʔi tʰôŋmiɲ ŋườʔita dã dầʔi tíɲ cí cế áʔɔ cɔ ʔazôn dặŋ ŋườʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔilàm cứk cướk Ðâʔi áʔɔ cế bảŋ deo ŋựk êfót áʔɔzàʔi áʔɔlá cɔŋ tʰêʔu daj tʰếtʰì cế áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dể kák ŋườʔi dó cứk cướk họ zùŋ kimtwiến cỉ màʔu dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj họ cế fót bằŋ kimtwiến cỉ màʔu dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu tʰêʔu kựk sảʔɔ haj fót haj daj vaj dâʔu dầʔuvàʔɔ fót Ðʔaj dể kột fót fíʔa ŋɔàʔi ŋwiên miếŋ kũŋɲư kôŋviệk fót bằŋ kimtwiến cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi haj bícŋọk xắk kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên cên sáʔu cên bícŋọk nầʔi sáʔu cên bícŋọk kiə tùʔi tʰeo tʰứtự ŋàʔisiɲ kủʔa fảʔi xắk kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên cên haj bícŋọk dó ɲư kác kủʔa tʰợ xắk kɔnzấʔu xảm cɔŋ xuôn bằŋ vàŋ Ðʔɔạn ɣắn haj bícŋọk dó cên haj daj vaj fót zùŋ ŋọk kɔncáʔu ʔisơzaên ʔazôn maŋ kủʔa cên haj vaj mìɲ cướk Ðứkzê ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi mók ɣàʔi bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ haj sợʔi zâʔicwiền ɲỏ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ɲư hìɲ zâʔi zồʔi dể cwiền dáɲ ɲưtʰế vàʔɔ mók ɣàʔi bảŋ deo ŋựk sétdɔán ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi cɔ kựk sảʔɔ ʔiɲư fót tứklà bằŋ kimtwiến cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu bảŋ deo ŋựk hìɲvuôŋ măj zàʔi ʔɛm ŋaŋ ʔɛm ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣắn hàŋ ŋọk vàʔɔ bảŋ deo ŋựk hàŋ tʰứ ɲất ɣắn ŋọk mãnãʔɔ ŋọk hồŋ bíc ŋọk lụk bửʔu hàŋ tʰứ ɲì ŋọk fỉ túʔi ŋọk bửʔu ŋọk kimkươŋ hàŋ tʰứba ŋọk hồŋ bửʔu ŋọk bạc mãnãʔɔ ŋọk tiɲ hàŋ tʰứtư ŋọk huỳɲ bíc ŋọk hồŋ mãnãʔɔ bícŋọk kák ŋọk nầʔi xảm vàʔɔ xuôn bằŋ vàŋ số kák ŋọk dó hếttʰảʔi mườʔihaj tùʔi tʰeo kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên cên mỗʔi ŋọk xắk kủʔa cɔŋ mườʔihaj cifáʔi ʔisơzaên ɲư ŋườʔita xắk kɔnzấʔu vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kák sợʔi cwiền bằŋ vàŋzòŋ dáɲ ɲư hìɲ zâʔi cwiền cên bảŋ deo ŋựk zồʔi haj xwɛɲ bằŋ vàŋ dể haj ɣók dầʔu cên bảŋ kùŋ kột haj sợʔi cwiền vàŋ vàʔɔ haj xwɛɲ nơʔi haj dầʔubảŋ haj dầʔu sợʔi cwiền kột vàʔɔ mók ɣàʔi dɔạn ɣắn cên haj daj vaj fót fíʔa dằŋ cướk ŋựk ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi haj káʔi xwɛɲ bằŋ vàŋ nữʔa dể vàʔɔ haj ɣók dầʔu zướʔi kủʔa bảŋ deo ŋựk fíʔa cɔŋ fót lạʔi haj xwɛɲ xák nữʔa bằŋ vàŋ ɣắn vàʔɔ haj dầʔu zướʔi daj vaj fót fíʔa cướk cên daj ɣần cỗ ɣiáp mốʔi zồʔi sợʔi zâʔi màʔu kột haj káʔi xwɛɲ kủʔa bảŋ deo ŋựk lạʔi kùŋ haj káʔi xwɛɲ fót hầʔu cɔ zíɲ vớʔi daj dừŋ zớt xỏʔi fót tʰếtʰì xi nàʔɔ ʔazôn vàʔɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ maŋ cên lòŋ mìɲ kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên nơʔi bảŋ deo ŋựk sétdɔán dặŋ ɣiữ cướk Ðứkzê cên bảŋ deo ŋựk kủʔa sétdɔán ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣắn ʔu zim tʰu vàʔɔ dặŋ xi ʔazôn dến cướk Ðứkzê tʰì kák dó cên lòŋ mìɲ Ấʔi vậʔi cướk Ðứkzê ʔazôn maŋ sétdɔán kủʔa kɔncaj ʔisơzaên cên lòŋ mìɲ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi măj áʔɔzàʔi kủʔa fót tɔàn bằŋ vảʔi ɣiữʔa áʔɔ kó còŋ dầʔuvàʔɔ cuŋkwɛɲ zệt ɲư áʔɔzáp lướʔi dể cɔ xỏʔi nơʔi zướʔi hãʔi tʰắt cáʔi lựʔu màʔu dỏ diềʔu dỏ kùŋ cuôŋ vàŋ ɲỏ dan céʔɔ ɲăw vòŋ tʰeo ŋĩʔalà káʔi cuôŋ zồʔi cáʔi lựʔu vòŋ xắp cuŋkwɛɲ áʔɔ xi ʔazôn hầʔu việk mặk áʔɔ dó xi vàʔɔ hăj za nơʔi tʰáɲ cướk Ðứkzê ŋườʔita ŋɛ tiếŋ cuôŋ vàŋ ɲỏ ʔazôn xỏʔi cết vậʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi káʔi tʰẻ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cên dó xắk ɲư ŋườʔita xắk kɔnzấʔu zằŋ tʰáɲcɔÐứkzê zồʔi lấʔi sợʔi zâʔi màʔu buộk tʰẻ dó dể cên dằŋ cướk káʔi tʰẻ dó cên cán ʔazôn ʔazôn ɣáɲ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên fạm cɔŋ xi zâŋ kủʔa tʰáɲ tʰẻ dó nơʔi cán ʔazôn dể zânsự dượk dẹp Ðứkzê ŋươʔi hãʔi cế káʔi áʔɔlá mặk cɔŋ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj káʔi bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj káʔi daj tʰêʔu ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi cế cɔ kák kɔncaj ʔazôn áʔɔlá daj hầʔu cɔ dượk viɲhiển caŋsứk Ðʔɔạn hãʔi lấʔi kák áʔɔ dó mặk cɔ ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi hãʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dể cứk cướk hãʔi cế cɔ kwầnlót cɔŋ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dặŋ cɛ lõʔalồ mặk ŋaŋ lưŋ kwần cɔdến ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi mặk kwần dó cɔŋ xi vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk hăjlà dến ɣần bàntʰờ dặŋ làmviệk cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ tʰì cẳŋ mắk tộʔi cẳŋ cết dâʔu Ấʔilà mạŋ lịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ ʔazôn zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi Ðâʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi dặŋ ziêŋ ʔazôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dể cứk cướk hãʔi kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk xôŋ zùŋ tʰiệt báɲ xôŋ mɛn báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn ɲồʔi vớʔi zầʔu báɲcáŋ xôŋ mɛn zầʔu zồʔi dể kák báɲ dó cɔŋ ɣiỏ zâŋ kùŋ dựk haj ciên dựk Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi biểʔu ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến ɣần nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk zồʔi lấʔi nướk cɔ kế dó lấʔi áʔɔ mặk cɔ ʔazôn tứklà áʔɔlá mặk cɔŋ áʔɔzàʔi kủʔa fót êfót bảŋ deo ŋựk zồʔi lấʔi daj kủʔa fót tʰắtlưŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dɔạn dộʔi káʔi dầʔu dể tʰẻ tʰáɲ cên kùŋ lấʔi zầʔu sứk dổ cên dầʔu sứk cɔ ŋườʔi lạʔi biểʔu kák kɔncaj ʔazôn dến ɣần mặk áʔɔlá cɔ zồʔi lấʔi daj tʰắtlưŋ dộʔi cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi tʰếtʰì cứk bởʔi mạŋ lịɲ dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi tʰế Ðʔɔạn hãʔi zắt kɔn dựk lạʔi ɣần cướk hộʔi mạk ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn dó ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiết dựk cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk zồʔi lấʔi hwiết dó ɲúŋ ŋóntăj vàʔɔ bôʔi kák sừŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ dổ xắp zướʔi cân bàntʰờ kũŋ hãʔi lấʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ bọk zuột za mỏŋ bọk ɣan haj cáʔi kật cên cáʔi kật dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ɲưŋ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân hãʔi tʰiêʔu tʰịt za fẩn kủʔa kɔn dựk dó ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi cɔŋ haj kɔnciên dựk ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu zồʔi ɣiết ciên dựk dó lấʔi hwiết zướʔi xắp cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ kế dó ciên za từŋ miếŋ zửʔa sạc lòŋ ɣiò di zồʔi dể cên kák miếŋ dã dầʔu dɔạn sôŋ kả kɔnciên dựk tạʔi cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tứklà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê vậʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi hãʔi kɔnciên dựk tʰứ ɲì ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu zồʔi ŋươʔi ɣiết ciên dựk dó lấʔi hwiết bôʔi nơʔi cáʔitaj hữʔu kủʔa ʔazôn kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cên ŋónkáʔi bàntăj ŋónkáʔi bàncân hwiết kòn zư hãʔi zướʔi cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi hwiết nơʔi bàntʰờ zầʔu sứk zảʔi cên mìɲ kwầnáʔɔ ʔazôn kùŋ cên mìɲ kwầnáʔɔ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲưvậʔi ʔazôn kùŋ kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kùŋ kwầnáʔɔ dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ vì kớ ciên dựk dó zùŋ cwiền cứk ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi duôʔi bọk zuột za mỏŋ bọk ɣan haj cáʔi kật kùŋ cên cáʔi kật ɣiò hữʔu lạʔi lấʔi báɲ báɲ ɲỏ ɲồʔi vớʔi zầʔu káʔi báɲcáŋ cɔŋ ɣiỏ báɲ xôŋ mɛn dể cướk Ðứkzê zồʔi ŋươʔi dể mấʔi dó cɔŋ lòŋ bàntăj ʔazôn cɔŋ lòŋ bàntăj kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn hãʔi lấʔi za xỏʔi bàntăj dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ cên kủʔa tʰiêʔu dể cɔ kó mùʔi tʰơm cướk Ðứkzê ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kũŋ hãʔi lấʔi káʔi ʔɔ ciên dựk ʔazôn dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ấʔi fần ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ káʔi ʔɔ ɣiò kủʔa ciên dựk dã zùŋ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi tứklà ʔɔ dã dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi ɣiò dã ɣiơ lễvật nầʔi zɔ nơʔi ʔisơzaên zâŋ cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ dờʔidờʔi dã diềʔu cɔ bởʔi cɔŋ kák kủʔa tʰù kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tứklà kủʔa ɣiơ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê vậʔi ɲữŋ áʔɔ tʰáɲ kủʔa ʔazôn dể lạʔi cɔ kák kɔncaj nốʔi săw ŋườʔi dể mặk áʔɔ dó dượk sứk zầʔu cɔŋ cứk ʔaj cɔŋ vòŋ kɔncaj ŋườʔi dượk tʰầʔi tʰế cɔ ŋươʔi dến hộʔi mạk dặŋ hầʔu việk tạʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ tʰì mặk áʔɔ dó cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi hãʔi kɔnciên dựk zùŋ tʰiếtlập nấʔu tʰịt cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi tʰịt ciên dựk dó kùŋ báɲ cɔŋ ɣiỏ nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk vậʔi kák nầʔi bởʔi dó dượk cuộk tộʔi dể ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ɲưŋ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ cẳŋ dượk kák dó dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ zồʔi nếʔu tʰịt tʰiếtlập báɲ kòn zư lạʔi dến ŋàʔimaj ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰiêʔu cɔŋ lửʔa cớ kủʔa dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ vậʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu fán zặn ŋươʔi hãʔi cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi mỗʔi ŋàʔi hãʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk dặŋ cuộk tộʔi zâŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kùŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ dể bàntʰờ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ bàntʰờ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ bàntʰờ cởnên zất tʰáɲ fàm ci dụŋ dến dềʔu dượk tʰáɲ vậʔi Ðâʔi kák diềʔu ŋươʔi zâŋ bàntʰờ haj ciên kɔnmột tuổʔi mỗʔi ŋàʔi tʰườŋtʰườŋ ɲưvậʔi buổʔi sớmmaj ŋươʔi hãʔi zâŋ cɔŋ haj ciên kɔn kɔntʰứ ɲì hãʔi zâŋ vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi vớʔi kɔnciên tʰứ ɲất hãʔi zâŋ fần mườʔi ɲồʔi vớʔi mộtfầntư zầʔu kùŋ kwán mộtfầntư zượʔuɲɔ về kɔnciên tʰứ ɲì hãʔi zâŋ vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi vớʔi kủʔa kwán ʔiɲư sớmmaj ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê Ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê nơʔi ɣiáŋ fán kùŋ ŋươʔi vậʔi kó tạʔi dó kùŋzân ʔisơzaên cỗ nầʔi viɲhiển dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ta hộʔi mạk kùŋ bàntʰờ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ kùŋ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ nữʔa dặŋ cứk cướk ta ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zân ấʔi zân ấʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋnó dã dɛm cúŋnó za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ ɣiữʔa vòŋ ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi dóŋ káʔi bàntʰờ bằŋ kâʔi dể sôŋ hươŋ mặt vuôŋ zàʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw haj tʰướk bàntʰờ kó sừŋ za ŋươʔi hãʔi bọk vàŋzòŋ cên kạɲ cuŋkwɛɲ kák sừŋ kòn cạʔi dườŋ vàŋ zướʔi dườŋ dó nơʔi haj hãʔi haj káʔi xwen bằŋ vàŋ dể sỏ dòn zùŋ dặŋ xiêŋ hãʔi cuốt dòn xiêŋ bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ ŋươʔi dể bàntʰờ dó cướk bứk cɛ bảŋ cứŋ dốʔi kùŋ tʰiân cên nơʔi ɣặp ŋươʔi mỗʔi buổʔi sớmmaj xi ʔazôn dèn sôŋ hươŋ tạʔi nơʔi dó vàʔɔ lúk ciềʔutốʔi xi ʔazôn tʰắp dèn kũŋ sôŋ hươŋ ấʔilà tʰứ hươŋ fảʔi sôŋ cướk Ðứkzê cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi cên bàntʰờ nầʔi cớ sôŋ hươŋ hɔặk zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj hăjlà kwán nàʔɔ ɲưŋ cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi mỗʔi ʔazôn lấʔi hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuộk tôʔi bôʔi cên sừŋ bàntʰờ nầʔi dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ Ấʔi việk zất tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ xi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi diểmsố zân ʔisơzaên dặŋ mỗʔi fảʔi dềnmạŋ mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ xỏʔi mắk tainạn ci cɔŋ xi kẻ nàʔɔ kó cɔŋ fảʔi nửʔa siếk tùʔi siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kận nặŋ haimươʔi ɣê za vậʔi nửʔa siếk tứklà kủʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê mọʔi ŋườʔi kó vàʔɔsổ haimươʔi tuổʔi zâŋ kủʔa nầʔi cɔ Ðứkzê xi zâŋ kủʔa nầʔi cɔ Ðứkzê dặŋ dềnmạŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu xôŋ cộʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xôŋ tʰiếʔu nửʔa siếk vậʔi ŋươʔi tʰâʔu dềnmạŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên zồʔi zùŋ dó vàʔɔ việk hộʔi mạk ấʔilà kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cướk Ðứkzê dặŋ dềnmạŋ mìɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ nữʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi káʔi tʰùŋ vớʔi cân tʰùŋ bằŋ dồŋ dặŋ zửʔa mìɲ cɔŋ zồʔi dể ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ kủʔa hộʔi mạk bàntʰờ dổ nướk vàʔɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zửʔa tăj cân mìɲ cɔŋ xi vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk lấʔi nướk zửʔa mìɲ hầʔu cɔ xỏʔi cết xi lạʔi ɣần bàntʰờ dặŋ fụŋsự tứklà sôŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kũŋ fảʔi ɣiữ ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì hãʔi zửʔa tăj cân hầʔu cɔ xỏʔi cết Ấʔilà dờʔidờʔi cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɣóp kák hươŋliệʔu ɲất zượk nướk nămcăm siếk hươŋ ɲụk kwế fânnửʔa dó tứklà haj căm zưỡʔi hươŋ sươŋbồ haj căm zưỡʔi kwếbì nămcăm dềʔu tʰeo siếk nơʔi tʰáɲ zầʔu livɛ ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi kák hươŋliệʔu dó tʰeo fép hòʔa hươŋ cế za tʰứ zầʔu tʰơm zùŋ zầʔu sứk tʰáɲ Ðʔɔạn lấʔi sứk cɔ hộʔi mạk kùŋ bảŋ cứŋ bàntʰờ kùŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ cân dèn kùŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kùŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ káʔi tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ Ấʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi kák nầʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ hầʔu cɔ zất tʰáɲ ci dụŋ dến dềʔu dượk tʰáɲ ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dể cứk cướk lạʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ về fần zầʔu nầʔi zầʔu sứk tʰáɲ cảʔi kwa mọʔi dờʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ dổ cên sáktʰịt lɔàʔiŋườʔi kũŋ dừŋ zầʔu nàʔɔ xák tʰeo fép hòʔa hươŋ dó zầʔu nầʔi tʰáɲ kũŋ tʰáɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi hễ ʔaj cế tʰứ hòʔa hươŋ ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi dɛm zướʔi cên mìɲ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cuất xỏʔi vòŋ zânsự Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ nữʔa zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kák hươŋliệʔu tứk hươŋ lwa ʔiểm hươŋ fɔŋ ci hươŋ kùŋ tʰɛɲ ɲũhươŋ mỗʔi tʰứ bằŋ ɲăw tʰeo fép hòʔa hươŋ cế za tʰứ hươŋ cɔŋ tʰáɲ hãʔi ŋiền za zồʔi dể cướk bảŋ cứŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk tứklà nơʔi ɣặp ŋươʔi fần kák ŋươʔi hươŋ nầʔi zất tʰáɲ kòn tʰứ hươŋ ŋươʔi cế cớ cế ɣiốŋ ɲư fép hòʔa hươŋ nầʔi ấʔilà ŋươʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê hễ nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ʔi ɲưvậʔi dặŋ ŋửʔi mùʔi cuất xỏʔi vòŋ zânsự Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ nữʔa zằŋ nầʔi dã kêʔu bếtsalêên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔuzi cáʔu kủʔa huzơ cɔŋ cifáʔi zuda ta dã cɔ ŋườʔi dầʔizẫʔi tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ hiểʔubiết dể mọʔi tʰứ ŋề tʰợ dặŋ bàʔi za cếtạʔɔ dồ vàŋ bạk dồŋ dặŋ xák xảm ŋọk dẽʔɔ ɣỗ dượk mọʔi tʰứ ŋề tʰợ Ðâʔi lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi fụ việk kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahisamạk cɔŋ cifáʔi Ðʔan ta kũŋ dã tʰôŋmiɲ cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi tàʔinăŋ hầʔu cɔ kák việk dã fán zặn ŋươʔi hộʔi mạk bảŋ cứŋ tʰiân cên kùŋ dồzùŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk bàntʰờ kùŋdồ fụtùŋ cân dèn bằŋ vàŋzòŋ dồ fụtùŋ bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ bàntʰờ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kùŋdồ fụtùŋ káʔi tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ áʔɔ áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn tʰầʔi kả áʔɔ cɔ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dặŋ cứk zầʔu sứk hươŋ tʰơm kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kák ŋườʔi dó fảʔi hếttʰảʔi tʰeo lờʔi dã fán zặn ŋươʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ fần ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ɲấtlà kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ ŋàʔi zấʔu ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa mọʔi dờʔi dể tʰiêɲạ zằŋ Ðứkzê cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰáɲ vậʔi hãʔi ɣiữ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰáɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi kẻ nàʔɔ fạm dến ŋàʔi dó fảʔi sửtử nàʔɔ việk ci cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kũŋ cuất xỏʔi vòŋ zânsự ŋườʔita kôŋviệk cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi tứklà ŋàʔi ŋỉ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ ŋàʔi ʔaj việk ci sửtử Ấʔi vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên ɣiữ ŋàʔi cảʔi kák dờʔi kủʔa ɲư zawướk dờʔidờʔi Ấʔilà zấʔu dờʔidờʔi cɔ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê dã zựŋ cờʔi dất cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ lấʔi sứk lạʔi xiÐứkzê dã fán sɔŋ kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi núʔi sina ʔi cɔ ŋườʔi haj bảŋ cứŋ bằŋ dá vớʔi ŋóntăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi za zânsự tʰấʔi môʔisɛ cên núʔi cậm suốŋ ɲóm lạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ʔazôn nóʔi zằŋ nàʔɔ hãʔi kák tʰần dể di cướk cúŋtôʔi di fần môʔisɛ nầʔi ŋườʔi dã zẫn cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ biếtdiềʔu ci dã sảʔi dến cɔ ŋườʔi zồʔi ʔazôn dáp zằŋ hãʔi ɲữŋ vòŋ vàŋ deo nơʔi taj kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kák ŋươʔi di zồʔi dɛm lạʔi cɔ hếttʰảʔi dềʔu vòŋ vàŋ nơʔi taj mìɲ dɛm lạʔi cɔ ʔazôn ŋườʔi ɲận lấʔi nơʔi tăj zùŋ dụk tʰàɲ kɔn dúk zâncúŋ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên nầʔi kák tʰần kủʔa ŋươʔi dã dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ʔazôn tʰấʔi vậʔi bàntʰờ cướk tượŋ dó dɔạn ŋườʔi zằŋ sáŋmaj kó tôncọŋ Ðứkzê sáŋmaj zâncúŋ tʰứkzậʔi zâŋ kák kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰù ŋồʔi ănuốŋ dɔạn dứŋzậʔi vuicơʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi suốŋ di zân ŋươʔi dưʔa za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dã bạʔihɔạʔi zồʔi vộʔi dạʔɔ cwiền zạʔi dúk kɔn cướk tượŋ dó zâŋ kủʔa cɔ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên dâʔi kák tʰần dã zẫn ŋươʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ta dã sɛm tʰấʔi zân nầʔi kìʔa zân kứŋkổ vả bâʔizờ hãʔi dể mặk hầʔu cɔ kơn tʰạɲ nổʔi kùŋ cúŋnó ziệt cúŋnó di ɲưŋ cɔ ŋươʔi tʰàɲ zân môʔisɛ nàʔisin ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ lạʔiÐứkzê saw nổʔi tʰạɲ kùŋzân ŋàʔi zân ŋàʔi dã zùŋ kwiền lớnlaw mạɲmẽ dưʔa za xỏʔi sứ zíptô saw dể cɔ ŋườʔi zíptô nóʔi zằŋ ŋàʔi dưʔa cúŋnó za xỏʔi sứ dặŋ hạʔi cɔ ɣiết di tạʔi cɔŋ núʔi kùŋ ziệt cúŋnó xỏʔi mặtdất kầʔusin cúʔa hãʔi ŋuôʔi kơn ɣiận bỏkwa diềʔu tajhọʔa ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ cɔ zân ŋàʔi sincúʔa hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi zaham ʔisák ʔisơzaên kák tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kó cỉ mìɲ tʰề kùŋ zằŋ ta tʰêm zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu ɲư saw cên cờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi dó kả sứ cỉ fán dượk sứ ấʔi kơŋiệp dờʔidờʔi Ðứkzê bỏkwa diềʔu tajhọʔa ŋàʔi nóʔi zằŋ ɣiáŋ cɔ zân mìɲ Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ cên núʔi cở suốŋ tăikầm haj bảŋ cứŋ haj bảŋ cứŋ kó haj nầʔi kiə haj bảŋ dó việk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi za cữ kũŋ cữ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xắk cên bảŋ vả ɣiôsuê ŋɛ zâncúŋ nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ cɔŋ cạʔi kwân kótiếŋ ciếndấʔu môʔisɛ dáp zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tiếŋ kêʔu tʰắŋ cận kũŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tiếŋ kêʔu tʰwa cận ɲưŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ xi dến ɣần cạʔi kwân môʔisɛ tʰấʔi kɔn ɲảʔimúʔa nổʔizận liệŋ haj bảŋ cứŋ xỏʔi tăj mịɲ za nơʔi cân núʔi dɔạn lấʔi kɔn kủʔa cúŋ dã dúk dɛm dốt cɔŋ lửʔa zồʔi ŋiền cɔdến tʰàɲza bụʔi zảʔi cên mặtnướk cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ʔuốŋ môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ zân nầʔi làmci ʔɛɲ ʔɛɲ suj cɔ cúŋ fạmtộʔi nặŋ zườŋ ấʔi ʔazôn dáp zằŋ sin cúʔa tôʔi dừŋ nổʔizận cúʔa zằŋ zân nầʔi cwiên diềʔu ák họ kó nóʔi kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi kák tʰần di cướk cúŋtôʔi fần môʔisɛ nầʔi ŋườʔi dã zẫn cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ kódiềʔu ci sảʔi dến cɔ ŋườʔi zồʔi tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ʔaj kó vàŋ hãʔi za họ dưʔa cɔ tôʔi tôʔi vàʔɔ lửʔa bởʔi dó tʰàɲza kɔn nầʔi vả môʔisɛ tʰấʔi zânsự buôŋ luŋ ʔazôn dể buôŋ luŋ dến dỗʔi sỉɲụk cɔŋ vòŋ kák tʰùŋịc tʰì ŋườʔi dứŋ nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi kwân nóʔi zằŋ ʔaj tʰuộk Ðứkzê hãʔi dếnkùŋ tadâʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi ɣần ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cwiền cɔ zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi deo ɣươm mìɲ di kwa dilạʔi cɔŋ cạʔi kwân kửʔa nầʔi dến kửʔa kiə mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi ɣiết ʔɛɲɛm bạɲữʔu lânkận mìɲ zânlê ʔiɲư lờʔi môʔisɛ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kó cừŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi cết vả môʔisɛ dã cwiền zằŋ ŋàʔinăj mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi zâŋ tăj mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê cẳŋ ci dến kɔncaj hăjlà ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk fướk vậʔi ŋàʔimaj môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dã fạm tộʔi zất cọŋ sɔŋ bâʔizờ dến Ðứkzê kólẽ dượk cuộk tộʔi kák ŋươʔi căŋ vậʔi môʔisɛ cởlên dến Ðứkzê tʰưʔa zằŋ Ôʔi zânsự nầʔi kó fạm tộʔi cọŋ cɔ mìɲ kák tʰần bằŋ vàŋ ɲưŋ bâʔizờ sin cúʔa tʰa tộʔi cɔ bằŋxôŋ hãʔi sóʔa tôʔi xỏʔi sác ŋàʔi dã cép di Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kẻ nàʔɔ fạmtộʔi kùŋ sóʔa xỏʔi sác bâʔizờ hãʔi di zẫn zânsự dếnnơʔi dã cỉ fán nầʔi tʰiênsứ di cướk ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ hìɲfạt tʰì fạt tộʔi cúŋnó Ðứkzê hàɲ fạt zânsự vậʔi zânsự ɣốk fạm tượŋ vàŋ ʔazôn dã za Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi ŋươʔi kùŋzân ŋươʔi dã zẫn za xỏʔi sứ zíptô hãʔi dâʔi di sứ dã tʰề cɔ zaham ʔisák zakốp zằŋ ta sứ dó cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ta saj tʰiênsứ di cướk ŋươʔi duổʔi zân kanaan zân ʔamôzít zân hêtít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít dặŋ dưʔa kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ dượm sữʔa ɲưŋ xôŋ kùŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi dâʔu ŋươʔi zân kứŋkổ ʔɛ ziệt ŋươʔi zọk dườŋ căŋ xi zânsự ŋɛ lờʔi nầʔi dềʔu dểtaŋ xôŋ ʔaj deo dồ caŋsứk vìÐứkzê dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi zân kứŋkổ nếʔu kùŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cỉ cɔŋ lúk tʰì ziệt kák ŋươʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi kất dồ caŋsứk cɔŋ mìɲ ŋươʔi di dặŋ liệʔu dãʔi ŋươʔi kác nàʔɔ tʰếtʰì núʔi hôzếp zân ʔisơzaên dã kák dồ caŋsứk mìɲ môʔisɛ lấʔi cạʔi dɛm zựŋ sa za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân ɣọʔilà hộʔi mạk fàm ʔaj kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê tʰìza dến hộʔi mạk ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân vừʔa xi môʔisɛ za dến cạʔi tʰì kả zânsự cổʔi zậʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi mìɲ ŋó tʰeo môʔisɛ cɔdến xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ cạʔi zồʔi vừʔa xi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ dó tʰì cụ mâʔi ɣiáŋ suốŋ zừŋ tạʔi kửʔa cạʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ kả zânsự tʰấʔi cụ mâʔi zừŋ tạʔi kửʔa cạʔi dứŋzậʔi zồʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu mìɲ suốŋ nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi mìɲ Ðứkzê dốʔiziện fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ɲư ŋườʔi nóʔicwiện kùŋ bạɲữʔu mìɲ Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ cởvề cạʔi kwân kòn hầʔu cẻ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun xôŋ za xỏʔi cạʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ nầʔi cúʔa fán kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi dɛm zânsự nầʔi sɔŋcúʔa cẳŋ cɔ tôʔi cúʔa saj ʔaj di kùŋ tôʔi vả cúʔa kó fán zằŋ ta ŋươʔi zɛɲ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk cướk vậʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk cúʔa sin cɔ tôʔi dườŋ kủʔa cúʔa dể cɔ tôʔi cúʔa dượk cướk ŋàʔi sin kũŋ hãʔi ŋĩ zằŋ zân nầʔi zân kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dáp zằŋ cíɲ mìɲ di kùŋ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ʔanŋỉ môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ nếʔu cíɲ mìɲ ŋàʔi cẳŋ di sin dừŋ dɛm cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi dâʔi lấʔi kớ ci ŋườʔita zằŋ tôʔi kùŋzân ŋàʔi dượk cướk ŋàʔi kó fảʔi xi nàʔɔ ŋàʔi kùŋ di vớʔi cúŋtôʔi căŋ tʰếtʰì tôʔi kùŋzân ŋàʔi dượk fânbiệt vớʔi muônzân cên mặtdất Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ta diềʔu ŋươʔi kầʔusin ŋươʔi dượk cướk ŋươʔi bởʔi zɛɲ ŋươʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi sin ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi sɛm viɲhiển kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê fán zàŋ ta cɔ kák ɲântừ fát za cướk ŋươʔi zɛɲ ɣiêhôva cướk ŋươʔi cɔ ʔaj tʰươŋsót ʔaj tʰươŋsót ŋàʔi lạʔi fán zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi dượk xôŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi màkòn sốŋ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán Ðâʔi kó cỗ ɣần ŋươʔi hãʔi dứŋ cên dá xi viɲhiển di ŋaŋ kwa dể ŋươʔi cɔŋ bộŋ dá lấʔi tăj cɛ ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ di kwa zồʔi ta zút tăj lạʔi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi fíʔa săw ɲưŋ tʰấʔi cẳŋ dượk Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi dụk haj bảŋ dá ɲư haj bảŋ cướk zồʔi cên haj bảŋ nầʔi kák lờʔi dã nơʔi haj bảŋ kiə ŋươʔi dã ŋàʔimaj hãʔi cựk cɔ vừʔa sáŋ cên dỉɲ núʔi sina ʔi dứŋ cướk tạʔi dó xôŋ ʔaj tʰeo kùŋ ŋươʔi xắp núʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi kó ŋườʔi ciên kũŋ cẳŋ kỏ nơʔi núʔi nầʔi nữʔa môʔisɛ dụk haj bảŋ dá ʔiɲư haj bảŋ cướk zậʔi kầm tʰeo tăj haj bảŋ dó cên núʔi sina ʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn Ðứkzê ŋự suốŋ cɔŋ dám mâʔi dứŋ ɣần môʔisɛ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva ŋàʔi di ŋaŋ kwamặt ŋườʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲântừ tʰươŋsót cậm ɣiận dầʔizẫʔi tʰàɲtʰựk dến ŋàn dờʔi sá diềʔu zanák tộʔi cọŋ tộʔilỗʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ kó tộʔi vôtộʔi ɲơn tộʔi tổfụ fạt dến kɔncáʔu cảʔi dờʔi môʔisɛ lậtdật kúʔi dầʔu suốŋ dất tʰờ lạʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ lạʔicúʔa nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk cúʔa sin hãʔi di ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi zân nầʔi zân kứŋkổ sin hãʔi tʰa zanák kùŋ tộʔilỗʔi ɲận cúŋtôʔi kơŋiệp cúʔa Ðứkzê fán zằŋ nầʔi zawướk cướk kák zânsự kủʔa ŋươʔi kák fép cưʔa kó cên kả mặtdất hăjlà nơʔi zân nàʔɔ tɔàn zânsự cɔŋ dó kó ŋươʔi sɛm tʰấʔi việk Ðứkzê diềʔu kùŋ ŋươʔi diềʔu dáŋ kiɲ xiếp hãʔi kẩntʰận diềʔu cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi hômnăj nầʔi duổʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi zân ʔamôzít zân kanaan zân hêtít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít hãʔi kẩntʰận dừŋ zawướk kùŋzân kủʔa sứ ŋươʔi vàʔɔ ʔɛ cúŋnó tʰàɲ káʔi bẫʔi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi căŋ ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi fáhủʔi bàntʰờ dập fɔ tượŋ dáɲ kák tʰần cúŋnó vì ŋươʔi dừŋ mìɲ suốŋ cướk cúʔa nàʔɔ xák bởʔi Ðứkzê tựsưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi tʰậtlà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vậʔi hãʔi kẩntʰận dừŋ zawướk kùŋzân kủʔa sứ dó ʔɛ xi cúŋnó hàɲ zâm kùŋ kák tʰần cúŋnó kák tʰần kủʔa cúŋnó kó mờʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi kủʔa cúŋ căŋ lạʔi dừŋ kướʔi kɔŋáʔi cúŋnó cɔ kɔncaj ŋươʔi ʔɛ xi kɔŋáʔi cúŋnó hàɲ zâm vớʔi kák tʰần cúŋnó kwiến zụ kɔncaj ŋươʔi kũŋ hàɲ zâm kùŋ kák tʰần kủʔa cúŋnó nữʔa căŋ ŋươʔi cớ dúk tʰầntượŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn ɲằm tʰáŋ lúʔa cỗ hãʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ɲư dã cwiền zặn ŋươʔi ɲằm tʰáŋ dó ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô kák kɔn cưởŋnam dềʔu tʰuộk kùŋ kák kɔn dựk dầʔulòŋ kủʔa bầʔi súkvật ŋươʔi hɔặk hɔặk ciên kũŋ vậʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi ciên kɔn hăjlà zê kɔn cuộk kɔn lừʔa dầʔulòŋ nếʔu cẳŋ cuộk ŋươʔi hãʔi kổ ŋươʔi cuộk kák kɔn cưởŋnam mìɲ cớ ʔaj di tăjxôŋ dến cầʔu cướk cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kôŋviệk ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi hãʔi ŋỉ zẫʔu mùʔa kàʔi hăj mùʔa ɣặt ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi ŋỉ vậʔi Ðầʔu mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamì ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ kủʔa kák kuốʔi ɣiữ mùʔamàŋ tʰườŋ cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi zamắt cúʔazê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên vì duổʔi kák zân xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi mởzộŋ bờkõʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ xi ŋươʔi zamắt ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi mỗʔi tʰì cẳŋ ʔaj tʰam sứ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ zâŋ hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ kùŋ báɲ fa mɛn tʰịt kủʔa kɔn siɲ vượtkwa cớ ɣiữ dến sáŋmaj ŋươʔi dɛm zâŋ hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa dất sɛɲ vàʔɔ dến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ nấʔu tʰịt zê kɔn cɔŋ sữʔa Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cép kák lờʔi nầʔi tʰeo kák lờʔi nầʔi zawướk kùŋ ŋươʔi kùŋ ʔisơzaên môʔisɛ dó kùŋ Ðứkzê cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi mườʔi dêm xôŋ báɲ kũŋ xôŋ ʔuốŋ nướk Ðứkzê cép cên haj bảŋ dá kák lờʔi zawướk tứklà mườʔi diềʔu zăn ximôʔi sɛ tăikầm haj bảŋ cứŋ di suốŋ núʔi sina ʔi cẳŋ zằŋ za mìɲ sáŋzựk bởʔivì mìɲ hầʔu cwiện Ðứkzê ɲưŋ ʔazôn kùŋ kả zân ʔisơzaên ɲìn môʔisɛ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi sáŋzựk xôŋ zám lạʔi ɣần môʔisɛ ɣọʔi ʔazôn kùŋ kák hộʔicưởŋ dến ɣần zồʔi nóʔicwiện kùŋ kế săw kả zân ʔisơzaên dến ɣần ŋườʔi cwiền zặn kák diềʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ nơʔi núʔi sina ʔi môʔisɛ tʰôʔi nóʔicwiện kùŋ lấʔi cɛ mìɲ lạʔi ximôʔi sɛ vàʔɔ cướk Ðứkzê dặŋ hầʔu cwiện ŋàʔi tʰì zở cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ luj za dɔạn za nóʔi lạʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên mọʔi lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán zặn mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên ɲìn môʔisɛ tʰấʔi za ŋườʔi sáŋzựk tʰì môʔisɛ lấʔi cɛ mìɲ cɔdến xi nàʔɔ vàʔɔ hầʔu cwiện Ðứkzê môʔisɛ ɲóm hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðâʔi kák việk kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán zạʔi ŋườʔita kôŋviệk cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ dến ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰáɲ tứklà ŋàʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔaj kôŋviệk cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó sửtử ɲằm ŋàʔi cớ nổʔi lửʔa cɔŋ ɲà nàʔɔ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ Ðâʔi kák lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn hãʔi lấʔi ci ɲà kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê hễ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó lòŋtʰàɲ zâŋ cɔ hãʔi dɛm cɔ Ðứkzê vàŋ bạk dồŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj lôŋ zê za ciên dựk ɲuộm dỏ za ká nượk kâʔi zầʔu tʰắp kák tʰứ hươŋliệʔu dặŋ cế zầʔu sứk hươŋ tʰơm bícŋọk kák tʰứ ŋọk xák dể zùŋ xảm cɔ fót bảŋ deo ŋựk cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi mấʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan hãʔi dến mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn dền cạʔi bɔŋ kủʔa dền mók sàŋaŋ cụ cụ bảŋ cứŋ dòn xiêŋ tʰiân kùŋ cɛ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ kàʔi dòn xiêŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa kùŋ báɲ cầntʰiết cân dèn dồ fụtùŋ kák dèn zầʔu tʰắp dèn bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ kùŋ dòn xiêŋ zầʔu sứk hươŋliệʔu bứk kửʔa dền bàntʰờ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zá dồŋ dòn xiêŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ káʔi tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ cɛ hàɲlaŋ cụ cụ bứk kủʔa kửʔa hàɲlaŋ kák nọk kủʔa dền kùŋ nọk zâʔi kủʔa hàɲlaŋ áʔɔ zùŋ kôŋviệk cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn tʰầʔi kả áʔɔ cɔ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dặŋ cứk kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên luj za xỏʔi môʔisɛ mọʔi ŋườʔi kó lòŋ kảmdộŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi kó lòŋtʰàɲ dềʔu dɛm dến zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê dể kôŋviệk hộʔi mạk kák dồ fụtùŋ áʔɔ tʰáɲ fàm ŋườʔi kùŋ tứk mọʔi kó lòŋtʰàɲ dềʔu dến dɛm ɲữŋ hwataj ɲẫn xâʔu kiềŋ kák tʰứ caŋsứk bằŋ vàŋ hếttʰảʔi dềʔu zâŋ bằŋ vàŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kẻ nàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ kó cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj lôŋ zê za ciên dựk ɲuộm dỏ za ká nượk dềʔu dɛm dến hễ ʔaj kó ci bằŋ bạk hăj bằŋ dồŋ dềʔu dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔaj kó kâʔi nơʔi ɲà mìɲ zùŋ kák kôŋviệk dềʔu dɛm dến fàm ŋườʔi dànbà xéʔɔ tʰì cáɲ tăj mìɲ kéʔɔ cỉ lấʔi dɛm dến ci dã kéʔɔ zồʔi cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ cỉ ɣaj kòn mấʔi ŋườʔi dànbà kó kảmdộŋ tàʔi xéʔɔ tʰì kéʔɔ cỉ lôŋ zê kák bựk cưởŋ cɔŋ zânsự dɛm bícŋọk kák tʰứ ŋọk xák dể xảm cɔ fót bảŋ deo ŋựk zầʔu tʰắp dèn kák hươŋliệʔu dểcế zầʔu sứk zầʔu tʰơm kả zân ʔisơzaên hăj fàm ʔaj kó lòŋ kảmdộŋ suj cɔ mìɲ tìɲŋwiện kwiên vàʔɔ kák kôŋviệk Ðứkzê dã fán zặn nơʔi môʔisɛ dềʔu dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák tìɲŋwiện vậʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ nầʔiÐứkzê dã kêʔu zɛɲ bếtsalêên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔuzi cáʔu kủʔa huzơ cɔŋ cifáʔi zuda ŋàʔi fú cɔ ŋườʔi dầʔizẫʔi tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ hiểʔubiết dể mọʔi tʰứ ŋề tʰợ dặŋ bàʔi za dồ vàŋ bạk dồŋ dặŋ xắk xảm kák tʰứ ŋọk dặŋ cạm kâʔi kák dồ xéʔɔléʔɔ ŋàʔi lạʔi fú cɔ ŋườʔi tàʔi zạʔizỗ kũŋ dồŋ cɔ kɔn kủʔa ʔahisamạk cɔŋ cifáʔi Ðʔan nữʔa ŋàʔi fú cɔ haj ŋườʔi dó dầʔi xônŋwan dặŋ kák kôŋŋệ tʰợ tʰêʔu tʰợ zệt ɲiềʔu màʔu tứklà màʔu dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dể bàʔi za kák tʰứ kôŋŋệ xéʔɔ bếtsalêên kák ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ tứklà ŋườʔi Ðứkzê dã fú cɔ xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ dặŋ kák kôŋviệk dịɲ zùŋ việk nơʔi tʰáɲ dềʔu mọʔi việk Ðứkzê dã fán zặn vậʔi môʔisɛ ɣọʔi bếtsalêên kák ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ cɔŋ lòŋ Ðứkzê fú tʰôŋ sáŋ kùŋ kák ŋườʔi kó lòŋ kảmdộŋ suj mìɲ dến ɣần dặŋ kôŋviệk cướk môʔisɛ tʰâʔu kák kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên dã dɛm dến dể kák kôŋviệk dịɲ zùŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ɲưŋ mỗʔi buổʔi sớmmaj zânsự lạʔi dɛm dến tìɲŋwiện nữʔa tʰếtʰì kák ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ dềʔu dìɲ dếnnỗʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ zânsự dɛm dến zư bộʔifần dặŋ kák kôŋviệk Ðứkzê dã fán zặn tʰeo lịɲ cwiền kủʔa môʔisɛ di zaw cạʔi kwân zằŋ bấtkỳ ŋườʔi hăj cớ kôŋviệk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ nữʔa vậʔi kấm zânsự xôŋ cɔ dɛm dến ci tʰêm nữʔa vì dã dủ kák vậtliệʔu dặŋ hếttʰảʔi kôŋviệk cɔdến dỗʔi kòn zư lạʔinữʔa kák ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ cɔŋ vòŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔilàm kôŋviệk zùŋ mườʔi bứk bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ tʰêʔu hìɲ cê zubin kựk sảʔɔ zựŋ dền mỗʔi bứk dềʔu zàʔi haimươʔitám tʰướk zộŋ tʰướk kák bứk dềʔu dồŋ kỡ ɲăw họ mỗʔi bứk zíɲ lạʔi ɲăw tʰắt vòŋ bằŋ cỉ nơʔi ciêŋ kủʔa bứk tʰứ ɲất dầʔu bứk ŋwiên kũŋ ɲưvậʔi cɔ ciêŋ kủʔa bứk nơʔi cót cɔŋ bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲì họ tʰắt nămcụk vòŋ tʰeo ciêŋ kủʔa bứk dầʔu kủʔa bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲất nămcụk vòŋ tʰeo ciêŋ bứk cót kủʔa bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲì kák vòŋ dốʔi ɲăw Ðʔɔạn cế nămcụk káʔi mók bằŋ vàŋ mók bứk nầʔi vớʔi bứk kiə dể cɔ dền lạʔi tʰàɲ kế dó zùŋ lôŋ zê mườʔimột bứk dể bɔŋ cên dền bề zàʔi mỗʔi bứk bamươʔi tʰướk zộŋ tʰướk mườʔimột bứk dềʔu dồŋ kỡ ɲăw họ bứk ziêŋ za sáʔu bứk xák ziêŋ za tʰắt nămcụk káʔi vòŋ nơʔi ciêŋ bứk cót kủʔa bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲất nămcụk vòŋ nơʔi ciêŋ bứk dầʔu kủʔa bứk ŋwiên tʰứ ɲì nămcụk káʔi mók bằŋ dồŋ mók bứk bɔŋ lạʔi tʰàɲ họ kũŋ cɔ dền fủ bằŋ za ciên dựk ɲuộm dỏ fủ bằŋ za ká nượk dắp cên họ zùŋ bằŋ kâʔi vác cɔ dền mỗʔi mườʔi tʰướk zàʔi tʰướk zưỡʔi ŋaŋ mỗʔi kó haj káʔi mộŋ ɲăw kả dền dềʔu mộtkác vậʔi cɔ dền haicụk fíʔa zướʔi haicụk cụk mộŋ bằŋ bạk zướʔi mỗʔi kó haj mộŋ dể cịʔu haj káʔi mộŋ họ kũŋ haicụk fíʔa bắk dền cụk mộŋ bằŋ bạk zướʔi mỗʔi kó haj mộŋ về fíʔa dằŋ săw kủʔa dền tứklà fíʔa tâʔi sáʔu haj ɣók săw tʰì haj haj ɣók za xít vớʔi ɲăw zướʔi cí cên bởʔi káʔi xwen nơʔi dầʔu haj ɣók haj dềʔu ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì kó mườʔisáʔu mộŋ bằŋ bạk zướʔi mỗʔi kó haj mộŋ họ kâʔi sàŋaŋ bằŋ ɣỗ kặp mấʔi fíʔa nầʔi kủʔa dền kâʔi sàŋaŋ xák fíʔa kiə kâʔi sàŋaŋ xák nữʔa fíʔa săw dền tứklà fíʔa tâʔi họ kâʔi sàŋaŋ ɣiữʔa dặŋ kwa tʰân ɣiữʔa kák dầʔu nầʔi dến dầʔu kiə bọk vàŋ mấʔi họ kák xwen kủʔa bằŋ vàŋ dặŋ sỏ sàŋaŋ kwa bọk vàŋ kák kâʔi sàŋaŋ họ lạʔi cế bứk bằŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu tʰêʔu hìɲ cê zubin kựk sảʔɔ zồʔi kâʔi cụ bằŋ ɣỗ bọk vàŋ kùŋdiɲ bằŋ vàŋ dúk cụ bằŋ bạk cɔ mấʔi kâʔi cụ dó họ kũŋ cế cɔ kửʔa vàʔɔ cạʔi bằŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu ấʔilà kôŋviệk tʰêʔutʰùʔa họ kũŋ kâʔi cụ kùŋdiɲ zồʔi bọk vàŋ cên dầʔu cụ kák kâʔi nuôŋ kòn cụ tʰì bằŋ dồŋ Ðʔɔạn bếtsalêên dóŋ bằŋ kâʔi zàʔi haj tʰướk zưỡʔi ŋaŋ tʰướk zưỡʔi kaw tʰướk zưỡʔi ŋườʔi bọk vàŋzòŋ cɔŋ bềŋɔàʔi kùŋ cạʔi dườŋ cuŋkwɛɲ Ðúk káʔi xwen vàŋ dặŋ ɣắn ɣók haj káʔi hôŋ nầʔi haj káʔi hôŋ kiə ŋườʔi kũŋ cuốt kák dòn bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ zồʔi sỏ dòn dó vàʔɔ xwen haj hôŋ dặŋ xiêŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ káʔi tʰiân bằŋ vàŋzòŋ zàʔi haj tʰướk zưỡʔi ŋaŋ tʰướk zưỡʔi làm haj tượŋ cê zubin bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát dể nơʔi haj dầʔu tʰiân tượŋ dầʔu nầʔi tượŋ dầʔu kiə za nơʔi haj dầʔu haj cê zubin káɲ za cɛ cên tʰiân dốʔiziện ɲăw sâʔi vàʔɔ tʰiân ŋườʔi kũŋ dóŋ káʔi bằŋ kâʔi zàʔi haj tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw tʰướk zưỡʔi bọk bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cạʔi dườŋ cuŋkwɛɲ lạʔi kùŋ bɛ cɔ kaw cừŋ ŋóntăj cạʔi cɔ bɛ dườŋ vàŋ ŋườʔi dúk káʔi xwen vàŋ ca vàʔɔ ɣók tạʔi nơʔi cân kák xwen ɣần nơʔi bɛ dể sỏ dòn vàʔɔ dặŋ xiêŋ ŋườʔi cuốt dòn bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ dặŋ xiêŋ lạʔi kũŋ lấʔi vàŋzòŋ kák dồzùŋ bàʔi cên zĩʔa cén li cậʔu dể zùŋ kwán ŋườʔi kũŋ cân dèn bằŋ vàŋzòŋ káʔi cân káʔi tʰân káʔi dàʔi káʔi bầʔu káʔi hwa dềʔu za bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát haj tʰân dèn kó sáʔu ɲáɲ za ɲáɲ nầʔi ɲáɲ kiə cɔŋ sáʔu ɲáɲ za cên tʰân cân dèn mỗʔi ɲáɲ dềʔu kó káʔi dàʔi hìɲɲư hạɲɲân kùŋ bầʔu hwa cên tʰân cân dèn lạʔi kũŋ kó káʔi dàʔi hìɲɲư hạɲɲân kùŋ bầʔu hwa cɔŋ sáʔu ɲáɲ tʰân cân dèn za kứ mỗʔi haj ɲáɲ tʰì zướʔi kó káʔi bầʔu bầʔu ɲàɲ kủʔa cân dèn dềʔu bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ŋwiên miếŋ dáɲ ɣiát ŋườʔi kũŋ bảʔi káʔi tʰếp dèn kéʔɔ dồ dựŋ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ŋườʔi zùŋ lâŋ vàŋzòŋ cân dèn kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa cân dèn ŋườʔi kũŋ dóŋ káʔi bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ bằŋ kâʔi hìɲvuôŋ zàʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw haj tʰướk bàntʰờ kó sừŋ za ŋườʔi bọk vàŋzòŋ cên kạɲ cuŋkwɛɲ kák sừŋ kũŋ cạʔi zườŋ vàŋ zướʔi dườŋ dó nơʔi haj ɣók ŋườʔilàm haj káʔi xwen vàŋ dể sỏ dòn dặŋ xiêŋ ŋườʔi cuốt dòn bằŋ kâʔi bọk vàŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ cế zầʔu tʰáɲ dể sứk hươŋ tʰɛɲsạc bằŋ kák hươŋliệʔu tʰeo ŋề tʰợ cế hươŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ dóŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu bằŋ kâʔi hìɲvuôŋ zàʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw tʰướk ŋườʔilàm nơʔi ɣók bàntʰờ ɲữŋ sừŋ za bọk dồŋ zồʔi kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ bằŋ dồŋ cảʔɔ ɲỏ ảŋ nỉʔa bìɲ hươŋ lạʔi zá bằŋ lướʔi dồŋ dể zướʔi tʰàɲ bàntʰờ cân dến ŋaŋ ɣiữʔa dúk káʔi xwen cɔ ɣók zá lướʔi dồŋ dặŋ sỏ dòn xiêŋ Ðʔɔạn cuốt dòn xiêŋ bằŋ kâʔi bọk dồŋ sỏ dòn vàʔɔ xwen nơʔi haj bàntʰờ dặŋ xiêŋ di ŋườʔi dóŋ bàntʰờ bằŋ cốŋ bộŋ ŋườʔi zùŋ kák tấmɣươŋ kủʔa mấʔi ŋườʔi dànbà hầʔu việk nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk cế za káʔi tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ bằŋ dồŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ hàɲlaŋ fíʔa mấʔi bứk kủʔa hàɲlaŋ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu zàʔi căm tʰướk haicụk kâʔi cụ haicụk cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ nuôŋ cụ bằŋ bạk về fíʔa bắk kũŋ mộtcăm tʰướk haicụk kâʔi cụ haicụk cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ nuôŋ cụ bằŋ bạk về fíʔa tâʔi nămcụk tʰướk mườʔi kâʔi cụ mườʔi cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ nuôŋ cụ bằŋ bạk về fíʔa cướk fíʔa dôŋ kũŋ nămcụk tʰướk ŋĩʔalà hữʔu kủʔa hàɲlaŋ mườʔilăm tʰướk kâʔi cụ cụ kủʔa hàɲlaŋ kũŋ mườʔilăm tʰướk kâʔi cụ cụ hếttʰảʔi kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cuŋkwɛɲ dềʔu bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu kák cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ nuôŋ bằŋ bạk dầʔu cụ bọk bạk hếttʰảʔi cụ kủʔa hàɲlaŋ dềʔu ɲờ kó nuôŋ bạk cắp vớʔi ɲăw tấm nơʔi kửʔa hàɲlaŋ tʰêʔutʰùʔa bằŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu zàʔi haicụk tʰướk kaw tùʔi tʰeo xổ kủʔa vảʔi tʰướk dồŋ kỡ vớʔi kaw kủʔa kák cuŋkwɛɲ hàɲlaŋ bốn kâʔi cụ cụ bằŋ dồŋ diɲ dồ bọk dầʔu cụ ɲữŋ nuôŋ dềʔu bằŋ bạk kák nọk kủʔa dền kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cuŋkwɛɲ dềʔu bằŋ dồŋ Ðâʔi tổŋkộŋ dền dền cứŋkớ tʰeo lịɲ cwiền kủʔa môʔisɛ biểʔu ŋườʔi lêvi za ɲờ ʔitʰama kɔncaj kủʔa tʰầʔi kả ʔazôn kaikwản bếtsalêên kɔncaj ʔuzi cáʔu huzơ tʰuộk cifáʔi zuda tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ɣiúp ŋườʔi kɔncaj ʔahisamạk tʰuộk cifáʔi Ðʔan tʰợ cạm bàʔivẽ tʰợ tʰêʔutʰùʔa bằŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ bằŋ cỉ ɣaj hếttʰảʔi vàŋ dã zùŋ vàʔɔ kák kôŋviệk nơʔi tʰáɲ ấʔilà vàŋ zâŋ dượk haimươʔi cín lâŋ bảʔicăm cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ bạk kủʔa mấʔi ŋườʔi hộʔi cúŋ kó tổŋkộŋ dượk mộtcăm lâŋ mộtŋàn bảʔicăm bảʔi mươʔi siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó haimươʔi tuổʔi ŋĩʔalà sáʔu căm ŋàn nămcăm nămcụk ŋườʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi nửʔa siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ vậʔi fảʔi mộtcăm lâŋ bạk dặŋ dúk kák cụ kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ cụ mộtcăm lâŋ cɔ mộtcăm cụ tứk lâŋ vàʔɔ mỗʔi cụ kòn mộtŋàn bảʔicăm bảʔi mươʔi siếk zư lạʔi tʰì zùŋ diɲ cụ bọk dầʔu cụ lấʔi nuôŋ cắp kák cụ vớʔi ɲăw Ðồŋ dɛm zâŋ kộŋ dượk bảʔi cụk lâŋ haj ŋàn bốncăm siếk họ zùŋ dồŋ dó cụ kủʔa kửʔa hộʔi mạk bàntʰờ bằŋ dồŋ zá bằŋ dồŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ kák cụ kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cuŋkwɛɲ kák cụ kủʔa kửʔa hàɲlaŋ kák nọk kủʔa dền kák nọk kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cuŋkwɛɲ họ zùŋ cỉ màʔu dỏ diềʔu dỏ cế áʔɔ dịɲ cɔ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ vậʔi cế fót bằŋ kimtwiến cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu họ kăŋ vàŋlá za kắt tʰàɲ sợʔi cỉ sɛn kùŋ cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ cỉ ɣaj cế tʰật kựk sảʔɔ họ măj haj daj vaj fót dâʔu haj dầʔu zíɲ lạʔi Ðʔaj dể kột fót fíʔa ŋɔàʔi ŋwiên miếŋ ʔiɲư kôŋviệk kủʔa fót bằŋ kimtwiến cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ bằŋ cỉ ɣaj dậʔu ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ họ xảm cɔŋ xuôn vàŋ kák bícŋọk kó xắk kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên ɲư ŋườʔita xắk kɔnzấʔu họ dể kák ŋọk dó cên daj vaj fót dặŋ ŋọk zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê fán zặn môʔisɛ họ kũŋ cế bảŋ deo ŋựk kựk sảʔɔ ɲư kôŋviệk fót bằŋ kimtwiến cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ cỉ ɣaj dậʔu bảŋ deo ŋựk măj hìɲvuôŋ zàʔi ʔɛm ŋaŋ ʔɛm họ ɲận hàŋ ŋọk hàŋ tʰứ ɲất ŋọk mãnãʔɔ ŋọk hồŋ bíc ŋọk lụk bửʔu hàŋ tʰứ ɲì ŋọk fỉ túʔi ŋọk bửʔu ŋọk kimkươŋ hàŋ tʰứba ŋọk hồŋ bửʔu ŋọk bạc mãnãʔɔ ŋọk tiɲ hàŋ tʰứtư ŋọk huỳɲ bíc ŋọk hồŋ mãnãʔɔ bícŋọk kák ŋọk nầʔi dềʔu xảm vàŋ số ŋọk mườʔihaj tùʔi tʰeo zɛɲ kủʔa kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋọk kó xắk cɔŋ mườʔihaj cifáʔi ʔisơzaên ɲư ŋườʔita xắk kɔnzấʔu Ðʔɔạn cên bảŋ deo ŋựk cế kák sợʔi cwiền bằŋ vàŋzòŋ dáɲ lạʔi ɲư hìɲ zâʔi kũŋ haj káʔi mók haj káʔi xwɛɲ bằŋ vàŋ dể haj xwɛɲ nơʔi haj ɣók dầʔubảŋ deo ŋựk kùŋ kột haj sợʔi cwiền vàŋ vàʔɔ haj xwɛɲ dó zồʔi cwiền haj dầʔu kủʔa haj sợʔi cwiền vàʔɔ mók ɣàʔi nơʔi daj vaj fót fíʔa cướk ŋựk kũŋ haj xwɛɲ vàŋ xák dể vàʔɔ haj ɣók dầʔu zướʔi kủʔa bảŋ deo ŋựk fíʔa cɔŋ fót lạʔi haj xwɛɲ vàŋ xák nữʔa dể nơʔi dầʔu zướʔi kủʔa haj daj vaj fót fíʔa cướk cên daj ɣần cỗ ɣiáp mốʔi họ lấʔi sợʔi zâʔi màʔu kột haj káʔi xwɛɲ kủʔa bảŋ deo ŋựk lạʔi kùŋ haj káʔi xwɛɲ fót hầʔu cɔ zíɲ vớʔi daj dừŋ zớt xỏʔi fót ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ họ kũŋ cế áʔɔzàʔi kủʔa fót bằŋ vảʔi tʰườŋ tɔàn màʔu kổ dể còŋ dầʔuvàʔɔ cíɲ ɣiữʔa áʔɔ ɲư áʔɔzáp kó cuŋkwɛɲ cɔ xỏʔi nơʔi côn áʔɔ tʰắt ɲữŋ cáʔi lựʔu bằŋ cỉ sɛ màʔu dỏ diềʔu dỏ lạʔi cuôŋ ɲỏ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ɣắn ɣiữʔa haj cáʔi lựʔu vòŋ tʰeo cuŋkwɛɲ côn áʔɔ kứ cáʔi lựʔu káʔi cuôŋ ɲỏ vòŋ tʰeo cuŋkwɛɲ côn áʔɔ zùŋ dể hầʔu việk ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ họ kũŋ cế áʔɔlá mặk cɔŋ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj zệt tʰườŋ cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi káʔi dồ caŋsứk kủʔa kwầnlót cɔŋ dềʔu bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu kùŋ káʔi daj bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dậʔu cỉ dỏ diềʔu dỏ kó tʰêʔu ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ họ kũŋ zùŋ vàŋlá zòŋ cế káʔi tʰẻ tʰáɲ xắk cên dó ɲư ŋườʔita xắk kɔnzấʔu zằŋ tʰáɲcɔÐứkzê zồʔi lấʔi sợʔi zâʔi dặŋ kột dể cên ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ kák kôŋviệk kủʔa dền hộʔi mạk sɔŋ ɲưvậʔi zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư mọʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ họ dɛm dền dến cɔ môʔisɛ cạʔi kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa cạʔi nọk sàŋaŋ cụ cụ bɔŋ za ciên dựk ɲuộm dỏ bɔŋ za ká nượk káʔi bảŋ cứŋ dòn xiêŋ kùŋ tʰiân dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa kùŋ báɲ cầntʰiết cân dèn bằŋ vàŋzòŋ tʰếp dèn dã kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa cân dèn zầʔu tʰắp bàntʰờ bằŋ vàŋ zầʔu sứk hươŋliệʔu kủʔa kửʔa cạʔi bàntʰờ bằŋ dồŋ zá dồŋ dòn xiêŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ kák kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cụ cụ kủʔa kửʔa hàɲlaŋ zâʔi nọk hếttʰảʔi dồ fụtùŋ việk kủʔa dền áʔɔ dặŋ hầʔu việk cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn tʰầʔi kả áʔɔ kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dể cứk zân ʔisơzaên mọʔi kôŋviệk nầʔi ʔiɲư mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ môʔisɛ sɛm kák kôŋviệk tʰấʔi dềʔu ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn dɔạn môʔisɛ cúk fướk cɔ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋzêŋ ŋươʔi zựŋ dền hãʔi dể cɔŋ dó káʔi bảŋ cứŋ zồʔi lấʔi fủ lạʔi kũŋ hãʔi dɛm dến cưŋbàʔi kák dồ cên cɔ kó tʰứtự kùŋ cân dèn tʰắp kák dèn kũŋ hãʔi dể bàntʰờ bằŋ vàŋ zùŋ sôŋ hươŋ cướk bảŋ cứŋ zồʔi sủ nơʔi kửʔa dền kũŋ hãʔi dể bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dằŋ cướk kửʔa dền dể káʔi tʰùŋ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ hộʔi mạk bàntʰờ zồʔi dổ nướk vàʔɔ lạʔi cừʔa hàɲlaŋ cuŋkwɛɲ sủ nơʔi kửʔa hàɲlaŋ Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi zầʔu sứk sứk dền kák dồ dể cɔŋ dó ziêŋ dền za tʰáɲ tʰì tʰáɲ vậʔi kũŋ hãʔi sứk zầʔu bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ zồʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ tʰì bàntʰờ zất tʰáɲ kũŋ hãʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ tʰùŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ Ðʔɔạn hãʔi zẫn ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến ɣần kửʔa hộʔi mạk zồʔi cɔŋ nướk ŋươʔi hãʔi mặk áʔɔ tʰáɲ cɔ ʔazôn sứk zầʔu ŋườʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ vậʔi ŋườʔi cứk cướk hãʔi zẫn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến ɣần zồʔi mặk áʔɔlá cɔ sứk zầʔu cɔ ɲư ŋươʔi dã sứk cɔ ca tʰì cứk cướk sự sứk zầʔu fɔŋ cɔ cứk mãʔimãʔi cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi môʔisɛ ʔiɲư mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋzêŋ tʰứhaj tʰì dền dã zựŋ môʔisɛ zựŋ dền dể mấʔi cụ dóŋ tʰả sàŋaŋ zựŋ cụ ŋườʔi kăŋ bɔŋ cên dền zồʔi cảʔi fủ bɔŋ cên ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi kũŋ lấʔi bảŋ cứŋ dể cɔŋ sỏ dòn xiêŋ vàʔɔ dể tʰiân cên ŋườʔi xiêŋ vàʔɔ dền ceo dể cɛ cỗ cí tʰáɲ fủ bảŋ cứŋ lạʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kũŋ dể káʔi cɔŋ hộʔi mạk fíʔa bắk dền ŋɔàʔi bứk zồʔi hàŋ báɲ cên cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán zặn môʔisɛ cân dèn cɔŋ hộʔi mạk fíʔa dốʔiziện kùŋ káʔi ŋườʔi tʰắp dèn cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán zặn môʔisɛ bàntʰờ bằŋ vàŋ cướk bứk cɔŋ hộʔi mạk cên dó ŋườʔi sôŋ hươŋ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kũŋ sủ nơʔi kửʔa dền Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dể bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu nơʔi kửʔa dền zâŋ cên dó kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ kũŋ dể tʰùŋ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ hộʔi mạk bàntʰờ kùŋ dổ nướk vàʔɔ dặŋ tắmzửʔa môʔisɛ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔazôn zửʔa tăj cân mìɲ vàʔɔ dó xi nàʔɔ vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk lạʔi ɣần bàntʰờ tʰì zửʔa mìɲ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ cuŋkwɛɲ dền bàntʰờ ŋườʔi kũŋ cừʔa hàɲlaŋ sủ nơʔi kửʔa hàɲlaŋ Ấʔi môʔisɛ sɔŋ kôŋviệk ɲưvậʔi Áŋ mâʔi bawfủ hộʔi mạk viɲhiển kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔizẫʔi dền cɔ dếnnỗʔi môʔisɛ vàʔɔ cẳŋ dặŋ áŋ mâʔi bawfủ cên viɲhiển kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔizẫʔi dền vả cɔŋ kák hàɲcìɲ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên xi nàʔɔ áŋ mâʔi dền ŋự tʰì zadi kòn nếʔu áŋ mâʔi xôŋ ŋự tʰì kũŋ xôŋ di cɔdến ŋàʔi nàʔɔ áŋ mâʔi ŋự vì cɔŋ kák hàɲcìɲ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tʰì áŋ mâʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cên dền banŋàʔi kó lửʔa cên dó bandêm cướk kả zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ɣọʔi môʔisɛ fán zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi zâŋ súkvật hɔặk hɔặk ciên nếʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu bằŋ tʰìfảʔi zùŋ kɔn dựk xôŋ zâŋ tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê dể dượk ŋàʔi dẹplòŋ ɲậm lấʔi ŋươʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn siɲ dượk ɲậm tʰế cɔ hầʔu cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ɣiết cướk Ðứkzê zồʔi kák kɔncaj ʔazôn tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zâŋ hwiết zướʔi cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk kế dó za kɔn siɲ tʰịt za từŋ miếŋ kák kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔazôn câm lửʔa cên bàntʰờ cất kủʔi cụm lửʔa zồʔi kák kɔncaj ʔazôn tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák miếŋ tʰịt dầʔu cên kủʔi dã cụm lửʔa nơʔi bàntʰờ ŋườʔi lấʔi nướk zửʔa lòŋ ɣiò zồʔi tʰấʔi dɛm mọʔi fần sôŋ nơʔi bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu tứk kủʔa zùŋ lữʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu bằŋ súkvật ɲỏ hɔặk ciên hăj zê tʰìfảʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk xôŋ ɣiết nơʔi hướŋ bắk kủʔa bàntʰờ cướk Ðứkzê zồʔi kák kɔncaj ʔazôn tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zướʔi
