hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ tʰịt từŋ miếŋ dể ziêŋ dầʔu za tʰầʔi cất kák fần dó cên kủʔi dã cụm lửʔa nơʔi bàntʰờ ŋườʔi lấʔi nướk zửʔa lòŋ ɣiò dɔạn tʰầʔi zâŋ sôŋ mọʔi fần cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu tứk kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu ŋườʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa tʰiêʔu bằŋ cim tʰìfảʔi zùŋ kudất hăjlà kâʔu kɔn tʰầʔi dɛm dến bàntʰờ zứt dầʔuza zồʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ hwiết cảʔi nơʔi kạɲ bàntʰờ ŋườʔi ɣỡ lấʔi káʔi ziềʔu ɲổ lôŋ liệŋ ɣần bàntʰờ hướŋ dôŋ cỗ dổ cɔ dɔạn sé za tạʔi nơʔi haj káɲ ɲưŋ xôŋ cɔ zờʔi zồʔi tʰầʔi dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ tạʔi cên kủʔi dã cụm lửʔa ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu tứk kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê xi nàʔɔ ʔaj zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa căj tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi bằŋ lọk kó cế zầʔu dể ɲũhươŋ cên ŋườʔi dɛm dến cɔ kák kɔncaj ʔazôn tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi lấʔi lọk cế zầʔu hếttʰảʔi ɲũhươŋ dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê fần ci cɔŋ kủʔa căj kòn lạʔi tʰuộk ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ cɔŋ kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê xi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi zùŋ ci kủʔa căj tʰìfảʔi lấʔi báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn ɲồʔi zầʔu báɲcáŋ xôŋ mɛn tʰwa zầʔu nếʔu ŋươʔi zùŋ ciên cɔŋ cảʔɔ dặŋ kủʔa căj tʰìfảʔi bằŋ xôŋ fa mɛn ɲồʔi vớʔi zầʔu za miếŋ cế zầʔu cên Ấʔilà kủʔa căj nếʔu ŋươʔi zùŋ ciên cɔŋ cảʔɔ dặŋ kủʔa căj tʰìfảʔi bằŋ vớʔi zầʔu kủʔa căj dã sắmsửʔa ɲư kác nầʔi ŋươʔi dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê zaw cɔ tʰầʔi ŋươʔi dɛm dến bàntʰờ tʰầʔi lấʔi za fần fảʔi zâŋ sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê fần ci cɔŋ kủʔa căj kòn lạʔi tʰuộk ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ cɔŋ kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê hễ kủʔa căj kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìcớ zâŋ vớʔi mɛn kák ŋươʔi cớ zùŋ mɛn hăj sôŋ vớʔi kủʔa cizùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi dượk zâŋ ɲữŋ dó cɔ Ðứkzê ɲư kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa ɲưŋ cẳŋ dốt cên bàntʰờ ɲư kủʔa kó mùʔi tʰơm fảʔi muốʔi kák kủʔa căj cớ zâŋ tʰiếʔu muốʔi muốʔi zấʔuhiệʔu zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kùŋ ŋươʔi cên kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ muốʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi zùŋ hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa dặŋ kủʔa căj Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi bằŋ ɣié lúʔa zaŋ lúʔa mớʔi za dổ zầʔu vàʔɔ tʰêm ɲũhươŋ Ấʔilà kủʔa căj Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi lấʔi fần za vớʔi zầʔu hếttʰảʔi ɲũhươŋ sôŋ Ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê fàm xi nàʔɔ ʔaj zâŋ kủʔa tʰù bằŋ hɔặk dựk hɔặk káʔi tʰìfảʔi zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê xôŋ ci ŋườʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn siɲ kủʔa mìɲ zồʔi ɣiết tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk kák kɔncaj ʔazôn tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zảʔi hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ zɔ kủʔa tʰù nầʔi ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê mỡcàʔi lòŋ haj cáʔi kật cên haj cáʔi kật nơʔi kạɲ hôŋ za mỏŋ bọk ɣan ɣỡ ɣần nơʔi haj cáʔi kật kák kɔncaj ʔazôn sôŋ mấʔi dó nơʔi bàntʰờ cên kủʔa tʰiêʔu dã cất cên kủʔi cụm lửʔa zồʔi ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu ŋườʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa tʰù bằŋ ciên hɔặk dựk hɔặk káʔi tʰìfảʔi zâŋ xôŋ ci vì kủʔa bằŋ ciên kɔn tʰìfảʔi zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn siɲ zồʔi ɣiết cướk kửʔa hộʔi mạk kák kɔncaj ʔazôn zảʔi hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ zɔ kủʔa tʰù nầʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê káʔi duôʔi ŋwiên cặt ɣần kuốʔi sươŋsốŋ mỡcàʔi lòŋ haj cáʔi kật cên haj cáʔi kật nơʔi kạɲ hôŋ za mỏŋ bọk ɣan ɣỡ ɣần nơʔi haj cáʔi kật tʰầʔi sôŋ kák dó cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà tʰựkvật kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi bằŋ kɔn zê káʔi tʰìfảʔi zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn siɲ zồʔi ɣiết cướk hộʔi mạk kák kɔncaj ʔazôn zảʔi hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ zɔ kủʔa tʰù nầʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê mỡcàʔi lòŋ haj cáʔi kật cên haj cáʔi kật nơʔi kạɲ hôŋ za mỏŋ bọk ɣan ɣỡ ɣần nơʔi haj cáʔi kật tʰầʔi sôŋ kák dó cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà tʰựkvật kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm hếttʰảʔi dềʔu tʰuộk Ðứkzê Ấʔi dó dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi mặkzầʔu nơʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi cẳŋ hăjlà hwiết Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ ʔaj fạm cɔŋ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê diềʔu cẳŋ nếʔu tʰầʔi cịʔu sứk zầʔu zồʔi fạmtộʔi kớ dó ɣâʔi cɔ zânsự fảʔi mắk tộʔi tʰì tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kɔn xôŋ ci dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi zẫn dó dến kửʔa hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu zồʔi ɣiết cướk Ðứkzê tʰầʔi cịʔu sứk zầʔu zồʔi lấʔi hwiết dɛm vàʔɔ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ɲúŋ ŋóntăj mìɲ cɔŋ hwiết zảʔi bảʔi cướk Ðứkzê dốʔi ŋaŋ bứk nơʔi dền tʰáɲ Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi bôʔi hwiết cên kák sừŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê dổ hếttʰảʔi hwiết nơʔi cân bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dể cướk kửʔa hộʔi mạk ŋườʔi fảʔi ɣỡ ɲữŋ kủʔa kɔn zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tứklà mỡcàʔi lòŋ haj cáʔi kật cên haj cáʔi kật nơʔi kạɲ hôŋ za mỏŋ bọk ɣan ɣỡ ɣần nơʔi haj cáʔi kật ɲư ɣỡ kák fần nầʔi kủʔa zùŋ kủʔa tʰù zồʔi tʰầʔi sôŋ kák dó cên bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kòn za hếttʰảʔi tʰịt dầʔu ɣiò lòŋ fẩn tứk kɔn ŋwiên ŋườʔi fảʔi dɛm za xỏʔi cạʔi kwân dến nơʔi tiɲ sạc cỗ dổ cɔ zồʔi cất cên kủʔi nơʔi lửʔa tʰiêʔu di tứklà tʰiêʔu tạʔicỗ dổ cɔ vậʔi nếʔu kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên fạm cɔŋ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê diềʔu xôŋ xôŋ kớ dó fảʔi mắk tộʔi nếʔu tộʔifạm ấʔi vừʔamớʔi za tʰì hộʔi cúŋ fảʔi zâŋ kɔn dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi zẫn dến cướk hộʔi mạk kák hộʔicưởŋ fảʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔubò zồʔi ɣiết cướk Ðứkzê tʰầʔi cịʔu sứk zầʔu zồʔi dɛm hwiết kɔn vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk ɲúŋ ŋóntăj mìɲ cɔŋ hwiết zảʔi bảʔi cướk Ðứkzê dốʔi ŋaŋ bứk Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi bôʔi hwiết cên kák sừŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê zồʔi dổ hwiết zướʔi cân bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dể cướk kửʔa hộʔi mạk ŋườʔi kũŋ ɣỡ hếttʰảʔi dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kác zâŋ kɔn nầʔi kũŋɲư kác zâŋ kɔn zùŋ cuộk tộʔi ấʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ hộʔi cúŋ tộʔi hộʔi cúŋ dượk tʰa Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi fảʔi dɛm kɔn dó za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân tʰiêʔu di ɲư dã tʰiêʔu kɔn cướk ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi cɔ hộʔi cúŋ víbằŋ kwan cưởŋ nàʔɔ fạm cɔŋ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ diềʔu xôŋ kớ dó mắk tộʔi xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔita za cɔ kwan cưởŋ dó tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi zẫn dến kủʔa mìɲ kɔn zê dựk xôŋ ci ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu zê dựk dó zồʔi ɣiết cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi ɣiết kák kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰầʔi ɲúŋ ŋóntăj mìɲ cɔŋ hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi bôʔi cên kák sừŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dổ hwiết zướʔi cân bàntʰờ dɔạn sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ɲư kác sôŋ kủʔa tʰù Ấʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi tộʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ zâncúŋ fạm cɔŋ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê diềʔu xôŋ kớ dó fảʔi mắk tộʔi xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔita cɔ ŋườʔi dó tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi kớ tộʔi mìɲ zẫn dến kɔn zê káʔi xôŋ ci zùŋ kủʔa ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi zồʔi ɣiết cɔŋ nơʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰầʔi ɲúŋ ŋóntăj mìɲ cɔŋ hwiết bôʔi cên kák sừŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dổ hwiết zướʔi cân bàntʰờ zồʔi ɣỡ ɲư kác ɣỡ kủʔa tʰù dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa kó mùʔi tʰơm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê Ấʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dó tʰì tộʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa nếʔu kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi bằŋ ciên kɔn tʰìfảʔi zâŋ kɔnkáʔi cẳŋ ci ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi zồʔi ɣiết tạʔi nơʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi ɲúŋ ŋóntăj mìɲ cɔŋ hwiết bôʔi cên kák sừŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dổ hwiết zướʔi cân bàntʰờ ɣỡ ɲư kác ɣỡ kủʔa ciên kɔn zùŋ kủʔa tʰù dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ɲư kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê Ấʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dó tʰì tộʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ làmcứŋ tʰề zồʔi fạmtộʔi xôŋ zadiềʔu mìɲ dã tʰấʔi hăjlà dã tʰì ŋườʔi dó maŋ tộʔi mìɲ xi ʔaj dụŋ dến ôʔuế hɔặk tʰâʔi kủʔa kɔn tʰú ɲà xôŋ tiɲ sạc hɔặk tʰâʔi kủʔa kɔn tʰúzừŋ xôŋ tiɲ sạc hɔặk tʰâʔi kủʔa lɔàʔi kôncùŋ nàʔɔ xôŋ tiɲ sạc xôŋ tʰì ôʔuế mắk tộʔi xi ʔaj hɔặk hăj xôŋ dụŋ dến ôʔuế nàʔɔ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi xôŋ kứ ôʔuế kác nàʔɔ tʰì kũŋ mắk tộʔi xi ʔaj nóʔi tʰềtʰốt ák hăjlà tʰiện mặkzầʔu kác nàʔɔ cướk xôŋ ŋờ dến zồʔi săw lạʔi tʰì ʔaj dó mắk tộʔi cɔŋ diềʔu nầʔi hăjlà diềʔu kiə vậʔi xi nàʔɔ ʔaj mắk tộʔi cɔŋ kák diềʔu nầʔi tʰìfảʔi sưŋ mìɲ fạmtộʔi ci zồʔi tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm zẫn dến Ðứkzê kɔnkáʔi cɔŋ bầʔi súkvật ɲỏ hɔặk ciên káʔi hăjlà zê káʔi dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰì tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nếʔuxôŋ fươŋ tʰế lɔ cɔ kó ciên káʔi hăjlà zê káʔi dượk tʰìfảʔi tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm dɛm dến cɔ Ðứkzê kặp ku hăjlà kặpbồ kâʔu kɔn kɔn zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ŋườʔi dɛm kặp dó dến cɔ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi zâŋ cướk kɔn zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi zứt dầʔu ɣần nơʔi ɣáʔi kổ xôŋ ɣãʔi lìʔa za dɔạn zảʔi hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi cên fíʔa kủʔa bàntʰờ hwiết kòn zư lạʔi tʰì zướʔi cân bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kòn cim kiə ŋườʔi fảʔi tùʔi tʰeo dã dịɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu Ấʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi ŋườʔi dó cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi dã fạm tʰì tộʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa nếʔuxôŋ fươŋ tʰế lɔ cɔ kó kặp ku hăjlà kặpbồ kâʔu kɔn dượk tʰì ŋườʔi tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm fảʔi dɛm fần mườʔi fa lọk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi xôŋ dổ zầʔu cên kũŋ xôŋ tʰêm ɲũhươŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi dɛm dó dến tʰầʔi tʰầʔi bốk sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ɲư kác sôŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi Ấʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi ŋườʔi dó cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi dã fạm cɔŋ mấʔi diềʔu nầʔi tʰì tộʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa kòn zư lạʔi tʰuộk tʰầʔi ɲư cɔŋ kuộk kủʔa căj vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ xi nàʔɔ ʔaj bấtcuŋ fạm dến tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì ʔaj dó mắk lỗʔi mìɲ fảʔi zẫn dến Ðứkzê kɔnciên dựk xôŋ ci cɔŋ bầʔi dáɲzá bằŋ siếk bạk tùʔi tʰeo siếk kủʔa dền tʰáɲ ấʔi kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi ŋườʔi dó fảʔi bồʔitʰườŋ fụ tʰêm fần ɣiácị kủʔa mìɲ dã fạm dếnnơʔi dền tʰáɲ zồʔi zaw dó cɔ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi zùŋ ciên kɔn dựk kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi tộʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa xi nàʔɔ ʔaj fạm cɔŋ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê xôŋ diềʔu xôŋ tʰì ʔaj zó mắk lỗʔi maŋ lấʔi tộʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi lỗʔi mìɲ fảʔi zẫn dến tʰầʔi kɔnciên dựk xôŋ ci cɔŋ bầʔi tùʔi tʰeo ŋươʔi dáɲzá zồʔi tʰầʔi cuộk lỗʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dã fạmtộʔi xôŋ tʰì lỗʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa Ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi mắk lỗʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ xi nàʔɔ ʔaj mắk tộʔifạm dến Ðứkzê hɔặk nóʔizốʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ dồvật ɣởʔi hăjlà zaw cɔ hɔặk tàʔi cộmkắp hɔặk ɣiựt lấʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ hɔặk nếʔu sí dượk kủʔa nóʔizốʔi kủʔa dó hɔặk tʰề zốʔi cɔŋ kák việk ŋườʔita fạmtộʔi dượk xi nàʔɔ dã fạm mắk lỗʔi ɲưvậʔi tʰìfảʔi cả lạʔi mìɲ dã ănkắp hɔặk dã ɣiựt lấʔi hɔặk dã ɣởʔi cɔ hɔặk sí dượk hɔặk kák ŋườʔi dã tʰề zốʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi tʰườŋ ŋwiên lạʔi fụ tʰêm fần ɣiácị zaw cɔ củ dó ŋàʔi nàʔɔ mìɲ zâŋ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi tùʔi tʰeo dáɲzá kủʔa ŋươʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi fảʔi cɔŋ bầʔi ciên dựk xôŋ ci zẫn dến tʰầʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê dặŋ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi mìɲ tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê tʰì lỗʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰa lỗʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi dã mắk Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi nầʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰiêʔu fảʔi cên dốŋ lửʔa tạʔi bàntʰờ cọn dêm cɔdến sáŋmaj lửʔa kủʔa bàntʰờ ɣiữ cɔ cáʔi tʰầʔi mặk áʔɔlá cɔŋ kwần bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj cɛ tʰân mìɲ zồʔi cɔ kủʔa lửʔa dã dốt kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ dổ ɣần bàntʰờ dɔạn kổʔi áʔɔ nầʔi mặk áʔɔ xák dɛm cɔ nầʔi za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân dổ cɔŋ nơʔi tiɲ sạc lửʔa cên bàntʰờ fảʔi cáʔi xôŋ mỗʔi buổʔisáŋ tʰầʔi lấʔi kủʔi cụm lửʔa tʰêm kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên sôŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰù tạʔi dó lửʔa hằŋ cáʔi cên bàntʰờ cẳŋ Ðâʔi kủʔa căj kák kɔncaj ʔazôn fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa nầʔi tạʔi fíʔa cướk bàntʰờ cướk Ðứkzê họ lấʔi lọk cɔŋ kủʔa căj zầʔu kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ɲũhươŋ cên dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê fần kòn zư lạʔi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ănxôŋ fa mɛn tạʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ tứklà tạʔi hàɲlaŋ kủʔa hộʔi mạk họ xôŋ nấʔu dó vớʔi mɛn ấʔilà fần cɔ zɔ cɔŋ kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ tʰậtlà cí tʰáɲ ɲư kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi fàm ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kɔnkáʔi ʔazôn lấʔi ấʔilà dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔaj dụŋ dến ɲữŋ kủʔa dó tʰáɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi kủʔa ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ ŋàʔi cịʔufép sứk zầʔu một fần mườʔi fa lọk kủʔa căj tʰườŋtʰườŋ sáŋ fânnửʔa ciềʔu fânnửʔa kủʔa dó ciên cên cảʔɔ cộn vớʔi zầʔu cín zồʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi dɛm dến kắt za miếŋ zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê kɔncaj nàʔɔ kủʔa ʔazôn cịʔu sứk zầʔu dặŋ tʰế cɔ ŋườʔilàm tʰầʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa nầʔi Ấʔilà dờʔidờʔi cướk Ðứkzê fảʔi sôŋ cọn kủʔa nầʔi fàm kủʔa căj kủʔa tʰầʔi nàʔɔ tʰìfảʔi dốt xôŋ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðâʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi fảʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi ŋườʔita ɣiết kɔn siɲ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ tʰầʔi dứŋ zâŋ kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi fảʔi tʰịt cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ tứklà cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa hộʔi mạk hễ ʔaj dụŋ dến tʰịt kɔn siɲ tʰáɲ nếʔu hwiết văŋ cên áʔɔ nàʔɔ tʰìfảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔ dó cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ nồʔi dất zùŋ nấʔu tʰịt dó dập di nếʔu nồʔi nấʔu bằŋ dồŋ tʰì kạʔɔ zửʔa nướk cɔ sạc hễ ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰịt dó ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰịt kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi kó hwiết dɛm vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk dặŋ cuộk tộʔi nơʔi dền tʰáɲ hãʔi dốt di Ðâʔi kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ cɔŋ nơʔi ŋườʔita ɣiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰì hãʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ cuộk mắk lỗʔi zồʔi zướʔi hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn zâŋ hếttʰảʔi duôʔi mỡcàʔi haj cáʔi kật haj cáʔi kật nơʔi kạɲ hôŋ za mỏŋ bọk ɣan ɣỡ ɣần nơʔi haj cáʔi kật tʰầʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk mắk lốʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰịt dó tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi kũŋɲư kủʔa cuộk tộʔi dồŋ ɲăw kɔn siɲ tʰuộk tʰầʔi nàʔɔ dã zùŋ cuộk tộʔi kòn tʰầʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ ʔaj dượk miếŋ za kủʔa kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dó fàm kủʔa căj nàʔɔ hɔặk nấʔu cɔŋ hɔặk ciên cên cảʔɔ hăjlà nướŋ cên tʰì tʰuộk tʰầʔi dã dứŋ zâŋ fàm kủʔa căj hɔặk cế zầʔu hɔặk xô fảʔi kứ mộtmựk fân cɔ kák kɔncaj ʔazôn Ðâʔi kủʔa tʰù ŋườʔita fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu ʔaj zâŋ kủʔa dó dặŋ kảmtạ tʰìfảʔi zâŋ cuŋ vớʔi kủʔa tʰù ɲữŋ báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ fa mɛn cế zầʔu báɲcáŋ xôŋ fa mɛn tʰwa zầʔu lọk cộn báɲ ɲỏ cế zầʔu lạʔi fảʔi tʰêm báɲ kó fa mɛn zâŋ vớʔi kủʔa tʰù kảmtạ họ lấʔi fần cɔŋ mỗʔi kủʔa căj ɣiơ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa dó tʰuộk tʰầʔi dã zướʔi hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ tʰù tʰịt kủʔa kɔn siɲ kảmtạ tʰù tʰìfảʔi nộʔi ŋàʔi dã zâŋ xôŋ dể ci lạʔi dến sáŋmaj nếʔu kủʔa zâŋ việk tʰườŋ ŋwiện hăjlà lạk tʰìfảʔi kɔn siɲ dó nộʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dã zâŋ kòn zư lạʔi tʰì ŋàʔimaj ɲưŋ fần kòn zư lạʔi dến ŋàʔi tʰứba tʰìfảʔi tʰiêʔu di nếʔu ʔaj tʰịt kủʔa tʰù cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰứba tʰì ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zâŋ kủʔa dó cẳŋ dượk ɲậm cẳŋ ci kủʔa dó cɔ ŋườʔi nữʔa ấʔilà diềʔu ɣớmɣê ʔaj tʰịt dó maŋ lấʔi tộʔi mìɲ kũŋ cẳŋ tʰịt dã dụŋ dến ci ôʔuế fảʔi tʰiêʔu di kòn tʰịt nàʔɔ dượk ʔaj tiɲ sạc mớʔi ʔaj dã ôʔuế lạʔi tʰịt kủʔa tʰù tʰuộk Ðứkzê tʰì cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ nếʔu ʔaj dụŋ dến ôʔuế hɔặk kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi hɔặk kủʔa lɔàʔi hăjlà diềʔu ɣì ɣêɣớm màlạʔi tʰịt kủʔa tʰù tʰuộk Ðứkzê tʰì cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ cẳŋ tʰứ nàʔɔ kủʔa ciên hăjlà zê mỡ kủʔa kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ cết hăjlà sé dượk zùŋ mọʔi việk ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ʔaj kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰú ŋườʔita zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ cɔŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ hwiết hɔặk kủʔa lɔàʔi cim hăjlà kủʔa lɔàʔi súkvật fàm ʔaj tʰứ hwiết nàʔɔ cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ Ðứkzê kòn fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê fảʔi dɛm dến cɔ ŋàʔi zɔ cɔŋ kủʔa tʰù mìɲ cáɲ tăj ŋườʔi dɛm fần fảʔi zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tứklà káʔi ʔɔ káʔi ʔɔ dể dặŋ zùŋ kủʔa dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê zồʔi tʰầʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kòn káʔi ʔɔ tʰì tʰuộk fần ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kák ŋươʔi kũŋ cɔ tʰầʔi káʔi ɣiò hữʔu kủʔa tʰù dặŋ kủʔa ɣiơ kòn ʔaj cɔŋ vòŋ kák kɔncaj ʔazôn zâŋ hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ tʰù tʰì dượk fần káʔi ɣiò hữʔu vì cɔŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰù kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên lấʔi káʔi ʔɔ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk káʔi ɣiò zâŋ ɣiơ dặŋ cɔ tʰầʔi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ciếʔu tʰeo dờʔidờʔi zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi ɣiữ tʰeo Ấʔilà fần cɔŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê fép sứk zầʔu cwiền cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ cứk cướk Ðứkzê ấʔilà diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi cɔ ŋàʔi cịʔufép sứk zầʔu Ấʔilà dờʔidờʔi cảʔi kwa kák tʰế dạʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi kủʔa fɔŋ cứk kủʔa tʰù Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ tạʔi cên núʔi sina ʔi xi ŋàʔi zặn biểʔu zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ kủʔa mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm ʔazôn kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi áʔɔsốŋ zầʔu sứk kɔn kủʔa cuộk tộʔi haj kɔnciên dựk ɣiỏ báɲ xôŋ mɛn zồʔi ɲóm kả hộʔi cúŋ tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk môʔisɛ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê fán zặn hộʔi cúŋ ɲóm tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ hộʔi cúŋ zằŋ Ðâʔi kák diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn tʰeo Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ biểʔu ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi lạʔi ɣần zồʔi lấʔi nướk zửʔa ŋườʔi mặk áʔɔlá cɔŋ cɔ ʔazôn kột daj lưŋ mặk áʔɔzàʔi mặk fót kột daj fót ŋườʔi kũŋ deo bảŋ deo ŋựk ɣắn vàʔɔ bảŋ ʔu zim tʰu dộʔi káʔi mãʔɔ dầʔu fíʔa cướk mãʔɔ buộk tʰẻvàŋ tứklà càŋ tʰáɲ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ kế dó môʔisɛ lấʔi zầʔu sứk sứk cɔ dền kák tạʔi dó ziêŋ za tʰáɲ zảʔi zầʔu bảʔi cên bàntʰờ sứk zầʔu cɔ bàntʰờ kùŋ kák dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ káʔi tʰùŋ cân tʰùŋ dặŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ dổ zầʔu sứk cên dầʔu ʔazôn sứk cɔ ŋườʔi dặŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ biểʔu kák kɔncaj ʔazôn lạʔi ɣần mặk áʔɔlá cɔŋ cɔ kột daj dộʔi mãʔɔ dầʔu ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ŋườʔi biểʔu dɛm kɔn zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi lạʔi ɣần ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu môʔisɛ ɣiết lấʔi hwiết zồʔi zùŋ ŋóntăj bôʔi hwiết cên cuŋkwɛɲ sừŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ cɔ bàntʰờ tʰɛɲsạc dɔạn dổ hwiết zướʔi cân bàntʰờ ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi bàntʰờ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dể cuộk tộʔi tạʔi dó ŋườʔi lấʔi hếttʰảʔi mỡcàʔi za mỏŋ bọk ɣan haj cáʔi kật vớʔi kủʔa haj cáʔi kật zồʔi dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kòn kɔn za tʰịt fẩn tʰì ŋườʔi dɛm tʰiêʔu ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kũŋ biểʔu dɛm kɔnciên dựk zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu lạʔi ɣần ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu zồʔi môʔisɛ ɣiết zướʔi hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ dɔạn tʰịt za miếŋ dɛm sôŋ káʔi dầʔu mấʔi miếŋ dó ŋườʔi lấʔi nướk zửʔa lòŋ ɣiò zồʔi sôŋ cọn kɔnciên dựk cên bàntʰờ ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm tứk kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kũŋ biểʔu dɛm kɔnciên dựk tʰứ ɲì lạʔi ɣần tứklà kɔnciên dựk fɔŋ cứk ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲận tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔnciên dựk dó môʔisɛ ɣiết lấʔi hwiết bôʔi cên cáʔitaj hữʔu kủʔa ʔazôn cên ŋónkáʔi kủʔa bàntăj cên ŋónkáʔi kủʔa bàncân môʔisɛ kũŋ biểʔu kák kɔncaj ʔazôn dến ɣần bôʔi hwiết nơʔi cáʔitaj hữʔu cên ŋónkáʔi kủʔa bàntăj cên ŋónkáʔi kủʔa bàncân dɔạn môʔisɛ zướʔi hwiết cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ kế dó ŋườʔi lấʔi duôʔi hếttʰảʔi mỡcàʔi za mỏŋ bọk ɣan haj cáʔi kật vớʔi kủʔa haj cáʔi kật káʔi ɣiò hữʔu lạʔi lấʔi cɔŋ ɣiỏ báɲ xôŋ mɛn dể cướk Ðứkzê káʔi báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn káʔi báɲ ɲỏ kó zầʔu káʔi báɲcáŋ dể mấʔi báɲ dó cên ɲữŋ ɣiò hữʔu dɔạn dể hếttʰảʔi cɔŋ tăj ʔazôn tăj kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê môʔisɛ lấʔi kák dó xỏʔi tăj dɛm sôŋ nơʔi bàntʰờ tạʔi cên kủʔa tʰiêʔu ấʔilà kủʔa fɔŋ cứk kó mùʔi tʰơm tứklà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê môʔisɛ kũŋ lấʔi káʔi ʔɔ kủʔa kɔnciên dựk fɔŋ cứk dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ấʔilà fần tʰuộk môʔisɛ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi kế ấʔi môʔisɛ lấʔi zầʔu sứk hwiết cên bàntʰờ zảʔi cên ʔazôn cên kwầnáʔɔ ŋườʔi cên kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cên kwầnáʔɔ ʔazôn kwầnáʔɔ ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kwầnáʔɔ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ kák ŋườʔi hãʔi nấʔu tʰịt tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk tạʔi dó vớʔi báɲ cɔŋ ɣiỏ fɔŋ cứk ʔiɲư dã fán zặn zằŋ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi tʰịt dó ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰiêʔu tʰịt báɲ kòn zư lạʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ di za xỏʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi fɔŋ cứk mìɲ dượk cọn zồʔi việk fɔŋ cứk kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa bảʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ʔiɲư hômnăj ŋườʔita dã dể cuộk tộʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi cọn ŋàʔi kả dêm tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk cɔŋ bảʔi bữʔa ɣìŋiữ mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tʰák ŋàʔi dã cwiền zặn ɲưvậʔi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔilàm mọʔi diềʔu ʔiɲư Ðứkzê kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zặn vậʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứ môʔisɛ ɣọʔi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa ʔisơzaên zồʔi zạʔi ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi kɔn kɔn dựk dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔnciên dựk kủʔa tʰiêʔu dềʔu xôŋ ci zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kɔn kɔnciên kɔn xôŋ ci tuổʔi dặŋ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn kɔnciên dựk dặŋ zùŋ kủʔa tʰù dể zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê kủʔa căj cế zầʔu ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê za kùŋ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi zẫn dến cướk hộʔi mạk ɲữŋ môʔisɛ dã zặn biểʔu zồʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ dến ɣần dứŋ cướk Ðứkzê môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ Ðâʔi kák diềʔu Ðứkzê fán zặn hãʔi di tʰì viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê za kùŋ kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi dến ɣần bàntʰờ zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi di dể ŋươʔi zânsự cuộk tộʔi lạʔi kùŋ hãʔi zâŋ kủʔa kủʔa zânsự cuộk tộʔi cɔ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn vậʔi ʔazôn lạʔi ɣần bàntʰờ ɣiết kɔn dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dɛm hwiết dến ŋườʔi ɲúŋ ŋóntăj vàʔɔ bôʔi cên kák sừŋ bàntʰờ zồʔi dổ hwiết zướʔi cân bàntʰờ ŋườʔi lấʔi dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ haj cáʔi kật za mỏŋ bọk ɣan kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ kòn tʰịt za ŋườʔi dɛm za tʰiêʔu ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák kɔncaj ʔazôn dɛm hwiết dến ŋườʔi zướʔi cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ họ kũŋ dɛm cɔ ʔazôn tʰịt kủʔa tʰiêʔu za miếŋ zầʔu zồʔi ŋườʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi zửʔa lòŋ kák ɣiò dɛm sôŋ cên kủʔa tʰiêʔu nơʔi bàntʰờ ŋườʔi kũŋ zâŋ kủʔa kủʔa zânsự kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi cɔ zânsự ɣiết zâŋ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi ʔiɲư kủʔa dầʔutiên lạʔiŋườʔi kũŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰeo dã dịɲ kế dó ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa căj cút dầʔi tăj mìɲ dɛm sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ŋɔạʔicừ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hồʔi banmaj ŋườʔi kũŋ zânsự ɣiết kɔn kɔnciên dựk kủʔa tʰù kák kɔncaj ʔazôn dɛm hwiết dến ŋườʔi zướʔi cuŋkwɛɲ cên bàntʰờ họ kũŋ dɛm dến cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa kɔn kɔnciên dựk duôʔi cên lòŋ haj cáʔi kật za mỏŋ bọk ɣan dể ɲữŋ nầʔi cên ʔɔ zồʔi sôŋ nơʔi bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn ʔazôn lấʔi káʔi ʔɔ ɣiò hữʔu dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư môʔisɛ dã zặn biểʔu ʔazôn ɣiơ tăj mìɲ cên zânsự cúk fướk cɔ săw xi zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù tʰì ŋườʔi bướk suốŋ xỏʔi bàntʰờ môʔisɛ ʔazôn vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk lạʔi za cúk fướk cɔ zânsự viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê za kùŋ kả zânsự ŋọn lửʔa cướk Ðứkzê lóʔɛ za tʰiêʔuhóʔa kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ kả zânsự tʰấʔi dềʔu kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ suốŋ dất haj kɔncaj ʔazôn nadáp ʔabihu mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu kầm hươŋ mìɲ dể lửʔa vàʔɔ hươŋ zâŋ tʰứ lửʔa cướk Ðứkzê ấʔilà diềʔu ŋàʔi xôŋ fán zặn một ŋọn lửʔa cướk Ðứkzê lòʔɛ za tiêʔu cết cướk Ðứkzê môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ Ấʔilà diềʔu Ðứkzê dã za xi ŋàʔi fán zằŋ ta ɲờ ɲữŋ lạʔi ɣần dượk tʰáɲ dượk viɲhiển cướk kả zânsự ʔazôn nínlặŋ môʔisɛ ɣọʔi misaên ʔɛânsafan haj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusiên cú kủʔa ʔazôn zạʔi zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần xiêŋ tʰâʔi haj ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi cướk nơʔi tʰáɲ dɛm za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân vậʔi dến ɣần xiêŋ tʰâʔi kòn mặk áʔɔlá cɔŋ za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân ʔiɲư lờʔi môʔisɛ dã biểʔu Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn lêʔasa ʔitʰama haj kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ dể dầʔu cần cớ sé áʔɔ mìɲ ʔɛ xi fảʔi cết Ðứkzê nổʔizận kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ căŋ ɲưŋ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi kả ɲà ʔisơzaên fảʔi xók kớ lửʔa tʰiêʔuhóʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ Ðừŋ za xỏʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cết căŋ zầʔu sứk kủʔa Ðứkzê cên kák ŋươʔi họ tʰeo lờʔi môʔisɛ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ xi nàʔɔ vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi cớ ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà ʔuốŋ ci kó táɲ săj ʔɛ fảʔi cết căŋ ấʔilà mạŋ lịɲ dờʔidờʔi cảʔi kák tʰế dạʔi hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk fânbiệt dềʔu tʰáɲ diềʔu cẳŋ tʰáɲ xiết cẳŋ xiết zạʔi zân ʔisơzaên kák mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zặn cɔ môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn lêʔasa ʔitʰama haj kɔncaj ʔazôn kòn lạʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kủʔa căj kòn zư lạʔi kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi di xôŋ fa mɛn ɣần bàntʰờ cí tʰáɲ fảʔi kủʔa nầʔi tạʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ fần kủʔa ŋươʔi kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê bởʔivì dã fán zặn ɲưvậʔi kòn káʔi ʔɔ zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi káʔi ɣiò zâŋ ɣiơ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj kák kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi tạʔi nơʔi tiɲ sạc kák diềʔu dó dã cɔ fần ziêŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi zɔ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰù kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên họ dɛm dến káʔi ɣiò zâŋ ɣiơ káʔi ʔɔ zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ dịɲ tʰiêʔuhóʔa dể zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ɲữŋ diềʔu dó tʰuộk ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi ciếʔu tʰeo dờʔidờʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn vậʔi vả môʔisɛ kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰấʔi dã tʰiêʔu nổʔizận kùŋ lêʔasa ʔitʰama haj kɔncaj ʔazôn kòn lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰịt kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ vì cí tʰáɲ Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi hầʔu ɣáɲ lấʔi tộʔi kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ cướk Ðứkzê nầʔi hwiết xôŋ kó dɛm vàʔɔ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kwả dáŋ kák ŋươʔi siɲ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ʔiɲư lờʔi dã zặn biểʔu ɲưŋ ʔazôn dáp zằŋ kìʔa ŋàʔinăj dã zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa mìɲ cướk Ðứkzê săw xi việk zủʔi nầʔi sảʔiza nếʔu lạʔi ŋàʔinăj tôʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kó dẹplòŋ Ðứkzê căŋ môʔisɛ fảʔi ŋɛ lờʔi dáp ấʔi ɲận cɔ fảʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi cên mặtdất nầʔi ɲữŋ kɔn kák ŋươʔi dượk fép hễ lɔàʔi nàʔɔ kó móŋ zẽ za cân ciə haj ɲơʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi dượk fép ɲưŋ cẳŋ kɔn nàʔɔ cỉ ɲơʔi xôŋ hăjlà cỉ kó móŋ zẽ xôŋ kɔn lạkdà ɲơʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ kó móŋ zẽ hãʔi kầm lɔàʔi xôŋ sạc kɔn cuộtdồŋ ɲơʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ kó móŋ zẽ hãʔi kầm lɔàʔi xôŋ sạc kɔn tʰỏ zừŋ ɲơʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ móŋ zẽ hãʔi kầm lɔàʔi xôŋ sạc kɔɲeo kó móŋ zẽ cân ciə haj ɲưŋ xôŋ ɲơʔi hãʔi kầm lɔàʔi xôŋ sạc kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰịt kũŋ xôŋ dụŋ dến tʰâʔi kák tʰú dó fảʔi kầm xôŋ sạc ɲữŋ lɔàʔi zướʔi nướk kák ŋươʔi dượk fép lɔàʔi nàʔɔ hɔặk zướʔi hɔặk zướʔi sôŋ kó vâʔi kó vảʔi fàm nàʔɔ hɔặk zướʔi hɔặk zướʔi sôŋ tứk kák lɔàʔi sɛɲ cɔŋ nướk xôŋ kó vâʔi cẳŋ kó vảʔi tʰì kák ŋườʔi xôŋ fảʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ lɔàʔi nầʔi xá lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ mìɲ cớ tʰịt hãʔi kầm tʰâʔi diềʔu ɣớmɣiếk kák lɔàʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ nướk xôŋ kó vâʔi cẳŋ kó vảʔi tʰìfảʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi cim ɲữŋ ɣiốŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kầmbằŋ ɣớmɣiếk xôŋ cim ưŋ cim ŋạk cim lãʔɔ ưŋ kɔn ziềʔu tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi cúŋnó kák tʰứ kwạ cim dàdiểʔu cim cim tʰủʔi cim kắk kák lɔạʔi ɣiốŋ cúŋnó cim mèʔɔ cim tʰằŋ kộk kɔnkò kwắm kɔn hạk cim tʰằŋ kɔn kồŋ kộk kɔnkò kɔn ziệk kák lɔạʔi ɣiốŋ cúŋnó cim zẽ kwạt kɔn zơʔi hễ kôncùŋ nàʔɔhăj băj di kẳŋ tʰì kák ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk ɲưŋ cɔŋ lɔạʔi kôncùŋ nàʔɔhăj băj di kẳŋ kák ŋươʔi dượk kɔn nàʔɔ kó kẳŋ dặŋ ɲảʔi cên dất kɔn kàʔɔkàʔɔ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kɔn vɛ tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi câʔucấʔu tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kɔn zế tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi kák lɔàʔi kôncùŋ xák hăj băj kó kẳŋ tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk kák ŋươʔi lɔạʔi dó ôʔuế ʔaj dụŋ dến sákcết lɔàʔi dó ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi ʔaj maŋ sákcết lɔàʔi dó fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi kák tʰú nàʔɔ kó móŋ zẽ za ɲưŋ xôŋ kó cân ciə haj xôŋ ɲơʔi fảʔi lấʔilàm ôʔuế cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến ôʔuế cɔŋ ɣiốŋ di kẳŋ kɔn nàʔɔ di cên kẳŋ tʰì xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến sákcết ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi kòn ʔaj maŋ sákcết ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi kák lɔàʔi dó xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ lɔàʔi di cên mặtdất nầʔi ɲữŋ lɔàʔi lấʔilàm xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi kɔn cuột ɲủʔi kɔn cuộtlắt kɔn zắnmốʔi tùʔi tʰeo lɔạʔi cúŋnó kɔn kắkkè kỳdà kɔn tʰạcsùŋ kɔn kỳɲôŋ kɔn kắk cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi kôncùŋ ɲữŋ lɔàʔi dó lấʔilàm xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến sákcết ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi bấtluận nàʔɔ lɔàʔi nầʔi cết zớt ɲằm cên tʰì dềʔu ôʔuế hɔặk dồ bằŋ kâʔi áʔɔsốŋ za baw tứk kák ŋườʔita tʰườŋ zùŋ fảʔi ŋâm dồ dó cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi zồʔi mớʔitiɲ sạc lạʔi nếʔu ci kủʔa zớt ɲằm dồ sàɲ kák ci dựŋ cɔŋ dềʔu ôʔuế fảʔi dập dồ sàɲ dó di fàm dồăn nàʔɔ kák ʔuốŋ mặkzầʔu dể cɔŋ dồ sàɲ nàʔɔ nướk dồ sàɲ dó ɲểʔu vàʔɔ lâʔi ôʔuế fàm nàʔɔ mộtvàʔi miếŋ sákcết zớt ɲằm lâʔi ôʔuế zầʔu zầʔu kũŋ fảʔi fá dã ôʔuế kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kầm ôʔuế vậʔi kòn káʔi suốʔi hɔặk cứʔa ɲiềʔu nướk dềʔu kứ dượk tiɲ sạc ɲưŋ ʔaj dụŋ dến sákcết tʰì lâʔi ôʔuế nếʔu ci kủʔa sákcết zớt ɲằm cên ɣiốŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔita zeo tʰì ɣiốŋ dó kứ tiɲ sạc ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋườʔita kó dổ nướk cên ɣiốŋ dó nếʔu ɣì kủʔa sákcết zớt ɲằm tʰì ɣiốŋ dó ôʔuế cɔ kák ŋươʔi xi kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk zùŋ tʰựkvật cết di ʔaj dụŋ dến sák ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi kẻ nàʔɔ tʰịt kủʔa sák fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ lâʔi ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi kòn ʔaj xiêŋ sák ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi fàm lɔàʔi kôncùŋ nàʔɔ cên mặtdất dềʔu ɣớmɣiếk xôŋ tʰịt vậʔi xôŋ tʰịt kák lɔàʔi kôncùŋ di cên mặtdất kɔn nàʔɔ bằŋ bụŋ kɔn nàʔɔ di kẳŋ hăjlà di ɲiềʔu kẳŋ cúŋnó ɣớmɣiếk kák ŋươʔi cớ kɔn nàʔɔ cɔŋ lɔàʔi kôncùŋ lâʔi cɔ tʰân mìɲ fảʔi ɣớmɣiếk xôŋ tiɲ sạc hăjlà ôʔuế vì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tʰáɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰáɲ tʰì dượk tʰáɲ kák ŋươʔi cớ kɔn nàʔɔ kủʔa lɔàʔi kôncùŋ cên mặtdất lâʔi ôʔuế cɔ tʰân mìɲ vì Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰáɲ tʰáɲ lɔàʔi súkvật lɔàʔi cim cờʔi kák siɲvật dộŋ zướʔi nướk kák lɔàʔi kôncùŋ cên mặtdất dể fânbiệt kɔn xôŋ sạc vớʔi kɔn tiɲ sạc kɔn tʰú dượk kùŋ kɔn tʰú xôŋ dượk Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi dànbà tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰìfảʔi ôʔuế cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ɲư cɔŋ kiɲŋwiệt kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔita fảʔi làmfép kắt cɔ dứʔa cẻ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dànbà fảʔi kiêŋ cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋàʔi dươŋ xi hwiết mìɲ dượk sạc xôŋ dụŋ tʰáɲ nàʔɔhăj di tớʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ cɔdến tʰɛɲsạc dượk cọn zồʔi kòn nếʔu ŋườʔi sɛɲ kɔŋáʔi tʰì ôʔuế cɔŋ haj ɲư cɔŋ kiɲŋwiệt fảʔi kiêŋ cɔŋ sáʔu mươʔi sáʔu ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ hwiết mìɲ dượk sạc xi mìɲ cɔ tʰɛɲsạc dứʔa caj hăj ɣáʔi dã cọn zồʔi ŋườʔi dànbà fảʔi zâŋ cɔ tʰầʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk ciên kɔnmột tuổʔi dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kâʔu kɔn hɔặk ku kɔn dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰầʔi zâŋ kɔn siɲ dó cướk Ðứkzê cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi lưʔuhwiết ŋườʔi dượk sạc ŋườʔi dànbà sɛɲ kɔncaj hăjlà kɔŋáʔi kòn nếʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ tʰế lɔ cɔ kó ciên kɔn tʰìfảʔi haj cim ku hɔặk haj kɔn kâʔu kɔn kɔn nầʔi zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn kiə zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dượk sạc Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ za cên mìɲ nổʔi sưŋ hɔặk dém cắŋ zườŋ cởtʰàɲ cên za mìɲ fuŋ tʰì ŋườʔita fảʔi zẫn ŋườʔi dó dến tʰầʔi ʔazôn hăjlà dến cɔŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi xám cên za tʰân ŋườʔi nếʔu lôŋ dó dã cởtʰàɲ cắŋ nếʔu hủŋ suốŋ sâʔu za tʰân mìɲ ấʔilà fuŋ tʰầʔi xám zồʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi nầʔi ôʔuế kòn nếʔu kó dém cắŋ cên za tʰân ŋườʔi dém xôŋ sủŋ suốŋ sâʔu za nếʔu lôŋ xôŋ cởtʰàɲ cắŋ tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi zam ŋườʔi dó cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi xám ŋườʔi nếʔu dó ŋừŋ lạʔi xôŋ cên za tʰìfảʔi zam ŋườʔi tʰứ ɲì bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi xám ŋườʔi lạʔi nếʔu dó dã táʔi xôŋ cên za tʰì tʰầʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi dó tiɲ sạc ấʔilà tʰôʔi ŋườʔi dó fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ tʰì dượk tiɲ sạc ɲưŋ nếʔu săw xi ŋườʔi dã dến cướk tʰầʔi dể dượk dịɲ tiɲ sạc kòn fát lạʔi cên za tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi dến tʰầʔi tʰứ ɲì tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu dã cên za tʰìfảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế ấʔilà bịɲ fuŋ vậʔi xi kó fuŋ cên ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰìfảʔi zẫn ŋườʔi dó di mìɲ kùŋ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu kó nổʔi sưŋ sắk cắŋ cên za cɔ lôŋ cởtʰàɲ cắŋ kó tʰịt cín dó nơʔi cỗ sưŋ dó ấʔilà bịɲ fuŋ tʰâmniên cɔŋ za kủʔa tʰân ŋườʔi tʰầʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế xôŋ zam dã ôʔuế zồʔi kòn nếʔu fuŋ cên za bawfủ za kủʔa ŋườʔi kó dó dầʔu cí cân xắpnơʔi nàʔɔ tʰầʔi zòm tʰấʔi dượk tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi xám cɔ nếʔu fuŋ bawfủ kùŋ tʰịt tʰì dịɲ ŋườʔi kó tiɲ sạc ŋườʔi dã hóʔa cắŋ kùŋ mìɲ dượk tiɲ sạc vậʔi ɲưŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ fát za tʰịt cín dỏ tʰì ŋườʔi ôʔuế xi tʰầʔi tʰấʔi tʰịt cín dỏ tʰìfảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế tʰịt cín dỏ ôʔuế ấʔilà bịɲ fuŋ vậʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu tʰịt cín dỏ tʰăj di hóʔaza cắŋ tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi di mìɲ kùŋ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu dã cởtʰàɲ cắŋ tʰìfảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi kó tiɲ sạc dã dượk tiɲ sạc zồʔi xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cên za tʰân mìɲ kó cốk dã cữʔa làɲ tạʔicỗ cốk kó nổʔi sưŋ sắk cắŋ hăjlà dém cắŋ hồŋ tʰì ŋườʔi dó fảʔi di mìɲ kùŋ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu káʔi dém hủŋ sâʔu za nếʔu lôŋ cởtʰàɲ cắŋ tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế ấʔilà fuŋ dã cɔŋ cốk vậʔi kòn nếʔu tʰầʔi xám xôŋ tʰấʔi lôŋ cắŋcɔŋ cỗ dém xôŋ hủŋ sâʔu za tʰấʔi dã cởtʰàɲ táʔi tʰì hãʔi zam ŋườʔi dó cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi nềʔu dém cên za tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế ấʔilà fuŋ vậʔi kòn nếʔu kầmkự cỗ xôŋ za ấʔilà tʰẹʔɔ kủʔa cốk tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fỏŋ lửʔa cên za zấʔu fỏŋ dém cắŋ hồŋ hăjlà cắŋ tʰì tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu cɔŋ dém lôŋ cởtʰàɲ cắŋ nếʔu dém hủŋ sâʔu za ấʔilà bịɲ fuŋ cɔŋ fỏŋ vậʔi tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi nầʔi ôʔuế ấʔilà fuŋ kòn nếʔu tʰầʔi xám xôŋ tʰấʔi lôŋ cắŋcɔŋ dém xôŋ hủŋ sâʔu za tʰấʔi dã táʔi zồʔi tʰì hãʔi zam ŋườʔi nầʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi xám ŋườʔi nếʔu dém cên za tʰìfảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế ấʔilà fuŋ kòn nếʔu dém kầmkự cỗ xôŋ cên za táʔi di ấʔilà sưŋ fỏŋ tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc tʰẹʔɔ fỏŋ lửʔa xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi hăj kó cên dầʔu hɔặk nơʔi zâʔu tʰì tʰầʔi xám dó nếʔu hủŋ sâʔu za kó lôŋ ɲỏ vàŋvàŋ tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi za ôʔuế ấʔilà dòŋ dɛɲ tứklà bịɲ fuŋ kủʔa dầʔu hăjlà kủʔa zâʔu kòn nếʔu xi tʰầʔi xám dòŋ dɛɲ tʰấʔi xôŋ hủŋ sâʔu za xôŋ tʰấʔi kó lôŋ dɛn tʰìfảʔi zam ŋườʔi kó dòŋ dɛɲ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi xám nếʔu dòŋ dɛɲ xôŋ za xôŋ kó lôŋ vàŋvàŋ xôŋ hủŋ sâʔu za tʰì ŋườʔi dó fảʔi kạʔɔ ɣọt ɲưŋ xôŋ kạʔɔ ɣọt cỗ dòŋ dɛɲ zồʔi tʰầʔi zam ŋườʔi tʰứ ɲì bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa Ðʔɔạn ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu dòŋ dɛɲ xôŋ cên za xôŋ hủŋ sâʔu za tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc bịɲ fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ tʰì dượk tiɲ sạc ɲưŋ nếʔu săw xi ŋườʔi dã dượk dịɲ tiɲ sạc dòŋ dɛɲ lạʔi kòn cên za tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi xám cɔ nếʔu dòŋ dɛɲ dã cên za zồʔi tʰầʔi xôŋ kần tʰấʔi lôŋ vàŋvàŋ ŋườʔi dã ôʔuế ɲưŋ nếʔu dòŋ dɛɲ sɛm ŋừŋ lạʔi dã mọk lôŋ dɛn dòŋ dɛɲ dã làɲ ŋườʔi dã dượk tiɲ sạc tʰầʔi fảʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi hãʔi cên za tʰân mìɲ kó ɲữŋ dém cắŋ tʰầʔi xám cɔ nếʔu cên za tʰân ŋườʔi kó ɲữŋ dém cắŋ sɛɲ ấʔilà dém cắŋ cên za tʰôʔi ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dầʔu zụŋ tók ấʔilà ŋườʔi sóʔi dầʔu ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc nếʔu ŋườʔi zụŋ tók fíʔa ấʔilà ŋườʔi sóʔi cán ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc kòn nếʔu cɔŋ cỗ sóʔi fíʔa cướk hăjlà fíʔa săw kó cắŋ hồŋ ấʔilà bịɲ fuŋ za cỗ sóʔi fíʔa cướk hăjlà fíʔa săw tʰầʔi fảʔi xám cɔ nếʔu nơʔi sưŋ kủʔa cɔŋ cỗ sóʔi fíʔa cướk hăjlà fíʔa săw kó màʔu cắŋ hồŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư bịɲ fuŋ tạʔi za kủʔa tʰân ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi nầʔi fuŋ tʰầʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi ôʔuế ŋườʔiở nơʔi dầʔu vả ŋườʔi dã fuŋ zồʔi fảʔi sé kwầnáʔɔ dầʔu cần cɛ zâʔu lạʔi zằŋ ʔuế ʔuế cọn lúknàʔɔ ŋườʔi kó tʰì ôʔuế fảʔi mộtmìɲ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân xi nàʔɔ mốk cên kwầnáʔɔ ɲư fuŋ cên kwầnáʔɔ bằŋ lôŋ ciên hăj kwầnáʔɔ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj cên kɛɲ hăj cên cỉ bằŋ ɣaj hɔặk bằŋ lôŋ ciên cên za hăjlà cên nàʔɔ bằŋ za nếʔu dó màʔu sɛɲsɛɲ hăj dỏ dỏ cên kwầnáʔɔ hɔặk cên za cên kɛɲ hɔặk cên cỉ hăjlà cên nàʔɔ bằŋ za tʰìfảʔi kɔj ɲư bịɲ fuŋ dɛm dến cɔ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi xám cɔ zam kó ấʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi xám lạʔi nếʔu cên kwầnáʔɔ cên kɛɲ hăj cỉ cên za hăj cên cibằŋ za tʰìfảʔi kɔj ɲư bịɲ fuŋ dó ôʔuế vậʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi dốt kwầnáʔɔ kɛɲ hăj cỉ bằŋ lôŋ ciên hɔặk bằŋ ɣaj hɔặk kák ci làmbằŋ za cên dã bịɲ fuŋ zuồŋ fảʔi tʰiêʔu di kòn nếʔu tʰầʔi xám cẳŋ tʰấʔi dó cên kwầnáʔɔ cên kɛɲ hăj cên cỉ hɔặk kák ci làmbằŋ za tʰì ŋườʔi hãʔi biểʔu dɛm ɣiặt kó dó di zồʔi zam tʰứ ɲì cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa xi ɣiặt zồʔi tʰầʔi xám lạʔi nếʔu dó xôŋ faj màʔu kũŋ cẳŋ za tʰì dó ôʔuế ŋươʔi hãʔi dɛm tʰiêʔu di tʰứ mốk vàʔɔ cáʔi hăjlà kòn nếʔu săw xi ɣiặt zồʔi tʰầʔi tʰấʔi dã táʔi tʰìfảʔi ɣỡ xỏʔi kwầnáʔɔ za kɛɲ hăj cỉ di nếʔu mốk kòn lạʔi cên kwầnáʔɔ cên kɛɲ hăj cỉ hɔặk cên cibằŋ za tʰìfảʔi kɔj ɲư fuŋ tʰiêʔu kó dó di ɲưŋ kwầnáʔɔ kɛɲ hăj cỉ hɔặk nàʔɔ bằŋ za ŋươʔi dã ɣiặt dã zồʔi tʰì hãʔi dɛm ɣiặt tʰứ ɲì nữʔa dɔạn dượk tiɲ sạc mốk ɲư fuŋ cên kwầnáʔɔ bằŋ lôŋ ciên hăj bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj cên kɛɲ hăj cỉ hɔặk cên cibằŋ za ciếʔu tʰeo dó fảʔi dịɲ tiɲ sạc hăjlà ôʔuế Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi cɔ fuŋ ŋàʔi dượk sạc ŋườʔita zẫn ŋườʔi fuŋ dến tʰầʔi tʰầʔi za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân xám bịɲ cɔ nếʔu fuŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi bịɲ làɲ zồʔi tʰì fần ŋườʔi fảʔi dượk sạc tʰầʔi cwiền dɛm haj kɔn cim sốŋ tiɲ sạc kâʔi hươŋ màʔu dỏ ɲàɲ kiɲzớʔi tʰầʔi biểʔu kắtkổ cɔŋ haj cim dó cɔŋ cậʔu sàɲ cên nướk cảʔi Ðʔɔạn lấʔi cim kòn sốŋ vớʔi kâʔi hươŋ màʔu dỏ ɲàɲ kiɲzớʔi dɛm ɲúŋ cɔŋ hwiết kủʔa cim kiə dã kắtkổ cên nướk cảʔi tʰầʔi fảʔi zảʔi hwiết bảʔi cên ŋườʔi dượk sạc fuŋ dịɲ ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc zồʔi tʰả kɔn cim kòn sốŋ za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kẻ dượk sạcsẽ ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ kạʔɔ lôŋ cɔŋ nướk zồʔi dượk tiɲ sạc kế dó ŋườʔi dượk vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân ɲưŋ fảʔi ŋɔàʔi cạʔi mìɲ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋườʔi kạʔɔ lôŋ tók zâʔu lôŋmàʔi mìɲ ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk tʰì dượk tiɲ sạc kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔi haj ciên kɔn dựk xôŋ ci ciên kɔnkáʔi cưʔa ɣiáp xôŋ ci fần mườʔi fa lọk cế zầʔu kủʔa căj zầʔu tʰầʔi tʰɛɲsạc dɛm ŋườʔi dươŋ dượk sạc kák dó dến cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk kế dó tʰầʔi cɔŋ haj ciên kɔn dựk zâŋ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi vớʔi zầʔu dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ɣiết ciên kɔn dó cɔŋ nơʔi tʰườŋ ɣiết kák kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu tứklà cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi tʰuộk tʰầʔi ɲư kủʔa cuộk tộʔi vậʔi ấʔilà cí tʰáɲ tʰầʔi lấʔi hwiết kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuộk mắk lỗʔi bôʔi cên cáʔitaj hữʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi dượk sạc cên ŋónkáʔi tăimặt cên ŋónkáʔi cân dɔạn lấʔi zầʔu dổ cɔŋ bàntăj mìɲ ɲúŋ ŋóntăj hữʔu vàʔɔ zầʔu cɔŋ bàntăj mìɲ zảʔi bảʔi cướk Ðứkzê zầʔu kòn lạʔi cɔŋ bàntăj mìɲ tʰầʔi lấʔi bôʔi cên cáʔitaj hữʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi dượk sạc cên ŋónkáʔi tăimặt ŋónkáʔi cân tứk cên hwiết kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi zầʔu kòn zư lạʔi cɔŋ bàntăj mìɲ tʰầʔi dổ cên dầʔu ŋườʔi dượk sạc vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dượk sạc ôʔuế mìɲ kế dó tʰầʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zâŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj cên bàntʰờ vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi tʰì ŋườʔi nầʔi dượk tiɲ sạc ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi dó ŋèʔɔnàn xôŋ fươŋ tʰế dủ zâŋ ɲữŋ nầʔi tʰìfảʔi ciên kɔn dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ fần mườʔi lọk cế zầʔu kủʔa căj zầʔu tùʔi tʰeo fươŋ tʰế mìɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ dɛm haj kɔn cim ku hăjlà haj kâʔu kɔn kɔn nầʔi zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kiə zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔi fảʔi tʰɛɲsạc mìɲ dɛm kák nầʔi cɔ tʰầʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê tʰầʔi ciên kɔn dựk dịɲ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi zầʔu zồʔi zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ɣiết ciên kɔn zùŋ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi lấʔi hwiết bôʔi cên cáʔitaj hữʔu kủʔa dượk sạc cên ŋónkáʔi tăimặt cên ŋónkáʔi cân zồʔi tʰầʔi dổ zầʔu vàʔɔ bàntăj mìɲ ŋóntăj hữʔu ɲúŋ lấʔi zầʔu dổ cɔŋ bàntăj zảʔi bảʔi cướk Ðứkzê bôʔi cên cáʔitaj hữʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi dượk sạc cên ŋónkáʔi tăimặt cên ŋónkáʔi cân tạʔi nơʔi dã bôʔi hwiết kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi zầʔu kòn zư lạʔi cɔŋ bàntăj tʰầʔi dổ cên dầʔu ŋườʔi dượk sạc dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi zâŋ cɔŋ haj kɔn cim ku hɔặk cɔŋ haj kɔn bồkâʔu kɔn tùʔi tʰeo zâŋ kɔn nầʔi zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kiə zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu vớʔi kủʔa căj vậʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dượk sạc cướk Ðứkzê tʰɛɲsạc kủʔa ŋèʔɔnàn fuŋ Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ kanaan cɔ kák ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp nếʔu ɣiáŋ mốk mốk ɲư fuŋ cɔŋ ɲà nàʔɔ kủʔa sứ kák ŋươʔi dượk sảnŋiệp củ ɲà dó fảʔi dến káʔɔ kùŋ tʰầʔi zằŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi ɲư kó mốk cɔŋ ɲà cướk xi vàʔɔ xám mốk dó tʰầʔi fảʔi cwiền dɛm dồdạk cɔŋ ɲà za hầʔu cɔ xỏʔi lâʔi ôʔuế săw zờʔi sɔŋ tʰầʔi vàʔɔ dặŋ xám ɲà ŋườʔi sɛm dó nếʔu nơʔi vác kó màʔu sɛɲsɛɲ hɔặk dỏ dỏ sâʔu vác tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi di za dến kửʔa ŋɔàʔi ɲà lạʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi tʰầʔi cởlạʔi nếʔu tʰấʔi za cên vác ɲà tʰìfảʔi cwiền ɣỡ mấʔi kụk dá lâʔi liệŋ za ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ nơʔi zơzáʔi dɔạn biểʔu ŋườʔita kạʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà cuŋkwɛɲ ɲà bụʔi kạʔɔ dó za ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ nơʔi zơzáʔi zồʔi lấʔi dá xák cám vàʔɔ cỗ dá kũ dɛm mớʔi lạʔi xắp ɲà ɲưŋ nếʔu săw xi dã ɣỡ mấʔi kụk dá kạʔɔ ɲà lạʔi dó cởlạʔi cɔŋ ɲà tʰì tʰầʔi fảʔi dến xám nữʔa nếʔu tʰấʔi za ấʔilà fuŋ zuồŋ ɲà ɲà dã ôʔuế vậʔi fảʔi fá ɲà di dá ɣỗ zồʔi dɛm dổ hếttʰảʔi ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ nơʔi zơzáʔi cɔŋ lúk ɲà ʔaj di vàʔɔ tʰì lâʔi ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi ʔaj ŋủ hɔặk cɔŋ ɲà dó fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ ɲưŋ săw xi ɲà dã zồʔi nếʔu tʰầʔi cởlạʔi xám tʰấʔi xôŋ cɔŋ ɲà tʰìfảʔi dịɲ ɲà tiɲ sạc dó dã làɲ zồʔi Ðặŋ tʰɛɲsạc cɔ ɲà ŋườʔi fảʔi lấʔi haj kɔn cim kâʔi hươŋ màʔu dỏ ɲàɲ kiɲzớʔi ɣiết kɔn cim cɔŋ cậʔu sàɲ cên nướk cảʔi zồʔi lấʔi kâʔi hươŋ ɲàɲ kiɲzớʔi màʔu dỏ kɔn cim sốŋ ɲúŋ cɔŋ hwiết kɔn cim dã kắtkổ cên nướk cảʔi zảʔi bảʔi cên ɲà vậʔi ŋườʔi zùŋ hwiết kɔn cim nướk cảʔi kɔn cim sốŋ kâʔi hươŋ ɲàɲ kiɲzớʔi màʔu dỏ dặŋ xiến ɲà tʰɛɲsạc Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi tʰả kɔn cim sốŋ băj za ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ dếnnơʔi zuộŋ ŋườʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ɲà tʰì ɲà dượk sạc kák tʰứ fuŋ dòŋ dɛɲ mốk cên kwầnáʔɔ ɲàở ɲư fuŋ cỗ sưŋ cỗ za cỗ dém dặŋ zạʔi cɔbiết xi nàʔɔ ôʔuế xi nàʔɔ tiɲ sạc bịɲ fuŋ vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰân mìɲ bịɲ bạc cượk tʰì kớ dó ôʔuế ôʔuế ŋườʔi bởʔi nơʔi bạc cượk hɔặk tʰân mìɲ cảʔi bạc cượk za hăjlà lạʔi tʰì ŋườʔi ôʔuế hễ ɣiườŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk dềʔu ôʔuế kák nàʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cên kũŋ ôʔuế ʔaj dụŋ dến ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi ʔaj ŋồʔi cên ci ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk dã ŋồʔi fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến mìɲ ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk ɲổ ɲằm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tiɲ sạc tʰì ŋườʔi dó fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi hễ sɛ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk ŋồʔi dềʔu ôʔuế hễ ʔaj dụŋ dến ci zướʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk dềʔu ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi kòn ʔaj maŋ kák dó fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi ʔaj ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk zờ dến nếʔu ŋườʔi bịɲ dó xôŋ zửʔa tăj mìɲ cɔŋ nướk tʰì ʔaj dó fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi sàɲ ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk dụŋ dến fảʔi dập di kòn dồ ɣỗ tʰì zửʔa cɔŋ nướk vả xi ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk dã làɲ zồʔi tʰìfảʔi tíɲtừ ŋàʔi làɲ dến bảʔi ŋàʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk cảʔi dɔạn ŋườʔi dượk tiɲ sạc kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔi cɔ mìɲ haj cim ku hăjlà haj kɔn kâʔu kɔn dến cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk dưʔa cɔ tʰầʔi tʰầʔi zâŋ kɔn nầʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kiə kủʔa tʰiêʔu vậʔi tʰầʔi kớ bịɲ bạc cượk cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê hễ ŋườʔi zitiɲ fảʔi cọn mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi fàm kwầnáʔɔ za zíɲ fảʔi ɣiặt zửʔa cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi zawkấʔu ɲăw tʰìfảʔi cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi kó kiɲŋwiệt fảʔi cịʔu ôʔuế cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến ŋườʔi ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi fàm ɣì ŋườʔi hăj ŋồʔi cên cɔŋ lúk mìɲ xôŋ sạc ôʔuế ʔaj dụŋ dến ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến ɣì ŋườʔi dã ŋồʔi cên fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi nếʔu kó ci nơʔi ɣiườŋ hɔặk cên dồ ŋườʔi ŋồʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi víbằŋ ŋườʔi zawkấʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi dó ôʔuế kiɲŋwiệt zíɲ ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi ôʔuế cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi fàm ɣiườŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi dềʔu kũŋ ôʔuế xi ŋườʔi ŋɔàʔi kiɲŋwiệt mìɲ lạʔi kó lưʔuhwiết ɲiềʔu ŋàʔi hɔặk kwá ôʔuế cọn cɔŋ lúk lưʔuhwiết ɲư cɔŋ lúk kiɲŋwiệt mìɲ vậʔi cɔŋ cọn lúk lưʔuhwiết ɣiườŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi cên ɲư káʔi ɣiườŋ kủʔa kiɲŋwiệt mọʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cên dềʔu ôʔuế ɲư cɔŋ kiɲŋwiệt vậʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến kák dó ôʔuế fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi xi nàʔɔ hwiết ŋườʔi kầm lạʔi zồʔi fảʔi tíɲtừ ŋàʔi làɲ dến bảʔi ŋàʔi dɔạn dượk tiɲ sạc kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔi haj kɔn cim ku hɔặk haj kɔn kâʔu kɔn dɛm dến tʰầʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk tʰầʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn nầʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kiə kủʔa tʰiêʔu vậʔi tʰầʔi kớ lưʔuhwiết ôʔuế ŋườʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê tʰếtʰì kák ŋươʔi fânkác zân ʔisơzaên za sa ôʔuế kủʔa kẻʔɔ ôʔuế hộʔi mạk ɣiữʔa fảʔi cết cɔŋ ôʔuế mìɲ căŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ bịɲ bạc cượk hăjlà kớ zitiɲ ôʔuế ŋườʔi kó kiɲŋwiệt mọʔi ŋườʔi hɔặk hăj bạc cượk ŋườʔi zawkấʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ xi kiɲŋwiệt săw xi haj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔazôn cết cɔŋ lúk dến ɣần cướk Ðứkzê tʰì ŋàʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi cớ vàʔɔ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ fíʔa cɔŋ bứk cướk tʰiân cên bảŋ cứŋ ʔɛ ŋườʔi fảʔi cết căŋ cɔŋ mâʔi za cên tʰiân nầʔi ʔazôn vàʔɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ ɲưvầʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi kɔn dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔnciên dựk zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ŋườʔi mặk áʔɔlá cɔŋ tʰáɲ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj tʰân zướʔi mặk káʔi kwần bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj tʰắt daj bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj dộʔi cên dầʔu káʔi mãʔɔ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj Ấʔilà áʔɔ tʰáɲ ŋươʔi mặk lấʔi xi dã mìɲ cɔŋ nướk zɔ nơʔi hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi haj kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔnciên dựk zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ʔazôn zâŋ kɔn mìɲ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ cɔ ɲà mìɲ kế dó ŋườʔi fảʔi haj kɔn zê dựk dɛm dể cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk Ðʔɔạn ʔazôn bắttʰăm cɔ haj kɔn zê dựk tʰăm fần Ðứkzê tʰăm fần ʔasasên ʔazôn biểʔu zẫn kɔn zê dựk bắttʰăm fần Ðứkzê lạʔi ɣần zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kòn kɔn bắttʰăm fần ʔasasên dể sốŋ cướk Ðứkzê dể cuộk tộʔi cên zồʔi tʰả za nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ dặŋ ʔasasên vậʔi ʔazôn zâŋ kɔn mìɲ kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi ɣiết cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ cɔ ɲà mìɲ dɔạn lấʔi hươŋ dầʔi tʰan hựk dỏ cên bàntʰờ cướk Ðứkzê vốk hươŋ dɛm vàʔɔ fíʔa cɔŋ bứk ŋườʔi fảʔi hươŋ cên lửʔa cướk Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ ŋọn xóʔihươŋ bawfủ tʰiân cên bảŋ cứŋ tʰì ŋườʔi xôŋ cết ŋườʔi kũŋ fảʔi lấʔi hwiết kɔn dó zùŋ ŋóntăj zảʔi cên tʰiân fíʔa dôŋ zảʔi bảʔi fíʔa cướk tʰiân Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ɣiết kɔn zê dựk zùŋ zâncúŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi dɛm hwiết vàʔɔ fíʔa cɔŋ bứk zùŋ hwiết kɔn zê dựk dó kũŋɲư dã zùŋ hwiết kɔn tứklà zảʔi cên tʰiân cướk tʰiân vậʔi ŋườʔi kớ ôʔuế vifạm tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ cɔ hộʔi mạk ɣiữʔa ôʔuế kủʔa xi tʰầʔi vàʔɔ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ cɔdến xi ŋườʔi za tʰì cẳŋ kó ʔaj tạʔi hộʔi mạk vậʔi ŋườʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ cɔ ɲà mìɲ cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi za di dến bàntʰờ cướk Ðứkzê dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ bàntʰờ ŋườʔi lấʔi hwiết kɔn dựk kɔn zê dựk bôʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ɲữŋ sừŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ zồʔi zùŋ ŋóntăj zảʔi hwiết bảʔi cên bàntʰờ cɔ bàntʰờ sạc tʰáɲ kớ ɲữŋ ôʔuế kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên xi tʰầʔi dã cuộk tộʔi cɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ cɔ hộʔi mạk cɔ bàntʰờ zồʔi tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kòn sốŋ kiə ʔazôn ɲận haj tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kɔn zê dựk kòn sốŋ sưŋ cên kák zanák vifạm tứk ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cất cên dầʔu zồʔi ɲờ ŋườʔi cựk việk nầʔi saj duổʔi za tʰả vàʔɔ dồŋ vắŋ vậʔi kɔn zê dựk dó ɣáɲ cên mìɲ kák tộʔiák kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên za nơʔi hwaŋ dịʔa ʔazôn cở vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk kổʔi áʔɔ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj mìɲ dã mặk dặŋ vàʔɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ dể tạʔi dó zồʔi lấʔi nướk mìɲ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ mặk áʔɔ lạʔi di za zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu fần mìɲ kủʔa tʰiêʔu fần zâncúŋ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ cɔ zâncúŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ fảʔi lấʔi kủʔa kɔn siɲ cuộk tộʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zẫn kɔn zê dựk fần ʔasasên fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk dɔạn mớʔi dượk vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân ɲưŋ ŋườʔita fảʔi dɛm za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân kɔn dựk kɔn zê dựk dã zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi hwiết dã dɛm vàʔɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi zồʔi fảʔi lấʔi za tʰịt fẩn kủʔa haj tʰú dó dốt cɔŋ lửʔa kẻ nàʔɔ dứŋ dốt fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk dɔạn mớʔi dượk vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân Ðʔiềʔu nầʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi dến mồŋ mườʔi tʰáŋ bảʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi liɲhồn mìɲ xôŋ việk nàʔɔ ŋườʔi sứ hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita cuộk tộʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi dể kák ŋươʔi dượk tiɲ sạc cắk kák ŋươʔi dượk sạc ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ cướk Ðứkzê vậʔi Ấʔi sabát ŋàʔi ŋỉ cɔ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi liɲhồn mìɲ dó dịɲ dờʔidờʔi vậʔi tʰầʔi dã dượk fép sứk zầʔu cứk cɔ ca mìɲ mặk lấʔi áʔɔ vảʔi ɣaj tứklà áʔɔ tʰáɲ cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ cɔ hộʔi mạk cɔ bàntʰờ cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔ kả zân kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ mỗʔi fảʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dặŋ cɔ sạc kák tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa cúŋ ấʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi ʔazôn ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ kả zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ nầʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê fán zặn nếʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲà ʔisơzaên ɣiết kɔn kɔnciên kɔn hɔặk kɔn zê cɔŋ cạʔi kwân hăjlà ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân cẳŋ dɛm dến kửʔa hộʔi mạk dặŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê cướk dền kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰì hwiết dổ tộʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã dổ hwiết za cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ Ấʔi hầʔu cɔ zân ʔisơzaên lấʔi kủʔa mìɲ ɣiết ŋɔàʔi dồŋ zẫn dến tʰầʔi cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê tʰầʔi zướʔi hwiết kɔn siɲ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê dể tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk sôŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê zân ʔisơzaên kũŋ cẳŋ zâŋ kủʔa mìɲ cɔ makwỉ nữʔa tʰôŋzâm kùŋ Ðʔiềʔu nầʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ cảʔi kwa kák tʰế dạʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hăjlà kủʔa ci cẳŋ dɛm dến tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk dặŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì ŋườʔi dó cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa ɲà ʔisơzaên hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa hwiết ci kũŋ mặk tʰì nổʔizận kùŋ dó cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ sɛɲ mạŋ kủʔa sáktʰịt cɔŋ hwiết dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi hwiết zướʔi cên bàntʰờ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ liɲhồn mìɲ ɲờ sɛɲ mạŋ hwiết mớʔi cuộk tộʔi dượk bởʔi kớ dó dã fán kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ʔaj hwiết xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi kũŋ xôŋ hwiết kòn nếʔu ʔaj hɔặk zân ʔisơzaên hɔặk xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa di dượk kɔn tʰú hăjlà kɔn cim tʰịt dượk tʰìfảʔi dổ hwiết za zồʔi lấʔi bụʔi dất lạʔi sɛɲ mạŋ kủʔa mọʔi sáktʰịt ấʔilà hwiết cɔŋ hwiết kó sɛɲ mạŋ bởʔi kớ ấʔi dã fán kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ hwiết kủʔa sáktʰịt nàʔɔ sɛɲ mạŋ kủʔa mọʔi sáktʰịt ấʔilà hwiết ʔaj cuất ziệt hễ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hɔặk sɛɲ dẻ tạʔi sứ hɔặk xác tʰịt kủʔa kɔn tʰú cết hăjlà sé fảʔi ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi dɔạn dượk tiɲ sạc lạʔi kòn nếʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ xôŋ tʰì maŋ tộʔi mìɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰeo ɲữŋ diềʔu ŋườʔita hɔặk tạʔi sứ zíptô nơʔi kák ŋươʔi dã kiềʔu ŋụ hɔặk tạʔi sứ kanaan sứ zẫn kák ŋươʔi di dến cớ di tʰeo tʰóʔitụk kák ŋươʔi hãʔi mạŋ lịɲ ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp dặŋ nɔj tʰeo ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi ɣiữ luậtfáp mạŋ lịɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo tʰì ɲờ dượk sốŋ ta Ðứkzê cớ ʔaj cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi dến ɣần kùŋ ŋườʔi bàkɔn mìɲ dặŋ kấʔu ta Ðứkzê cớ kấʔu kùŋ mìɲ bằŋ kấʔu làmɲụk cɔ camẹ cớ kấʔu kùŋ kếmẫʔu bằŋ kấʔu ấʔi làmɲụk cɔ ca mìɲ cớ kấʔu kùŋ cịʔɛm mìɲ hɔặk ca xák hɔặk xák ca hɔặk sɛɲ tạʔi cɔŋ ɲà hɔặk sɛɲ ŋɔàʔi cớ kấʔu kùŋ cáʔu ɣáʔi hɔặk cáʔu ɣáʔi nộʔi hɔặk cáʔu ɣáʔi ŋɔạʔi bằŋ kấʔu ấʔilà ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ mìɲ cớ kấʔu kùŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa kếmẫʔu bởʔi ca mìɲ sɛɲ za ʔɛmɣáʔi ŋươʔi cớ kấʔu kùŋ cịʔɛm kủʔa ca ŋươʔi kốtɲụk kủʔa ca ŋươʔi cớ kấʔu kùŋ cịʔɛm kủʔa ŋươʔi kốtɲụk kủʔa ŋươʔi cớ kấʔu kùŋ bák ɣáʔi hăj tʰím ŋươʔi bằŋ kấʔu ấʔilà ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ca ŋươʔi cớ kấʔu kùŋ zâʔu ŋươʔi kủʔa kɔncaj mìɲ cớ kấʔu kùŋ cị zâʔu hăj ʔɛm zâʔu ŋươʔi nếʔu kấʔu ấʔi làmɲụk cɔ ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi vậʔi cớ kấʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi dànbà vớʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dànbà nữʔa cớ lấʔi cáʔu ɣáʔi nộʔi ŋươʔi hɔặk cáʔu ɣáʔi ŋɔạʔi ŋươʔi dặŋ kấʔu kùŋ cúŋnó dềʔu kốtɲụk ɣần làmvậʔi ấʔilà việk ák zụk cớ lấʔi vớʔi cịʔɛm ŋườʔi kấʔu kùŋ ɣần cáɲ mìɲ dươŋ xi ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ ʔɛ xi sɛɲ ɣɛn tươŋ cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi kó kiɲŋwiệt cớ dến ɣần kấʔu cớ kùŋ ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế vớʔi ŋườʔi cớ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ dặŋ zâŋ cɔ tʰần mɔlók cớ ôzɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ta Ðứkzê cớ kùŋ ŋườʔi ɲư ŋườʔita kùŋ ŋườʔi ấʔilà kwáʔi ɣớm cớ kùŋ kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế vớʔi ŋườʔi dànbà cớ kùŋ tʰúvật nàʔɔ ấʔilà kwáʔi ɣớm kák ŋươʔi cớ cɔŋ mấʔi việk dó ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế bởʔi zân duổʔi xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi dã tʰàɲ ôʔuế kớ kák việk dó cúŋnó ôʔuế fạt tộʔiák dất mửʔa zân za vậʔi kòn kák ŋươʔi hɔặk zân sứ hɔặk xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ luậtfáp mạŋ lịɲ dừŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ diềʔu kwáʔi ɣớm nầʔi vì ɲữŋ diềʔu kwáʔi ɣớm ấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở tạʔi sứ cướk kák ŋươʔi dã dất kớ dó fảʔi tʰàɲ ôʔuế vậʔi cớ dất tʰàɲ ôʔuế ʔɛ xi dất mửʔa kák ŋươʔi za ɲư dã mửʔa zân kưcú tạʔi sứ cướk kák ŋươʔi căŋ fàm ʔaj cɔŋ ɲữŋ diềʔu kwáʔi ɣớm ấʔi cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ tʰếtʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ diềʔu fán zặn dể dừŋ tʰeo cɔŋ kák tʰóʔitụk ɣớmɣiếk nàʔɔ dã cướk kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ kák tʰóʔitụk dó ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ hãʔi tʰáɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋườʔi tʰáɲ ʔainấʔi fảʔi tônkíɲ camẹ mìɲ ɣiữ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cớ sâʔi hìɲtượŋ kũŋ cớ dúk tượŋ tʰần ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi zâŋ mộtkác cɔ dượk ɲậm nộʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi zâŋ dó ŋàʔimaj kòn fần ci zư lạʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứba tʰìfảʔi tʰiêʔu di nếʔu ŋườʔita dể dến ŋàʔi tʰứba ấʔilà diềʔu ɣớmɣiếk cẳŋ dượk ɲậm ʔaj kủʔa ɲưvậʔi maŋ lấʔi tộʔiák mìɲ dã tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê za dộk ŋườʔi dó cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ xi kák ŋươʔi ɣặt lúʔa cɔŋ sứ mìɲ cớ kó ɣặt dến kuốʔi dầʔu dồŋ cớ lạʔi ɲữŋ bôŋ kòn kák ŋươʔi cớ kắn ɲɔ mìɲ dừŋ ɲặt ɲữŋ cáʔi zớt zồʔi hãʔi dể cɔ mấʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xác ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ăncộm ănkắp cớ nóʔizốʔi cớ lừʔadảʔɔ ɲăw kák ŋươʔi cớ cỉ zɛɲ tʰề zốʔi ŋươʔi ôzɛɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ta Ðứkzê cớ ứciếp lânkận mìɲ cớ kướp ɣiựt kủʔa tiềnkôŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi cớ dể lạʔi cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ cɔdến ŋàʔimaj cớ zủʔasả ŋườʔi diếk cớ dể cướk ŋườʔi ci cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ta Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi cớ fạm bấtŋĩʔa cɔŋ việk sétdɔán cớ tʰiênvị ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ cớ kwiềntʰế hãʔi kứ tʰeo kôŋbìɲ sétdɔán lânkận ŋươʔi cớ buôŋ lờʔi faw cɔŋ zânsự mìɲ cớ mưʔukế ŋịc sốŋ kủʔa lânkận mìɲ ta Ðứkzê cớ kó lòŋ ɣɛŋét ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ hãʔi sửʔa zạʔi lânkận mìɲ dừŋ kớ fảʔi mắk tộʔi cớ twan báʔɔtʰù cớ ɣiữ báʔɔtʰù kùŋ kɔncáʔu zânsự mìɲ ɲưŋ hãʔi ʔiêʔutʰươŋ lânkận ŋươʔi ɲư mìɲ ta Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ cớ dể lɔàʔi xák ɣiốŋ fủ ɲăw cớ zeo zuộŋ ŋươʔi haj tʰứ ɣiốŋ cớ mặk mìɲ bằŋ áʔɔ zệt ɲiềʔu tʰứ cỉ nếʔu ŋườʔi kấʔu kùŋ dứʔa ɣáʔi dã hứʔa ɣả cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cưʔa cuộk za hɔặk cưʔa dượk fóŋ mọʔi tʰì haj ŋườʔi dềʔu hìɲfạt xôŋ fảʔi dến cết dứʔa ɣáʔi cưʔa dượk fóŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi lỗʔi mìɲ zẫn kɔnciên dựk dến cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi tʰầʔi zùŋ kɔnciên dựk kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dã fạm cướk Ðứkzê vậʔi tộʔi ŋườʔi dã fạm dượk tʰa xi kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ kanaan dã cồŋ kák tʰứ kâʔi cáʔi zồʔi hãʔi kɔj kák cáʔi ciếŋ xôŋ sạc ɲư cưʔa cịʔufép kắt cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi kɔj xôŋ sạc cớ ɲưŋ kwa tʰứtư kák cáʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa xɛnŋợʔi Ðứkzê kwa tʰứnăm kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ăncáʔi hầʔu cɔ kâʔi tʰêm hwakwả ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ci kó hwiết cớ zùŋ bóʔi xwa cớ tʰuậtsố cớ kắt tók mìɲ cɔ còn cớ fá xóʔɛ zâʔu mìɲ cớ cết kắt tʰịt mìɲ cớ săm cên mìɲ ta Ðứkzê cớ ɲụk kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi xiến dể cɔŋ sứ xôŋ kódiềʔu zâmlɔạn dầʔizẫʔi ɲữŋ ák zụk kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ ɲữŋ tônkíɲ nơʔi tʰáɲ ta Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi cớ kầʔu dồŋkốt hăjlà tʰầʔibóʔi cớ hỏʔi cúŋnó ʔɛ cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ôʔuế ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cướk ŋườʔi tók bạk ŋươʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi kíɲ ŋườʔi ɣiàkả kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ta Ðứkzê xi xác nàʔɔ kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi tʰìcớ ŋườʔi kẻ xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi ɲư dã sɛɲ dẻ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰươŋiêʔu ŋườʔi ɲư mìɲ kák ŋươʔi dã làmxác kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ zíptô ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ fạm bấtŋĩʔa cɔŋ việk sétdɔán hɔặk dɔ kân hăjlà lườŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kó kân tʰiệt cáʔi kânbằŋ dá dúŋ fa tʰiệt tʰiệt ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã zẫn kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vậʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣìŋiữ tʰeo kák luậtfáp kák mạŋ lịɲ ta Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ fàm ʔaj cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa vòŋ zùŋ cɔŋ kák kɔn mìɲ zâŋ cɔ tʰần mɔlók tʰì cắk sửtử zân sứ fảʔi dá ŋườʔi ấʔi kòn nổʔizận kùŋ ŋườʔi dó cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ dã kɔnkáʔi mìɲ cɔ tʰần mɔlók cɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ ôʔuế ôzɛɲ tʰáɲ nếʔu zân sứ ɲắmmắt xi ŋườʔi dó zâŋ cɔŋ kák kɔnkáʔi cɔ tʰần mɔlók cẳŋ ɣiết di tʰì tadâʔi nổʔizận kùŋ ŋườʔi dó ɲà zồʔi cuất kùŋ ɲữŋ nàʔɔ tʰeo tʰôŋzâm kùŋ tʰần mɔlók za xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ nếʔu ʔaj sâʔi dồŋkốt tʰầʔibóʔi tʰôŋzâm kùŋ cúŋnó tʰì nổʔizận kùŋ ŋườʔi dó cuất za xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi sạc mìɲ hãʔi tʰáɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ tʰeo ɲữŋ luậtfáp ta Ðứkzê Ðấŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰáɲ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cửʔi ca mắŋ mìɲ tʰìfảʔi sửtử dã cửʔizủʔa camẹ hwiết dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fạmtộʔi tàzâm kùŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi xák hăjlà fạmtộʔi tàzâm kùŋ ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ ŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dó dềʔu fảʔi sửtử nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kùŋ ca mìɲ ấʔilà ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ ca mìɲ tʰì haj ŋườʔi dềʔu fảʔi sửtử hwiết dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kùŋ zâʔu mìɲ haj ŋườʔi dềʔu fảʔi fạt sửtử fạm ɣớmɣiếk hwiết dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi xák ɲư kùŋ ŋườʔi tʰì haj ŋườʔi dó dềʔu fảʔi sửtử dã ɣớmɣiếk hwiết dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi kả mẹkɔn ấʔilà ák hãʔi tʰiêʔu kả di hầʔu cɔ ák dó xôŋ kòn cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi kấʔu kùŋ tʰúvật tʰì fảʔi sửtử kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiết tʰú dó di nếʔu ŋườʔi lạʔi ɣần kɔn tʰú dặŋ kấʔu kùŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi kɔn tʰú dó di hwiết dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi cịʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ hɔặk ca xák hɔặk xák ca kấʔu ɲăw ấʔilà diếmɲụk cuất xỏʔi cướk zânsự mìɲ ŋườʔi dã ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ cịʔɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi maŋ tộʔiák mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk kó kiɲŋwiệt ŋườʔi za ŋwiên hwiết kủʔa ŋườʔi cáɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ za ŋwiên hwiết mìɲ tʰì kả haj dềʔu cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ cớ kấʔu kùŋ cịʔɛm kủʔa hăjlà cịʔɛm kủʔa ca ŋươʔi ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ tʰântộk mìɲ haj ŋườʔi dềʔu maŋ tộʔiák mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi kùŋ bák ɣáʔi hăj tʰím mìɲ tứklà ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ cú bák mìɲ haj ŋườʔi dềʔu maŋ hìɲfạt kủʔa tộʔi mìɲ họ cết twiệttự nếʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ấʔilà ôʔuế ŋườʔi dó dã ɣâʔi ɲụk cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ haj ŋườʔi dó twiệttự kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣìŋiữ tʰeo ɲữŋ luậtfáp mạŋ lịɲ hầʔu cɔ sứ zẫn kák ŋươʔi dến ởxôŋ mửʔa kák ŋươʔi za cớ nɔj tʰeo tʰóʔitụk kủʔa zân duổʔi za xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi dã ɲữŋ diềʔu dó lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk ta dã fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà kák ŋươʔi dượk sứ kủʔa zân dó cɔ kák ŋươʔi sứ ấʔi dặŋ sảnŋiệp ấʔilà sứ dượm sữʔa ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dã fânzẽ kák ŋươʔi kùŋ kák zân vậʔi hãʔi fânbiệt tʰú tiɲ sạc vớʔi tʰú ôʔuế cim ôʔuế vớʔi cim tiɲ sạc cớ ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ za ɣớmɣiếk lɔàʔi cimcók kák lɔàʔi kôncùŋ cên mặtdất dã zạʔi kák ŋươʔi fânbiệt ɲư lɔàʔi ôʔuế Ðốʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰáɲ Ðứkzê tʰáɲ dã fânzẽ kák ŋươʔi vớʔi kák zân dể kák ŋươʔi tʰuộk xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi hăj dồŋkốt hăjlà bóʔi xwa tʰì sửtử ŋườʔita dá cúŋnó hwiết cúŋnó dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ cúŋnó Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák kɔncaj ʔazôn zằŋ tʰầʔi cớ ŋườʔi cết cɔŋ zânsự cɔ mìɲ za ôʔuế cừ za bàkɔn tʰântʰíc mìɲ ca kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cịʔɛmzuột mìɲ kòn dồŋciɲ cưʔa cồŋ tʰì ŋườʔi dượk cịʔɛm dó cɔ mìɲ za ôʔuế ŋườʔi dầʔu cưởŋ cɔŋ zânsự mìɲ cớ mìɲ za tụk ôʔuế kák tʰầʔi cớ sóʔi cên dầʔu cớ kạʔɔ zâʔu mìɲ dừŋ kắt tʰịt mìɲ họ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ cớ ôzɛɲ ŋàʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa tʰiêʔu tứklà tʰựkvật kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ fảʔi tʰáɲ tʰầʔi cớ kướʔi ŋườʔi hăjlà zâmô kũŋ cẳŋ kướʔi ŋườʔi cồŋ dể tʰầʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰầʔi ɲư tʰáɲ ŋườʔi zâŋ tʰựkvật kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi tʰáɲ cɔ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê tʰáɲ Ðấŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰáɲ vậʔi nếʔu kɔŋáʔi tʰầʔi di zâmô ấʔilà ôzɛɲ cɔ ca fảʔi tʰiêʔu lửʔa tʰầʔi dượk kwiền cọŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dã dượk zướʔi zầʔu sứk cên dầʔu mìɲ dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dể mặk mìɲ bằŋ áʔɔ tʰáɲ cẳŋ dể dầʔu cần sé áʔɔ mìɲ ŋươʔi cớ di dếnkùŋ cết cớ ca hăj mìɲ za ôʔuế ŋườʔi cẳŋ di za xỏʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ dừŋ cɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ za ôʔuế káʔi mãʔɔ zầʔu sứk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên dầʔu ŋườʔi ta Ðứkzê ŋườʔi fảʔi kướʔi ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kướʔi dànbà ɣóʔa dể zâmô hăjlà ɲưŋ fảʔi kướʔi ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ cɔŋ vòŋ zânsự mìɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ ôzɛɲ zòŋọ mìɲ ɣiữʔa zânsự ŋườʔi Ðứkzê cɔ ŋườʔi tʰáɲ Ðứkzê kòn fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ fàm ʔaj cɔŋ zòŋọ ŋươʔi cảʔi kák dờʔi kó bịɲ cɔŋ tʰântʰể cớ dến ɣần zâŋ tʰựkvật cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ fàm ʔaj kó xôŋ dượk dến ɣần ɲư dâʔi ŋườʔi kwè mũʔi hăjlà tứci xôŋ dềʔu ŋườʔi ɣãʔi cân hăj ɣãʔi tăj ŋườʔi kó bướʔu hăjlà lỏŋxỏŋ kó vảʔi ká hăjlà kó ɣẻ cốk kó hăjlà kó naŋ zập fàm kɔncáʔu tʰầʔi ʔazôn kó cɔŋ mìɲ xôŋ dượk dến ɣần zâŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu kó cɔŋ mìɲ xôŋ dượk dến ɣần zâŋ tʰựkvật cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi dượk tʰựkvật kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ kák cí tʰáɲ kák ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ɲưŋ xôŋ dượk di dến ɣần bàntʰờ kó nơʔi mìɲ ŋươʔi cớ kák nơʔi tʰáɲ za ôʔuế Ðứkzê kák nơʔi dó tʰáɲ môʔisɛ nóʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kùŋ cɔ kả zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ fảʔi kiêŋkữ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰáɲ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ hầʔu cɔ cúŋ cớ ôzɛɲ tʰáɲ ta Ðứkzê hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ fàm ʔaj cɔŋ zòŋzốŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi dã ôʔuế dến ɣần kák tʰáɲ zân ʔisơzaên ziêŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì ʔaj dó cuất xỏʔi cướk ta Ðứkzê fàm ʔaj kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔazôn bịɲ fuŋ hăjlà bạc cượk tʰì cẳŋ dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dượk tiɲ sạc ʔaj dụŋ dến ŋườʔi dã ôʔuế bởʔi sákcết ʔaj kó zitiɲ hăjlà ʔaj dụŋ dến hɔặk lɔàʔi kôncùŋ hɔặk ŋườʔi ôʔuế nàʔɔ cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế tʰì kũŋ fảʔi mộttʰể ấʔi ʔaj dụŋ dến kák dó ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi xôŋ dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ɲưŋ fảʔi mìɲ cɔŋ nướk săw xi mặtcờʔi ŋườʔi dượk sạc lạʔi zồʔi mớʔi dượk fép kák tʰáɲ dồăn kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ cết tựɲiên hăjlà sé hầʔu xỏʔi ôʔuế ta Ðứkzê vậʔi fảʔi ɣiữ diềʔu fán zặn kẻʔɔ maŋ tộʔilỗʔi cết căŋ dã kák tʰáɲ năj za ôʔuế ta Ðứkzê cɔ tʰáɲ cẳŋ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ nàʔɔ dượk tʰáɲ nàʔɔ tạʔi ɲà tʰầʔi hăjlà ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ dượk tʰáɲ ɲưŋ nàʔɔ tʰầʔi lấʔi bạk mwa sɛɲ dẻ tạʔi ɲà ŋườʔi tʰì dượk fép dồăn kủʔa ŋườʔi nếʔu kɔŋáʔi kủʔa tʰầʔi kếttʰân kùŋ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ tʰì xôŋ dượk tʰáɲ zâŋ ɣiơ kòn nếʔu kɔŋáʔi kủʔa tʰầʔi dã ɣóʔa hăjlà dể xôŋ kó kɔn cởvề ɲà ca ɲư buổʔi kòn tʰơ tʰì nàŋ dượk dồăn kủʔa ca mìɲ ɲưŋ cẳŋ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ nàʔɔ nếʔu ʔaj tʰáɲ tʰìfảʔi dền lạʔi cɔ tʰầʔi ɣiá kủʔa tʰáɲ dó fụ tʰêm fần tʰầʔi cớ ôʔuế kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔaj tʰáɲ dã zâŋ ɲưvậʔi maŋ tộʔi mìɲ dã fạm Ðứkzê cɔ kák dó tʰáɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kùŋ cɔ kả zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ hễ ŋườʔiɲà ʔisơzaên hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê hɔặk kủʔa xấn ŋwiện hăjlà kủʔa lạk hầʔu cɔ dượk ɲậm fảʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk xôŋ ci cɔŋ bầʔi hɔặk ciên kɔn hăjlà zê káʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ zâŋ kɔn nàʔɔ kó xôŋ dượk ɲậm xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa tʰù bằŋ hăj ciên hɔặk zâŋ cả xấn ŋwiện hăjlà lạk hầʔu cɔ kɔn siɲ dượk ɲậm fảʔi xôŋ kó ci cên mìɲ kák ŋươʔi cớ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ hɔặk kwè kẳŋ sé ɣẻ cốk hăjlà kák ŋươʔi cớ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê cên bàntʰờ kák ŋươʔi dượk kɔn hăj ciên kɔn kó ɣiò zàʔi hɔặk ŋắn kwá kủʔa lạk ɲưŋ kủʔa xấn ŋwiện kɔn tʰú ɲưvầʔi kwả cẳŋ dượk ɲậm kák ŋươʔi cớ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi sứ mìɲ kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ naŋ zập zứt hăjlà tʰiến di cớ ɲận nơʔi tăj xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kɔn siɲ nàʔɔ ɲưvậʔi dặŋ zâŋ tʰựkvật cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ dã kó cên mìɲ xôŋ dượk ɲậm kák ŋươʔi dâʔu Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hễ kɔn kɔn kɔnciên kɔn hăj kɔn zê kɔn fảʔi kwẩn tʰeo cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔisăw xi lọtlòŋ ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứ săw dượk ɲậm kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê bấtkỳ káʔi hăj ciên káʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ɣiết kɔn cɔŋ ŋàʔi xi kák ŋươʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi zâŋ tʰếnàʔɔ cɔ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dượk ɲậm kủʔa dó fảʔi nộʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ dể ci lạʔi cɔdến sớmmaj ta Ðứkzê vậʔi hãʔi ɣiữ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn ta Ðứkzê Ðừŋ ôzɛɲ tʰáɲ tʰì dượk tʰáɲ ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên ta Ðứkzê cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰáɲ tứk Ðấŋ dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dể Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi ta Ðứkzê Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ nầʔi ɲữŋ ŋàʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi hãʔi zaw cwiền za kák hộʔitʰáɲ ŋườʔita làmviệk cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ tứk ɲóm tʰáɲ dừŋ kôŋviệk ɣì ấʔilà kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ ɲữŋ nơʔi kák ŋươʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê tứk ɲữŋ ɲóm tʰáɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zaw cwiền za xi dến ɲấtdịɲ ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋzêŋ vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi ấʔilà vượtkwa kủʔa Ðứkzê kwaŋàʔi zằm tʰáŋ nầʔi ấʔilà báɲ xôŋ mɛn dể kíɲcọŋ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi báɲ xôŋ fa mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dầʔu kák ŋươʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ cẳŋ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ dến ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ nữʔa kák ŋươʔi dừŋ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã vàʔɔ sứ cɔ dã ɣặt mùʔamàŋ zồʔi tʰì hãʔi dɛm dến cɔ tʰầʔi lúʔa dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kwaŋàʔi săw tʰầʔi zâŋ lúʔa dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ lúʔa dó dượk ɲậm cáɲ ŋàʔi zâŋ lúʔa dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi dó kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ciên kɔŋiáp xôŋ ci dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zâŋ tʰêm kủʔa căj bằŋ haj fần mườʔi lọk cế zầʔu kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê vớʔi mộtfầntư zượʔu kwán kák ŋươʔi cớ hɔặk báɲ hɔặk lúʔa zaŋ hɔặk lúʔa daŋ cɔŋ ɣié cɔdến cáɲ ŋàʔi nầʔi tứklà ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi dɛm zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ mặkzầʔu nơʔi nàʔɔ ấʔilà dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi kể ŋàʔisăw ŋàʔi dɛm lúʔa zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi kák ŋươʔi tíɲ bảʔi cọn kák ŋươʔi tíɲ nămmươʔi ŋàʔi cɔdến ŋàʔisăw kủʔa tʰứbảʔi tʰìfảʔi zâŋ kủʔa căj
