mớʔi cɔ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲà mìɲ dɛm dến haj báɲ dặŋ kủʔa zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi báɲ dó làmbằŋ haj fần mườʔi lọk kó fa mɛn ấʔilà kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ vớʔi báɲ bảʔi ciên kɔŋiáp cẳŋ ci kɔn haj kɔnciên dựk vớʔi kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu Ðứkzê ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa sôŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi haj ciên kɔŋiáp dặŋ kủʔa tʰù tʰầʔi lấʔi kák kủʔa dó vớʔi haj báɲ bằŋ lúʔa dầʔu mùʔa haj ciên kɔn zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê kák dó ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰuộk tʰầʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi zaw cwiền ɲóm cɔŋ cáɲ ŋàʔi dó fảʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ Ấʔilà dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi mặkzầʔu nơʔi nàʔɔ xi kák ŋươʔi ɣặt lúʔa cɔŋ sứ mìɲ cớ ɣặt dầʔu dồŋ cớ lúʔa lạʔi hãʔi dểfần dó cɔ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ bảʔi kó cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ lấʔi tiếŋ tʰổʔi zaw cwiền tứklà ɲóm tʰáɲ vậʔi cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ fảʔi zâŋ kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋàʔi mồŋ mườʔi tʰáŋ bảʔi nầʔi ŋàʔi cuộk tộʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ hãʔi mìɲ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ ŋàʔi dó cẳŋ kôŋviệk nàʔɔ ŋàʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó fảʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ʔaj xôŋ mìɲ cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ và ʔaj kôŋviệk ɣì tʰì ziệt xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kôŋviệk ci ấʔilà dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi mặkzầʔu nơʔi nàʔɔ Ấʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi mìɲ ŋàʔi mồŋ cín tʰáŋ dó kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ mìɲ ciềʔu năj dến ciềʔu maj Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ŋàʔi zằm tʰáŋ bảʔi nầʔi lềʔu cảʔi kwa bảʔi ŋàʔi dặŋ tônkíɲ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲất kó ɲóm tʰáɲ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi fảʔi zâŋ kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kwaŋàʔi tʰứ kák ŋươʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ nữʔa kũŋ zâŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê Ấʔi hộʔi cọŋtʰể cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ ɲữŋ cọŋtʰể kủʔa Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zaw cwiền ɲóm tʰáɲ dặŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kủʔa tʰù kwán nàʔɔ dã dịɲ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi ŋɔàʔiza kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kứ ɣiữ kủʔa Ðứkzê kứ zâŋ cɔ ŋàʔi kák mìɲ kák kủʔa xấn ŋwiện lạk ɲưŋ dến ŋàʔi zằm tʰáŋ bảʔi xi kák ŋươʔi dã tʰâʔu hɔạc tʰổsản mìɲ zồʔi hãʔi ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi bữʔa tʰứ ɲất ŋàʔi ŋỉ bữʔa tʰứ kũŋ ŋàʔi ŋỉ bữʔa tʰứ ɲất kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi cáʔicâʔi tàʔu càlà ɲàɲ kâʔi zậm kâʔi zươŋliễʔu zồʔi vuimừŋ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔicướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi mỗʔi vàʔɔ tʰáŋ bảʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ nầʔi cɔ Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi Ấʔilà dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi ʔaj sɛɲ cɔŋ zòŋ ʔisơzaên nơʔi cạʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi zằŋ xi dɛm zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔ cɔŋ ɲữŋ cạʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ấʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kák kủʔa Ðứkzê nàʔɔ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dɛm zầʔu livɛ cɔŋsạc dặŋ tʰắp dèn dể ɣiữ cɔ dèn cáʔi ʔazôn dèn dó cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ŋɔàʔi bứk cɛ bảŋ cứŋ hầʔu cɔ dèn cáʔi ciềʔutốʔi dến sáŋmaj cướk Ðứkzê ấʔilà dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔazôn dể kák dèn cên cân dèn bằŋ vàŋ cɔ dèn cáʔi cướk Ðứkzê ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi lấʔi lọk mườʔihaj báɲ mỗʔi kân nặŋ haj fần mườʔi fa dɔạn za haj hàŋ sáʔu cên káʔi bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cướk Ðứkzê kùŋ zắk ɲũhươŋ tʰáɲ cên mỗʔi hàŋ dể cên báɲ ɲư kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê mỗʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔita báɲ nầʔi cướk Ðứkzê zɔ nơʔi zân ʔisơzaên kuŋkấp ấʔilà zawướk dờʔidờʔi kák báɲ dó tʰuộk ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi fảʔi tạʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ cí tʰáɲ cɔ bởʔi kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê Ấʔilà dịɲ dờʔidờʔi kó dứʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ca ŋườʔi zíptô di za ɣiữʔa vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên dáɲlộn tạʔi nơʔi cạʔi kwân vớʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên Ðứʔa caj dó nóʔi fạm dến zủʔasả zɛɲ Ðứkzê ŋườʔita zẫn dến môʔisɛ zam vàʔɔ ŋụk cɔdến cừŋ Ðứkzê fán dịɲ fảʔi sử làmsaw mẹ sêlômít kɔŋáʔi kủʔa Ðʔiệp zi tʰuộk cifáʔi Ðʔan vả Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm dã zủʔasả za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân hếttʰảʔi ʔaj dã kó ŋɛ fảʔi dặt tăj mìɲ cên dầʔu kả hộʔi cúŋ fảʔi dá Ðʔɔạn hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zủʔasả Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ maŋ hìɲfạt kủʔa tộʔi mìɲ ʔaj nóʔi fạm dến zɛɲ Ðứkzê sửtử kả hộʔi cúŋ dá mặkzầʔu xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ hăjlà sɛɲ cɔŋ sứ xi nàʔɔ nóʔi fạm dến zɛɲ Ðứkzê tʰì sửtử kẻ nàʔɔ dáɲ cết ŋườʔi nàʔɔ mặkzầʔu dó ʔaj sửtử kẻ nàʔɔ dáɲ cết súkvật fảʔi tʰườŋ lạʔi ŋĩʔalà mạŋ dềnmạŋ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰươŋtíc cɔ lânkận mìɲ tʰì ŋườʔita fảʔi tʰươŋtíc cɔ ŋườʔi dó lạʔi ɲư cíɲ ŋườʔi dã ɣãʔi dền ɣãʔi dền zăŋ dền zăŋ ŋườʔita cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi dồŋ tʰươŋ ɲư cíɲ ŋườʔi dã cɔ ŋườʔi xák kẻ nàʔɔ cết súkvật tʰì tʰườŋ lạʔi kòn nàʔɔ ɣiết cết ŋườʔi tʰìfảʔi sửtử bấtluận xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ hăjlà ŋườʔi cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi lạʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên biểʔu dɛm dã zủʔasả za xỏʔi cạʔi kwân zồʔi dá tʰếtʰì zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã cwiền zặn môʔisɛ Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi cên núʔi sina ʔi zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi kák ŋươʔi dã vàʔɔ sứ cɔzồʔi tʰì dất fảʔi ŋỉ ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ sáʔu ŋươʔi zeo zuộŋ ɲɔ mìɲ kùŋ tʰâʔu hɔạc tʰổsản ɲưŋ tʰứbảʔi dể cɔ dất ŋỉ tứklà cɔ Ðứkzê ŋươʔi cẳŋ zeo zuộŋ mìɲ hăjlà ɲɔ mìɲ cẳŋ ɣặt lạʔi ɲữŋ ci dã mọk săw xi mùʔamàŋ dừŋ háʔi ɲɔ kủʔa ɲɔ xôŋ sửʔa ấʔi cɔ dất ŋỉ fàm ɣì dất sɛɲ cɔŋ zùŋ dồăn cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi ŋươʔi cɔ làmtʰuê kủʔa ŋươʔi cɔ ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ vớʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ cɔ lụksúk tʰúvật cɔŋ sứ ŋươʔi nữʔa hếttʰảʔi tʰổsản zùŋ dồăn vậʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi tíɲ bảʔi tứk bảʔi bảʔi tʰìɣiờ kủʔa bảʔi nầʔi bốnmươʔicín zồʔi dến ŋàʔi mồŋ mườʔi tʰáŋ bảʔi tứklà ŋàʔi cuộk tộʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰổʔi vaŋ cɔŋ xắp sứ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ tʰứ nămmươʔi tʰáɲ zaw cwiền tựzɔ cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân cɔŋ sứ Ấʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔainấʔi dềʔu dượk ɲận lạʔi kơŋiệp mìɲ ʔainấʔi dềʔu cởvề zakwiến mìɲ năm tʰứ nămmươʔi nầʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ zeo xôŋ ɣặt ci dất sɛɲ kũŋ cẳŋ háʔi ɲɔ xôŋ kó sửʔa tʰáɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲữŋ tʰổsản cɔŋ nầʔi kák sảnŋiệp dềʔu cởvề ŋwiêncủ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi hăjlà mwa ci vớʔi lânkận mìɲ tʰìcớ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi kứ lấʔi săw mwa vớʔi lânkận mìɲ kòn ŋườʔi kứ lấʔi tʰeo kó hwalợʔi tùʔi tʰeo săw ŋươʔi tʰêm ɣiá tùʔi tʰeo ŋươʔi ɣiảm ɣiá tʰeo mùʔa ɣặt ŋườʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cớ ʔaj cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi lânkận mìɲ ɲưŋ hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xá tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp nɔj tʰeo ɲưvậʔi dượk bìɲiên cɔŋ sứ sɛɲ hwalợʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi nɔ dượk bìɲiên cɔŋ sứ vì kák ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ zeo cẳŋ ɣặt mùʔamàŋ tʰì cɔŋ tʰứbảʔi lấʔi ci năm tʰứsáʔu ɣiáŋ fướk cɔ kák ŋươʔi ấʔi cúŋ mùʔa năm tʰứ kák ŋươʔi zeo hwalợʔi kủʔa mùʔamàŋ kũ cɔdến mùʔamàŋ mớʔi kủʔa tʰứ cín xôŋ dượk dɔạn mãʔi dất tʰuộk kák ŋươʔi kùŋ ɲư xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ xắp sứ kák ŋươʔi dượk sảnŋiệp hãʔi cɔfép cuộk dất lạʔi nếʔu ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi cởnên ŋèʔɔ fần sảnŋiệp mìɲ tʰì ŋườʔi bàkɔn ɣần kó kwiền cuộk lạʔi fảʔi dến cuộk fần dất ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dã nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ kó ʔaj dượk kwiền cuộk lạʔi ɲưŋ lɔ cɔ kó ci cuộk lạʔi dượk tʰìfảʔi tíɲtừ dã bồʔi cộʔi cɔ củ mwa zồʔi ŋườʔi dượk ɲận sảnŋiệp mìɲ lạʔi nếʔu ŋwiêncủ xôŋ dủ ɣiá dặŋ cả cɔ dất tʰuộk ŋườʔi củ mwa cɔdến dɔạn dất za xỏʔi tăj củ mwa ŋwiêncủ nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ káʔi ɲàở cɔŋ tʰàɲ kó vác bọk tʰìkó dượk fép cuộk lạʔi cɔdến ɣiáp săw xi fép cuộk lạʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi cỉ cɔŋ cọn vậʔi kòn nếʔuxôŋ cuộk lạʔi cướk xi ɣiáp cọn tʰì ɲàở cɔŋ tʰàɲ kó vác bọk dó củ mwa zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi mãʔimãʔi dến ɲà dó xôŋ za xỏʔi tăj ɲưŋ kák ɲàở nơʔi hươŋtʰôn xôŋ kó vác bọk lấʔi tʰì ɲư zuộŋdất củ kó fép cuộk lạʔi dến ɲà ŋwiêncủ kòn kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi kák ɲà kủʔa cɔŋ tʰàɲ dó tʰì ŋườʔi lêvi kó kwiền cuộk lạʔi ʔaj mwa kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi káʔi ɲà tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi lêvi dến ɲà dó ŋwiêncủ kák ɲàkửʔa tạʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi lêvi sảnŋiệp kủʔa ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ zuộŋdất tʰuộk tʰàɲ ŋườʔi lêvi xôŋ fép ŋiệp dờʔidờʔi kủʔa nếʔu ʔɛɲɛm ɣần ŋươʔi cởnên ŋèʔɔxổ tàʔisản ŋườʔi tiêʔumòn tʰì hãʔi kứʔuzúp ŋườʔi mặkzầʔu xác kiềʔu ŋụ hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi kứ kùŋ ŋươʔi cớ ănlờʔi kũŋ dừŋ lấʔi lợʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ tʰì ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi cớ cɔ ŋườʔi văj bạk ănlờʔi dừŋ cɔ lươŋtʰựk dặŋ lấʔi lờʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi sứ kanaan Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi nếʔu ʔɛɲɛm ɣần ŋươʔi cởnên ŋèʔɔxổ dɛm mìɲ cɔ ŋươʔi cớ ŋườʔi làmviệk ɲư tôʔimọʔi ŋườʔiở ɲàŋươʔi ɲư làmtʰuê ŋườʔi ởdậʔu ɣiúpviệk ŋươʔi cɔdến dɔạn ŋườʔi kɔnkáʔi ŋườʔi tʰôʔi ɲà ŋườʔi cởvề ɲà ɲận lấʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ vì ấʔilà ɲữŋ tôʔitớ dã dɛm za xỏʔi sứ zíptô xôŋ ɲư ŋườʔita tôʔimọʔi ŋươʔi cớ xắkbạk ɲưŋ fảʔi kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kòn tôʔi caj ɣáʔi tʰuộk ŋươʔi tʰì zɔ kák zân cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ za ấʔi zɔ nơʔi ɲữŋ zân dó kák ŋươʔi mwa tôʔi caj ɣáʔi kák ŋươʔi kũŋ kó fép mwa tôʔimọʔi cɔŋ kɔnkáʔi kủʔa xác kiềʔu ŋụ nơʔi mìɲ kủʔa họhàŋ cúŋnó sɛɲ za cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dể lạʔi kơŋiệp cɔ kɔncáʔu mìɲ hằŋ ɣiữ ɲư tôʔimọʔi ɲưŋ fần ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰì xôŋ ʔaj xắkbạk ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ xi xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ hăjlà ŋườʔi kiềʔu ŋụ nơʔi ŋươʔi cởnên ɣiàʔu kòn ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi kùŋ lạʔi ŋèʔɔ dɛm mìɲ cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ nơʔi ŋươʔi hăjlà cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ ấʔi săw xi dã dɛm mìɲ zồʔi tʰì kó fép cuộk lạʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk cuộk ŋườʔi lạʔi hɔặk bák cú hɔặk kɔn kủʔa bák cú hɔặk ŋườʔi tʰântʰíc kũŋ dượk cuộk ŋườʔi lạʔi hăjlà nếʔu ŋườʔi kó tʰế tʰì cáɲ ŋườʔi fảʔi cuộk mìɲ lấʔi ŋườʔi tíɲ kùŋ củ mwa nàʔɔ mìɲ dã mìɲ cɔdến ɣiá tíɲ tʰeo ɲiềʔu hăj tứklà tíɲ ɲư ŋàʔicôŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi làmtʰuê vậʔi nếʔu kòn ɲiềʔu tʰì hãʔi kứ nầʔi kân fân tʰeo ɣiá dã mìɲ cuộk lạʔi nếʔu dến kòn tʰì hãʔi tíɲ vớʔi củ mwa kứ tʰeo nầʔi tʰốʔi hồʔi mwa mìɲ lạʔi họ dốʔi kùŋ củ ɲư ŋườʔi làmtʰuê cứ xôŋ xắkbạk ŋườʔi cướk ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ dượk cuộk lạʔi bởʔi kák tʰếấʔi dến ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dượk za tựzɔ vì zân ʔisơzaên tôʔitớ tứk kák tôʔitớ dã dɛm za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ hɔặk hìɲ cạm hɔặk hìɲ dúk cớ zựŋ cɔŋ sứ mìɲ dá nàʔɔ kó zạŋ hìɲ dặŋ mìɲ cướk hìɲ dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữ tônkíɲ nơʔi tʰáɲ ta Ðứkzê nếʔu kák ŋươʔi tʰeo luậtfáp ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn tʰeo tʰì ɣiáŋ mưʔa tʰuận tʰì dất sɛɲ hwalợʔi kâʔi ŋɔàʔi dồŋ bôŋ cáʔi mùʔa dập lúʔa dến mùʔa háʔi ɲɔ mùʔa háʔi ɲɔ dến mùʔa zeo kák ŋươʔi nɔ bìɲiên cɔŋ sứ mìɲ ta ɣiáŋ bìɲ tịɲ cɔŋ nướk kák ŋươʔi ŋủ xôŋ ʔaj zọʔa ziệt ɲữŋ lɔàʔi tʰúzữ xỏʔi sứ ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ cẳŋ dưʔa kwa sứ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi duổʔi tʰeo kwân ŋịc ɣươm saŋã cướk kák ŋươʔi năm ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi duổʔi tʰeo mộtcăm mộtcăm cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi duổʔi tʰeo kwân ŋịc ɣươm saŋã cướk kák ŋươʔi ta dɔáʔi lạʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔ sɛɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu kùŋ zawướk vớʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi hwalợʔi kũ mìɲ dɛm káʔi kũ za dặŋ cừʔa cỗ cɔ káʔi mớʔi ta cỗ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣêɣớm kák ŋươʔi dâʔu ta di ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi zân ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô hầʔu cɔ xỏʔi tôʔimọʔi ta dã ɣãʔi káʔi ác kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi di ŋướk dầʔu sɔŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ xôŋ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn nầʔi nếʔu xiɲbỉ mạŋ lịɲ kák ŋươʔi ŋịc kùŋ luậtfáp dếnnỗʔi xôŋ tʰeo ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn bộʔi zawướk tʰì nầʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu ɣiáŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi ta ɣiáŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi kiɲxủŋ bịɲ zét kɔn ɲọkmệt kák ŋươʔi zeo luốŋ kôŋ kwân tʰùŋịc ta nổʔizận kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kwân tʰùŋịc dáɲdập nàʔɔ ɣét kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cạʔi cốn xôŋ ʔaj duổʔi tʰeo nếʔu dến dỗʔi vậʔimà kák ŋươʔi xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ kớ tộʔifạm tʰêm ɣấp bảʔi dặŋ sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi zẹp kiêʔuŋạʔɔ năŋlựk kák ŋươʔi ta xiến cờʔi kák ŋươʔi kứŋ ɲư dất cơ ɲư dồŋ năŋlựk mìɲ hawmòn vôíc dất xôŋ sɛɲ huêlợʔi kâʔicốʔi xôŋ bôŋ cáʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi fảndốʔi kùŋ xôŋ ŋɛ tʰì tùʔi tʰeo tộʔifạm ɣiáŋ tajvạ cên kák ŋươʔi ɣấp bảʔi nữʔa ta saj ɲữŋ tʰú dồŋ dến tʰa kɔnkáʔi kák ŋươʔi di ăɲạʔi súkvật ziệt ŋườʔi za dườŋ nẻʔɔ kák ŋươʔi vắŋtɛɲ zẫʔu dến ɲữŋ việk ấʔi kák ŋươʔi kứ xôŋ fụk sửʔa fạt kứ fảndốʔi kùŋ tʰì tadâʔi kũŋ ŋịc lạʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kớ tộʔilỗʔi ɣiáŋ tajvạ cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɣấp bảʔi nữʔa ta xiến ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ dến cên kák ŋươʔi dặŋ báʔɔtʰù zawướk xi kák ŋươʔi hộʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ ɣiáŋ zịchạc dến ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj tʰùŋịc xi zẫn dóʔicém dến mườʔi ŋườʔi nướŋ báɲ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ kân báɲ caw lạʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ nɔ zầʔu dếnnỗʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi kứ xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ kòn fảndốʔi kùŋ tʰì kũŋ ŋịc lạʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kác ɣiậnzữ kớ tộʔilỗʔi kák ŋươʔi sửʔa fạt ɣấp bảʔi nữʔa kák ŋươʔi tʰịt kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ hủʔiziệt ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw kák ŋươʔi fá dổ ɲữŋ hìɲ mặtcờʔi dể tʰâʔi kák ŋươʔi cồŋ cên tʰâʔi kủʔa hìɲtượŋ mìɲ ɣêɣớm kák ŋươʔi ta cɔ tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi za vắŋvẻ kák nơʔi tʰáɲ kwạɲhiw cẳŋ kòn hưởŋ mùʔi tʰơm kủʔa kák ŋươʔi nữʔa ta sứ za dồʔibạʔi dếnnỗʔi tʰùŋịc tạʔi dó kũŋ lấʔilàm ta lạk kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák zân zút ɣươm za duổʔi tʰeo săw kák ŋươʔi sứ kák ŋươʔi hwaŋvu tʰàɲ vắŋvẻ cọn cɔŋ lúk dất hwaŋvu kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ dất kủʔa tʰùŋịc xi dó dất dượk ʔanŋỉ hưởŋ ɲữŋ cọn lúk dất hwaŋvu dượk ʔanŋỉ lúk kák ŋươʔi kòn dất dó xôŋ dượk ʔanŋỉ cɔŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kòn ʔaj cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi sốŋsót lạʔi cɔ ɲátɣan cɔŋ sứ kủʔa tʰùŋịc mìɲ tiếŋ xwa cɔ cạʔi cốn xáknàʔɔ cạʔi cốn cướk lưỡʔi ɣươm ŋã xôŋ ʔaj duổʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi nầʔi vấpŋã cên ŋườʔi kiə ɲư cướk ŋọn ɣươm cẳŋ ʔaj zượt duổʔi tʰeo kák ŋươʔi xôŋtʰể cịʔu nổʔi cướk kwân tʰùŋịc mìɲ kák ŋươʔi cết ɣiữʔa kák zân dất tʰùŋịc kák ŋươʔi ʔaj cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kòn sốŋ kớ zanák mìɲ zanák kủʔa tổfụ hawmòn cɔŋ sứ tʰùŋịc mìɲ xi ấʔi ɲận zanák mìɲ zanák kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi dã fạm cốŋcả dã kự kùŋ dến dỗʔi kũŋ cốŋcả lạʔi zẫn vàʔɔ sứ tʰùŋịc bấʔizờ nếʔu lòŋ xôŋ cịʔu kắt kủʔa hạmìɲ suốŋ fụk diềʔu sửʔa fạt zanák mìɲ tʰì ɲớ lạʔi zawướk dã kùŋ zakốp kùŋ ʔisák kùŋ zaham ɲớ lạʔi sứ nầʔi vì sứ bỏhwaŋ dượk ŋỉ bấʔiɲiêʔu tùʔi tʰeo hwaŋvu bawɲiêʔu cịʔu hìɲfạt kủʔa zanák mìɲ bởʔivì dã xiɲbỉ mạŋ lịɲ dã lấʔilàm ɣêɣớm kák luậtfáp zẫʔuvậʔi dươŋ xi cɔŋ sứ tʰùŋịc mìɲ kũŋ cẳŋ dâʔu cẳŋ ɣêɣớm dến fảʔi hawmòn cẳŋ bộʔi zawướk kùŋ dâʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ta ɲớ lạʔi zawướk dã kùŋ tổfụ dã dɛm za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cướk kák zân dặŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ta Ðứkzê kák diềʔulệ mạŋ lịɲ luậtfáp Ðứkzê ɲờ môʔisɛ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kó ʔaj zùŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi xấn ŋwiện tʰì ŋươʔi hãʔi dịɲzá cɔ ɣiá dó tʰuộk Ðứkzê nếʔu ŋươʔi dịɲzá ŋườʔi haimươʔi dến sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi tʰì hãʔi dịɲ cɔ nămcụk siếk bạk tùʔi tʰeo siếk nơʔi tʰáɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi hãʔi dịɲzá cụk siếk bạk nếʔu dứʔa kɔncẻ dến haimươʔi tuổʔi tʰì hãʔi dịɲzá haicụk siếk cɔ dứʔa caj mườʔi siếk cɔ dứʔa ɣáʔi víbằŋ dứʔa cẻ tʰáŋ dến nămtuổʔi tʰì hãʔi dịɲzá siếk bạk cɔ dứʔa caj siếk bạk cɔ dứʔa ɣáʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi ɣiàkả sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi cởlên ŋươʔi hãʔi dịɲzá mườʔilăm siếk bạk cɔ ŋườʔi mườʔi siếk bạk cɔ ŋườʔi bằŋ ŋườʔi xấn ŋwiện zất ŋèʔɔxổ xôŋ dượkzá ŋươʔi dịɲ tʰì hãʔi dɛm dến cướk tʰầʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɲấtdịɲ cɔ tʰầʔi tùʔi tʰeo fươŋ tʰế ŋườʔi xấn ŋwiện ɲấtdịɲ ɣiá vậʔi nếʔu xấn ŋwiện tʰúvật zùŋ kủʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰáɲ ŋườʔita xôŋ dổʔi hăjlà tʰế kɔn cɔ kɔn sấʔu hăjlà kɔn sấʔu cɔ kɔn nếʔu tʰế kɔn nàʔɔ cɔ kɔn xák tʰì kɔn nầʔi kɔn tʰế dềʔu tʰáɲ nếʔu tʰúvật ôʔuế xôŋ fép zùŋ kủʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi dɛm kɔn tʰú dó dến cướk tʰầʔi zồʔi tʰầʔi tùʔi tʰeo kɔn tʰú sấʔu hăj dịɲzá họ tʰeo ɣiá dịɲ kủʔa tʰầʔi cả kòn nếʔu cuộk lạʔi tʰìfảʔi fụ tʰêm fần ɣiá kủʔa ŋươʔi dịɲ nếʔu ʔaj ɲà mìɲ za tʰàɲ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì tʰầʔi tùʔi tʰeo ɲà hăj sấʔu dịɲzá fảʔi ɲận lấʔi ɣiá kủʔa tʰầʔi dã dịɲ kòn nếʔu dã ɲà mìɲ za tʰáɲ cuộk lạʔi tʰìfảʔi fụ tʰêm fần ɣiá ŋươʔi dã dịɲ zồʔi ɲà tʰuộk ŋườʔi nếʔu ʔaj fần zuộŋ tổŋiệp mìɲ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì ŋươʔi hãʔi dịɲzá tùʔi tʰeo zeo ŋĩʔalà kứ nămcụk siếk bạk mỗʔimột mɛ mạcɲa ɣiốŋ nếʔu zuộŋ mìɲ za tʰáɲ ɲận ɣiá ŋươʔi dịɲ kòn nếʔu zuộŋ mìɲ za tʰáɲ săw tʰì tʰầʔi kứ tʰeo kòn lạʔi dến dịɲzá zuộŋ cừ lạʔi ɣiá ŋươʔi dịɲ nếʔu ŋươʔi dã zuộŋ mìɲ za tʰáɲ cuộk lạʔi tʰìfảʔi fụ tʰêm fần ɣiá ŋươʔi dịɲ zồʔi zuộŋ tʰuộk ŋườʔi kòn ŋươʔi xôŋ cuộk lạʔi ŋườʔita zuộŋ cɔ ŋườʔi xák tʰì xôŋ dượk cuộk lạʔinữʔa xi dến zuộŋ za xỏʔi tăj củ mwa tʰì cởnên tʰáɲ ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê ɲư zuộŋ kấm sảnŋiệp cɔ tʰầʔi nếʔu ʔaj za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê zuộŋ mìɲ mwa cớ cẳŋ fảʔi kủʔa tổŋiệp tʰì tʰầʔi tùʔi tʰeo ɣiá ŋươʔi dịɲ dáɲzá dến zồʔi cáɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi nầʔi fảʔi ɲấtdịɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê năm zuộŋ dó cởvề củ tứklà cởvề ŋwiêncủ vả fàm kák ɣiá dịɲ dềʔu kứ tʰeo siếk nơʔi tʰáɲ siếk ɣiá haicụk ɣê za sɔŋ xôŋ ʔaj dượk za tʰáɲ kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa súkvật mìɲ hɔặk hɔặk ciên kák kɔn dầʔulòŋ tʰeo fép dã tʰuộk Ðứkzê zồʔi kòn nếʔu kɔn tʰú xôŋ sạc fảʔi tùʔi tʰeo ɣiá ŋươʔi dịɲ fụ tʰêm fần cuộk lạʔi nếʔu kɔn tʰú cẳŋ cuộk lạʔi tʰìfảʔi dɛm tùʔi tʰeo ɣiá dịɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi fàm kấm tứklà hếttʰảʔi ci ŋườʔi hằŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê zɔ ɲữŋ kủʔa mìɲ kó hɔặk ŋườʔi hɔặk lɔàʔi hɔặk zuộŋ tổŋiệp tʰì cẳŋ dượk fép kũŋ xôŋ dượk fép cuộk lạʔi ɣì kấm tʰì za cí tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê hễ ʔaj dã fú cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì xôŋ dượk fép cuộk lạʔi fảʔi ɣiết fàm tʰuế fần mườʔi tʰổsản zeo hăjlà hwakwả kủʔa kâʔi dềʔu tʰuộk Ðứkzê ấʔilà tʰáɲ ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu ʔaj cuộk lạʔi ci fần mườʔi kủʔa mìɲ tʰìfảʔi fụ tʰêm fần kòn fần mườʔi kủʔa bầʔi hăjlà ciên tứklà mọʔi ci di ŋaŋ zướʔi ɣậʔi kɔntʰứ mườʔi tʰáɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê họ xôŋ fânbiệt kɔn hăjlà kɔn sấʔu kũŋ xôŋ dổʔi nếʔu dổʔi tʰì kɔn tʰú dổʔi kɔn dổʔi kả haj dềʔu ziêŋ za tʰáɲ xôŋ fép cuộk lạʔi kák mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi cên núʔi sina ʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ haj tʰứhaj săw xi zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi zằŋ hãʔi zựŋ kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa kứ dếm từŋ kủʔa hếttʰảʔi diɲ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên di za cận dượk ŋươʔi ʔazôn cúŋnó tùʔi tʰeo dộʔiŋũ kủʔa cɔŋ mỗʔi cifáʔi fảʔi kó ŋườʔi ɣiúpdỡ kák ŋươʔi tứklà ŋườʔilàm tộkcưởŋ kủʔa cifáʔi mìɲ Ðâʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiúpdỡ kák ŋươʔi về cifáʔi zubên kɔncaj kủʔa sêdêʔu cifáʔi simêôn sêlumiên kɔncaj kủʔa suzihadaj cifáʔi zuda nahasôn kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaminadáp cifáʔi ʔisaka natʰanaên kɔncaj kủʔa su ʔa cifáʔi sabulôn kɔncaj kủʔa hêlôn kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép ŋĩʔalà cifáʔi zaim kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamihút cifáʔi manasɛ ɣamaliên kɔncaj kủʔa fêdátsu cifáʔi bêŋiəmin ʔabidan kɔncaj kủʔa ɣidewni cifáʔi Ðʔan ʔahiêsɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamisadaj cifáʔi ʔasɛ faɣiên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɔùkzan cifáʔi ɣát liəsáp kɔncaj kủʔa ʔuên cifáʔi néptali ʔahiza kɔncaj kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dượk ɣọʔi cɔŋ hộʔi cúŋ kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi tổfụ mìɲ kwan tướŋkwân dộʔi ʔisơzaên vậʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn ɲận lấʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dã dượk sướŋ dến ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ haj cwiền ɲóm kả hộʔi cúŋ kứ từŋ ŋườʔi haimươʔi tuổʔi ɲập tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa vậʔi môʔisɛ cúŋnó tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn kɔncáʔu zubên cưởŋnam kủʔa ʔisơzaên zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ kủʔa hếttʰảʔi diɲ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi zubên di za cận dượk mươʔi sáʔu ŋàn nămcăm kɔncáʔu simêôn zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ kủʔa hếttʰảʔi diɲ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi simêôn di za cận dượk nămmươʔi cín ŋàn bɛcăm kɔncáʔu ɣát zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi ɣát di za cận dượk mươʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm nămmươʔi kɔncáʔu zuda zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi zuda di za cận dượk bảʔi mươʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔisaka zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi ʔisaka di za cận dượk nămmươʔi ŋàn bốncăm kɔncáʔu kủʔa sabulôn zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi sabulôn di za cận dượk nămmươʔi bảʔi ŋàn bốncăm về hậʔu ɣiôsép kɔncáʔu zaim zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi zaim di za cận dượk mươʔi ŋàn nămcăm kɔncáʔu manasɛ zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi manasɛ di za cận dượk bamươʔi haj ŋàn haj căm kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi bêŋiəmin di za cận dượk bamươʔi ŋàn bốncăm kɔncáʔu Ðʔan zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi Ðʔan di za cận dượk sáʔu mươʔi haj ŋàn bảʔicăm kɔncáʔu ʔasɛ zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi ʔasɛ di za cận dượk mươʔi ŋàn nămcăm kɔncáʔu néptali zòŋzõʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ kứ từŋ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi néptali di za cận dượk nămmươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn mườʔihaj kwan cưởŋ ʔisơzaên mỗʔi kwan cưởŋ cɔ tôŋtộk mìɲ tʰếtʰì hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dã dượk ɲập tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ haimươʔi tuổʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên di za cận dượk sáʔu căm ŋàn nămcăm nămmươʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lêvi tʰeo cifáʔi tổfụ mìɲ xôŋ cuŋ vớʔi ɲữŋ cifáʔi xák vìÐứkzê kó fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ cifáʔi lêvi kũŋ dừŋ zựŋ cuŋ vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ hãʔi kắt fần ŋườʔi lêvi kɔjsók dền cứŋkớ hếttʰảʔi dồdạk kák tʰuộk dền Ấʔilà ŋườʔi lêvi cwiên dền hếttʰảʔi dồdạk kùŋ kôŋviệk dền dóŋ cạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ dền xi nàʔɔ dền zờʔi cỗ tʰì ŋườʔi lêvi tʰáʔɔzỡ xi nàʔɔ dền zừŋ lạʔi tʰì zựŋ kòn ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi dến ɣần sửtử zân ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi dóŋ cɔŋ cạʔi kwân mìɲ mỗʔi cạʔi kwân từŋ dộʔiŋũ fảʔi dóŋ ɣần ŋọn kờ mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lêvi dóŋ cạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ dền cứŋkớ dể dừŋ kó ɣiậnzữ kùŋ hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi lêvi kɔjsók dền cứŋkớ zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ vậʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi dóŋ cạʔi ɣần ŋọn kờ mìɲ zướʔi bảŋiệʔu kủʔa tôŋtộk mìɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲăw vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ hộʔi mạk cạʔi kwân zuda dóŋ tạʔi hướŋ dôŋ fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk vớʔi ŋọn kờ ɲữŋ dộʔiŋũ kủʔa mìɲ kwancưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda nahasôn kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaminadáp kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kọŋ bảʔi mươʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi cifáʔi ʔisaka fảʔi dóŋ cạʔi zuda kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔisaka natʰanaên kɔncaj su ʔa kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kọŋ nămmươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi kế dến cifáʔi sabulôn kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi sabulôn kɔncaj kủʔa hêlôn kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ nămmươʔi bảʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi vậʔi kák ŋườʔi dã tʰeo cạʔi kwân zuda từŋ dộʔiŋũ kộŋ mộtcăm mươʔi sáʔu ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi họ fảʔi di tiênfɔŋ ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân zubên ɲữŋ dộʔiŋũ mìɲ fảʔi dóŋ hướŋ kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi zubên kɔncaj kủʔa sêdêʔu kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ mươʔi sáʔu ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi cifáʔi simêôn fảʔi dóŋ cạʔi zubên kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi simêôn sêlumiên kɔncaj kủʔa suzihadaj kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ nămmươʔi cín ŋàn bɛcăm ŋườʔi kế dến cifáʔi ɣát kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣát liəsáp kɔncaj kủʔa zê ʔuên kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ mươʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi kák ŋườʔi dã tʰeo cạʔi kwân zubên từŋ dộʔiŋũ kộŋ mộtcăm nămmươʔi ŋàn bốncăm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi họ fảʔi di tʰứ ɲì săw ấʔi hộʔi mạk di vớʔi cạʔi kwân lêvi ɣiữʔa kák cạʔi kwân xák cạʔi kwân lêvi di tʰeo tʰứtự ɲư dã dóŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi tʰeo hàŋŋũ tʰeo ŋọn kờ mìɲ ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân zaim ɲữŋ kwândộʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi dóŋ hướŋ tâʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi zaim kɔncaj ʔamihút kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ mươʔi ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi cifáʔi manasɛ fảʔi dóŋ cạʔi zaim kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi manasɛ ɣamaliên kɔncaj kủʔa fêdátsu kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ bamươʔi haj ŋàn haj căm ŋườʔi kế dến cifáʔi bêŋiəmin kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ʔabidan kɔncaj kủʔa ɣidewni kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ bamươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi vậʔi kák ŋườʔi dã tʰeo cạʔi kwân zaim từŋ dộʔiŋũ kộŋ mộtcăm ŋàn mộtcăm ŋườʔi họ fảʔi di tʰứba ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân Ðʔan ɲữŋ kwândộʔi fảʔi dóŋ hướŋ bắk kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðʔan ʔahiêsɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamisadaj kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ sáʔu mươʔi haj ŋàn bảʔicăm ŋườʔi cifáʔi ʔasɛ fảʔi dóŋ cạʔi Ðʔan kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔasɛ faɣiên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɔùkzan kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ mươʔi ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi kế dến cifáʔi néptali kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi néptali ʔahiza kɔncaj kủʔa kwândộʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo kộŋ nămmươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi vậʔi kák ŋườʔi dã tʰeo cạʔi kwân Ðʔan kộŋ mộtcăm nămmươʔi bảʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi họ tʰeo ŋọn kờ mìɲ fảʔi di hậʔu biɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ cɔŋ kák cạʔi kwân hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi dã từŋ dộʔiŋũ sáʔu căm ŋàn nămcăm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lêvi xôŋ ɲập cuŋ vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên ʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ dóŋ cạʔi tùʔi tʰeo ŋọn kờ mìɲ mỗʔi ŋườʔi zadi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ nầʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ʔazôn môʔisɛ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi cên núʔi sina ʔi nầʔi kák kɔncaj ʔazôn cưởŋnam nadáp ʔabihu lêʔasa ʔitʰama kák kɔncaj ʔazôn tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dã cịʔufép sứk zầʔu dượk dể cứk vả nadáp ʔabihu dã tʰák cướk Ðứkzê xi haj ŋườʔi zâŋ tʰứ lửʔa cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi haj ŋườʔi nầʔi xôŋ kó kɔn kòn lêʔasa ʔitʰama cứk cướk ʔazôn ca mìɲ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi xiến cifáʔi lêvi lạʔi ɣần dặt cướk tʰầʔi ʔazôn dể ŋườʔi lêvi fụk ŋườʔi ŋườʔilê ɣiữ cứkfận kủʔa ŋườʔi cứkfận kủʔa kả hộʔi cúŋ cướk hộʔi mạk ɲữŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa dền kũŋ fảʔi kɔjsók hếttʰảʔi dồdạk kủʔa hộʔi mạk mọʔi ci zân ʔisơzaên zaw cɔ dặŋ zùŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa dền vậʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi zaw ŋườʔi lêvi cɔ ʔazôn cɔ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã lấʔi cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên cọn cɔ ʔazôn zồʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dể cứk ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi dến ɣần sửtử Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên cọn lấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰế cɔ hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰuộk vì hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ dềʔu tʰuộk ŋàʔisưʔa xi hàɲ hạʔi kák kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ sứ zíptô dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên lɔàʔiŋườʔi hăj tʰúvật cúŋnó dềʔu tʰuộk ta Ðứkzê Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi zằŋ hãʔi kɔncáʔu lêvi tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk họhàŋ cúŋnó hếttʰảʔi diɲ tʰáŋ môʔisɛ ŋườʔi lêvi tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán zặn ŋườʔi vậʔi Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa lêvi từŋ ɣẹtsôn kêhát mêzazi Ðâʔi kủʔa kák kɔncaj ɣẹtsôn tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ lípni simê ʔi Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa kêhát tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ ʔamzam zítsa hếpzôn ʔusiên kák kɔncaj kủʔa mêzazi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ mácli musi ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk kủʔa họhàŋ lípni họhàŋ simê ʔi tʰuộk ɣẹtsôn haj họhàŋ kủʔa ɣẹtsôn vậʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɣẹtsôn dượk mọʔi diɲ tʰáŋ bảʔi ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi kák họhàŋ kủʔa ɣẹtsôn dóŋ cạʔi fíʔa tâʔi săw dền kwan cưởŋ kủʔa tôŋtộk ɣẹtsôn liəsáp kɔncaj kủʔa laên cứkfận kủʔa kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn cɔŋ hộʔi mạk kɔjsók mọʔi ci kan dến dền cạʔi tứklà bɔŋ kủʔa cạʔi bứk kủʔa kửʔa hộʔi mạk kák kủʔa hàɲlaŋ bứk kủʔa kửʔa hàɲlaŋ bawfủ cuŋkwɛɲ dền bàntʰờ kùŋ zâʔi cạk kák việk kủʔa dền họhàŋ ʔamzam họhàŋ zítsa họhàŋ hếpzôn họhàŋ ʔusiên tʰuộk kêhát ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa kêhát kứ mọʔi diɲ tʰáŋ ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi kó cứkfận sănsók nơʔi tʰáɲ kák họhàŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu kêhát dóŋ cạʔi hôŋ dền fíʔa kwan cưởŋ kủʔa tôŋtộk kêhát lisafan kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusiên ŋườʔicê kɔjsók bảŋ cứŋ káʔi cân dèn kák bàntʰờ ɲữŋ dồdạk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ dể zùŋ việk tʰờ fượŋ vớʔi bứk kák ci kan dến tổŋcưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi lêʔasa kɔncaj kủʔa tʰầʔi ʔazôn dượk dặt kwảncị ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kɔjsók nơʔi tʰáɲ họhàŋ mácli họhàŋ musi tʰuộk mêzazi haj họhàŋ kủʔa mêzazi vậʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ mêzazi dượk mọʔi diɲ tʰáŋ sáʔu ŋàn haj căm ŋườʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa tôŋtộk mêzazi suziên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabihaj kɔncáʔu mêzazi dóŋ cạʔi hôŋ dền fíʔa bắk kó fần kɔjsók kák kủʔa dền kâʔi sàŋaŋ cụ cụ ɲữŋ dồdạk mọʔi việk tʰuộk dó ɲữŋ cụ cuŋkwɛɲ hàɲlaŋ cụ ɲữŋ nọk zâʔi cạk kủʔa cụ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dóŋ cạʔi cướk dền fíʔa dôŋ tứk cướk hộʔi mạk fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk môʔisɛ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kó cứkfận sănsók nơʔi tʰáɲ tʰế cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi dến ɣần sửtử hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi lêvi môʔisɛ ʔazôn vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa mọʔi diɲ tʰáŋ haimươʔihaj ŋàn ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi hếttʰảʔi kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tʰáŋ hãʔi zựŋ cúŋnó ta Ðứkzê ŋươʔi fảʔi cọn lấʔi cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi tʰế cɔ kák kɔn cưởŋnam cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên kũŋ fảʔi súkvật kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi tʰế cɔ mọʔi kɔn súkvật dầʔulòŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi môʔisɛ kák kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ kɔn cưởŋnam từŋ tuổʔi tʰáŋ tʰeo haimươʔihaj ŋàn haj căm bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cọn lấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi tʰế cɔ hếttʰảʔi kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên súkvật kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi tʰế cɔ súkvật kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi kák ŋườʔi lêvi tʰuộk ta Ðứkzê kòn cuộk lạʔi kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi lêvi haj căm bảʔi mươʔi tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰâʔu mỗʔi ŋườʔi siếk tùʔi tʰeo siếk nơʔi tʰáɲ siếk haicụk ɣê za ŋươʔi fảʔi zaw bạk cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ấʔilà bạk cuộk lạʔi ɲữŋ kɔn cưởŋnam cổʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ tʰâʔu bạk cuộk lạʔi ɲữŋ kɔn cưởŋnam cổʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dã cuộk lạʔi bạk ŋườʔi tʰâʔu ɲữŋ kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên kộŋ dượk mộtŋàn bɛcăm sáʔu mươʔi siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ môʔisɛ vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê zaw bạk cuộk lạʔi cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi hãʔi zựŋ kák kɔncáʔu kêhát tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa cúŋnó bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kótʰể ɣiúp kôŋ vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk nầʔi fần việk kủʔa kɔncáʔu kêhát tạʔi cɔŋ hộʔi mạk họ kɔjsók nơʔi cí tʰáɲ xi nàʔɔ zờʔi cạʔi kwân di ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến ɣỡ bứk baw lấʔi bảŋ cứŋ dɔạn dắp fủ bằŋ za ká nượk cảʔi cên tɔàn bằŋ màʔu diềʔu sɛɲ sỏ dòn xiêŋ vàʔɔ kũŋ cảʔi màʔu diềʔu sɛɲ cên káʔi báɲ cầntʰiết cên tʰì zĩʔa cén cậʔu ɲữŋ kwán báɲ hằŋ cầntʰiết kũŋ kó cên nữʔa zồʔi cảʔi cên kák dó màʔu dỏ dắp fủ bằŋ za ká nượk sỏ dòn xiêŋ vàʔɔ kũŋ fảʔi lấʔi màʔu diềʔu sɛɲ dậʔi cân dèn tʰắp kák tʰếp dèn kéʔɔ dồ dựŋ cɔ kák bìɲ zầʔu ŋườʔita zùŋ cân dèn zồʔi dể cân dèn hếttʰảʔi dồ fụtùŋ cɔŋ fủ bằŋ za ká nượk dể cên káʔi họ fảʔi cảʔi cên bàntʰờ bằŋ vàŋ màʔu diềʔu sɛɲ dắp fủ bằŋ za ká nượk zồʔi sỏ dòn xiêŋ vàʔɔ lạʔi kũŋ fảʔi lấʔi hếttʰảʔi dồdạk zùŋ kôŋviệk nơʔi tʰáɲ dể cɔŋ màʔu diềʔu sɛɲ zồʔi dắp fủ bằŋ za ká nượk dể cên káʔi fảʔi cɔ kủʔa bàntʰờ cảʔi cên màʔu dỏ diềʔu dể cên hếttʰảʔi dồdạk zùŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa bàntʰờ tứklà ɲữŋ hươŋ nĩʔa cén kùŋ ɲữŋ dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ zồʔi dắp cên bàntʰờ fủ bằŋ za ká nượk sỏ dòn xiêŋ vàʔɔ săw xi ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã dậʔi diệm nơʔi tʰáɲ kák dồdạk tʰáɲ sɔŋ xi zờʔi cạʔi kwân di tʰì kák kɔncáʔu kêhát fảʔi dến dặŋ xiêŋ kák dồdạk dó cẳŋ dụŋ vàʔɔ ɲữŋ tʰáɲ ʔɛ fảʔi cết căŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ấʔilà dồ kák kɔncáʔu kêhát fảʔi xiêŋ di lêʔasa kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔazôn kɔj zầʔu tʰắp dèn hươŋliệʔu kủʔa căj hằŋ zầʔu sứk kả dền hếttʰảʔi ci cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ vớʔi dồ fụtùŋ kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi tʰểnàʔɔ cɔ tôŋtộk kêhát cớ cuất xỏʔi cifáʔi lêvi hãʔi diềʔu nầʔi cɔ cúŋnó dể xi dến ɣần nơʔi cí tʰáɲ cúŋnó dượk sốŋ cẳŋ fảʔi cết ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi fảʔi dến kắt kôŋviệk cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi dồ ci fảʔi xiêŋ di zẫʔu cúŋnó cớ vàʔɔ dặŋ sɛm ɲữŋ tʰáɲ ʔɛ fảʔi cết căŋ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kũŋ hãʔi zựŋ kák kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk họhàŋ từ bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi ŋươʔi xá hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kótʰể kôŋviệk cɔŋ hộʔi mạk nầʔi cứkviệk kủʔa kák họhàŋ ɣẹtsôn hɔặk fảʔi hɔặk fảʔi xiêŋ dồ maŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa dền hộʔi mạk bɔŋ kủʔa hộʔi mạk fủ bằŋ za ká nượk cên bứk kủʔa kửʔa hộʔi mạk kák kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cuŋkwɛɲ dền bàntʰờ bứk kủʔa kửʔa hàɲlaŋ ɲữŋ zâʔi cạk hếttʰảʔi dồzùŋ kák dó kùŋ kák kôŋviệk ɲữŋ ấʔi hếttʰảʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn ci fảʔi xiêŋ di việk ci fảʔi diềʔu tʰeo lịɲ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cỉ biểʔu ŋườʔi fảʔi zaw cɔ kɔjsók mọʔi ci fảʔi xiêŋ di cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ấʔilà kôŋviệk kủʔa kák họhàŋ kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn họ ɣiữ cứkfận mìɲ zướʔi kwiền kaicị kủʔa ʔitʰama kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔazôn ŋươʔi fảʔi kɔncáʔu mêzazi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kótʰể ɣiúp kôŋ vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk về kák kôŋviệk kủʔa kɔncáʔu mêzazi cɔŋ hộʔi mạk nầʔi fảʔi kɔjsók xiêŋ di ɲữŋ kủʔa dền kák sàŋaŋ cụ cụ kák cụ cuŋkwɛɲ hàɲlaŋ cụ nọk zâʔi cạk kùŋ hếttʰảʔi dồdạk kák cizùŋ việk dó kák ŋươʔi từŋ ɲữŋ ci fảʔi kɔjsók xiêŋ di hếttʰảʔi việk kủʔa kák họhàŋ mêzazi ɲữŋ kôŋviệk cɔŋ hộʔi mạk fảʔi zướʔi kwiền kaicị kủʔa ʔitʰama kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔazôn vậʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn ɲữŋ hộʔicưởŋ kɔncáʔu kêhát tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kótʰể ɣiúp kôŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔita tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ kộŋ dượk haj ŋàn bảʔicăm nămmươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa kák họhàŋ kêhát dã tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi hầʔu việk cɔŋ hộʔi mạk môʔisɛ ʔazôn ʔi tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zạʔi kòn kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣẹtsôn dã tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi kótʰể ɣiúp kôŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk kộŋ dượk haj ŋàn sáʔu căm bamươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kák họhàŋ kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn dã tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi hầʔu việk cɔŋ hộʔi mạk môʔisɛ ʔazôn ʔi tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi họhàŋ kɔncáʔu mêzazi dã tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi kótʰể ɣiúp kôŋ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk kộŋ dượk ŋàn haj căm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kák họhàŋ kɔncáʔu mêzazi dã môʔisɛ ʔazôn lấʔi zân ʔi tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zạʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi môʔisɛ ʔazôn kák kwan cưởŋ ʔisơzaên tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa bamươʔi tuổʔi cɔdến nămmươʔi tứklà mọʔi ŋườʔi dến dặŋ hầʔu việk xiêŋ dồ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk kộŋ dượk ŋàn nămcăm mươʔi ŋườʔita ŋườʔi lêvi tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zạʔi kắt fần cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi việk mìɲ fảʔi ci mìɲ fảʔi xiêŋ di ŋườʔita zân tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ vậʔi Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi biểʔu zân ʔisơzaên duổʔi za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi fuŋ ŋườʔi kó bịɲ bạc cượk ŋườʔi kớ dụŋ dến sákcết nàʔɔ dã ôʔuế bấtluận hăj kák ŋươʔi fảʔi duổʔi za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân hầʔu cɔ xôŋ cɔ cạʔi kwânbị ôʔuế nơʔi ŋự cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvậʔi duổʔi za xỏʔi cạʔi kwân ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã cwiền lịɲ cɔ môʔisɛ vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ɲưvầʔi xi ŋườʔi hăj fạm cɔŋ ɲữŋ tộʔi ŋườʔita tʰườŋfạm cɔdến kanfạm kùŋ Ðứkzê kớ dó fảʔi mắk tộʔi tʰì ŋườʔi ấʔi fảʔi sưŋtộʔi mìɲ dã fạm za cả taŋvật lạʔi dủ tʰêm fần ɣiá zaw cɔ ŋườʔi mìɲ dã mắk tộʔi kùŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi nầʔi xôŋ kòn xôŋ bàkɔn nàʔɔ dể lãɲ taŋvật dó lạʔi tʰì ấʔi Ðứkzê tứklà tʰầʔi ŋɔạʔicừ kɔnciên dựk cuộk tộʔi tʰầʔi zùŋ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi mắk tộʔi dó fàm ci ziêŋ za tʰáɲ zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ cɔ tʰầʔi dềʔu tʰuộk ŋườʔi ɲữŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ mỗʔi ŋườʔi zâŋ tʰuộk ŋườʔi ci mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔ tʰầʔi cắk tʰuộk ŋườʔi vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi dànbà lỗʔi dạʔɔ fạmtộʔi cáɲ kùŋ cồŋ nếʔu kó ŋườʔi zanzâm kùŋ nàŋ việk ɲẹm xuất cồŋ nếʔu nàŋ ôʔuế kínɲiệm xôŋ kó cứŋkớ dốʔi kùŋ nàŋ nàŋ xôŋ tạʔicận nếʔu táɲ ɣɛn fát nơʔi ŋườʔi cồŋ ɣɛn mìɲ hɔặk dã tʰật ôʔuế hɔặk xôŋ kó ôʔuế tʰì ŋườʔi nầʔi fảʔi zẫn mìɲ dến cướk tʰầʔi nàŋ dɛm tʰeo fần mườʔi fa mạcɲa zùŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi cớ cế zầʔu vàʔɔ kũŋ cẳŋ ɲũhươŋ cên kủʔa căj ɣɛn tươŋ kủʔa căj dặŋ ɲắk tộʔi zanák tʰầʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi dến ɣần dứŋ cướk Ðứkzê kế dó tʰầʔi lấʔi nướktʰáɲ dổ vàʔɔ cậʔu dất bụʔi cên dất kủʔa dền cɔŋ nướk Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi fảʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi dứŋ cướk Ðứkzê lộtcần dầʔu nàŋ dể kủʔa cên lòŋ bàntăj nàŋ ŋĩʔalà kủʔa căj ɣɛn tươŋ tʰầʔi fảʔi kó nướk dắŋ ɣiáŋ zủʔasả cɔŋ tăj mìɲ tʰầʔi fảʔi ŋườʔi tʰề nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ nếʔu cẳŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kùŋ ŋươʔi nếʔu dươŋ zướʔi kwiền cồŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ kó lỗʔi dạʔɔ xôŋ ôʔuế tʰì cẳŋ fảʔi mắk diềʔu hạʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa nướk dắŋ ɣiáŋ zủʔasả nầʔi kòn nếʔu dươŋ zướʔi kwiền cồŋ ŋươʔi lỗʔi dạʔɔ nếʔu ŋươʔi ôʔuế nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xák cồŋ dã kùŋ ŋươʔi bấʔizờ tʰầʔi fảʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi lờʔi tʰề cùẻʔɔ tʰề nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ kầʔuÐứkzê xiến cɔ ŋươʔi cởnên zủʔasả cùẻʔɔ ɣiữʔa vòŋ zânsự ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi lòʔi hôŋ fìɲ bụŋ nướk dắŋ ɣiáŋ zủʔasả nầʔi xá cun vàʔɔ zuộtɣan cɔ bụŋ ŋươʔi fìɲ lòʔi hôŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ ʔamɛn ʔamɛn kế dó tʰầʔi fảʔi kák lờʔi cùẻʔɔ nầʔi cɔŋ kuốn sác zồʔi lấʔi nướk dắŋ bôʔi di tʰầʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ nướk dắŋ ɣiáŋ zủʔasả nướk dắŋ ɣiáŋ zủʔasả vàʔɔ cɔŋ mìɲ nàŋ dặŋ kăjdắŋ cɔ nàŋ Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi lấʔi xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi kủʔa căj ɣɛn tươŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê zâŋ cên bàntʰờ zồʔi lấʔi kủʔa căj sôŋ cên bàntʰờ biểʔu ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ nướk dắŋ vả xi nàʔɔ tʰầʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ nướk dắŋ zồʔi nếʔu kwả ŋườʔi kó ôʔuế fạmtộʔi cáɲ kùŋ cồŋ mìɲ tʰì nướk dắŋ ɣiáŋ zủʔasả vàʔɔ mìɲ kăjdắŋ cɔ nàŋ bụŋ nàŋ fìɲ hôŋ nàŋ lòʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi zủʔasả ɣiữʔa vòŋ zânsự mìɲ kòn nếʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ ôʔuế tʰɛɲsạc tʰì nàŋ cẳŋ diềʔu hạʔi nàʔɔ sɛɲ kɔn ɣɛn tươŋ xi ŋườʔi dànbà zướʔi kwiền cồŋ mìɲ lỗʔi dạʔɔ ôʔuế hɔặk xi nàʔɔ táɲ ɣɛn fát sɛɲ nơʔi ŋườʔi cồŋ ɣɛn mìɲ ŋườʔi fảʔi dɛm dến cướk Ðứkzê tʰầʔi cɔ nàŋ hếttʰảʔi diềʔu ci nầʔi cwiền zạʔi ŋườʔi cồŋ vôtộʔi kòn ŋườʔi dànbà dó maŋ lấʔi tộʔi mìɲ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ bấtluận ŋườʔi hăj xi hứʔa ŋwiện nasizê dặŋ mìɲ ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi kiêŋkữ zượʔu ʔuốŋ săj cẳŋ ʔuốŋ hɔặk ɣiấm zượʔu hɔặk ɣiấm kủʔa ʔuốŋ săj lạʔi kũŋ cẳŋ ʔuốŋ tʰứ nướk nàʔɔ bằŋ cáʔi ɲɔ hăjlà ɲɔ tươʔi hɔặk ɲɔ xô cọn cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi mìɲ ziêŋ za cớ ci kủʔa ɲɔ sɛɲ dến za cọn cɔŋ lúk hứʔa ŋwiện nasizê mìɲ cớ zùŋ zawkạʔɔ dầʔu ŋườʔi tʰáɲ fảʔi dể tók mọk cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ mìɲ ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê dã dượk cọn cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi mìɲ ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê cớ dến ɣần ŋườʔi cết ŋườʔi cớ ca hɔặk ʔɛɲ hɔặk cị dã cết cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế zấʔu cỉ ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên dầʔu ŋườʔi cọn cɔŋ lúk hứʔa ŋwiện nasizê ŋườʔi dượk za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu ʔaj cết tʰìɲlìɲ ɣần ŋườʔi cɔ ôʔuế dầʔu mìɲ dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ tʰìfảʔi kạʔɔ dầʔu mìɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dượk sạc tứklà ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔi fảʔi dɛm haj cim ku hăjlà haj kâʔu kɔn dến cɔ tʰầʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk tʰầʔi zâŋ kɔn nầʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kiə kủʔa tʰiêʔu cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dã fạm kớ sákcết vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi dầʔu mìɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ tʰếtʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ ŋàʔi ŋwiện nasizê mìɲ lạʔi zâŋ kɔnciên dựk ɣiáp kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi ɲữŋ ŋàʔicướk xôŋ nữʔa nasizê mìɲ dã ôʔuế nầʔi ŋườʔi nasizê xi nàʔɔ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi nasizê mìɲ dã ŋườʔita fảʔi dɛm ŋườʔi dến tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê tứklà kɔnciên kɔŋiáp xôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔnciên káʔi ɣiáp xôŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔnciên dựk xôŋ kủʔa tʰù ɣiỏ báɲ xôŋ mɛn bằŋ lọk báɲ ɲỏ tướʔi zầʔu báɲcáŋ xôŋ mɛn tʰwa zầʔu vớʔi kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo kák kiə tʰầʔi dɛm ɲữŋ kủʔa nầʔi dến cướk Ðứkzê zâŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi zồʔi ŋɔạʔicừ ɣiỏ báɲ xôŋ mɛn zâŋ kɔnciên dựk kủʔa tʰù kùŋ zâŋ kủʔa căj kwán kủʔa ŋườʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk ŋườʔi nasizê fảʔi kạʔɔ dầʔu mìɲ dã ziêŋ za lấʔi tók vàʔɔ lửʔa zướʔi kủʔa tʰù săw xi ŋườʔi nasizê kạʔɔ dầʔu zồʔi tʰầʔi lấʔi káʔi vaj cín kủʔa ciên dựk káʔi báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ ɣiỏ báɲcáŋ xôŋ mɛn dể cɔŋ lòŋ haj bàntăj ŋườʔi zồʔi dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ấʔilà tʰáɲ tʰầʔi vớʔi káʔi ʔɔ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi káʔi ɣiò zâŋ ɣiơ kế dó ŋườʔi nasizê dượk fép ʔuốŋ zượʔu ŋườʔi nasizê dã hứʔa ŋwiện dâʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ŋwiện nasizê mìɲ ŋɔạʔicừ kủʔa nàʔɔ ŋườʔi kótʰể zâŋ tʰêm ŋườʔi fảʔi tʰeo nasizê mìɲ tʰeo lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện kủʔa mìɲ vậʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cúk fướk cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvầʔi kầʔusin Ðứkzê fướk cɔ ŋươʔi fùhộ ŋươʔi kầʔusin Ðứkzê ciếʔu sáŋ ŋàʔi cên ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kầʔusin Ðứkzê dɔáʔi sɛm ŋươʔi bìɲan cɔ ŋươʔi họ fảʔi dặt zɛɲ cên zân ʔisơzaên ɲưvầʔi tʰì tadâʔi fướk cɔ zân dó ximôʔi sɛ dã zựŋ sɔŋ dền dã sứk zầʔu kùŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ hếttʰảʔi dồdạk kủʔa dền sứk zầʔu ziêŋ za tʰáɲ bàntʰờ hếttʰảʔi dồdạk kủʔa bàntʰờ zồʔi tʰì kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ʔisơzaên tứklà kák kwan cưởŋ ɲữŋ cifáʔi dã kaicị kuộk zân dềʔu dɛm zâŋ kủʔa mìɲ vậʔi kák kwan cưởŋ zẫn mìɲ dến cướk Ðứkzê sáʔu sɛcộ hìɲɲư káʔi kiệʔu mườʔihaj kɔn dựk ŋĩʔalà mỗʔi haj kwan cưởŋ dồŋ zâŋ sɛcộ mỗʔimột ŋườʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk zâŋ dó cướk dền Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi tʰâʔu ɲận kák kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi dể zùŋ vàʔɔ kôŋviệk hộʔi mạk hãʔi zaw cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi tứklà cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi tùʔi tʰeo cứkfận mìɲ vậʔi môʔisɛ ɲận lấʔi kák sɛcộ ɲữŋ dựk zaw cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔi zaw cɔ kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn haj sɛcộ kɔn dựk tùʔi tʰeo cứkfận kủʔa ŋườʔi zaw cɔ kɔncáʔu mêzazi sɛcộ kɔn dựk tùʔi tʰeo cứkfận kủʔa kó ʔitʰama kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔazôn kwảnlý ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ kó zaw ci cɔ kɔncáʔu kêhát mắk fần kôŋviệk ɲữŋ tʰáɲ ɣáɲvák ɲữŋ dó cên vaj mìɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi bàntʰờ dượk sứk zầʔu kák kwan cưởŋ zâŋ mìɲ cướk bàntʰờ kuộk xáɲtʰàɲ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kák kwan cưởŋ fảʔi dɛm mìɲ kuộk xáɲtʰàɲ bàntʰờ ŋườʔi nầʔi tʰì ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔi kiə tʰì ŋàʔiciə ŋườʔi zâŋ mìɲ ŋàʔi dầʔu nahasôn kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaminadáp tʰuộk cifáʔi zuda lễvật ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa nahasôn kɔncaj ʔaminadáp ŋàʔi tʰứhaj natʰanaên kɔncaj kủʔa su ʔa kwan cưởŋ ʔisaka zâŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi zâŋ káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa natʰanaên kɔncaj su ʔa ŋàʔi tʰứba dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu sabulôn kɔncaj kủʔa hêlôn lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi zĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa kɔncaj hêlôn ŋàʔi tʰứtư dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu zubên kɔncaj sêdêʔu lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa kɔncaj sêdêʔu ŋàʔi tʰứnăm dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu simêôn sêlumiên kɔncaj suzihadaj lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa sêlumiên kɔncaj suzihadaj ŋàʔi tʰứsáʔu dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu ɣát liəsáp kɔncaj ʔuên lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa liəsáp kɔncaj ʔuên ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu zaim kɔncaj ʔamihút lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa kɔncaj ʔamihút ŋàʔi tʰứ dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu manasɛ ɣamaliên kɔncaj fêdátsu lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa ɣamaliên kɔncaj fêdátsu ŋàʔi tʰứ cín dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin ʔabidan kɔncaj ɣidewni lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa ʔabidan kɔncaj ɣidewni ŋàʔi tʰứ mườʔi dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu Ðʔan ʔahiêsɛ kɔncaj ʔamisadaj lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa ʔahiêsɛ kɔncaj ʔamisadaj ŋàʔi tʰứ mườʔimột dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu ʔasɛ faɣiên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɔùkzan lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm mườʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa faɣiên kɔncaj ʔɔùkzan ŋàʔi tʰứ mườʔihaj dến kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kɔncáʔu néptali ʔahiza kɔncaj lễvật kủʔa ŋườʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kả haj káʔi dềʔu dầʔi lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj káʔi cén vàŋ nặŋ mườʔi siếk dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk kɔn zê dựk kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kủʔa ʔahiza kɔncaj Ấʔilà ɲữŋ kủʔa kák kwan cưởŋ zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ kuộk xáɲtʰàɲ bàntʰờ xi bàntʰờ dượk sứk zầʔu mườʔihaj dĩʔa bạk mườʔihaj cậʔu bạk mườʔihaj cén vàŋ mỗʔi káʔi dĩʔa bạk nặŋ mộtcăm bamươʔi siếk mỗʔi káʔi cậʔu bạk nặŋ bảʔi cụk siếk tổŋkộŋ bạk kủʔa kák dĩʔa cậʔu haj ŋàn bốncăm siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ mườʔihaj káʔi cén vàŋ dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm mỗʔi káʔi mườʔi siếk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ tổŋkộŋ vàŋ kủʔa cén nặŋ dượk mộtcăm haimươʔi siếk tổŋkộŋ dựk kủʔa tʰiêʔu mườʔihaj kɔn vớʔi mườʔihaj kɔnciên dựk mườʔihaj kɔnciên kɔŋiáp kùŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa căj kặp tʰeo mườʔihaj kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tổŋkộŋ dựk kủʔa tʰù haimươʔi kɔn vớʔi sáʔu mươʔi kɔnciên dựk sáʔu mươʔi kɔn zê dựk sáʔu mươʔi kɔnciên kɔŋiáp Ấʔilà zâŋ kuộk xáɲtʰàɲ bàntʰờ săw xi bàntʰờ dượk sứk zầʔu zồʔi ximôʔi sɛ vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk dặŋ hầʔu cwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰì ŋườʔi ŋɛ tiếŋnóʔi kùŋ mìɲ cên tʰiân dể cên bảŋ cứŋ ɣiữʔa haj cê zubin ŋườʔi hầʔu cwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê vậʔi Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi dặt kák dèn tʰì bảʔi ŋọn dèn fảʔi ciếʔu cên fíʔa cướk cân dèn ʔazôn ɲưvậʔi dặt bảʔi ŋọn dèn cên fíʔa cướk cân dèn ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ vả cân dèn dã tʰeo kác nầʔi làmbằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát cɔdến káʔi cân ɲữŋ káʔi hwa dềʔu dáɲ ɣiát Ấʔi vậʔi ŋườʔita cân dèn tʰeo ɲư kiểʔu Ðứkzê dã cỉ cɔ môʔisɛ sɛm Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cọn lấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ vòŋ zân ʔisơzaên zọn cɔ dượk sạc nầʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ dượk sạc ŋươʔi fảʔi zảʔi nướk zửʔatộʔi cên mìɲ fảʔi kạʔɔ hếttʰảʔi kùŋ mìɲ ɣiặt kwầnáʔɔ zọn cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc Ðʔɔạn fảʔi kɔn dựk vớʔi kủʔa căj bằŋ lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu kặp tʰeo kòn ŋươʔi kɔn dựk tʰứ ɲì zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi zồʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi lêvi dến ɣần cướk hộʔi mạk ɲóm kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên vậʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi lêvi dến ɣần cướk Ðứkzê zồʔi zân ʔisơzaên dặt tăicên mìɲ ŋườʔi lêvi ʔazôn zâŋ ŋườʔi lêvi kủʔa zɔ fần zân ʔisơzaên dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê dượk fần kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi lêvi dặt tăicên dầʔu haj kɔn dựk ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn nầʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kɔn kiə kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê dể cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kế dó ŋươʔi fảʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi lêvi dứŋ cướk ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi zồʔi zâŋ ɲư kủʔa dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cɔ Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi ziêŋ za ŋườʔi lêvi vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi lêvi tʰuộk săw việk ấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dến dặŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa hộʔi mạk Ấʔi ŋươʔi cɔ dượk sạc zâŋ ɲư kủʔa dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi vậʔi bởʔivì ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi lêvi cọn cɔ dã cọn lấʔi tʰế cɔ hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên vìcưŋ hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu tʰuộk ŋườʔi hăj dã cúŋnó ziêŋ za cɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi hàɲ hạʔi mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ tạʔi sứ zíptô dã cọn lấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰế cɔ mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên bởʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dã cọn ŋườʔi lêvi cọn cɔ ʔazôn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dặŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ hộʔi mạk kùŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên hầʔu cɔ xi dến ɣần nơʔi tʰáɲ cẳŋ kó tajhạʔi ci cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên dốʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên dốʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔilê cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc xỏʔi tộʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ zồʔi ʔazôn zâŋ ɲư kủʔa dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê cuộk tộʔi cɔ dể zọn dượk sạc săw zồʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dến dặŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk cướk ʔazôn cướk kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi Ðốʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔita ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi dịɲ ŋườʔi lêvi từ haimươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi lêvi fảʔi dến ɲập cɔŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa hộʔi mạk ɲưŋ dến nămmươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi za cẳŋ kôŋviệk nữʔa ŋườʔi fảʔi kứ ɣiúpdỡ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk kɔjsók việk ci dã zaw cɔ ɲưŋ xôŋ kôŋviệk nữʔa ŋươʔi fảʔi dốʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi ɲưvậʔi cứkfận kủʔa tʰáŋzêŋ tʰứhaj săw xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi ɣiữ vượtkwa tʰeo ɲấtdịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ dó tʰeo ɲấtdịɲ tứklà ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋ nầʔi vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰeo hếttʰảʔi dịɲ luậtfáp dó vậʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên dể ɣiữ vượtkwa zân ʔisơzaên ɣiữ vượtkwa cɔŋ tʰáŋzêŋ ŋàʔi mườʔibốn vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi ʔi mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ vả kó mấʔi ŋườʔi kớ sákcết ôʔuế xôŋ dượk ɣiữ vượtkwa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó dến cướk môʔisɛ ʔazôn tʰưʔa kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi lâʔi ôʔuế sákcết kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi saw tạʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên cúŋtôʔi fảʔi kất fần zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkzê tʰeo dã cỉ môʔisɛ dáp zằŋ hãʔi dợʔi dể biếtdiềʔu Ðứkzê cwiền zạʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi hăjlà cɔŋ vòŋ hậʔu dạʔi kák ŋươʔi ôʔuế kớ sákcết hɔặk mắk di sa tʰì kũŋ buộk fảʔi ɣiữ vượtkwa cɔ Ðứkzê mấʔi ŋườʔi dó fảʔi ɣiữ nầʔi ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋ haj vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn kùŋ zăw dắŋ cớ dể ci kòn zư lạʔi dến sáŋ laj kũŋ cẳŋ ɣãʔi ɲữŋ sươŋ fảʔi ɣiữ tʰeo mọʔi vượtkwa vậʔi ɲưŋ kòn ʔaj tiɲ sạc xôŋ kó di sa nếʔu cẳŋ ɣiữ vượtkwa tʰì cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ ŋườʔi ấʔi cẳŋ zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ ɲấtdịɲ ŋườʔi maŋ lấʔi tộʔi mìɲ xi xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi ɣiữ vượtkwa cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi ɣiữ tʰeo dịɲ luậtfáp vượtkwa Ðồŋ kó cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ sɛɲ tạʔi cɔŋ sứ vả ŋàʔi ŋườʔita zựŋ dền tʰì cụ mâʔi bawfủ dền cạʔi cứŋkớ ciềʔu zườŋ kó vầŋ lửʔa cên dền cɔdến sáŋmaj hằŋ kó ɲưvậʔi banŋàʔi cụ mâʔi bawfủ dền bandêm ɣiốŋ ɲư kó lửʔa mỗʔi xi cụ mâʔi kất xỏʔi cạʔi tʰì zân ʔisơzaên zadi cɔŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ cụ mâʔi zừŋ lạʔi tʰì zân ʔisơzaên cạʔi dó zân ʔisơzaên zadi tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê cạʔi tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê cọn cɔŋ lúk cụ mâʔi ŋự cên dền tʰì zân ʔisơzaên kứ dóŋ cạʔi xi nàʔɔ cụ mâʔi ŋự lâʔu cên dền tʰì zân ʔisơzaên vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê cẳŋ zadi ɲưŋ xi nàʔɔ cụ mâʔi ŋự ŋàʔi cên dền tʰì zân ʔisơzaên kứ vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê cạʔi zadi xi cụ mâʔi ŋự tạʔi dó buổʔi ciềʔu dến sáŋmaj xi dến sáŋmaj cụ mâʔi kất tʰì zadi xôŋ kứ ŋàʔi hăj dêm cụ mâʔi kất tʰì zadi cụ mâʔi ŋự cên dền hɔặk haj ŋàʔi hɔặk tʰáŋ hɔặk lâʔu hơnnữʔa tʰì zân ʔisơzaên kứ dóŋ cạʔi xôŋ zadi ɲưŋ xi cụ mâʔi kất tʰì zadi zân ʔisơzaên cạʔi zadi tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê tʰeo cươŋcìɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê tùʔi mạŋ ŋàʔi dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi haj ốŋ lwa bằŋ bạk dáɲ ɣiát zùŋ cɔ ŋươʔi dể ɲóm hiệfộʔi cúŋ cwiền cɔ kák cạʔi kwân zadi xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔita tʰổʔi lwa tɔàn hộʔi cúŋ ɲóm lạʔi ɣần ŋươʔi tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk nếʔu ŋườʔita tʰổʔi cỉ ốŋ lwa tʰì kák kwan cưởŋ tứklà kák kwan tướŋ dộʔi kwân ʔisơzaên fảʔi ɲóm lạʔi ɣần ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi tʰổʔi tiếŋvaŋ tʰì ɲữŋ cạʔi kwân hướŋ dôŋ fảʔi zadi xi kák ŋươʔi tʰổʔi tiếŋvaŋ tʰứ ɲì tʰì ɲữŋ cạʔi kwân hướŋ fảʔi zadi ŋườʔita tʰổʔi tiếŋvaŋ xi nàʔɔ kák cạʔi kwân fảʔi zadi vậʔi xi ɲóm hộʔi cúŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰổʔi ɲưŋ dừŋ tʰổʔi tiếŋvaŋ kák kɔncaj ʔazôn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi ɲữŋ ốŋ lwa từ dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə ấʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi xi nàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi za ciếncận kùŋ tʰùŋịc sôŋ dáɲ mìɲ tʰìfảʔi tʰổʔi lwa tiếŋvaŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ɲớ lạʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk ɣiảʔitʰɔát xỏʔi tʰùŋịc cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi vuimừŋ cɔŋ kák cọŋtʰể dầʔu tʰáŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tʰìfảʔi tʰổʔi lwa xi zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù mìɲ lwa zùŋ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi sảʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi haimươʔi tʰáŋ haj tʰứhaj tʰì cụ mâʔi kất xỏʔi dền cứŋkớ zân ʔisơzaên tʰeo cươŋcìɲ dã dịɲ za dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi cụ mâʔi zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ fazan vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên vâŋ mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ zadi tʰứ ɲất ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân zuda tùʔi tʰeo kák dộʔiŋũ mìɲ di cướk nahasôn kɔncaj ʔaminadáp tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi zuda natʰanaên kɔncaj su ʔa tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi ʔisaka kɔncaj hêlôn tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi sabulôn bấʔizờ dền dã tʰáʔɔzỡ zồʔi kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn kɔncáʔu mêzazi xiêŋ dền zadi kế dó ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân zubên zadi tùʔi tʰeo kák dộʔiŋũ mìɲ kɔncaj sêdêʔu tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi zubên sêlumiên kɔncaj suzihadaj tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi simêôn kɔncaj ʔuên tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi ɣát bấʔizờ kák ŋườʔi kêhát xiêŋ ɲữŋ tʰáɲ zadi ŋườʔita zựŋ dền dươŋ lúk dợʔi dến Ðʔɔạn ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân kɔncáʔu zaim zadi tùʔi tʰeo dộʔiŋũ mìɲ kɔncaj ʔamihút tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi zaim ɣamaliên kɔncaj fêdátsu tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi manasɛ ʔabidan kɔncaj ɣidewni tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi bêŋiəmin zốt lạʔi ŋọn kờ kủʔa cạʔi kwân Ðʔan zadi tùʔi tʰeo kák dộʔiŋũ mìɲ hậʔu biɲ kủʔa kák cạʔi kwân xák ʔahiêsɛ kɔncaj ʔamisadaj tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi Ðʔan faɣiên kɔncaj ʔɔùkzan tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi ʔasɛ ʔahiza kɔncaj tʰốŋlãɲ kwândộʔi kủʔa cifáʔi néptali tʰứtự kấtbiɲ di kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tùʔi tʰeo kák dộʔiŋũ mìɲ ấʔi zadi ɲưvậʔi vả môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ hôbáp kɔncaj zê ʔuên ŋườʔi madiən tứklà ʔɛɲ mìɲ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi di dến sứ Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ta sứ dó cɔ kák ŋươʔi sin ʔɛɲ hãʔi di kùŋ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi dãʔi ʔɛɲ Ðứkzê kó hứʔa cɔ zân ʔisơzaên hôbáp dáp zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ di dâʔu ɲưŋ tôʔi divề sứsở tôʔi nơʔi bàkɔn tôʔi môʔisɛ lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi sin ʔɛɲ cớ cúŋtôʔi ʔɛɲ nơʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cúŋtôʔi kó tʰế cạʔi dượk ʔɛɲ zườŋɲư kɔn cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi nếʔu ʔɛɲ di kùŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ hưởŋ làɲ Ðứkzê cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên zadi núʔi Ðứkzê di cɔŋ ŋàʔidườŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê di cướk cɔŋ lúk ŋàʔidườŋ nầʔi dặŋ cɔ zân nơʔi ʔanŋỉ cɔŋ lúk banŋàʔi xi zân ʔisơzaên zờʔi cạʔi kwân di tʰì cụ mâʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cên xi zawướk di tʰì môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin cổʔi zậʔi dể tʰùŋịc ŋàʔi lạk nàʔɔ ɣét ŋàʔi cạʔi cốn cướk ŋàʔi xi ŋườʔita dể zawướk suốŋ tʰì môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin cởlạʔi kùŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên vả zânsự diềʔu dó cẳŋ dẹp tạʔi Ðứkzê Ðứkzê ŋɛ kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi nổʔi lửʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê cáʔi fừŋfừŋ ɣiữʔa zânsự tʰiêʔuhóʔa dầʔu kùŋ cạʔi kwân zânsự kêʔula kùŋ môʔisɛ môʔisɛ kầʔusin Ðứkzê tʰì lửʔa ŋừŋ lạʔi ŋườʔita dặt cỗ nầʔi tʰabêza lửʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cáʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự bọn zân cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên sɛɲ lòŋ tʰam dếnnỗʔi zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi xók nữʔa zằŋ ʔaj cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰịt cúŋtôʔi ɲớ ɲữŋ ká cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ tạʔi sứ zíptô ɲữŋ zưʔɛcuột zưʔaɣaŋ kủ kiệʔu hàɲ tỏʔi bâʔizờ liɲhồn cúŋtôʔi xôhéʔɔ xôŋ kó ci mắt cỉ tʰấʔi tʰôʔi vả mana hìɲɲư ŋò sắk ɲư câncâʔu zânsự di za lấʔi zồʔi ŋiền bằŋ kốʔisăj hăjlà ɣiã bằŋ kốʔi ɣiã nấʔu cɔŋ káʔi nồʔi báɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư báɲ ɲỏ kó fa zầʔu xi tốʔi mùsươŋ suốŋ cên cạʔi kwân tʰì kũŋ suốŋ nữʔa vậʔi môʔisɛ ŋɛ zânsự xók mỗʔi ŋườʔiở cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi mìɲ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋfừŋ môʔisɛ lấʔilàm buồnbựk diềʔu dó môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ sawŋàʔi cɔ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi saw tôʔi cẳŋ dượk cướk ŋàʔi saw ŋàʔi lạʔi cất ɣáɲ nặŋ kủʔa hếttʰảʔi zânsự nầʔi cên mìɲ tôʔi tôʔi kó tʰọtʰaj zân nầʔi saw kó sɛɲ dẻ saw ŋàʔi lạʔi fán biểʔu tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi zân nầʔi cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi ɲư ŋườʔi ca nuôʔi bồŋ dứʔa cẻ cɔdến sứ ŋàʔi kó tʰề hứʔa cɔ tổfụ kủʔa cúŋnó tôʔi kó tʰịt dâʔu dặŋ fát cɔ kả zânsự nầʔi bởʔivì xók tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰịt tôʔi xôŋ tʰế mộtmìɲ ɣáɲ zânsự nầʔi tʰậtlà zất nặŋnề cɔ tôʔi kwá nếʔucúʔa dãʔi tôʔi ɲưvậʔi nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk cúʔa sin tʰà ɣiết tôʔi di dể tôʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi xốnnạn tôʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɲóm cɔ bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ bựk cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên tứklà ɲữŋ ŋươʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ kaikwản zânsự hãʔi zẫn kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dến hộʔi mạk dứŋ tạʔi dó vớʔi ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋự suốŋ nóʔicwiện tạʔi dó vớʔi ŋươʔi lấʔi tʰần kảm ŋươʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó dể cịʔu ɣáɲ nặŋ zânsự vớʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ fảʔi ɣáɲ mộtmìɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi cwiền cɔ zânsự zằŋ ŋàʔimaj fảʔi zọn mìɲ za tʰáɲ tʰì kák ŋươʔi tʰịt vìcưŋ taj Ðứkzê kó ŋɛ kák ŋươʔi xók zằŋ ʔaj cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰịt cúŋtôʔi lấʔilàm suŋsướŋ tạʔi sứ zíptô bởʔi kớ dó Ðứkzê tʰịt cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰịt ŋàʔi haj ŋàʔi ŋàʔi mườʔi ŋàʔi hăjlà haimươʔi ŋàʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ cɔdến tʰáŋ cọn cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰịt càn za mũʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋán di kák ŋươʔi dã Ðứkzê ɣiữʔa mìɲ xók cướk ŋàʔi zằŋ vìsaw cúŋtôʔi dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô môʔisɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ cɔŋ zânsự tôʔi dươŋ dâʔi kó sáʔucămŋàn ŋườʔi dànôŋ ŋàʔi kó fán zằŋ ta fát tʰịt cɔ zân nầʔi cɔŋ tʰáŋ cọn ŋườʔita ɣiết ciên dến dỗʔi dượk dủ cɔ saw hăjlà ŋườʔita ɣɔm hếttʰảʔi ká zướʔi dếnnỗʔi dượk dủ cɔ saw Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê dã lạʔi saw ŋươʔi sɛm tʰử diềʔu dã fán kùŋ ŋươʔi kó sảʔi dến hăj căŋ môʔisɛ di za tʰuật lạʔi kák lờʔi Ðứkzê cɔ zânsự zồʔi ɲóm bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ bựk cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa zânsự dặtdể suŋkwɛɲ cạʔi Ðứkzê ŋự suốŋ cɔŋ mâʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ŋàʔi lấʔi tʰần kảm ŋườʔi cɔ bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ vừʔa xi tʰần cên bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ dượk kảmdộŋ nóʔi tiênci ɲưŋ xôŋ kứ nóʔi mãʔi kó haj ŋườʔiở lạʔi cɔŋ cạʔi kwân ŋườʔi ʔɛândát ŋườʔi mêdát dượk tʰần kảmdộŋ nóʔi tiênci tạʔi cạʔi kwân haj ŋườʔi nầʔi tʰuộk dượk ɲưŋ xôŋ kó dến hộʔi mạk một dứʔa caicẻ cạʔi tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ʔɛândát mêdát nóʔi tiênci cɔŋ cạʔi kwân ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun ŋườʔi hầʔu việk môʔisɛ dáp lạʔi zằŋ hỡʔimôʔi sɛ cúʔa tôʔi hãʔi kấm cúŋnó môʔisɛ dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi ɣɛɲ cɔ căŋ Ôʔi cớci kả zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê dềʔu ŋườʔi tiênci cớci Ðứkzê tʰần kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔ môʔisɛ mấʔi ŋườʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ dềʔu luj vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân Ðứkzê xiến cận ɣió nổʔi zẫn ɲữŋ cimkút dến vảʔi cên cạʔi kwân suŋkwɛɲ nầʔi cảʔi za zàʔi cừŋ ŋàʔidườŋ di kiə cảʔi za zàʔi cừŋ ŋàʔidườŋ di xỏʔi mặtdất cừŋ haj tʰướk kaw zânsự dứŋzậʔi ɲữŋ kút cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó dêm dó cọn ŋàʔisăw ʔaj kó mườʔi mɛ ŋườʔita kăŋ xắp cuŋkwɛɲ cạʔi kwân tʰịt kòn nơʔi zăŋ cưʔa ɲaj tʰì kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋzân hàɲ zânsự tajvạ zất nặŋ ŋườʔita dặt cỗ dó kípzốt hatʰava tạʔi dó ŋườʔita côn zânsự sɛɲ lòŋ tʰam từkíp zốt hatʰava zânsự di dến hátsêzốt zồʔi ŋừŋ lạʔi tạʔi dó miziəm ʔazôn nóʔi hàɲ môʔisɛ việk ŋườʔi tʰiôbi ŋườʔi dã lấʔi ŋườʔi kó lấʔi ŋườʔi tʰiôbi haj ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê cỉ zùŋ mộtmìɲ môʔisɛ tʰôʔi saw ŋàʔi xôŋ zùŋ cúŋta fán nữʔa saw Ðứkzê ŋɛ diềʔu dó vả môʔisɛ ŋườʔi zất xiêm hòʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi cên tʰếzan tʰìɲlìɲ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn miziəm zằŋ kả hãʔi za dến hộʔi mạk kả dềʔu di Ðứkzê ŋự suốŋ cɔŋ cụ mâʔi dứŋ tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk zồʔi ɣọʔi ʔazôn môʔisɛ haj ŋườʔi dềʔu dến ŋàʔi fán kùŋ haj ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ zõ lờʔi nếʔu cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kó tiênci nàʔɔ Ðứkzê za kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰấʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kơn ciêmbaw tôʔitớ môʔisɛ xôŋ kó ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi tʰật cuŋtín cɔŋ kả ɲà ta nóʔicwiện kùŋ ŋườʔi miệŋ dốʔi miệŋ mộtkác zõzàŋ xôŋ lờʔi dố ŋườʔi tʰấʔi hìɲ Ðứkzê vậʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ nóʔi hàɲ tôʔitớ môʔisɛ saw ɲưvậʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋfừŋ kùŋ haj ŋườʔi ŋàʔi ŋự di xi cụ mâʔi zút xỏʔi cên dền tʰì kìʔa miziəm dã fuŋ cắŋ ɲư twiết ʔazôn sâʔi lạʔi fíʔa miziəm tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dã kó bịɲ fuŋ ʔazôn nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ Ôʔi lạʔi cúʔa tôʔi sin cớ dể cên cúŋtôʔi tộʔi cúŋtôʔi dã zạʔi fạm dã mắk lấʔi sin cớ dể nàŋ ɲư dứʔa kɔn sảʔɔ tʰịt dã fânnửʔa xi za xỏʔi lòŋ môʔisɛ kêʔuvan kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ Ôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi cữʔa cɔ nàŋ Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nếʔu ca nàŋ ɲổ cên nàŋ nàŋ xôŋ maŋ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi saw nàŋ fảʔi kầm ziêŋ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi zồʔi săw dượk ɲận vàʔɔ lạʔi Ấʔi vậʔi miziəm kầm ziêŋ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi zânsự xôŋ zadi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ miziəm dượk ɲận vàʔɔ lạʔi săw việk dó zânsự zadi hátsêzốt cạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ fazan Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi saj ɲữŋ ŋườʔi di zɔtʰám sứ kanaan sứ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên về mỗʔimột cifáʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi saj ŋườʔi di mỗʔi ŋườʔilàm kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cifáʔi mìɲ tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê môʔisɛ dồŋ vắŋ fazan saj kák ŋườʔi nầʔi di hếttʰảʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên Ðâʔi kủʔa kák ŋườʔi ấʔi về cifáʔi zubên sammwa kɔncaj saku cifáʔi simêôn safát kɔncaj kủʔa hôzi cifáʔi zuda kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê cifáʔi ʔisaka ziɣɛɲ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsép cifáʔi zaim hôsê kɔncaj kủʔa nun cifáʔi bêŋiəmin fantʰi kɔncaj kủʔa zafu cifáʔi sabulôn ɣátdiên kɔncaj kủʔa sôdi cifáʔi ɣiôsép ŋĩʔalà cifáʔi manasɛ ɣadi kɔncaj kủʔa susi cifáʔi Ðʔan ʔamiên kɔncaj kủʔa ɣêmali cifáʔi ʔasɛ sêtʰu kɔncaj kủʔa micaên cifáʔi néptali nácbi kɔncaj kủʔa vấpsi cifáʔi ɣát ɣuên kɔncaj kủʔa maki ɲữŋ ŋườʔi môʔisɛ saj di zɔtʰám sứ vả môʔisɛ dặt cɔ hôsê kɔncaj nun ɣiôsuê vậʔi môʔisɛ saj di zɔtʰám sứ kanaan zặn zằŋ từ dâʔi hãʔi nam fươŋ vàʔɔ núʔi zồʔi tʰấʔi sứ zasaw zânsự dó nếʔu mạɲ ʔiếʔu tʰểnàʔɔ nếʔu hăj ɲiềʔu sứ zân dó tʰếnàʔɔ nếʔu hăj sấʔu kák tʰàɲ zân dó làmsaw hɔặk cỉ ɲữŋ nơʔi dóŋ cạʔi hăjlà dồnlũʔi dất za làmsaw nếʔu màʔumỡ hăjlà sấʔu kó kâʔicốʔi hăjlà xôŋ hãʔi kandảm háʔi lấʔi cáʔicâʔi sứ dó bấʔizờ ɲằm mùʔa ɲɔ vậʔi kák ŋườʔi dó di zɔtʰám sứ dồŋ vắŋ sin cɔdến zêhốp divề hamát họ hướŋ nam di dến tʰàɲ hếpzôn nơʔi kó ʔahiman sêsaj tɛɲmaj kɔnkáʔi kủʔa ʔanák vả tʰàɲ hếpzôn dã sâʔi bảʔi cướk sôʔan tʰàɲ kủʔa sứ zíptô kák ŋườʔi dến xɛ Ếc kôn kắt tạʔi dó ɲàɲ ɲɔ kó cùm ɲɔ haj ŋườʔi xiêŋ lấʔi bằŋ kâʔi sàʔɔ ɲữŋ cáʔi lựʔu cáʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi cỗ nầʔi xɛ Ếc kôn kó cùm ɲɔ zân ʔisơzaên dã kắt tạʔi dó kák ŋườʔi di zɔtʰám sứ cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi cởvề tớʔi zồʔi dếnkùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ fazan tạʔi kadɛ tʰuật lạʔi mọʔi cɔ haj ŋườʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ ŋɛ kùŋ dưʔa cɔ sɛm hwakwả kủʔa sứ vậʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰuật cɔ môʔisɛ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi di dến sứ ŋườʔi dã saj cúŋtôʔi di ấʔi kwảtʰật sứ dượm sữʔa nầʔi hwakwả sứ dódâʔi mà zânsự cɔŋ sứ nầʔi mạɲzạn tʰàɲcì tʰật vữŋvàŋ zất cúŋtôʔi kũŋ kó tʰấʔi kɔnkáʔi kủʔa ʔanák dó zân ʔamalék nam zân hêtít zân ɣiêbusít zân ʔamôzít cɔŋ núʔi zân kanaan ɣần zọk zàʔi tʰeo ɣiôdɛɲ kalép cɔ zânsự dươŋ kùŋ môʔisɛ nínlặŋ di nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi di ciếm sứ di cúŋta tʰắŋ dượk ɲưŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi di kùŋ kalép nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta xôŋ di kự zân nầʔi dượk cúŋnó mạɲ cúŋta cướk zân ʔisơzaên kák ŋườʔi dó faw fản sứ mìɲ dã zɔtʰám zằŋ sứ cúŋtôʔi dã di xắp dặŋ zɔtʰám sứ zânsự mìɲ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cúŋtôʔi dã tʰấʔi tạʔi dó dềʔu hìɲvók kawlớn cúŋtôʔi kó tʰấʔi kawlớn tứklà kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔanák tʰuộk ɣiốŋ ɣiềɲ ɣiàŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰấʔi mìɲ xáknàʔɔ kɔn kàʔɔkàʔɔ tʰấʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ kấttiếŋ zânsự xóklók cɔŋ dêm dó hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn kả hộʔi cúŋ nóʔi kùŋ haj ŋườʔi zằŋ cớci cúŋtôʔi dã cết cɔŋ sứ zíptô hăjlà dã cết cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ nầʔi vì kớ nàʔɔ Ðứkzê zẫn cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ sứ nầʔi dặŋ ɣươm ŋã vợ kɔnɲỏ cúŋtôʔi miếŋ mồʔi về fần cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ xá cởvề sứ zíptô saw zồʔi zânsự nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi kwan cưởŋ cởvề sứ zíptô di môʔisɛ ʔazôn mìɲ suốŋ cướk kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê haj ŋườʔi cɔŋ di zɔtʰám sứ sé áʔɔkwần mìɲ haj ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ sứ cúŋtôʔi dã di xắp dặŋ zɔtʰám tʰậtlà sứ zất nếʔu Ðứkzê dẹplòŋ kùŋ cúŋta dɛm cúŋta vàʔɔ sứ nầʔi cɔ ấʔilà sứ dượm sữʔa cỉ kák ŋươʔi cớ zấʔi lɔạn kùŋ Ðứkzê dừŋ zân kủʔa sứ zân dó dồ nuôʔi cúŋta bóŋ cɛcở dã zút di xỏʔi zồʔi Ðứkzê kùŋ cớ ci bấʔizờ kả hộʔi cúŋ nóʔi dá haj ŋườʔi nầʔi ɲưŋ viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê za cên hộʔi mạk cướk zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ zân nầʔi xiɲ xôŋ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ mặkzầʔu kák fép ɣiữʔa cúŋnó ta ɣiáŋ cɔ zânsự nầʔi zịclệ tiêʔuziệt fần kơŋiệp kủʔa di ɲưŋ cɔ ŋươʔi tʰàɲ zân mạɲ môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ zân zíptô kó hăj zằŋ cúʔa kậʔi kwiềnnăŋ cúʔa dɛm zân nầʔi za xỏʔi kó tʰuật diềʔu dó cɔ
