zân sứ nầʔi ÔʔiÐứkzê ŋườʔita zằŋ cúʔa ŋự ɣiữʔa zân nầʔi cúʔa za cɔ cúŋ tʰấʔi cụ mâʔi cúʔa cên zân nầʔi cúʔa di cướk banŋàʔi cɔŋ cụ mâʔi bandêm cɔŋ cụ lửʔa nếʔucúʔa ɣiết zân nầʔi ɲưtʰể ɣiết ŋườʔi tʰì kák nướk dã ŋɛnóʔi cúʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê xôŋtʰể zẫn zân nầʔi vàʔɔ sứ ŋàʔi dã tʰề cɔ bởʔi kớ dó ŋàʔi ɣiết cết cúŋnó cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ vả bâʔizờ tôʔi sin kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa cúʔa za kác waiŋiêm ɲư cúʔa dã nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê cậm nóŋzận dầʔi hăj sá diềʔu zanák tộʔilỗʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ kó tộʔi vôtộʔi ɲơn tộʔi tổfụ fạt kɔncáʔu cảʔi dờʔi tôʔi sin cúʔa tʰa tộʔi zanák kủʔa zân nầʔi tùʔi tʰeo kủʔa cúʔa ɲư cúʔa dã tʰa sứ zíptô dến dâʔi Ðứkzê dáp zằŋ ta dã tʰa ɲư lờʔi ŋươʔi sin ɲưŋ cỉ hằŋ sốŋ kwảkwiết zằŋ viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔizẫʔi xắp cáʔidất cɔŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi dã tʰấʔi viɲkwaŋ fép dã tạʔi sứ zíptô nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ kák ŋươʔi dã tʰử mườʔi dã xôŋ ŋɛ lờʔi tʰì cẳŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi sứ tʰề hứʔa cɔ tổfụ cúŋnó cẳŋ ʔaj dã xiɲ tʰấʔi sứ dó dâʔu ɲưŋ tôʔitớ kalép xôŋ dồŋlòŋ kùŋ cúŋnó tʰeo mộtkác cuŋtín tʰì dɛm ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ ŋườʔi dã kó di zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dượk sứ sảnŋiệp zân ʔamalék zân kanaan cɔŋ cũŋ ŋàʔimaj kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cở luj lạʔi săw di dến dồŋ vắŋ hướŋ biển dỏ Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ ta cịʔu hộʔi cúŋ huŋzữ nầʔi hăj kùŋ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ta dã ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ʔɔáncác hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi zâncúŋ Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ ta cỉ hằŋ sốŋ tʰề dãʔi kák ŋươʔi tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi dã ŋɛ kák ŋươʔi nóʔi ɲữŋ tʰâʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋã cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ nầʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔita dã hếttʰảʔi bawɲiêʔu kũŋ vậʔi haimươʔi tuổʔi ɲữŋ dã kùŋ tʰì cẳŋ dượk vàʔɔ sứ dã tʰề cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋɔạʔicừ kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun ɲưŋ dɛm vàʔɔ sứ ɲữŋ kɔncẻ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ cúŋnó miếŋ mồʔi zồʔi cúŋnó sứ kák ŋươʔi dã cêbaj kòn ɲữŋ tʰâʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋã cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ nầʔi kɔnkáʔi kák ŋươʔi cănciên nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ cɔŋ mươʔi maŋ hìɲfạt tộʔi tʰôŋzâm kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰâʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dã ŋã zạp cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ kák ŋươʔi di zɔtʰám sứ bawɲiêʔu ŋàʔi ŋĩʔalà mươʔi ŋàʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi kũŋ maŋ hìɲfạt tộʔi zanák mìɲ bấʔiɲiêʔu ŋĩʔalà mươʔi dền cɔ ŋàʔi bấʔizờ kák ŋươʔi dã sâʔi xỏʔi kák ŋươʔi ta Ðứkzê dã fán ta diềʔu nầʔi cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ huŋzữ nầʔi dã lạʔi ŋịc kùŋ cúŋnó hawmòn cết tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ nầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi môʔisɛ dã saj di zɔtʰám sứ xi cởvề kó suj cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ kùŋ môʔisɛ kó faw fản sứ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi dềʔu tajvạ hàɲ cết cướk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi di zɔtʰám sứ cỉ kó ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê kòn sốŋ dượk môʔisɛ tʰuật lạʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi nầʔi cɔ kả zân ʔisơzaên zồʔi kó tʰảmsầʔu zất cɔŋ zânsự Ðʔɔạn zânsự zậʔi di cót núʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dâʔi di tớʔi cỗ Ðứkzê dã fán hứʔa cúŋtôʔi kó fạmtộʔi sɔŋmôʔi sɛ nóʔi zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi cáʔi mạŋ Ðứkzê sự dó cẳŋ măimắn dâʔu cớ di dó ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi kwân ŋịc dáɲbạʔi căŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ kòn ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi nữʔa kìʔa zân ʔamalék zân kanaan dằŋ cướk kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣươm ŋã zạp bởʔivì dã bộʔiŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê xôŋ kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ zânsự kốý di cót núʔi kòn zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê môʔisɛ xôŋ di za xỏʔi cạʔi kwân zân ʔamalék zân kanaan cɔŋ núʔi nầʔi dổ suốŋ dáɲbạʔi fân tʰâʔi zân ʔisơzaên cɔdến họtma Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ cɔ kák ŋươʔi dặŋ kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa dốt hɔặk kủʔa tʰiêʔu hɔặk kủʔa cả hứʔa ŋwiện hɔặk kủʔa lạk hăjlà cɔŋ ɲữŋ cọŋtʰể kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa kó mùʔi tʰơm bằŋ hăj ciên tʰì ʔaj zâŋ mìɲ fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa căj bằŋ fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi vớʔi mộtfầntư zầʔu về mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kwán bằŋ mộtfầntư zượʔu vớʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hăjlà vớʔi kủʔa xák ɲượkbằŋ kɔnciên dựk tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi zùŋ kủʔa căj bằŋ haj fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi vớʔi mộtfầnba zầʔu mộtfầnba zượʔu kwán zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê ɲượkbằŋ ŋươʔi zâŋ kɔn hɔặk kủʔa tʰiêʔu hɔặk kủʔa cả hứʔa ŋwiện hăjlà kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi zâŋ cuŋ vớʔi kɔn kủʔa căj bằŋ fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi vớʔi nửʔa zầʔu zâŋ nửʔa zượʔu kwán ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê ŋườʔita kũŋ fảʔi ɲưvậʔi mỗʔi kɔn dựk mỗʔi kɔnciên dựk mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn hăjlà mỗʔi kɔn zê kɔn tùʔi tʰeo kɔn siɲ kák ŋươʔi zâŋ tʰìfảʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔ mỗʔi kɔn fàm ŋườʔi sɛɲ za cɔŋ sứ fảʔi ɲưvậʔi xi nàʔɔ zâŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa dốt kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê nếʔu xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi hăjlà ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kủʔa kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê tʰìfảʔi ʔiɲư kák ŋươʔi làmvậʔi cɔŋ hộʔi cúŋ cỉ dồŋ kó cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi Ấʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kák ŋươʔi cướk Ðứkzê xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kũŋ dồŋ ɲư kák ŋươʔi vậʔi sẽ kó ɲư ɲăw cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê kũŋ fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã vàʔɔ sứ zẫn kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ báɲ kủʔa sứ dó tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi za káʔi báɲ ɲỏ tứklà báɲ dầʔu ɲồʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ ʔi mộtkác ɲư zâŋ ɣiơ dạp lúʔa vậʔi từ dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê ɲồʔi dầʔutiên kủʔa kák ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi fạmtộʔi xôŋ ɣiữ hếttʰảʔi kák diềʔu zăn nầʔi Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ ŋĩʔalà mọʔi diềʔu ci Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cwiền ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn nầʔi cɔ ŋàʔisăw cɔŋ ɲữŋ zòŋzõʔi dến kủʔa kák ŋươʔi nếʔu tộʔifạm hộʔi cúŋ xôŋ hăjbiết tʰì kả hộʔi cúŋ tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ fảʔi zùŋ kɔn dựk zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê vớʔi kủʔa căj kùŋ kwán kặp tʰeo kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰì tộʔi hộʔi cúŋ dượk tʰa tộʔifạm hộʔi cúŋ dã dɛm dến cướk Ðứkzê mìɲ tứklà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê vớʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi dặŋ cữʔa mìɲ kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ zân dó dượk tʰa tộʔi bởʔi màkả zânsự dã fạmtộʔi ɲượkbằŋ cỉ ŋườʔi fạmtộʔi tʰì ŋườʔi dó fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê káʔi ɣiáp kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰầʔi cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dã fạmtộʔi ɲưvậʔi cướk Ðứkzê xi dã cuộk tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi dượk tʰa xi fạmtộʔi tʰì kó dồŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi hɔặk sɛɲ ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ zân dó ɲưŋ ʔaj kốý fạmtộʔi hɔặk ŋườʔi sɛɲ cɔŋ sứ hăjlà xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ tʰì ʔaj dó xiɲbỉ Ðứkzê ŋườʔi cuất xỏʔi zânsự mìɲ ŋườʔi dã xiɲbỉ lờʔi Ðứkzê cáʔi mạŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋườʔi cuất ziệt tộʔi zanák ŋườʔi dổ lạʔi cên mìɲ ŋườʔi vả zân ʔisơzaên dươŋ tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ ɣặp ŋườʔi kủʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ ɣặp ŋườʔi dươŋ kủʔi zẫn ŋườʔi dến môʔisɛ ʔazôn kả hộʔi cúŋ họ ŋườʔi zam diềʔu fảʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cưʔa ɲấtdịɲ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi fảʔi fạt sửtử kả hộʔi cúŋ hãʔi dá ŋườʔiŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân vậʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ dɛm ŋườʔi za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân dá ŋườʔi cết ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên biểʔu dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə hãʔi káʔi twa nơʔi kák céʔɔáʔɔ mìɲ cên mỗʔi twa sợʔi zâʔi màʔu diềʔu kák ŋươʔi fảʔi maŋ káʔi twa nầʔi xi tʰấʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲớ lạʔi hếttʰảʔi diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰeo xôŋ tʰeo zụk kủʔa lòŋ mìɲ diềʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tʰôŋzâm ɲưvậʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲớ lạʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vả kôzê kɔncaj kủʔa zítsêha cáʔu kủʔa kêhát cít kủʔa lêvi ɣiụk tʰeo mìɲ Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam kɔncaj kủʔa kùŋvớʔi kɔncaj kủʔa fêlết cáʔu zubên kák ŋườʔi nầʔi vớʔi haj căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên kwan tướŋ kủʔa hộʔi ŋịviên kủʔa hộʔidồŋ kó zɛɲzá dềʔu ɲăw zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ tʰôʔi dủ zồʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu tʰáɲ Ðứkzê ŋự cɔŋ vậʔisaw kák ŋươʔi tựkaw cên hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê môʔisɛ ŋɛ diềʔu dó suốŋ dất nóʔi kùŋ kôzê hếttʰảʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ sáŋmaj Ðứkzê cɔbiết ʔaj tʰuộk ŋàʔi ʔaj tʰáɲ ŋàʔi xiến ŋườʔi dó lạʔi ɣần ŋàʔi tứk xiến ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋàʔi dã cọn lấʔi dến ɣần ŋàʔi hỡʔicô zê hãʔi diềʔu nầʔi ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kầm hươŋ sáŋmaj hãʔi dể lửʔa cɔŋ hươŋ cên cướk Ðứkzê ŋườʔi nàʔɔ Ðứkzê cọn ấʔilà ŋườʔi tʰáɲ hỡʔi kɔncáʔu lêvi tʰôʔi dủ zồʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ kôzê zằŋ hỡʔi kɔncáʔu lêvi bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ về fần kák ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã kák ŋươʔi ziêŋ za vớʔi hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên xiến kák ŋươʔi dến ɣần ŋàʔi dặŋ kôŋviệk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dặŋ cựk hầʔu việk cướk hộʔi cúŋ việk ấʔi ɲỏmọn saw ŋàʔi biểʔu ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi vớʔi kɔncáʔu lêvi dến ɣần ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi lạʔi kòn cứk nữʔa saw vìvậʔi ŋươʔi tɔàn bèdảŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi dềʔu lạʔi ŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê vì ʔazôn ʔaj kák ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi môʔisɛ saj dòʔi Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam kɔncaj ɲưŋ haj ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ di dâʔu há diềʔu ɲỏmọn ŋươʔi dã dɛm cúŋta za xỏʔi sứ dượm sữʔa dặŋ cɔ cúŋta cết cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ŋươʔi lạʔi kòn cên cúŋta nữʔa saw kwảtʰật ŋươʔi xôŋ kó zẫn cúŋta dến cɔŋ sứ dượm sữʔa dâʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ cɔ cúŋta dồŋzuộŋ hăjlà ɲɔ sảnŋiệp dâʔu ŋươʔi twan xɔét kủʔa zân nầʔi cúŋta xôŋ di dâʔu môʔisɛ nổʔizận tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ sin dừŋ dến kủʔa căj cúŋnó nữʔa tôʔi xôŋ kó nơʔi cúŋnó kɔn lừʔa nàʔɔ tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ kó hạʔi ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋnó Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ kôzê zằŋ ŋàʔimaj ŋươʔi tɔàn bèdảŋ ŋươʔi vớʔi ʔazôn hãʔi zamắt Ðứkzê mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi lấʔi hươŋ mìɲ hươŋ cɔŋ zồʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi zâŋ hươŋ mìɲ cướk Ðứkzê tứklà haj căm nămmươʔi káʔi hươŋ ŋươʔi ʔazôn mỗʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ fảʔi kó hươŋ mìɲ vậʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi hươŋ mìɲ dể lửʔa vàʔɔ hươŋ cên zồʔi dứŋ tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk vớʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn kôzê kả hộʔi cúŋ ŋịc lạʔi môʔisɛ ʔazôn tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê za kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi tác xỏʔi ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ nầʔi tʰì tiêʔuziệt cɔŋ haj ŋườʔi suốŋ zằŋ ÔʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa kủʔa tʰầnliɲ mọʔi sáktʰịt cỉ kó ŋườʔi fạmtộʔi cúʔa lạʔi nổʔizận kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ saw Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ hộʔi cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi zan za xỏʔi cuŋkwɛɲ cỗ kủʔa kôzê Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam môʔisɛ dứŋzậʔi dilạʔi fíʔa Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên di tʰeo ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ hộʔi cúŋ zằŋ bâʔizờ hãʔi zan za xỏʔi cạʔi kủʔa kák ŋườʔi huŋák nầʔi cớ dụŋ dến ci tʰuộk ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi cết ɲữŋ tộʔi kủʔa căŋ vậʔi zânsự zan za xỏʔi tứfíʔa cỗ kủʔa kôzê Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam za dứŋ tạʔi kửʔa cạʔi vớʔi kɔncaj kɔnnít mìɲ môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ ɲờ diềʔu nầʔi kák ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê kó saj dặŋ kák diềʔu nầʔi cẳŋ ci nếʔu kák dó cết ɲư mọʔi ŋườʔi xák cết nếʔu dồŋ cịʔu sốfận cuŋ ɲư mọʔi ŋườʔi tʰì Ðứkzê xôŋ kó saj ɲưŋ nếʔu Ðứkzê sựtʰật mớʔi nếʔu dất miệŋ za mọʔi ci tʰuộk nếʔu kòn dươŋ sốŋ suốŋ âmfủ tʰì kák ŋươʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi kó xiɲbỉ Ðứkzê vừʔa xi môʔisɛ nóʔi zứt kák lờʔi nầʔi dất ŋăj zướʔi cân za miệŋ zakwiến hếttʰảʔi fɛ kôzê kùŋ tàʔisản kủʔa cúŋnó kák ŋườʔi dó kòn dươŋ sốŋ mọʔi ci tʰuộk dềʔu suốŋ âmfủ dất lạʔi cúŋnó ziệt xỏʔi hộʔi cúŋ kả ʔisơzaên suŋkwɛɲ ŋɛ tiếŋ dềʔu cạʔi cốn nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi kɔicừŋ kẻʔɔ dất cúŋta căŋ zồʔi ŋọn lửʔa Ðứkzê lòʔɛ za tʰiêʔuhóʔa haj căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi dã zâŋ hươŋ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi lêʔasa kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔazôn biểʔu kák hươŋ za xỏʔi cỗ lửʔa cáʔi dổ lửʔa kủʔa kák hươŋ nơʔi sa hươŋ dã tʰáɲ kòn ɲữŋ hươŋ kủʔa kák ŋườʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ sɛɲ mạŋ mìɲ ŋườʔita fảʔi lấʔilàm tʰàɲ ɲữŋ zát mỏŋ dể bọk bàntʰờ bởʔi kák hươŋ dã zâŋ cướk Ðứkzê dã tʰàɲ tʰáɲ ɲữŋ zát dó zùŋ zấʔu cɔ zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi lêʔasa tʰầʔi lấʔi ɲữŋ hươŋ bằŋ dồŋ kủʔa kák ŋườʔi tʰiêʔu dã zâŋ ŋườʔita tʰàɲ ɲữŋ zát mòŋ dể bọk bàntʰờ Ấʔilà cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dể ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋɔạʔi zòŋ ʔazôn cớ dến ɣần dặŋ sôŋ hươŋ cướk Ðứkzê kẻʔɔ ʔɛ dồŋ sốfận kùŋ kôzê bèdảŋ ŋườʔi tʰeo lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zạʔi ŋàʔimaj kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ haj ŋườʔi dã cết zân kủʔa Ðứkzê xi hộʔi cúŋ dươŋ ɲăw ŋịc kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn tʰì ŋó hướŋ hộʔi mạk sảʔi tʰấʔi cụ mâʔi bawfủ hộʔi mạk viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê za môʔisɛ ʔazôn dến dứŋ cướk hộʔi mạk Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi zan za xỏʔi ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ nầʔi tʰì tiêʔuziệt cɔŋ ɲưŋ haj ŋườʔi suốŋ dất zồʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ hãʔi kầm lấʔi hươŋ dể lửʔa cên bàntʰờ vàʔɔ hươŋ cên măw măw di dến hộʔi cúŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã nổʔi tajvạ dã fátxởʔi ʔazôn kầm lấʔi hươŋ ʔiɲư môʔisɛ dã biểʔu cạʔi dến ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ kìʔa tajvạ dã fátxởʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự ʔazôn hươŋ vàʔɔ cuộk tộʔi cɔ zânsự ŋườʔi dứŋ ɣiữʔa cết sốŋ tʰì tajvạ ŋừŋ lạʔi kó mườʔibốn ŋàn bảʔicăm ŋườʔi cết tajvạ nầʔi cừ za ɲữŋ dã cết kớ kôzê Ðʔɔạn ʔazôn cởvề kùŋ môʔisɛ tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk zồʔi tajvạ ŋừŋ lạʔi kế dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên biểʔu zằŋ mỗʔi cifáʔi kủʔa fảʔi dɛm cɔ ŋươʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi ŋĩʔalà mườʔihaj kâʔi ɣậʔi bởʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa mỗʔi cifáʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi dề mỗʔi ŋườʔi cên kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa mìɲ dề ʔazôn cên kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa lêvi fảʔi kó kâʔi ɣậʔi cɔ mỗʔi cưởŋtộk ŋươʔi fảʔi dể kák ɣậʔi dó cɔŋ hộʔi mạk cướk bảŋ cứŋ nơʔi ɣặp ŋươʔi hễ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cọn lấʔi tʰì kâʔi ɣậʔi ŋườʔi dó cổ hwa vậʔi cɔ di cướk ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên dã fát za dốʔiŋịc kùŋ kák ŋươʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên tʰì hếttʰảʔi cưởŋtộk tùʔi tʰeo cifáʔi mìɲ dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi tứklà mườʔihaj kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa ʔazôn ɣiữʔa kák kâʔi ɣậʔi xák môʔisɛ dể ɲữŋ ɣậʔi dó cɔŋ cạʔi bảŋ cứŋ cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔimaj xi môʔisɛ vàʔɔ cạʔi bảŋ cứŋ sảʔi tʰấʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi ʔazôn ɲà lêvi dã cổ hwa kó sɛɲ hwa cáʔi hạɲ ɲơn cín môʔisɛ zút kák kâʔi ɣậʔi xỏʔi cướk Ðứkzê dɛm dưʔa cɔ kả zân ʔisơzaên kák ŋườʔi dềʔu tʰấʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi ɣậʔi mìɲ lạʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa ʔazôn dể lạʔi cướk bảŋ cứŋ dặŋ ɣiữ zấʔu cɔ kɔnkáʔi fảnŋịc ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ di ɲữŋ lờʔi dốʔiŋịc kùŋ hầʔu cɔ zâncúŋ cẳŋ cết môʔisɛ ɲưvậʔi tứk ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ nầʔi cúŋtôʔi ziệt cúŋtôʔi cết cúŋtôʔi cết hếttʰảʔi fàm ʔaj dến ɣần dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dềʔu cết kólẽ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cết saw Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi tôŋtộk ŋươʔi fảʔi maŋ lấʔi ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi fạm cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kòn ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi fảʔi maŋ lấʔi ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi fạm cɔŋ cứk kũŋ hãʔi biểʔu dến ɣần ŋươʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cifáʔi lêvi tứk tôŋtộk ŋươʔi dặŋ kák ŋườʔi dó vớʔi ŋươʔi hầʔu việk ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi fảʔi cướk cạʔi bảŋ cứŋ kák ŋườʔi dó ɣìŋiữ diềʔu ci ŋươʔi cwiền zạʔi diềʔu nàʔɔ tʰuộk kả cạʔi cỉ xôŋ lạʔi ɣần ɲữŋ tʰáɲ kũŋ dừŋ lạʔi ɣần bàntʰờ ʔɛ xi cúŋnó fảʔi cết kák ŋươʔi kũŋ cết căŋ vậʔi kák ŋườʔi dó vớʔi ŋươʔi kɔjsók diềʔu ci tʰuộk hộʔi mạk ɣiữ kôŋviệk kủʔa cạʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi nàʔɔ cẳŋ dến ɣần kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kɔjsók diềʔu ci tʰuộk nơʔi tʰáɲ bàntʰờ dể dừŋ kó tʰạɲ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên nữʔa kòn tadâʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dã cọn lấʔi ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi cɔ kák ŋươʔi dã zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê zồʔi dặŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa hộʔi mạk ɲưŋ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi fảʔi kỹlưỡŋ lɔ cɔsɔŋ cứk kwảncị kák diềʔu ci tʰuộk bàntʰờ ci fíʔa cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi làmviệk mìɲ tạʔi dó cứk kủʔa kák ŋươʔi việk fɔŋ cɔ ɲư kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi nàʔɔ dến ɣần sửtử Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ nầʔi kử ŋươʔi kɔjsók kák kủʔa tʰâʔu lấʔi mọʔi zân ʔisơzaên dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ kứ dịɲ dờʔidờʔi ɲữŋ nầʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi ɲư fần ziêŋ fép sứk zầʔu cwiền cɔ cɔŋ kák zất tʰáɲ xôŋ kó tʰiêʔuhóʔa zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ cɔ nầʔi fần tʰuộk ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi kủʔa nàʔɔ kủʔa căj nàʔɔ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi ɲữŋ zất tʰáɲ nầʔi dềʔu tʰuộk ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔŋ nơʔi zất tʰáɲ mọʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi lấʔi ấʔi tʰáɲ cɔ ŋươʔi vật nầʔi kũŋ tʰuộk ŋươʔi fàm nàʔɔ zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ ɣiơ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi tʰì kứ dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi ʔaj cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi tiɲ sạcsẽ dượk kák dó ta kũŋ dã cɔ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ dầʔu mùʔa zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê hếttʰảʔi fần zầʔu zượʔuŋọt lúʔa ɲấtʰạŋ mọʔi hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa dất sɛɲ zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê dềʔu tʰuộk ŋươʔi ʔaj cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi tiɲ sạcsẽ dượk lấʔi fàm ci zân ʔisơzaên fú zâŋ tʰuộk ŋươʔi mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa kák sáktʰịt hɔặk ŋươʔi hɔặk zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê dềʔu tʰuộk ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi cuộk lạʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi kũŋ fảʔi cuộk lạʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa tʰúvật ôʔuế về cuộk lạʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cuộk lạʔi ɲữŋ kɔn tʰáŋ cở di tʰeo ɣiá dịɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi siếk bạk tʰeo siếk kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ haimươʔi ɣê za ɲưŋ ŋươʔi cớ cuộk lạʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa káʔi hɔặk kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa ciên káʔi hăjlà kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa zê káʔi ấʔilà ɲữŋ tʰáɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi zướʔi hwiết cên bàntʰờ sôŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê tʰịt tʰuộk ŋươʔi ɲư káʔi ʔɔ zâŋ dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi káʔi ɣiò hữʔu ta kứ dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj kák kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi tʰáɲ zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê ấʔilà zawướk bằŋ muốʔi dờʔidờʔi xôŋ dượk cướk Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ʔazôn zằŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ kó kơŋiệp cɔŋ sứ zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó fần cɔ ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa zân dó fần kủʔa ŋươʔi kơŋiệp kủʔa ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên kòn kɔncáʔu lêvi nầʔi dã cɔ kơŋiệp mọʔi tʰuế fần mườʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên lươŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ cɔŋ hộʔi mạk zân ʔisơzaên cớ lạʔi ɣần hộʔi mạk nữʔa ʔɛ fảʔi mắk tộʔi cết căŋ ɲưŋ ấʔilà ŋườʔi lêvi kôŋviệk kủʔa hộʔi mạk bằŋ kó fạmtộʔi tʰì maŋ lấʔi cúŋnó xôŋ kó fần kơŋiệp ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên ấʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cảʔi kwa kák tʰế dạʔi vì dã cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kơŋiệp ɲữŋ tʰuế fần mườʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê bởʔi kớ dó dã fán zằŋ họ xôŋ kó kơŋiệp ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi cwiền cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã lãɲ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tʰuế fần mườʔi dã fần zân dó dặŋ kơŋiệp kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi lấʔi fần mườʔi kủʔa tʰuế fần mườʔi kủʔa zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê lễvật zâŋ ɣiơ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ɲư lúʔamì lấʔi nơʔi dạp lúʔa ɲư dầʔizẫʔi kủʔa zượʔu tʰếtʰì cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰuế fần mườʔi kák ŋươʔi lãɲ nơʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰì kũŋ fảʔi lấʔi za fần mườʔi zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê zaw kủʔa Ðứkzê dó cɔ ʔazôn tʰầʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ lãɲ dượk kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi za fần ɲất ziêŋ za tʰáɲ zâŋ ɣiơ cɔ Ðứkzê ŋươʔi fảʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã zâŋ ɣiơ fần ɲất kủʔa tʰuế fần mườʔi tʰì cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ɲư huêlợʔi kủʔa dạp lúʔa ɲư huêlợʔi kủʔa zượʔu vậʔi kák ŋươʔi zakwiến kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ kũŋ dượk kôŋ ɣiá mìɲ việk kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ hộʔi mạk bởʔi kớ ấʔi xi kák ŋươʔi dã zâŋ ɣiơ fần ɲất kák ŋươʔi xôŋ mắk tộʔi xôŋ ôʔuế ɲữŋ tʰáɲ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi xôŋ cết dâʔu Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ nầʔi dịɲ kủʔa luậtfáp Ðứkzê kó cwiền zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên biểʔu zẫn dến ŋườʔi kɔn káʔi sắk hwej xôŋ xôŋ cưʔa maŋ ác Ðʔɔạn fảʔi zaw cɔ lêʔasa tʰầʔi zẫn za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân zồʔi ŋườʔita ɣiết cướk ŋườʔi lêʔasa tʰầʔi zùŋ ŋóntăj ɲúŋ hwiết zảʔi bảʔi fíʔa cướk kủʔa hộʔi mạk ŋườʔita tʰiêʔu kɔn káʔi dó cướkmắt ŋườʔi tʰiêʔu za tʰịt hwiết vớʔi fẩn kế dó tʰầʔi lấʔi kâʔi hươŋ cùm kiɲzớʔi màʔu dỏ liệŋ vàʔɔ ɣiữʔa dám lửʔa tʰiêʔu kɔn káʔi Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk săw zồʔi vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi kẻ nàʔɔ tʰiêʔu kɔn káʔi fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi một ŋườʔi tiɲ sạcsẽ cɔ kɔn káʔi dổ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân cɔŋ nơʔi tiɲ sạc ŋườʔita fảʔi ɣiữ cɔ dó cɔ hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên dể zùŋ nướk tẩʔiuế ấʔilà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kẻ nàʔɔ cɔ kɔn káʔi fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi Ðʔiềʔu nầʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kiềʔu ŋụ ɣiữʔa zân dó ʔaj dụŋ dến sákcết kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ôʔuế cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi fảʔi zùŋ nướk nầʔi cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc tʰì dượk sạc kòn nếʔu ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi xôŋ cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc tʰì ŋườʔi xôŋ tiɲ sạc fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dụŋ dến sákcết kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc tʰì ɣâʔi cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ôʔuế ŋườʔi dó cuất xỏʔi ʔisơzaên nướk tẩʔiuế xôŋ kó zảʔi cên mìɲ ŋườʔi nênŋườʔi ôʔuế ôʔuế kủʔa ŋườʔi cên mìɲ ŋườʔi vậʔi nầʔi luậtfáp xi kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cết cɔŋ cạʔi ʔaj vàʔɔ cạʔi mọʔi ci cɔŋ dềʔu ôʔuế cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi fàm bìɲ dựŋ nàʔɔ dể cốŋ xôŋ kó dậʔi buộk tʰeo ôʔuế ŋɔàʔi dồŋ ʔaj dụŋ dến hɔặk ŋườʔi ɣươm ɣiết hɔặk sákcết hɔặk hàʔicốt lɔàʔiŋườʔi hăjlà káʔi tʰì ôʔuế cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi về ôʔuế ŋườʔita fảʔi lấʔi cɔ kủʔa kɔn siɲ dã tʰiêʔu dặŋ cuộk tộʔi dể cɔŋ káʔi bìɲ dổ nướk cảʔi cên Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi tiɲ sạcsẽ lấʔi cùm kiɲzớʔi ɲúŋ vàʔɔ nướk zồʔi zảʔi cên cạʔi cên kák bìɲ cên ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó tạʔi dó cên ŋườʔi dã dụŋ hɔặk ɲữŋ hàʔicốt hɔặk ŋườʔi ɣiết hɔặk sákcết hăjlà káʔi ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc fảʔi zảʔi nướk dó cên ŋườʔi ôʔuế ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋườʔi tiɲ sạcsẽ cɔ ŋườʔi dượk sạc ŋườʔi dươŋ dượk sạc fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ mìɲ cɔŋ nướk dến ciếʔu tốʔi mớʔi dượk tiɲ sạc kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ôʔuế xôŋ cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc ŋườʔi ɲưvậʔi cuất xỏʔi hộʔi cúŋ ŋườʔi dã cɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ôʔuế nướk tẩʔiuế xôŋ kó zướʔi cên mìɲ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ôʔuế Ấʔi dịɲ dờʔidờʔi cɔ zânsự ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zảʔi nướk tẩʔiuế ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ nàʔɔ dụŋ dến nướk tẩʔiuế ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi fàm ci ŋườʔi ôʔuế dụŋ dến dềʔu lâʔi ôʔuế kòn ʔaj dụŋ dến ŋườʔi dó lâʔi ôʔuế dến ciềʔutốʔi tʰáŋzêŋ kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên tớʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi kadɛ miziəm kwadờʔi dượk côn tạʔi dó vả xôŋ kó nướk cɔ hộʔi cúŋ ʔuốŋ cúŋ zấʔi lɔạn kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zânsự kãʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ʔɛɲɛm cúŋtôʔi dã cết cướk Ðứkzê cớci cúŋtôʔi kũŋ dồŋ cết luôntʰể saw ŋườʔi dɛm hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê vàʔɔ dồŋ vắŋ nầʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi súkvật kủʔa cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cết saw ŋườʔi xiến cúŋtôʔi di xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ zẫn dến cỗ dộk nầʔi nơʔi ŋườʔita xôŋ zeo dượk cẳŋ kó kâʔi kâʔi ɲɔ kâʔi lựʔu kũŋ xôŋ kó nướk ʔuốŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn luj xỏʔi hộʔi cúŋ dến tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk suốŋ dất viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kùŋ haj ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi kầm lấʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi ŋươʔi zồʔi vớʔi ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi cwiền ɲóm hộʔi cúŋ haj ŋươʔi fảʔi nóʔi kùŋ dá cướk hộʔi cúŋ tʰì dá cảʔi nướk za ŋươʔi xiến nướk dá cảʔi za cɔ hộʔi cúŋ súkvật kủʔa ʔuốŋ vậʔi môʔisɛ kầm lấʔi kâʔi ɣậʔi cướk Ðứkzê ɲư ŋàʔi dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ʔazôn cwiền ɲóm hộʔi cúŋ dến cướk dá nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi zân fảnŋịc hãʔi ŋɛ cúŋta zễ xiến nướk cảʔi dá nầʔi za cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk saw môʔisɛ ɣiơ tăj dập dá haj bằŋ kâʔi ɣậʔi mìɲ nướk cảʔi càn za ɲiềʔu hộʔi cúŋ ʔuốŋ súkvật ʔuốŋ nữʔa Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn zằŋ bởʔivì haj ŋươʔi xôŋ kó dến dặŋ tʰáɲ cướk zân ʔisơzaên kớ dó haj ŋươʔi xôŋ dɛm hộʔi cúŋ nầʔi vàʔɔ sứ dã cɔ dâʔu Ấʔi dó nướk kủʔa mêziba tứklà nơʔi zân ʔisơzaên kãʔicã kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰáɲ cướk zân dó Ðʔɔạn kadɛ môʔisɛ saj sứɣiả di dến vwa dôm dặŋ nóʔi zằŋ ʔisơzaên ʔɛm vwa kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi vwa kák tainạn dã sảʔi dến cɔ cúŋtôʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi di suốŋ sứ zíptô làmsaw cúŋtôʔi dã lâʔu tạʔi sứ zíptô ɲưŋ zân sứ dó bạkdãʔi cúŋtôʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi kó kêʔula kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kó ŋɛ tʰấʔu tiếŋ kêʔu saj tʰiênsứ zẫn cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô nầʔi cúŋtôʔi tạʔi kadɛ tʰàɲ nơʔi dầʔu bờkõʔi kủʔa vwa sin cɔfép cúŋtôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sứ kủʔa vwa cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ di ŋaŋ kwa dồŋzuộŋ cẳŋ di ŋaŋ ɲɔ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ ʔuốŋ nướk kák ɣiếŋ cúŋtôʔi di tʰeo dườŋkáʔi kủʔa vwa xôŋ sâʔi kwa hữʔu kũŋ xôŋ sâʔi kwa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dã di ŋaŋ xỏʔi bờkõʔi kủʔa vwa ɲưŋ dôm dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ xá di ŋaŋ zɛɲ bằŋ kượŋ kầm ɣươm za dón ŋươʔi zân ʔisơzaên tâʔu zằŋ cúŋtôʔi di tʰeo dườŋkáʔi nếʔu cúŋtôʔi bầʔi súkvật cúŋtôʔi ʔuốŋ nướk kủʔa vwa tʰì cúŋtôʔi cả sin cỉ dể di ŋaŋ kwa xôŋ ci xák nữʔa ɲưŋ dôm dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ dượk kwa dâʔu dôm dɛm kwân cúŋ zất dôŋ tăikầm biɲxí za dón ʔisơzaên Ấʔi vậʔi dôm xôŋ cɔfép ʔisơzaên di ŋaŋ bờkõʔi mìɲ ʔisơzaên cở di xỏʔi ŋườʔi kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên di kadɛ dến núʔi hôzơ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn cên núʔi hôzơ tạʔi bờkõʔi sứ dôm zằŋ ʔazôn nơʔi tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔi xôŋ dượk vàʔɔ sứ dã cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dâʔu bởʔivì tạʔi nướk mêziba kák ŋươʔi dã bộʔiŋịc diềʔu zăn hãʔi ʔazôn lêʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi biểʔu di núʔi hôzơ dɔạn hãʔi áʔɔsốŋ ʔazôn mặk cɔ lêʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi Ấʔi tạʔi dó ʔazôn dượk kwadờʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi di núʔi hôzơ kả hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu tʰấʔi môʔisɛ áʔɔsốŋ ʔazôn mặk cɔ lêʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔazôn cết tạʔi dó cên cót núʔi zồʔi môʔisɛ lêʔasa suốŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ tʰấʔi ʔazôn dã tắtʰơʔi zồʔi xók ŋườʔi cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋàʔi xi vwa ʔazát ŋườʔi kanaan nơʔi nam fươŋ hăj zằŋ ʔisơzaên tʰeo dườŋ zɔtʰám di dến dáɲ ʔisơzaên mấʔi ŋườʔi kầmtù ʔisơzaên hứʔa ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ nếʔucúʔa fó zân nầʔi vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi tôʔi ziệt kák tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi zân ʔisơzaên fó zân kanaan cɔ ŋườʔita ziệt zân dó kák tʰàɲ kủʔa dặt cỗ nầʔi họtma Ðʔɔạn zân ʔisơzaên di núʔi hôzơ hướŋ biển dỏ dặŋ di vòŋ tʰeo sứ dôm ɣiữʔa dườŋ zânsự ŋãlòŋ vậʔi zânsự nóʔi ŋịc kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi môʔisɛ zằŋ làmsaw ŋườʔi xiến cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ cết cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ vì dâʔi xôŋ kó báɲ kũŋ xôŋ kó nướk liɲhồn cúŋtôʔi dã ɣêɣớm tʰứ dồăn dạmbạk nầʔi Ðứkzê saj kɔn zắnlửʔa dến cɔŋ zânsự kắn zân dó dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cết zất ɲiềʔu zânsự dếnkùŋ môʔisɛ nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó fạmtộʔi dã nóʔi ŋịc Ðứkzê ŋườʔi hãʔi kầʔusin Ðứkzê dể ŋàʔi xiến zắn lìʔa sa cúŋtôʔi môʔisɛ kầʔuxẩn cɔ zânsự Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kɔn zắnlửʔa zồʔi ceo cên kâʔi sàʔɔ nếʔu ʔaj kắn ɲìn tʰì dượk sốŋ vậʔi môʔisɛ kɔn zắn bằŋ dồŋ zồʔi ceo kâʔi sàʔɔ nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dã zắn kắn ɲìn kɔn zắn bằŋ dồŋ tʰì dượk sốŋ kế dó zân ʔisơzaên di dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi Ðʔɔạn di dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ʔizêʔabazim tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ môáp hướŋ mặtcờʔi mọk họ di dó dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dèʔɔ sêzết zồʔi dó di dóŋ cạʔi fíʔa kiə ʔaï cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ vừʔa za bờkõʔi zân ʔamôzít ʔaï ɣiáp zɛɲ kủʔa zân môáp zân ʔamôzít bởʔi kớ dó cɔŋ sác ciếncận kủʔa Ðứkzê kó nóʔi zằŋ vahép tạʔi sufa cũŋ ʔaï kùŋ ɲữŋ ciền cũŋ cạʔi suốŋ fíʔa ʔazơ dụŋ zɛɲ môáp từ dó zân ʔisơzaên dến bêzɛ ấʔi dó káʔi ɣiếŋ Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɲóm zânsự cɔ cúŋnó nướk ʔisơzaên bàʔi nầʔi hỡʔi ɣiếŋ hãʔi hãʔi kahát cɔ ɣiếŋ kák vwɛcúʔa dã xaj kák tướkvị kủʔa zânsự dã dàʔɔ vớʔi fủ kùŋ kâʔi ɣậʔi mìɲ kế dó dồŋ vắŋ zân ʔisơzaên dến matʰana zồʔi matʰana dến nahaliên nahaliên dến bamốt bamốt dến cũŋ cɔŋ bờkõʔi môáp tạʔi cót núʔi fícɣa nơʔi ŋườʔita ɲìn tʰấʔi dồŋbằŋ kủʔa samạk vả ʔisơzaên saj sứɣiả dến sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít dặŋ nóʔi zằŋ sin cɔfép cúŋtôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sứ vwa cúŋtôʔi xôŋ sâʔi vàʔɔ dồŋzuộŋ hăjlà vàʔɔ ɲɔ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ xôŋ ʔuốŋ nướk kák ɣiếŋ kứ di dườŋkáʔi kủʔa vwa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kwa xỏʔi bờkõʔi vwa ɲưŋsi xôŋ cɔfép ʔisơzaên di ŋaŋ kwa bờkõʔi mìɲ zânsự mìɲ di za dón ʔisơzaên hướŋ dồŋ vắŋ ŋườʔi dến zahát ciếncận kùŋ ʔisơzaên sɔŋ ʔisơzaên zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm dáɲbạʔi ŋườʔi ciếm sứ ŋườʔi ʔaï dến zabốk dến zân ʔammôn bờkõʔi zân ʔammôn bềnvữŋ ʔisơzaên ciếm kák tʰàɲ nầʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ zân ʔamôzít tạʔi hếtbôn cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ dịʔa vìhết tʰàɲ kủʔa sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít vwa dã zawciến kùŋ vwa cướk kủʔa môáp ciếm lấʔi xắp sứ ŋườʔi dến ʔaï bởʔi kớ dó ɲữŋ ɲà nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến hếtbôn tʰàɲsi fảʔi sâʔicất vữŋ vì kó dám lửʔa bởʔi tʰàɲ hếtbôn một ŋọn lửʔa bởʔi tʰàɲ sihôn za nó tʰiêʔudốt ʔazơ kủʔa môáp kák cúʔa kủʔa nơʔi kaw ʔaï hỡʔimô xốn tʰăj cɔ ŋươʔi hỡʔi zân kêmók ŋươʔi dã ziệt ŋườʔi dã kɔncaj mìɲ cốncáɲ và kɔŋáʔi mìɲ fu cɔ sihôn vwa ʔamôzít cúŋta dã ɲằm cúŋnó hếtbôn dã hủʔiziệt cɔdến Ðʔi cúŋta dã tàɲạʔi dến nôfác lửʔa dã dến mêdêba vậʔi ʔisơzaên cɔŋ sứ zân ʔamôzít môʔisɛ saj di zɔtʰám zaêsɛ ciếm kák tʰàɲ duổʔi zân ʔamôzít tạʔi dó Ðʔɔạn zân ʔisơzaên cởlạʔi di hướŋ basan ʔɔùk vwa basan kả zânsự ŋườʔi di za dón dặŋ ciếncận tạʔi zê ʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ Ðừŋ ŋườʔi dã fó ŋườʔi zânsự sứ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xá cɔ ŋườʔi ɲư dã cɔ sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít tạʔi hếtbôn vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi ʔɔùk kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kả zânsự ŋườʔi cɔdến cừŋ xôŋ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ lạʔi zân ʔisơzaên ciếm lấʔi sứ ŋườʔi vậʔi Ðʔɔạn zân ʔisơzaên di dến dóŋ cạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ bắŋ môáp kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔiziện ɣiêzicô balák kɔncaj sếpbô tʰấʔi mọʔi diềʔu ʔisơzaên dã cɔ zân ʔamôzít môáp lấʔilàm kiɲxủŋ cướk zân ʔisơzaên zân dó zất dôŋ vậʔi môáp nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ madiən zằŋ bâʔizờ dɔàn zân dôŋ nầʔi hếttʰảʔi cuŋkwɛɲ xáknàʔɔ kɔn kỏ cɔŋ dồŋ vậʔi Ðươŋ lúk dó balák kɔncaj sếpbô vwa môáp ŋườʔi saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ balaam kɔncaj bê fêtʰôzơ tạʔi cên sôŋ cɔŋ sứ kủʔa kɔnkáʔi zânsự mìɲ dặŋ ɣọʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi zân dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô fủ xắp mặtdất dóŋ lạʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ vậʔi sin ŋươʔi hãʔi dến bâʔizờ zủʔasả zân nầʔi cɔ mạɲ kólẽ dáɲbạʔi zân nầʔi duổʔi xỏʔi sứ dượk zằŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi cúk fướk cɔ tʰì dượk fướk kòn nàʔɔ ŋươʔi zủʔasả tʰì zủʔasả vậʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ môáp di kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ madiən cɔŋ tăj kó cɔ tʰầʔibóʔi dếnkùŋ balaam tʰuật lạʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa balák ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi dâʔi dêm năj tʰì cảlờʔi tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ môáp lạʔi ɲà balaam vả Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dếnkùŋ balaam fán zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋươʔi kó cɔŋ ɲà ʔaj balaam tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ balák kɔncaj sếpbô vwa môáp dã saj dến tôʔi dặŋ nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi zân dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô fủ xắp mặtdất hãʔi dến bâʔizờ zủʔasả zân dó cɔ kólẽ dáɲbạʔi zân nầʔi duổʔi dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ balaam zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ di vớʔi cúŋnó cớ zủʔasả zân nầʔi zân nầʔi dượk fướk sớmmaj balaam zậʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák sứtʰần kủʔa balák zằŋ hãʔi cởvề sứ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê xôŋ cɔ di kùŋ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi kák sứtʰần môáp zậʔi cởvề balák tâʔu zằŋ balaam từcốʔi dếnkùŋ cúŋtôʔi balák lạʔi saj ɲiềʔu sứtʰần tôncọŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cướk dếnkùŋ balaam zằŋ balák kɔncaj sếpbô kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ta sin ŋươʔi cớ kó ci ŋănkản ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi zất viɲhiển tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi dến zủʔasả zân nầʔi balaam dáp kùŋ kák sứtʰần kủʔa balák zằŋ zầʔuba lák cɔ ɲà ŋườʔi dầʔi vàŋ bạk kũŋ cẳŋ dượk kwa mạŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa dặŋ việk hɔặk ɲỏ hăj sɔŋ sin kák ŋươʔi kũŋ lạʔi dêm năj dặŋ Ðứkzê fán diềʔu ci kùŋ nữʔa cɔŋ lúk bandêm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiáŋ dến balaam fán zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dến dặŋ ɣọʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di vớʔi cúŋnó ɲưŋ cỉ hãʔi tʰeo lờʔi fán vậʔi sớmmaj balaam zậʔi tʰắŋ lừʔa káʔi mìɲ di vớʔi kák sứtʰần môáp ɲưŋ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nổʔi fừŋ ŋườʔi zadi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dứŋ cên dườŋ dặŋ kản ŋườʔi vả ŋườʔi dã kỡʔi lừʔa káʔi mìɲ kó haj dứʔa dầʔitớ di tʰeo lừʔa káʔi tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dứŋ cên dườŋ kó kâʔi ɣươm cần nơʔi tăj dườŋ di vàʔɔ cɔŋ zuộŋ balaam dáɲ dặŋ zẫn vàʔɔ dườŋ lạʔi ɲưŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dứŋ cɔŋ dườŋ ɲỏ kủʔa ɲɔ kó vác nầʔi kiə lừʔa tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì vàʔɔ vác cân balaam ŋườʔi dáɲ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê di tớʔi sa dứŋ cɔŋ ŋả zất xôŋ cỗ nàʔɔ cở kwa hữʔu hăjlà lừʔa tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwị zướʔi balaam ɲưŋba laam nổʔizận dáɲlừʔa bằŋ kâʔi ɣậʔi bấʔizờ Ðứkzê mởmiệŋ lừʔa za nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ tôʔi kó làmci cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã dáɲ tôʔi balaam dáp kùŋ lừʔa káʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà tạʔi mầʔi xiɲ ɲạʔɔ cớci kó kâʔi ɣươm cɔŋ tăj dã ɣiết mầʔi zồʔi lừʔa nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ fảʔi lừʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã kỡʔi dến ŋàʔinăj saw tôʔi kó tʰóʔi ɲưvậʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi căŋ ŋườʔi dáp xôŋ Ðứkzê balaam za tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dứŋ cɔŋ dườŋ tăikầm kâʔi ɣươm ŋườʔi kúʔi dầʔu suốŋ dất tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi saw ŋươʔi dã dáɲlừʔa káʔi ŋươʔi nầʔi di za dặŋ kản ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ŋươʔi di tʰeo kɔn dườŋzẫn mìɲ dếnnơʔi vả kɔn lừʔa káʔi kó tʰấʔi di cướk nếʔu xôŋ di cướk cắk dã ɣiết ŋươʔi zồʔi dể sốŋ balaam tʰưʔa kùŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi kó fạmtộʔi cẳŋ ŋườʔi dã dứŋ cɔŋ dườŋ dặŋ kản tôʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ bằŋlòŋ tôʔi di tôʔi cởvề tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ hãʔi di kùŋ kák ŋườʔi dó ɲưŋ cỉ hãʔi nóʔi diềʔu ci fán zặn ŋươʔi balaam di kùŋ kák sứtʰần kủʔa balák xiba lák hăj zằŋ balaam dến di za tớʔi tʰàɲ môáp ɣần xɛ ʔaï tứklà bờkõʔi kủʔa sứ ŋiɲtiếp ŋườʔi balák nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ ta cẳŋ saj vờʔi ŋươʔi saw saw ŋươʔi xôŋ dến ta xôŋ viɲhiển cɔ ŋươʔi dượk saw balaam dáp kùŋ balák zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi dã dếnkùŋ vwa bâʔizờ tôʔi kótʰể nóʔi za lờʔi ɣì căŋ tôʔi nóʔi diềʔu ci Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt cɔŋ miệŋ tôʔi vậʔi balaam di kùŋ balák dến kiziátʰútsốt balák ɣiết ɲữŋ ciên saj zâŋ cɔ balaam kák sứtʰần dã di vớʔi ŋườʔi xi dến sáŋmaj balák dɛm balaam bamốtbaɛɲ nơʔi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi dầʔu kùŋ cạʔi kwân ʔisơzaên balaam nóʔi kùŋ balák zằŋ hãʔi kất tạʔi dâʔi cɔ tôʔi bảʔi káʔi bàntʰờ kùŋ cɔ tôʔi bảʔi kɔn dựk bảʔi kɔnciên dựk balák ɲư balaam dã nóʔi haj ŋườʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk cên mỗʔi bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn balaam nóʔi kùŋ balák zằŋ vwa hãʔi dứŋ ɣần kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa vwa tôʔi di kólẽ Ðứkzê za kùŋ tôʔi căŋ tôʔi tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ vwa diềʔu ci ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi di nơʔi kaw cốŋcảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi za kùŋ balaam balaam tʰưʔa kùŋ ŋàʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó bảʔi káʔi bàntʰờ cên mỗʔi bàntʰờ tôʔi kó zâŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk Ðứkzê dể lờʔi cɔŋ miệŋ balaam fán zằŋ hãʔi cởvề kùŋ balák nóʔi ɲưvậʔi balaam cởvề kùŋ balák nầʔi ŋườʔi kák sứtʰần môáp dứŋ ɣần kủʔa tʰiêʔu vwa balaam nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ balák vwa môáp saj vờʔi tôʔi ʔazam từ ɲữŋ núʔi Ðôŋ fươŋ nóʔi hãʔi dến zủʔasả zakốp cɔ hãʔi dến ɣiận mắŋ ʔisơzaên kẻ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ zủʔasả tôʔi zủʔasả làmsaw kẻ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ ɣiận mắŋ tôʔi ɣiận mắŋ làmsaw vì dỉɲ kák núʔi tôʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi từ dầʔu kaw ɣòdốŋ tôʔi ɲìn ŋườʔi kìʔa zân ởziêŋ za sẽ xôŋ ɲập kák nướk ʔaj dếm dượk bụʔi kát kủʔa zakốp ʔaj dượk fần kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi kôŋcáɲ tʰák tʰểnàʔɔ tôʔi ŋwiện tʰák tʰể ấʔi kuốʔicùŋ ŋườʔi ŋĩʔa làmsaw tôʔi ŋwiện kuốʔicùŋ tôʔi làmvậʔi bấʔizờ balák nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ ŋươʔi dã làmci vớʔi ta tʰỉɲ ŋươʔi dể zủʔasả ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc kìʔa ŋươʔi lạʔi cúk fướk cɔ ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ kẩntʰận nóʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva dặt vàʔɔ miệŋ tôʔi saw balák nóʔi vậʔi hãʔi dếnkùŋ cɔŋ cỗ xák nơʔi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi zân nầʔi ŋươʔi cỉ dã tʰấʔi dầʔu kùŋ cớ xôŋ tʰấʔi dó hãʔi zủʔasả cɔ vậʔi ŋườʔi zẫn balaam dến dồŋ sôfim cên cót núʔi fícɣa bảʔi káʔi bàntʰờ cên mỗʔi káʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk balaam nóʔi kùŋ balák zằŋ hãʔi dứŋ dâʔi ɣần kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa vwa kòn tôʔi dilạʔi dó dón Ðứkzê Ðứkzê za kùŋ balaam zằŋ hãʔi cởvề kùŋ balák nóʔi ɲưvậʔi balaam cởvề kùŋ balák ŋườʔi kák sứtʰần môáp dứŋ ɣần kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa vwa balák hỏʔi Ðứkzê kó fán ci balaam nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ hỡʔiba lák hãʔi dứŋzậʔi ŋɛ hỡʔi kɔncaj sếpbô hãʔi lắŋtaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi dể nóʔizốʔi kũŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi dặŋ hốʔicảʔi Ðʔiềʔuŋàʔi dã nóʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ Ðʔiềʔuŋàʔi dã fán ŋàʔi cẳŋ ứŋŋiệm saw nầʔi tôʔi dã lãɲ mạŋ cúk fướk ŋàʔi dã fướk tôʔi cẳŋ kảʔi dâʔu ŋàʔi cẳŋ sɛm tộʔiák nơʔi zakốp và xôŋ tʰấʔi vạʔi cɔŋ ʔisơza ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kótiếŋ zeo mừŋ kủʔa vwa Ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã zút zân dó za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cúŋ kó sứkmạɲ ɲư zừŋ vậʔi xôŋ kó fùcú nơʔi zakốp kũŋ cẳŋ kó bóʔi xwa cɔŋ ʔisơzaên vì dến dịɲ nóʔi zakốp ʔisơzaên zằŋ việkÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi zườŋ nàʔɔ kìʔa tʰứzân hưŋ ɲư káʔi và zượk xáknàʔɔ dựk cỉ xi nàʔɔ dã sé dượk mồʔi mớʔi nằmsuốŋ và ʔuốŋ hwiết ɲữŋ bịtʰươŋ bấʔizờ balák nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ cớ zủʔasả ɲưŋ kũŋ dừŋ cúk fướk cɔ nữʔa balaam dáp kùŋ balák zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi tôʔi fảʔi mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê fán zặn saw balák lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ vậʔi hãʔi lạʔi zẫn ŋươʔi dến cỗ xák kólẽ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ưŋ cɔ ŋươʔi zủʔasả zân nầʔi tạʔi dó căŋ balák zẫn balaam dến cót núʔi fê dốʔi ŋaŋ dồŋ vắŋ balaam nóʔi kùŋ balák zằŋ tạʔi dâʔi hãʔi cɔ tôʔi bảʔi káʔi bàntʰờ bảʔi kɔn dựk bảʔi kɔnciên dựk vậʔi balák tʰeo ɲư balaam dã nóʔi cên mỗʔi bàntʰờ ŋườʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk balaam tʰấʔi zõ Ðứkzê ưŋ fướk cɔ ʔisơzaên tʰì xôŋ kậʔi dến fùcú ɲư ɲữŋ xák ɲưŋ ŋườʔi sâʔi hướŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɲướŋ tʰấʔi ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi từŋ cifáʔi tʰầnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ lờʔi ka kủʔa balaam kɔncaj bê lờʔi ka kủʔa ŋườʔi kó za lờʔi ka kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋɛ lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sɛm tʰấʔi kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ sấp mìɲ suốŋ za hỡʔiza kốp cạʔi ŋươʔi zườŋ baw hỡʔi ʔisơzaên ɲà ŋươʔi dẹp biếtmấʔi nó cươŋ za ɲư cũŋ núʔi xáknàʔɔ kảɲ nơʔi sôŋ tợ kâʔi cầmhươŋ Ðứkzê dã cồŋ tỉɲư kâʔi hươŋ nơʔi nướk nướk cảʔi càn ŋɔàʔi tʰùŋ cứʔa hột ɣiốŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɲuần tướʔi zưzật vwa ŋườʔi cổʔi kaw ʔaɣát nướk ŋườʔi dượk kaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã zẫn ŋườʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ŋườʔi kó sứkmạɲ ɲư zừŋ sẽ kák nướk tứk tʰùŋịc mìɲ bẻ ɣãʔi sươŋ cúŋnó dáɲ cúŋnó bằŋ mũʔitên mìɲ ŋườʔi suốŋ ɲư dựk xáknàʔɔ káʔi ʔaj zễ xiến ŋồʔi fướk cɔ nàʔɔ cúk fướk ŋươʔi zủʔasả nàʔɔ zủʔasả ŋươʔi bấʔizờ balák nổʔizận kùŋ balaam vỗtăj nóʔi kùŋ balaam zằŋ ta dã tʰỉɲ ŋươʔi dặŋ zủʔasả tʰùŋịc nầʔi ŋươʔi lạʔi cúk fướk cɔ cúŋnó dã zồʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ xá cạʔi cởvề sứ ŋươʔi ta dã nóʔi ŋươʔi viɲhiển ɲưŋ nầʔi Ðứkzê dã kản ŋươʔi ɲận lãɲ balaam dáp kùŋ balák zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi kùŋ kák sứɣiả vwa dã saj dến tôʔi zằŋ zầʔuba lák cɔ tôʔi ɲà ŋườʔi dầʔi bạk vàŋ tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ dượk kwa mạŋ Ðứkzê dể diềʔu fảʔi hăjlà diềʔu kwấʔi tôʔi fảʔi nóʔi diềʔu ci Ðứkzê fán nầʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi cở kùŋzân tôʔi hãʔi lạʔi tôʔi káʔɔ cɔ vwa biếtdiềʔu zân nầʔi ŋàʔi săwkùŋ cɔ zânsự vwa ŋườʔi nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ lờʔi ka kủʔa balaam kɔncaj bê lờʔi ka kủʔa ŋườʔi kó za lờʔi ka kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋɛ lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi biết citʰứk kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw sɛm tʰấʔi kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ sấp mìɲ suốŋ za tôʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ fảʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi sɛm ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ fảʔi ɣần một ŋôʔisaw za zakốp một kâʔi fủ cồʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi dâm lủŋ môáp dầʔu nầʔi tớʔi dầʔu kiə hủʔiziệt zân hăj zấʔi ɣiặk nầʔi ŋườʔi dượk dôm kơŋiệp sẽ dượk sê ʔizơ tʰùŋịc mìɲ sảnŋiệp ʔisơzaên za kườŋ tʰạɲ mìɲ Ðấŋ za zakốp kầmkwiền ŋườʔi ziệt ɲữŋ zân kủʔa tʰàɲ balaam kũŋ tʰấʔi ʔamalék nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ ʔamalék dứŋ dầʔu kák nướk ɲưŋ săwkùŋ ŋườʔi ziệtvɔŋ kế dó balaam tʰấʔi ŋườʔi kênít nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ cỗ ŋươʔi bềnvữŋ ŋươʔi dóŋ cɔŋ dá ɲưŋka ʔin cɔdến xi ʔasuzơ zẫn ŋươʔi ŋườʔi kòn nóʔi lờʔi ka mìɲ zằŋ Ôʔi xi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kák diềʔu nầʔi ʔaj kòn sốŋ ɲưŋ kó ɲữŋ tàʔu ɣàɲ kíttim dến hàxắk ʔasu hàxắk hêbɛ zồʔi cíɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ twiệtziệt Ðʔɔạn balaam dứŋzậʔi divề sứ balák kũŋ lêndườŋ zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi sitim xởʔi tʰôŋzâm kùŋ ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi môáp kɔŋáʔi mờʔi zânsự siɲ kúŋ kák tʰần mìɲ zânsự kwì lạʔi cướk kák tʰần cúŋnó ʔisơzaên kũŋ tʰờ tʰần baɛɲfê kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋ ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi kák dầʔu cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự ceo cướk Ðứkzê dốʔi kùŋ mặtcờʔi dể kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê sâʔi xỏʔi ʔisơzaên vậʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ kák kwan ʔisơzaên zằŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiết ɲữŋ nàʔɔ tʰuộk kúŋ tʰờ baɛɲfê nầʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên zẫn ŋườʔi madiən dến ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cướkmắt môʔisɛ kả hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên dươŋ xi hộʔi cúŋ xók tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk finê ʔa kɔncaj lêʔasa cáʔu ʔazôn tʰầʔi tʰấʔi nầʔi dứŋzậʔi ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ kầm kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ di tʰeo ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên vàʔɔ cɔŋ cạʔi dâm ŋaŋzạ zướʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi tajvạ ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên ŋừŋ lạʔi vả kó haimươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi cết tajvạ nầʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ finê ʔa kɔncaj lêʔasa cáʔu ʔazôn tʰầʔi dã sâʔi zân ʔisơzaên xỏʔi kơn ɣiận lòŋ tʰúkzụk lòŋ ŋườʔi vậʔi xôŋ kó ziệt zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ kơn kủʔa bởʔi kớ dó hãʔi káʔɔ kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ta ưŋ cɔ ŋườʔi zawướk bìɲiên ấʔi fần ŋườʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi zawướk cứk dờʔidờʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó lòŋ sốtsắŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ kó cuộk tộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên vả ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ɣiết cuŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi madiən simzi kɔncaj salu kwan cưởŋ kủʔa tôŋtộk ŋườʔi simêôn tên ŋườʔi madiən ɣiết kốtbi kɔŋáʔi suzơ dầʔu cưởŋ kủʔa tôŋtộk madiən Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi xuấʔizốʔi ŋườʔi madiən dáɲ cúŋnó cúŋnó dã lấʔi mưʔucướk mìɲ xuấʔizốʔi kák ŋươʔi zỗzàɲ kák ŋươʔi việk kúŋ tʰờ fê cɔŋ việk kủʔa kốtbi kɔŋáʔi kwan cưởŋ madiən cị cúŋnó dã ɣiết cɔŋ ŋàʔi tajvạ kớ việk kúŋ tʰờ fê sảʔi săw tajvạ nầʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ lêʔasa kɔncaj ʔazôn tʰầʔi zằŋ hãʔi zựŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên haimươʔi tuổʔi tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk kủʔa tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên di za cận dượk vậʔi môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ dồŋ môáp ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô zằŋ hãʔi zânsự haimươʔi tuổʔi ɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô zubên kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ʔisơzaên kɔncaj zubên hênók zɔ nơʔi ŋườʔi sɛɲ za hênók zɔ nơʔi falu sɛɲ falu zɔ nơʔi hếcôn sɛɲ hếcôn zɔ nơʔi kạtmi sɛɲ za kạtmi kák kủʔa zubên ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔita kộŋ dượk mươʔi ŋàn bảʔicăm bamươʔi kɔncaj falu kák kɔncaj kủʔa nêmuên Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam Ấʔilà Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam nầʔi cưởŋ kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ zấʔi lɔạn kùŋ môʔisɛ ʔazôn tạʔi fɛdảŋ kôzê xi zấʔi lɔạn kùŋ Ðứkzê Ấʔi xi dất miệŋ za haj ŋườʔi kôzê kùŋ ɲữŋ dã dảŋ cết lúk lửʔa tʰiêʔu haj căm zưởʔi ŋườʔi làmɣươŋ ɲưvậʔi ɲưŋ kák kɔncaj kôzê xôŋ cết kák kɔncaj simêôn tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi nêmuên sɛɲ za nêmuên zɔ nơʔi zamin sɛɲ za zamin zɔ nơʔi zakin sɛɲ za zakin zɔ nơʔi sêzác sɛɲ za sêzác zɔ nơʔi săwlơ sɛɲ za săwlơ kák kủʔa simêôn haimươʔihaj ŋàn haj căm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɣát tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi sêfôn sɛɲ za sêfôn zɔ nơʔi haɣi sɛɲ za haɣi zɔ nơʔi suni sɛɲ za suni zɔ nơʔi ʔɔùkni sɛɲ za ʔɔùkni zɔ nơʔi zi sɛɲ za zi zɔ nơʔi ʔazốt sɛɲ za ʔazốt zɔ nơʔi ʔazêli sɛɲ za ʔazêli kák kủʔa ɲữŋ kɔncaj ɣát tùʔi tʰeo mươʔi ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj zuda zơ ɲưŋ zơ dã kwadờʔi tạʔi sứ kanaan kák kɔncaj zuda tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi sêla sɛɲ za sêla zɔ nơʔi fêzết sɛɲ za fêzết zɔ nơʔi sêzác sɛɲ za sêzác kák kɔncaj kủʔa fazết zɔ nơʔi hếcôn sɛɲ za hếcôn zɔ nơʔi hamun sɛɲ za hamun kák kủʔa zuda tùʔi tʰeo bảʔi mươʔi sáʔu ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj ʔisaka tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi tʰôla sɛɲ za tʰôla zɔ nơʔi fuva sɛɲ za fuva zɔ nơʔi zasúp sɛɲ za zasúp zɔ nơʔi simzôn sɛɲ za simzôn kák ʔisaka tùʔi tʰeo sáʔu mươʔi ŋàn bɛcăm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj sabulôn tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi sêzết sɛɲ za sêzết zɔ nơʔi sɛɲ za zɔ nơʔi zalêên sɛɲ za zalêên kák kủʔa sabulôn tùʔi tʰeo sáʔu mươʔi ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj ɣiôsép tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ manasɛ zaim kák kɔncaj manasɛ zɔ nơʔi maki sɛɲ za maki maki sɛɲ ɣalaát zɔ nơʔi ɣalaát sɛɲ za ɣalaát nầʔi kák kɔncaj ɣalaát zɔ nơʔi ɣiêsɛ sɛɲ za ɣiêsɛ zɔ nơʔi hêlék sɛɲ za hêlék zɔ nơʔi Ác ziên sɛɲ za Ác ziên zɔ nơʔi sicɛm sɛɲ za sicɛm zɔ nơʔi sêmida sɛɲ za sêmida zɔ nơʔi hêfɛ sɛɲ za hêfɛ vả sêlôfát kɔncaj hêfɛ xôŋ kó kɔncaj ɲưŋ kó kɔŋáʔi tên kák kɔŋáʔi sêlôfát mácla nô ʔa hốtla miɲka tʰiệtsa kák manasɛ tùʔi tʰeo nămmươʔi haj ŋàn bảʔicăm ŋườʔi nầʔi kák kɔncaj zaim tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi sutʰêlác sɛɲ za sutʰêzác zɔ nơʔi bêkɛ sɛɲ za bêkɛ zɔ nơʔi tʰɛcan sɛɲ za tʰɛcan nầʔi kɔncaj kủʔa sutʰêlác zɔ nơʔi zan sɛɲ za zan kủʔa kák kɔncaj zaim tùʔi tʰeo bamươʔi haj ŋàn nămcăm ŋườʔi Ấʔilà kák kɔncaj ɣiôsép tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ vậʔi kák kɔncaj bên za tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi bêla sɛɲ za bêla zɔ nơʔi Ác sɛɲ za Ác zɔ nơʔi ʔɛcizam sɛɲ za ʔɛcizam zɔ nơʔi sêfufam sɛɲ za sêfufam zɔ nơʔi hufam sɛɲ za hufam kák kɔncaj bêla ʔazết naaman zɔ nơʔi ʔazết sɛɲ za ʔazết zɔ nơʔi naaman sɛɲ za naaman kák kɔncaj bêŋiəmin tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ tùʔi tʰeo mươʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi nầʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔan tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi sucam sɛɲ za sucam kủʔa Ðʔan sucam tùʔi tʰeo sáʔu mươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj ʔasɛ tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi zima sɛɲ za zima zɔ nơʔi zícvi sɛɲ za zícvi zɔ nơʔi bêzi ʔa sɛɲ za bêzi ʔa kák kɔncaj bêzi ʔa zɔ nơʔi hêbɛ sɛɲ za hêbɛ zɔ nơʔi mɛɲkiên sɛɲ za mɛɲkiên tên kủʔa kɔŋáʔi ʔasɛ sêzác ɲữŋ kủʔa kák kɔncaj ʔasɛ tùʔi tʰeo nămmươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj néptali tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi ɣiátsêên sɛɲ za ɣiátsêên zɔ nơʔi ɣuni sɛɲ za ɣuni zɔ nơʔi zítsɛ sɛɲ za zítsɛ zɔ nơʔi silɛm sɛɲ za silɛm kák kủʔa néptali tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ mươʔi ŋàn bốncăm ŋườʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita lạʔi sáʔu căm mộtŋàn bảʔicăm bamươʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ fảʔi tùʔi tʰeo kák zɛɲ ciə sứ za cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi sảnŋiệp cifáʔi nàʔɔ zân dôŋ tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ sảnŋiệp cifáʔi nàʔɔ zân tʰìfảʔi cɔ sảnŋiệp ɲỏ tứklà fảʔi cɔ mỗʔi cifáʔi sảnŋiệp mìɲ kân fân kùŋ ɲưŋ fảʔi bắttʰăm ciə sứ za zân ʔisơzaên lãɲ fần sảnŋiệp mìɲ tʰeo kủʔa kák cifáʔi tổtôŋ fảʔi tùʔi bắttʰăm ciə sảnŋiệp za cɔ mỗʔi cifáʔi hɔặk zân dôŋ hăj nầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔita lạʔi tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ mìɲ zɔ nơʔi ɣẹtsôn sɛɲ za ɣẹtsôn zɔ nơʔi kêhát sɛɲ za kêhát zɔ nơʔi mêzazi sɛɲ za mêzazi nầʔi kák lêvi lípni hếpzôn mácli musi kôzê vả kêhát sɛɲ ʔamzam tên ʔamzam ɣiôkêbết kɔŋáʔi kủʔa lêvi sɛɲ cɔŋ sứ zíptô nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ ʔamzam ʔazôn môʔisɛ cị kủʔa haj ŋườʔi miziəm kòn ʔazôn sɛɲ nadáp ʔabihu lêʔasa ʔitʰama ɲưŋna dáp ʔabihu cết cɔŋ xi zâŋ tʰứ lửʔa cướk Ðứkzê ɲữŋ diɲ ŋườʔita tʰáŋ kộŋ dượk haimươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi lêvi xôŋ dượk vàʔɔ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên bởʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xôŋ dượk fần sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ môáp ɣần ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi nầʔi xôŋ kó ʔaj tʰuộk môʔisɛ ʔazôn tʰầʔi dã kiểmsɔát xi haj ŋườʔi zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi vìÐứkzê kó fán dó zằŋ cúŋnó cết cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ vậʔi cẳŋ kòn lạʔi cừ za kalép kɔncaj ɣiêfunê ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sêlôfát kɔncaj hêfɛ cáʔu kủʔa ɣalaát cắt kủʔa maki cít kủʔa manasɛ tʰuộk họhàŋ manasɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsép dến ɣần dâʔi kủʔa kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi mácla nô ʔa hốtla miɲka tʰiệtsa kák kɔŋáʔi dó dến zamắt môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk nóʔi zằŋ ca cúŋtôʔi dã cết cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ fảʔi fɛdảŋ kủʔa lạʔi ŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê tứklà fɛdảŋ kôzê ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cết tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ xôŋ kó kɔncaj kớsaw zɛɲ ca cúŋtôʔi cừ za xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ŋườʔi bởʔi xôŋ kó kɔncaj hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi fần sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ca cúŋtôʔi môʔisɛ dɛm kớ kủʔa kák kɔŋáʔi ấʔi dến cướk Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kák kɔŋáʔi sêlôfát nóʔi kólý ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ cúŋnó fần sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ca cúŋnó tứklà fảʔi zaw cɔ cúŋnó sảnŋiệp kủʔa ca cúŋnó ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cết xôŋ kó kɔncaj tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zaw sảnŋiệp kủʔa ŋườʔi lạʔi cɔ kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi ɲượkbằŋ xôŋ kó kɔŋáʔi tʰìfảʔi zaw sảnŋiệp cɔ ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi víbằŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ kó ʔɛɲɛm tʰìfảʔi zaw sảnŋiệp cɔ cú bák ŋườʔi nếʔuxôŋ kó cú bák tʰìfảʔi zaw sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi cɔ ŋườʔi bàkɔn ɣần ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk lấʔilàm kủʔa Ấʔi dể dịɲ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cên núʔi ʔabazim nầʔi ɲìn sɛm sứ dã cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi ɲìn sɛm sứ dó zồʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ dượk kùŋ tổfụ ɲư ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi dã dượk vậʔi bởʔivì tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin kák ŋươʔi kó bộʔiŋịc mạŋ lịɲ cɔŋ lúk hộʔi cúŋ kãʔicọ cướk cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰáɲ việk nướk Ấʔilà nướk kãʔicọ tạʔi kadɛ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sin môʔisɛ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tʰầnliɲ mọʔi sáktʰịt sin ŋàʔi cên hộʔi cúŋ ŋườʔi dể vàʔɔ za cướk cúŋnó xiến cúŋnó zavàʔɔ hầʔu cɔ hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê cớ ɲư kɔnciên xôŋ ŋườʔi căn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cọn lấʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun ŋườʔi kó tʰần kảmdộŋ fảʔi dặt tăicên mìɲ ŋườʔi zồʔi dɛm ŋườʔi zamắt lêʔasa tʰầʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ cwiền lịɲ cɔ ŋườʔi cướk caw fần viɲhiển ŋươʔi lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi hầʔu cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ŋɛ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi zamắt lêʔasa tʰầʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi ɣiôsuê kầʔu hỏʔi sétdɔán kủʔa ʔu zim cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo lịɲ lêʔasa ŋườʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên di za di vàʔɔ vậʔi môʔisɛ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ cọn lấʔi ɣiôsuê dể cướk lêʔasa tʰầʔi cướk kả hộʔi cúŋ dặt tăicên mìɲ ŋườʔi cwiền lịɲ cɔ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ fán zặn vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lɔ zâŋ cɔ cɔŋ dịɲ tʰựkvật kủʔa kùŋ kák kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ vậʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ nầʔi kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa dốt kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê mỗʔi ŋàʔi haj kɔnciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn nầʔi vàʔɔ buổʔi sớmmaj kɔn kiə vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi kòn kủʔa căj tʰìfảʔi zâŋ fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi vớʔi mộtfầntư zầʔu livɛ Ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ dã tạʔi núʔi sina ʔi kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê lễ kwán bằŋ mộtfầntư zượʔu cɔ mỗʔimột ciên kɔn ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kwán bằŋ zượʔu cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ ciên kɔn kiə vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi kủʔa căj kwán ɲư buổʔi sớmmaj ấʔilà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ haj ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ haj fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu kủʔa căj vớʔi kwán kặp tʰeo Ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu mỗʔi ŋàʔi ŋɔạʔicừ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kwán kặp tʰeo mỗʔi dầʔu tʰáŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk bảʔi ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj mỗʔi kɔn dựk haj fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj kɔnciên dựk fần mườʔi fa lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu zùŋ kủʔa căj mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn Ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm tứk kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê lễ kwán bằŋ fânnửʔa zượʔuɲɔ mỗʔi kɔn dựk mộtfầnba kɔnciên dựk mộtfầntư mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn Ấʔilà kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák dầʔu tʰáŋ cɔŋ ŋɔạʔicừ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kwán kặp tʰeo kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋzêŋ fảʔi ɣiữ vượtkwa cɔ Ðứkzê kwaŋàʔi mườʔilăm ŋàʔi fảʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲứt kák ŋươʔi kó hộʔi tʰáɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê haj kɔn dựk bảʔi ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp dềʔu xôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj bằŋ lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ fần mườʔi fa kɔn dựk haj fần mườʔi fa kɔnciên dựk fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi ciên kɔn kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kák nầʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu buổʔi sớmmaj kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ mỗʔi bữʔa cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ ɲữŋ ŋần ấʔi ɲư tʰựkvật kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê ŋườʔita fảʔi zâŋ dó ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kák ŋươʔi kó hộʔi tʰáɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ cɔŋ kủʔa kák ɲằm ŋàʔi hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa xi kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa căj mớʔi tʰìfảʔi kó hộʔi tʰáɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi zùŋ haj kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk bảʔi ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa căj bằŋ lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔn dựk haj fần mườʔi fa kɔnciên dựk fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk dể cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kủʔa căj kặp tʰeo kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ mấʔi dó xôŋ tʰêm ɲữŋ kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ bảʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ fần kák ŋươʔi ấʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔita tʰổʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zùŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk bảʔi ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê vớʔi kủʔa căj bằŋ lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu fần mườʔi fa kɔn dựk haj fần mườʔi fa kɔnciên dựk fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi dể cuộk tộʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ ɲữŋ nầʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu dầʔu tʰáŋ kủʔa căj kặp tʰeo kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kủʔa căj vớʔi kwán kặp tʰeo tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ dã dịɲ mấʔi kủʔa dó kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi mồŋ mườʔi tʰáŋ bảʔi nầʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ fảʔi liɲhồn mìɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk bảʔi ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa căj bằŋ lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu fần mườʔi fa kɔn dựk haj fần mườʔi fa kɔnciên dựk fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋườʔita zâŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kủʔa căj vớʔi kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi zằm tʰáŋ bảʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɲóm tʰáɲ cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zùŋ mườʔiba kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tứklà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa căj kặp tʰeo bằŋ lọk ɲồʔi zầʔu fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔn dựk haj fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔnciên dựk fần mườʔi fa mỗʔi kɔnciên kɔn kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kủʔa căj vớʔi kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứhaj kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ mườʔihaj kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứba kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ mườʔimột kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứtư kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ mườʔi kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứnăm kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ cín kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứsáʔu kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ bảʔi kɔn dựk haj kɔnciên dựk mườʔibốn ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo ŋàʔi tʰứ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kó ɲóm cọŋtʰể cớ kôŋviệk sáktʰịt nàʔɔ fảʔi zùŋ kɔn dựk kɔnciên dựk bảʔi ciên kɔn dựk ɣiáp xôŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tứklà kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê vớʔi kủʔa căj kák kwán ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kứ tʰeo ɲư dã dịɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ kɔn zê dựk kủʔa kủʔa cuộk tộʔi ŋɔàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kùŋ kủʔa căj kwán kặp tʰeo ɲữŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi cọŋtʰể mìɲ dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kwán kủʔa tʰù ŋɔàʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa hứʔa ŋwiện ɲữŋ kủʔa lạk kủʔa kák ŋươʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi môʔisɛ kũŋ nóʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ nàʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó hứʔa ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê hɔặk fát tʰề buộk lấʔilòŋ mìɲ fảʔi ɣiữ ɣì tʰìcớ tʰấttín mọʔi lờʔi za xỏʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi tʰeo xi ŋườʔi cɔŋ buổʔi kòn tʰơấʔu ɲà ca mìɲ kó hứʔa ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê buộk lấʔilòŋ mìɲ fảʔi ɣiữ diềʔu ci nếʔu ŋườʔi ca dã lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện nàŋ buộklòŋ nàŋ cịʔu lấʔi dốʔivớʔi nàŋ làmtʰiɲ tʰì nàŋ fảʔi ʔi lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện ɣiữ mọʔi buộklòŋ mìɲ nàŋ cịʔu lấʔi kòn ɲượkbằŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ca màŋ kấm di tʰì nàŋ xôŋ mắk lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện mìɲ hăjlà kák buộklòŋ ɣiữ nàŋ dã cịʔu lấʔi Ðứkzê tʰa tộʔi cɔ nàŋ ca nàŋ kấm nàŋ vậʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi ấʔi dã hɔặk hứʔa ŋwiện hɔặk lờʔi ci lỡza xỏʔi môʔi nàŋ dã cịʔu lấʔi buộk mìɲ ɲượkbằŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ cồŋ nàŋ hăj dốʔi kùŋ nàŋ làmtʰiɲ tʰì nàŋ fảʔi ʔi lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện ɣiữ ɲữŋ buộklòŋ mìɲ nàŋ cịʔu lấʔi kòn nếʔu ŋàʔi nàʔɔ cồŋ dã kấm nàŋ di hủʔi lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện nàŋ mắk dó lờʔi ɣì lỡza xỏʔi môʔi kớ dó nàŋ dã buộk lấʔi mìɲ tʰì Ðứkzê tʰa tộʔi cɔ nàŋ lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện kủʔa ŋườʔi dànbà ɣóʔa hɔặk ŋườʔi dànbà dể mọʔi diềʔu ci ŋườʔi dã buộk mìɲ tʰìfảʔi ɣiữ lấʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi dànbà dã hứʔa ŋwiện cɔŋ ɲà cồŋ mìɲ hɔặk fát tʰề buộk lấʔilòŋ mìɲ fảʔi ɣiữ ɣì nếʔu cồŋ dã hăj làmtʰiɲ kùŋ nàŋ xôŋ kấm tʰì nàŋ fảʔi ʔi lờʔi hứʔa ŋwiện ɣiữ mọʔi buộklòŋ nàŋ dã cịʔu lấʔi ɲưŋ ɲượkbằŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ cồŋ nàŋ hăjbiết hủʔi di tʰì mọʔi lờʔi dã za xỏʔi môʔi ɲữŋ hứʔa ŋwiện buộklòŋ mìɲ hủʔi di cồŋ nàŋ dã hủʔi kák lờʔi dó tʰì Ðứkzê tʰa tộʔi cɔ nàŋ cồŋ nàŋ kótʰể ưŋ hăj hủʔi mọʔi hứʔa ŋwiện mọʔi lờʔi tʰề nàŋ buộk mìɲ dặŋ liɲhồn mìɲ ɲượkbằŋ cồŋ làmtʰiɲ kùŋ nàŋ ŋàʔinăj kwa ŋàʔimaj ɲưvậʔi cồŋ ưŋ kák hứʔa ŋwiện kủʔa nàŋ cồŋ ưŋ xôŋ nóʔi ci ŋàʔi ŋườʔi dã hăjbiết kòn nếʔu cồŋ hủʔi kák hứʔa ŋwiện ítlâʔu săw xi dã hăjbiết tʰì cồŋ maŋ hìɲfạt tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa mìɲ kák dịɲ Ðứkzê cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ ŋườʔi cồŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi ca kɔŋáʔi mìɲ buổʔi tʰơấʔu xi kòn ɲà ca Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi báʔɔtʰù zân madiən cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zồʔi ŋươʔi dượk kùŋ tổfụ vậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ zânsự zằŋ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi sắmsửʔa biɲxí za cận dáɲ zân madiən dặŋ báʔɔtʰù zân dó cɔ Ðứkzê về mỗʔi cifáʔi ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi fảʔi saj mộtŋàn líɲ za cận vậʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita kứ mỗʔi cifáʔi cọn mộtŋàn líɲ mườʔihaj ŋàn ŋườʔi sắmsửʔa biɲxí dặŋ za cận môʔisɛ saj mườʔihaj ŋàn ŋườʔi dó za cận tứklà saj mộtŋàn ŋườʔi mỗʔi cifáʔi vớʔi finê ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa lêʔasa tʰầʔi dɛm di tʰeo mìɲ ɲữŋ xíɣiớʔi tʰáɲ kùŋ kó tiếŋvaŋ vậʔi cúŋ zawciến kùŋzân madiən ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ɣiết hếttʰảʔi diɲ cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi ɣiết cúŋ kũŋ ɣiết vwa madiən zêkɛm suzơ huzơ zêba kũŋ lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết balaam kɔncaj kủʔa bê zân ʔisơzaên dànbà kɔnnít madiən zẫn tʰeo kướp hếttʰảʔi súkvật bầʔi ciên kủʔakảʔi dốt ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ɲàở hươŋtʰôn cúŋnó kũŋ lấʔi dɛm tʰeo hếttʰảʔi kủʔa dɔạt dượk ŋườʔi hăj cúŋ zẫn ɲữŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa dɔạt dượk dến cɔ môʔisɛ cɔ lêʔasa tʰầʔi cɔ hộʔi zân ʔisơzaên dươŋ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dồŋbằŋ môáp ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô bấʔizờ môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi hếttʰảʔi hộʔicưởŋ di za dónzướk cúŋ biɲ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân môʔisɛ nổʔizận kùŋ kák kwân cưởŋ tứklà kwan tướŋ mộtŋàn kwân kwan tướŋ mộtcăm kwân di dáɲ ɣiặk nầʔi cởvề môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dể hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ saw kìʔa ấʔilà cúŋnó tʰeo mưʔukế kủʔa balaam zụzỗ zân ʔisơzaên kùŋ tʰờ fê fạm tộʔi cọŋ kùŋ Ðứkzê tộʔi dó suj cɔ hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê tajvạ vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ɣiết hếttʰảʔi diɲ cɔŋ kɔncẻ ɣiết ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dã kùŋ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ hãʔi dể sốŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi kɔŋáʔi cưʔa kùŋ ŋườʔi kòn fần kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dóŋ cạʔi ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ʔaj kó ɣiết ŋườʔi kó dụŋ dến sákcết tʰì ʔaj dó kùŋ fảʔi zọn cɔ mìɲ dượk sạc ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kũŋ fảʔi cɔ sạc hếttʰảʔi áʔɔsốŋ mọʔi bằŋ za mọʔi bằŋ lôŋ zê mọʔi dồdạk bằŋ kâʔi lêʔasa tʰầʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ líɲ cận divề zằŋ nầʔi diềʔu luậtfáp zạʔi Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ vàŋ bạk dồŋ tʰiếk cì tứklà mọʔi dưʔa vàʔɔ lửʔa dượk tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi dưʔa ŋaŋ kwa lửʔa dặŋ lwiện ɲưŋ ŋườʔita kũŋ fảʔi zùŋ nướk tẩʔiuế cɔ dượk sạc nữʔa kòn mọʔi ci xôŋ dưʔa kwa lửʔa dượk tʰìfảʔi ŋâm cɔŋ nướk ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiặt áʔɔsốŋ mìɲ tʰì dượk sạc dɔạn mớʔi dượk vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi lêʔasa tʰầʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tôŋtộk hãʔi zựŋ kủʔa ɣiặk ŋườʔita dã dɔạt dượk nàʔɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zồʔi ciə kủʔa dó cɔ kák ŋườʔi dã za cận cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ cɔŋ fần tʰuộk kwânbiɲ dã za cận hɔặk ŋườʔi hɔặk hɔặk lừʔa hăj ciên ŋươʔi fảʔi kứ tʰâʔu fần cɔŋ nămcăm dóŋ tʰuế cɔ Ðứkzê tứk fảʔi tʰâʔu tʰuế dó cɔŋ fânnửʔa tʰuộk kwânbiɲ zaw cɔ lêʔasa tʰầʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kòn cɔŋ fânnửʔa kiə tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên hɔặk ŋườʔi hɔặk hɔặk lừʔa hăj ciên tứk kák súkvật ŋươʔi fảʔi kứ mỗʔi nămcụk dể ziêŋ za zaw cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kó cứkfận kɔjsók dền kủʔa Ðứkzê môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ vả kủʔa ɣiặk kòn lạʔi kwânbiɲ kướp lấʔidượk sáʔu căm bảʔi mươʔi ŋàn kɔnciên káʔi bảʔi mươʔi haj ŋàn kɔn sáʔu mươʔi ŋàn kɔn lừʔa dựk ŋườʔi cưʔa kùŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hếttʰảʔi dượk bamươʔi haj ŋàn ŋườʔi fânnửʔa tʰuộk dã di cận bɛcăm bamươʔi bảʔi ŋàn nămcăm kɔnciên káʔi dóŋ tʰuế cɔ Ðứkzê sáʔu căm bảʔi mươʔi kɔn bamươʔi sáʔu ŋàn kɔn dóŋ tʰuế cɔ Ðứkzê bảʔi mươʔi haj kɔn ŋàn nămcăm kɔn lừʔa dựk dóŋ tʰuế cɔ Ðứkzê sáʔu mươʔi kɔn mườʔisáʔu ŋàn ŋườʔi dóŋ tʰuế cɔ Ðứkzê bamươʔi haj ŋườʔi môʔisɛ zaw cɔ lêʔasa tʰầʔi kủʔa tʰuế zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ fânnửʔa kiə tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên tứklà fânnửʔa môʔisɛ ciə za vớʔi fânnửʔa kủʔa kwânbiɲ dã di cận fânnửʔa nầʔi tʰuộk hộʔi cúŋ bɛcăm bamươʔi bảʔi ŋàn nămcăm kɔnciên káʔi bamươʔi sáʔu ŋàn kɔn bamươʔi ŋàn nămcăm kɔn lừʔa mườʔisáʔu ŋàn ŋườʔi cɔŋ fânnửʔa nầʔi tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên môʔisɛ kứ mỗʔi nămcụk tʰì dể ziêŋ za ŋườʔi hăj zaw cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kó cứkfận kɔjsók dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ tứklà kwan tướŋ mộtŋàn kwân kwan tướŋ mộtcăm kwân dến ɣần môʔisɛ zằŋ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ ôŋ dã zựŋ ciếnsĩ ŋườʔiở zướʔi kwiền cúŋtôʔi xôŋ tʰiếʔu mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi kó dɛm dến dồ bằŋ vàŋ mìɲ dã dượk hɔặk zâʔicwiền hɔặk vòŋ hɔặk kà zá hɔặk hwataj hɔặk kiềŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ mìɲ cướk ŋàʔi môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi ɲận lãɲ vàŋ hếttʰảʔi dồ caŋsứk làmkôŋ hếttʰảʔi vàŋ ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ mộtŋàn kwân kwan tướŋ mộtcăm kwân zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kộŋ mườʔisáʔu ŋàn bảʔicăm nămmươʔi siếk vả mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kwânbiɲ dềʔu kó kướp lấʔi cɔ mìɲ vậʔi môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi ɲận lãɲ vàŋ kủʔa kwan tướŋ ŋàn kwân căm kwân zồʔi dɛm vàʔɔ hộʔi mạk zân ʔisơzaên cướk Ðứkzê vả kɔncáʔu zubên kùŋ kɔncáʔu ɣát kó bầʔi súkvật zất ɲiềʔu tʰấʔi sứ zaêsɛ sứ ɣalaát dất nuôʔi bầʔi súkvật dến tʰưʔa kùŋ môʔisɛ lêʔasa tʰầʔi kák hộʔicưởŋ zằŋ ʔatazốt Ðʔi zaêsɛ nimza hếtbôn lêʔasa sêbam nêbô bêôn sứ Ðứkzê dã dáɲbạʔi cướk hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên sứ nuôʔi bầʔi súkvật kák tôʔitớ ôŋ kó bầʔi súkvật lạʔi zằŋ nếʔu cúŋtôʔi dượk cướk ôŋ cớci sứ nầʔi cɔ tôʔitớ ôŋ sảnŋiệp sin dừŋ biểʔu cúŋtôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɲưŋmôʔi sɛ dáp kùŋ kɔncáʔu ɣát kɔncáʔu zubên zằŋ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi di cận kòn kák ŋươʔi lạʔi dâʔi saw saw kák ŋươʔi suj zân ʔisơzaên cở lòŋ xôŋ xứŋ di kwa sứ Ðứkzê dã cɔ Ấʔi tổfụ kák ŋươʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi xi kadɛbanê ʔa saj di zɔtʰám sứ vì tổfụ kák ŋươʔi dến dèʔɔ Ếc kôn tʰấʔi sứ zồʔi suj zân ʔisơzaên cở lòŋ xôŋ xứŋ vàʔɔ sứ Ðứkzê dã cɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê fừŋ ŋàʔi tʰề zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi di xỏʔi sứ zíptô haimươʔi tuổʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi sứ dã tʰề cɔ zaham ʔisák zakốp kák ŋườʔi dó xôŋ tʰeo kác cuŋtʰàɲ cừ za kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê ŋườʔi kênít ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun haj ŋườʔi dó dã tʰeo Ðứkzê kác cuŋtʰàɲ Ấʔi vậʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋfừŋ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi cɔ zân dó di lưʔulạk cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ mươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kả zòŋzõʔi dã diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê tiêʔuziệt nầʔi kák ŋươʔi zấʔi tʰế cɔ tổfụ mìɲ zòŋzõʔi tộʔiɲân dặŋ za tʰêm sứk tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê kùŋ ʔisơzaên nữʔa vì ɲượkbằŋ kák ŋươʔi di ŋàʔi za tʰì ŋàʔi kứ dể zân nầʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔ zân cết sạc vậʔi ɲưŋ kák ŋườʔi dó dến ɣần môʔisɛ zằŋ tạʔi dâʔi cúŋtôʔi zựŋ cuồŋ cɔ súkvật tʰàɲ cɔ kɔncẻ cúŋtôʔi zồʔi cúŋtôʔi kầm biɲxí lậptứk dặŋ di cướk zân ʔisơzaên cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dưʔa zân ấʔi vàʔɔ kõʔi dã fândịɲ cɔ kòn kɔncẻ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ kiênkố kớ zân sứ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ cởvề ɲà cúŋtôʔi cướk xi mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên cưʔa lãɲ dượk sảnŋiệp mìɲ cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ dượk ci vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ hăjlà sa cúŋtôʔi dượk sảnŋiệp mìɲ nầʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ môʔisɛ dáp kùŋ kák ŋườʔi zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi diềʔu dó nếʔu kầm biɲxí dặŋ di ciếncận cướk Ðứkzê nếʔu mọʔi ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí di ŋaŋ kwa sốŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cướk Ðứkzê cɔdến xi nàʔɔ duổʔi kwân ŋịc cạʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋàʔi nếʔu cỉ cởvề săw xi sứ dã fụk cướk Ðứkzê tʰì dốʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi xôŋ cácmók ci dất nầʔi sảnŋiệp cɔ kák ŋươʔi cướk Ðứkzê kòn nếʔuxôŋ ɲưvậʔi nầʔi kák ŋươʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê fảʔibiết zằŋ tộʔi cắk dổ lạʔi cên kák ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi kất tʰàɲ cɔ kɔncẻ mìɲ kùŋ zựŋ cuồŋ cɔ bầʔi súkvật diềʔu kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi kɔncáʔu ɣát kɔncáʔu zubên nóʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kák tôʔitớ ôŋ diềʔu cúʔa tôʔi fán zặn kɔncẻ bầʔi ciên hếttʰảʔi súkvật cúŋtôʔi dâʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ sứ ɣalaát kòn hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ ôŋ kầm biɲxí di ŋaŋ kwa ŋừʔa ciếncận cướk Ðứkzê ɲư cúʔa tôʔi dã fán zặn vậʔi môʔisɛ fần kák ŋườʔi dó cwiền lịɲ cɔ lêʔasa tʰầʔi cɔ ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun cɔ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ cifáʔi zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ nếʔu kɔncáʔu ɣát kɔncáʔu zubên kầm biɲxí di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi dặŋ ciếncận cướk Ðứkzê nếʔu sứ fụk kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ sứ ɣalaát sảnŋiệp ɲưŋ nếʔu xôŋ kầm biɲxí di ŋaŋ kwa vớʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰì kó sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ kanaan kɔncáʔu ɣát kɔncáʔu zubên tʰưʔa zằŋ cúŋtôʔi diềʔu ci Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ tôʔitớ ôŋ cúŋtôʔi kầm biɲxí di kwa cɔŋ sứ kanaan cướk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cúŋtôʔi lãɲ sảnŋiệp mìɲ fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ Ấʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ cɔ kɔncáʔu ɣát kɔncáʔu zubên fân nữʔa cifáʔi manasɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsép nướk kủʔa sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít nướk kủʔa ʔɔùk vwa sứ basan tứklà sứ vớʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kák tʰàɲ dịʔa cuŋkwɛɲ kɔncáʔu ɣát sâʔicất Ðʔi ʔatazốt ʔazô ʔɛ ʔaï cốtsôfan zaêsɛ ɣiôbêha bếtnimza bếtʰazan ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kiênkố kũŋ zựŋ cuồŋ cɔ bầʔi súkvật nữʔa kɔncáʔu zubên sâʔicất hếtbôn lêʔalê kiziətaim nêbô baɛɲmêôn kák tʰàɲ nầʔi dổʔi sípma zồʔi dặt cɔ kák tʰàɲ nàʔɔ mìɲ sâʔicất kɔncáʔu maki kɔncaj manasɛ di vàʔɔ ciếm sứ ɣalaát duổʔi ŋườʔi ʔamôzít cɔŋ dó za vậʔi môʔisɛ sứ ɣalaát cɔ maki kɔncaj manasɛ ŋườʔiở tạʔi dó zajzơ kɔncaj manasɛ di ciếm kák tʰônzân ʔamôzít dặt tʰôn zajzơ nôbác di lấʔi tʰàɲ kênát vớʔi kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt dặt nôbác tʰeo cáɲ zɛɲ mìɲ nầʔi kák nơʔi dóŋ cạʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tùʔi tʰeo kák dộʔiŋũ kó môʔisɛ ʔazôn kwảnlý môʔisɛ vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê cép hàɲcìɲ kủʔa zâncúŋ tùʔi tʰeo kák nơʔi dóŋ cạʔi vậʔi nầʔi kák nơʔi dóŋ cạʔi tùʔi tʰeo hàɲcìɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi zằm tʰáŋzêŋ tứk ŋàʔisăw vượtkwa zân ʔisơzaên zadi zamsɛ kác zạnzĩ kó kủʔa hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zíptô tʰấʔi ŋườʔi zíptô côn ɲữŋ Ðứkzê dã hàɲ hạʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ tứklà hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ Ðứkzê dã dɔán sét kák tʰần cúŋnó zân ʔisơzaên di zamsɛ dến dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi sukốt zồʔi di sukốt dến dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi kuốʔi dồŋ vắŋ kế dó di vòŋ hướŋ fihahizốt dốʔi ŋaŋ kùŋ baɛɲsêfôn dóŋ cạʔi cướk mítdôn zân ʔisơzaên fihahizốt di kwa ɣiữʔa hướŋ dồŋ vắŋ di ŋàʔidườŋ ŋaŋ dồŋ vắŋ zồʔi dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi maza Ðʔɔạn di maza dến tạʔi kó mườʔihaj káʔi suốʔi bảʔi cụk kâʔi cà dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dó zânsự di dóŋ cạʔi ɣần biển dỏ Ðʔɔạn zi biển dỏ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin Ðʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ka Ðʔi ka dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ʔalúk Ðʔi ʔalúk dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zêfidim nơʔi xôŋ kó nướk cɔ zânsự ʔuốŋ zân ʔisơzaên di zêfidim dóŋ cạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi kế dó di dồŋ vắŋ sina ʔi dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi kípzốt hatʰava Ðʔi kípzốtʰatʰava dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi hátsêzốt Ðʔɔạn di hátsêzốt dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zítma Ðʔi zítma dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zimôn fêzết Ðʔi zimônfêzết dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi lípna Ðʔi lípna dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zisa kế dó di zisa dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi kêhêlatʰa Ðʔi kêhêlatʰa dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi núʔi sêfɛ Ðʔi núʔi sêfɛ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi hazada Ðʔi hazada dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi mácêlốt
