Ðʔɔạn di mácêlốt dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi tahát Ðʔi tahát dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi tazác Ðʔi tazác dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi mítɣa Ðʔi mítɣa dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi hácmôna Ðʔi hácmôna dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi môsêzốt Ðʔi môsêzốt dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi bênɛzakan Ðʔi bênɛzakan dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi hôɣiɣát Ðʔi hôɣiɣát dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zốtbatʰa Ðʔi zốtbatʰa dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zôna Ðʔɔạn di zôna dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi siôŋêbɛ Ðʔi siôŋêbɛ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin ŋĩʔalà tạʔi kadɛ kế dó di kadɛ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi núʔi hôzơ cót dầʔu sứ dôm ʔazôn tʰầʔi tʰeo mạŋ Ðứkzê cên núʔi hôzơ zồʔi kwadờʔi tạʔi dó ɲằm ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ tʰứ mươʔi săw xi zân ʔisơzaên dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô xi ʔazôn kwadờʔi cên núʔi hôzơ ŋườʔi dã dượk mộtcăm haimươʔi tuổʔi bấʔizờ vwa ʔazát ŋườʔi kanaan sứ kanaan hăj zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên dến zân ʔisơzaên di núʔi hôzơ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi samôna Ðʔi samôna dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi funôn Ðʔi funôn dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi kế dó di dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ʔizêʔabazim cên bờkõʔi môáp Ðʔi ʔizêʔabazim dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi Ðʔi bôŋát Ðʔi Ðʔi bôŋát dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ʔɛɲmôn latʰaim kế ấʔi di ʔɛɲmôn latʰaim dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi núʔi ʔabazim cướk nêbô Ðʔi núʔi ʔabazim dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dồŋbằŋ môáp ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô zân ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi ɣần dôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ bếtzêsimốt ci ʔabênsitim cɔŋ dồŋ môáp Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ cɔŋ dồŋ môáp ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô zằŋ hãʔi cwiền kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ sứ kanaan zồʔi tʰìfảʔi duổʔi hếttʰảʔi zân kủʔa sứ xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi fáhủʔi hếttʰảʔi hìɲtượŋ cạm hìɲ dúk kùŋ dạpdổ kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi lãɲ sứ sảnŋiệp tạʔi dó dã sứ cɔ kák ŋươʔi dặŋ kơŋiệp fảʔi bắttʰăm ciə sứ za tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kák ŋươʔi hễ ʔaj dôŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ sảnŋiệp kòn ʔaj tʰìfảʔi cɔ sảnŋiệp ɲỏ mỗʔi ŋườʔi ɲận lãɲ fần mìɲ bắttʰăm dượk fảʔi kứ ɲữŋ cifáʔi tổfụ kák ŋươʔi ciə sứ za kòn nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ duổʔi zân kủʔa sứ xỏʔi cướk mìɲ tʰì ɲữŋ nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kòn cừʔa lạʔi ɲư ɣaj cɔŋ kɔn ɲư côŋ nơʔi hôŋ kák ŋươʔi cúŋnó tʰeo ziết kák ŋươʔi tạʔi cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi zồʔi sảʔi dến hàɲ hạʔi kák ŋươʔi xáknàʔɔ dã twan hàɲ hạʔi cúŋnó vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền diềʔu nầʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ kanaan dặŋ lãɲ sứ sảnŋiệp tứklà sứ kanaan xắp miền tʰuộk kák ŋươʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin cạʔi zàʔi tʰeo dôm Ấʔi vậʔi ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa kák ŋươʔi fíʔa cạʔi dầʔu biểnmặn hướŋ dôŋ ɣiớʔihạn nầʔi cạʔi vòŋ fíʔa kủʔa núʔi ʔaï kzápbim di ŋaŋ hướŋ sin ɣiáp fíʔa kadɛbanê ʔa dɔạn cạʔi kwa hátsa da di ŋaŋ hướŋ từÁt ɣiớʔihạn cạʔi vòŋ lốʔi suốʔi zíptô ɣiáp kòn ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa tâʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi kó zùŋ ấʔi ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa tâʔi nầʔi ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa kák ŋươʔi fíʔa bắk từ kák ŋươʔi cấm núʔi hôzơ núʔi hôzơ kák ŋươʔi cấm tạʔi dầʔu hamát zồʔi ɣiớʔihạn ɣiáp tạʔi sêdát ɣiớʔihạn cạʔi hướŋ sípzôn kuốʔi hátsa dó ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa kák ŋươʔi fíʔa bắk fíʔa dôŋ kák ŋươʔi cấm zɛɲ mìɲ hátsa tớʔi sêfam zồʔi cạʔi sêfam suốŋ dến zípla hướŋ dôŋ kủʔa ʔain dɔạn cạʔi suốŋ ɣiáp ɣàɲ kinêzết fíʔa dôŋ zốt lạʔi ɣiớʔihạn cạʔi suốŋ fíʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiáp biểnmặn sứ kák ŋươʔi kó kùŋ kák ɣiớʔihạn suŋkwɛɲ vậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ Ấʔi dó sứ kák ŋươʔi bắttʰăm ciə za Ðứkzê dã fán zặn cɔ cín cifáʔi fânnửʔa kủʔa cifáʔi vì cifáʔi kɔncáʔu zubên tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ cifáʔi kɔncáʔu ɣát tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ kùŋ fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ dã lãɲ fần sảnŋiệp mìɲ zồʔi haj cifáʔi nửʔa cifáʔi nầʔi dã ɲận lãɲ sảnŋiệp mìɲ fíʔa kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô hướŋ dôŋ tứk fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ Ðâʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dứŋ ciə sứ lêʔasa tʰầʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun kák ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi kử mỗʔi cifáʔi cọn kwan cưởŋ dặŋ ciə sứ za Ðâʔi kák ŋườʔi dó về cifáʔi zuda kalép kɔncaj ɣiêfunê cifáʔi kɔncáʔu simêôn sêmuên kɔncaj ʔamihút cifáʔi bêŋiəmin lidát kɔncaj kítlɔn cifáʔi kɔncáʔu Ðʔan kwan cưởŋ buki kɔncaj ɣiốkli kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép cifáʔi kɔncáʔu manasɛ kwan cưởŋ haniên kɔncaj fát cifáʔi kɔncáʔu zaim kwan cưởŋ kêmuên kɔncaj síptan cifáʔi kɔncáʔu sabulôn kwan cưởŋ lítsafan kɔncaj fáknát cifáʔi kɔncáʔu ʔisaka kwan cưởŋ fatiên kɔncaj ʔasan cifáʔi kɔncáʔu ʔasɛ kwan cưởŋ ʔahihút kɔncaj sɛlumi cifáʔi kɔncáʔu néptali kwan cưởŋ fêdaên kɔncaj ʔamihút ɲữŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán biểʔu dứŋ ciə sảnŋiệp cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ sứ kanaan Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ cɔŋ dồŋ môáp ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô zằŋ hãʔi biểʔu zân ʔisơzaên zɔ cɔŋ fần sảnŋiệp mìɲ dã kó ɲườŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi dặŋ cɔ miếŋ dất cuŋkwɛɲ kák tʰàɲ dó ŋườʔilê kó ɲữŋ tʰàɲ dặŋ kòn dất cuŋkwɛɲ kák tʰàɲ nầʔi zùŋ cɔ súkvật cɔ cɔ hếttʰảʔi tʰúvật kủʔa cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi mộtŋàn tʰướk cuvi vác tʰàɲ ŋɔàʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi dɔ fíʔa ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ hướŋ dôŋ haj ŋàn tʰướk hướŋ haj ŋàn tʰướk hướŋ tâʔi haj ŋàn tʰướk hướŋ bắk haj ŋàn tʰướk káʔi tʰàɲ cíɲ ɣiữʔa dất kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ sốtʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kó sáʔu káʔi tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cỉ cɔ dể ɲơn cốncáɲ tạʔi dó ŋɔàʔi sáʔu tʰàɲ dó kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi mươʔi haj káʔi tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi vớʔi dất mươʔi káʔi về ɲữŋ tʰàɲ zɔ cɔŋ sảnŋiệp kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi fảʔi lấʔi ɲiềʔu kủʔa cifáʔi kó ɲiềʔu lấʔi kủʔa cifáʔi kó mỗʔi cifáʔi ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kân fân tʰeo sảnŋiệp kủʔa mìɲ dượk Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ sứ kanaan tʰìfảʔi lựʔa ɲữŋ tʰàɲ zùŋ tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ mìɲ nơʔi ɲơn dáɲ cết ʔaj cạʔi ẩnnáʔu mìɲ dượk ɲữŋ tʰàɲ dó zùŋ tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu dể cốn xỏʔi báʔɔtʰù hwiết hầʔu cɔ ɲơn xôŋ cết cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ứŋ hầʔu cướk hộʔi cúŋ dặŋ cịʔu sétdɔán vậʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi ɲườŋ cɔ kó sáʔu tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cỉ tʰàɲ fíʔa kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰàɲ xák cɔŋ sứ kanaan ấʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu sáʔu tʰàɲ nầʔi zùŋ cỗ ẩnnáʔu cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cɔ xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ nàʔɔ kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ zân dó dể ʔaj dáɲ cết ŋườʔi kó tʰế cạʔi mìɲ tạʔi dó ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi ấʔi dáɲ bằŋ dồ ŋườʔi dáɲ cết di ấʔilà ɲơn ɲơn fảʔi sửtử nếʔu ŋườʔi dáɲ bằŋ kụk dá kầm nơʔi tăj kó tʰế cết ŋườʔi dáɲ cết di ấʔilà ɲơn sátɲân fảʔi sửtử kũŋ vậʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi dáɲ bằŋ dồ kâʔi kầm nơʔi tăj kó tʰế cết ŋườʔi dáɲ cết di ấʔilà ɲơn ɲơn fảʔi sửtử Ấʔilà báʔɔtʰù hwiết cɔ ɲơn fảʔi cết xi nàʔɔ báʔɔtʰù hwiết ɣặp ɲơn tʰìfảʔi cɔ cết di nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ lòŋ ɣɛɲɣét sô ŋườʔi xák hăjlà kốý liệŋ ci cên mìɲ kớ dó cết hɔặk tʰù dáɲ bằŋ bàntăj kớ dó cết tʰì ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dáɲ dó fảʔi sửtử Ấʔilà ɲơn ŋườʔi báʔɔtʰù hwiết xi nàʔɔ ɣặp ɲơn fảʔi cɔ cết di nếʔu tìɲkờ hòʔatʰuận ɲăw ŋườʔi kó sô hɔặk liệŋ ci cên mìɲ ŋườʔi kiə hɔặk nếʔuxôŋ fảʔi tʰùŋịc cẳŋ kó hạʔi lạʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi zớt kụk dá cên mìɲ ŋườʔi kiə kó tʰế cết dượk nếʔu ŋườʔi cết di tʰì kứ tʰeo nầʔi hộʔi cúŋ fảʔi sử dɔán cɔ dã dáɲ báʔɔtʰù hwiết hộʔi cúŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ɲơn xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi báʔɔtʰù hwiết biểʔu ŋườʔi cởvề tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu nơʔi ŋườʔi dã cạʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi fảʔi dó cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm dã dượk sứk zầʔu tʰáɲ kwadờʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ɲơn di za ŋɔàʔi ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu nơʔi ŋườʔi dã cạʔi mìɲ nếʔu báʔɔtʰù hwiết ɣặp ɣiết ŋườʔiở ŋɔàʔi ɣiớʔihạn tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu tʰì báʔɔtʰù hwiết xôŋ mắk tộʔi ɲơn vì ɲơn fảʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm kwadờʔi ɲơn dượk cởvề cɔŋ sảnŋiệp mìɲ bấtluận kák ŋươʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ diềʔu nầʔi fảʔi zùŋ sétdɔán cɔ kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi nếʔu ʔaj ɣiết ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔita kứ tʰeo lờʔi xaj kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cứŋ ɣiết ɲơn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cứŋ xôŋ dủ kớ dặŋ ɣiết ʔaj kák ŋươʔi cớ lãɲ cuộk mạŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɲơn dã kó tộʔi dáŋ cết fảʔi sửtử kák ŋươʔi dừŋ lãɲ cuộk dã cạʔi mìɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu hầʔu cɔ cởvề cɔŋ sứ săw xi tʰầʔi kwadờʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ôʔuế sứ kák ŋươʔi hwiết ôʔuế sứ ɲượkbằŋ kó dổ hwiết za cɔŋ sứ nếʔuxôŋ dổ hwiết lạʔi tʰì xôŋ tʰế cuộk tộʔi cɔ sứ dượk vậʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ôʔuế sứ nơʔi kák ŋươʔi cáɲ ɣiữʔa dó nơʔi ŋự Ðứkzê ŋự ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên vả ɲữŋ cưởŋtộk ɣalaát kɔncaj maki cáʔu manasɛ cɔŋ zòŋ kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép dến ɣần nóʔi cướk môʔisɛ kùŋ cướk kák tổŋcưởŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ cifáʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ cúʔa tôʔi bắttʰăm ciə sứ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp cúʔa tôʔi kó lãɲ mạŋ Ðứkzê zaw sảnŋiệp kủʔa sêlôfát ʔɛɲ cúŋtôʔi cɔ kák kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi nếʔu kák kɔŋáʔi vớʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ kɔncaj kák cifáʔi xák kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp cúŋnó cuất xỏʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa tổfụ cúŋtôʔi tʰêm vàʔɔ sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi nàʔɔ cúŋnó tʰuộk ɲưvậʔi fần dó fảʔi cuất xỏʔi sảnŋiệp dã bắttʰăm cúŋtôʔi xi dến cɔ zân ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp cúŋnó tʰêm vàʔɔ sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi nàʔɔ cúŋnó tʰuộk ɲưvậʔi sảnŋiệp cúŋnó cuất xỏʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi môʔisɛ cwiền kák lịɲ nầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ cifáʔi kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép nóʔi kólý nầʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê kó fán fần kák kɔŋáʔi sêlôfát cúŋnó kếttʰân vớʔi ʔaj tʰì ɲữŋ cỉ hãʔi kếttʰân vớʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ ɲà kủʔa cifáʔi tổfụ mìɲ ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp nàʔɔ cẳŋ dượk cifáʔi nầʔi dɛm kwa cifáʔi xák mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên deo tʰeo sảnŋiệp cifáʔi tổfụ mìɲ fàm ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi nàʔɔ dượk fần sảnŋiệp cɔŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên tʰìfảʔi kếttʰân kùŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa ɲà nàʔɔ cifáʔi tổfụ mìɲ hầʔu cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên hưởŋ fần sảnŋiệp kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ vậʔi fần sảnŋiệp nàʔɔ cẳŋ dượk cifáʔi nầʔi dɛm kwa cifáʔi kiə ɲưŋ mỗʔi cifáʔi ʔisơzaên ɣiữ sảnŋiệp mìɲ vậʔi kák kɔŋáʔi sêlôfát ɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ mácla tʰiệtsa hốtla miɲka nô ʔa kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sêlôfát dềʔu kếttʰân kùŋ kák kɔncaj kủʔa kậʔu mìɲ cúŋnó kếttʰân cɔŋ ɲữŋ ɲà kủʔa kɔncáʔu manasɛ kɔncaj ɣiôsép fần sảnŋiệp kòn lạʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi tổfụ mìɲ kák mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ môáp ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô nầʔi lờʔi môʔisɛ nóʔi cɔ kả ʔisơzaên kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ sufơ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ fazan tôfên laban hátsêzốt Ðʔi saháp từhô zếp tớʔi kadɛbanê ʔa bởʔi dườŋ núʔi sê ʔizơ di mườʔimột ŋàʔidườŋ ɲằm mươʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ mườʔimột môʔisɛ nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã biểʔu ŋườʔi fảʔi nóʔi kùŋ Ấʔilà săw xi ŋườʔi dã dáɲ ɣiết sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít tạʔi hếtbôn ʔɔùk vwa basan tạʔi Ác tazốt zê ʔi tạʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ sứ môáp môʔisɛ xởʔi ɣiảŋzảʔi luậtfáp nầʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kó fán kùŋ cúŋta tạʔi hôzếp zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ núʔi nầʔi dã lâʔu kwá hãʔi vòŋ lạʔi di dến núʔi zân ʔamôzít kùŋ dến kák ɣần tứklà dếnnơʔi dồŋbằŋ núʔi vàʔɔ sứ tʰấp dến vàʔɔ sứ zân kanaan liban cɔdến sôŋ sôŋ fơzát kìʔa fó sứ nầʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi vàʔɔ ciếm lấʔi sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi zaham ʔisák zakốp kùŋ cɔ kɔncáʔu kủʔa cɔŋ lúk dó kó nóʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ mộtmìɲ xôŋ dủ sứk kaicị kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã za tʰêm kák ŋươʔi kìʔa ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi dôŋ ɲư saw cên cờʔi ŋwiệŋiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi xiến kák ŋươʔi tʰêm ɣấp ŋàn fướk cɔ ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi mộtmìɲ tʰếnàʔɔ maŋ lấʔi cácɲiệm ɣáɲ nặŋ diềʔu cɛɲtụŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cọn cɔŋ mỗʔi cifáʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ kótiếŋ kwan cưởŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kó dáp zằŋ việk ŋườʔi twan tʰật tʰăj bấʔizờ cọn lấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan kótiếŋ kwan tướŋ kák ŋươʔi hɔặk kaj ŋàn ŋườʔi hɔặk kaj căm ŋườʔi hɔặk kaj nămmươʔi ŋườʔi hɔặk kaj mườʔi ŋườʔi kwảnlý cɔŋ ɲữŋ cifáʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ lúk dó za lịɲ cɔ ɲữŋ kwan sét kák ŋươʔi zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi lấʔi kôŋbìɲ sétdɔán cɛɲtụŋ kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ hăjlà vớʔi xác ŋɔạʔibaŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ việk sétdɔán kák ŋươʔi cớ ʔaj hãʔi ŋɛ ŋườʔi ɲư ŋɛ ŋườʔi saŋ dừŋ kó ʔaj sétdɔán tʰuộk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fàm việk nàʔɔ lấʔilàm zất xó cɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dɛm dến cướk tʰì ŋɛ cɔ vậʔi cɔŋ lúk dó kó cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi mọʔi diềʔu mìɲ fảʔi Ðʔɔạn hôzếp cúŋta cảʔi ŋaŋ kwa dồŋ vắŋ miɲ môŋ ɣớmɣê cúŋta tʰấʔi kiə hướŋ núʔi zân ʔamôzít ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dã fán zặn zồʔi cúŋta dến kadɛbanê ʔa bấʔizờ nóʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dã dến núʔi kủʔa zân ʔamôzít ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta cɔ cúŋta kìʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fó sứ nầʔi cɔ ŋươʔi hãʔi di ciếm sảnŋiệp ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi dã fán kùŋ ŋươʔi cớ áʔiŋạʔi cớ kiɲxủŋ kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi lạʔi ɣần nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi saj ɲữŋ ŋườʔi di cướk cúŋtôʔi dặŋ zɔtʰám sứ cỉbảʔɔ dườŋsá nàʔɔ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi kák tʰàɲ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi vàʔɔ lờʔi nầʔi dẹplòŋ cọn mườʔihaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi tứk mỗʔi cifáʔi ŋườʔi mườʔihaj ŋườʔi dó zadi núʔi di dến xɛ Ếc kôn zɔtʰám sứ họ háʔi kầm cɔŋ tăj mìɲ ɲữŋ cáʔicâʔi sứ dó dɛm cɔ cúŋta tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ cúŋta zằŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta cɔ tʰậtlà ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dó dã bộʔiŋịc mạŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ cạʔi mìɲ zằŋ Ấʔi bởʔi Ðứkzê ɣét cúŋta xiến cúŋta za sứ zíptô dặŋ fó cúŋta vàʔɔ tăj zân ʔamôzít dể tiêʔuziệt di cúŋta di dâʔu ʔɛɲɛm cúŋta cɔ cúŋta tiêʔu ɣan nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà zân dôŋ kawlớn cúŋta ấʔilà ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kiênkố dến cờʔi vảlạʔi tạʔi dó cúŋtôʔi kó tʰấʔi ɲữŋ kɔncáʔu kủʔa zân ʔanakim ɲưŋ nóʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ cớ áʔiŋạʔi cớ ɣì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi di cướk cíɲ ŋàʔi ciến kự cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰườŋ cướkmắt kák ŋươʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ nơʔi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi zằŋ cọn zọk dườŋ ŋươʔi di cɔdến xi tớʔi cốn nầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã bồŋ ŋươʔi ɲư ŋườʔi bồŋ kɔncaj mìɲ zầʔu vậʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ di cướk zẫn kák ŋươʔi cên dườŋ dể cɔ kák ŋươʔi nơʔi dóŋ cạʔi bandêm cɔŋ dám lửʔa banŋàʔi cɔŋ dám mâʔi dặŋ cỉ kɔn dườŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi di bấʔizờ Ðứkzê ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa lờʔinóʔi kák ŋươʔi nổʔizận tʰề zằŋ cẳŋ ʔaj kủʔa zòŋzõʔi zanák nầʔi tʰấʔi sứ tốtdẹp dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi ŋɔạʔicừ kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê ŋườʔi tʰấʔi sứ dó cɔ ŋườʔi kùŋ kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi sứ ŋườʔi dã cảʔi kwa bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó tʰeo Ðứkzê kác cuŋtín cọnvẹn lạʔi Ðứkzê kớ kák ŋươʔi kũŋ nổʔizận kùŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ vậʔi xôŋ vàʔɔ dó dâʔu ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun dầʔitớ ŋươʔi dượk vàʔɔ dó hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔi vữŋlòŋ ấʔilà ŋườʔi xiến zân ʔisơzaên ɲận lấʔi sứ nầʔi sảnŋiệp ɲữŋ kɔncẻ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dã nóʔi zằŋ tʰàɲ miếŋ mồʔi ɲữŋ kɔncaj kák ŋươʔi bâʔizờ cưʔa biếtdiềʔu tʰiện hăjlà diềʔu ák vàʔɔ sứ dó ta cɔ cúŋnó sứ nầʔi sảnŋiệp ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cởvề di dến dồŋ vắŋ hướŋ biển dỏ lúk dó kák ŋươʔi dáp kùŋ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê cúŋtôʔi di ciếncận mọʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dã fán zặn mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi biɲxí twan zạʔizột di núʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋzân cớ di cớ ciếncận xôŋ ŋự ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi kwân tʰùŋịc dáɲbạʔi ta kó tʰuật lạʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi nầʔi ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ ŋịc mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kéʔɔ di núʔi bấʔizờ ŋườʔi ʔamôzít cɔŋ núʔi nầʔi di za dón duổʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲưtʰể dɔàn ʔɔŋ dáɲbạʔi kák ŋươʔi tạʔi sê ʔizơ cɔdến họtma xi cởvề kák ŋươʔi kó xóklók cướk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ lắŋtaj cẳŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ấʔi vìtʰế kák ŋươʔi tạʔi kadɛ lâʔu ŋàʔi ɲiềʔu ŋàʔi zườŋ baw Ðʔɔạn cúŋta cởlạʔi di vàʔɔ dồŋ vắŋ hướŋ biển dỏ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn cúŋta di vòŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi kwɛɲ núʔi sê ʔizơ Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi di vòŋ núʔi nầʔi kũŋ dã lâʔu zồʔi hãʔi cởlên hướŋ bắk hãʔi cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ zânsự kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa dịʔafận kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tứklà kɔncáʔu săw tạʔi sê ʔizơ cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ hãʔi ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ cớ kó cɛɲ kùŋ cúŋnó xôŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi sứ kủʔa cúŋnó dâʔu zầʔu dếnnỗʔi tʰẻʔɔ dất bằŋ bàncân kũŋ xôŋ cɔ ta dã cɔ săw núʔi sê ʔizơ sảnŋiệp kák ŋươʔi zùŋ tiềnbạk mwa lươŋ tʰứk kủʔa cúŋnó nướk ʔuốŋ vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fướk cɔ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋươʔi ŋàʔi dã kuộk di dườŋ ŋươʔi ŋaŋ kwa dồŋ vắŋ lớnlaw nầʔi cɔŋ mườʔi nầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰiếʔu ci vậʔi cúŋta kó di ŋaŋ kwa kác sa ʔɛɲɛm kɔncáʔu săw tạʔi sê ʔizơ divề hướŋ dồŋ vắŋ môáp dặŋ cáɲ kɔn dườŋ dồŋbằŋ kùŋ siôŋêbɛ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ cớ dươŋ dịc cớ ciếncận vớʔi zân môáp xôŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ci cɔŋ sứ zân ấʔi sảnŋiệp dâʔu bởʔi dã ʔazơ cɔ kɔncáʔu lót sảnŋiệp lúk cướk zân tạʔi dó Ấʔilà zân dôŋ hìɲ ɣiềŋ ɣiàŋ ɲư zân ʔanakim vậʔi ŋườʔita kũŋ cɔ zân nầʔi zân ɣiềŋ ɣiàŋ ɲư zân ʔanakim ɲưŋ zân môáp ɣọʔi zâɲô zít lúk cướk kũŋ tạʔi sê ʔizơ sɔŋ kɔncáʔu săw ziệt zân ấʔi dɔạt lấʔi sứ tʰế cɔ ʔiɲư ʔisơzaên cɔŋ sứ Ðứkzê dã cɔ ŋườʔilàm sảnŋiệp bâʔizờ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di ŋaŋ kwa xɛ sêzết vậʔi cúŋta kó di ŋaŋ xɛ sêzết vả tʰìɣiờ kák kuộk di dườŋ kủʔa cúŋta xi lìʔa xỏʔi kadɛbanê ʔa tớʔi lúk di ŋaŋ kwa xɛ sêzết kộŋ bamươʔi cɔdến cừŋ kák ŋườʔi ciếnsĩ dờʔi ấʔi dã ziệt xỏʔi cạʔi kwân ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã tʰề kùŋ kák ŋườʔi dó vảlạʔi tăj Ðứkzê kũŋ ca vàʔɔ dặŋ ziệt xỏʔi cạʔi kwân cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dềʔu tiêʔuziệt sảʔi xi kák ŋườʔi ciếnsĩ dã tiêʔuziệt cết xỏʔi zânsự tʰì Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ ŋàʔinăj ŋươʔi di ŋaŋ kwa ʔazơ bờkõʔi kủʔa zân môáp dến ɣần kɔncáʔu ʔammôn cớ dươŋ dịc cớ ciếncận kùŋ cúŋnó xôŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ci kủʔa sứ kɔncáʔu ʔammôn sảnŋiệp bởʔi dã sứ dó cɔ kɔncáʔu kủʔa lót sảnŋiệp ŋwiên sứ nầʔi ɣọʔilà sứ zêfaim sưʔa kiə zân zêfaim dó zân ʔammôn ɣọʔilà samsumim ấʔilà zân dôŋ hìɲ ɣiềŋ ɣiàŋ ɲư zân ʔanakim ɲưŋÐứkzê ziệt zân zêfaim cướk zân ʔammôn zân ʔammôn dɔạt lấʔi sứ kủʔa tʰế cɔ Ấʔi ŋàʔi dã cɔ kɔncáʔu săw tạʔi sê ʔizơ ɲưvậʔi xi ŋàʔi hủʔiziệt zân hôzít cướk kɔncáʔu săw ciếm lấʔi sứ zân ấʔi tʰế vàʔɔ cỗ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj kòn zân ʔavim cɔŋ ɲữŋ làŋ cɔdến ɣasa zân káptôzim káptô za hủʔiziệt tʰế vàʔɔ cɔ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di ŋaŋ kwa xɛ ʔaï kìʔa dã fó sihôn vwa hếtbôn ŋườʔi ʔamôzít kùŋ sứ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi hãʔi xởʔi ciếm lấʔi zawciến kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋàʔinăj xởʔi zảʔi cên kák zântộk cɔŋ tʰiêɲạ sợhãʔi kiɲxủŋ zɛɲ ŋươʔi dếnnỗʔi xi ŋɛnóʔi ŋươʔi kák zântộk dó zunzẩʔi kiɲxủŋ cướk ŋươʔi bấʔizờ dồŋ vắŋ kêdêmốt saj sứɣiả dến sihôn vwa hếtbôn lấʔi lờʔi hòʔahảʔɔ dặŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sin cɔfép tôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sứ vwa tôʔi di tʰeo dườŋkáʔi xôŋ sâʔi kwa hữʔu hăj vwa ɲận lấʔi bạk lươŋtʰựk cɔ dể tôʔi kó ɲận lấʔi bạk bánnướk dể tôʔi kó ʔuốŋ cỉ hãʔi dể cɔ tôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa kũŋɲư kɔncáʔu săw tạʔi sê ʔizơ zân môáp tạʔi ʔazơ dã cɔfép vậʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tôʔi di kwa ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi cɔ tôʔi ɲưŋsi vwa hếtbôn xôŋ xứŋ cúŋta di ŋaŋ kwa dịʔafận ŋườʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã xiến cɔ táɲ ŋườʔi ŋwan ŋạc lòŋ ŋườʔi kứŋkỏʔi dể fó ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ʔiɲư diềʔu dã sảʔi dến ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ kìʔa bâʔizờ fó sihôn sứ ŋườʔi cɔ ŋươʔi hãʔi xởʔi ciếm lấʔi sứ ŋườʔi dặŋ kơŋiệp vậʔi sihôn kả zânsự ŋườʔi za dón cúŋta dặŋ zawciến tạʔi zahát ɲưŋzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta fó ŋườʔi cɔ cúŋta cúŋta dáɲbạʔi ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj kùŋ kả zânsự kủʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk dó ciếm kák tʰàɲ ŋườʔi xấnváʔi ziệt kák tʰàɲ kả ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kák kɔncẻ xôŋ cừʔa lạʔi ʔaj cúŋta cỉ kó kướp lấʔi cɔ fần mìɲ súkvật hóʔa tàʔi kủʔa kák tʰàɲ mìɲ dã tʰắŋ dượk từ ʔazô ʔɛ cên xɛ ʔaï káʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ cũŋ cɔdến ɣalaát cẳŋ kó tʰàɲ nàʔɔ lấʔilàm kiênkố kwá cɔ cúŋta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dã fó kák tʰàɲ dó cɔ cúŋta cỉn ŋươʔi xôŋ kó lạʔi ɣần sứ kủʔa kɔncáʔu ʔammôn zọk xắp xɛ zabốk hɔặk kák tʰàɲ cên núʔi hăjlà cỗ nàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kấm xôŋ cɔ cúŋta ciếm lấʔi bấʔizờ cúŋta cởlạʔi dườŋ basan di ʔɔùk vwa basan kả zânsự ŋườʔi za dón cúŋta dặŋ zawciến tạʔi Ếc zê ʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ dã fó ŋườʔi kả zânsự sứ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɲư ŋươʔi dã cɔ sihôn vwa ʔamôzít tạʔi hếtbôn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kũŋ kó fó vàʔɔ tăj cúŋta ʔɔùk vwa basan kả zânsự ŋườʔi cúŋta kó dáɲbạʔi ŋườʔi dến cừŋ xôŋ kòn lạʔi ʔaj cɔŋ lúk dó cúŋta ciếm lấʔi kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi xôŋ kó tʰàɲ nàʔɔ mìɲ xôŋ ciếm lấʔi tứklà sáʔu mươʔi káʔi tʰàɲ tɔàn ʔaï tɣốp nướk kủʔa ʔɔùk cɔŋ sứ basan kák tʰàɲ nầʔi dồnlũʔi kó vác kaw kửʔa kâʔi ɣàʔi kũŋ kó lấʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ xôŋ kó vác zất ɲiềʔu cúŋta xấnváʔi tậnziệt kák tʰàɲ nầʔi ɲư cúŋta dã cɔ sihôn vwa hếtbôn tứklà xấnváʔi ziệt kák tʰàɲ kák ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kɔncẻ ɲưŋ cúŋta ciếm lấʔi fần mìɲ hếttʰảʔi súkvật hóʔa tàʔi kủʔa kák tʰàɲ ấʔi vậʔi cɔŋ lúk dó cúŋta ciếm lấʔi kủʔa haj vwa ʔamôzít sứ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ xɛ ʔaï dến núʔi hẹtmôn zân sidôn ɣọʔi núʔi hẹtmôn siziôn kòn zân ʔamôzít dặt sênizơ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa dồŋbằŋ tɔàn ɣalaát tɔàn basan vì zântộk zêfaim cỉ kó mộtmìɲ ʔɔùk vwa basan kòn lạʔi nầʔi káʔi ɣiườŋ bằŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi cẳŋ kòn tạʔi zápba tʰàɲ kủʔa kɔncáʔu ʔammôn saw bề zàʔi ɣiườŋ cín tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk tʰeo tʰướk tăj ŋườʔi vậʔi cɔŋ lúk dó cúŋta ciếm lấʔi sứ nầʔi ta cɔ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát sứ ʔazô ʔɛ cên xɛ ʔaï fânnửʔa núʔi ɣalaát kùŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ta cɔ fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ fần kòn lạʔi kủʔa núʔi ɣalaát tɔàn basan nướk kủʔa ʔɔùk tứklà kả ʔaï tɣốp kùŋ tɔàn basan vậʔi miền ấʔi ɣọʔilà sứ zêfaim zajzơ kɔncaj manasɛ ciếm lấʔi kả ʔaï tɣốp cɔdến ɣiớʔihạn zân ɣêsuzít makatʰít dặt mìɲ cɔ kák tʰôn sứ basan tʰôn zajzơ dến ŋàʔinăj hãʔi kòn ta kũŋ cɔ maki sứ ɣalaát về ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát cɔ fần ɣalaát kó zɛɲ ɣiữʔa xɛ ʔaï cɔdến xɛ zabốt ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa kɔncáʔu ʔammôn vớʔi dồŋbằŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kinêzết tớʔi kủʔa dồŋbằŋ tứklà biển zướʔi ciền núʔi fícɣa fíʔa dôŋ vả cɔŋ lúk dó cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi kó fó sứ nầʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi dặŋ ɲận lấʔilàm sảnŋiệp hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ciếnsĩ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kầm biɲxí di kwa cướk ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên cỉ ɲữŋ kɔncẻ súkvật kák ŋươʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kó ɲiềʔu súkvật lạʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi dến cừŋ nàʔɔ Ðứkzê cɔ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi ʔanŋỉ ɲư mìɲ ʔɛɲɛm kũŋ ɲận dượk sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ tạʔi fíʔa kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dɔạn mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi cởvề sảnŋiệp mìɲ dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi Ðʔaŋ lúk ấʔi kũŋ cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ ɣiôsuê zằŋ mắt ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔi mọʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ haj vwa nầʔi Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi cɔ kák nướk nàʔɔ ŋươʔi di kwa Ðừŋ kák nướk dó cíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɛɲ ciến cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ lúk nầʔi kầʔuxẩn kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ lạʔicúʔazê cúʔa dã xởʔi cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa waiŋiêm káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa cúʔa cêncờʔizướʔidất kó tʰần nàʔɔ dượkviệk kôŋsự kwiềnnăŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư kủʔa cúʔa căŋ tôʔi sin cúʔa cɔfép tôʔi di kwa sɛm sứ tốttươʔi núʔi dẹpdẽ nầʔi liban kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɲưŋÐứkzê bởʔi kớ kák ŋươʔi nổʔizận kùŋ xôŋ ɲậnlờʔi fán zằŋ tʰôʔi cớ kòn nóʔi việk nầʔi kùŋ nữʔa hãʔi di cót fícɣa ŋướk ŋươʔi hướŋ tâʔi hướŋ bắk hướŋ hướŋ dôŋ ɲìn sứ ấʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ nầʔi dâʔu sɔŋ hãʔi cwiền mạŋ lịɲ cɔ ɣiôsuê cɔ ŋườʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí ấʔilà ŋườʔi fảʔi di kwa cướk zân nầʔi xiến cúŋ ɲận lấʔi sứ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi Ấʔi vậʔi cúŋta kó cɔŋ cũŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ bếtfê ʔɔ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ zạʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰeo dể kák ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ vàʔɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲận dượk kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰêm ci dừŋ ci diềʔu cwiền cɔ dể ɣiữ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cwiền ɲânzịp kủʔa baɛɲfê ʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kó ziệt xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi mọʔi tʰeo baɛɲfê ʔɔ kòn kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ŋàʔinăj hếttʰảʔi kòn sốŋ nầʔi dâʔi dã zạʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zặn dể kák ŋươʔi tʰeo ɣiữʔa sứ mìɲ vàʔɔ dặŋ ɲận lấʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ tʰeo kák mạŋ lịɲ nầʔi ấʔilà xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cướk kák zântộk ŋɛnóʔi kák nầʔi nóʔi zằŋ zân nầʔi zân xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ xôŋ haj vảcăŋ kó zân nàʔɔ kó kák tʰần mìɲ ɣầnɲư cúŋta kó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣần cúŋta mọʔixi cúŋta kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi căŋ lạʔi kó nướklớn nàʔɔ kó ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ kôŋbìɲ ɲư kả luậtfáp nầʔi ŋàʔinăj dặt cướk kák ŋươʔi căŋ cỉ hãʔi ɣiữ lấʔi ŋươʔi lɔ kɛɲ kẩntʰận liɲhồn mìɲ ʔɛ ŋươʔi kwên ɲữŋ diềʔu mìɲ dã tʰấʔi hầʔu cɔ cẳŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa dờʔi ŋươʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu dó lìʔa xỏʔi lòŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi zạʔi cɔ kák kɔn cáʔu ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲớ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi cầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi hôzếp xi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi ɲóm zânsự dể xiến cúŋ ŋɛ lờʔi hầʔu cɔ kíɲ daŋ lúk kòn sốŋ nơʔi tʰế tʰượŋ zạʔi lờʔi dó cɔ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ vậʔi kák ŋươʔi lạʔi ɣần dứŋ zướʔi núʔi vả núʔi kả lửʔa cáʔi cɔdến cờʔi kó tốʔităm mâʔi dɛnkịt từ cɔŋ lửʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋɛ tiếŋnóʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi hìɲcạŋ nàʔɔ cỉ ŋɛ tiếŋ tʰôʔi ŋàʔi zaw cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi zawướk kủʔa ŋàʔi tứklà mườʔi diềʔu zăn xiến kák ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ lấʔi ŋàʔi cép mườʔi diềʔu zăn ấʔi cên haj bảŋ dá cɔŋ lúk dó Ðứkzê kũŋ fán zặn zạʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ dể kák ŋươʔi tʰeo tạʔi cɔŋ sứ mìɲ di vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi kẩntʰận ɣiữ lấʔi liɲhồn mìɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó tʰấʔi hìɲcạŋ nàʔɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi nơʔi ɣiữʔa lửʔa fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi tạʔi hôzếp ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi hɔạʔi cɔ mìɲ căŋ tượŋ cạm nàʔɔ tạʔɔ hìɲcạŋ kủʔa tʰần nàʔɔ hɔặk hìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi hăj ŋườʔi hɔặk hìɲ kủʔa kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ di cên dất hɔặk hìɲ kủʔa nàʔɔ kó káɲ băj cên cờʔi hɔặk hìɲ kủʔa lɔàʔi kôncùŋ nàʔɔ cên dất hăjlà hìɲ kủʔa kɔn ká nàʔɔ cɔŋ nướk zướʔi dất lạʔi ʔɛ xi ŋươʔi ŋướk cờʔi tʰấʔi mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ kák ŋôʔisaw tứklà tɔàn kả tʰiênbiɲ tʰì ŋươʔi kwiến zụ kwì suốŋ cướk kák dó tʰờ lạʔi kák tiɲtú nầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã ciə fân cɔ muônzân zướʔi cờʔi căŋ kòn kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê dã cọn zút kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi lửʔa bằŋ kiə sứ zíptô dể kák ŋươʔi tʰàɲ zân ziêŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ʔiɲư kák ŋươʔi dã diềʔu dó ŋàʔinăj Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê kớ kák ŋươʔi nổʔizận kùŋ kó tʰề zằŋ xôŋ dượk di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cẳŋ dặŋ vàʔɔ sứ tốtdẹp ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp vì fảʔi cết cɔŋ sứ nầʔi xôŋ di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dượk ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi di kwa ɲận lấʔi sứ tốtdẹp ấʔi xá kẩntʰận ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ cớ kwên zawướk kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ tượŋ cạm nàʔɔ hìɲ kủʔa nàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã kấm ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɲư dám lửʔa tiêʔu cáʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj xi kák ŋươʔi kó kɔn kùŋ cáʔu xi dã lâʔu cɔŋ sứ zồʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi bạʔihɔạʔi mìɲ tượŋ cạm nàʔɔ hìɲ kủʔa ci mặkzầʔu hàɲ ák cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dể cọk ŋàʔi nổʔizận tʰì ŋàʔinăj cờʔi dất làmcứŋ kwiết cɔ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cết vộʔi xuất xỏʔi sứ mìɲ di ɲận lấʔi tạʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ dó lâʔuzàʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ tậnziệt Ðứkzê lạk kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák nướk cỉ kòn lạʔi ɲỏ cɔŋ kák nướk Ðứkzê zẫn kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ dó kák ŋươʔi kúŋ tʰờ ɲữŋ tʰần bằŋ kâʔi bằŋ dá kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ cẳŋ kũŋ cẳŋ ŋửʔi dó ŋươʔi kầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xi nàʔɔ hếtlòŋ kầʔu ŋàʔi tʰì mớʔi ɣặp xi ŋươʔi zannan kák việk nầʔi sảʔi dến cɔ ŋươʔi bấʔizờ cɔŋ ŋàʔi kuốʔicùŋ ŋươʔi cởvề kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ ŋàʔi vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj tʰươŋsót xôŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ hủʔiziệt ŋươʔi dâʔu kũŋ cẳŋ kwên zawướk ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi hỏʔi họk tʰờʔicỳ kó cướk ŋươʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cên dất ɣók cờʔi nầʔi dến ɣók cờʔi kiə nếʔu bawzờ kó sảʔiza việk nàʔɔ zườŋ ấʔi hăjlà ŋườʔita kó ŋɛ ci ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi căŋ tứklà kó zântộk nàʔɔ ŋɛ tiếŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ lửʔa fán za ɲư ŋươʔi dã ŋɛ kòn sốŋ căŋ hăjlà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó kậʔi lấʔi tʰửtʰác zấʔu diềm ciếncɛɲ káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za kùŋ kậʔi kôŋsự tɔtát ɣớmɣê dặŋ tʰử di ciếm zântộk cɔ mìɲ ɣiữʔa zântộk xák ɲư mọʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô zướʔi mìɲ căŋ ŋươʔi dã cứŋkiến mọʔi diềʔu dó dể ɲìn zằŋ ɣiêhôva ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cớ xôŋ ʔaj xák ŋàʔi ŋàʔi cên cờʔi xiến cɔ ŋươʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ ŋàʔi dể zạʔi ŋươʔi cên dất ŋàʔi xiến cɔ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi dám lửʔa ŋàʔi cɔŋ lửʔa ŋươʔi kó ŋɛ lờʔi ŋàʔi fán za bởʔivì ŋàʔi ʔiêʔumến kák tổfụ ŋươʔi cọn lấʔi zòŋzõʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi cáɲ ŋàʔi ɲờ kwiềnnăŋ mìɲ zút ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ duổʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋườʔi ɲữŋ zântộk mạɲ ŋươʔi dặŋ dưʔa ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ kủʔa zân dó cɔ sảnŋiệp ʔiɲư diềʔu ấʔi sảʔi dến ŋàʔinăj vậʔi ŋàʔinăj hãʔi ɣitạk cɔŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi kaw kiə zướʔi dất tʰấp nầʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj xák hãʔi ɣiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔinăj cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi dềʔu kó fướk lâʔuzàʔi cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi mãʔimãʔi môʔisɛ za káʔi tʰàɲ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ hướŋ mặtcờʔi mọk dể sátɲân ɣiết ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ xôŋ kó ɣét cướk dượk tʰế cốncáɲ cɔŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nầʔi dượk sốŋ Ấʔilà bếtsɛ nơʔi zừŋ vắŋ cɔŋ sứ dồŋbằŋ dể cɔ ŋườʔi zubên zamốt nơʔi ɣalaát dể cɔ ŋườʔi ɣát ɣôlan nơʔi basan dể cɔ ŋườʔi manasɛ nầʔi luậtfáp môʔisɛ dặt cướk zân ʔisơzaên nầʔi cứŋkớ mạŋ lịɲ môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ cũŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ bếtfê ʔɔ tạʔi sứ sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít hếtbôn môʔisɛ zân ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô zân ʔisơzaên ciếm sứ ŋườʔi vớʔi sứ ʔɔùk vwa basan haj vwa zân ʔamôzít tạʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ hướŋ mặtcờʔi mọk ʔazô ʔɛ cên xɛ ʔaï cɔdến núʔi siziôn ŋĩʔalà hẹtmôn tɔàn dồŋbằŋ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ cɔdến kủʔa dồŋbằŋ zướʔi ciền núʔi fícɣa vậʔi môʔisɛ ɣọʔi kả ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ hõʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ŋɛ ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔinăj zaw cwiền nơʔi taj kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi họktập kẩntʰận tʰeo ɲữŋ diềʔu dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kó zawướk kùŋ cúŋta tạʔi hôzếp cẳŋ fảʔi kùŋ tổfụ cúŋta Ðứkzê dã zawướk nầʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ kùŋ hếttʰảʔi cúŋta ŋàʔinăj kòn sốŋ dâʔi Ðứkzê tạʔi cên núʔi ɣiữʔa lửʔa dã dốʔiziện fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi Ðʔaŋ lúk dó dứŋ ɣiữʔa Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi dặŋ cwiền lạʔi lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi lửʔa xôŋ cên núʔi ŋàʔi fán zằŋ ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã zút ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứklà xỏʔi ɲà cướk ŋươʔi cớ kó kák tʰần xák ŋươʔi cớ tượŋ cạm cɔ mìɲ kũŋ cớ tượŋ nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲữŋ cên cờʔi kaw kiə hɔặk nơʔi dất tʰấp nầʔi hɔặk cɔŋ nướk zướʔi dất ŋươʔi cớ kwì lạʔi cướk kák hìɲtượŋ dó kũŋ dừŋ hầʔu việk cúŋnó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔaj ɣét ɲơn tộʔi tổfụ fạt lạʔi kɔncáʔu dến dờʔi dến ŋàn dờʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ʔiêʔumến ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋươʔi cớ lấʔi zɛɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cơʔi Ðứkzê xôŋ kầmbằŋ vôtộʔi nàʔɔ lấʔi zɛɲ ŋàʔi cơʔi hãʔi ɣiữ ŋàʔi ŋỉ dặŋ tʰáɲ ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fán zặn ŋươʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋàʔi ŋỉ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cớ kôŋviệk nàʔɔ hɔặk ŋươʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi tôʔi caj ɣáʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi hɔặk lừʔa hɔặk cɔŋ kák súkvật kủʔa ŋươʔi hăjlà xác cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ dượk ŋỉ ɲư ŋươʔi xá ɲớ zằŋ ŋươʔi dã tôʔimọʔi nơʔi sứ zíptô ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi zùŋ tăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi dó bởʔi kớ ấʔi cɔnên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kó zặn biểʔu ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ ŋàʔi ŋỉ hãʔi hiếʔu kíɲ camẹ ŋươʔi ɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kó fán zặn hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu kó fướk cên dất ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cớ ɣiết ŋườʔi ŋươʔi cớ fạmtộʔi tàzâm ŋươʔi cớ cộmkướp ŋươʔi cớ làmcứŋ zốʔi cɔ lânkận mìɲ ŋươʔi cớ tʰam kủʔa lânkận mìɲ cớ tʰam ɲà kủʔa ŋườʔi hɔặk zuộŋ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi lừʔa hăjlà ci tʰuộk lânkận ŋươʔi tạʔi cên núʔi ɣiữʔa lửʔa mâʔi tốʔităm Ðứkzê kó zùŋ tiếŋ fán ɲữŋ lờʔi nầʔi cɔ kả hộʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ tʰêm ci dɔạn ŋàʔi ɣi kák lờʔi dó cên haj bảŋ dá caw cɔ vả cɔŋ xi kả núʔi fát lửʔa kák ŋươʔi vừʔa ŋɛ tiếŋ ɣiữʔa nơʔi tốʔităm fán za tʰì ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dến ɣần nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dã za viɲhiển waiŋiêm ŋàʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛ tiếŋ ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa lửʔa fán za ŋàʔinăj cúŋtôʔi tʰấʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fán kùŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kòn sốŋ ɲưŋ bâʔizờ kớsaw cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cết dám lửʔa nầʔi tiêʔuziệt cúŋtôʔi víbằŋ cúŋtôʔi kòn kó ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cết vì cɔŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kó ʔaj dã ŋɛ tiếŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sɛɲ hɔạt ɣiữʔa lửʔa fán za ɲư cúŋtôʔi kòn sốŋ vậʔi ôŋ hãʔi di dến ɣần ŋɛ mọʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi fán zồʔi hãʔi cwiền lạʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi mọʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋɛ tʰeo Ðʔaŋ xi kák ŋươʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi fán kùŋ zằŋ ta kó ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi zân nầʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi cúŋnó nóʔi ɲưvậʔi lấʔilàm tʰậm fảʔi cớci zân nầʔi tʰườŋ kó mộtlòŋ kíɲ hằŋ ɣiữ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn ɲưtʰế dể cúŋnó kɔncáʔu cúŋnó dượk fướk dờʔidờʔi hãʔi di nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ xá cởvề cạʔi mìɲ kòn ŋươʔi hãʔi lạʔi dâʔi vớʔi cwiền kák diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ ŋươʔi zạʔi lạʔi cɔ dể cúŋnó tʰeo kák diềʔu dó cɔŋ sứ cɔ ɲận lấʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi xá kẩntʰận tʰeo ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fán zặn kák ŋươʔi cớ sâʔi kwa hữʔu hɔặk kwa kák ŋươʔi xá di tʰeo cọn dườŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cỉ cɔ dể kák ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ hưởŋ fướk lâʔuzàʔi cɔŋ sứ mìɲ ɲận dượk vả nầʔi diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fán zặn zạʔi lạʔi cɔ dể kák ŋươʔi tʰeo cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi di vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn dờʔi ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi vâŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi hãʔi ŋɛ lấʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi dượk fướk tʰêm ɲiềʔu cɔŋ sứ dượm sữʔa ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi dã fán hứʔa kùŋ ŋươʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ŋɛ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ɣiêhôva kómộtxôŋaj ŋươʔi fảʔi hếtlòŋ hếtsứk kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kák lờʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tạʔi cɔŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi xá ânkần zạʔizỗ diềʔu dó cɔ kɔnkáʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi nóʔi dến hɔặk xi ŋươʔi ŋồʔi cɔŋ ɲà hɔặk xi diŋɔàʔi dườŋ hɔặk lúk ŋươʔi hăjlà xi cổʔi zậʔi xá buộk cên tăj mìɲ ɲư zấʔu ɣiữʔa haj kɔn ŋươʔi ɲư cí kũŋ fảʔi kák lờʔi dó cên kột ɲà cên kửʔa ŋươʔi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã zẫn ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ ŋàʔi tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi zaham ʔisák zakốp dặŋ cɔ ŋươʔi xiến ŋươʔi lấʔidượk ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi xôŋ kó sâʔicất ɲữŋ ɲà dầʔidủ kák tʰứ kủʔa ŋươʔi xôŋ kó cấtcứʔa kák ɣiếŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ kó dàʔɔ kâʔi ɲɔ kâʔi livɛ ŋươʔi xôŋ kó cồŋ xi ŋươʔi dượk nɔnê xá ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ kẻʔɔ ŋươʔi kwên Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứklà xỏʔi ɲà ŋươʔi fảʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fụk ŋàʔi lấʔi zɛɲ ŋàʔi tʰề cớ tʰeo kák tʰần xák cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰần kủʔa kák zântộk suŋkwɛɲ kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋự ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔɛ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi nổʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ziệt ŋươʔi xỏʔi mặtdất căŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰử ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲư dã tʰử ŋàʔi tạʔi masa xá kẩntʰận ɣiữ lấʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn cứŋkớ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ tốtlàɲ cướk Ðứkzê dể ŋươʔi dượk fướk vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ tốtdẹp Ðứkzê dã tʰề hứʔa kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi dể cɔ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê duổʔi ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc za xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán vậʔi về ŋàʔisăw xi kɔnŋườʔi hỏʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ kák cứŋkớ mạŋ lịɲ nầʔi ci ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dã cwiền cɔ ca tʰì hãʔi dáp zằŋ cúŋta dã tôʔimọʔi cɔ fazaôn tạʔi sứ zíptô Ðứkzê kó zùŋ tăj mạɲ dɛm cúŋta za xỏʔi sứ ấʔi Ðứkzê kó cướk cúŋta ɲữŋ zấʔu fép zất lớnlaw dáŋsợ hạʔi sứ zíptô fazaôn kà ɲà ŋườʔi ŋàʔi dã dɛm cúŋta za xỏʔi sứ ấʔi dể zẫn vàʔɔ sứ ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cúŋta dể cɔ cúŋta Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ cúŋta xá tʰeo kák nầʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta hầʔu cɔ cúŋta dượk fướk dượk ŋàʔi bảʔɔtồn sốŋ cɔ cúŋta ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã dến ŋàʔinăj vả cúŋta dượk sưŋ kôŋbìɲ nếʔu cúŋta kẩntʰận tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn nầʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán zặn vậʔi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã zẫn ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ mìɲ ɲận dượk duổʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu zântộk zân hêtít zân ɣizêɣasít zân ʔamôzít zân kanaan zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít tứk bảʔi zântộk mạɲ ŋươʔi xi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fó cɔ kák zân ấʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dáɲbạʔi cúŋ tʰìfảʔi ziệt cúŋ di cớ zawướk kùŋ kũŋ dừŋ tʰươŋsót lấʔi ŋươʔi cớ sujza vớʔi cúŋ cớ ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ kɔncaj kũŋ dừŋ kướʔi kɔŋáʔi cɔ kɔncaj mìɲ kák zântộk nầʔi zụ kɔncaj ŋươʔi lìʔabỏ fụk kák tʰần xák zồʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ziệt ŋươʔi kác vộʔivàŋ ɲưŋ dốʔi kùŋ kák zân dó kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲưvầʔi fá ɲữŋ bàntʰờ dập ɲữŋ fɔ tượŋ dáɲ kák tʰần ʔasêza dốt ɲữŋ hìɲ cạm kủʔa cúŋnó vì ŋươʔi zân tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋàʔi dã cọn ŋươʔi cɔŋ muônzân cên mặtdất dặŋ zân tʰuộk ziêŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cíʔu cọn lấʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kák ŋươʔi dôŋ mọʔi zân xák dâʔu tʰật kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ zân xák ɲưŋ ấʔi Ðứkzê tʰươŋiêʔu kák ŋươʔi ɣiữ lờʔi tʰề ŋàʔi dã kùŋ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê ɲờ tăj mạɲ zút kák ŋươʔi za cuộk xỏʔi ɲà kứʔu xỏʔi tăj fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô vậʔi fảʔi ɲậnbiết zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰàɲ ɣiữ zawướk ɲântừ dến ŋàn dờʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋàʔi vâŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi ŋàʔi báʔɔứŋ ɲãntiền cɔ ɲữŋ ɣét ŋàʔi hủʔiziệt cúŋnó di ŋàʔi xôŋ cìhɔãn kùŋ nàʔɔ ɣét ŋàʔi dâʔu báʔɔứŋ ɲãntiền cɔ dó vậʔi xá kẩntʰận tʰeo ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj nếʔu ŋươʔi ŋɛ kák nầʔi ɣìŋiữ tʰeo tʰì dốʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữ lờʔi zawướk tʰươŋsót ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi zatăŋ ŋươʔi fướk cɔ kɔnkáʔi ŋươʔi cɔ tʰổsản ŋươʔi cɔ ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi cɔ lứʔa dẻ kủʔa káʔi ciên káʔi ŋươʔi saj dôŋ cên dất ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi dể cɔ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk fướk mọʔi zân nơʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj sɔnsẻ hɔặk hăj hɔặk kɔn dựk hăj kɔnkáʔi cɔŋ bầʔi súkvật kủʔa ŋươʔi Ðứkzê xiến kák bịɲ lìʔa sa ŋươʔi ɲữŋ bịɲ lâʔi kủʔa sứ zíptô kiə ŋươʔi dã tʰì ŋàʔi cẳŋ ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ ɣiáŋ cɔ ɲữŋ nàʔɔ ɣét ŋươʔi vậʔi fảʔi ziệt kák zântộk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fó cɔ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ dɔáʔi tʰươŋ cúŋnó dừŋ hầʔu việk kák tʰần ấʔi káʔi bẫʔi cɔ ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ kák zântộk nầʔi dôŋ làmsaw duổʔi cúŋnó za dượk tʰìcớ hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cɔ fazaôn kả sứ zíptô tứklà ɲữŋ tʰửtʰác lớnlaw ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi ɲữŋ zấʔu fép káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã kậʔi lấʔi dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dãʔi ɲưvậʔi kák zântộk ŋươʔi sợhãʔi dó vảlạʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi saj ɲữŋ ʔɔŋ dến hạʔi cúŋnó cɔ tớʔi cừŋ nàʔɔ ɲữŋ dã tʰɔát xỏʔi cốn ziệt cướk ŋươʔi cớ kớ cúŋnó sợhãʔi ci ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋự tạʔi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất dáŋsợ ɲưŋzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi kák zântộk nầʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰế ziệt cúŋnó măw ʔɛ ɲữŋ tʰúzừŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu hạʔi ŋươʔi căŋ sɔŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fó cúŋnó cɔ ŋươʔi xiến cɔ vàʔɔ kiɲhɔàŋ zữzộʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ cúŋnó ziệt ŋàʔi fó kák vwa cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi sóʔa zɛɲ kák vwa dó xỏʔi zướʔi cờʔi cẳŋ kòn ʔaj cốŋkự cướk ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi dã ziệt cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰiêʔudốt ɲữŋ tượŋ cạm kák tʰần cúŋnó cớ tʰamlam kũŋ cớ lấʔi cɔ mìɲ bạk hăj vàŋ bọk kák tượŋ ấʔi ʔɛ ŋươʔi fảʔi mắk bẫʔi căŋ ấʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cớ dɛm vàŋ ɣớmɣiếk nầʔi vàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ ʔɛ ŋươʔi kũŋ dáŋ ziệt ɲư xá ɣớmɣê dến dềʔu dáŋ ziệt hãʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo hếttʰảʔi diềʔu zăn cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj dể kák ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ dượk za tʰêm dượk vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi dể cɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲớ cọn kɔn dườŋ nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã zẫn ŋươʔi di cɔŋ mươʔi nầʔi dể ŋươʔi suốŋ tʰử ŋươʔi dặŋ biếtdiềʔu kó cɔŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi hɔặk ŋươʔi kó ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi hăj căŋ vậʔi ŋàʔi kó ŋươʔi suốŋ cɔ ŋươʔi dóʔi dɔạn cɔ ŋươʔi tổfụ ŋươʔi cưʔa dể xiến ŋươʔi zằŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi sốŋ cẳŋ fảʔi ɲờ báɲ tʰôʔi ɲưŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi sốŋ ɲờ mọʔi lờʔi bởʔi miệŋ Ðứkzê za cɔŋ mươʔi nầʔi áʔɔsốŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ cân ŋươʔi cẳŋ fù vậʔi xá ɲậnbiết cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi sửʔa fạt ŋươʔi ɲư ŋườʔi sửʔa fạt kɔn mìɲ vậʔi hãʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi di tʰeo kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xiến ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ tốttươʔi kó ɲiềʔu xɛ suốʔi nướk sâʔu fun cɔŋ cũŋ cên núʔi sứ kó lúʔamì lúʔamạc zâʔi ɲɔ kâʔi kâʔi lựʔu zầʔu livɛ sứ dó ŋươʔi báɲ dầʔidủ cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ci dá sứ dó cɔŋ núʔi ŋươʔi lấʔi dồŋ za vậʔi ŋươʔi nɔnê xɔŋ xɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kớ sứ tốttươʔi ŋàʔi dã cɔ ŋươʔi xá kẩntʰận ʔɛ kwên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiữɣìn ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔinăj cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi căŋ lạʔi ʔɛ săw xi dã nɔnê kất ɲà dặŋ tʰấʔi ciên kủʔa mìɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu bạk vàŋ mọʔi tàʔisản mìɲ zưzật zồʔi tʰì bấʔizờ lòŋ ŋươʔi tựkaw kwên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứk xỏʔi ɲà căŋ Ấʔilà ŋàʔi dã zẫn ŋươʔi di ŋaŋ kwa dồŋ vắŋ mêɲmôŋ ɣớmɣiếk nầʔi dầʔi ɲữŋ zắnlửʔa dất xôxan cẳŋ kó nướk ŋàʔi xiến nướk dá zất kứŋ fun za cɔ ŋươʔi lạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi tổfụ cưʔa dể ŋươʔi suốŋ tʰử ŋươʔi hầʔu săw cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi xá kɔicừŋ cớ nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ Ấʔi ɲờ kwiềnnăŋ sứklựk kủʔa tăj dɔạt dượk ɲữŋ sảnŋiệp nầʔi hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ấʔilà ŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sứklựk dɔạt dượk ɲữŋ sảnŋiệp dể cọn zawướk ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã ŋàʔinăj nếʔu ŋươʔi kwên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰeo kák tʰần xák hầʔu việk kwì lạʔi cướk kák tʰần ấʔi tʰì ŋàʔinăj káʔɔ kwiết zằŋ kák ŋươʔi ziệt kák ŋươʔi ziệt ɲư ɲữŋ zântộk kiəmà Ðứkzê twiệtziệt cướk kák ŋươʔi bởʔivì xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ŋɛ ŋàʔinăj ŋươʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ ciếm lấʔi kák zântộk mạɲ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ tườŋ kaw dến cờʔi zân tɔlớn ták kaw kɔncáʔu ʔanakim ŋươʔi dã kó ŋɛ móʔi zằŋ ʔaj dươŋ dịc nổʔi cướk kɔncáʔu ʔanák vậʔi ŋàʔinăj fảʔibiết zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di cướk ŋươʔi ɲư dám lửʔa hừŋ tiêʔuziệt suốŋ kák zân nầʔi cướk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi za ziệt cúŋnó kác măw ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ ŋươʔi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã duổʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi cớ nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ Ấʔi kớ kôŋbìɲ tôʔi Ðứkzê xiến tôʔi vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ nầʔi tʰậtlà bởʔi zanák kủʔa kák zântộk dó Ðứkzê mớʔi duổʔi cúŋnó za xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ kủʔa kák zântộk ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kớ kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi hăjlà lòŋ cáɲ cựk kủʔa ŋươʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ kớ zanák kủʔa cúŋnó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi cúŋnó za xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi dể cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi hứʔa ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi zaham ʔisák zakốp vậʔi xá zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kớ kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi sứ tốttươʔi nầʔi dâʔu bởʔi ŋươʔi zân kứŋkổ hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi cớ kwên zằŋ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ŋươʔi dã cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi từ ŋàʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔdến cốn nầʔi ŋươʔi tʰườŋ fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê tạʔihô zếp kák ŋươʔi kũŋ dã cọkzận Ðứkzê ŋàʔi nổʔi tʰạɲ twan ziệt kák ŋươʔi xi di núʔi dặŋ lãɲ haj bảŋ dá tứklà haj bảŋ zawướk Ðứkzê dã kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cên núʔi mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm xôŋ báɲ cẳŋ ʔuốŋ nướk Ðứkzê caw cɔ haj bảŋ dá bởʔi ŋóntăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi za kó dủ ɲữŋ lờʔi Ðứkzê ɣiữʔa lửʔa tạʔi cên núʔi kó fán za kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɲóm sảʔi xi mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm zồʔi Ðứkzê cɔ haj bảŋ dá tứklà haj bảŋ zawướk Ðʔɔạn Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi măw măw suốŋ xỏʔi dâʔi zân ŋươʔi dɛm za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dã bạʔihɔạʔi vộʔi dạʔɔ kủʔa dã cwiền cɔ cế cɔ mìɲ tượŋ dúk Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ zằŋ ta ɲìn sɛm zân nầʔi kìʔa zân kứŋkổ hãʔi dể mặk ziệt cúŋnó sóʔa cúŋnó xỏʔi zướʔi cờʔi zồʔi cɔ ŋươʔi tʰàɲ zântộk mạɲ zân ấʔi vậʔi sâʔi lạʔi di suốŋ núʔi kả núʔi kó lửʔa cáʔi haj tăj kầm haj bảŋ dá zawướk bấʔizờ ɲìn sɛm kìʔa kák ŋươʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi zất vộʔi dạʔɔ ŋàʔi dã cwiền cɔ cɔ mìɲ kɔn kɔn dúk ta haj bảŋ dá liệŋ za xỏʔi tăj dập cướk kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn kớ kák ŋươʔi làmzữ fạmtộʔi cọŋ cướkmắt Ðứkzê cọk cɔ ŋàʔi ɣiận lạʔi mìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm ɲư cướk xôŋ báɲ cẳŋ ʔuốŋ nướk vì kơn tʰạɲ tứkzận kủʔa Ðứkzê dã nổʔi fừŋ dặŋ ziệt kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkzê kòn ɲậm lờʔi nầʔi nữʔa Ðứkzê kũŋ nổʔinóŋ fừŋ kùŋ ʔazôn dến dỗʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi sɔŋ kũŋ kầʔuŋwiện cɔ ʔazôn cɔŋ lúk dó Ðʔɔạn lấʔi tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tứklà kɔn kɔn kák ŋươʔi dã dɛm dốt cɔŋ lửʔa dập za từŋ miếŋ ŋiền cɔdến dỗʔi za bụʔi zồʔi dổ bụʔi ấʔi nơʔi xɛ cên núʔi cảʔi suốŋ kák ŋươʔi kũŋ kó cọkzận Ðứkzê tạʔi tʰabêza tạʔi masa tạʔi kípzốtʰatʰava xiÐứkzê saj kák ŋươʔi di kadɛbanê ʔa kó zặn zằŋ hãʔi di ɲận lấʔi sứ cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi dã bộʔiŋịc mạŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ ŋàʔi từ ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔdến bâʔizờ kák ŋươʔi tʰườŋ fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê vậʔi kớ Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ŋàʔi twan ziệt kák ŋươʔi kứ mìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi zằŋ cúʔazê ôʔi sin cớ ziệt zânsự kủʔa cúʔa kơŋiệp kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa dã lấʔi waiŋiêm ŋàʔi cuộk lạʔi ɲờ tăj kwiềnnăŋ zút za xỏʔi sứ zíptô sin hãʔi ɲớ dến ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa cúʔa zaham ʔisák zakốp cớ cấp kứŋ lòŋ huŋzữ tộʔiák kủʔa zân nầʔi ʔɛ zân kủʔa sứ cúʔa dã dɛm cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi dó nóʔi zằŋ bởʔivì Ðứkzê xôŋ tʰế dɛm zân ấʔi vàʔɔ sứ ŋàʔi dã hứʔa ŋàʔi ɣét cúŋnó zẫn cúŋnó za xỏʔi sứ dặŋ ɣiết di cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sɔŋ cúŋ zânsự kơŋiệp kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa dã zùŋ kwiềnnăŋ káɲtăj ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za zút za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔŋ lúk dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi dụk baj bảŋ dá ɲư haj bảŋ cướk hãʔi dến cên núʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi dóŋ káʔi bằŋ kâʔi ta cên haj bảŋ nầʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi dã kó cên haj bảŋ cướk ŋươʔi dã dập zồʔi dể haj bảŋ nầʔi cɔŋ vậʔi dóŋ káʔi bằŋ kâʔi dụk haj bảŋ dá ʔiɲư haj bảŋ cướk zồʔi di cên núʔi kầm haj bảŋ dó cɔŋ tăj ŋàʔi cên haj bảŋ nầʔi lờʔi ŋàʔi dã cướk tứklà mườʔi diềʔu zăn Ðứkzê ɣiữʔa lửʔa tạʔi cên núʔi kó fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɲóm zồʔi Ðứkzê caw cɔ ta cở di suốŋ núʔi dể haj bảŋ vàʔɔ dã dóŋ haj bảŋ ấʔi kòn tạʔi dó ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn vậʔi vả zân ʔisơzaên di bêzốt bênêzakan dến môsêza ʔazôn kwadờʔi dượk côn tạʔi dó lêʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi cứk tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi từ dó zân ʔisơzaên di dến ɣútɣôda zồʔi ɣútɣôda dến zốtbatʰa sứ kó ɲiềʔu sôŋzạc cɔŋ lúk ấʔi Ðứkzê cifáʔi lêvi ziêŋ za dặŋ xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê cầʔucựk cướk Ðứkzê fụk ŋàʔi ɲânzɛɲ ŋàʔi cứk fướk cɔdến ŋàʔinăj bởʔi kớ dó lêvi xôŋ fần xôŋ ŋiệp vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ Ðứkzê kơŋiệp kủʔa ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fán kùŋ ŋườʔi vậʔi cên núʔi cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm ɲư dầʔu nầʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi ɲậm lờʔi bằŋlòŋ xôŋ ziệt ŋươʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di dầʔu zânsự dặŋ cúŋnó vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cúŋnó dể cɔ cúŋnó vậʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dòʔi ŋươʔi diềʔu ci cẳŋ fảʔi dòʔi ŋươʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di tʰeo kák dạʔɔ ŋàʔi hếtlòŋ kíɲmến fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj dể ŋươʔi dượk fướk kìʔa cờʔi kák từŋ cờʔi kaw cờʔi dất mọʔi nơʔi dất dềʔu tʰuộk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cỉnÐứkzê ưʔadẹp kák tổfụ ŋươʔi ʔiêʔumến zồʔi cɔŋ muônzân ŋàʔi dã cọn zòŋzõʔi tứklà kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ŋàʔinăj vậʔi hãʔi cừ ôʔuế kủʔa lòŋ mìɲ di cớ kứŋkổ nữʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák tʰần cúʔa kủʔa kák cúʔa tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất kó kwiềnnăŋ dáŋsợ xôŋ tʰiênvị ʔaj cẳŋ ɲận kủʔa hốʔilộ bàʔɔcữʔa kôŋbìɲ cɔ mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa tʰươŋ ŋườʔi xác dồăn áʔɔsốŋ cɔ ŋườʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰươŋ ŋườʔi xác kák ŋươʔi dã làmxác cɔŋ sứ zíptô ŋươʔi fảʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fụk ŋàʔi cíʔu ŋàʔi cỉ zɛɲ ŋàʔi tʰề Ấʔi cíɲ ŋàʔi viɲkwaŋ ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã ɲữŋ việk lớnlaw dáŋ kíɲ nầʔi ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi xi tổfụ ŋươʔi suốŋ sứ zíptô kó bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi kòn bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cɔ ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu bằŋ saw cên cờʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hằŋ ɣìŋiữ diềʔu ŋàʔi cwiền ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣìŋiữ tứklà mạŋ lịɲ diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲìn xôŋ nóʔi kùŋ kɔncẻ kák ŋươʔi bởʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ ci kũŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ci ɲữŋ lờʔi zănzạʔi kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi waiŋiêm ŋàʔi káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲữŋ fép kôŋviệk ŋàʔi za ɣiữʔa sứ zíptô hạʔi fazaôn vwa zíptô tɔàn sứ ŋườʔi hãʔi ɲận biếtdiềʔu ŋàʔi cɔ dạʔɔ biɲ zíptô ŋựʔa sɛ zíptô cɔŋ xi cúŋ duổʔi tʰeo kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê nướk biển dỏ lạʔi hủʔiziệt cúŋnó dến ŋàʔinăj việk ŋàʔi dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cɔdến xi tớʔi cốn nầʔi kũŋ hãʔi ɲận biếtdiềʔu ŋàʔi cɔ Ðʔa tʰan ʔabizam kɔncaj cáʔu zubên xi dất tạʔi ɣiữʔa kả ʔisơzaên miệŋ haj ŋườʔi zakwiến vớʔi cạʔi mọʔi ci tʰeo vì kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ việk Ðứkzê dã vậʔi fảʔi ɣìŋiữ hếttʰảʔi diềʔu zăn cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj dể kák ŋươʔi dượk mạɲmẽ vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ mìɲ ciếm dượk hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi sốŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi cên dất Ðứkzê dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi kủʔa tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa vì sứ ŋươʔi vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ɲư sứ zíptô nơʔi mìɲ dã za xỏʔi tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi ŋươʔi zeo fảʔi ɲờ lấʔi cân mìɲ tuớʔi ɲư zăwkỏ ɲưŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi di vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi dó sứ kó núʔi cũŋ ɲờ mưʔa cờʔi dượk tʰấm tướʔi Ấʔilà sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi sănsók ŋàʔi hằŋ dɔáʔi sɛm dầʔu dến kuốʔi vậʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi cămcỉ ŋɛ kák diềʔu zăn cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj hếtlòŋ kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fụk ŋàʔi tʰì cɔ mưʔa mùʔa tʰu mưʔa mùʔa suân suốŋ tʰuận tʰì tạʔi cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi ŋươʔi tʰâʔu ɣóp ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi ta kũŋ xiến dồŋzuộŋ ŋươʔi sɛɲ kỏ cɔ súkvật ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk nɔnê kák ŋươʔi xá kẩntʰận kẻʔɔ lòŋ mìɲ zụzỗ sâʔi cúʔa hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák kwì lạʔi cướk cúŋnó căŋ ʔɛ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê fừŋ kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi dóŋ kák từŋ cờʔi lạʔi nỗʔi cẳŋ kó mưʔa nữʔa dất xôŋ sɛɲ ɲưvậʔi kák ŋươʔi vộʔi cết cɔŋ sứ tốttươʔi nầʔi sứ Ðứkzê cɔ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi kất dể cɔŋ lòŋ cɔŋ cí mìɲ ɲữŋ lờʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi deo ɲư zấʔu nơʔi tăj ɲư cí ɣiữʔa haj kɔn hãʔi zạʔi lạʔi cɔ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ nóʔi dến hɔặk xi ŋươʔi ŋồʔi cɔŋ ɲà hăjlà di dườŋ hɔặk xi ŋươʔi hăjlà xi cổʔi zậʔi kũŋ fảʔi ɣi kák lờʔi ấʔi cên kột ɲà cên kửʔamìɲ hầʔu cɔ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kủʔa kɔnkáʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk ɲiềʔu tʰêm cɔŋ sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ɲữŋ ŋàʔi kủʔa cờʔi cên dất vì ɲượkbằŋ kák ŋươʔi kẩntʰận ɣìŋiữ hếttʰảʔi diềʔu zăn nầʔi cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi di tʰeo kák dạʔɔ ŋàʔi cíʔu ŋàʔi tʰì Ðứkzê duổʔi ɲữŋ zântộk nầʔi za xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi xiến kák ŋươʔi tʰắŋ dượk zântộk mạɲ mìɲ fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ bàncân kák ŋươʔi dạp dến dềʔu tʰuộk kák ŋươʔi ɣiớʔihạn kák ŋươʔi cạʔi dồŋ vắŋ tớʔi liban sôŋ fơzát dến tâʔi cẳŋ ʔaj dứŋ nổʔi dượk cướk kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi zảʔi kiɲxủŋ sợhãʔi cɔŋ xắp sứ kák ŋươʔi dạp cân ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán kìʔa ŋàʔinăj dặt cướk kák ŋươʔi fướk làɲ zủʔasả fướk làɲ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi ŋɛ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cwiền cɔ ŋàʔinăj zủʔasả nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ sâʔi dườŋ cỉ cɔ ŋàʔinăj dặŋ di tʰeo kák tʰần xák kák ŋươʔi xôŋ xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xiến ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ dặŋ ɲận lấʔi tʰìfảʔi zaw cúk làɲ cên núʔi ɣazisim cúk zữ cên núʔi bɛɲ haj núʔi nầʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kwa xỏʔi dườŋ tâʔi tạʔi dất zân kanaan cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiɲɣɛɲ ɣần ɲữŋ kâʔi zẻ kủʔa môzê saw vì kák ŋươʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi lấʔi sứ sảnŋiệp tạʔi dó vậʔi fảʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔinăj dặt cướk kák ŋươʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ cọn dờʔi mìɲ sốŋ cên dất kák ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣìŋiữ tʰeo cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi dã cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ ɲữŋ zântộk kák ŋươʔi duổʔi di dã hầʔu việk kák tʰần cúŋnó hɔặk cên núʔi kaw hɔặk cên nổŋ hăjlà zướʔi kâʔisɛɲ tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi hủʔiziệt sạc di fảʔi fá dổ bàntʰờ dập fɔ tượŋ tʰiêʔu ɲữŋ cụ ʔasêza kủʔa cúŋnó cɔŋ lửʔa lạʔi ɲữŋ tượŋ cạm kák tʰần cúŋnó sóʔa kák tʰần ấʔi cɔ xỏʔi cỗ dó cớ tùʔi tụk cúŋnó fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi sɔŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲữŋ cifáʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cọn dặŋ dặt zɛɲ ŋàʔi tứklà nơʔi ŋự kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi di dến dó dɛm zâŋ tạʔi dó ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák hisiɲ tʰuế fần mườʔi zâŋ ɣiơ kủʔa hɔàn ŋwiện kủʔa lạk kák kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa bầʔi ciên zồʔi kák ŋươʔi tạʔi dó cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi vujvẻ kùŋ zakwiến mìɲ mọʔi việk tăj mìɲ dã dượk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ cớ ɲư cúŋta ŋàʔinăj dâʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔilàm tùʔiý mìɲ tưởŋ fảʔi kák ŋươʔi cưʔa vàʔɔ nơʔi ʔanŋỉ cưʔa hưởŋ lấʔi kơŋiệp ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ sảnŋiệp ŋàʔi bìɲan cɔ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dể tʰùŋịc suŋkwɛɲ xiến cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk ʔiênổn bấʔizờ kó cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cọn dặŋ cɔ zɛɲ ŋàʔi ấʔilà nơʔi kák ŋươʔi dɛm zâŋ mọʔi diềʔu zặn kák ŋươʔi tứklà ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák hisiɲ tʰuế fần mườʔi zâŋ ɣiơ mọʔi kủʔa ɲất kák ŋươʔi hứʔa ŋwiện zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi tôʔi caj ɣáʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vujvẻ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi xá kɔicừŋ cớ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu mìɲ cɔŋ ɲữŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ɲưŋ fảʔi zâŋ tạʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê cọn cɔŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi dó ŋươʔi fảʔi mọʔi diềʔu cwiền zặn sɔŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ mìɲ ŋươʔi dượk mặký ɣiết ɲữŋ tʰúvật tʰịt tùʔi tʰeo fướk làɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi ôʔuế hăjlà ŋườʔi dượk tiɲ sạcsẽ dềʔu tʰịt ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ kɔn naj dựk cỉ kák ŋươʔi cớ hwiết fảʔi dổ hwiết cên dất ɲư nướk vậʔi kủʔa tʰuế fần mườʔi ŋũkốk zượʔu hăjlà zầʔu kùŋ ɲữŋ kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa bầʔi hăj ciên ci ŋươʔi hứʔa ŋwiện zâŋ kák kủʔa lạk hăjlà zâŋ ɣiơ tʰì kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ tạʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi tôʔi caj ɣáʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲữŋ ấʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tạʔicỗ ŋàʔi cọn ŋươʔi vujvẻ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi mọʔi việk tăj ŋươʔi dã cọn dờʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ xá ɣiữmìɲ cớ ŋườʔi lêvi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã mởzộŋ bờkõʔi ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán ŋươʔi ướkaw tʰịt nóʔi tôʔi tʰịt tʰì xá tùʔiý lấʔi nếʔu cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cọn dặŋ dặt zɛɲ ŋàʔi kác sa ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk ɣiết hăj ciên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ʔiɲư zặn zồʔi tùʔiý ŋươʔi lấʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ fảʔi tʰịt ấʔi ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ kɔn naj dựk ŋườʔi ôʔuế hăjlà ŋườʔi tiɲ sạc kũŋ dềʔu kả sɔŋ fảʔi ɣiữmìɲ cớ hwiết hwiết sốŋ cớ tʰịt vớʔi sốŋ ŋươʔi cớ hwiết fảʔi dổ cên dất ɲư nướk Ðừŋ hwiết hầʔu ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi dượk fướk bởʔivì kó diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk Ðứkzê kòn tʰúvật ŋươʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ hăjlà hứʔa ŋwiện zâŋ tʰìfảʔi dɛm tʰeo mìɲ dếnnơʔi Ðứkzê dã cọn zâŋ tʰịt hwiết kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kòn hwiết kák kɔn siɲ xák tʰìfảʔi dổ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dɔạn mớʔi tʰịt hãʔi ɣiữ ŋɛ kák diềʔu nầʔi zặn biểʔu ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi dượk fướk dờʔidờʔi bởʔivì diềʔu tốtlàɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã ziệt xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ɲữŋ zântộk ŋươʔi di dến dặŋ duổʔi di dó xi ŋươʔi dã duổʔi cúŋnó zồʔi dượk cɔŋ sứ cúŋnó tʰì hãʔi ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ kẻʔɔ săw xi cúŋnó dã ziệt xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi vàʔɔ bẫʔi bắtcướk cúŋnó hỏʔi zằŋ kák zântộk nầʔi fụk kák tʰần mìɲ tʰếnàʔɔ ta kũŋ tʰeo vậʔi nữʔa ŋươʔi cớ fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk ɣét tʰì cúŋnó dã cɔ kák tʰần mìɲ dếnnỗʔi cúŋnó tʰiêʔu kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔŋ lửʔa dể kúŋ tʰờ kák tʰần mìɲ kák ŋươʔi xá kẩntʰận tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu zặn biểʔu kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰêm hăjlà ci nếʔu ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi kó nổʔi tiênci hăjlà hăj ciêmbaw cɔ ŋươʔi zấʔu hɔặk fép nếʔu zấʔu hɔặk fép nầʔi ŋườʔi dã nóʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi dượk ứŋŋiệm ŋườʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ ta hãʔi di tʰeo hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰìcớ ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa tiênci hăjlà ciêmbaw ấʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰử kák ŋươʔi dặŋ kák ŋươʔi kó hếtlòŋ kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi căŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi vâŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ fán ŋàʔi fụk ŋàʔi cíʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔita fảʔi ɣiết tiênci hăjlà ciêmbaw ấʔi kó ɣiụk zấʔi lɔạn kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cuộk kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi ɲà dặŋ sô ŋươʔi za ŋɔàʔi kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi di Ấʔi ŋươʔi ziệt huŋák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ ɲưvậʔi xi ʔɛɲɛm vớʔi ŋươʔi hăjlà kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi ʔiêʔumến hɔặk bạɲữʔu tʰiết ŋươʔi ɣiụk ŋươʔi kác ɲiệm zằŋ ta hãʔi di hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák ŋươʔi hăj tổfụ ŋươʔi xôŋ tứklà kák tʰần kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk cuŋkwɛɲ hɔặk ɣần hăj sa ŋươʔi dầʔu nầʔi kủʔa dất cɔdến dầʔu kiə tʰìcớ cịʔu tʰeo cớ xứŋ ŋɛ mắt ŋươʔi dừŋ tʰươŋtiếk cớ dộŋlòŋ sótsa cɛcở cɔ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiết tăj mìɲ fảʔi ca vàʔɔ mìɲ cướcết dặŋ ɣiết di zồʔi săw tăj kủʔa kả zânsự fảʔi dá cɔ cết tʰế ɣiụk ŋươʔi sakác ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứk xỏʔi ɲà vậʔi kả ʔisơzaên hăj diềʔu dó sợhãʔi cẳŋ kòn việk ák zườŋ ấʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi nữʔa xi ŋươʔi ŋɛnóʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ kó ɲữŋ zantà ɣiữʔa mìɲ za zụzỗ zân tʰàɲ dó zằŋ ta hãʔi di hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰìfảʔi hỏʔitʰăm casét cɔ kỹkàŋ bằŋ diềʔu ŋườʔita nóʔi cântʰật kwảkwiết nếʔu diềʔu ɣớmɣiếk ɲưvậʔi dã fạm ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiết zânsự tʰàɲ ấʔi bằŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm fảʔi zùŋ ɣươm tậnziệt mọʔi cɔŋ vớʔi súkvật kủʔa Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣɔm hếttʰảʔi kủʔa kướp lạʔi ɣiữʔa fố tʰàɲ zồʔi dốt tʰàɲ mọʔi kủʔa kướp cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰì tʰàɲ dốŋ mãʔimãʔi xôŋ dượk kất lạʔinữʔa fàm dáŋ tậnziệt cẳŋ kòn ɣì zíɲ lạʔi mảʔimăj nơʔi tăj ŋươʔi dể xi ŋươʔi vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰì Ðứkzê ŋuôʔi kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cɔ dɔáʔi tʰươŋ ŋươʔi xiến cɔ ŋươʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kɔnkáʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ ŋườʔi cết kắt tʰịt mìɲ hɔặk kạʔɔ ɣiữʔa haj kɔn bởʔi ŋươʔi zân tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðứkzê dã cọn ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák zân cên mặtdất hầʔu ŋươʔi zân ziêŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi cớ ci ɣớmɣiếk nầʔi ɲữŋ lɔàʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk kɔn kɔn cừʔu kɔn zê káʔi kɔn naj dựk kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ kɔn hươʔu dựk kɔn zê zừŋ kɔn sơnzươŋ kɔn zừŋ kɔn liɲzươŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ lɔàʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk kɔn nàʔɔ kó móŋ zẽ za cân ciə haj ɲơʔi ɲưŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ kɔn ɲơʔi kó móŋ zẽ za cân ciə haj nầʔi ɲữŋ kɔn kák ŋươʔi xôŋ fép kɔn lạkdà kɔn tʰỏ zừŋ kɔn tʰỏ ɲà cúŋnó ɲơʔi sɔŋ xôŋ kó móŋ zẽ za fảʔi kầm xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi kɔɲeo kũŋ vậʔi kó móŋ zẽ za ɲưŋ xôŋ ɲơʔi fảʔi kầm xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰịt kủʔa kák kɔn dó cớ dụŋ dến sákcết cúŋnó fàm lɔàʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ nướk kómaŋ kó vảʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi dượk ɲưŋ kɔn nàʔɔ xôŋ kómaŋ xôŋ kó vảʔi tʰì cẳŋ fảʔi kầm xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk mọʔi kɔn cim sạc sɔŋ nầʔi ɲữŋ kɔn kák ŋươʔi xôŋ cim ưŋ cim ŋạk kɔn kɔn ziềʔu kɔn mọʔi tʰứ lãʔɔ ưŋ mọʔi tʰứ kwạ cim dàdiểʔu kɔn cim tʰủʔi mọʔi tʰứ kắk cim mèʔɔ cim kɔn hạk cim tʰằŋ kɔn kòŋ kộk cim tʰằŋ kộk kɔnkò mọʔi tʰứ ziệk cim zẽ kwạt kɔn zơʔi mọʔi lɔàʔi kôncùŋ hăj băj xôŋ sạc cɔ kák ŋươʔi cớ kák ŋươʔi dượk mọʔi kɔn cim sạc kák ŋươʔi cớ kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ cết tựɲiên hãʔi dưʔa cɔ ŋườʔi xác ŋụ cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi ấʔi hăjlà mìɲ kũŋ dượk cɔ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ vì ŋươʔi zân tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ nấʔu tʰịt zê kɔn cɔŋ sữʔa mỗʔi ŋươʔi cớ kwên dóŋ tʰuế fần mườʔi huêlợʔi kủʔa ɣiốŋ mìɲ zeo dồŋzuộŋ mìɲ sɛɲ tạʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ nơʔi ŋàʔi cọn dặŋ dể zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰuế fần mườʔi ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa bầʔi hăj ciên kủʔa ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi hằŋ kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fướk cɔ nếʔu dườŋ di lấʔilàm sa kwá cɔ ŋươʔi dếnnỗʔi xôŋ tʰế dɛm kủʔa tʰuế fần mườʔi ấʔi dượk cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn dể dặt zɛɲ ŋàʔi kác sa ŋươʔi tʰì bấʔizờ ŋươʔi hãʔi dổʔi tʰuế fần mườʔi dó za bạk kầm bạk nầʔi cɔŋ tăj di dếnnơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cọn zồʔi dưʔa bạk ấʔi dổʔi lấʔi mọʔi tʰứk ci mìɲ ướkaw hɔặk hăj ciên hɔặk zượʔu hăjlà dồ ʔuốŋ săj tứklà mọʔi ci mìɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi tạʔi dó cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vujvẻ vớʔi zakwiến mìɲ cớ ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ kó fần kũŋ xôŋ hưởŋ kơŋiệp ci cuŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi kuốʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi fần mườʔi kủʔa huêlợʔi ấʔi za cứʔa tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ bấʔizờ ŋườʔi lêvi xôŋ kó fần ci kũŋ cẳŋ hướŋ kơŋiệp ci cuŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi dềʔu dến cɔ nɔnê hầʔu cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ mọʔi kôŋviệk tăj ŋươʔi dã kuốʔi mỗʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiảʔitʰíc nầʔi kủʔa ɣiảʔitʰíc fàm củnợ fảʔi ɣiảʔitʰíc văj mìɲ dã cịʔu cɔ lânkận mìɲ văj ŋươʔi cớ tʰúk lânkận mìɲ hăjlà ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cả lạʔi ŋườʔita dã kaw zaw ɣiảʔitʰíc cɔ Ðứkzê ŋươʔi dượk tʰúk ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cả lạʔi sɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi kó ci tʰuộk mìɲ tʰìfảʔi tʰa ấʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ nơʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó ŋèʔɔnàn Ðứkzê kwả fướk cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔilàm sảnŋiệp ŋươʔi cămcỉ ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán ŋươʔi cɔ ɲiềʔu nướk văj kòn cáɲ ŋươʔi xôŋ văj ʔaj ŋươʔi kwản ɲiềʔu nướk sɔŋ kák nướk ấʔi cẳŋ kwản ŋươʔi nếʔu cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ kủʔa sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi kó ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋèʔɔ tʰìcớ kứŋ lòŋ tăj lạʔi cướk ʔɛɲɛm ŋèʔɔ kủʔa mìɲ dó ɲưŋ xá tăj mìɲ za cɔ ŋườʔi văj ci kần zùŋ cɔŋ ŋèʔɔnàn kủʔa ŋườʔi xá kɔicừŋ kẻʔɔ kó ák tưởŋ nơʔi lòŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ năm tʰứbảʔi tứklà ɣiảʔitʰíc hầʔu ɣần xá kɔicừŋ kẻʔɔ ŋươʔi cẳŋ dɔáʔi tʰươŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋèʔɔ kủʔa mìɲ xôŋ ɣiúp cɔ ŋườʔi ɣì ʔɛ ŋườʔi kêʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋươʔi ŋươʔi mắk tộʔi căŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiúp cɔ ŋườʔi cớ cɔ kó lòŋ tiếk tạʔi kớ ấʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋươʔi mọʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi dặt tăj vàʔɔ vì kó ŋèʔɔ cɔŋ sứ mớʔi zặn biểʔu ŋươʔi zằŋ xá tăj mìɲ za cɔ ʔɛɲɛm âʔulɔ ŋèʔɔxó cɔŋ sứ ŋươʔi xi cɔŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi ŋườʔi hêbơzơ hăj cɔ ŋươʔi tʰì hầʔu việk ŋươʔi cɔŋ sáʔu sɔŋ kwa tʰứbảʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiảʔifóŋ ŋườʔi xi ŋươʔi ɣiảʔifóŋ ŋườʔi cớ cɔ ŋườʔi di zatăj xôŋ fảʔi kấp cɔ ŋườʔi ci hɔặk cɔŋ bầʔi mìɲ hɔặk kủʔa dạp lúʔa mìɲ hɔặk kủʔa zượʔu mìɲ tứklà kấp cɔ ŋườʔi bởʔi cɔŋ kủʔakảʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fướk cɔ ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲớ zằŋ mìɲ dã tôʔimọʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cuộk ŋươʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋàʔinăj cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi kák diềʔu nầʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu tôʔimọʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ di za xỏʔi ɲà củ ŋươʔi zakwiến ŋươʔi lấʔilàm tʰỏʔa lòŋ fụkzịc ŋươʔi tʰì bấʔizờ ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi káʔi zùʔi dể taj ŋườʔi kửʔa sỏ vậʔi ŋườʔi tôʔitớ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔ ɣáʔi mìɲ ŋươʔi cớ kó nặŋlòŋ ɣiảʔifóŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã fụkzịc ŋươʔi sáʔu fânnửʔa kôŋ ɣiá kủʔa ŋườʔi vậʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ dựk sɛɲ cɔŋ bầʔi hăj ciên kủʔa ŋươʔi cớ kàʔi bằŋ kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa káʔi mìɲ cớ lôŋ kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa ciên káʔi mìɲ mỗʔi ŋươʔi zakwiến ŋươʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi cọn ɲưŋ nếʔu kó ci kwè hăj duj hɔặk nặŋ xák tʰìcớ zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ ôʔuế dượk sạc kũŋ dềʔu dượk ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ hăjlà kɔn naj dựk cỉn ŋươʔi cớ hwiết fảʔi dổ hwiết cên dất ɲư nướk vậʔi hãʔi ɣiữ tʰáŋ lúʔa cỗ vượtkwa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ấʔi cɔŋ tʰáŋ lúʔa cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi daŋ bandêm dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi Ðứkzê cọn dể zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi zùŋ kɔn siɲ bằŋ bầʔi ciên bầʔi zâŋ vượtkwa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vớʔi vượtkwa cớ báɲ fa mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋươʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn tứklà báɲ hɔạnnạn dặŋ ɣiữ ấʔi ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vộʔivàŋ hầʔu cɔ cọn dờʔi ŋươʔi ɲớ ŋàʔi mìɲ dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi mɛn nơʔi ɲàŋươʔi hăj cɔŋ xắp dịʔafận ŋươʔi tʰịt kɔn siɲ ŋươʔi dã ɣiết lúk ciềʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲất tʰìcớ dể dến sáŋmaj ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk ɣiết kɔn siɲ vượtkwa cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲưŋ cỉ cɔŋ nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn dể zɛɲ ŋàʔi ấʔilà nơʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ vượtkwa vàʔɔ lốʔi ciềʔu vừʔa xi mặtcờʔi ɲằm ɣiờ ŋươʔi dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô fảʔi nấʔu tʰịt kɔn siɲ tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn zồʔi sáŋmaj cởvề cạʔi mìɲ cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kó cọŋtʰể cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ kôŋviệk nàʔɔ ŋươʔi fảʔi dếm bảʔi xởʔi dến bảʔi nầʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔita ca káʔi lưỡʔi háʔi vàʔɔ mùʔa ɣặt ŋươʔi ɣiữ bảʔi cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi zɔ tăj mìɲ dɛm zâŋ kủʔa lạk tùʔi tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi tôʔi caj ɣáʔi ŋươʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa ɣiữʔa vòŋ ŋươʔi dềʔu vujvẻ tạʔi cɔŋ cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cọn dể zɛɲ ŋàʔi fảʔi ɲớ lạʔi zằŋ mìɲ dã tôʔimọʔi tạʔi sứ zíptô xá kẩntʰận tʰeo kák nầʔi xi ŋươʔi dã tʰâʔu huêlợʔi kủʔa dạp lúʔa zượʔu mìɲ zồʔi tʰìfảʔi ɣiữ lềʔu cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋươʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi tôʔi caj ɣáʔi ŋươʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa dềʔu vujvẻ ɣiữ dó cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiữ nầʔi cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê cọn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ kák mùʔamàŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋươʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi vuimừŋ cọnvẹn mọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi mỗʔi fảʔi zamắt ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi cọn tứklà ɲằm báɲ xôŋ mɛn bảʔi lềʔu ŋườʔita cẳŋ di tăjxôŋ zamắt Ðứkzê mỗʔi ŋườʔi zâŋ tùʔi tʰeo kủʔa mìɲ kó tùʔi tʰeo fướk ɣiêhôva
