Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi tùʔi từŋ cifáʔi mìɲ ɲữŋ kwan cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ kwan ấʔi sử dɔán zânsự kác kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi cớ zịc cáɲ cựk cớ tʰiênvị ʔaj kũŋ cẳŋ ɲận kủʔa hốʔilộ kủʔa hốʔilộ cɔ xônŋwan zốʔi lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰeo kôŋbìɲ kác cọnvẹn dể ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ ɲận lấʔi sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɣần bàntʰờ ŋươʔi cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cớ zựŋ hìɲtượŋ kủʔa tʰần ʔasêza bằŋ tʰứ kâʔi nàʔɔ kũŋ cẳŋ zựŋ cụ tʰờ nàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi lấʔilàm ɣét kák ấʔi ŋươʔi cớ zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kɔn dựk hɔặk kɔnciên kó hăj ci ấʔilà ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kó ŋườʔi hăj diềʔu ák cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vifạm zawướk ŋàʔi di hầʔu việk kwì lạʔi kák tʰần xák hɔặk mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ hăjlà kả tʰiênbiɲ tứklà diềʔu xôŋ kó zạʔi biểʔu xi diềʔu dó dɛm họk cɔ ŋươʔi hăj tʰìfảʔi cahỏʔi kỹkàŋ nếʔu diềʔu ŋườʔita nóʔi tʰật kwảkwiết kó ɣớmɣê zườŋ ấʔi dã fạm cɔŋ ʔisơzaên tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi zẫn ŋườʔi hăj dã làmviệk ák dó dến kửʔa tʰàɲ dá cɔ cúŋnó cết kứ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa haj hɔặk ŋườʔi cứŋ mớʔi sửtử dáŋ cết ɲưŋ kứ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi cứŋ xôŋ dủ sửtử ŋườʔi tăj kủʔa kák ŋườʔi cứŋ fảʔi ca vàʔɔ mìɲ dầʔu dặŋ cɔ cết săw tăj kủʔa kả zânsự ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi kất huŋák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ xi nàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ kó cɛɲtụŋ hɔặk dổ hwiết hɔặk ɣiàɲ sé hăjlà tʰươŋtíc ŋươʔi fânsử lấʔi làmxó kwá tʰìfảʔi dứŋzậʔi di cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn dến ɣần ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cifáʔi lêvi kùŋ ŋườʔi daŋ xi ấʔi kwan hỏʔihan cɔ mìɲ fánsét dáŋ dịɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi ʔi tʰeo lờʔi zạʔi cɔ mìɲ tạʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê cọn xá kẩntʰận tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi zạʔi kủʔa fảʔi tʰeo luậtfáp zạʔi cɔ fánsét ɣiảŋ za cớ sâʔi hữʔu hăj kák diềʔu ɣiảŋ kủʔa sɔŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ xôŋ xứŋ vâŋ tʰeo tʰầʔi dứŋ tạʔi dó dặŋ hầʔu việk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hăjlà xôŋ vâŋ kwan tʰì ŋườʔi dó fảʔi cết ŋươʔi kất ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ʔisơzaên kả zânsự ŋɛ diềʔu ấʔi xôŋ kòn buôŋ tʰeo kiêʔuŋạʔɔ nữʔa xi ŋươʔi dã vàʔɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ dượk ɲận lấʔi tạʔi sứ dó zồʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi nóʔi tôʔi vwa kaicị tôʔi ɲư kák zântộk cuŋkwɛɲ tʰì xá vwa kaicị ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn fảʔi vwa tʰuộk ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi cớ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ xôŋ fảʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi sɔŋ vwa ấʔi cẳŋ lɔ cɔ kó ɲiềʔu ŋựʔa cớ tʰêm ɲiềʔu ŋựʔa zẫn zânsự cởlạʔi sứ zíptô bởʔi Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ cởvề dườŋ dó nữʔa vwa kũŋ xôŋ ɲiềʔu fitần ʔɛ lòŋ ŋườʔi cở sấʔusa lạʔi cẳŋ tʰâʔu ɣóp ɲiềʔu bạk vàŋ vwa xi tứkvị vwa fảʔi ciếʔu tʰeo luậtfáp nầʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zòŋ lêvi ɣiữ cép cɔ mìɲ bản ấʔi fảʔi vwa cọn dờʔi vwa fảʔi dọk cɔŋ dể kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ kẩntʰận tʰeo kák lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi hếttʰảʔi diềʔu zăn nầʔi kẻʔɔ lòŋ vwa cên ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ sâʔi hữʔu hăj lìʔabỏ diềʔu zăn nầʔi hầʔu cɔ vwa kɔncáʔu vwa dượk cịvì lâʔu ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zòŋ lêvi kả cifáʔi lêvi xôŋ kó fần kũŋ xôŋ kó sảnŋiệp cuŋ vớʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋ hưởŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kơŋiệp ŋàʔi nuôʔi lấʔi mìɲ vậʔi cúŋ xôŋ kó fần sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ Ðứkzê kơŋiệp kủʔa ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán vả nầʔi fần dịɲ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kó fép lấʔi cɔŋ kák kủʔa zânsự zâŋ hɔặk bằŋ dựk hăjlà ciên káʔi cẻʔɔ vaj káʔi káʔi bụŋ ŋươʔi kấp cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu lôŋ ciên dầʔutiên kủʔa ŋươʔi tạʔi cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cọn tʰầʔi dể ŋườʔi kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɲânzɛɲ Ðứkzê cầʔucựk fụk cướk ŋàʔi dờʔidờʔi xôŋ zứt xi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰàɲ nàʔɔ cỗ nàʔɔ tạʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên tʰàɲtâm dếnnơʔi Ðứkzê cọn nếʔu ŋườʔi ɲânzɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ hầʔu việk ɲư hếttʰảʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi lêvi cầʔucựk tạʔi dó cướk Ðứkzê tʰì ŋườʔi kó fần lươŋtʰựk bằŋ fần kủʔa kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ xôŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kótʰể dượk kủʔa ŋiệp mìɲ xi ŋươʔi dã vàʔɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ cớ bắtcướk ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zântộk tạʔi dó ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi cớ kó ʔaj dɛm kɔncaj hăj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ŋaŋ kwa lửʔa cớ kó tʰầʔibóʔi hɔặk hăj sɛm saw bóʔi tʰầʔi fùtʰủʔi tʰầʔifáp hăj zùŋ cú ŋườʔi di hỏʔi dồŋkốt tʰuậtsố hăjlà dicầʔu kɔŋ Ðứkzê lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk kák việk ấʔi kák ɣớmɣiếk ấʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi kák zântộk dó xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cọnvẹn vớʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vì ɲữŋ zântộk ŋươʔi duổʔi di ŋɛ tʰeo tàtʰuật bóʔi xwa sɔŋ fần ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ cɔfép ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi từ ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dấŋ tiênci ɲư kák ŋươʔi xá ŋɛ tʰeo dấŋ ấʔi diềʔu cíɲ ŋươʔi dã kầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi hôzếp cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɲóm zằŋ kầʔusin tôʔi cớ ŋɛ tiếŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi nữʔa cớ tʰấʔi dám lửʔa hừŋ nầʔi nữʔa ʔɛ tôʔi cết căŋ bấʔizờ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ cúŋnó nóʔi kólý cɔ cúŋ dấŋ tiênci ɲư ŋươʔi tʰuộk cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm cúŋ lấʔi kák lờʔi dể cɔŋ miệŋ ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi nóʔi cɔ cúŋ mọʔi diềʔu fán zặn ŋươʔi bằŋ kó ʔaj xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi dấŋ tiênci ɲânzɛɲ nóʔi tʰì hạc ʔaj dó kòn tiênci kó lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ɲânzɛɲ nóʔi diềʔu ci xôŋ biểʔu ŋườʔi nóʔi hăjlà ɲânzɛɲ kák tʰần xák nóʔi tʰì tiênci ấʔi fảʔi cết nếʔu ŋươʔi nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ làmsaw cúŋta ɲìn dượk lờʔi nàʔɔ Ðứkzê xôŋ kó fán xi tiênci ɲânzɛɲ Ðứkzê nóʔi víbằŋ lờʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi xôŋ sảʔi dến xôŋ ứŋŋiệm ấʔilà lờʔi Ðứkzê cẳŋ kó fán kẻ tiênci dó bởʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ nóʔi za cớ ŋườʔi xizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã ziệt kák zântộk kủʔa sứ ŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi xi ŋươʔi dã duổʔi cúŋnó di dượk cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kák ɲà cúŋnó zồʔi tʰìfảʔi dể ziêŋ káʔi tʰàɲ ɣiữʔa sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi zọn dườŋ ciə za fần dịʔafận kủʔa sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp ấʔi hầʔu cɔ sátɲân tạʔi dó vả nầʔi kác ŋườʔita fảʔi dãʔi sátɲân tạʔi dó dặŋ bảʔɔtồn sốŋ mìɲ nếʔu ʔaj dáɲ cết lânkận mìɲ xôŋ kó ɣɛɲɣét cướk tʰízụ nếʔu ŋườʔi dó di kùŋ lânkận mìɲ vàʔɔ zừŋ dốn kủʔi tăj ŋườʔi daŋ ɣiơ zìʔu za dốn zủʔi lưỡʔi zìʔu kán cúŋ ɲằm lânkận cɔ ấʔi cết di tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi cạʔi mìɲ cɔŋ kủʔa káʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi dặŋ bảʔɔtồn sốŋ mìɲ bằŋ cẳŋ báʔɔtʰù hwiết nóŋzận cạʔi duổʔi tʰeo sátɲân dó nếʔu dườŋ zàʔi kwá tʰeo dáɲ ŋườʔi cết di mặkzầʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ dáŋ cết bởʔi cướk ŋườʔi xôŋ kó ɣɛɲɣét lânkận mìɲ vìvậʔi zặn fán kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ hãʔi dể ziêŋ káʔi tʰàɲ nếʔu ŋươʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn nầʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tứklà tʰươŋmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hằŋ di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi tʰì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi mởzộŋ bờkõʔi ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kả sứ ŋàʔi dã hứʔa cɔ tổfụ ŋươʔi zồʔi bấʔizờ ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰêm tʰàɲ nữʔa vàʔɔ tʰàɲ cướk hầʔu cɔ hwiết vôtộʔi xôŋ dổ za ɣiữʔa sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp xôŋ kó hwiết cên mìɲ ŋươʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ʔaj ɣɛɲɣét lânkận mìɲ ɣàʔi mưʔuhạʔi ŋườʔi nổʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi cết zồʔi cạʔi mìɲ cɔŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ ấʔi tʰì ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ dó fảʔi saj di kéʔɔ za xỏʔi nơʔi vàʔɔ tăj báʔɔtʰù hwiết dể cết di mắt ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰươŋsót ɲưŋ fảʔi cừ hwiết ŋườʔi vôtộʔi xỏʔi ʔisơzaên tʰì ŋươʔi dượk fướk ŋươʔi cớ zờʔi mộk ɣiớʔi kủʔa lânkận mìɲ kák tiênɲân ŋươʔi dã kắm nơʔi sảnŋiệp ŋươʔi ɲận dượk tạʔi sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi cứŋ dộk ciếk xôŋ dủ kớ dịɲtộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zanák tộʔilỗʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi dã fạm kứ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa haj hăj ŋườʔi cứŋ tʰì mớʔi dịɲtộʔi dượk xi ŋườʔi cứŋ zốʔi zấʔi kùŋ nàʔɔ dặŋ faw tộʔi cɔ tʰì haj dàŋ kó cɛɲtụŋ ɲăw fảʔi ứŋ hầʔu cướk Ðứkzê cướk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kwan cứk daŋ tʰì dó kák kwan fảʔi casét kỹkàŋ nếʔu tʰấʔi ŋườʔi cứŋ nầʔi cứŋ zốʔi dã tʰưʔa zan cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cɔ ɲư dã twan cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ vậʔi ŋươʔi kất ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xák hăj diềʔu dó xôŋ huŋák ɲưtʰế ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi nữʔa mắt ŋươʔi cớ tʰươŋsót mạŋ dềnmạŋ dền zăŋ dền zăŋ tăj dền tăj cân dền cân xi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi za zawciến kùŋ tʰùŋịc mìɲ nếʔu tʰấʔi ŋựʔa sɛ biɲ dôŋ mìɲ tʰìcớ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã xiến ŋươʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô kùŋ ŋươʔi lúk ɣần xaiciến tʰầʔi bướk tớʔi nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ŋɛ ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi di zawciến kùŋ tʰùŋịc mìɲ lòŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ ɲát cớ cớ zunzẩʔi cớ kiɲ xiếp cúŋnó bởʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ kùŋ di vớʔi kák ŋươʔi dặŋ kák ŋươʔi dáɲ tʰùŋịc ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ bấʔizờ kák kwan cưởŋ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ ʔaj dã kất ɲà mớʔi cưʔa xáɲtʰàɲ hãʔi di cờ ɲà mìɲ ʔɛ cết nơʔi ciếncận zồʔi ŋườʔi xák xáɲtʰàɲ căŋ ʔaj dã cồŋ ɲɔ cưʔa háʔi cáʔi hãʔi di cởvề ɲà mìɲ kẻʔɔ cết nơʔi ciếncận zồʔi ŋườʔi xák háʔi cáʔi căŋ ʔaj dã hỏʔi ŋườʔi cưʔa kướʔi hãʔi di cởvề ɲà mìɲ ʔɛ cết nơʔi ciếncận zồʔi ŋườʔi xák kướʔi nàŋ căŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kứ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ ʔaj ŋườʔi ɲất hãʔi di cởvề ɲà mìɲ ʔɛ lòŋ kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dởm ɲư lòŋ mìɲ căŋ vừʔa xi kák kwan cưởŋ nóʔi sɔŋ vớʔi zânsự tʰìfảʔi ɲữŋ tướŋ làmdầʔu zânsự xi ŋươʔi dến ɣần káʔi tʰàɲ dặŋ cướk fảʔi ɣiảŋòʔa kùŋ nếʔu tʰàɲ dó dáp hòʔa mởkửʔa cɔ ŋươʔi tʰì tɔàn zânsự dó tʰuế fụkzịc ŋươʔi víbằŋ tʰàɲ xôŋ xứŋ hòʔa ɲưŋ xaiciến kùŋ ŋươʔi bấʔizờ ŋươʔi vâʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nambằŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm sɔŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰâʔu cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ dànbà kɔncẻ súkvật mọʔi ci cɔŋ tʰàɲ tứklà mọʔi kủʔa kướp dượk ŋươʔi lấʔi kủʔa kướp kủʔa kwân ŋịc ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi dốʔidãʔi ɲưvậʔi kùŋ kák tʰàɲ kác sa ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰuộk ɲữŋ zântộk nầʔi ɲưŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk nầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp tʰìcớ dể sốŋ nàʔɔ tʰở xá tậnziệt zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân kanaan zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã fán zặn dể cúŋnó xôŋ zạʔi kák ŋươʔi bắtcướk tʰeo ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk cúŋnó dã dặŋ kúŋ tʰờ kák tʰần cúŋnó ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi căŋ xi ŋươʔi vâʔi tʰàɲ nàʔɔ lâʔu dặŋ ciếm cớ lấʔi zìʔu cặt ɲữŋ kâʔi kủʔa tʰàɲ dó ŋươʔi kótʰể dượk cáʔi vậʔi cớ cặt kâʔi ŋɔạʔi dồŋ ŋườʔi dể ŋươʔi vâʔi saw ŋươʔi cỉ fảʔi fáhạʔi cặt ɲữŋ kâʔi mìɲ cẳŋ fảʔi kâʔiăncáʔi hãʔi zùŋ kất dồnlũʔi dể dáɲ tʰàɲ daŋ ɣiặk vớʔi mìɲ dó cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dầʔuhàŋ xi nàʔɔ cɔŋ dất ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi ŋườʔita ɣặp ŋườʔi ɣiết sảʔi cên dồŋ cẳŋ ʔaj dã ɣiết tʰì kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kwan kủʔa ŋươʔi fảʔi di za dɔ sa ŋườʔi ɣiết dến kák tʰàɲ cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ ɣần ŋườʔi ɣiết fảʔi kɔn káʔi cưʔa làmviệk hăj maŋ ác zẫn dến zòŋ nướk hằŋ cảʔi ɣần dó xôŋ ʔaj kàʔi zeo zồʔi tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi cɔŋ xɛ kổ kɔn káʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncaj lêvi dến ɣần ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cọn kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dặŋ fụk ŋàʔi ɲânzɛɲ Ðứkzê cúk fướk cɔ tùʔi lờʔi miệŋ làmbằŋ fảʔi kwiết fán kák cɛɲtụŋ tʰươŋtíc bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ ɣần ŋườʔi ɣiết zửʔa tăj mìɲ cên kɔn káʔi mớʔi kổ cɔŋ xɛ dɔạn kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ tăj cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ dổ hwiết nầʔi za cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi ɣì lạʔiÐứkzê kầʔusin ŋàʔi tʰa tộʔi cɔ zânsự ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dã cuộk sin cớ hwiết vôtộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi zồʔi tộʔi sátɲân dượk tʰa cɔ ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê kất hwiết vôtộʔi xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ xi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi za ciếndấʔu kùŋ kwân tʰùŋịc mìɲ ɲờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi zẫn cúŋnó nếʔu tʰấʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ ɣiặk ŋườʔi lịcsự mìɲ áʔimộ lấʔilàm tʰìfảʔi zẫn nàŋ ɲà mìɲ nàŋ kạʔɔ dầʔu mìɲ kắt móŋ tăj áʔɔ cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi xók camẹ mìɲ cɔŋ tʰáŋ ấʔi ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ nàŋ cồŋ nàŋ nàŋ ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋàʔisăw ŋươʔi xôŋ ưʔa nàŋ nữʔa nàŋ di dâʔu tʰìfảʔi cɔ nàŋ di mặký ŋươʔi dã lấʔi nàŋ cẳŋ xá nàŋ lấʔi hăj dãʔi nàŋ ɲư xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó haj nầʔi dượk tʰươŋ kiə ɣét sɔŋ kả haj dềʔu kó sɛɲ kɔn cɔ ŋươʔi kɔn cưởŋnam tʰuộk ɣét xi ŋươʔi ciə sảnŋiệp cɔ kák kɔn mìɲ tʰì cẳŋ dượk fép caw kwiền cưởŋnam cɔ kɔncaj kủʔa dượk tʰươŋ tʰế cɔ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣét bởʔi cưởŋnam ɲưŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲận kɔncaj kủʔa ɣét kɔn dầʔulòŋ ciə fần bằŋ haj mọʔi tʰuộk mìɲ dầʔutiên kủʔa sứkmạɲ ŋươʔi kwiền cưởŋnam tʰuộk vậʔi xi ʔaj kó dứʔa kɔn xó zạʔi bộʔiŋịc xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi camẹ mặkzầʔu cừŋcị xôŋ xứŋ vâŋ lờʔi tʰì camẹ fảʔi zẫn dến cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ mìɲ tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ Ðʔɔạn camẹ nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ mìɲ zằŋ nầʔi kɔn cúŋtôʔi xó zạʔi bộʔiŋịc xôŋ vâŋ lờʔi cúŋtôʔi hwaŋdàŋ săjsưʔa bấʔizờ cúŋ zân tʰàɲ ấʔi dá cɔ cết ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi kất ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ kả ʔisơzaên hăj diềʔu dó xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fạmtộʔi dáŋ cết tʰì hãʔi ɣiết ceo cụ hìɲ tʰâʔi cớ dể ceo cên cụ hìɲ kác dêm sɔŋ fảʔi côn cɔŋ nộʔi ŋàʔi dó nàʔɔ ceo Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zủʔasả ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ ôʔuế dất ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰấʔi hăjlà ciên kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ lạk tʰìcớ cẳŋ tʰấʔi fảʔi zẫn cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ víbằŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣần ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ kwɛnbiết ŋườʔi tʰìfảʔi zắt ciên dó vàʔɔ ɲàŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi dến bấʔizờ fảʔi cả lạʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔ kɔn lừʔa áʔɔsốŋ hăjlà mọʔi ci kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi ŋươʔi sí dượk cớ xôŋ tʰấʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰấʔi lừʔa hăj kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cên dườŋ cớ xôŋ tʰấʔi xá dỡ dứŋzậʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ fép mặk kwầnáʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ dượk mặk kwầnáʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔaj diềʔu dó lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xi ŋươʔi ɣặp ŋɔàʔi dườŋ hɔặk cên kâʔi hɔặk zướʔi dất cim vớʔi kɔn hăjlà cứŋ tʰìcớ cim vớʔi cim kɔn fảʔi dể cɔ cim di kɔn cɔ fần mìɲ dể ŋươʔi dượk fướk sốŋ lâʔu xi ŋươʔi kất káʔi ɲà mớʔi tʰìfảʔi kâʔu nơʔi máʔi ɲà kẻʔɔ nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cên dó suốŋ ŋươʔi ɣâʔi cɔ ɲà mìɲ kan dến hwiết căŋ cớ cồŋ ɲɔ mìɲ haj tʰứ kɔn ɣiâm ʔɛ hếttʰảʔi hɔặk kɔn ɣiâm ŋươʔi dã cồŋ hăjlà hwalợʔi kủʔa ɲɔ dềʔu tʰuộk nơʔi tʰáɲ cớ kàʔi bằŋ kɔn tʰắŋ cuŋ vớʔi kɔn lừʔa cớ mặk bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj fa lôŋ ciên ɣaj vớʔi ɲăw ŋươʔi fảʔi twa nơʔi céʔɔ áʔɔcɔàŋ kủʔa mìɲ mặk xi ŋườʔi dã kướʔi kùŋ nàŋ zồʔi săw lạʔi ɣét di faw cɔ ɲữŋ cwiện xiến nàŋ zɛɲzá ɣièm nàŋ zằŋ tôʔi kó lấʔi ŋườʔi dó xi dã dến ɣần tʰấʔi xôŋ kòn dồŋciɲ bấʔizờ camẹ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣáʔi dó lấʔi bàʔi za ɲữŋ zấʔu dồŋciɲ kủʔa nàŋ cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ tʰàɲ dó tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋươʔi ca kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣáʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zằŋ tôʔi kó ɣả kɔŋáʔi tôʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi ɣét nầʔi ŋườʔi faw ɲữŋ cwiện ɣâʔi cɔ zɛɲzá zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi kɔŋáʔi ôŋ kòn dồŋciɲ vả nầʔi kák zấʔu dồŋciɲ kủʔa kɔŋáʔi tôʔi zồʔi camẹ cảʔi áʔɔsốŋ nàŋ cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ dó bấʔizờ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ tʰàɲ dó ŋườʔi cồŋ dáɲ fạt bởʔivì kó ɣièm ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi mộtcăm siếk bạk zaw cɔ ca ŋườʔi ɣáʔi nàŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ fép duổʔi nàŋ di ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ ɲưŋ nếʔu cwiện ŋườʔi nóʔi tʰật nàŋ cẳŋ fảʔi dồŋciɲ tʰì kák cưởŋlãʔɔ fảʔi zẫn nàŋ za dến kửʔɛɲà ca nàŋ bátáɲ kủʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi lấʔi dá cɔ nàŋ cết nàŋ kó fạmtộʔi zanák tạʔi ʔisơzaên hàɲ zâm cɔŋ ɲà ca mìɲ Ấʔi ŋươʔi kất ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ ɲưvậʔi xi ŋườʔita ɣặp ŋườʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kó cồŋ tʰì ŋườʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kả haj dềʔu fảʔi cết Ấʔi ŋươʔi kất ák xỏʔi ʔisơzaên ɲưvậʔi xi kɔŋáʔi dồŋciɲ dã hứʔa ɣả cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó ŋườʔi xák ɣặp nàŋ cɔŋ tʰàɲ kùŋ tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zẫn kả haj ŋườʔi za kửʔa tʰàɲ dó lấʔi dá cɔ kả haj dềʔu cết kɔŋáʔi cẻ bởʔivì xôŋ kó cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi kɔncaj bởʔivì zɛɲzá ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ Ấʔi ŋươʔi kất ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ ɲưvậʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi ɣặp kɔŋáʔi hứʔa ɣả tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ hàɲhuŋ vớʔi nàŋ tʰì cỉ ŋườʔi fảʔi cết mộtmìɲ tʰôʔi cớ diềʔu ci cɔ kɔŋáʔi cẻ zó nàŋ xôŋ kó fạmtộʔi dáŋ cết việk nầʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi zấʔi kùŋ lânkận mìɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi di ŋườʔi ɣặp kɔŋáʔi cẻ dã hứʔa ɣả dó ŋɔàʔi dồŋ nàŋ kó tʰế xôŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu nếʔu ŋườʔi ɣặp kɔŋáʔi cẻ dồŋciɲ cưʔa hứʔa ɣả nàŋ kùŋ ŋườʔita ɣặp tạʔicận tʰì ŋườʔi dã kùŋ kɔŋáʔi cẻ dó fảʔi cɔ ca màŋ nămmươʔi siếk bạk zồʔi nàŋ ŋườʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó làmɲụk nàŋ ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ tʰì cẳŋ dượk fép duổʔi nàŋ di cẳŋ ʔaj lấʔi kủʔa ca mìɲ kũŋ dừŋ zở áʔɔ kủʔa ca mìɲ ŋườʔi hɔạn hɔặk ŋɔạʔi tʰận zập hăjlà kắt xôŋ dượk fép vàʔɔ hộʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kɔn ŋɔạʔitìɲ xôŋ dượk fép vàʔɔ hộʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê zầʔu dến dờʔi tʰứ mườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ vàʔɔ dượk zânam zân môáp xôŋ dượk fép vàʔɔ hộʔi Ðứkzê zầʔu dến dờʔi tʰứ mườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ bawzờ vàʔɔ dượk bởʔivì xi kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cúŋnó xôŋ dɛm báɲ nướk za zướk kák ŋươʔi cên dườŋ bởʔivì cúŋnó kó balaam kɔncaj bê fêtʰôzơ tạʔi mêsôbôtami di dến zủʔasả ŋươʔi ɲưŋzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ cịʔu ŋɛ balaam dổʔi zủʔasả za cúk fướk cɔ ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰươŋmến ŋươʔi cọn dờʔi ŋươʔi cớ kầʔu bìɲan hɔặk íclợʔi cɔ cúŋnó cớ lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk ŋườʔi dôm ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kũŋ cớ lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk ŋườʔi zíptô ŋươʔi dã làmxác cɔŋ sứ ŋườʔi kɔncáʔu sɛɲ dờʔi tʰứba dượk fép vàʔɔ hộʔi Ðứkzê xi ŋươʔi kéʔɔ biɲ za dáɲ kwân tʰùŋịc mìɲ hãʔi kɔicừŋ mọʔi việk ák víbằŋ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kó ʔaj xôŋ dượk tiɲ sạc bởʔi mộŋ zi sảʔi dến lúk bandêm tʰì ŋườʔi dó fảʔi di za ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân cớ vàʔɔ buổʔi ciềʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ nướk zồʔi xi mặtcờʔi vừʔa vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân lạʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi kó cỗ ziêŋ ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân ấʔilà nơʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi di za fảʔi kó kâʔi nọk vớʔi dồ tùʔitʰân xi nàʔɔ di za ŋɔàʔi hãʔi lấʔi kâʔi nọk nầʔi dàʔɔ zồʔi xi di fảʔi fẩn mìɲ lạʔi bởʔivì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di ɣiữʔa cạʔi kwân ŋươʔi dặŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi fó tʰùŋịc cɔ vậʔi cạʔi kwân ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰáɲ kẻʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ôʔuế nơʔi ŋươʔi sâʔi xỏʔi ŋươʔi căŋ xi tôʔitớ cốn xỏʔi củ mìɲ cạʔi dến ɲàŋươʔi cớ lạʔi cɔ củ vớʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa sứ ŋươʔi cɔŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ cọn tứk cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ kủʔa ŋươʔi lấʔilàm ưʔatʰíc cớ cɔŋ vòŋ kɔŋáʔi ʔisơzaên cớ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cwiên hươŋ cɔŋ vòŋ kɔncaj ʔisơzaên kũŋ cớ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cwiên tàzâm mặkzầʔu hứʔa ŋwiện ŋươʔi tʰểnàʔɔ cớ dɛm vàʔɔ ɲà kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hɔặk tiềnkôŋ kủʔa kɔn dĩ hăjlà ɣiá cả cɔ kɔn có kả haj dềʔu lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ dòʔi lờʔi lãʔi ɣì nơʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tiềnbạk dồăn hăjlà nàʔɔ mặkzầʔu ŋườʔita cɔ văj dể ănlờʔi ŋươʔi dượk fép lấʔi lợʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ ɲưŋ cớ lấʔi lợʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dể ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi mọʔi việk ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ŋươʔi vàʔɔ dể ɲận lấʔi xi ŋươʔi hứʔa ŋwiện kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰìcớ cìhɔãn cɔsɔŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dòʔi hɔàn ŋwiện ấʔi bằŋ cẳŋ cɔsɔŋ ŋươʔi maŋ lấʔi tộʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ hứʔa ŋwiện tʰì xôŋ fạmtộʔi xi môʔi ŋươʔi dã hứʔa kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hứʔa ŋwiện lạk tʰì xá kẩntʰận cọn lờʔi za xỏʔi miệŋ mìɲ dó xi ŋươʔi vàʔɔ ɲɔ kủʔa lânkận mìɲ tʰìkó fép ɲɔ tùʔi tʰeo miệŋăn ŋɔn nɔnê sɔŋ xôŋ dượk cɔŋ ɣiỏ mìɲ xi ŋươʔi vàʔɔ dồŋ lúʔamì kủʔa lânkận mìɲ tʰì dượk fép lấʔi tăj zứt ɣié lúʔa ɲưŋ cớ dặt lưỡʔi háʔi vàʔɔ dồŋ lúʔamì kủʔa lânkận mìɲ xi ŋườʔi kướʔi nếʔu nàŋ cẳŋ dượk cướk ŋườʔi bởʔi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi nơʔi nàŋ sấʔuhổ nàʔɔ tʰì ŋườʔi dượk dể caw vàʔɔ tăj nàŋ duổʔi nàŋ xỏʔi ɲà mìɲ xi nàŋ dã za xỏʔi ɲà mìɲ di ŋườʔi xák nếʔu ŋườʔi cồŋ tʰứ ɲì lạʔi ɣét nàŋ cɔ dể caw vàʔɔ tăj nàŋ duổʔi xỏʔi ɲà mìɲ hăjlà ŋườʔi cồŋ tʰứ ɲì nầʔi cết di tʰì ŋườʔi cồŋ tʰứ ɲấtlà ŋườʔi dã duổʔi nàŋ di xôŋ dượk fép lấʔi nàŋ lạʔi săw xi nàŋ ôʔuế vì ấʔilà việk ɣớmɣiếk cướk Ðứkzê ŋươʔi cớ dổ tộʔi cɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp xi ŋườʔi mớʔi kướʔi tʰìcớ di dáɲ ɣiặk cớ ŋườʔi ɣáɲ kôŋviệk ci ŋườʔi dượk tʰɔŋtʰả ɲà cɔŋ vujvẻ kùŋ ŋườʔi mìɲ dã kướʔi cớ cịʔu kầm káʔi tʰớt kốʔi zướʔi hăjlà cên ấʔilà cịʔu kầm sốŋ kủʔa lânkận mìɲ xi ŋườʔita ɣặp ʔaj kó ănkướp ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dã mọʔi hăjlà dã ŋườʔi tʰì ấʔi fảʔi sửtử ŋươʔi cừ ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ vậʔi hãʔi kɔicừŋ tajvạ bịɲ fuŋ dể ɣìŋiữ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu tʰầʔi zòŋ lêvi ɣiảŋzạʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kɔicừŋ ʔiɲư dã zặn biểʔu ɲữŋ tʰầʔi hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ miziəm zọk dườŋ xi kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô xi ŋươʔi cɔ lânkận ci cớ vàʔɔ ɲà ŋườʔi dặŋ lãɲ lấʔi kủʔa kầm ŋườʔi fảʔi dứŋ ŋɔàʔi ŋườʔi mìɲ cɔ dó dɛm kủʔa kầm za ŋɔàʔi dưʔa cɔ ɲượkbằŋ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ cớ lấʔi kủʔa kầm ŋườʔi di ŋủ xá cả cɔ ŋườʔi cướk xi mặtcờʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi ŋủ kó áʔɔsốŋ dáp cúk fướk cɔ ŋươʔi ấʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kôŋbìɲ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cớ ŋèʔɔxổ túŋ kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ hăjlà xác kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi fát kôŋ ɣiá cɔ ŋườʔi nộʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cướk xi mặtcờʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ côŋmɔŋ lãɲ kôŋ ɣiá ấʔi bằŋxôŋ ŋườʔi kêʔu dến Ðứkzê ŋươʔi ŋươʔi mắk tộʔi cớ kɔn ɣiết ca kũŋ dừŋ ca ɣiết kɔn fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fạmtộʔi tʰìfảʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi nấʔi cớ dɔán sét bấtkôŋ xác hăjlà mồkôʔi cớ cịʔu kầm áʔɔsốŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa xá ɲớ zằŋ mìɲ dã tôʔimọʔi nơʔi sứ zíptô ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cuộk ŋươʔi xỏʔi dó cɔnên zặn biểʔu ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲưvậʔi xi ŋươʔi ɣặt cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ kwên ɣié lúʔa dó tʰìcớ cởlạʔi lấʔi nắm ɣié ấʔi fần xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa hầʔu cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋươʔi xi ŋươʔi zuŋ kâʔi livɛ mìɲ cớ ɲữŋ cáʔi cên ɲáɲ ấʔi fần xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa xi ŋườʔi háʔi ɲɔ mìɲ cớ ci kòn lạʔi ấʔi fần xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa xá ɲớ zằŋ mìɲ dã tôʔimọʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô bởʔi kớ ấʔi zặn biểʔu ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲưvậʔi xi nàʔɔ ŋườʔita kó cɛɲtụŋ ɲăw di dến tòʔa dể kầʔu kwan sétdɔán tʰìfảʔi dịɲ kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kó tộʔi ɲượkbằŋ kó tộʔi dáŋ dáɲdòn kwan fảʔi xiến ŋườʔi nằmsuốŋ dất dáɲ ŋườʔi cướk mìɲ bawɲiêʔu dòn tùʔi tʰeo lỗʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dã fạm kwan xiến dáɲdòn ŋườʔi dến cụk cớ dáɲ kwá kẻʔɔ nếʔu kứ dáɲ tʰì ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi kớ hìɲfạt tʰáʔicwá ấʔi fảʔi za cướk ŋươʔi căŋ cớ xớp miệŋ kɔn cɔŋ xi dạp lúʔa xi ʔɛɲɛm zuột cuŋ ɲăw kó ŋườʔi cết xôŋ kɔn tʰì kủʔa ŋườʔi cết cớ dôʔi kùŋ ŋườʔiŋɔàʔi ʔɛɲɛm cồŋ fảʔi di dếnkùŋ nàŋ kướʔi nàŋ ʔi tʰeo bổnfận kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm cồŋ vậʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ nàŋ sɛɲ za nốʔi zɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm cết hầʔu cɔ zɛɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ấʔi cớ twiệt xỏʔi ʔisơzaên víbằŋ ŋườʔi kiə xôŋ dẹplòŋ lấʔi nàŋ nàŋ fảʔi dến kửʔa tʰàɲ tớʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm cồŋ tôʔi xôŋ cịʔu lưʔuzɛɲ ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi lạʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kướʔi tôʔi ʔi tʰeo fậnsự ʔɛɲɛm cồŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi ɣọʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi kứ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ dẹplòŋ kướʔi nàŋ tʰì cịʔɛm zâʔu ŋườʔi dến ɣần cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣiàʔi xỏʔi cân ŋườʔi xạk cên ŋườʔi dɔạn kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ lạʔi ɲà ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔ ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ɣọʔi ɲà ŋườʔi ɲà ɣiàʔi xi haj ŋườʔi dáɲlộn ɲăw nếʔu kủʔa cɔŋ haj ŋườʔi dến ɣần dặŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu cồŋ xỏʔi tăj dáɲ nàŋ ɣiơ tăj ɲằm cỗkín kủʔa ấʔi tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi cặt tăj nàŋ di ŋươʔi cớ tʰươŋsót nàŋ cɔŋ baw ŋươʔi cớ kó haj tʰứ cáʔi kân tʰứ ɣià tʰứ nɔn cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi cớ kó haj tʰứ fa tʰứ ɣià tʰứ nɔn fảʔi zùŋ cáʔi kân dúŋ tʰật kôŋbìɲ kũŋ fảʔi kó fa dúŋ tʰật kôŋbìɲ dể ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu cên dất ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kák diềʔu nầʔi fạm bấtŋĩʔa hãʔi ɲớ diềʔu ʔamalék dã cɔ ŋươʔi zọk dườŋ xi kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tʰếnàʔɔ ŋườʔi xôŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến dón ŋươʔi cên dườŋ sôŋ vàʔɔ biɲ hậʔu ŋươʔi dáɲ kák ŋườʔi ʔiếʔu tʰeo ŋươʔi cɔŋ xi cáɲ mìɲ ŋươʔi mỏʔimệt ɲọkɲằn vậʔi xi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã bìɲan cɔ ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi xỏʔi mọʔi tʰùŋịc vâʔi fủ ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔilàm sảnŋiệp tʰìfảʔi sóʔa ɣiɲớ ʔamalék xỏʔi zướʔi cờʔi cớ kwên xi ŋươʔi dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp xi ɲận dượk tạʔi dó zồʔi tʰìfảʔi lấʔi hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa tʰổsản mìɲ tʰâʔu hɔạc cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dể cɔŋ káʔi ɣiỏ zồʔi di dến cỗ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cọn dể zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi tớʔi kùŋ tʰầʔi cứk daŋ tʰì dó nóʔi zằŋ ŋàʔinăj cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ tôʔi ɲậnbiết tôʔi dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cɔ cúŋtôʔi Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi lấʔi káʔi ɣiỏ xỏʔi tăj ŋươʔi dể cướk bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi kấttiếŋ nóʔi tạʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ tổfụ tôʔi ŋườʔi ʔazam fiêʔulưʔu di suốŋ sứ zíptô kiềʔu ŋụ tạʔi dó ŋườʔi màlạʔi cởtʰàɲ zântộk mạɲ dôŋ ŋườʔi zíptô ŋượkdãʔi xắk bứk cúŋtôʔi làmkôŋ zịc ɲọkɲằn bấʔizờ cúŋtôʔi kêʔuvan kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ cúŋtôʔi Ðứkzê ŋɛ tʰấʔu tʰấʔi zannan lawxổ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi zùŋ káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za kák zấʔu fép dáŋ kiɲxủŋ zút cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô zẫn cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi nầʔi sứ nầʔi cɔ tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa vậʔi bâʔizờ Ðứkzê ôʔi tôʔi dɛm ɲữŋ hwakwả dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa dất ŋàʔi dã cɔ tôʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋươʔi dể hwakwả dó cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰờ lạʔi cướk ŋàʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xác ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi vớʔi ɲà kủʔa ŋườʔi vujvẻ kák fướk làɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cɔ ŋươʔi xi ŋươʔi dã tʰâʔu sɔŋ kák tʰuế fần mườʔi huêlợʔi tʰứba tʰuế fần mườʔi tʰìfảʔi kấp tʰuế dó cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi xác mồkôʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa zùŋ lươŋtʰựk cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi nɔnê zồʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi tạʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã dɛm ɲữŋ tʰáɲ xỏʔi ɲà tôʔi kấp cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi xác mồkôʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa ciếʔu tʰeo kák mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi dã fán zặn tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ fạm kũŋ xôŋ kwên mạŋ lịɲ nàʔɔ kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔŋ lúk taŋcế tôʔi xôŋ dến tʰáɲ nầʔi xi ôʔuế tôʔi xôŋ dụŋ dến dó kũŋ xôŋ ŋườʔi cết zùŋ dến tôʔi vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ʔiɲư mọʔi diềʔu ŋàʔi dã fán zặn tôʔi kầʔucúʔa nơʔi kư tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi cên cờʔi kaw dɔáʔi sɛm fướk cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi kùŋ dất ŋàʔi dã cɔ cúŋtôʔi tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa nầʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔinăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi zặn biểʔu ŋươʔi tʰeo kák mạŋ lịɲ nầʔi vậʔi fảʔi hếtlòŋ tʰeo kác kaŋ ŋàʔinăj ŋươʔi hứʔa ɲận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi kùŋ vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê dã hứʔa ɲận ŋươʔi zân tʰuộk ziêŋ ŋàʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi dể ŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi xɛnŋợʔi zɛɲtiếŋ tôncọŋ cổʔi mọʔi zân ŋàʔi dã tạʔɔ ŋươʔi cởnên zân tʰàɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán vậʔi môʔisɛ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ zânsự hãʔi ɣiữɣìn mọʔi diềʔu zăn cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj xi ŋươʔi dã kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi tʰìfảʔi zựŋ ɲữŋ biə dá tʰwa vôʔi Ðʔɔạn xi ŋươʔi dã di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vàʔɔ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi dã hứʔa kùŋ ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi ɣi cên kák biə dá dó ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi vậʔi xi kák ŋươʔi dã kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi fảʔi zựŋ ɲữŋ biə dá nầʔi cên núʔi bɛɲ tʰwa vôʔi ʔi tʰeo lịɲ cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ fảʔi bàntʰờ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tứklà bàntʰờ bằŋ dá cớ ca dồ bằŋ vàʔɔ ŋươʔi fảʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi bằŋ dá ŋwiên xốʔi cên dó zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰù tạʔi dó vujvẻ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣi cên kák biə dá hếttʰảʔi lờʔi luậtfáp nầʔi xắk cɔ tʰật zõzàŋ môʔisɛ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zòŋ lêvi nóʔi kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên zằŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ŋɛ ŋàʔinăj ŋươʔi dã cởnên zân kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vậʔi fảʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữ tʰeo ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi dó môʔisɛ kũŋ cwiền cɔ zânsự lịɲ nầʔi xi kák ŋươʔi di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi tʰì simêôn lêvi zuda ʔisaka ɣiôsép bêŋiəmin fảʔi dứŋ cên núʔi ɣazisim dặŋ cúk fướk cɔ zânsự kòn zubên ɣát ʔasɛ sabulôn Ðʔan néptali fảʔi dứŋ cên núʔi bɛɲ dặŋ zủʔasả ŋườʔilê kấttiếŋ nóʔi kùŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tượŋ cạm hăjlà tượŋ dúk ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê kôŋviệk bởʔi tăj ŋườʔi tʰợ zựŋ cɔŋ nơʔi kínɲiệm kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xiɲbỉ camẹ mìɲ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zờʔi mộk ɣiớʔi kủʔa lânkận mìɲ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔ lạk dườŋ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kɔŋ vạʔi fép cáɲ kủʔa xác mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ kùŋ kủʔa ca mìɲ vì dó làmɲụk ca mìɲ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ kùŋ kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ kùŋ cịʔɛm mìɲ hɔặk ca xák hɔặk xák ca kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ kùŋ bàza mìɲ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ dáɲ cộm ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ ɲận kủʔa hốʔilộ dể ɣiết ŋườʔi vôtộʔi kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn Ðáŋ zủʔasả tʰăj nàʔɔ xôŋ ɣiữ kák lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi dể tʰeo kả zânsự fảʔi dáp ʔamɛn nếʔu ŋươʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kác cuŋtʰàɲ kẩntʰận tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tʰì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cổʔi mọʔi zân cên dất nếʔu ŋươʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi nầʔi mọʔi fướk làɲ ɣiáŋ suốŋ cên mìɲ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk fướk cɔŋ tʰàɲ dượk fướk ŋɔàʔi dồŋzuộŋ bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa tʰântʰể ŋươʔi hwakwả kủʔa dất zuộŋ ŋươʔi kủʔa siɲ súk ŋươʔi vớʔi lứʔa dẻ kủʔa káʔi ciên káʔi ŋươʔi dềʔu dượk fướk káʔi ɣiỏ tʰùŋ ɲồʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi dềʔu dượk fướk ŋươʔi dượk fướk cɔŋ xi di za dượk fướk cɔŋ xi vàʔɔ Ðứkzê cɔ tʰùŋịc zấʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi dáɲbạʔi cướk ŋươʔi cúŋnó zɔ dườŋ za dáɲ ŋươʔi zồʔi zɔ bảʔi dườŋ cạʔi cốn cướk ŋươʔi Ðứkzê xiến fướk làɲ kùŋ ŋươʔi tạʔi cɔŋ xɔ lúʔa cɔŋ kák kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋươʔi ŋàʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi tʰì Ðứkzê ŋươʔi zân tʰáɲ cɔ ŋàʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ ŋươʔi muônzân kủʔa tʰếzan tʰấʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dượk ɣọʔi tʰeo zɛɲ Ðứkzê cúŋnó ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dượk kủʔakảʔi ɲiềʔu zưzật xiến cɔ hwakwả kủʔa tʰântʰể ŋươʔi kủʔa siɲ súk bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa dất zuộŋ ŋươʔi dượk sɛɲ ɲiềʔu tʰêm cɔŋ sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋươʔi dể cɔ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê ŋươʔi cờʔi za xɔ báʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi dặŋ cɔ mưʔa fảʔi tʰì ɣiáŋ suốŋ dất fướk cɔ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ɲiềʔu nướk văj kòn ŋươʔi xôŋ văj ʔaj nếʔu ŋươʔi ŋɛ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ tʰeo nếʔuxôŋ lìʔabỏ lờʔi nàʔɔ cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj sâʔi kwa hửʔu hɔặk dặŋ di tʰeo hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák tʰì Ðứkzê dặt ŋươʔi dằŋ dầʔu cớ cẳŋ fảʔi dằŋ duôʔi ŋươʔi cên kaw cớ cẳŋ zướʔi tʰấp ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ kẩntʰận tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn luậtfáp kủʔa ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tʰì nầʔi mọʔi zủʔasả ɣiáŋ suốŋ cên mìɲ ŋươʔi tʰeo ŋươʔi ŋươʔi zủʔasả cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋzuộŋ káʔi ɣiỏ tʰùŋ ɲồʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ zủʔasả hwakwả kủʔa tʰântʰể ŋươʔi bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa dất zuộŋ ŋươʔi vớʔi lứʔa dẻ kủʔa káʔi ciên káʔi ŋươʔi dềʔu zủʔasả ŋươʔi zủʔasả xi di za lúk di vàʔɔ vì kớ ŋươʔi diềʔu ák lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê cɔŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋươʔi bắttăj ŋàʔi xiến ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi zủʔasả kiɲxủŋ hămzọʔa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi hủʔiziệt cết vộʔivàŋ Ðứkzê xiến ônzịc dewduổʔi ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ziệt ŋươʔi xỏʔi dất ŋươʔi vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi Ðứkzê lấʔi bịɲ law bịɲ nóŋ lạɲ bịɲ fù nắŋ cáʔi biɲdaw sâʔu lúʔa hàɲ hạʔi ŋươʔi xiến cɔ kák nỗʔi dó duổʔi tʰeo ŋươʔi cɔdến xi ŋươʔi cết kák từŋ cờʔi cên dầʔu ŋươʔi ɲư dồŋ dất zướʔi cân ŋươʔi ɲư tʰăjvì mưʔa Ðứkzê xiến kát bụʔi cờʔi suốŋ cên dất ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi hủʔiziệt Ðứkzê xiến ŋươʔi ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc mìɲ dáɲbạʔi ŋươʔi zɔ dườŋ za dáɲ cúŋnó zồʔi zɔ bảʔi dườŋ cạʔi cốn cướk cúŋnó ŋươʔi sô dùʔa dâʔidó cɔŋ xắp kák nướk kủʔa tʰếzan tʰâʔi ŋươʔi dồăn cɔ cim cên cờʔi tʰú zướʔi dất xôŋ ʔaj duổʔi cúŋnó di Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ɣẻ cốk kủʔa sứ zíptô cĩ lậʔu ɣẻ ŋứʔa lák ŋươʔi xôŋtʰể cữʔa làɲ lạʔi ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi sảŋsốt duimù lảŋ cí daŋ buổʔicưʔa ŋươʔi di zờ zờ ɲư cɔŋ tốʔităm ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk măimắn cɔŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ hằŋ ŋàʔi hiếpdáp kướp ɣiựt cẳŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ ŋươʔi hỏʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xák lạʔi kùŋ nàŋ ŋươʔi kất káʔi ɲà ɲưŋ xôŋ dượk ŋươʔi cồŋ ɲɔ sɔŋ xôŋ dượk háʔi cáʔi kɔn ŋươʔi ɣiết cướk ŋươʔi sɔŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk tʰịt lừʔa ŋươʔi ănkắp ŋươʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ ʔaj cả lạʔi ciên ŋươʔi cɔ tʰùŋịc ɲưŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ kó ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi cɔ zân ŋɔạʔibaŋ kó ŋươʔi tʰấʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi hawmòn côŋmɔŋ cúŋnó sɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi xôŋ kòn sứk kứʔuvớt một zântộk ŋươʔi cưʔa lấʔi tʰổsản mọʔi kôŋlaw kủʔa ŋươʔi ŋươʔi hiếpdáp ɣiàʔidạp xôŋ ŋớt cởnên diênkuồŋ kảɲtượŋ mìɲ tʰấʔi Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi tʰứ ʔuŋdộk tạʔi cên dầʔuɣốʔi cân xôŋtʰể cữʔa làɲ dượk bàncân cí cót dầʔu Ðứkzê zẫn ŋươʔi vwa ŋươʔi dã cên mìɲ dến nướk ŋươʔi tổfụ ŋươʔi cưʔa dó ŋươʔi hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák bằŋ kâʔi bằŋ dá cɔŋ kák zântộk Ðứkzê zẫn ŋươʔi dến ŋươʔi tʰàɲ kiɲhãʔi tụkŋữ tiếʔu dàm ŋươʔi dɛm zeo ɲiềʔu cɔŋ zuộŋ mìɲ ɲưŋ mùʔa ɣặt lạʔi kàʔɔkàʔɔ sạc ŋươʔi cồŋ ɲɔ sɔŋ xôŋ dượk ʔuốŋ zượʔu xôŋ ɣặtʰáʔi ci sâʔubọ fá di ŋươʔi kó kâʔi livɛ cɔŋ kả dịʔafận mìɲ ɲưŋ xôŋ dượk sứk zầʔu kâʔi livɛ zụŋ cáʔi ŋươʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ɲưŋ cúŋnó xôŋ tʰuộk ŋươʔi cúŋnó mọʔi kɔn zầʔi kâʔicốʔi tʰổsản kủʔa ŋươʔi xác ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi cên ŋươʔi kàŋŋàʔicàŋ kaw kòn ŋươʔi lạʔi suốŋ kàŋŋàʔicàŋ tʰấp cɔ ŋươʔi văj kòn ŋươʔi cẳŋ cɔ văj lạʔi dằŋ dầʔu kòn ŋươʔi dằŋ duôʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ cúk zủʔasả nầʔi ɣiáŋ cên ŋươʔi duổʔi ŋươʔi tʰeo cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi hủʔiziệt bởʔivì ŋươʔi xôŋ kó ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi kák zủʔasả nầʔi cên mìɲ ŋươʔi cên zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ɲư zấʔu dến dờʔidờʔi bởʔi cɔŋ lúk zưzật mọʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ vujlòŋ lạk fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔnên cɔŋ lúk dóʔixát cɔŋ lúk cầncuồŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn mọʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi hầʔu việk tʰùŋịc Ðứkzê saj dến dáɲ ŋươʔi ca ác cên kổ ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ tiêʔuziệt ŋươʔi Ðứkzê nơʔi sa dịʔakựk xiến zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ŋươʔi zântộk băj ɲư cim ưŋ tứklà zântộk ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ tiếŋnóʔi dượk zântộk mặtmàʔi huŋák xôŋ ŋườʔizà cẳŋ tʰươŋsót cẻ kủʔa súkvật ŋươʔi hwakwả kủʔa dất zuộŋ ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi tiêʔuziệt xôŋ cừʔa lạʔi ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu hăjlà lứʔa dẻ kủʔa ciên ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dã tiêʔuziệt ŋươʔi di zân dó vâʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa kả sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ɲữŋ vác kawlớn vữŋbền kiəmà ŋươʔi ɲờkậʔi dó ŋã suốŋ cɔŋ lúk vậʔi xicwân ŋịc cɔ túŋtʰế kùŋdườŋ ŋươʔi hwakwả kủʔa tʰântʰể mìɲ tứklà tʰịt kủʔa kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ lúk ŋươʔi kwân ŋịc vâʔi tạʔi kák tʰàɲ mìɲ cɔ kùŋdườŋ túŋtʰế ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɲuɲượk ʔiếʔuớt cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi ŋó ɣiận ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ʔiêʔuzấʔu kɔnkáʔi mìɲ kòn lạʔi xôŋ cịʔu cɔ ʔaj cɔŋ dó tʰịt kủʔa kɔnkáʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi bởʔi mìɲ xôŋ kòn ci cɔŋ lúk ŋươʔi kwân ŋịc vâʔi tạʔi kák tʰàɲ mìɲ cɔ kùŋdườŋ túŋtʰế ŋườʔi nàʔɔ nɔnnớt mảɲxảɲ cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔiểʔudiệʔu hăjlà sắksảʔɔ mìɲ xôŋ dặt bàncân suốŋ dất ɲìn ɣiận cồŋ zất ʔiêʔu kủʔa mìɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ bởʔi kớ ɲăw bọk za cɔŋ bụŋ ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ sɛɲ dẻ cɔŋ kơn tʰiếʔutʰốn mọʔi diềʔu nàŋ ɲẹm cúŋnó nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ kẩntʰận tʰeo kák lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi ɣi cɔŋ sác nầʔi xôŋ kíɲ zɛɲ viɲhiển dáŋsợ nầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰì Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cɔ ŋươʔi zòŋzốŋ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ tajvạ lạtʰườŋ lớnlaw lâʔubền ɲựŋ cứŋ dộk bịɲ huŋ ŋàʔi xiến ɣiáŋ cên ŋươʔi kák bịɲ hɔạn kủʔa sứ zíptô ŋươʔi dã zunsợ dó deo zíɲ tʰeo ŋươʔi vảlạʔi kák tʰứ cứŋ bịɲ tajvạ xôŋ kó cép cɔŋ sác luậtfáp nầʔi tʰì Ðứkzê kũŋ xiến ɣiáŋ cên ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi tiêʔuziệt di số kák ŋươʔi dôŋ ɲư saw cên cờʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ kó ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cỉ kòn lạʔi hễÐứkzê lấʔilàm vuj làmlàɲ za tʰêm kák ŋươʔi tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì Ðứkzê kũŋ lấʔilàm vuj cɔ kák ŋươʔi tiêʔuziệt kák ŋươʔi tʰể ấʔi kák ŋươʔi cuất xỏʔi sứ mìɲ vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi Ðứkzê lạk ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák zân kuốʔi dầʔu nầʔi kủʔa dất dến kuốʔi dầʔu kiə tạʔi dó ŋươʔi hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák bằŋ kâʔi bằŋ dá ŋươʔi kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi xôŋ cɔŋ kák nướk ấʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk ʔan tịɲ bàncân ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk ŋỉŋơʔi ɲưŋ tạʔi dó Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi tấmlòŋ zunsợ ʔiếʔu liɲhồn hawmòn sự sốŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ cắk cướk ŋươʔi ŋàʔi dêm ŋươʔi hằŋ sợhãʔi xó liệʔu bảʔɔtồn sốŋ mìɲ bởʔi kớ kiɲxủŋ dầʔizẫʔi lòŋ ŋươʔi kảɲ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi sớmmaj ŋươʔi nóʔi cớci dượk ciềʔutốʔi zồʔi ciềʔutốʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi Ướk ɣì dượk sáŋmaj zồʔi Ðứkzê xiến ŋươʔi di tàʔu cởlạʔi sứ zíptô bởʔi kɔn dườŋ cướk dã nóʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi nữʔa dó ŋươʔi dɛm mìɲ cɔ tʰùŋịc ɲưŋ xôŋ kó ʔaj mwa nầʔi kák lờʔi kủʔa zawướk Ðứkzê zặn biểʔu môʔisɛ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ sứ môáp ŋɔàʔi zawướk ŋàʔi dã kùŋ cúŋ tạʔi hôzếp vậʔi môʔisɛ ɣọʔi kả ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê cɔŋ sứ zíptô zướʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ fazaôn kwầntʰần kả sứ ŋườʔi tứklà ɲữŋ tʰửtʰác lớnlaw zấʔu fép ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi ɲưŋ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê xôŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi tấmlòŋ dể dể tʰấʔi hăjlà taj dể ŋɛ ta dã zẫnzắt kák ŋươʔi mươʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ áʔɔsốŋ xôŋ kũ cên mìɲ ŋươʔi ɣiàʔi xôŋ zướʔi cân ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kóăn báɲ ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà ci săj dể cɔbiết zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi dến cốn nầʔi sihôn vwa hếtbôn ʔɔùk vwa basan di za dón dặŋ zawciến kùŋ cúŋta cúŋta kó dáɲbạʔi ciếm sứ cɔ cifáʔi zubên ɣát nửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ sảnŋiệp vậʔi kák ŋươʔi xá ɣìŋiữ tʰeo ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa zawướk nầʔi hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk măimắn cɔŋ mọʔi việk mìɲ hếttʰảʔi kák ŋươʔi nàʔɔ cưởŋtộk kák cifáʔi nàʔɔ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ nàʔɔ kák kwan kaj nàʔɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ kɔncẻ kák ŋươʔi nàʔɔ xác cɔŋ cạʔi kwân ŋươʔi ŋườʔi cặt kủʔi cɔdến ŋườʔi sác nướk ŋàʔinăj hãʔi dến cầʔu cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dặŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ zawướk kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ lờʔi tʰề ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj hầʔu cɔ ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi ŋươʔi zân kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ ŋươʔi tʰề kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi zaham ʔisák zakốp cẳŋ fảʔi cỉ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi zawướk lờʔi tʰề nầʔi tʰôʔi ɲưŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋàʔinăj dứŋ tạʔi dâʔi kùŋ cúŋta cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ kó kùŋ cúŋta cɔŋ ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi kiềʔu ŋụ kủʔa cúŋta cɔŋ sứ zíptô cúŋta di ŋaŋ kwa kák nướk làmsaw Ðʔaŋ xi di ŋaŋ dịʔafận cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa cúŋnó ɲữŋ tʰần kwáʔiɣở bằŋ kâʔi bằŋ dá bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ nơʔi cúŋnó cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ kó ŋườʔi ŋườʔi họhàŋ hăjlà cifáʔi nàʔɔ ŋàʔinăj cở lòŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dặŋ di hầʔu việk kák tʰần kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk ấʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kũŋ cớ kó zễ sɛɲ za dộk ŋảʔicứʔu ʔaj ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa tʰề nầʔi cớ kó xwej nơʔi lòŋ zằŋ ta dượk bìɲan zầʔu xi di tʰeo kứŋ lòŋ dếnnỗʔi dượk tướʔi vớʔi xô dềʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ xứŋ tʰa tộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ bấʔizờ kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi zủʔasả ɣi cɔŋ sác nầʔi cất nặŋ cên mìɲ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê sóʔa ŋườʔi xỏʔi zướʔi cờʔi ŋươʔi za xỏʔi kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dể tajhọʔa ciếʔu tʰeo kák lờʔi cùẻʔɔ kủʔa zawướk dã ɣi cɔŋ sác luậtfáp nầʔi Ðờʔi săw kɔncáʔu sɛɲ za săw kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔi xác fươŋ sa dến xi tʰấʔi ɲữŋ tajvạ cứŋ bịɲ Ðứkzê dã hàɲ hạʔi sứ nầʔi xi tʰấʔi tɔàn sứ cỉ ziêm muốʔi cáʔi tiêʔu xôŋ ɣiốŋ zeo xôŋ ci cẳŋ tʰứ kỏ nàʔɔ mọk ɣiốŋ ɲư hủʔihɔạʔi kủʔa sôdôm ɣômôzơ sêbôʔim Ðứkzê fá ziệt cɔŋ kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi tʰì cúŋnó kák nướk hỏʔi zằŋ sawÐứkzê dãʔi sứ nầʔi ɲưtʰế kăn kớ kủʔa tʰạɲ lớnlaw nầʔi làmsaw ŋườʔita dáp zằŋ Ấʔi bộʔi zawướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ dã kùŋ xi zẫn za xỏʔi sứ zíptô Ấʔi di hầʔu việk tʰờ lạʔi kák tʰần mìɲ cưʔa ŋàʔi xôŋ fânfát cɔ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ sứ nầʔi dặŋ ɣiáŋ cên kák zủʔasả ɣi cɔŋ sác nầʔi cɔŋ kơn tʰạɲ hờŋiận nổʔinóŋ Ðứkzê dã zút zân nầʔi xỏʔi dất vàʔɔ sứ xák ɲư diềʔu dó kó ŋàʔinăj ɲữŋ tʰuộk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta sɔŋ ɲữŋ bàʔitỏ tʰuộk cúŋta kɔncáʔu cúŋta dờʔidờʔi dể cúŋta tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi xi kák diềʔu nầʔi dã sảʔi dến cɔ ŋươʔi hɔặk fướk làɲ hɔặk zủʔasả dã dặt cướk ŋươʔi nếʔu cɔŋ kák nướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi ŋươʔi dến ŋươʔi dɛmlòŋ ɲắk lạʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu ấʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi hếtlòŋ vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲư mọʔi diềʔu cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tʰì bấʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰươŋsót ŋươʔi dɛm ɲữŋ fu ŋươʔi cởvề ɲóm ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa kák zân nơʔi ŋàʔi dã lạk ŋươʔi dó zẫʔu ɲữŋ dàʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi tạʔi kuốʔi cờʔi tʰì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ dó ɲóm ŋươʔi lạʔi zút ŋươʔi xỏʔi nơʔi dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dɛm ŋươʔi sứ tổfụ ŋươʔi dã ɲận dượk ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi ŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi za tʰêm ŋươʔi ɲiềʔu tổfụ ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kất ôʔuế xỏʔi lòŋ ŋươʔi xỏʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi hếtlòŋ kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dổ kák lờʔi cùẻʔɔ nầʔi cên tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi cên nàʔɔ ɣét ŋươʔi kòn ŋươʔi hốʔicảʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj xi ŋươʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi dã ɣi cɔŋ sác luậtfáp nầʔi hếtlòŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tʰì ŋàʔi fướk dầʔi cɔ mọʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋươʔi dượk tʰạɲ lợʔi xiến hwakwả kủʔa tʰântʰể ŋươʔi kủʔa siɲ súk bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa dất zuộŋ ŋươʔi dượk tʰịɲ vượŋ Ðứkzê lạʔi vujlòŋ nữʔa cɔ ŋươʔi ɲư ŋàʔi dã vujlòŋ kák tổfụ ŋươʔi Ðʔiềʔu zăn nầʔi cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ fảʔi kaw kwá ŋươʔi hăjlà sa kwá cɔ ŋươʔi nó cẳŋ fảʔi cên cờʔi dể ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ ʔaj cờʔi dɛm suốŋ cɔ cúŋtôʔi ŋɛ dặŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰeo nó kũŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kiə dể ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ ʔaj di kwa kiə dɛm cɔ cúŋtôʔi ŋɛ dặŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰeo vì lờʔi nầʔi zất ɣần ŋươʔi cɔŋ miệŋ cɔŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi tʰeo hãʔi sɛm ŋàʔinăj dặt cướk ŋươʔi sốŋ fướk làɲ cết tajhọʔa ŋàʔinăj bảʔɔ ŋươʔi tʰươŋmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di cɔŋ kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi dể ŋươʔi sốŋ za tʰêm ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ ŋươʔi vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu lòŋ ŋươʔi sâʔi cở xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tʰeo cịʔu zụzỗ tʰờ lạʔi hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák tʰì ŋàʔinăj kùŋ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi twiệtziệt xôŋ dượk sốŋ lâʔu cên dất ŋươʔi di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ ɲận lấʔi ŋàʔinăj cờʔi dất làmcứŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ dã dặt cướk ŋươʔi sốŋ cết fướk làɲ zủʔasả vậʔi hãʔi cọn sốŋ hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ tʰươŋmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ fán ŋàʔi cíʔu ŋàʔi ŋàʔi sốŋ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu dặŋ ŋươʔi cên dất Ðứkzê dã tʰề cɔ kák tổfụ ŋươʔi zaham ʔisák zakốp môʔisɛ dến ɣiảŋ cɔ kả ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ bàʔi săw nầʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi ŋàʔinăj dượk mộtcăm haimươʔi tuổʔi xôŋtʰể di zadi vàʔɔ nữʔa Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ nầʔi dâʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di dầʔu ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ziệt kák zântộk dằŋ cướk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi ɲận dượk sứ cúŋnó ɣiôsuê di cướk ŋươʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn Ðứkzê dãʔi cúŋnó ɲư ŋàʔi dã dãʔi sihôn ʔɔùk vwa zân ʔamôzít sứ cứŋ ŋàʔi dã hủʔi fá Ðứkzê fó cúŋnó cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi dãʔi cúŋnó tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ dã cwiền cɔ hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí cớ ci cớ kiɲxủŋ cướk kák zân dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi di kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu Ðʔɔạn môʔisɛ ɣọʔi ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên zằŋ hãʔi vừŋ lòŋ bềncí ŋươʔi vàʔɔ vớʔi zân nầʔi cɔŋ sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ ŋươʔi ciə sứ cɔ cáɲÐứkzê di cướk ŋươʔi ŋàʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu cớ cớ kiɲxủŋ môʔisɛ cép nầʔi zaw cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu lêvi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi zaw cɔ hếttʰảʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên cwiền lịɲ nầʔi zằŋ kuốʔi bảʔi ɲằm ɣiảʔitʰíc tạʔi ŋàʔi lềʔu xi kả zân ʔisơzaên dến cầʔu cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ cỗ ŋàʔi cọn tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi dọk nầʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên cɔ cúŋ ŋɛ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲóm zânsự nàʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kɔncẻ xác cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi dể cúŋ ŋɛ kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo kák lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi kủʔa zânsự cưʔa việk ấʔi ŋɛ kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cọn lúk kák ŋươʔi sốŋ cên dất kák ŋươʔi ɲận dượk săw xi dã di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣôdɛɲ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kìʔa ŋàʔi cết kủʔa ŋươʔi hầʔu ɣần hãʔi ɣọʔi ɣiôsuê zồʔi haj ŋươʔi hãʔi zamắt tạʔi hộʔi mạk dể cwiền lịɲ cɔ ŋườʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ ɣiôsuê di dến cầʔu tạʔi hộʔi mạk Ðứkzê za nơʔi cạʔi cɔŋ cụ mâʔi cụ mâʔi zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi kửʔa cạʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ kìʔa ŋươʔi ʔaŋiấk vớʔi kák tổfụ ŋươʔi zânsự nầʔi zấʔi tʰôŋzâm kùŋ kák tʰần xák cɔŋ sứ vàʔɔ bộʔi zawướk dã kùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi kơn tʰạɲ fừŋ kùŋ ɣiấʔu di xiến cɔ tiêʔu ɲiềʔu tajvạ buồntʰảm sôŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó nóʔi zằŋ há kó fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ ŋự ɣiữʔa tôʔi ɲữŋ tajvạ nầʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ tôʔi căŋ kòn cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣiấʔu di kớ kák tộʔiák kủʔa zân dã cở tʰeo kák tʰần xák vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi cép bàʔi ka nầʔi zạʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên hãʔi dể cɔŋ miệŋ dể bàʔi ka nầʔi zùŋ làmcứŋ cɔ ŋịc kùŋzân ʔisơzaên vì dưʔa zân nầʔi vàʔɔ sứ dã tʰề hứʔa kùŋ tổfụ cúŋnó tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa cúŋnó nɔnê béʔɔ dɔạn cở di hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák xiɲzể bộʔi zawướk kủʔa xi tajvạ ɲiềʔu zancuân dã sôŋ zân nầʔi tʰì bấʔizờ bàʔi ka nầʔi zền làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ miệŋ kủʔa zòŋzõʔi xôŋ kwên vả ɲữŋ ýtưởŋ kủʔa dã ŋàʔinăj cướk xi dưʔa vàʔɔ sứ dã tʰề cɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó môʔisɛ cép bàʔi ka nầʔi zạʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê za lịɲ cɔ ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun zằŋ hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí ŋươʔi dưʔa zân ʔisơzaên vàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ dã tʰề cɔ cúŋnó kòn kùŋ ŋươʔi ximôʔi sɛ cép ɲữŋ lờʔi luậtfáp nầʔi cɔŋ kuốn sác sɔŋ zồʔi tʰìza lịɲ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kuốn sác luậtfáp nầʔi dể zawướk kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi nó dó làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ ŋươʔi táɲ bộʔiŋịc kứŋkổ kủʔa ŋươʔi nầʔi ŋàʔinăj lúk kòn sốŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê huốŋci săw xi kwadờʔi hãʔi ɲóm ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa kák cifáʔi kwan kaj kák ŋươʔi lạʔi ɣần cɔ ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi nầʔi nơʔi taj cờʔi kùŋ dất làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ vì zằŋ săw xi kwadờʔi kák ŋươʔi bạʔihɔạʔi cở dườŋ dã cwiền zạʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi săwzốt tajhọʔa sôŋ kák ŋươʔi bởʔi kák ŋươʔi diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê lấʔi ɲữŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj mìɲ cọk ŋàʔi nổʔizận môʔisɛ dọk ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa bàʔi ka nầʔi cɔ kả hộʔi ʔisơzaên ŋɛ hỡʔi cờʔi hãʔi lắŋtaj tôʔi nóʔi và dất hãʔi ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ tôʔi Ðạʔɔ kủʔa tôʔi zảʔi za ɲư mưʔa lờʔi tôʔi suốŋ xáknàʔɔ sươŋmók tợ mưʔa cɔ cên kâʔicỏ tỉɲư mưʔa cên dồŋ sɛɲ vì tôʔi tuŋô zɛɲ ɣiêhôva hãʔi waiŋiêm cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa hònÐá cọnvẹn vì kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi kôŋbìɲ Ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰàɲ vôtộʔi ŋàʔi kôŋbìɲ cáɲ cựk cúŋ dáŋ maŋ sấʔuhổ dã fản ŋàʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ŋàʔi nữʔa kwảlà zòŋzõʔi zantà diên dảʔɔ hỡʔi zân xờzạʔi xôŋ cí kák ŋươʔi báʔɔdáp Ðứkzê ɲư vậʔisaw ŋàʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ca ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã cuộk ŋươʔi căŋ há cẳŋ fảʔi ŋàʔi dã zựŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi saw hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi ɲữŋ ŋàʔisưʔa swisét ɲữŋ kủʔa kák dờʔi cướk hãʔi hạchỏʔi ca ŋươʔi ŋườʔi zạʔi cɔ kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ nóʔi cɔ xiÐấŋcíkaw fânfát sảnŋiệp cɔ muônzân fânzẽ ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi ʔadam tʰìŋàʔi dịɲ bờkõʔi kủʔa kák zân kứ tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên vì fần kủʔa Ðứkzê zân ŋàʔi zakốp kơŋiệp ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dượk ŋườʔi cɔŋ nơʔi zừŋ zú tạʔi nơʔi vắŋvẻ ɣiữʔa ɲữŋ tiếŋ kủʔa dồŋ vắŋ ŋàʔi bawfủ ŋườʔi sănsók ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ ŋườʔi ɲư kɔnŋươʔi kủʔa mìɲ ɲư fụŋɔàŋ fấpfớʔi zởn mìɲ băj cuŋkwɛɲ kɔnɲỏ mìɲ sè káɲ za sớt và kõŋ cên céʔɔ káɲ mìɲ tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì mộtmìɲ Ðứkzê dã zẫnzắt ŋườʔi tʰể ấʔi xôŋ kó tʰần nàʔɔ xák kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋàʔi dã xiến ŋườʔi kỡʔi cên kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa sứ ʔisơzaên hwakwả kủʔa dồŋzuộŋ ŋàʔi xiến ŋườʔi kủʔa dá zầʔu kủʔa dá kứŋ và sữʔa sữʔa ciên ŋàʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ciên kɔn ciên dựk sɛɲ tạʔi basan zê dựk kùŋ lọk ɲấtʰạŋ kủʔa lúʔamạc ŋườʔi kó ʔuốŋ hwiết kủʔa ɲɔ ɲư zượʔumạɲ ɣiêsuzun dã kất dá ŋườʔi cởnên béʔɔcòn ŋườʔi dã lìʔabỏ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ zựŋ nênŋườʔi và xiɲzể hònÐá kủʔa cửŋ kứʔu ŋươʔi cúŋnó cêʔuɣẹʔɔ ŋàʔi fânbì bởʔi kúŋ tʰờ ɲữŋ tʰần xák cọkzận ŋàʔi kák ɣớmɣiếk tếlễ ɲữŋ makwỉ cẳŋ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwì lạʔi kák tʰần mìɲ cưʔa tứklà kák tʰần mớʔi vừʔa dến ítlâʔu mà tổfụ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kíɲ ŋươʔi xôŋ dến hònÐá sɛɲ mìɲ và kwên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã tạʔɔ mìɲ Ðứkzê kó tʰấʔi diềʔu dó cɔŋ kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi dã kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ŋàʔi kó fán ta ɣiấʔu sɛm kuốʔicùŋ kủʔa cúŋnó zasaw vì zòŋzõʔi zantà là ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi xôŋ kó lòŋ cuŋtín cúŋnó ɣiụk fânbì kúŋ tʰờ tʰần cẳŋ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi hưxôŋ cọkzận ta kũŋ vậʔi lấʔi zântộk cêʔu fânbì kủʔa cúŋnó lấʔi nướk ŋuzạʔi cọkzận cúŋnó vì kó lửʔa nổʔi fừŋ cɔŋ kơn ɣiận cáʔi cɔdến dáʔi sâʔu âmfủ tʰiêʔu dất tʰổsản kùŋ cáʔi dốt kák núʔi ta cất ɲữŋ tajvạ cên mìɲ cúŋnó bắn cúŋnó kák cúŋnó dóʔi hawmòn zét tiêʔu di và tʰứ zịchạc dộk zữ ta xiến zăŋ tʰúzừŋ và nọkdộk kủʔa lɔàʔi zướʔi bụʔi dến hạʔi cúŋnó ŋɔàʔi tʰì ɣươm zaw cɔŋ tʰì kiɲxủŋ sẽ cɔ caicẻ ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ và kɔn daŋ vớʔi ŋườʔizà bạk Ðềʔu ziệtvɔŋ ta nóʔi zằŋ ta lấʔi hơʔi tʰở kwét sạc cúŋnó di ziệt cúŋnó xỏʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi sɔŋ tʰùŋịc ɲiếk ɲók kẻ kừʔudịc cúŋnó hiểʔu la zằŋ tăj cúŋtôʔi dã sứk kawkườŋ cớ cẳŋ fảʔi Ðứkzê kó mọʔi diềʔu ấʔi dâʔu vì zân mấtcí cɔŋ lòŋ xôŋ kó tʰôŋmiɲ cớci xônŋwan hiểʔu dượk Ướk ɣì ŋĩ dến kuốʔicùŋ dợʔi ɲượkbằŋ hònÐá xôŋ kó cúŋnó vàɣiê xôŋ zawnộp cúŋnó tʰì làmsaw ŋườʔi zượt nổʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi và haj ŋườʔi duổʔi mườʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi cốn di vì dá cúŋnó cẳŋ fảʔi ɲư hònÐá cúŋta tʰùŋịc cúŋta kũŋ sétdɔán ɲưvậʔi kâʔi ɲɔ cúŋnó cồʔi kủʔa sôdôm và zɔ dất kủʔa ɣômôzơ cáʔi ɲɔ cúŋnó dộk và cùm ɲɔ dắŋ zượʔuɲɔ cúŋnó nọkdộk kɔn zắn một tʰứ nọkdộk zất zữ kủʔa zắn ɲữŋ việk ɲưtʰế làmsaw kwên dượk ta dã niêmfɔŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ xɔ xi cân cúŋnó siêʔu sự báʔɔtʰù tʰuộk fần dốʔi cả kwi vì ŋàʔi bạʔihɔạʔi kủʔa cúŋnó hầʔu ɣần và ɲữŋ tajhọʔa buộk fảʔi sảʔiza cɔ cúŋnó dến măw fảʔi xi Ðứkzê tʰấʔi sứklựk kủʔa zânsự mìɲ hawmòn và xôŋ kòn lạʔi tôʔimọʔi hăjlà tựcủ cɔ cúŋnó tʰìŋàʔi dɔán sét kôŋbìɲ cɔ cúŋnó và tʰươŋsót tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi fán kák tʰần cúŋnó ɲữŋ dá cúŋnó ɲờkậʔi kák tʰần hưởŋ kủʔa hisiɲ và ʔuốŋ zượʔu kủʔa kwán cúŋnó dềʔu dâʔu kák tʰần ấʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi ɣiúpdỡ và cɛfủ cɔ kák ŋườʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi sɛm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɔàʔi cẳŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nàʔɔ xák ta xiến cɔ cết cɔ sốŋ lạʔi làm cɔ bịtʰươŋ cữʔa cɔ làɲ cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi tăj dượk vì ɣiơ tăj cỉ cờʔi mà tʰề zằŋ ta kwảtʰật hằŋ sốŋ dờʔidờʔi xi màʔi lưỡʔi sáŋ kủʔa ɣươm và tăj kầm dɔán sét tʰì báʔɔtʰù kừʔudịc kùŋ dốʔi cả ɲữŋ nàʔɔ ɣét ta cɔ kák mũʔitên săj hwiết lưỡʔi ɣươm tʰịt tứklà hwiết kủʔa ɣiết kủʔa fu tʰịt kủʔa dầʔu kák tướŋ tʰùŋịc hỡʔi kák nướk hãʔi vuimừŋ vớʔi zân ŋàʔi vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi báʔɔtʰù hwiết kủʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi cảtʰù kừʔudịc ŋàʔi và tʰa tộʔi cɔ sứ cɔ zân kủʔa ŋàʔi vậʔi môʔisɛ kùŋ ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun dến dọk kák lờʔi bàʔi ka nầʔi cɔ zânsự ŋɛ ximôʔi sɛ dã dọk sɔŋ kák lờʔi nầʔi tạʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên tʰì ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi dể lòŋ cămcỉ hếttʰảʔi lờʔi dã nàʔi xwiên kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj cwiền cɔ kɔncáʔu mìɲ dể cúŋnó kẩntʰận tʰeo kák lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp nầʔi vì cẳŋ fảʔi lờʔinóʔi vôɣiá cɔ kák ŋươʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ sốŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ɲờ lờʔinóʔi nầʔi kák ŋươʔi lâʔu ŋàʔi cên dất kák ŋươʔi di ɲận lấʔi xi kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ môʔisɛ zằŋ hãʔi di núʔi ʔabazim cên dỉɲ nêbô cɔŋ sứ môáp dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô zồʔi ɲìn sứ kanaan cɔ zân ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp vả ŋươʔi cết cên núʔi ŋươʔi dó dượk kùŋzân ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ʔazôn ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi dã cết cên núʔi hôzơ dã dượk kùŋzân kủʔa ŋườʔi bởʔivì tạʔi ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ nơʔi nướk mêziba tạʔi kadɛ cɔŋ dồŋ bắŋ sin kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰáɲ ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên kwảtʰật ŋươʔi tʰấʔi sứ cướk mìɲ ɲưŋ xôŋ dượk vàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ ấʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên vả nầʔi lờʔi cúk fướk môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúk cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cướk xi kwadờʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi Ðứkzê dã dến sina ʔi ŋàʔi sê ʔizơ zấʔi cên zâncúŋ ciếʔu sáŋ núʔi fazan ɣiữʔa dấŋ tʰáɲ từ tăj hữʔu ŋàʔi fát za cɔ lửʔa kủʔa luậtfáp ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰươŋiêʔu zânsự kák tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi dềʔu cɔŋ tăj ŋàʔi kwì suốŋ cân ŋàʔi Ðặŋ lãɲ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi môʔisɛ dã luậtfáp cɔ cúŋtôʔi là kơŋiệp kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ zakốp xi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự hộʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ cifáʔi ʔisơzaên tʰìŋàʔi cởnên vwa kủʔa ɣiêsuzun ŋwiệnzu sốŋ cớ tʰák zẫʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa dôŋ ŋườʔi cúk cɔ zuda zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê kầʔusin ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa zuda và dưʔa ŋườʔi zân mìɲ ŋwiện tăj ŋườʔi biɲ vựk cúŋ sincúʔa dến ɣiúp ŋườʔi dươŋ dịc kùŋ tʰùŋịc mìɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ cúk cɔ lêvi zằŋ tʰumim ʔu zim kủʔa ŋươʔi tʰuộk ŋườʔi kíɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi mà ŋươʔi tʰửtʰác tạʔi masa cɛɲzàɲ vớʔi tạʔi nướk mêziba lêvi nóʔi camẹ mìɲ zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi camẹ ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲận ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cẳŋ dến kɔnkáʔi mìɲ vì ŋườʔi ɣìŋiữ lờʔi cúʔa kɛɲcừŋ zawướk kủʔa cúʔa họ lấʔi mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa cúʔa zạʔi cɔ zakốp và luậtfáp cúʔa cɔ ʔisơzaên họ dể hươŋ zướʔi mũʔi ŋàʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ ŋàʔi lạʔiÐứkzê sin fướk cɔ kủʔakảʔi ŋườʔi và ɲậm kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋườʔilàm sin họŋ kủʔa zấʔi ŋịc ɣɛŋét ŋườʔi cúŋnó xôŋ tʰế zấʔi nữʔa ŋườʔi cúk bêŋiəmin zằŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê ʔiêʔumến sẽ dượk ʔiên ɣần ŋàʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cɛcở ŋườʔi lập nơʔi ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa haj vaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cúk ɣiôsép zằŋ sứ ŋườʔi dượk Ðứkzê fướk từ cờʔi ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ suốŋ cɔ ŋườʔi zất báʔu sươŋ mók ɲữŋ suốʔi kủʔa vựk tʰẳm kó nướk sâʔu ɲữŋ huêlợʔi kwí ɲất kủʔa mặtcờʔi hwakwả kựk báʔu kủʔa mặtcăŋ ɲữŋ ɲấtʰạŋ kủʔa núʔi sưʔa kák báʔu kủʔa mấʔi ɣòdốŋ dờʔidờʔi bửʔubốʔi kủʔa dất suŋmãn ŋwiện kủʔa Ðấŋ za cɔŋ bụʔi ɣaj ɣiáŋ suốŋ cên dầʔu ɣiôsép và cên cán kủʔa cúʔa ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi waiŋiêm ŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn dựk dầʔulòŋ haj sừŋ ŋườʔi sừŋ kủʔa câʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi sừŋ ấʔi báŋ mọʔi zân cɔdến kuốʔi dầʔu kủʔa dất hằŋ kủʔa zaim Ấʔilà hằŋ ŋàn kủʔa manasɛ ŋườʔi cúk sabulôn zằŋ hỡʔisa xá vuimừŋ kuộk mìɲ di za ŋɔàʔi kòn ŋươʔi ʔisaka hãʔi cɔŋ kák cạʔi mìɲ haj ŋườʔi ɣọʔi kák zântộk núʔi tạʔi dó zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa kôŋbìɲ vì haj ŋườʔi zưzật kủʔa và ɲữŋ bửʔu zướʔi kát ŋườʔi cúk ɣát zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn tʰăj Ðấŋ dể ɣát nơʔi kwảŋ xɔát ŋườʔi ŋỉ ɲư káʔi và sé káɲtăj kùŋ dầʔu ŋườʔi dã cọn cɔ mìɲ fần dầʔu ɲất kủʔa sứ bởʔivì tạʔi dó dã zàɲ fần kủʔa dấŋ luậtfáp và ŋườʔiở dằŋ dầʔu zânsự di dến ŋườʔi dồŋlòŋ vớʔi ʔisơzaên sɔŋ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê và tʰeo ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋườʔi cúk Ðʔan zằŋ Ðʔan từba ɲảʔi sôŋ dến ŋườʔi cúk néptali zằŋ néptali hưởŋ cɔ tʰỏʔaŋwiện và fướk làɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ dầʔizẫʔi ciếm dượk fươŋ tâʔi fươŋ ŋườʔi cúk ʔasɛ zằŋ ŋwiện cɔ ʔasɛ dượk fướk ɣiữʔa kák kɔncaj ʔisơzaên Ðượk dẹplòŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ và dượk zầm cân mìɲ cɔŋ zầʔu ɲữŋ tʰɛn kửʔa ŋườʔi bằŋ dồŋ Ðờʔi ŋươʔi lâʔu bawɲiêʔu sứk mạŋ ŋươʔi lâʔu bấʔiɲiêʔu ɣiêsuzun xôŋ ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi làÐấŋ waiŋi kỡʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi cên ɲữŋ dám mâʔi dặŋ dến kứʔuzúp ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ nơʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi zướʔi kó káɲtăj dờʔidờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi duổʔi tʰùŋịc xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi và fán kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ hãʔi ziệt di ʔisơzaên bìɲan suốʔiza kốp fun ziêŋ za cɔŋ sứ ŋũkốk zượʔu cờʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲỏ sươŋmók suốŋ ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi kó fướk zườŋ baw hỡʔi zân dượk Ðứkzê kứʔuzỗʔi ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋươʔi ŋàʔi káʔi tʰuẫn ɣiúpdỡ ŋươʔi tʰɛɲ ɣươm xiến cɔ ŋươʔi viɲhiển kẻtʰù ŋịc ŋươʔi dến zwa nịɲ ŋươʔi kòn ŋươʔi ŋươʔi lấʔi cân ɣiàʔidạp kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa cúŋnó kế ấʔi môʔisɛ dồŋbằŋ môáp cên núʔi nêbô nơʔi dỉɲ fícɣa dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô zồʔi Ðứkzê cɔ ŋườʔi sɛm tɔàn sứ ɣalaát cí Ðʔan tɔàn néptali sứ zaim manasɛ kả sứ zuda cɔdến tâʔi nam dồŋbằŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cũŋ ɣiêzicô tʰàɲ kâʔi càlà cɔdến swa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sứ dã tʰề cɔ zaham ʔisák zakốp zằŋ ta sứ ấʔi cɔ zòŋzốŋ ŋươʔi ta cɔ ŋươʔi sɛm sứ ấʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ vàʔɔ dó dượk môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwadờʔi tạʔi dó cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ môáp tʰeo ɲư lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ cũŋ tạʔi sứ môáp dốʔi ŋaŋ bếtfê ʔɔ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj xôŋ kó ʔaj dượk kủʔa ŋườʔi vả xi môʔisɛ kwadờʔi tuổʔi dượk mộtcăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ làŋ sứk ŋườʔi xôŋ ɣiảm zân ʔisơzaên xók môʔisɛ cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋàʔi tạʔi dồŋbằŋ môáp ɲữŋ ŋàʔi xók ŋàʔi cịʔutaŋ cɔ môʔisɛ dã sɔŋ zồʔi ɲưvậʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun dượk dầʔizẫʔi tʰần xônŋwan môʔisɛ dã dặt tăj mìɲ cên ŋườʔi zân ʔisơzaên vâŋ lờʔi ŋườʔi tʰeo diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ về săw cɔŋ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kòn zấʔi tiênci nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư môʔisɛ Ðứkzê ɣiápmặt xôŋ kó ʔaj bằŋ ŋườʔi hɔặk kák zấʔu fép Ðứkzê saj ŋườʔilàm tạʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô cướk fazaôn kák kwầntʰần kả sứ kủʔa ŋườʔi hɔặk hếttʰảʔi kôŋviệk lớnlaw dáŋsợ môʔisɛ kậʔi tăj kwiềnnăŋ mìɲ tạʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên săw xi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwadờʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun tôʔitớ kủʔa môʔisɛ zằŋ môʔisɛ tôʔitớ dã cết bâʔizờ ŋươʔi kả zânsự nàʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ sứ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ cơn kák ŋươʔi dạp dến tʰì cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ Ðịʔa fận kák ŋươʔi za dồŋ vắŋ liban nàʔi cɔdến sôŋkáʔi sôŋ fơzát càn kả sứ zân hêtít cɔdến biểnkả hướŋ mặtcờʔi cót dờʔi ŋươʔi sốŋ tʰì cẳŋ ʔaj dượk cốŋkự cướk ŋươʔi ta kùŋ ŋươʔi ɲư dã kùŋ môʔisɛ xôŋ lìʔa ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí ŋươʔi zẫn zân nàʔi di ɲận lấʔi sứ dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cɔ cúŋnó cỉ hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí kẩntʰận tʰeo hếttʰảʔi luậtfáp môʔisɛ tôʔitớ dã cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi cớ sâʔi kwa hữʔu hɔặk dể ŋươʔi di dâʔu kũŋ dềʔu dượk tʰạɲ vượŋ kwiển sác luậtfáp nàʔi cớ sa miệŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi swiɣẫm ŋàʔi dêm hầʔu cɔ kẩntʰận tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu dã cép cɔŋ ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi mớʔi dượk măimắn cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ mìɲ mớʔi dượk fướk ta xôŋ kó fán zặn ŋươʔi saw hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí cớ zunsợ cớ kiɲxủŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi cɔŋ mọʔi nơʔi ŋươʔi di bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự zằŋ hãʔi cạʔi xắp cạʔi kwân cwiền lịɲ nàʔi cɔ zânsự zằŋ hãʔi tʰựkvật cɔŋ ŋàʔi nữʔa kák ŋươʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ nàʔi dặŋ dáɲ lấʔi sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ mìɲ sảnŋiệp ɣiôsuê kũŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ zằŋ hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi diềʔu môʔisɛ tôʔitớ ɣiêhôva dã zặn kák ŋươʔi xi ŋườʔi kó nóʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔanŋỉ sứ nàʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi vợ kɔnɲỏ bầʔi súkvật kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ môʔisɛ cɔ kák ŋươʔi fíʔa nàʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi tứklà hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn fảʔi kầm biɲxí di ŋaŋ kwa cướk ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ɣiúpdỡ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ Ðứkzê ʔanŋỉ cɔ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi dến xi kũŋ dã ɲận dượk sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ Ðʔɔạn kák ŋươʔi cởvề sứ mìɲ sứ môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi fíʔa nàʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ hướŋ zờʔi mọk zồʔi kák ŋươʔi lấʔi sảnŋiệp ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi mọʔi diềʔu ôŋ zặn biểʔu di xắpnơʔi nàʔɔ ôŋ saj cúŋtôʔi vâŋ tʰeo ôŋ cɔŋ mọʔi việk ʔiɲư dã vâŋ tʰeo cɔŋ mọʔi việk ɲư dã vâŋ tʰeo môʔisɛ cỉn ŋwiện ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ kùŋ ôŋ ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã kùŋ môʔisɛ vậʔi fàm ʔaj ŋịc mạŋ xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi ôŋ cɔŋ mọʔi diềʔu ôŋ zặn biểʔu cúŋtôʔi tʰì ŋườʔi dó sửtử cỉ ôŋ hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun sitim saj haj ŋườʔi zɔtʰám zằŋ hãʔi di zɔtʰám sứ ɲấtlà ɣiêzicô vậʔi haj ŋườʔi ấʔi di dến ɲà kủʔa zaháp ŋụ tạʔi dó ŋườʔita tâʔu kùŋ vwa ɣiêzicô zằŋ kìʔa dêm năj kó ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dã dến zɔtʰám sứ vwa ɣiê zicô saj nóʔi kùŋ zaháp zằŋ hãʔi duổʔi haj ŋườʔi dã dến vàʔɔ ɲàŋươʔi dến dặŋ zɔtʰám kả sứ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dờn dɛm ɣiấʔu haj ŋườʔi nàʔi zồʔi dáp zằŋ kwảtʰật dã tớʔi ɲà tôʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ dâʔu dến sɔŋ vàʔɔ buổʔi tốʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ hầʔu dóŋ haj ŋườʔi ấʔi di za tôʔi xôŋ di dâʔu hãʔi măw duổʔi tʰeo kák ŋươʔi tʰeo dượk vả nàŋ kó biểʔu haj ŋườʔi máʔi ɲà ɣiấʔu zướʔi kộŋ ɣaj nàŋ zảʔi cên máʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa vwa duổʔi tʰeo hướŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔdến cỗ kạn vừʔa xi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo dó za xỏʔi tʰàɲ tʰì ŋườʔita dóŋkửʔa tʰàɲ cướk xi haj ŋườʔi zɔtʰám cưʔa ŋủ nàŋ máʔi ɲà nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák ôŋ sứ nàʔi kiɲxủŋ kớ kák ôŋ dã lấʔi cúŋtôʔi kả zân kủʔa sứ dềʔu sờnlòŋ cướk kák ôŋ vì cúŋtôʔi kó hăj xi kák ôŋ za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tʰì Ðứkzê dã xiến nướk biển dỏ bàʔi xô cướk kák ôŋ diềʔu kák ôŋ dã cɔ sihôn ʔɔùk haj vwa zân ʔamôzít kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kák ôŋ dã ziệt di cúŋtôʔi kó hăj diềʔu dó lòŋ za cẳŋ ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi kòn kandảm cướk kák ôŋ nữʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ôŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi kaw kiə zướʔi dất tʰấp nàʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi dã ɲơn cɔ haj ôŋ tʰì haj ôŋ kũŋ fảʔi ɲơn lạʔi cɔ ɲà ca tôʔi hãʔi cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề kùŋ tôʔi cɔ zấʔu kwảkwiết zằŋ kák ôŋ dể camẹ ʔɛɲɛm cịʔɛm tôʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi bàkɔn kủʔa dềʔu kòn sốŋ kùŋ kứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi cết haj ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ mạŋ cúŋta dền cɔ mạŋ nàŋ nếʔu nàŋ xôŋ cɔ lậʔu việk cúŋta za tʰì cúŋta dãʔi nàŋ kác ɲơn tʰàɲ xi Ðứkzê sứ cɔ cúŋta vậʔi nàŋ zùŋ sợʔi zâʔi zòŋ haj ŋườʔi suốŋ nơʔi kửʔasổ ɲà nàŋ tạʔi cên vác tʰàɲ nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi di dến núʔi kẻʔɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo ɣặp kák ôŋ căŋ hãʔi dó ŋàʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo cởvề săw zồʔi kák ôŋ hãʔi di dườŋ vả haj ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ nàʔi tʰểnàʔɔ cúŋta xỏʔi mắk lờʔi tʰề nàŋ dã tʰề xi nàʔɔ cúŋta vàʔɔ sứ nàŋ fảʔi kột sợʔi cỉ diềʔu nàʔi nơʔi kửʔasổ nàŋ zòŋ cúŋta suốŋ zồʔi ɲóm camẹ ʔɛɲɛm hếttʰảʔi bàkɔn kủʔa nàŋ lạʔi cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ fàm ʔaj cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi dó di za ŋɔàʔi kửʔɛɲà nàŋ tʰì hwiết ŋườʔi ấʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu ŋườʔi cúŋta vôtộʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ʔaj ca tăj vàʔɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kùŋ nàŋ cɔŋ ɲà tʰì hwiết kủʔa ŋườʔi dó dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu cúŋta kòn nếʔu nàŋ cɔ lậʔu việk cúŋta cúŋta xỏʔi mắk lờʔi nàŋ dã cúŋta tʰề nàŋ dáp xá ʔi lờʔi haj ôŋ dã nóʔi Ðʔɔạn nàŋ cɔ haj ŋườʔi di haj ŋườʔi di nàŋ kột sợʔi cỉ diềʔu nơʔi kửʔasổ vậʔi haj ŋườʔi di dến núʔi dó ŋàʔi cɔdến xi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo mìɲ cởvề mấʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi kùŋdườŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ ɣặp haj ŋườʔi zɔtʰám di suốŋ núʔi cởvề xi dã kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi tʰì dến ɣần ɣiêsuê kɔncaj nun tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu dã sảʔiza haj ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ kwảtʰật Ðứkzê dã fó kả sứ vàʔɔ tăj cúŋta lạʔi hếttʰảʔi zân kủʔa sứ dềʔu sờnlòŋ cướk cúŋta ɣiôsuê zậʔi sitim di kùŋ hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên dến sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó cướk xi kwa sôŋ kuốʔi ŋàʔi kák kwan cưởŋ di xắp cạʔi kwân cwiền lịɲ nàʔi cɔ zânsự zằŋ xi kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zòŋ lêvi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰìfảʔi cỗ dóŋ cạʔi mìɲ di tʰeo săw sɔŋlɛ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ kák ŋươʔi zawướk fảʔi kác cừŋ haj ŋàn tʰướk cớ dến ɣần hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi kó tʰế dườŋ mìɲ fảʔi di tʰeo kák ŋươʔi cưʔa di dườŋ nàʔi bawzờ ɣiôsuê kũŋ nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ hãʔi cɔ mìɲ za tʰáɲ ŋàʔimaj Ðứkzê ɲữŋ việk lạlùŋ ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zằŋ hãʔi xiêŋ zawướk di kwa cướk zânsự vậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk di dầʔu zânsự Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ ŋàʔinăj xởʔi ŋươʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên dể cúŋnó zằŋ kùŋ ŋươʔi ɲư dã kùŋ môʔisɛ vậʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi cwiền lịɲ nàʔi cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk xi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dến sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰì hãʔi zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi ɲờ diềʔu nàʔi kák ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ ŋự ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi duổʔi xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi zân kanaan zân hêtít zân hêvít zân fêzêsít zân ʔamôzít zân ɣiêbusít nàʔi zawướk kủʔa cúʔa kả tʰếzan di cướk kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vậʔi hãʔi cọn mườʔihaj ŋườʔi kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên mỗʔi cifáʔi ŋườʔi xi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê cúʔa kả tʰếzan mớʔi dể cơn mìɲ zướʔi nướk sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰì nướk kủʔa sôŋ tứk nướk ŋuồn cảʔi suốŋ ciə za zồn lạʔi tʰàɲ dốŋ xi zânsự kák cạʔi mìɲ dặŋ di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰì ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk cướk zânsự vả cọn lúk mùʔa ɣặt sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ càn xỏʔi xi kák ŋườʔi xiêŋ dến sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cơn kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ mớʔi nơʔi nướk tʰì nướk cên ŋuồn tʰườŋ cảʔi suốŋ zừŋ lạʔi zồn tʰàɲ dốŋ sa za xɔảŋ dến tʰàɲ ʔadam tʰàɲ bênkạɲ sáttʰan kòn nướk cảʔi dến dồŋbằŋ tứk biển dã zẽ dɔạn za zồʔi zânsự di kwa dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê zừŋ cơn vữŋ cên dất xô ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ xi kả ʔisơzaên di kwa cên dất xô cɔdến cừŋ kả zân dã kwa xỏʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi xi kả zân dã kwa xỏʔi ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi cọn cɔŋ zânsự mườʔihaj ŋườʔi mỗʔi cifáʔi ŋườʔi zồʔi cwiền lịɲ nàʔi cɔ kák ŋườʔi dó hãʔi lấʔi mườʔihaj dá tạʔi dâʔi ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ nơʔi cơn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dứŋ vữŋ zồʔi dɛm tʰeo dặt tạʔicỗ kák ŋươʔi ŋủ bandêm vậʔi ɣiôsuê ɣọʔi mườʔihaj ŋườʔi mìɲ dã cọn cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên mỗʔi cifáʔi ŋườʔi cwiền zằŋ hãʔi di kwa cướk kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi tʰeo cifáʔi ʔisơzaên fảʔi vák dá cên vaj mìɲ hầʔu cɔ diềʔu dó zấʔu ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi về săw xi kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ dá nàʔi kóŋĩʔa ci tʰì hãʔi dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà nướk sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dã zẽ za cướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê xi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰì nướk sôŋ zẽ za kák dá nàʔi zùŋ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dờʔidờʔi vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰeo diềʔu ɣiôsuê dã biểʔu lấʔi mườʔihaj dá ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰeo cifáʔi zân ʔisơzaên dɛm tʰeo kùŋ mìɲ dến cỗ nàʔɔ fảʔi ŋủ bandêm zồʔi dặt tạʔi dó ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ɣiôsuê ɣiôsuê kũŋ zựŋ mườʔihaj dá ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tạʔi nơʔi cơn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk dã dứŋ kák dá ấʔi hãʔi kòn dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ dềʔu dứŋ ɣiữʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ dã sɔŋ mọʔi việk Ðứkzê dã zặn biểʔu ɣiôsuê cwiền lạʔi cɔ zânsự tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ môʔisɛ dã cwiền cɔ ɣiôsuê zânsự lậtdật di kwa sôŋ xi kả zânsự dã di kwa sôŋ zồʔi tʰì kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kũŋ di kwa cướk zânsự kɔncáʔu zubên kɔncáʔu ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ kầm biɲxí di cướk zân ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư môʔisɛ dã zặn biểʔu kó cừŋ ŋườʔi sắmsửʔa za cận di kwa cướk Ðứkzê dến cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ ɣiêzicô dặŋ dáɲ ɣiặk ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê xiến ɣiôsuê dượk tôncọŋ cướk kả ʔisơzaên cúŋ kíɲ ŋườʔi cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi ɲư dã kíɲ môʔisɛ vậʔi vả Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ bảŋ cứŋ di xỏʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiôsuê cwiền lịɲ cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zằŋ hãʔi di xỏʔi ɣiôdɛɲ xi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dã xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ôŋ cơn zở dặŋ bướk cên dất xô zồʔi tʰì nướk sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ
