cởlạʔi cỗ kũ cảʔi càn za xắp ɲư cướk ŋàʔi mồŋ mườʔi tʰáŋzêŋ zânsự di xỏʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ kuốʔi fíʔa dôŋ ɣiêzicô ɣiôsuê zựŋ tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ mườʔihaj dá zâncúŋ dã lấʔi zướʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ về săw xi kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi hỏʔi ca mìɲ zằŋ kák dá nàʔi kóŋĩʔa ɣì tʰì kák ŋươʔi zạʔi kɔncáʔu mìɲ zằŋ ʔisơzaên dã di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cên dất xô ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ bàʔi xô cướk kák ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã kwa xỏʔi ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã tạʔi biển dỏ xiến cɔ bàʔi xô cướk cúŋta cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ cúŋta dã kwa xỏʔi hầʔu cɔ kák zântộk tʰếzan zằŋ tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê zất mạɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi vả kák vwa ʔamôzít kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa tâʔi kák vwa kanaan ɣần vừʔa hăj zằŋ Ðứkzê dã cɔ nướk sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ bàʔi xô cướk zân ʔisơzaên cɔdến cừŋ dã di kwa xỏʔi tʰì lòŋ kiɲ xiếp naw kớ zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ lúk dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi sắmsửʔa zaw bằŋ dálửʔa làmfép kắt tʰứ ɲì cɔ zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi ɣiôsuê sắmsửʔa zaw bằŋ dálửʔa làmfép kắt cɔ zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi cên ɣò ʔazalốt nàʔi kớ ɣiôsuê làmfép kắt cɔ kák ŋườʔi cɔŋ zâncúŋ dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứklà kák ciếnsĩ dềʔu dã cết zọk dườŋ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ săw xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vả hếttʰảʔi zâncúŋ dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dềʔu kó cịʔufép kắt ɲưŋ săw xi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ŋườʔita xôŋ kó làmfép kắt cɔ ʔaj cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sɛɲ za zọk dườŋ tạʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ vì zân ʔisơzaên dã di cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ mươʔi cɔdến cừŋ kả zânsự dã cết tứklà ɲữŋ ciếnsĩ dã za xỏʔi sứ zíptô xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kó tʰề kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ cẳŋ cɔ tʰấʔi sứ Ðứkzê dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cɔ cúŋta tứklà sứ dượm sữʔa vàŋàʔi dã zấʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa tʰế vàʔɔ cỗ Ấʔilà kɔncáʔu nàʔi ɣiôsuê làmfép kắt cɔ cúŋnó xôŋ kó cịʔufép kắt zọk dườŋ xi ŋườʔita làmfép kắt cɔ hếttʰảʔi zânsự sɔŋ zồʔi tʰì lạʔi cỗ mìɲ cɔŋ cạʔi kwân cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ làɲ bấʔizờ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ ŋàʔinăj dã kất xỏʔi kák ŋươʔi sấʔuhổ kủʔa sứ zíptô nên ŋườʔita ɣọʔi cỗ ấʔilà ɣiɲɣɛɲ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj zân ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ ɣiêzicô ɣiữ vượt kwa ɲằm ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋ nàʔi vàʔɔ lốʔi ciềʔutốʔi ŋàʔisăw vượt kwa cáɲ nàʔi dó zânsự tʰổsản kủʔa sứ báɲ xôŋ mɛn zaŋ ŋàʔi cúŋ dã lúʔamì kủʔa sứ tʰì dến sáŋmaj vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó nữʔa ɲưŋ cɔŋ dó ɲữŋ tʰổsản kủʔa kanaan sảʔi xi ɣiôsuê ɣần ɣiêzicô ŋướk ɲìn tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ kầm ɣươm cần dốʔiziện kùŋ mìɲ ɣiôsuê dilạʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa cúŋta hăjlà ŋườʔi kủʔa tʰùŋịc cúŋta ŋườʔi dáp xôŋ bâʔizờ dến tướŋ dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiôsuê suốŋ dất lạʔi hỏʔi zằŋ cúʔa cwiền cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa diềʔu ɣì tướŋ dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi ɣiàʔi xỏʔi cơn ŋươʔi nơʔi ŋươʔi dứŋ tʰáɲ ɣiôsuê ɲưvậʔi vả ɣiêzicô dã dóŋkửʔa mìɲ kác ŋiêmɲặt cướk zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vàʔɔ za Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê vwa kák ciếnsĩ mạɲzạn kủʔa vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi vậʔi hếttʰảʔi kák ŋươʔi ciếnsĩ hãʔi di vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ fảʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi bảʔi tʰầʔi di cướk zawướk kầm bảʔi káʔi tiếŋvaŋ ɲưŋ kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi di vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ bảʔi bảʔi tʰầʔi tʰổʔi xi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi vaŋ kák ŋươʔi vừʔa ŋɛ tiếŋ hếttʰảʔi zânsự fảʔi tiếŋ tʰì vác tʰàɲ suốŋ zồʔi zânsự mỗʔi ŋườʔi ŋăj cướk mìɲ vậʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun ɣọʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi xiêŋ zawướk bảʔi tʰầʔi fảʔi di cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê kầm bảʔi káʔi tiếŋvaŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ hãʔi di vòŋ suŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí fảʔi di cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê xizô dã nóʔi kùŋzân sɔŋ zồʔi bảʔi tʰầʔi kầm bảʔi kâʔi tiếŋvaŋ cướk Ðứkzê vừʔa di tớʔi vừʔa tʰổʔi kòn kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰeo săw kák ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí di cướk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi kòn dạʔɔ hậʔu di tʰeo săw ŋườʔita vừʔa di vừʔa tʰổʔi vả ɣiôsuê kó cwiền lịɲ cɔ zânsự zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ cớ kó ŋɛ tiếŋnóʔi mìɲ cớ kó lờʔi ci za xỏʔi miệŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔdến ŋàʔi nàʔɔ biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi bấʔizờ kák ŋươʔi hòm kủʔa Ðứkzê di vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ zồʔi cúŋ vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó ɣiôsuê zậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xiêŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê bảʔi tʰầʔi kứ di cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê kầm bảʔi kâʔi tiếŋvaŋ vừʔa di vừʔa tʰổʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí di cướk kòn dạʔɔ hậʔu di tʰeo săw kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰầʔi vừʔa di vừʔa tʰổʔi ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲì cúŋ di vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ zồʔi cởvề cạʔi kwân cúŋ ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ sáʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi kák ŋườʔi dó zậʔi vừʔa tưŋ sáŋ ʔiɲư kác cướk di cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ bảʔi cỉ nộʔi ŋàʔi dó di cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ bảʔi lần tʰứbảʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi tʰì ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ hãʔi Ðứkzê dã fó tʰàɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi káʔi tʰàɲ mọʔi cɔŋ fú zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ɲư dáŋ ziệt cỉ mộtmìɲ zaháp vớʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở kùŋ nàŋ cɔŋ ɲà dượk sốŋ nàŋ dã ɣiấʔu sứɣiả kủʔa cúŋta saj dến ɲưŋ hãʔi kẩntʰận kák ŋươʔi fú zâŋ ziệt di nếʔu xi dã fú ziệt zồʔi kák ŋươʔi dɔạt lấʔi kủʔa dáŋ ziệt dó tʰì kák ŋươʔi ɣâʔi cɔ cạʔi kwân ʔisơzaên dáŋ ziệt zeo lɔạnlạk vàʔɔ cɔŋ dó fàm bạk vàŋ hếttʰảʔi bằŋ dồŋ kùŋ bằŋ dềʔu ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê kák dó ɲập xɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê vậʔi zânsự ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi vừʔa xi zânsự ŋɛ tiếŋ vác tʰàɲ ŋã zânsự tʰàɲ mỗʔi ŋườʔi ŋăj cướk mìɲ cúŋ lấʔi tʰàɲ dưʔa ɣươm kwa ziệt mọʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ fụlãʔɔ ấʔi cɔdến ciên lừʔa bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ haj ŋườʔi dã di zɔtʰám sứ zằŋ hãʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà biểʔu nàŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi tʰuộk nàŋ di za ʔiɲư haj ŋươʔi dã tʰề kùŋ nàŋ vậʔi haj ŋườʔi caicẻ dã di zɔtʰám sứ vàʔɔ biểʔu zaháp camẹ nàŋ ʔɛɲɛm mọʔi ci tʰuộk nàŋ di za haj ŋườʔi dɛm hếttʰảʔi zakwiến nàŋ za dể ŋɔàʔi cạʔi kwân ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn cúŋ fóŋỏʔa káʔi tʰàɲ mọʔi cɔŋ cỉ dể bạk vàŋ cibằŋ dồŋ bằŋ ɲập vàʔɔ xɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê vậʔi ɣiôsuê bảʔɔtồn sốŋ kủʔa zaháp nộʔi ɲà kủʔa ca nàŋ mọʔi ci tʰuộk nàŋ nàŋ ɣiữʔa ʔisơzaên cɔdến ŋàʔinăj nàŋ kó ɣiấʔu ɣiả ɣiôsuê dã saj zɔtʰám ɣiêzicô bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê fát tʰề zằŋ fàm ʔaj cổʔi sâʔi lạʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzicô nàʔi zủʔasả cướk Ðứkzê lạʔi kɔn cưởŋnam mìɲ fảʔi cết zựŋ kửʔa lạʔi kɔn mìɲ fảʔi cết vậʔi Ðứkzê kùŋ ɣiôsuê zɛɲtiếŋ ŋườʔi dồn xắp cɔŋ sứ sɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên kó fạm tộʔi dáŋ ziệt ʔakan kɔncaj kủʔa kạtni cáʔu kủʔa sápdi cắt kủʔa sêzác cifáʔi zuda kó lấʔi dáŋ ziệt kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ɣiêzicô ɣiôsuê saj ŋườʔi dến tʰàɲ ʔahi ɣần bếtavɛn fíʔa dôŋ bêtên cwiền lịɲ nàʔi zằŋ hãʔi di zɔtʰám sứ vậʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi di zɔtʰám tʰàɲ ʔahi Ðʔɔạn cởvề kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ lấʔilàm vôíc dɛm kả zânsự di dó ɲưŋ hãʔi cɔ cừŋ vàʔiba ŋàn ŋườʔi di dó dáɲ tʰàɲ ʔahi cớ cɔ mệtɲọk kả zâncúŋ di dó ŋườʔi ʔahi kwá vậʔi kó cừŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi di dó ɲưŋ cạʔi cốn cướk ŋườʔi ʔahi ŋườʔi ʔahi ɣiết cừŋ bamươʔi sáʔu ŋườʔi zượt tʰeo kửʔa tʰàɲ cɔdến sêbazim dáɲ lúk di suốŋzốk lòŋ zânsự za ɲư nướk ɣiôsuê sé áʔɔ mìɲ zồʔi ŋườʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên suốŋ dất cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi vảʔi bụʔi dất cên dầʔu mìɲ ɣiôsuê nóʔi Ôʔi cúʔazê saw ŋàʔi dɛm zân nàʔi kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dặŋ fó cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ tăj zân ʔamôzít cɔ ziệt di Ôʔi cớci cúŋtôʔi cọn fần lạʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰanôʔi hỡʔi cúʔa săw xi ʔisơzaên dã sâʔi lưŋ cướk tʰùŋịc mìɲ tôʔi kòn nóʔi làmsaw zânka naan kả zân sứ nàʔi hăj diềʔu dó vâʔi cúŋtôʔi ziệt zɛɲ cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi dất zồʔi cúʔa làmsaw cɔ zɛɲ cúʔa bấʔizờ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi saw ŋươʔi suốŋ dất ɲưvậʔi ʔisơzaên kó fạmtộʔi cúŋnó bộʔiŋịc zawướk dã cwiền cɔ dếnnỗʔi zám lấʔi dáŋ ziệt ănkắp dó zốʔicá dể cɔŋ baw mìɲ bởʔi kớ dó zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ tʰế cốŋkự nổʔi cướk tʰùŋịc mìɲ fảʔi sâʔi lưŋ cướk cúŋnó ʔisơzaên dã cởnên zủʔasả nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kất xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ dáŋ ziệt ấʔi tʰì xôŋ kòn kùŋ kák ŋươʔi nữʔa hãʔi dứŋzậʔi cɔ zânsự tʰáɲ hãʔi nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xá cɔ mìɲ tʰáɲ ŋàʔimaj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi kó dáŋ ziệt tạʔi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰế cốŋkự nổʔi cướk tʰùŋịc mìɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi dã kất xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ dáŋ ziệt ấʔi vậʔi sáŋmaj kák ŋươʔi di dến ɣần từŋ cifáʔi cifáʔi nàʔɔ Ðứkzê cỉ za dến ɣần từŋ họhàŋ họhàŋ nàʔɔ Ðứkzê cỉ za dến ɣần từŋ ɲà ɲà nàʔɔ Ðứkzê cỉ za dến ɣần từŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cỉ za kókủʔa dáŋ ziệt dó tʰiêʔu nơʔi lửʔa kùŋ kák tʰuộk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã bộʔi zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê fạm sấʔuhổ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên vậʔi ɣiôsuê zậʔi biểʔu ʔisơzaên dến ɣần từŋ cifáʔi cifáʔi zuda cỉ za Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi biểʔu kák họhàŋ zuda dến ɣần họhàŋ sêzác cỉ za Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi biểʔu họhàŋ sêzác lạʔi ɣần từŋ zɛcưởŋ sápdi cỉ za ŋườʔi biểʔu ɲà sápdi dến ɣần từŋ ŋườʔi tʰì ʔakan kɔncaj kủʔa kạtni cáʔu kủʔa sápdi cỉ za ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ ʔakan zằŋ hỡʔi kɔn sin hãʔi tônviɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hãʔi tʰútʰật cɔ diềʔu kɔn dã cớ ɣiấʔu cút nàʔɔ ʔakan tʰưʔa kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ fảʔi tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên nàʔi diềʔu tôʔi dã tôʔi kó tʰấʔi cɔŋ kủʔa kướp káʔi áʔɔcɔàŋ sinê ʔa tốtdẹp haj căm siếk bạk vàŋ nặŋ nămmươʔi siếk tôʔi tʰam kák dó lấʔi kìʔa kák ấʔi dã ɣiấʔu zướʔi dất ɣiữʔa cạʔi tôʔi kòn bạk tʰì zướʔi ɣiôsuê saj ŋườʔi cạʔi dến cạʔi tʰấʔi áʔɔcɔàŋ ɣiấʔu tạʔi dó bạk tʰì zướʔi họ lấʔi kák dó ɣiữʔa cạʔi dɛm cɔ ɣiôsuê cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên zồʔi dể cướk Ðứkzê bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê kả ʔisơzaên ʔakan kɔncáʔu sêzác kùŋ lấʔi bạk áʔɔcɔàŋ vàŋ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi lừʔa ciên cạʔi mọʔi ci tʰuộk ŋườʔi zẫn dến cɔŋ cũŋ ʔakô ɣiôsuê nóʔi saw ŋươʔi kó xuấʔizốʔi cúŋta Ðứkzê cắk xuấʔizốʔi ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj zồʔi kả ʔisơzaên dá ŋườʔi tʰiêʔu kák ŋườʔi ấʔi cɔŋ lửʔa lấʔi dá cúŋnó lạʔi kế ấʔi cúŋ cất cên tʰâʔi ŋườʔi dốŋ dá hãʔi kòn cɔdến ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê ŋuôʔi kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi bởʔi kớ dó ŋườʔita ɣọʔi cỗ nàʔi ʔakô cɔdến ŋàʔinăj kế dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ cớ áʔiŋạʔi hãʔi dɛm tʰeo mìɲ hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ cổʔi zậʔi di dáɲ tʰàɲ ʔahi kìʔa dã fó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi vwa ʔahi zânsự tʰàɲ sứ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi dãʔi ʔahi vwa ɲư ŋươʔi dã dãʔi ɣiêzicô vwa ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi dɔạt lấʔi hóʔa tàʔi súkvật cɔ mìɲ hãʔi fụkbiɲ săw tʰàɲ vậʔi ɣiôsuê dứŋzậʔi kùŋ kák kwânlíɲ dặŋ dáɲ ʔahi ŋườʔi cọn ŋườʔi mạɲzạn saj di bandêm cwiền lịɲ nàʔi zằŋ hãʔi kɔj kák ŋươʔi fụkbiɲ săw tʰàɲ cớ zaŋ za sa tʰàɲ kwá hãʔi zàn cɔ kòn vớʔi kả zânsự tʰeo di ɣần lạʔi tʰàɲ xi cúŋnó za dón dáɲ cúŋta ɲư cướk tʰì cúŋta cạʔi cốn cướk cúŋnó cúŋnó zượt tʰeo cúŋta cɔdến cừŋ cúŋta zụ cúŋnó za kác sa xỏʔi tʰàɲ nóʔi zằŋ cúŋnó cạʔi cốn ɲư cướk cɔŋ lúk cúŋta cạʔi cốn cướk cúŋnó tʰì kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi nơʔi fụkbiɲ lấʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi fó tʰàɲ vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi ciếm tʰàɲ zồʔi tʰìfảʔi fóŋỏʔa hãʔi tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê hãʔi kɔj nàʔi lịɲ cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi ɣiôsuê saj kák ŋườʔi dó di fụk ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ bêtên ʔahi fíʔa tâʔi kủʔa ʔahi kòn ɣiôsuê dêm dó ŋủ tạʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự kế ấʔi ɣiôsuê zậʔi diểm zânsự ŋườʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ di cướk zân dến tʰàɲ ʔahi hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi di dến ɣần cướk tʰàɲ dóŋ cạʔi fíʔa bắk ʔahi kó káʔi cũŋ cạʔi zàʔi ɣiữʔa tʰàɲ ʔahi ɣiôsuê dɛm cừŋ ŋàn líɲ fụk ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ bêtên ʔahi fíʔa tâʔi kủʔa tʰàɲ xi zânsự dã dóŋ cạʔi nơʔi fíʔa bắk kủʔa tʰàɲ fụkbiɲ fíʔa tâʔi zồʔi tʰì dêm dó ɣiôsuê di sớm tớʔi cɔŋ cũŋ vwa tʰàɲ ấʔi vừʔa tʰấʔi diềʔu dó ŋườʔita lậtdật zậʔi vwa kả zânsự ŋườʔi dềʔu di za dón ʔisơzaên tạʔi nơʔi dã cỉbảʔɔ fíʔa dồŋbằŋ dặŋ zawciến sɔŋ vwa xôŋ zằŋ kó dạʔɔ biɲfụk fíʔa săw tʰàɲ ɣiôsuê kả ʔisơzaên dể cɔ cúŋnó dáɲbạʔi mìɲ cạʔi cốn fíʔa dồŋ vắŋ hếttʰảʔi zânsự cɔŋ tʰàɲ dềʔu lạʔi dặŋ duổʔi tʰeo vậʔi cúŋ zượt tʰeo ɣiôsuê zụ kác sa xỏʔi tʰàɲ cẳŋ kó ʔaj tʰàɲ ʔahi hăjlà bêtên xôŋ za duổʔi tʰeo ʔisơzaên tʰàɲ cốŋxôŋ dể duổʔi tʰeo ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi ɣiơ ɣiáʔɔ ŋươʔi kầm nơʔi tăj za hướŋ tʰàɲ ʔahi fó tʰàɲ vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ɣiôsuê ɣiơ ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ kầm nơʔi tăj za hướŋ tʰàɲ vừʔa ɣiơ tăj biɲfụk lậptứk dứŋzậʔi xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ cạʔi vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ciếm lấʔi fóŋỏʔa ŋườʔi tʰàɲ ʔahi kwăj lạʔi ɲìn tʰấʔi xóʔi dốt tʰàɲ băj cờʔi cẳŋ fươŋ tʰếnàʔɔ dặŋ cốn fíʔa nàʔi hăjlà fíʔa kiə vả zânsự cạʔi cốn fíʔa dồŋ vắŋ cở lạʔi dáɲ ɲữŋ zượt duổʔi tʰeo mìɲ xizô kả ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi biɲfụk dã lấʔi tʰàɲ xóʔi dốt tʰàɲ băj cởvề dáɲ ŋườʔi ʔahi kák biɲ xák kũŋ za xỏʔi tʰàɲ dón dáɲ zân ʔahi ɲưvậʔi cúŋnó zân ʔisơzaên vâʔi fủ nàʔi kó dạʔɔ nàʔi kiə kó kwân kiə ŋườʔita dáɲ cúŋnó dến dỗʔi xôŋ kòn dể lạʔi nàʔɔ sốŋ hăjlà cɔ ʔaj tʰɔát dượk biɲ bắtsốŋ vwa ʔahi zẫn dếnkùŋ ɣiôsuê xi zân ʔisơzaên dã ɣiết sɔŋ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi tʰàɲ ʔahi hɔặk cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ hăjlà cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ nơʔi cúŋnó duổʔi tʰeo xi hếttʰảʔi dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi cót dã ŋã zạp zướʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm zồʔi tʰì zân ʔisơzaên cởvề ʔahi ɣiết bằŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ɲữŋ kòn tạʔi dó cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔahi dềʔu ŋã cết mườʔihaj ŋàn ŋườʔi ɣiôsuê cẳŋ zút lạʔi tăj mìɲ dã kầm ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za vớʔi kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋườʔita dã ziệt hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi tʰàɲ ʔahi sɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên kướp cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ súkvật hóʔa tàʔi kủʔa tʰàɲ nàʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ɣiôsuê vậʔi ɣiôsuê fóŋỏʔa tʰàɲ ʔahi cɔ za dốŋ dờʔidờʔi ʔiɲư hãʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔi biểʔu ceo vwa ʔahi cên kâʔi dể dó cɔdến ciềʔu ɲưŋ xi mặtcờʔi ɣiôsuê biểʔu ŋườʔita tʰâʔi suốŋ xỏʔi kâʔi ŋườʔita dɛm liệŋ tʰâʔi dó nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ cất cên dốŋ dá hãʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê bàntʰờ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tạʔi cên núʔi bɛɲ ʔiɲư môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã zặn biểʔu zân ʔisơ zên dã kó cép cɔŋ sác luậtfáp môʔisɛ ấʔilà bàntʰờ bằŋ dá ŋwiên xốʔi cưʔa dụŋ dến dó zânsự zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê zâŋ kủʔa tʰù tạʔi dó ɣiôsuê kũŋ xắk cên dá luậtfáp môʔisɛ dã cép cướk zân ʔisơzaên kả ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kák kwan kaj kák kwan sét dứŋ haj cướk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔi xiêŋ zawướk ủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ xác vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu kómặt tạʔi dó fânnửʔa nàʔi fíʔa núʔi ɣazisim fânnửʔa kiə fíʔa núʔi bɛɲ tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê cướk dã cwiền cɔ cúk fướk zân ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê dọk kák lờʔi luậtfáp cúk làɲ cúk zữ ʔiɲư dã cép cɔŋ sác luậtfáp cẳŋ kó lờʔi nàʔɔ mọʔi diềʔu môʔisɛ dã cwiền zặn ɣiôsuê xôŋ dọk tạʔi cướk kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên cướk dờn kɔnnít xác ɣiữʔa xi hăj dượkviệk nàʔi hếttʰảʔi kák vwa nàʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ hɔặk cɔŋ núʔi zướʔi dồŋbằŋ hăjlà zọk bãʔibiển dốʔi ŋaŋ liban tứklà kák vwa zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân kanaan zân fêzêsít zân ɣiêbusít dềʔu zập vớʔi ɲăw dặŋ zawciến vớʔi ɣiôsuê ʔisơzaên xi zân ɣabaôn dã hăj diềʔu ɣiôsuê cɔ ɣiêzicô ʔahi tíɲ zùŋ mưʔukế cúŋnó ɣiảbộ di lấʔi baw kũ cất cɔ lừʔa mìɲ bầʔu cứʔa zượʔu kũ zác lạʔi zướʔi cơn maŋ ɣiàʔi kũ cên mìɲ kwầnáʔɔ kũ hếttʰảʔi báɲ lươŋ dềʔu xô miếŋ cúŋnó di dến ɣần ɣiôsuê tạʔi cạʔi kwân ɣiɲɣɛɲ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ cúŋtôʔi sứ sa dến vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi zawướk kùŋ cúŋtôʔi zân ʔisơzaên dáp kùŋzân hêvít zằŋ kólẽ kák ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa cúŋta căŋ vậʔi tʰếnàʔɔ zawướk dặŋ ɲưŋ cúŋnó nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa ôŋ ɣiôsuê hỏʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔaj dâʔu dến zằŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa ôŋ sứ zất sa dến dể tôncọŋ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛnóʔi ŋàʔi mọʔi diềʔu ŋàʔi dã cɔŋ sứ zíptô lạʔi kũŋ ŋɛ mọʔi diềʔu ŋàʔi dã cɔ haj vwa ʔamôzít kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ sihôn vwa hếtbôn ʔɔùk vwa basan tạʔi Ác tazốt kák cưởŋlãʔɔ hếttʰảʔi zânsự sứ cúŋtôʔi kó nóʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi lươŋtʰựk zùŋ zọk dườŋ di dến cướk zân dó nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi tôʔitớ kák ôŋ bâʔizờ hãʔi zawướk kùŋ cúŋtôʔi kìʔa báɲ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi ɲà dặŋ di dếnkùŋ kák ôŋ cúŋtôʔi lấʔi dɛm tʰeo lươŋtʰựk nóŋổʔi ŋàʔinăj dã xô ɲữŋ bầʔu zượʔu nàʔi cúŋtôʔi dổ dầʔi zượʔu hãʔi kòn mớʔitiɲ kìʔa năj dã zác kòn kwầnáʔɔ ɣiàʔi cúŋtôʔi dã kũ bởʔivì di dườŋ sa ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ɲậm lươŋtʰựk cúŋnó xôŋ kầʔu hỏʔi Ðứkzê ɣiôsuê hòʔa kùŋ cúŋnó kếtướk cɔ cúŋnó sốŋ zồʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ tʰề kùŋ cúŋnó ɲưŋ ŋàʔisăw xi dã zawướk kùŋ cúŋnó zân ʔisơzaên hăj zằŋ kák ŋườʔi nàʔi lânkận mìɲ tạʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên lêndườŋ ŋàʔi tʰứba dến tʰàɲ cúŋnó vả kák tʰàɲ kủʔa cúŋnó ɣabaôn kêfiza bêêzốt kiziátzêʔazim zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ zawciến kùŋzân dó kớ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ dã cỉ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰề kùŋzân dó ɲưŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ kùŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kák kwan cưởŋ nóʔi kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ zằŋ cúŋta dã cỉ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰề kùŋzân dó vậʔi bâʔizờ cúŋta xôŋ tʰế hạʔi cúŋnó dượk cúŋta fảʔi dãʔi zân dó ɲưvầʔi fảʔi dể cɔ cúŋnó sốŋ hầʔu cɔ cớ kớ lờʔi tʰề dã cúŋta xiến kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên cúŋta vậʔi kák kwan cưởŋ zằŋ cúŋnó dượk sốŋ ɲưŋ fảʔi zùŋ dể dốn kủʔi sác nướk cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔiɲư kák kwan cưởŋ dã nóʔi kùŋ cúŋnó ɣiôsuê ɣọʔi zân dó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi saw kák ŋươʔi dã ɣạt cúŋta nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi zất sa kák ôŋ téza kák ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa cúŋta vậʔi bâʔizờ kák ŋươʔi zủʔasả xôŋ zứt tôʔimọʔi kứ dốn kủʔi sác nướk cɔ ɲà kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó tʰưʔa kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ Ấʔilà diềʔu tôʔitớ ôŋ kó hăj zõzàŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ dã fán zặn môʔisɛ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi biểʔu tɔàn sứ cɔ kák ôŋ ziệt hếttʰảʔi zân cướk mìɲ ấʔi vậʔi cúŋtôʔi kớ kák ôŋ lấʔilàm zất sợhãʔi cɔ sốŋ mìɲ mớʔi ɲưvậʔi bâʔizờ cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ tăj ôŋ hãʔi dãʔi cúŋtôʔi tùʔiý ôŋ cɔ tốtlàɲ kôŋbìɲ ɣiôsuê ɲư ŋườʔi dã nóʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋnó xỏʔi tăj zân ʔisơzaên ɣiết cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi kắt cúŋnó dốn kủʔi sác nướk cɔ hộʔi cúŋ cɔ bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi ŋàʔi cọnlựʔa ấʔilà diềʔu zân dó hãʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj xi ʔadônisêdék vwa ɣiêzusalɛm hăj zằŋ ɣiôsuê dã ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ ʔahi tậnziệt di dãʔi tʰàɲ ʔahi vwa ɲư ŋườʔi dã dãʔi ɣiêzicô vwa lạʔi hăj zằŋ zân ɣabaôn dã hòʔa vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên kùŋ tʰì ŋườʔi lấʔilàm sợhãʔi ɣabaôn tʰàɲ dếdô tʰật lạʔi tʰàɲ ʔahi kả zânsự dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn vậʔi ʔadônisêdék vwa tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm saj ŋườʔi di nóʔi kùŋ hôham vwa hếpzôn kùŋ fizam vwa ɣiạtmút kùŋ zafiə vwa laki kùŋ biə vwa Ék zằŋ hãʔi di dến tiếpkứʔu dáɲ tʰàɲ ɣabaôn dã hòʔa kùŋ ɣiôsuê zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi vwa ʔamôzít tứklà vwa ɣiêzusalɛm vwa hếpzôn vwa ɣiạtmút vwa laki vwa Ék ɲóm kéʔɔ kùŋ hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ mìɲ dóŋ cạʔi cướk ɣabaôn dàɲ tʰàɲ ŋườʔiɣa saj dến nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê tạʔi cạʔi kwân ɣiɲɣɛɲ zằŋ sin cớ tôʔitớ ôŋ hãʔi măw dếnkùŋ cúŋtôʔi ɣiảʔitʰɔát tiếpkứʔu cúŋtôʔi hếttʰảʔi vwa ʔamôzít cɔŋ núʔi dã lạʔi ŋịc cúŋtôʔi vậʔi ɣiôsuê ɣiɲɣɛɲ di vớʔi hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲ zân Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ cớ dã fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn ʔaj dứŋ nổʔi cướk ŋươʔi dượk vậʔi ɣiôsuê ɣiɲɣɛɲ di cọn dêm zồʔi cợt dến cúŋnó Ðứkzê cɔ cúŋnó cạʔi cướk ʔisơzaên xiến cɔ dạʔibạʔi ɣần ɣabaôn ʔisơzaên zượt duổʔi cúŋnó tʰeo dườŋ zốk bếtʰôzôn dáɲ cɔdến ʔasêka makêda xi cúŋnó cạʔi cốn cướk ʔisơzaên suốŋzốk bêhôzôn tʰì Ðứkzê xiến dá cờʔi zớt suốŋ kả dườŋ cɔdến ʔasêka cúŋnó dềʔu cết số ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cết mưʔadá ɲiềʔu ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zân ʔisơzaên ɣiết bằŋ ɣươm ŋàʔi Ðứkzê fó zân ʔamôzít cɔ zân ʔisơzaên tʰì ɣiôsuê tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê tạʔi cướk ʔisơzaên zằŋ hỡʔi mặtcờʔi hãʔi zừŋ lạʔi cên ɣabaôn hỡʔi mặtcăŋ hãʔi ŋừŋ lạʔi cên cũŋ ʔazalôn mặtcờʔi zừŋ mặtcăŋ ŋừŋ cɔdến cừŋ zânsự dã báʔɔtʰù kwân ŋịc mìɲ Ðʔiềʔu dó xôŋ kó cép cɔŋ sác zasa saw mặtcờʔi zừŋ lạʔi ɣiữʔa cờʔi xôŋ vộʔi ướk ŋàʔi cọn từ cướk săw cẳŋ kó ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ɲư ŋàʔi dó ŋàʔi Ðứkzê kó ɲậm lờʔi kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi Ðứkzê ciến kự cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zồʔizô kả ʔisơzaên cởvề cạʔi kwân ɣiɲɣɛɲ vả vwa kiə dã cạʔi cốn cɔŋ haŋ dá tạʔi makêda kó ŋườʔi tʰuật cɔ ɣiôsuê hăj diềʔu dó zằŋ ŋườʔita kó ɣặp vwa cɔŋ haŋ dá tạʔi makêda ɣiôsuê zạʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi dá miệŋ haŋ lạʔi kắt ŋườʔi kɛɲzữ kòn kák ŋươʔi cớ zừŋ lạʔi fảʔi zượt tʰeo kwân ŋịc sôŋ dáɲ fíʔa săw dừŋ dể cúŋnó vàʔɔ tʰàɲ cúŋnó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi xizô zân ʔisơzaên dã dáɲ cúŋnó bạʔi zất cɔ dếnnỗʔi twiệtziệt di xi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋnó dã dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi zút lạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ kiênkố tʰì kả zânsự cởvề vớʔi ɣiôsuê bìɲiên nơʔi cạʔi kwân tạʔi makêda cẳŋ ʔaj zám xwa môʔi ŋịc kùŋzân ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi mởmiệŋ haŋ dɛm vwa dó za zồʔi zẫn dến cɔ họ ɲưvậʔi dưʔa vwa za xỏʔi haŋ dá zẫn dến cɔ ŋườʔi tứklà vwa ɣiêzusalɛm vwa hếpzôn vwa ɣiạtmút vwa laki vwa Ék xi dã zẫn vwa nàʔi dếnkùŋ ɣiôsuê tʰì ɣiôsuê ɣọʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ kák biɲ tướŋ dã di vớʔi mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần dạp cơn kổ kủʔa kák vwa nàʔi họ dến ɣần dạp cơn cên kổ kák vwa ấʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ cớ ŋạʔi cớ kiɲxủŋ xá vữŋlòŋ bềncí Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi cɔ hếttʰảʔi tʰùŋịc kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ciến kự săw zồʔi ɣiôsuê dáɲ ɣiết kák vwa ấʔi biểʔu dɛm ceo cên kâʔi vwa ấʔi ceo cên kâʔi cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi xi mặtcờʔi cɛn ɣiôsuê biểʔu ŋườʔita tʰâʔi suốŋ xỏʔi kâʔi liệŋ ɲữŋ tʰâʔi cɔŋ haŋ dá cỗ kák vwa ấʔi dã zồʔi lấʔi ɲữŋ dá miệŋ haŋ lạʔi hãʔi kòn cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣiôsuê kũŋ ciếm lấʔi makêda zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết kả tʰàɲ kùŋ vwa ŋườʔi tậnziệt tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi cɔŋ xôŋ dể tʰɔát ʔaj ŋườʔi dãʔi vwa makêda ɲư dã dãʔi vwa ɣiêzicô Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên makêda di kwa lípna dáɲ lípna Ðứkzê kũŋ fó lípna kùŋ vwa vàʔɔ tăj ʔisơzaên zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ziệt tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi cɔŋ dó cẳŋ dể tʰɔát ʔaj ŋườʔi dãʔi vwa tʰàɲ nàʔi ʔiɲư dã dãʔi vwa ɣiêzicô vậʔi kế ấʔi ɣiôsuê kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên lípna di kwa laki dóŋ cạʔi dốʔi kùŋ tʰàɲ dáɲ Ðứkzê fó laki vàʔɔ tăj ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi tʰứhaj ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ziệt tʰàɲ vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ kũŋ ʔiɲư dã cɔ lípna vậʔi bấʔizờ hôzam vwa ɣêsɛ di tiếpkứʔu laki ɣiôsuê dáɲbạʔi ŋườʔi zânsự ŋườʔi dến dỗʔi xôŋ kòn dể ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê kùŋ ʔisơzaên laki di kwa Ék dóŋ cạʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ tʰàɲ dáɲ cáɲ ŋàʔi dó ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ziệt di cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣiôsuê tậnziệt tʰàɲ vớʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở cɔŋ dó ʔiɲư ŋườʔi dã cɔ laki vậʔi kế dó ɣiôsuê kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên Ék di hếpzôn dáɲ họ ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ziệt tʰàɲ vwa kák hươŋtʰôn mọʔi ŋườʔiở cɔŋ dó xôŋ dể tʰɔát xỏʔi ʔaj kũŋ ʔiɲư ŋườʔi dã cɔ Ék vậʔi ŋườʔi tậnziệt tʰàɲ kák ŋườʔiở cɔŋ Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên di dến biə dáɲ ŋườʔi ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ hươŋtʰôn kùŋ vwa zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ziệt tʰàɲ tậnziệt hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ xôŋ dể tʰɔát xỏʔi ʔaj ŋườʔi dãʔi biə vwa ʔiɲư dã dãʔi hếpzôn dãʔi lípna vwa vậʔi ɣiôsuê dáɲ tɔàn sứ nàʔɔ núʔi nàʔɔ nàʔɔ dồŋbằŋ nàʔɔ ɲữŋ ɣò nỗŋ kák vwa mấʔi dó ŋườʔi xôŋ dể tʰɔát xỏʔi ʔaj fàm kó hơʔi tʰở tʰì ŋườʔi ziệt di ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã cwiền zặn Ấʔi vậʔi ɣiôsuê dáɲ kák vwa dó kadɛbanê ʔa cɔdến ɣasa tɔàn sứ ɣôsɛn cɔdến ɣabaôn kwa tʰì ɣiôsuê kák vwa nàʔi ciếm lấʔi sứ bởʔivì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ciɲciến cɔ ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê kả ʔisơzaên cởvề cạʔi kwân ɣiɲɣɛɲ vừʔa xi zabin vwa hátsɔ dã hăj kák nàʔi saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ ɣiôbáp vwa madôn dếnkùŋ simzôn vwa ʔaï ksáp kùŋ kák vwa bắk hɔặk cên núʔi cɔŋ dồŋ kinêzết sứ tʰấp hăjlà cên kák nơʔi kaw zơ fíʔa tâʔi lạʔi saj dến kùŋzân kanaan fíʔa dôŋ fíʔa tâʔi kùŋzân ʔamôzít zân hêtít zân fêzêsít zân ɣiêbusít cɔŋ núʔi dến kùŋzân hêvít nơʔi cơn núʔi hẹtmôn cɔŋ sứ mícba kák vwa nàʔi vớʔi hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ mìɲ kéʔɔ za zân dôŋ ɲư kát nơʔi kó ŋựʔa sɛ tʰeo zất ɲiềʔu hếttʰảʔi kák vwa nàʔi dã ɲăw dến dóŋ cạʔi cuŋ ɣần nướk mêzôm dặŋ zawciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên ɲưŋÐứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ cớ ŋàʔimaj tạʔi ɣiờ nàʔi fó hếttʰảʔi cúŋnó cết cướk ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi kắt ɲượŋ ŋựʔa dốt kák sɛcộ cúŋnó nơʔi lửʔa vậʔi ɣiôsuê hếttʰảʔi ciếnsĩ ŋườʔi lậptứk di dến sôŋ vàʔɔ cúŋnó ɣần nướk mêzôm Ðứkzê fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ʔisơzaên ɣiôsuê hếttʰảʔi ciếnsĩ dáɲduổʔi tʰeo cúŋnó cɔdến sidôn cɔdến mícêfốtmazim dến cũŋ mícva fíʔa dôŋ cẳŋ dể tʰɔát xỏʔi ʔaj ɣiôsuê cɔ cúŋnó ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi kắt ɲượŋ ŋựʔa dốt sɛcộ kủʔa cúŋnó nơʔi lửʔa cɔŋ lúk dó xi cởvề ɣiôsuê lấʔi hátsɔ zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết vwa hátsɔ sưʔa kiɲdô kủʔa kák nướk nàʔi ɣiôsuê kwânlíɲ zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở cɔŋ tʰàɲ cẳŋ kòn lạʔi ci kó hơʔi tʰở ŋườʔi fóŋỏʔa tʰàɲ hátsɔ ɣiôsuê kũŋ kák vwa nầʔi zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết di ciếm kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ziệt di ʔiɲư môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cwiền zặn ɲưŋ ʔisơzaên xôŋ dốt tʰàɲ nàʔɔ cên ɣò nỗŋ cừ za hátsɔ ɣiôsuê dã dốt zân ʔisơzaên dɔạt lấʔi fần mìɲ hảʔi hóʔa tàʔi hếttʰảʔi súkvật kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nàʔi ɲưŋ zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết mọʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi cɔdến cừŋ dã ziệt cẳŋ kòn dể lạʔi nàʔɔ kó hơʔi tʰở mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê fán zặn môʔisɛ ɣiôsuê xôŋ ɣì vậʔi ɣiôsuê ciếm lấʔi kả sứ nàʔi nàʔɔ núʔi nàʔɔ kả nàʔɔ tɔàn sứ ɣôsɛn nàʔɔ dất tʰấp dồŋbằŋ nàʔɔ núʔi ʔisơzaên kùŋ sứ tʰấʔi fíʔa núʔi cụʔi mọk fíʔa sê ʔizơ cɔdến baɛɲɣát cɔŋ cũŋ liban tạʔi cơn núʔi hẹtmôn ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi vwa kák dó dáɲ ɣiết di ɣiôsuê dáɲ ɣiặk kùŋ kák vwa nàʔi lâʔu ŋàʔi cẳŋ kó tʰàɲ nàʔɔ hòʔa kùŋzân ʔisơzaên cừ za zân hêvít tạʔi ɣabaôn zân ʔisơzaên ɲờ ɣiặkzã ciếm lấʔi hếttʰảʔi vìÐứkzê dể cɔ lòŋ kák vwa ấʔi kốcấp ciɲciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên hầʔu cɔ ziệt di xôŋ dượk tʰươŋsót ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ cɔŋ lúk dó ɣiôsuê di cừziệt zân ʔanakim nàʔɔ cɔŋ núʔi hếpzôn biə ʔanáp hăjlà cên xắp núʔi zuda núʔi ʔisơzaên ɣiôsuê tậnziệt cúŋnó vớʔi kák tʰàɲ kủʔa cẳŋ kòn ŋườʔi ʔanakim nàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ ʔisơzaên cỉ tạʔi ɣasa ɣát Ác dốt tʰìkó vậʔi ɣiôsuê ciếm kả sứ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ sứ cɔ ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp tùʔi ciə fân từŋ cifáʔi bấʔizờ sứ dượk bìɲ tịɲ xôŋ kòn ɣiặkzã nầʔi kák vwa kủʔa sứ ʔisơzaên dã dáɲbạʔi ciếm lấʔi sứ kủʔa kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk xɛ ʔaï dến núʔi hẹtmôn vớʔi tɔàn dồŋbằŋ fíʔa dôŋ sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít tạʔi hếtbôn ŋườʔi kwản ʔazô ʔɛ tʰàɲ xɛ ʔaï ɣiữʔa zòŋ xɛ fânnửʔa sứ ɣalaát cɔdến xɛ zabốk ɣiớʔihạn zân ʔammôn lạʔi kwản dồŋbằŋ cɔdến kɛnêzết fíʔa dôŋ cɔdến kủʔa dồŋbằŋ tứklà biển fíʔa dôŋ hướŋ bếtzêsimốt kũŋ kwản zướʔi cơn ciền núʔi fícɣa kế dến dịʔafận kủʔa ʔɔùk vwa basan ŋườʔi kòn kủʔa zân zêfaim tạʔi Ác tazốt zê ʔi ŋườʔi kwản núʔi hẹtmôn sɛɲka kả sứ basan cɔdến ɣiớʔihạn zân ɣêsuzít zân makatʰít kùŋ dến lốʔi ɣiữʔa sứ ɣalaát ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa sihôn vwa hếtbôn môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê zân ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi cúŋnó zồʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dịʔafận cúŋnó cɔ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ sảnŋiệp nàʔi kák vwa kủʔa sứ ɣiôsuê zân ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi nàʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa tâʔi baɛɲɣát cɔŋ cũŋ liban cɔdến núʔi cụʔi nổʔi hướŋ sê ʔizơ tùʔi fânciə từŋ cifáʔi ɣiôsuê cɔ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp núʔi sứ tʰấp dồŋbằŋ ɣò nỗŋ dồŋ vắŋ tứklà kả sứ zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít vwa ɣiê zicô vwa ʔahi nơʔi kạɲ bêtên vwa ɣiêzusalɛm vwa hếpzôn vwa ɣiạtmút vwa laki vwa Ék vwa ɣêsɛ vwa biə vwa ɣêdɛ vwa họtma vwa ʔazát vwa lípna vwa ʔadulam vwa makêda vwa bêtên vwa tʰápbuác vwa hêfɛ vwa ʔafék vwa sazôn vwa madôn vwa hátsɔ vwa simzônmêzôn vwa ʔaï ksáp vwa tʰaanák vwa mêɣidô vwa kêdɛ vwa ɣiếknêʔam tạʔi kạtmên kwa zơ cên kák nơʔi kaw zơ vwa ɣôʔim ɣiɲɣɛɲ vwa tʰiệtsa hếttʰảʔi bamươʔi vwa ɣiôsuê dã ɣià tuổʔi kaw Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dã ɣià tuổʔi dã kaw fần sứ fảʔi dáɲ lấʔi hãʔi kòn ɲiềʔu sứ kòn lạʔi dâʔi hếttʰảʔi kủʔa zân filitin kả dịʔafận zân ɣêsuzít sôŋ sicô dốʔi ŋaŋ sứ zíptô cɔdến ɣiớʔihạn Ék zôn fíʔa bắk kanaan tʰuộk vwa filitin vwa ɣasam vwa Ác dốt vwa Ác kalôn vwa ɣát vwa Ék zôn vwa zân ʔavim lạʔi fíʔa kả sứ kanaan mêʔaza tʰuộk zân sidôn cɔdến ʔafék cɔdến ɣiớʔihạn zân ʔamôzít kòn sứ zân ɣibêlít kả liban fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk baɛɲɣát zướʔi cơn núʔi hẹtmôn cɔ dếnnơʔi vàʔɔ zɛɲ hamát lạʔi kòn zân cên núʔi liban cɔdến mícêfốtmaim tứklà kák zân sidôn Ấʔi cíɲ duổʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên sɔŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi bắttʰăm ciə sứ nàʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp ʔiɲư dã cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ciə sứ nàʔi cɔ cín cifáʔi fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ ŋườʔizu ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ dã lãɲ bởʔi môʔisɛ fần sảnŋiệp mìɲ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ ʔiɲư môʔisɛ tôʔitớ Ðứkzê dã fát cɔ cúŋnó tứklà sứ ʔazô ʔɛ cên xɛ ʔaï tʰàɲ ɣiữʔa cũŋ kùŋ kả sứ dồŋbằŋ mêdêba cí Ðʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa sihôn vwa ʔamôzít cịvì tạʔi hếtbôn cɔdến ɣiớʔihạn zân ʔammôn lạʔi sứ ɣalaát kùŋ dịʔafận zân ɣêsuzít zân makatʰít xắp núʔi hẹtmôn tɔàn basan cɔdến sɛɲka kũŋ dượk tɔàn nướk vwa ʔɔùk cɔŋ basan cịvì tạʔi Ác tazốt zi ʔi ŋườʔi cót cɔŋ zân zêfaim kòn lạʔi môʔisɛ dáɲbạʔi duổʔi cúŋnó di ɲưŋ zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ duổʔi di zân ɣêsuzít zân makatʰít Ấʔi vậʔi zân ɣêsuzít zân makatʰít kòn ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên cɔdến ŋàʔinăj sɔŋmôʔi sɛ xôŋ fát fần sảnŋiệp cɔ cifáʔi lêvi ɲữŋ kủʔa zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ấʔilà fần sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi dó ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ vậʔi môʔisɛ kó fát fần cɔ cifáʔi zubên tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ Ðịʔa fận cifáʔi zubên cạʔi ʔazô ʔɛ cên xɛ ʔaï tʰàɲ ɣiữʔa cũŋ kùŋ tɔàn dồŋbằŋ ɣần mêdêba hếtbôn kák tʰàɲ nơʔi dồŋbằŋ Ðʔi bamốtbaɛɲ bếtbaɛɲmêôn zahát kêdêmốt mêfát kiziətaim sípma sêzếtʰasɛca cên núʔi kủʔa cũŋ bếtfê ʔɔ kák ciền núʔi fícɣa bếtzêsimốt kák tʰàɲ kủʔa sứ dồŋbằŋ tɔàn nướk sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít kaicị tạʔi hếtbôn môʔisɛ dã dáɲbạʔi vớʔi kwan cưởŋ madiən zêkɛm suzơ zêba tứk kák kwan cưởŋ cưhầʔu sihôn cɔŋ sứ cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zân ʔisơzaên zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết tʰìkó tʰuậtsĩ balaam kɔncaj kủʔa bê Ðịʔa fận ŋườʔi zubên kó sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiớʔihạn sảnŋiệp kủʔa ŋườʔi zubên tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ tʰàɲ làŋsóm kủʔa môʔisɛ kũŋ kó fát fần cɔ cifáʔi ɣát tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ Ðịʔa fận kủʔa cifáʔi ɣát zaêsɛ kák tʰàɲ ɣalaát fânnửʔa sứ zân ʔammôn cɔdến ʔazô ʔɛ dốʔi ŋaŋ zápba hếtbôn cɔdến zamátmítbê kùŋ bêtônim dɔạn mahanaim cɔdến bờkõʔi biə kòn cɔŋ cũŋ tʰì bếtʰazam bếtnimza sukốt safôn tứklà fần kòn lạʔi kủʔa nướk sihôn vwa ɣiôdɛɲ cɔdến kuốʔi kinêzết tạʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ sảnŋiệp kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣát tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ tʰàɲ làŋsóm kủʔa môʔisɛ kũŋ kó fát fần cɔ fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ fần kòn tʰuộk fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ Ðịʔa fận kủʔa mahanaim tɔàn basan kả nướk ʔɔùk vwa basan kák tʰôn zajzơ cɔŋ basan kó sáʔu mươʔi tʰàɲ fânnửʔa sứ ɣalaát Ác tazốt zi ʔi haj tʰàɲ nướk ʔɔùk tạʔi basan dã fát cɔ fânnửʔa kɔncáʔu maki cít kủʔa manasɛ tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ kák sảnŋiệp môʔisɛ fânfát tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ môáp kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô sɔŋmôʔi sɛ xôŋ fát sảnŋiệp cɔ cifáʔi lêvi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi ấʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ vậʔi nầʔi kák fần zân ʔisơzaên ɲận lãɲ sảnŋiệp cɔŋ sứ kanaan tʰầʔi lêʔasa ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa ɲữŋ cifáʔi zân ʔisơzaên fânfát cɔ ŋườʔita bắttʰăm ciə sứ cɔ cín cifáʔi cɔ fânnửʔa cifáʔi ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ fán zặn môʔisɛ dã fát cɔ haj cifáʔi cɔ fânnửʔa cifáʔi kiə fần sảnŋiệp kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɲưŋ tạʔi ɣiữʔa ŋườʔi xôŋ fát fần sảnŋiệp cɔ cifáʔi lêvi kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép fân haj cifáʔi manasɛ zaim ŋườʔita xôŋ lấʔi fần sảnŋiệp cɔŋ sứ fát cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ɲưŋ cỉ fát mấʔi tʰàɲ dặŋ vớʔi dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ dể zùŋ cɔ kák bầʔi súkvật tàʔisản kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ʔi tʰeo diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ ciə sứ vả kɔncáʔu zuda dến ɣần ɣiôsuê tạʔi ɣiɲ ɣɛɲ kalép kɔncaj ɣiêfunê ŋườʔi kênít nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ Ôŋ biếtdiềʔu tʰuộk tôʔi ôŋ Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi kadɛbanê ʔa ximôʔi sɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê kadɛbanê ʔa saj tôʔi di zọ tʰám sứ tʰì tôʔi dã dượk mươʔi tuổʔi tôʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi tʰậttìɲ kák ʔɛɲɛm dồŋ di vớʔi tôʔi cɔ bátáɲ sờnlòŋ kòn tôʔi cuŋtʰàɲ vâŋ tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó môʔisɛ kó tʰề zằŋ kwảtʰật dất cơn ŋươʔi dã dạp dến tʰuộk ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp dờʔidờʔi ŋươʔi cuŋtʰàɲ dã vâŋ tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kìʔa cɔŋ mươʔi năj xi ŋàʔi fán lờʔi nàʔi kùŋ môʔisɛ dươŋ xi ʔisơzaên kòn di cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ Ðứkzê dã bảʔɔtồn sɛɲ mạŋ tôʔi dến bâʔizờ ŋàʔinăj tôʔi dượk mươʔi tuổʔi zàʔi tôʔi kũŋ kòn mạɲxỏʔɛ ɲư ŋàʔi môʔisɛ saj tôʔi di tôʔi kòn sứk tôʔi kó hồʔi dó dặŋ di dáɲ ɣiặk hɔặk vàʔɔ za vậʔi hãʔi cɔ tôʔi núʔi nàʔi Ðứkzê dã fán dến cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó bâʔizờ ôŋ dã hăj zằŋ kó zân ʔanakim kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ dó kólẽ Ðứkzê kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi duổʔi cúŋnó di ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán căŋ ɣiôsuê cúk fướk cɔ ŋườʔi hếpzôn cɔ kalép kɔncaj ɣiêfunê sảnŋiệp bởʔi kớ dó hếpzôn cɔ kalép sảnŋiệp cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔi kó cuŋtʰàɲ vâŋ tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên vả xi sưʔa hếpzôn ɣọʔilà kiziátazaba ʔazaba ŋườʔi ɣiềŋ ɣiàŋ cɔŋ zân ʔanakim từ dâʔi săw sứ dượk bìɲ tịɲ xôŋ kòn ɣiặkzã fần dất bắttʰăm cúŋ cifáʔi zuda tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ cạʔi fíʔa ɣiớʔihạn dôm tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ sin fíʔa dến kuốʔi ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa cạʔi dầʔu biển tứklà fíʔa ŋăj hướŋ zồʔi zốk ʔaï kzápbim cạʔi zàʔi suốŋ miềŋ di ŋaŋ kwa sin fíʔa kadɛbanê ʔa di ŋaŋ kwa hếcôn hướŋ da vòŋ kwa kạtka di ŋaŋ hướŋ dổ vàʔɔ xɛ zíptô zồʔi ɣiáp Ấʔi dó ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ɣiớʔihạn hướŋ dôŋ biển cɔdến sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa bắk cạʔi fíʔa nơʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ di bếtʰốtla cảʔi kwa fíʔa bắk bếtazaba cạʔi dến dá bôhan kɔncaj kủʔa zubên Ðʔɔạn ɣiớʔihạn nàʔi di hướŋ biə cũŋ ʔakô cạʔi tớʔi hướŋ bắk fíʔa ɣiɲɣɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ zốk ʔadumim tạʔi fíʔa xɛ zồʔi cảʔi kwa ɣần nướk ʔɛânsêmết ɣiáp ʔɛânzôɣên từ dó ɣiớʔihạn di ŋaŋ kwa cũŋ kɔncaj hinôm kạɲ kủʔa ɣiêhu tứklà ɣiêzusalɛm kế dó cạʔi cɔdến cót núʔi ŋaŋ cũŋ hinôm hướŋ tâʔi dầʔu fíʔa bắk cũŋ zêfaim ɣiớʔihạn nàʔi cạʔi cót núʔi dến suốʔi nướk néptʰôác hướŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa núʔi zôn zồʔi di dến bala kiziátzêʔazim nó vòŋ bala kwa hướŋ tâʔi lốʔi núʔi sê ʔizơ zồʔi tʰeo hướŋ bắk di ŋaŋ kwa fíʔa núʔi ɣiêzaim tứklà kêsalôn cạʔi suốŋ dến bếtsêmết kwa tʰimna từ dó ɣiớʔihạn nàʔi kứ di tʰeo fíʔa bắk Ék zôn dɔạn băŋ kwa hướŋ siếkzôn cảʔi kwa núʔi bala tʰẳŋ dến ɣiápnêên zồʔi ɣiáp kòn ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa tâʔi ấʔilà ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ŋườʔita cɔ ka kɔncaj ɣiêfunê fần ɣiữʔa ŋườʔi zuda tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê fán cɔ ɣiôsuê tʰàɲ kủʔa ʔazaba ca ʔanák Ấʔilà tʰàɲ hếpzôn kalép duổʔi di kɔncaj kủʔa ʔanák sêsaj ʔahinam tʰamaj từ dó ŋườʔi di dáɲ zân tʰàɲ biə tʰuở sưʔa biə kiziátsêfɛ kalép nóʔi zằŋ ta ɣả kɔŋáʔi ʔaï ksa cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dáɲ ciếm lấʔi kiziátsêfɛ ʔɔátniên kɔncaj kủʔa kêna cáʔu kalép ciếm dượk tʰàɲ kalép ɣả ʔaï ksa kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔilàm vả sảʔi xi nàŋ vàʔɔ ɲà ʔɔátniên kó tʰúkzụk ŋườʔi sin ca mìɲ zuộŋ nàŋ suốŋ lừʔa kalép hỏʔi zằŋ kɔn ci nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ sin ca kủʔa fướk cɔ kɔn ca kɔn nơʔi dất hãʔi cɔ kɔn mấʔi suốʔi nướk ŋườʔi cɔ nàŋ kák suốʔi cên zướʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi zuda tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ kák tʰàɲ dầʔu kùŋ cifáʔi zuda fíʔa zɛɲ dôm tạʔi kápsêên dɛ zaɣwa kina Ðʔi ʔadɛada kêdɛ hátsɔ ɣítnan síp têlɛm bêʔalốt hátsɔhadatʰa kêzizốtʰếcôn tứklà hátsɔ ʔamam sêma môlada hátsaɣada hếtmôn bếtfalê hátsaswɛɲ bê ʔɛsêba bisốtza bala ʔizim sɛm tʰôlát kêsiɲ họtma siếklát mátmana sansana lêbaốt silim sin zimmôn hếttʰảʔi haimươʔi cín tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ tʰaôn sôzê ʔa sanôác ʔɛâŋanim tʰápbuác ɣiạtmút ʔadulam sôkô ʔasêka saazaim ʔaditʰaim ɣêdêza ɣêdêzôtʰaim hếttʰảʔi mườʔibốn tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa lạʔi kó sênan hadasa mícdɛɲɣát Ðʔi mítbê ɣiốktʰêên laki bốtkát Ék kápbôn lácma kítlít ɣêdêzốt bết Ðʔa ɣôn naama makêda hếttʰảʔi mườʔisáʔu tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa lípna tʰɛ ʔasan zíptác nếtsíp kê ʔila ʔaï ksíp mazêsa hếttʰảʔi cín tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa Ék zôn vớʔi kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt làŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ ɣần Ác dốt kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa Ék zôn hướŋ tâʔi Ác dốt kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa ɣasa kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa cɔdến xɛ zíptô zùŋ ɣiớʔihạn cɔŋ núʔi samiə ɣiạttʰiə sôkô Ðʔa kiziátsana tứklà biə ʔanáp tʰêmô ʔanim ɣôsɛn hôlôn ɣilô hếttʰảʔi mườʔimột tʰàɲ kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa ʔazáp zuma sêʔan zanum bếttʰápbuác ʔafêka humta kiziátazaba tứklà hếpzôn si hếttʰảʔi cín tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa maôn kạtmên síp zuta ɣícêên ɣiốkdêʔam sanôác kain ɣibê ʔa tʰimna hếttʰảʔi mườʔi tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa hɛɲhun bếtsuzơ ɣêdô maazát bếtanốt ʔɛântʰêkôn hếttʰảʔi sáʔu tʰàɲ vớʔi káŋ làŋ kủʔa kiziátbaɛɲ tứklà kiziátzêʔazim zápba hếttʰảʔi haj tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ kó bếtazaba midin sêkaka nípsan ʔiếtʰamêlác ʔɛâŋêdi hếttʰảʔi sáʔu tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa vả ŋườʔi zuda xôŋ duổʔi dượk zân ɣiêbusít tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zân ɣiêbusít kòn cuŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi zuda tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔdến ŋàʔinăj fần dất bắttʰăm cúŋ kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép cảʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiêzicô kák suốʔi kủʔa ɣiêzicô hướŋ dôŋ cạʔi zọk tʰeo dồŋ vắŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêzicô dến núʔi bêtên ɣiớʔihạn băŋtừ bêtên dến lusơ di kwa bờkõʔi zân ʔaêkít tạʔi ʔatasốt cạʔi suốŋ hướŋ tâʔi fíʔa bờkõʔi zân ɣiáplêtít cɔdến bờkõʔi bếtʰôzôn zướʔi ɣêsɛ zồʔi ɣiáp Ấʔilà tạʔi dó kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣiôsép manasɛ zaim lãɲ fần sảnŋiệp mìɲ nàʔi ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa zaim tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa sảnŋiệp fíʔa dôŋ ʔatêzốtada cɔdến bếtʰôzôn cên tʰẳŋ kwa tâʔi tạʔi hướŋ bắk kủʔa mítmêtʰát zồʔi vòŋ kwa dôŋ lốʔi tʰaanátsilô kwa xỏʔi dó dến zanôác tʰeo fíʔa dôŋ cạʔi zanôác suốŋ ʔatazốt nazatʰa dụŋ ɣiêzicô zồʔi ɣiáp sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ từtʰáp buác ɣiớʔihạn di hướŋ tâʔi dến xɛ kana zồʔi ɣiáp sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi zaim tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ŋườʔi zaim kũŋ kó ɲữŋ tʰàɲ làŋ ziêŋ za ɣiữʔa sảnŋiệp kủʔa ŋườʔi manasɛ sɔŋ xôŋ duổʔi dượk zân kanaan tạʔi ɣêsɛ zân kanaan ɣiữʔa zaim cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ɲưŋ fảʔi tʰuế fần kủʔa manasɛ ɣiôsuê ciə cɔ kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép dịʔafận dáɲ lấʔi ŋườʔita kũŋ bắttʰăm cɔ cifáʔi manasɛ ŋườʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa ɣiôsép kɔnma kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa manasɛ ca kủʔa ɣalaát bởʔi ŋườʔi ciếnsĩ kó dượk sứ ɣalaát basan ŋườʔita bắttʰăm cɔ kák kɔn xák kủʔa manasɛ tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ kɔncáʔu ʔabiêsɛ kɔncáʔu hêlék kɔncáʔu ziên kɔncáʔu sicɛm kɔncáʔu hêfɛ kɔncáʔu sêmida kák kɔncaj kủʔa manasɛ cáʔu ɣiôsép tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ vả sêlôfát kɔncaj kủʔa hêfɛ cáʔu kủʔa ɣalaát cắt kủʔa maki cít kủʔa manasɛ xôŋ kó kɔncaj cỉ kó kɔŋáʔi mácla nô ʔa hốtla miɲka tʰiệtsa kák kɔŋáʔi nàʔi dến cướk tʰầʔi lêʔasa cướk ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun cướk kák kwan cưởŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ môʔisɛ cɔ cúŋtôʔi fần sảnŋiệp cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm cúŋtôʔi ɣiôsuê vâŋ mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ fần sảnŋiệp cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ca kák kɔŋáʔi dó vậʔi mườʔi fần bắttʰăm cúŋ cɔ manasɛ cừ za sứ ɣalaát basan kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kák kɔŋáʔi manasɛ kó fần sảnŋiệp tạʔi ɣiữʔa kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kòn sứ ɣalaát tʰuộk kák kɔncaj xák kủʔa manasɛ ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa manasɛ ʔasɛ dến mítmêtʰát dốʔi ŋaŋ sicɛm zồʔi cạʔi dến zamin lốʔi zân ʔɛântʰápbuác sứtʰáp buác tʰuộk manasɛ ɲưŋ tʰàɲ tʰáʔɔbuác ɣần bờkõʔi manasɛ tʰì tʰuộk ŋườʔi zaim từ dó ɣiớʔihạn cạʔi suốŋ fíʔa xɛ kana kák tʰàɲ dó ɣiữʔa kák tʰàɲ manasɛ dềʔu tʰuộk zaim ɣiớʔihạn manasɛ fíʔa bắk kủʔa xɛ ɣiáp fần hướŋ tʰuộk zaim fần hướŋ bắk tʰuộk manasɛ kòn zùŋ ɣiớʔihạn haj fần nàʔi ɣiáp ʔasɛ fíʔa bắk ʔisaka fíʔa dôŋ cɔŋ dịʔafận ʔisaka ʔasɛ manasɛ kũŋ dượk bếtsêʔan kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt ɣíplêʔam kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt zânkư kủʔa zơ kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt zânkư kủʔa ʔɛân zơ kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt zânkư kủʔa tʰanaák kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt zânkư kủʔa mêɣidô kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt káʔi dồŋ kaw kɔncáʔu manasɛ cẳŋ duổʔi dượk zân kák tʰàɲ ấʔi zân kanaan dịɲ cɔŋ sứ dó ɲưŋ xi zân ʔisơzaên dã dượk kườŋ tʰạɲ zân kanaan fảʔi fụkzịc sɔŋ cẳŋ duổʔi cúŋnó dượk vả kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣiôsép nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰàɲ zân dôŋ Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ cúŋtôʔi dến ŋàʔinăj vậʔi tạʔisaw làmsaw ôŋ cɔ cúŋtôʔi cỉ fần dất sảnŋiệp ɣiôsuê dáp nếʔu kák ŋươʔi dôŋ ɲưvậʔi núʔi zaim zất cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi xajfá zừŋ dặŋ cỗ cɔ mìɲ cɔŋ sứ zân fêzêsít zân zêfaim ɲưŋ kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép dáp zằŋ núʔi xôŋ dủ cỗ cɔ cúŋtôʔi kòn dồŋbằŋ hếttʰảʔi zân kanaan dó zân bếtsêʔan ŋườʔiở kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ cũŋ ɣícêên dềʔu kó tʰiết sa ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ ɲà ɣiôsép tứklà zaim manasɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi zân dôŋ kó sứk cẳŋ lãɲ cỉ fần dất tʰôʔi ɲưŋ núʔi tʰuộk ŋươʔi zầʔu káʔi zừŋ ŋươʔi xajfá kák bờkõʔi tʰuộk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi duổʔi zân kanaan mặkzầʔu cúŋnó kó tʰiết sa kườŋ tʰạɲ kả hộʔi cúŋ zân ʔisơzaên ɲóm tạʔi silô hộʔi mạk tạʔi dó sứ dềʔu fụk cướk ɲưŋ cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên kòn lạʔi bảʔi cifáʔi ŋườʔita cưʔa fânfát fần sảnŋiệp cɔ ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi lầnlữʔa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ xôŋ di ciếm sứ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cọn từŋ cifáʔi ŋườʔi zồʔi saj di kák ŋườʔi nàʔi dứŋzậʔi di xắp sứ lấʔi dịʔadồ dể fânciə zồʔi cởvề kùŋ họ ciə sứ bảʔi fần zuda cɔŋ ɣiớʔihạn mìɲ nơʔi kòn ɲà ɣiôsép cɔŋ ɣiớʔihạn mìɲ nơʔi bắk vậʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi dịʔadồ kủʔa sứ bảʔi fần dɛm dâʔi cɔ zồʔi bắttʰăm cɔ kák ŋươʔi tạʔi dâʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ɲưŋ xôŋ kó fần cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi tạʔi ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi bởʔivì cứk kủʔa Ðứkzê sảnŋiệp kủʔa kák ŋườʔi dó kòn ɣát zubên fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ dã lãɲ fần sảnŋiệp môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cɔ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ vậʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dứŋzậʔi di ɣiôsuê cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák ŋườʔi di dặŋ lấʔi dịʔadồ kủʔa sứ zằŋ hãʔi di xắp sứ lấʔi dịʔadồ zồʔi cởvề kùŋ bắttʰăm tạʔi dâʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi cướk Ðứkzê silô kák ŋườʔi ấʔi di xắp sứ dịʔadồ cên kwiển sác ciə bảʔi fần tùʔi tʰeo kák tʰàɲ zồʔi cởvề kùŋ ɣiôsuê cạʔi kwân tạʔi silô ɣiôsuê bắttʰăm cɔ cúŋ tạʔi silô cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi dó ɣiôsuê ciə sứ za cɔ zân ʔisơzaên tùʔi tʰeo kák cifáʔi kủʔa tʰăm cúŋ ɲằm cifáʔi bêŋiəmin tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ dịʔafận tʰăm cỉdịɲ ɲằm ɣiữʔa cifáʔi zuda cifáʔi ɣiôsép ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa bêŋiəmin fíʔa bắk cạʔi ɣiôdɛɲ di fíʔa săw ɣiêzicô hướŋ bắk dɔạn núʔi zồʔi ɣiáp dồŋ vắŋ bếtavɛn từ kó ɣiớʔihạn di ŋaŋ săw lưŋ lusơ kũŋ ɣọʔilà bêtên tạʔi fíʔa zồʔi cạʔi suốŋ ʔatazốtada ɣần núʔi fíʔa bếtʰôzôn zướʔi ɣiớʔihạn ɣiăŋ vòŋ fíʔa tâʔi hướŋ tứk núʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ bếtʰôzôn fíʔa zồʔi ɣiáp kiziátbaɛɲ tứklà kiziátzêʔazim tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda tâʔi miền xởʔi dầʔu kiziátzêʔazim ɣiớʔihạn kứ cạʔi fíʔa tâʔi tʰẳŋ dến suốʔi nướk néptʰôác zồʔi suốŋ dến duôʔi núʔi ŋaŋ cũŋ kɔncaj hinôm cɔŋ cũŋ zêfaim tạʔi fíʔa bắk cạʔi suốŋ zọk tʰeo cũŋ hinôm săw lưŋ ɣiêbusít fíʔa dɔạn suốŋ dến ʔɛânzôɣɛn ɣiớʔihạn cạʔi hướŋ bắk dến ʔɛânsêmết dó tʰẳŋ ɣêlilốt dốʔi ŋaŋ zốk ʔadumim zồʔi cạʔi suốŋ dến dá bôhan kɔncaj zubên dɔạn di ŋaŋ ʔazaba hướŋ bắk cạʔi suốŋ ʔazaba ɣiớʔihạn di ŋaŋ kwa fíʔa săw bếtʰốtla hướŋ bắk zồʔi ɣiáp fíʔa biển hướŋ bắk dầʔu fíʔa kủʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa về fíʔa dôŋ ɣiáp sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ sảnŋiệp kủʔa kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin ɣiớʔihạn fíʔa tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa cifáʔi bêŋiəmin tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiêzicô bếtʰôda mékkêsít bếtazaba sêmazaim bêtên ʔavim faza ʔɔùpza kêfaamônaj ʔɔùpni ɣêba hếttʰảʔi mườʔihaj tʰàɲ kák làŋ kủʔa ɣabaôn zama bêêzốt mítbê kêfiza mộtsa zêkɛm ɣiệtbêên tʰazêʔala sêla ɣiêbu tứklà ɣiêzusalɛm ɣibêát kiziát hếttʰảʔi mườʔibốn tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa sảnŋiệp kủʔa kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ fần dất tʰứ ɲì bắttʰăm cúŋ cifáʔi simêôn tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi nàʔi ɣiữʔa sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi zuda cifáʔi simêôn kó cɔŋ sảnŋiệp mìɲ bê ʔɛsêba sêba môlada hátsaswɛɲ bala sɛm ʔɛântʰôlát bêtʰu họtma siếklák bếtmakabốt hátsasusa bếtlêbaốt sêʔazucɛm hếttʰảʔi mườʔiba tʰàɲ kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa ʔain zimmôn tʰɛ ʔasan hếttʰảʔi tʰàɲ kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa kák làŋ cuŋkwɛɲ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ấʔi cɔdến balátbê ʔɛ tứklà zama sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi simêôn tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ sảnŋiệp kủʔa ŋườʔi simêôn ciếk fần dất kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda fần kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda lấʔilàm kwá vậʔi ŋườʔi simêôn kó sảnŋiệp mìɲ tạʔi ɣiữʔa sảnŋiệp kủʔa fần dất tʰứba bắttʰăm cúŋ ŋườʔi sabulôn tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa sảnŋiệp cạʔi dến sazít ɣiớʔihạn di hướŋ tâʔi lốʔi mazêʔala dụŋ zồʔi dến xɛ dốʔi ɣiốknêʔam từsa zít vòŋ kwa hướŋ dôŋ tứk hướŋ mặtcờʔi mọk cên ɣiápzớʔi kítlốttʰabô dɔạn divề hướŋ zát dến zafiə dó cạʔi hướŋ dôŋ dến ɣátʰêfɛ kátsin zàʔi tʰêm lốʔi nê ʔa dến zimmôn Ðʔɔạn ɣiớʔihạn vòŋ fíʔa bắk lốʔi hanatʰôn zồʔi ɣiáp cũŋ zíptʰácɛân lạʔi kòn kó tʰàɲ káttát nahala simzôn zidêʔala bếtlêhɛm hếttʰảʔi mườʔihaj tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nàʔi kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa ấʔilà sảnŋiệp kủʔa ŋườʔi sabulôn tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ fần tʰứtư bắttʰăm cúŋ kɔncáʔu ʔisaka tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa cúŋ cạʔi dến ɣícêên kêsulốt sunɛm hafazaim siôn ʔanɛcazát zabít kisiôn zêmết ʔɛâŋanim ʔɛâɲada bếtfátsết kế ɣiớʔihạn dụŋ tʰabô sɛcátsima bếtsêmết zồʔi ɣiáp sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ hếttʰảʔi mườʔisáʔu tʰàɲ vớʔi kák làŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nàʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ làŋ kủʔa ấʔilà sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi ʔisaka tùʔi tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ fần tʰứnăm bắttʰăm cúŋ cifáʔi ʔasɛ tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiớʔihạn hênkát hali bêtɛn ʔaï ksáp ʔalammêlék ʔamêát misêʔɛɲ hướŋ tâʔi dụŋ kạtmên xɛ lípna zồʔi vòŋ kwa fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk lốʔi bết Ðʔa ɣôn dụŋ sabulôn cụŋ zíptʰácɛân fíʔa bắk bết mék nê ʔiên dɔạn cạʔi fíʔa kabun zôn zêhốp hammôn kana cɔdến tʰàɲ sidôn ɣiớʔihạn lạʔi vòŋ zama cɔdến tʰàɲ kiênkố tizơ dɔạn cạʔi hướŋ hôsa zồʔi ɣiáp tạʔi ʔaï ksíp lạʔi kòn kó ʔuma ʔafék zêhốp hếttʰảʔi haimươʔi tʰàɲ kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nàʔi ɲữŋ làŋ kủʔa ấʔilà sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi ʔasɛ tùʔi tʰeo kák họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ fần tʰứsáʔu bắttʰăm cúŋ kɔncáʔu néptali tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa cạʔi hêlép kâʔi zẻ tạʔi sanaim lốʔi ʔadaminêkép ɣiápnêên cɔdến lạkkum zồʔi ɣiáp sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kết ɣiớʔihạn vòŋ hướŋ tâʔi di dến nốttʰabô zồʔi dó cạʔi hụkkốk fíʔa ɣiáʔɔ sabulôn fíʔa tâʔi ɣiáp ʔasɛ zuda kòn fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk kó sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kák tʰàɲ kiênkố sidim sɛzơ hamát zakát kinêzết ʔadama zama hátsɔ kêdɛ zê ʔi ʔɛâɲátsɔ zziôn mítdaɛân hôzɛm bếtanát bếtsêmết hếttʰảʔi mườʔi cín tʰàɲ kùŋ kák làŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nàʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ làŋ kủʔa ấʔilà sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi néptali tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ fần tʰứbảʔi bắttʰăm cúŋ ci fàʔi Ðʔan tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiớʔihạn sảnŋiệp ɣồm sôzê ʔa tʰaôn ʔiếtsêmết salabin ʔazalôn ɣítla tʰimnatʰa Ék zôn ʔɛântʰêkê ɣibêtʰôn balát ɣiêhút bênêbêzák ɣácimmôn mêɣiạtkôn zakôn vớʔi dất dốʔi ŋaŋ zafô vả dịʔafận kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðʔan za ŋɔàʔi nơʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi Ðʔan di dáɲ ciếm lấʔi lêsɛm zồʔi zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ziệt ŋườʔiÐʔan ciếm lấʔi sảnŋiệp tạʔi dó lấʔi Ðʔan tổfụ mìɲ dặt cɔ lêsɛm kák tʰàɲ nàʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ làŋ kủʔa ấʔilà sảnŋiệp kủʔa cifáʔi Ðʔan tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ xi ŋườʔita dã ciə sứ tʰeo ɣiớʔihạn sɔŋ zồʔi tʰì zân ʔisơzaên lấʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ sảnŋiệp kấp cɔ ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun zân ʔisơzaên vâŋ mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kấp cɔ ŋườʔi káʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔi sin tứklà tʰàɲ tʰimnátsêzác cɔŋ núʔi zaim ŋườʔi sâʔi tʰàɲ tạʔi dó kák sảnŋiệp tʰầʔi lêʔasa ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ cifáʔi zân ʔisơzaên bắttʰăm fânfát cɔ tạʔi silô kửʔa hộʔi mạk cướk Ðứkzê Ấʔi ciə sɔŋ sứ ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zắŋ hãʔi kák tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu dã kậʔi môʔisɛ fán kùŋ kák ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ɲơn ɣiết ʔaj kó tʰế cốn dó dượk kák tʰàɲ ấʔi zùŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi ẩnnáʔu xỏʔi báʔɔtʰù hwiết kẻ ɲơn cạʔi cốn dến kủʔa kák tʰàɲ nàʔi dứŋ nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ tʰuật sựtìɲ cɔ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi ŋɛ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zẫn ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ cỉdịɲ cɔ cỗ tạʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ nếʔu báʔɔtʰù hwiết duổʔi tʰeo kák cưởŋlãʔɔ cớ ɲơn vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi ấʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ xôŋ kó cướk xi xôŋ ɣét ŋườʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ấʔi cɔdến cừŋ cịʔu dɔán sét cướk hộʔi cúŋ cɔdến cừŋ tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm dươŋcứk kwadờʔi kế dó ɲơn cởvề vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ɲà mìɲ tứklà tʰàɲ mìɲ dã cốn xỏʔi vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên dể ziêŋ za kêdɛ ɣalilê tạʔi cên núʔi zaim kiziátazaba tứklà hếpzôn cên núʔi zuda bên kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêzicô cɔŋ cifáʔi zubên cỉdịɲ bếtsɛ cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ tạʔi samạk cɔŋ cifáʔi ɣát zamốt tạʔi sứ ɣalaát cɔŋ cifáʔi manasɛ ɣôlan sứ basan kák tʰàɲ cỉdịɲ cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên cɔ xác kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ dó dể ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiết ʔaj kótʰể tạʔi dó dượk hầʔu cɔ xôŋ tăj báʔɔtʰù hwiết ɣiết cết cɔdến xi ứŋ hầʔu cướk hộʔi cúŋ bấʔizờ kák cưởŋtộk ŋườʔi lêvi dến ɣần tʰầʔi lêʔasa ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ cifáʔi ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ tạʔi silô cɔŋ sứ kanaan zằŋ Ðứkzê kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền ɲữŋ tʰàɲ cɔ cúŋtôʔi dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ dặŋ zùŋ cɔ súkvật cúŋtôʔi vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê lấʔi cɔŋ sảnŋiệp mìɲ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ săwnàʔi dất cuŋkwɛɲ kấp cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔita bắttʰăm cɔ kák họhàŋ kêhát ɲữŋ kɔncáʔu kủʔa tʰầʔi ʔazôn zòŋ lêvi bắttʰăm dượk mườʔiba tʰàɲ bởʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi zuda cifáʔi simêôn cifáʔi bêŋiəmin kòn ɲữŋ kɔncáʔu xák kủʔa kêhát tʰeo tʰăm dượk mườʔi káʔi tʰàɲ kủʔa cifáʔi zaim kủʔa cifáʔi Ðʔan kủʔa fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ Ðʔɔạn kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn tʰeo tʰăm dượk mườʔiba káʔi tʰàɲ kủʔa cifáʔi néptali kủʔa fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ basan kɔncáʔu mêzazi tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ dượk mườʔihaj káʔi tʰàɲ kủʔa cifáʔi zubên kủʔa cifáʔi ɣát kủʔa cifáʔi sabulôn zân ʔisơzaên bắttʰăm kấp cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kák tʰàɲ dó vớʔi dất cuŋkwɛɲ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền zặn cɔ vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi zuda cɔŋ cifáʔi simêôn kák tʰàɲ kó dâʔi kấp cɔ kɔncáʔu ʔazôn zòŋ kêhát kɔncaj lêvi dượk kák tʰàɲ ấʔi fần tʰứ ɲất bắttʰăm cúŋ ŋườʔita kấp cɔ tʰàɲ kiziátazaba ʔazaba ca kủʔa ʔanák tứklà hếpzôn cên núʔi zuda dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ dó kòn dịʔafận kủʔa tʰàɲ kák làŋ tʰì ŋườʔita kấp cɔ kalép kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêfunê sảnŋiệp ŋườʔita kấp cɔ kɔncáʔu tʰầʔi ʔazôn tʰàɲ hếpzôn tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ ɲơn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ lípna dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣiạttʰiə dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰêmô ʔa dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hôlôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ biə dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ʔain dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ zuta dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ bếtsêmết dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi cín káʔi tʰàɲ kủʔa haj cifáʔi nàʔi ŋườʔita lạʔi lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi bêŋiəmin kấp cɔ ɣabaôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣêba dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ʔanatốt dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kùŋ ʔɛɲmôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ kộŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu ʔazôn mườʔiba káʔi tʰàɲ vớʔi dất cuŋkwɛɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi tʰuộk họhàŋ kɔncáʔu xák kủʔa kêhát dượk mấʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ cifáʔi zaim fần kủʔa mìɲ ŋườʔita kấp cɔ sicɛm tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ ɲơn cên núʔi zaim dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣêsɛ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kípsaim dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ bếtʰôzôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣibêtʰôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔita lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi Ðʔan kấp cɔ ʔɛântʰêkê dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣibêtʰôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ʔazalôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣácimmôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ lạʔi lấʔi cɔŋ fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ tʰaanák dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi haj káʔi tʰàɲ kộŋ mườʔi káʔi tʰàɲ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ cɔ ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa kák kɔncáʔu xák kủʔa kêhát ŋườʔita kũŋ lấʔi cɔŋ fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ tʰàɲ ɣôlan sứ basan tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ ɲơn kấp cɔ kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn kák họhàŋ lêvi dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ấʔi bếtêza dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi haj káʔi tʰàɲ lạʔi lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi ʔisaka kisiôn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ zát dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣiạtmút dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ʔɛâŋiənim dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ từ cɔŋ cifáʔi ʔasɛ lấʔi misêʔɛɲ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hênkát dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ zêhốp dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ kũŋ lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi néptali tʰàɲ kêdɛ ɣalilê tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ ɲơn dất cuŋkwɛɲ hamốt zơ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kạttʰan dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ kọŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣẹtsôn tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ mườʔiba káʔi tʰàɲ vớʔi dất cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔita kũŋ lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi sabulôn kấp cɔ ɲữŋ họhàŋ kɔncáʔu mêzazi tứklà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi săw cót tʰàɲ ɣiốknêʔam dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kạtta dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ Ðʔim dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ nahala dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ từ cɔŋ cifáʔi zubên lấʔi tʰàɲ bếtsɛ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣiátsa dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣiátsa dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kêdêmốt dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ mêfát dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ lạʔi lấʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi ɣát tʰàɲ zamốt sứ ɣalaát tʰàɲ ẩnnáʔu cɔ ɲơn dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ mahanaim dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếtbô dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ zaêsɛ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi káʔi tʰàɲ kộŋ kák tʰàɲ kấp cɔ kɔncáʔu mêzazi tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ họhàŋ kủʔa cúŋ tứklà zư hậʔu kák họhàŋ lêvi mườʔihaj káʔi tʰàɲ kộŋ kák tʰàɲ ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiữʔa sảnŋiệp zân ʔisơzaên mươʔi káʔi tʰàɲ kùŋ dất cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ mỗʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi dềʔu kó dất cuŋkwɛɲ hếttʰảʔi tʰàɲ kũŋ dềʔu ɲưvậʔi tʰếtʰì Ðứkzê cɔ ʔisơzaên kả sứ ŋàʔi dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ zân ʔisơzaên ɲận sảnŋiệp tạʔi dó Ðứkzê cɔ tứfíʔa dềʔu dượk ʔanŋỉ ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ tổfụ cẳŋ kó tʰùŋịc nàʔɔ kòn dứŋ nổʔi cướk Ðứkzê fó hếttʰảʔi tʰùŋịc vàʔɔ tăj cɔŋ kák lờʔi làɲ Ðứkzê dã fán cɔ ɲà ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó lờʔi nàʔɔlà xôŋ tʰàɲ tʰảʔi dềʔu ứŋŋiệm bấʔizờ ɣiôsuê ɣọʔi ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dã ɣiữ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi kó vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ cɔŋ mọʔi diềʔu zặn biểʔu cɔŋ xɔảŋ lâʔu ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj kó vâŋ ɣiữ mọʔi diềʔu fảʔi vâŋ ɣiữ tứklà mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi nên bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔanŋỉ cɔ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán vậʔi hãʔi di cởvề cạʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ sứ tʰuộk kák ŋươʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ sɔŋ fảʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo diềʔu zăn luậtfáp môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi tứklà tʰươŋiêʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi cíʔu ŋàʔi hếtlòŋ fụk ŋàʔi ɣiôsuê cúk fướk cɔ zồʔi cɔ dềʔu cởvề cạʔi mìɲ vả môʔisɛ dã cɔ fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ sảnŋiệp tạʔi basan kòn ɣiôsuê cɔ fânnửʔa kiə sảnŋiệp cuŋ vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ nàʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa tâʔi xizô cɔ cúŋ cởvề cạʔi mìɲ tʰì cúk fướk cɔ nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cởvề cạʔi mìɲ kó dɛm kủʔakảʔi zất ɲiềʔu kó bầʔi súkvật kùŋ vàŋ bạk dồŋ áʔɔsốŋ fủfê hãʔi ciə cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kủʔa kướp dượk nơʔi tʰùŋịc kák ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ lìʔa zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi silô dặŋ cởvề ɣalaát sảnŋiệp mìɲ mìɲ dã ɲận lấʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ xi dến cɔŋ dịʔahạt ɣiôdɛɲ tʰuộk sứ kanaan tʰì ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ bàntʰờ tạʔi dó ɣần sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ bàntʰờ ấʔi sɛm tʰấʔi zất kawlớn zân ʔisơzaên ŋɛ dượk ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ dã bàntʰờ cɔŋ dịʔahạt ɣiôdɛɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ sứ kanaan bênkạɲ zân ʔisơzaên xi zân ʔisơzaên hăj dượk diềʔu dó kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên lạʔi tạʔi silô dặŋ kéʔɔ dáɲ zân ʔisơzaên saj finê ʔa kɔncaj tʰầʔi lêʔasa dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ tạʔi sứ ɣalaát kũŋ kó mườʔi cưởŋtộk tʰeo ŋườʔi cưởŋtộk cɔ mỗʔi cifáʔi ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cưởŋtộk kủʔa hàŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋ dến ɣần ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát nóʔi zằŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kó hỏʔi ɲưvầʔi sự bấtcuŋ nàʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fạm kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ci vìsaw ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê bàntʰờ dặŋ fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê tộʔiák kủʔa fê ɣâʔi cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dến bâʔizờ cúŋta cưʔa zửʔa sạc dượk việk ɲỏmọn cɔ cúŋta saw ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi lạʔi Ðứkzê vả nếʔu ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔimaj cắk ŋàʔi nổʔizận kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên sɔŋ nếʔu dất kák ŋươʔi ɲận dượk ôʔuế tʰì hãʔi di kwa dất Ðứkzê dã ciếm lấʔi nơʔi dã dền kủʔa Ðứkzê hãʔi lậpŋiệp ɣiữʔa cúŋta ɲưŋ cớ fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê dừŋ fânzẽ cúŋta za bàntʰờ kìɲdịc kùŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ʔakan kɔncaj sêzác cẳŋ kó fạm tộʔi bấtcuŋ dáŋ ziệt kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê cẳŋ nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên saw và ŋườʔi ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi mộtmìɲ cết tộʔi mìɲ dâʔu bấʔizờ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ dáp kùŋ cưởŋtộk hàŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tɔànnăŋ biếtdiềʔu dó ʔisơzaên zõ nếʔu ấʔilà fảnŋịc nếʔu bấtcuŋ kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰì ŋàʔinăj cớ kứʔu cúŋtôʔi nếʔu cúŋtôʔi kó bàntʰờ dặŋ lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê nếʔu dể zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kủʔa tʰù tạʔi dó ŋwiện cáɲ Ðứkzê dòʔi lạʔi cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi kó bàntʰờ cúŋtôʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mộtmaj nóʔi kùŋ kɔncáʔu cúŋtôʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kó ci cuŋ kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên hỡʔi kɔncáʔu zubên kɔncáʔu ɣát Ðứkzê dã dặt sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ɣiớʔihạn ɣiữʔa cúŋta kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó fần ci nơʔi Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm cɔ kɔncáʔu cúŋtôʔi tʰôʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê bởʔi kớ dó cúŋtôʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi bàntʰờ cẳŋ fảʔi dể zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hăjlà zâŋ hisiɲ ɲưŋ dể làmcứŋ ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi ʔɛɲɛm kùŋ kɔncáʔu săw cúŋta zằŋ cúŋtôʔi zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kủʔa tʰù ɣiữ kuộk tʰờ fượŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê cướk ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ săw kɔncáʔu ʔɛɲɛm xôŋ nóʔi kùŋ kɔncáʔu cúŋtôʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó fần nơʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi cúŋtôʔi kó nóʔi xi nàʔɔ nóʔi diềʔu dó kùŋ cúŋtôʔi hăjlà nóʔi kùŋ kɔncáʔu săw cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi nóʔi hãʔi sɛm hìɲzạŋ bàntʰờ Ðứkzê tổfụ cúŋta dã nàʔɔ fảʔi zùŋ cɔ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hăjlà zâŋ hisiɲ ɲưŋ dể làmcứŋ ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi kák ŋươʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔinăj kwiết xôŋ kó fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi bàntʰờ xák bàntʰờ cướk dền kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dặŋ zùŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj ɲữŋ hisiɲ xi tʰầʔi finê ʔa kák mụk kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa hàŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên di tʰeo ŋườʔi dã ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát fânnửʔa cifáʔi manasɛ nóʔi tʰì diềʔu lấʔilàm bằŋlòŋ finê ʔa kɔncaj tʰầʔi lêʔasa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát ŋườʔi manasɛ zằŋ ŋàʔinăj cúŋtôʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê ŋự ɣiữʔa cúŋta kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó fạmtộʔi bấtcuŋ nàʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi kák ŋươʔi dã ɣiảʔicứʔu zân ʔisơzaên xỏʔi tăj Ðứkzê finê ʔa kɔncaj tʰầʔi lêʔasa kùŋ kák kwan cưởŋ từɣiã ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát sứ ɣalaát cởvề sứ kanaan kùŋzân ʔisơzaên tʰuật lạʔi diềʔu dã sảʔi kwa việk nàʔi zân ʔisơzaên lấʔilàm dẹplòŋ cúŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ kòn twan kéʔɔ dáɲ ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát dặŋ tàɲạʔi sứ vìvậʔi ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát dặt bàntʰờ nóʔi zằŋ làmcứŋ ɣiữʔa cúŋta zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiÐứkzê ʔanŋỉ cɔ ʔisơzaên lâʔu zồʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi kák tʰùŋịc fíʔa ɣiôsuê dã ɣià tuổʔiták kaw tʰì ŋườʔi ɣọʔi kả ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kák kwan cưởŋ kák kwan sét kák kwan tướŋ nóʔi zằŋ ta lãʔɔ ɣià dã kawtuổʔi zồʔi kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi mọʔi diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ ɲữŋ zântộk nàʔi ŋàʔi kwifụk kák ŋươʔi ấʔilà ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã ciếndấʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi kìʔa tùʔi tʰeo cifáʔi dã bắttʰăm kấp cɔ kák ŋươʔi sảnŋiệp sứ cưʔa dáɲ lấʔi sứ kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk dã ziệt sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔdến fíʔa mặtcờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi duổʔi kất zân ấʔi xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲận dượk sứ ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fán vậʔi hãʔi vữŋlòŋ ɣìŋiữ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu dã ɣi cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ cớ sâʔi kwa hữʔu hɔặk cớ sɛn kùŋ kák zântộk nàʔi kòn lạʔi ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi cớ sưŋ dến zɛɲ kák tʰần cúŋnó cớ biểʔu ʔaj kák tʰần ấʔi tʰề cớ hầʔu việk dừŋ kwì lạʔi cướk kák tʰần dó ɲưŋ fảʔi cíʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư kák ŋươʔi dã dến ŋàʔinăj vìÐứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ zântộk kườŋ tʰạɲ dến ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ ʔaj dứŋ nổʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi một ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi duổʔi dượk dến ŋàn ŋườʔi kủʔa cúŋnó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ ciếndấʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán vậʔi hãʔi kẩntʰận lấʔi mìɲ dặŋ kíɲmến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi vả nếʔu kák ŋươʔi cở lòŋ vớʔi fần kòn lạʔi kủʔa kák zântộk nàʔi ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi sujza kùŋ cúŋnó hɔặk kák ŋươʔi sɛn vàʔɔ kùŋ cúŋnó cúŋnó kùŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰìfảʔi zõzàŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn kứ duổʔi ɲữŋ zântộk nàʔi xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi nữʔa ɲưŋ cúŋnó lướʔi bẫʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi zɔj dáɲ nơʔi hôŋ côŋɣaj cíc cɔŋ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi ziệt xỏʔi sứ tốtdẹp nàʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ nầʔi ŋàʔinăj di dườŋ kả tʰếzan fảʔi di vậʔi hãʔi hếtlòŋ ɲậnbiết zằŋ cɔŋ kák lờʔi làɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fán kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó lờʔi nàʔɔ saj tʰảʔi dềʔu ứŋŋiệm cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰật cẳŋ lờʔi nàʔɔ saj vả kák lờʔi làɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã fán dượk ứŋŋiệm cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰếnàʔɔ tʰì Ðứkzê kũŋ ứŋŋiệm ɲữŋ lờʔi hămzọʔa kủʔa ŋàʔi cên kák ŋươʔi tʰếấʔi cɔdến cừŋ ŋàʔi ziệt kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi sứ tốtdẹp nàʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi bộʔi zawướk kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã zặn biểʔu nếʔu kák ŋươʔi di hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák kwì lạʔi cướk cúŋnó tʰì kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ziệt xỏʔi sứ tốtdẹp ŋàʔi dã cɔ ɣiôsuê ɲóm kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên tạʔi sicɛm ɣọʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên kák kwan cưởŋ kák kwan sét kák kwan tướŋ dềʔu zamắt cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋ kả zânsự zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fán ɲưvầʔi tổfụ kák ŋươʔi tʰazê ca kủʔa zaham nakô tʰuở sưʔa fíʔa sôŋ hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák ɲưŋ cọn zaham tổfụ kák ŋươʔi fíʔa sôŋ xiến ŋườʔi di xắp sứ kanaan ʔisák cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi sɛɲ ɲiềʔu tʰêm ta zakốp săw cɔ ʔisák zồʔi núʔi sê ʔizơ cɔ săw sảnŋiệp kòn zakốp kák kɔnkáʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu di suốŋ sứ zíptô kế dó saj môʔisɛ ʔazôn zùŋ kák fép za ɣiữʔa sứ zíptô hàɲ hạʔi dɔạn dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi dó ta dɛm tổfụ kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô kák ŋươʔi di dến ŋườʔi zíptô zùŋ sɛ biɲ líɲ duổʔi tʰeo tổfụ kák ŋươʔi dến biển dỏ bấʔizờ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ tốʔităm ɣiữ kák ŋươʔi zân zÊ zíptô zẫn nướkbiển cên mìɲ cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi diềʔu dã cɔ ŋườʔi zíptô kák ŋươʔi kó lâʔu ŋàʔi cɔŋ dốŋ vắŋ kế dó zẫn kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ zân ʔamôzít kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cúŋnó ciếndấʔu kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kó fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ciếm sứ cúŋnó sảnŋiệp dã ziệt cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi balák kɔncaj sếpbô vwa môáp cổʔi zậʔi ciɲciến vớʔi ʔisơzaên saj dòʔi balaam kɔncaj bê dặŋ zủʔasả kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ ŋɛ balaam vìvậʔi ŋườʔi buộk fảʔi cúk fướk cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj balák săw xi kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi dến tʰàɲ ɣiêzicô ŋườʔizê zicô zân ʔamôzít zân fêzêsít zân kanaan zân hêtít zân ɣizêɣasít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít ciếndấʔu kùŋ kák ŋươʔi fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi ta saj ʔɔŋ duổʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi ʔiɲư haj vwa zân ʔamôzít Ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ɲờ ɣươm ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ fảʔi ɲờ kuŋ ŋươʔi ta cɔ kák ŋươʔi dất kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó kàʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó sâʔi kák ŋươʔi dó ɲữŋ ɲɔ kâʔi livɛ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó cồŋ dể zùŋ tʰựk cɔ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê fụk ŋàʔi kác tʰàɲtâm cuŋtín hãʔi sa kák tʰần tổfụ kák ŋươʔi hầʔu việk kiə sôŋ tạʔi sứ zíptô fảʔi fụk Ðứkzê nếʔu cẳŋ tʰíc cɔ kák ŋươʔi fụk Ðứkzê tʰì ŋàʔinăj hãʔi cọn ʔaj mìɲ fụk hɔặk kák tʰần tổfụ kák ŋươʔi dã hầʔu việk kiə sôŋ hɔặk kák tʰầnzân ʔamôzít cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ɲà fụk Ðứkzê zânsự dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kwiết xôŋ lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ấʔi cíɲ ŋàʔi dã dɛm cúŋtôʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô tứk xỏʔi ɲà ŋàʔi dã cướk cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ fép nàʔi fùhộ cúŋtôʔi hɔặk cọn zọk dườŋ di hɔặk cɔŋ kák zân cúŋtôʔi cảʔi kwa Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk cúŋtôʔi kák zântộk zân ʔamôzít cɔŋ sứ vìvậʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ fụk Ðứkzê bởʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dủ sứk fụk Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰáɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ tʰa cáʔi mạŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê di hầʔu việk kák tʰần ŋɔạʔibaŋ tʰì ŋàʔi cở lòŋ ɣiáŋọʔa cɔ kák ŋươʔi săw xi dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi zânsự nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ xôŋdâʔu cúŋtôʔi fụk Ðứkzê vậʔi ɣiôsuê nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ kák ŋươʔi làmcứŋ lấʔi cɔ mìɲ zằŋ cíɲ kák ŋươʔi dã cọn Ðứkzê dể fụk ŋàʔi zânsự dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi làmcứŋ diềʔu dó vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi kất kák tʰần ŋɔạʔibaŋ xỏʔi ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi di hãʔi sâʔi lòŋ kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔisơzaên zânsự dáp kùŋ ɣiôsuê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ ŋàʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣiôsuê zawướk kùŋzân cwiền cɔ luậtfáp diềʔu zăn tạʔi sicɛm Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê cép kák lờʔi nàʔi cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kế dó ŋườʔi lấʔi dá zựŋ tạʔi dó zướʔi kâʔi zẻ ɣần nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê zồʔizô nóʔi kùŋ kả zânsự zằŋ kìʔa dá nàʔi zùŋ làmcứŋ cɔ cúŋta kó ŋɛ mọʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ cúŋta zùŋ làmcứŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi ʔɛ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ căŋ Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê cɔ zânsự cởvề ʔainấʔi dềʔu cɔŋ sảnŋiệp mìɲ săw kák việk ấʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj nun tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwadờʔi tuổʔi dượk mộtcăm mườʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ dịʔafận dã bắttʰăm ŋườʔi tạʔi tʰimnátsêzác cên núʔi zaim fíʔa bắk núʔi ɣaác ʔisơzaên fụk Ðứkzê cọn lúk sɛɲ tiềnkủʔa ɣiôsuê kák cưởŋlãʔɔ mọʔi việk Ðứkzê dã ʔisơzaên hàʔicốt kủʔa ɣiôsép zân ʔisơzaên dã zờʔi sứ zíptô tʰì ŋườʔita côn sicɛm cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ zakốp mwa kủʔa kɔncáʔu hêmô ca sicɛm ɣiá mộtcăm miếŋ bạk kɔncáʔu ɣiôsép dượk hàʔicốt dó sảnŋiệp lêʔasa kɔncaj ʔazôn kũŋ kwadờʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi ɣibêátfinê ʔa finê ʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã dượk cɔ cɔŋ núʔi zaim săw xi ɣiôsuê kwadờʔi zân ʔisơzaên kầʔu hỏʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ ʔaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi di cướk dặŋ dáɲ zân kanaan Ðứkzê dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà ŋườʔi zuda fảʔi di kìʔa dã fó sứ vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔizu da nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi simêôn ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi di kùŋ tôʔi cɔŋ sứ dã bắttʰăm tôʔi tʰì cúŋta dáɲ zân kanaan zồʔi tôʔi kũŋ di kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm dến sứ dã bắttʰăm ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔisi di vớʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi zuda di Ðứkzê fó zân kanaan zân fêzêsít vàʔɔ tăj tạʔi bêsék dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi bêsék kũŋ kó ɣặp ʔadônibêsék sôŋ vàʔɔ ŋườʔi dáɲbạʔi zân kanaan zân fêzêsít ʔadônibêsék cạʔi cốn ɲưŋ cúŋ duổʔi tʰeo dượk ŋườʔi cặt ŋónkáʔi kủʔa tăj cơn bấʔizờ ʔadônibêsék nóʔi zằŋ kó bảʔi mươʔi vwa cặt ŋónkáʔi kủʔa tăj cơn ci zớt zướʔi Ðʔiềʔu dã Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi báʔɔứŋ ŋườʔita zẫn vwa dến ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi cết tạʔi dó ŋườʔizu da dáɲ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ciếm lấʔi zùŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết zânkư fóŋỏʔa tʰàɲ kế ấʔi ŋườʔi zuda di suốŋ dặŋ dáɲ zân kanaan cên núʔi dồŋbằŋ lạʔi di dáɲ zân kanaan tạʔi hếpzôn hếpzôn tʰuở sưʔa kiziátazaba dáɲ sêsaj ʔahiman kùŋ tɛɲmaj từ dó ŋườʔi zuda di dáɲ zânkư kủʔa biə biə tʰuở sưʔa kiziátsêfê kalép nóʔi ʔaj dáɲ kiziátsêfɛ ciếm lấʔi tʰì ɣả kɔŋáʔi ʔaï ksa cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi bấʔizờ ʔɔátniên kɔncaj kêna ʔɛm tʰứ kalép ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ dó kalép ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ʔaï ksa cɔ ŋườʔilàm xi nàŋ dã dến ɲà ʔɔátniên nàŋ ɣiụk ŋườʔi sin ca mìɲ miếŋ zuộŋ nàŋ suốŋ xỏʔi lừʔa tʰì kalép hỏʔi zằŋ kɔn ci nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ sin ca cɔ kɔnmột kủʔa fướk vì ca dã dịɲ cɔ kɔn dất sin hãʔi cɔ kɔn ɲữŋ ŋuồn nướk kalép cɔ nàŋ kák ŋuồn cên kák ŋuồn zướʔi vả kɔncáʔu kủʔa kênít ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa môʔisɛ tʰàɲ kâʔicà di vớʔi kɔncáʔu zuda dến cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ zuda fíʔa ʔazát cỗ tạʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự kế ấʔi ŋườʔi zuda di kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi simêôn dáɲ zân kanaan tạʔi sêfát tậnziệt nơʔi ấʔi zồʔi ɣọʔi họtma ŋườʔizu da kũŋ ciếm lấʔi ɣasa kùŋ dịʔafận Ác kalôn kùŋ dịʔafận Ék zôn kùŋ dịʔafận Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi zuda lấʔi núʔi kòn zânsự cũŋ tʰì duổʔi di xôŋ dặŋ cúŋnó kó ɲữŋ sɛ bằŋ kế săw tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa môʔisɛ ŋườʔita hếpzôn cɔ kalép kalép duổʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔanák xỏʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi ɲưŋ kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin xôŋ duổʔi dượk zân ɣiêbusít tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zân ɣiêbusít hãʔi kòn cuŋ kùŋ kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin cɔdến ŋàʔinăj kòn ɲà ɣiôsép kũŋ dáɲ bêtên Ðứkzê kùŋ vậʔi ɲà ɣiôsép saj zɔtʰám bêtên tʰàɲ nầʔi lúk cướk lusơ ɲữŋ zɔtʰám tʰấʔi ŋườʔiở tʰàɲ di za nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sin cỉ cɔ cúŋta ŋõ nàʔɔ di vàʔɔ tʰàɲ dượk tʰì cúŋta cɔ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi cỉ cɔ ŋõ ŋườʔita di vàʔɔ tʰàɲ dượk cúŋ lấʔi ɣươm
