dáɲ ɣiết tʰàɲ ɲưŋ dể cɔ ŋườʔi dó kả ɲà ŋườʔi di Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ấʔi di vàʔɔ sứ zân hêtít sâʔi káʔi tʰàɲ tạʔi dó dặt lusơ hãʔi kòn ɣọʔi vậʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔima nasɛ xôŋ duổʔi dượk zânkư kủʔa bếtsêʔan kủʔa kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt kũŋ cẳŋ duổʔi zânkư kủʔa tʰaanák kủʔa kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt hɔặk zân zơ zân kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt hɔặk zân ɣíplêʔam zân cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt hɔặk zân mêɣidô zân kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt tʰì kũŋ cẳŋ duổʔi di zân kanaan kwiếtdịɲ cɔŋ sứ ấʔi sảʔi xi ʔisơzaên cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ tʰì zân kanaan fụkzịc ɲưŋ xôŋ kó duổʔi cúŋnó di ŋườʔi zaim kũŋ cẳŋ duổʔi zân kanaan tạʔi ɣêsɛ ɲưŋ zân kanaan kứ kùŋ tạʔi ɣêsɛ ŋườʔisa kũŋ cẳŋ duổʔi zân kícôn hɔặk zân nahalô ŋườʔi kanaan cuŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi sabulôn sɔŋ fảʔi fụkzịc ŋườʔi ʔasɛ kũŋ cẳŋ duổʔi zân ʔakô hɔặk zân sidôn zân Ác zân ʔaï ksíp zân hênba zân ʔafék hăjlà zân zêhốp ŋườʔi ʔasɛ sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa zân kanaan zân sứ ŋườʔi ʔasɛ xôŋ duổʔi cúŋnó di ŋườʔinép xôŋ duổʔi zân bếtsêmết bếtanát ɲưŋ sảnŋiệp ɣiữʔa zân kanaan zân sứ kòn zân bếtsêmết zân bếtanát fảʔi fụkzịc ŋườʔi néptali zân ʔamôzít zồn ŋườʔi Ðʔan cên núʔi xôŋ cɔ suốŋ cũŋ zân ʔamôzít dịɲ tạʔi núʔi hêzɛ ʔazalôn saanbim ɲưŋ tăj kủʔa ɲà ɣiôsép tʰắŋ cúŋnó cúŋnó fảʔi fụkzịc Ðịʔa fận zân ʔamôzít cạʔi zốk ʔaï kzápbim sêla cởlên vả tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê di ɣiɲɣɛɲ dến bôkim nóʔi zằŋ ta dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi di xỏʔi sứ zíptô zẫn vàʔɔ sứ dã tʰề cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi ta dã fán ta cẳŋ hủʔi zawướk dã kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kòn kák ŋươʔi cớ zawướk kùŋzân sứ nầʔi hãʔi fáhủʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa cúŋnó sɔŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa tạʔisaw kák ŋươʔi dã diềʔu dó ta kũŋ kó fán ta cẳŋ duổʔi zân ấʔi xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi sɔŋ cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi kák tʰần cúŋnó tʰàɲ káʔi bẫʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê vừʔa nóʔi zứt lờʔi nầʔi cɔ kả zân ʔisơzaên tʰì kả zânsự kấttiếŋ xók cúŋ ɣọʔi cỗ dó bôkim zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi dó xizô dã cɔ zânsự tʰì mọʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi dềʔu di vàʔɔ sảnŋiệp mìɲ dặŋ ɲận lấʔi sứ zânsự fụk Ðứkzê cɔŋ cọn dờʔi ɣiôsuê cọn dờʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kòn sốŋ lâʔu ɣiôsuê ɲữŋ dã tʰấʔi kák kôŋviệk lớnlaw Ðứkzê dã za ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwadờʔi tuổʔi dượk mộtcăm mườʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ dịʔafận sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi tạʔi tʰimnátʰêzɛ cên núʔi zaim fíʔa bắk núʔi ɣaác hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔidờʔi ấʔi kũŋ dượk tổfụ mìɲ zồʔi dờʔi xák nổʔi cẳŋ Ðứkzê kũŋ cẳŋ kák diềʔu ŋàʔi dã ɲơn ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ zân ʔisơzaên ák cướk Ðứkzê hầʔu việk kák tʰầntượŋ kủʔa baɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ Ðấŋ dã dɛm za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tʰeo kák tʰần xák kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk suŋkwɛɲ kwì lạʔi kák tʰần dó cọkzận Ðứkzê vậʔi cúŋnó Ðứkzê hầʔu việk baɛɲ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa kướpbók cúŋnó bóklột ŋàʔi ʔisơzaên cɔ kák tʰùŋịc cuŋkwɛɲ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kòn tʰế cốŋkự nổʔi dượk cướk tʰùŋịc mìɲ bấtluận cúŋ di dến dâʔu tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋịc kùŋ cúŋ dặŋ ɣiáŋọʔa cɔ ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán dã tʰề kùŋ cúŋ cúŋ kơn hɔạnnạn lớnlaw tʰăj sɔŋÐứkzê zấʔi ɲữŋ kwan sét ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋ xỏʔi tăj kướpbók ɲưŋ cúŋ kũŋ xôŋ ŋɛ kák kwan sét cúŋ hàɲ zâm kùŋ kák tʰần xák kwì lạʔi cướk kák tʰần ấʔi cúŋ vộʔi sâʔi kɔn dườŋ tổfụ mìɲ dã di cẳŋ bắtcướk tʰeo tổfụ vâŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê vả xi Ðứkzê zấʔi kák kwan sét cɔ ʔisơzaên tʰì Ðứkzê kùŋ kwan sét dó cọn dờʔi kwan sét ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên xỏʔi tăj tʰùŋịc mìɲ Ðứkzê lấʔilòŋ tʰươŋsót tạʔi kớ ɲữŋ tiếŋ zên siếk tʰở za cướk ɲữŋ tứktốʔi mìɲ kế săw xi kwan sét kwadờʔi zồʔi ʔisơzaên lạʔi ák kák tổfụ mìɲ tʰeo kák tʰần xák hầʔu việk tʰờ lạʔi cướk kák tʰần ấʔi ʔisơzaên xôŋ xứŋ cừʔa việklàm ák hăjlà lốʔi kốcấp kủʔa bởʔi kớ dó kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi fán zằŋ vì zântộk nầʔi kó bộʔiŋịc zawướk kủʔa dã cwiền cɔ tổfụ cúŋnó cúŋnó xôŋ kó ŋɛ lờʔi fán fần kũŋ cẳŋ duổʔi xỏʔi cướk cúŋnó zân nàʔɔ ɣiôsuê dể lạʔi xi ŋườʔi kwadờʔi ta zùŋ kák zântộk dó tʰửtʰác ʔisơzaên dể sɛm tʰử cúŋnó kó ɣiữ di tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲư tổfụ cúŋnó căŋ Ấʔi vậʔi Ðứkzê dể cɔ kák zântộk nầʔi lạʔi cɔŋ sứ xôŋ vộʔi duổʔi cúŋnó di kũŋ xôŋ fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ɣiôsuê nầʔi kák zântộk Ðứkzê dể kòn lạʔi dặŋ zùŋ cúŋnó tʰửtʰác ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên nàʔɔ cưʔa từŋ tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ciếncận kanaan ŋàʔi cỉ tʰửtʰác kák zòŋzõʔi mớʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cɔ cúŋnó việk ciếncận ɲứt ɲữŋ cưʔa từŋ tʰấʔi ciếncận xi cướk kák zântộk nầʔi zân filitin kùŋ vwa cúŋnó hếttʰảʔi zân kanaan zân sidôn zân hêvít tạʔi núʔi liban núʔi baɛɲhẹtmôn cɔdến kửʔa hamát Ðứkzê zùŋ kák zântộk nầʔi dể tʰửtʰác ʔisơzaên dặŋ sɛm tʰử cúŋnó kó vâŋ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi kậʔi môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ tổfụ cúŋnó căŋ ɲưvậʔi zân ʔisơzaên cuŋ kùŋzân kanaan zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa cúŋnó ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ kɔncaj cúŋnó hầʔu việk kák tʰần cúŋnó zân ʔisơzaên kòn diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê kwên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ kúŋ tʰờ kák hìɲtượŋ baɛɲ ʔasêza vìvậʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj kusanzisatʰaim vwa nướk mêsôbôtami zân ʔisơzaên fụkzịc vwa kusanzisatʰaim kế ấʔi zân ʔisơzaên kêʔula kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê zấʔi cɔ cúŋnó ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔɔátniên kɔncaj kủʔa kêna ʔɛm tʰứ kủʔa kalép ŋườʔi ấʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dɔán sét ʔisơzaên di za ciếncận Ðứkzê fó kusanzisatʰaim vwa ʔazam vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi xiến cɔ ŋườʔi tʰắŋ kusanzisatʰaim sứ dượk hòʔabìɲ cɔŋ mươʔi dó ʔɔátniên kɔncaj kêna kwadờʔi zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê Ðứkzê xiến Ék vwa môáp cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ dể dáɲ ʔisơzaên vậʔi Ék ɲóm cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ zân ʔammôn zân ʔamalék kéʔɔ di dáɲ ʔisơzaên ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ kâʔi càlà zân ʔisơzaên fụkzịc Ék vwa môáp cɔŋ mườʔitám Ðʔɔạn zân ʔisơzaên kêʔula kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê zấʔi cɔ cúŋ dấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu kɔncaj ɣêza tʰuộk cifáʔi bêŋiəmin ŋườʔi kó tʰuận tăj zân ʔisơzaên saj ŋườʔi dɛm kốŋ cɔ Ék vwa môáp lấʔi kâʔi ɣươm haj lưỡʔi zàʔi tʰướk deo tʰeo cɔŋ mìɲ áʔɔ nơʔi háŋ hữʔu vậʔi ŋườʔi dɛm zâŋ kốŋ cɔ Ék vwa môáp ŋườʔi zất xi zâŋ kốŋ zồʔi cɔ ɲữŋ dã dɛm dến divề ɲưŋ cáɲ ŋườʔi dến lấʔi dá ɣần ɣiɲɣɛɲ tʰì cởlạʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi vwa tôʔi kó lờʔi tâʔu kùŋ vwa vwa cwiền hãʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ hầʔukận vwa di za bấʔizờ vwa dươŋ ŋồʔi mộtmìɲ nơʔi lầʔu dến ɣần nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tâʔu lạʔi vớʔi vwa Ék vừʔa dứŋzậʔi xỏʔi ŋaj ɣiơ tăj za zút ɣươm deo fíʔa hữʔu dâm ŋườʔi nơʔi bụŋ kán ɣươm kũŋ tʰeo lưỡʔi lạʔi suŋkwɛɲ lưỡʔi ɣươm ŋườʔi xôŋ zút ɣươm za xỏʔi bụŋ tʰấʔu za săw lưŋ Ðʔɔạn láɲ za nơʔi kửʔa dóŋ kák kửʔa lầʔu lạʔi ɣàʔi cốt xi di za xỏʔi kák dầʔitớ dến sɛm tʰấʔi kák kửʔa lầʔu dềʔu dóŋ ɣàʔi cốt tʰì nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ hɔặk vwa di ŋơʔi cɔŋ lầʔu căŋ cúŋ dợʔi zất lâʔu dến dỗʔi hổtʰẹn sɔŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi vwa mởkửʔa fòŋ lấʔi cìʔaxóʔa kìʔa tʰấʔi cúʔa mìɲ dã cết sảʔi cên dất cɔŋ xi cúŋ cì dã cốn kwa xỏʔi kák dá láɲ dến sêzi ʔa ŋườʔi vừʔa dến tʰổʔi cɔŋ núʔi zaim zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi suốŋ xỏʔi núʔi cíɲ ŋườʔi diở dầʔu nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi tʰeo Ðứkzê dã fó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi zân môáp tʰùŋịc kák ŋươʔi cúŋ dềʔu tʰeo ŋườʔi suốŋ ciếmkứ kák cỗ kạn sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dườŋ di dến môáp kấm xôŋ cɔ ʔaj di kwa vậʔi cɔŋ lúk dó zân ʔisơzaên dáɲ ɣiết cừŋ mườʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi môáp tʰảʔi dềʔu tăj mạɲmẽ kan dãm xôŋ ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi dượk cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zân môáp fụk zướʔi tăj ʔisơzaên sứ dượk hòʔabìɲ cɔŋ mươʔi săw kó samɣa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔanát ŋườʔi zùŋ kâʔi dót dáɲ ɣiết sáʔu căm ŋườʔi filitin kũŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên săw xi dã kwadờʔi zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj zabin vwa kanaan cịvì tạʔi hátsɔ kwan tʰốŋ lãɲdạʔɔ biɲ ŋườʔi sisêza tạʔi hazôsết kủʔa zân ŋɔạʔibaŋ vwa za kó cín căm sɛ cɔŋ haimươʔi ŋườʔi zân ʔisơzaên kác huŋbạʔɔ ʔisơzaên kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê cɔŋ lúk dó bôza tiênci kủʔa lápbidốt dɔán sét zân ʔisơzaên bà cên núʔi zaim ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ zama bêtên zướʔi kâʔi càlà bôza zân ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi dặŋ ŋɛ sétdɔán bà saj ɣọʔi bazák kɔncaj ʔabinôʔam kêdɛ cɔŋ dất néptali nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã cwiền lịɲ nầʔi hãʔi cọn dɛm tʰeo ŋươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kɔncáʔu néptali cɔŋ kɔncáʔu sabulôn di tʰẳŋ dến núʔi tʰabô ta xiến sisêza tʰốŋ lãɲdạʔɔ biɲ vwa zabin dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi xɛ kisôn vớʔi kák sɛcộ kả kwânlíɲ kủʔa fó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi bazák dáp zằŋ nếʔu di vớʔi tôʔi tʰì tôʔi di ɲưŋ nếʔu xôŋ di vớʔi tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ di bà dáp fảʔi di vớʔi ŋươʔi sɔŋ viɲhiển kủʔa việk nầʔi cẳŋ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê fó sisêza vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi vậʔi bôza dứŋzậʔi di kùŋ bazák dến kêdɛ bazák ɲóm ŋườʔi sabulôn ŋườʔi néptali tạʔi kêdɛ kó ŋườʔi di tʰeo săw ŋườʔi bôza kũŋ di vớʔi ŋườʔi vả hêbɛ ŋườʔi kênít dã lìʔa xỏʔi zân kênít kɔncáʔu hôbáp ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa môʔisɛ di zựŋ cạʔi mìɲ kâʔi zẻ sanaim ɣần kêdɛ ŋườʔita tʰuật cɔ sisêza hăj zằŋ bazák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabinôʔam dã di dến núʔi tʰabô sisêza ɲóm hếttʰảʔi sɛcộ mìɲ cín căm káʔi bằŋ tɔàn kwânbiɲ vớʔi mìɲ hazôsết zân ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔdến xɛ kisôn bôza nóʔi kùŋ bazák zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi nầʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê fó sisêza vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi Ðứkzê cẳŋ di dằŋ cướk ŋươʔi saw zồʔiba zák di suốŋ tʰabô kó mườʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi tʰeo săw Ðứkzê zùŋ mũʔi ɣươm cɔ sisêza hếttʰảʔi sɛcộ kùŋ tɔàn kwânlíɲ ŋườʔi cạʔi cướk bazák sisêza suốŋ sɛ mìɲ cạʔi cốn bazák duổʔi tʰeo sɛcộ dạʔɔ biɲ cɔdến hazôsết zân ŋɔạʔibaŋ kả dạʔɔ biɲ sisêza ɣươm ɣiết xôŋ kòn lạʔi ŋườʔi sisêza cạʔi cốn dến cạʔi zaên kủʔa hêbɛ ŋườʔi kênít zabin vwa hátsɔ ɲà hêbɛ ŋườʔi kênít hòʔahảʔɔ vớʔi ɲăw zaên za dón sisêza nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi cúʔa sin hãʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi ɲà tôʔi cớ ci vậʔi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cạʔi nàŋ nàŋ lấʔi dắp ŋườʔi lạʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ ta sin nàŋ cɔ cút nướk ʔuốŋ xát nàŋ bầʔu sữʔa za cɔ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ zồʔi cùm ŋườʔi lạʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi dứŋ nơʔi kửʔa cạʔi nếʔu kó ʔaj dến hỏʔi zằŋ dâʔi kó ʔaj căŋ tʰì hãʔi dáp cẳŋ kó ʔaj bấʔizờ ŋườʔi ŋủ săj mệtɲọk kwá zaên hêbɛ lấʔi kâʔi nọk cạʔi tăj káʔi búʔa ɲẹ ɲẹ dến ŋươʔi lấʔi káʔi nọk dóŋ tʰủŋ màŋtaŋ ŋườʔi tʰấʔu suốŋ dất ŋườʔi di bazák dươŋ kòn zượt tʰeo sisêza zaên za dón ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến tôʔi cỉ cɔ ôŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi ôŋ dươŋ bazák vàʔɔ ɲà nàŋ tʰấʔi sisêza cết sảʔi kó nọk dâm nơʔi màŋtaŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến cɔ zabin vwa kanaan fụk cướk zân ʔisơzaên tăj zân ʔisơzaên kàŋŋàʔicàŋ mạɲ tʰắŋ zabin vwa kanaan cɔdến cừŋ cúŋ dã ziệt ŋườʔi di cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi bôza bàʔi ka nầʔi vớʔi bazák kɔncaj ʔabinôʔam xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê vì ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ dã kầmkwiền kwảncị cɔŋ ʔisơzaên và táɲ zâŋ mìɲ kác vujlòŋ hỡʔi kák vwa hãʔi ŋɛ hỡʔi kák kwan cưởŋ xá lắŋtaj ta cɔ Ðứkzê ta ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên hỡʔiÐứkzê xi ŋàʔi za sê ʔizơ xi cảʔi kwa dồŋbằŋ dôm tʰì dất zuŋ kák từŋ cờʔi ɲỏɣiọt mâʔi nướk suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê núʔi dổʔi za zòŋ nướk tứk núʔi sina ʔi kiə cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi samɣa kɔncaj ʔanát và ɲằm lúk zaên kák dườŋkáʔi dềʔu bỏhwaŋ ɲữŋ hàɲxác nươŋ tʰeo kák lốʔi kwɛɲ kwẹʔɔ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên tʰiếʔu kwan cưởŋ cɔdến cừŋ bôza cổʔi zậʔi ɲư ŋườʔimẹ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita dã cọn kák tʰần mớʔi tứktʰì kơn ɣiặk kó tạʔi cướk kửʔa tʰàɲ ɣiữʔa mươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita cẳŋ tʰấʔi xiên kũŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ lòŋ áʔimộ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên là ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ zânsự zâŋ mìɲ kác vujlòŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi kỡʔi kɔn lừʔa bạc ŋồʔi cên xảm Ðʔi cên dườŋkáʔi xá mừŋ kậʔi tiếŋ kủʔa líɲ kầm kuŋ tạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ʔuốŋ nướk ŋườʔita hãʔi kíɲ xɛn việk kôŋbìɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê và kuộk kwảncị kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi tạʔi nơʔi ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê di suốŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ hỡʔiÐê bôza xá tỉɲ tʰứk tỉɲ tʰứk hãʔi tỉɲ tʰứk tỉɲ tʰứk bàʔi ka hỡʔiba zák xá cổʔi zậʔi hỡʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabinôʔam hãʔi zẫn ɲữŋ fu ŋườʔi di bấʔizờ kòn lạʔi cɔŋ zânsự dềʔu suốŋ kùŋ kák cáŋsĩ dặŋ za cận zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê suốŋ dáɲ zõŋ từ zaim dến ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó ɣốk nơʔi ʔamalék săw ŋươʔi kó bêŋiəmin ŋườʔiở ɣiữʔa dɔàn zân ŋươʔi kák kwan cưởŋ dến maki và ɲữŋ kầm kâʔi fủ dến sabulôn kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ʔicasa dềʔu tʰeo bôza ʔicasa bazák dồŋ ɲăw ŋườʔi sôŋ dạʔi vàʔɔ cũŋ ɣần kák suốʔi kủʔa zubên kó lắmdiềʔu ŋịluận cɔŋ lòŋ ɲân saw ŋươʔi cɔŋ cuồŋ mà ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔu kủʔa ɲữŋ bầʔi ciên ɣần kák suốʔi zubên kó lắmdiềʔu ŋịluận cɔŋ lòŋ ɣalaát kứ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kònÐʔan saw lạʔi cên kák ciếk tàʔu ʔasɛ ŋồʔi nơʔi ʔanŋỉ cɔŋ kák kửʔabiển mìɲ sabulôn néptali zântộk liềʔumạŋ mìɲ cên kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa dồŋzuộŋ kák vwa dến ciếncɛɲ kák vwa kanaan ciếncɛɲ tạʔitʰa ʔanák tạʔi nướk mêɣidô sɔŋ cẳŋ kướp lấʔidượk tiềnbạk kák từŋ cờʔi kó zự vàʔɔ ciếncận ɲữŋ ŋôʔisaw kứ tʰeo dườŋ mìɲ dáɲ sisêza xɛci dã kéʔɔ côʔi cúŋnó tứklà xɛ kisôn dờʔi sưʔa hỡʔi liɲhồn ŋươʔi kó zàʔi dạp năŋlựk zướʔi cơn bấʔizờ ŋựʔa ɣiậm dất vì kớ ɲữŋ ciếnsĩ sảʔi sảʔi cạʔi măw sứɣiả kủʔa Ðứkzê fán hãʔi zủʔasả mêzô hãʔi zủʔasả zủʔasả zânkư kủʔa vì kủʔa vì cúŋnó xôŋ dến cợ Ðứkzê xôŋ dến cợ Ðứkzê dáɲ kák zõŋ ŋwiện cɔ zaên hêbɛ ŋườʔi kênít Ðượk fướk ɣiữʔa kák ŋườʔi dờn ŋwiện ŋườʔi dượk fướk ɣiữʔa kák dờn cɔŋ cạʔi sisêza sin nướk nàŋ dɛm cɔ sữʔa nàŋ lấʔi cén saŋcọŋ tʰết sữʔa cɔ một tăj nàŋ lấʔi kâʔi nọk kòn tăj hữʔu kầm káʔi búʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰợ nàŋ dáɲ sisêza bửʔa dầʔu za dầʔu dâm tʰủŋ màŋtaŋ hắn sỉʔu tạʔi nơʔi cơn nàŋ hắn sỉʔu tạʔi cơn nàŋ và tạʔicỗ sỉʔu cết kứŋ mẹ kủʔa sisêza kửʔasổ sɛm tʰấʔi bèn kêʔu kwa sɔŋ vỏŋ zằŋ vìsaw sɛcɔn dến cậm cể tạʔisaw kák sɛcɔn di cậm zườŋ ấʔi ɲữŋ xônŋwan cɔŋ hầʔu ŋườʔi cảlờʔi mà kũŋ nóʔitʰầm zằŋ cúŋ cẳŋ dượk kủʔa kướp saw họ cẳŋ fảʔi ciə fân kủʔa dó mộtvàʔi kɔŋáʔi cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi ciếnsĩ một kủʔa kướp bằŋ vảʔi ɲuộm tʰêʔu một káʔi áʔɔ vảʔi ɲuộm haj káʔi áʔɔ vảʔi tʰêʔu cɔ kổ kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰắŋ cận Ôʔi Ðứkzê ŋwiện hếttʰảʔi kừʔudịc ŋàʔi dềʔu ɲưvậʔi ŋwiện ɲữŋ ʔiêʔumến ŋàʔi dượk ɣiốŋ ɲư mặtcờʔi xi mọk zựkzỡ Ðʔɔạn sứ dượk hòʔabìɲ cɔŋ mươʔi zân ʔisơzaên diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj zân madiən cɔŋ bảʔi tăj kủʔa ŋườʔi madiən tʰắŋ ʔisơzaên vì ŋườʔi madiən zân ʔisơzaên cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ nơʔi ẩnnáʔu cɔŋ núʔi cɔŋ kák dồn xi ʔisơzaên dã zeo ɣiốŋ zân madiən vớʔi zân ʔamêlék ŋườʔi fươŋ Ðôŋ di dáɲ ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ŋườʔi fáhạʔi mùʔamàŋ kủʔa sứ cɔdến ɣasa xôŋ dể lạʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên lươŋtʰựk ɣì hɔặk ciên hăjlà lừʔa vì cúŋnó di dɛm tʰeo bầʔi súkvật cạʔi mìɲ lɔán dến xáknàʔɔ dám kàʔɔkàʔɔ ŋườʔi lạkdà dến cɔŋ sứ dặŋ fáhạʔi vậʔi kớ zân madiən ʔisơzaên ŋèʔɔxổ cật kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê bấʔizờ zân ʔisơzaên dã kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê việk zân madiən Ðứkzê saj dấŋ tiênci dến kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã dɛm kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô zút kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi ɲà ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô xỏʔi tăj hếttʰảʔi kák ŋươʔi duổʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi sứ kủʔa cúŋnó kó fán zằŋ ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ kák tʰần kủʔa zân ʔamôzít tạʔi cɔŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi nàʔɔ kó ŋɛ tiếŋ Ðʔɔạn tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dến ŋồʔi zướʔi kâʔi tʰôŋ ʔɔùpza tʰuộk ɣiôác ŋườʔi ʔabiêsêzít ɣêdêôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi dươŋ dập lúʔamạc cɔŋ dặŋ ɣiấʔu xỏʔi zân madiən tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi zõŋ Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi ɣêdêôn tʰưʔa zằŋ Ôʔi cúʔa nếʔu Ðứkzê kùŋ cúŋtôʔi saw kák diềʔu nầʔi sảʔi dến cɔ cúŋtôʔi kák fép kiə dâʔu tổfụ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰuật lạʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê cẳŋ kó dɛm cúŋta za xỏʔi sứ zíptô saw vì bâʔizờ Ðứkzê cúŋtôʔi fó cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ tăj zân madiən Ðứkzê sâʔi lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi zùŋ sứk kủʔa ŋươʔi kó di ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên xỏʔi tăj zân madiən ta cẳŋ saj ŋươʔi di saw ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tʰanôʔi hỡʔi cúʔa tôʔi lấʔi ci ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên kìʔa cɔŋ cifáʔi manasɛ tôʔi ŋèʔɔ kòn tôʔi ɲỏ cɔŋ ɲà ca tôʔi Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ta kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dáɲbạʔi zân madiən ɲư dáɲ ŋườʔi vậʔi ɣêdêôn tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk cúʔa sin cɔ tôʔi zấʔu zằŋ cíɲ cúʔa fán kùŋ tôʔi sin cớ zan xỏʔi dâʔi cɔdến xi tôʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ ŋàʔi dɛm kủʔa tôʔi dể cướk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dáp ta dâʔi cɔdến xi ŋươʔi cởlạʔi ɣêdêôn di zọn kɔn zê kɔn lấʔi fa ɲữŋ báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn ŋườʔi dể tʰịt cɔŋ zổ dổ nướk tʰịt vàʔɔ nồʔi zồʔi dɛm za zâŋ kák ấʔi cɔ ŋàʔi zướʔi kâʔi tʰôŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi tʰịt báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn dể cên dá nầʔi zồʔi dổ nướk tʰịt za ɣêdêôn ɲưvậʔi bấʔizờ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiơ dầʔu ɣậʔi ŋàʔi dươŋ kầm nơʔi tăj mìɲ za dụŋ dến tʰịt báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn lửʔa dá bốk tʰiêʔuhóʔa tʰịt báɲ ɲỏ xôŋ mɛn dɔạn tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê di xỏʔi ŋườʔi ɣêdêôn tʰấʔi zằŋ ấʔilà tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê zằŋ Ôʔi cúʔazê xốnnạn cɔ tôʔi tôʔi tʰấʔi dốʔiziện tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưŋÐứkzê fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ xá ʔiênlòŋ cớ ci ŋươʔi xôŋ cết dâʔu ɣêdêôn tạʔi dó káʔi bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê dặt ɣiêhôvasalam tạʔiɔùp za tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔabiêsêzít káʔi bàntʰờ ấʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ kũŋ dêm ấʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ hãʔi kɔn dựk kủʔa ca ŋươʔi kɔn dựk tʰứ ɲì bảʔi tuổʔi zồʔi fá zỡ bàntʰờ tʰần baɛɲ tạʔi ɲà ca ŋươʔi dáɲ hìɲtượŋ ʔasêza cên dó Ðʔɔạn tạʔi nơʔi cót dá nầʔi ŋươʔi bàntʰờ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi sắpdặt mọʔi việk zồʔi hãʔi kɔn dựk tʰứ ɲì zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu vớʔi ɣỗ hìɲtượŋ ʔasêza ŋươʔi dã dáɲ ɣêdêôn cọn lấʔi mườʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ dầʔitớ mìɲ tʰeo diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi ɲà ca mìɲ kùŋ cɔŋ tʰàɲ xôŋ zám tʰeo lịɲ ấʔi banŋàʔi bandêm sớmmaj xi zân cɔŋ tʰàɲ tʰứkzấk tʰấʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰần baɛɲ dã fá zỡ hìɲtượŋ ʔasêza cên dáɲ kɔn dựk tʰứ ɲì dã zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ mớʔi dó cúŋ hỏʔi ɲăw zằŋ ʔaj diềʔu dó Ðʔɔạn hỏʔitʰăm casét kó ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ Ấʔilà ɣêdêôn kɔncaj ɣiôác dã diềʔu dó zân cɔŋ tʰàɲ nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôác zằŋ hãʔi biểʔu kɔnŋươʔi za fảʔi cết dã fá zỡ bàntʰờ tʰần baɛɲ dáɲ hìɲtượŋ ʔasêza cên ɣiôác dáp vớʔi ɲữŋ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ mìɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kó biɲ vựk baɛɲ saw há kó fảʔi kák ŋươʔi tiếpkứʔu ʔaj tʰeo fɛ kủʔa baɛɲ sửtử sáŋ năj nếʔu cúʔa tʰì cíɲ hãʔi cɛɲluận lấʔi cớ bởʔivì ŋườʔita dã fá zỡ bàntʰờ kủʔa vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita ɣọʔi ɣêdêôn ɣiêzubaɛɲ zằŋ baɛɲ fảʔi cɛɲluận kùŋ ŋườʔi ɣêdêôn kó fá zỡ bàntʰờ kủʔa hếttʰảʔi zân madiən zân ʔamalék ŋườʔi fươŋ Ðôŋ dềʔu lạʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi cũŋ ɣícêên tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmhóʔa ɣêdêôn ŋườʔi tʰổʔi kák ŋườʔi ʔabiêsêzít lạʔi dặŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ saj sứɣiả di xắp manasɛ ŋườʔi manasɛ ɲóm dặŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi saj sứɣiả dến cifáʔi ʔasɛ sabulôn néptali kũŋ di vớʔi ŋườʔi nữʔa ɣêdêôn tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ nếʔucúʔa zùŋ tăj tôʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư lờʔi cúʔa dã fán tʰì tôʔi dể ciên cɔŋ dạp lúʔa nếʔu sươŋ cỉ dóŋ cên ciên kòn dất lạʔi xôzáʔɔ tʰì tôʔi ɲậnbiết cúʔa zùŋ tăj tôʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư cúʔa dã hứʔa vậʔi việk sảʔiza ɲưvậʔi ŋàʔimaj ɣêdêôn zậʔi ciên tʰì sươŋ cảʔi za dầʔi cén nướk ɣêdêôn lạʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ sin kơn tʰạɲ cúʔa cớ nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi cỉ nóʔi nầʔi tʰôʔi sincúʔa dể tôʔi tʰử vớʔi ciên cỉ nầʔi tʰôʔi sin cɔ mộtmìɲ ciên fảʔi xô kòn sươŋ lạʔi dóŋ xắp cên dất cɔŋ dêm dó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưvậʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ ciên tʰì xô kòn xắp cên dất lạʔi sươŋ fủ kwaŋàʔi săw ɣiêzubaɛɲ tứklà ɣêdêôn kả zânsự dồŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu zậʔi di dến dóŋ cạʔi ɣần suốʔi hazốt ziɲ kủʔa madiən fíʔa bắk lốʔi nổŋ môzê cɔŋ cũŋ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ Ðạʔɔ biɲ di tʰeo ŋươʔi lấʔilàm dôŋ kwá cẳŋ fó zân madiən vàʔɔ tăj dâʔu ʔɛ ʔisơzaên dốʔi kùŋ xwej zằŋ tăj tôʔi dã kứʔu tôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ bátáɲ ŋɛ ʔaj ŋườʔi sợhãʔi zunzẩʔi xá cởvề xỏʔi núʔi ɣalaát haj haj ŋàn ŋườʔi cởvề kòn ŋườʔiở lạʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ zân hãʔi kòn dôŋ kwá fảʔi biểʔu cúŋ suốŋ nơʔi nướk zồʔi ŋươʔi tʰử cúŋnó tạʔi dó hễ nàʔɔ fán vớʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ nó xá di vớʔi ŋươʔi tʰì di tʰeo ŋươʔi kòn nàʔɔ fán kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ nó cớ di vớʔi ŋươʔi tʰì dó xôŋ di vậʔi ŋườʔi biểʔu zânsự suốŋ nướk zồʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ fàm nàʔɔ zùŋ lưỡʔi nướk ɲư có nàʔɔ kwì ɣốʔi kúʔi suốŋ ʔuốŋ tʰì ŋươʔi fảʔi dể ziêŋ za số ŋườʔi nướk cɔŋ tăj zồʔi miệŋ bɛcăm kòn lạʔi bawɲiêʔu dềʔu kwì ɣốʔi kúʔi suốŋ ʔuốŋ bấʔizờ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ ta zùŋ bɛcăm ŋườʔi dã nướk dó ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi fó zân madiən vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi kòn zânsự xák ʔainấʔi dềʔu fảʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ ɣêdêôn cɔ kả ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ʔaj cởvề cạʔi nấʔi ɲưŋ ɣiữ lạʔi bɛcăm ŋườʔi kiə cúŋ lấʔi lươŋtʰựk kâʔi cɔŋ tăj vả ziɲ madiən tʰân zướʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ sảʔi cɔŋ dêm dó Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di suốŋ ziɲ madiən dã fó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi kòn nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi di suốŋ dó vớʔi fuza dầʔitớ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi ŋɛ diềʔu cúŋnó nóʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi kảmbiết zằŋ mìɲ kó sứkmạɲ ziɲ cúŋnó vậʔi ɣêdêôn di suốŋ kùŋ fuza dầʔitớ mìɲ dến ɣần nơʔi líɲ kɛɲ dầʔu ziɲ vả zân madiən zân ʔamalék hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi fươŋ Ðôŋ bủʔa za cɔŋ cũŋ dôŋ ɲư kàʔɔkàʔɔ kòn lạkdà kủʔa cúŋnó tʰì dôŋ xáknàʔɔ kát nơʔi cɔŋ lúk ɣêdêôn dến kó ŋườʔi tʰuật diềm ciêmbaw cɔ mìɲ ŋɛ zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi kó diềm ciêmbaw tʰấʔi káʔi báɲ ɲỏ bẳŋ lúʔamạc vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân madiən dến cạʔi dụŋ cɔ cạʔi ŋã lậtŋượk cên zướʔi cạʔi dáɲdổ bọn ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ nàʔɔ xák ɣươm kủʔa ɣêdêôn kɔncaj ɣiôác ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fó madiən kả cạʔi kwân vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi xiɣê dêôn ŋɛ lờʔi tʰuật diềm ciêmbaw nầʔi diềm dó tʰì tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi cởvề cạʔi kwân ʔisơzaên zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi Ðứkzê dã fó cạʔi kwân madiən vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ciə bɛcăm ŋườʔilàm dộʔi fát cɔ mỗʔi ɲữŋ bìɲ xôŋ duốk cɔŋ bìɲ zặn zằŋ hãʔi ŋó ʔiɲư xi dến dầʔu cạʔi kwân kák ŋươʔi tʰeo diềʔu xi ɲữŋ tʰeo tʰổʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi kũŋ tʰổʔi xắp suŋkwɛɲ cạʔi kwân zeo zằŋ vìÐứkzê ɣêdêôn ɣêdêôn mộtcăm kwân tʰeo ŋườʔi di dến dầʔu cạʔi kwân vàʔɔ lúk kɛɲ hồʔi mớʔi zaw kɛɲ cúŋ tʰổʔi dập bìɲ kầm nơʔi tăj bấʔizờ dộʔi kwân tʰổʔi dập bìɲ tăj kầm duốk tăj hữʔu dặŋ tʰổʔi dɔạn kấttiếŋ zeo zằŋ ɣươm kủʔa Ðứkzê kủʔa ɣêdêôn cúŋ dứŋ vâʔi kwɛɲ cạʔi kwân ʔaj kứ cỗ nấʔi kả cạʔi kwân cạʔi kấttiếŋ cốn di bɛcăm ŋườʔi kứ tʰổʔi xắp cạʔi kwân Ðứkzê xiến cở ɣươm kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi cém mìɲ Ðạʔɔ biɲ cạʔi cốn dến bếtsita hướŋ sêzêza cɔdến bờkõʔi ʔabênmêhôla ɣần tabát ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên tứk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cifáʔi néptali ʔasɛ manasɛ lạʔi duổʔi tʰeo zân madiən bấʔizờ ɣêdêôn saj vàʔɔ xắp núʔi zaim dặŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi suốŋ dón zân madiən cận dườŋ cúŋnó kwa sôŋ cɔdến bếtbaza kák cỗ kạn kủʔa ɣiôdɛɲ vậʔi kák ŋườʔi zaim lạʔi ciếm kák cɔdến bếtbaza kùŋ ɲữŋ cỗ kạn kủʔa ɣiôdɛɲ cúŋ kũŋ dượk haj kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân madiən zép sêép ɣiết zép tạʔi nơʔi dá zép sêép tạʔi nơʔi máʔi zượʔu sêép Ðʔɔạn duổʔi tʰeo zân madiən kùŋ dɛm dầʔu zép dầʔu sêép dến ɣêdêôn fíʔa kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ŋườʔi zaim nóʔi kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ vìsaw ôŋ dã dãʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲưvậʔi xi ôŋ di zawciến kùŋzân madiən saw xôŋ ɣọʔi cúŋtôʔi di vớʔi cúŋ kãʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kác zữzộʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dáp kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ sáɲ vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi kó dượk diềʔu ci sự ɲɔ kủʔa zaim cẳŋ mùʔa ɣặt ɲɔ kủʔa ʔabiêsɛ saw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fó zép sêép haj kwan cưởŋ zân madiən vàʔɔ tăj ʔɛɲɛm Ðʔɛm sáɲ vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi nàʔɔ kó dượk diềʔu ɣì xi ŋườʔi nóʔi lờʔi ấʔi zồʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa cúŋ ŋuôʔi ɣêdêôn di tớʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ saŋ kwa kùŋ bɛcăm ŋuờʔi dồŋ tʰeo mìɲ zẫʔu mệtɲọk kũŋ kứ zượt tʰeo kwân ŋịc ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋzân sukốt zằŋ ta sin kák ŋươʔi hãʔi kấp mộtvàʔi báɲ cɔ zân tʰeo cúŋ mệtɲọk dươŋ duổʔi tʰeo sêbác sɛɲmuna haj vwa madiən ɲưŋ kák kwan cưởŋ sukốt dáp zằŋ cớ tʰì ôŋ dã kầm nơʔi tăj mìɲ kườm tăj kủʔa sêbác sɛɲmuna cưʔa cúŋtôʔi fảʔi kấp báɲ cɔ dạʔɔ biɲ ôŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ tʰếtʰì xi Ðứkzê dã fó sêbác sɛɲmuna vàʔɔ tăj lấʔi côŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɲáɲ ɣaj dáɲ tʰịt kák ŋươʔi từ dó ŋườʔi di dến fênuên kũŋ nóʔi mộtkác ấʔi vớʔi zân fênêên zânfê dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi ʔiɲư zân sukốt dã dáp vậʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ nóʔi vớʔi zân fênuên zằŋ xi cởvề bìɲan fáhủʔi káʔi tʰáp nầʔi sêbác sɛɲmuna lạʔi kạtkô vớʔi kwânbiɲ mìɲ cừŋ mườʔilăm ŋàn ŋườʔi kòn lạʔi cɔŋ dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa kák ŋườʔi fươŋ Ðôŋ mộtcăm haimươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm dã ɣiết ɣêdêôn di tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ zân zướʔi cạʔi tạʔi hướŋ dôŋ nôbác ɣiôbêha dáɲbạʔi dạʔɔ biɲ tưởŋ zằŋ mìɲ bìɲan xisê bác sɛɲmuna cạʔi cốn ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo dượk haj vwa madiən sêbác sɛɲmuna dáɲ kả dạʔɔ biɲ cạʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣêdêôn kɔncaj ɣiôác cận cởvề kwa zốk hêzɛ dứʔa kɔn caicẻ sukốt cahỏʔi zồʔi xaj ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa sukốt dượk bảʔi mươʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi kế dó ŋườʔi dến kùŋzân sukốt nóʔi zằŋ nầʔisê bác sɛɲmuna kák ŋươʔi dã mắŋ zằŋ cớ tʰì ôŋ dã kầm kườm tăj sêbác sɛɲmuna nơʔi tăj mìɲ cưʔa cúŋtôʔi fảʔi kấp báɲ cɔ zân mệtɲọk kủʔa ôŋ vậʔi ŋườʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ lấʔi côŋɣaj nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ dáɲ fạt ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sukốt kũŋ fáhủʔi tʰáp fênuên ɣiết ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ sêbác sɛɲmuna zằŋ kák ŋườʔi kiəmà haj ŋươʔi dã ɣiết tạʔi tʰabô làmsaw haj vwa dáp cúŋnó kũŋɲư ŋươʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu kó hìɲvók ɲư hɔàŋtử ŋườʔi Ấʔilà ʔɛɲɛm kɔn kủʔa kwảtʰật cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề nếʔu haj ŋươʔi dã dể ʔɛɲɛm sốŋ tʰì năj xôŋ ɣiết haj ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣêdêôn nóʔi kùŋ ɣiêtʰɛ kɔn dầʔulòŋ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɣiết di ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẻ cẳŋ zút ɣươm za ŋườʔi kòn tʰiếʔuniên sêbác sɛɲmuna nóʔi cáɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dáɲ cúŋta di ŋườʔi tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì sứk tʰể ấʔi ɣêdêôn cổʔi zậʔi ɣiết sêbác sɛɲmuna dɔạn lấʔi dồ caŋsứk hìɲɲư căŋlưỡʔiliềm nơʔi kổ lạkdà kủʔa haj vwa bấʔizờ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ ɣêdêôn zằŋ sin ôŋ kɔncaj cáʔu ôŋ hãʔi kwảncị cúŋtôʔi ôŋ dã ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi tăj zân madiən ɲưŋɣê dêôn dáp kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ta cẳŋ kwảncị kák ŋươʔi kɔncaj kũŋ xôŋ kwảncị kák ŋươʔi dâʔu Ðứkzê kwảncị kák ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn ɣêdêôn nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ta cỉ sin kák ŋươʔi diềʔu nầʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zaw ɲữŋ vòŋ mìɲ dã dɔạt lấʔi vả kwân ŋịc kó ɲữŋ vòŋ vàŋ cúŋnó zân Íc cúŋ dáp cúŋtôʔi sẵnlòŋ zaw cɔ ôŋ họ cảʔi áʔɔtơʔi za zồʔi hếttʰảʔi dềʔu vàʔɔ dó ɲữŋ vòŋ kủʔa mìɲ dã dɔạt lấʔi ɲữŋ vòŋ vàŋ ɣêdêôn dã sin kân dượk mộtŋàn bảʔicăm siếk vàŋ xôŋ ɲữŋ dồ caŋsứk hìɲɲư căŋlưỡʔiliềm hwataj áʔɔ sắk diềʔu kủʔa vwa madiən tʰườŋ mặk kùŋ ɲữŋ kiềŋ nơʔi kổ lạkdà ɣêdêôn lấʔi dó káʔi fót dể cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ tạʔi ʔɔùpza kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu kúŋ tʰờ káʔi fót dó cởtʰàɲ káʔi bẫʔi cɔ ɣêdêôn kả ɲà ŋườʔi zânma diən fụk cướk zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kất dầʔu dượk nữʔa cɔŋ dờʔi ɣêdêôn sứ dượk hòʔabìɲ cọn mươʔi ɣiêzubaɛɲ kɔncaj ɣiôác cởvề cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ vả ɣêdêôn sɛɲ dượk bảʔi mươʔi kɔncaj ŋườʔi kó ɲiềʔu vợlẽ ŋườʔiở tạʔi sicɛm kũŋ sɛɲ cɔ ŋươʔi kɔncaj dặt ʔabimêlék Ðʔɔạn ɣêdêôn kɔncaj ɣiôác kwadờʔi tuổʔiták dã kaw dượk côn cɔŋ kủʔa ɣiôác ca ŋườʔi tạʔi ʔɔùpza tʰàɲ kủʔa zân ʔabiêsêzít săw xi ɣêdêôn kwadờʔi zân ʔisơzaên cởlạʔi hàɲ zâm kùŋ kák baɛɲ cọn baɛɲbêzít tʰần ɲưvậʔi zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ ɲớ dến ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ Ðấŋ dã ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi tăj kủʔa kák tʰùŋịc cuŋkwɛɲ kũŋ xôŋ kó lòŋ tʰảʔɔ cút nàʔɔ vớʔi ɲà ɣiêzubaɛɲ ɣêdêôn kák ŋườʔi dã cɔ ʔisơzaên ʔabimêlék kɔncaj ɣiêzubaɛɲ saŋ kwa sicɛm dếnkùŋ kák kậʔu kả ɲà ôŋ ŋɔạʔi mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ sin kák ôŋ hãʔi hỏʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi sicɛm nóʔi zằŋ hɔặk tấtkả bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi kɔncaj ɣiêzubaɛɲ kaicị cên kák ŋươʔi hɔặk cỉ ŋườʔilàm vwa kủʔa kák ŋươʔi diềʔu nàʔɔlà kũŋ hãʔi ɲớ zằŋ dồŋ kốtɲụk vớʔi kák ŋươʔi kák kậʔu ŋườʔi nóʔi ɣiùm ŋườʔi dɛm kák lờʔi nầʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân sicɛm ŋɛ lòŋ cúŋ ŋiêŋ ʔabimêlék cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm cúŋ cɔ ŋườʔi bảʔi mươʔi miếŋ bạk kủʔa miếʔu baɛɲbêzít ʔabimêlék lấʔi bạk dó ɲữŋ bạʔihɔạʔi hwaŋdàŋ di tʰeo mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi di dến ɲà ca mìɲ tạʔi ʔɔùpza cên dá ɣiết kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tứk ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzubaɛɲ bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ ɣiôtʰam kɔn kủʔa ɣiêzubaɛɲ kòn sốŋ bởʔivì càŋ mìɲ bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sicɛm ɲóm vớʔi kả milô di dến kâʔi zẻ biə dá tạʔi sicɛm ʔabimêlék vwa ɣiôtʰam hăj dặŋ diềʔu dó di dứŋ cên cót núʔi ɣazisim kấttiếŋ zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi sicɛm hãʔi ŋɛ ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɛ kák ŋươʔi kák kâʔicốʔi dềʔu di dặŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ vwa kaicị cúŋnó cúŋnó nóʔi kùŋ kâʔi livɛ zằŋ hãʔi kaicị cúŋtôʔi kâʔi livɛ dáp ta zầʔuta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dềʔu tônviɲ dặŋ di sawdộŋ cên kák kâʔicốʔi kák kâʔicốʔi lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ kâʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến kaicị cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ kâʔi dáp zằŋ ta ŋọt ŋɔn cáʔi tươʔitốt dặŋ di sawdộŋ cên kák kâʔicốʔi Ðʔɔạn kák kâʔicốʔi nóʔi kùŋ kâʔi ɲɔ zằŋ hãʔi dến kaicị cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ kâʔi ɲɔ dáp ta zượʔu ŋɔn tʰứ cɔ vuj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔita dặŋ di sawdộŋ cên kák kâʔicốʔi bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi kâʔicốʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣajɣók zằŋ hãʔi dến kaicị cúŋtôʔi ɣajɣók dáp kùŋ kák kâʔicốʔi zằŋ nếʔu bởʔi lòŋ cơn tʰật kák ŋươʔi sứk zầʔuta vwa kák ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi dến zướʔi bóŋ bằŋxôŋ ŋwiện lửʔa za ɣaj tʰiêʔu kâʔi hươŋ liban di bâʔizờ kó fảʔi kák ŋươʔi kưsử cơn tʰật kôŋbìɲ ʔabimêlék vwa căŋ kák ŋươʔi kó hậʔudãʔi ɣiêzubaɛɲ ɲà ŋườʔi căŋ kó báʔɔdáp diềʔu ŋườʔi dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi căŋ vì ca kó cɛɲ ciến cɔ kák ŋươʔi liềʔumìɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj zân madiən ɲưŋ ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi lạʔi zấʔi kùŋ ɲà ca dã ɣiết cên dá kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi ʔabimêlék kɔncaj kủʔa kɔndòʔi ŋườʔi vwa kủʔa zân sicɛm ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi vậʔi víbằŋ ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi kó lấʔi cơn tʰật cáɲ cựk dãʔi ɣiêzubaɛɲ ɲà ŋườʔi tʰì ʔabimêlék xá vuimừŋ nơʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi vuimừŋ nơʔi bằŋ cẳŋ ŋwiện lửʔa za ʔabimêlék tʰiêʔu ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sicɛm kùŋ milô ŋwiện lửʔa za ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sicɛm kùŋ milô tʰiêʔu ʔabimêlék Ðʔɔạn ɣiôtʰam cốn di ẩnnáʔu tạʔi bêzê dó ʔabimêlék ʔɛɲ mìɲ ʔabimêlék kaicị ʔisơzaên cɔŋ Ðʔɔạn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj dến áktʰần sɛɲ bấtbìɲ ɣiữʔa ʔabimêlék ŋườʔi sicɛm ŋườʔi sicɛm fảnŋịc kùŋ ʔabimêlék dể báʔɔtʰù tộʔi ɲơn dã fạm kùŋ bảʔi mươʔi kɔncaj ɣiêzubaɛɲ xiến hwiết dổ lạʔi cên ʔabimêlék ʔɛɲ dã ɣiết kùŋ dổ cên ŋườʔi sicɛm dã ɣiúp ɣiết ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔisi cɛm saj mấʔi di zìɲzập ŋườʔi cên cót núʔi cúŋnó kướp ɣiựt ɲữŋ di kwa dườŋ ɣần cúŋnó ʔabimêlék hăj dượk diềʔu dó bấʔizờ ɣaɛɲ kɔncaj kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dến vàʔɔ cɔŋ sicɛm ŋườʔi sicɛm dềʔu dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi ŋườʔi zồʔi cúŋ za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ háʔi ɲữŋ ɲɔ kủʔa mìɲ dạp cáʔi ɲɔ zự tiệk ʔiến Ðʔɔạn vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa tʰần cúŋ ʔuốŋ zồʔi zủʔasả ʔabimêlék ɣaɛɲ kɔncaj nóʔi zằŋ ʔabimêlék ʔaj sicɛm ci cúŋta fụk ʔabimêlék hắn cẳŋ fảʔi kɔncaj ɣiêzubaɛɲ saw kònsê cẳŋ fảʔi fụtá kák ŋươʔi xá fụk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hêmô ca kủʔa sicɛm kòn cúŋta saw lạʔi fụk nếʔu kó zânsự nầʔi zướʔi tăj duổʔi ʔabimêlék di Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔabimêlék zằŋ hãʔi zatăŋ kwânlíɲ ŋươʔi za cận sêbun kwan kaj tʰàɲ ŋɛ dượk kák lờʔi kủʔa ɣaɛɲ kɔncaj nóʔi tʰì kơn ɣiận ŋườʔi fừŋ saj dến ʔabimêlék nóʔi zằŋ nầʔiɣa ʔɛɲ kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm dã dến sicɛm sujzụk tʰàɲ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ôŋ vậʔi dêm năj ôŋ kák ŋườʔi tʰeo ôŋ fảʔi cổʔi zậʔi di fụkbiɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ sáŋmaj xi mặtcờʔi mọk ôŋ fảʔi zậʔi sôŋ tʰàɲ xiɣa ʔɛɲ kwân tʰeo za dáɲ ôŋ tʰì ôŋ hãʔi tùʔicơ vậʔi ʔabimêlék kả dạʔɔ biɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu cổʔi zậʔi bandêm ciə za dộʔi majfụk ɣần sicɛm ɣaɛɲ kɔncaj kéʔɔ za dứŋ tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ ʔabimêlék kả dạʔɔ biɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi di za xỏʔi nơʔi fụk ɣaɛɲ tʰấʔi dạʔɔ biɲ ấʔi nóʔi kùŋ sêbun zằŋ ta tʰấʔi dạʔɔ biɲ cên cót núʔi suốŋ sêbun dáp ŋườʔi tʰấʔi bóŋ núʔi tưởŋ ŋườʔita dó cớ ɲưŋɣa ʔɛɲ lạʔi zằŋ kwảtʰật kơ biɲ cên núʔi suốŋ dộʔi zɔ dườŋ kâʔi zẻ tʰuậtsĩ dến sêbun zằŋ cíɲ ŋươʔi dã nóʔi ʔabimêlék ʔaj fụk vậʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi xwejxwaŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi dó dã zasaw cẳŋ fảʔi dạʔɔ biɲ ŋườʔi xiɲzể bâʔizờ xá di za zawciến kùŋ cúŋnó ɣaɛɲ dứŋ dầʔu kák ŋườʔi sicɛm di za zawciến kùŋ ʔabimêlék ɣaɛɲ ʔabimêlék duổʔi tʰeo cạʔi cốn cướk ŋườʔi ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi bịtʰươŋ ŋã cết zọk dườŋ cɔdến kửʔa tʰàɲ ʔabimêlék diở tạʔi ʔazuma kònsê duổʔi ɣaɛɲ ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi di xôŋ cɔ tạʔi sicɛm nữʔa kwaŋàʔi săw zânsự di za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kó ŋườʔi dɛm dó cɔ ʔabimêlék hăj ŋườʔi kơ biɲ mìɲ ciə za dộʔi dể majfụk ŋɔàʔi dồŋ xi tʰấʔi zânsự tʰàɲ kéʔɔ za ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi dáɲ cúŋnó Ðʔɔạn ʔabimêlék ɲữŋ di tʰeo dến cướk zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kòn haj dộʔi kiə sôŋ vàʔɔ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở ŋɔàʔi dồŋ dáɲ ɣiết ʔabimêlék dáɲ tʰàɲ cọn ŋàʔi ciếm lấʔi ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở cɔŋ zồʔi fá tʰàɲ zắk muốʔi dó ŋɛ nầʔi hếttʰảʔi zânsự tʰáp sicɛm dềʔu zút cɔŋ dồn kủʔa miếʔu tʰần bêzít ŋườʔita dɛm cɔ ʔabimêlék hăj zằŋ hếttʰảʔi zânsự tʰáp sicɛm dềʔu lạʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dồn ʔabimêlék di núʔi sɛɲmôn vớʔi kả dạʔɔ biɲ tʰeo mìɲ ŋườʔi kầm lấʔi nơʔi tăj káʔi zìʔu cặt ɲáɲ kâʔi dỡ vák cên vaj zồʔi nóʔi kùŋ kwân tʰeo mìɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔi diềʔu căŋ hãʔi măw măw ɲư vậʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cặt ɲáɲ kâʔi zồʔi di tʰeo ʔabimêlék họ zựŋ ɲáɲ kâʔi dó nơʔi dồn câm lửʔa vàʔɔ tʰiêʔu dồn kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ ɲưvậʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở tʰáp sicɛm dềʔu cết ướk mộtŋàn ʔabimêlék di dáɲ tʰêbết vâʔi ciếm lấʔi ɣiữʔa tʰàɲfố kó káʔi tʰáp vữŋbền hếttʰảʔi zânsự kủʔa tʰàɲ dềʔu cạʔi tạʔi dó dóŋkửʔa lạʔi zồʔi cên dỉɲ tʰáp ʔabimêlék tấntớʔi tʰáp sôŋ dilạʔi ɣần kửʔa dặŋ fóŋỏʔa ɲưŋ ŋườʔi tʰớt kốʔi cên dầʔu ʔabimêlék ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kêʔu ɣã caicẻ kầm biɲxí hầʔu mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi zút ɣươm ŋươʔi za ɣiết di kẻʔɔ ŋườʔita nóʔi ŋườʔi dờn dã ɣiết ŋườʔi vậʔi ɣã caicẻ dâm ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi cết xi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi ʔabimêlék dã cết tʰì mỗʔi ŋườʔi divề ɲà mìɲ ɲưvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi báʔɔứŋ ʔabimêlék tộʔiák dã fạm kùŋ ca mìɲ ɣiết bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ báʔɔứŋ zân sicɛm mọʔi diềʔu ák cúŋnó sự zủʔasả kủʔa ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj ɣiêzubaɛɲ ứŋŋiệm cên cúŋnó ɲưvậʔi săw ʔabimêlék tʰôla kɔncaj fu ʔa cáʔu dô ŋườʔi ʔisaka zấʔi dặŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên ŋườʔiở tạʔi samiə cɔŋ núʔi zaim kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên haimươʔi zồʔi tʰák dượk côn tạʔi samiə săw ŋườʔi ấʔi kó zajzơ ŋườʔi ɣalaát zấʔi kwan sét ʔisơzaên cɔŋ haimươʔihaj ŋườʔi kó bamươʔi kɔncaj kỡʔi bamươʔi lừʔa kɔn kó bamươʔi káʔi tʰàɲ tạʔi sứ ɣalaát ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔita kũŋ kòn ɣọʔi tʰôn zajzơ xizaj zơ tʰák tʰì dượk côn tạʔi xamôn kế ấʔi zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê fụk ɲữŋ baɛɲ kùŋ kák tʰần sizi kák tʰần sidôn kák tʰần môáp kák tʰàɲ ŋườʔi ʔammôn kák tʰần kủʔa zân filitin cúŋ lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê xôŋ fụk ŋàʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi ʔammôn kể dó haj zântộk nầʔi cà zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ sứ ʔamôzít tạʔi ɣalaát cà cɔŋ mườʔitám zânam kũŋ saŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dáɲ zuda bêŋiəmin ɲà zaim ʔisơzaên kơn hɔạnnạn lớnlaw vậʔi bấʔizờ zân ʔisơzaên kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi dã lìʔabỏ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi hầʔu việk kák tʰần baɛɲ ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ta cẳŋ kó ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi zân zíptô xỏʔi zân ʔamôzít xỏʔi zân ʔammôn xỏʔi zân filitin saw lạʔi xi zân sidôn zân ʔamalék zân maôn kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi kó kêʔukầʔu kùŋ dã ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj cúŋnó ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi dã lìʔabỏ hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák bởʔi dó cɔnên xôŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi nữʔa hãʔi di kêʔukầʔu ɲữŋ tʰần kák ŋươʔi dã cọn cúŋnó xá ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn zân ʔisơzaên tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã fạmtộʔi sincúʔa hãʔi dãʔi cúŋtôʔi tʰeo diềʔu cúʔa cɔ tốtlàɲ cỉ sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔinăj họ kất xỏʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ kák tʰần zồʔi cởlạʔi fụk Ðứkzê lòŋ ŋàʔi buồnzầʔu xốnxổ kủʔa ʔisơzaên zânam ɲóm lạʔi dóŋ cạʔi cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát zân ʔisơzaên kũŋ ɲóm lạʔi dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi mícba zânsự kák kwan cưởŋ sứ ɣalaát hỏʔi ɲăw zằŋ ʔaj ŋườʔi xởʔidầʔu za dáɲ zân ʔammôn ŋườʔi dó kwan cưởŋ hếttʰảʔi zân ɣalaát ɣiéptʰê ŋườʔi ɣalaát tăj zõŋ kɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi ca ɣalaát vợ kủʔa ɣalaát kó sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ kɔncaj xi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ấʔi duổʔi ɣiéptʰê di zằŋ mầʔi xôŋ dượk fần zatàʔi cɔŋ ɲà ca cúŋta mầʔi kɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn xák vậʔi ɣiéptʰê cốn sa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔŋ sứ tóp kó ɲữŋ dứʔa zudãŋ lạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ɣiéptʰê di za vớʔi ŋườʔi săw ítlâʔu zân ʔammôn zawciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên cɔŋ lúk zân ʔammôn dáɲ ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣalaát di dɛm ɣiéptʰê sứ tóp họ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi dến kwan tướŋ cúŋta cúŋta dáɲ zân ʔammôn ɲưŋzép tʰê dáp kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣalaát zằŋ kák ôŋ cẳŋ fảʔi ɣét tôʔi duổʔi tôʔi xỏʔi ɲà ca tôʔi saw kòn bâʔizờ kák ôŋ dươŋ kùŋ xốn saw lạʔi dến tôʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣalaát dáp kùŋ ɣiéptʰê zằŋ bâʔizờ cúŋta lạʔi dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi di vớʔi cúŋta ŋươʔi dáɲ zân ʔammôn zồʔi làmdầʔu kủʔa cúŋta kủʔa hếttʰảʔi zân sứ ɣalaát ɣiéptʰê lạʔi dáp kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣalaát zằŋ víbằŋ kák ôŋ dɛm tôʔi dặŋ dáɲ zân ʔammôn nếʔu Ðứkzê fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi tôʔi làmdầʔu kák ôŋ cớ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣalaát nóʔi kùŋ ɣiéptʰê zằŋ cúŋta ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋươʔi dã nóʔi ŋwiện Ðứkzê làmcứŋ ɣiữʔa cúŋta vậʔi ɣiéptʰê di kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ɣalaát zânsự ŋườʔi làmdầʔu tướŋ zồʔi tạʔi mícba ɣiéptʰê lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi ŋườʔi dã nóʔi Ðʔɔạŋiép tʰê saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ vwa zân ʔammôn nóʔi zằŋ ta vớʔi ŋươʔi kó việk ci ŋươʔi kéʔɔ dến dặŋ dáɲ sứ vwa zân ʔammôn dáp kùŋ sứɣiả ɣiéptʰê zằŋ Ấʔi bởʔi ʔisơzaên xi za xỏʔi nướk zíptô kó ciếm lấʔi sứ ʔaï cɔdến zabốk ɣiôdɛɲ bâʔizờ hãʔi cả lạʔi sứ ấʔi cɔ ɣiéptʰê lạʔi saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ vwa zân ʔammôn nóʔi zằŋ ɣiéptʰê nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó sâm dɔạt dịʔafận môáp kũŋ cẳŋ kó ciếm lấʔi sứ kủʔa zân ʔammôn sɔŋ xi ʔisơzaên za sứ zíptô tʰì di ŋaŋ kwa dồŋ vắŋ cɔdến biển dỏ zồʔi tớʔi kadɛ bấʔizờ ŋườʔi saj sứɣiả dến vwa dôm dặŋ tâʔu zằŋ sin cɔ tôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sứ vwa ɲưŋ vwa dôm xôŋ bằŋlòŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ saj sứɣiả dến vwa môáp vwa môáp kũŋ xôŋ xứŋ cɔ ʔisơzaên kứ tạʔi kadɛ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi lạʔi di vàʔɔ dồŋ vắŋ vòŋkwɛɲ sứ dôm sứ môáp zồʔi dến kõʔi fíʔa dôŋ sứ môáp ŋườʔi cạʔi kiə ʔaï xôŋ vàʔɔ bờkõʔi môáp ʔaï ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa sứ môáp zốt lạʔi ʔisơzaên saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ sihôn vwa ŋườʔi ʔamôzít tạʔi bếtʰôn zặn nóʔi zằŋ sin dể cɔ cúŋtôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa sứ vwa dặŋ dến sứ cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋsi xôŋ dủ zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ cɔ di ŋaŋ kwa sứ mìɲ lạʔi kả kơ biɲ mìɲ kéʔɔ dến dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zahát cốŋ dấʔu kùŋ ʔisơzaên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fó sihôn kả kơ biɲ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj ʔisơzaên ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi cúŋnó lấʔi tɔàn sứ zân ʔamôzít zân dó vậʔi ʔisơzaên ɲận dượk tɔàn sứ zân ʔamôzít ʔaï cɔdến zabốk dồŋ vắŋ cɔdến ɣiôdɛɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã duổʔi zân ʔamôzít xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi zồʔi tʰì ŋươʔi lạʔi ciếm lấʔi sứ kủʔa saw ŋươʔi cẳŋ ɲận dượk dất kêmốt tʰần kủʔa ŋươʔi dã cɔ ŋươʔi saw tʰếtʰì cúŋta kũŋ ɲận dượk dất kủʔa ɲữŋ nàʔɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk cúŋta vảlạʔi ŋươʔi cɔ cổʔi balák kɔncaj sếpbô vwa môáp căŋ hắn kóxi nàʔɔ kãʔicọ hăjlà ciếndấʔu kùŋ ʔisơzaên căŋ Ðươŋ lúk bɛcăm ʔisơzaên tạʔi hếtbôn kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt ʔazô ʔɛ kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt kùŋ hếttʰảʔi kák tʰàɲ zọk tʰeo ʔaï saw ŋươʔi xôŋ lấʔi lạʔi cɔŋ xi dó vậʔi xôŋ kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi dã kwấʔi kùŋ dáɲ ŋwiệnÐứkzê Ðấŋ dɔán sét ŋàʔinăj sétdɔán ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên zân ʔammôn ɲưŋ vwa zân ʔammôn xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa ɣiéptʰê saj nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ ɣiéptʰê ŋườʔi cảʔi kwa ɣalaát manasɛ saŋ dến mícba ɣalaát zồʔi mícba ɣalaát ŋườʔi di dáɲ zân ʔammôn ɣiéptʰê xẩn ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ nếʔuŋàʔi fó zân ʔammôn vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi xi tôʔi tʰắŋ cúŋnó cởvề ci kửʔɛɲà tôʔi di za dầʔu dặŋ dónzướk tôʔi tʰì nấʔi tʰuộk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu Ðʔɔạn ɣiéptʰê di dến zân ʔammôn dặŋ zawciến kùŋ cúŋnó Ðứkzê fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dáɲbạʔi cúŋnó ʔazô ʔɛ cɔdến minít cɔdến ʔabênkêzamim kùŋ ciếm lấʔi kủʔa cúŋnó haimươʔi káʔi tʰàɲ Ấʔilà cận bạʔi zất zân ʔammôn fụk cướk zân ʔisơzaên ɣiéptʰê cởvề ɲà mìɲ tạʔi mícba kìʔa kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi za dón zướk ŋườʔi kó kầm cốŋ ɲỏ ɲảʔimúʔa nàŋ kɔnmột kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋɔàʔi nàŋ cẳŋ kó kɔncaj hɔặk kɔŋáʔi nàʔɔ xák ɣiéptʰê vừʔa tʰấʔi nàŋ sé áʔɔ mìɲ zằŋ kɔn tʰanôʔi kɔn ɣâʔi cɔ ca tứktốʔi kwá tʰăj kɔn tʰuộk vàʔɔ zốʔi ca vì ca kó mởmiệŋ xấn ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ tʰế nuốtlờʔi nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ ca ôʔi nếʔu ca kó mởmiệŋ xấn ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê sin hãʔi cɔ kɔn ʔiɲư lờʔi za xỏʔi miệŋ ca bâʔizờ Ðứkzê dã báʔɔtʰù kừʔudịc ca zồʔi tứklà zân ʔammôn Ðʔɔạn nàŋ lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ ca mìɲ zằŋ sin ca hãʔi ɲậm cɔ kɔn lờʔi nầʔi cɔ kɔn tʰɔŋtʰả cɔŋ haj tʰáŋ kɔn diở cên núʔi dặŋ kùŋ cịʔɛm kɔn xók dồŋciɲ kủʔa kɔn ɣiéptʰê dáp zằŋ kɔn kứ di zồʔi ŋườʔi dể nàŋ di haj tʰáŋ vậʔi nàŋ di kùŋ cịʔɛm mìɲ xók dồŋciɲ mìɲ tạʔi cên núʔi kuốʔi haj tʰáŋ nàŋ cởvề ca mìɲ ŋườʔilàm cɔ nàŋ tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi xấn ŋwiện mìɲ dã hứʔa nàŋ cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi tạʔi kớ dó cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kó tʰườŋlệ nầʔi mỗʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ʔisơzaên di tʰanxók kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ɣiéptʰê ŋườʔi ɣalaát cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi zaim ɲóm dến tạʔi safôn nóʔi kùŋ ɣiéptʰê zằŋ vìsaw ŋươʔi di dáɲ zân ʔammôn xôŋ ɣọʔi cúŋta di vớʔi cúŋta dốt ɲàŋươʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi ɣiéptʰê dáp zằŋ ta zânsự kó kuộk cɛɲ kạɲ zất vớʔi zân ʔammôn xi kêʔu kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi tăj cúŋnó tʰấʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dến tiếpkứʔu tʰì dã liềʔumìɲ di dáɲ zân ʔammôn Ðứkzê dã fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj vậʔi saw ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi dến dặŋ cɛɲ ciến kùŋ kế ấʔi ɣiéptʰê lạʔi hếttʰảʔi zân ɣalaát zawciến kùŋ zaim ŋườʔiɣa dáɲbạʔi ŋườʔi zaim nóʔi zằŋ zân ɣalaát ɣiữʔa zaim manasɛ kák ŋươʔi cỉ cốncáɲ kủʔa zaim dó tʰôʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ɣalaát sâmciếm ɲữŋ cỗ kạn sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cướk xi ŋườʔi zaim dến dó và xi ŋườʔi cốn nàʔɔ kủʔa zaim nóʔi zằŋ sin dể cɔ tôʔi di kwa tʰì ŋườʔi ɣalaát nóʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kó fảʔi ŋườʔi zaim căŋ ŋườʔi dáp xôŋ cúŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ tʰếtʰì hãʔi nóʔi sibôlết ŋườʔi nóʔi sibôlết xôŋ tʰế nóʔi cɔ zõ dượk cúŋ ɣiết di tạʔicỗ kạn kủʔa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ lúk dó kó mươʔi haj ŋàn ŋườʔi zaim cết ɣiéptʰê ŋườʔi ɣalaát kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên dượk sáʔu Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi kwadờʔi dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ sứ ɣalaát săw ŋườʔi kó ʔiếpsan bếtlêhɛm kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi kó bamươʔi kɔncaj bamươʔi kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi ɣả kák kɔŋáʔi za ŋɔàʔi ɲà mìɲ kướʔi bamươʔi kɔŋáʔi ŋɔàʔi cɔ kɔncaj mìɲ ŋườʔilàm kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên dượk bảʔi Ðʔɔạn ʔiếpsan kwadờʔi dượk côn bếtlêhɛm săwiếp kó ŋườʔi sabulôn kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên fánsét ʔisơzaên cɔŋ mườʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi sabulôn kwadờʔi dượk côn tạʔi ʔazalôn cɔŋ dất cifáʔi sabulôn săw kó dôn kɔncaj hilên ŋườʔi fizatʰôn kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi kó mươʔi kɔncaj bamươʔi cáʔu caj cúŋnó dềʔu kỡʔi bảʔi mươʔi lừʔa kɔn ŋườʔi fánsét ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn dôn kɔncaj hilên ŋườʔi fizatʰôn kwadờʔi dượk côn tạʔi fizatʰôn sứ zaim cên núʔi zân ʔamalék zân ʔisơzaên kứ diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin cọn mươʔi vả kó ŋườʔi sôzê ʔa tʰuộk họhàŋ kủʔa cifáʔi Ðʔan manô ʔa ŋườʔi sɔn xôŋ kó kɔn tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi zằŋ kìʔa ŋươʔi sɔnsẻ xôŋ kó kɔn ɲưŋ ŋươʔi tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ dứʔa kɔncaj vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi kẩntʰận cớ ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà ci săj kũŋ dừŋ ɣì cẳŋ sạc ŋườʔi kó ŋén sɛɲ dứʔa kɔncaj zawkạʔɔ xôŋ dưʔa kwa dầʔu bởʔivì dứʔa cẻ cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi nasizê cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi săw ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên xỏʔi tăj zân filitin ŋườʔi dờn di tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ cồŋ mìɲ zằŋ một ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dếnkùŋ tôʔi ziệnmạʔɔ ŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ziệnmạʔɔ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất dáŋ kíɲ dáŋsợ tôʔi xôŋ zám hỏʔi ŋườʔiở dâʔu ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋ cɔbiết ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kó nóʔi kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ kìʔa ŋươʔi tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ dứʔa caj vậʔi bâʔizờ cớ ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà ci săj kũŋ dừŋ ɣì cẳŋ sạc dứʔa cẻ dó cɔŋ lòŋ cɔdến ŋàʔi kwadờʔi ŋườʔi nasizê cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi manô ʔa kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê zằŋ Ôʔi cúʔa sin cúʔa cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa dã saj suốŋ lạʔi dếnkùŋ cúŋtôʔi dặŋ zạʔi cúŋtôʔi diềʔu fảʔi cɔ dứʔa cẻ sɛɲ za Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲậm lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa manô ʔa tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi dờn dươŋ xi ŋồʔi cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ kòn manô ʔa cồŋ nàŋ xôŋ kó tạʔi dó vớʔi nàŋ ŋườʔi dờn cạʔi di tʰuật cɔ cồŋ zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi dã dếnkùŋ tôʔi ŋàʔi năj lạʔi dến manô ʔa dứŋzậʔi di tʰeo mìɲ xi dến ɣần ŋườʔi dó tʰì nóʔi zằŋ Ôŋ kó fảʔi ŋườʔi dã nóʔi kùŋ dờn nầʔi căŋ ŋườʔi dáp Ấʔilà manô ʔa xi lờʔi ôŋ ứŋŋiệm tʰì dứʔa cẻ fảʔi ɣiữ tʰeo nàʔɔ fảʔi làmsaw tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ manô ʔa zằŋ ŋườʔi dờn fảʔi kiêŋkữ mọʔi diềʔu dã zặn nàŋ cớ ɣì kủʔa ɲɔ cớ ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà ci ʔuốŋ săj kũŋ dừŋ ɣì cẳŋ sạc ŋườʔi xá ɣiữ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu dã cỉ zạʔi cɔ bấʔizờ manô ʔa tʰưʔa kùŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê zằŋ sin cɔfép cúŋtôʔi kầm ôŋ dặŋ zọn zâŋ cɔ ôŋ kɔn zê kɔn tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ manô ʔa zằŋ zầʔu ŋươʔi kầm lạʔi kũŋ cẳŋ tʰựk kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰì hãʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê vả manô ʔa xôŋ zõ ấʔilà tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê manô ʔa lạʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê zằŋ zɛɲ ôŋ ci dể cúŋtôʔi tôncọŋ ôŋ xi lờʔi ôŋ fán dượk ứŋŋiệm tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dáp zằŋ saw ŋươʔi hỏʔi zɛɲ ɲưvậʔi zɛɲ ấʔi lấʔilàm ziệʔukỳ manô ʔa kɔn zê kɔn vớʔi kủʔa căj zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi cên dá tʰiênsứ za việk lạlùŋ kó manô ʔa ŋườʔilàm cứŋkiến cɔŋ lúk ŋọn lửʔa bàntʰờ kất băj cên cờʔi tʰì tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê kũŋ zâŋ tʰeo cɔŋ ŋọn lửʔa kủʔa bàntʰờ tʰấʔi vậʔi manô ʔa suốŋ dất tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê cẳŋ kòn dếnkùŋ manô ʔa ŋườʔi nữʔa manô ʔa ɲậnbiết ấʔilà tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ kwảtʰật cúŋta cết dã tʰấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưŋ dáp zằŋ nếʔuÐứkzê ɣiết cúŋta lẽnàʔɔ ŋàʔi kó ɲậm kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj nơʔi tăj lạʔi lẽnàʔɔ ŋàʔi dã cɔ cúŋta tʰấʔi kák diềʔu nầʔi cɔ ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi cúŋta dã ŋɛ ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔi dànbà nàʔi sɛɲ kɔncaj dặt samsôn Ðứʔa cẻ Ðứkzê fướk cɔ tʰầnÐứkzê xởʔi kảmdộŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ ziɲ Ðʔan ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ sôzê ʔa zaôn samsôn di suốŋ tʰimna tʰấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kɔŋáʔi filitin ŋườʔi dã cởlên tʰuật diềʔu dó cɔ camẹ mìɲ zằŋ kɔn kó tʰấʔi tạʔi tʰimma ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kɔŋáʔi filitin bâʔizờ sin hãʔi hỏʔi nàŋ kướʔi cɔ kɔn camẹ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cɔŋ vòŋ kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm kɔn cɔŋ kả zânsự cúŋta cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kɔn fảʔi di kướʔi nơʔi zân filitin cẳŋ cịʔu kắt dó saw samsôn dáp kùŋ ca zằŋ sin ca hãʔi kướʔi nàŋ dó cɔ kɔn dẹpmắt kɔn vả camẹ ŋườʔi cẳŋ zõ diềʔu dó bởʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê dến ŋườʔi zịp cɛɲdấʔu kùŋzân filitin lúk bấʔizờ zân filitin kwản ʔisơzaên samsôn di suốŋ tʰimna vớʔi camẹ mìɲ xi dến ɲɔ tʰimna tʰấʔi kɔn dến dón ɣầm tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ samsôn zất mạɲ twi cẳŋ kầm ci sɔŋ ŋườʔi sé kɔn dó ɲư sé kɔn zê kɔn vậʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰuật lạʔi cɔ camẹ hăj diềʔu mìɲ dã vậʔi ŋườʔi di suốŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dẹplòŋ samsôn săw ítlâʔu ŋườʔi cởlạʔi dặŋ kướʔi nàŋ di vòŋ lạʔi sɛm káʔi tʰâʔi tʰấʔi cɔŋ sák kó dɔàn ʔɔŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ tăj vừʔa vừʔa di ɣần camẹ ŋườʔi dưʔa cɔ camẹ ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰuật lạʔi zằŋ mìɲ dã tʰấʔi dó cɔŋ tʰâʔi ca ŋườʔi di suốŋ ɲà ŋườʔi ấʔi tạʔi dó samsôn bàʔi za tiệk Ấʔilà tʰườŋ tụk kủʔa kák ɣã tʰɛɲniên hăj vừʔa tʰấʔi càŋ ŋườʔita mờʔi bamươʔi ɣã tʰɛɲniên dể kùŋ càŋ samsôn nóʔi tôʔi za cɔ ʔɛɲɛm kâʔudố nếʔu cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi tiệk ʔɛɲɛm ɣiảʔi za tʰì tôʔi tʰưởŋ ʔɛɲɛm bamươʔi káʔi áʔɔ cɔŋ bamươʔi áʔɔ kòn nếʔu ʔɛɲɛm xôŋ ɣiảʔi za dượk tʰì ʔɛɲɛm fảʔi cɔ tôʔi bamươʔi káʔi áʔɔ cɔŋ bamươʔi áʔɔ cúŋ dáp zằŋ hãʔi za kâʔudố ʔɛɲ cɔ cúŋtôʔi ŋɛ vậʔi càŋ za cɔ cúŋ zằŋ kủʔa ɣiốŋ za ŋọt ɣiốŋ mạɲ za cɔŋ ŋàʔi cúŋ xôŋ ɣiảʔi dượk kâʔudố ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi cúŋ nóʔi kùŋ samsôn zằŋ hãʔi zụ cồŋ nàŋ ɣiảʔidáp kâʔudố cɔ cúŋta bằŋ cẳŋ cúŋta dốt nàŋ ɲà ca nàŋ kó fảʔi dể bóklột cúŋta kák ŋươʔi tʰỉɲ cúŋta căŋ vợsam xók cướk ŋườʔi zằŋ kwảtʰật càŋ ɣét tôʔi cẳŋ tʰươŋ tôʔi cút nàʔɔ càŋ dã za kâʔudố cɔ ŋườʔi zânsự tôʔi xôŋ kó ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa cɔ tôʔi ŋườʔi dáp kìʔa xôŋ kó ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa cɔ camẹ tʰăj lạʔi fảʔi lạʔi ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa cɔ nàŋ saw cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi tiệk nàŋ kứ xók ɲưvậʔi cướk ŋườʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi ŋườʔi ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa cɔ nàŋ bởʔivì nàŋ kựk lòŋ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn nàŋ ɣiảʔi lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi zânsự mìɲ vậʔi ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi cướk xi mặtcờʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ dến nóʔi kùŋ càŋ zằŋ kó ɣì ŋọt kó ci mạɲ samsôn dáp nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kàʔi zuộŋ bằŋ káʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiảʔi dượk kâʔudố bấʔizờ tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi di suốŋ Ác kalôn ɣiết bamươʔi ŋườʔi kướp lấʔi áʔɔsốŋ kủʔa cúŋnó tʰưởŋ cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiảʔi dượk kâʔudố dɔạn ŋườʔi nổʔizận fừŋfừŋ cởvề ɲà ca mìɲ vợsam ɣả cɔ ŋườʔi caicẻ càŋ dã cọn săw ítlâʔu ɲằm mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamì samsôn di tʰăm mìɲ dɛm cɔ nàŋ kɔn zê kɔn nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi di dếnkùŋ tôʔi cɔŋ fòŋ nàŋ ɲưŋ ca nàŋ xôŋ cɔfép ŋườʔi vàʔɔ nóʔi zằŋ ta ŋờ ŋươʔi ɣét dã ɣả cɔ kủʔa ŋươʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi cẳŋ lịcsự saw vậʔi hăj lấʔi ʔɛm tʰế cɔ samsôn dáp zằŋ nếʔu nầʔi hạʔi cɔ zân filitin tʰì kũŋ vôtộʔi vậʔi samsôn di bɛcăm kɔn có zừŋ kũŋ lấʔi ɲữŋ duốk zồʔi kột duôʔi mỗʔi haj kɔn lạʔi kột duốk ɣiữʔa haj duôʔi ŋườʔi dốt duốk tʰả có zừŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ lúʔamì kủʔa zân filitin ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi dốt lúʔamì dã kùŋ lúʔamì cưʔa ɣặt kák livɛ zânfi hỏʔi ʔaj diềʔu dó ŋườʔita dáp samsôn zể kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰimna bởʔivì ŋườʔi tʰimna ɣả cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa zânfi di tʰiêʔu nàŋ vớʔi ca nàŋ cɔŋ lửʔa samsôn nóʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi tʰì kwiết báʔɔtʰù kák ŋươʔi zồʔi mớʔi cịʔu ʔanŋỉ ŋườʔi dáɲ cúŋnó tʰwa kảtʰể Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi di suốŋ tạʔi haŋ dá bấʔizờ zân filitin di dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi zuda càn za dến lêci ŋườʔizu da nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ kớsaw kák ŋươʔi dáɲ cúŋta cúŋ dáp cúŋta dâʔi ấʔi dặŋ cóʔi samsôn cúŋta dãʔi ʔiɲư dã dãʔi cúŋta ba ŋàn ŋườʔi zuda suốŋ haŋ dá nóʔi kùŋ samsôn zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ zân filitin củ cúŋta vậʔi saw ŋươʔi dã diềʔu dó cɔ cúŋta ŋườʔi dáp ta dãʔi cúŋnó ɲư cíɲ cúŋnó dãʔi cúŋ lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta suốŋ dặŋ cóʔi ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin samsôn hãʔi tʰề kùŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ ɣiết cúŋ dáp zằŋ xôŋ cúŋta cỉ cóʔi ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin cớ cẳŋ ɣiết ŋươʔi dâʔu vậʔi cúŋ cóʔi ŋườʔi bằŋ haj sợʔi zâʔi mớʔi zắk za xỏʔi haŋ dá xi dến lêci zân filitin za dón ŋườʔi tiếŋ zeo mừŋ sɔŋtʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ samsôn ɲữŋ zâʔi kột káɲtăj ŋườʔi cởtʰàɲ ɲư cỉ ɣaj lửʔa dốt zớt xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi ɣặp dượkmộtkáʔi lừʔa kɔn mớʔitiɲ ŋườʔi ɣiơ tăj lấʔi zùŋ dáɲ mộtŋàn ŋườʔi bấʔizờ samsôn nóʔi zằŋ vớʔi lừʔa ɣiết cất tʰâʔi từŋ dốŋ vớʔi lừʔa dáɲ mộtŋàn ŋườʔi xi ŋườʔi dã nóʔi sɔŋ káʔi lừʔa xỏʔi tăj mìɲ dặt cổ dó zamátlêci bởʔi ŋườʔi xát nướk kwádỗʔi kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê zằŋ cúʔa dã cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu lớnlaw nầʔi hồzễ nàʔɔ bâʔizờ tôʔi fảʔi cết xát vàʔɔ tăj ɲữŋ xôŋ cịʔu kắt saw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẻ dá bộŋ tạʔi lêci kó nướk cảʔi za samsôn ʔuốŋ tʰì tâmtʰần ŋườʔi hồʔitỉɲ lòŋ mạɲmẽ lạʔi bởʔi dó cɔnên ŋườʔita dặt káʔi suốʔi nầʔi ʔɛâɲakôzê cɔdến ŋàʔinăj suốʔi ấʔi tạʔi lêci ɲằm tʰờʔicỳ zân filitin kwản ʔisơzaên tʰì samsôn kwan sét nơʔi ʔisơzaên cọn haimươʔi samsôn di dến ɣasa tʰấʔi dó di vàʔɔ ɲà nàŋ ŋườʔita tʰuật lạʔi cɔ zân ɣasa zằŋ samsôn dã dến dâʔi cúŋ vâʔi ŋườʔi zìɲ ɣiữ cọn dêm tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kả dêm ấʔi cúŋ ɣiữ ʔiênlặŋ zằŋ zựŋ sáŋ cúŋta ɣiết samsôn ŋủ cɔdến xwiə lốʔi xwiə ŋườʔi tʰứkzậʔi haj káɲ kửʔa tʰàɲ haj kâʔi cụ ɲổ vớʔi kâʔi tʰɛn vák cên vaj dɛm cót núʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ hếpzôn săw dó ŋườʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋườʔi cɔŋ cũŋ sôzék Ðʔa kák kwan cưởŋ filitin dến ɲà nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi zán zụzỗ hầʔu cɔbiết bởʔi dâʔu kó sứkmạɲ lớnlaw kiə cúŋta fảʔi tʰếnàʔɔ cɔ dượk tʰắŋ cóʔi fụk cúŋta ʔainấʔi tʰưởŋ cɔ nàŋ mườʔimột căm miếŋ bạk Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ samsôn zằŋ tôʔi sin càŋ hãʔi nóʔi cɔ tôʔi bởʔi dâʔu càŋ kó sứkmạɲ lớnlaw fảʔi zùŋ ci cóʔi càŋ dặŋ fụk càŋ samsôn dáp nếʔu ŋườʔita cóʔi tôʔi bằŋ bảʔi sợʔi zâʔicuŋ tươʔi kòn tʰì tôʔi cởnên ʔiếʔuduốʔi ɲư ŋườʔi xák kák kwan cưởŋ filitin dɛm cɔ Ðʔa bảʔi sợʔi zâʔi tươʔi kòn nàŋ lấʔi cóʔi ŋườʔi vả tạʔi cɔŋ fòŋ ɲà nàŋ kó biɲfụk nàŋ nóʔi samsôn ŋườʔi filitin sôŋ ŋươʔi sɔŋ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ sợʔi zâʔi ɲư sợʔi cỉ ɣaj dứt xi dụŋ dến lửʔa ɲưvậʔi kănŋwiên sứkmạɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ za dượk Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ samsôn zằŋ nầʔi càŋ dã ɣạt tôʔi nóʔizốʔi kùŋ tôʔi sin bâʔizờ hãʔi cɔ tôʔi fảʔi lấʔi ci cóʔi càŋ ŋườʔi dáp nếʔu ŋườʔita kột bằŋ zâʔi mớʔi cưʔa kó ʔaj zùŋ tʰì cởnên ʔiếʔu ɲư ŋườʔi xák vậʔi Ðʔa lấʔi zâʔi mớʔi cóʔi samsôn zồʔi nóʔi zằŋ samsôn ŋườʔi filitin sôŋ ŋươʔi vả kó biɲ dươŋ fụk cɔŋ fòŋ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi bứk ɲữŋ sợʔi zâʔi cóʔi káɲtăj ʔiɲư sợʔi cỉ vậʔi Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ samsôn zằŋ càŋ ɣạt tôʔi nóʔizốʔi tôʔi dến bâʔizờ vậʔi sin hãʔi nóʔi cɔ tôʔi fảʔi cóʔi càŋ bằŋ ci ŋườʔi dáp nàŋ kứ zệt bảʔi tók tʰắt kủʔa dầʔu vàʔɔ cɔŋ kɛɲ cỉ kủʔa nàŋ Ðʔa lấʔi kɔn kột cặt lạʔi zồʔi zằŋ samsôn ŋườʔi filitin sôŋ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi tʰứkzậʔi ɲổ kɔn kủʔa xuŋkửʔi vớʔi kɛɲ cỉ bấʔizờ nàŋ mớʔi nóʔi zằŋ làmsaw càŋ nóʔi dượk zằŋ tôʔi ʔiêʔu nàŋ bởʔivì lòŋ càŋ cẳŋ tʰàɲ kùŋ tôʔi càŋ dã ɣạt tôʔi cẳŋ nóʔi cɔ tôʔi bởʔi dâʔu kó sứklựk kủʔa càŋ mỗʔi ŋàʔi nàŋ lấʔi kâʔuhỏʔi ɣẹʔɔ lòŋ zốʔi cí ŋườʔi dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi tứkmìɲ hòŋ cết ŋườʔi sựlòŋ mìɲ zằŋ zawkạʔɔ cẳŋ dưʔa kwa dầʔu cɔŋ lòŋ dã ŋườʔi nasizê cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nếʔu kạʔɔ sứklựk lìʔa xỏʔi cởtʰàɲ ʔiếʔu ɲư ŋườʔi xák Ðʔa tʰấʔi ŋuờʔi dã sựlòŋ cɔ mìɲ saj mờʔi kák kwan cưởŋ filitin zằŋ lần nầʔi hãʔi sựlòŋ cɔ tôʔi vậʔi kák kwan cưởŋ filitin di ɲà nàŋ dɛm bạk cɔŋ tăj nàŋ xiến samsôn ŋủ cên dầʔuɣốʔi mìɲ ɣọʔi ŋườʔi biểʔu kạʔɔ bảʔi tók cên dầʔu càŋ ɲưvậʔi nàŋ xởʔi xốnxổ ŋườʔi sứklựk lìʔa xỏʔi ŋườʔi bấʔizờ nàŋ nóʔi samsôn ŋườʔi filitin sôŋ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi tʰứkzậʔi zằŋ ta za ɲư kák cướk ɣỡ mìɲ cɔ tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj cúŋnó ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ zằŋ Ðứkzê dã lìʔa xỏʔi mìɲ ŋườʔifi ŋườʔi xɔét kɔn dɛm suốŋ ɣasa zồʔi cóʔi ŋườʔi bằŋ zâʔi dồŋ dậʔu dôʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi săj kốʔi cɔŋ ŋụk sɔŋ tók ŋườʔi dã kạʔɔ xởʔi mọk lạʔi vả kák kwan cưởŋ filitin ɲóm lạʔi dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðʔa ɣôn tʰần kủʔa dặŋ vuimừŋ ɲăw cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ tʰần cúŋta dã fó samsôn vàʔɔ tăj cúŋta tʰùŋịc cúŋta zânsự vừʔa tʰấʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ kấttiếŋ xɛnŋợʔi tʰần mìɲ zằŋ tʰần cúŋta dã fó tʰùŋịc vàʔɔ tăj cúŋta dã fáhạʔi sứ cúŋta dã ɣiết biếtbawɲiêʔu ŋườʔi Ðươŋ xi lòŋ zất cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi ɣọʔi samsôn dể làmcò vuj cɔ cúŋta vậʔi cúŋ zẫn samsôn ŋụk dến zồʔi ŋườʔi làmcò cướk cúŋ ŋườʔita dã dể ŋườʔi dứŋ ɣiữʔa kák kột samsôn nóʔi kùŋ dứʔa cẻ tăj mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi buôŋ dể cɔ zờ dến kák kột dỡ cịʔu káʔi dền hầʔu cɔ zựʔa vàʔɔ dó vả dền dầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi kák kwan cưởŋ filitin dềʔu dó tạʔi cên máʔi dền kũŋ kó dộ ɣần ŋàn ŋườʔi sɛm samsôn làmcò bấʔizờ samsôn kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ cúʔazê ôʔi sin ŋàʔi ɲớ lạʔi tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin sứklựk cɔ tôʔi cỉ nầʔi tʰôʔi hầʔu cɔ tôʔi báʔɔtʰù zân filitin haj kɔn tôʔi samsôn lấʔi haj kâʔi kột cíɲ ɣiữʔa dỡ cịʔu káʔi dền kâʔi hữʔu kâʔi ɲận vàʔɔ zằŋ ŋwiện tôʔi cết cuŋ vớʔi zân filitin Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi zán hếtsứk haj kâʔi kột dền dổ suốŋ cên kák kwan cưởŋ zânsự dó Ấʔi vậʔi cɔŋ lúk cết samsôn ɣiết ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ɣiết cɔŋ xi kòn sốŋ kế dó ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kả ɲà ŋườʔi di suốŋ dɛm tʰâʔi ŋườʔi côn tạʔi ɣiữʔa sôzê ʔa cɔŋ kủʔa manô ʔa ca ŋườʔi samsôn kwan sét cɔŋ ʔisơzaên haimươʔi cɔŋ núʔi zaim kó ŋườʔi mica ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ mìɲ zằŋ mườʔimột căm miếŋ bạk ŋườʔita ănkắp kủʔa dã zủʔasả cướk kɔn buôŋ ɲữŋ lờʔi cùẻʔɔ cíɲ taj kɔn dã ŋɛ nầʔi bạk dó cɔŋ tăj kɔn ấʔilà kɔn dã lấʔi mẹ ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê fướk cɔ kɔn mica cả lạʔi cɔ mìɲ mườʔimột căm miếŋ bạk ấʔi mẹ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ tôʔi bạk nầʔi ziêŋ za cɔ Ðứkzê dể cɔ kɔncaj tôʔi káʔi tượŋ cạm vớʔi káʔi cơn bằŋ ɣaŋ vậʔi cả bạk lạʔi cɔ kɔn bâʔizờ sɔŋmi ka lạʔi cả bạk cɔ mìɲ lấʔi haj căm miếŋ caw cɔ tʰợ dúk tượŋ cạm vớʔi káʔi cơn bằŋ ɣaŋ dể cɔŋ ɲà mica ɲưvậʔi ɲà mica cởnên káʔi miếʔu tʰờ tʰần ŋườʔi kũŋ káʔi fót ɲữŋ tʰê zafim zồʔi kɔncaj mìɲ tʰầʔi cɔŋ lúk dó xôŋ kó vwa nơʔi ʔisơzaên mọʔi ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo mìɲ tưởŋ fảʔi bấʔizờ bếtlêhɛm tạʔi sứ zuda ɲà zuda kó ɣã caicẻ ŋườʔi lêvi kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ấʔi ŋườʔi dó tʰàɲ bếtlêhɛm tạʔi sứ zuda dặŋ di nơʔi nàʔɔ kiềʔu ŋụ dượk Ðươŋ di dàŋ ŋườʔi tớʔi núʔi zaim kwa ɲà mica mica hỏʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu dến ŋườʔilê dáp tôʔi bếtlêhɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda dến twan di tớʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ tôʔi kiềʔu ŋụ dượk mica nóʔi hãʔi dâʔi vớʔi ca tʰầʔi cɔ kấp cɔ ŋươʔi mỗʔi mườʔi miếŋ bạk áʔɔsốŋ ɲữŋ kần nuôʔi mìɲ ŋườʔilê vàʔɔ bằŋlòŋ kùŋ mica mica kɔj ŋườʔi cẻ ấʔi ɲư kɔncaj kủʔa mìɲ mica ŋườʔi lêvi tʰầʔi cɔ mìɲ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ ɲà mica mica nóʔi bâʔizờ zằŋ Ðứkzê cɔ bởʔivì kó ŋườʔi lêvi tʰầʔi Ðươŋ lúk dó cẳŋ kó vwa nơʔi ʔisơzaên cíɲ hồʔi ấʔi cifáʔi Ðʔan di dịʔafận dặŋ lậpŋiệp cướk dến ɣiờ cɔŋ cifáʔi ʔisơzaên cifáʔi nầʔi cưʔa ɲận dượk sảnŋiệp nàʔɔ vậʔi ŋườʔi Ðʔan cọn cɔŋ cifáʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn saj sôzê ʔa di xắpnơʔi zɔtʰám sứ zặn zằŋ hãʔi di zɔtʰám sứ cúŋ saŋ kwa núʔi zaim dến ɲà mica ŋủ dêm dó cúŋ dươŋ ɣần ɲà mica tʰì ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa ɣã cẻ tuổʔi ŋườʔi lêvi lạʔi ɣần hỏʔi zằŋ ʔaj zẫn ŋươʔi dến dâʔi ŋươʔi dâʔi làmci cỗ nầʔi kó ɣì ŋườʔi dáp mica kó dãʔi tôʔi tʰế nầʔi tʰế nầʔi kấp cɔ tôʔi lươŋ zùŋ tôʔi tʰầʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cúŋ tʰếtʰì hãʔi hỏʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể cúŋta kɔn dườŋ cúŋta di dâʔi kó măimắn căŋ tʰầʔi dáp hãʔi di bìɲan Ðứkzê dɔáʔi dến kɔn dườŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi di vậʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi lêndườŋ dến laít tʰấʔi zânsự tạʔi dó kó tʰóʔitụk zân sidôn ʔan bìɲ tịɲ vữŋcắk cɔŋ kwản sứ dó cẳŋ kó ʔaj cɔ cúŋ hạʔi cútdỉɲ nàʔɔ cúŋ kác sa zân sidôn cẳŋ kó việk ci vớʔi ʔaj kả kế ấʔi ŋườʔi cởvề kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tạʔi sôzê ʔa tʰì ʔɛɲɛm hỏʔi cúŋ zằŋ kák ʔɛɲ dã làmɣì năm ŋườʔi dáp hè hãʔi di dáɲ cúŋnó cúŋtôʔi kó tʰấʔi sứ ấʔi tʰật lấʔilàm ɲứt ʔuû ʔa kìʔa ʔɛɲɛm dó cẳŋ làmci saw cớ biếŋɲák di ciếm lấʔi sứ ấʔi sảnŋiệp xi ʔɛɲɛm vàʔɔ sứ dó dếnkùŋ zân ʔan sứ ấʔi tʰật zất zộŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fó vàʔɔ tăj ʔɛɲɛm kwảtʰật nơʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ci dất sɛɲ vậʔi sáʔu căm ŋườʔi zòŋ Ðʔan kầm biɲxí di sôzê ʔa dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi kiziátzêʔazim cɔŋ dất zuda cỗ dó hãʔi kòn ɣọʔilà cạʔi kwân Ðʔan cɔdến ŋàʔinăj fíʔa săw kiziátzêʔazim từ dó cúŋ di saŋ núʔi zaim dến ɲà mica bấʔizờ ŋườʔi dã di zɔtʰám sứ laít kấttiếŋ nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zằŋ cɔŋ ɲà nầʔi kó káʔi fót ɲữŋ tʰê zafim tượŋ cạm vớʔi cơn bằŋ vàŋ ɣaŋ ʔɛɲɛm kó căŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi sɛm diềʔu ʔɛɲɛm fảʔi cúŋ lạʔi ɣần vàʔɔ ɲà ŋườʔi lêvi cẻ tuổʔi tứklà vàʔɔ ɲà kủʔa mica càʔɔ ŋườʔi sáʔu căm ŋườʔi zòŋ Ðʔan kầm biɲxí ɣiữ ŋɔàʔi kửʔa ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dã di zɔtʰám sứ di vàʔɔ ɲà kướp lấʔi tượŋ cạm cơn bằŋ ɣaŋ êfót ɲữŋ tʰê zafim dươŋ xi tʰầʔi dứŋ tạʔi kửʔa kùŋ sáʔu căm ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí năm ŋườʔi dó vàʔɔ ɲà kướp lấʔi kák ấʔi zồʔi tʰầʔi hỏʔi cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi làmci vậʔi cúŋ dáp zằŋ hãʔi di lấʔi tăj miệŋ lạʔi dếnkùŋ cúŋta ca tʰầʔi cɔ cúŋta ŋươʔi tʰầʔi cɔ ɲà hăjlà tʰầʔi cɔ cifáʔi họhàŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên diềʔu nàʔɔ xá tʰầʔi mừŋ lòŋ lấʔi fót ɲữŋ tʰê zafim tượŋ cạm zồʔi ɲập vớʔi ấʔi cúŋ sâʔi lạʔi lêndườŋ dể cɔ kɔncẻ súkvật dồ hàɲlý di cướk cúŋ dã di sa xỏʔi ɲà mica zồʔi kó ɲữŋ ɣần ɲà mica ɲóm lạʔi duổʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi Ðʔan vì cúŋ kêʔula săw ŋườʔi Ðʔan sâʔi lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ mica zằŋ ŋươʔi kódiềʔu ci vìsaw ŋươʔi kó ɲóm lạʔi ɲữŋ dó mica dáp kák ŋươʔi dã kướp lấʔi kák tʰần dã tʰầʔi di kòn ci lạʔi cɔ saw kák ŋươʔi kòn hỏʔi zằŋ kó diềʔu ci ŋườʔiÐʔan dáp kùŋ mica zằŋ cớ cɔ ŋɛ tiếŋ ŋươʔi nữʔa ʔɛ kó ŋươʔi nổʔizận sôŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲàŋươʔi dềʔu sốŋ căŋ bấʔizờ ŋườʔi Ðʔan kứ di dườŋ kòn mica tʰấʔi cúŋ mạɲ mìɲ cởvề ɲà mìɲ Ấʔi vậʔi săw xi dã kướp lấʔi kủʔa mica dã cế za tʰầʔi ŋườʔi dã kó cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ tʰì cúŋ sôŋ vàʔɔ zân laít zân bìɲ tịɲ vữŋcắk lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết zân dó zồʔi câm lửʔa dốt tʰàɲ cẳŋ kó ʔaj dến tiếpkứʔu zân laít tʰàɲ sa sidôn xôŋ zawtʰiệp vớʔi ʔaj cɔŋ cũŋ cạʔi hướŋ bếcêhóp ŋườʔiÐʔan sâʔidắp tʰàɲ lạʔi lạʔi dó lấʔi Ðʔan tổfụ mìɲ kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên dặt cɔ tʰàɲ kòn cướkkiə tʰàɲ ấʔilà laít Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi Ðʔan zựŋ tượŋ cạm zồʔi ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ɣẹtsôn cáʔu môʔisɛ hếttʰảʔi hậʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu tʰầʔi cɔŋ cifáʔi Ðʔan cɔdến ŋàʔi cúŋ lưʔudàʔi xỏʔi sứ cúŋ ɣiữ tượŋ cạm kủʔa mica cọn cɔŋ lúk dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi silô ɲằm lúk xôŋ kó vwa cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kó ŋườʔi lêvi dến kiềʔu ŋụ nơʔi ɣók sa kủʔa núʔi zaim lấʔi ŋườʔi bếtlêhɛm tʰàɲ sứ zuda vợbé ŋườʔi hàɲ zâm ŋườʔi divề ɲà ca mìɲ tạʔi bếtlêhɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda dó tʰáŋ cồŋ nàŋ cổʔi zậʔi di tʰeo nàŋ lấʔi lờʔi ŋọt kảm lòŋ nàŋ dặŋ zẫn nàŋ ɲà mìɲ ŋườʔi kó dɛm tʰeo dầʔitớ haj kɔn lừʔa nàŋ mờʔi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ɲà ca mìɲ ca nàŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dến za dónzướk kác vuimừŋ Ôŋza ŋườʔi ca kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn bàcẻ kầm ŋườʔi lạʔi ŋườʔiở ɲà ôŋza cɔŋ ŋàʔi kùŋ ănuốŋ ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó ŋàʔi tʰứtư zậʔi xi ŋườʔi lêvi sửʔasɔạn di za ca kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn bàcẻ nóʔi kùŋ zể mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi zùŋ miếŋ báɲ dặŋ dỡ lòŋ kɔn zồʔi săw kák ŋươʔi di vậʔi vợcồŋ ŋồʔi ănuốŋ kùŋ ɲăw ca kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn bàcẻ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi cồŋ zằŋ kɔn hãʔi dịɲ lạʔi dêm năj nữʔa cɔ lòŋ kɔn vuimừŋ ŋườʔilê zậʔi dặŋ di ɲưŋ ôŋza épnàʔi kwá dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi cởlạʔi dêm dó nữʔa ŋàʔi tʰứnăm ŋườʔi zậʔi dặŋ zadi tʰì ca ŋườʔi dờn bàcẻ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sin kɔn hãʔi zùŋbữʔa lạʔi cɔdến sếciềʔu zồʔi vợcồŋ ŋồʔi lạʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi lêvi dứŋzậʔi dặŋ di kùŋ tôʔitớ mìɲ ɲưŋ ôŋza ca kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn bàcẻ nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi ŋàʔi dã sế ciềʔu hầʔu ɣần ca sin haj kɔn hãʔi lạʔi dâʔi ŋàʔi dã sế hãʔi dêm lạʔi dâʔi cɔ lòŋ kɔn vuimừŋ ŋàʔimaj haj kɔn tʰứkzậʔi dặŋ lêndườŋ cởvề ɲà kɔn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cồŋ xôŋ dêm dứŋzậʔi di ŋườʔi dến tạʔi cướk ɣiêbu tứk ɣiêzusalɛm vớʔi haj kɔn lừʔa tʰắŋ kũŋ kó tʰeo ŋườʔi xi haj ŋườʔi dến ɣần ɣiêbu ŋàʔi dã sếciềʔu zồʔi kẻ tôʔitớ tʰưʔa kùŋ củ zằŋ hè cúŋta hãʔi sâʔi kwa dặŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêbu nầʔi ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó củ dáp zằŋ cúŋta xôŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋɔạʔibaŋ nơʔi cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋta di dến ɣibê ʔa ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ dầʔitớ zằŋ hè hãʔi zán di dến nơʔi nàʔɔ dằŋ cướk hɔặk ɣibê ʔa hăjlà zama dặŋ ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó vậʔi cúŋ kứ di dườŋ xi dến ɣần ɣibê ʔa tʰàɲtʰuộk bêŋiəmin tʰì mặtcờʔi zồʔi cúŋ kwẹʔɔ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ɣibê ʔa dặŋ ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó vậʔi cúŋ di vàʔɔ ŋồʔi tạʔi ŋɔàʔi fố cợ kủʔa tʰàɲ xôŋ ʔaj vàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ dặŋ cɔ bandêm vả kó ŋườʔizà làmviệk ŋɔàʔi dồŋ buổʔi ciềʔu cởvề ŋườʔi ấʔi kwê núʔi zaim dươŋ kiềʔu ŋụ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa sɔŋ zânkư tʰàɲ nầʔi ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ŋườʔizà ŋướk tʰấʔi hàɲxác nầʔi cên fố cợ kủʔa tʰàɲ hỏʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu dến di dâʔu ŋườʔi hàɲxác dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dến bếtlêhɛm sứ zuda dươŋ divề nơʔi ɣók sa kủʔa núʔi zaim nơʔi sɛɲ tôʔi za tôʔi dã di dến bếtlêhɛm sứ zuda năj tôʔi dến ɲà kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj tôʔi vàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ vảlạʔi cúŋtôʔi kó zơm kỏ cɔ lừʔa cúŋtôʔi zượʔu báɲ cɔ tôʔi cɔ kɔndòʔi cɔ ŋườʔi caicẻ di tʰeo tôʔitớ ôŋ cẳŋ tʰiếʔuɣì cɔ cúŋtôʔi kả ŋuờʔi ɣià nóʔi bìɲan cɔ ŋươʔi ta lãɲ lɔliệʔu mọʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi kó kần zùŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ ŋủ dêm tạʔi fố cợ dâʔu ŋườʔizà mờʔi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ɲà cɔ lừʔa kák hàɲxác zửʔa cơn zồʔi ʔuốŋ xi cúŋ dươŋ vujvẻ kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ zantà vâʔi ɲà dộŋ kửʔa nóʔi kùŋ ôŋzà củ ɲà zằŋ hãʔi dɛm ŋườʔi dã vàʔɔ ɲàŋươʔi dó za cɔ cúŋta củ ɲà za dếnkùŋ cúŋ zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛɲɛm dừŋ sin cớ diềʔu ák ŋườʔi nầʔi dã vàʔɔ ɲà tôʔi cớ fạm sỉɲụk nầʔi kìʔa kɔŋáʔi kòn dồŋciɲ ŋườʔi kiə zẫn cúŋnó za ŋɔàʔi cɔ ʔɛɲɛm ʔɛɲɛm lăŋɲụk dãʔi tùʔiý tʰíc ʔɛɲɛm ɲưŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi cớ fạm diềʔu sỉɲụk zườŋ ấʔi sɔŋ ɲữŋ dó xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi xác ŋườʔi zẫn za ŋɔàʔi cɔ cúŋ cúŋ nàŋ lăŋɲụk nàŋ cọn dêm cɔdến sáŋ zồʔi duổʔi nàŋ zạŋdôŋ ɣần sáŋ ŋườʔi dờn dến ŋã tạʔi kửʔɛɲà cồŋ nàŋ cọ tạʔi dó cɔdến sáŋ ŋàʔi sáŋ dến cồŋ nàŋ cổʔi zậʔi mởkửʔa ɲà za dặŋ lêndườŋ mìɲ kìʔa tʰấʔi mìɲ sảʔi cướk kửʔɛɲà haj tăj cên ŋạc ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi cúŋta di sɔŋ nàŋ cẳŋ cảlờʔi ŋườʔi dể nàŋ cên lừʔa mìɲ lêndườŋ cởvề ɲà ɲà zồʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi kɔn zaw mìɲ cặt từŋ tăj từŋ cơn za mườʔihaj dɔạn ɣởʔi di xắp dịʔafận ʔisơzaên hếttʰảʔi ʔaj tʰấʔi dó dềʔu nóʔi zằŋ từ xi zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔita cưʔa hɔặk tʰấʔi việk ɲưvậʔi xá ŋĩ dếndiềʔu dó ɲăw ɣiảŋ za bấʔizờ kả zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu kéʔɔ zadi Ðʔan cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba cɔdến sứ ɣalaát hộʔi cúŋ lạʔi ɲư ŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi mícba ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kả zânsự tứklà kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dềʔu zamắt cɔŋ hộʔi kủʔa zân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó cămŋàn líɲ kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm vả ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin dã hăj zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên di mícba zân ʔisơzaên nóʔi hãʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔbiết tộʔiák nầʔi dã fạm làmsaw ŋườʔilê cồŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn ɣiết dáp zằŋ tôʔi kó vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ɣibê ʔa tʰàɲ kủʔa bêŋiəmin vớʔi tôʔi dặŋ ŋủ dêm tạʔi dó ɲưŋ zân ɣibê ʔa zấʔi kùŋ tôʔi dươŋ bandêm vâʔi ɲà tôʔi cúŋ dã twan ɣiết tôʔi kó hàɲhuŋ kùŋ tôʔi cết kớ dó Ðʔɔạn tôʔi lấʔi tʰâʔi tôʔi cặt za từŋ dɔạn ɣởʔi di xắp dịʔafận kủʔa sảnŋiệp ʔisơzaên cúŋnó kó fạm tộʔi cọŋ sỉɲụk cɔŋ ʔisơzaên nầʔi hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên kómặt dâʔi ʔɛɲɛm hãʔi ɲăw liệʔu dịɲ fảʔi tʰếnàʔɔ dâʔi kả zânsự dứŋzậʔi ɲư ŋườʔi zằŋ cẳŋ ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta cởlạʔi cạʔi mìɲ xôŋ ʔaj zút ɲà mìɲ bâʔizờ nầʔi diềʔu cúŋta fảʔi sử cɔ ɣibê ʔa cúŋta di dáɲ tʰàɲ dó tʰeo tʰứtự kủʔa tʰăm ɲ dịɲ cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋta fảʔi lấʔi mườʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ mộtcăm căm ŋườʔi cɔŋ mộtŋàn ŋàn ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋta di lươŋtʰựk cɔ zânsự zồʔi xi cởvề ŋườʔita fảʔi sử ɣibê ʔa kủʔa bêŋiəmin tùʔi tʰeo sỉɲụk tʰàɲ ấʔi dã fạm nơʔi ʔisơzaên Ấʔi vậʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ɲóm ɲăw dáɲ tʰàɲ dó lạʔi ɲư cỉ ŋườʔi kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ cifáʔi bêŋiəmin nóʔi zằŋ tộʔiák dã fạm tạʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi ɣì bâʔizờ hãʔi cɔ cúŋta ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zantà kủʔa ɣibê ʔa dể cúŋta sửtử cúŋnó ziệt diềʔu ák xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi tʰàɲ ɲóm tạʔi ɣibê ʔa dặŋ zawciến kùŋzân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin kák tʰàɲ dến haj sáʔu ŋàn ŋườʔi dềʔu kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm xôŋ zân ɣibê ʔa dượk bảʔicăm ŋườʔi tiɲ biɲ cɔŋ kả zânsự ấʔi kó bảʔicăm ŋườʔi tiɲ biɲ tʰuận tăj hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ dó kó tàʔi zùŋ càɲ dá cúŋ sợʔi tók cẳŋ saj cật ŋườʔita kũŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên xôŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin tʰì dượk mươʔi ŋườʔi kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm tʰảʔi dềʔu ciếnsĩ vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên di ɣibê ʔa kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưvầʔi ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi cướk dặŋ zawciến kùŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin Ðứkzê dáp zuda di cướk vừʔa sáŋ ŋàʔi zân ʔisơzaên kéʔɔ di dóŋ cạʔi ɣần ɣibê ʔa ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên za dáɲ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin zàn cận kùŋ cúŋ tạʔi cướk ɣibê ʔa ŋườʔibên zamin za xỏʔi ɣibê ʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣiết haj muônŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cật dất zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi fấn cí zàn cận mớʔi tạʔicỗ mìɲ dã zàn ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲứt zân ʔisơzaên di xók cướk Ðứkzê cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi di zawciến lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa tôʔi căŋ Ðứkzê dáp hãʔi dáɲ ŋàʔi tʰứ ɲì ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kéʔɔ tớʔi dáɲ ŋươʔi bêŋiəmin ŋườʔibên zamin kũŋ za ɣibê ʔa nộʔi ŋàʔi dó dáɲ zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi ɣiết sảʔi zướʔi dất ŋàn ŋườʔi kủʔa zân ấʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kả zânsự dềʔu di bêtên xók dứŋ tạʔi dó cướk Ðứkzê kữ cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi zồʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðươŋ xi ấʔi zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi dó kó finê ʔa kɔncaj lêʔasa cáʔu ʔazôn fụk cướk Ðứkzê vậʔi zân ʔisơzaên kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi kòn fảʔi zawciến kùŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi hăjlà tôʔi fảʔi dìɲ lạʔi Ðứkzê dáp hãʔi di ŋàʔimaj fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi ʔisơzaên fụkbiɲ cuŋkwɛɲ ɣibê ʔa ŋàʔi tʰứba zân ʔisơzaên di dáɲ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin zàn cận kùŋ ɣibê ʔa ɲư kák cướk ŋườʔibên zamin za dón zân ʔisơzaên zụ sa tʰàɲ ʔiɲư haj cướk cúŋ xởʔi dáɲ ɣiết mấʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên
