cừŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ haj kɔn dườŋ cảʔi kwa dồŋbằŋ di ŋả tớʔi bêtên ŋả kiə tớʔi ɣibê ʔa ŋườʔibên zamin nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa cúŋnó bạʔi cướk cúŋta ɲư cướk ɲưŋ zân ʔisơzaên nóʔi cúŋta hãʔi cạʔi cốn zụ cúŋnó za kác sa tʰàɲ dến cɔŋ kák dườŋkáʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cỗ mìɲ dứŋ zàn cận tạʔi baɛɲtʰama dạʔɔ biɲfụk kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fụk kủʔa ʔisơzaên dâmsầm za xỏʔi cỗ fụk mìɲ tạʔi dồŋbằŋ ɣibê ʔa ɲưvậʔi sảʔi kó tiɲbiɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fụk cướk tạʔi ɣibê ʔa sôŋ tớʔi dáɲ ɣiặk zất zữzộʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin xôŋ tajhọʔa lấʔi mìɲ Ðứkzê dáɲbạʔi ŋườʔi cifáʔi bêŋiəmin cướk zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zân ʔisơzaên ɣiết haj ŋàn ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin hếttʰảʔi dềʔu kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm ŋườʔibên zamin tʰấʔi zõ mìɲ bạʔi vả ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dã ɲườŋbướk cɔ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin cúŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi fụkbiɲ mìɲ ɣần ɣibê ʔa ɲữŋ biɲ dã fụk lậtdật sôŋ ɣibê ʔa di tớʔi lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết hếttʰảʔi kả ŋườʔiở tʰàɲ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dã zấʔuhiệʔu vớʔi ɲữŋ biɲfụk ɲữŋ fụkbiɲ fảʔi cɔ ŋọn xóʔi dɛn kất xỏʔi tʰàɲ vậʔi zân ʔisơ zên dã tʰốʔi lạʔi cɔŋ cận kòn ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin xởʔi dáɲ ɣiết cừŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋ nóʔi kwảtʰật cúŋnó tʰwa cướk cúŋta ɲư cướk ɲưŋ xi cụ xóʔi xởʔi băj xỏʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ɲìn sɛmlạʔi dằŋ săw tʰấʔi kả tʰàɲ dềʔu kó xóʔi băj cờʔi bấʔizờ zân ʔisơzaên cởlạʔi kòn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin lấʔilàm kiɲhãʔi tʰấʔi tajhọʔa dã mìɲ cúŋ sâʔi lưŋ lạʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên cạʔi cốn fíʔa dồŋ vắŋ ɲưŋ dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên tʰeo ziết ɣần ɲữŋ za xỏʔi tʰàɲ dềʔu ɣiết cúŋ vâʔi fủ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin duổʔi tʰeo càdạp tạʔi nơʔi zừŋ lạʔi cɔdến cỗ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣibê ʔa hướŋ mặtcờʔi mọk ɲưvậʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin fảʔi ŋã tʰảʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi zõŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi sâʔi lưŋ cạʔi cốn fíʔa dồŋ vắŋ hướŋ dá zimmôn tʰì zân ʔisơzaên kòn ɣiết zọk dườŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi nữʔa dɔạn tʰeo ziết ɣần dến ɣibêʔɔm tʰì ɣiết haj ŋàn ŋườʔi vậʔi tổŋkộŋ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ŋã cết cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm tʰảʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi zõŋ lạʔi kó sáʔu căm ŋườʔi sâʔi lưŋ cạʔi cốn fíʔa dồŋ vắŋ dến dá zimmôn dó tʰáŋ Ðʔɔạn zân ʔisơzaên cởlạʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔita cɔŋ tʰàɲ súkvật hếttʰảʔi nàʔɔ ɣặp dượk lạʔi ɣặp tʰàɲ nàʔɔ tʰì câm lửʔa dốt tạʔimíc zân ʔisơzaên kó lờʔi tʰề nầʔi cẳŋ ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin Ðʔɔạn zânsự dến bêtên lạʔi dó cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi kấttiếŋ xók zầmzề zằŋ Ôʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋàʔinăj tʰiếʔu cifáʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên saw tajhọʔa nầʔi sảʔi dến cɔ cúŋtôʔi kwaŋàʔi săw zânsự dềʔu dứŋzậʔi sâʔi cɔŋ cỗ dó bàntʰờ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù vả zân ʔisơzaên kó tʰề lờʔi cọŋtʰể nầʔi kẻ nàʔɔ cẳŋ dến zamắt Ðứkzê tạʔi mícba sửtử nên hỏʔi cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ dến hộʔidồŋ cướk Ðứkzê căŋ sɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên diềʔu sảʔi dến cɔ cifáʔi bêŋiəmin ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zằŋ ŋàʔinăj cifáʔi dã cuất xỏʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋta làmsaw dặŋ kó ŋườʔi cɔ ɲữŋ kòn sốŋ cúŋta dã ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê tʰề zằŋ xôŋ ɣả kɔŋáʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa cúŋta cɔ vậʔi cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên kó ʔaj cẳŋ dến zamắt cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi mícba căŋ vả zabɛ cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát cẳŋ kó ʔaj dến vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân tạʔi hộʔidồŋ xi zân tʰì cẳŋ tʰấʔi kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa zân zabɛ sứ ɣalaát hộʔi cúŋ saj dến zabɛ haj ŋàn ŋườʔi mạɲmẽ cwiền lịɲ zằŋ hãʔi di zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết zânkư kủʔa zabɛ sứ ɣalaát vớʔi ŋườʔi kɔncẻ nầʔi diềʔu kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tậnziệt mọʔi ŋườʔi vớʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi dã ŋườʔi cúŋ dượk cɔŋ zân zabɛ sứ ɣalaát bốncăm kɔŋáʔi dồŋciɲ cưʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi zẫn cúŋnó cạʔi kwân tạʔi silô cɔŋ sứ kanana tɔàn hộʔi cúŋ saj dến ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin zút nơʔi dá zimmôn dặŋ ɣiảŋòʔa cɔ cúŋ ŋườʔibên zamin cởvề zân ʔisơzaên ɣả cɔ cúŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mìɲ dã zuŋtʰứ dể kòn sốŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zabɛ sứ ɣalaát ɲưŋ xôŋ dủ cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi zânsự việk bêŋiəmin Ðứkzê kó xwiết cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa hộʔi cúŋ nóʔi bởʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa cifáʔi bêŋiəmin twiệtziệt tʰì cúŋta fảʔi làmsaw dặŋ cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn lạʔi lạʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ ɲận dượk sảnŋiệp tʰuộk bêŋiəmin kẻʔɔ cifáʔi cuất xỏʔi ʔisơzaên căŋ sɔŋ cúŋ cẳŋ tʰế ɣả kɔŋáʔi cúŋta cɔ dượk zân ʔisơzaên kó lờʔi tʰề nầʔi Ðáŋ zủʔasả cɔ nàʔɔ ɣả ŋườʔi cɔ bêŋiəmin vậʔi cúŋ nóʔi kìʔa tạʔi silô hướŋ bắk bêtên fíʔa dôŋ kủʔa kɔn dườŋ di bêtên sicɛm fíʔa lêbôna mỗʔi ŋườʔita ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê cúŋ xwiên ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin zằŋ hãʔi di fụk cɔŋ ɲɔ xi tʰấʔi kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa silô di za dặŋ múʔahát zập ɲăw tʰì kák ŋươʔi hãʔi za xỏʔi ɲɔ zồʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kướp lấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɣáʔi cẻ kủʔa silô dó dɔạn cởvề sứ bêŋiəmin xi ca hăj ʔɛɲ cúŋnó dến kùŋ cúŋta cúŋta dáp zằŋ sin hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɣả cúŋnó cɔ cɔŋ ɣiặkzã nầʔi cúŋtôʔi xôŋ tʰế kướʔi ŋườʔi cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ lạʔinữʔa cẳŋ fảʔi cíɲ kák ʔɛɲɛm dã ɣả cúŋnó cɔ nếʔu ɲưvậʔi cắk ʔɛɲɛm fảʔi mắk tộʔi ŋườʔibên zamin ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi múʔahát cúŋ kướp lấʔi ŋườʔi bằŋ kủʔa mìɲ zồʔi di cởvề sảnŋiệp mìɲ cúŋ sâʔidắp tʰàɲ lạʔi tạʔi dó bấʔizờ zân ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi dềʔu cởvề cɔŋ cifáʔi họhàŋ mìɲ nơʔi dó mỗʔi ŋườʔi divề sảnŋiệp mìɲ Ðươŋ lúk dó xôŋ kó vwa cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi tʰeo mìɲ lấʔilàm fảʔi cɔŋ dờʔi kák kwan sét kơn dóʔicém sảʔi dến cɔŋ sứ kó ŋườʔi bếtlêhɛm sứ zuda di vớʔi haj kɔncaj mìɲ dến kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ môáp ŋườʔi limêlék naômi haj kɔncaj mạklôn kiliôn dềʔu zân fơzát bếtlêhɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda sứ môáp cúŋ tạʔi dó limêlék cồŋ kủʔa naômi kwadờʔi dể nàŋ lạʔi vớʔi haj kɔncaj mìɲ cúŋnó kướʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi môáp ŋườʔi nầʔi ʔɔï ŋườʔi kiə zutơ tạʔi dó dộ mườʔi kế săw mạklôn kiliôn kũŋ tʰák dể naômi lạʔi xôŋ cồŋ xôŋ kɔn bấʔizờ naômi kó ŋɛnóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã dɔáʔi sɛm zânsự ŋàʔi lươŋtʰựk cɔ dứŋzậʔi kùŋ haj zâʔu mìɲ dặŋ sứ môáp cởvề vậʔi ŋườʔi lìʔabỏ cỗ mìɲ dã kùŋ haj zâʔu mìɲ lêndườŋ dặŋ cởvề sứ zuda ɲưŋna nóʔi kùŋ haj zâʔu mìɲ zằŋ mỗʔi kɔn hãʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ di kầʔuÐứkzê lấʔi dãʔi haj kɔn ɲư haj kɔn dã dãʔi kák ŋườʔi tʰák kủʔa cúŋta dã dãʔi cíɲ mìɲ ŋwiệnÐứkzê cɔ haj kɔn dượk bìɲiên nơʔi ɲà cồŋ mớʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi haj nàŋ kòn haj nàŋ kấttiếŋ xók nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi di vớʔi dến kwêhươŋ kủʔa maômi dáp hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi hãʔi cởvề di vớʔi làmci mẹ kòn ɲữŋ kɔncaj cɔŋ lòŋ kó tʰế cồŋ cúŋ kɔn saw hỡʔi haj kɔŋáʔi hãʔi cởvề didi mẹɣià kwá lấʔi cồŋ nữʔa lạʔi zầʔu bâʔizờ nóʔi ciềʔu năj kó cồŋ zẫʔu sɛɲ dẻ kɔncaj dinữʔa cúŋ kɔn lạʔi dợʔi cɔdến cúŋnó xônlớn xôŋ lấʔi cồŋ xák hăjsaw xôŋ hỡʔi cúŋ kɔn nỗʔi sầʔutʰảm kủʔa kăjdắŋ fần kủʔa cúŋ kɔn tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê dã ɣiơ za hạʔi haj nàŋ lạʔi kấttiếŋ xók Ðʔɔạn ʔɔï bàza mìɲ kòn zutơ xôŋ cịʔu fânzẽ ŋườʔi naômi nóʔi kùŋ zutơ zằŋ nầʔi cị kɔn dã cởvề kwêhươŋ tʰần kủʔa kɔn hãʔi cởvề tʰeo di zutơ tʰưʔa zằŋ sin cớ nàʔi tôʔi fânzẽ di dâʔu tôʔi di dó nơʔi nàʔɔ tôʔi nơʔi dó zânsự kủʔa tứklà zânsự kủʔa tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tôʔi tʰák nơʔi nàʔɔ tôʔi tʰák dượk côn nơʔi dó víbằŋ kó ci xák cết fânkác tôʔi xỏʔi ŋwiện Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa cɔ tôʔi naômi tʰấʔi nàŋ kwiếtdịɲ tʰeo mìɲ xôŋ nóʔi nữʔa vậʔi haj ŋườʔi di dến bếtlêhɛm xi haj ŋườʔi dến kả tʰàɲ dềʔu kảmdộŋ kák ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ Ấʔi kó fảʔi naômi căŋ ŋườʔi dáp cớ ɣọʔi tôʔi naômi hãʔi ɣọʔilà maza Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ dã dãʔi tôʔi kác kăjdắŋ tôʔi di za dượk dầʔizẫʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkzê zắt tôʔi tăjxôŋ Ðứkzê dã ɣiáŋọʔa cɔ tôʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ xiến tôʔi xốnxổ vậʔi kòn ɣọʔi tôʔi naômi làmci naômi zutơ ŋườʔi môáp zâʔu kủʔa naômi sứ môáp cởvề ɲưvậʔi haj ŋườʔi dến bếtlêhɛm ɲằm dầʔu mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamạc naômi kó ŋườʔi bàkɔn cồŋ ŋườʔi kó kwiềntʰế ɣiàʔu họhàŋ limêlék ŋườʔi bô zutơ ŋườʔi môáp tʰưʔa kùŋ naômi zằŋ sin dể cɔ kɔn di za ŋɔàʔi zuộŋ dặŋ ɣié lúʔa tʰeo săw sẵnlòŋ cɔ kɔn naômi dáp hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi didi vậʔi zutơ di tʰeo săw kák kɔn ɣặt cɔŋ zuộŋ kiə téza măj cɔ nàŋ ɣặp dất kủʔa bô họhàŋ limêlék vả nầʔi bô bếtlêhɛm dến nóʔi kùŋ kák kɔn ɣặt zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cúŋ dáp ŋwiệnÐứkzê fướk cɔ ôŋ Ðʔɔạn bô nóʔi kùŋ dầʔitớ kɔjsók kák kɔn ɣặt zằŋ ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ nàʔi kɔn kủʔa ʔaj ŋườʔi dầʔitớ kɔjsók kák kɔn ɣặt dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ môáp sứ môáp cởvề kùŋ naômi nàŋ kó nóʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi zằŋ sin cɔfép tôʔi disăw kák kɔn ɣặt nơʔi ɣiữʔa kák lúʔa nàŋ dã dến sáŋ dứŋ cɔdến bâʔizờ cừ za kó ŋỉ zướʔi còʔi mộtcút bô nóʔi kùŋ zutơ zằŋ hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi hãʔi ŋɛ cớ di cɔŋ zuộŋ xák kũŋ dừŋ sa xỏʔi cỗ nàʔi hãʔi kùŋ kák ɣáʔi sɛm ŋườʔita ɣặt cɔŋ zuộŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ tʰì hãʔi di tʰeo dó ta dã kấm kák dầʔitớ dụŋ dến nàŋ nếʔu kó xát hãʔi di ʔuốŋ nướk nơʔi bìɲ kủʔa cúŋ múk cɔ zutơ mìɲ suốŋ zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi kúʔi dầʔu dến dất tʰưʔa zằŋ vì zwiênkớ nàʔɔ tôʔi dượk cướk ôŋ dến dỗʔi ôŋ dɔáʔi sɛm tôʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ bô dáp ŋườʔita kó tʰuật cɔ ŋɛ mọʔi diềʔu nàŋ dã cɔ cồŋ nàŋ xi cồŋ nàŋ cết kác nàʔɔ nàŋ dã lìʔa camẹ sứsở sɛɲ kủʔa nàŋ dặŋ di dến zântộk nàŋ xôŋ cướk ŋwiệnÐứkzê báʔɔdáp diềʔu nàŋ dã nàŋ dã dến zướʔi káɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kầʔusin ŋàʔi tʰưởŋ cɔ nàŋ kác cọnvẹn nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ hỡʔi cúʔa cúʔa dã ʔanủʔi ɣiụk lòŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa kầʔu cúʔa lấʔilòŋ dãʔi tôʔi zẫʔu zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ dồŋ bựk kùŋ kák ɣáʔi cúʔa cɔŋ bữʔa bô ôlạʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần báɲ nàʔi ɲúŋ miếŋ nàŋ cɔŋ ɣiấm vậʔi nàŋ ŋồʔi ɣần kák kɔn ɣặt ŋườʔi dưʔa cɔ nàŋ mạc zaŋ nàŋ cɔdến nɔnê zồʔi dểzàɲ fần zư lạʔi Ðʔɔạn nàŋ dứŋzậʔi dặŋ bô cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák dầʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi dể cɔ nàŋ zẫʔu ɣiữʔa kák lúʔa cớ sấʔuhổ nàŋ kũŋ hãʔi zút vàʔi ɣié cɔŋ lúʔa zớt cɔ nàŋ lấʔi cớ cácmók nàŋ cút nàʔɔ vậʔi zutơ cɔŋ zuộŋ cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi dập lúʔa mìɲ dã hứŋ dượk cừŋ fa lúʔamạc nàŋ vák dɛm cở vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ bàza nàŋ tʰấʔi lúʔa nàŋ dã Ðʔɔạn zutơ cút fần bữʔa zư za caw cɔ ŋườʔi bàza nóʔi ŋàʔinăj kɔn kó dâʔu kɔn kó làmviệk dâʔu fướk cɔ ŋườʔi dã ɲận kɔn nàŋ nóʔi cɔ bàza mìɲ hăj mìɲ kó làmviệk nơʔi củ nàʔɔ nàŋ nóʔi ŋườʔi củ kủʔa nơʔi tôʔi kó làmviệk ŋàʔinăj bô naômi dáp zùŋ zâʔu mìɲ zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê fướk cɔ ŋườʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ zứt cɔ sốŋ cết tiếp zằŋ ŋườʔi dó bàkɔn kủʔa cúŋta cɔŋ ɲữŋ kó kwiền cuộk sảnŋiệp lạʔi zutơ ŋườʔi môáp zằŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ kó nóʔi kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi kùŋ kák dầʔitớ cɔdến cừŋ sɔŋ mùʔa ɣặt naômi nóʔi kùŋ zutơ zâʔu mìɲ zằŋ hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi lấʔilàm fảʔi cɔ kɔn di vớʔi kák ɣáʔi ŋườʔi cớ cɔ ŋườʔita ɣặp kɔn cɔŋ zuộŋ xák vậʔi nàŋ kùŋ kák ɣáʔi kủʔa bô dặŋ cɔdến mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamạc mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamì nàŋ ɲà kủʔa bàza mìɲ naômi bàza zutơ nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi fảʔi lɔ cɔ kɔnmột cỗ ʔantʰân cɔ kɔn dượk fướk hạɲ vả kɔn dã tʰeo kák ɣáʔi kủʔa bô ŋườʔi ấʔi bàkɔn kủʔa cúŋta cíɲ dêm năj ŋườʔi fảʔi di sảʔi lúʔamạc nơʔi dạp lúʔa ŋườʔi hãʔi tắmzửʔa sứk zầʔu mặk kwầnáʔɔ zồʔi di suốŋ dạp lúʔa ɲưŋ cướk xi ŋườʔi cưʔa ănuốŋ sɔŋ kɔn cớ cɔ ŋườʔi ɲậnbiết mìɲ xi ŋườʔi ŋủ hãʔi dểý sɛm ŋườʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ zồʔi di zở zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi nằmsuốŋ cíɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi diềʔu ɣì kɔn fảʔi nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ mọʔi diềʔu dã nóʔi vớʔi kɔn kɔn nàŋ di suốŋ dạp lúʔa tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu cồŋ mìɲ dã zặn xibô dã ănuốŋ sɔŋ lòŋ dươŋ mừŋzỡ di dốŋ lúʔamạc kiə nàŋ di dến ɲẹ ɲẹ zở zướʔi cân ŋườʔi zồʔi nằmsuốŋ nửʔadêm bô sợhãʔi ŋiêŋmìɲ kwa kìʔa tʰấʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi zướʔi cơn mìɲ bô hỏʔi ŋươʔi ʔaj nàŋ dáp tôʔi zutơ ɣáʔi ôŋ sin dắp ôŋ cên ɣáʔi ôŋ ôŋ kó kwiền cuộk sảnŋiệp tôʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi ŋwiện Ðứkzê fướk cɔ kɔn việk ɲơn kɔn săwnàʔi lạʔi kòn cọŋ cướk kɔn cẳŋ kó tʰeo ɲữŋ ɣã caicẻ ŋèʔɔ hăj ɣiàʔu vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi cớ ci cɔ nàŋ mọʔi diềʔu nàŋ nóʔi kả zânsự cɔŋ tʰàɲ dềʔu zằŋ nàŋ ŋườʔi dờn hiềndứk bâʔizờ diềʔu dó kwảtʰật kó kwiền cuộk sảnŋiệp nàŋ lạʔi sɔŋ kó ŋườʔi xák lạʔi bàkɔn ɣần hãʔi dêm lạʔi dâʔi sáŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi kiə cuộk sảnŋiệp nàŋ lạʔi tʰì ŋườʔi buộk fảʔi kòn nếʔuɲư ŋườʔi xôŋ dẹplòŋ cuộk sảnŋiệp nàŋ lạʔi tʰì cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề zằŋ cắk cuộk sảnŋiệp nàŋ lạʔi hãʔi lạʔi ŋủ nơʔi cơn ŋườʔi cɔdến sáŋ vậʔi nàŋ ŋủ nơʔi cơn ŋườʔi cɔdến sáŋ zồʔi zậʔi cướk xi haj ŋườʔi kó tʰế ɲìn ɲăw bô nóʔi zằŋ cớ cɔ ŋườʔita zằŋ kó ŋườʔi vàʔɔ dạp lúʔa ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi hãʔi ɣiơ za áʔɔtơʔi kủʔa nàŋ mặk zồʔi cɔ cắk nàŋ ɣiơ za ŋườʔi cút cɔ sáʔu dấʔu lúʔamạc biểʔu nàŋ dɛm di dɔạn ŋườʔi cở vàʔɔ tʰàɲ zutơ cởvề ɲà bàza mìɲ ŋườʔi hỏʔi kó fảʔi kɔŋáʔi căŋ zutơ tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu bô dã cɔ mìɲ zồʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi kó cɔ tôʔi sáʔu dấʔu lúʔamạc nàʔi zằŋ nàŋ cớ cởvề kùŋ bàza haj tăjxôŋ naômi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi hãʔi dâʔi dể dợʔi sɛm cɔbiết kôŋviệk swăj tʰếnàʔɔ nếʔu ŋàʔinăj việk nàʔi cưʔa zồʔi tʰì ŋườʔi ấʔi cẳŋ ŋỉ dâʔu bô di dến kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋồʔi dó bấʔizờ ŋườʔi kó kwiền cuộk sảnŋiệp bô dã nóʔi dến vừʔa di kwa bô nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛɲ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần ŋồʔi bô cọn mườʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ zằŋ kák ôŋ hãʔi ŋồʔi dâʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ŋồʔi Ðʔɔạn bô nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kó kwiền cuộk sảnŋiệp zằŋ naômi môáp cởvề zaw miếŋ dất kủʔa limêlék ʔɛɲ cúŋta tôʔi báʔɔkáʔɔ cɔ ʔɛɲ hăj nóʔi zằŋ tạʔi cướk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋồʔi dâʔi cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa zânsự tôʔi sin hãʔi mwa sảnŋiệp dó nếʔu ʔɛɲ cuộk sảnŋiệp dó lạʔi tʰì hãʔi di bằŋxôŋ tʰì hãʔi za cɔ tôʔi vì cướk ʔɛɲ cẳŋ ʔaj kó kwiền cuộk lạʔi săw ʔɛɲ kwiền nàʔi cởvề tôʔi ŋườʔi dáp tôʔi cuộk bô ôlạʔi nóʔi xi mwa zuộŋ bởʔi tăj naômi ʔɛɲ kũŋ fảʔi mwa bởʔi zutơ ŋườʔi môáp kủʔa cết dể nốʔi zɛɲ kủʔa cết cɔ sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kó kwiền cuộk lạʔi dáp zằŋ nếʔuvậʔi tôʔi xôŋ cuộk lạʔi dượk ʔɛ fảʔi hủʔihɔạʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa mìɲ sin hãʔi lấʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ kwiền cuộk lạʔi kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ tʰế cuộk dượk vả sưʔa cɔŋ ʔisơzaên xi cuộk lạʔi hăjlà dổʔi ɲăw cɔ cắk lờʔi zawkết tʰì ŋườʔi nàʔi fảʔi kổʔi ɣiầʔi mìɲ caw cɔ ŋườʔi kiə nơʔi ʔisơzaên ấʔilà kác ưŋ cịʔu zawướk vậʔi ŋườʔi kó kwiền cuộk lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ bô zằŋ ʔɛɲ hãʔi cuộk sảnŋiệp dó zồʔi ŋườʔi kổʔi ɣiầʔi mìɲ za bấʔizờ bô nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kả zânsự zằŋ ŋàʔinăj kák ôŋ cứŋkiến zằŋ tôʔi mwa nơʔi tăj naômi mọʔi tàʔisản tʰuộk limêlék kilôn mạklôn kũŋ lấʔi zutơ ŋườʔi môáp kủʔa mạklôn tôʔi dặŋ nốʔi zɛɲ cết cɔ sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi hầʔu cɔ zɛɲ cết xôŋ xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ xỏʔi zânsự kủʔa tʰàɲ ŋườʔi ŋàʔinăj kák ôŋ làmcứŋ diềʔu dó kả zânsự nơʔi kửʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dềʔu dáp zằŋ cúŋtôʔi làmcứŋ diềʔu dó ŋwiệnÐứkzê cɔ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ɲàŋươʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư zɛcên lê ʔa haj ŋườʔi dã zựŋ ɲà ʔisơzaên hãʔi cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ nơʔi zata cɔ nổʔizɛɲ ŋươʔi cɔŋ bếtlêhɛm ŋwiện kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi bởʔi ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ nàʔi cɔ ɲàŋươʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà kủʔa fazết tʰama dã sɛɲ cɔ zuda ɲưvậʔi bô lấʔi zutơ ŋườʔi dilạʔi kùŋ nàŋ Ðứkzê cɔ nàŋ dượk tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj kák ŋườʔi dờn nóʔi kùŋ naômi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê cẳŋ từcốʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kó kwiền cuộk lạʔi ŋwiện zɛɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi cởnên saŋcọŋ nơʔi ʔisơzaên nó ʔanủʔi lòŋ zưỡŋ ɣià ấʔilà zân tʰươŋ dã sɛɲ cɔ nàŋ kwí cɔ bảʔi kɔncaj naômi bồŋ dứʔa cẻ dể vàʔɔ lòŋ mìɲ nuôʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lânkận dặt cɔ zằŋ một dứʔa caj dã sɛɲ cɔ naômi ca kủʔa ʔisaj ôŋ kủʔa Ðʔa nầʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa fazết fazết sɛɲ hếcôn hếcôn sɛɲ zam zam sɛɲ ʔaminadáp ʔaminadáp sɛɲ nahasôn nahasôn sɛɲ sɛɲmôn sɛɲmôn sɛɲ bô bô sɛɲ sɛɲ ʔisaj ʔisaj sɛɲ Ðʔa sưʔa tạʔi zamatʰaimsôfim kó ŋườʔi kwê núʔi zaim ʔɛânkana kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzôham cáʔu kủʔa cắt kủʔa tôhu cít kủʔa sufơ ŋườʔi zaim ʔɛânkana kó haj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nàʔi ʔannɛ ŋườʔi kiə fênina fênina kó kɔn kòn ʔannɛ xôŋ kó mỗʔi ʔɛânkana tʰàɲ mìɲ di silô dặŋ tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkzê kwân zâŋ kủʔa cɔ ŋàʔi tạʔi silô kó haj kɔncaj kủʔa hêli hốpni finê ʔa tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ʔɛânkana zâŋ tʰì ciə kủʔa za từŋ fần cɔ fênina mìɲ cɔ kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi cɔ ʔannɛ fần bằŋ haj ŋườʔitʰươŋ nàŋ zẫʔu zằŋ Ðứkzê xiến cɔ nàŋ sɔnsẻ kẻ fânbì nàŋ xônsiết cêʔuɣẹʔɔ nàŋ dể ɣiụk nàŋ Ðứkzê dã xiến nàŋ sɔnsẻ từ nầʔi dến nămkiə mỗʔi xi nàŋ di dền Ðứkzê cồŋ nàŋ dãʔi nàŋ ɲưvậʔi kòn fênina kứ cêʔuɣẹʔɔ nàŋ ʔannɛ xók xôŋ ʔɛânkana cồŋ nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔiən nɛ saw nàŋ xók kớsaw xôŋ lòŋ buồnbựk zườŋ ấʔi ta cẳŋ dáŋ cɔ nàŋ mườʔi dứʔa kɔncaj săw xi ŋườʔita dã ănuốŋ tạʔi silô zồʔi ʔannɛ dứŋzậʔi lúk ấʔi hêli tʰầʔi dươŋ ŋồʔi cên káʔi ɣế ɣần kửʔa kủʔa dền Ðứkzê ʔannɛ lấʔilàm sầʔu xổ cɔŋ lòŋ vừʔa kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê vừʔa càn ɣiọt nàŋ hứʔa ŋwiện zằŋ Ôʔi Ðứkzê kủʔa kwân nếʔu ŋàʔi dɔáʔi sɛm nỗʔi sầʔu xổ kủʔa kɔndòʔi ŋàʔi ɲớ lạʔi cẳŋ kwên cɔ kɔndòʔi ŋàʔi dứʔa kɔncaj tʰì tôʔi fú zâŋ cọn dờʔi cɔ Ðứkzê zawkạʔɔ cẳŋ dưʔa kwa ŋaŋ dầʔu vì nàŋ kầʔuŋwiện lâʔuzàʔi cướk Ðứkzê hêli căm sɛm miệŋ nàŋ ʔannɛ nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ cỉ ɲópɲép miệŋ tʰôʔi xôŋ kó ʔaj ŋɛ tiếŋ nàŋ hêli tưởŋ nàŋ săj hỏʔi zằŋ cừŋ nàʔɔ nàŋ mớʔi săj hãʔi di ɣiã zượʔu di ʔannɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi vậʔi cúʔa tôʔi dờn kó lòŋ buồnbựk cẳŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà ɣì ʔuốŋ săj ɲưŋ tôʔi ɣiãʔibàʔi lòŋ tôʔi za cướk Ðứkzê cớ tưởŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa ôŋ ŋườʔi dờn zanák nỗʔi dăwdớn ưʔufiền kwádộ kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi fảʔi nóʔi dến bâʔizờ hêli zằŋ hãʔi di bìɲiên ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲậm lờʔi nàŋ dã kầʔusin kùŋ ŋàʔi nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ ŋwiện kɔndòʔi ôŋ dượk cướkmắt ôŋ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi luj za nàŋ cẳŋ kòn za ưʔusầʔu nữʔa kwaŋàʔi săw vợcồŋ zậʔi tʰờ lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê dɔạn cởvề ɲà mìɲ tạʔi zama ʔɛânkana kùŋ ʔannɛ mìɲ Ðứkzê ɲớ dến nàŋ Ðươŋ cɔŋ ʔannɛ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj dặt samuên nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã kầʔusin nơʔi Ðứkzê ʔɛânkana cồŋ nàŋ kả ɲà ŋườʔi di dặŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa hằŋ sɔŋ hứʔa ŋwiện mìɲ ɲưŋan nɛ xôŋ di nóʔi kùŋ cồŋ nàŋ zằŋ xi dứʔa cẻ zứt sữʔa tôʔi zẫn dể zamắt Ðứkzê dó ʔɛânkana cồŋ nàŋ dáp zằŋ hãʔi tʰeo nàŋ cɔ fảʔi lạʔi dâʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàŋ zứt sữʔa cỉn ŋwiện Ðứkzê ứŋŋiệm lờʔi hứʔa kủʔa ŋàʔi vậʔi nàŋ lạʔi ɲà cɔ kɔn dến lúk zứt sữʔa vừʔa xi zứt sữʔa nàŋ zẫn tʰeo mìɲ dến dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi silô kùŋ dɛm tʰeo kɔn dựk fa bầʔu zượʔu Ðứʔa cẻ hãʔi kòn ɲỏ họ ɣiết kɔn dựk zồʔi zẫn dứʔa cẻ dến hêli nàŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sinlỗʔi cúʔa sưʔa kó ŋườʔi dờn dứŋ tạʔi dâʔi ɣần ôŋ dặŋ kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê tôʔi cỉ sɛɲ mạŋ ôŋ tʰề zằŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi dó Ấʔi dứʔa cẻ nầʔi tôʔi kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê dã ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi dã kầʔusin kùŋ ŋàʔi vìvậʔi tôʔi kũŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tôʔi cɔ Ðứkzê cọn dờʔi Ðʔɔạn mẹkɔn dềʔu tʰờ lạʔi tạʔi dó cướk Ðứkzê bấʔizờ ʔannɛ kầʔuŋwiện zằŋ Ðứkzê xiến lòŋ tôʔi xấpxởʔi vuimừŋ và dỡ cɔ tôʔi ŋướk miệŋ tôʔi tʰácdố tʰùŋịc tôʔi vì cửŋ kứʔu ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi dầʔi xɔáʔilạk cẳŋ ʔaj tʰáɲ ɲư Ðứkzê cẳŋ kó cúʔa nàʔɔ xák ŋàʔi xôŋ kó dá nàʔɔ ɲư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta tʰôʔi cớ nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ cớ dể ɲữŋ lờʔi sấksượk za miệŋ kák ŋươʔi nữʔa vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰôŋ mọʔi diềʔu ŋàʔi kânɲắk mọʔi việklàm kủʔa ŋườʔi kâʔi kuŋ kủʔa zõŋ dã ɣãʔi kòn ŋườʔi ʔiếʔu tʰắtlưŋ bằŋ sứklựk kẻ nɔnê fảʔi dặŋ và ŋườʔisưʔa dóʔi dã dượk nɔnê ŋườʔi dờn sɔnsẻ sɛɲ bảʔi kòn ŋườʔi kó ɲiềʔu kɔn za ʔiếʔu Ðứkzê xiến cɔ cết cɔ sốŋ ŋàʔi dɛm ŋườʔi suốŋ zồʔi xiến lạʔi xỏʔi dó Ðứkzê cɔ ŋèʔɔnàn cɔ ɣiàʔukó ŋàʔi ŋườʔi suốŋ lạʔi ɲắk ŋườʔi Ðʔɛm xốnkùŋ za xỏʔi bụʔi dất và zút ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ za ŋɔàʔi dốŋ fân Ðặŋ dể ŋồʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kùŋ cɔ ŋôʔi viɲhiển kơŋiệp vì kák cụ kủʔa cáʔidất tʰuộk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã dặt tʰếzan cên dó Ðứkzê ɣiữ cơn kủʔa kák tʰáɲ ŋàʔi kòn ɲữŋ ák nơʔi tămtốʔi vì cẳŋ zɔ sứk ziêŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk tʰắŋ kẻ nàʔɔ cốŋ kãʔi Ðứkzê fá từ cên cờʔi kaw Ðứkzê kùŋ cúŋnó ŋàʔi dɔán sét bốnfươŋ kủʔa dất ban tʰếlựk cɔ vwa ŋàʔi và cɔ kwiềnnăŋ Ðấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi za ʔɛânkana cởvề ɲà mìɲ tạʔi zama kòn dứʔa cẻ lạʔi fụk Ðứkzê cướk hêli tʰầʔi haj kɔncaj kủʔa hêli ŋườʔi zantà cẳŋ ɲậnbiết Ðứkzê kák tʰầʔi tʰườŋ dãʔi zânsự ɲưvầʔi fàm xi kó ʔaj zâŋ kủʔa tʰì tôʔitớ tʰầʔi dến lúk ŋườʔita nấʔu tʰịt tăikầm cĩʔaba cíc vàʔɔ hɔặk cɔŋ káʔi vạk káʔi cảʔɔ káʔi nồʔi hăjlà cɔŋ cảʔɔ ɲỏ hễ nàʔɔ zíɲ cĩʔaba tʰì tʰầʔi lấʔi kác dốʔivớʔi hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên dến silô lạʔi cướk xi sôŋ tôʔitớ tʰầʔi kũŋ dến nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa zằŋ hãʔi dưʔa tʰịt dể nướŋ cɔ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲậm tʰịt luộk kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲưŋ cỉ ɲậm tʰịt sốŋ tʰôʔi víbằŋ ŋườʔi dó dáp zằŋ ŋườʔita sôŋ săw lấʔi fần ci dẹp ŋươʔi tʰì tôʔitớ dó nóʔi xôŋ ŋườʔi fảʔi cɔ tứktʰì bằŋxôŋ ɣiựt lấʔi tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa haj ŋườʔi caicẻ nầʔi lấʔilàm zất cướk Ðứkzê ɣâʔi cɔ ŋườʔita xiɲbỉ kák kủʔa zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kònsa fụk cướk Ðứkzê ŋườʔi hãʔi kòn tʰơấʔu tʰắtlưŋ káʔi fót bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj mỗʔi ŋườʔi măj cɔ káʔi áʔɔzàʔi ɲỏ dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi cɔŋ xi vớʔi cồŋ dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa hằŋ hêli cúk fướk cɔ ʔɛânkana ŋườʔi zằŋ kầʔusin Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi bởʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi dể dổʔi lấʔi dứʔa nàŋ dã kầʔu nơʔi Ðứkzê vợcồŋ cởvề ɲà mìɲ Ðứkzê dɔáʔi sɛm ʔannɛ nàŋ tʰọtʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj haj kɔŋáʔi kòn ɣã caicẻ samuên xônlớn cướk Ðứkzê vả hêli tuổʔi dã zất kaw dượk hăj mọʔi diềʔu haj kɔncaj mìɲ cɔ kả ʔisơzaên tʰếnàʔɔ kùŋ kák ŋườʔi hầʔu việk tạʔi kửʔa hộʔi mạk ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ cúŋnó zằŋ saw cúŋbăj ɲưvậʔi vì dã ŋɛ kả zânsự nóʔi kák việk sấʔu kủʔa cúŋbăj cẳŋ xá ɲưvậʔi hỡʔi kɔn diềʔu ŋɛ việk băj xôŋ tốtlàɲ băj xiến zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê fạmtộʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi xák Ðứkzê dɔán sét ɲượkbằŋ ŋườʔi fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ʔaj kầʔu tʰăj cɔ sɔŋ cúŋnó xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ca mìɲ Ðứkzê twan ɣiết cúŋnó kòn ɣã caicẻ samuên kứ Ðứkzê ŋườʔita dềʔu lấʔilàm dẹplòŋ ŋườʔi kó ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến hêli nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta cẳŋ za kùŋ ɲà tổfụ ŋươʔi xi kòn tạʔi zíptô hầʔu việk ɲà fazaôn saw ta dã cọn ɲà ấʔi cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa zâŋ kủʔa cên bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ maŋ fót cướk kũŋ dã cɔ ɲà tổfụ ŋươʔi kák kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên zùŋ lửʔa zâŋ vìsaw kák ŋươʔi ɣiàʔidạp zướʔi cơn ɲữŋ hisiɲ kủʔa căj dã cwiền lịɲ zâŋ cɔŋ dền ŋươʔi kíɲcọŋ kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa ɲứt kủʔa ʔisơzaên zânsự bởʔi kớ dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi ta kó fán zằŋ ɲàŋươʔi ɲà ca ŋươʔi dờʔidờʔi hầʔu việk cướk ɲưŋ bâʔizờ Ðứkzê fán diềʔu dó cẳŋ dượk ɲưvậʔi vì fàm ʔaj tônkíɲ cɔ dượk tôncọŋ kòn ʔaj xiɲbỉ xiɲbỉ lạʔi kìʔa tʰìɣiờ dến hủʔi hạʔi mạɲmẽ kủʔa ŋườʔi mạɲmẽ kủʔa ɲà ca ŋươʔi dến dỗʔi cẳŋ kòn ŋườʔizà cɔŋ họhàŋ ŋươʔi nữʔa ɣiữʔa kák fướk làɲ Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cɔ ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ɲàŋươʔi xổ cɔŋ họhàŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kó ŋườʔizà nữʔa nếʔu cɔŋ nộʔi ɲà ŋườʔi kó ŋườʔi xôŋ cuất xỏʔi bàntʰờ ấʔi dể cɔ ŋươʔi mỏʔimắt zầʔu lòŋ kák ɲàŋươʔi sɛɲ cết lúk suânsɛɲ Ðʔiềʔu sảʔi dến cɔ haj kɔnŋươʔi hópni finê ʔa zùŋ zấʔuhiệʔu cɔ ŋươʔi kả haj dềʔu cết cɔŋ ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn cɔ tʰầʔi cuŋtín ŋườʔi tʰeo lòŋ ta kất cɔ ŋườʔi ɲà vữŋbền ŋườʔi di cướk Ðấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ʔaj cɔŋ họhàŋ ŋươʔi kòn sốŋ di dến lạʔi cướk ŋườʔi hầʔu cɔ dượk miếŋ bạk kùŋ báɲ nóʔi zằŋ sin ôŋ hãʔi fɔŋ cɔ tôʔi cứk dể tôʔi dượk miếŋ báɲ samuên tʰơấʔu fụk Ðứkzê tạʔi cướk hêli cɔŋ lúk dó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê lấʔilàm hiếmhɔj ɲữŋ tʰấʔi cẳŋ năŋ kó vả bấʔizờ hêli xởʔi làŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi zõ kó ŋàʔiciə ŋườʔi dươŋ tạʔicỗ mìɲ kwɛn dèn kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cưʔa samuên ŋủ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê nơʔi kó káʔi tʰáɲ bấʔizờ Ðứkzê ɣọʔi samuên ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cạʔi dến ɣần hêli zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi ôŋ kó kêʔu tôʔi hêli dáp ta xôŋ kêʔu hãʔi ŋủ lạʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi di ŋủ lạʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi ɣọʔi nữʔa zằŋ hỡʔisa samuên cổʔi zậʔi di dếnkùŋ hêli zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi ôŋ dã kêʔu tôʔi ŋườʔi dáp hỡʔi kɔn xôŋ kêʔu hãʔi di ŋủ lạʔi di vả samuên cưʔa ɣiêhôva lờʔi Ðứkzê cưʔa dượk bàʔitỏ za cɔ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi ɣọʔi samuên tʰứba ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi di dến ɣần hêli zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi ôŋ dã kêʔu tôʔi bấʔizờ hêli hiểʔu zằŋ Ðứkzê ɣọʔi dứʔa cẻ ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ samuên zằŋ hãʔi di ŋủ di nếʔu kó ʔaj ɣọʔi kɔn kɔn hãʔi nóʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi fán tôʔitớ ŋàʔi dươŋ ŋɛ vậʔi samuên di tạʔicỗ mìɲ Ðứkzê dến dứŋ tạʔi dó ɣọʔi ɲư kák cướk hỡʔisa hỡʔi samuên samuên tʰưʔa sin hãʔi fán tôʔitớ ŋàʔi dươŋ ŋɛ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ samuên zằŋ nầʔi za cɔŋ ʔisơzaên fàm ʔaj ŋɛ dến taj fảʔi lùŋbùŋ bấʔizờ ứŋŋiệm nơʔi hêli kák lờʔi hămzọʔa dã fán ɲà ŋườʔi xởʔisự cɔ hɔàntʰàɲ ta kó báʔɔ cướk zằŋ dɔán sét ɲà ŋườʔi dờʔidờʔi ŋườʔi dã táɲ kwáʔiɣở kủʔa kák kɔncaj mìɲ xôŋ kấm bởʔi kớ dó tʰề kùŋ ɲà hêli zằŋ tộʔifạm kủʔa ɲà ấʔi cẳŋ cuộk dượk hɔặk bởʔi hisiɲ hăjlà bởʔi kủʔa căj samuên ŋủ cɔdến sáŋ dɔạn kák kửʔa dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi xôŋ zám tʰuật tʰấʔi nầʔi cɔ hêli ɲưŋê ɣọʔi samuên zằŋ samuên hỡʔi kɔn ŋườʔi tʰưʔa kó tôʔi dâʔi hêli nóʔi Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ kɔn lờʔi ɣì sin kɔn dừŋ ɣiấʔu ci kùŋ nếʔu kɔn ɣiấʔu tʰí ci cɔŋ mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ kɔn ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fạt kɔn nặŋnề samuên tʰuật lạʔi cẳŋ ɣiấʔu ɣì vớʔi ŋườʔi hêli dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà Ðứkzê ŋwiện ŋàʔi diềʔu dẹp ŋàʔi samuên cởnên xônlớn Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ dể lờʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi za từÐʔan cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu zằŋ samuên dượk tiênci kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kứ za tạʔi silô ấʔi tạʔi silô Ðứkzê za kùŋ samuên xiến cɔ ŋườʔi lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi lờʔi kủʔa samuên dượk zaw cwiền cɔ kả ʔisơzaên ʔisơzaên za cận dón ɲữŋ ŋườʔi filitin dóŋ cạʔi ɣần sɛ kòn ŋườʔi filitin dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ʔafék zânfi zàn cận dáɲ ʔisơzaên lúk ɣiápcận ʔisơzaên zân filitin dáɲbạʔi ɣiết tạʔi ciếncườŋ ướk ŋàn ŋườʔi xi zânsự dã cởvề cạʔi kwân kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ kớsaw ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê dể cɔ zân filitin dáɲbạʔi cúŋta cúŋta hãʔi di tʰỉɲ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi silô fảʔi dɛm dó tạʔi ɣiữʔa cúŋta ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta xỏʔi tăj kừʔudịc cúŋta vậʔi zânsự saj ɲữŋ sứɣiả dến silô dó dɛm zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân Ðấŋ ŋự ɣiữʔa kák cêzubin haj kɔncaj kủʔa hêli hópni finê ʔa dềʔu di tʰeo zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xi zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu zeo tiếŋ vuimừŋ dến dỗʔi dất fảʔi zúŋdộŋ xi zân filitin ŋɛ tiếŋ ấʔi hỏʔi zằŋ tiếŋ zeo mừŋ cɔŋ cạʔi kwân hêbơzơ kóŋĩʔa ci tʰìkó ŋườʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ cúŋ hăj zằŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dã dến cɔŋ cạʔi kwân zânfi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi dã ŋự dến cɔŋ cạʔi kwân zồʔi zằŋ xốnnạn cɔ cúŋta tʰăj xi cướk cẳŋ kó sảʔiza ɲưvậʔi xốnnạn cɔ cúŋta tʰăj ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta xỏʔi tăj kák tʰần kwiềnnăŋ zườŋ kiə Ấʔilà kák tʰần dó dã hàɲ hạʔi zân zíptô dủ kák tʰứ tajvạ tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi filitin hãʔi mạɲbạʔɔ hãʔi cượŋfu kẻʔɔ kák ŋươʔi cở tôʔimọʔi zân hêbơzơ ɲư dã tôʔimọʔi kák ŋươʔi căŋ xá cượŋfu ciếndấʔu di vậʔi zân filitin ciếndấʔu ʔisơzaên bạʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cạʔi cốn cạʔi mìɲ Ấʔilà bạʔicận líɲ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋã cết hòm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kướp lấʔi kòn haj kɔncaj hêli hópni finê ʔa dềʔu cết một ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin cạʔi cốn xỏʔi ɣiặk dến tạʔi silô nộʔi ŋàʔi dó kwầnáʔɔ zác za dầʔu dóŋ bụʔi kát xi ŋườʔi ấʔi dến hêli dươŋ ŋồʔi cên ɣế mìɲ tạʔi dườŋ côŋdợʔi kác áʔináʔi lòŋ hêli zunsợ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi vàʔɔ tʰàɲ báʔɔ dó kả tʰàɲ kêʔula hêli ŋɛ tiếŋlà nầʔi tʰì nóʔi sự ồnàʔɔ nầʔi ci tứktʰì ŋườʔi dó lậtdật báʔɔ cɔ hêli vả hêli dã cín mươʔi tuổʔi duj xôŋ tʰế tʰấʔi dượk ŋườʔi dó nóʔi kùŋ hêli zằŋ tôʔi ŋườʔiở ciếncườŋ dến ŋàʔinăj tôʔi dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi kơn cận hêli hỏʔi zằŋ hỡʔi kɔn dã sảʔiza làmsaw sứɣiả zằŋ ʔisơzaên dã cạʔi cốn cướk zân filitin zânsự dạʔibạʔi lạʔi haj kɔncaj kủʔa ôŋ hópni finê ʔa dã cết kủʔa Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi dã kướp lấʔi ŋườʔi vừʔa nóʔi dến kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì hêli ŋãŋửʔa suốŋ xỏʔi ɣế mìɲ fíʔa kửʔa ɣãʔi kổ cết ŋườʔi dã ɣiàʔiếʔu nặŋnề ŋườʔi dã kwan sét cɔ ʔisơzaên cɔŋ mươʔi kɔn zâʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa finê ʔa dươŋ kótʰaj ɣần dẻ xi nàŋ ŋɛ việk kướp lấʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ hăj zằŋ ôŋza cồŋ mìɲ dã cết tʰì tʰìɲlìɲ dăwdớn xòm suốŋ dẻ cɔŋ lúk nàŋ ɣần cết kák ŋườʔi dànbà kómặt dó nóʔi zằŋ cớ ci nàŋ dã sɛɲ kɔncaj ɲưŋ nàŋ xôŋ dáp lạʔi cẳŋ dếmsỉʔa ci kák lờʔi dó nàŋ dặt cɔ dứʔa cẻ ʔicabốt nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ sự viɲhiển dã lìʔa xỏʔi ʔisơzaên nàŋ nóʔi ŋụý kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cết kủʔa ôŋza cồŋ mìɲ nàŋ lạʔi tʰật viɲhiển kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã zồʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kướp lấʔi filitin lấʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi di sɛ tớʔi Ác dốt Ðʔɔạn cúŋ lấʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi di vàʔɔ dền Ðʔa ɣôn dể Ðʔa ɣôn sáŋ ŋàʔisăw zân Ác dốt zậʔi tʰấʔi Ðʔa ɣôn sảʔi suốŋ dất cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê cúŋnó dɛm Ðʔa ɣôn dặt lạʔi tạʔicỗ ŋàʔisăw cúŋnó cở vàʔɔ Ðʔa ɣôn lạʔi kòn suốŋ dất cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔu haj tăj dềʔu zơʔi za cên ŋạc kửʔa cỉ kòn káʔi mìɲ tʰôʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả kủʔa Ðʔa ɣôn fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền dềʔu cáɲ xôŋ dặt cơn cên ŋạc kửʔa ɲưŋ tăj Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa cên zânsự Ác dốt zẫn tàɲạʔi dến cɔŋ sứ cúŋnó lấʔi bịɲ cĩ lậʔu hàɲ hạʔi Ác dốt dịʔafận zânÁc dốt tʰấʔi mìɲ ɲưvậʔi kêʔu zằŋ hòm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔisơzaên cớ nơʔi cúŋta tăj ŋàʔi ɣiáŋọʔa cên cúŋta cên Ðʔa ɣôn tʰần kủʔa cúŋta cúŋ saj tʰỉɲ ɲóm hếttʰảʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân filitin hỏʔi zằŋ cúŋta làmsaw kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên kák kwan cưởŋ dáp fảʔi dɛm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dến ɣát ŋườʔita dɛm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dến dó ŋườʔita vừʔa dɛm di tʰì tăj Ðứkzê fạt tʰàɲ ấʔi xiến cɔ kiɲ xiếp zất ŋàʔi hàɲ hạʔi zân tʰàɲ dó dứʔa ɲỏ cɔdến ŋườʔilớn cúŋ dềʔu bịɲ cĩ lậʔu fát za bấʔizờ cúŋnó saj ɣởʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến Ék zôn xi dến zân Ék zôn kêʔula zằŋ ŋườʔita xiêŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ dặŋ ɣiết cúŋta zânsự cúŋta cúŋnó saj tʰỉɲ ɲóm hếttʰảʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân filitin nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi xiêŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên di dể cởvề nơʔi kũ cớ cɔ cúŋta zânsự cúŋta fảʔi cết vì cɔŋ mọʔi tʰàɲ dềʔu kó kiɲ xiếp hầʔu cết tăj Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa tạʔi dó kác zữtợn ɲữŋ nàʔɔ xôŋ cết tʰì bịɲ cĩ lậʔu tiếŋ kêʔula kủʔa tʰàɲ dến cờʔi hòm kủʔa Ðứkzê bảʔi tʰáŋ cɔŋ sứ zân filitin Ðʔɔạn zân filitin ɣọʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả tʰuậtsĩ hỏʔi zằŋ cúŋta fảʔi làmci kủʔa Ðứkzê hãʔi nóʔi cɔ cúŋta kác nàʔɔ fảʔi cả ấʔi nơʔi kũ cúŋnó dáp nếʔu kák ŋườʔi ɣởʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰìcớ ɣởʔi di xôŋ ɲưŋ fảʔi cả cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa cuộk lỗʔi zồʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk cữʔa làɲ tạʔi kớsaw ŋàʔi xôŋ ŋừŋ ɣiáŋọʔa cên kák ŋươʔi cúŋnó hỏʔi kủʔa ci cúŋta fảʔi cả cɔ ŋàʔi dặŋ cuộk lỗʔi zằŋ năm káʔi hìɲ cĩ lậʔu bằŋ vàŋ kɔn cuột bằŋ vàŋ tʰeo kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân filitin hếttʰảʔi kák ŋươʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dềʔu dồŋ tajhọʔa hãʔi kák hìɲ cĩ lậʔu ɲữŋ hìɲ kɔn cuột fá sứsở zồʔi tônviɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kólẽ ŋàʔi ɲẹtăj cên kák ŋươʔi cên tʰần sứ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi saw kák ŋươʔi kứŋ lòŋ ɲư zân zíptô fazaôn dã săw xi Ðứkzê dã tʰihàɲ kwiềnnăŋ cên zân zíptô cẳŋ dể cɔ ʔisơzaên di saw hè hãʔi dóŋ káʔi sɛ mớʔi haj kɔn káʔi kòn cɔ cưʔa maŋ ác tʰắŋ vàʔɔ sɛ zồʔi zẫn kák kɔnɲỏ cúŋnó vàʔɔ cuồŋ kế dó hãʔi lấʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dể cên sɛ zồʔi cɔŋ káʔi cắp ɲữŋ dồ bằŋ vàŋ kák ŋươʔi zâŋ cả cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa cuộk lỗʔi dặt ɣần hôŋ Ðʔɔạn hãʔi dể cɔ káʔi di sɛmcừŋ nếʔu di fíʔa sứ tứk hướŋ bếtsêmết tʰì Ðứkzê dã ɣiáŋọʔa nầʔi cên cúŋta bằŋxôŋ cúŋta cẳŋ fảʔi tăj ŋàʔi dã hàɲ hạʔi cúŋta ɲưŋ kák diềʔu dó sảʔi dến tìɲkờ dó tʰôʔi ŋườʔifi dềʔu ɲưvậʔi haj kɔn káʔi kòn cɔ tʰắŋ vàʔɔ káʔi sɛ zồʔi ɲốt kák kɔnɲỏ cúŋnó cɔŋ cuồŋ cúŋ dể kủʔa Ðứkzê cên sɛ vớʔi káʔi cắp kó kɔn cuột bằŋ vàŋ hìɲ cĩ lậʔu haj kɔn káʔi di tʰẳŋ tʰeo dườŋ bếtsêmết vừʔa di vừʔa zốŋ xôŋ sâʔi hữʔu kũŋ xôŋ sâʔi kák kwan cưởŋ zân filitin di tʰeo cɔdến bờkõʔi bếtsêmết bấʔizờ zân bếtsêmết dươŋ ɣặt lúʔamì cɔŋ cũŋ ŋướk tʰấʔi káʔi tʰì lấʔilàm vuimừŋ káʔi sɛ dến cɔŋ zuộŋ kủʔa ɣiôsuê tạʔi bếtsêmết zừŋ lạʔi dó nơʔi ấʔi kó dá ŋườʔita bửʔa ɣỗ kủʔa sɛ zâŋ haj káʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê ŋườʔilê kất kủʔa Ðứkzê suốŋ xỏʔi sɛ vớʔi káʔi cắp dựŋ ɲữŋ bằŋ vàŋ dể cên dá cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi bếtsêmết zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák kủʔa xák cɔ Ðứkzê năm kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân filitin dã tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tʰì nộʔi ŋàʔi cởvề Ék zôn nầʔi hìɲ cĩ lậʔu bằŋ vàŋ zân filitin zâŋ cả cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa cuộk lỗʔi káʔi kủʔa Ác dốt káʔi kủʔa ɣasa káʔi kủʔa Ác káʔi kủʔa ɣát káʔi kủʔa Ék zôn cúŋnó lạʔi zâŋ cả tʰêm hìɲ kɔn cuột vàŋ bằŋ bawɲiêʔu sốtʰàɲ filitin tʰuộk kwan cưởŋ hɔặk tʰàɲ kiênkố hăjlà làŋ ɲàkwê hòn dá ấʔi nơʔi ŋườʔita dể kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi cɔŋ zuộŋ kủʔa ɣiôsuê ŋườʔi bếtsêmết diềʔu dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi zân bếtsêmết cúŋnó kó ɲìn vàʔɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi hàɲ hạʔi bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa zânsự zânsự dềʔu dểtaŋ Ðứkzê dã hàɲ hạʔi tajvạ zất nặŋ bấʔizờ zân bếtsêmết nóʔi ʔaj kótʰể dứŋ nổʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cí tʰáɲ xi lìʔa xỏʔi cúŋta tʰì di dến ʔaj cúŋnó saj dến zân kiziátzêʔazim nóʔi zằŋ zânfi dã dɛm kủʔa Ðứkzê hãʔi di suốŋ dɛm nơʔi kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔici ziátzêʔazim dến tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê dɛm vàʔɔ ɲà ʔabinadáp cên ɣò nổŋ zồʔi ziêŋ lêʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi dặŋ kɔj ɣiữ kủʔa Ðứkzê hòm kủʔa Ðứkzê dể tạʔi kiziátzêʔazim lâʔu ŋàʔi dến dỗʔi cảʔi kwa haimươʔi kả ɲà ʔisơzaên dềʔu tʰan ɲớ Ðứkzê bấʔizờ samuên nóʔi kùŋ kả ɲà ʔisơzaên zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi tʰật hếtlòŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰì xá kất xỏʔi ɣiữʔa kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ tʰần tượŋ hếtlòŋ tʰeo Ðứkzê cỉ fụk mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi tʰôʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj zân filitin zân ʔisơzaên zẹp ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ kủʔa baɛɲ kủʔa zồʔi fụk mộtmìɲ Ðứkzê tʰôʔi Ðʔɔạn samuên nóʔi hãʔi ɲóm kả ʔisơzaên tạʔi mícba kầʔu Ðứkzê ɣiùm cɔ kák ŋươʔi cúŋộʔi tạʔi mícba múk nướk dổ za cướk Ðứkzê cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cúŋ kữ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê samuên dɔán sét zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi mícba xi zân filitin dã hăj zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên hộʔi tạʔi mícba tʰì kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cúŋnó dáɲ ʔisơzaên ŋɛ nàʔi zân ʔisơzaên zunsợ cướk zân filitin nóʔi kùŋ samuên zằŋ sin cớ cúŋtôʔi ŋừŋ kêʔukầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dể ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi tăj zân filitin samuên kɔnciên kɔn kòn zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi cɔŋ lúk samuên zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zân filitin dến ɣần dặŋ zawciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê xiến vaŋ cên zân filitin cɔ tʰwa cạʔi cúŋnó dáɲbạʔi cướk ʔisơzaên zân ʔisơzaên mícba za duổʔi tʰeo zân filitin dáɲ cúŋnó cɔdến zướʔi bếtkạt bấʔizờ samuên lấʔi dá zựŋ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ mícba sɛn dặt sɛ vì ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã kứʔuzúp cúŋtôʔi dến bâʔizờ zânfi fụk cẳŋ kòn sâmlấn dịʔafận kủʔa ʔisơzaên nữʔa cọn dờʔi samuên tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲận cên zân filitin kák tʰàɲ zân filitin dã ciếm lấʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ék zôn dến ɣát dềʔu dượk cả lạʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên ʔisơzaên ɣiảʔitʰɔát dịʔahạt kák tʰàɲ ấʔi xỏʔi tăj zân filitin bèn kó hòʔabìɲ ɣiữʔa ʔisơzaên zân ʔamôzít samuên kwan sét cɔ ʔisơzaên cọn dờʔi mìɲ mỗʔi ŋườʔi tuầɲàɲ xắp bêtên ɣiɲɣɛɲ mícba dɔán sét zânsự cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ ấʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cởvề zama nơʔi kó ɲà ŋườʔi zama ŋườʔi kũŋ dɔán sét ʔisơzaên bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi dó xisa dã ɣià tʰì kák kɔncaj mìɲ kwan sét cɔ ʔisơzaên kɔn dầʔulòŋ ɣiôên kɔntʰứ ʔabiza haj ŋườʔi dɔán sét tạʔi bê ʔɛsêba ɲưŋ haj kɔncaj ŋườʔi cẳŋ nɔj tʰeo ɣươŋ ŋườʔi siêʔulòŋ tʰam kủʔa ɲậm lấʔi hốʔilộ cáʔi lệc kôŋbìɲ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ dềʔu lạʔi dến samuên tạʔi zama nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa ôŋ dã ɣiàʔiếʔu kòn kák kɔncaj ôŋ lạʔi cẳŋ nɔj tʰeo ɣươŋ kủʔa ôŋ bâʔizờ sin hãʔi cên cúŋtôʔi vwa dặŋ dɔán sét cúŋtôʔi ʔiɲư kák zântộk xák dã kó zồʔi kák lờʔi cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi vwa dặŋ dɔán sét cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ dẹp samuên samuên kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ samuên zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi zânsự nóʔi kùŋ kùŋ ŋươʔi ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi cúŋnó từcốʔi ŋươʔi dâʔu từcốʔi dó hầʔu cɔ cẳŋ kaicị cúŋnó nữʔa cúŋnó dốʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi ʔiɲư cúŋnó dã tʰườŋ xi dɛm cúŋnó za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cúŋnó dã lìʔabỏ dặŋ hầʔu việk kák tʰần xák vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi cúŋnó sɔŋ cớ kwên báʔɔkáʔɔ cɔ cúŋnó kác ŋiêmcaŋ za cɔbiết vwa kaicị cúŋnó dó dãʔi cúŋnó za làmsaw samuên tʰuật lạʔi mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ zânsự dã kầʔusin ŋàʔi vwa zằŋ nàʔi kác kủʔa vwa kaicị kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔi kɔncaj kák ŋươʔi dặŋ dáɲ sɛ mìɲ hɔặk dặt vàʔɔ kwân dể cạʔi cướk sɛ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cúŋnó cưởŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi cưởŋ nămmươʔi ŋườʔi hɔặk cúŋnó kàʔi zuộŋ ŋườʔi ɣặt mùʔamàŋ ŋườʔi cếtạʔɔ biɲxí ŋườʔi dồdạk kủʔa sɛcộ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰợ cế zầʔu tʰơm dầʔubếp tʰợ báɲmì ŋườʔi tʰâʔu ɲất kủʔa zuộŋ ɲɔ kâʔi livɛ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dặŋ fát cɔ tôʔitớ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dáɲ tʰuế fần mườʔi ŋũkốk ɲɔ kák ŋươʔi fânfát cɔ ɲữŋ hɔạnkwan tôʔitớ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi caicáŋ hạŋ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dến dỗʔi kɔn lừʔa kák ŋươʔi zùŋ vàʔɔ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dáɲ tʰuế fần mườʔi ɲữŋ bầʔi ciên kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi tôʔimọʔi ŋườʔi bấʔizờ kák ŋươʔi kêʔula kớ vwa kák ŋươʔi dã cọn ɲưŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ ŋɛ kák ŋươʔi dâʔu zânsự cốʔi xôŋ ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa samuên zằŋ xôŋ fảʔi kó vwa cên cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲư kák zântộk xák vwa cúŋtôʔi dɔán sét cúŋtôʔi di cướk dầʔu cúŋtôʔi dáɲ ɣiặk cɔ cúŋtôʔi samuên ŋɛ mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa zânsự tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ samuên zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ cúŋnó cɔ cúŋnó vwa bấʔizờ samuên nóʔi kùŋ kák ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔainấʔi hãʔi cởvề tʰàɲ mìɲ bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin kíc kɔncaj ʔabiên cáʔu sêzô cắt bêkôzát cít ʔafiák kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi bêŋamin kíc ŋườʔi zõŋ kó kɔncaj săwlơ kòn cẻ lịcsự cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ ʔaj lịcsự bằŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kaw kả zânsự vaj cởlên một ŋàʔiciə ɲữŋ lừʔa káʔi kủʔa kíc ca săwlơ lạk kíc nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm tʰeo tôʔitớ di ɲữŋ lừʔa káʔi ŋườʔi di xắp núʔi zaim xắp sứ salisa xôŋ dượk lạʔi cảʔi kwa sứ salim sứ bêŋiəmin sɔŋ kũŋ xôŋ ɣặp cɔŋ sứ sufơ săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ tʰeo mìɲ zằŋ nầʔi cúŋta hãʔi cởvề kẻʔɔ ca dãdàɲ lừʔa lạʔi lɔ cɔ cúŋta căŋ kẻ tôʔitớ dáp kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ cɔŋ tʰàɲ nầʔi kó ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi zất tôncọŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi cướk diềʔu ứŋŋiệm cẳŋ saj vậʔi cúŋta hãʔi di dến dó kólẽ ŋườʔi cỉ cɔ cúŋta kɔn dườŋ fảʔi nươŋ tʰeo săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ fảʔi cúŋta hãʔi di dó ɲưŋ cúŋta fảʔi lấʔi ɣì zâŋ cɔ ŋườʔi kák baw cúŋta dềʔu lươŋtʰựk cúŋta cẳŋ kòn nàʔɔ dể zâŋ cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kòn ci kẻ tôʔitớ zằŋ tôʔi kó cɔŋ mìɲ mộtfầntư siếk bạk tôʔi zâŋ bạk dó cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi cỉ dườŋ cɔ cúŋta tʰuở sưʔa cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita dicầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì tʰườŋ nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi di ŋườʔi ŋườʔi tʰiêɲạ ŋàʔinăj ɣọʔilà tiênci ŋàʔisưʔa ɣọʔilà ŋườʔi săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ zằŋ ŋươʔi nóʔi fảʔi cúŋta hãʔi di haj ŋườʔi di dến tʰàɲ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xi haj ŋườʔi di lêndườŋ zốk tʰàɲ tʰì ɣặp ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi cẻ di za múk mướk hỏʔi zằŋ Ðấŋ kó dâʔi căŋ kák kɔŋáʔi cẻ dáp zằŋ kó kìʔa ŋườʔiở dằŋ cướk ôŋ ɲưŋ hãʔi di măw ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔi dến tʰàɲ bởʔi bátáɲ kó việk tạʔi nơʔi kaw xi vàʔɔ tʰàɲ haj ôŋ cắk ɣặp ŋườʔi cướk xi cưʔa nơʔi kaw dặŋ zự bátáɲ xôŋ cướk xi ŋườʔi dến ŋườʔi fảʔi cúk fướk cɔ kủʔa sɔŋ zồʔi kák ŋườʔi zự tiệk mớʔi vậʔi hãʔi di nộʔi ŋàʔinăj haj ôŋ cắk ɣặp ŋườʔi haj ŋườʔi di tʰàɲ xi vừʔa vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ɣặp samuên di za dặŋ nơʔi kaw vả ŋàʔicướk xi săwlơ dến Ðứkzê za cɔ samuên zằŋ ŋàʔimaj tạʔi ɣiờ nầʔi saj ŋườʔiở sứ bêŋiəmin dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔilàm vwa kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu zân xỏʔi tăj zân filitin dã dɔáʔi sɛm zân tiếŋ kủʔa cúŋ dã tʰấʔu dến xisa tʰấʔi săwlơ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi dã bảʔɔ ŋươʔi ấʔi ŋườʔi kwảncị zân săwlơ dến ɣần samuên tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sin ôŋ hãʔi cỉ cɔ tôʔi ɲà kủʔa dấŋ samuên dáp kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ ta dấŋ dâʔi hãʔi di cướk nơʔi kaw ŋàʔinăj haj ŋươʔi bữʔa kùŋ dến maj cɔ ŋươʔi mọʔi diềʔu cɔŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi dɔạn dể ŋươʔi di kòn ɲữŋ lừʔa káʔi ŋươʔi dã ŋàʔinăj cớ lɔlắŋ cúŋnó dã dượk zồʔi vảlạʔi mọʔi kwícọŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên dã zàɲ cɔ ʔaj há cẳŋ fảʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ kả ɲà kủʔa ca ŋươʔi saw săwlơ dáp tôʔi cỉ ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin cifáʔi ɲỏ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ɲà tôʔi lạʔi kák ɲà kủʔa cifáʔi bêŋiəmin ɲân saw ôŋ nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi ɣiọŋ ɲưvậʔi samuên zẫn săwlơ tôʔitớ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ fòŋ zồʔi mờʔi ŋồʔi cỗ tʰứ ɲất cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi zự tiệk cừŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi bấʔizờ samuên nóʔi kùŋ dầʔubếp zằŋ hãʔi bưŋ fần dã caw cɔ ŋươʔi dã zặn dể ziêŋ za Ðầʔu lấʔi cả vaj miếŋ bọk cuŋkwɛɲ dɛm zọn cɔ săwlơ samuên zằŋ kìʔa miếŋ dã dểzàɲ cɔ ŋươʔi cướk ŋươʔi hãʔi di xi dịɲ mờʔi zânsự dã ɣiữ lạʔi tiệk nầʔi vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó săwlơ bữʔa kùŋ samuên Ðʔɔạn cúŋ dềʔu suốŋ xỏʔi nơʔi kaw vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ kòn samuên còcwiện kùŋ săwlơ cên máʔi ɲà kwaŋàʔi săw haj ŋườʔi zậʔi xi hừŋ dôŋ samuên ɣọʔi săwlơ cên máʔi ɲà nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi dưʔa ŋươʔi di săwlơ dứŋzậʔi zồʔi samuên săwlơ kả haj dồŋ di za xi dến dầʔu tʰàɲ samuên nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ hãʔi cwiền cɔ tôʔitớ di cướk cúŋta kẻ tôʔitớ di cướk ŋườʔi zằŋ bâʔizờ hãʔi zừŋ lạʔi dể nóʔi cɔ ŋuơʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi samuên lấʔi vɛ ɲỏ dựŋ zầʔu dổ cên dầʔu săwlơ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔiÐứkzê dã sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi dặŋ ŋươʔi vwa kủʔa kơŋiệp ŋàʔi ŋàʔinăj xi dã lìʔa xỏʔi ŋươʔi ɣặp haj ŋườʔi ɣần zɛcɛn cên bờkõʔi sứ bêŋiəmin tạʔi sếtsa nóʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ lừʔa káʔi ŋươʔi di dã ɣặp dượk zồʔi nàʔi ca ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn lɔ dến lừʔa káʔi nữʔa ɲưŋ lạʔi lɔsợ kák ŋươʔi hỏʔi zằŋ fảʔi lɔliệʔu saw kɔncaj từ dó ŋươʔi di tớʔi dến kâʔi zẻ tʰabô ŋươʔi ɣặp ŋườʔi di bêtên dặŋ tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi cở kɔn zê dựk ŋườʔi dɛm báɲ ŋườʔi tʰứba dɛm bầʔu za zượʔu cúŋ càʔɔ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi haj báɲ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɲận lấʔi nơʔi tăj cúŋ kế săw ŋươʔi dến ɣibê ʔa nơʔi kó káʔi dồn kủʔa zân filitin xi dã vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi ɣặp dɔàn tiênci nơʔi kaw suốŋ kó dờn cốŋkơm ốŋ sáʔɔ dờn kầm di cướk nóʔi tiênci tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ ŋươʔi nóʔi tiênci kùŋ cúŋ zồʔi ŋươʔi hóʔaza ŋườʔi xák xi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi kák zấʔuhiệʔu nầʔi sảʔiza tʰì tùʔicơ vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn hãʔi di suốŋ cướk dến ɣiɲɣɛɲ tʰeo ŋươʔi dó dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù ŋươʔi dợʔi bảʔi ŋàʔi cɔdến cừŋ tớʔi bấʔizờ zạʔi ŋươʔi diềʔu fảʔi săwlơ vừʔa sâʔi lưŋ lìʔa xỏʔi samuên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dổʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi za xák kák zấʔuhiệʔu dã bảʔɔ cướk diềʔu ứŋŋiệm nộʔi ŋàʔi ấʔi xisăw dến ɣibê ʔa kó dɔàn tiênci dến dón ŋườʔi tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi tiênci ɣiữʔa cúŋ xi ɲữŋ kwɛnbiết săwlơ cướk tʰấʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi tiênci vớʔi kák dấŋ tiênci tʰì hỏʔi ɲăw zằŋ kɔncaj kủʔa kíc dã sảʔiza làmsaw săwlơ kũŋ vàʔɔ kák tiênci kó ŋườʔiở ɣibê ʔa dáp zằŋ mà ca ʔaj bởʔi dó kó kâʔu ŋạnŋữ zằŋ săwlơ kũŋ vàʔɔ kák tiênci xisăw tʰôʔi nóʔi tiênci tʰì di nơʔi kaw cú săw hỏʔi ŋườʔi tôʔitớ zằŋ haj ŋươʔi di dâʔu săwlơ tʰưʔa zằŋ Ðʔi ɲữŋ lừʔa káʔi xôŋ ɣặp dượk cúŋtôʔi kó kầʔu samuên cú săw zằŋ sin cáʔu hãʔi cɔ cú biếtdiềʔu samuên dã nóʔi kùŋ haj ŋươʔi săwlơ tʰưʔa kùŋ cúmìɲ zằŋ ŋườʔi dã zạʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi zằŋ lừʔa káʔi dã dượk zồʔi ɲưŋsăw xôŋ ɣì samuên dã nóʔi việk nướk samuên ɲóm zânsự cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi mícba zồʔi nóʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã dɛm ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi zíptô dã ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj zân zíptô xỏʔi tăj mọʔi vwa kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi từcốʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi mọʔi hɔạnnạn ŋwihiểm kák ŋươʔi dã tʰưʔa kùŋ ŋàʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi vwa kwảncị cúŋtôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ứŋ hầʔu cướk Ðứkzê cifáʔi hằŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi samuên biểʔu mọʔi cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dến ɣần zồʔi cifáʔi bêŋiəmin dượk cỉdịɲ ŋườʔi biểʔu cifáʔi bêŋiəmin dến ɣần họhàŋ zồʔi máci dượk cỉdịɲ Ðʔɔạn săwlơ kɔncaj kủʔa kíc dượk cỉdịɲ ŋườʔita săwlơ ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi cúŋ hỏʔi lạʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ kòn kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xák dến dâʔi căŋ Ðứkzê dáp kìʔa cɔŋ dồdạk kiə ŋườʔita cạʔi ŋườʔi tạʔicỗ dó săwlơ zamặt ɣiữʔa zânsự ŋườʔi kaw kả cúŋ vaj cởlên samuên nóʔi kùŋ kả zânsự zằŋ kák ŋườʔi kó tʰấʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkzê dã cọn căŋ cɔŋ kả zânsự xôŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi dềʔu tuŋô zằŋ ŋwiện vwa samuên twiên ɣiảŋ luậtfáp kủʔa nướk tạʔi cướk zânsự cép cɔŋ kuốn sác ŋườʔi dể cướk Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn samuên cɔ kả zânsự ʔaj ɲà nấʔi săwlơ kũŋ ɲà mìɲ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zõŋ cịʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ lòŋ dềʔu di tʰeo ŋườʔi sɔŋ kó mấʔi ŋươʔi fỉ dồ nóʔi zằŋ hắn dó kứʔuzúp cúŋta dượkviệk ci cúŋnó xiɲzể ŋườʔi xôŋ dɛm ɣì cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋsăw ɣiảdò xôŋ ŋɛ nahác ŋườʔi ʔammôn di za dến vâʔi zabɛ cɔŋ ɣalaát kả zân zabɛ nóʔi kùŋ nahác zằŋ hãʔi ướk kùŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi fụk ôŋ nahác ŋườʔi ʔammôn dáp zằŋ ta ướk kùŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰeo kác nầʔi fảʔi xɔét hếttʰảʔi kɔn hữʔu kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dể zeo sỉɲụk cɔ kả ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zabɛ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi bảʔi ŋàʔi dìɲciến cúŋtôʔi saj sứɣiả dến xắp dịʔafận ʔisơzaên nếʔuxôŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi di za hàŋdầʔu vậʔi ɲữŋ sứɣiả di dến ɣibê ʔa tʰàɲ kủʔa săwlơ tʰuật lạʔi kák lờʔi ấʔi cɔ zânsự ŋɛ kả zânsự kấttiếŋ xók lúk ấʔi săwlơ zuộŋ cởvề disăw mìɲ ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ kớ ci zânsự xók ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔita tʰuật lạʔi lờʔi kák ŋườʔi zabɛ dã nóʔi vừʔa ŋɛ nầʔi săwlơ dượk tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ kơn ɣiận ŋườʔi nổʔi fừŋfừŋ ŋườʔi kặp za từŋ miếŋ ɣởʔi cɔ sứɣiả dɛm dến xắp dịʔafận ʔisơzaên vớʔi lờʔi zaw nầʔi fàm ʔaj xôŋ za tʰeo săwlơ samuên tʰì kák kɔn ɲưvậʔi sự kiɲxủŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên zânsự hếttʰảʔi cúŋ dềʔu di za ɲư cỉ ŋườʔi săwlơ kiểmdiểm cúŋ tạʔi bêsék kó bɛcămŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên bamươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi zuda cúŋ nóʔi kùŋ sứɣiả dã dến zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zabɛ cɔŋ ɣalaát maj xi mặtcờʔi dã nắŋnóŋ tʰì ʔɛɲɛm dượk ɣiảʔicứʔu ɲữŋ sứɣiả divề tʰuật lạʔi kák lờʔi nầʔi cɔ zân zabɛ zân nầʔi lấʔilàm vuimừŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ʔammôn zằŋ ŋàʔimaj cúŋta di za kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dãʔi cúŋta tʰeo mìɲ lấʔilàm fảʔi ɲưŋ sáŋ ŋàʔimaj săwlơ ciə zânsự za dạʔɔ ziɲ zân ʔammôn vừʔa lúk kɛɲ dáɲ zân ʔammôn cɔdến ɣần dứŋbóŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi tʰì lạk dến dỗʔi xôŋ kó haj ŋườʔi cuŋ ɲăw zânsự nóʔi kùŋ samuên zằŋ ʔaj dã nóʔi săwlơ cịvì cên cúŋta saw hãʔi fó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɣiết di ɲưŋsăw dáp cẳŋ ʔaj sửtử cɔŋ ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê dã ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔŋ ʔisơzaên samuên nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi di dến ɣiɲɣɛɲ dặŋ nướk lạʔi kả zânsự dềʔu di dến ɣiɲɣɛɲ tạʔi dó cướk Ðứkzê cúŋ săwlơ vwa tạʔi dó cúŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn săwlơ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên vuimừŋ xônsiết bấʔizờ samuên nóʔi kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên zằŋ ta dã vâŋ tʰeo mọʔi lờʔi kák ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ dã vwa cên kák ŋươʔi zàʔi vwa ấʔi di cướk dầʔu kák ŋươʔi kòn dã ɣià tók bạk kák kɔncaj kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ta dã di cướk dầʔu kák ŋươʔi xi kòn tʰơấʔu cɔdến ŋàʔinăj vậʔi tadâʔi hãʔi làmcứŋ tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê cướk cịʔu sứk zầʔu ŋàʔi ta kó ʔaj căŋ bắt lừʔa ʔaj căŋ ta kó lừʔazốʔi ʔaj căŋ hàɲhuŋ kùŋ ʔaj căŋ ta kó ɲận kủʔa hốʔilộ nơʔi tăj ʔaj dặŋ ɲắmmắt căŋ víbằŋ kó làmvậʔi cả lạʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi cúŋ dáp zằŋ Ôŋ xôŋ kó lừʔazốʔi cúŋtôʔi xôŋ hàɲhuŋ kùŋ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ ɲận lấʔi ci nơʔi tăj ʔaj ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê cứŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi kũŋ cứŋ zằŋ ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi ɣì cɔŋ tăj cúŋ dáp ŋwiệnŋàʔi làmcứŋ cɔ samuên nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã môʔisɛ ʔazôn dɛm tổfụ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi zamắt cướk Ðứkzê kùŋ kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ việk kôŋbìɲ Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi săw xi zakốp dến sứ zíptô tổfụ kák ŋươʔi kó kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê saj môʔisɛ ʔazôn dɛm tổfụ kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔŋ cỗ nầʔi ɲưŋ kwên ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ŋàʔi fó cɔ sisêza tổŋbiɲ kủʔa hátsɔ cɔ zân filitin cɔ zân môáp cúŋnó dềʔu cɛɲ ciến kùŋ họ kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã fạmtộʔi cúŋtôʔi kó lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê hầʔu việk ɲữŋ baɛɲ ɲưŋ bâʔizờ sin ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi tăj tʰùŋịc cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi fụk ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dã saj ɣiêzubaɛɲ bêdan ɣiéptʰê samuên ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc suŋkwɛɲ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dã dượk ʔan sɔŋ tʰấʔi nahác vwa zân ʔammôn dến dáɲ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ xôŋ dượk fảʔi kó vwa kaicị cúŋtôʔi tʰật ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã vwa kák ŋươʔi bâʔizờ kìʔa vwa kák ŋươʔi dã cọn dã kầʔusin Ðứkzê dã ŋườʔilàm vwa cên kák ŋươʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê fụk ŋàʔi vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán ŋàʔi cẳŋ ŋịc mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi vwa kaicị kák ŋươʔi vâŋ tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰì cắk kák ŋươʔi dượk măimắn kòn nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê bộʔiŋịc mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰì tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa cên kák ŋươʔi ɲư dã ɣiáŋọʔa cên tổfụ kák ŋươʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi dứŋ tạʔi dâʔi dặŋ sɛm việk Ðứkzê cướkmắt kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ fảʔi mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamì saw ta kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi mưʔa dể kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi mìɲ dã fạm ák cướk Ðứkzê bởʔivì dã sin vwa samuên kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê mưʔa kả zânsự lấʔilàm Ðứkzê samuên hếttʰảʔi dềʔu nóʔi kùŋ samuên zằŋ sin hãʔi ɲữŋ dầʔitớ kủʔa ôŋ kầʔusin ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ cết cúŋtôʔi dã tʰêm lỗʔi sin vwa vàʔɔ kák tộʔi xák kủʔa cúŋtôʔi samuên dáp kùŋzân zằŋ cớ ci tʰật kák ŋươʔi kó mọʔi diềʔu zanák nầʔi sɔŋ cớ sâʔi Ðứkzê fảʔi hếtlòŋ fụk ŋàʔi cớ lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi dặŋ di tʰeo ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ hưxôŋ cẳŋ kóíc ci kũŋ xôŋ kứʔu hìɲtượŋ cỉ hưxôŋ tʰôʔi Ðứkzê kớ zɛɲ mìɲ cẳŋ zânsự ŋàʔi cỉn tʰật Ðứkzê dã dịɲ kák ŋườʔilàm zânsự kủʔa ŋàʔi kòn tadâʔi kũŋ cẳŋ fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰôʔi kầʔuŋwiện cɔ kák ŋươʔi ta zạʔi kák ŋươʔi kɔn dườŋ làɲ ŋăj cỉ hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê lấʔi hếtlòŋ cuŋ tínfụk ŋàʔi xá sɛm ɲữŋ việk lớnlaw ŋàʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi zườŋ nàʔɔ ɲưŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi kứ ák tʰì kák ŋươʔi vwa kák ŋươʔi cắk ziệtvɔŋ xisăw lênŋôʔi vwa tʰì dã dượk mươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi dã kaicị cên ʔisơzaên haj cọn ŋàn ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên haj ŋàn ŋườʔi dặŋ kùŋ mìɲ tạʔi mícma cên núʔi bêtên kòn mộtŋàn ŋườʔi tʰì vớʔi ɣiônatʰan tạʔi ɣibê ʔa cɔŋ sứ bêŋiəmin zânsự kòn lạʔi ŋườʔi cɔ ʔainấʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ cạʔi mìɲ ɣiônatʰan dáɲ dồn filitin tạʔi ɣêba zânfi hăj diềʔu dó săwlơ lịɲ tʰổʔi xắp sứ zằŋ zâɲê bơzơ xá ŋɛ vậʔi kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu hăj zằŋ săwlơ dã dáɲ dồn filitin ʔisơzaên zân filitin ɣɛŋét bấʔizờ zânsự ɲóm lạʔi săwlơ tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ xi ấʔi zân filitin lạʔi dặŋ dáɲ ʔisơzaên cúŋ kó kỗ sɛ sáʔu ŋàn líɲ kwânlíɲ dôŋ ɲư kát cên vậʔi cúŋnó di dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi mícma hướŋ dôŋ kủʔa bếtavɛn zân ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi mìɲ ŋwicấp cúŋ tʰeo ziết ɣần cốn cɔŋ haŋ dá cɔŋ bờbụʔi cɔŋ ɣàɲ dá cɔŋ dồnlũʔi cɔŋ mấʔi ŋườʔi hêbơzơ saŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dến sứ ɣát ɣalaát sɔŋsăw kòn tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ hếttʰảʔi zânsự di tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu zunsợ săwlơ dợʔi bảʔi ŋàʔi kủʔa samuên dã dịɲ sɔŋ samuên xôŋ dến ɣiɲɣɛɲ zânsự di bấʔizờ săwlơ nóʔi hãʔi dɛm dến cɔ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù zồʔi ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu xi ŋườʔi zâŋ sɔŋ kìʔa samuên dến săwlơ di za dón dặŋ càʔɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋsa hỏʔi ŋươʔi dã làmci săwlơ dáp zằŋ xi tôʔi tʰấʔi zânsự di ôŋ xôŋ dến tʰeo ŋàʔi dã dịɲ zân filitin dã lạʔi tạʔi mícma tʰì tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ zânfi cắk dáɲ tôʔi tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ tôʔi cưʔa kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê vìvậʔi tôʔi miễnkưỡŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu samuên nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ ŋươʔi tʰật kó ŋuzạʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cwiền cɔ víbằŋ kó vâŋ tʰeo tʰì Ðứkzê dã nướk ŋươʔi vữŋ dờʔidờʔi nơʔi ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ bâʔizờ nướk ŋươʔi xôŋ lâʔu Ðứkzê dã cọn lấʔi cɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi tʰeo lòŋ ŋàʔi dặt ŋườʔi ấʔi cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự ŋàʔi bởʔivì ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiữ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn samuên dứŋzậʔi di ɣiɲɣɛɲ dến ɣibê ʔa cɔŋ sứ bêŋiəmin zồʔi săwlơ kiểmdiểm zân kùŋ mìɲ kó ướkcừŋ sáʔu căm ŋườʔi săwlơ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ŋườʔi kùŋ kwânlíɲ di tʰeo dềʔu dóŋ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa cɔŋ sứ bêŋiəmin kòn zân filitin cạʔi tạʔi mícma từ cɔŋ ziɲ filitin kó tɔán kwân kướp fá di za ciə dộʔi dộʔi nàʔi tʰeo kɔn dườŋ ʔɔùpza divề sứ swɛɲ dộʔi kiə nɔj kɔn dườŋ bếtʰôzôn kòn dộʔi tʰứba tʰeo kɔn dườŋ zɛɲ cên cũŋ sêbôʔim hướŋ dồŋ vắŋ vả cɔŋ kả sứ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó tʰợzèn bởʔivì zân filitin dã nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi kấm ŋườʔi hêbơzơ zèn ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ hếttʰảʔi ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi dềʔu di suốŋ nơʔi filitin dặŋ zèn lưỡʔi kàʔi kuốk zìʔu lưỡʔi háʔi mìɲ lạʔi xi nàʔɔ lưỡʔi kàʔi kuốk cĩʔaba hăjlà zìʔu tʰì di suốŋ dặŋ màʔi sửʔa káʔi dót lạʔi nên cɔŋ ŋàʔi cɛɲ ciến cẳŋ kó ɣươm kũŋ xôŋ kó ɣiáʔɔ nơʔi tăj kủʔa kả zânsự di tʰeo săwlơ ɣiônatʰan cỉ kó cɔ săwlơ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ŋườʔi zùŋ tʰôʔi một dồn kwân filitin kéʔɔ za dặŋ dón dèʔɔ mícma một ŋàʔiciə ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ɣã caicẻ vák biɲxí mìɲ zằŋ hè cúŋta hãʔi di kwa dồn kwân filitin dóŋ fíʔa kiə ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ nóʔi cɔ ca mìɲ hăj bấʔizờ săwlơ tạʔi dầʔu zɛɲ ɣibê ʔa zướʔi kâʔi lựʔu kủʔa miɣơzôn kòn dạʔɔkwân tʰeo ŋườʔi ướkcừŋ sáʔu căm ŋườʔi ʔahiza kɔncaj ʔahitúp ʔɛɲ kủʔa ʔicabốt kɔncaj finê ʔa cáʔu hêli mặk áʔɔ fót tʰầʔi tạʔi silô zânsự xôŋ ɣiônatʰan di ɣiữʔa dèʔɔ ɣiônatʰan ɣắŋsứk di dặŋ dến dồn filitin kó zăŋ dá nầʔi zăŋ kiə káʔi nầʔi ɣọʔilà bốtsết kòn káʔi kiə ɣọʔilà sênê một káʔi zăŋ dá mọk fíʔa bắk dốʔi ŋaŋ mícma kòn káʔi kiə tạʔi fíʔa dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣêba ɣiônatʰan nóʔi kùŋ vák biɲxí mìɲ zằŋ hè cúŋta hãʔi dồn kủʔa ɲữŋ cẳŋ cịʔu kắt kiə hɔặkzả Ðứkzê hàɲsự cúŋta căŋ Ðứkzê xiến cɔ ŋườʔi dượk tʰắŋ kũŋɲư dôŋ ŋườʔi vậʔi kẻ vák biɲxí kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ hãʔi diềʔu ôŋ ướk di nơʔi nàʔɔ ôŋ lòŋ ôŋ zẫn ôŋ di dâʔu tôʔi tʰeo dó ɣiônatʰan nầʔi cúŋta hãʔi di dến ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi mìɲ za cɔ cúŋnó nếʔu cúŋnó nóʔi hãʔi dợʔi cúŋta dếnkùŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰì cúŋta dứŋ lạʔi cỗ mìɲ xôŋ dếnkùŋ cúŋnó kòn nếʔu cúŋnó nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến cúŋta tʰì cúŋta Ðứkzê dã fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj cúŋta diềʔu dó zùŋ zấʔuhiệʔu cɔ cúŋta vậʔi haj ŋườʔi dềʔu di dồn filitin zânfi nóʔi kìʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hêbơzơ za haŋ dá nơʔi cúŋnó cốn kiə líɲ kủʔa dồn nóʔi kùŋ ɣiônatʰan vák biɲxí zằŋ hãʔi di dến cúŋta cúŋta kó cwiện kùŋ haj ŋươʔi ɣiônatʰan nóʔi vớʔi vák biɲxí mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi tʰeo Ðứkzê dã fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ʔisơzaên ɣiônatʰan zùŋ tăj cơn kầm biɲxí tʰeo ŋườʔifi ŋã cướk ɣiônatʰan vák biɲxí ɣiết cúŋnó cết dằŋ săw ŋườʔi cɔŋ cận tʰứ ɲứt nầʔi ɣiônatʰan vák biɲxí ŋườʔi ɣiết cừŋ haimươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ xɔảŋ nửʔa kôŋ dất sự hãʔihùŋ càn za cɔŋ cạʔi kwân cɔŋ dồŋ cɔŋ kả zân filitin kwân dồn dảŋ kướp ɣiựt dềʔu kiɲxủŋ dất zúŋdộŋ ấʔi ɲư kiɲ xiếp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vậʔi líɲ kɛɲ kủʔa săwlơ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa cɔŋ sứ bêŋiəmin dềʔu tʰấʔi kwân cúŋ filitin lạk cạʔi cốn lộnsộn bấʔizờ săwlơ nóʔi vớʔi kwânlíɲ kùŋ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi kiểmdiểm sɛm ʔaj ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã hàŋŋũ cúŋta cúŋ kiểmdiểm tʰấʔi tʰiếʔu ɣiônatʰan vák biɲxí ŋườʔi săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ʔahiza zằŋ hãʔi dɛm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến ɣần cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ xi săwlơ nóʔi vớʔi tʰầʔi tʰì tiếŋ ồnàʔɔ lạʔi kàŋ tʰêm cɔŋ cạʔi kwân filitin săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ tʰầʔi zằŋ hãʔi zút tăj ŋươʔi lạʔi Ðʔɔạn săwlơ hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ kùŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi di tớʔi cốn ciếncườŋ kìʔa tʰấʔi ŋườʔi filitin zút ɣươm ɣiết ɲăw hỗnlɔạn kựkdiểm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hêbơzơ dã lâʔu fụk zân filitin tʰeo cɔŋ cạʔi kwân năj cở lòŋ vớʔi ʔisơzaên tʰeo kùŋ săwlơ ɣiônatʰan lạʔi xi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dươŋ cɔŋ núʔi zaim ŋɛ zân filitin cạʔi cốn kũŋ zượt duổʔi tʰeo cúŋnó dáɲ ɣiặk Ðứkzê ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kơn ɣiặk càn dến bếtavɛn kũŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zân ʔisơzaên duốʔi vảlạʔi săwlơ kó tʰề kùŋzân zằŋ Ðáŋ zủʔasả ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰựk ɣì cướk xi ciềʔutốʔi tứk cướk xi báʔɔtʰù ɲữŋ kừʔudịc vìvậʔi kả zânsự dềʔu kử xôŋ tʰựk ɣì sɔŋ cúŋ zân dã dến cɔŋ káʔi zừŋ kó mậtɔŋ cên mặtdất bấʔizờ zânsự di vàʔɔ cɔŋ zừŋ tʰấʔi nầʔi cảʔi cẳŋ ʔaj zám cấm tăj vàʔɔ miệŋ lờʔi tʰề ɲưŋzô natʰan xôŋ lờʔi tʰề ca mìɲ dã kùŋzân ɣiơ dầʔu ɣậʔi mìɲ kầm nơʔi tăj cấm vàʔɔ tàŋ mậtɔŋ zồʔi lấʔi tăj dɛm vàʔɔ miệŋ tʰì ŋườʔi sáŋ za kó ŋườʔi cɔŋ zâncúŋ kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ caôŋ kó tʰề kùŋ zâncúŋ zằŋ Ðáŋ zủʔasả ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰựk ɣì cɔŋ ŋàʔinăj vả zânsự dềʔu duốʔi ɣiônatʰan dáp zằŋ ca zốʔi cɔ sứ hãʔi sɛm dã sáŋ zườŋ nàʔɔ kớ cút nầʔi cớci ŋàʔinăj zânsự dã ciếm dượk kủʔa tʰùŋịc tʰì tʰwa bạʔi zân filitin dã biếtbaw vậʔi ŋàʔi dó zân ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi zân filitin mícma cɔdến ʔazalôn zânsự duốʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ kủʔa kướp ciên kɔn ɣiết di cên dất zồʔi tʰịt vớʔi hwiết kó ŋườʔi dến nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ kìʔa zânsự fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰịt vớʔi hwiết ŋườʔi dáp Ấʔilà lỗʔi dạʔɔ hãʔi lậptứk dá dến ɣần lạʔi zằŋ hãʔi di xắp kơ biɲ zaw zằŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi zẫn dến ciên mìɲ ɣiết di tạʔi dâʔi zồʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰịt ɲưvậʔi kák ŋườʔi xôŋ fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰịt vớʔi hwiết tʰếtʰì cɔŋ dêm dó mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋ zẫn súkvật mìɲ kó zướʔi tăj ɣiết cên dá săwlơ bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê ấʔilà bàntʰờ tʰứ ɲứt ŋườʔi cɔ Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn săwlơ nóʔi cúŋta hãʔi di suốŋ duổʔi tʰeo zân filitin cɔŋ xi bandêm kướp fá cúŋnó cɔdến sáŋsớm cớ dể sốŋ ʔaj cúŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ hãʔi mọʔi diềʔu vwa lấʔilàm fảʔi tʰầʔi nóʔi cúŋta hãʔi dến ɣần Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi săwlơ kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi suốŋ duổʔi tʰeo zân filitin căŋ ŋàʔi fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ʔisơzaên căŋ sɔŋ nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ dáp lạʔi lờʔi ɣì Ðʔɔạn săwlơ bảʔɔ zằŋ hỡʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự hếttʰảʔi hãʔi dến ɣần dâʔi sét tộʔilỗʔi dã fạm cɔŋ ŋàʔinăj saw ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ Ðấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên tʰề zằŋ dã fạmtộʔi zẫʔu cíɲ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kũŋ fảʔi cết di cɔŋ kả zânsự cẳŋ kó ʔaj dáp lờʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dứŋ nàʔi ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj dứŋ kiə zânsự tʰưʔa zằŋ hãʔi diềʔu vwa lấʔilàm fảʔi săwlơ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ ÔʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên sin hãʔi za sựtʰật ɣiônatʰan săwlơ cỉ za kòn zânsự tʰì vôkan săwlơ nóʔi hãʔi bắttʰăm cɔ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ɣiônatʰan cỉ za săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ɣiônatʰan zằŋ hãʔi cɔ biếtdiềʔu ŋươʔi dã ɣiônatʰan tʰútʰật zằŋ tôʔi kó zùŋ dầʔu ɣậʔi tôʔi kầm nơʔi tăj cút mậtɔŋ nầʔi tôʔi dâʔi fảʔi cết săwlơ nóʔi hỡʔizô natʰan nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ cết ŋwiện Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa zất nặŋ cên ɲưŋ zânsự dáp kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ ʔuû ʔa ɣiônatʰan ŋườʔi dã cɔ ʔisơzaên dượk dạʔitʰắŋ zườŋ kiə fảʔi cết saw Ðʔiềʔu dó cẳŋ cúŋtôʔi cỉ sɛɲ mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰề zằŋ sợʔi tók cên dầʔu ŋườʔi cẳŋ zụŋ suốŋ dất ŋườʔiở kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dượk tʰắŋ ŋàʔinăj ɲưvậʔi zânsự ɣiảʔicứʔu ɣiônatʰan ŋườʔi xỏʔi sửtử Ðʔɔạn săwlơ cởvề cẳŋ duổʔi tʰeo zân filitin nữʔa zân filitin dềʔu cởvề cɔŋ sứ mìɲ săw xi săwlơ dã kầmkwiền nướk ʔisơzaên tʰì ŋườʔi zawciến kùŋ tʰùŋịc mìɲ tứfíʔa tứk kùŋ môáp ʔammôn dôm kák vwa sôba kùŋzân filitin ŋườʔi kửbiɲ dến dâʔu tʰì báʔɔtʰù dượk dến dó ŋườʔi kwânlíɲ dáɲ zân ʔamalék ɣiảʔicứʔu ʔisơzaên xỏʔi tăj ɲữŋ kẻkướp fá kák kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ ɣiônatʰan zsêvi mɛɲkiswa ŋườʔi kũŋ kó haj kɔŋáʔi mêzáp ɲỏ micɛɲ săwlơ ʔahinôʔam kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔahimát tổŋbiɲ kủʔa dạʔɔ biɲ ŋườʔi nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ cú kủʔa săwlơ kíc ca kủʔa săwlơ nêzơ ca kủʔa nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabiên cọn dờʔi săwlơ kó cɛɲ ciến zữzộʔi kùŋzân filitin xi săwlơ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi mạɲmẽ bạʔɔzạn tʰì ciêʔumộ ŋườʔi tʰeo mìɲ samuên nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ Ðứkzê dã saj sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi vwa zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kwân fán ɲưvầʔi ta ɲớ lạʔi diềʔu ʔamalék cɔ ʔisơzaên ŋănkản dườŋ lúk za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vậʔi hãʔi di dáɲ zân ʔamalék ziệt mọʔi tʰuộk cúŋnó ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰươŋsót cúŋnó fảʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi kɔncẻ kɔn ciên lạkdà lừʔa vậʔi săwlơ ɲóm zânsự diểm sɔát tạʔi têlaim kó haj cămŋàn líɲ mườʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi zuda săwlơ di tớʔi tʰàɲ ʔamalék dặt biɲfụk cɔŋ cũŋ ŋườʔi kó nóʔi vớʔi zân kênít zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi zút di hãʔi fânzẽ xỏʔi zân ʔamalék kẻʔɔ ziệt kák ŋươʔi vớʔi cúŋnó căŋ vì xi zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô kák ŋươʔi kó cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân ấʔi vậʔi zân kênít fânzẽ xỏʔi zân ʔamalék săwlơ dáɲ ʔamalék havila cɔdến suzơ dốʔi ŋaŋ sứ zíptô ŋườʔi bắtsốŋ ʔaɣa vwa kủʔa zân ʔamalék zồʔi lấʔi ɣươm ziệt hếttʰảʔi zânsự ɲưŋsăw zâncúŋ zɔŋ tʰứ ʔaɣa cẳŋ ɣiết ɲữŋ kɔn cɔŋ bầʔi ciên kák tʰú lứʔa dẻ tʰứ ɲì ciên kɔn mọʔi ɲất cúŋ cẳŋ ziệt ɲữŋ dó cỉ ziệt ɲữŋ ci sấʔu xôŋ ɣiácị bấʔizờ kó lờʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ samuên ɲưvầʔi ta hốʔihận dã săwlơ vwa bởʔi ŋườʔi dã sâʔi xôŋ tʰeo lờʔi samuên buồnzầʔu kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê cọn dêm sáŋ ŋàʔisăw ŋườʔi di zướk săwlơ kó dến nóʔi kùŋ samuên zằŋ săwlơ dã dến kạtmên zựŋ cɔ mìɲ káʔi biə tạʔi dó dɔạn dổʔi dườŋ di suốŋ ɣiɲɣɛɲ samuên di dếnkùŋ săwlơ săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê fướk cɔ ôŋ tôʔi dã tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê samuên hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ vậʔitʰì tiếŋ ciên kêʔu vaŋ dến taj kùŋ tiếŋ zốŋ ŋɛ kiə làmsaw săwlơ dáp zằŋ zânsự kó zẫn cúŋnó nơʔi ŋườʔi ʔamalék dến zânsự dã tʰa ɲữŋ kɔn ɲứt ciên dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ kòn lạʔi cúŋtôʔi dã ziệt di samuên nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ tʰôʔi ta cɔ ŋươʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán cɔ dêm năj săwlơ dáp sin nóʔi samuên nóʔi zằŋ lúk ŋươʔi kòn ɲỏ tạʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ cởnên dầʔu cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên saw Ðứkzê cẳŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên vả Ðứkzê dã saj ŋươʔi di zằŋ hãʔi di ziệt ɲữŋ fạmtộʔi kiə zân ʔamalék zawciến kùŋ cúŋnó cɔdến cừŋ ŋươʔi dã ziệt cúŋnó saw ŋươʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê kớsaw ŋươʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ kủʔa kướp diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê săwlơ dáp kùŋ samuên zằŋ tôʔi tʰật kó ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê tôʔi dã di sɔŋ việk Ðứkzê saj tôʔi di tôʔi kó dɛm ʔaɣa vwa zân ʔamalék ziệt zân ʔamalék ɲưŋ zânsự kó cọn cɔŋ kủʔa kướp ciên ɲứt kủʔa dáŋ tậnziệt dặŋ zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ samuên nóʔi Ðứkzê dẹplòŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù bằŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa ŋàʔi vả vâŋ lờʔi kủʔa ŋɛ tʰeo ciên dựk bộʔiŋịc kũŋ dáŋ tộʔi bằŋ tàtʰuật kốcấp ɣiốŋ ɲư tộʔi cọŋ kúŋ lạʔi hìɲtượŋ bởʔi ŋươʔi dã lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kũŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ cɔ ŋươʔi vwa săwlơ dáp kùŋ samuên zằŋ tôʔi kó fạmtộʔi tôʔi dã kanfạm mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê lờʔi kủʔa ôŋ tôʔi zânsự ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa bâʔizờ sin ôŋ hãʔi tʰa tộʔi tôʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ tôʔi tʰì tôʔi mìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê samuên nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ ta xôŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu ŋươʔi dã lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê ŋươʔi dể ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên nữʔa xisa sâʔi lưŋ dặŋ di săwlơ áʔɔtơʔi ŋườʔi tʰì áʔɔ zác samuên nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi Ấʔi ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê sé nướk ʔisơzaên xỏʔi ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi dặŋ cɔ lânkận ŋươʔi sứŋdáŋ ŋươʔi vảlạʔi Ðấŋ fùhộ ʔisơzaên cẳŋ nóʔizốʔi xôŋ Ðấŋ ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi săwlơ dáp zằŋ tôʔi kó tộʔi sɔŋ sin hãʔi tôncọŋ tôʔi cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa zânsự tôʔi cướk ʔisơzaên sin ôŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ tôʔi tʰì tôʔi tʰờ lạʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ vậʔi samuên cởlạʔi tʰeo săwlơ săwlơ tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn samuên nóʔi hãʔi zẫn ʔaɣa vwa ʔamalék dến ʔaɣa di dến ŋườʔi vuimừŋ tưởŋ zằŋ kwả diềʔu kăjdắŋ kủʔa cết kwa zồʔi ɲưŋsa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hễ ɣươm ŋươʔi dã ŋườʔi dờn xôŋ kó kɔn tʰếnàʔɔ tʰì ŋươʔi kũŋ xôŋ kó kɔn tʰể ấʔi samuên ɣiết ʔaɣa cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi cíɲ ɣiɲɣɛɲ Ðʔɔạn samuên divề zama kòn săwlơ cởvề ɲà mìɲ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa kủʔa săwlơ samuên cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi săwlơ nữʔa cɔdến ŋàʔi mìɲ tʰák ŋườʔi buồnbựk việk săwlơ kòn Ðứkzê dã săwlơ vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê fán kùŋ samuên zằŋ ŋươʔi buồnzầʔu việk săwlơ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ta dã hầʔu cɔ xôŋ kòn vwa cên ʔisơzaên nữʔa hãʔi dổ zầʔu dầʔi sừŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi di ta saj ŋươʔi dến ʔisaj ŋườʔi bếtlêhɛm cɔŋ vòŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã cọn ŋườʔilàm vwa samuên tʰưʔa zằŋ làmsaw tôʔi di dó dượk nếʔusăw hăj tʰì ɣiết tôʔi di Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi dɛm tʰeo ŋươʔi kɔn káʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dến dể zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkzê ŋươʔi mờʔi ʔisaj zự ta cɔ ŋươʔi biếtdiềʔu ŋươʔi fảʔi zồʔi ŋươʔi ɲơn zɛɲ sứk zầʔu cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi samuên tʰeo diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ mìɲ di dến bếtlêhɛm ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi dềʔu lấʔilàm bốʔizốʔi cạʔi dón ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ôŋ dến dɛm bìɲan căŋ ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ bìɲan ta dến dể zâŋ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi zọn mìɲ tʰɛɲsạc dến tʰịt vớʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ zọn ʔisaj kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cɔ tʰɛɲsạc mờʔi dến zự xi cúŋ dến samuên tʰấʔi tʰầm zằŋ kwả cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê dươŋ cướk ŋàʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê fán kùŋ samuên zằŋ cớ sɛm bộzạŋ hìɲvók kawlớn kủʔa dã Ðứkzê cẳŋ sɛm diềʔu ɣì lɔàʔiŋườʔi sɛm lɔàʔiŋườʔi sɛm bềŋɔàʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkzê ɲìn tʰấʔi cɔŋ lòŋ ʔisaj ɣọʔi ʔabinadáp biểʔu ŋườʔi di kwa cướk samuên ɲưŋ samuên nóʔi Ðứkzê kũŋ cẳŋ cọn ŋườʔi nầʔi ʔisaj biểʔu samma di kwa ɲưŋ samuên nóʔi Ðứkzê kũŋ xôŋ cọn ŋườʔi nầʔi nữʔa ʔisaj biểʔu bảʔi kɔncaj mìɲ di kwa cướk samuên ɲưvậʔi tʰì samuên nóʔi kùŋ ʔisaj zằŋ Ðứkzê cẳŋ cọn ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋnó Ðʔɔạn samuên nóʔi kùŋ ʔisaj zằŋ hếttʰảʔi kɔncaj ŋươʔi dó saw ʔisaj dáp zằŋ hãʔi kòn dứʔa kɔn ɲưŋ di cănciên samuên nóʔi hãʔi saj ɣọʔi cúŋta xôŋ ŋồʔi cướk xi dến vậʔi ʔisaj saj ɣọʔi ŋườʔi mặt ŋườʔi hồŋ hồŋ kɔn siɲ lịc hìɲzuŋ tốtdẹp Ðứkzê fán kùŋ samuên zằŋ Ấʔilà hãʔi dứŋzậʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ samuên lấʔi sừŋ zầʔu sứk cɔ ŋườʔiở ɣiữʔa kák ʔɛɲ ŋườʔi từ ŋàʔi dó săw tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kảmdộŋ Ðʔa samuên dứŋzậʔi divề zama tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê lìʔa xỏʔi săwlơ Ðứkzê xiến áktʰần xuấʔi xuất ŋườʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ nầʔi kó áktʰần Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến dến xuấʔi xuất vwa sin cúʔa cúŋtôʔi hãʔi biểʔu ɲữŋ tôʔitớ dứŋ cầʔu cúʔa ŋườʔi ɣảʔi dờn dể xi nàʔɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj áktʰần dến cúʔa tʰì ŋườʔi dó ɣảʔi dờn cúʔa dượk ʔanủʔi săwlơ dáp kùŋ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ vậʔi hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɣảʔi dờn hăj zồʔi zẫn dếnkùŋ một ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ tôʔitớ kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi tôʔi dã tʰấʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaj ŋườʔi bếtlêhɛm ɣảʔi dờn hăj ŋườʔi ciếnsĩ mạɲbạʔɔ ănnóʔi xônŋwan mặtmàʔi tốtdẹp Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi săwlơ saj dến ʔisaj nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi ɣởʔi cɔ Ðʔa kɔncaj ŋươʔi cănciên ʔisaj lấʔi báɲ bầʔu za zượʔu kɔn zê kɔn kòn cất cên kɔn lừʔa zồʔi ɲờ Ðʔa kɔncaj mìɲ ɣởʔi cɔ săwlơ Ðʔa dếnnơʔi săwlơ zamắt ŋườʔi săwlơ tʰươŋiêʔu ŋườʔi dặt ŋườʔilàm vák biɲxí mìɲ ŋườʔi saj di nóʔi kùŋ ʔisaj zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi cɔ Ðʔa dứŋ cầʔucựk dượk cướk vậʔi xi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến áktʰần ɲập vàʔɔ săwlơ tʰì Ðʔa lấʔi dờn ɣảʔi săwlơ dượk ʔanủʔi làɲmạɲ áktʰần lìʔa xỏʔi ŋườʔi zânfi ɲóm kák dạʔɔ biɲ mìɲ dặŋ ɣiặk cúŋnó tạʔi sôkô tʰuộk sứ zuda dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi fê Ðʔa ɣiữʔa sôkô ʔasêka săwlơ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kũŋ ɲóm dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi cũŋ zàn cận kùŋzân filitin zânfi dứŋ cên núʔi fíʔa nầʔi kòn ʔisơzaên dứŋ cên núʔi fíʔa kiə cũŋ fânkác bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi lựksĩ cạʔi kwân filitin za ɣôliát kwê ɣát kaw ŋườʔi sáʔu tʰướk ɣaŋ ŋườʔi dộʔi mãʔɔ dồŋ cên dầʔu mặk áʔɔzáp dồŋ vảʔi ká nặŋ ŋàn siếk ɲữŋ ủŋ dồŋ săw lưŋ ceo kâʔi law dồŋ kán kủʔa kâʔi law ɲư kâʔi cụk kủʔa tʰợ zệt kửʔi mũʔi kủʔa kâʔi law nầʔi nặŋ sáʔu căm siếk kẻ vák biɲxí di cướk vậʔi za dứŋ kêʔula kùŋ dộʔiŋũ ʔisơzaên zằŋ kớsaw kák ŋươʔi za bàʔi cận ta cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi filitin kòn kák ŋươʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ saw hãʔi cọn ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi suốŋ dấʔu dịc kùŋ nếʔu xi dấʔu dịc kùŋ cổʔi ɣiết tʰì cúŋta tôʔitớ kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu cổʔi ɣiết tʰì kák ŋươʔi tôʔi cúŋta hầʔu việk cúŋta ŋườʔifi lạʔi kòn nóʔi zằŋ fảʔi ŋàʔinăj tʰác lờʔi nầʔi cɔ dộʔiŋũ ʔisơzaên hãʔi xiến ŋườʔi za dặŋ cúŋta dấʔu dịc kùŋ ɲăw săwlơ kả ʔisơzaên ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi filitin tʰì lấʔilàm hɔảŋồn sợhãʔi vả Ðʔa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaj ŋườʔi fơzát kiə kwê bếtlêhɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda ŋườʔi kó kɔncaj cɔŋ dờʔi săwlơ ʔisaj dã kawtuổʔi zồʔi ba kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaj dã tʰeo săwlơ nơʔi ciếncận kɔncaj ấʔilà kɔnkả kɔntʰứ ɲì ʔabidáp kɔntʰứ sama Ðʔa kɔn xi ʔɛɲ ŋườʔi dã tʰeo săwlơ tʰì Ðʔa lìʔa nơʔi săwlơ cởvề bếtlêhɛm dặŋ cănciên kủʔa ca mìɲ ŋườʔifi di za buổʔimaj buổʔi ciềʔu mìɲ za ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ mươʔi ŋàʔi vả ʔisaj nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ kɔn hãʔi lấʔi fa zaŋ mườʔi báɲ nầʔi cạʔi măw dến cạʔi kwân dặŋ dɛm dưʔa cɔ kák ʔɛɲ kɔn kɔn
