kũŋ hãʔi dɛm mườʔi báɲ sữʔa nầʔi cɔ kwan tướŋ kaj ŋàn kwân tʰử sɛm kák ʔɛɲ kɔn kó mạɲ căŋ kɔn fảʔi dɛm cɔ ca zấʔu ci cứŋ fần cúŋnó kák ʔɛɲ kɔn kùŋ săwlơ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ dể dáɲ ɣiặk kùŋzân filitin ŋàʔimaj sáŋsớm Ðʔa dể ciên cɔ ŋườʔi căn lấʔi dồvật di ɲư ʔisaj dã zặn ŋườʔi xi ŋườʔi dã dến dồn tʰì dạʔɔ biɲ di za dặŋ zàn cận zeo tiếŋ ciếncɛɲ ʔisơzaên zân filitin zàn cận haj dạʔɔkwân dốʔi ɲăw Ðʔa kất ɣáɲ nặŋ mìɲ zaw cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiữ dồvật dɔạn cạʔi dến cỗ zàn cận tớʔi hỏʔitʰăm ʔɛɲ mìɲ mạɲzỏʔi căŋ ŋườʔi dươŋ nóʔicwiện kùŋ cúŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi lựksĩ ɣôliát tứklà ŋườʔi filitin ɣát hàŋŋũ filitin sơm tớʔi Ðʔa ŋɛ nóʔi ɲư ɲữŋ lờʔi ŋàʔicướk hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi dềʔu cạʔi cốn zunsợ mọʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên nóʔi kák ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dó sơm tớʔi căŋ hắn dến dặŋ sỉɲụk ʔisơzaên nếʔu ʔaj ɣiết dượk tʰì vwa tʰưởŋ ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi dó sâʔu tʰuế cɔ ɲà ca ŋườʔi ấʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên Ðʔa hỏʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở ɣần mìɲ zằŋ ŋườʔita dãʔi tʰểnàʔɔ cɔ ɣiết dượk ŋườʔi filitin nầʔi kất sỉɲụk xỏʔi ʔisơzaên vì ŋườʔi filitin nầʔi cẳŋ cịʔufép kắt nầʔi ʔaj màlạʔi zám sỉɲụk dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ ŋườʔita lấʔi lờʔi tʰườŋ nóʔi ấʔi dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ʔaj ɣiết dượk tʰì fầntʰưởŋ ɲưvậʔi ɲưŋ ʔɛɲkả ŋườʔi ŋɛ Ðʔa nóʔi ɲưvậʔi nổʔizận ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ kớsaw màʔi dến dâʔi màʔi kɔnciên kủʔa cúŋta cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cɔ ʔaj taw táɲ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dộkák kủʔa lòŋ màʔi Ấʔi dặŋ sɛm cɛɲ ciến màʔi mớʔi dến Ðʔa dáp zằŋ vậʔi tôʔi kó làmci dâʔu Ấʔi cỉ kâʔuhỏʔi tʰôʔi ŋườʔi zan sa ʔɛɲ mìɲ hỏʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xák kũŋ kâʔu ấʔi tʰì ŋườʔita dáp ɲư tʰứ ɲứt kó ŋườʔi ŋɛ kák lờʔi Ðʔa nóʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ săwlơ hăj săwlơ dòʔi ŋườʔi dến Ðʔa tʰưʔa vớʔi săwlơ zằŋ sin cớ ʔaj ŋãlòŋ kớ ŋườʔi filitin kiə kẻ tôʔitớ vwa di dấʔu dịc kùŋ săwlơ dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰế di dấʔu dịc kùŋ ŋườʔi filitin kiə ŋươʔi cỉ dứʔa kɔncẻ kòn tăj ciếnsĩ tʰuở kòn tʰơ Ðʔa tâʔu kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ xi tôʔitớ vwa cănciên kủʔa ca mìɲ kó hăjlà kɔn ɣấʔu dến tʰa kɔnciên kủʔa bầʔi tʰì tôʔi duổʔi tʰeo dáɲ zứt kɔnciên xỏʔi miệŋ kất kự tôʔi tôʔi zâʔu dáɲ ɣiết di tôʔitớ vwa dã dáɲ cết kɔn kɔn ɣấʔu vậʔitʰì ŋườʔi filitin xôŋ cịʔufép kắt kiə kũŋ dồŋ sốfận vớʔi cúŋnó sỉɲụk kák dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ Ðʔa lạʔi nóʔi Ðứkzê dã ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi vấʔu xỏʔi kẳŋ ɣấʔu ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi filitin kiə săwlơ dáp zằŋ hãʔi di ŋwiện Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋươʔi săwlơ lấʔi áʔɔ ciến mìɲ mặk cɔ Ðʔa dộʔi káʔi mãʔɔ dồŋ dầʔu ŋườʔi mặk áʔɔ ɣiáʔɔ cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔa deo ɣươm kủʔa săwlơ cên áʔɔ ciến di tʰử xôŋ kó tʰóʔicwɛn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ tʰế maŋ xíɣiớʔi nầʔi di dượk tôʔi xôŋ kó tʰóʔicwɛn Ðʔa kổʔi áʔɔ ấʔi za kầm kâʔi ɣậʔi lựʔa zướʔi xɛ kụk dá bóŋláŋ dể cɔŋ káʔi túʔi cănciên mìɲ kó káʔi càɲ dá nơʔi tăj zồʔi sơm tớʔi ŋườʔi filitin ŋườʔifi kũŋ sơm tớʔi dến ɣần Ðʔa kó vák biɲxí di cướk ŋườʔifi sɛm Ðʔa tʰấʔi ŋườʔi kòn cẻ nướkza hồŋ hồŋ dẹpdẽ tʰì xiɲ ŋườʔi ŋườʔifi nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ta kɔn có nênŋườʔi kầm ɣậʔi dếnkùŋ ŋườʔifi zɛɲ kák tʰần mìɲ zủʔasả Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi dâʔi tʰịt ŋươʔi cɔ cim cờʔi tʰú dồŋ Ðʔa dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi filitin zằŋ ŋươʔi kầm ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ law dếnkùŋ kòn ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê biɲ dến tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi dã sỉɲụk ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê fó ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj ɣiết ŋươʔi kắt dầʔu ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj tʰâʔi kủʔa dạʔɔ biɲ filitin cɔ cim cờʔi tʰúvật kủʔa dất xắp tʰếzan zằŋ ʔisơzaên kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwânlíɲ nầʔi tʰấʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu bằŋ ɣươm hɔặk bằŋ ɣiáʔɔ Ðứkzê cúʔa kủʔa ciếncận ŋàʔi fó kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj cúŋta sảʔi xi ŋườʔi filitin dứŋzậʔi sơm tớʔi dón Ðʔa Ðʔa vộʔivàŋ cạʔi hướŋ hàŋ cận kwân ŋịc dặŋ dón ŋườʔi filitin Ðʔa tʰò tăj vàʔɔ túʔi mìɲ lấʔi kụk dá bằŋ càɲ cúŋ nơʔi cán ŋườʔi filitin kụk dá tʰấʔu cɔŋ cán ɣôliát suốŋ dất ɲưvậʔi Ðʔa tʰắŋ dượk ŋườʔi filitin bằŋ káʔi càɲ dá kụk dá dáɲ cết xôŋ kó ɣươm nơʔi tăj Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa cạʔi lạʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi filitin lấʔi ɣươm kủʔa zút za xỏʔi ɣiết kắt dầʔu di zânfi tʰấʔi lựksĩ mìɲ dã cết tʰì cạʔi cốn bấʔizờ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên zuda zấʔi duổʔi tʰeo zân filitin cɔdến kửʔa tʰàɲ ɣát Ék zôn ŋườʔi filitin bịtʰươŋ ŋã cết dầʔi dườŋ sazazim cɔdến ɣát Ék zôn zân ʔisơzaên săw xi dã zượt duổʔi zân filitin zồʔi tʰì cởvề kướp fá cạʔi kwân cúŋnó Ðʔa lấʔi tʰủkấp kủʔa ŋườʔi filitin dɛm dến ɣiêzusalɛm ɲưŋ dể biɲxí ɣôliát lạʔi cɔŋ cạʔi mìɲ săwlơ tʰấʔi Ðʔa dón dáɲ ŋườʔi filitin tʰìkó hỏʔi kwan tổŋbiɲ nɛ zằŋ hỡʔiÁp nɛ ŋườʔi caicẻ dó kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaj nɛ tʰưʔa zằŋ Ôʔi vwa tôʔi sin cỉ liɲhồn vwa tʰề tôʔi cẳŋ vwa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi hỏʔitʰăm ɣã caicẻ ấʔilà kɔn kủʔa ʔaj xiÐʔa dã ɣiết ŋườʔi filitin cởvề tʰì nɛ zướk ŋườʔi zẫn dến cướk săwlơ Ðʔa dươŋ sác tʰủkấp kủʔa ŋườʔi filitin nơʔi tăj săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ɣã caicẻ ŋươʔi kɔn ʔaj Ðʔa tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi kɔn ʔisaj tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa tạʔi bếtlêhɛm Ðʔa vừʔa tâʔu sɔŋ kùŋ săwlơ tʰì lòŋ kủʔa ɣiônatʰan xế kùŋ lòŋ Ðʔa dến dỗʔi ɣiônatʰan ʔiêʔumến Ðʔa ɲư mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ từ ŋàʔi dó săwlơ zướk Ðʔa dền mìɲ xôŋ cɔ cởvề ɲà ca ŋườʔi nữʔa ɣiônatʰan kùŋ Ðʔa bởʔivì ʔiêʔumến ŋườʔi ɲư mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi kổʔi áʔɔ mìɲ mặk caw cɔ Ðʔa vớʔi áʔɔsốŋ xák cɔdến ɣươm kuŋ daj kủʔa mìɲ nữʔa Ðʔa di dáɲ ɣi k ɲiềʔu nơʔi nàʔɔ săwlơ saj ŋườʔi di tʰì dềʔu dượkviệk săwlơ dặt ŋườʔi làmdầʔu ciếnsĩ ŋườʔidẹp bátáɲ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ xiÐʔa dã ɣiết dượk ŋườʔi filitin cởvề kùŋ dạʔɔ biɲ tʰì ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa kák tʰàɲ ʔisơzaên di za dón săwlơ múʔa dáɲ cốŋkơm ɣõ ɲịp zeo tiếŋ vuimừŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi múʔa dốʔidáp ɲăw zằŋ săwlơ ɣiết hàŋ ŋàn kònÐʔa ɣiết hàŋ săwlơ lấʔilàm ɣiận kák lờʔi nầʔi xôŋ dẹplòŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi ŋườʔita cɔ Ðʔa hàŋ kòn hàŋ ŋàn cỉ kòn tʰiếʔu cɔ ŋôʔi nướk tʰôʔi kể ŋàʔi ấʔi săwlơ tʰườŋ ŋó Ðʔa kác ɣiận ŋàʔimaj áktʰần bởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến ɲập vàʔɔ săwlơ ŋườʔi kó kơnsốt hɔảŋ cɔŋ dền mìɲ tʰì Ðʔa ɣảʔi dờn ɲư ɲữŋ ŋàʔi xák săwlơ kầm kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ nơʔi tăj fóŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ta dóŋ diɲ nơʔi vác ɲưŋÐʔa cáɲ haj xỏʔi mũʔi ɣiáʔɔ săwlơ Ðʔa Ðứkzê kùŋ Ðʔa dã lìʔa xỏʔi mìɲ săwlơ xiến Ðʔa kác sa mìɲ ŋườʔilàm cưởŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi Ðʔa za cận cởvề tʰì dứŋ dầʔu dạʔɔ biɲ cɔŋ kák kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dềʔu dượk măimắn Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi săwlơ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dượk măimắn zườŋ ấʔi tʰì lấʔilàm ŋườʔi ɲưŋ kả ʔisơzaên zuda dềʔu ʔiêʔumến Ðʔa bởʔivì ŋườʔi za cận cởvề dứŋ dầʔu cúŋ săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ nầʔimê záp kɔŋáʔi kả ɣả cɔ ŋươʔi cỉ fảʔi ɣiúp kác mạɲbạʔɔ dáɲ ɣiặk cɔ Ðứkzê vả săwlơ nóʔitʰầm zằŋ tăj cớ hàɲ hạʔi ɲưŋ tʰà tăj kủʔa zân filitin kòn Ðʔa tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi ʔaj tʰânfận tôʔi ɣì họhàŋ ca tôʔi nơʔi ʔisơzaên za ci tôʔi cởnên fòmã kủʔa vwa vả xi dến mêzáp kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ fảʔi ɣả cɔ Ðʔa tʰì lạʔi ɣả cɔ ziên ŋườʔi mêhôla ɲưŋmi kɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ ʔiêʔumến Ðʔa xisăw hăj diềʔu dó tʰì lấʔilàm dẹplòŋ ŋườʔi nóʔitʰầm zằŋ ta biểʔu kướʔi nàŋ hầʔu cɔ nàŋ káʔi bẫʔi cɔ vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa zân filitin vậʔi săwlơ nóʔi tʰứ ɲì kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi fòmã Ðʔɔạn săwlơ cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi vwa lấʔilàm dẹplòŋ ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ vwa dềʔu ʔiêʔumến ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi fòmã kủʔa vwa kák tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ nóʔi lạʔi kák lờʔi ấʔi kùŋ Ðʔa Ðʔa dáp zằŋ làm fòmã kủʔa vwa việk ɲỏmọn cướk kák ŋươʔi saw tôʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔnàn kák tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ tʰuật lạʔi cɔ vwa kâʔu cảlờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa ɲưvầʔi vwa cẳŋ dòʔi síɲlễ ɣì xák cỉ dòʔi mộtcăm zươŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi filitin dặŋ cảtʰù kừʔudịc mìɲ vả káʔi mưʔu kủʔa săwlơ xiến cɔ Ðʔa vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin kák tôʔitớ lạʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi nầʔi cɔ Ðʔa ŋɛ tʰì Ðʔa cìʔu tʰeo buộk ấʔi fòmã kủʔa vwa cướk dịɲ Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi kùŋ kwân tʰủhạ mìɲ di dáɲ ɣiết haj căm ŋươʔi filitin ŋườʔi dɛm zươŋ kủʔa cúŋnó cɔ vwa dủ dặŋ cở fòmã ŋườʔi vậʔi săwlơ ɣả micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔilàm săwlơ ɲìn Ðứkzê kùŋ Ðʔa micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ ʔiêʔumến Ðʔa ɲưŋsăw kàŋ Ðʔa hơnnữʔa cọn dờʔi mìɲ tʰùŋịc ŋườʔi mỗʔi kák kwan cưởŋ zân filitin za cận tʰì Ðʔa măimắn kák tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ vìvậʔi zɛɲ ŋườʔi cởnên tôncọŋ săwlơ bàntíɲ kùŋ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj mìɲ kák tôʔitớ dể ɣiết Ðʔa ɲưŋ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ zất tʰươŋiêʔu Ðʔa cɔ ŋườʔi hăj nóʔi zằŋ săwlơ ca tôʔi ɣiết ʔɛɲ vậʔi sáŋ ŋàʔimaj hãʔi kẩntʰận nơʔi xuất mìɲ di tôʔi di za dứŋ ɣần ca tôʔi nơʔi zuộŋ ʔɛɲ nóʔi ʔɛɲ kùŋ ca tôʔi tʰử sɛm ŋườʔi nóʔi tʰếnàʔɔ zồʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ vậʔi ɣiônatʰan nóʔi biɲ Ðʔa kùŋ săwlơ ca mìɲ zằŋ sin vwa cớ fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ vwa ŋườʔi xôŋ kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ vwa màlạʔi kó ɣiúp kôŋviệk lớnlaw cɔ vwa nữʔa ŋườʔi dã liềʔumạŋ mìɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi filitin kiə Ðứkzê kớ ŋườʔi kó ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ kả ʔisơzaên vwa kó tʰấʔi mừŋzỡ diềʔu dó ɲân saw lạʔi twan fạmtộʔi kùŋ hwiết vôtộʔi ɣiết Ðʔa săwlơ lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi ɣiônatʰan nóʔi tʰề zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề Ðʔa cẳŋ cết bấʔizờ ɣiônatʰan ɣọʔi Ðʔa tʰuật lạʔi kák lờʔi ấʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dɔạn zẫn Ðʔa dến ɣần săwlơ Ðʔa hầʔu việk săwlơ ɲư cướk sự cɛɲ ciến kứ Ðʔa di za dáɲ zân filitin cɔ cúŋnó tʰwa cạʔi cốn ɲưŋ áktʰần bởʔi Ðứkzê xiến ɲập vàʔɔ săwlơ lúk ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cɔŋ diện kầm kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ nơʔi tăj kòn Ðʔa ɣảʔi dờn săwlơ lấʔi ɣiáʔɔ dâm Ðʔa zíɲ vàʔɔ vác ɲưŋ Ðʔa cáɲ xỏʔi ɣiáʔɔ kủʔa săwlơ ɣăm cɔŋ vác Ðʔa cốn dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi buổʔi tốʔi dó săwlơ saj ŋườʔi di dến ɲà Ðʔa dặŋ kɛɲzữ ŋườʔi dể sáŋ ŋàʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi di sɔŋmi kɛɲ Ðʔa cɔ ŋườʔi hăj nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu dêm năj càŋ xôŋ cốn xỏʔi tʰì sáŋmaj càŋ ɣiết micɛɲ tʰòŋ Ðʔa suốŋ nơʔi kửʔasổ ŋườʔi cốn tʰɔát xỏʔi kế ấʔi micɛɲ lấʔi tượŋ tʰê zafim dể ɣiườŋ zùŋ bằŋ lôŋ zê bọk dầʔu zồʔi bawfủ káʔi mìɲ bằŋ káʔi áʔɔtơʔi xisăw saj ŋườʔi dến Ðʔa tʰì nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ càŋ dăw săwlơ lạʔi saj ŋườʔi dến tʰăm Ðʔa cwiền cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm cên ɣiườŋ dếnkùŋ hầʔu cɔ ɣiết di vậʔi ɲữŋ saj di dến dó tʰấʔi tượŋ tʰê zafim cên ɣiườŋ kó bằŋ lôŋ zê nơʔi dầʔu săwlơ nóʔi vớʔi micɛɲ zằŋ saw ŋươʔi ɣạt ɲưvậʔi cɔ tʰùŋịc cốn xỏʔi di micɛɲ tʰưʔa kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ ŋườʔi kó bảʔɔ tôʔi hãʔi dể cɔ di bằŋxôŋ ɣiết mầʔi vậʔi Ðʔa cốn tʰɔát xỏʔi di dến ɲà samuên tạʔi zama zồʔi tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu săwlơ dã cɔ mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi samuên di tạʔi nazốt kó ŋườʔi tʰuật lạʔi diềʔu dó cɔ săwlơ zằŋ kìʔa Ðʔa tạʔi nazốt cɔŋ zama săwlơ saj ŋườʔi di Ðʔa ɲưŋ xi cúŋ tʰấʔi dám tiênci dươŋ nóʔi tiênci samuên dứŋ dầʔu ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰì tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ kũŋ xởʔi nóʔi tiênci ŋườʔita cɔ săwlơ hăj ŋườʔi saj ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xák kũŋ nóʔi tiênci ɲư kák xák săwlơ lạʔi saj ŋườʔi di tʰứba dến fiên kũŋ nóʔi tiênci bấʔizờ săwlơ tʰâɲàɲ dến zama tớʔi nơʔi ɣiếŋ nướklớn kủʔa sêku ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ samuên Ðʔa dâʔu ŋườʔita tʰưʔa zằŋ haj ŋườʔiở nazốt cɔŋ zama vậʔi ŋườʔi di dến nazốt cɔŋ zama tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ dến fiên ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kứ di zọk dàŋ nóʔi tiênci cɔdến xi tớʔi nazốt cɔŋ zama ŋườʔi kũŋ áʔɔ mìɲ nóʔi tiênci cướk samuên zồʔi ởcần ɲưvậʔi zướʔi dất cọn ŋàʔi dêm dó bởʔi kớ ấʔi kó kâʔu tụkŋữ zằŋ săwlơ kũŋ vàʔɔ hàŋ kák tiênci saw Ðʔa cốn xỏʔi nazốt cɔŋ zama dếnkùŋ ɣiônatʰan nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã làmci tộʔiák tôʔi ɣì tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi ci kùŋ caɛɲ ŋườʔi twan hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi ɣiônatʰan dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tʰế ʔɛɲ xôŋ cết dâʔu ca tôʔi cẳŋ ɣì hăj ɲỏ cẳŋ nóʔi cướk vớʔi tôʔi vậʔi ɲân saw ca tôʔi ɣiấʔu tôʔi nầʔi vớʔi tôʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó cẳŋtʰể dượk ɲưŋÐʔa lạʔi tʰềŋwiền zằŋ caɛɲ zõ zằŋ tôʔi dượk cướk ʔɛɲ kó nóʔi zằŋ cớ cɔ ɣiônatʰan ɣì kẻʔɔ fảʔi lɔbuồn căŋ sɔŋ cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa ʔɛɲ tʰề zằŋ cỉ kòn bướk kác tôʔi cết tʰôʔi ɣiônatʰan dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ hễ ʔɛɲ tôʔi diềʔu ɣì tʰì cɔ ʔɛɲ Ðʔa zằŋ maj ŋàʔi mồŋ tôʔi fảʔi di ŋồʔi cuŋ vớʔi vwa hãʔi dể cɔ tôʔi di cốn cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ cɔdến ciềʔu ŋàʔi tʰứba nếʔu caɛɲ tʰấʔi tôʔi vắŋmặt tʰì hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðʔa kó kố nàʔisin tôʔi cɔ divề bếtlêhɛm kwêhươŋ dó kả ɲà zâŋ kủʔa hằŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi dáp tốt tʰì tôʔitớ ʔɛɲ dượk bìɲiên kòn nếʔu ŋườʔi nổʔizận tʰì hãʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi dịɲ hạʔi tôʔi vậʔi hãʔi lòŋ ɲântừ cɔ tôʔitớ ʔɛɲ bởʔivì ʔɛɲ dã ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê kếtướk kùŋ tôʔitớ ʔɛɲ sɔŋ fần tôʔi kó tộʔiɣì sin cíɲ ʔɛɲ hãʔi ɣiết tôʔi di kớsaw ʔɛɲ lạʔi zẫn tôʔi dến caɛɲ ɣiônatʰan dáp lạʔi zằŋ cớ kó ŋĩ ɲưvậʔi cáʔilạʔi nếʔu tôʔi tʰật ca tôʔi dịɲ hạʔi ʔɛɲ zễ nàʔɔ tôʔi cẳŋ cɔ ʔɛɲ hăj Ðʔa dáp kùŋ ɣiônatʰan zằŋ ɲưŋ nếʔu caɛɲ zùŋ lờʔi ŋiêmxắk dáp kùŋ ʔɛɲ tʰì ʔaj cɔ tôʔi hăj ɣiônatʰan dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ hè cúŋta hãʔi za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kả haj dềʔu di za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ ɣiônatʰan nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên làmcứŋ ŋàʔimaj hăjlà ŋàʔi tạʔi ɣiờ nầʔi tôʔi zọ ca tôʔi nếʔu tʰấʔi cẳŋ kódiềʔu ci cɔ ʔɛɲ tʰì tôʔi xôŋ saj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dến cɔ ʔɛɲ hăjbiết kòn nếʔu ca tôʔi kwiết lòŋ hạʔi ʔɛɲ tôʔi cɔ ʔɛɲ hăj cướk biểʔu ʔɛɲ di ʔɛɲ di bìɲiên bằŋ cẳŋ ŋwiện Ðứkzê fạt ɣiônatʰan kác nặŋnề kầʔusin Ðứkzê kùŋ ʔɛɲ ɲư ŋàʔi dã kùŋ ca tôʔi và ŋàʔisăw nếʔu tôʔi kòn sốŋ kó fảʔi ʔɛɲ lấʔi ɲântừ kủʔa Ðứkzê dãʔi tôʔi căŋ ɲưŋ nếʔu tôʔi cết zẫʔu xi Ðứkzê ziệt hếttʰảʔi tʰùŋịc kủʔa Ðʔa xỏʔi mặtdất cɔ dếnkùŋ tʰì kũŋ cớ kất tʰươŋ ɲà tôʔi dến dờʔidờʔi ɲưvậʔi ɣiônatʰan kếtzaw ướk kùŋ ɲà Ðʔa zằŋ Ðứkzê báʔɔtʰù ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc kủʔa Ðʔa ɣiônatʰan tʰươŋiêʔu Ðʔa ɲư mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ vậʔi xiến Ðʔa lạʔi tʰề nữʔa ɣiônatʰan zằŋ maj ŋàʔi mồŋ vắŋmặt ʔɛɲ ŋườʔita tʰấʔi cỗ ʔɛɲ cốŋ ŋàʔi cớ kwên di suốŋ măw dếnnơʔi ʔɛɲ dã ŋàʔicướk ŋàʔi dịɲ làmviệk ʔɛɲ dợʔi ɣần dá sɛ tôʔi mũʔitên fíʔa dá dó zườŋɲư tôʔi vàʔɔ káʔi biə Ðʔɔạn tôʔi saj tôʔitớ tôʔi bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi di kák mũʔitên nếʔu tôʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ kìʔa kák mũʔitên nầʔi mầʔi hãʔi lấʔi di bấʔizờ ʔɛɲ hãʔi dến tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề mọʔi việk dềʔu bìɲan cɔ ʔɛɲ cẳŋ kó ɣì ɲưŋ nếʔu tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ dứʔa cẻ zằŋ kìʔa kák mũʔitên kiə mầʔi bấʔizờ ʔɛɲ xá di Ðứkzê xiến ʔɛɲ di kòn lờʔi cúŋta dã nóʔi ɲăw ŋwiện Ðứkzê làmcứŋ ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲ tôʔi dến dờʔidờʔi vậʔi Ðʔa cɔŋ dồŋ xi dến ŋàʔi mồŋ vwa ŋồʔi dặŋ bữʔa ŋườʔi ŋồʔi nơʔi cỗ tʰườŋ ŋồʔi ɣần vác ɣiônatʰan dứŋzậʔi nɛ ŋồʔi săwlơ kòn cỗ kủʔa Ðʔa tʰì xôŋ ŋàʔi dó săwlơ cẳŋ nóʔi ci tưởŋ zằŋ kó ɣì zủʔizɔ dã sảʔi dến cɔ zồʔi cắcẳn xôŋ sạc dã fảʔi ɣì ôʔuế zồʔi sɔŋ ŋàʔisăw ŋàʔi mồŋ haj cỗ kủʔa Ðʔa lạʔi xôŋ nữʔa săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ kớsaw kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaj xôŋ dến zự bữʔa hômkwa ŋàʔinăj ɣiônatʰan tʰưʔa kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ Ðʔa kó nàʔisin fép tôʔi di dến bếtlêhɛm zằŋ sin dể tôʔi di ɲà cúŋtôʔi kó cɔŋ tʰàɲ ʔɛɲ tôʔi dã zặn tôʔi fảʔi di dến vậʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk ŋườʔi sin cɔfép tôʔi lậptứk di dến dó dặŋ tʰăm kák ʔɛɲ tôʔi Ấʔi bởʔi kớ dó ŋườʔi xôŋ dến ŋồʔi bấʔizờ săwlơ nổʔizận kùŋ ɣiônatʰan zằŋ kɔncaj zantà bộʔiŋịc kiə mầʔi kó kùŋ kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaj dáŋ hổɲụk cɔ mầʔi dáŋ hổɲụk cɔ dã dẻ mầʔi tʰăj tʰật kɔncaj ʔisaj sốŋ lâʔu cên mặtdất cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰì mầʔi nướk mầʔi cẳŋ vữŋbền cừŋ nấʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi saj di zẫn cɔ fảʔi cết ɣiônatʰan tʰưʔa kùŋ săwlơ ca mìɲ zằŋ kớsaw ɣiết di nó kó diềʔu ɣì săwlơ fóŋ kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ dặŋ dâm ŋườʔi ɣiônatʰan ɲìn ca mìɲ dã ɲứt dịɲ ɣiết Ðʔa ɣiônatʰan cổʔi zậʔi xỏʔi tứkzận cɔŋ ŋàʔi mồŋ haj cẳŋ ɣì lấʔilàm buồnbựk Ðʔa ca mìɲ dã sỉɲụk ŋườʔi kwaŋàʔi săw ɣiônatʰan di za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ tạʔi nơʔi dã kùŋ Ðʔa kó dứʔa tôʔitớ cẻ tʰeo ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi cạʔi ɲữŋ kẻ tôʔitớ cạʔi ɣiônatʰan mũʔitên kwa xỏʔi xi tôʔitớ di dếnnơʔi kó ɣiônatʰan dã tʰì ɣiônatʰan zằŋ tên cẳŋ kiə mầʔi saw ɣiônatʰan lạʔi kêʔu tôʔitớ zằŋ hãʔi di măw cớ zừŋ lạʔi kẻ tôʔitớ mũʔitên zồʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ củ mìɲ vả tôʔitớ cẳŋ ci kả sɔŋ Ðʔa ɣiônatʰan hiểʔubiết diềʔu dó ɣì ɣiônatʰan caw biɲxí cɔ tôʔitớ mìɲ bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi di dɛm cɔŋ tʰàɲ xi tôʔitớ dã di zồʔi Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi fíʔa mìɲ suốŋ dất lạʔi dɔạn haj ŋườʔi ɲăw xók Ðʔa xók ɲiềʔu ɣiônatʰan nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ʔɛɲ hãʔi di bìɲan cúŋta dã ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê lờʔi tʰề kùŋ ɲăw zằŋ Ðứkzê làmcứŋ ɣiữʔa tôʔi ʔɛɲ ɣiữʔa zòŋzõʔi tôʔi zòŋzõʔi ʔɛɲ dến dờʔidờʔi vậʔi Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi di kòn ɣiônatʰan cở vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa dến nóp ɣặp tʰấʔi ʔahimêlék ʔahimêlék zunsợ cạʔi dến dón ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ɲân saw ôŋ kó mộtmìɲ cẳŋ ʔaj tʰeo vậʔi Ðʔa dáp kùŋ tʰầʔi ʔahimêlék zằŋ vwa kó saj tôʔi việk zặn zằŋ cớ cɔ ʔaj ɣì việk saj ŋươʔi kũŋ dừŋ cɔ ʔaj lịɲ cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ta dã cỉdịɲ cɔ kák tôʔitớ nơʔi bâʔizờ tʰầʔi kó ci cɔŋ tăj hãʔi caw cɔ báɲ hăjlà ɣì tʰầʔi kó tʰế dượk tʰầʔi dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ cɔŋ tăj xôŋ kó báɲ tʰườŋ cỉ kó báɲtʰáɲ tʰôʔi kák tôʔitớ ôŋ xôŋ kó dến ɣần dờn Ðʔa dáp kùŋ tʰầʔi zằŋ từ xi di za vàʔiba ŋàʔi zồʔi cúŋtôʔi xôŋ kó lạʔi ɣần ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kák tôʔi kũŋ tʰɛɲsạc kòn nếʔu kôŋviệk tôʔi xôŋ tʰáɲ tʰì ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ ɲờ tʰáɲ dượk tʰáɲ saw vậʔi tʰầʔi caw báɲtʰáɲ cɔ ŋườʔi dó cẳŋ kó báɲ ci xák báɲ cầntʰiết ŋườʔita dã kất xỏʔi cướk Ðứkzê dặŋ tʰế báɲ mớʔi kùŋ cɔŋ lúk ấʔi kũŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi kó tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ dó kầm lạʔi tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ŋườʔi ʔɛ zân dôm làmdầʔu kák cănciên kủʔa săwlơ Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ʔahimêlék zằŋ zướʔi tăj tʰầʔi dâʔi cẳŋ kó kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ hăjlà kâʔi ɣươm saw ta xôŋ kó dɛm tʰeo ɣươm hăjlà biɲxí ɣì lịɲ vwa lấʔilàm ɣấpzút tʰầʔi dáp zằŋ Ðâʔi kó kâʔi ɣươm kủʔa ɣôliát ŋườʔi filitin ôŋ dã ɣiết cɔŋ cũŋ bọk cɔŋ miếŋ dể săw fót nếʔu ôŋ lấʔi tʰì hãʔi lấʔi di dâʔi cẳŋ kó ɣươm nàʔɔ xák Ðʔa dáp zằŋ cẳŋ kó ɣươm nàʔɔ bằŋ hãʔi caw cɔ bấʔizờ Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi ŋàʔi dó cốn sa xỏʔi săwlơ di dếnkùŋ ʔakíc vwa ɣát kák tôʔitớ kủʔa ʔakíc hỏʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi dó Ðʔa vwa kủʔa sứ ấʔi căŋ há cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi kó nóʔi cɔŋ xi múʔahát zằŋ săwlơ ɣiết hàŋ ŋàn kònÐʔa ɣiết hàŋ Ðʔa dể kák lờʔi nầʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ zất ʔakíc vwa ɣát ŋườʔi ɣiảdò diênkuồŋ cướk cúŋ zạʔixờ ɣiữʔa ŋườʔi ɣạc zấʔu cên kửʔa dể nướkmiếŋ cảʔi cên zâʔu mìɲ ʔakíc nóʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ kìʔa kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dó diênkuồŋ kớsaw kák ŋươʔi zẫn dến nơʔi tʰiếʔu diên saw kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zẫn nầʔi dến dặŋ bàʔi kỳkụk cướk một ŋườʔi ɲưvậʔi cẳŋ vàʔɔ ɲà Ðʔa di xỏʔi dó cốn cɔŋ haŋ dá ʔadulam xi kák ʔɛɲ kả ɲà ca ŋườʔi hăj diềʔu dó di suốŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi fàm nàʔɔ kùŋxốn nàʔɔ mắk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ sầʔu xổ kũŋ dềʔu ɲómhọp kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi làmdầʔu Ấʔi vậʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi kó cừŋ bốncăm ŋuờʔi từ dó Ðʔa di dến mítbê cɔŋ sứ môáp ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ vwa sứ môáp zằŋ sin cɔfép camẹ tôʔi dến vớʔi vwa cɔdến cừŋ tôʔi biếtdiềʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ tôʔi vậʔi Ðʔa zẫn camẹ mìɲ dến cướk vwa môáp haj ŋườʔiở vớʔi vwa ấʔi cọn lúk Ðʔa cɔŋ dồn ɲưŋɣát dấŋ tiênci nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ cớ cɔŋ dồn nầʔi hãʔi di dến sứ zuda vậʔi Ðʔa di dến cɔŋ zừŋ hêzết săwlơ hăj zằŋ ŋườʔita dã dượk Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi bấʔizờ săwlơ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa ŋồʔi zướʔi kâʔi liễʔu sủ cên nơʔi kaw tăikầm ɣiáʔɔ kòn kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi cầʔucựk ŋườʔi săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ kák tôʔitớ cầʔucựk mìɲ zằŋ hỡʔi zân bêŋiəmin hãʔi ŋɛ kó fảʔi kɔncaj ʔisaj cɔ hếttʰảʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ zuộŋ ɲɔ căŋ kák ŋươʔi côŋkậʔi kák ŋươʔi cưởŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi căm ŋươʔi vậʔi kớsaw kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi dồŋmưʔu ŋịc kớsaw cẳŋ cɔ hăj zằŋ kɔncaj dã zawướk kùŋ kɔncaj ʔisaj ɲân saw cẳŋ ʔaj tʰươŋsót cɔ hăj cướk zằŋ kɔncaj dã suj tôʔitớ ŋịc kùŋ mưʔuhạʔi ɲư dã ŋàʔinăj bấʔizờ ʔɛ ŋườʔi dôm làmdầʔu ɲữŋ dầʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi kó tʰấʔi kɔncaj ʔisaj di dến nóp vàʔɔ ɲà ʔahimêlék kɔncaj ʔahitúp ŋườʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê cɔ kó kấp cɔ lươŋtʰựk kùŋ caw cɔ kâʔi ɣươm kủʔa ɣôliát ŋườʔi filitin vwa saj dòʔi ʔahimêlék kɔncaj ʔahitúp tʰầʔi kả ɲà ca ŋườʔi tứklà ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tạʔi nóp cúŋ tʰảʔi dềʔu dếnkùŋ vwa săwlơ nóʔi hỡʔi kɔncaj ʔahitúp hãʔi ŋɛ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ cúʔa ôʔi kó tôʔi dâʔi săwlơ zằŋ kớsaw ŋươʔi dồŋmưʔu kùŋ kɔncaj ʔisaj ŋịc kùŋ ŋươʔi kó kấp báɲ cɔ caw cɔ kâʔi ɣươm kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ dể zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ mưʔukế hạʔi ɲư dã ŋàʔinăj ʔahimêlék tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ vậʔi cɔŋ vòŋ dầʔitớ vwa ʔaj ŋườʔi cuŋtín ɲư Ðʔa fòmã vwa zự hộʔi ŋị kủʔa vwa dượk kwí cɔŋ ɲàvwa kó fảʔi ŋàʔinăj tôʔi mớʔi xởʔi kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋườʔi saw tôʔi kwiết xôŋ ɲưvậʔi sin vwa cớ ŋờ lờʔi nàʔɔ cɔ tôʔitớ vwa hɔặk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà ca tôʔi tôʔitớ vwa cẳŋ ɣì hɔặk hăj ɲiềʔu diềʔu dó vwa dáp hỡʔi ʔahimêlék tʰật ŋươʔi kả ɲà ca ŋườʔi dềʔu cết vwa nóʔi kùŋ kák tʰịvệ dứŋ ɣần mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần ɣiết ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cúŋnó ɣiúpdỡ Ðʔa cốn xôŋ cɔ hăj ɲưŋ kák dầʔitớ kủʔa vwa xôŋ xứŋ ca tăicên mìɲ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kũŋ cẳŋ cịʔu dáɲ nữʔa vwa nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi lạʔi ɣần dáɲ ɣiết ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ʔɛ ŋườʔi dôm lạʔi ɣần dáɲ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣiết mươʔi ŋườʔi mặk fót bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj săwlơ lạʔi zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết zân nóp tʰàɲ kủʔa tʰầʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kɔncẻ kɔn dươŋ lừʔa ciên tʰảʔi dềʔu ɣươm ɣiết sɔŋ cɔŋ kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahimêlék cáʔu kủʔa ʔahitúp ʔabiətʰa tʰɔát xỏʔi cốn dếnkùŋ Ðʔa ʔabiətʰa tʰuật lạʔi cɔ Ðʔa hăj zằŋ săwlơ ɣiết ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔa dáp kùŋ ʔabiətʰa zằŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi hiểʔu zõ ʔɛ ŋườʔi dôm kómặt tạʔi dó cắk họk lạʔi cɔ săwlơ Ấʔi tạʔi kớ màkả ɲà kủʔa ca ŋươʔi cết hãʔi kùŋ cớ ci nàʔɔ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ kũŋ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ tʰì bảʔɔtɔàn ŋườʔita dến nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ kìʔa zân filitin dáɲ kê ʔila kướp lấʔi kák dạp lúʔa Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi kó di dáɲ ŋườʔi filitin nầʔi căŋ Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi di dáɲ ŋườʔi filitin ɣiảʔicứʔu kê ʔila sɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰeo Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ cáɲ tạʔi dâʔi cɔŋ sứ zuda cúŋta sợhãʔi tʰăj fươŋci di dến kê ʔila dáɲ kwânlíɲ filitin Ðʔa lạʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê nữʔa Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di suốŋ kê ʔila fó zân filitin vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi vậʔi Ðʔa di kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰeo mìɲ dến kê ʔila dáɲ zân filitin cɔ cúŋ fảʔi tʰwa Ấʔi Ðʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu zân kê ʔila ɲưvậʔi vả xi ʔabiətʰa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahimêlék di cốn dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi kê ʔila tʰìkó dɛm tʰeo káʔi fót ŋườʔita cɔ săwlơ hăj zằŋ Ðʔa dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ kê ʔila săwlơ nóʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj bởʔivì dã di zam mìɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ kó kửʔa kó tʰɛn vậʔi săwlơ ciêʔu hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ dặŋ di suốŋ kê ʔila vâʔi fủ Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi ɲưŋÐʔa zằŋ săwlơ twan mưʔuhạʔi mìɲ tʰì nóʔi kùŋ tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa zằŋ hãʔi dɛm fót dến Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi kầʔu zằŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tôʔitớ kủʔa cúʔa kó hăj zằŋ săwlơ twan di dến tʰàɲ kê ʔila dặŋ fá tʰàɲ kớ tôʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kê ʔila tôʔi vàʔɔ tăj săwlơ căŋ săwlơ di suốŋ ʔiɲư lờʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa dã ŋɛnóʔi căŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên sin cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa biếtdiềʔu dó Ðứkzê dáp săwlơ di suốŋ Ðʔa lạʔi hỏʔi zằŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kê ʔila tôʔi ɲữŋ tʰeo tôʔi vàʔɔ tăj săwlơ căŋ Ðứkzê dáp cúŋnó kák ŋươʔi bấʔizờ Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo mìɲ ướkcừŋ sáʔu căm ŋườʔi dềʔu dứŋzậʔi di za xỏʔi kê ʔila zút nơʔi nàʔɔ dượk tʰì săwlơ hăj zằŋ Ðʔa dã tʰɔát xỏʔi kê ʔila tʰì xôŋ kéʔɔ biɲ di Ðʔa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cên nơʔi kaw hiểmhók tứklà cên núʔi tạʔi dồŋ vắŋ síp săwlơ ŋườʔi xôŋ ŋớt ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ fó ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj săwlơ Ðʔa tʰấʔi săwlơ dã kéʔɔ za dặŋ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ tʰì lạʔi cɔŋ zừŋ kủʔa dồŋ vắŋ síp bấʔizờ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ dứŋzậʔi di dếnkùŋ Ðʔa cɔŋ zừŋ cɔ ŋườʔi vữŋlòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ cớ ci tăj kủʔa săwlơ ca tôʔi cẳŋ dụŋ dến ʔɛɲ dâʔu ʔɛɲ vwa ʔisơzaên kòn tôʔi tểtướŋ ʔɛɲ săwlơ ca tôʔi kũŋ zõ diềʔu dó haj ŋườʔi kùŋ zawướk tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê dɔạn Ðʔa lạʔi cɔŋ zừŋ kòn ɣiônatʰan cởvề ɲà mìɲ zânsíp di kùŋ săwlơ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ðʔa ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi tạʔi nơʔi dồn cɔŋ zừŋ cên ɣò hakila fíʔa kủʔa dồŋ vắŋ vậʔi hỡʔi vwa hãʔi suốŋ ʔi tʰeo lòŋ ướk kủʔa vwa cúŋtôʔi cịʔu lɔ vàʔɔ tăj vwa săwlơ dáp ŋwiệnÐứkzê fướk cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót hãʔi di hỏʔitʰăm cɔ cắk hơnnữʔa dặŋ sɛmsét cỗ cú ʔaj dã tʰấʔi dó ŋườʔita kó nóʔi zằŋ zất xôn kwỉ vậʔi hãʔi sɛmsét mọʔi nơʔi dɔạn cởvề nóʔi lạʔi kùŋ cɔ cắk tʰì di kùŋ kák ŋươʔi nếʔu cɔŋ sứ tʰì cɔŋ hằŋ ŋàn zân zuda vậʔi cúŋ cổʔi zậʔi divề síp cướk săwlơ kòn Ðʔa ɲưŋ tʰeo ŋườʔiở nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ maôn tạʔi ʔazaba fíʔa ɣiêsimôn săwlơ ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi di Ðʔa Ðʔa hăj dượk diềʔu dó suốŋ dá cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ maôn săwlơ hăj dượk duổʔi tʰeo Ðʔa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ maôn săwlơ di núʔi nầʔi kòn Ðʔa tʰeo ŋườʔi di núʔi kiə Ðʔa vộʔivàŋ cạʔi cốn dặŋ tʰɔát xỏʔi săwlơ ɲưŋ lúk săwlơ kák dầʔitớ bawfủ Ðʔa tʰeo ŋườʔi dặŋ tʰìkó sứɣiả dếnkùŋ săwlơ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi măw măw cởvề zân filitin dã sâmfạm sứ vậʔi săwlơ tʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo Ðʔa di dáɲ zân filitin bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi cỗ nầʔi hònÐáfân zẽ Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa di xỏʔi dó ŋụ tạʔi cɔŋ dồn ʔɛâŋêdi xisăw duổʔi tʰeo filitin cởvề zồʔi kó ŋườʔi dến nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ kìʔa Ðʔa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ʔɛâŋêdi săwlơ dɛm ŋàn ŋườʔi cọn cɔŋ kả zân ʔisơzaên kéʔɔ zadi Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi cɔdến kák dá kủʔa zê zừŋ săwlơ di dến ɣần cuồŋ ciên cên dườŋ tạʔi dó kó haŋ dá săwlơ vàʔɔ dó dặŋ di vả Ðʔa tʰeo ŋườʔiở cɔŋ kùŋ haŋ ɲữŋ tʰeo Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ nầʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ ôŋ ta fó tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi hãʔi sử ŋườʔi tùʔiý ôŋ ɲưŋÐʔa dứŋzậʔi kắt cộm áʔɔtơʔi kủʔa săwlơ Ðʔɔạn lòŋ ŋườʔi các diềʔu mìɲ dã kắt áʔɔtơʔi kủʔa vwa ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ tʰeo mìɲ zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê cớ dể fạmtộʔi kùŋ cúʔa cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê ca tăicên mìɲ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔa nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi ấʔi kwởcác kák tʰeo mìɲ ŋănkản cúŋ sôŋ vàʔɔ mìɲ săwlơ săwlơ dứŋzậʔi za xỏʔi haŋ dá kứ di dườŋ mìɲ ÐʔɔạnÐʔa kũŋ cổʔi zậʔi di za xỏʔi haŋ dá ɣọʔi săwlơ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi vwa cúʔa tôʔi săwlơ ŋó lạʔi săw mìɲ tʰì Ðʔa kúʔi suốŋ dất lạʔi Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ ɲân saw vwa ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ðʔa tʰế hạʔi vwa kìʔa hãʔi sɛm cíɲ vwa kó tʰế tʰấʔi dượk zằŋ ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ haŋ dá Ðứkzê dã fó vwa vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi kó ŋườʔi biểʔu ɣiết vwa ɲưŋ tôʔi zɔŋ tʰứ cɔ vwa zằŋ xôŋ ca tăicên mìɲ cúʔa ŋườʔi dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê vậʔi ca ôʔi hãʔi sɛm káʔi áʔɔtơʔi ca tôʔi kầm cɔŋ tăj bởʔivì tôʔi kó áʔi tơʔi kủʔa ca xôŋ ɣiết ca tʰì ɲơn dó xá ɲận zằŋ nơʔi tôʔi cẳŋ kó ák hɔặk fảnŋịc tôʔi cẳŋ kó fạmtộʔi ɣì vớʔi ca kòn ca lạʔi mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi dể kất di Ðứkzê dɔán sét ca tôʔi Ðứkzê báʔɔtʰù ca cɔ tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ ca ɲư kâʔu kổŋữ nóʔi sự ák zɔ ák za ɲưŋ tăj tôʔi xôŋ dụŋ dến mìɲ ca vwa ʔisơzaên kéʔɔ za dáɲ ʔaj ca duổʔi tʰeo ʔaj một kɔn cócết một kɔn bọcét tʰếtʰì Ðứkzê kwan sét dɔán sét ca tôʔi ŋàʔi sɛmsét biɲ vựk kớ tôʔi sử kác kôŋbìɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tăj ca xiÐʔa nóʔi sɔŋ kák lờʔi nầʔi tʰì săwlơ dáp zằŋ hỡʔiÐʔa kɔn kó fảʔi tiếŋ kɔn căŋ săwlơ kấttiếŋ xók nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ kɔn tʰật kôŋbìɲ ca kɔn kó lấʔi diềʔu tʰiện báʔɔ diềʔu ák ca dã cɔ kɔn ŋàʔinăj kɔn dã za kɔn lấʔi diềʔu tʰiện dốʔi kùŋ ca Ðứkzê dã fó ca vàʔɔ tăj kɔn sɔŋ kɔn xôŋ kó ɣiết ca xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣặp tʰùŋịc mìɲ dể cɔ di bìɲiênvôsự saw ŋwiệnÐứkzê lấʔi diềʔu tʰiện báʔɔ cɔ kɔn kɔn dã cɔ ca ŋàʔinăj kwả zằŋ kɔn vwa nướk ʔisơzaên lâʔu cɔŋ tăj kɔn vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê tʰề kùŋ zằŋ kɔn cẳŋ ziệt zòŋzõʔi cẳŋ hủʔi zɛɲ xỏʔi ɲà tổfụ Ðʔa lờʔi tʰề kùŋ săwlơ săwlơ cởvề ɲà mìɲ kòn Ðʔa kák tʰeo ŋườʔi cởlên nơʔi dồn kế ấʔi samuên kwadờʔi kả ʔisơzaên ɲóm lạʔi dặŋ tʰanxók ŋườʔi zồʔi côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi tạʔi zama Ðʔa dứŋzậʔi di suốŋ dồŋ vắŋ fazan vả kó ŋườʔiở maôn kòn sảnŋiệp tʰì kạtmên ŋườʔi zất ɣiàʔu kó ŋàn ciên mộtŋàn zê ŋườʔi dươŋ kạtmên dặŋ lôŋ ciên mìɲ ŋườʔi nầʔi nabɛɲ ʔabiɣain tʰì tʰôŋmiɲ tốtdẹp kòn cồŋ tʰì kứŋkỏʔi huŋák tʰuộk zòŋ kalép Ðʔa cɔŋ zừŋ hăj zằŋ nabɛɲ lôŋ ciên saj mườʔi ɣã caicẻ di zặn zằŋ hãʔi di kạtmên nabɛɲ ɲơn zɛɲ càʔɔ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ ŋwiện ôŋ dượk bìɲiên ŋwiện ɲà ôŋ kũŋ dượk bìɲiên fàm ɣì tʰuộk ôŋ dềʔu dượk bìɲiên và bâʔizờ tôʔi kó hăj zằŋ ôŋ kó ɲữŋ tʰợ lôŋ ciên cɔŋ lúk kák cănciên ôŋ ɣần cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ xuấʔi xuất cúŋnó cọn hồʔi cúŋnó tạʔi kạtmên cẳŋ kó tʰiếʔu ɣì hãʔi hỏʔi tôʔitớ ôŋ diềʔu dó cúŋnó nóʔi kùŋ ôŋ vậʔi sin kák ɣã caicẻ dượk cướk ôŋ cúŋtôʔi dến cɔŋ ŋàʔi tốtlàɲ tăj ôŋ tʰấʔi ɣì hãʔi cɔ kák tôʔitớ ôŋ cɔ kɔn ôŋ Ðʔa vậʔi kák ɣã caicẻ kủʔa Ðʔa di dến ɲơn zɛɲ Ðʔa lạʔi cɔ nabɛɲ mọʔi lờʔi ấʔi dɔạn nínlặŋ ɲưŋna bɛɲ dáp kùŋ kák tôʔitớ Ðʔa zằŋ ʔaj Ðʔa ʔaj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaj ɲữŋ tôʔitớ cốn xỏʔi củ mìɲ ŋàʔinăj lấʔilàm dôŋ tʰăj lẽnàʔɔ lấʔi báɲ nướk tʰịt zọn cɔ kák tʰợ lôŋ ciên cɔ ɲữŋ cẳŋ dâʔu dến saw ɲữŋ ɣã caicẻ kủʔa Ðʔa tʰốʔi dườŋ cởvề nơʔi cúŋnó tʰuật lạʔi kák lờʔi ấʔi cɔ Ðʔa ŋɛ Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ kák ŋườʔi tʰeo mìɲ zằŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋta hãʔi deo ɣươm mìɲ cúŋ deo ɣươm mìɲ Ðʔa kũŋ deo ɣươm kủʔa ŋườʔi Ướkcừŋ bốncăm ŋườʔi di tʰeo Ðʔa kòn haj căm ŋườʔiở lạʔi ɣiữ dồvật kó dứʔa dầʔitớ báʔɔ cɔ ʔabiɣain kủʔa nabɛɲ zằŋ Ðʔa kó saj ɲữŋ sứɣiả dồŋ vắŋ dến càʔɔ củ cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ nabɛɲ ɣắt ɣóŋ kùŋ sɔŋ cọn lúk cúŋtôʔi ɣần ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ tʰì zất kùŋ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi xôŋ xuấʔi xuất cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ci bawlâʔu cúŋtôʔi ɣần kák ŋườʔi dó lɔ căn bầʔi ciên cúŋtôʔi tʰì ŋàʔi dêm zườŋɲư tườŋ cɛ cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ xá sɛmsét diềʔu fảʔi dã dịɲ ɣiáŋ tajhọʔa cên củ cúŋtôʔi cên kả ɲà ŋườʔi củ zữ kwá xôŋ kó ʔaj nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dượk ʔabiɣain vộʔivàŋ lấʔi haj căm báɲ haj bầʔu za zượʔuɲɔ kɔnciên dựk nấʔu cín dấʔu zaŋ mộtcăm báɲ ɲɔ xô haj căm báɲcáʔi xô cất cên lưŋ lừʔa Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák tôʔitớ zằŋ hãʔi di cướk di tʰeo kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ nàŋ xôŋ nóʔi ci kùŋ nabɛɲ cồŋ mìɲ nàŋ kỡʔi lừʔa di suốŋ tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kó núʔi bawfủ tʰì Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi kũŋ di suốŋ dụŋ nàŋ nàŋ ɣặp kák ŋườʔi dó vả Ðʔa kó nóʔi zằŋ vậʔi tʰật lấʔilàm luốŋ kôŋ cɔ dã ɣìŋiữ mọʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi kó cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ dến dỗʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ɣì kòn lạʔi lấʔi ʔɔán cả ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sử tʰùŋịc kủʔa Ðʔa tʰật cɔ nặŋnề từ dâʔi dến maj fàm ɣì tʰuộk nabɛɲ cẳŋ dể kòn lạʔi ɲỏ xi ʔa biɣain tʰấʔi Ðʔa lậtdật suốŋ lừʔa mìɲ mìɲ suốŋ dất tạʔi cướk Ðʔa lạʔi vậʔi nàŋ fụk zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ lạʔi cúʔa lỗʔi tôʔi tôʔi sin cɔfép kɔndòʔi ôŋ nóʔi cướk ôŋ sin hãʔi ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa kɔndòʔi ôŋ sin cúʔa cớ dến ŋườʔi huŋák kiə nabɛɲ táɲ tʰật vớʔi ŋĩʔa nabɛɲ nơʔi kó diênzạʔi kòn tôʔi kɔndòʔi cúʔa cẳŋ kó tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cúʔa saj dến bâʔizờ Ðứkzê dã ŋăn cúʔa dến dổ hwiết za lấʔi cáɲ tăj mìɲ báʔɔtʰù tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa cúʔa tʰề ŋwiện kák tʰùŋịc cúʔa hạʔi cúʔa dềʔu ɲư nabɛɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ nầʔi kɔndòʔi cúʔa dɛm dến zâŋ cɔ cúʔa dể fát cɔ kák ŋườʔi di tʰeo săw sin hãʔi tʰa lỗʔi cɔ kɔndòʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwả ɲàcúʔa dượk lâʔu cúʔa dáɲ ɣiặk cɔ Ðứkzê cọn dờʔi cúʔa cẳŋ tʰấʔi ák nơʔi cúʔa nếʔu kó ʔaj zấʔi dặŋ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ cúʔa tʰì ɣiêhôva dứk cúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúʔa ɣìŋiữ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa cúʔa cɔŋ bọk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sốŋ kòn mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa tʰùŋịc cúʔa Ðứkzê za sa ɲư xỏʔi càɲ dá vậʔi xi dứk ɣiêhôva dã cɔ cúʔa tôʔimọʔi làɲ ŋàʔi dã hứʔa xi ŋàʔi dã ŋườʔi làmdầʔu ʔisơzaên tʰì ướk ɣì cúʔa tôʔi xôŋ fànnàn xôŋ lòŋ kắn zứk dã vôkớ dổmáʔu za báʔɔtʰù cɔ mìɲ lạʔi xi Ðứkzê dã cɔ cúʔa tôʔi ŋwiện cúʔa ɲớ dến kɔndòʔi kủʔa cúʔa Ðʔa dáp kùŋ ʔabiɣain zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã saj ŋươʔi dến dón ŋàʔinăj Ðáŋ xɛn xônŋwan ŋươʔi cúk fướk cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj dã kản dến dổ hwiết ŋăn zùŋ cíɲ tăj mìɲ báʔɔtʰù cɔ mìɲ ɲưŋ cỉ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðấŋ dã kản diềʔu ák tʰề zằŋ nếʔu nàŋ xôŋ vộʔivàŋ dến dón tʰì dến sáŋmaj fàm ɣì tʰuộk nabɛɲ cẳŋ kòn lạʔi vậʔi Ðʔa ɲận zɔ nơʔi tăj nàŋ dɛm dến cɔ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cởlên ɲàŋươʔi bìɲan hãʔi sɛm dã ŋɛ tʰeo tiếŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi xi ʔabiɣain cởvề kùŋ nabɛɲ tʰì nabɛɲ dươŋ tiệk cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ tʰật ɲư ʔiếntiệk kủʔa vwa vậʔi nabɛɲ kó lòŋ vujvẻ săj ʔabiɣain xôŋ kó cɔ ŋườʔi biếtdiềʔu ɣì hɔặk kầnkíp hăj căŋ cɔdến xi sáŋ ɲưŋ sáŋmaj xi nabɛɲ dã ɣiã săj zồʔi ŋườʔi tʰuật lạʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi kiɲhɔảŋ cởtʰàɲ ɲư dá kác cừŋ mườʔi ŋàʔisăw Ðứkzê dáɲ nabɛɲ ŋườʔi cết xiÐʔa hăj nabɛɲ cết tʰì nóʔi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰăj dã sử dɔán sỉɲụk tôʔi bởʔi nabɛɲ dã ɣiữ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi xỏʔi diềʔu ák Ðứkzê dã xiến huŋák kủʔa nabɛɲ dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa saj ŋườʔi dến hỏʔi ʔabiɣain mìɲ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ Ðʔa dến ʔabiɣain tạʔi kạtmên nóʔi zằŋ Ðʔa saj cúŋtôʔi dếnkùŋ nàŋ ŋườʔi twan lấʔi nàŋ nàŋ cổʔi zậʔi mìɲ suốŋ dất nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi kɔndòʔi kủʔa cúʔa tôʔimọʔi kủʔa cúʔa dặŋ zửʔa cơn kák tôʔitớ kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi Ðʔɔạn ʔabiɣain dứŋzậʔi kỡʔi lừʔa mìɲ kó kɔndòʔi dồŋ di tʰeo di vớʔi kák sứɣiả kủʔa Ðʔa dặŋ ŋườʔi Ðʔa kũŋ kó kướʔi ʔahinôʔam ɣícêên kả haj dềʔu ŋườʔi vả săwlơ dã ɣả micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kủʔa Ðʔa cɔ fɛɲti kɔncaj kủʔa laít ŋườʔi ɣalim zânsíp lạʔi dến săwlơ tạʔi ɣibê ʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ðʔa cẳŋ tạʔi cên ɣò hakila dốʔi ŋaŋ dồŋ vắŋ saw săwlơ cổʔi zậʔi kéʔɔ ŋàn tiɲbiɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên di suốŋ dồŋ vắŋ síp dặŋ Ðʔa săwlơ dóŋ cạʔi cên ɣò hakila dốʔi ŋaŋ dồŋ vắŋ tạʔi nơʔi dầʔu dườŋ Ðʔa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ xi tʰấʔi săwlơ dến duổʔi tʰeo mìɲ saj zɔtʰám di cắk zằŋ săwlơ dã dến bấʔizờ Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi di dến nơʔi săwlơ cạʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰấʔi nơʔi ŋủ kủʔa săwlơ kủʔa nɛ kɔncaj nêzơ kwan tổŋbiɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi săwlơ ŋủ tạʔi dồn kó dạʔɔ biɲ dóŋ cạʔi suŋkwɛɲ mìɲ Ðʔa kấttiếŋ nóʔi kùŋ ʔahimêlék ŋườʔi hêtít ʔabisaj kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza ʔɛm kủʔa ɣiôáp zằŋ ʔaj di kùŋ suốŋ ziɲ săwlơ ʔabisaj dáp tôʔi di vớʔi ôŋ vậʔi Ðʔa ʔabisaj lúk bandêm vàʔɔ ɣiữʔa kwânlíɲ tʰấʔi săwlơ dươŋ ŋủ cɔŋ dồn kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ kặm zướʔi dất tạʔi nơʔi dầʔu ɣiườŋ nɛ kwânlíɲ suŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi ʔabisaj nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋàʔinăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fó tʰùŋịc ôŋ vàʔɔ tăj ôŋ sin cɔfép tôʔi lấʔi ɣiáʔɔ dâm ŋườʔi cỉ káʔi kặm ŋườʔi suốŋ dất cẳŋ kần fảʔi dâm lạʔi ɲưŋÐʔa bảʔɔ ʔabisaj zằŋ Ðừŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi ʔaj kó tʰế ca tăicên cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê xôŋ fạt ŋườʔi zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề Ðứkzê cắk dáɲ ŋườʔi hɔặk xi ŋườʔi dến dịɲ cết hɔặk xi ŋườʔi za cận ziệtvɔŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê ɣiữ cớ cɔ tôʔi ca tăj vàʔɔ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi ta sin ŋươʔi cỉ hãʔi lấʔi kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ nơʔi dầʔu ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi kùŋ káʔi bìɲ nướk zồʔi cúŋta hãʔi di ɲưvậʔi Ðʔa lấʔi kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ bìɲ nướk nơʔi dầʔu ɣiườŋ kủʔa săwlơ zồʔi haj ŋườʔi di xôŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi hăjlà kũŋ cẳŋ ʔaj tỉɲ tʰứk hếttʰảʔi ŋủ Ðứkzê dã xiến ŋủmê ɣiáŋ cên cúŋnó Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa saŋ kwa kiə zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi cên cót núʔi sa cạʔi kwân kó xɔảŋ sakác ɲăw ŋườʔi ɣọʔi kwânlíɲ vớʔi nɛ kɔncaj nêzơ zằŋ nɛ ŋườʔi cẳŋ dáp lờʔi saw nɛ dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi ʔaj kêʔula kùŋ vwa Ðʔa dáp kùŋ zằŋ nàʔɔ ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi zõŋ saw cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ʔaj bằŋ ŋươʔi vậʔi saw ŋươʔi xôŋ kɛɲzữ vwa cúʔa kủʔa ŋươʔi kó cɔŋ zânsự dã dến ɣiết vwɛcúʔa ŋươʔi Ðʔiềʔu ŋươʔi dã dó cẳŋ dâʔu ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề ŋươʔi dáŋ cết xôŋ kɛɲzữ cúʔa ŋươʔi dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê bâʔizờ hãʔi sɛm tʰử kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ kủʔa vwa bìɲ nướk nơʔi dầʔu ɣiườŋ vwa dâʔu săwlơ ɲậnbiết tiếŋ kủʔa Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔiÐʔa kɔn kó fảʔi tiếŋ kɔn căŋ Ðʔa tʰưʔa zằŋ hỡʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ấʔilà tiếŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi kớsaw cúʔa duổʔi tʰeo tôʔitớ cúʔa ɲưvậʔi tôʔi kó diềʔu ɣì tăj tôʔi dã fạm tộʔiák ci bâʔizờ sin vwa hãʔi lắŋŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa tôʔitớ vwa nếʔuÐứkzê sujzụk vwa hạʔi tôʔi ŋwiện ŋàʔi ɲậm mùʔi tʰơm kủʔa ɲưŋ nếʔu lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋwiện cúŋ zủʔasả cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔinăj cúŋ duổʔi tôʔi di xỏʔi cỗ zàɲ cɔ tôʔi cɔŋ sảnŋiệp kủʔa Ðứkzê cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi di tʰờ tʰần Ôʔi ŋwiện hwiết tôʔi cớ cảʔi za cên dất kác sa Ðứkzê vwa ʔisơzaên dã kéʔɔ za dặŋ kɔn bọcét ɲư ŋườʔita duổʔi tʰeo cim dada cɔŋ núʔi vậʔi bấʔizờ săwlơ nóʔi ta kó fạmtộʔi hỡʔi Ðʔa kɔn hãʔi cởlạʔi ta cẳŋ hạʔi cɔ kɔn nữʔa ŋàʔinăj kɔn dã kíɲnể mạŋ sốŋ tʰật dã diênkuồŋ fạm lỗʔi zất cọŋ Ðʔa nóʔi nầʔi kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ kủʔa vwa hãʔi cɔ ɣã caicẻ kủʔa vwa di kwa dâʔi lấʔi di Ðứkzê báʔɔ cả cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi tùʔi tʰeo kôŋbìɲ cuŋtín kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi dã fó vwa vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ xứŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔinăj tôʔi lấʔi mạŋ sốŋ vwa kwícọŋ tʰếnàʔɔ tʰì Ðứkzê kũŋ lấʔi mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi kwí cọŋtʰể ấʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi kák hɔạnnạn săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ hỡʔiÐʔa kɔn ŋwiện kɔn dượk fướk kwảtʰật kɔn kôŋviệk lớnlaw dượk tʰắŋ Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa kứ di lốʔi mìɲ kòn săwlơ cởvề nơʔi ŋườʔi Ðʔa nóʔitʰầm ŋĩ zằŋ cắk ŋàʔiciə cết bởʔi tăj săwlơ ta cẳŋ làmci hăj bằŋ cốn cɔŋ sứ filitin tʰì săwlơ cẳŋ kòn cɔŋ kả dịʔafận ʔisơzaên nữʔa ɲưvậʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi vậʔi Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi kùŋ sáʔu căm ŋườʔi tʰeo mìɲ saŋ kwa dến ʔakíc kɔncaj maók vwa ɣát Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔiở kùŋ ʔakíc tạʔi ɣát mỗʔi ŋườʔi kó zakwiến mìɲ Ðʔa kó haj tʰeo tứklà ʔahinôʔam ɣícêên ʔabiɣain cướk kủʔa nabɛɲ kạtmên săwlơ hăj zằŋ Ðʔa cốn dến ɣát tʰìtʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ʔakíc zằŋ nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk vwa sin hãʔi ɲườŋ cɔ tôʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ tʰuộk kák tʰàɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋbằŋ dể tôʔi dó vì tôʔitớ vwa cɔŋ dếdô vớʔi vwa ci vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ʔakíc siếklák cɔ ŋườʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi siếklák tʰuộk vwa zuda cɔdến ŋàʔinăj tʰìɣiờ Ðʔa ŋụ cɔŋ sứ zân filitin tʰáŋ Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi di lɔán dến dất zân ɣêsuzít zân ɣiệtsít zân ʔamalék ɲữŋ zântộk lâʔudờʔi lânkận suzơ cɔdến sứ zíptô Ðʔa fáhủʔi sứ nầʔi cẳŋ dể ŋườʔi hăj kòn sốŋ kướp lấʔi ciên lừʔa lạkdà áʔɔsốŋ dɔạn cởvề kùŋ ʔakíc ʔakíc hỏʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋươʔi di sâm dɔạt nơʔi nàʔɔ Ðʔa dáp cɔŋ dất zuda dất zân ɣêzamêlít Ðʔa cẳŋ cừʔa ŋườʔi hăj kòn sốŋ dặŋ zẫn ɣát nóʔi zằŋ ʔɛ cúŋnó káʔɔ cúŋta zằŋ diềʔu Ðʔa dã cọn lúk Ðʔa ŋụ cɔŋ sứ zân filitin tʰườŋ hăj ɲưvậʔi cɔnên ʔakíc Ðʔa zằŋ hắn cɔ ɣớmɣiếk nơʔi ʔisơzaên zânsự cắk tôʔitớ dờʔidờʔi về lốʔi nầʔi zân filitin vớʔi kák kơ biɲ dạʔɔ dặŋ zawciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên ʔakíc nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi fảʔibiết zằŋ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋươʔi di za cận kùŋ Ðʔa dáp kùŋ ʔakíc zằŋ vwa tʰấʔi diềʔu tôʔitớ vwa ʔakíc nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ tʰếtʰì ŋươʔi tʰịvệ vả samuên dã kwadờʔi kả ʔisơzaên dểtaŋ cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi zama tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi săwlơ dã cừ xỏʔi sứ ɲữŋ dồŋkốt ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tàtʰuật vậʔi zân filitin ɲóm dến dóŋ cạʔi nơʔi sunɛm kònsăw kũŋ hếttʰảʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa ɲưŋ xi săwlơ tʰấʔi cạʔi kwân filitin tʰì lòŋ zuŋdộŋ ŋườʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê sɔŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ dáp lờʔi hɔặk bằŋ ciêmbaw hɔặk bằŋ ʔu zim hăjlà bởʔi kák dấŋ tiênci săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dờn kầʔu vɔŋ di dến ŋườʔi kầʔu kák tôʔitớ tʰưʔa zằŋ tạʔiɛân dôzơ kó ŋườʔi dờn kầʔu vɔŋ săwlơ ɣiảzạŋ mặk ɲữŋ áʔɔ xák di dɛm tʰeo haj ŋườʔi zồʔi dến ɲà ŋườʔi dờn nầʔi lúk bandêm săwlơ nóʔi sin ŋươʔi hãʔi kầʔu vɔŋ bóʔi cɔ hãʔi vờʔi cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi dờn dáp zằŋ Ôŋ zõ diềʔu săwlơ dã tʰểnàʔɔ ŋườʔi cừ xỏʔi sứ ɲữŋ dồŋ kốt tʰầʔi tàtʰuật vậʔi kớsaw ôŋ lạʔi ɣàʔi bẫʔi dặŋ ɣiết tôʔi săwlơ cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề cẳŋ sảʔi dến cɔ ŋươʔi diềʔu hạʔi ci việk nầʔi dâʔu bấʔizờ ŋườʔi dờn nóʔi tôʔi fảʔi kầʔu ʔaj cướk ôŋ săwlơ dáp hãʔi kầʔu samuên xi ŋườʔi dờn tʰấʔi samuên tiếŋ nóʔi kùŋ săwlơ zằŋ kớsaw ôŋ ɣạt tôʔi Ôŋ săwlơ vwa dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cớ ɲưŋ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ci ŋườʔi dáp tôʔi tʰấʔi tʰần zướʔi dất vwa hỏʔi mặtmàʔi zasaw ŋườʔi dáp Ấʔilà ôŋzà zướʔi mặk káʔi áʔɔtơʔi săwlơ hiểʔu samuên kúʔi dầʔu mìɲ suốŋ dất lạʔi samuên hỏʔi săwlơ zằŋ ɲân saw ŋươʔi kwấʔi ʔiên tịɲ ɣọʔi săwlơ dáp tôʔi hɔạnnạn zân filitin cɛɲ ciến vớʔi tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã lìʔa xỏʔi tôʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ cảlờʔi cɔ tôʔi hɔặk bởʔi kák dấŋ tiênci hɔặk bởʔi ciêmbaw vậʔi tôʔi dã vờʔi ôŋ dể ôŋ bảʔɔ cɔ tôʔi biếtdiềʔu tôʔi fảʔi samuên dáp ɲân saw ŋươʔi kầʔu bởʔivì Ðứkzê dã lìʔa xỏʔi ŋươʔi cởnên tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi Ðứkzê ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán bởʔi miệŋ Ðứkzê dɔạt lấʔi nướk xỏʔi tăj ŋươʔi cɔ lânkận ŋươʔi Ðʔa ŋươʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê xôŋ cɔ ʔamalék kảmbiết kơn ɣiận fừŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi kớ dó ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê dãʔi ŋươʔi kác nầʔi vảlạʔi Ðứkzê fó ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin ŋàʔimaj ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi nơʔi vớʔi Ðứkzê kũŋ fó dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên vàʔɔ tăj zân filitin săwlơ zàʔi suốŋ dất kák lờʔi kủʔa samuên xiến ŋườʔi hɔảŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi dã kiệtsứk bởʔi cọn ŋàʔi dêm dó ŋườʔi xôŋ kóăn ci bấʔizờ ŋườʔi dờn dến ɣần săwlơ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi bốʔizốʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi kɔndòʔi vwa dã vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ vwa tôʔi dã liềʔumạŋ mìɲ dặŋ vâŋ tʰeo kák lờʔi vwa zạʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ vwa kũŋ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa kɔndòʔi vwa tôʔi sin dặt cướk vwa miếŋ báɲ dể vwa sứk dặŋ lêndườŋ săwlơ từcốʔi zằŋ ta xôŋ ɲưŋ kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dờn épnàʔi kwá dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi suôʔi tʰeo lờʔi cúŋ ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi xỏʔi dất ŋồʔi cên ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi kó kɔn kɔn lậtdật ɣiết dɔạn lấʔi ɲồʔi báɲ xôŋ mɛn dể cướk săwlơ kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi ʔaên sɔŋ cúŋ cổʔi zậʔi di nộʔi dêm dó zânfi ɲóm hếttʰảʔi kák dạʔɔkwân tạʔi ʔafék kòn zân ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi ɣần suốʔi ɣícêên kák kwan cưởŋ zân filitin dạʔɔkwân kéʔɔ za cướk từŋ căm từŋ ŋàn kòn Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi di hậʔu vớʔi ʔakíc bấʔizờ kák kwan cưởŋ zân filitin nóʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hêbơzơ dó ʔaj ʔakíc dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà Ðʔa tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ vwa ʔisơzaên vớʔi dã lâʔu ŋàʔi cầʔi từ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi saŋ nơʔi cúŋta cɔdến bâʔizờ cẳŋ tʰấʔi lỗʔi ɣì nơʔi ŋườʔi kák kwan cưởŋ filitin nổʔizận nóʔi vớʔi ʔakíc zằŋ hãʔi duổʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi cởvề cỗ ôŋ dã cớ cɔ di dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi cúŋta ʔɛ cɔŋ lúk ciếndấʔu cở lòŋ ŋịc cúŋta căŋ tʰếnàʔɔ cɔ dượk hòʔa kùŋ củ mìɲ cẳŋ fảʔi ɲờ ɲữŋ tʰủkấp kủʔa cúŋta saw há cẳŋ fảʔi Ðʔa nàʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kuộk ɲảʔimúʔa zằŋ săwlơ ɣiết hàŋ ŋàn kònÐʔa ɣiết hàŋ vậʔi ʔakíc ɣọʔi Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề ŋươʔi ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰíc ŋươʔi vàʔɔ za cɔŋ cạʔi kwân vớʔi ŋàʔi ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ cɔ tớʔi ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ tʰấʔi nơʔi ŋươʔi diềʔu ci dáŋ các ɲưŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ dẹplòŋ kák kwan cưởŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi luj di bìɲan hầʔu cɔ xỏʔi mấtlòŋ kák kwan cưởŋ filitin Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi ʔakíc zằŋ tôʔi kó diềʔu ɣì xi tôʔi ɣần vwa dến ŋàʔinăj vwa kó tʰấʔi diềʔu ci kwởcác nơʔi tôʔitớ vwa tôʔi xôŋ dượk di dáɲ kwân tʰùŋịc kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi vwa ʔakíc dáp vớʔi Ðʔa zằŋ ta biếtdiềʔu dó ŋươʔi dẹplòŋ ɲư tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưŋ kák kwan cưởŋ filitin kó nóʔi hắn xôŋ dáɲ cận kùŋ cúŋta Ấʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi ɲữŋ dầʔitớ kủʔa củ ŋươʔi dã dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi zậʔi fảʔi hãʔi zậʔi vừʔa xi cờʔi sáŋ hãʔi didi vậʔi Ðʔa kák tʰeo ŋườʔi zậʔi dể vừʔa sáŋmaj di cởvề cɔŋ sứ zân filitin kòn zân filitin di ɣícêên xỏʔi ŋàʔi xi Ðʔa vớʔi ɲữŋ tʰeo mìɲ dến siếklák tʰì zân ʔamalék dã lɔán dến kùŋ siếklák sôŋ vàʔɔ siếklák dã fóŋỏʔa cúŋ lấʔi kák ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi lớnɲỏ tạʔi dó cúŋnó cẳŋ ɣiết ʔaj sɔŋ xi di kó zẫn hếttʰảʔi xiÐʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi dến tʰàɲ tʰì tʰàɲ dã lửʔa cáʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kủʔa cúŋ dềʔu dã zẫn bấʔizờ Ðʔa ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu kấttiếŋ xók xók dến dổʔi xôŋ kòn sứk xók nữʔa haj ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðʔa kũŋ zẫn tứk ʔahinôʔam ɣícêên ʔabiɣain cướk kủʔa nabɛɲ tạʔi kạtmên Ðʔa hɔạnnạn zânsự twan dá ŋườʔi bởʔi hếttʰảʔi dềʔu kó dầʔi kăjdắŋ kớ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ ɲưŋÐʔa dượk sứkmạɲ nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa zằŋ ta sin tʰầʔi hãʔi dɛm fót cɔ ʔabiətʰa dɛm fót cɔ Ðʔa Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi duổʔi tʰeo dạʔɔ biɲ nầʔi căŋ tôʔi tʰeo căŋ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ hãʔi xởʔi duổʔi tʰeo kwảtʰật ŋươʔi tʰeo ɣiảʔicứʔu hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ vậʔi Ðʔa zadi kùŋ sáʔu căm ŋườʔi tʰeo mìɲ xɛ bêsô ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mệtmỏʔi zừŋ lạʔi Ðʔa kứ duổʔi tʰeo vớʔi bốncăm ŋườʔi haj căm ŋườʔi kiə zừŋ lạʔi lấʔilàm mệtɲọk kwá xôŋtʰể kwa xɛ bêsô dượk bọn kủʔa Ðʔa ɣặp ŋườʔi zíptô cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ zẫn dếnkùŋ Ðʔa ŋườʔita cɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi báɲ nướk ʔuốŋ kũŋ cɔ ŋườʔi káʔi báɲcáʔi xô haj báɲ ɲɔ xô ŋườʔi dượk hồʔisứk lạʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔidêm ŋườʔi xôŋ xôŋ ʔuốŋ ci Ðʔa hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi vớʔi ʔaj dâʔu dến ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi zíptô tuổʔicẻ tôʔitớ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔamalék củ tôʔi tôʔi ŋàʔi zồʔi tôʔi dăw cúŋtôʔi kó lɔán dến dất kủʔa zân kêzêtʰít dịʔafận zuda dến fíʔa kalép cúŋtôʔi dã dốt siếklák Ðʔa hỏʔi ŋươʔi xứŋ zẫn dến kơ biɲ nầʔi căŋ ŋườʔi dó tʰưʔa zằŋ hãʔi cỉ zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰề kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ ôŋ cẳŋ ɣiết tôʔi hɔặk tôʔi cɔ củ tôʔi tʰì tôʔi zẫn ôŋ dến kơ biɲ dó ŋườʔi zíptô zẫn dến tʰấʔi zân ʔamalék càn za xắp sứ ănuốŋ cơʔi ɣiỡn kớ kủʔa kướp zất ɲiềʔu cúŋnó dã dɔạt lấʔi cɔŋ sứ filitin cɔŋ sứ zuda Ðʔa dáɲ cúŋnó tảŋsáŋ ŋàʔi dó cɔdến ciềʔu ŋàʔisăw cừ za bốncăm ŋườʔi caicẻ kỡʔi lạkdà cạʔi cốn tʰì cẳŋ ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi Ðʔa tʰâʔu lạʔi mọʔi zân ʔamalék dã kướp lấʔi kũŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu haj mìɲ nữʔa cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ʔaj hɔặk ɲỏ hăj hɔặk ɣáʔi hăj caj hɔặk fần hóʔa tàʔi nàʔɔ zân ʔamalék dã kướp lấʔi Ðʔa dɛm hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ lạʔi ciên kwânlíɲ kủʔa Ðʔa di dầʔu bầʔi nầʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi kủʔa Ðʔa dượk Ðʔa cởvề kùŋ haj căm ŋườʔi cướkkiə mệtɲọk kwá tʰeo ŋườʔi xôŋ nổʔi ŋườʔita dã dể lạʔi ɣần xɛ bêsô haj căm ŋườʔi ấʔi di tớʔi dón Ðʔa dạʔɔ biɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi Ðʔa lạʔi ɣần hỏʔi cúŋ mạɲzỏʔi căŋ ɲưŋ hếttʰảʔi huŋák kôndồ cɔŋ Ðʔa kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ bởʔivì cúŋnó xôŋ di kùŋ cúŋta cúŋta xôŋ ɲườŋ cɔ cúŋnó fần kủʔakảʔi nàʔɔ cúŋta dã lấʔidượk cỉ cả lạʔi kɔn kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi tʰôʔi cúŋnó hãʔi zẫn didi ɲưŋÐʔa dáp zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛɲɛm cớ ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê dã cɔ cúŋta ŋàʔi dã ɣìŋiữ fó cɔ dạʔɔ biɲ dã dến dáɲ cúŋta vậʔi ʔaj tʰeo lờʔi dịɲướk kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dượk fần kủʔa za cận fần kủʔa ɣiữ dồvật fảʔi bằŋ ɲăw cúŋ ciə cɔ ɲăw vậʔi kể ŋàʔi ấʔi Ðʔa diềʔu dó cɔŋ ʔisơzaên hãʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj vậʔi Ðʔa cởvề siếklák ɣởʔi fần kủʔa kướp cɔ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zuda tứklà bạɲữʔu ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi cɔ kák ôŋ zɔ kủʔa kướp lấʔi nơʔi tʰùŋịc Ðứkzê ŋườʔi ɣởʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở bêtên zamốt nam ɣiạttʰiə cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở ʔazô ʔɛ sípmốt tʰêmô ʔa cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở zakɛɲ kák tʰàɲ zân ɣiêzácmêlít cɔ ŋườʔiở kák tʰàɲ kênít cɔ ŋườʔiở họtma bọtasan ʔatát hếpzôn cɔ xắp mọʔi nàʔɔ Ðʔa dã di ŋaŋ kwa vớʔi dạʔɔ biɲ mìɲ bấʔizờ zân filitin zawciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cạʔi cốn cướk zân filitin ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ cết ŋã suốŋ cên núʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa zânfi hăŋ zượt tʰeo săwlơ kùŋ kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɣiết ɣiônatʰan ʔabinadáp mɛɲkiswa kák kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ tʰếcận zữzộʔi cɔ săwlơ ɲữŋ líɲ kầm kuŋ cúŋ ŋườʔi cɔ cọŋtʰươŋ săwlơ nóʔi kùŋ vák biɲxí mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi zút ɣươm ŋươʔi dâm di kẻʔɔ ɲữŋ xôŋ cịʔu kắt kiə dến dâm sỉɲụk căŋ ɲưŋ vák biɲxí ŋườʔi xôŋ zám sợhãʔi săwlơ lấʔi ɣươm mìɲ cên mũʔi xi vák biɲxí kủʔa săwlơ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi cết kũŋ mìɲ cên mũʔi ɣươm mìɲ cết vớʔi ŋườʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó săwlơ kɔncaj ŋườʔi vák biɲxí ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu cết cuŋ vớʔi ɲăw ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kiə cũŋ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰấʔi dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên cạʔi cốn săwlơ kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã cết tʰì kák tʰàɲ mìɲ cốn di nỗʔi zân filitin dến dó ŋàʔisăw zân filitin dến lụksɔát ɲữŋ cết tʰấʔi săwlơ kɔncaj ŋườʔi sảʔi cên núʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa cúŋ kắt dầʔu săwlơ lấʔi biɲxí ŋườʔi saj báʔɔ nầʔi cɔ xắp sứ zân filitin cɔŋ kák dền tʰờ kủʔa tʰầntượŋ cɔŋ kả zânsự cúŋ dể biɲxí kủʔa săwlơ tạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ ceo sák ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tườŋ tʰàɲ bếtsan ɲưŋ xi zânsự zabɛ ɣalaát hăj diềʔu zân filitin dã cɔ săwlơ tʰì ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zõŋ cɔŋ dứŋzậʔi di cọn dêm ɣỡ lấʔi sák kủʔa săwlơ kủʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi xỏʔi tườŋ tʰàɲ bếtsan zồʔi cởvề zabɛ tʰiêʔu kák tʰâʔi tạʔi dó lấʔi kốt kủʔa côn zướʔi kâʔi liễʔu sủ ɣần zabɛ kiêŋ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi săw xi săwlơ tʰák Ðʔa dã tʰắŋ zân ʔamalét cởvề zồʔi tʰì siếtlák haj ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứba sảʔi kó ŋườʔiở ziɲ săwlơ cởvề kwầnáʔɔ záczướʔi dầʔu dóŋ bụʔi dến cướk Ðʔa mìɲ suốn dất lạʔi Ðʔa hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋườʔiở dâʔu dến tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi cạʔi kwân ʔisơzaên tʰɔát xỏʔi Ðʔa nóʔi vậʔi việk sảʔi zasaw hãʔi tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zânsự dã cốn xỏʔi ciếncườŋ kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋã cết săwlơ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ŋườʔi kũŋ dềʔu cết nữʔa Ðʔa hỏʔi ŋườʔi caicẻ dɛm ấʔi zằŋ làmsaw ŋươʔi săwlơ kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã cết ŋườʔi caicẻ dɛm ấʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tìɲkờ tôʔi di kwa núʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa tʰấʔi săwlơ nươŋ cên kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ sɛ líɲ tʰeo ɣần ŋườʔi ŋườʔi sâʔi lạʔi tʰấʔi tôʔi ɣọʔi tôʔi tôʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi ʔaj tôʔi tʰưʔa tôʔi zân ʔamalék ŋườʔi hãʔi lạʔi ɣần ɣiết di sâʔisẩm ɲưŋ hãʔi kòn sốŋ vậʔi tôʔi dến ɣần ɣiết ŋườʔi di tôʔi ŋườʔi bạʔicận xôŋ kòn sốŋ dượk Ðʔɔạn tôʔi lấʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cên dầʔu ŋườʔi vòŋ vàŋ nơʔi káɲtăj ŋườʔi dɛm dâʔi cɔ cúʔa tôʔi Ðʔa sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi di tʰeo kũŋ dềʔu ɲưvậʔi kế ấʔi cúŋ dểtaŋ xóklók ɲịndóʔi cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi săwlơ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ŋườʔi zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲà ʔisơzaên bởʔi cúŋ dã ɣươm ŋã cết Ðʔa hỏʔi ŋườʔi caicẻ dɛm nầʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu dến ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ tứk kɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔamalék Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ kớsaw ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiơ tăj ɣiết cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê hwiết ŋươʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu ŋươʔi miệŋ ŋươʔi dã làmcứŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dã nóʔi zằŋ cíɲ tôʔi dã ɣiết dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa ɣọʔi ŋườʔi caicẻ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi lạʔi ɣần sôŋ dáɲ ŋườʔi ấʔi dáɲ cết bâʔizờ Ðʔa bàʔi ʔaj ka nầʔi săwlơ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj săwlơ cwiền zạʔi cɔ kák kɔncẻ zuda Ấʔilà bàʔi ʔaj ka kuŋ cép cɔŋ sác kôŋbìɲ Ôʔi ʔisơzaên zɛɲvọŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi dã tʰák cên ɣò nỗŋ ŋươʔi ɲơn saw kák ʔɛɲhùŋ nầʔi ŋã cết cớ di twiênkáʔɔ diềʔu dó cɔŋ ɣát cớ zaw cwiền ấʔi cɔŋ kák dườŋfố Ác kalôn ʔɛ kák kɔŋáʔi filitin vujvẻ và kák kɔŋáʔi xôŋ cịʔu kắt mừŋzỡ căŋ hỡʔi núʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa ŋwiện sươŋmók mưʔa cẳŋ suốŋ cên ŋươʔi và cẳŋ kó dồŋzuộŋ sɛɲ zùŋ kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa vì tạʔi nơʔi dó káʔi xiên kủʔa ʔɛɲhùŋ ɲơɲuốk tứklà káʔi xiên kủʔa săwlơ cẳŋ dượk sứk zầʔu nữʔa kâʔi kuŋ kủʔa ɣiônatʰan cẳŋ cởvề mà xôŋ zíɲ dầʔi hwiết cết kủʔa ŋườʔi zõŋ kâʔi ɣươm kủʔa săwlơ xôŋ cởvề xôŋ viɲkwaŋ xi kòn sốŋ săwlơ ɣiônatʰa ʔiêʔu ɲăw dẹp ɲăw lúk cết cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi ɲăw haj ŋườʔi cim ưŋ mạɲ kɔn hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi xók săwlơ ŋườʔi dã mặk cɔ kák ŋươʔi áʔɔsốŋ màʔu dỏ diềʔu sa sí caw ɣiồʔi áʔɔsốŋ kák ŋươʔi bằŋ dồ vàŋ kớsaw ŋườʔi zõŋ ŋã ɣiữʔa kơn cận ɲân saw ɣiônatʰan tʰák cên ɣò nỗŋ kák ŋươʔi hỡʔizô natʰan ʔɛɲ tôʔi lòŋ tôʔi kwặntʰắt ʔɛɲ ʔɛɲ cɔ tôʔi xɔáʔi zạ ŋĩʔa bầʔubạn kủʔa ʔɛɲ lấʔilàm kwí tìɲtʰươŋ ŋườʔi kớsaw ɲữŋ ʔɛɲhùŋ ŋã suốŋ ɲân saw kák biɲxí ɣãʔi săw diềʔu dó Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkzê ɲưvầʔi tôʔi kó di cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ kủʔa sứ zuda căŋ Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di Ðʔa tôʔi fảʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ Ðứkzê dáp hếpzôn Ðʔa di dến dó dɛm tʰeo haj ŋườʔi ʔahinôʔam ɣícêên ʔabiɣain ŋwiên kủʔa nabɛɲ kạtmên Ðʔa kũŋ dɛm kák ŋườʔiở kùŋ mìɲ di mỗʔi ŋườʔi vớʔi zakwiến mìɲ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa dịʔafận hếpzôn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda di dến dó sứk zầʔu cɔ Ðʔa vwa ɲà zuda ŋườʔita dến nóʔi cɔ Ðʔa zằŋ zân zabɛ dã côn săwlơ Ðʔa saj dếnkùŋ zânsự zabɛ cɔŋ ɣalaát nóʔi zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê fướk cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi dã kó lòŋ ɲơn dốʔi kùŋ săwlơ cúʔa kák ŋươʔi côn ŋườʔi ŋwiệnÐứkzê lấʔi ɲơn tʰàɲtʰựk dốʔi lạʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kòn kũŋ diềʔu tʰiện cɔ kák ŋươʔi bởʔivì kák ŋươʔi dã ɲưvậʔi ŋwiện cɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi dượk mạɲ xá mìɲ za ŋườʔi hàʔɔkiệt săwlơ cúʔa kák ŋươʔi dã tʰák ɲà zuda dã sứk zầʔu cɔ vwa kủʔa bấʔizờ nɛ kwan tổŋbiɲ kủʔa săwlơ Íc kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ dưʔa kwa mahanaim ŋườʔilàm vwa ɣalaát ʔasựzít ɣícêên zaim bêŋiəmin kả ʔisơzaên xiÍc kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ xởʔi kaicị ʔisơzaên tʰì dã dượk mươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi kaicị haj cỉ kó ɲà zuda tʰeo Ðʔa tʰôʔi tʰìɣiờ Ðʔa hếpzôn kaicị cên ɲà zuda bảʔi sáʔu tʰáŋ vả nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Íc kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ mahanaim kéʔɔ za dặŋ di dến ɣabaôn ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa kũŋ za haj ɣặp ɲăw tạʔi lốʔi ɣabaôn zồʔi nầʔi ŋồʔi nầʔi xák ŋồʔi kiə bấʔizờ nɛ nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ ɲữŋ caicẻ nầʔi hãʔi cỗʔi zậʔi cửŋ ɣiỡn tạʔi cướk cúŋta ɣiôáp nóʔi cúŋnó xá cổʔi zậʔi vậʔi cúŋnó cổʔi zậʔi di tớʔisố bằŋ ɲăw mườʔihaj ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin Íc kɔncaj săwlơ mườʔihaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi dầʔu kừʔudịc mìɲ dâm ɣươm vàʔɔ hôŋ tʰảʔi dềʔu ŋã cết kùŋ ɲăw cỗ dó ɣọʔilà dồŋ ɣươm cɔŋ ɣabaôn cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kó ciếndấʔu zất zữ nɛ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dềʔu kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa dáɲbạʔi dó kó kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza ɣiôáp ʔabisaj ʔasaên vả ʔasaên cạʔi lẹlàŋ ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ zừŋ ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo nɛ xôŋ sâʔi kwa xỏʔi ŋườʔi hɔặk hữʔu hăjlà vậʔi nɛ ŋó lạʔi săw hỏʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ŋươʔi ʔasaên căŋ ŋườʔi dáp fảʔi ấʔilà nɛ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di kwa fíʔa hữʔu hăjlà fíʔa sôŋ vàʔɔ ŋườʔi cɔŋ caicẻ lấʔi xíɣiớʔi di ɲưŋ ʔasaên xôŋ sâʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi nɛ lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔasaên zằŋ hãʔi sâʔi xỏʔi kớsaw buộk fảʔi dáɲ ɣiết ŋươʔi sảʔi suốŋ dất víbằŋ ɣiết ŋươʔi zễ nàʔɔ kòn zám ŋó ɣiôáp ʔɛɲ ŋươʔi bởʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ láɲ di nɛ lấʔi kán ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ dâm ŋườʔi nơʔi bụŋ tʰấʔu dến săw lưŋ ʔasaên suốŋ cết tạʔicỗ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dến cỗ ʔasaên ŋã suốŋ cết dềʔu zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi dó ɣiôáp ʔabisaj duổʔi tʰeo nɛ xi haj ŋườʔi dến ɣò ʔama dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣi ʔa hướŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɣabaôn tʰì mặtcờʔi dã zânbên zamin lạʔi kùŋ nɛ tʰàɲ dạʔɔ zừŋ lạʔi cên cót ɣò nỗŋ nɛ kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ vậʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm cưʔa tʰôʔi hủʔiziệt saw ŋươʔi cẳŋ kuốʔicùŋ xổ saw ŋươʔi xôŋ cwiền lịɲ cɔ zânsự tʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ɣiôáp dáp zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ tʰề zằŋ nếʔu ôŋ cẳŋ nóʔi ci tʰì zânsự xôŋ tʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cướk xi sáŋmaj ɣiôáp cwiền tʰổʔi hếttʰảʔi zânsự dềʔu zừŋ lạʔi tʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ ciếndấʔu nữʔa nɛ kák tʰeo ŋườʔi cọn dêm dó di ŋaŋ kwa dồŋbằŋ saŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cảʔi xắp bícôn zồʔi dến mahanaim ɣiôáp kũŋ tʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo nɛ cởvề hếttʰảʔi zânsự cɔŋ kák dầʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa tʰì tʰiếʔu mườʔi cín ŋườʔi ʔasaên kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa kó dáɲ cết bɛcăm sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân bêŋiəmin tʰủhạ kủʔa nɛ cúŋ dɛm ʔasaên côn cɔŋ kủʔa ca ŋườʔi tạʔi bếtlêhɛm Ðʔɔạn ɣiôáp kák tʰủhạ ŋườʔi di cọn dêm zạŋdôŋ dến hếpzôn ɲàÐʔa ɲà săwlơ zawciến ɲăw lâʔu ŋàʔi ɲưŋ Ðʔa kàŋŋàʔicàŋ mạɲ kòn ɲà săwlơ kàŋŋàʔicàŋ ʔiếʔu cɔŋ xi tạʔi hếpzôn Ðʔa sɛɲ ɲiềʔu kɔncaj kɔn cưởŋnam ʔamnôn zɔ ʔahinôʔam ɣícêên kɔntʰứ ɲì kilêáp zɔ ʔabiɣain cướk kủʔa nabɛɲ kạtmên kɔntʰứ zalôn ŋườʔi maaka kɔŋáʔi kủʔa tʰɛɲmaj vwa ɣêsuzơ kɔn tʰứtư ʔadôniza kɔncaj kủʔa haɣít kɔntʰứ sɛfatiə kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabitɛɲ kɔn tʰứsáʔu zícêʔam zɔ Ék Ðʔa ɲữŋ kɔncaj dã sɛɲ cɔ Ðʔa cɔŋ xi ŋườʔiở tạʔi hếpzôn cọn cɔŋ lúk ɲà săwlơ ɲà Ðʔa cɛɲ ciến ɲăw tʰì nɛ biɲ ɲà săwlơ vả săwlơ kó zítba kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔaza Íc nóʔi kùŋ nɛ zằŋ kớ săw ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ kủʔa ca nɛ lấʔilàm ɣiận kák lờʔi kủʔa Íc nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dầʔu có hầʔu việk zuda saw hiệnnăj tôʔi hếtlòŋ fú mìɲ cɔ ɲà kủʔa săwlơ ca vwa cɔ kák ʔɛɲɛm bằŋữʔu vwa xôŋ dể cɔ vwa fảʔi vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa Ðʔa ŋàʔinăj vwa lạʔi các tôʔi lỗʔi fạm vớʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fạt tôʔi kác nặŋnề nếʔu tôʔi cẳŋ Ðʔa tʰàɲ mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã hứʔa kùŋ ŋườʔi tứklà zờʔi nướk xỏʔi ɲà săwlơ kwa ɲà Ðʔa ŋôʔi Ðʔa cên ʔisơzaên cên zuda Ðʔan cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba Íc xôŋ zám dáp lờʔi nàʔɔ kùŋ nɛ bởʔivì ŋườʔi nɛ saj dến Ðʔa dặŋ tʰăj mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ sứ tʰuộk ʔaj hãʔi zawướk vớʔi tôʔi tăj tôʔi ɣiúp ôŋ dặŋ lạʔi kả ʔisơzaên cɔ ôŋ Ðʔa dáp fảʔi zawướk vớʔi ŋươʔi ta cỉ sin ŋươʔi diềʔu xi ŋươʔi dến tʰăm cớ dến zamắt cướk xi cưʔa zẫn micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ dến Ðʔa saj sứɣiả dến Íc kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cả lạʔi micɛɲ dã kướʔi bằŋ siɲ mộtcăm zươŋ filitin Íc saj ŋườʔi nàŋ nơʔi ɲà cồŋ nàŋ fatiên kɔncaj kủʔa laít cồŋ nàŋ vừʔa dưʔa di vừʔa xók tʰeo dến bahuzim Ðʔɔạn nɛ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di cởvề ɲàŋươʔi zồʔifa cởvề nɛ nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên zằŋ lâʔunăj kák ôŋ ʔawướk dượk Ðʔa vwa vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi di Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ Ấʔi bởʔi Ðʔa tôʔitớ ɣiảʔicứʔu zân ʔisơzaên xỏʔi tăj zân filitin xỏʔi tăj mọʔi tʰùŋịc nɛ kũŋ nóʔi ɲư lờʔi ấʔi kùŋzân bêŋiəmin dɔạn ŋườʔi di dến hếpzôn dể cɔ Ðʔa ŋịdịɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên kủʔa kả ɲà bêŋiəmin vậʔi nɛ di dến Ðʔa tạʔi hếpzôn dɛm tʰeo haimươʔi ŋườʔi zồʔi Ðʔa bàʔi tiệk dãʔi nɛ kùŋ ɲữŋ di tʰeo ŋườʔi nɛ nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ tôʔi di hộʔi lạʔi kả zân ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ vwa cúʔa tôʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋ zawướk vớʔi cúʔa cúʔa vwa cɔ kả ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư lòŋ cúʔa ướkaw vậʔi Ðʔa cɔ nɛ ŋườʔi di bìɲiên vả dầʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa di kùŋ ɣiôáp dáɲ kwân tʰùŋịc cởvề kó dɛm ɲiềʔu kủʔa ɣiặk nɛ cẳŋ kòn kùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi hếpzôn Ðʔa dã cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi di bìɲan vậʔi ɣiôáp kùŋ kả dạʔɔ biɲ cởvề ŋườʔi kó dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi hăj zằŋ nɛ kɔncaj nêzơ dã dếnkùŋ vwa vwa dể cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi di bìɲiên ɣiôáp dếnkùŋ vwa hỏʔi zằŋ vwa kó diềʔu ci kìʔa nɛ dã dến ɲàvwa kớ săw dã cɔ ŋườʔi divề ɲưvậʔi vwa nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ cớ ŋườʔi dến cỉ dể ɣạt vwa dể zìɲ kák dườŋ di zadi vàʔɔ kủʔa vwa dặŋ mọʔi diềʔu vwa Ðʔɔạn ɣiôáp luj xỏʔi Ðʔa saj ɲữŋ sứɣiả tʰeo nɛ nốʔiɣót ziệʔu ŋườʔi hồcứʔanướk siza xôŋ cɔ Ðʔa hăj xiÁp nɛ cởvề hếpzôn ɣiôáp dɛm ŋườʔi ziêŋ za cɔŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ zườŋ nóʔi việk kùŋ ŋườʔi dó dâm ŋườʔi cɔŋ bụŋ ɣiết di dặŋ báʔɔtʰù hwiết cɔ ʔasaên ʔɛm kủʔa ɣiôáp Ðʔa hăj nóʔi zằŋ ta nướk vôtộʔi dờʔidờʔi cướk Ðứkzê hwiết kủʔa nɛ kɔncaj nêzơ ŋwiện hwiết ấʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu ɣiôáp cên kả ɲà ca ŋườʔi ŋwiện ɲà ɣiôáp cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ŋườʔi bịɲ bạc cượk bịɲ fuŋ bạʔi suộʔi ɣươm ŋã cết tʰiếʔu báɲ ɣiôáp ʔabiza ʔɛm ŋườʔi ɣiết nɛ ɲưvậʔi bởʔivì nɛ dã ɣiết ʔasaên ʔɛm kủʔa haj ŋườʔi săw xi ciếncận tạʔi ɣabaôn Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp kả zânsự tʰeo ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi sé áʔɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰắt baw nơʔi lưŋ tʰanxók nɛ cướkÐʔa di tʰeo săw liɲkữʔu xi cúŋ dã côn nɛ tạʔi hếpzôn zồʔi vwa kấttiếŋ xók tạʔi nɛ kả zânsự kũŋ xók vwa bàʔi diếʔu nɛ zằŋ nɛ dáŋ cết ɲư ŋuzạʔi cết saw tăj ŋươʔi cẳŋ cóʔi cơn ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ maŋ siềŋ ŋươʔi ŋã cết xáknàʔɔ ŋườʔita ŋã cướk ɲơn ŋɛ lờʔi nầʔi kả zânsự dềʔu xók Ðʔɔạn hếttʰảʔi dến ɣần sin ŋườʔi miếŋ báɲ cướk xi ŋàʔi ɲưŋ Ðʔa tʰề zằŋ nếʔu cướk xi mặtcờʔi miếŋ báɲ hăjlà ci xák ŋwiện Ðứkzê fạt kác nặŋnề zânsự dềʔu dểý vàʔɔ dó lấʔilàm tốtlàɲ cẳŋ kódiềʔu ɣì vwa cúŋ xôŋ lấʔilàm tốtlàɲ ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zân ʔisơzaên ɲìn zằŋ vwa cẳŋ kan ɣì dến tộʔi ɣiết nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ vwa nóʔi kùŋ kák dầʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ một kwan cưởŋ dạʔi ɲơn cɔŋ ʔisơzaên dã tʰák ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ saw về fần ŋàʔinăj hãʔi kòn ʔiếʔu zẫʔu zằŋ dã cịʔu sứk zầʔu vwa ɲữŋ kiə kák kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza kườŋbạʔɔ cɔ kwá ŋwiệnÐứkzê báʔɔ ák nầʔi tùʔi ák kủʔa xi kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ hăj zằŋ nɛ dã tʰák tạʔi hếpzôn tʰì sờnlòŋ zủncí kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu bốʔizốʔi vả kɔncaj săwlơ kó haj dộʔicưởŋ ŋườʔi baana ŋườʔi zêkáp haj ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa zimmôn bêêzốt cifáʔi bêŋiəmin mặkzầʔu cúŋ dã cạʔi cốn nơʔi ɣitʰaim nơʔi cúŋ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ kó kɔncaj bạʔi cơn xi săwlơ ɣiônatʰan tʰák ɣícêên tʰấʔu dến tʰì dã dượk nămtuổʔi vú dɛm cạʔi cốn cɔŋ kơn lậtdật cốn nỗʔi cởnên kwè tên mêfibôsết haj kɔncaj kủʔa zimmôn bêêzốt zêkáp baana cɔŋ lúk cờʔi nắŋ banŋàʔi di dến ɲà Íc ŋườʔi dươŋ ŋỉ cưʔa haj ŋườʔi di dến ɣiữʔa ɲà ɣiảdò lấʔi lúʔamì zồʔi dâm bụŋ Íc dɔạn zêkáp baana ʔɛɲ ŋườʔi cốn di vậʔi haj ŋườʔi di vàʔɔ ɲà Íc cɔŋ xi ŋườʔi ŋỉ cên ɣiườŋ tạʔi fòŋ ŋủ dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi dɔạn kắt lấʔi dầʔu ŋườʔi zồʔi dườŋ dồŋbằŋ di cọn dêm haj ŋườʔi dɛm dầʔu Íc hếpzôn zâŋ cɔ vwa Ðʔa zằŋ nầʔi dầʔu kủʔa Íc kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ tʰùŋịc vwa twan hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ vwa ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê dã báʔɔtʰù săwlơ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi cɔ vwa cúʔa tôʔi ɲưŋÐʔa dáp kùŋ zêkáp baana kɔncaj kủʔa zimmôn bêêzốt zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ Ðấŋ dã kứʔu xỏʔi kák hɔạnnạn tʰề zằŋ ta dã saj dã dến tʰuật cɔ hăj zằŋ săwlơ dã tʰák tưtưởŋ zằŋ mìɲ sứɣiả dɛm tinlàɲ dã ɣiết dó tạʔi siếklák dặŋ cả kôŋ cɔ báʔɔ zườŋ ấʔi fươŋci ɲữŋ huŋák dã ɣiết ŋườʔi làɲ cên ɣiườŋ tạʔi cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ vậʔi cẳŋ dòʔi hwiết ŋườʔi lạʔi nơʔi tăj kák ŋươʔi ziệt kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi dất saw Ðʔa cwiền lịɲ kák dầʔitớ mìɲ ɣiết haj ŋườʔi dó cúŋ cặt tăj cơn zồʔi ceo tʰâʔi ɣần ʔaw hếpzôn Ðʔɔạn cúŋ lấʔi dầʔu kủʔa Íc côn cɔŋ nɛ tạʔi hếpzôn bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi hếpzôn nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dâʔi kốtɲụk kủʔa vwa sưʔa xi săwlơ kòn kaicị cúŋtôʔi cíɲ vwa dã zắt ʔisơzaên za cận dɛm Ðứkzê kó fán kùŋ vwa zằŋ ŋươʔi căn zânsự vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên vậʔi hếttʰảʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ vwa tạʔi hếpzôn vwa Ðʔa zawướk vớʔi tạʔi hếpzôn cướk Ðứkzê cúŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ Ðʔa vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên xiÐʔa xởʔi cịvì tuổʔi dã dượk bamươʔi ŋườʔi kaicị mươʔi tạʔihếp zôn Ðʔa cịvì cên zuda bảʔi sáʔu tʰáŋ zồʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi cịvì cên kả zân ʔisơzaên zuda bamươʔi vwa kák tʰủhạ kéʔɔ dến ɣiêzusalɛm dáɲ zân ɣiêbusít tạʔi sứ nầʔi cúŋnó nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ vàʔɔ dâʔi ɲữŋ duj kwè dủ sô duổʔi ŋườʔi di ŋườʔi nóʔi Ðʔa xôŋ vàʔɔ dâʔi dượk ɲưŋÐʔa lấʔi dồn siôn ấʔilà tʰàɲ Ðʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dáɲ zân ɣiêbusít ɲàʔɔ suốŋ xɛ kwè duj cúŋnó tứk ɲữŋ kừʔudịc kủʔa Ðʔa dượk dầʔumụk kwan cưởŋ bởʔi kớ dó kó tụkŋữ zằŋ kẻ duj kwè dềʔu cẳŋ vàʔɔ ɲà nầʔi Ðʔa cɔŋ dồn dặt tʰàɲ Ðʔa ŋườʔi sâʔi vác milô cởvề cɔŋ Ðʔa kàŋŋàʔicàŋ kườŋ tʰạɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân kùŋ ŋườʔi hizam vwa tʰàɲ tizơ saj dến Ðʔa dɛm tʰeo ɣỗ hươŋ tʰợmộk tʰợ dá dặŋ sâʔicất káʔi dền cɔ Ðʔa bấʔizờ Ðʔa ɲìn zằŋ Ðứkzê dã mìɲ vwa cên ʔisơzaên xiến nướk mìɲ dượk tʰạɲ vượŋ kớ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi săw xi Ðʔa hếpzôn dến tʰì kòn kướʔi tʰêm ɲữŋ hầʔu ɣiêzusalɛm lạʔi sɛɲ tʰêm cɔ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi xák nầʔi kák kɔncaj sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi tạʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm samwa sôbáp natʰan salômôn ziba liswa nêfék zafiə lizada lifêlết xi zân filitin Ðʔa dã cịʔu sứk zầʔu vwa ʔisơzaên zồʔi tʰì kéʔɔ za dặŋ dáɲ ŋườʔi Ðʔa hăj diềʔu dó di dến dồn zânfi di dến bủʔa za cɔŋ cũŋ zêfaim bấʔizờ Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi dáɲ zân filitin căŋ Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi di fó zân filitin vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi vậʔi Ðʔa kéʔɔ dến baɛɲfêzátsim nơʔi ŋườʔi dáɲ zân dó ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã dáɲ kák tʰùŋịc tôʔi xỏʔi cướk tôʔi xáknàʔɔ nướk cảʔi bởʔi kớ dó ŋườʔi dặt cỗ nầʔi baɛɲfêzátsim zânfi lạʔi kák tʰầntượŋ kủʔa cúŋnó tạʔi dó Ðʔa tʰủhạ ŋườʔi lấʔi dɛm di zânfi cởlạʔi tʰứ ɲì bủʔa za cɔŋ cũŋ zêfaim Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ di hãʔi di vòŋ fíʔa săw cúŋnó zồʔi ŋươʔi tớʔi cúŋnó hướŋ kâʔi zâʔu và xi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ bướk cên ŋọn kâʔi zâʔu bấʔizờ hãʔi lậtdật sôŋ tớʔi cíɲ cɔŋ lúk dó Ðứkzê di cướk ŋươʔi dặŋ dáɲ dạʔɔkwân filitin Ðʔa mọʔi diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán dặn ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dáɲduổʔi zân filitin ɣêba cɔdến ɣêsɛ Ðʔa lạʔi ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kéncọn kủʔa ʔisơzaên cừŋ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cỗʔi zậʔi kó zânsự dồŋ tʰeo di balê sứ zuda dặŋ tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cướk ấʔi zân kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ cúʔa tứklà cáɲ zɛɲ Ðứkzê kwân ŋự ɣiữʔa cê zubin tạʔi cên ấʔi cúŋ dể kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên káʔi sɛ mớʔi zồʔi dɛm di xỏʔi ɲà ʔabinadáp tạʔi cên ɣò nỗŋ ʔusa ʔahizô kɔncaj ʔabinadáp zẫn káʔi sɛ mớʔidó vậʔi cúŋ zờʔi xỏʔi ɲà ʔabinadáp tạʔi cên ɣò nỗŋ ʔusa di ɣần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn ʔahizô di cướk Ðʔa kả ɲà ʔisơzaên dềʔu múʔahát cướk Ðứkzê vớʔi dủ tʰứ ɲạkxí bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ dờn kầm dờn cốŋ xi dến dạp lúk kủʔa nakôn ʔusa ɣiơ tăj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bởʔivì ɲữŋ kɔn vấpŋã kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ ʔusa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hàɲ hạʔi ŋườʔi kớ lầmlỗʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cết tạʔi dó ɣần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðʔa lấʔilàm buồntʰảm Ðứkzê dã hàɲ hạʔi ʔusa ŋườʔita ɣọʔi cỗ ấʔilà hàɲ hạʔi ʔusa cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ hòm kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰếnàʔɔ vàʔɔ ɲà dượk vậʔiÐʔa xôŋ dể kủʔa Ðứkzê dến ɲà mìɲ tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa biểʔu zẫn vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà dôm ŋườʔi ɣát ɲưvậʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê batʰáŋ cɔŋ ɲà dôm ŋườʔi ɣát Ðứkzê fướk cɔ dôm kả ɲà ŋườʔi ŋườʔita dến nóʔi kùŋ vwa Ðʔa zằŋ Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ ɲà dôm mọʔi tʰuộk ŋườʔi kớ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðʔa di tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲà dôm dến cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa kác zất vuimừŋ xi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xiêŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã di sáʔu bướk tʰì Ðʔa kɔn dựk kɔn tʰú béʔɔ Ðʔa mặk áʔɔ fót vảʔi ɣaj ɲảʔimúʔa hếtsứk tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ấʔi Ðʔa kả ɲà ʔisơzaên lấʔi tiếŋ vuimừŋ tiếŋ tʰổʔi tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi ɲưŋ xi kủʔa Ðứkzê vàʔɔ tʰàɲ Ðʔa tʰì micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ zòm ŋaŋ kwa kửʔasổ tʰấʔi Ðʔa múʔa ɲảʔi cướk Ðứkzê tʰì cɔŋ lòŋ xiɲbỉ ŋườʔi vậʔi cúŋ dɛm kủʔa Ðứkzê vàʔɔ dặt tạʔicỗ ɣiữʔa cạʔi Ðʔa dã zựŋ cɔ dó zồʔi Ðʔa zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê xiÐʔa dã zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák kủʔa tʰù tʰì ŋườʔi ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê kwân cúk fướk cɔ zânsự ŋườʔi fát cɔ hếttʰảʔi zâncúŋ ʔisơzaên hăj mỗʔi ŋườʔi báɲ miếŋ tʰịt báɲ ɲɔ Ðʔɔạn hếttʰảʔi ʔaj ɲà nấʔi Ðʔa kũŋ cởvề dặŋ cúk fướk cɔ ɲà mìɲ ɲưŋ micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ dến dón ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hômnăj vwa ʔisơzaên dượk viɲhiển tʰăj ởcần cướk kák kɔndòʔi kủʔa tôʔitớ vwa ɲư xôŋ zaɣì vậʔi Ðʔa dáp vớʔi micɛɲ zằŋ Ấʔi tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã cọn lấʔi ca nàŋ kả ɲà ŋườʔi vwɛcúʔa ʔisơzaên zân kủʔa Ðứkzê fảʔi cướk Ðứkzê kó múʔa ta hạmìɲ suốŋ ɲiềʔu hơnnữʔa sɛm mìɲ zầʔu vậʔi ɲữŋ kɔndòʔi nàŋ nóʔi dó lạʔi tônkíɲ vìvậʔi micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi săwlơ xôŋ sɛɲ kɔn cɔdến ŋàʔi nàŋ tʰák xi vwa dã ŋự cɔŋ kuŋ mìɲ Ðứkzê dã ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi kák tʰùŋịc cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ xiến cɔ ŋườʔi dượk bìɲan tʰì vwa nóʔi kùŋ tiênci natʰan zằŋ hãʔi sɛm ŋự cɔŋ káʔi kuŋ bằŋ hươŋ kòn kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi zướʔi cướŋ natʰan tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ hễ cɔŋ lòŋ vwa kó làmɣì tʰì hãʔi Ðứkzê kùŋ vwa ɲưŋ cɔŋ lúk bandêm kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ natʰan zằŋ hãʔi di nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ŋườʔi sâʔi cɔ káʔi dền dể ŋự tạʔi dó saw ŋươʔi ŋàʔi dưʔa zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ kó ŋự cɔŋ dền nàʔɔ ɲưŋ hằŋ di dódâʔi zướʔi cạʔi ɲà xắpnơʔi nàʔɔ ŋự kwa vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên kó fán lờʔi ɣì kùŋ cưởŋ nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên zặn căn zânsự saw ta kó fán kùŋ cúŋnó zằŋ kớsaw kák ŋươʔi xôŋ zựŋ cɔ dền tʰờ bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ ɲưvầʔi Ðứkzê kwân kó fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã ɣọʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa dồŋkỏ nơʔi ŋươʔi cănciên dặŋ ŋươʔi zẫnzắt zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ta dã kùŋ ŋươʔi cɔŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋươʔi twiệtziệt kák tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi xiến cɔ ŋươʔi dượk zɛɲ ɲư zɛɲ ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ kủʔa tʰếzan ta dã cỗ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cɔ câm zễ tạʔi dó nơʔi mìɲ cẳŋ kòn kwấʔizốʔi nữʔa kák kɔn lɔàʔi ák cẳŋ nữʔa ɲư ŋàʔisưʔa tứklà ɲư lúk lúk kwan sét cị zân ʔisơzaên ta dã ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi xỏʔi kák tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi bìɲan cɔ ŋươʔi zốt lạʔi Ðứkzê fán hứʔa zằŋ ŋàʔi zựŋ cɔ ŋươʔi káʔi ɲà xi kák ŋàʔi ŋươʔi dã ŋươʔi ŋủ vớʔi kák tổfụ ŋươʔi tʰì zòŋzốŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi zòŋzốŋ zɔ ŋươʔi sɛɲ za xiến cɔ nướk bềnvữŋ nó sâʔi dền tʰờ cɔ zɛɲ xiến cɔ ŋôʔi kùŋ nướk dổ dờʔidờʔi ta ca kɔn nếʔu fạm tộʔiák sửʔa fạt bằŋ zɔj tʰươŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ zút diển xỏʔi ɲư zút xỏʔi săwlơ dã cừziệt xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi ɲàŋươʔi nướk ŋươʔi dượk dổ cướk ŋươʔi dờʔidờʔi ŋôʔi ŋươʔi dượk vữŋ dến mãʔimãʔi natʰan dến tʰuật lạʔi cɔ Ðʔa mọʔi lờʔi nầʔi mặk tʰị nầʔi vwa Ðʔa di dến hầʔu cướk Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ lạʔicúʔazê tôʔi ʔaj họhàŋ tôʔi ɣì cúʔa dã dɛm tôʔi dếnnơʔi nầʔi lạʔicúʔazê diềʔu dó cúʔa kòn cɔ ɲỏmọn saw cúʔa lạʔi nóʔi ɲà kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa cɔŋ buổʔi lâʔu săw lạʔicúʔazê diềʔu nầʔi tʰeo kác tʰườŋ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi saw Ðʔa kòn nóʔi tʰêm dượk lờʔi ci nữʔa Ôʔicúʔazê cúʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa Ấʔi lờʔi cúʔa tùʔi tʰeo lòŋ ŋàʔi cúʔa dã ɲữŋ việk nầʔi cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa vìvậʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi ŋàʔi zất cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋàʔi cẳŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nàʔɔ xák ŋàʔi ɲư taj cúŋtôʔi dã ŋɛ cớ tʰì cên xắp tʰếzan kó zântộk nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư zân kủʔa cúʔa ʔisơzaên zântộk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã di cuộk lạʔi dặŋ zân kủʔa ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ cúʔa dượk zɛɲ cúʔa ɲơn cúŋtôʔi ɲơn sứ kủʔa ŋàʔi làmviệk lớnlaw dáŋsợ nầʔi cúʔa dã duổʔi ɲữŋ zântộk tʰầntượŋ cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk zânsự cúʔa dã cuộk za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dặŋ tʰuộk ziêŋ ŋàʔi vìcúʔa dã zân ʔisơzaên zân kủʔa cúʔa dờʔidờʔi kòn cúʔa ôʔi Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zân dó vậʔi bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi
