cɔ vữŋcắk dến dờʔidờʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi cúʔa dã fán tôʔitớ cúʔa ɲà kùŋ ʔiɲư cúʔa dã fán vậʔi ŋwiện zɛɲ cúʔa dượk ŋợʔixɛn mãʔimãʔi ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva kwân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋwiện ɲà Ðʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk vữŋbền cướk cúʔa vảlạʔi hỡʔi ɣiêhôva kwân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cíɲ cúʔa dã fán lờʔi hứʔa nầʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa zằŋ ta zựŋ ɲà cɔ ŋươʔi bởʔi kớ dó tôʔitớ cúʔa nóʔi zạnzĩ kầʔusin cúʔa mấʔi lờʔi nầʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi cúʔazê ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi cơn tʰật cúʔa dã hứʔa kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa cɔ ɲữŋ fướk nầʔi vậʔi sin cúʔa fướk cɔ ɲà tôʔitớ cúʔa dể kòn tạʔi cướk cúʔa dến dờʔidờʔi hỡʔi cúʔazê ấʔilà cúʔa dã fán ŋwiện ɲà tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk hưởŋ fướk kủʔa cúʔa dến mãʔimãʔi săw diềʔu dó Ðʔa dáɲbạʔi zân filitin fụk cúŋnó kất kwiền kiɲdô xỏʔi cúŋnó ŋườʔi kũŋ dáɲ zân môáp cúŋ zàʔi cên dất lấʔi zâʔi dɔ dɔ haj zâʔi dể ɣiết zồʔi dɔ zâʔi dể sốŋ ɲưvậʔi zân môáp fảʔi fụk Ðʔa dóŋ tʰuế cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔa kũŋ dáɲ hadadêsɛ kɔncaj kủʔa zêhốp vwa sôba dươŋ xi ŋườʔi di dặŋ lấʔi lạʔi kwiền kwản cên sôŋ fơzát Ðʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋàʔi bảʔicăm líɲ haimươʔi ŋàʔi líɲ kắt ɲượŋ ŋựʔa kủʔa kák sɛ cỉ dểzàɲ cɔ cúŋnó mộtcăm kổ sɛ tʰôʔi zânsi zi Ðʔa mác dến cợ hadadêsɛ vwa sôba Ðʔa ɣiết cúŋnó haimươʔihaj ŋàn ŋươʔi kế dó ŋườʔi dồn cɔŋ Ðʔa mác sứ sizi zân sizi fụkzịc Ðʔa tʰuế hễ nơʔi nàʔɔ Ðʔa di dến tʰì Ðứkzê cɔ ŋườʔi dượk tʰắŋ Ðʔa lấʔi ɲữŋ tʰuẫn bằŋ vàŋ kủʔa kák dầʔitớ hadadêsɛ maŋ ɣởʔi dến ɣiêzusalɛm bêtác bêzôtôʔi haj tʰàɲ kủʔa hadadêsɛ vwa kũŋ dɔạt lấʔi dồŋ zất ɲiềʔu tʰôʔi vwa hamát hăj zằŋ vwa Ðʔa dáɲbạʔi kả dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa hadadêsɛ saj ɣiôzam kɔncaj mìɲ dến vwa Ðʔa dặŋ càʔɔmừŋ tặŋ xɛn ŋườʔi dã dáɲbạʔi hadadêsɛ vìha dadêsɛ hằŋ dáɲ ɣiặk kùŋ tʰôʔi ɣiôza dɛm zâŋ ɲữŋ cậʔu bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ bằŋ dồŋ vwa Ðʔa kũŋ kák nầʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê ʔiɲư ŋườʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ bạk vàŋ kủʔa kák zântộk ŋườʔi dã fụk tứklà zân sizi zân môáp zân ʔammôn zân filitin zân ʔamalék ŋườʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi kủʔa ɣiặk lấʔi nơʔi hadadêsɛ kɔncaj kủʔa zêhốp vwa sứ sôba săw xi tʰắŋ zân sizi cởvề Ðʔa lạʔi nổʔizɛɲ tiếŋ dáɲ ɣiết ŋàn zân dôm cɔŋ cũŋ muốʔi ŋườʔi dồn cɔŋ xắp sứ dôm kả sứ dôm fảʔi fụk Ðʔa ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê xiến cɔ Ðʔa dượk tʰắŋ xắpnơʔi nàʔɔ ŋườʔi di dến Ðʔa vwa cên kả ʔisơzaên kaicị kả zânsự mìɲ kác ŋăitʰẳŋ kôŋbìɲ ɣiôáp kɔncaj sêzuza kwan tổŋbiɲ ɣiôsafát kɔncaj ʔahilút kwan tʰáʔi sadốk kɔncaj ʔabiətʰa tʰầʔi sɛzaza kýlụk bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada kwan cưởŋ zân kêzêtʰít zân fêlêtʰít kòn kák kɔncaj Ðʔa tểtướŋ vwa bấʔizờ Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa ɲà săwlơ kòn sốŋ căŋ ta kớ ɣiônatʰan cɔ ŋườʔi vả kó tôʔitớ kủʔa ɲà săwlơ sípba ŋườʔita ɣọʔi dếnkùŋ Ðʔa vwa hỏʔi ŋươʔi sípba căŋ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa fảʔi ấʔilà tôʔi dầʔitớ vwa vwa zằŋ cẳŋ kòn kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɲà săwlơ saw ta lấʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dãʔi ŋườʔi sípba tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ kòn ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiônatʰan haj cơn vwa hỏʔi zằŋ ŋườʔiở dâʔu sípba tʰưʔa zằŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ ɲà maki kɔncaj ʔamiên tạʔi lôdêba vwa Ðʔa saj tớʔi ɲà maki kɔncaj ʔamiên tạʔi lôdêba dòʔi ŋườʔi dến ximê fibôsết kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiônatʰan cáʔu săwlơ dã dến Ðʔa tʰì mìɲ suốŋ dất lạʔi Ðʔa nóʔi mêfibôsết ŋườʔi tʰưʔa kó tôʔitớ vwa dâʔi Ðʔa nóʔi kũŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cớ cɔ ŋươʔi kớ ɣiônatʰan ca ŋươʔi cả lạʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ dất kủʔa săwlơ ôŋ nộʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cuŋ mêfibôsết lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ vwa ɣì vwa lạʔi dɔáʔi dến kɔn cócết ɲư tôʔi dâʔi vwa ɣọʔi sípba tôʔitớ kủʔa săwlơ nóʔi zằŋ ta dã cɔ kɔncaj củ ŋươʔi mọʔi tàʔisản tʰuộk săwlơ ɲà ŋườʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi kùŋ kák kɔncaj tôʔitớ ŋươʔi fảʔi kàʔi dất dó cɔ ŋườʔi zồʔi hwalợʔi dất sɛɲ hầʔu cɔ kɔncaj củ ŋươʔi kó báɲ mêfibôsết kɔncaj củ ŋươʔi cuŋ vảsíp kó mườʔilăm kɔncaj haimươʔi tôʔitớ sípba tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ vwa mọʔi diềʔu vwɛcúʔa tôʔi zặn biểʔu Ấʔi vậʔi mêfibôsết cuŋ Ðʔa ɲư kɔncaj kủʔa vwa vậʔi mêfibôsết kó kɔncaj ɲỏ mica hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ ɲà sípba dềʔu tôʔitớ kủʔa mêfibôsết mêfibôsết tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm bởʔivì ŋươʔi cuŋ kủʔa vwa ŋườʔi kwè haj cơn săw việk ấʔi vwa zân ʔammôn băŋ hanun kɔncaj ŋườʔi Ðʔa nóʔi ta cɔ hanun kɔncaj kủʔa nahác ɲư ca ŋườʔi dã cɔ vậʔi Ðʔa saj tôʔitớ mìɲ di dến ʔanủʔi ŋườʔi cết kủʔa ca ŋườʔi kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa dến cɔŋ sứ kủʔa zân ʔammôn ɲưŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân ʔammôn nóʔi kùŋ hanun cúʔa mìɲ zằŋ Ôŋ tưởŋ zằŋ Ðʔa saj ɲữŋ ʔanủʔi dếnkùŋ ôŋ tônkíɲ caôŋ saw Ðʔa saj ɲữŋ tôʔitớ ŋườʔi dếnkùŋ ôŋ cẳŋ fảʔi sɛmsét tʰàɲ zɔtʰám dặŋ fá ziệt di căŋ vậʔi hanun kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa kạʔɔ fânnửʔa zâʔu kắt fânnửʔa kwầnáʔɔ cɔdến nửʔa tʰân mìɲ dɔạn cɔ divề kó ŋườʔi tʰuật lạʔi việk ấʔi kùŋ Ðʔa ŋườʔi saj di dón mấʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi lấʔilàm hổtʰẹn vwa sajbảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi tạʔi ɣiêzicô cɔdến cừŋ zâʔu kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dã mọk lạʔi dɔạn kák ŋươʔi cởvề xi zân ʔammôn tʰấʔi mìɲ Ðʔa ɣớm ɣét saj ŋườʔi di ciêʔumộ zân sizi bếcêhốt sôba cừŋ haj líɲ lạʔi ciêʔumộ vwa maaka vớʔi mộtŋàn ŋườʔi haj ŋàn ŋườʔiở sứ tóp Ðʔa hăj dượk diềʔu dó saj ɣiôáp vớʔi kák zõŋ kủʔa dạʔɔ biɲ mìɲ di dáɲ cúŋnó zânam kéʔɔ za zàn cận tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kòn zân sizi sôba zêhóp ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở tóp maaka dềʔu dóŋ ziêŋ za cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ ɣiôáp tʰấʔi kwân ɣiặk dáɲ dằŋ cướk dằŋ săw cọn ŋườʔi líɲ cɔŋ dạʔɔ tiɲbiɲ ʔisơzaên zàn biɲ dó za kùŋzân sizi kòn biɲ kòn lạʔi ŋườʔi caw cɔ ʔabisaj ʔɛm mìɲ dặŋ bàʔi cận dốʔi kùŋzân ʔammôn ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔabisaj zằŋ nếʔu zân sizi mạɲ ʔɛɲ ʔɛm dến ɣiúp ʔɛɲ ɲưŋ nếʔu zân ʔammôn mạɲ ʔɛm ʔɛɲ dến ɣiúp ʔɛm hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí dáɲ ɣiặk kác kandảm zânsự kák tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ŋwiện Ðứkzê tʰeo ŋàʔi lấʔilàm Ðʔɔạn ɣiôáp vớʔi kwânlíɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu dến ɣần zawciến kùŋzân sizi cúŋ cạʔi cốn cướk ŋườʔi bấʔizờ zân ʔammôn tʰấʔi zân sizi cạʔi cốn tʰì cúŋ kũŋ cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk ʔabisaj vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɣiôáp lìʔa xỏʔi zân ʔammôn cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm zânsi zi tʰấʔi mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi ɲóm lạʔi hadazêsɛ saj ciêʔuzân sizi kiə sôŋ cúŋnó dến hêlam kó sôbák tổŋbiɲ kủʔa hadazêsɛ kwản ŋɛ nầʔi Ðʔa lạʔi hếttʰảʔi ʔisơzaên di ŋaŋ kwa ɣiôdɛɲ kéʔɔ dến hêlam zânsi zi zàn cận dốʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zawciến kùŋ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cúŋ cạʔi cốn cướk ʔisơzaên Ðʔa ɣiết bảʔicăm sɛ biɲ kủʔa zân sizi líɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ ɣiết sôbák tổŋbiɲ kủʔa cúŋnó cết tạʔi dó xi kák vwa cưhầʔu kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi mìɲ ʔisơzaên dáɲbạʔi tʰì hòʔa kùŋ ʔisơzaên fụkzịc zân sizi xôŋ kòn zám ɣiúp zân ʔammôn nữʔa kwa mớʔi xi kák vwa tʰườŋ za cɛɲ ciến Ðʔa saj ɣiôáp kùŋ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ kả dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên dáɲ ɣiặk cúŋ kướp fá sứ zân ʔammôn vâʔi tʰàɲ zápba ɲưŋ vwa Ðʔa lạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm một buổʔi ciềʔu kiə Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi xỏʔi ɣiườŋ mìɲ di zạʔɔ cơʔi cên nók dền vwa tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dươŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi zất lịcsự Ðʔa saj hỏʔi ŋườʔi ấʔilà ʔaj tʰì ŋườʔita tʰưʔa zằŋ Ấʔilà bátsêba kɔŋáʔi kủʔa liəm kủʔa ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít Ðʔa saj ŋườʔi dɛm nàŋ dến nàŋ dến ɲàvwa vwa ŋủ vớʔi nàŋ săw xi nàŋ cɔ sạc ôʔuế mìɲ cởvề ɲà ŋườʔi nầʔi tʰọtʰaj saj ŋườʔi tâʔu kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ tôʔi kótʰaj Ðʔa cwiền lịɲ cɔ ɣiôáp zằŋ hãʔi saj ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít dếnkùŋ vậʔi ɣiôáp săw ʔuzi dếnkùŋ Ðʔa ʔuzi dến Ðʔa hỏʔitʰăm ɣiôáp dạʔɔ biɲ kó bìɲan căŋ kùŋ ciếncận za tʰểnàʔɔ Ðʔɔạn vwa nóʔi kùŋ ʔuzi zằŋ hãʔi di suốŋ ɲàŋươʔi zửʔa cơn di vậʔi ʔuzi di za xỏʔi dền vwa kó ŋườʔi dɛm tʰeo ŋườʔi kủʔa ɲàvwa ɲưŋ ʔuzi xôŋ ɲà mìɲ ŋủ tạʔi kửʔa dền vwa kùŋ kák tôʔitớ vwa ŋườʔita tʰuật diềʔu dó cɔ Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ ʔuzi xôŋ kó di suốŋ ɲà ŋườʔi Ðʔa hỏʔi ʔuzi zằŋ cớ tʰì ŋươʔi cẳŋ di dườŋ cởvề saw kớsaw xôŋ di suốŋ ɲàŋươʔi ʔuzi tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ hòm zawướk ʔisơzaên zuda zướʔi cạʔi ɣiôáp cúʔa tôʔi vớʔi kák tôʔitớ cúʔa tôʔi dươŋ cạʔi nơʔi dồŋ cốŋ kòn tôʔi lạʔi vàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ dặŋ ʔuốŋ ŋủ kùŋ mìɲ saw tôʔi cỉ mạŋ sốŋ liɲhồn kủʔa vwa tʰề zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ ɲưvậʔi Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ʔuzi zằŋ hãʔi kòn dâʔi ŋàʔinăj zồʔi maj saj ŋươʔi di vậʔi ʔuzi lạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔi ấʔi ŋàʔisăw Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa vờʔi ŋườʔi ănuốŋ tạʔi cướk mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi săj ɲưŋ ciềʔutốʔi ʔuzi di za ŋủ cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ vớʔi kák tôʔitớ kủʔa ŋườʔi cớ xôŋ kó di suốŋ ɲà mìɲ sáŋ ŋàʔimaj Ðʔa káʔi tʰơ cɔ ɣiôáp ɣởʔi nơʔi tăj ʔuzi ŋườʔi ɲưvầʔi hãʔi dặt ʔuzi tạʔi hàŋdầʔu nơʔi hiểmŋwi kủʔa ciếncận zồʔi hãʔi zút za sa ŋườʔi dể ŋườʔi dáɲ cết di vậʔi xi ɣiôáp vâʔi tʰàɲ dặt ʔuzi tạʔicỗ dã kó líɲ mạɲbạʔɔ kủʔa tʰùŋịc ɣìŋiữ ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ kéʔɔ za dáɲ ɣiôáp kó mấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ tôʔitớ Ðʔa ŋã cết ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít kũŋ cết ɣiôáp saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ Ðʔa dặŋ tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi dầʔuduôʔi kủʔa ciɲciến và ŋườʔi cwiền lịɲ cɔ sứɣiả zằŋ xi ŋươʔi dã tʰuật sɔŋ cɔ vwa mọʔi diềʔu dã sảʔiza nơʔi ciếncận nếʔu vwa nổʔizận nóʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ kớsaw kák ŋươʔi di tớʔi ɣần kwá dặŋ tʰàɲ vậʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ zằŋ ŋườʔita cên cót vác tʰàɲ suốŋ saw sưʔa ʔaj ɣiết ʔabimêlék kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzútbêsết há cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi cên cót vác tʰàɲ tʰớt kốʔi suốŋ cên ŋườʔilàm cɔ ŋườʔi cết tạʔi têbết saw vìsaw kák ŋươʔi dến ɣần vác tʰàɲ ɲưvậʔi tʰì bấʔizờ ŋươʔi zằŋ ʔuzi tôʔitớ vwa ŋườʔi hêtít kũŋ cết nữʔa ɲưvậʔi sứɣiả di xi ŋườʔi dếnnơʔi tʰuật cɔ Ðʔa mọʔi diềʔu ɣiôáp dã zặn ŋườʔi sứɣiả tâʔu kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ bandầʔu ɲữŋ kwân dó mạɲ cúŋtôʔi kéʔɔ za dến ŋɔàʔi dồŋ ɲưŋ cúŋtôʔi dáɲduổʔi cúŋnó dến kửʔa tʰàɲ kák líɲ kầm kuŋ cên vác tʰàɲ kó ɲữŋ tôʔitớ vwa kó vàʔi ŋườʔi cết ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít tôʔitớ vwa kũŋ cết nữʔa Ðʔa dáp kùŋ sứɣiả zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp cớ lấʔilàm kựk lòŋ kwá diềʔu dó ɣươm xi ɣiết nầʔi xi ɣiết xák hãʔi zán sứk tʰàɲ hủʔiziệt di kòn ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiụk ŋườʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí xi ʔuzi hăj zằŋ cồŋ mìɲ dã tʰák tʰì tʰanxók ʔuzi xi dã taŋ Ðʔa saj vờʔi nàŋ vàʔɔ kuŋ nàŋ cởnên ŋườʔi sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kɔncaj ɲưŋ diềʔu Ðʔa dã dó xôŋ dẹplòŋ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê saj natʰan dếnkùŋ Ðʔa vậʔi natʰan dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cɔŋ tʰàɲ kiə kó haj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi ɣiàʔu kòn ŋườʔi kiə ŋèʔɔ ŋườʔi ɣiàʔukó ciên zất ɲiềʔu ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ nếʔu cẳŋ kɔnciên káʔi ɲỏ ŋườʔi dã mwa tʰì cẳŋ kó ɣì ŋườʔi nuôʔi kùŋ vớʔi kɔnkáʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi ɲà ŋườʔi dồ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ dồ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ ŋủ cên lòŋ ŋườʔi ɲư kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi vậʔi vả kó ŋườʔi xác dến ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu tiếk xôŋ dụŋ dến ciên kủʔa mìɲ dặŋ zọn bữʔa cɔ ŋườʔi xác dã dến kɔnciên kɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ zọn cɔ xák dã dến tʰăm mìɲ Ðʔa nổʔizận kùŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi nóʔi kùŋ natʰan zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề ŋườʔi dã fạm diềʔu ấʔi tʰật dáŋ cết hắn fảʔi tʰườŋ ɣiá ciên kɔn dã ɲưvậʔi xôŋ kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót bấʔizờ natʰan nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ vwa ŋườʔi dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã sứk zầʔu ŋươʔi vwa ʔisơzaên dã ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj săwlơ ta kũŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ɲà kủʔa củ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi vwa kủʔa ɲà ʔisơzaên zuda nếʔu diềʔu dó xôŋ dủ tʰêm cɔ xák nữʔa kớ săw ŋươʔi dã xiɲbỉ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê diềʔu xôŋ dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi dã zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít lấʔi ŋươʔi kòn tʰì ŋươʔi dã ɣiết bởʔi ɣươm kủʔa zân ʔammôn nên bâʔizờ ɣươm cẳŋ tʰôʔi hủʔihɔạʔi ɲàŋươʔi bởʔivì ŋươʔi dã xiɲ kướp ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít dặŋ nàŋ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta xiến ɲàŋươʔi nổʔi ɲữŋ tajhọʔa ɣiáŋ cên ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi tạʔi cướkmắt ŋươʔi caw cɔ ŋườʔi lânkận ŋươʔi làmɲụk cúŋnó tạʔi nơʔi bạc ɲựt vì ŋươʔi dã kiə kác kínɲiệm ɲưŋ làmviệk nầʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên tạʔi nơʔi bạc ɲựt Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ natʰan zằŋ ta dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê natʰan dáp kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ Ðứkzê kũŋ dã sóʔa tộʔi vwa vwa xôŋ cết dâʔu ɲưŋ việk nầʔi vwa dã ɣâʔi zịp cɔ ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc Ðứkzê nóʔi fạm dến ŋàʔi kɔncaj dã sɛɲ cɔ ŋươʔi cết Ðʔɔạn natʰan cởvề ɲà mìɲ Ðứkzê dáɲ dứʔa cẻ kủʔa ʔuzi dã sɛɲ cɔ Ðʔa dăw nặŋ Ðʔa kɔn kầʔuxẩn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kiêŋ dɔạn ŋườʔi cở vàʔɔ ɲà cọn dêm zướʔi dất kák cưởŋlãʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà cổʔi zậʔi dứŋ cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi dặŋ dỡ ŋườʔi xỏʔi dất ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ cẳŋ vớʔi ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi dứʔa cẻ cết kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa ŋạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dứʔa cẻ dã cết nóʔi zằŋ lúk dứʔa cẻ kòn sốŋ cúŋtôʔi kó xwiêŋiảʔi vwa vwa xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi làmsaw cúŋtôʔi lạʔi zám nóʔi kùŋ vwa zằŋ dứʔa cẻ dã cết kólẽ vwa zủʔizɔ ɲưŋÐʔa tʰấʔi ɲữŋ tôʔitớ ɲỏ ɲỏ hiểʔu zằŋ dứʔa cẻ dã cết hỏʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi dứʔa cẻ dã cết căŋ họ tʰưʔa fảʔi dã cết zồʔi bấʔizờ Ðʔa cờ zậʔi xỏʔi dất mìɲ sứk zầʔu tʰơm tʰăj kwầnáʔɔ zồʔi ŋườʔi di vàʔɔ dến kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰờ lạʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cởvề kuŋ cwiền zọn tʰựk cɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi kák tôʔitớ hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa làmci vậʔi xi dứʔa cẻ nầʔi kòn sốŋ vwa kiêŋ xók bấʔizờ dã cết vwa cờ zậʔi vwa dáp xi dứʔa cẻ kòn sốŋ kiêŋ xóklók ŋĩʔa zằŋ nàʔɔ ʔaj kólẽ Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót cɔ dứʔa cẻ dượk sốŋ căŋ ɲưŋ bâʔizờ dã cết kiêŋ ci ta kó tʰế cɔ cởlạʔi ta di dến ɲưŋ xôŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðʔa ʔanủʔi bátsêba mìɲ dến ŋủ kùŋ nàŋ nàŋ sɛɲ dứʔa caj dặt salômôn Ðứkzê ʔiêʔumến salômôn ŋàʔi saj dấŋ tiênci natʰan dến dặt cɔ ɣiêdidiə Ðứkzê ʔiêʔumến ɣiôáp dáɲ zápba kủʔa zân ʔammôn lấʔi dếdô ŋườʔi saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó dáɲ zápba lấʔi tʰàɲ zướʔi zồʔi bâʔizờ vwa hãʔi ɲóm ciếnsĩ kòn lạʔi dến dóŋ cướk tʰàɲ ciếm lấʔi kẻʔɔ tôʔi lấʔi tʰì kôŋ dó tôʔi căŋ vậʔi vwa Ðʔa ɲóm kả zânsự kéʔɔ dến dáɲ zápba vâʔi lấʔi ŋườʔi káʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên kủʔa vwa zân ʔammôn dộʔi cên dầʔu mãʔɔ dó kân nặŋ lâŋ vàŋ kó caŋsứk ɲữŋ bửʔu tʰạc Ðʔa dặt cên dầʔu mìɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ dɔạt lấʔi zất ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi tʰàɲ dɛm di ŋườʔi diệʔu zânsự tʰàɲ ấʔi za cúŋ fảʔi làmkôŋ zịc bằŋ kưʔa bừʔa zìʔu ɣạc ŋườʔi kũŋ dãʔi hếttʰảʔi tʰàɲ kủʔa zân ʔammôn ɲưvậʔi Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa kả zânsự dềʔu cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm kế săw ấʔi sảʔi kó việk nầʔi kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa kó ʔɛmɣáʔi zuột tama zất lịcsự ʔamnôn kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa tʰươŋ nàŋ ʔamnôn kớ tama ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ dến dỗʔi tʰàɲ bịɲ nàŋ dồŋciɲ lấʔi làmxó cɔ ʔamnôn dượk ci vớʔi nàŋ vả ʔamnôn kó bạɲữʔu ɣiônadáp kɔncaj kủʔa simê ʔa ʔɛɲ Ðʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi zất kwỉkwiệt ɣiônadáp nóʔi kùŋ ʔamnôn zằŋ hỡʔi vươŋtử ɲơn saw ŋàʔimột hawmòn ɲưvậʔi vươŋtử tʰútʰật vớʔi tôʔi căŋ ʔamnôn dáp ta tʰươŋ tama ʔɛmɣáʔi kủʔa ʔɛmcaj ɣiônadáp nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ vươŋtử hãʔi cên ɣiườŋ dăw zồʔi xi vwa ca dến tʰăm hãʔi nóʔi zằŋ kɔn sin ca cɔ tama ʔɛmɣáʔi kɔn dến cɔ kɔn zọn cướk kɔn kɔn tʰấʔi ɲận lấʔi dồăn nơʔi tăj vậʔi ʔamnôn dăw vwa dến tʰăm tʰì ʔamnôn nóʔi kùŋ vwa zằŋ kɔn sin ca cɔ tama dến dâʔi haj káʔi báɲ ɲỏ tạʔi cướkmắt kɔn kɔn ɲận lấʔi báɲ ấʔi nơʔi tăj Ðʔa saj ŋườʔi dếnkùŋ tama bảʔɔ nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi di dến ɲà ʔammôn ʔɛɲ kɔn ci dể tama di dến ɲà ʔɛɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi dươŋ cướk ŋườʔi nàŋ lấʔi ɲồʔi báɲ ɲỏ di Ðʔɔạn nàŋ ɲắk cảʔɔ ɲỏ suốŋ cút báɲ za cɔŋ ɲưŋ ʔamnôn từcốʔi xôŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi biểʔu mọʔi ŋườʔi za xỏʔi dâʔi hếttʰảʔi dềʔu luj za bấʔizờ ʔamnôn nóʔi kùŋ tama zằŋ hãʔi bưŋ dồăn ʔɛm dã zọn cɔ ʔɛɲ vàʔɔ cɔŋ fòŋ dể ʔɛɲ ɲận lấʔi nơʔi tăj ʔɛm tama lấʔi kák báɲ ɲỏ mìɲ dã bưŋ vàʔɔ cɔ ʔamnôn ʔɛɲ mìɲ cɔŋ fòŋ nàŋ zâŋ báɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lấʔi nàŋ zằŋ ʔɛm ơʔi hãʔi dến ŋủ kùŋ ʔɛɲ nàŋ dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ xôŋ dượk ʔɛɲ cớ làmɲụk tôʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita cẳŋ ɲưvậʔi cớ fạm hạɲ nầʔi tôʔi maŋ sỉɲụk tôʔi di dâʔu kòn ʔɛɲ ɲư ŋườʔi ôzɛɲ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên tʰà ʔɛɲ nóʔi kùŋ vwa tʰì vwa cẳŋ kấm ʔɛɲ lấʔi tôʔi ɲưŋam xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ nàŋ ŋườʔi mạɲ zan nàŋ kùŋ nàŋ zồʔi dó ʔamnôn lấʔilàm ɣớm ɣét nàŋ kwá dến dỗʔi tìɲ ŋườʔi ɣɛŋét nàŋ lạʔi tìɲtʰươŋ ʔiêʔu nàŋ xi cướk ʔamnôn nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi didi nàŋ dáp cớ duổʔi tôʔi di cɔ tôʔi kwấʔi kwấʔi ʔɛɲ dã zồʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ nàŋ ɣọʔi dứʔa cẻ hầʔuhạ biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi duổʔi dờn nầʔi za xỏʔi cướk zồʔi dóŋkửʔa xóʔa cốt lạʔi vả nàŋ mặk káʔi áʔɔ cɔŋ zàʔi kák kôŋcúʔa dềʔu mặk áʔɔ ɲưtʰế dươŋ xi kòn dồŋciɲ vậʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa ʔamnôn duổʔi nàŋ za dóŋkửʔa lạʔi tama cɔ cên dầʔu mìɲ sé áʔɔzàʔi bưŋ tăicên dầʔu vừʔa di vừʔa kấttiếŋ ʔɛɲ nàŋ hỏʔi nàŋ zằŋ kó fảʔi ʔamnôn ʔɛɲ kủʔa ʔɛm dã kùŋ ʔɛm căŋ tʰếtʰì hỡʔi ʔɛm hãʔi làmtʰiɲ ʔɛɲ kủʔa ʔɛm cớ lấʔi dó kựk lòŋ kwá ɲưvậʔi tama ởziêŋ za nơʔi ɲà ʔɛɲ nàŋ vwa Ðʔa hăj dượk kák diềʔu dó ɣiận cẳŋ kòn nóʔi kùŋ ʔamnôn lờʔi nàʔɔ hɔặk làɲ hăj zữ ŋườʔi ɣét ʔamnôn bởʔi ʔamnôn dã zan tama ʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ kák haj săw dươŋ lúk lôŋ ciên mìɲ tạʔi baɛɲhátsɔ ɣần zaim ŋườʔi mờʔi hếttʰảʔi kák vươŋtử dếnkùŋ vwa tʰưʔa zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ vwa kó ɲữŋ tʰợ lôŋ ciên nơʔi ɲà vậʔi sin vwa kùŋ kwầntʰần kủʔa vwa dến ɲà tôʔitớ vwa ɲưŋ vwa dáp kùŋ zằŋ xôŋ dượk kɔn hếttʰảʔi cúŋta xôŋ di dến ɲà kɔn tổnfí cɔ kɔn mặkzầʔu kố nàʔi Ðʔa xôŋ cịʔu di dến dó ɲưŋ Ðʔa cúk fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu vwa xôŋ dến sin cɔfép ʔamnôn ʔɛɲ tôʔi dếnkùŋ cúŋtôʔi vwa dáp kớsaw di dếnkùŋ kɔn ɲưŋÁp kố nàʔi dến dỗʔi vwa dể cɔ ʔamnôn hếttʰảʔi vươŋtử di vớʔi ŋườʔi vả cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi sɛm xi lòŋ ʔamnôn vuj zượʔu xi bảʔɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dáɲ ʔamnôn tʰì bấʔizờ hãʔi ɣiết di cớ ci ấʔi cíɲ zặn biểʔu kák ŋươʔi diềʔu dó xá kandảm mìɲ za mạɲbạʔɔ kák tôʔitớ sử ʔamnôn ʔiɲư ŋườʔi dã cwiền cɔ bấʔizờ kák vươŋtử dứŋzậʔi kỡʔi lừʔa cạʔi cốn Ðươŋ xi kák vươŋtử zọk dườŋ kótiếŋ tʰấʔu dến vwa Ðʔa zằŋ dã ɣiết kák vươŋtử zồʔi xôŋ kó ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi vwa dứŋzậʔi sé áʔɔ mìɲ zướʔi dất hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ ŋườʔi dứŋ cầʔu ɣần áʔɔ kũŋ sé zác ɲưŋzô nadáp kɔncaj simê ʔa ʔɛɲ Ðʔa kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ sin cúʔa tôʔi cớ tưởŋ zằŋ kák vươŋtử kủʔa cúʔa dã ɣiết cỉ mộtmìɲ ʔamnôn cết tʰôʔi ấʔilà việk dã dịɲ ŋàʔi ʔamnôn zan tama ʔɛmɣáʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi Ấʔi vậʔi sin vwɛcúʔa tôʔi cớ tưởŋ zằŋ hếttʰảʔi vươŋtử dã cết cỉ mộtmìɲ ʔamnôn cết dó tʰôʔi dã cạʔi cốn kẻ tôʔitớ dươŋ vọŋkɛɲ ŋướk ɲìn tʰấʔi dɔàn ŋườʔi dôŋ di tớʔi zɔ tʰeo dườŋ tâʔi fíʔa núʔi ɣiônadáp tâʔu kùŋ vwa zằŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi kák vươŋtử dến việk dã sảʔiza ʔiɲư tôʔitớ vwa dã nóʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi vừʔa zứt tʰì tʰấʔi kák vươŋtử dến dềʔu kấttiếŋ xók vwa hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ kũŋ dềʔu càn ɣiọt lụʔi kònÁp dã cạʔi cốn tạʔi ɲà tʰɛɲmaj kɔncaj ʔamihút vwa sứ ɣɛsuzơ Ðʔa dểtaŋ cɔ kɔncaj mìɲ cốn tạʔi sứ ɣêsuzơ Ðʔɔạn vwa Ðʔa xôŋ duổʔi tʰeo nữʔa vwa dã dượk ɣiảʔi cết kủʔa ʔamnôn bấʔizờ ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza tʰấʔi lòŋ vwa hướŋ tʰì saj di tạʔi tʰêkô ʔa ŋườʔi dờn xônxéʔɔ zặn nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi kó taŋ mặk áʔɔ cế cớ sứk zầʔu cên dầʔu nàŋ sɔŋ hãʔi kó záŋ ŋườʔi dờn dã lâʔu ŋàʔi xók cết Ðʔɔạn hãʔi vàʔɔ dền vwa tâʔu kùŋ vwa tʰeo kác nầʔi ɣiôáp dể cɔŋ miệŋ nàŋ kák lờʔi nàŋ fảʔi nóʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi dờn tʰêkô ʔa di dếnkùŋ vwa mìɲ suốŋ dất lạʔi zồʔi tâʔu zằŋ lạʔi vwa sin hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi vwa nóʔi ŋươʔi ci nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ hỡʔiôʔi tôʔi ɣóʔabụʔa cồŋ tôʔi dã cết kẻ dòʔi vwa kó haj kɔncaj cúŋnó dã dáɲlộn vớʔi ɲăw ŋɔàʔi dồŋ xôŋ ʔaj kan dứʔa nầʔi dáɲ dứʔa kiə cết vì dó kả zòŋọ dềʔu zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa vwa nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ cúŋta dã ɣiết ʔɛm mìɲ cúŋta ɣiết dể báʔɔtʰù ʔɛm dã ɣiết mặkzầʔu kếŋiệp cúŋta kũŋ ziệt vậʔi cúŋ twan dóm lửʔa kòn tạʔi cɔ tôʔi xôŋ dể cɔ cồŋ tôʔi hɔặk zɛɲ hɔặk zòŋzõʔi ɣì cên mặtdất vwa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dờn zằŋ hãʔi cởvề ɲàŋươʔi cwiền lịɲ việk ŋươʔi ŋườʔi dờn tʰêkô ʔa tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ lạʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ŋwiện lỗʔi dổ lạʔi cên tôʔi cên ɲà ca tôʔi ŋwiện vwa ŋôʔi vwa xôŋ kanzự dến vwa nếʔu kó ʔaj hămzọʔa ŋươʔi nữʔa hãʔi zẫn dến nó dượk cẳŋ kòn zám dụŋ dến ŋươʔi dâʔu nữʔa nàŋ zằŋ tôʔi kầʔusin vwa hãʔi cỉ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa làmcứŋ zằŋ báʔɔtʰù hwiết cớ hạʔi tôʔi kàŋ nặŋ ɣiết kɔncaj tôʔi vwa dáp ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề zằŋ sợʔi tók cẳŋ zụŋ suốŋ xỏʔi dầʔu kủʔa kɔncaj ŋươʔi ŋườʔi dờn lạʔi sin cɔfép kɔndòʔi vwa kòn tâʔu lờʔi kùŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi nữʔa vwa dáp hãʔi nóʔi ŋườʔi dờn nóʔi vậʔitʰì saw dốʔi kùŋzân kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa cẳŋ dɔán sét dồŋ mộttʰể vwa fán lờʔi dó ɣiốŋ ɲư kó tộʔi vwa xôŋ dòʔi dứʔa kɔncaj vwa dã dàʔi di vì zốt lạʔi cúŋta hăj cết ɣiốŋ ɲư nướk cảʔi cên dất xôŋ lạʔi dượk ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ kất mạŋ sốŋ di ŋàʔi kác tʰế dặŋ xôŋ dẩʔi dầʔi kác sa ŋàʔi bấʔizờ nếʔu tôʔi dến tâʔu kùŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ấʔi zânsự cɔ tôʔi zunsợ kɔndòʔi vwa kó ŋĩ zằŋ mìɲ fảʔi tâʔu kùŋ vwa kólẽ vwa diềʔu kɔndòʔi vwa kầʔusin fảʔi vwa ŋɛ kɔndòʔi vwa ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi tăj ziệt cúŋtôʔi tôʔi kɔncaj tôʔi xỏʔi sảnŋiệp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vậʔi kɔndòʔi vwa dã ŋĩ zằŋ cớci lờʔi kủʔa vwɛcúʔa tôʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi ʔanŋỉ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi xáknàʔɔ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hiểʔu làɲ zữ ŋwiệŋiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa kùŋ vwa vwa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dờn zằŋ cớ zấʔu ci diềʔu hỏʔi ŋươʔi ŋườʔi dờn tʰưʔa zằŋ sin vwɛcúʔa tôʔi hãʔi hỏʔi vwa hỏʔi kó fảʔi ɣiôáp dã dặt tăj vàʔɔ mọʔi diềʔu dó căŋ ŋườʔi dờn tʰưʔa zằŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ôʔi tôʔi cỉ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa vwa tʰề ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰế sít kwa hữʔu hɔặk dặŋ xỏʔi diềʔu vwɛcúʔa tôʔi mớʔi nóʔi dó fảʔi ấʔilà ɣiôáp tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa dã cwiền lịɲ cɔ tôʔi dể kák lờʔi nầʔi cɔŋ miệŋ kɔndòʔi vwa ɣiôáp tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa dã ɲưvậʔi dể cɔ việk nầʔi tʰàɲza kác mớʔi ɲưŋ cúʔa tôʔi xônŋwan ɲư tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hiểʔu zõ mọʔi việk dã sảʔiza cên dất vwa nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ vậʔi ŋươʔi dã làmviệk nầʔi hãʔi di dòʔi ɣã caicẻ cởvề ɣiôáp mìɲ suốŋ dất lạʔi cúk fướk cɔ vwa zằŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ôʔi ŋàʔinăj tôʔitớ vwa zằŋ dã dượk cướk vwa vwa dã diềʔu tôʔitớ vwa dã kầʔusin ŋàʔi ɣiôáp cổʔi zậʔi di dến ɣêsuzơ dɛm ɣiêzusalɛm vwa nóʔi zằŋ nó fảʔi cɔŋ ɲà cớ zamặt cướk Ấʔi vậʔi zút cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ xôŋ zamắt vwa vả cɔŋ kả ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk xɛn cuộŋ ɲansắk mìɲ ɲư nơʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi cơn cɔdến cót dầʔu cẳŋ kó ɣì mỗʔi ŋườʔi hớttók mìɲ nặŋ cɔ ŋườʔi tʰì tók ŋườʔi kân dượk haj căm siếk tʰeo kân kủʔa vwa sɛɲ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi tama nàŋ ŋườʔi zất lịcsự tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cọn haj xôŋ zamắt vwa kế dó dòʔi ɣiôáp dặŋ saj ŋườʔi di dếnkùŋ vwa ɲưŋ ɣiôáp xôŋ cịʔu dến ɣần ŋườʔi dòʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi tʰứ ɲì sɔŋ ɣiôáp lạʔi từcốʔi xôŋ dến nóʔi kùŋ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi sɛm zuộŋ kủʔa ɣiôáp zuộŋ lúʔamạc kiə ɣần zuộŋ hãʔi di câm lửʔa vàʔɔ zuộŋ ấʔi kák tôʔitớ kủʔa câm lửʔa vàʔɔ zuộŋ dó bấʔizờ ɣiôáp dứŋzậʔi dếnkùŋ cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ kớsaw kák tôʔitớ ŋươʔi kó câm lửʔa vàʔɔ zuộŋ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến dâʔi saj ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ vwa dặŋ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã ɣêsuzơ cởvề làmci tʰà tôʔi kòn dó tʰì vậʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi zamắt vwa víbằŋ tôʔi kó tộʔiák ɣì sin vwa hãʔi ɣiết tôʔi di vậʔi ɣiôáp di dến vwa tʰuật lạʔi kák lờʔi ấʔi vwa dòʔi dến ŋườʔi vàʔɔ dền vwa mìɲ suốŋ cướk văw vwa kác ítlâʔu sɛ ŋựʔa vớʔi nămmươʔi kwân cạʔi cướk mìɲ zậʔi dứŋ nơʔi dườŋ vàʔɔ kửʔa tʰàɲ nếʔu ɣặp ʔaj kó tʰưʔa ci di dến vwa dặŋ kầʔu sétdɔán tʰì ɣọʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ŋườʔiở tʰàɲ nàʔɔ nếʔu dáp tôʔitớ ôŋ tʰuộk cifáʔi kiə kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰì zằŋ sựtìɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi tʰật fảʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ nơʔi dền vwa nàʔɔ kó ʔaj dể ŋɛ ŋươʔi dâʔu Ðʔɔạn zằŋ cớci ŋườʔita kwan sét cɔŋ sứ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó việk cɛɲtụŋ hăj kiệnkáʔɔ ɣì kần dɔán sét dến tʰì sử dɔán kôŋbìɲ cɔ nếʔu kó ʔaj dến ɣần dặŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi ɣiơ tăj za dỡ lấʔi ŋườʔi ɲưvậʔi dốʔi kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên di dến vwa dặŋ kầʔu dɔán sét zụ lấʔilòŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên vậʔi kuốʔi nóʔi kùŋ vwa zằŋ sin cɔfép kɔn di dến hếpzôn dặŋ cả sɔŋ hứʔa ŋwiện tôʔi dã xấn vớʔi Ðứkzê vì lúk tôʔitớ vwa tạʔi ɣêsuzơ cɔŋ sizi kó xấn lờʔi ŋwiện nầʔi nếʔuÐứkzê zẫn tôʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì tôʔi tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkzê vwa dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di bìɲan vậʔi ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi di dến hếpzôn saj ɲữŋ zɔtʰám zaw lịɲ nầʔi xắp cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ tʰɔạt xi ʔɛɲɛm ŋɛ tiếŋ tʰì hãʔi nóʔi vwa tạʔi hếpzôn kó haj căm ŋườʔiở ɣiêzusalɛm dã mờʔi dềʔu di vớʔi ŋườʔi kác tʰậttʰà cẳŋ ŋiŋạʔi ci Ðươŋ lúk zâŋ kủʔa saj mờʔi ʔahitôfɛ mưʔusĩ kủʔa Ðʔa ɣilô tʰàɲ ŋườʔi sự fảnŋịc cởnên mạɲ dɔàn zân di tʰeo kùŋ ŋàʔicàŋ dôŋ kó ŋườʔi dến báʔɔ cɔ Ðʔa zằŋ lòŋ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên ŋiêŋ Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ kák tôʔitớ vớʔi mìɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi cạʔi cốn di bằŋ cẳŋ cúŋta xôŋ tʰế tʰɔát xỏʔi dượk hãʔi di măw măw ʔɛ dến cúŋta hạʔi cɔ cúŋta zùŋ ɣươm ziệt tʰàɲ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa tʰưʔa zằŋ fàm việkɣì vwɛcúʔa cúŋtôʔi ɲứt dịɲ tʰì kák tôʔitớ vwa tʰeo vậʔi vwa zadi kó kả ɲà ŋườʔi kùŋ tʰeo ɲưŋ vwa dể lạʔi mườʔi ŋườʔi kuŋfi dặŋ ɣiữ dền tʰếtʰì vwa di za kó kả zânsự tʰeo săw cúŋ zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi ɲàở kuốʔi cót tʰàɲ hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa kả ŋườʔi kêzêtʰít ŋườʔi fêlêtʰít dềʔu diở vwa kòn ŋườʔi ɣitít sáʔu căm ŋườʔiở ɣát dến tʰeo vwa dềʔu di dàŋ cướk vwa nóʔi kùŋ ʔitaj ŋườʔi ɣitít zằŋ kớsaw ŋươʔi kũŋ dếnkùŋ cúŋta hãʔi cởlạʔi vớʔi vwa bởʔivì ŋươʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ dã lìʔa sứ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi mớʔi dến hômkwa hômnăj cɔ ŋươʔi lạk làʔi dâʔidó vớʔi cúŋta saw kòn di dâʔu xôŋ zõ vậʔi hãʔi cởvề zẫn kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi tʰeo ŋươʔi ŋwiện tʰươŋsót tʰàɲ kùŋ ŋươʔi ɲưŋ ʔitaj tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ cỉ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa vwɛcúʔa tôʔi tʰề vwɛcúʔa tôʔi dâʔu hɔặk cɔŋ cết hɔặk cɔŋ sốŋ tʰì tôʔitớ vwa kũŋ dó vwa Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi ʔitaj zằŋ vậʔi hãʔi dến di cướk tʰếtʰì ʔitaj ŋườʔi ɣitít kùŋ hếttʰảʔi kɔncẻ tʰeo mìɲ kả ŋườʔi dềʔu di tớʔi cướk hếttʰảʔi zân cɔŋ sứ dềʔu xók lớntiếŋ cɔŋ xi kả dám dôŋ nầʔi di kwa vwa kwa xɛ sếcôn kả zânsự dềʔu tớʔi cên kɔn dườŋ dồŋ vắŋ dó kũŋ kó sadốk hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi họ dể kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi suốŋ dất zồʔi ʔabiətʰa di cướk cɔdến xi hếttʰảʔi zânsự dã za xỏʔi tʰàɲ suốŋ zồʔi vwa nóʔi kùŋ sadốk zằŋ hãʔi tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ nếʔu dượk cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dɛm cɔ tʰấʔi lạʔi zawướk nơʔi ŋự kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋàʔi fán ɲưvầʔi ta xôŋ ưʔatʰíc ŋươʔi tʰếtʰì ŋwiện ŋàʔi sử tʰeo ŋàʔi lấʔilàm vwa lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ tʰầʔi sadốk zằŋ nầʔi ŋɛ hãʔi cởvề tʰàɲ bìɲan vớʔi ʔabiətʰa ʔahimát ɣiônatʰan haj kɔncaj ŋươʔi kòn dợʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ kủʔa samạk cɔdến xi kó bởʔi kák ŋươʔi dɛm báʔɔ cɔ Ấʔi vậʔi sadốk ʔabiətʰa tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lạʔi tạʔi dó Ðʔa cèʔɔ núʔi livɛ ŋườʔi vừʔa vừʔa xók dầʔu cùm lạʔi cơn xôŋ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi di tʰeo kũŋ cùm dầʔu vừʔa cèʔɔ vừʔa xók ŋườʔita dến nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ʔahitôfɛ kũŋ dảŋ fảnŋịc vớʔi Ðʔa kầʔu zằŋ Ôʔi Ðứkzê sin cɔ ɲữŋ mưʔucướk kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ za ŋuzạʔi xiÐʔa dã di dến cót núʔi tạʔi nơʔi ŋườʔita tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì husaj ŋườʔi ʔaï dến dón ŋườʔi áʔɔ sé zác dầʔu dầʔi bụʔi dất Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi xóɲọk cɔ ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi cởvề tʰàɲ nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ Ôʔi vwa tôʔi tôʔitớ vwa tʰuở cướk tôʔi dã fụk vwa ca tʰểnàʔɔ bâʔizờ tôʔi fụk vwa tʰể ấʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi bạʔi mưʔucướk kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ haj tʰầʔi sadốk ʔabiətʰa dồŋ kùŋ ŋươʔi fàm việk ci ŋươʔi hăj dượk ɲàvwa ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰuật cɔ haj tʰầʔi sadốk ʔabiətʰa haj ŋườʔi kó haj dứʔa kɔncaj tʰeo mìɲ ʔahimát kɔncaj kủʔa sadốk ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabiətʰa kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zùŋ cúŋnó dể báʔɔ cɔ mọʔi diềʔu mìɲ ŋɛ tʰấʔi vậʔi husaj bạɲữʔu kủʔa Ðʔa cởvề tʰàɲ dươŋ xi vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔa vừʔa cèʔɔ kwa xỏʔi cót núʔi tʰì sípba tôʔitớ kủʔa mêfibôsết dến dón vwa vớʔi haj kɔn lừʔa maŋbàɲ cở haj căm báɲ mộtcăm káʔi báɲ ɲỏ bằŋ cáʔi ɲɔ mộtcăm káʔi báɲ ɲỏ bằŋ cáʔi bầʔu zượʔuɲɔ vwa hỏʔi sípba zằŋ ŋươʔi kó zùŋ diềʔu dó làmci sípba tʰưʔa zằŋ haj kɔn lừʔa zùŋ kỡʔi cɔ ɲàvwa báɲ cáʔi ɲɔ zùŋ dồăn cɔ kák ŋườʔi caicẻ kòn zượʔu dể zùŋ cɔ ŋườʔi mệtɲọk cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ʔuốŋ vwa hỏʔi vậʔi kɔncaj kủʔa củ ŋươʔi dâʔu sípba tʰưʔa ŋườʔiở lạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm nóʔi zằŋ ŋàʔinăj ɲà ʔisơzaên cả nướk kủʔa ca lạʔi cɔ vwa nóʔi kùŋ sípba zằŋ tʰếtʰì mọʔi tʰuộk mêfibôsết dềʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi sípba nầʔi tôʔi fụk zướʔi cơn vwa vwa ôʔi ướk ɣì tôʔi dượk cướk vwɛcúʔa tôʔi vwa Ðʔa vừʔa dến bahuzim tʰấʔi dó di za ŋườʔi zòŋzõʔi ɲà săwlơ simê ʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ɣɛza ŋườʔi vừʔa di tớʔi vừʔa zủʔasả dá vàʔɔ Ðʔa kák tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa kả zânsự kák zõŋ dềʔu vâʔi fủ vwa hữʔu simê ʔi zủʔasả Ðʔa ɲư lờʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi hwiết ŋườʔi zantà kiə hãʔi di hãʔi di ŋườʔi dã vwa tʰăjvì săwlơ bâʔizờ Ðứkzê xiến ɲữŋ hwiết kủʔa ɲà ŋườʔi dổ lạʔi cên ŋươʔi ŋàʔi fó nướk vàʔɔ tăj kɔncaj ŋươʔi kìʔa cíɲ ŋươʔi hɔạnnạn bởʔivì ŋươʔi ŋườʔi hwiết bấʔizờ ʔabisaj kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ kớsaw kɔn cócết kiə zám mắŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi hãʔi dể tôʔi di cém dầʔu ɲưŋ vwa dáp zằŋ hỡʔi kák kɔncaj sêzuza kó kɛɲệ ɣì vớʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dể simê ʔi zủʔasả Ấʔilà Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi zủʔasả Ðʔa vậʔi ʔaj zám nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ kớsaw ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi ʔabisaj kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ kìʔa kɔnzuột zɔ lòŋ sɛɲ za kòn hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ tʰăj fươŋci ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin nầʔi hãʔi dể cɔ dể zủʔasả Ðứkzê dã fán zặn làmvậʔi kólẽ Ðứkzê dɔáʔi sɛm hɔạnnạn lấʔi fướk cả lạʔi tʰế cɔ zủʔasả ŋàʔinăj Ðʔa kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi kứ di kòn simê ʔi di tʰeo hôŋ núʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ Ðʔa ŋườʔi vừʔa di vừʔa zủʔasả Ðʔa dá ŋườʔi bụʔi ɲưvậʔi vwa kả zâncúŋ tʰeo vwa dềʔu mệtɲọk di dến nơʔi ŋỉ xỏʔɛ tạʔi dó hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dềʔu dã vàʔɔ ɣiêzusalɛm zồʔi ʔahitôfɛ tʰeo ŋườʔi xihu saj ŋườʔi ʔaï bạɲữʔu kủʔa Ðʔa dến tʰì nóʔi zằŋ vwa vwa nóʔi vớʔi husaj zằŋ Ấʔi kó fảʔi ɲơn ŋườʔi zùŋ dãʔi ŋươʔi saw ŋươʔi xôŋ di tʰeo ŋươʔi husaj dáp kùŋ zằŋ xôŋ tôʔi tʰuộk ʔaj ŋườʔi dượk Ðứkzê lựʔɛcọn dượk zânsự nầʔi kả ɲà ʔisơzaên lựʔɛcọn tôʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dó vảlạʔi ʔaj ŋườʔi tôʔi fụk há cẳŋ fảʔi kɔncaj kủʔa vwa tôʔi tôʔitớ ôŋ ɲư dã tôʔitớ kủʔa tʰânfụ ôŋ vậʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔahitôfɛ zằŋ haj ŋươʔi hãʔi mưʔu kùŋ ɲăw dặŋ dịɲ dềʔu cúŋta fảʔi ʔahitôfɛ dáp kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi di dếnkùŋ kák kuŋfi kủʔa tʰânfụ ôŋ dã dể lạʔi dặŋ ɣiữ dền xi kả ʔisơzaên hăj zằŋ ôŋ dã sỉɲụk tʰânfụ ôŋ ɲưvậʔi tʰì hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở kùŋ ôŋ lạʔi kàŋ mạɲmẽ vậʔi ŋườʔita cɛ cɔ káʔi cạʔi cên nók dền zồʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên di dếnkùŋ kák kuŋfi kủʔa ca mìɲ vả cɔŋ lúk dó ŋườʔita kɔj mưʔu kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ ɲư lờʔi fán kủʔa cíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiácị kák mưʔu kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ hɔặk dốʔi kùŋ Ðʔa hɔặk dốʔi kùŋ dềʔu ɲưvậʔi ʔahitôfɛ lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ sin cɔfép tôʔi cọn mườʔihaj ŋàn kwân tôʔi kéʔɔ za duổʔi tʰeo Ðʔa nộʔi dêm năj tôʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi mệtmỏʔi ŋãlòŋ cɔ ŋườʔi kiɲ xiếp kả zâncúŋ di tʰeo ŋườʔi cạʔi cốn tôʔi ɣiết mộtmìɲ vwa ɲưvậʔi tôʔi zẫn kả zâncúŋ cởvề kùŋ ôŋ cết kủʔa mộtmìɲ ŋườʔi ôŋ duổʔi tʰeo dó xiến cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi cởvề vậʔi kả zâncúŋ dượk bìɲiên kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên dềʔu ɲậnlờʔi ấʔilà fảʔi sɔŋÁp nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi vờʔi husaj ŋườʔi ʔaï dến dể cúŋta kũŋ ŋɛ lờʔi ŋườʔi nữʔa husaj dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền tʰì nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ʔahitôfɛ dã nóʔi lờʔi ɲưvậʔi cúŋta kó tʰeo lờʔi ŋườʔi dã hăj căŋ husaj dáp kùŋ zằŋ lần nầʔi lờʔi kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ xôŋ dượk tốtlàɲ ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa dã vwa ca kák ŋườʔi kủʔa vwa ca ɲữŋ zõŋ kó lòŋ nóŋzận xáknàʔɔ ɣấʔu káʔi cên zừŋ ŋườʔita kɔn lạʔinữʔa vwa ca ŋườʔi tʰạʔɔ việk ciếncận cắk cẳŋ dêm kùŋ dạʔɔ biɲ dâʔu kwả lúk nầʔi ŋườʔi mìɲ cɔŋ haŋ nàʔɔhăj cɔŋ cỗ nàʔɔ xák nếʔu xởʔi cúŋta tʰwa hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋɛ nóʔi zằŋ fɛ kủʔa dã tʰwa bâʔizờ mạɲbạʔɔ zầʔu kó lòŋ ɲư kũŋ fảʔi ɣan kả ʔisơzaên zằŋ vwa ca tăj ʔɛɲhùŋ ɲữŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu kandảm nên tôʔi zằŋ tʰà hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên Ðʔan cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba lạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ôŋ dôŋ ɲư kát cên tʰì Ôŋ tʰâɲàɲ za cận vôluận ŋườʔiở cỗ nàʔɔ cúŋta sôŋ dến ŋườʔi dáp cên ŋườʔi ɲư sươŋ cên dất cướk ŋườʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋtʰể tʰɔát xỏʔi dượk nếʔu ŋườʔi mìɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔɔ kả ʔisơzaên lấʔi zâʔi vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ dó zồʔi kéʔɔ tʰàɲ dó suốŋ dáʔi xɛ dến dỗʔi ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰấʔi kụk dá nàʔɔ kòn lạʔi bấʔizờ kả zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu nóʔi zằŋ mưʔu kủʔa husaj ŋườʔi ʔaï hăj mưʔu kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ vả Ðứkzê dã dịɲ bạʔi mưʔu xônŋwan kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ hầʔu ɣiáŋ tajhọʔa cên vậʔi bấʔizờ husaj nóʔi kùŋ haj tʰầʔi sadốk ʔabiətʰa zằŋ ʔahitôfɛ kó zâŋ mưʔu mưʔu kiə cɔ cɔ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ lạʔi zâŋ mưʔu xák nầʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi măw măw báʔɔ cɔ Ðʔa zằŋ cớ dêm ŋɔàʔi dồŋbằŋ kủʔa samạk hãʔi di tớʔi sa kẻʔɔ vwa kák ŋườʔi di tʰeo fảʔi tajvạ căŋ ɣiônatʰan ʔahimát dứŋ taj ʔɛânzôɣên xôŋ zám vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ʔɛ ŋườʔita tʰấʔi kɔndòʔi dến báʔɔ cɔ haj ŋườʔi fảʔi báʔɔ lạʔi cɔ vwa Ðʔa ɲưŋ kó ŋườʔi caicẻ tʰấʔi dến tʰuật cɔ hăj haj ŋườʔi dã vộʔivã kùŋ di dến ɲà kủʔa ŋườʔiở bahuzim cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó káʔi ɣiếŋ haj ŋườʔi suốŋ dó vợ kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi lấʔi káʔi cảʔi cên miệŋ ɣiếŋ cướk cên dó ŋườʔi zảʔi fơʔi lúʔamạc cɔ ŋườʔita xôŋ ŋiŋờ ci kák tôʔitớ kủʔa dến ɲà ŋườʔi nầʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ʔahimát ɣiônatʰan dâʔu ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ haj ŋườʔi dã kwa suốʔi zồʔi vậʔi di tʰeo sɔŋ xôŋ ɣặp cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm săw xi cúŋ di zồʔi ʔahimát ɣiônatʰan di xỏʔi ɣiếŋ zồʔi di báʔɔ nầʔi cɔ Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi măw kwa sôŋ ʔahitôfɛ dã dịɲ mưʔu nầʔi ŋịc kùŋ vwa Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi vớʔi kả zân tʰeo ŋườʔi zồʔi di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vừʔa zạŋdôŋ cẳŋ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cưʔa kwa sôŋ ʔahitôfɛ tʰấʔi ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰeo mưʔu kủʔa mìɲ tʰắŋ lừʔa cởvề tʰàɲ mìɲ vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi săw xi ŋườʔi dã sắpdặt việk mìɲ zồʔi tʰì tʰắtkổ cết ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ kủʔa ca ŋườʔi Ðươŋ lúk Ðʔa di dến mahanaim tʰì di ŋaŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kó kả dạʔɔkwân ʔisơzaên di tʰeo dã ʔamasa tổŋbiɲ tʰế cɔ ɣiôáp vả ʔamasa kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ɣíca sưʔa dã kùŋ ʔabiɣɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa nahác cị kủʔa sêzuza kủʔa ɣiôáp ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi vớʔi tạʔi cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát xiÐʔa dã dến mahanaim tʰì sôbi kɔncaj nahác kwê zápba tʰàɲ kủʔa zân ʔammôn vớʔi maki kɔncaj ʔamiên tʰàɲ lôdêba bátsilaj ŋườʔi ɣalaát tʰàɲ zôɣêlim dềʔu dɛm cɔ Ðʔa cɔ kả zân tʰeo ŋườʔi ɲữŋ ɣiườŋ cén cậʔu dất lúʔamì lúʔamạc zaŋ dậʔu fạn dậʔu kák tʰứ zaŋ xák mậtɔŋ sữʔa kɔnciên báɲ sữʔa dặŋ cɔ Ðʔa dạʔɔkwân ŋườʔi cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ zânsự dã dóʔixát mệtɲọk cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ Ðʔa diểm zânsự di tʰeo mìɲ zồʔi dặt cướk dầʔu cúŋ ɲữŋ cưởŋ kủʔa ŋàn ŋườʔi cưởŋ kủʔa căm ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ciə zân za tɔán xiến ɣiôáp lãɲ tɔán ʔabisaj kɔn kủʔa sêzuza ʔɛm kủʔa ɣiôáp lãɲ tɔán kòn ʔitaj ŋườʔi ɣát lãɲ tɔán Ðʔɔạn vwa nóʔi kùŋzân zằŋ hẳn kũŋ di za vớʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ zânsự tʰưʔa zằŋ vwa cớ dến nếʔu cúŋtôʔi cạʔi cốn tʰùŋịc xôŋ lấʔilàm hệcọŋ ɣì zẫʔu dến dỗʔi fânnửʔa cúŋtôʔi kó cết di tʰì cúŋnó kũŋ xôŋ cúý dến kòn vwa vwa bằŋ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi tʰà vwa cɔŋ tʰàɲ cựk tiếpkứʔu cúŋtôʔi tʰì vwa zằŋ ta diềʔu ci kák ŋươʔi lấʔilàm fảʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ cɔŋ xi zânsự kéʔɔ di từŋ tɔán căm ŋàn vwa cwiền lịɲ nầʔi cɔ ɣiôáp ʔabisaj ʔitaj zằŋ hãʔi kớ zɔŋ cɔ caicẻ kả zân dềʔu ŋɛ lờʔi vwa kănzặn cɔ kák cưởŋ zânsự kéʔɔ za dồŋ dón kwân ʔisơzaên zawciến tạʔi cɔŋ zừŋ zaim Ðạʔɔ kwân ʔisơzaên kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa dáɲbạʔi tʰật ấʔilà cận tʰwa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cết haj ŋườʔi ciếncɛɲ xắp cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cết cɔŋ zừŋ cết zướʔi luỡʔi ɣươm kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa ɣặp kỡʔi kɔn kɔn lủʔi vàʔɔ zướʔi ɲàɲ sỏ zế kủʔa kâʔi tʰôŋ dầʔu fảʔi vướŋ cɔŋ ɲàɲ ŋườʔi ceo ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ cờʔidất kòn kɔn cở ŋườʔi tʰì tʰɔát di xỏʔi kó ŋườʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó dến nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ tôʔi dã tʰấʔi ceo cên kâʔi tʰôŋ ɣiôáp dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ci ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔi vậʔisaw cẳŋ ɣiết tạʔicỗ di ɲượkbằŋ kó ɣiết sẵnlòŋ tʰưởŋ ŋươʔi mườʔi miếŋ bạk káʔi daj lưŋ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ zẫʔu tôʔi cɔŋ tăj mộtŋàn miếŋ bạk kũŋ cẳŋ zám ca tăj vàʔɔ vươŋtử cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛ vwa biểʔu zặn ôŋ ʔabisaj ʔitaj zằŋ xá ɣiữ lấʔi cớ dụŋ dến càŋ caicẻ vảlạʔi nếʔu tôʔi lấʔilòŋ bấtcuŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi tʰì cẳŋ kó tʰểnàʔɔ ɣiấʔu dượk vwa cắk cíɲ ôŋ ŋườʔi káʔɔ tôʔi ɣiôáp dáp ta cẳŋ tʰèm dâʔi ŋɛ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ dâm vàʔɔ cáʔitim kủʔa dươŋ kòn sốŋ ɣiữʔa kâʔi tʰôŋ Ðʔɔạn mườʔi caicẻ vák biɲxí kủʔa ɣiôáp vâʔi kwɛɲ dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi di kế dó ɣiôáp tʰổʔi zânsự tʰôʔi duổʔi tʰeo kwân ʔisơzaên bởʔivì ɣiôáp kản cúŋ ŋườʔita lấʔi tʰâʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ káʔi ɣiữʔa zừŋ zồʔi cất dá cwiền ŋườʔi tʰàɲ dốŋ hếttʰảʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dềʔu cạʔi cốn cạʔi mìɲ lúk kòn sốŋ kó saj zựŋ káʔi biə cɔŋ cũŋ vwa ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ ta xôŋ kó kɔncaj dặŋ lưʔuzɛɲ zồʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi zɛɲ mìɲ dặt cɔ káʔi biə dó dến ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔita hãʔi kòn ɣọʔilà biə ʔahimát kɔncaj kủʔa sadốk nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ sin cɔfép tôʔi cạʔi dɛm cɔ vwa tinlàɲ nầʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã sử kôŋbìɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc mìɲ ɣiôáp dáp ŋàʔinăj ŋươʔi cẳŋ dɛm tinlàɲ ŋàʔi xák ŋươʔi ŋàʔinăj káʔi cẳŋ dượk làɲ vươŋtử dã cết ɣiôáp nóʔi kùŋ kusi zằŋ hãʔi di tʰuật cɔ vwa diềʔu ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi kusi lạʔi ɣiôáp zồʔi cạʔi di ʔahimát kɔncaj kủʔa sadốk lạʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ mặkzầʔu sảʔi dếndiềʔu ci hãʔi dể cɔ tôʔi cạʔi tʰeo săw kusi ɣiôáp hỡʔi kɔn kớsaw kɔn cạʔi di việk báʔɔ nầʔi cẳŋ tʰưởŋ ɣì cɔ kɔn ŋườʔi tʰưʔa mặkzầʔu tôʔi cạʔi di ɣiôáp nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi cạʔi di vậʔi ʔahimát cạʔi kwa dồŋbằŋ tớʔi cướk kusi Ðʔa ŋồʔi ɣiữʔa haj káʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kòn kwân kɛɲ cèʔɔ dỉɲ lầʔu kửʔa tʰàɲ cên vác tườŋ ŋướk ɲìn tʰấʔi kó ŋườʔi cạʔi kwân kɛɲ tâʔu cɔ vwa vwa nóʔi nếʔu mộtmìɲ cắk dɛm tinlàɲ ŋườʔi cạʔi mãʔi di dến ɣần Ðʔɔạn kwân kɛɲ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi xák kũŋ cạʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa zằŋ kìʔa lạʔi kó ŋườʔi cạʔi vwa nóʔi hắn kũŋ dɛm tinlàɲ kwân kɛɲ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi cạʔi dầʔu ɣiốŋ zạŋ ʔahimát kɔncaj kủʔa sadốk vwa nóʔi Ấʔilà ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cắk dɛm tinlàɲ ʔahimát kêʔu tâʔu kùŋ vwa zằŋ mọʔi măimắn zồʔi ŋườʔi mìɲ suốŋ cướk vwa tâʔu zằŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa ŋàʔi dã ɣiảʔicứʔu vwa xỏʔi ɲữŋ dã fảnŋịc kùŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ɲưŋ vwa hỏʔi zằŋ càŋÁp caicẻ dượk bìɲan vôhạʔi căŋ ʔahimát tʰưʔa zằŋ xizô saj tôʔitớ vwa cíɲ tôʔi di tʰì tôʔi tʰấʔi kó ồnàʔɔ zữzộʔi zấʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cẳŋ ci vwa fán kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi luj za dứŋ tạʔi dó ŋườʔi luj za cờ kusi dến tâʔu zằŋ nầʔi tinlàɲ cɔ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê dã sử kôŋbìɲ cɔ vwa ɣiảʔicứʔu vwa xỏʔi kák zấʔi fảnŋịc kùŋ vwa vwa nóʔi kùŋ kusi zằŋ càŋÁp caicẻ dượk bìɲan vôhạʔi căŋ kusi dáp ŋwiện hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fảnŋịc dặŋ hạʔi vwa dồŋ sốfận vớʔi ŋườʔi caicẻ ấʔi vwa zất kảmtʰươŋ lầʔu kửʔa tʰàɲ xók ŋườʔi vừʔa di vừʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ôʔi kɔncaj kɔncaj kɔncaj Ướk ci cíɲ cết tʰế cɔ kɔn Ôʔi kɔncaj kɔncaj ŋườʔita dến nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ kìʔa vwa xók tʰan tiếk Ấʔi vậʔi cíɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tʰắŋ cận dổʔi za tʰảmsầʔu cɔ kả zânsự zânsự dã ŋɛnóʔi zằŋ vwa zất buồnbựk cết kủʔa kɔn vwa nên nỗʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zânsự cở vàʔɔ tʰàɲ zườŋɲư dạʔɔ biɲ mắkkỡ dã cốn xỏʔi ciếncận vwa cùm lớntiếŋ zằŋ Ôʔi kɔncaj Ôʔi kɔncaj kɔncaj ɣiôáp vàʔɔ ɲàvwa nóʔi zằŋ ŋàʔinăj vwa kák tôʔitớ vwa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cíɲ ŋàʔinăj dã kứʔumạŋ sốŋ kủʔa vwa kủʔa kák kɔncaj kák kɔŋáʔi vwa dến kứʔumạŋ sốŋ kủʔa kák hầʔu vwa nữʔa vậʔi vwa tʰươŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣét vwa ɣét ɲữŋ ŋườʔitʰươŋ vwa vwa mớʔi za zằŋ ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa cẳŋ za ci vớʔi vwa zầʔi tôʔi zõzàŋ nếʔu kòn sốŋ cúŋtôʔi cết hếttʰảʔi tʰì vừʔaý vwa tʰà vwa cổʔi zậʔi di za nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi ɣiụk lòŋ kák tôʔitớ vwa tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề zằŋ nếʔu vwa xôŋ cườŋ za tʰì dêm năj xôŋ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vwa tainạn ấʔi kòn cọŋ kák tainạn xák dã sảʔi dến cɔ vwa xi tʰơấʔu tớʔi ŋàʔinăj bấʔizờ vwa cổʔi zậʔi ŋồʔi tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋườʔita cɔ kả zânsự zằŋ vwa dã ŋồʔi tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kả zânsự kéʔɔ dến cướk vwa vả ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi dềʔu dã cạʔi cốn nơʔi cạʔi mìɲ cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita các ɲăw zằŋ vwa dã ɣiảʔi cúŋta xỏʔi tăj tʰùŋịc cúŋta ŋườʔi dã kứʔu cúŋta xỏʔi tăj zân filitin sɔŋ bâʔizờ ŋườʔi fảʔi cốn xỏʔi sứ kớ vả cúŋta dã sứk zầʔu cɔ vwa cúŋta dã cết cɔŋ ciếncận vậʔi bâʔizờ ɲân saw kák ŋươʔi xôŋ nóʔi dɛm vwa cởvề vwa Ðʔa saj nóʔi kùŋ haj tʰầʔi sadốk ʔabiətʰa zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zuda zằŋ lờʔi kả ʔisơzaên nóʔi việk zướk vwa dã tʰấʔu dếnnơʔi vwa zồʔi vậʔi kớsaw kák ŋươʔi săw cót dɛm vwa kuŋ ŋườʔi kák ŋươʔi ʔɛɲɛm kốtɲụk ɲân saw kák ŋươʔi săw cót dɛm vwa kũŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔamasa zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kốtɲụk saw nếʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ tổŋbiɲ tʰế cɔ ɣiôáp hằŋ cướk tʰì ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fạt kác nặŋnề ɲưvậʔi Ðʔa dượklòŋ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda zườŋɲư cỉ ŋườʔi tʰôʔi saj nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ sin vwa hãʔi cởvề vớʔi hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ vwa vậʔi vwa cởvề dến tạʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kák ŋườʔi zuda di dến dón vwa tạʔi ɣiɲɣɛɲ dặŋ dưʔa vwa kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ simê ʔi kɔncaj ɣêza ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin bahuzim lậtdật di suốŋ vớʔi kák ŋườʔi zuda dón vwa Ðʔa mộtŋàn ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin dềʔu tʰeo ŋườʔi vớʔi sípba tôʔitớ kủʔa ɲà săwlơ kùŋ mườʔilăm kɔncaj ŋườʔi haimươʔi dầʔitớ cúŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tạʔi cướk vwa ciếk dò dể cɔ zakwiến vwa kũŋ kwa simê ʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ɣêza fụk zướʔi cơn vwa Ðʔa cɔŋ xi vwa hầʔu kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ vwa zằŋ kầʔusin cúʔa tôʔi cớ tộʔiák cɔ tôʔi dừŋ ɲớ dến zantà tôʔitớ vwa dã fạm cɔŋ ŋàʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi di za xỏʔi ɣiêzusalɛm sin vwa cớ dể diềʔu dó vàʔɔ lòŋ kẻ tôʔitớ vwa ɲìn mìɲ dã fạmtộʔi vìvậʔi ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ kả ɲà ɣiôsép tôʔi dã dến cướcết dặŋ suốŋ dón vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ɲưŋ ʔabisaj kɔncaj sêzuza dáp zằŋ vậʔi ŋườʔita xôŋ sửtử simê ʔi kớ dó saw dã zủʔasả dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưŋÐʔa dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi kák kɔncaj sêzuza kó kɛɲệ ci vớʔi kák ŋươʔi căŋ ŋàʔinăj kák ŋươʔi vớʔi xáknàʔɔ kừʔudịc cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔita kótʰể saj ɣiết ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔinăj kólẽnàʔɔ xôŋ hiểʔu zằŋ vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên saw Ðʔɔạn vwa nóʔi kùŋ simê ʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ cết dâʔu zồʔi vwa lờʔi tʰề vớʔi ŋườʔi mêfibôsết kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ kũŋ di suốŋ dón vwa ŋườʔi xôŋ kó zửʔa cơn cảʔi zâʔu hăjlà ɣiặt áʔɔ mìɲ lúk vwa zadi cɔdến ŋàʔi vwa cởvề bìɲanvôsự xi ŋườʔiở ɣiêzusalɛm dến dón vwa tʰì Ðʔa hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔimê fibôsết saw ŋươʔi xôŋ dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi tʰằŋ tôʔitớ tôʔi kó dáɲlừʔa tôʔi tʰật tôʔi ŋĩ zằŋ tôʔi tʰắŋ lừʔa zờʔi kỡʔi dặŋ di tʰeo vwa tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa kwè ŋườʔita kó káʔɔ zan tôʔi nơʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ɲưŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi xáknàʔɔ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin hãʔi dãʔi tôʔi tʰeo vwa lấʔilàm vì kák ŋườʔi kủʔa ɲà ca tôʔi cướk vwɛcúʔa tôʔi cỉ dáŋ cết tʰôʔi zầʔu vậʔi vwa dã dể tôʔi vàʔɔ ŋườʔi nơʔi vwa tʰếtʰì tôʔi nàʔɔ kòn kólẽ ɣì fànnàn kùŋ vwa vwa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ saw kòn nóʔi việk mìɲ làmci ta dã nóʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi sípba hãʔi ciə lấʔi dất mêfibôsết tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ sípba lấʔi kũŋ dượk bởʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi dã cởvề ɲà mìɲ bìɲanvôsự bátsilaj ɣalaát kũŋ zôɣêlim suốŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vớʔi vwa dặŋ dưʔa vwa dến kiə sôŋ ŋườʔi dã ɣià kwá dượk mươʔi tuổʔi kó kuŋkấp lươŋtʰựk cɔ vwa cọn lúk vwa tạʔi mahanaim ŋườʔi kó ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi vwa nóʔi vớʔi bátsitaj zằŋ hãʔi kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vớʔi bawbọk cɔ ŋươʔi ɲà tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲưŋbát silaj tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ bâʔizờ tôʔi kòn bawlâʔu ŋàʔi nữʔa màlạʔi kùŋ vwa di ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔinăj tôʔi dượk mươʔi tuổʔi kòn kó tʰế fânbiệt diềʔu diềʔu sấʔu kẻ tôʔitớ vwa kũŋ cẳŋ dượk mùʔi kủʔa mìɲ ʔuốŋ há lạʔi kótʰể vuj ŋɛ ŋườʔi kasướŋ saw kẻ tôʔitớ vwa vwɛcúʔa tôʔi làmci kẻ tôʔitớ vwa kùŋ vwa di tớʔi mộtcút kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kớ săw vwa tʰưởŋ cɔ tôʔi kác zườŋ ấʔi sin cɔfép tôʔi cởvề hầʔu cɔ tôʔi cết cɔŋ tʰàɲ tôʔi ɣần kủʔa camẹ tôʔi ɲưŋ nầʔi kimham tôʔitớ vwa di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vớʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi zồʔi vwa fảʔi dãʔi tùʔiý vwa lấʔilàm vwa zằŋ kimham tʰeo cɔ mọʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi ŋươʔi sin diềʔu ɣì tʰì ɲậm cɔ vậʔi kả zânsự dềʔu kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cíɲ mìɲ vwa kũŋ dinữʔa Ðʔɔạn vwa cúk fướk cɔ bátsilaj zồʔi bátsilaj cởvề sứsở mìɲ từ dó vwa di kwa ɣiɲɣɛɲ kó kimham kả zân zuda fânnửʔa zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu tʰeo bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ vwa hỏʔi zằŋ kớsaw ʔɛɲɛm cúŋtôʔi ŋườʔi zuda kó dɛm vwa di dưʔa saŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ vớʔi ŋườʔiɲà hếttʰảʔi tʰeo vwa ŋườʔizu da dáp lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên zằŋ Ấʔi vwa dồŋtộk kùŋ cúŋta vảlạʔi kớsaw ʔɛɲɛm ɣiận cúŋta kóăn ɲờ ɣì kủʔa vwa căŋ cúŋta kó lãɲ kủʔa ɣì nơʔi vwa saw ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zuda zằŋ cúŋta kó mườʔi fần nơʔi vwa lạʔi Ðʔa tʰuộk cúŋta kák ŋươʔi vậʔi kớsaw kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dếmsỉʔa dến cúŋta há cẳŋ fảʔi cúŋta nóʔi cướk dɛm vwa saw ɲữŋ lờʔinóʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda lạʔi kòn nặŋ lờʔinóʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên tạʔi dó kó ŋườʔi zantà sêba kɔncaj kủʔa biếkzi ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ŋườʔi tʰổʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta cẳŋ kó fầnnàʔɔ kùŋ Ðʔa kũŋ cẳŋ kantʰiệp ɣì nơʔi kɔncaj ʔisaj hỡʔi ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi cởvề cạʔi mìɲ hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên fânzẽ Ðʔa tʰeo sêba kɔncaj biếkzi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi zuda cuŋtín kùŋ vwa mìɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi ɣiôdɛɲ cɔdến ɣiêzusalɛm xiÐʔa cởvề kuŋ mìɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zồʔi tʰì mườʔi ŋườʔi kuŋfi vwa dã dể cɔ kɔj ɣiữ dền kầm cɔŋ ɲàziêŋ kấp lươŋtʰựk cɔ cúŋnó zùŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ di dếnkùŋ cúŋnó cúŋnó zamkầm ởɣóʔa cɔdến ŋàʔi cết kế dó vwa nóʔi kùŋ ʔamasa zằŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dâʔi hãʔi ɲóm cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda cíɲ ŋươʔi kũŋ fảʔi kómặt dâʔi vậʔi ʔamasa di dặŋ ɲóm ŋườʔi zuda ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cậmcễ dã kwá dã dịɲ Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi ʔabisaj zằŋ bâʔizờ sêba kɔncaj biếkzi hạʔi cúŋta vậʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi dɛm kák ciếnsĩ kủʔa cúʔa ŋươʔi duổʔi tʰeo sêla kẻʔɔ cɔán lấʔi tʰàɲ nàʔɔ kiênkố tʰɔát xỏʔi cúŋta căŋ bấʔizờ dạʔɔ biɲ ɣiôáp ŋườʔi kêzêtʰít ŋườʔi fêzêtʰít vớʔi kák zõŋ dềʔu di tʰeo ʔabisaj họ di za xỏʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm duổʔi tʰeo sêba kɔncaj biếkzi xi cúŋ dến ɣần báʔɔơn dá kủʔa ɣabaôn tʰì tʰấʔi ʔamasa di dến ɣiôáp mặk áʔɔ líɲ ŋɔàʔi kó zâʔi deo ɣươm mìɲ tʰòŋ nơʔi hôŋ dút cɔŋ xi ŋườʔi sơm tớʔi ɣươm za ɣiôáp nóʔi vớʔi ʔamasa zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛɲ ʔɛɲ mạɲ căŋ zồʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi bàntăj hữʔu zâʔu ʔamasa dặŋ ŋườʔi ʔamasa xôŋ kɔicừŋ kâʔi ɣươm nơʔi tăj kiə kủʔa ɣiôáp ɣiôáp dâm mũʔi cɔŋ bụŋ zuột ʔamasa dổ za suốŋ dất ŋườʔi cết xôŋ fảʔi dâm lạʔi tʰứ ɲì Ðʔɔạn ɣiôáp ʔabisaj ʔɛm ŋườʔi lạʔi duổʔi tʰeo sɛba kɔncaj biếkzi một dứʔa cẻ cɔŋ dầʔitớ kủʔa ɣiôáp dứŋ ɣần ʔamasa nóʔi zằŋ ʔaj tʰươŋ ɣiôáp tʰuộk Ðʔa hãʔi tʰeo ɣiôáp sɔŋ ʔamasa dẵm cɔŋ máʔu ɣiữʔa dườŋ xi dứʔa cẻ tʰấʔi hếttʰảʔi zâncúŋ dềʔu zừŋ lạʔi ɣần tʰâʔi ʔamasa tʰì sít tʰâʔi ŋườʔi xỏʔi dườŋ dɛm di cɔŋ káɲ dồŋ dắp káʔi áʔɔcɔàŋ cên xi tʰâʔi dã kất xỏʔi dườŋkáʔi zồʔi tʰì hếttʰảʔi zâncúŋ dềʔu di kwa tʰeo ɣiôáp dặŋ duổʔi tʰeo sêba kɔncaj biếkzi ɣiôáp di xắp kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên cɔdến ʔabênbếtmaka hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ zõŋ dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi di tʰeo dạʔɔkwân ŋườʔi vậʔi dến vâʔi fủ sêba cɔŋ ʔabênbếtmaka dắp káʔi lũʔi kaw dồn tʰàɲ kả dạʔɔkwân ɣiôáp dàʔɔ tườŋ tʰàɲ dặŋ cɔ ŋã suốŋ bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi xônŋwan cên dầʔu dồn tʰàɲ kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ŋɛ hãʔi ŋɛ sin hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp lạʔi ɣần dâʔi tôʔi nóʔicwiện kùŋ ŋườʔi xizô dã lạʔi ɣần ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ Ôŋ kó fảʔi ɣiôáp căŋ ŋườʔi dáp fảʔi nàŋ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kɔndòʔi ôŋ ŋườʔi dáp ta ŋɛ nàŋ nóʔi ɲư lờʔi nầʔi tʰuở sưʔa ŋườʔita kó tʰóʔicwɛn nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi di hỏʔi zân ʔabên zồʔi mớʔi việk ɲưtʰế cɔŋ ʔisơzaên tʰàɲ cúŋtôʔi tʰàɲ hòʔabìɲ cuŋậʔu ôŋ lạʔi ziệt tʰàɲ cáɲ dô kủʔa ʔisơzaên saw ɲân saw ôŋ fáhủʔi kơŋiệp kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiôáp dáp zằŋ xôŋ xôŋ fảʔi vậʔi dâʔu ta kwiết xôŋ ziệt xôŋ fáhủʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ɲưŋ kó ŋườʔiở núʔi zaim sêla kɔncaj kủʔa biếkzi dã fảnŋịc kùŋ vwa tứklà Ðʔa hãʔi mộtmìɲ tʰôʔi tʰì zan za xỏʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ ŋườʔita dầʔu kwa tườŋ cɔ ôŋ vậʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi dến cướk kả zâncúŋ nóʔi cɔ ŋɛ lờʔi xônŋwan kủʔa nàŋ cúŋ cém dầʔu sêba kɔncaj biếkzi zồʔi cɔ ɣiôáp ɣiôáp tʰổʔi dạʔɔkwân zan za xỏʔi tʰàɲ di ʔainấʔi dềʔu cởvề ɲà mìɲ kòn ɣiôáp cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm ɣần vwa ɣiôáp tổŋ lãɲ kả dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada làmdầʔu cưởŋ kák ŋườʔi kêzêtʰít fêzêtʰít ʔadôzam dượk bầʔukử kɔj tʰuếxóʔa ɣiôsafát kɔncaj ʔahilút tʰủ sêza tʰơ sadốk ʔabiətʰa tʰầʔi kòn ʔiza ŋườʔi zajzơ tểtướŋ tʰânmật kủʔa Ðʔa về dờʔi Ðʔa kó ác kơ kẩn cɔŋ Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ sự nầʔi sảʔi dến kớ săwlơ ɲà dổ hwiết kủʔa ŋườʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó ɣiết zân ɣabaôn vwa cwiền ɣọʔi zân ɣabaôn nóʔicwiện vớʔi ŋườʔiɣa cẳŋ tʰuộk zânsự ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ sốŋsót kủʔa zân ʔamôzít zân ʔisơzaên kó tʰề hứʔa tʰatʰứ zầʔu vậʔi săwlơ lòŋ sốtsắŋ zân ʔisơzaên zuda dã kác cừziệt Ấʔi vậʔi Ðʔa hỏʔi zân ɣabaôn zằŋ ta fảʔi làmsaw cɔ kák ŋươʔi lấʔi ɣì cuộk tộʔi hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi cúk fướk cɔ kơŋiệp kủʔa Ðứkzê zâŋa tâʔu kùŋ vwa zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dốʔi kùŋ săwlơ ɲà ŋườʔi cẳŋ dòʔi bạk hăj vàŋ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó fép ɣiết ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên Ðʔa vậʔi kák ŋươʔi làmɣì cɔ kák ŋươʔi họ dáp kùŋ vwa zằŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi kó ziệtcừ cúŋtôʔi ŋườʔi kó twan mưʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi kả dịʔafận ʔisơzaên tʰếtʰì hãʔi fó cɔ cúŋtôʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ kɔncaj ŋườʔi cúŋtôʔi ceo cúŋnó cướk Ðứkzê ɣibê ʔa tʰàɲ kủʔa săwlơ ŋườʔi dượk Ðứkzê cọn vwa dáp ta fó cúŋnó cɔ Ðʔa zɔŋ tʰứ mêfibôsết kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiônatʰan cáʔu kủʔa săwlơ kớ lờʔi tʰề Ðʔa ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ dã vớʔi ɲăw cướk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ vwa mêfibôsết haj kɔncaj kủʔa zítba kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔajza dã sɛɲ cɔ săwlơ kɔncaj kủʔa micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi săwlơ dã sɛɲ cɔ ziên kɔncaj kủʔa bátsilaj mêhôla zaw cɔ zân ɣabaôn cúŋ ceo cên núʔi tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê bảʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu cết cuŋ vớʔi ɲăw ŋườʔita ɣiết ɲằm mấʔi ŋàʔi dầʔu mùʔa ɣặt lúʔamạc zítba kɔŋáʔi ʔajza lấʔi káʔi baw cảʔi cên dá zùŋ ɣiườŋ mìɲ zồʔi dầʔu mùʔa ɣặt cɔdến xi kó mưʔa cên cờʔi suốŋ cên tʰâʔi cúŋnó banŋàʔi nàŋ kản xôŋ cɔ cim cờʔi dậʔu cên tʰâʔi bandêm kản xôŋ cɔ tʰú dồŋ dến ɣần kó ŋườʔi họk lạʔi cɔ Ðʔa zítba kɔŋáʔi ʔajza hầʔu kủʔa săwlơ dã vwa di dến zânsự zabɛ cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát lấʔi hàʔicốt kủʔa săwlơ kủʔa ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj săwlơ zân ấʔi lấʔi cộm xỏʔi bếtsan nơʔi zân filitin ceo cɔŋ ŋàʔi cúŋnó dáɲbạʔi săwlơ tạʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa vậʔi zabɛ vwa dɛm lạʔi hàʔicốt kủʔa săwlơ kủʔa ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔita kũŋ lấʔi hàʔicốt kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã ceo côn vớʔi hàʔicốt kủʔa săwlơ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ŋườʔi cɔŋ kủʔa kíc ca kủʔa săwlơ sêla tạʔi dịʔafận bêŋiəmin ŋườʔita mọʔi diềʔu ʔiɲư vwa dã zặn biểʔu về săw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mớʔi dɔáʔi tʰươŋ dến sứ zân ʔisơzaên lạʔi kòn cɛɲ ciến xák vớʔi zân filitin Ðʔa kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi kéʔɔ suốŋ ɣiápciến vớʔi zân filitin Ðʔa cɔŋ ŋườʔi mìɲ mỏʔimệt bấʔizờ bibênốp kɔncáʔu kủʔa zafa kó kâʔi law nặŋ bɛcăm siếk dồŋ deo ɣươm mớʔi twan dáɲ ɣiết Ðʔa ɲưŋ ʔabisaj kɔncaj sêzuza dến tiếpkứʔu vwa dáɲ ŋườʔi filitin ấʔi ɣiết di từ dó kák tʰủhạ kủʔa Ðʔa nàʔisin ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa cớ za cận kùŋ cúŋtôʔi nữʔa ʔɛ ŋọn duốk ʔisơzaên fảʔi căŋ săw dó lạʔi kó cận xák kùŋzân filitin tạʔi ɣóp dó sibêkaj ŋườʔi husa ɣiết sáp kɔncáʔu kủʔa zafa tạʔiɣóp lạʔi kòn kó cận vớʔi zân filitin nữʔa ʔɛâncanan kɔncaj zaazê zêɣim bếtlêhɛm dáɲ ɣiết ɣôliát ɣát ŋườʔi kó kâʔi law kán ɲư ốŋ cụk kủʔa tʰợ zệt kũŋ sảʔiza cận tạʔi ɣát nơʔi kó ŋườʔi kawlớn tʰuộk zòŋ zafa ŋườʔi kó sáʔu ŋọn nơʔi haj bàntăj sáʔu ŋọn nơʔi haj cơn kộŋ haimươʔi ŋón ŋườʔi nầʔi sỉɲụk ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj simê ʔa cáʔu Ðʔa ɣiết di bốn ŋườʔi filitin nầʔi dã sɛɲ tạʔi ɣát zòŋzõʔi zafa dềʔu ɣiết bởʔi tăj Ðʔa bởʔi tăj kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi xiÐứkzê dã ɣiảʔicứʔu Ðʔa xỏʔi tăj kák tʰùŋịc xỏʔi tăj săwlơ tʰì ŋườʔi kák lờʔi nầʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê zằŋ Ðứkzê dá dồnlũʔi tôʔi Ðấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dá tôʔi nơʔi tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ là tʰuẫn dỡ tôʔi sừŋ cửŋ kứʔu tôʔi ŋọn tʰáp kaw nơʔi nươŋ zựʔa kủʔa tôʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ cɛcở tôʔi ấʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi huŋbạʔɔ tôʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dáŋ xɛnŋợʔi tʰì tôʔi dượk ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi kák tʰùŋịc tôʔi kák lượŋ sóŋ kủʔa tửvɔŋ dã fủ baw tôʔi lụt zanák cảʔi kuộn cɔ tôʔi sợhãʔi ɲữŋ zâʔi kủʔa dịʔaŋụk dã tôʔi lướʔi cết kó tôʔi cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn tôʔi kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê tôʔi kêʔula kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi nơʔi dền ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa tôʔi tʰấʔu dến taj ŋàʔi bấʔizờ dất dộŋ zuŋ nền kák từŋ cờʔi kũŋ lăicwiển nó zúŋdộŋ ŋàʔi nổʔizận xóʔi băj za mũʔi ŋàʔi và miệŋ ŋàʔi fát za ŋọn lửʔa hựk ŋàʔi xiến tʰan hừŋ dỏ fun za làm ŋiêŋ lệc kák từŋ cờʔi ŋự suốŋ zướʔi cơn ŋàʔi kó vùŋ dɛnkịt ŋàʔi kỡʔi cê zubin băj ŋàʔi za cên káɲ kủʔa ɣió ŋàʔi bủʔa za tốʔităm ɲữŋ vùŋ nướk ɲữŋ mâʔi dɛn cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ ɲư káʔi cạʔi từ zựkzỡ cướk ŋàʔi ɲữŋ tʰan hựk ciếʔu sáŋ za Ðứkzê cên kák từŋ cờʔi Ðấŋcí kaw cɔ tiếŋ ŋàʔi vaŋ zân ŋàʔi cɔ kwântʰù tôʔi lạk fát cớpɲɔáŋ xiến cúŋnó lạk dườŋ bởʔi lờʔi hămhɛ kủʔa Ðứkzê bởʔi ɣió sịt za xỏʔi mũʔi ŋàʔi Ðáʔi za nền tʰếzan bàʔitỏ từ cên kaw ŋàʔi ɣiơ tăj tôʔi zút tôʔi za xỏʔi nướk sâʔu ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc kườŋbạʔɔ xỏʔi ɣét tôʔi cúŋnó mạɲ tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn cúŋnó dến sôŋ vàʔɔ tôʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê nâŋdỡ tôʔi ŋàʔi dɛm tôʔi za nơʔi zộŋzãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi ŋàʔi ưʔatʰíc tôʔi Ðứkzê dã tʰưởŋ tôʔi tùʔi kôŋbìɲ tôʔi báʔɔ tôʔi tʰeo tʰɛɲsạc kủʔa tăj tôʔi vì tôʔi kó ɣiữ tʰeo kák dườŋlốʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê xôŋ ák sâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi vì kák mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi dềʔu cướk tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ lìʔa sa kák ŋàʔi tôʔi kũŋ cọnvẹn vớʔi ŋàʔi và ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ xỏʔi zanák vìvậʔi Ðứkzê dã báʔɔ tôʔi tùʔi kôŋbìɲ tôʔi tʰưởŋ tôʔi tʰeo tiɲ sạc tôʔi cướk ŋàʔi kẻ hăj tʰươŋsót cúʔa tʰươŋsót lạʔi Ðốʔi kùŋ cọnvẹn cúʔa mìɲ cọnvẹn lạʔi Ðốʔi kùŋ tiɲ sạc cúʔa mìɲ tiɲ sạc lạʔi kòn dốʔi kùŋ cáʔi ŋịc cúʔa mìɲ ɲặt ɲiệm lạʔi vìcúʔa kứʔu zân xốnxổ ɲưŋ cúʔa kɔicừŋ kiêʔukăŋ dặŋ cúŋnó suốŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi tʰật ŋàʔi ŋọn dèn tôʔi vàÐứkzê ciếʔu sáŋ tốʔităm tôʔi ɲờŋàʔi tôʔi sôŋ ŋaŋ kwa dạʔɔ biɲ kậʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi xỏʔi tườŋ tʰàɲ kònÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák dườŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi cọnvẹn lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê tiɲtườŋ ŋàʔi káʔi tʰuẫn cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi vậʔi cừ za Ðứkzê ʔaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔaj dá nếʔuxôŋ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dồnlũʔi vữŋcắk kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi zắt ŋườʔi cọnvẹn vàʔɔ dườŋ cáɲ dáŋ ŋàʔi cɔ cơn tôʔi ɲư cơn naj káʔi và dể tôʔi dứŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi tăj tôʔi ciếncận dỗʔi káɲtăj tôʔi ɣươŋ nổʔi kuŋ dồŋ cúʔa dã cửŋ kứʔu cɔ tôʔi káʔi xiên và cúʔa dã cɔ tôʔi saŋcọŋ cúʔa mởzộŋ dườŋ zướʔi bướk tôʔi và cơn tôʔi xôŋ siêʔu tôʔi duổʔi tʰeo tʰùŋịc tôʔi hủʔiziệt cỉ cởvề săw xi dã tậnziệt cúŋnó tôʔi cừ dâm lủŋ cúŋnó xôŋtʰể zậʔi lạʔi dượk cúŋnó saŋã zướʔi cơn tôʔi vìcúʔa dã tʰắtlưŋ tôʔi bằŋ sứkmạɲ dể ciếncận và xiến zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi sếp zệp zướʔi tôʔi cúʔa kũŋ xiến tʰùŋịc sâʔi lưŋ kùŋ tôʔi hầʔu cɔ tôʔi ziệt ɲữŋ ɣét tôʔi cúŋnó côŋŋóŋ ɲưŋ cẳŋ ʔaj kứʔu cɔ cúŋnó kêʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê sɔŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ dáp lạʔi bấʔizờ tôʔi dập ɣiập cúŋnó xáknàʔɔ bụʔi zướʔi dất cà ɣiàʔidạp cúŋnó ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋɔàʔi dườŋ cúʔa dã ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi cɛɲzàɲ kủʔa zânsự tôʔi ɣìŋiữ tôʔi dể làmdầʔu kák nướk một zântộk tôʔi xôŋ kwɛnbiết fụk tôʔi kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔicwốk fụk zướʔi tôʔi vừʔa ŋɛnóʔi tôʔi cúŋnó dềʔu vâŋ tʰeo tôʔi kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔicwốk Ðʔi za xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ kác zunsợ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ dáŋ ŋợʔixɛn dá tôʔi ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dá kủʔa cửŋ kứʔu tôʔi dượk kaw từ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi báʔɔtʰù cɔ tôʔi xiến kák zântộk kwifụk tôʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc tʰậtcúʔa nâŋ tôʔi kaw zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi và kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi huŋbạʔɔ vìvậʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi tôʔi xɛnŋợʔi ŋàʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa kák zân và katụŋ zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cɔ vwa kủʔa ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu lớnlaw và cɔ dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi tứklà cɔ Ðʔa cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi dến dờʔidờʔi nầʔi lờʔi săw kủʔa Ðʔa nầʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa kɔncaj ʔisaj tứk lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dã dượk nâŋ kaw tʰăj Ðấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔiza kốp và êmzịʔu kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ fán và lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi nơʔi lưỡʔi miệŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fán hònÐá kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fán kùŋ zằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kaicị lɔàʔiŋườʔi kác kôŋbìɲ kác kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì ɣiốŋ ɲư cóʔilòʔa buổʔisáŋ xi mặtcờʔi mọk xáknàʔɔ buổʔi sớmmaj cẳŋ kó mâʔi kák áɲsáŋ cɔ kâʔicỏ bởʔi dất nảʔi za săw xi mưʔa ɲà zầʔu cẳŋ fảʔi ɲưvậʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sɔŋŋàʔi dã vớʔi zawướk dờʔidờʔi vữŋbền cɔŋ mọʔi cắkcắn vì dó kả kứʔuzỗʔi kả ướkaw zẫʔuŋàʔi xôŋ cɔ diềʔu dó nẩʔinở za cáʔilạʔi hếttʰảʔi huŋák dềʔu ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣaj côŋ ŋườʔita liệŋ za sa xôŋtʰể lấʔi bằŋ tăj dượk ŋườʔita fảʔi zùŋ dồ bằŋ hăjlà kán kâʔi law dặŋ zồʔi cíɲ tạʔicỗ tʰiêʔu cɔŋ lửʔa nầʔi kák ŋườʔi mạɲbạʔɔ dã ɣiúpviệk cɔ Ðʔa ɣiôsépbasêbết ŋườʔi táckêmôn làmdầʔu líɲ tʰịvệ kủʔa vwa Ấʔilà ŋườʔi kwơ ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ kự lạʔi támcăm ŋườʔi ɣiết di cɔŋ lúk ɣặp săw ŋườʔi ấʔi kó lêʔasa kɔncaj dô cáʔu kủʔa ʔakôhi cɔŋ ŋườʔi mạɲbạʔɔ dã kùŋ Ðʔa tʰác zân filitin lạʔi dặŋ ciếncận xi zân ʔisơzaên zút di tʰì lêʔasa cổʔi zậʔi dáɲ zân filitin cɔdến xi tăj ŋườʔi kứŋ lạʔi nơʔi ɣươm ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê xiến cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dượk tʰắŋ cận kảtʰể cúŋ cỉ tʰeo săw lêʔasa dặŋ kướpbók tʰùŋịc dó tʰôʔi săw ŋườʔi ấʔi kó sama kɔncaj ʔaɣɛ ŋườʔi haza zânfi dã lạʔi tʰàɲdɔàn dó kó dồŋ zeo dầʔi dậʔu zânsự dềʔu cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk zân filitin ɲưŋsa dứŋ ɣiữʔa zuộŋ biɲ vựk dáɲ zân filitin ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê xiến cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dượk tʰắŋ cận kảtʰể cɔŋ vòŋ bamươʔi kwan tướŋ kó ŋườʔi di suốŋ ɲằm lúk mùʔa ɣặt dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi haŋ dá ʔadulam cɔŋ xi kơ kwân filitin dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi cũŋ zêfaim bấʔizờ Ðʔa cɔŋ dồn tạʔi bếtlêhɛm kó dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa zân filitin Ðʔa ʔawướk zằŋ cớci dượk ʔuốŋ nướk bởʔi ɣiếŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ bếtlêhɛm bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi kwan tướŋ dầʔi lòŋ ɣanzạ sôŋ ŋaŋ kwa cạʔi kwân filitin múk nướk ɣiếŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ bếtlêhɛm zồʔi dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðʔa ɲưŋ ŋườʔi từcốʔi xôŋ ʔuốŋ zảʔi nướk dó za zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê zằŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi tôʔi xôŋ ʔuốŋ dâʔu nướk nầʔi xáknàʔɔ hwiết kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi liềʔumạŋ sốŋ mìɲ dặŋ di dếnnơʔi kiə vậʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ cịʔu ʔuốŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi tướŋ mạɲbạʔɔ ấʔi dã ʔabisaj ʔɛm ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza tướŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi zõŋ ŋườʔi zùŋ kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ dáɲ cết bɛcăm ŋườʔi kó zɛɲtiếŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi zõŋ ấʔi cɔŋ kả ʔabisaj kó zɛɲ ŋườʔi làmdầʔu zầʔu vậʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ bằŋ ŋườʔi kiə lạʔi kó bênaza kápsêên kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêhôzada ŋườʔi mạɲbạʔɔ nổʔitiếŋ kák kôŋ kủʔa mìɲ ŋườʔi dã ɣiết haj ŋườʔi môáp mạɲbạʔɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi twiết kiə ấʔi kũŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi di suốŋ káʔi cứʔa nướk kó kɔn ɣiết di lạʔiŋườʔi kũŋ dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi zíptô kó bộtướŋ dáŋ sợhãʔi ŋườʔi zíptô kầm nơʔi tăj kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ kòn bênaza kầm kâʔi ɣậʔi suốŋ dón ŋườʔi ŋườʔi zứt kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô zồʔi zùŋ kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ ấʔi ɣiết di kôŋviệk bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada dã ŋườʔi dượk nổʔitiếŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi tướŋ ɣanzạ kiə cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi bênaza kó zɛɲtiếŋ sɔŋ xôŋ bằŋ ŋườʔi cướk Ðʔa ɲận ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ ŋị mìɲ ʔasaên ʔɛm ɣiôáp ŋườʔi tʰuộk cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi zõŋ kiə kũŋ kó ʔɛânkanan kɔncaj kủʔa dô bếtlêhɛm lạʔi kó sama hazốt lica hazốt hêlết fêlết ʔisa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔicẻ têkô ʔabiêsɛ ʔanatốt mêbônaj husa sɛɲmôn ʔahô ʔa mahazaj nêtôfa hêlép kɔncaj kủʔa baana nêtɔfa ʔitaj kɔncaj kủʔa zibaj ɣibê ʔa tʰàɲ kủʔa zân bêŋiəmin bênaza fizatʰôn hidaj nahalêzaác ʔabiəɲbôn ʔazaba Ác bạt kum liəba sabôn kák kɔncaj kủʔa zasɛn ɣiônatʰan sama haza ʔakiəm kɔncaj kủʔa saza ŋườʔi ʔazazít lifêlết kɔncaj kủʔa ʔakạtbaj kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi makatʰít liəm kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahitôfɛ ɣilô hếcaj kạtmên fazaj ʔazáp ziɣɛɲ kɔncaj kủʔa natʰan sôba bani ɣadi sêlék ŋườʔi ʔammôn nahazaj bêêzốt vák biɲxí cɔ ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza ʔiza ɣiêtʰɛ ɣazép ɣiêtʰɛ ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít kộŋ bamươʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi nổʔi fừŋ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi ɣiụk lòŋ Ðʔa ŋịc kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi ditu zân ʔisơzaên zân zuda vwa nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôáp kwan tổŋbiɲ ɣần ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di xắp kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên Ðʔan cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba zânsự dể cɔ zân ʔisơzaên bawɲiêʔu ɣiôáp dáp kùŋ vwa zằŋ ŋwiệŋiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa cɔ zânsự vwa ŋàʔinăj dượk kòn tʰêm ɣấp bằŋ căm ŋwiện vwɛcúʔa tôʔi tʰấʔi za tʰêm ấʔi ɲưŋ kớsaw vwɛcúʔa tôʔi vujlòŋ việk ɲưvậʔi zầʔu vậʔi mặklòŋ lờʔi kủʔa vwa mạɲ cốŋcả kủʔa ɣiôáp kák kwan tướŋ vậʔi ɣiôáp kák kwan tướŋ cướk vwa dềʔu di za dặŋ zân ʔisơzaên săw xi kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zồʔi cúŋ cạʔi tạʔi ʔazô ʔɛ fíʔa hữʔu tʰàɲ ɣiữʔa cũŋ ɣát zồʔi hạʔi cạʔi tạʔi zaêsɛ từ dó di vàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát hướŋ sứ tʰấp kủʔa hốtsi kế dó dến Ðʔan zaan cuŋkwɛɲ sidôn họ kũŋ di dến tʰàɲlũʔi sứ tizơ vàʔɔ kák tʰàɲ zân hếvít zân kanaan zồʔi ɣiáp dến bê ʔɛsêba tạʔi zuda ɲưvậʔi di xắp sứ cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ cín tʰàɲ haimươʔi ŋàʔi ɣiôáp caw cɔ vwa káʔi cọn zânsự cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kó támcămŋàn ŋườʔi líɲciến kó tàʔi kầm ɣươm dượk cɔŋ zuda cămŋàn ŋườʔi săw xi zânsự zồʔi Ðʔa lươŋtâm kắnzứt kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi dã ɲưvậʔi tʰậtlà dã fạmtộʔi zất nặŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi kất tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi dã fạm tôʔi kó kác ŋuzạʔi kwá sáŋ ŋàʔimaj xi Ðʔa zậʔi kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ tiênci ɣát ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi di nóʔi vớʔi Ðʔa Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta kó diềʔu dịɲ cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ diềʔu dó hãʔi cọn zồʔi lấʔi fạt ŋươʔi ɣát di dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tʰật kák lờʔi dó cɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa cọn diềʔu nàʔɔ hãʔi bảʔi dóʔicém cɔŋ nướk vwa hɔặk cɔŋ batʰáŋ vwa fảʔi cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk tʰùŋịc duổʔi tʰeo vwa hɔặk ŋàʔi zịchạc cɔŋ nướk vwa bâʔizờ hãʔi swiŋĩ sɛm diềʔu tôʔi fảʔi tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ Ðấŋ dã saj tôʔi Ðʔa dáp kùŋ ɣát zằŋ sự xốnxổ tôʔi tʰăj tʰếtʰì ŋwiện tôʔi vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰươŋsót kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲưŋ cớ cɔ tôʔi vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa lɔàʔi ŋườʔita vậʔi Ðứkzê xiến zịchạc fáhạʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên buổʔi sớmmaj cɔdến tʰìɣiờ ŋàʔi dã ɲứt dịɲ cɔŋ zânsự Ðʔan dến bê ʔɛsêba cết bảʔi ŋườʔi tʰiênsứ ɣiơ tăj za cên ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ hạʔi sɔŋ Ðứkzê hốʔihận tajhọʔa ấʔi fán kùŋ tʰiênsứ hàɲ hạʔi zânsự zằŋ tʰôʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi zút tăj ŋươʔi lạʔi bấʔizờ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣần dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔazăwna ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít Ðʔa tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ hàɲ hạʔi zânsự tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðứkzê ɲưvầʔi Ấʔi cíɲ tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi tôʔi kó tộʔi kòn kák kɔnciên kiə kó làmci ŋwiện tăj cúʔa cỉ hàɲ hạʔi tôʔi ɲà ca tôʔi ŋàʔi dó ɣát dến Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi di bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔazăwna ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít vậʔi Ðʔa tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ɣát di ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ŋườʔi ʔazăwna ŋướk tʰấʔi vwa kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi di tớʔi cướk mìɲ di za mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk vwa Ðʔɔạn ʔazăwna nóʔi kớ ci vwɛcúʔa tôʔi dến ɲà tôʔitớ vwa Ðʔa dáp Ấʔi dặŋ mwa dạp lúk ŋươʔi sâʔi tạʔi dó káʔi bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê dể ŋừŋ tajhọʔa hàɲ hạʔi zânsự ʔazăwna tâʔu vớʔi Ðʔa zằŋ sin vwɛcúʔa tôʔi hãʔi zâŋ kủʔa diềʔu ɣì vwa lấʔilàm tốtlàɲ nầʔi ɲữŋ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kộ ác zùŋ kủʔi dể dốt kủʔa Ôʔi vwa mọʔi diềʔu dó ʔazăwna sin zâŋ cɔ vwa ʔazăwna ŋwiệŋiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa tiếpɲận vwa vwa dáp kùŋ ʔazăwna zằŋ xôŋ xôŋ dượk mwa kủʔa ŋươʔi kứ tʰeo ɣiá bạk ta xôŋ zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu xôŋ dáŋzá ci vậʔi Ðʔa mwa dạp lúʔa ɣiá nămmươʔi siếk bạk ŋườʔi tạʔi dó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kùŋ kủʔa tʰù tʰếtʰì Ðứkzê dộŋlòŋ tʰươŋ ʔisơzaên tajhọʔa cɔŋ sứ ŋừŋ lạʔi vwa Ðʔa dã ɣià tuổʔi kaw mặkzầʔu ŋườʔita dắp áʔɔ cɔ ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋtʰể dượk kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ sin cɔ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dồŋciɲ dể hầʔuhạ vwa sănsók vwa nàŋ cɔŋ lòŋ vwa tʰì vwɛcúʔa tôʔi kótʰể dượk vậʔi ŋườʔita cɔŋ xắp dịʔafận ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ dẹp ɣặp dượk ʔabisák ŋườʔi sunɛm zẫn nàŋ dếnkùŋ vwa ŋườʔi ɣáʔi cẻ nàʔi zất lịcsự nàŋ sănsók hầʔuhạ vwa ɲưŋ vwa xôŋ tʰânkận nàŋ vả ʔadôniza kɔncaj haɣít zằŋ ta vwa ŋườʔi sɛ kwân kùŋ nămmươʔi ŋườʔi cạʔi cướk mìɲ ca ŋườʔi cẳŋ fiềnlòŋ ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ kớsaw mầʔi ɲưvậʔi vảlạʔi ʔadôniza zất dẹp sɛɲ za săw ŋườʔi bàntíɲ vớʔi ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza vớʔi tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa haj ŋườʔi tʰeo fɛ ʔadôniza ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ tʰầʔi sadốk bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada natʰan tʰầʔi tiênci simê ʔi zê ʔi kák zõŋ kủʔa Ðʔa xôŋ tʰeo fɛ ʔadôniza ʔadôniza zâŋ ɲữŋ ciên kɔn dá sôhêlết kạɲ ɣiếŋ ʔɛânzôɣên zồʔi mờʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kák kɔncaj kủʔa vwa hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda fụk vwa ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ mờʔi natʰan dấŋ tiênci bênaza kák zõŋ kùŋ salômôn ʔɛm mìɲ bấʔizờ natʰan nóʔi vớʔi bátsêba kủʔa salômôn zằŋ bà cẳŋ hăj zằŋ ʔadôniza kɔncaj haɣít dã vwa Ðʔa cúʔa cẳŋ hăjbiết saw tʰếtʰì bâʔizờ hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi cɔ dể kứʔumạŋ sốŋ mìɲ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa salômôn hãʔi di zamắt vwa Ðʔa tâʔu zằŋ Ôʔi vwa cúʔa tôʔi cúʔa cẳŋ kó tʰề kùŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa cúʔa zằŋ kɔncaj ŋươʔi salômôn cịvì cɔŋ lúk tâʔu vớʔi vwa ɲưvậʔi tʰì cíɲ tôʔi kũŋ di vàʔɔ săw cɔ kwảkwiết kák lờʔi kủʔa vậʔi bátsêba di dếnkùŋ vwa tạʔi cɔŋ fòŋ vwa dã ɣià kó ʔabisák ŋườʔi sunɛm hầʔuhạ ŋườʔi bátsêba kúʔi mìɲ suốŋ lạʔi cướk vwa vwa hỏʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi ci bà tâʔu zằŋ cúʔa tôʔi ôʔi cúʔa dã ɲơn zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa tʰề kùŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa cúʔa zằŋ salômôn kɔncaj ŋươʔi cịvì ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ɲưŋ bâʔizờ ʔadôniza vwa cúʔa cẳŋ ci dến ŋườʔi lạʔi kó ɣiết dựk ciên zất ɲiềʔu kũŋ kó mờʔi hếttʰảʔi kák vươŋtử vớʔi ʔabiətʰa tʰầʔi ɣiôáp kwan tổŋbiɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ mờʔi salômôn tôʔitớ vwa Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu sâʔi vwa dợʔi vwa cɔ ʔaj ŋườʔi vwa fảʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋaj kủʔa vwa cúʔa tôʔi cẳŋ vậʔi xi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi ʔaŋiấk vớʔi kák tổfụ tʰì tôʔi kɔncaj tôʔi salômôn sử ɲư kó tộʔi bà dươŋ kòn tâʔu vớʔi vwa tʰì tiênci natʰan dến ŋườʔita dến tʰưʔa kùŋ vwa zằŋ nầʔi kó tiênci natʰan natʰan zamắt vwa mìɲ suốŋ cướk ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi kó fảʔi vwa dã fán zằŋ ʔadôniza cịvì ŋồʔi cên ŋaj căŋ tʰật vậʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔi dã di suốŋ ɣiết ciên zất ɲiềʔu kùŋ mờʔi hếttʰảʔi kák vươŋtử kwan tướŋ tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa kìʔa ănuốŋ tạʔi cướk ŋườʔi zằŋ ʔadôniza kòn tôʔi tôʔitớ vwa tʰầʔi sadốk bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada salômôn tôʔitớ vwa tʰì ŋườʔi cẳŋ kó mờʔi việk nàʔi fảʔi bởʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi za và lạʔi vwa xôŋ cɔ kák tôʔitớ vwa ʔaj ŋườʔi vwa fảʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋaj kủʔa vwɛcúʔa tôʔi vwa Ðʔa dáp zằŋ hãʔi ɣọʔi bátsêba cɔ bà vàʔɔ dứŋ cướk vwa Ðʔa tʰề zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê hằŋ sốŋ Ðấŋ dã ɣiảʔi kứʔumạŋ sốŋ xỏʔi kák hɔạnnạn ta ɲơn zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰề kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ kwả salômôn kɔncaj ŋươʔi cịvì ŋồʔi cên ŋaj tʰế cɔ tʰì ŋàʔinăj hɔàntʰàɲ diềʔu dó bátsêba kúʔi suốŋ dất lạʔi cướk vwa tâʔu zằŋ ŋwiện vwa Ðʔa cúʔa tôʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa Ðʔa nóʔi hãʔi ɣọʔi cɔ tʰầʔi sadốk tiênci natʰan bênaza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêhôzada mấʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi zamắt vwa zồʔi vwa nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hãʔi dɛm kák dầʔitớ kủʔa củ kák ŋươʔi tʰeo dỡ salômôn kɔncaj kỡʔi kɔn kủʔa zồʔi dưʔa dến ɣihôn dó tʰầʔi sadốk tiênci natʰan fảʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔilàm vwa ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰổʔi zằŋ vwa sa kák ŋươʔi tʰeo săw ŋườʔi dã vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên zuda bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada tâʔu kùŋ vwa zằŋ ʔamɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwɛcúʔa tôʔi kũŋ fán dịɲ ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê dã kùŋ vwɛcúʔa tôʔi tʰểnàʔɔ ŋwiện ŋàʔi kũŋ kùŋ salômôn tʰể ấʔi xiến ŋôʔi ŋườʔi kòn kawcọŋ ŋôʔi kủʔa vwa Ðʔa cúʔa tôʔi Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi sadốk tiênci natʰan bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kêzêtʰít fêlêtʰít dềʔu di suốŋ dỡ salômôn kỡʔi kɔn kủʔa vwa Ðʔa zồʔi dưʔa ŋườʔi dến ɣihôn tʰầʔi sadốk lấʔi káʔi sừŋ zầʔu cɔŋ sứk cɔ salômôn ŋườʔita tʰổʔi kả zânsự dềʔu zằŋ vwa sa cúŋ dềʔu tʰeo ŋườʔi di tʰổʔi sáʔɔ vuimừŋ xônsiết dếnnỗʔi dất zúŋdộŋ bởʔi tiếŋ kủʔa ʔadôniza hếttʰảʔi zự tiệk vớʔi mìɲ dềʔu ŋɛ tiếŋ nàʔi xi vừʔa sɔŋ lúkzô ŋɛ tiếŋ tʰì nóʔi saw cɔŋ tʰàɲ kótiếŋ sônsaw ấʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi kòn nóʔi kìʔa ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa cợt dến ʔadôniza nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi vàʔɔ ŋươʔi tăj zõŋ cắk ŋươʔi dɛm ɲữŋ tinlàɲ ɲưŋzô natʰan dáp vớʔi ʔadôniza zằŋ tʰật cáʔi vwa Ðʔa cúʔa cúŋta dã salômôn vwa vwa kó saj tʰầʔi sadốk tiênci natʰan bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada ŋườʔi kêzêtʰít kùŋ ŋườʔi fêlênít di tʰeo ŋườʔi dã dỡ ŋườʔi kỡʔi kɔn kủʔa vwa Ðʔɔạn tạʔi ɣihôn tʰầʔi sadốk tiênci natʰan dã sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔilàm vwa dã dó cởlên kác zeo mừŋ kả tʰàɲ dềʔu vaŋdộŋ tiếŋ sônsaw kák ôŋ dã ŋɛ lạʔi salômôn dã ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi nướk kák tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa dến cúk fướk cɔ vwa Ðʔa cúʔa cúŋta tâʔu zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa cɔ zɛɲ salômôn tônviɲ zɛɲ kủʔa vwa xiến cɔ ŋôʔi ŋườʔi kawcọŋ ŋôʔi kủʔa vwa zồʔi kúʔi lạʔi nơʔi ɣiườŋ mìɲ kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi Ðáŋ xɛnŋợʔi tʰăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi kó ŋườʔi dể ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi sɛm tʰấʔi bấʔizờ hếttʰảʔi kák ŋườʔi zự tiệk vớʔi ʔadôniza dềʔu sợhãʔi dứŋzậʔi ʔaj di dườŋ nấʔi ʔadôniza kũŋ salômôn hăj diềʔu dó zằŋ nầʔi ʔadôniza vwa salômôn kìʔa ŋườʔi dã kák sừŋ bàntʰờ kó ŋườʔi dến tʰuật cɔ salômôn hăj diềʔu dó zằŋ nầʔi ʔadôniza vwa salômôn kìʔa ŋườʔi dã kák sừŋ bàntʰờ nóʔi zằŋ hômnăj vwa salômôn hãʔi tʰề vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ vwa xôŋ ɣiết dầʔitớ ŋườʔi bằŋ ɣươm salômôn dáp zằŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi za ŋườʔi tʰì cẳŋ sợʔi tók nàʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi zụŋ suốŋ dất bằŋ kó tʰấʔi ák nơʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cết vwa sa saj dɛm ŋườʔi suốŋ
