xỏʔi bàntʰờ ʔadôniza dến mìɲ suốŋ cướk salômôn salômôn nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi cởvề ɲàŋươʔi xi ŋàʔi kủʔa Ðʔa hầʔu cọn ŋườʔi cwiền lịɲ cɔ salômôn kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ ta hầʔu di kɔn dườŋ cuŋ kủʔa tʰếzan xá mạɲzạn nênŋườʔi cượŋfu hãʔi ɣiữ diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kɔn ɣiữ dể di cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ luậtfáp diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ zạʔizỗ kủʔa ŋàʔi ʔiɲư dã cép cɔŋ luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ hầʔu cɔ kɔn diềʔu ci hăjlà di nơʔi nàʔɔ kũŋ dềʔu dượk tʰàɲkôŋ Ðứkzê ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán zằŋ ɲượkbằŋ kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi kẩntʰận dườŋlốʔi mìɲ hếtlòŋ tʰeo tʰật diở cướk tʰì ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ʔisơzaên kɔn ɣiôáp kɔncaj sêzuza dã cɔ ca dã cɔ haj kwan tướŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ ʔamasa kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêtʰɛ haj ŋườʔi dã ɣiết dổ hwiết za cɔŋ lúk hòʔabìɲ ɲư cɔŋ kơn ciếncận xiến cɔ hwiết dổ za cɔŋ ciếncận zíɲ vàʔɔ daj tʰắtlưŋ kùŋ vàʔɔ ɣiàʔi maŋ nơʔi cơn kɔn hãʔi kứ xônŋwan kɔn kưsử cớ dể dầʔu bạk suốŋ âmfủ kác bìɲiên kɔn hãʔi vớʔi kák kɔncaj bátsilaj ŋườʔi ɣalaát kác ɲơn cɔ dồŋ kùŋ kɔn cíɲ cúŋnó dã dãʔi ca ɲưvậʔi dến dónzướk ca lúk ca cạʔi cốn cướk ʔɛɲ kɔn nầʔi kòn vớʔi kɔn simê ʔi kɔncaj ɣêza ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ʔahuzim lấʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi dộkák ŋwiềnzủʔa ca cɔŋ ŋàʔi ca di dến mahanaim ɲưŋ suốŋ dón ca tạʔi ɣiôdɛɲ tʰì ca dã ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê tʰề vớʔi zằŋ ta cẳŋ ɣiết ŋươʔi bằŋ ɣươm bâʔizờ kɔn cớ dể xỏʔi fạt kɔn xônŋwan tʰếnàʔɔ fảʔi sử kɔn xá cɔ dầʔu bạk zíɲ máʔu suốŋ âmfủ Ðʔa ʔaŋiấk vớʔi kák tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ɲữŋ ŋàʔi Ðʔa cịvì cên ʔisơzaên mươʔi ŋườʔi cịvì bảʔi tạʔi hếpzôn bamươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔɔạn salômôn ŋồʔi cên ŋaj Ðʔa ca mìɲ nướk ŋườʔi dượk zất vữŋbền ʔadôniza kɔncaj haɣít dếnkùŋ bátsêba kủʔa salômôn bà nóʔi ŋươʔi dến kó bìɲan cớ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ fảʔi kó bìɲan ŋườʔi lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó lờʔinóʔi kùŋ bà dáp hãʔi nóʔi ŋườʔi bà zằŋ nướk tʰuộk tôʔi kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu mɔŋ tʰấʔi tôʔi cịvì ɲưŋ ŋôʔi nướk dã cởnên kủʔa ʔɛm tôʔi zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê tʰuộk ŋườʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi kó sin vớʔi cớ từcốʔi bà dáp hãʔi nóʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi sin hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa salômôn ŋườʔi cẳŋ cốʔi ɣì vớʔi kầʔu ŋườʔi cɔ tôʔi lấʔi ʔabisák ŋườʔi sunɛm bátsêba dáp Ðượk nóʔi vớʔi vwa ɣiùm cɔ ŋươʔi bátsêba di dến vwa salômôn dể nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi ɣiùm cɔ ʔadôniza vwa dứŋzậʔi di dón kúʔi suốŋ lạʔi dɔạn ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋaj mìɲ saj dặt ŋaj xák cɔ mìɲ ŋồʔi tăj hữʔu vwa bà nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ mẹ kó việk ɲỏ sin kɔn kɔn cớ từcốʔi vwa dáp mẹ ôʔi sin hãʔi nóʔi tôʔi cẳŋ từcốʔi vớʔi dâʔu bà hãʔi ʔabisák ŋườʔi sunɛm ʔadôniza ʔɛɲ kɔn ɲưŋ vwa salômôn tʰưʔa kùŋ mìɲ zằŋ kớsaw sin ʔabisák ŋườʔi sunɛm cɔ ʔadôniza kũŋ hãʔi sin nướk cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲkả tôʔi hãʔi sin cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa cɔ ɣiôáp kɔncaj sêzuza vwa sa cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề zằŋ ʔadôniza kó nóʔi lờʔi dó ŋịc vớʔi mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ bằŋ cẳŋ ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sử tôʔi kác nặŋnề bâʔizờ tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ Ðấŋ dã cɔ tôʔi vữŋvàŋ xiến tôʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋaj kủʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi kùŋ ɲà cɔ tôʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa tʰề zằŋ ʔadôniza sửtử cíɲ ŋàʔi hômnăj vwa sa cwiền lịɲ cɔ bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada sôŋ dáɲ ʔadôniza tʰì ŋườʔi cết Ðʔɔạn vwa nóʔi vớʔi tʰầʔi ʔabiətʰa zằŋ hãʔi luj ʔanatốt cɔŋ dất ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dáŋ cết sɔŋ ŋàʔinăj xôŋ ɣiết ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kó xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa cúʔazê cướk Ðʔa ca bởʔivì ŋươʔi dã hɔạnnạn cɔŋ kák hɔạnnạn kủʔa ca ɲưvậʔi salômôn duổʔi ʔabiətʰa zadi xôŋ cɔ tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê nữʔa hầʔu cɔ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán ɲà hêli tạʔi silô dượk ứŋŋiệm tin nàʔi tʰấʔu dến ɣiôáp vảɣiô dã tʰeo fɛ ʔadôniza zầʔu xôŋ kó tʰeo fɛ kủʔa ŋườʔi cốn dến kủʔa Ðứkzê sừŋ kủʔa bàntʰờ ŋườʔita dến tâʔu vớʔi vwa salômôn zằŋ ɣiôáp dã cốn dến kủʔa Ðứkzê kìʔa ŋườʔi dứŋ bênkạɲ bàntʰờ salômôn saj bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada zặn zằŋ hãʔi di dáɲ ɣiết di bênaza di dến kủʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôáp zằŋ vwa kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi hãʔi za xỏʔi dó ɣiôáp dáp xôŋ cết tạʔi dâʔi bênaza di tʰuật lạʔi cɔ vwa tâʔu zằŋ ɣiôáp dã nóʔi dáp lạʔi ɲưvậʔi vwa nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi ʔiɲư hãʔi ɣiết côn di ɲưvậʔi ŋươʔi kất xỏʔi xỏʔi ɲà ca hwiết ɣiôáp dã dổ za vôkớ Ðứkzê xiến hwiết dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu dã sôŋ vàʔɔ haj ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣiết bằŋ ɣươm Ðʔa ca xôŋ hăj dến ci kả ấʔilà nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ kwan tướŋ kủʔa dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên ʔamasa kɔncaj ɣiêtʰɛ hwiết haj ŋườʔi ấʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu ɣiôáp cên dầʔu kủʔa zòŋzõʔi cɔdến dờʔidờʔi kòn fần Ðʔa zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi ɲà ŋôʔi nướk ŋườʔi ɲờ Ðứkzê dượk bìɲiên mãʔimãʔi vậʔi bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada cởlên sôŋ vàʔɔ ɣiôáp ɣiết ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dượk côn ɲà ŋườʔi tạʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ vwa dặt bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada kwan tổŋbiɲ tʰăj cɔ ɣiôáp sadốk tʰầʔi tʰăj cɔ ʔabiətʰa Ðʔɔạn vwa saj dòʔi simê ʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi kất cɔ ŋươʔi káʔi ɲà tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dó cớ za dặŋ di dầʔu nàʔi dầʔu kiə vì xá zằŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi za xỏʔi dó di kwa xɛ sếcôn tʰì cắk ŋươʔi cết hwiết ŋươʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu ŋươʔi simê ʔi tʰưʔa vớʔi vwa zằŋ lờʔi ấʔi fảʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi fán zặn diềʔu ɣì tôʔitớ vwa diềʔu dó vậʔi simê ʔi lâʔu ŋàʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kuốʔi sảʔi kó haj tôʔitớ kủʔa simê ʔi cốn dến ɲà ʔakíc kɔncaj maaka vwa kủʔa ɣát ŋườʔita dến tʰuật diềʔu dó cɔ simê ʔi zằŋ kìʔa haj tôʔitớ ôŋ tạʔi ɣát simê ʔi cổʔi zậʔi tʰắŋ lừʔa mìɲ di dến ɣát nơʔi ɲà ʔakíc dặŋ haj tôʔitớ mìɲ ɣặp dɔạn zẫn cúŋnó ŋườʔita tʰuật cɔ salômôn zằŋ simê ʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dã di dến ɣát zồʔi cởvề vwa saj dòʔi simê ʔi fán zằŋ ta cẳŋ kó ŋươʔi cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề bảʔɔ ŋươʔi cướk zằŋ xá zằŋ ŋàʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi za di dầʔu nàʔi dầʔu kiə tʰì ŋươʔi cắk cết saw và ŋươʔi kó tʰưʔa kùŋ zằŋ lờʔi tôʔi dã ŋɛ tʰậm fảʔi vậʔi kớsaw ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣiữ lờʔi cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi vwa lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi simê ʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi mọʔi ák ŋươʔi dã cɔ Ðʔa ca lòŋ ŋươʔi kòn ɲớ vậʔi Ðứkzê xiến ák kủʔa ŋươʔi dổ lạʔi dầʔu ŋươʔi ɲưŋ vwa salômôn dượk fướk ŋôʔi kủʔa Ðʔa dượk vữŋbền dến dờʔidờʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa cwiền lịɲ cɔ bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada ŋườʔi di za dáɲ ɣiết simê ʔi ɲưvậʔi ŋôʔi nướk dượk vữŋbền cɔŋ tăj salômôn salômôn kếttʰân vớʔi fazaôn vwa zíptô kướʔi kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi zướk nàŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa dợʔi sâʔicất sɔŋ kuŋdiện ziêŋ mìɲ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tườŋ tʰàɲ cuŋkwɛɲ ɣiêzusalɛm zânsự hãʔi kòn zâŋ kủʔa cên kák nơʔi kaw cɔdến bấʔizờ cưʔa kó sâʔicất dền nàʔɔ cɔ zɛɲ Ðứkzê salômôn kíɲmến Ðứkzê di tʰeo kák kủʔa Ðʔa ca mìɲ sɔŋ ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa sôŋ hươŋ tạʔi cên nơʔi kaw vwa di dến ɣabaôn dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa tạʔi dó nơʔi kaw ấʔilà cọŋ ɲất cên bàntʰờ dó salômôn zâŋ mộtŋàn kɔn siɲ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tạʔiɣa lúk bandêm Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ salômôn cɔŋ kơn ciêmbaw fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi sin diềʔu ɣì ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi salômôn tʰưʔa zằŋ cúʔa dã lấʔi dãʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi tʰeo ɲư ŋườʔi lấʔi cuŋtín kôŋbìɲ lòŋ ŋăj cọnvẹn di cướk Ðứkzê lạʔi cúʔa kó ɣiữ ấʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kɔncaj ŋồʔi cên ŋaj kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔiɲư dã kó ŋàʔinăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi bâʔizờ cúʔa dã xiến tôʔitớ cúʔa cịvì Ðʔa ca tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cỉ dứʔa cẻ ɲỏ cẳŋ fảʔi zavàʔɔ làmsaw kẻ tôʔitớ cúʔa ɣiữʔa zân kủʔa cúʔa cọn zân dôŋ xôŋtʰể dếm dượk vậʔi sin cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa tấmlòŋ xôn sáŋ dể dɔán sét zânsự ŋàʔi fânbiệt diềʔu làɲ diềʔu zữ ʔaj kótʰể dɔán sét zân zất nàʔi kủʔa cúʔa lờʔi kủʔa salômôn dẹplòŋ cúʔa ŋườʔi dã kầʔusin dó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ bởʔivì ŋươʔi dã kầʔusin diềʔu nàʔi xôŋ sin sốŋ lâʔu xôŋ sin ɣiàʔukó kũŋ xôŋ sin mạŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi ɲưŋ sin tʰôŋmiɲ dể sétdɔán nầʔi dã tʰeo lờʔi kầʔusin kủʔa ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi tấmlòŋ xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ dến dỗʔi cướk ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj bằŋ săw ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj ŋaŋ vảlạʔi kũŋ dã cɔ ŋươʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ sin tứklà ɣiàʔukó viɲhiển dến dỗʔi cọn dờʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák vwa cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋươʔi lạʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi di cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi ɲư Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi dã di tʰì xiến cɔ ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi tʰêm bấʔizờ salômôn tʰứkzậʔi tʰấʔi diềm ciêmbaw ŋườʔi cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm dứŋ cướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kùŋ kủʔa tʰù dãʔi tiệk cɔ hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ mìɲ bấʔizờ kó haj kɔn dếnkùŋ vwa dứŋ cướk vwa một dứʔa nóʔi cúʔa tôʔi ôʔi ŋườʔi dờn nàʔi tôʔi cuŋ ɲăw ɲà tôʔi dẻ ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲà dó săw ŋàʔi ŋườʔi nàʔi kũŋ dẻ cúŋtôʔi cuŋ ɲăw cẳŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vớʔi cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ ɲà cỉ kó haj cúŋtôʔi dó tʰôʔi lúk bandêm kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi cết bởʔivì ŋườʔi dã dè cên xwiə ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi cɔŋ xi kɔndòʔi vwa ŋủ tʰì ŋườʔi lấʔi kɔncaj tôʔi xỏʔi tôʔi dể cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ zồʔi dặt kɔncaj cết kủʔa cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi sáŋsớm tôʔi tʰứkzậʔi dặŋ cɔ kɔncaj tôʔi tʰì tʰấʔi dã cết ɲưŋ sáŋ zõ tôʔi ɲìn kỹkàŋ tʰấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kɔncaj tôʔi dã dẻ ŋườʔi dờn kiə cảlờʔi zằŋ xôŋ fảʔi vậʔi dứʔa sốŋ kɔncaj taw dứʔa cết kɔncaj mầʔi sɔŋ dờn nàʔi nóʔi xôŋ fảʔi vậʔi dâʔu dứʔa cết kɔncaj mầʔi kòn dứʔa sốŋ kɔncaj taw haj ŋườʔi kãʔi ɲăw ɲưvậʔi cướk vwa vwa fán zằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔi nóʔi Ðứʔa kòn sốŋ kɔncaj taw dứʔa cết kɔncaj mầʔi ŋườʔi kiə nóʔi xôŋ fảʔi vậʔi dâʔu sɔŋ kɔncaj mầʔi ấʔilà dứʔa cết kɔncaj taw ấʔilà dứʔa sốŋ vwa zằŋ vậʔi hãʔi dɛm cɔ kâʔi ɣươm ŋườʔita dɛm cɔ vwa kâʔi ɣươm vwa lạʔi fán hãʔi ciə dứʔa cẻ sốŋ haj fânnửʔa cɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi fânnửʔa cɔ ŋườʔi kiə ɲưŋ kủʔa dứʔa cẻ sốŋ ɣanzuột kảmdộŋ tʰươŋiêʔu kɔn mìɲ tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ Ôʔi cúʔa tôʔi sin hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kiə kɔncẻ sốŋ cớ ɣiết ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kiə nóʔi zằŋ nó cẳŋ tʰuộk taw kũŋ cẳŋ tʰuộk mầʔi hãʔi ciə di bấʔizờ vwa kấttiếŋ fán zằŋ hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi dứʔa cẻ sốŋ cớ ɣiết ấʔilà kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu ŋɛ dɔán sét vwa dã tʰì kíɲ vwa tʰấʔi cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi kó xônŋwan kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặŋ sử dɔán kôŋbìɲ vwa sa cịvì cên kả ʔisơzaên nầʔi kák ciềʔutʰần kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔasaziə kɔncaj tʰầʔi sadốk liôzếp ʔahiza kɔncaj kủʔa sina kýlụk ɣiêhôsafát kɔncaj ʔahilút tʰủ bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada tổŋbiɲ sadốk ʔabiətʰa tʰầʔi ʔasaziə kɔncaj tʰan làmdầʔu kák kwanlạʔi sabút kɔncaj natʰan tểtướŋ kủʔa vwa ʔahisa kwan kaj kuŋdiện ʔadônizam kɔncaj da kɔj việk kốŋ tʰuế salômôn kó mườʔihaj ŋườʔi làmdầʔu kwanlạʔi kaicị kả ʔisơzaên dể kuŋkấp lươŋtʰựk cɔ vwa cɔ ɲàvwa mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ fảʔi kuŋkấp tʰáŋ nầʔi kák kɔncaj huzơ kɔj cɔŋ núʔi zaim kɔncaj kɛm kɔj makát saanbim bếtsêmết kủʔa bếtʰana kɔncaj hêsết kɔj ʔazubốt ŋườʔi kɔj sôkô kả sứ hêfɛ kɔncaj ʔabinadáp kɔj kả dồŋ kaw zơ tafát kɔŋáʔi kủʔa salômôn ŋườʔi baana kɔncaj ʔahilút kɔj tʰaanák mêɣidô kả sứ bếtsêʔan ɣần sạtʰan zướʔi ɣítêên bếtsêʔan cɔdến ʔabênmêhôla cɔdến xỏʔi kiə ɣiốkmêʔam kɔncaj ɣêbɛ tạʔi zamốt kủʔa ɣalaát ŋườʔi kɔj tʰôn zajzơ zajzơ kɔncaj kủʔa manasɛ ŋườʔi kũŋ kaicị ʔaï tɣốp cɔŋ basan sáʔu mươʔi tʰàɲ kó tườŋ tʰàɲ tʰɛn kửʔa dồŋ ʔahinadáp kɔncaj ʔidô tạʔi mahanaim ʔahimát cɔŋ dịʔafận néptali ŋườʔi kũŋ kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa salômôn bácmát baana kɔncaj husaj cɔŋ sứ ʔasɛ ʔalốt ɣiêhôsafát kɔncaj fazuák kɔj ʔisaka simê ʔi kɔncaj kɔj bêŋiəmin ɣêbɛ kɔncaj ʔuzi kɔj sứ ɣalaát tʰuở sưʔa sứ kủʔa sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít kủʔa ʔɔùk vwa basan cỉ kó mộtmìɲ ŋườʔi làmdầʔu kwanlạʔi kɔj kả nàʔi zâŋiw da ʔisơzaên dôŋ ɲư kát cên ănuốŋ vuicơʔi salômôn kaicị cên kák nướk sôŋkáʔi cɔdến sứ filitin cɔdến zɛɲ zíptô kák nướk ấʔi dềʔu tiếnkốŋ fụk salômôn cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi lươŋtʰựk kủʔa ɲà salômôn kần zùŋ cɔŋ mỗʔi ŋàʔi bamươʔi kô zơ lọk sáʔu mươʔi kô zơ tʰườŋ mườʔi kɔn haimươʔi kɔn nơʔi dồŋkỏ mộtcăm kɔnciên xôŋ naj dựk hɔàŋ zươŋ ká tɔŋ ɣà nuôʔi vảlạʔi salômôn kaicị cên kák sứ nàʔi sôŋ cên kák vwa kủʔa mấʔi sứ dó típsắk cɔdến ɣasa ŋườʔi hòʔahảʔɔ vớʔi kák zân fíʔa cọn dờʔi vwa salômôn cịvì zân zuda ʔisơzaên ʔiênổn Ðʔan cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba ʔainấʔi dềʔu zướʔi kâʔi ɲɔ kâʔi mìɲ salômôn kó tàʔu dể ŋựʔa ɣák sɛ haj ŋàn líɲ kák ŋườʔi làmdầʔu kwanlạʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi tʰáŋ lɔ sắmsửʔa dồ kần zùŋ cɔ vwa salômôn cɔ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dượk ɲận nơʔi vwa cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ci họ tʰeo fiên mìɲ mỗʔi ŋườʔi sắmsửʔa dɛm dếnnơʔi vwa lúʔamạc zơm cɔ ŋựʔa zùŋ dể kéʔɔ dể kỡʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ salômôn xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ zất kaw kùŋ lòŋ zộŋzãʔi ɲư kát cên sự xônŋwan kủʔa salômôn cổʔi xônŋwan kủʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi fươŋ dôŋ xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô ŋườʔi xônŋwan mọʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰan ŋườʔi Ếc zahít hêman kɛɲkôn da kák kɔncaj mahôn zɛɲtiếŋ ŋườʔi dồn za cɔŋ kák zântộk cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi ŋàn kâʔu câmŋôn mộtŋàn bàʔitʰơ ŋườʔi kâʔicốʔi kâʔi hươŋ kủʔa liban cɔdến cùm kiɲzớʔi mọk za nơʔi vác ŋườʔi kũŋ kó lɔàʔi cim lɔàʔi kôŋ cùŋ ká kólẽ kák zântộk dến ŋɛ xônŋwan kủʔa salômôn kák vwa tʰếzan dã ŋɛnóʔi xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu saj dến hizam vwa tizơ hăj salômôn dã dượk sứk zầʔu vwa dặŋ ca ŋườʔi saj tôʔitớ mìɲ dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi hizam ʔiêʔumến Ðʔa salômôn saj nóʔi vớʔi hizam zằŋ vwa zằŋ Ðʔa tʰânfụ tôʔi xôŋ kất dượkmộtkáʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi kớ ciɲciến tʰùŋịc vâʔi tứfíʔa ŋườʔi cɔdến ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dã xiến cúŋnó fụk zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi ɲưŋ bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dã cɔ tôʔi bằŋ ʔiên tứfíʔa cẳŋ kòn kừʔudịc cẳŋ kòn tajhọʔa vậʔi tôʔi tíɲ kất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tʰeo ɲư Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ Ðʔa ca tôʔi zằŋ kɔncaj ŋươʔi xiến ŋồʔi cên ŋaj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ sin vwa hãʔi cwiền cɔ dầʔitớ kủʔa vwa dốn cɔ tôʔi kâʔi hươŋ cên núʔi liban tôʔi kũŋ cwiền cɔ kák dầʔitớ tôʔi ɣiúpdỡ kák dầʔitớ vwa tôʔi fát cɔ vwa kôŋ ɣiá kủʔa tùʔi tʰeo vwa dịɲ vwa zằŋ cẳŋ ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta tʰạʔɔ dốn ɣỗ ɲư zân sidôn xihi zam ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa salômôn tʰì mừŋ zằŋ ŋàʔinăj dáŋ xɛnŋợʔi tʰăj Ðứkzê dã cɔ Ðʔa kɔncaj xônŋwan dể cịvì zânsự nàʔi hizam saj dáp lờʔi cɔ salômôn zằŋ tôʔi dã ŋɛ dượk lờʔi vwa saj nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi mọʔi diềʔu vwa ướkaw ɣỗ hươŋ ɣỗ tòŋ tʰì tôʔi kák dầʔitớ tôʔi kéʔɔɣỗ ấʔi liban dến dóŋ tʰả cɔ dếnnơʔi vwa cỉ cɔ dó tôʔi za vwa ɲận lấʔi dɛm di kòn vwa cɔ tʰỏʔa tôʔi kấp lươŋtʰựk cɔ ɲà tôʔi vậʔi hizam kấp cɔ salômôn ɣỗ hươŋ ɣỗ tòŋ bawɲiêʔu tùʔi ŋườʔi kònsa kấp cɔ hizam haj kô zơ lúʔamạc zùŋ lươŋtʰựk cɔ ɲà ŋườʔi haimươʔi kô zơ zầʔu zất cɔŋ salômôn kấp cɔ hizam mỗʔi ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê xônŋwan cɔ salômôn ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã hứʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi hizam salômôn hòʔa ɲăw zawướk vớʔi ɲăw vwa sa ciêʔumộ cɔŋ kả ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ ŋườʔilàm sâʔu ŋườʔi saj di dến liban tʰăj fiên mỗʔi tʰáŋ mườʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi tʰáŋ tạʔi liban tʰăj fiên mỗʔi tʰáŋ mườʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi tʰáŋ tạʔi liban haj tʰáŋ nơʔi ɲà mìɲ ʔadôniza kwản suất ŋườʔilàm sâʔu salômôn kòn kó bảʔi ŋườʔi xiêŋ ɣáɲ ŋườʔi dẽʔɔ dá cɔŋ xôŋ ɲữŋ dốkkôŋ ŋàn bɛcăm ŋườʔi salômôn dã dặt kɔjsók kôŋviệk sajxiến zân làmviệk vwa cwiền lấʔi dá dá kwíɣiá dẽʔɔ di dặŋ zùŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ kák tʰợ kủʔa salômôn kủʔa hizam vớʔi ŋườʔi ɣibêlít dẽʔɔ dá zọn kâʔi kùŋ dá dặŋ kất dền sảʔiza bốncăm mươʔi săw xi zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tʰứtư kủʔa salômôn cịvì cên ʔisơzaên ɲằm tʰáŋ síp ŋĩʔalà tʰáŋ tʰứhaj tʰì ŋườʔi kất dền kủʔa Ðứkzê káʔi dền vwa salômôn kất cɔ Ðứkzê zàʔi kó sáʔu mươʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ haimươʔi tʰướk káʔi kửʔa cướk dền zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk bằŋ ŋaŋ kủʔa dền zộŋ mườʔi tʰướk cướk dền vwa kũŋ cɔdến ɲữŋ kửʔasổ kó sɔŋ xuôn kâʔi ŋườʔi kất ɲữŋ từŋ lầʔu zựʔa vàʔɔ vác fíʔa dền tứklà zựʔa vàʔɔ vác cuŋkwɛɲ dền tʰờ nơʔi tʰáɲ kũŋ ɲữŋ fòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ dền từŋ zướʔi zộŋ tʰướk từŋ ɣiữʔa zộŋ sáʔu tʰướk từŋ cên zộŋ bảʔi tʰướk vwa kất luj kák vác vòŋ ŋɔàʔi ɲà dặŋ cáɲ sà hɔàɲ dâm vàʔɔ vác dền xi kất dền ŋườʔita zùŋ dá dã dẽʔɔ nơʔi xôŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ búʔa zìʔu hăjlà xí zụŋ xák bằŋ tạʔi nơʔi dền dươŋ xi kất kửʔa vàʔɔ kák fòŋ từŋ tʰứ ɲì fíʔa hữʔu kủʔa dền ŋườʔita di từŋ ɣiữʔa bởʔi káʔi tʰaŋ xu ốk zồʔi từŋ ɣiữʔa từŋ tʰứba xi kất dền sɔŋ tʰì salômôn bằŋ dòntăj ɣỗ hươŋ kũŋ kất ɲữŋ từŋ lầʔu tʰướk zựʔa vàʔɔ tứfíʔa dền zíɲ vớʔi ɲà bởʔi kâʔi dà hươŋ bấʔizờ kó lờʔi Ðứkzê fán vớʔi salômôn zằŋ ɲà nàʔi ŋươʔi dươŋ sâʔicất nếʔu ŋươʔi vâŋ tʰeo kák nɔj tʰeo kák mạŋ lịɲ ɣiữ di cɔŋ hếttʰảʔi kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa tʰì ŋươʔi hɔàntʰàɲ lờʔi dã hứʔa kùŋ Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi ta ŋự ɣiữʔa zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ ʔisơzaên zân Ấʔi vậʔi salômôn sâʔi dền cɔ hɔàntʰàɲ ŋườʔi lấʔi hươŋ dóŋ vác fíʔa cɔŋ dền dất cɔdến cần dất bằŋ kâʔi tùŋ từ kuốʔi fíʔa cɔŋ dền haimươʔi tʰướk ŋườʔi dóŋ ŋăn bằŋ hươŋ cɔdến cần dặŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ kòn mươʔi tʰướk kiə tiềndườŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ fíʔa cɔŋ dền kó ɣỗ hươŋ cạm hìɲ zưʔa ák hwa mớʔi tɔàn ɣỗ hươŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi dá kòn nơʔi cí tʰáɲ salômôn dặt fíʔa cɔŋ dền kuốʔi cɔŋ dặŋ dể zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi dó fíʔa cɔŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ kó haimươʔi tʰướk zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ bọk bằŋ vàŋzòŋ kũŋ bọk vàŋ bàntʰờ bằŋ kâʔi hươŋ nữʔa salômôn bọk vàŋzòŋ tuồŋ cɔŋ kủʔa ɲà lấʔi siềŋ vàŋ ɣiăŋ cướk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ bọk bằŋ vàŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ bọk vàŋ tɔàn kả ɲà ŋườʔi kũŋ vàŋ xắp bàntʰờ dằŋ cướk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ ŋườʔilàm cɔ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ haj cê zubin bằŋ ɣỗ livɛ kaw mườʔi tʰướk káɲ nàʔi káɲ kiə kủʔa mỗʔi cê zubin kó tʰướk tʰếlà mườʔi tʰướk cót káɲ nàʔi tớʔi cót káɲ kiə cêzubin tʰứ ɲì kũŋ kó mườʔi tʰướk haj cê zubin dềʔu dồŋ kỡ záŋ vớʔi ɲăw cêzubin nàʔi kó mườʔi tʰướk kaw cê zubin kiə kũŋ vậʔi salômôn dể haj cê zubin tạʔi nơʔi cí tʰáɲ cɔŋ kùŋ kủʔa dền káɲ kủʔa cê zubin tʰứ ɲất dụŋ ɲăw tạʔi ɣiữʔa nơʔi cí tʰáɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ bọk vàŋ cɔ haj cê zubin bốn fíʔa vác dền fíʔa cɔŋ fíʔa ŋɔàʔi salômôn xiến cạmnổʔi hìɲ cê zubin kâʔi càlà hwa kũŋ fủ dất ɲà bằŋ vàŋ cɔŋ bềŋɔàʔi tạʔicỗ vàʔɔ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ ŋườʔilàm káʔi kửʔa haj káɲ bằŋ ɣỗ livɛ tʰɛɲ kột cɔán fần kủʔa ŋườʔi xiến cạmnổʔi cên haj káɲ kửʔa bằŋ ɣỗ livɛ ấʔi ɲữŋ hìɲ cê zubin kâʔi càlà hwa zồʔi bọk bằŋ vàŋ cáŋ vàŋ za cên hìɲ cê zubin hìɲ kâʔi càlà về kửʔa dền tʰờ ŋườʔi kũŋ kột bằŋ ɣỗ livɛ cɔán mộtfầntư kủʔa vác lạʔi haj káɲ kửʔa bằŋ ɣỗ tòŋ mỗʔi káɲ kó haj miếŋ cá xép lạʔi dượk salômôn xiến cạmnổʔi ɲữŋ hìɲ cê zubin kâʔi càlà hwa zồʔi bọk bằŋ vàŋ cáŋ vàŋ za cên kák cạmcổ ŋườʔi sâʔi tườŋ hàɲlaŋ fíʔa cɔŋ bằŋ hàŋ dá cạm hàŋ kâʔi sà ɣỗ hươŋ năm tʰứtư nămtʰáŋ síp káʔi kủʔa dền tʰờ Ðứkzê dã dặt tʰứ mườʔimột ɲằm tʰáŋ bulơ ŋĩʔalà tʰáŋ dền tʰờ hɔàntʰàɲ cɔŋ mọʔi fần tʰeo kiểʔu dã za salômôn kất dền bảʔi salômôn kũŋ kất kuŋdiện mìɲ sɔŋ mọʔi việk cɔŋ mườʔiba ŋườʔi lạʔi kất káʔi kuŋ zừŋ liban zàʔi mộtcăm tʰướk ŋaŋ nămmươʔi tʰướk kaw bamươʔi tʰướk dặt cên hàŋ kột bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ kó ɲữŋ sàŋaŋ bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ dể cên ɲữŋ kột cần kủʔa kák fòŋ bởʔi kột cốŋdỡ mươʔi kâʔi mườʔilăm kâʔi mỗʔi zãʔi dềʔu dóŋ bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ kó zãʔi fòŋ kửʔasổ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲăw hếttʰảʔi kửʔa kột dềʔu vuôŋ kák kửʔasổ kủʔa zãʔi fòŋ dềʔu dốʔimặt ɲăw ŋườʔi kất kửʔa kó cụ zàʔi nămmươʔi tʰướk cướk nàʔi kó xák kũŋ kó cụ bựk salômôn kũŋ sâʔi dể ŋaj nơʔi ŋườʔi sétdɔán ɣọʔilà sétdɔán zồʔi zùŋ ɣỗ hươŋ dến cần kuŋ kủʔa salômôn cɔŋ tʰứ ɲì fíʔa săw kửʔa kũŋ sâʔi mộtkác ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi kũŋ sâʔi cɔ kɔŋáʔi fazaôn salômôn dã kướʔi káʔi kuŋ ɲư kiểʔu kủʔa nàʔi kák kuŋdiện nàʔi dềʔu sâʔi bằŋ dá kwí dụk tʰeo tʰướk tấk kưʔasẻ hɔặk cɔŋ hăj bềŋɔàʔi dến kổbồŋ kâʔi kột cɔdến vác kửʔa dềʔu kũŋ vậʔi káʔi tʰì bằŋ dá kwí kó tʰì mườʔi tʰướk tʰì tʰướk cên kák nàʔi lạʔi kòn ɲữŋ dá kwí dụk tʰeo tʰướk tấk ɣỗ hươŋ vác hàɲlaŋ kó hàŋ dá cạm hàŋ kâʔi dà bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ ʔiɲư hàŋ laŋ fíʔa cɔŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê ʔiɲư kửʔa dền vwa sa saj ŋườʔi dòʔi hizam tizơ dến ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa dờn ɣóʔa cifáʔi néptali kòn ca ŋườʔi tizơ tʰợ dồŋ hizam dầʔi xônŋwan tʰôŋiểʔu kó tàʔi kák tʰứ kôŋviệk bằŋ dồŋ ŋườʔi dến vwa salômôn mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋườʔi ŋườʔilàm haj kâʔi cụ bằŋ dồŋ kâʔi tʰứ ɲất kaw mườʔitám tʰướk sợʔi zâʔi mườʔihaj tʰướkdɔ còn kủʔa kâʔi tʰứ ɲì ŋườʔi dúk haj dầʔu cụ bằŋ dồŋ dặt cên cót cụ kaw dầʔu cụ nàʔi tʰướk ɲữŋ võŋ sɛ lạʔi ɲữŋ zâʔi hwa cèʔɔ ɲư cwiền ɲỏ caŋdiểm dầʔu cụ dặt cên cót cụ kó bảʔi zâʔi hwa cɔ dầʔu cụ nàʔi bảʔi zâʔi hwa cɔ dầʔu cụ kiə hizam cuŋkwɛɲ võŋ nàʔi haj hàŋ cáʔi lựʔu dặŋ caŋsứk cɔ dầʔu cụ nàʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi cɔ dầʔu kiə ɲữŋ dầʔu cụ cên kák kâʔi cụ cɔŋ kửʔa dềʔu kó hwa cót kaw tʰướk ɲữŋ dầʔu cụ cên cụ nẩʔi za tʰân cên nơʔi hầʔu fíʔa kiə võŋ kó haj căm cáʔi lựʔu haj hàŋ vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ haj dầʔu cụ hizam zựŋ ɲữŋ kâʔi cụ cɔŋ kửʔa dền tʰờ ŋườʔi zựŋ kâʔi cụ hữʔu dặt zakin dɔạn zựŋ kâʔi cụ dặt bôác cên cót cụ tʰì cế hìɲ hwa kôŋviệk ɲữŋ kâʔi cụ dềʔu hɔàntʰàɲ ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ dúk hìɲcòn kaw tʰướk nàʔi dến kiə kó mườʔi tʰướk sợʔi zâʔi bamươʔi tʰướkdɔ vòŋcòn kủʔa zướʔi kó haj hàŋ zưʔa ák vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ kứ mỗʔi tʰướk mườʔi cáʔi dúk vớʔi biển dể cên mườʔihaj kɔn kɔn hướŋ bắk kɔn hướŋ tâʔi kɔn hướŋ kɔn hướŋ dôŋ biển tʰì dặt cên lưŋ kák kɔn ấʔi fíʔa săw tʰân kɔn dềʔu sâʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ biển dầʔi ɣaŋ tăj ɣiốŋ cén kác ɲư bôŋ dựŋ haj ŋàn ŋườʔi kũŋ mườʔi táŋ dồŋ mỗʔi tʰướk zàʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw kák táŋ kác nàʔi kó ɲữŋ miếŋ cám dóŋ vàʔɔ xuôŋ cên kák cám dóŋ vàʔɔ xuôŋ nàʔi kó hìɲ cê zubin nơʔi ciêŋ cên kũŋ kó ɲưvậʔi kòn nơʔi ciêŋ zướʔi kó ɲữŋ zâʔi hwa tʰòŋ mỗʔi táŋ kó báɲsɛ dồŋ vớʔi kốt dồŋ nơʔi ɣók kó ɲữŋ káʔi dế dúk dể cịʔu káʔi cậʔu ɲữŋ zâʔi hwa mỗʔi káʔi dế ɣiữʔa táŋ cên dầʔu cụ kó miệŋ còn sâʔu tʰướk zộŋ tʰướk zưỡʔi káʔi miệŋ nàʔi kũŋ kó hìɲ cạmcổ kòn kák miếŋ cám tʰì vuôŋ cớ xôŋ fảʔi còn bốn báɲsɛ dềʔu zướʔi ɲữŋ miếŋ cám sák kốt báɲsɛ tʰì dóŋ vàʔɔ táŋ mỗʔi báɲsɛ kaw tʰướk zưỡʔi báɲ ɲư báɲ kủʔa káʔi kộ cụk vàɲ kăm dềʔu dúk kả kó kɔn nơʔi ɣók kủʔa mỗʔi táŋ vớʔi táŋ Ðầʔu táŋ hìɲcòn ɲọn kaw nửʔa tʰướk kũŋ kó cám cên cám kủʔa dế tạʔi nơʔi cốŋ kủʔa mỗʔi cám cừʔa za hizam cạm ɲữŋ cê zubin kâʔi càlà zâʔi hwa cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi tʰeo kiểʔu nàʔi mườʔi táŋ dúk tʰứ kỡ záŋ vớʔi ɲăw ŋườʔi kũŋ mườʔi káʔi tʰùŋ bằŋ dồŋ mỗʔi káʔi cứʔa mươʔi mỗʔi tʰùŋ kó tʰướk dể cên táŋ kủʔa mườʔi káʔi tʰùŋ bằŋ dồŋ mỗʔi káʔi cứʔa mươʔi mỗʔi tʰùŋ kó tʰướk dể cên táŋ kủʔa mườʔi káʔi táŋ ŋườʔi sắpdặt táŋ ɲưvầʔi káʔi hữʔu dền káʔi kòn ŋườʔi dể nơʔi hữʔu dền hướŋ dôŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ cảʔɔ ảŋ vậʔi hizam sɔŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk cɔ salômôn cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tứklà haj kâʔi cụ haj dầʔu cụ còn cên dỉɲ cụ haj võŋ baw haj dầʔu cụ còn vớʔi dỉɲ cụ bốncăm cáʔi lựʔu haj hàŋ vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ võŋ baw haj dầʔu cụ còn nơʔi dỉɲ cụ mườʔi táŋ mườʔi káʔi cên táŋ dúk ŋwiên miếŋ mườʔihaj kɔn dể zướʔi cảʔɔ ảŋ kák xí zụŋ nàʔi hizam cɔ salômôn cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê dềʔu bằŋ dồŋ dáɲbóŋ vwa biểʔu dúk kák dó tạʔi dốŋ bằŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ nơʔi dấtsét ɣiữʔa sukốt sáttʰan salômôn xôŋ kân nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák xí zụŋ ấʔi bởʔivì ɲiềʔu kwá ŋườʔi xôŋ sét nặŋ kủʔa dồŋ salômôn lạʔi ɲữŋ xí zụŋ cɔ dền Ðứkzê bàntʰờ vàŋ ɲữŋ bằŋ vàŋ dể báɲ cầntʰiết cơn dèn bằŋ vàŋzòŋ dặt cướk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ káʔi hữʔu káʔi kùŋ hwa tʰếp dèn káʔi nỉʔa bằŋ vàŋ ɲữŋ cén zaw muỗŋ dồ dựŋ cɔ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ɲữŋ cốt kửʔa hɔặk zùŋ cɔ kửʔa kủʔa ɲà fíʔa cɔŋ hɔặk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ hăjlà zùŋ cɔ kửʔa kủʔa dền tʰờ tʰì dềʔu bằŋ vàŋ kák kôŋviệk salômôn cɔ ɲà Ðứkzê dềʔu dượk hɔàntʰàɲ ɲưvậʔi Ðʔɔạn salômôn saj dɛm kák Ðʔa ka ŋườʔi dã za tʰáɲ tứklà bạk vàŋ kák tʰứ xí zụŋ dể cɔŋ xɔtàŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê bấʔizờ salômôn vờʔi dến mìɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên hếttʰảʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cifáʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋtộk kủʔa ʔisơzaên dặŋ zướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðʔa tứklà siôn cɔŋ lúk ɲằm tʰáŋ tʰaniɲ tʰáŋ bảʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi kùŋ vwa salômôn xi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên dã dến tʰì ɲữŋ tʰầʔi lấʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê zờʔi di vớʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xiêŋ kák dồ dó vwa sa kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên dã vớʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ cướk ɣiết ciên kủʔa zất ɲiềʔu xôŋ tʰế dếm dượk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dɛm zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dếnnơʔi cɔŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ zướʔi káɲ cê zubin vì kák cê zubin ɣiươŋ káɲ za cên nơʔi dể cɛ tʰân cên kák dòn xiêŋ kák dòn xiêŋ zàʔi dếnnỗʔi ŋườʔita nơʔi tʰáɲ cướk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ kótʰể tʰấʔi dượk ɲưŋ ŋɔàʔi tʰì cẳŋ tʰấʔi kák dòn ấʔi dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ cỉ kó haj bảŋ dá môʔisɛ dã dể tạʔi núʔi hôzếp xi Ðứkzê zawướk vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên lúk za xỏʔi sứ zíptô sảʔiza xi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dã za xỏʔi nơʔi tʰàɲ kó mâʔi dầʔizẫʔi ɲà kủʔa Ðứkzê dếnnỗʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kó mâʔi ấʔi xôŋtʰể dứŋ dó hầʔu việk dượk viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔizẫʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê bấʔizờ salômôn ŋwiện zằŋ Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ŋàʔi ŋự cɔŋ nơʔi tốʔităm hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dã kất sɔŋ káʔi dền zùŋ nơʔi ŋự kủʔa ŋàʔi tứk nơʔi ŋàʔi dờʔidờʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa sâʔi lạʔi cúk fướk cɔ hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên dềʔu dứŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên miệŋ ŋàʔi kó fán hứʔa vớʔi Ðʔa ca bởʔi tăj ŋàʔi dã ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ấʔi ŋàʔi fán zằŋ từ ŋàʔi dã dɛm ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi zíptô xôŋ cọn tʰàɲ nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặŋ kất tạʔi dó káʔi ɲà cɔ zɛɲ ŋự ɲưŋ dã cọn Ðʔa dể ŋườʔi cịvì zân ʔisơzaên vả Ðʔa ca kó kất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲưŋÐứkzê kó fán vớʔi Ðʔa ca zằŋ xi ŋươʔi kó sâʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ tʰì lấʔilàm tʰậm fảʔi sɔŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ kất dền ấʔi dâʔu kɔncaj ŋươʔi zɔ lòŋ ŋươʔi sɛɲ za kất dền cɔ zɛɲ vậʔi Ðứkzê dã ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi fán Ðʔa ca ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã hứʔa dã kất dền nàʔi cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tạʔi dó dã zọn cỗ dể cɔŋ kó zawướk ŋàʔi dã vớʔi tổfụ cúŋta xi ŋàʔi dɛm za xỏʔi sứ zíptô kế dó salômôn dứŋ cướk bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê dốʔimặt kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ɣiơ tăj cờʔi zằŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên hɔặk cên cờʔi kaw kiə hɔặk zướʔi dất tʰấp nàʔi cẳŋ kó tʰần nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư cúʔa cúʔa ɣiữ zawướk lòŋ ɲơn vớʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa nàʔɔ hếtlòŋ diở cướk cúʔa Ðốʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi cúʔa kó ɣiữ lờʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰật diềʔu ci miệŋ cúʔa fán tʰì tăj cúʔa dã hɔàntʰàɲ ʔiɲư cúŋtôʔi tʰấʔi ŋàʔinăj vậʔi hỡʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋàʔinăj sin cọn lờʔi cúʔa dã hứʔa kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi zằŋ nếʔu kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi kẩntʰận kák dườŋlốʔi mìɲ diở cướk ʔiɲư ŋươʔi dã di tʰì cướk cẳŋ tʰiếʔu hậʔu ŋươʔi dặŋ ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi nướk ʔisơzaên dâʔu hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên sin hãʔi cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi cúʔa dã hứʔa kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi ɲưŋ kwảtʰật zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋự cên dất nàʔi căŋ kìʔa cờʔi zầʔu dến dỗʔi cờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi cẳŋ kótʰể cứʔa ŋàʔi dượk tʰăj fươŋci káʔi dền nàʔi tôʔi dã kất zầʔu vậʔi hỡʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi sin hãʔi dɔáʔi dến lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa dặŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu xẩn ŋwiện tôʔitớ cúʔa kầʔu cướk cúʔa ŋàʔinăj ŋwiện kủʔa cúʔa ŋàʔi dêm dɔáʔi sɛm ɲà nầʔi cỗ cúʔa dã fán zằŋ zɛɲ ŋự tạʔi dó dặŋ ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa hướŋ nơʔi nàʔi kầʔu fàm diềʔu ɣì tôʔitớ cúʔa zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa hướŋ nơʔi nàʔi xẩnkầʔu sin cúʔa hãʔi zủ ŋɛ fảʔi nơʔi ŋự kủʔa cúʔa tạʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi sin cúʔa zủ ŋɛ ɲậm lờʔi tʰatʰứ cɔ xi ʔaj fạmtộʔi kùŋ lânkận mìɲ ŋườʔita di dó fảʔi tʰề nếʔu ŋườʔi dến tʰề cướk bàntʰờ kủʔa cúʔa tạʔi cɔŋ dền nàʔi tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi ŋɛ dốʔidãʔi sétdɔán tôʔitớ cúʔa cɔ zữ xiến dườŋlốʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu sưŋ kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰưởŋ ŋươʔi tùʔi tʰeo kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi xi zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa kớ fạmtộʔi vớʔi cúʔa ŋịc dáɲ dượk nếʔu cúŋnó cởlạʔi vớʔi cúʔa ɲậnbiết zɛɲ ŋàʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin vớʔi cúʔa cɔŋ dền nàʔi tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi zủ ŋɛ tʰa tộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa xiến cởvề dất cúʔa dã cɔ tổfụ nếʔu kák từŋ cờʔi dóŋ cặt xôŋ kó mưʔa bởʔivì cúŋnó dã fạmtộʔi vớʔi cúʔa nếʔu cúŋnó hướŋ nơʔi nàʔi kầʔuŋwiện ɲậnbiết zɛɲ cúʔa sâʔi tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ săw xi cúʔa dã dɔán fạt tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi zủ ŋɛ tʰa tộʔi cɔ kák tôʔitớ cúʔa cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi sin hãʔi cỉ cɔ kɔn dườŋ tʰiện fảʔi di ɣiáŋ mưʔa cên dất kủʔa cúʔa dã cɔ zân ŋàʔi sảnŋiệp xi cɔŋ sứ sảʔi kó dóʔicém ônzịc tɛn kàʔɔkàʔɔ câʔucấʔu hɔặk kó kwân tʰùŋịc vâʔi kák tʰàɲ kủʔa dịʔafận hăjlà kó tajvạ ci bịɲ ɣì nếʔu kó ŋườʔi hɔặk kả zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa ʔainấʔi dã ɲậnbiết tajhọʔa kủʔa lòŋ mìɲ ɣiơ tăj za hướŋ dền nàʔi kầʔuŋwiện xẩn sin diềʔu ɣì tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi nơʔi cúʔa ŋự zủ ŋɛ tʰatʰứ cɔ dốʔidãʔi báʔɔứŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi tùʔi tʰeo kôŋviệk cúʔa tʰôŋ lòŋ kủʔa tʰật cỉ mộtmìɲ cúʔa lòŋ kủʔa kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dể xiến kíɲ cúʔa cọn dờʔi sốŋ cên dất cúʔa dã cɔ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi vảlạʔi xác ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa ɲưŋ zɛɲ ŋàʔi sứ sa dến ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ ŋɛnóʔi zɛɲ kủʔa cúʔa káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za kủʔa cúʔa xi ŋườʔi dến kầʔuŋwiện cɔŋ ɲà nàʔi sin cúʔa cên cờʔi nơʔi cúʔa ŋự zủ ŋɛ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu ŋườʔi xác kầʔusin cúʔa dể cɔ muônzân kủʔa tʰếzan ɲậnbiết zɛɲ cúʔa kíɲ cúʔa ʔiɲư zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔbiết zằŋ zɛɲ cúʔa sưŋ za cên dền nàʔi tôʔi dã sâʔicất xi zân kủʔa cúʔa di ciếncận kùŋ kwân tʰùŋịc mìɲ tʰeo kɔn dườŋ cúʔa dã saj di nếʔu kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê sâʔi hướŋ tʰàɲ cúʔa dã cọn dền tôʔi dã kất cɔ zɛɲ ŋàʔi tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi zủ ŋɛ kák lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa cúŋ biɲ vựk kwiềnlợʔi cɔ xi cúŋnó fạmtộʔi kùŋ cúʔa xôŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cẳŋ fạmtộʔi cúʔa nổʔizận fó cúŋnó cɔ tʰùŋịc xi fu dến sứ kủʔa tʰùŋịc hɔặk sa hɔặk ɣần víbằŋ cɔŋ sứ ŋĩlạʔi nàʔisin cúʔa zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó fạmtộʔi diềʔu zanák kưsử kác zữtợn ɲượkbằŋ tạʔi cɔŋ sứ tʰùŋịc dã zẫn dến fu hếtlòŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ cúʔa kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ ŋàʔi hướŋ sứ cúʔa dã cɔ tổfụ tʰàɲ cúʔa dã cọn dền tôʔi dã sâʔicất cɔ zɛɲ cúʔa tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi tứk nơʔi cúʔa ŋự hãʔi zủ ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa biɲ vựk kwiền nàʔisin kủʔa biɲ vựk kwiềnlợʔi cɔ tʰa cɔ zân cúʔa tộʔilỗʔi kák cáʔi mạŋ dã fạm kùŋ ŋàʔi sin cúʔa xiến ɲữŋ fu kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót zân ʔisơzaên zânsự cúʔa kơŋiệp kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa dã dɛm za xỏʔi zíptô tứk xỏʔi ɣiữʔa ŋwiệncúʔa dɔáʔi sɛm tôʔitớ cúʔa zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi zủ ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa mỗʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa hỡʔicúʔazê ôʔi cúʔa dã fânkác xỏʔi kák zântộk cên dất dể kơŋiệp cúʔa ʔiɲư cúʔa dã fán bởʔi miệŋ môʔisɛ tôʔitớ cúʔa xi cúʔa dɛm tổfụ cúŋtôʔi za xỏʔi zíptô xisa dã kầʔu vớʔi Ðứkzê ɲữŋ lờʔi xẩn ŋwiện nàʔisin nàʔi sɔŋ dứŋzậʔi cướk bàntʰờ Ðứkzê xỏʔi nơʔi ŋườʔi dã kwì tăj ɣiơ cờʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ cúk fướk lớntiếŋ cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ Ðáŋ xɛnŋợʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã bìɲiên cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi tùʔi tʰeo kák lờʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa về kák lờʔi tốtlàɲ ŋàʔi dã kậʔi miệŋ môʔisɛ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fán za cẳŋ kó lờʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ ứŋŋiệm ŋwiệŋiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi vớʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲư ŋàʔi dã kùŋ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi cớ lìʔa cớ cúŋtôʔi ŋwiện ŋàʔi ɣiụk lòŋ cúŋtôʔi hướŋ ŋàʔi hầʔu cúŋtôʔi di cɔŋ mọʔi dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ɣiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn luậtfáp mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi dã cwiền cɔ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi Ướk ɣì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ŋàʔidêm zủ lòŋ ɲớ dến kák lờʔi dã nàʔisin cướk ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ tùʔi việk kần ŋàʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi Ðứkzê biɲ vựk kwiềnlợʔi kủʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên hầʔu cɔ muônzân kủʔa tʰếzan zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cớ cẳŋ kó ʔaj xák vậʔi kák ŋươʔi xá lấʔilòŋ cọn làɲ dốʔivớʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dể di tʰeo ŋàʔi ɣiữɣìn diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi ʔiɲư kák ŋươʔi dã ŋàʔinăj vwa kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu zâŋ kák kủʔa tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê salômôn zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ Ðứkzê haj haj ŋàn kɔn dựk mườʔihaj kɔnciên vwa kả zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu zự xáɲtʰàɲ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó vwa ziêŋ za nơʔi cíɲ ɣiữʔa kủʔa hàɲlaŋ cướk dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi dó ŋườʔi zâŋ kák kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kủʔa tʰù bởʔivì bàntʰờ bằŋ dồŋ dể cướk dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲỏ kwá dựŋ kák kủʔa tʰù xôŋ dặŋ cɔŋ lúk dó salômôn kả zân ʔisơzaên hộʔi cúŋ zất hamát cɔdến xɛ zíptô tạʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ɣiữ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi lạʔi bảʔi ŋàʔi xák nữʔa kộŋ mườʔibốn ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứ vwa cɔ zânsự zân cúk fướk cɔ vwa di cởvề cạʔi mìɲ lấʔilàm mừŋzỡ vujlòŋ mọʔi tốtlàɲ Ðứkzê dã cɔ Ðʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên zânsự kủʔa ŋàʔi xisa dã kất sɔŋ ɲà kủʔa Ðứkzê kuŋdiện mọʔi ŋườʔi kất tʰì Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi tʰứ ɲì ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã za kùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi ɣabaôn Ðứkzê fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ta dã ɲậm lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa ŋươʔi tʰưʔa cướk dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ káʔi dền nàʔi ŋươʔi dã kất dể cɔ zɛɲ ŋự tạʔi dó dờʔidờʔi lòŋ tʰườŋ dó mãʔimãʔi kòn ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi di cướk ɲư Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi dã di lấʔilòŋ cọn làɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰeo kák diềʔu dã fán zặn ŋươʔi ɣiữ ɲữŋ mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa bấʔizờ cɔ ŋôʔi nướk ŋươʔi kiênkố dến dờʔidờʔi cên ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư dã hứʔa kùŋ Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu hậʔu ŋươʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi sâʔi xôŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn dã cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi di hầʔu việk ɲữŋ tʰần xák tʰờ lạʔi cúŋnó tʰì cuất ʔisơzaên xỏʔi dất dã cɔ cúŋnó cừbỏ xỏʔi cướkmắt káʔi dền nàʔi dã zɛɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ʔisơzaên cởnên lờʔi tụkŋữ còkườʔi ɣiữʔa muônzân kòn dền nàʔi zầʔukaw zườŋ nàʔɔ ʔaj di ŋaŋ kwa ɣần kũŋ lấʔilàm lạlùŋ cêbaj zằŋ kớsaw Ðứkzê kó cɔ sứ nàʔi dền nàʔi ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔita dáp zằŋ Ấʔi cúŋnó dã lìʔabỏ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó Ðấŋ dɛm tổfụ za xỏʔi sứ zíptô tʰeo kák tʰần xák tʰờ lạʔi kák tʰần ấʔi hầʔu việk cúŋnó kớ dó Ðứkzê dã ɣiáŋ cên kák tajhọʔa nàʔi sảʔiza vừʔa cẵn haimươʔi xi salômôn dã sâʔi sɔŋ haj káʔi ɲà tứklà dền kủʔa Ðứkzê kuŋdiện vwa tʰì bấʔizờ vwa salômôn cɔ hizam vwa tizơ haimươʔi tʰàɲ sứ ɣalilê hizam kó kấp cɔ salômôn ɣỗ hươŋ ɣỗ tùŋ vàŋ tùʔi ŋườʔi bawɲiêʔu hizam tizơ dến dặŋ sɛm kák tʰàɲ salômôn dã cɔ mìɲ ɲưŋ kák tʰàɲ dó cẳŋ dẹplòŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛɲ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ ʔɛɲ cɔ ʔɛm dó káʔi ɣì zồʔi ŋườʔi ɣọʔi kák tʰàɲ ấʔilà sứ kabun hãʔi kòn ɣọʔi ɲưvậʔi dến ŋàʔinăj vả hizam dã ɣởʔi cɔ vwa salômôn mộtcăm haimươʔi lâŋ vàŋ nầʔi kớsaw salômôn dã sâʔu dặŋ sâʔicất dền Ðứkzê kuŋdiện mìɲ vớʔi milô vác tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm hátsɔ mêɣidô ɣêsɛ fazaôn vwa kủʔa zíptô dã di ciếm lấʔi ɣêsɛ tʰiêʔudốt ɣiết ɲữŋ zân kanaan cɔŋ tʰàɲ zồʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi kủʔa vukwi cɔ kɔŋáʔi mìɲ salômôn vậʔi salômôn sâʔi tʰàɲ ɣêsɛ bếtʰôzôn zướʔi balát tátmốt tạʔi cɔŋ dất zừŋ kủʔa sứ lạʔi sâʔi kák tʰàɲ kó ɲữŋ xɔ cữ lươŋ fạn kủʔa salômôn ɲữŋ tʰàɲ dể sɛcộ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ cɔ kwân mọʔi diềʔu ɣì dẹplòŋ salômôn sâʔicất tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ liban cɔŋ kả sứ fụk zướʔi kwiền ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ lạʔi cɔŋ zân ʔamôzít zân hêtít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít xôŋ tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên tứklà kák kɔncáʔu kủʔa cúŋnó kòn lạʔi cɔŋ sứ zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ dủ sứk ziệt dượk tʰì salômôn fụ sâʔu zịc cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ɲưŋsa xôŋ zân ʔisơzaên tôʔimọʔi sɔŋ biɲ ciến tôʔitớ kwan cưởŋ kwan tướŋ kwan kaj sɛ líɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi kòn kák kwan cưởŋ dặt kɔjsók kák kôŋviệk kủʔa salômôn nămcăm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi kaicị zân kôŋviệk kɔŋáʔi fazaôn tʰàɲ Ðʔa di kuŋ salômôn dã sâʔicất cɔ nàŋ bấʔizờ ŋườʔi sâʔicất milô mỗʔi salômôn zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù cên bàntʰờ ŋườʔi dã dóŋ cɔ Ðứkzê sôŋ hươŋ cên bàntʰờ dã dặt cướk Ðứkzê ŋườʔi sâʔi sɔŋ dền tʰờ ɲưvậʔi vwa sa kũŋ sắmsửʔa dɔàn tàʔu tạʔi siôŋêbɛ ɣần cên biển dỏ cɔŋ sứ dôm hizam saj ɲữŋ tôʔitớ mìɲ tứk ɲữŋ tʰủʔitʰủ tʰôŋtʰạʔɔ ŋề di dến cɔŋ dɔàn tàʔu dó dặŋ ɣiúp tôʔitớ kủʔa salômôn họ di fiə dɛm cɔ salômôn bốncăm haimươʔi lâŋ vàŋ xi nữvươŋ sêba ŋɛnóʔi zɛɲtiếŋ kủʔa salômôn zɛɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê dến tʰử salômôn ɲiềʔu kâʔudố bà dến ɣiêzusalɛm kó hầʔuhạ tʰeo zất dôŋ lạkdà cở tʰuốk tʰơm ɲiềʔu vàŋ ŋọk bà dếnkùŋ salômôn nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu kó cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ salômôn dáp kák kâʔuhỏʔi kủʔa cẳŋ kâʔu nàʔɔ kwá cɔ vwa vwa xôŋ ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa nổʔi cɔ xi nữvươŋ sêba tʰấʔi mọʔi xônŋwan kủʔa salômôn kuŋdiện ŋườʔi kất ɲữŋ cên ŋườʔi ɲàkửʔa kủʔa tôʔitớ ŋườʔi tʰứtự kôŋviệk kủʔa kák kwan dồ ănmặk kủʔa kák kwan cướk tửʔu kák kủʔa tʰiêʔu ŋườʔi zâŋ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê tʰì mấtvíʔa zồʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu tôʔi ŋɛnóʔi cɔŋ sứ tôʔi lờʔinóʔi xônŋwan kủʔa vwa tʰì tʰật sɔŋ cướk xi tôʔi cưʔa dến dâʔi cưʔa tʰấʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu nàʔi tʰì tôʔi cẳŋ kìʔa ŋườʔita cẳŋ nóʔi dến dượk fânnửʔa sự xônŋwan waiŋi kủʔa vwa cổʔi tiếŋ dồn tôʔi dã ŋɛ kák tôʔitớ vwa tʰật kó fướk tʰăj kák tôʔitớ vwa hằŋ dứŋ cầʔu cướk vwa ŋɛ xônŋwan kủʔa vwa lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj Ðáŋ xɛnŋợʔi tʰăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa ŋàʔi dẹplòŋ vwa dặt vwa cên ŋôʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên bởʔivì Ðứkzê ʔiêʔuzấʔu ʔisơzaên mãʔimãʔi ŋàʔi dã vwa vwa dặŋ kaicị tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ kôŋbìɲ Ðʔɔạn nữvươŋ zâŋ cɔ vwa mộtcăm haimươʔi lâŋ vàŋ zất ɲiềʔu tʰuốk tʰơm kùŋ ŋọk kwí từ dó ɲẫn năj cẳŋ kó ʔaj dɛm tʰuốk tʰơm dến sốɲiềʔu bằŋ kủʔa nữvươŋ nướk sêba zâŋ cɔ vwa salômôn Ðʔɔàn tàʔu hizam cở vàŋ fiə kũŋ cở kâʔi bạcdàn zất ɲiềʔu ŋọk kwí vwa zùŋ kâʔi bạcdàn nàʔi bawlơn cɔ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê cɔ ɲàvwa kùŋ ɲữŋ dờn kầm dơn cɔ kɔɲát từ dó cẳŋ kó ʔaj dɛm dến ɣiêzusalɛm kâʔi bạcdàn zườŋ ấʔi nữʔa xôŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi lạʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj vwa sa cɔ nữvươŋ sêba mọʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi ướk sin cẳŋ ɲữŋ salômôn dã cɔ tùʔi tʰườŋ kủʔa vwa Ðʔɔạn kák tôʔitớ lêndườŋ cởvề sứ mìɲ vàŋ vwa salômôn tʰâʔu ɲận mỗʔi kân dến sáʔu căm bảʔi mươʔi sáʔu lâŋ xôŋ vàŋ ŋườʔi tʰâʔu lấʔi nơʔi ŋườʔi zôŋ nơʔi dổʔicák kủʔa tʰươŋmạʔi kùŋ vàŋ kák vwa ʔazabi kák kwan tổŋdốk kủʔa sứ dɛm vwa sa haj căm káʔi xiên bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiák kứ mỗʔi káʔi zùŋ sáʔu căm siếk vàŋ lạʔi bɛcăm káʔi xiên ɲỏ bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiák kứ mỗʔi káʔi zùŋ vàŋ vwa dể kák xiên ấʔi cɔŋ dền zừŋ liban vwa kũŋ káʔi ŋaj bằŋ ŋà bọk vàŋzòŋ ŋaj nàʔi kó sáʔu nấk tʰân kaw ŋaj fíʔa săw tʰì còn mỗʔi fíʔa ŋaj kó tʰɛɲ nâŋ tăj haj kɔn dứŋ lạʔi kó mườʔihaj kɔn xák dứŋ cên sáʔu nấk nơʔi hữʔu cẳŋ kó nướk nàʔɔ ŋaj ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi hếttʰảʔi kák cén ʔuốŋ kủʔa vwa salômôn dềʔu bằŋ vàŋ ɲữŋ xí zụŋ cɔŋ kuŋ zừŋ liban dềʔu kũŋ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cẳŋ kó ci bằŋ bạk cɔŋ dờʔi vwa salômôn ŋườʔita cẳŋ bạk ci vì dɔàn tàʔu tazêsi kủʔa vwa mỗʔi vớʔi dɔàn tàʔu kủʔa hizam dɛm vàŋ bạk ŋàvɔj kɔnxỉ kɔn kôŋ Ấʔi vậʔi vwa salômôn cổʔi kák vwa tʰếzan ɣiàʔukó xônŋwan kả tʰiêɲạ dềʔu salômôn dặŋ ŋɛ xônŋwan Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dể cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi kứ hằŋ tʰeo dịɲ mọʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu dɛm dến zâŋ mìɲ tiếnkốŋ cɔ vwa nàʔɔ cậʔu bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ áʔɔsốŋ biɲxí tʰuốk tʰơm ŋựʔa salômôn kũŋ ɲóm sɛ líɲ kó mộtŋàn bốncăm sɛ mườʔihaj ŋàn líɲ dể cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ cứʔa sɛ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɣần vwa tạʔizê zusalɛm vwa cɔ bạk za tʰườŋ ɲư dá kâʔi hươŋ ɲiềʔu ɲư kâʔi suŋ mọk nơʔi dồŋbằŋ vwa sa zɔ nơʔi zíptô dượk ŋựʔa dɔàn kɔnbuôn kủʔa vwa di mwa từŋ bầʔi ɣiá fảʔicăŋ mỗʔi kỗ sɛ mwa sứ zíptô zẫn ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiá dáŋ sáʔu căm siếk bạk kòn mỗʔi kɔn ŋựʔa ɣiá dáŋ mộtcăm nămmươʔi siếk kák vwa zân hêtít vwa sizi kũŋ tʰeo ɣiá ấʔi ɲờ ɲữŋ kɔnbuôn kủʔa vwa mwa ŋɔàʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa fazaôn vwa salômôn lạʔi kòn tʰươŋmến ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa zân ŋɔạʔi tứklà ŋườʔi môáp ʔammôn dôm sidôn hêtít cúŋnó tʰuộk kák zântộk Ðứkzê kó fán vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cúŋnó cớ dilạʔi zawtʰôŋ vớʔi ɲăw cúŋnó kwiến zụ lòŋ kák ŋươʔi hướŋ tʰeo kák tʰần cúŋnó salômôn cíʔu ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi ŋườʔi kó bảʔicăm hɔàŋậʔu bɛcăm kuŋnữ cúŋnó cɔ ŋườʔi cở lòŋ cɔŋ buổʔi ɣiàʔiếʔu kák hɔàŋậʔu kủʔa salômôn zụ lòŋ ŋườʔi di tʰeo kák tʰần xák Ðốʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ lòŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ cọn làɲ ɲưtʰể lòŋ kủʔa Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi vìsa kúŋ tʰờ nữtʰần kủʔa zân sidôn tʰần miɲkôm tʰần dáŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa zân ʔammôn ɲưvậʔi salômôn diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê cẳŋ vâŋ tʰeo Ðứkzê kác cọn làɲ ɲư Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi dã bấʔizờ salômôn lạʔi sâʔicất tạʔi cên núʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzusalɛm nơʔi kaw cɔ kêmók dáŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa zân môáp cɔ mɔlók dáŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa zân ʔammôn vwa kũŋ ɲưvậʔi cɔ hếttʰảʔi kák hɔàŋậʔu ŋɔạʔi kủʔa mìɲ sôŋ hươŋ cɔ tʰần kủʔa cúŋnó Ðứkzê nổʔizận kùŋ salômôn bởʔivì lòŋ ŋườʔi cở ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðấŋ dã haj dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi fán bảʔɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ cớ tʰeo kák tʰần xák ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán vớʔi salômôn zằŋ bởʔivì ŋươʔi dã diềʔu nàʔi xôŋ ɣiữ zawướk luậtfáp cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi cắk dɔạt lấʔi nướk xỏʔi ŋươʔi cɔ tôʔitớ ŋươʔi sɔŋ kớ Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi cẳŋ diềʔu dó cɔŋ dờʔi ŋươʔi ta dɔạt lấʔi nướk xỏʔi tăj kɔncaj ŋươʔi lạʔi cẳŋ dɔạt lấʔi kả nướk xỏʔi sɔŋ kớ Ðʔa dầʔitớ kớ ɣiêzusalɛm dã cọn dể lạʔi cifáʔi cɔ kɔncaj ŋươʔi vậʔi Ðứkzê xiến zấʔi tʰùŋịc kùŋ salômôn hadát ŋườʔi dôm zòŋzõʔi vwa dôm vả cɔŋ lúk Ðʔa dáɲ zẹp dôm tʰì ɣiôáp tổŋbiɲ di côn kák tʰák ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ dôm ɣiôáp kả ʔisơzaên lạʔi dó sáʔu tʰáŋ cɔdến xi ŋườʔi dã ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ dôm lúk bấʔizờ hadát cạʔi cốn kùŋ mấʔi ŋườʔi dôm tôʔitớ kủʔa ca ŋườʔi dặŋ dến zíptô hadát hãʔi kòn tʰơấʔu cúŋ di madiən dến fazan dɔạn mấʔi ŋườʔi fazan tʰeo mìɲ di dến zíptô zamắt fazaôn vwa sứ zíptô vwa kấp cɔ hadát ɲàở lươŋtʰựk dất zuộŋ hadát dượk ɲiềʔu cướk fazaôn vwa ɣả ʔɛm mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi tứklà ʔɛm kủʔa hɔàŋậʔu tákbênɛ ʔɛm kủʔa tákbênɛ sɛɲ cɔ hadát kɔncaj ɣênubát tákbênɛ zứt sữʔa tạʔi cɔŋ dền fazaôn ɲưvậʔi ɣênubát tạʔi cɔŋ dền fazaôn ɣiữʔa kák kɔncaj kủʔa vwa xiha dát zíptô hăj zằŋ Ðʔa dã ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák ŋườʔi ɣiôáp kwan tổŋbiɲ dã tʰák tʰì ŋườʔi tâʔu kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ sin hãʔi dể cɔ tôʔi di cởvề cɔŋ sứ tôʔi fazaôn dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi nơʔi kó tʰiếʔuɣì saw ʔawướk cởvề cɔŋ sứ mìɲ ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ci zầʔu vậʔi sin cɔ tôʔi di Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi xiến zấʔi tʰùŋịc xák zêsôn kɔncaj lizada dã cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cúʔa mìɲ hadadêsɛ vwa sôba xiÐʔa ɣiết kwân vwa sôba tʰì ŋườʔi ấʔi ɲóm ŋườʔita cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ làmdầʔu dó di dến tʰàɲ Ðʔa mác tạʔi dó kwảncị tʰàɲ ấʔi zêsôn kừʔudịc kùŋ ʔisơzaên cọn dờʔi salômôn ŋɔàʔiza bạʔi hadát dã ŋườʔi kaicị nướk sizi ɣɛŋét ʔisơzaên ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát ŋườʔi zaim dất sêzêda tôʔitớ kủʔa salômôn kũŋ zấʔi ŋịc vớʔi ŋườʔi mẹ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa sêzuha nàʔi zwiênkớ ŋườʔi fảnŋịc vớʔi vwa salômôn sâʔicất milô lạʔi nơʔi lủŋ kủʔa tʰàɲ Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi vả ɣiêzôbôʔam ŋườʔi mạɲzạn tàʔinăŋ salômôn tʰấʔi ŋườʔi tuổʔicẻ kó tàʔi ŋề dặt ŋườʔi làmdầʔu sâʔu cɔ kả ɲà ɣiôsép sảʔi cɔŋ lúk dó ɣiêzôbôʔam ɣiêzusalɛm di za ɣặp tiênci ʔahiza silô tạʔi ɣiữʔa dườŋ mặk káʔi áʔɔtơʔi mớʔi cỉ kó haj ŋườʔiở ŋɔàʔi dồŋ tʰôʔi ʔahiza áʔɔ mớʔi ŋườʔi mặk cɔŋ mìɲ sé za mườʔi miếŋ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi mườʔi miếŋ fần ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvậʔi kìʔa dɔạt lấʔi nướk xỏʔi tăj salômôn caw cɔ ŋươʔi mườʔi cifáʔi kủʔa nướk ấʔi ɲưŋ kớ Ðʔa tôʔitớ kớ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲ dã cọn ɣiữʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên kó cifáʔi kứ cuŋtín kùŋ ŋườʔi Ấʔi bởʔivì cúŋnó dã di tʰờ lạʔi nữtʰần kủʔa zân sidôn tʰần sứ môáp miɲkôm tʰần kủʔa zân ʔammôn cúŋnó xôŋ di tʰeo kák dườŋlốʔi dặŋ diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ tạʔi cướk kũŋ cẳŋ ɣiữ diềʔu zăn ʔiɲư Ðʔa ca kủʔa salômôn dã ɲưŋ cẳŋ kất lấʔi kả nướk xỏʔi tăj salômôn sɔŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ dã cọn ŋườʔilàm vwa cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi sốŋ bởʔivì Ðʔa dã ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ɲưŋ dɔạt lấʔi nướk xỏʔi tăj kɔncaj ŋườʔi caw cɔ ŋươʔi mườʔi cifáʔi ta dể lạʔi cifáʔi cɔ kɔncaj ŋườʔi dể cɔ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲ dã cọn dặŋ dặt zɛɲ dó Ðʔa tôʔitớ hằŋ kó ŋọn dèn cướk vậʔi cọn ŋươʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi kaicị tʰeo lòŋ ŋươʔi và nếʔu ŋươʔi vâŋ tʰeo lịɲ di cɔŋ kák dườŋlốʔi diềʔu tʰiện cướk ɣiữɣìn diềʔu zăn ʔiɲư Ðʔa tôʔitớ dã tʰì kùŋ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲà vữŋcắk ʔiɲư dã cɔ Ðʔa ʔisơzaên cɔ ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi sỉɲụk zòŋzõʔi Ðʔa ɲưŋ cẳŋ fảʔi dờʔidờʔi salômôn tʰế ɣiết ɣiêzôbôʔam ɲưŋ ɣiêzôbôʔam cạʔi cốn kwa zíptô dếnkùŋ sisắk vwa zíptô zồʔi ŋườʔiở tạʔi zíptô cɔdến cừŋ salômôn băŋà kòn kák diềʔu xák cwiện salômôn mọʔi việk ŋườʔi xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác hàɲcạŋ kủʔa salômôn salômôn ɣiêzusalɛm kaicị cên kả ʔisơzaên cɔŋ mươʔi Ðʔɔạn salômôn ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi zôbôʔam kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi zôbôʔam dến sicɛm kả ʔisơzaên dã lạʔi tạʔi sicɛm dặŋ ŋườʔilàm vwa xizê zôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát hăj diềʔu dó tʰì kòn zíptô nơʔi ŋườʔi cốn dể tʰɔát xỏʔi vwa salômôn ŋườʔita saj ŋườʔi tạʔi dó ɣiêzôbôʔam kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên dềʔu dến tâʔu vớʔi zôbôʔam zằŋ tʰânfụ vwa dã cɔ ác cúŋtôʔi nặŋ kwá ɲưŋ bâʔizờ vwa hãʔi ɣiảm ɲẹ fụkzịc xóɲọk káʔi ác nặŋ tʰânfụ vwa dã ɣán cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi fụkzịc vwa ŋườʔi dáp vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi luj cɔŋ ŋàʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ zânsự luj vwa zô bôʔam vớʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dã hầʔuhạ salômôn ca mìɲ cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔ fảʔi dáp vớʔi zânsự nàʔi làmsaw cúŋ tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ nếʔu ŋàʔinăj vwa ɲư ŋườʔi dầʔitớ kủʔa zânsự nàʔi fụk dáp lờʔi còcwiện kùŋ tʰì tôʔitớ vwa mãʔimãʔi ɲưŋzô bôʔam xôŋ tʰeo mưʔu kủʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dã cɔ mìɲ ŋị kùŋ kák caicẻ dồŋ vớʔi mìɲ hầʔuhạ mìɲ zằŋ zânsự nàʔi dã tâʔu vớʔi zằŋ hãʔi ɣiảm ɲẹ káʔi ác tʰânfụ vwa dã ɣán cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ fảʔi dáp vớʔi cúŋnó làmsaw kák ɣã caicẻ dồŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi dáp zằŋ zânsự nàʔi dã tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ tʰânfụ vwa xiến ác cúŋtôʔi nặŋ vwa hãʔi cɔ za ɲẹ vwa fảʔi dáp lạʔi kùŋ cúŋ ɲưvầʔi ŋóntăj kón lưŋ kủʔa ca vậʔi ca dã ɣák káʔi ác nặŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi káʔi ác kák ŋươʔi tʰêm nặŋ hơnnữʔa ca sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj za sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj bọkạp ŋàʔi tʰứba ɣiêzôbôʔam kả zânsự dềʔu di dến zôbôʔam ʔiɲư vwa dã biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi vwa dáp lờʔi vớʔi zânsự kác sẳŋ sớm xôŋ kák lờʔi kủʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ tʰeo mưʔu kák caicẻ dáp lạʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ca dã xiến cɔ ác kák ŋươʔi nặŋnề ác kák ŋươʔi kàŋ nặŋnề hơnnữʔa ca kó sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj za sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj bọkạp ɲưvậʔi vwa xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ lờʔi zânsự diềʔu dó bởʔi Ðứkzê zẫn dến dặŋ cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi kậʔi ʔahiza silô fán cɔ ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát xi kả ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi vwa xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ lờʔi dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cúŋta kó fần ɣì kùŋ Ðʔa cúŋta cẳŋ kó kơŋiệp ci vớʔi kɔncaj ʔisaj hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi cởvề cạʔi mìɲ di Ðʔa zàʔi ŋươʔi xá kɔicừŋ ɲà kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi ʔisơzaên dềʔu zút kák cạʔi kủʔa ɲưŋ zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi kák tʰàɲ zuda tʰì zôbôʔam kaicị bấʔizờ zôbôʔam saj ʔadôzam ŋườʔi kɔjsók việk kốŋ tʰuế dếnkùŋ cúŋ ɲưŋ kả ʔisơ zên dá ŋườʔi cết vwa zô bôʔam lậtdật sɛ cốn ɣiêzusalɛm Ấʔi vậʔi ʔisơzaên fảnŋịc ɲà Ðʔa cɔdến ŋàʔinăj xi zân ʔisơzaên hăj zằŋ ɣiêzôbôʔam dã cởvề saj mờʔi ŋườʔi dến hộʔi mìɲ ŋườʔilàm vwa cên ʔisơzaên cỉ kó cifáʔi zuda kứ tʰeo ɲà Ðʔa tʰôʔi zôbôʔam dến ɣiêzusalɛm ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ɲà zuda cifáʔi bêŋiəmiɲ mươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi líɲciến kéncọn twan cɛɲ ciến kùŋ ɲà ʔisơzaên dặŋ nướk fụk lạʔi zôbôʔam kɔncaj salômôn ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ sêmaza ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ zôbôʔam kɔncaj salômôn vwa zuda kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ɲà zuda bêŋiəmin fần zânsự kòn lạʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ di dáɲ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zân ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ nàʔi bởʔi sảʔi dến cúŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi Ðứkzê cởvề tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam sâʔicất sicɛm cên núʔi zaim tạʔi dó Ðʔɔạn dó ŋườʔi di za sâʔicất fênuên bấʔizờ ɣiêzôbôʔam nóʔitʰầm zằŋ hɔặk nướk cởvề ɲà Ðʔa căŋ nếʔu zânsự nàʔi di ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ tạʔi cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứk ɣiê tʰì lòŋ cắk cởvề cúʔa kủʔa zôbôʔam vwa zuda ŋườʔita ɣiết di cởvề vớʔi zôbôʔam vwa zuda vậʔi vwa bàndịɲ zồʔi cwiền haj kɔn kɔn bằŋ vàŋ nóʔi vớʔi zânsự zằŋ kák ŋươʔi di ɣiêzusalɛm tʰật xó tʰăj hỡʔi ʔisơzaên nầʔi kák tʰần ŋươʔi dã dɛm ŋươʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô ŋườʔi dặt kɔn nàʔi tạʔi bêtên kɔn kiə tạʔi Ðʔan việk dó tʰàɲ tộʔilỗʔi zâncúŋ di dến Ðʔan dặŋ tʰờ lạʔi kɔn ấʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam kũŋ kất cùʔa miễʔu cên kák nơʔi kaw cọn lấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ zâncúŋ tʰầʔi xôŋ tʰuộk cifáʔi lêvi ŋườʔi lạʔi dịɲ cɔŋ tʰáŋ ŋàʔi zằm ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔita tʰườŋ zự cɔŋ sứ zuda ŋườʔi zâŋ kák kủʔa cên bàntʰờ ŋườʔi kũŋ ɲưvậʔi tạʔi bêtên cɔ haj kɔn ŋườʔi dã lạʔi dể tạʔi bêtên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa kák nơʔi kaw ŋườʔi dã kất ŋàʔi zằm tʰáŋ tứklà tʰáŋ ŋườʔi cọn lấʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam di bàntʰờ mìɲ dã kất tạʔi bêtên ŋườʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zồʔi di bàntʰờ dặŋ sôŋ hươŋ Ðươŋ xi ɣiêzôbôʔam dứŋ ɣần bàntʰờ dặŋ sôŋ hươŋ kìʔa kó ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zuda vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê dến bêtên ŋườʔi vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê kwởcác bàntʰờ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi bàntʰờ bàntʰờ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi một dứʔa kɔncaj sɛɲ za cɔ ɲà Ðʔa ɣiôsi ʔa nó zâŋ cên mầʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa kák nơʔi kaw ŋườʔi sôŋ hươŋ cên mầʔi ŋườʔita tʰiêʔu cên mầʔi hàʔicốt kủʔa ŋườʔi cết cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tʰầʔi tiênci zấʔu zằŋ nầʔi zấʔu Ðứkzê dã fán bàntʰờ cɔ cên bàntʰờ dổ suốŋ dất xi vwa ɣiêzôbôʔam ŋɛ lờʔi hămzọʔa ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi nóʔi ŋịc kùŋ bàntʰờ tạʔi bêtên tʰì ŋườʔi ɣiơ tăj za cên bàntʰờ bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi di ɲưŋ káɲtăj vwa ɣiơ za dốʔi kùŋ tiênci cởnên xô xôŋ tʰế kɔ lạʔi vàʔɔ mìɲ dượk bàntʰờ kũŋ za cɔ cên dổ suốŋ ʔiɲư zấʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê za bấʔizờ vwa kấttiếŋ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi nàʔisin ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kầʔuŋwiện cɔ hầʔu cɔ tăj dượk lạʔi ɲư kũ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê tʰì tăj vwa kɔ vàʔɔ dượk cởlạʔi ʔiɲư cướk vwa nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi kuŋ vớʔi dặŋ sứk lạʔi zâŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp lạʔi kùŋ vwa zằŋ zẫʔu vwa cɔ tôʔi fânnửʔa zasản vwa tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ vàʔɔ kuŋ vớʔi vwa hɔặk báɲ hăjlà ʔuốŋ nướk tạʔi nơʔi nàʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ɲưvầʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ báɲ cớ ʔuốŋ nướk cớ nɔj kɔn dườŋ ŋươʔi dã di cởvề Ấʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi di dườŋ xák cẳŋ cởlạʔi dườŋ ŋườʔi dã di dến bêtên vả kó tiênci ɣià tạʔi bêtên một kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến họk lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã tạʔi bêtên cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kák lờʔi ŋườʔi dã nóʔi vớʔi vwa ŋườʔi ca ŋɛ lờʔi tʰuật nàʔi tʰì hỏʔi kɔn mìɲ zằŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi di dườŋ nàʔɔ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi cỉ kɔn dườŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zuda dã nɔj divề ŋườʔi nóʔi kùŋ kák kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi tʰắŋ lừʔa cúŋ tʰắŋ lừʔa zồʔi ŋườʔi kỡʔi di tʰeo ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣặp ŋườʔi ŋồʔi zướʔi ɣốk kâʔi tʰôŋ tʰì nóʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ŋươʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zuda dến căŋ ŋườʔi dáp Ấʔilà tôʔi tiênci ɣià zằŋ hãʔi dến ɲà vớʔi dặŋ zùŋbữʔa ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dáp lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋtʰể cởvề vớʔi ôŋ kũŋ cẳŋtʰể vàʔɔ ɲà ôŋ hɔặk báɲ hăjlà ʔuốŋ nướk vớʔi ôŋ tạʔi nơʔi nàʔi kũŋ xôŋ dặŋ Ðứkzê dã fán zặn tôʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ báɲ cớ ʔuốŋ nướk tạʔi nơʔi dó kũŋ dừŋ cởlạʔi tʰeo kɔn dườŋ ŋươʔi dã dặŋ di dến ŋườʔi kiə lạʔi zằŋ ta kũŋ tiênci ɲư ŋươʔi vả tʰiênsứ vâŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê kó fán vớʔi zằŋ hãʔi zẫn vàʔɔ ɲà vớʔi ŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ báɲ ʔuốŋ nướk ɲưŋ ŋườʔi tiênci nàʔi nóʔizốʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cởlạʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ tạʔi ɲà ŋườʔi xi haj ŋườʔi dươŋ ŋồʔi kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán vớʔi tiênci dã dɛm ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kêʔula kùŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zuda dến zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi bởʔivì ŋươʔi fảnŋịc lờʔi kủʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã cwiền cɔ ŋươʔi ɲưŋ dã cởlạʔi báɲ ʔuốŋ nướk tạʔi dó tʰì sákcết ŋươʔi cẳŋ dượk côn cɔŋ kủʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi xi dã ănuốŋ sɔŋ tiênci ɣià tʰắŋ lừʔa cɔ tiênci mìɲ dã zẫn ŋườʔi di zọk dườŋ ŋườʔi ɣặp kɔn ɣiết di tʰâʔi ŋườʔi sảʔi cên dườŋ kó kɔn lừʔa dứŋ kòn kũŋ dứŋ ɣần tʰâʔi kó ŋườʔi di ŋaŋ kwa tʰấʔi tʰâʔi sảʔi cên dườŋ kɔn dứŋ tʰì di dến cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa tiênci ɣià tʰuật lạʔi dềʔu mìɲ dã tʰấʔi xi tiênci ɣià ŋườʔi dã xiến ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cở bướk lạʔi ŋɛ diềʔu ấʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fảnŋịc lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê bởʔivậʔi cɔnên Ðứkzê dã fó ŋườʔi cɔ fân sé ɣiết di ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi biểʔu kák kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi tʰắŋ lừʔa cúŋ tʰắŋ lừʔa ŋườʔi di ɣặp sákcết cên dườŋ kɔn lừʔa kɔn haj kɔn xôŋ sákcết xôŋ fân sé kɔn lừʔa tiênci ɣià kất sák kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cở cên kɔn lừʔa dɛm vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ dặŋ tʰanxók côn ŋườʔi ŋườʔi côn sák ấʔi cɔŋ mìɲ zồʔi xók ŋườʔi zằŋ tʰươŋôʔi ʔɛɲ ôʔi săw xi côn sák zồʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi kák kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ xi nàʔɔ cết kák kɔn hãʔi côn vàʔɔ dã côn ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể hàʔicốt hàʔicốt ŋườʔi vì kák lờʔi hămzọʔa ŋườʔi vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê nóʔi ŋịc kùŋ bàntʰờ tạʔi bêtên ŋịc kùŋ kák cùʔa miễʔu tạʔi cên ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ samazi dượk ứŋŋiệm săw việk ấʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam xôŋ cởlạʔi kɔn dườŋ ák mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi cɔ kák nơʔi kaw ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cọn cɔŋ dám zânsự fàm ʔaj tìɲŋwiện tʰì dượk ŋườʔi ziêŋ za tʰầʔi tạʔi kák nơʔi kaw ɲân kớ ấʔi ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam fạmtộʔi dến dỗʔi ziệt xỏʔi mặtdất cɔŋ lúk dó ʔabiza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam dăw ɣiêzôbôʔam nóʔi vớʔi mìɲ zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɣiảzạŋ xák di cɔ ŋườʔita xôŋ ŋườʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi di dến silô tạʔi dó kó tiênci ʔahiza dấŋ dã nóʔi cướk zằŋ vwa kủʔa zânsự nàʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi lấʔi dɛm tʰeo mườʔi báɲ ɲữŋ báɲ ŋọt bìɲ mậtɔŋ zồʔi hãʔi di dến ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dềʔu fảʔi sảʔi dến cɔ kɔncẻ vợɣiê zôbôʔam tʰeo vậʔi dứŋzậʔi di dến silô tớʔi ɲà ʔahiza vả ʔahiza xôŋ tʰấʔi dượk bởʔivì tuổʔi ɣià cɔ ŋườʔi mùlòʔa ɲưŋÐứkzê fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ kìʔa kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam dến kầʔu hỏʔi ŋươʔi kɔncaj dươŋ dăw ŋươʔi dáp lờʔi kùŋ tʰể nàʔi tʰể nàʔi xi dến nàŋ ɣiảzạŋ ŋườʔi xák xi nàŋ bướk kwa ŋạc kửʔa káʔi ʔahiza ŋɛ tiếŋ bướk ŋườʔi tʰì nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi vwa ɣiêzôbôʔam hãʔi vàʔɔ kớsaw ŋươʔi ɣiả ŋườʔi xák ta cịʔu saj báʔɔ cɔ ŋươʔi zữ hãʔi di tâʔu vớʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã kất ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự ŋươʔi vwa cên zân ʔisơzaên ta dã dɔạt lấʔi nướk xỏʔi ɲà Ðʔa tôʔitớ ŋườʔi ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn hếtlòŋ tʰeo cỉ diềʔu tʰiện tạʔi cướk ŋươʔi dã diềʔu ák kák bốʔi ŋươʔi di cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ tʰần xák hìɲtượŋ dúk dặŋ cọkzận dã cốʔibỏ bởʔi kớ dó ɣiáŋ tajhọʔa cên ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam kák diɲ kủʔa hăjlà ŋườʔi tựzɔ ziệt xỏʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kwét sạc ɲà ɲư ŋườʔita kwét fân cɔdến cẳŋ kòn ci fàm ŋườʔi kủʔa ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam cết tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ dềʔu có kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cết ŋɔàʔi dồŋ tʰì cim cờʔi kắn zỉʔa di Ðứkzê dã fán vậʔi tʰếtʰì hãʔi dứŋzậʔi cởvề ɲàŋươʔi vừʔa xi ŋươʔi dặt cơn vàʔɔ tʰàɲ tʰì kɔnŋươʔi cết kả ʔisơzaên tʰanxók côn cɔŋ ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam cỉ mộtmìɲ dượk côn nơʔi cɔŋ zakwiến ɣiêzôbôʔam cỉ tʰấʔi nơʔi kó cút lòŋ dốʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê zấʔi vwa cên ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ziệt ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam màsaw việk dã sảʔi dến zồʔi Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi ʔisơzaên ɲư kâʔi sậʔi nướk dưʔa di cuất ʔisơzaên xỏʔi sứ tốtdẹp nàʔi ŋàʔi dã cɔ tổfụ lạk fíʔa kiə sôŋkáʔi bởʔivì dã lấʔi hìɲtượŋ cọkzận Ðứkzê vì kớ tộʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm tứk tộʔi xiến cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kanfạm Ðứkzê fó ʔisơzaên vàʔɔ tăj tʰùŋịc vợ kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam dứŋzậʔi di dến tiệtsa nàŋ vừʔa dặt cơn cên ŋạc kửʔɛɲà tʰì dứʔa cẻ dã cết ŋườʔita côn kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu tʰanxók tʰeo ɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ʔahiza dấŋ tiênci fán mọʔi kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam tứklà cɛɲ ciến kuộk cịvì kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiêzôbôʔam cịvì haimươʔihaj dɔạn ŋườʔi ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ nadáp kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi Ðờʔizô bôʔam cịvì zôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa salômôn kaicị zuda xi lênŋôʔi ŋườʔi dã dượk mươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi cịvì mườʔibảʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲ Ðứkzê dã cọn cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặŋ dặt zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋự tạʔi dó mẹ ŋườʔi naama ŋườʔi ʔammôn zâŋiw da diềʔu ák tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê kớ tộʔifạm cúŋnó cọk cɔ Ðứkzê fânbì kák tổfụ mìɲ dã vì ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda kũŋ sâʔicất cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw cụ tʰờ tượŋ tạʔi cên kák ɣò nổŋ kaw zướʔi ɲữŋ kâʔi zậm kũŋ kó ɲữŋ zan cɔŋ sứ cúŋ bắtcướk tʰeo ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên năm tʰứnăm dờʔi zôbôʔam cịvì sisắk vwa zíptô di dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm lấʔi kák câʔubáʔu kủʔa dền Ðứkzê kủʔa kuŋ vwa ŋườʔi kũŋ dɔạt lấʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ xiên bằŋ vàŋ salômôn dã vwa zô bôʔam cwiền ɲữŋ xiên bằŋ dồŋ dặŋ tʰế cɔ kák xiên ấʔi zaw cɔ kák kwan làmdầʔu tʰịvệ kɛɲ kửʔa kuŋ vwa hễ vwa di vàʔɔ dền Ðứkzê kó ɲữŋ tʰịvệ kầm kák xiên ấʔi dɔạn dɛm kất lạʔi cɔŋ fòŋ tʰịvệ kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa zôbôʔam mọʔi việk ŋườʔi dã dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kủʔa kák vwa zuda vả zôbôʔam ɣiêzôbôʔam dáɲ ɣiặk ɲăw zôbôʔam ʔaŋiấk vớʔi tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn vớʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa mẹ ŋườʔi naama ŋườʔi ʔammôn ʔabizam kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi vwa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tʰì ʔabizam lênŋôʔi vwa zuda ŋườʔi cịvì ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi maaka kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔabisalôm ŋườʔi di cɔŋ kák tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ca ŋườʔi dã fạm cướk ŋườʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cọn làɲ vớʔi ɣiêhɔva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi ɲưtʰể lòŋ Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ kớ Ðʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi zàɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ŋọn dèn cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm kɔncaj ŋườʔilàm ŋườʔi xiến cɔ ɣiêzusalɛm kòn hɔàʔi Ðʔa diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ŋɔàʔi việk ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ sâʔi diềʔu ɣì kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ vả zôbôʔam ɣiêzôbôʔam dáɲ ɣiặk ɲăw cọn dờʔi mìɲ kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ʔabizam mọʔi việk ŋườʔilàm dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kủʔa kák vwa zuda ʔabizam ɣiêzôbôʔam kũŋ dáɲ ɣiặk ɲăw ʔabizam ʔaŋiấk vớʔi tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ haimươʔi dờʔi vwa ɣiêzôbôʔam vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ʔasa lênŋôʔi vwa zuda ŋườʔi kaicị mươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm bà nộʔi ŋườʔi maaka kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔabisalôm ʔasa diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi dã ŋườʔi duổʔi zan xỏʔi sứ zạʔi hếttʰảʔi hìɲtượŋ tổfụ ŋườʔi dã lạʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ kấtcứk tʰáʔihậʔu xỏʔi maaka nộʔi mìɲ bởʔivì kó zựŋ tượŋ ʔasa dáɲ hìɲtượŋ kủʔa dốt tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ sếcôn sɔŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cừbỏ kák nơʔi kaw zầʔu vậʔi dốʔivớʔi Ðứkzê lòŋ ʔasa cọn làɲ kả dờʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi dɛm dể lạʔi cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰáɲ kủʔa ca ŋườʔi ɲữŋ cíɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ hɔặk vàŋ bạk hăjlà kák xí zụŋ ʔasa vwa zuda baêsa vwa ʔisơzaên dáɲ ɣiặk ɲăw cọn dờʔi mìɲ baêsa vwa ʔisơzaên di dáɲ zuda sâʔi dồnlũʔi zama dể cɔ zânsự kủʔa ʔasa vwa zuda xôŋ zavàʔɔ nơʔi ʔasa vwa zuda dượk xi ấʔi ʔasa lấʔi ɲữŋ bạk vàŋ kòn lạʔi cɔŋ xɔ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê cɔŋ xɔ nơʔi kuŋ kủʔa vwa zaw cɔ dềʔu mìɲ dɔạn saj dến bêɲadát kɔncaj tápzimôn cáʔu hêsiôn vwa sizi Ðʔa mác nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi zawướk vớʔi ɲăw ʔiɲư ca kủʔa ôŋ ca dã kìʔa saj dɛm bằŋ bạk vàŋ hãʔi di fá lờʔi zawướk kủʔa ôŋ vớʔi baêsa vwa ʔisơzaên dể zan sa bêɲadát ŋɛ lờʔi vwa ʔasa saj kák kwan tướŋ mìɲ dáɲ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ciếm lấʔi ʔizôn Ðʔan ʔabênbếtmaka kả sứ kinêzốt vớʔi sứ néptali baêsa hăj dượk diềʔu dó tʰôʔi sâʔidắp dồn zama zút tạʔi tiệtsa vwa ʔasa ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda xôŋ cừ ʔaj cúŋ dɛm di ɲữŋ dá ɣỗ baêsa dã zùŋ sâʔidắp dồn zama vwa ʔasa zùŋ dồ ấʔi dặŋ sâʔicất ɣêba cɔŋ sứ bêŋiəmin mícba kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ʔasa kwiềntʰế kủʔa ŋườʔi mọʔi việk ŋườʔilàm kák tʰàɲ ŋườʔi sâʔicất dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kủʔa kák vwa zuda xi ŋườʔi dã ɣià zồʔi tʰì dăw cơn ʔasa ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn vớʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ŋườʔi ɣiôsafát kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứhaj dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda nadáp kɔncaj ɣiêzôbôʔam lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên cịvì cên ʔisơzaên haj ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê di tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ fạmtộʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm xiến cɔ ʔisơzaên kanfạm nữʔa baêsɛ kɔncaj ʔahiza ɲà ʔisaka làmfản ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk nadáp kả ʔisơzaên vâʔi ɣibêtʰôn tʰuộk zân filitin tʰì baêsɛ ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi dó Ấʔilà ɲằm tʰứba dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda baêsa ɣiết nadáp cịvì tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi vừʔa xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa tʰì ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi tʰuộk ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam xôŋ dể ʔaj dến dỗʔi dã ziệt cɔŋ ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ ʔahiza tôʔitớ ŋàʔi silô fán za ấʔi kớ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm cɔ ʔisơzaên kũŋ fạmtộʔi cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kák kôŋsự xák kủʔa nadáp mọʔi việk ŋườʔilàm dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơʔaên vả ʔasa vwa zuda baêsa vwa ʔisơzaên dáɲ ɣiặk ɲăw cọn dờʔi mìɲ năm tʰứba dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda tʰì baêsa kɔncaj ʔahiza vwa kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔiở tạʔi tiệtsa kaicị haimươʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê di tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam tộʔilỗʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm cɔ ʔisơzaên kũŋ fạmtộʔi bấʔizờ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán cɔ ɣiêhu kɔncaj kủʔa hunani ŋịc kùŋ baêsa zằŋ ta dã kất ŋươʔi xỏʔi bụʔi dất ŋươʔi vwɛcúʔa zân ʔisơzaên sɔŋ ŋươʔi dã di tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam suj cɔ zân ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi tộʔi cúŋnó cọkzận ɲân kớ ấʔi kwét sạc baêsa ɲà cɔ ɲà ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát vậʔi fàm nàʔɔ tʰuộk baêsa cết tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ có fàm nàʔɔ cết ŋɔàʔi dồŋ cim cờʔi zỉʔa kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa baêsa ɲữŋ việk ŋườʔilàm kwiềntʰế ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên baêsa ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn tạʔi tiệtsa kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi kậʔi tiênci ɣiêhu kɔncaj hanani fán ŋịc kùŋ baêsa ɲà ŋườʔi cẳŋɲữŋ kớ kák tộʔiák kủʔa ŋườʔi dã cướk Ðứkzê lấʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj mìɲ cọk cɔ ŋàʔi ɣiận ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam màlạʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi dã hủʔiziệt ɲà ấʔi năm tʰứ haimươʔi sáʔu dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda tʰì kɔncaj baêsa vwa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔiở tạʔi tiệtsa kaicị haj simzi tôʔitớ tướŋ kɔj fânnửʔa sɛ biɲ làmfản ŋườʔi tiệtsa kwan kaj dền ŋườʔi tạʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi simzi vàʔɔ ɣiết ŋườʔi ɲằm haimươʔibảʔi dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda kaicị tʰăj cɔ ŋườʔi sảʔi xi simzi vừʔa lênŋôʔi vwa tʰì ŋườʔi ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ɲà baêsa cẳŋ dể lạʔi diɲ nàʔɔ hɔặk bàkɔn hăjlà bằŋữʔu ŋườʔi kũŋ vậʔi vì kák tộʔilỗʔi baêsa kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã fạm tứklà tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên kanfạm kák hưxôŋ kủʔa cúŋnó cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên simzi ziệt kả ɲà baêsa ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ ɣiêhu dấŋ tiênci fán za cɔ baêsa kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa mọʔi việk ŋườʔilàm dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên năm tʰứ haimươʔibảʔi dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda tʰì simzi lênŋôʔi vwa bảʔi ŋàʔi tạʔi tiệtsa bấʔizờ kwânlíɲ ʔisơzaên dươŋ vâʔi ɣibêtʰôn tʰàɲ tʰuộk zân filitin xi dạʔɔ biɲ hăj nàʔi zằŋ simzi dã fảnŋịc ɣiết vwa tʰì kũŋ ŋàʔi dó cɔŋ ziɲ kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu zi kwan tổŋbiɲ vwa cên ʔisơzaên zi kả ʔisơzaên ɣibêtʰôn di vâʔi tiệtsa sảʔi xi simzi tʰấʔi tʰàɲ dã tʰì di vàʔɔ dồnlũʔi kủʔa kuŋ vwa dốt cíɲ mìɲ vớʔi kuŋ vwa zồʔi cết ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi ŋườʔi dã fạm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê bắtcướk tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm tứk tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên kanfạm kák cwiện xák kủʔa simzi ŋườʔi làmfản dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ zân ʔisơzaên ciə haj fɛ fɛ nàʔi tʰeo típni kɔncaj ɣinát ŋườʔilàm vwa fɛ kiə tʰeo zi ɲưŋ fɛ tʰeo zi tʰắŋ fɛ tʰeo típni kɔncaj ɣinát vậʔi típni cết zi kaicị năm tʰứ bamươʔi dờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda tʰì zi lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên kaicị mườʔihaj ŋườʔi cịvì sáʔu tạʔi tiệtsa Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi mwa núʔi samazi kủʔa sêmɛ ɣiá haj lâŋ bạk cên núʔi ấʔi ŋườʔi kất káʔi tʰàɲ lấʔi sêmɛ củ núʔi samazi dặt cɔ tʰàɲ zi diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê kák ŋườʔi bốʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi bắtcướk tʰeo dườŋ ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát fạmtộʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm tứk tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kɔn fạm lấʔi ɲữŋ hưxôŋ mìɲ cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kák cwiện xák kủʔa zi ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm kwiềntʰế ŋườʔi dềʔu dã ɣi cɔŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên zi ʔaŋiấk vớʔi tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn tạʔi samazi ʔaháp kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ bamươʔi támdờʔi ʔasa vwa zuda tʰì ʔaháp kɔncaj zi lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔiở samazi kaicị cên ʔisơzaên haimươʔihaj ʔaháp kɔncaj zi diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê hếttʰảʔi kák ŋườʔi bốʔi mìɲ vả ŋườʔi lấʔi bắtcướk tʰeo tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát ɲỏmọn nênŋườʔi di lấʔi ɣiêsabên kɔŋáʔi baɛɲ vwa zân sidôn ŋườʔi kũŋ di hầʔu việk baɛɲ tʰờ lạʔi ŋườʔi bàntʰờ cɔ baɛɲ tạʔi cɔŋ miễʔu kủʔa baɛɲ ŋườʔi dã kất tạʔi samazi ʔaháp kũŋ zựŋ hìɲtượŋ vậʔi ʔaháp ɲiềʔu diềʔu ák cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kák vwa ʔisơzaên cướk mìɲ cɔŋ dờʔi ʔaháp hiên bêtên sâʔi lạʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzicô xi ŋườʔi dặt káʔi tʰì ʔabizam kɔn cưởŋnam mìɲ lúk zựŋ kák kửʔa tʰì sêɣúp kɔn mìɲ tʰeo ɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun fán za tʰisêbɛ ŋườʔi cɔŋ dã saŋ ŋụ ɣalaát nóʔi vớʔi ʔaháp zằŋ ta dứŋ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên hằŋ sốŋ tʰề zằŋ mấʔi săw dâʔi nếʔu cẳŋ nóʔi cắk xôŋ kó sươŋ kũŋ xôŋ kó mưʔa Ðʔɔạn kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán zạʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di xỏʔi dâʔi kwa fíʔa dôŋ ŋươʔi xɛ kêzít dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiôdɛɲ ŋươʔi ʔuốŋ nướk kủʔa xɛ dã cwiền cɔ cim kwạ nuôʔi ŋươʔi tạʔi dó vậʔi di vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dến nơʔi xɛ kêzít dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiôdɛɲ buổʔimaj buổʔi ciềʔu cim kwạ dɛm báɲ tʰịt cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ nướk xɛ ɲưŋ cɔŋ ítlâʔu tʰì xɛ xô cɔŋ sứ xôŋ kó mưʔa bấʔizờ kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán zạʔi zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di dến sazépta tʰàɲtʰuộk sidôn tạʔi dó kìʔa dã cwiền cɔ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi lɔ nuôʔi ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi dứŋzậʔi di dến sazépta xi dến kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋườʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi dờn ɣóʔa kủʔi kêʔu nóʔi zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi di múk mộtcút nướk cɔŋ bìɲ dể cɔ ʔuốŋ nàŋ di múk nướk ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kêʔu lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi nàŋ zằŋ kũŋ hãʔi dɛm cɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi cɔ miếŋ báɲ nữʔa nàŋ dáp tôʔi cỉ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ tʰề tôʔi xôŋ kó báɲ cỉ kó cɔŋ mộtcút zầʔu cɔŋ bìɲ nàʔi tôʔi haj xúk kủʔi dɔạn nấʔu zọn cɔ tôʔi kɔncaj tôʔi xi zồʔi cúŋtôʔi cết ɲưŋ zằŋ cớ ci hãʔi cởvề ʔiɲư ŋươʔi dã nóʔi sɔŋ cướk hãʔi zùŋ ấʔi cɔ káʔi báɲ ɲỏ zồʔi dɛm za cɔ săw ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cɔ kɔncaj ŋươʔi vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvậʔi bột xôŋ cɔŋ zầʔu xôŋ tʰiếʔu cɔŋ bìɲ cɔdến ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ mưʔa suốŋ dất vậʔi nàŋ di tʰeo diềʔu nóʔi nàŋ ɲà nàŋ vớʔi cɔŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi bột cẳŋ cɔŋ zầʔu xôŋ tʰiếʔu cɔŋ bìɲ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ fán za săw ítlâʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn tứklà củ ɲà dăw bịɲ zất nặŋ dến dỗʔi cɔŋ mìɲ cẳŋ kòn hơʔi tʰở ŋườʔi dờn nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi vớʔi ôŋ kó việk ci căŋ kó fảʔi ôŋ dến ɲà tôʔi dặŋ ɲắk lạʔi ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi ɣiết kɔn tôʔi căŋ ŋườʔi dáp vớʔi nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi zaw kɔn nàŋ cɔ ŋườʔi bồŋ xỏʔi tăj dɛm fòŋ kaw cỗ ŋườʔiở dể cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi kớsaw ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ tajhọʔa cên ŋườʔi dờn ɣóʔa nàʔi ɲà nàŋ nơʔi tôʔi cúŋụ ɣiết kɔncaj ŋườʔi di ŋườʔi cên mìɲ kɔncẻ lạʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê nữʔa zằŋ Ôʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi sin cúʔa xiến liɲhồn kủʔa dứʔa cẻ nàʔi cởlạʔi cɔŋ mìɲ Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi kủʔa liɲhồn kủʔa dứʔa cẻ cởlạʔi cɔŋ mìɲ sốŋ lạʔi bồŋ dứʔa cẻ di suốŋ lầʔu vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà zướʔi zaw cɔ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi sɛm kɔn nàŋ sốŋ nàŋ nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ bâʔizờ tôʔi ɲìn ôŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ miệŋ ôŋ tʰật kác lâʔu ŋàʔi cɔŋ tʰứba kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán zạʔi zằŋ hãʔi di zamắt ʔaháp xiến mưʔa suốŋ dất vậʔi di zamắt ʔaháp vả tạʔi samazi kó kơn dóʔicém kwádỗʔi ʔaháp saj ɣọʔi diə kwaŋiə mìɲ diə zất kíɲ Ðứkzê sảʔiza xi ɣiêsabên ziệt kák dấŋ tiênci di ɣiấʔu cɔŋ haj haŋ dá mỗʔi haŋ nămmươʔi ŋườʔi zùŋ báɲ nướk nuôʔi ʔaháp nóʔi vớʔi diə zằŋ hãʔi di xắp sứ sɛm hếttʰảʔi kák suốʔi xɛ kólẽ cúŋta dượk kỏ kứʔu cɔ ŋựʔa kòn sốŋ xôŋ fảʔi ziệt kák súkvật căŋ vậʔi haj ŋườʔi ciə sứ dặŋ di ʔaháp di mộtmìɲ kɔn dườŋ nàʔi diə di mộtmìɲ kɔn dườŋ kiə diə dươŋ di dườŋ tʰì ɣặp za dón mìɲ diə ɲìn ŋườʔi mìɲ suốŋ dất tʰưʔa zằŋ hỡʔi cúʔa tôʔi kó fảʔi ôŋ căŋ ŋườʔi dáp fảʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi di nóʔi vớʔi củ ŋươʔi zằŋ dâʔi diə zằŋ tôʔi kó fạmtộʔi ɣì ôŋ fó tôʔitớ ôŋ vàʔɔ tăj ʔaháp hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiết tôʔi di tôʔi cỉ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ kủʔa ôŋ tʰề cẳŋ zân nàʔɔ nướk nàʔɔ củ tôʔi xôŋ saj dến ôŋ xi ŋườʔita dáp zằŋ xôŋ kó dâʔi tʰì ŋườʔi nướk zân ấʔi tʰề zằŋ xôŋ ʔaj ɣặp ôŋ mà bâʔizờ ôŋ lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ zằŋ hãʔi di nóʔi vớʔi củ ŋươʔi dâʔi zồʔi xi tôʔi lìʔa xỏʔi ôŋ kó tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê dɛm ôŋ di nơʔi nàʔɔ tôʔi cẳŋ vậʔi xi tôʔi di tʰuật lạʔi kùŋ ʔaháp ŋườʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi ôŋ ɣiết tôʔi di vả tôʔitớ ôŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê xi tʰơấʔu xizê ɣiết kák tiênci kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì tôʔi kó ɣiấʔu mộtcăm tiênci kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ haj haŋ dá mỗʔi haŋ
