nămmươʔi ŋườʔi zùŋ báɲ nướk nuôʔi ŋườʔita xôŋ kó tʰuật diềʔu dó cɔ cúʔa tôʔi hăjsaw và bâʔizờ ôŋ biểʔu tôʔi hãʔi di nóʔi vớʔi củ ŋươʔi zằŋ dâʔi ŋườʔi ɣiết tôʔi di dáp zằŋ ta cỉ sɛɲ mạŋ Ðứkzê kwân Ðấŋ fụk tʰề zằŋ cíɲ ŋàʔinăj zamắt ʔaháp vậʔi diə di dón ʔaháp tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ʔaháp di dón vừʔa xi ʔaháp tʰấʔi tʰì nóʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ŋươʔi zốʔilɔạn ʔisơzaên căŋ dáp zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tôʔi zốʔilɔạn ʔisơzaên dâʔu vwa ɲà ca vwa bởʔivì vwa dã diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê dã tʰeo tʰần baɛɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ vwa hãʔi saj ŋườʔi di ɲóm kả ʔisơzaên vớʔi bốncăm nămmươʔi tiênci kủʔa baɛɲ bốncăm tiênci kủʔa tạʔi ɣiêsabên xiến dếnkùŋ tôʔi cên núʔi kạtmên vậʔi ʔaháp saj ŋườʔi di ɲóm kả zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ tiênci dến núʔi kạtmên Ðʔɔạn dến cướk zânsự nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi di ɣiẹʔɔ haj cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ nếʔuzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xá tʰeo ŋàʔi nếʔu baɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi tʰeo sɔŋ zânsự xôŋ dáp lờʔi bấʔizờ nóʔi vớʔi zânsự zằŋ cɔŋ vòŋ ɲữŋ tiênci kủʔa Ðứkzê cỉ mộtmìɲ kòn lạʔi kòn kák tiênci baɛɲ bốncăm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi hãʔi cɔ cúŋta haj kɔn dựk fảʔi cọn kɔn cɔ mìɲ za miếŋ dể cên kủʔi ɲưŋ cớ câm lửʔa kòn kɔn kiə dể cên kủʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ câm lửʔa Ðʔɔạn hãʔi kêʔukầʔu zɛɲ kủʔa tʰần kák ŋươʔi kòn kêʔukầʔu zɛɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰần dáp lờʔi bằŋ lửʔa ấʔi kwảlà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kả zânsự dềʔu dáp zằŋ lờʔinóʔi zất fảʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ tiênci baɛɲ zằŋ hãʔi cọn kɔn dựk cướk di kák ŋươʔi dôŋ zồʔi hãʔi kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ kủʔa tʰần kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ cớ câm lửʔa vậʔi cúŋ kɔn ŋườʔita dã cɔ zồʔi sớmmaj dến cưʔa cúŋ kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ kủʔa baɛɲ zằŋ hỡʔiba ʔɛɲ sin dáp lờʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ kótiếŋ ɣì kũŋ cẳŋ ʔaj dáp lờʔi cúŋ dềʔu ɲảʔi cuŋkwɛɲ bàntʰờ mìɲ dã zựŋ xi dã dến cưʔa ɲạʔɔ cúŋ zằŋ xá di ŋườʔi tʰần hɔặk ŋườʔi dươŋ swiɣẫm hɔặk dâʔu sa hɔặk dươŋ di dườŋ hăjlà kólẽ ŋườʔi ŋủ tʰứkzậʔi vậʔi cúŋ kêʔu lớntiếŋ tʰeo tʰóʔi lấʔi ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ ɣạc vàʔɔ mìɲ cɔdến cừŋ máʔu cảʔi za xi kwá cưʔa zồʔi kứ nóʔi tiênci ɲưvậʔi cɔdến ɣiờ zâŋ kủʔa căj ciềʔu ɲưŋ xôŋ kótiếŋ ɣì cẳŋ ʔaj dáp lờʔi kũŋ xôŋ kốý dến bấʔizờ nóʔi vớʔi kả zânsự zằŋ hãʔi dến ɣần zânsự dến ɣần ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn sửʔa lạʔi káʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê fáhủʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi mườʔihaj cifáʔi kủʔa kák kɔncaj zakốp ŋườʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán cɔ zằŋ ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi ŋườʔi zùŋ mườʔihaj dá ấʔi zựŋ káʔi bàntʰờ ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê cuŋkwɛɲ bàntʰờ ŋườʔi dàʔɔ káʔi mươŋ dựŋ dượk haj dấʔu ɣiốŋ zồʔi cất kủʔi za miếŋ cên kủʔi kế ŋườʔi nóʔi hãʔi múk dầʔi bìɲ nướk dɛm dổ cên kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi hãʔi tʰứ ɲì tʰì ŋườʔita tʰứ ɲì ŋườʔi hãʔi tʰứba tʰứba cɔdến dỗʔi nướk cảʔi cuŋkwɛɲ bàntʰờ dầʔi káʔi mươŋ nữʔa ɣiờ zâŋ kủʔa căj ciềʔu tiênci dến ɣần ŋwiện zằŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham kủʔa ʔisák kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋàʔinăj sin hãʔi cɔ ŋườʔita zằŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ tôʔi tôʔitớ ŋàʔi tôʔi vâŋ lờʔi ŋàʔi mọʔi nàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi sin dáp lờʔi tôʔi hầʔu cɔ zânsự nàʔi ɲìn zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi xiến cɔ lòŋ cởlạʔi lửʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ suốŋ tʰiêʔudốt kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔi dá bụʔi zút nướk cɔŋ mươŋ tʰấʔi vậʔi kả zânsự mìɲ suốŋ dất zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi kák tiênci kủʔa baɛɲ cớ cɔ tʰɔát ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cúŋ dɛm suốŋ zướʔi xɛ kisôn ɣiết tạʔi dó Ðʔɔạn nóʔi kùŋ ʔaháp zằŋ hãʔi di ʔuốŋ tôʔi dã ŋɛ tiếŋ mưʔa vậʔi ʔaháp cởlên dặŋ ănuốŋ ɲưŋ cót núʔi kạtmên kúʔi suốŋ dất mìɲ ɣiữʔa haj dầʔuɣốʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ sin hãʔi di ŋó fíʔa kẻ tôʔitớ di sɛm ɲưŋ nóʔi zằŋ xôŋ kó ci lạʔi nóʔi hãʔi cởlên bảʔi lần tʰứbảʔi tôʔitớ dáp zằŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi fíʔa kụm mâʔi ɲỏ ɲư lòŋ bàntăj hãʔi di nóʔi vớʔi ʔaháp zằŋ hãʔi tʰắŋ sɛ di suốŋ kẻʔɔ mưʔa kầm vwa lạʔi căŋ cɔŋ lúk cờʔi mâʔi cɛ dɛn ɣió nổʔizậʔi kó kơn mưʔa zất ʔaháp sɛ mìɲ di dến ɣícêên tăjÐứkzê ɣiáŋ cên ŋườʔi tʰắtlưŋ cạʔi cướk ʔaháp cɔdến xi tớʔi ɣícêên ʔaháp tʰuật lạʔi cɔ ɣiêsabên mọʔi diềʔu dã ŋườʔi dã zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết hếttʰảʔi tiênci baɛɲ làmsaw ɣiêsabên saj sứɣiả dến nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu ŋàʔimaj cɔŋ ɣiờ nàʔi xôŋ sử mạŋ sốŋ ŋươʔi ɲư mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋnó ŋwiện kák tʰần dãʔi kác nặŋnề vìvậʔi sợhãʔi dứŋzậʔi cạʔi di dặŋ kứʔumạŋ sốŋ mìɲ tạʔi bê ʔɛsêba tʰuộk zuda ŋườʔi dể tôʔitớ mìɲ lạʔi dó kòn ŋườʔi vàʔɔ dồŋ vắŋ dườŋ di ướk ŋàʔi dến ŋồʔi zướʔi kâʔi ɣiếŋ ɣiêŋ sin cết zằŋ ÔʔiÐứkzê dã dủ zồʔi hãʔi kất lấʔi mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ ɣì kák tổfụ tôʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi ŋủ zướʔi kâʔi ɣiếŋ ɣiêŋ kó tʰiênsứ dụŋ dến ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi ŋườʔi ɲìn tʰấʔi nơʔi dầʔu mìɲ káʔi báɲ ɲỏ nướŋ cên tʰan bìɲ nướk ŋườʔi ănuốŋ zồʔi lạʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dến tʰứ ɲì dụŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dườŋ sa kwá cɔ ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi ʔuốŋ zồʔi ɲờ sứk kủʔa lươŋtʰựk ấʔi ŋườʔi di mươʔi ŋàʔi mươʔi dêm cɔdến hôzếp núʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi ŋườʔi di vàʔɔ cɔŋ haŋ dá ŋủ dêm dó và kìʔa kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋươʔi dâʔi làmci ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi dã zất nóŋnảʔi sốtsắŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân zân ʔisơzaên dã bộʔi zawướk ŋàʔi fáhủʔi kák bàntʰờ ŋàʔi zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết ɲữŋ tiênci ŋàʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ tôʔi kòn lạʔi kũŋ tʰế kất mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di za dứŋ tạʔi cên núʔi cướk Ðứkzê nầʔiÐứkzê di ŋaŋ kwa kó ŋọn ɣió mạɲ tʰổʔi zữtợn cướk ŋàʔi sé núʔi za kák dá ɲưŋ xôŋ kó Ðứkzê cɔŋ cận ɣió săw cận ɣió kó kơn dộŋdất ɲưŋ xôŋ kó Ðứkzê cɔŋ kơn dộŋdất săw kơn dộŋdất kó dám lửʔa ɲưŋ xôŋ kó Ðứkzê cɔŋ dám lửʔa săw dám lửʔa kó tiếŋ êmzịʔu ɲỏɲẹ xi vừʔa ŋɛ tiếŋ dó tʰì lấʔi áʔɔtơʔi bawfủ mìɲ di za dứŋ tạʔi nơʔi miệŋ haŋ nàʔi kó tiếŋ fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋươʔi làmci dâʔi ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi zất nóŋnảʔi sốtsắŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân zân ʔisơzaên dã bộʔi zawướk kủʔa ŋàʔi fáhủʔi kák bàntʰờ ŋàʔi zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết ɲữŋ tiênci cỉ mộtmìɲ tôʔi kòn lạʔi kũŋ kác kất mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi kɔn dườŋ dồŋ vắŋ di dến Ðʔa mác xi dến zồʔi ŋươʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ hasaên vwa sizi ŋươʔi kũŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ ɣiêhu kɔncaj kủʔa nimsi vwa ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ kɔncaj safát ʔabênmêhôla tiênci tʰế cɔ ŋươʔi ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi ɣươm kủʔa hasaên ɣiêhu ɣiết ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi ɣươm kủʔa ɣiêhu ɣiết ɲưŋ dã dểzàɲ lạʔi cɔ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên bảʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi xôŋ kó kwì ɣốʔi suốŋ cướk baɛɲ môʔi cưʔa từ dó di ɣặp kɔncaj kủʔa safát dươŋ kàʔi kó mườʔihaj dôʔi cướk mìɲ cíɲ ŋườʔi kầm dôʔi tʰứ mườʔihaj di ŋaŋ kwa ŋườʔi áʔɔcɔàŋ mìɲ cên ŋườʔi mìɲ cạʔi tʰeo nóʔi zằŋ sin cɔfép tôʔi ca tôʔi dã dɔạn tôʔi tʰeo ôŋ dáp hãʔi di cởlạʔi nàʔɔ kó làmɣì cɔ ŋươʔi dâʔu lìʔa xỏʔi cởvề mộtdôʔi ɣiết di lấʔi kàʔi kủʔi nấʔu tʰịt zồʔi cɔ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dứŋzậʔi di tʰeo hầʔu việk ŋườʔi bêɲadát vwa sizi hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ mìɲ kó bamươʔi haj vwa tʰeo ŋườʔi kùŋ ŋựʔa sɛ ŋườʔi di vâʔi samazi dáɲ ŋườʔi saj sứɣiả dến ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ tʰàɲ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ bêɲadát nóʔi ɲưvầʔi bạk vàŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi tʰuộk kák kuŋfi ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi ɲất kủʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ tʰuộk vwa ʔisơzaên dáp hỡʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi kứ ɲư lờʔi vwa nóʔi tôʔi mọʔi kủʔa tôʔi dềʔu tʰuộk vwa ɲưŋ kák sứɣiả cởlạʔi kùŋ vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ bêɲadát nóʔi ɲưvầʔi hãʔi dưʔa bạk vàŋ kuŋfi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi cɔ tʰếtʰì ŋàʔimaj ɣiờ nàʔi saj kák dầʔitớ dến ɲàŋươʔi cúŋnó lụksɔát ɲàŋươʔi ɲà kủʔa tôʔitớ ŋươʔi fàm ɣì kủʔa ŋươʔi lấʔilàm kwícọŋ cúŋnó lấʔi dɛm di vwa ʔisơzaên dòʔi hếttʰảʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ cɔŋ sứ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi sɛmsét zằŋ ŋườʔi nàʔi twan mưʔu hạʔi cúŋta ŋườʔi dã saj dòʔi kák kuŋfi kɔnkáʔi bạk vàŋ kủʔa xôŋ kó từcốʔi ɣì kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kả zânsự dềʔu tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ Ðừŋ ŋɛ cớ cịʔu ci vậʔi ʔaháp dáp kùŋ sứɣiả kủʔa bêɲadát zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwɛcúʔa mọʔi diềʔu vwa dòʔi tôʔitớ vwa tʰứ ɲất tôʔi ɲưŋ diềʔu nàʔi tôʔi xôŋ tʰế dượk kák sứɣiả di tʰuật lạʔi lờʔi dó cɔ bêɲadát bêɲadát lạʔi saj nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu bụʔi kát samazi dủ dầʔi lòŋ bàntăj kủʔa kák ciếnsĩ tʰeo ŋwiện kák tʰần ɣiáŋ tajhọʔa cɔ nặŋnề ɲưŋ vwa ʔisơzaên dáp hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ ŋườʔi mặk áʔɔzáp cớ xwej mìɲ ɲư ŋườʔi kổʔi za bêɲadáp dươŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu vớʔi kák vwa cɔŋ cạʔi vừʔa ŋɛ dượk kák lờʔi nàʔi tʰì nóʔi kùŋ kák dầʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi zàn cận di cúŋ zàn cận dặŋ dáɲ tʰàɲ vả kó tiênci dến ɣần ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi dɔàn biɲ zất dôŋ nàʔi căŋ kìʔa ŋàʔinăj fó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva ʔaháp tʰưʔa zằŋ zùŋ ʔaj ŋườʔi dáp Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi zùŋ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa kák kwan kaj hàŋ tỉɲ ŋườʔi ʔaj zawciến tiênci dáp cíɲ vwa ʔaháp sɔát diểm ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa kák kwan kaj hàŋ tỉɲ kó dượk haj căm bamươʔi haj ŋườʔi kế săw ŋườʔi sɔát diểm kả zân ʔisơzaên dượk bảʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưʔa kéʔɔ di za sɔŋ bêɲadát ʔuốŋ zượʔu săj tạʔi cạʔi mìɲ vớʔi bamươʔi haj vwa ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa kák kwan kaj hàŋ tỉɲ di za cướk bêɲadát saj hỏʔi zọ ŋườʔita báʔɔ lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ kó ŋườʔi samazi kéʔɔ za ŋườʔi dáp cúŋnó dến hɔặk kó kầʔuhòʔa hãʔi bắtsốŋ lấʔi hɔặk kó ciếncɛɲ kũŋ hãʔi bắtsốŋ lấʔi vậʔi ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa kák kwan kaj hàŋ tỉɲ kéʔɔ za tʰàɲ dạʔɔkwân di tʰeo ʔainấʔi dáɲ ŋịc mìɲ kwânsi zi cạʔi cốn ʔisơzaên zượt duổʔi tʰeo bêɲadát vwa sizi ŋựʔa tʰɔát cạʔi vớʔi mộtvàʔi líɲ vwa ʔisơzaên kéʔɔ za dáɲ ɣiết ŋựʔasɛ cɔ zân sỵzi tʰwa cận kảtʰể bấʔizờ dấŋ tiênci dến ɣần vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ vwa hãʔi di cɔ mìɲ mạɲmẽ hãʔi sɛmsét kɔicừŋ diềʔu mìɲ fảʔi tớʔi vwa sizi dến dáɲ vwa nữʔa kák dầʔitớ kủʔa vwa sizi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ tʰần kủʔa cúŋnó tʰần núʔi cɔnên cúŋnó mạɲ cúŋta ɲưŋ cúŋta hãʔi zawciến vớʔi cúŋnó zướʔi dồŋbằŋ kwả cúŋta tʰắŋ cúŋnó lạʔi xá diềʔu nàʔi hãʔi kất kák vwa xỏʔi cỗ làmdầʔu biɲ ɲữŋ kwan kaj tʰế vàʔɔ cɔ dɔạn hãʔi diểm lấʔi dạʔɔkwân ɣiốŋ ɲư dạʔɔkwân kủʔa vwa dã bằŋ ŋựʔa sɛ ấʔi cúŋta zawciến vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ kwả cúŋta tʰắŋ cúŋnó vwa ŋɛ lờʔi dầʔitớ mìɲ tʰeo năm tớʔi bêɲadát diểm sɔát zân sizi di dến ʔafék dặŋ zawciến kùŋ ʔisơzaên zân ʔisơzaên kũŋ diểm sɔát lươŋtʰựk di dón cúŋnó zân ʔisơzaên dóŋ cạʔi dốʔimặt zân sizi ɣiốŋ ɲư haj bầʔi zê ɲỏ kòn zân sizi dầʔi xắp kả sứ bấʔizờ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến ɣần vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi bởʔivì zân sizi kó nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê tʰần núʔi cớ cẳŋ fảʔi tʰần cũŋ fó dɔàn biɲ zất dôŋdảʔɔ nàʔi vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva haj dóŋ cạʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲăw cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi zawciến ɲăw zân ʔisơzaên dáɲ zân sizi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɣiết mườʔi líɲ kòn lạʔi cạʔi cốn cɔŋ tʰàɲ ʔafék sɔŋ ɲữŋ vác tʰàɲ ŋã dè haimươʔibảʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi dã tʰɔát xỏʔi cận bêɲadát kũŋ cạʔi cốn vàʔɔ tʰàɲ cɔŋ fòŋ kák dầʔi bêɲadát tâʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛ zằŋ kák vwa ɲà ʔisơzaên ɲântừ vìvậʔi sin cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰắt baw nơʔi lưŋ zâʔi cên dầʔu zồʔi cúŋtôʔi za hàŋ vwa ʔisơzaên hɔặk ŋườʔi dể cɔ vwa sốŋ căŋ họ tʰắt baw nơʔi lưŋ zâʔi cên dầʔu zồʔiza hàŋ vwa ʔisơzaên tâʔu zằŋ bêɲadát tôʔitớ vwa kầʔu zằŋ sin vwa dể cɔ tôʔi sốŋ ʔaháp dáp zằŋ ŋườʔi kòn sốŋ căŋ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲta cúŋ lấʔi ấʔi diềm làɲ lậtdật ɲậnlờʔi zằŋ bêɲadát tʰật ʔɛɲ vwa ʔaháp zằŋ hãʔi di vờʔi ŋườʔi dến cɔ bêɲadát dến zamắt ʔaháp ŋườʔi mờʔi bêɲadát sɛ mìɲ bêɲadát nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ tôʔi caw lạʔi cɔ vwa kák tʰàɲ ca tôʔi dã ciếm lấʔi kủʔa ca vwa vwa cợ fố cɔ vwa tạʔi Ðʔa mác ʔiɲư ca tôʔi dã tạʔi samazi ʔaháp dáp kòn tʰuận zawướk nàʔi dể cɔ ŋươʔi divề vậʔi ʔaháp zawướk vớʔi bêɲadát dɔạn dể cɔ ŋườʔi di bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák kɔncaj tiênci vâŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê nóʔi vớʔi mìɲ zằŋ tôʔi sin ʔɛɲ hãʔi dáɲ tôʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ cịʔu dáɲ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ bởʔivì ʔɛɲ xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán zặn kủʔa Ðứkzê xi ʔɛɲ lìʔa xỏʔi tôʔi kó kɔn ɣiết ʔɛɲ bạn lìʔa xỏʔi ŋườʔi tʰì ɣặp kɔn ɣiết ŋườʔi di tiênci ɣặp ŋườʔi xák nóʔi zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi ấʔi dáɲ tiênci cɔ ŋườʔi bịtʰươŋ Ðʔɔạn tiênci di dứŋ dợʔi cên dườŋ vwa sủ xăn suốŋ mìɲ ɣiảzạŋ xi vwa di ŋaŋ kwa ŋườʔi kấttiếŋ nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ tôʔitớ vwa ɣiữʔa ciếncận tʰìkó ŋườʔi zẫn dếnkùŋ tôʔi fu biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi ɣiữ ŋườʔi nàʔi sảʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi tʰì mạŋ sốŋ ŋươʔi tʰườŋ cɔ mạŋ sốŋ hăjlà ŋươʔi fảʔi tʰườŋ lâŋ bạk sɔŋ cɔŋ xi tôʔitớ vwa mắk cwiện dâʔidó tʰì fu cốn di vwa ʔisơzaên dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà dɔán sét kủʔa ŋươʔi cíɲ ŋươʔi dã dịɲ lấʔi lậptứk ŋườʔi xăn cɛ mìɲ vwa ʔisơzaên ɲìn ŋườʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák tiênci tiênci nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi bởʔivì ŋươʔi dể tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj ŋươʔi dã dịɲ dáŋ tậnziệt vậʔi mạŋ sốŋ ŋươʔi tʰế cɔ mạŋ sốŋ zânsự ŋươʔi tʰế cɔ zânsự vwa ʔisơzaên cởvề kuŋdiện mìɲ tạʔi samazi lấʔilàm buồnzầʔu ɣiậnzữ săw kák việk ấʔi sảʔi kó cwiện nàʔi nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên kó ɲɔ tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ ɣícêên ɣiáp dền kủʔa ʔaháp vwa samazi ʔaháp nóʔi kùŋ nabốt zằŋ hãʔi ɲườŋ ɲɔ kủʔa ŋươʔi cɔ dể zùŋ zăw ɣần dền ta dổʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲɔ hăjlà nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰíc cɔ ŋươʔi bằŋ bạk ɲưŋna tʰưʔa lạʔi vớʔi ʔaháp zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê ɣiữ lấʔi tôʔi cớ dể tôʔi ɲườŋ cɔ vwa kơŋiệp kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi ʔaháp vàʔɔ dền mìɲ ɣiận bởʔi kó lờʔi nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên dã nóʔi ŋườʔi dã nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ ɲườŋ cɔ vwa kơŋiệp kủʔa tôʔi ʔaháp cên ɣiườŋ sâʔi di xôŋ cịʔu hɔàŋậʔu ɣiêsabên dến ɣần ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ bởʔi saw vwa kó lòŋ buồnzầʔu xôŋ cịʔu ŋườʔi dáp vì kó nóʔicwiện vớʔi nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên zằŋ hãʔi ɲườŋ ɲɔ ŋươʔi cɔ lấʔi hăjlà nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰíc dổʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɲɔ xák sɔŋ ŋườʔi dáp lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ ɲườŋ cɔ vwa ɲɔ kủʔa tôʔi hɔàŋậʔu ɣiêsabên nóʔi zằŋ kó fảʔi ôŋ hàɲ kwiền vwa cên ʔisơzaên căŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di vujlòŋ tôʔi cɔ ôŋ ɲɔ kủʔa nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên ɣiêsêbên tʰơ ɲơn zɛɲ ʔaháp dóŋ vwa ɣởʔi cɔ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kẻkả cɔŋ tʰàɲ nabốt kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰơ nóʔi ɲưvầʔi hãʔi cwiền zaw kiêŋ zồʔi dặt nabốt dầʔu zânsự dɔạn hãʔi dể cướk ŋườʔi haj kẻzan fạm làmcứŋ cɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kó zủʔasả Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa kế hãʔi zẫn ŋườʔi za xỏʔi tʰàɲ dá cɔ cết di ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa tʰàɲ nabốt tứk ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ kẻkả dó dềʔu tʰeo lờʔi ɣiêsabên cwiền zặn cɔŋ tʰơ ŋườʔi dã ɣởʔi cɔ họ zaw cwiền kiêŋ dặt nabốt dầʔu zânsự bấʔizờ haj zan fạm dến ŋồʔi cướk nabốt káʔɔ zan ŋườʔi tạʔi cướk zânsự zằŋ nabốt kó zủʔasả Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa Ðʔɔạn zẫn ŋườʔi za xỏʔi tʰàɲ dá ŋườʔi cết họ saj dến nóʔi vớʔi ɣiêsabên zằŋ nabốt dã dá cết zồʔi xizê hăj zằŋ nabốt dã dá cết zồʔi nóʔi kùŋ ʔaháp zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɲận lấʔi ɲɔ nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên dã từcốʔi xôŋ cịʔu ɲườŋ cɔ ôŋ dể lấʔi bạk nabốt xôŋ kòn sốŋ nữʔa dã cết zồʔi ŋɛ nabốt dã cết ʔaháp dứŋzậʔi di suốŋ ɲɔ kủʔa nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên dặŋ lấʔilàm kủʔa mìɲ bấʔizờ kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán zạʔi ŋườʔi tʰiêsɛ zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi di suốŋ dón ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi kìʔa ŋườʔiở cɔŋ ɲɔ kủʔa nabốt dặŋ lấʔilàm kủʔa mìɲ ŋươʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi dã ɣiết ŋườʔi bâʔizờ lạʔi ciếm lấʔi kơŋiệp saw ŋươʔi fảʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi tạʔicỗ có dã hwiết kủʔa nabốt tʰì có kũŋ cíɲ hwiết kủʔa ŋươʔi ʔaháp nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi kó ɣặp dáp fảʔi tôʔi kó ɣặp vwa bởʔivì vwa dã mìɲ dặŋ diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê vậʔitʰì ɣiáŋọʔa cên ŋươʔi ta kwét sạc ŋươʔi cừziệt kák diɲ kủʔa ɲà ʔaháp hăjlà ŋườʔi tựzɔ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi cọkzận suj cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi cɔ ɲàŋươʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà baêsa kɔncaj ʔahiza Ðứkzê kũŋ fán ɣiêsabên zằŋ có tʰịt ɣiêsabên tạʔi tʰàɲlũʔi ɣícêên fàm ŋườʔi tʰuộk ɲà ʔaháp nàʔɔ cết tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ có kòn nàʔɔ cết cɔŋ dồŋ cim cờʔi zỉʔa kwảtʰật cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ʔaháp buôŋ mìɲ diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê hɔàŋậʔu ɣiêsabên sujzụk ŋườʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ɣớmɣiếk kwádộ tʰeo hìɲtượŋ ʔiɲư zân ʔamôzít zân Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên ʔaháp ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa nóʔi sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ lấʔi baw mặk cɔ mìɲ ɲịndóʔi baw xiêmɲượŋ bấʔizờ kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán zạʔi ŋườʔi tʰisêbɛ zằŋ ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔi tʰếnàʔɔ ʔaháp hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk căŋ bởʔivì ŋườʔi hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk xôŋ ɣiáŋọʔa cɔŋ dờʔi ɲưŋ cɔŋ dờʔi kɔncaj ɣiáŋọʔa cên ɲà cɔŋ sizi ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó ɣiặk năm tʰứba ɣiôsafát vwa zuda di dếnkùŋ vwa ʔisơzaên vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ zằŋ zamốt cɔŋ ɣalaát tʰuộk cúŋta saw cúŋta lạʔi làmtʰiɲ cẳŋ zứt xỏʔi tăj vwa sizi saw Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôsafát zằŋ vwa dếnkùŋ dặŋ dáɲ lấʔi zamốt cɔŋ ɣalaát căŋ ɣiôsafát dáp vớʔi vwa ʔisơzaên zằŋ tôʔi ɲư ôŋ zânsự tôʔi ɲư zânsự ôŋ ŋựʔa tôʔi ɲư ŋựʔa kủʔa ôŋ sɔŋzô safát nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔisơzaên zằŋ tôʔi sin ôŋ fảʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê cướk dã vậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ɲóm kák tiênci lạʔi bốncăm ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ta kó di dáɲ zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát hăjlà cẳŋ di cúŋ dáp zằŋ hãʔi di cúʔa fó vàʔɔ tăj vwa ɲưŋzô safát zằŋ dâʔi kòn kó dấŋ tiênci nàʔɔ xák kủʔa Ðứkzê dể cúŋta kầʔu ŋườʔi ấʔi căŋ vwa ʔisơzaên dáp vớʔi ɣiôsafát zằŋ kòn kó ŋườʔi micê kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêmla ɲờ ŋườʔi ấʔi kótʰể kầʔu Ðứkzê ɲưŋ tôʔi ɣét ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ nóʔi tiênci làɲ tôʔi zữ dó tʰôʔi ɣiôsafát nóʔi zằŋ sin vwa cớ nóʔi ɲưvậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên dòʔi hɔạnkwan bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi lậptứk mờʔi micê kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêmla dến vả vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôsafát vwa zuda mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu mặk dồ ciềʔufụk dươŋ ŋồʔi cên káʔi ŋaj tạʔi cɔŋ dạp lúʔa nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ samazi hếttʰảʔi tiênci nóʔi tiênci cướk haj vwa sêdêkiə kɔncaj kênana lấʔi ɲữŋ sừŋ bằŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứk ɣiê fán ɲưvầʔi vớʔi kák sừŋ nàʔi ŋươʔi báŋ zân sizi cɔdến xi ziệt cúŋnó và hếttʰảʔi tiênci dềʔu nóʔi mộtkác zằŋ hãʔi di zamốt cɔŋ ɣalaát vwa dượk tʰắŋ Ðứkzê fó tʰàɲ ấʔi vàʔɔ tăj vwa vả sứɣiả di mờʔi micê nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ tiênci dềʔu dồŋlòŋ báʔɔkáʔɔ làɲ cɔ vwa tôʔi sin ôŋ kũŋ hãʔi lấʔi lờʔi ɲư lờʔi kủʔa báʔɔkáʔɔ diềʔu làɲ ɲưŋmi cê dáp zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề báʔɔkáʔɔ diềʔu ɣì Ðứkzê zặn xi ŋườʔi dã dếnkùŋ vwa vwa hỏʔi zằŋ hỡʔimi cê cúŋta kó di dáɲ zamốt cɔŋ ɣalaát hăjlà cẳŋ di micê dáp hãʔi di vwa dượk tʰắŋ Ðứkzê fó tʰàɲ ấʔi vàʔɔ tăj vwa ɲưŋ vwa nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ biếtbaw dã lấʔi lờʔi tʰề buộk ŋươʔi cỉ xá nóʔi cơn tʰật vớʔi ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê bấʔizờ micê dáp zằŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi kả ʔisơzaên lạk cên kák núʔi ɲư bầʔi ciên xôŋ kó ŋườʔi căn Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ɲữŋ ấʔi xôŋ kó củ ʔainấʔi xá cởvề ɲà mìɲ bìɲiên vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsafát zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi vớʔi vwa ŋườʔi cẳŋ nóʔi tiênci làɲ việk tôʔi nóʔi tiênci zữ saw micê lạʔi vậʔi hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê tôʔi tʰấʔi Ðứkzê ŋự cên ŋôʔi ŋàʔi kả kơ biɲ cên cờʔi dứŋ cầʔu ŋàʔi hữʔu Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi ʔaj di zụ ʔaháp dể ŋườʔi di zamốt cɔŋ ɣalaát ŋã cết tạʔi dó ŋườʔi cảlờʔi kác nàʔi cảlờʔi kác xák bấʔizờ kó tʰần za dứŋ cướk Ðứkzê tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi di zụ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi tʰần zằŋ zụ kác nàʔɔ tʰần tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi di tʰần nóʔizốʔi cɔŋ miệŋ ɲữŋ tiênci kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán zằŋ fảʔi ŋươʔi zụ ŋườʔi dượk hãʔi di ɲư ŋươʔi dã nóʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ kìʔa Ðứkzê dã dặt tʰần nóʔizốʔi cɔŋ miệŋ kák tiênci vwa Ðứkzê dã fán zữ cɔ vwa bấʔizờ sêdêkiə kɔncaj kủʔa kênana dến ɣần micê vàʔɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê kó zɔ dườŋ nàʔɔ lìʔa xỏʔi dặŋ dến nóʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi micê dáp cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi cạʔi fòŋ nàʔi dến fòŋ kiə dặŋ láɲ tʰì biếtdiềʔu dó vwa ʔisơzaên cwiền lịɲ zằŋ hãʔi micê zẫn dến cɔ ʔamôn kwan kaj tʰàɲ cɔ ɣiôác kɔncaj kủʔa vwa zồʔi hãʔi nóʔi zằŋ vwa bảʔɔ ɲưvầʔi hãʔi ŋườʔi nàʔi lấʔi báɲ nướk xổ nuôʔi cɔdến xi cởvề bìɲan micê zằŋ nếʔu vwa cởvề bìɲan tʰì Ðứkzê xôŋ kậʔi tôʔi fán ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi hỡʔi cúŋ zân kák ŋươʔi xá ŋɛ vậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên di zamốt cɔŋ ɣalaát vớʔi ɣiôsafát vwa zuda vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi kùŋ ɣiôsafát zằŋ tôʔi ɣiảzạŋ ănmặk zồʔiza cận kòn vwa hãʔi mặk áʔɔ kủʔa vwa ɲưvậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ănmặk ɣiảzạŋ za cận vả vwa sỵzi dã cwiền lịɲ cɔ bamươʔi haj kwan kɔj sɛ mìɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ dáɲ ʔaj hăj ɲỏ ɲưŋ cỉ mộtmìɲ vwa ʔisơzaên tʰôʔi vậʔi xi kák kwan kɔj sɛ tʰấʔi ɣiôsafát tʰì nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔi kwảtʰật vwa ʔisơzaên cúŋ dến ɣần ŋườʔi dặŋ dáɲ ɲưŋ ɣiôsafát kêʔula xi kák kwan kɔj sɛ tʰấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì tʰốʔi lạʔi xôŋ duổʔi tʰeo nữʔa bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi tìɲkờ ɣiươŋ kuŋ vwa ʔisơzaên cúŋ ɲằm ŋườʔi nơʔi ɣiáp dâʔu lạʔi vwa nóʔi kùŋ dáɲ sɛ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi kwăj kươŋ lạʔi zẫn za ŋɔàʔi hàŋ kwân bịtʰươŋ nặŋ ɲưŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tʰếcận tʰêm zữzộʔi kó ŋườʔi nâŋdỡ vwa dứŋ cɔŋ sɛ mìɲ dốʔidịc zân sizi ciềʔutốʔi vwa cết hwiết kủʔa tʰươŋ ŋườʔi cảʔi suốŋ cɔŋ lòŋ sɛ lốʔi ciềʔu cɔŋ hàŋ kwân kó zaw cwiền zằŋ ʔainấʔi hãʔi cởvề tʰàɲ mìɲ sứ mìɲ vwa băŋà ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔita dɛm tʰâʔi vwa samazi côn tạʔi dó ŋườʔita zửʔa sɛ ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ ʔaw samazi nơʔi ɲữŋ hươŋ kó ɲữŋ có máʔu ŋườʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê fán kák cwiện xák kủʔa ʔaháp ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm káʔi dền bằŋ ŋà ŋườʔi kất kák tʰàɲ ŋườʔi sâʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên vậʔi ʔaháp ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứtư dờʔi ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ɣiôsafát kɔncaj ʔasa lênŋôʔi vwa zuda ɣiôsafát lênŋôʔi tuổʔi dượk bamươʔi ŋườʔi kaicị haimươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tên kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔasuba kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sici ŋườʔi di tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa ʔasa ca ŋườʔi cẳŋ sâʔi di sɔŋ diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cừbỏ kák nơʔi kaw zânsự kòn dốt hươŋ tạʔi cên kák nơʔi kaw ɣiôsafát vwa ʔisơzaên hòʔahảʔɔ vớʔi ɲăw kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôsafát zõŋ lựk ŋườʔi ɲữŋ ɣiặkzã ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda ŋườʔi cừziệt ɲữŋ zan kòn lạʔi cɔŋ sứ dờʔi ʔasa ca mìɲ bấʔizờ zân dôm xôŋ kó vwa kó kwan cấntʰủ kaicị ɣiôsafát dóŋ dɔàn tàʔu tazêsi dặŋ di fiə cở vàŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ di dến dó dượk bởʔivì tàʔu za tạʔi siôŋêbɛ ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaháp nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôsafát zằŋ hãʔi cɔfép kák dầʔitớ di tàʔu vớʔi kák dầʔitớ ôŋ ɲưŋzô safát xôŋ cịʔu ɣiôsafát ʔaŋiấk vớʔi tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn vớʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứbảʔi dờʔi ɣiôsafát vwa zuda tʰì ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ʔaháp lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi kaicị haj ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ca mìɲ kùŋ tʰeo dườŋ kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát ŋườʔi suj cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi ŋườʔi hầʔu việk baɛɲ tʰờ lạʔi cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kứ tʰeo mọʔi ca ŋườʔi dã săw xi ʔaháp băŋà zân môáp fảnŋịc kùŋ ʔisơzaên ʔɛcasiə ŋaŋ kwa sɔŋ lầʔu mìɲ tạʔi samazi kớ ấʔi maŋ bịɲ ŋườʔi saj sứɣiả di zặn zằŋ hãʔi dicầʔu baɛɲsêbụt tʰần kủʔa Ék zôn dặŋ cɔbiết làɲ bịɲ nàʔi căŋ ɲưŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê fán vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰisêbɛ zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di dón kák sứɣiả kủʔa vwa samazi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saw ŋươʔi dicầʔu baɛɲsêbụt tʰần kủʔa Ék zôn bởʔi kớ dó Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ suốŋ xỏʔi ɣiườŋ ŋươʔi dã ɲưŋ cết Ðʔɔạn di kák sứɣiả cởvề kùŋ ʔɛcasiə ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ vìsaw kák ŋươʔi cởvề cúŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ kó ŋườʔi di dón cúŋtôʔi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋtôʔi zằŋ hãʔi cởvề kùŋ vwa dã saj kák ŋươʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã fán ɲưvầʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saw ŋươʔi saj dicầʔu baɛɲsêbụt tʰần kủʔa Ék zôn bởʔi kớ dó ŋươʔi xôŋ suốŋ xỏʔi ɣiườŋ ŋươʔi dã ɲưŋ cết vwa hỏʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi di dón kák ŋươʔi nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi ấʔi zasaw cúŋ tʰưʔa ŋườʔi dó mặk áʔɔ lôŋ tʰắtlưŋ bằŋ zâʔi za vwa nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà ŋườʔi tʰisêbɛ vwa saj kwan kaj nămmươʔi líɲ di vớʔi nămmươʔi líɲ mìɲ kùŋ vả dươŋ ŋồʔi cên cót ɣò kwan kaj nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa dòʔi ôŋ suốŋ ɲưŋ dáp kùŋ kwan kaj nămmươʔi líɲ zằŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋwiện lửʔa cên cờʔizáŋ suốŋ tʰiêʔudốt ŋươʔi vớʔi nămmươʔi líɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi di lửʔa cên cờʔi ɣiáŋ suốŋ tʰiêʔudốt kwan kaj nămmươʔi líɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔɛcasiə lạʔi saj dến kwan kaj nămmươʔi líɲ xák di vớʔi nămmươʔi líɲ ŋườʔi kwa nàʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi măw măw suốŋ ɲưŋ dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ nếʔu ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋwiện lửʔa cên cờʔizáŋ suốŋ tʰiêʔudốt ŋươʔi vớʔi nămmươʔi líɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi lửʔa kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cờʔizáŋ suốŋ tʰiêʔudốt kwan kaj vớʔi nămmươʔi líɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔɛcasiə lạʔi saj kwan kaj nămmươʔi líɲ di vớʔi nămmươʔi líɲ mìɲ kwan kaj nàʔi dến kwì ɣốʔi suốŋ cướk kầʔusin ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin ôŋ sɛm kwícọŋ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa tôʔi mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa nămmươʔi ŋườʔi nàʔi tôʔitớ ôŋ kìʔa lửʔa dã ɣiáŋ cờʔi tʰiêʔu haj kwan kaj nămmươʔi líɲ cướk nămmươʔi líɲ kủʔa ɲưŋ bâʔizờ sin sɛm mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi kwícọŋ cướk ôŋ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi di suốŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi cớ ci vậʔi cổʔi zậʔi di suốŋ vớʔi kwan kaj dếnkùŋ vwa ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi bởʔivì ŋươʔi kó saj sứɣiả dến kầʔu baɛɲsêbụt tʰần kủʔa Ék zôn cɔŋ ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể kầʔu saw ŋươʔi xôŋ suốŋ xỏʔi ɣiườŋ ŋươʔi dã cèʔɔ ŋươʔi cắk kwả cết vậʔi ʔɛcasiə tʰák tʰeo ɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi fán za ɣiôzam ŋườʔi ɲằm tʰứ ɲì kủʔa ɣiôzam kɔncaj ɣiôsafát vwa zuda bởʔivì ʔɛcasiə xôŋ kó kɔncaj kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ʔɛcasiə dã dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa ʔisơzaên dượk kất cờʔi xiÐứkzê dɛm cờʔi cɔŋ kơn ɣiólốk ɣiɲ ɣɛɲ di za nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi dâʔi Ðứkzê saj di dến bêtên tʰưʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ cỉ mạŋ sốŋ tʰầʔi tʰề zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi tʰầʔi ɲưvậʔi haj ŋườʔi di suốŋ bêtên kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci tạʔi bêtên dến nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ ʔɛɲ kó zằŋ ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê kất tʰầʔi kủʔa ʔɛɲ xỏʔi ʔɛɲ căŋ ŋườʔi dáp fảʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi làmtʰiɲ di nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi dâʔi Ðứkzê saj di dến ɣiêzicô lạʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê tʰề zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi tʰầʔi ɲưvậʔi haj ŋườʔi di dến ɣiêzicô kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci tạʔi ɣiêzicô dến ɣần nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ʔɛɲ kó zằŋ ŋàʔinăj Ðứkzê kất tʰầʔi kủʔa ʔɛɲ xỏʔi ʔɛɲ căŋ ŋườʔi dáp fảʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi làmtʰiɲ di nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ta sin ŋươʔi hãʔi dâʔi Ðứkzê saj di dến ɣiôdɛɲ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ cỉ mạŋ sốŋ tʰầʔi tʰề zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi tʰầʔi ɲưvậʔi haj ŋườʔi kứ di vớʔi ɲăw kó nămmươʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci di tʰeo dứŋ kác sa dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kòn dứŋ lạʔi tạʔi sôŋ lấʔi áʔɔtơʔi mìɲ kuốn lạʔi dập cên nướk nướk zẽ za haj haj ŋườʔi dềʔu di ŋaŋ kwa cên dất xô xi di kwa zồʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hãʔi sin diềʔu ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi cướk xi dượk kất xỏʔi ŋươʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ ŋwiền sin tʰần kủʔa tʰầʔi kảmdộŋ tôʔi dượk bộʔifần nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kầʔusin xó sɔŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰấʔi lúk dượk kất xỏʔi ŋươʔi dượk ɲư lờʔi bằŋ cẳŋ tʰì xôŋ dượk haj ŋườʔi kứ vừʔa di vừʔa nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw kìʔa kó káʔi sɛlửʔa ŋựʔa lửʔa fânzẽ haj ŋườʔi cờʔi cɔŋ kơn ɣiólốk ɲìn tʰấʔi zằŋ ca tôʔi ôʔi ca tôʔi ôʔi sɛ líɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn xôŋ kòn tʰấʔi ŋườʔi nữʔa zồʔi ŋườʔi áʔɔ mìɲ sé za haj mảɲ lấʔi káʔi áʔɔtơʔi dã nơʔi mìɲ zơʔi suốŋ cởvề dứŋ tạʔi cên ɣiôdɛɲ ŋườʔi lấʔi káʔi áʔɔtơʔi dã nơʔi mìɲ zơʔi suốŋ dập nướk nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa dâʔu xi ŋườʔi dã dập nướk zồʔi nướk zẽ za haj di ŋaŋ kwa xi kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci ɣiêzicô dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰấʔi tʰì nóʔi zằŋ tʰần dổ cên họ dến dón ŋườʔi mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ tạʔi dâʔi ɣiữʔa kák tôʔitớ tʰầʔi kó nămmươʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn hãʔi cɔfép di củ tʰầʔi kólẽ tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê dɛm ŋườʔi di cên núʔi nàʔɔhăj cɔŋ cũŋ nàʔɔ căŋ dáp cớ saj di ɲưŋ cúŋ nàʔiép ŋườʔi dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi sấʔuhổ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi saj didi cúŋ saj nămmươʔi ŋườʔi di cɔŋ ŋàʔi cẳŋ dặŋ cúŋ cởvề tạʔi ɣiêzicô ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ ta cẳŋ bảʔɔ kák ŋươʔi cớ kó di saw zânkư kủʔa ɣiêzicô nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ cỗ sâʔicất tʰàɲ nàʔi ʔiɲư cúʔa tôʔi tʰấʔi ɲưŋ nướk tʰì dộk dất tʰì caj ŋườʔi dáp hãʔi dɛm cɔ káʔi bìɲ mớʔi dựŋ muốʔi cɔŋ cúŋ dɛm bìɲ dến cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi di dến ŋuồn nướk dổ muốʔi suốŋnướk nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã cữʔa làɲ cɔ nướk nàʔi cẳŋ kòn ɣâʔi za cết hɔặk nữʔa vậʔi tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa fán za nướk dượk cữʔa làɲ kòn dến ŋàʔinăj từ dó di bêtên Ðʔaŋ di zọk dườŋ kó ɲữŋ cẻ kɔncaj tʰàɲza ɲạʔɔbáŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ lãʔɔ cọk hãʔi lãʔɔ cọk hãʔi ŋườʔi sâʔi lạʔi ŋó cúŋnó ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê zủʔasả cúŋnó liền kó haj kɔn ɣấʔu za káʔi za xỏʔi zừŋ kấʔusé mươʔi haj dứʔa cɔŋ cúŋnó từ dó di dến núʔi kạtmên dɔạn nơʔi ấʔi ŋườʔi cởvề samazi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi vwa ɣiôsafát vwa zuda kaicị mườʔihaj ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê sɔŋ xôŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư ca ŋườʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó cừbỏ tượŋ tʰần baɛɲ ca ŋườʔi dã zựŋ zầʔu vậʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰeo tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tứklà tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên kanfạm ŋườʔi cẳŋ cịʔu di vả mêsa vwa zân môáp nuôʔi ɲiềʔu bầʔi ciên hằŋ ŋườʔi tiếnkốŋ cɔ vwa ʔisơzaên cămŋàn ciên kɔn cămŋàn ciên dựk cưʔa lôŋ ɲưŋ sảʔiza xi ʔaháp băŋà vwa môáp zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ vwa ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ vwa ɣiôzam di za xỏʔi samazi kiểmdiểm kả ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi saj báʔɔ vớʔi ɣiôsafát vwa zuda zằŋ zânmô dã fảnŋịc kùŋ tôʔi vwa kó dếnkùŋ tôʔi zawciến vớʔi môáp căŋ ɣiôsafát dáp zằŋ tôʔi di tôʔi ɲư ôŋ zânsự tôʔi ɲư zânsự ôŋ ŋựʔa tôʔi ɲư ŋựʔa kủʔa ôŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi cúŋta di lêndườŋ nàʔɔ ɣiôzam dáp bởʔi kɔn dườŋ kủʔa dồŋ vắŋ dôm Ấʔi vậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên vwa zuda vwa dôm dồŋ kéʔɔ za di vòŋ bảʔi ŋàʔidườŋ dɔạn xôŋ kó nướk cɔ dạʔɔ biɲ súkvật tʰeo vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ tʰanôʔi Ðứkzê dã ɣọʔi vwa nàʔi dến dặŋ vàʔɔ tăj môáp ɲưŋzô safát hỏʔi dâʔi cẳŋ kó tiênci nàʔɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê dể cúŋta ɲờ ŋườʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê căŋ một dầʔitớ kủʔa vwa ʔisơzaên tʰưʔa zằŋ dâʔi kó kɔncaj kủʔa safát dã hầʔu việk ɣiôsafát lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê nơʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôsafát vwa dôm di dến ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔisơzaên zằŋ vwa tôʔi kó kɛɲệ ɣì căŋ xá dicầʔu kák tiênci kủʔa ca vwa vwa ʔisơzaên dáp zằŋ cẳŋ vậʔi dâʔu Ðứkzê dã ɣọʔi vwa nàʔi dến dặŋ vàʔɔ tăj môáp nóʔi Ðứkzê kwân hằŋ sốŋ tôʔi dứŋ cướk ŋàʔi tʰề zằŋ nếʔu tôʔi xôŋ kíɲnể ɣiôsafát vwa zuda tʰì tôʔi cẳŋ sɛm vwa zasaw kũŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi dến nữʔa ɲưŋ bâʔizờ hãʔi dɛm dến cɔ tôʔi ŋườʔi xảʔi dờn cɔŋ lúk ŋườʔi ấʔi xảʔi dờn tʰì tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê cên ŋườʔi nóʔi Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi dàʔɔ cɔ ɲiềʔu xắp cɔŋ cũŋ nàʔi vìÐứkzê fán zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi ɣió kũŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi mưʔa tʰếmà cũŋ nàʔi dầʔizẫʔi nướk kák ŋươʔi dềʔu ʔuốŋ nướk dượk ɲưŋÐứkzê kɔj nàʔi ɲỏmọn kwá ŋàʔi lạʔi fó zân môáp vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi fáhủʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kiênkố ɲữŋ tʰàɲ tʰịtứ dốn ɲữŋ kâʔi mọʔi suốʔi nướk lấʔi dá hưhạʔi dồŋzuộŋ màʔumỡ vậʔi buổʔisáŋ ɲằm ɣiờ ŋườʔita zâŋ kủʔa căj tʰấʔi nướk bởʔi dườŋ dôm dến sứ dầʔi ɲữŋ nướk xi zân môáp hăj zằŋ kák vwa ấʔi di dáɲ mìɲ tʰì ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kótʰể naj nịc biɲxí dượk cởlên dứŋ tạʔi bờkõʔi sứ ŋàʔisăw zân môáp cổʔi zậʔi tʰật xi mặtcờʔi mọk sɔj cên nướk zân môáp tʰấʔi cướk mìɲ nướk dỏ ɲư máʔu tʰì zằŋ Ấʔilà máʔu cắk vwa ấʔi dã cɛɲ ciến ɲăw dáɲ ɣiết ɲăw bâʔizờ hỡʔi zân môáp hãʔi di kướp kủʔa vậʔi cúŋ di dến cạʔi kwân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ zân ʔisơzaên cổʔi zậʔi dáɲ zân môáp họ fáhủʔi kák tʰàɲ ʔainấʔi lấʔi dá liệŋ vàʔɔ kák dồŋzuộŋ màʔumỡ kák ŋuồn nướk dốn ɲữŋ kâʔi tạʔi kiệtʰazêsết cỉ kòn lạʔi ɲữŋ vác tʰàɲ ɲữŋ kwân dá kũŋ vâʔi sôŋ fá kák vác dó nữʔa vwa mô tʰấʔi mìɲ xôŋ tʰế cốŋ nổʔi dɛm tʰeo mìɲ bảʔicăm ŋườʔi kầm ɣươm twan sôŋ dếnnơʔi vwa dôm ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰếnàʔɔ dượk ŋườʔi tʰáʔitử fảʔi mìɲ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tạʔi cên vác tʰàɲ bèn kó kơn tʰạɲ nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên tʰì lìʔa xỏʔi vwa môáp cởvề sứ mìɲ vả kó kủʔa ŋườʔi môndồ kủʔa kák dấŋ tiênci dến fànnàn kùŋ zằŋ kẻ tôʔitớ ôŋ cồŋ tôʔi dã kwadờʔi ôŋ zằŋ tôʔitớ ôŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê vả củnợ ŋườʔi dến twan haj dứʔa kɔn tôʔi tôʔimọʔi nóʔi vớʔi nàŋ zằŋ ta fảʔi làmɣì cɔ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kó ɣì ɲà nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ kɔndòʔi ôŋ cẳŋ kó ɣì cɔŋ ɲà zầʔu ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di za ŋɔàʔi ɲữŋ bìɲ xôŋ kủʔa kák láŋzềŋ ŋươʔi cớ xi ŋươʔi cởvề hãʔi vàʔɔ ɲà vớʔi kák kɔnŋươʔi dóŋkửʔa lạʔi zốʔi hãʔi dổ zầʔu vàʔɔ kák bìɲ dó bìɲ nàʔɔ dầʔi tʰì dể ziêŋ za nàŋ di xỏʔi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ɲà vớʔi kák kɔncaj mìɲ dóŋkửʔa lạʔi kák kɔncaj nàŋ dɛm bìɲ lạʔi nàŋ dổ zầʔu vàʔɔ xi kák bìɲ dã dầʔi nàŋ nóʔi vớʔi kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm cɔ bìɲ nữʔa ɲưŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ hết cơn bìɲ zồʔi zầʔu ŋừŋ lạʔi bấʔizờ nàŋ dɛm việk ấʔi tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dɛm zầʔu cả kủʔa ŋươʔi dɔạn ŋươʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi lấʔi zầʔu kòn lạʔi nuôʔi mìɲ một ŋàʔiciə di ŋaŋ kwa dất sunɛm dó kó ŋườʔi dờn ɣiàʔu kầm ŋườʔiở lạʔi bữʔa từ ấʔi mỗʔi xi ŋườʔi di ŋaŋ kwa dó tʰì vàʔɔ ɲà ŋườʔi dờn nàʔi zùŋbữʔa ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi cồŋ mìɲ zằŋ tôʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi năŋ dến ɲà cúŋta dâʔi ŋườʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin cúŋta hãʔi sâʔicất cɔ ŋườʔi káʔi fòŋ kaw zồʔi dể tạʔi dó káʔi ɣiườŋ káʔi káʔi ɣế kâʔi dèn vậʔi xi ŋườʔi dến ɲà tʰì lạʔi dó một ŋàʔiciə di dến sunɛm cọ nơʔi fòŋ kaw ŋủ tạʔi dó ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɣêhasi tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi ɣọʔi ŋườʔi dờn sunɛm dó dến ɣêhasi ɣọʔi nàŋ nàŋ za dứŋ cướk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ nàŋ zằŋ kìʔa ŋươʔi dã lɔliệʔu cɔ cúŋta mọʔi diềʔu nàʔi vậʔi cúŋta fảʔi làmɣì cɔ ŋươʔi kó fảʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi ɣiùm cɔ ŋươʔi vớʔi vwa hăjlà vớʔi kwan tổŋbiɲ căŋ nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự tôʔi lạʔi vậʔi cúŋta fảʔi làmɣì cɔ ŋườʔi ɣêhasi dáp zằŋ nàʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ kó kɔncaj cồŋ ŋườʔi dã ɣià zồʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi ɣọʔi nàŋ ɣêhasi ɣọʔi nàŋ nàŋ dến dứŋ nơʔi kửʔa nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi dờn zằŋ năm tớʔi cɔŋ lúk nàʔi ŋươʔi dứʔa kɔncaj nàŋ tʰưʔa hỡʔi cúʔa tôʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin cớ nóʔizốʔi kùŋ kɔndòʔi kủʔa cúʔa ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi tʰọtʰaj săw kũŋ cɔŋ lúk dó sɛɲ dứʔa kɔncaj ʔiɲư lờʔi dã nóʔi cướk cɔ nàŋ sảʔiza xi dứʔa cẻ ŋàʔiciə di dến ca nơʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣặt lúʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ðầʔu tôʔi dăw dầʔu tôʔi dăw ŋườʔi ca biểʔu tôʔitớ dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi tôʔitớ dɛm zaw cɔ dứʔa cẻ ŋồʔi cên dầʔuɣốʔi kủʔa cɔdến cưʔa zồʔi cết nàŋ di dể cên ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi di za dóŋkửʔa lạʔi kế dó nàŋ kêʔu cồŋ mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi sin ôŋ kắt cɔ tôʔi dứʔa dầʔitớ kɔn lừʔa dể tôʔi cạʔi dến ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɔạn tôʔi cởvề cồŋ hỏʔi nàŋ zằŋ ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ fảʔi mồŋ kũŋ cẳŋ fảʔi ŋàʔi sabát vậʔi ɲân saw di dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi nàŋ dáp mọʔi diềʔu bìɲan nàŋ biểʔu tʰắŋ lừʔa nóʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm di măw măw nếʔu biểʔu ŋươʔi mớʔi ŋừŋ lạʔi vậʔi nàŋ di dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi cên núʔi kạtmên ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰấʔi nàŋ dằŋ sa nóʔi vớʔi ɣêhasi tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi dờn sunɛm vậʔi hãʔi cạʔi di dón nàŋ hỏʔi nàŋ zằŋ mọʔi việk dềʔu bìɲan căŋ cồŋ kɔnŋươʔi bìɲan căŋ nàŋ dáp bìɲan xi nàŋ dến ɣần ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi cên núʔi tʰì lấʔi cơn ŋườʔi ɣêhasi dến ɣần dặŋ sô nàŋ za ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi dể mặk nàŋ liɲhồn nàŋ dắŋkăj Ðứkzê kó ɣiấʔu diềʔu dó xôŋ cɔ hăj ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó kầʔu cúʔa dứʔa kɔncaj saw tôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi vớʔi cúʔa zằŋ sin cớ zốʔi tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ ɣêhasi zằŋ hãʔi tʰắtlưŋ ŋươʔi kầm ɣậʔi nơʔi tăj di nếʔu ŋươʔi ɣặp ʔaj cớ càʔɔ nếʔu ʔaj càʔɔ ŋươʔi cớ dáp lạʔi ŋườʔi dặt kâʔi ɣậʔi cên dứʔa cẻ ŋườʔimẹ kủʔa dứʔa cẻ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ cỉ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa ôŋ tʰề tôʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi ôŋ cổʔi zậʔi di tʰeo ŋườʔi ɣêhasi di cướk haj ŋườʔi dặt kâʔi ɣậʔi cên dứʔa cẻ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ nàʔɔ kũŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi mòʔi ɣì sốŋ ŋườʔi cởlạʔi dón tʰưʔa kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðứʔa cẻ xôŋ tỉɲ lạʔi xi vàʔɔ ɲà tʰấʔi dứʔa cẻ dã cết sảʔi cên ɣiườŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ fòŋ dóŋkửʔa lạʔi kó dứʔa cẻ mìɲ cɔŋ zồʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cên ɣiườŋ cên dứʔa cẻ dặt miệŋ mìɲ cên miệŋ mìɲ cên tăj mìɲ cên tăj ŋườʔi cên mìɲ sák dứʔa cẻ lạʔi cở suốŋ di kwa dilạʔi cɔŋ fòŋ dɔạn ɣiườŋ cên mìɲ dứʔa cẻ nữʔa zốt lạʔi ɲảʔimũʔi bảʔi za ɣọʔi ɣêhasi ɣọʔi ŋườʔi xi nàŋ cạʔi dến nóʔi vớʔi nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kɔnŋươʔi nàŋ lạʔi ɣần mìɲ suốŋ zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi lạʔi dɔạn lấʔi kɔn mìɲ di za cởvề ɣiɲɣɛɲ vả cɔŋ sứ kó dóʔicém kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci dềʔu ŋồʔi cướk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi biểʔu tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi bắk káʔi nồʔi nấʔu kɛɲ cɔ kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci một ŋườʔi cɔŋ di za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ dặŋ háʔi zăw tʰấʔi zâʔi zừŋ háʔi ɲữŋ zâʔizưʔa zạʔi bọk dầʔi áʔɔtơʔi mìɲ xi ŋườʔi cởvề sắt za từŋ miếŋ cɔŋ nồʔi nấʔu kɛɲ cẳŋ tʰứ ɣì ŋườʔita múk cɔ kák ŋườʔi ɲưŋ vừʔa xi kɛɲ tʰì zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cết cɔŋ nồʔi nầʔi họ kɛɲ ấʔi xôŋ dặŋ nóʔi tʰếtʰì hãʔi dɛm lạʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ nồʔi biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi múk cɔ kák ŋườʔi vậʔi cɔŋ kɛɲ cẳŋ kòn dộk ɣì nữʔa kó ŋườʔiở baɛɲsalisa dến dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi haimươʔi báɲ lúʔamạc lúʔa kòn ɣié dể cɔŋ mìɲ kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa ɣặt biểʔu tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm fát cɔ kák ŋườʔi kẻ tôʔitớ ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ ci tôʔi fảʔi fát dồ nàʔi cɔ mộtcăm ŋườʔi saw ɲưŋ dáp hãʔi fát cɔ kák báɲ dó hầʔu cɔ di Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi ŋườʔita kòn zư lạʔi Ấʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi dặt kák báɲ dó cướk kòn tʰừʔa lạʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán naaman kwan tổŋbiɲ kủʔa vwa sizi ŋườʔi kó kwiền cướk củ mìɲ dượk tôncọŋ bởʔivì Ðứkzê zùŋ ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu zân sizi ŋườʔi nàʔi mạɲmẽ bạʔɔzạn sɔŋ bịɲ fuŋ vả kó mộtvàʔi tɔán zân sizi di za dứʔa ɣáʔi ɲỏ kủʔa sứ ʔisơzaên fu dể hầʔuhạ naaman một ŋàʔiciə nóʔi vớʔi củ mìɲ zằŋ Ôʔi cớci cúʔa tôʔi di dếnkùŋ ôŋ tiênci samazi ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúʔa tôʔi xỏʔi bịɲ fuŋ naaman dɛm kák lờʔi nàʔi tʰưʔa lạʔi cɔ cúʔa mìɲ zằŋ Ðứʔa ɣáʔi ɲỏ sứ ʔisơzaên kó nóʔi tʰể nầʔi tʰể nàʔi vwa si zi dáp hãʔi di ɣởʔi tʰơ cɔ vwa ʔisơzaên vậʔi naaman di dɛm tʰeo mìɲ mườʔi lâŋ bạk sáʔu ŋàn dồŋ vàŋ mườʔi áʔɔ ŋườʔi dɛm bứk tʰơ zâŋ cɔ vwa ʔisơzaên tʰơ zằŋ xi tʰơ nầʔi dạt dếnkùŋ vwa kìʔa dã saj naaman dầʔitớ dếnkùŋ vwa vwa dượk bứk tʰơ nầʔi ấʔi dể vwa ɣiảʔicứʔu bịɲ fuŋ cɔ ŋườʔi xi vwa ʔisơzaên d k tʰơ zồʔi sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ Ôŋ ấʔi saj ŋườʔi dếnkùŋ dể cữʔa xỏʔi bịɲ fuŋ cɔ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó kwiền sốŋ cết saw xá sɛm tʰấʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi zịp dể ŋịc kùŋ xi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj zằŋ vwa ʔisơzaên kó sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ tʰì saj nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ kớsaw vwa sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ naaman hãʔi dến tôʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kó tiênci vậʔi naaman dến vớʔi ŋựʔa sɛ zừŋ tạʔi kửʔɛɲà saj sứɣiả nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di mìɲ bảʔi zướʔi sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ tʰịt ŋươʔi cởnên làɲ ŋươʔi dượk sạc ɲưŋna ʔaman nổʔizận vừʔa di vừʔa nóʔi zằŋ ta ŋĩ zằŋ cíɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi di za dón dứŋ ɣần dó kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi lấʔi tăj dưʔa kwa dưʔa lạʔi cên cỗ bịɲ cữʔa làɲ fuŋ ʔabana bạtba haj sôŋ Ðʔa mác cẳŋ kák nướk cɔŋ ʔisơzaên saw ta cẳŋ dó cɔ dượk sạc hăjsaw vậʔi ŋườʔi cở di ɣiậnzữ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ dến ɣần ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ ca ơʔi nếʔu tiênci kó cwiền cɔ ca việk xó ca cẳŋ làmsaw fươŋci zàʔi ŋườʔi bảʔɔ ca zằŋ hãʔi tʰì dượk sạc ŋườʔi suốŋ sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ mìɲ bảʔi tʰeo ɲư lờʔi cwiền kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi dượk sạc tʰịt ŋườʔi cởnên ɲư cướk ɣiốŋ ɲư tʰịt kủʔa dứʔa kɔnnít ɲỏ naaman vớʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi di tʰeo cởlạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi dến dứŋ cướk nóʔi zằŋ bâʔizờ tôʔi ɲìn zằŋ cên xắp tʰếzan cẳŋ kó cúʔa nàʔɔ xák Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên Ấʔi vậʔi tôʔi sin ôŋ ɲậm kủʔa tôʔitớ ôŋ ɲưŋ dáp zằŋ ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ Ðấŋ fụk tʰề zằŋ cẳŋ ɲậm ɣì naaman épnàʔi ɲậm lấʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi từcốʔi naaman zằŋ twi cẳŋ ɲậm lấʔi tôʔi sin ôŋ cɔfép ŋườʔita cɔ tôʔitớ ôŋ dủ dất bằŋ haj kɔn cở nổʔi zàʔi săw tôʔitớ ôŋ cẳŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hăjlà cɔ cɔ tʰần nàʔɔ xák Ðứkzê sɔŋ ŋwiện Ðứkzê tʰatʰứ cɔ tôʔitớ ôŋ diềʔu nàʔi mỗʔi xi củ tôʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền tʰờ zimmôn dặŋ tʰờ lạʔi tʰì cốŋ cên káɲtăj tôʔi tôʔi kũŋ fảʔi kwì lạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ zimmôn ŋwiện Ðứkzê tʰatʰứ diềʔu dó cɔ tôʔitớ ôŋ dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di bìɲiên xina ʔaman dã lìʔa xỏʔi di kác sasa tʰì ɣêhasi tôʔitớ kủʔa ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nóʔitʰầm zằŋ kìʔa củ kó zɔŋ tʰứ cɔ naaman ŋườʔi sizi xôŋ ɲậm ŋườʔi dã dɛm dến ta cỉ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ tʰề cạʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi lãɲ lấʔi ci nơʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi ɣêhasi cạʔi tʰeo săw naaman naaman tʰấʔi ɣêhasi cạʔi tʰeo săw mìɲ ɲảʔi suốŋ sɛ di dến dón ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ mọʔi việk dềʔu bìɲan cớ ɣêhasi dáp mọʔi việk dềʔu bìɲan củ tôʔi saj tôʔi nóʔi vớʔi ôŋ zằŋ hồʔi nãʔi kó haj ŋườʔi caicẻ môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci núʔi zaim dến sin ôŋ hãʔi cɔ haj ŋườʔi ấʔi lâŋ bạk haj áʔɔ naaman nóʔi sin hãʔi ɲận lấʔi haj lâŋ ŋườʔi kố nàʔi dɔạn dể haj lâŋ bạk haj áʔɔ cɔŋ baw zồʔi caw cɔ haj tôʔitớ mìɲ dɛm di cướk ɣêhasi lúk dã dến cên ɣò ɣêhasi lấʔi kák baw xỏʔi tăj haj dầʔitớ dể cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ dɔạn cɔ di cởvề ŋườʔi zamắt củ mìɲ ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ ɣêhasi ŋươʔi dâʔu dến ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔitớ tʰầʔi xôŋ kó di dâʔu ɲưŋ zằŋ xi ŋườʔi kiə suốŋ xỏʔi sɛ dặŋ di dón ŋươʔi lòŋ cẳŋ kùŋ ŋươʔi saw zàʔi kó fảʔi lúk ɲậm lấʔi bạk kwầnáʔɔ livɛ ɲɔ ciên tôʔi caj ɣáʔi saw vìvậʔi bịɲ fuŋ kủʔa naaman zíɲ vàʔɔ ŋươʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dờʔidờʔi ɣêhasi di za xỏʔi fuŋ cắŋ ɲư twiết kák môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ nơʔi cúŋtôʔi cướk tʰầʔi kwá cɔ cúŋtôʔi sin dể cúŋtôʔi di dến ɣiôdɛɲ ʔainấʔi dốn kâʔi dòntăj zồʔi tạʔi dó kất nơʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi dáp hãʔi di một ŋườʔi zằŋ tôʔi sin tʰầʔi hãʔi di kùŋ kák tôʔitớ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi dáp ta di vậʔi ŋườʔi di vớʔi Ðếŋiô dɛɲ xởʔi dốn kâʔi ɲưŋ kó ŋườʔi dươŋ dốn kâʔi káʔi lưỡʔi zìʔu văŋ suốŋnướk ŋườʔi zằŋ cúʔa tôʔi tʰanôʔi tôʔi kó ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hỏʔi zằŋ nó zớt dâʔu ŋườʔi cỉ cỗ cɔ cặt xúk kâʔi kwăŋ suốŋ tạʔicỗ dó cɔ lưỡʔi zìʔu nổʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi ấʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi di ŋườʔi ấʔi ɣiơ tăj za lấʔi vả vwa sizi zawciến vớʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi tʰươŋŋị vớʔi kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ ta dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi nơʔi nơʔi kiə ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔisơzaên zằŋ xá ɣiữ lấʔi cớ di ŋaŋ kwa cỗ kiə zân sizi fụk tạʔi dó vậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên saj ŋườʔi dếnnơʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cỉ cɔ mìɲ bảʔɔ cướk ŋườʔi ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ tạʔi dó cẳŋɲữŋ mộtʰaj lòŋ vwa sizi bốʔizốʔi ấʔi ɣọʔi kák tôʔitớ mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ cɔ ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta ŋườʔi ɣiúpdỡ vwa ʔisơzaên một ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ tʰưʔa zằŋ Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi cẳŋ ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ tiênci cɔŋ ʔisơzaên cɔ vwa ʔisơzaên kák lờʔi vwa nóʔi cɔŋ fòŋ ŋủ mìɲ vwa bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi di sɛm ŋườʔiở dâʔu dể saj ŋườʔi kó ŋườʔi dến tʰuật cɔ vwa zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔiở tạʔi tʰan vìvậʔi vwa saj ŋựʔa sɛ dạʔɔ biɲ zất dôŋ dến tʰan tớʔi nơʔi lúk bandêm vâʔi tʰàɲ tôʔitớ kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cổʔi zậʔi sáŋsớm di za tʰấʔi dạʔɔ biɲ kùŋ ŋựʔa sɛ dươŋ vâʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hỡʔiôʔi cúʔa cúŋta làmsaw dáp zằŋ cớ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở vớʔi cúŋta dôŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở vớʔi cúŋnó Ðʔɔạn kầʔuŋwiện zằŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi sin tôʔitớ tôʔi dể tʰấʔi dượk Ðứkzê ŋườʔi za tʰì ŋườʔi tʰấʔi núʔi dầʔi ɲữŋ ŋựʔa sɛ bằŋ lửʔa cuŋkwɛɲ kwânsi zi kéʔɔ suốŋ nơʔi ŋườʔi kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê zằŋ sincúʔa xiến kwân ấʔi duimù Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến cúŋ duimù tʰeo ɲư lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa Ðʔɔạn nóʔi vớʔi cúŋnó zằŋ Ðâʔi xôŋ fảʔi dườŋ dâʔi cẳŋ fảʔi tʰàɲ hãʔi tʰeo zẫn kák ŋươʔi dến ŋườʔi kák ŋươʔi zồʔi ŋườʔi zẫn cúŋnó dến samazi xi cúŋnó dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ samazi zồʔi kầʔu zằŋ lạʔiÐứkzê sin cɔ cúŋnó tʰấʔi Ðứkzê tʰấʔi mìɲ ɣiữʔa samazi vwa ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi cúŋnó tʰì nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ca fảʔi dáɲ cúŋnó căŋ fảʔi dáɲ cúŋnó căŋ dáp zằŋ cớ dáɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi vwa zùŋ ɣươm kuŋ fu vwa dáɲ saw hãʔi zọn cướk cúŋ báɲ zượʔu dể cɔ cúŋ ʔuốŋ zồʔi cởvề kùŋ củ mìɲ ŋườʔi bàʔi tiệk cɔ cúŋnó xi cúŋnó dã ănuốŋ zồʔi ŋườʔi tʰa cɔ cúŋnó di cúŋnó cởvề kùŋ củ mìɲ từ dó săw ɲữŋ tɔán kwân sỵzi xôŋ kòn lɔán dến dịʔafận ʔisơzaên nữʔa săw kák diềʔu dó bêɲadát vwa sizi ɲóm kả dạʔɔ biɲ mìɲ di vâʔi tʰàɲ samazi cɔŋsamazi dươŋ kó dóʔicém tʰàɲ vâʔihãm lâʔu ŋàʔi dến dỗʔi káʔi dầʔu lừʔa mươʔi siếk bạk ɣók fân kâʔu siếk bạk xi vwa ʔisơzaên di ŋaŋ kwa cên tườŋ tʰàɲ kó ŋườʔi dànbà kêʔu ŋườʔi zằŋ Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi sin kứʔu tôʔi vwa nóʔi nếʔuÐứkzê xôŋ kứʔu ŋươʔi tʰì lấʔi dâʔu dặŋ kứʔu ŋươʔi bởʔi dạp lúʔa hăjlà bởʔi nơʔi zượʔu saw vwa lạʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kó ci nàŋ tʰưʔa zằŋ nàʔi nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ kɔncaj cị hầʔu ŋàʔinăj cúŋta tʰịt ŋàʔimaj cúŋta tʰịt kɔncaj vậʔi cúŋtôʔi kó nấʔu tʰịt kɔncaj tôʔi ŋàʔimaj tôʔi kó nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ kɔncaj cị hầʔu cúŋta ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kó ɣiấʔu kɔncaj mìɲ xi vwa ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn nàʔi tʰì sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ bấʔizờ ŋườʔi daŋ di ŋaŋ kwa cên tườŋ tʰàɲ zânsự sɛm tʰấʔi ŋườʔi fíʔa cɔŋ mặk káʔi baw vàʔɔ tʰịt mìɲ vwa zằŋ nếʔu ŋàʔinăj dầʔu kủʔa kɔncaj kủʔa safát hãʔi kòn cên vaj ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sử kác nặŋnề dươŋ ŋồʔi cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ŋồʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi tʰì vwa saj sứɣiả di cướk mìɲ dếnkùŋ tiênci ɲưŋ xi sứɣiả cưʔa dến nóʔi vớʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zằŋ kìʔa hãʔi sɛm kɔn ɲơn kiə saj ŋườʔi dến dặŋ kắt dầʔu xá kɔicừŋ vừʔa xi sứɣiả dến hãʔi dóŋkửʔa lạʔi zùŋ kửʔa sô duổʔi di kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ bướk kủʔa củ săw lưŋ saw ŋườʔi kòn dươŋ nóʔi cúŋ tʰấʔi sứɣiả dến vwa kũŋ dến nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ tainạn nàʔi dến bởʔi Ðứkzê vậʔi kòn côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê làmci nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ŋàʔimaj tạʔi ɣiờ nàʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ samazi dấʔu lọk siếk haj dấʔu lúʔamạc siếk kwan kaj nâŋdỡ vwa dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ zầʔu cɔ Ðứkzê kák kửʔasổ cên cờʔi diềʔu dó kó dượk saw dáp cíɲ ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ɲưŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ dặŋ dến tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kó ŋườʔi fuŋ nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ cúŋta ŋồʔi dâʔi dến cừŋ cết làmci nếʔu cúŋta ɲấtdịɲ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ tʰì dó kó dóʔicém cúŋta cết dóʔi bằŋ cúŋta kứ ŋồʔi dâʔi tʰì cúŋta kũŋ cết vậʔi cúŋta hãʔi kwa cạʔi kwân sizi nếʔu zuŋtʰứ tʰì sốŋ bằŋ ɣiết di zẫʔu tʰếnàʔɔ cúŋta kũŋ cết dó tʰôʔi vậʔi lúk cạŋvạŋ kák ŋườʔi fuŋ cổʔi zậʔi dặŋ di dến cạʔi kwân kủʔa sizi xi tớʔi dầʔu cạʔi kwân cẳŋ tʰấʔi ʔaj dó vìcúʔa dã xiến cạʔi kwân sizi ŋɛ tiếŋ sɛ ŋựʔa tiếŋ dạʔɔ biɲ nỗʔi zân sizi nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ kìʔa vwa ʔisơzaên dã vwa zân hêtít vwa zíptô dặŋ dáɲ cúŋta cúŋ cổʔi zậʔi cạʔi cốn lúk cạŋvạŋ kák cạʔi ŋựʔa lừʔa mìɲ dể cạʔi kwân mìɲ ɲư kũ cúŋ cốn dặŋ kứʔumạŋ sốŋ mìɲ xi kák ŋườʔi fuŋ kiə dến dầʔu cạʔi kwân vàʔɔ cɔŋ cạʔi ʔuốŋ dɔạn lấʔi bạk vàŋ kwầnáʔɔ dɛm di ɣiấʔu cúŋ cởlạʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ cạʔi xák dó kũŋ lấʔi ɲữŋ kủʔakảʔi dɛm di ɣiấʔu bấʔizờ nóʔi vớʔi ɲăw zằŋ cúŋta cẳŋ fảʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi kó tinlàɲ cúŋta nínlặŋ saw nếʔu cúŋta dợʔi dến zạŋdôŋ tʰì hìɲfạt cắk vàʔɔ cúŋta vậʔi hãʔi di báʔɔ nàʔi cɔ ɲàvwa cúŋ di ɣọʔi kwân kɛɲ kửʔa tʰàɲ tʰuật cɔ zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó di dến cạʔi kwân sizi tʰấʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj kũŋ xôŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cỉ tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ŋựʔa lừʔa dươŋ kột ɲữŋ cạʔi lạʔi ɲư kũ kwân kɛɲ kửʔa ɣọʔi ŋườʔi di báʔɔ ấʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền vwa vwa cổʔi zậʔi bandêm nóʔi vớʔi kák tôʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ ta bàʔitỏ cɔ kák ŋươʔi diềʔu zân sizi twan cɔ cúŋta cúŋnó cúŋta dóʔi nênci dã za xỏʔi cạʔi kwân mìɲ dặŋ fụk cɔŋ dồŋ cúŋnó dã nóʔi ɲăw zằŋ xi zân ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi tʰàɲ cúŋta bắtsốŋ cúŋnó zồʔi cúŋta vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ một ŋườʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa tʰưʔa zằŋ kìʔa ŋựʔa kòn lạʔi kũŋ hawmòn ɲư dɔàn zân ʔisơzaên kòn lạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ săw kwả dồŋ sốfận kùŋ dɔàn zân dôŋ dã cết vìvậʔi hãʔi cwiền lịɲ cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kɔn ŋựʔa cɔŋ kòn lạʔi dặŋ di zò tʰám vậʔi cúŋ lấʔi haj káʔi sɛ tʰắŋ ŋựʔa vàʔɔ zồʔi vwa saj ŋườʔi di tʰeo dạʔɔkwân sizi zằŋ hãʔi di sɛm cúŋ di tʰeo cɔdến ɣiôdɛɲ tʰấʔi xắp zọk dườŋ dầʔi ɲữŋ kwầnáʔɔ dồdạk kwân sizi dã kwăŋ cɔŋ lúk cạʔi cốn hốʔihả kák sứɣiả cởvề tʰuật lạʔi cɔ vwa hăj zânsự kéʔɔ za kướp lấʔi cạʔi kwân sizi dến dỗʔi dấʔu lọk siếk haj dấʔu lúk mạc kũŋ siếk ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán vwa kắt kwan kaj nâŋdỡ mìɲ kɛɲzữ kửʔa tʰàɲ ɲưŋ zâncúŋ dạp zẹp ŋườʔi tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋườʔi cết ʔiɲư ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã nóʔi cướk xi vwa dến ŋườʔi vảlạʔi việk sảʔiza ɲư lờʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ ŋàʔimaj tạʔi ɣiờ nàʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ samazi haj dấʔu lúʔamạc siếk dấʔu lọk kũŋ siếk zồʔi kwan kaj kó dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ zẫʔucɔ Ðứkzê kák kửʔasổ cên cờʔi diềʔu dó kó dượk saw zằŋ mắt ŋươʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó sɔŋ ŋươʔi xôŋ dến Ấʔilà diềʔu sảʔi dến zâncúŋ dạp zẹp ŋườʔi zướʔi cơn tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋườʔi cết nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi dờn kủʔa dứʔa caj ŋườʔi dã xiến sốŋ lạʔi zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi di vớʔi ŋườʔi ɲàŋươʔi ŋụ nơʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi dượk Ðứkzê dã dịɲ zẫn kơn dóʔi dến kìʔa dến cɔŋ sứ bảʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi dứŋzậʔi vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ ŋườʔiɲà mìɲ di kiềʔu ŋụ bảʔi cɔŋ sứ filitin kuốʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi sứ filitin cởvề di dến kêʔunàʔi vwa việk ɲà dồŋzuộŋ mìɲ vả vwa dươŋ nóʔicwiện vớʔi ɣêhasi tôʔitớ kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰuật cɔ kák kôŋviệk dã sɔŋ ɣêhasi daŋ tʰuật cɔ vwa hăj tʰếnàʔɔ dã xiến cếtsốŋ lạʔi kìʔa kó ŋườʔi dànbà kủʔa dứʔa kɔncaj dã xiến cɔ sốŋ lạʔi dến kêʔunàʔi vwa việk ɲà dồŋzuộŋ mìɲ ɣêhasi tâʔu zằŋ Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi kìʔa ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi nàʔi kɔncaj nàŋ dã cɔ sốŋ lạʔi vwa hỏʔi nàŋ tʰì nàŋ tʰuật kôŋviệk cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa kắt kwan hɔạn tʰeo nàŋ zằŋ hãʔi cả lạʔi cɔ nàŋ mọʔi nàʔɔ tʰuộk nàŋ hếttʰảʔi huêlợʔi kủʔa dồŋzuộŋ nàŋ ŋàʔi nàŋ lìʔa xỏʔi sứ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj di dến Ðʔa mác bấʔizờ bêɲadát vwa sizi dăw kó ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mớʔi dến dâʔi vwa bảʔɔ hasaên zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi dɛm tʰeo di dón ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kậʔi ŋườʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê zằŋ ta dượk làɲ bịɲ nàʔi căŋ vậʔi hasaên di dón ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zẫn tʰeo mìɲ mươʔi lạkdà cở mọʔi ɲất kó tạʔi Ðʔa mác dặŋ kủʔa cɔ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi dến zamắt tʰưʔa zằŋ kɔncaj ôŋ bêɲadát vwa sizi dã saj tôʔi dến ôŋ dặŋ hỏʔi zằŋ tôʔi dượk làɲ bịɲ nàʔi căŋ dáp zằŋ hãʔi di nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa dượk làɲ bịɲ zầʔu vậʔi Ðứkzê dã cɔ ŋườʔi cết ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋó căm hasaên lâʔu dến dỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi hổtʰẹn zồʔi kấttiếŋ xók hasaên hỏʔi zằŋ kớsaw cúʔa tôʔi xók dáp zằŋ bởʔi ŋươʔi tʰiệtʰạʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi câm lửʔa kák tʰàɲ kiênkố kủʔa cúŋnó ɣiết kák caicẻ bằŋ ɣươm cà kɔnɲỏ bụŋ dờn kó ŋén kủʔa cúŋnó hasaên ɲưŋ tôʔitớ ôŋ ʔaj cẳŋkwa kɔn có dó tʰôʔi saw nổʔi kôŋsự zườŋ ấʔi dáp zằŋ Ðứkzê dã cɔ zằŋ ŋươʔi vwa sizi hasaên lìʔa xỏʔi cởvề kùŋ củ mìɲ củ hỏʔi zằŋ nóʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi saw ŋươʔi tʰưʔa nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ cúʔa cắk làɲmạɲ ŋàʔimaj hasaên lấʔi káʔi ɲúŋ nướk dắp cện bêɲadát tʰì ŋườʔi cết zồʔiha saên vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi năm tʰứnăm dờʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ɣiôzam kɔncaj ɣiôsafát vwa zuda lênŋôʔi vwa zuda dươŋ xi ɣiôsafát kòn cịvì lúk lênŋôʔi ŋườʔi dã dượk bamươʔi haj tuổʔi ŋườʔi kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư ɲà ʔaháp dã kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔaháp ŋườʔi vậʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê sɔŋÐứkzê ɲân Ðʔa tôʔitớ kủʔa ŋàʔi xôŋ twiệtziệt zuda bởʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa dểzàɲ ŋọn dèn cɔ Ðʔa cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi mãʔimãʔi cɔŋ dờʔi ɣiôzam zân dôm fảnŋịc kùŋ zuda vwa cɔ mìɲ bấʔizờ ɣiôzam kwa sajzơ dɛm tʰeo hếttʰảʔi sɛ biɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi bandêm dáɲ kwân dôm kák kwan kaj sɛ líɲ vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi kwânlíɲ ŋườʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi cạʔi mìɲ Ấʔi vậʔi zân dôm fảnŋịc cẳŋ swi fụk zân zuda cɔdến ŋàʔinăj Ðồŋ lúk ấʔi lípna kũŋ fảnŋịc kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôzam mọʔi việk ŋườʔilàm diềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa zuda ɣiôzam ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn vớʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ mườʔihaj dờʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ɣiôzam vwa zuda lênŋôʔi cịvì ʔɛcasiə dượk haimươʔihaj tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi vwa kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi ʔatʰali cáʔu ɣáʔi kủʔa zi vwa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ɲà ʔaháp diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư ɲà ấʔi dã vì ŋườʔi zể kủʔa ɲà ʔaháp ŋườʔi di vớʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp dến zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát dặŋ zawciến kùŋ hasaên vwa sizi ɲưŋ kwân sizi cɔ vwa ɣiôzam bịtʰươŋ ŋườʔi cởvề ɣícêên dặŋ cữʔa làɲ ɲữŋ tʰươŋ ŋườʔi bởʔi kwân sizi tạʔi zamốt xi dáɲ ɣiặk kùŋ hasaên vwa sizi ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ɣiôzam vwa zuda di suốŋ ɣícêên dặŋ tʰăm ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp dăw tạʔi dó Ðấŋ tiênci ɣọʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ môndồ kủʔa ɲữŋ tiênci nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi tʰắtlưŋ dɛm vɛ zầʔu nàʔi tʰeo ŋươʔi hãʔi di dến zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát xi ŋươʔi dã dến dó hãʔi ɣiêhu kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsafát cáʔu nimsi dâʔu dɔạn ŋươʔi vàʔɔ xiến ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi xỏʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zẫn ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ fòŋ bấʔizờ ŋươʔi lấʔi vɛ zầʔu dổ cên dầʔu ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi vwa cên ʔisơzaên Ðʔɔạn hãʔi mởkửʔa za cốn di cớ dãʔi ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi tôʔitớ caicẻ kủʔa dấŋ tiênci di dến zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát xi ŋườʔi dến kák kwan tướŋ dạʔɔkwân dươŋ ŋồʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɣiêhu zằŋ hỡʔi kwan tướŋ tôʔi kó cwiện nóʔi vớʔi ôŋ ɣiêhu dáp zằŋ kó cwiện nóʔi vớʔi ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta ŋườʔi caicẻ dáp hỡʔi kwan tướŋ vớʔi ôŋ vậʔi ɣiêhu dứŋzậʔi di vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi caicẻ dổ zầʔu cên dầʔu ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi ta sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi vwa cên ʔisơzaên zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋươʔi dáɲ ɣiết ɲà ʔaháp củ ŋươʔi báʔɔ ɣiêsabên hwiết kủʔa kák tiênci tôʔitớ kùŋ hwiết kủʔa hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê kả ɲà ʔaháp ziệt kák ŋườʔi kủʔa ɲà ʔaháp hăjlà ŋườʔi dượk tựzɔ ɣiết xỏʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên cɔ ɲà ʔaháp ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲà baêsa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahiza có tʰịt ɣiêsabên cɔŋ dồŋ ɣícêên cẳŋ kó ʔaj côn ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi caicẻ mởkửʔa za cạʔi cốn ɣiêhu di za dếnkùŋ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa củ mìɲ cúŋnó hỏʔi zằŋ mọʔi bìɲan cớ kẻ diên nàʔi dến ʔɛɲ ci ŋườʔi dáp vớʔi cúŋnó zằŋ kák ŋươʔi ŋườʔi lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nóʔi ɲưŋ cúŋnó dáp zằŋ nóʔizốʔi hãʔi nóʔi cɔ cúŋta vậʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ ŋườʔi kó nóʔi vớʔi kác nàʔi kác kiə zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi vwa cên ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi lậtdật lấʔi kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ cảʔi suốŋ zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi cên kák nấk tʰaŋ Ðʔɔạn cúŋnó tʰổʔi tuŋô zằŋ ɣiêhu vwa Ấʔi vậʔi ɣiêhu kɔncaj ɣiôsafát cáʔu nimsi làmfản ɣiôzam vả kớ hasaên vwa sizi ɣiôzam kả kwân ʔisơzaên dềʔu biɲ vựk zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát ɲưŋ vwa ɣiôzam dã cởvề ɣícêên dặŋ cữʔa làɲ ɲữŋ tʰươŋ ŋườʔi dã bởʔi kwân sizi xi ŋườʔi dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi hasaên vwa sizi ɣiêhu nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi vừʔaý cớ dể ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi tʰàɲ di tʰôŋtin cɔ ɣícêên vậʔi ɣiêhu sɛ kwa ɣícêên ɣiôzam dăw tạʔi dó ʔɛcasiə vwa zuda kũŋ di suốŋ dó dặŋ tʰăm ɣiôzam líɲ kɛɲ dứŋ cên tʰáp ɣícêên tʰấʔi dạʔɔkwân kủʔa ɣiêhu dến zằŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi ɲữŋ dạʔɔkwân dến ɣiôzam bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi saj ŋườʔi líɲ di dón hỏʔi zằŋ bìɲiên căŋ vậʔi kó ŋườʔi líɲ di dón ɣiêhu dáp sự bìɲiên kó kɛɲệ ci ŋươʔi hãʔi luj săw tên líɲ kɛɲ báʔɔ zằŋ sứɣiả dã di dếnnơʔi kwân ấʔi zồʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ cởvề ŋườʔi lạʔi saj ŋườʔi líɲ tʰứ ɲì kũŋ dếnkùŋ cúŋnó nóʔi vwa hỏʔi bìɲiên căŋ ɣiêhu dáp sự bìɲiên kó kɛɲệ ci ŋươʔi hãʔi luj săw líɲ kɛɲ lạʔi báʔɔ zằŋ sứɣiả dã dếnnơʔi cúŋnó zồʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cởvề vả kác zẫn sɛ ɣiốŋ ɲư kác kủʔa ɣiêhu kɔncaj nimsi ŋườʔi zẫn kác huŋăŋ ɣiôzam nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi tʰắŋ sɛ ŋườʔita tʰắŋ sɛ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạŋiô zam vwa ʔisơzaên ʔɛcasiə vwa zuda mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu sɛ mìɲ kéʔɔ za dón ɣiêhu ɣặp ŋườʔi cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ kủʔa nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên vừʔa xi ɣiôzam tʰấʔi ɣiêhu tʰì nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔizê bìɲiên căŋ ɲưŋzê dáp zằŋ ci hễ zanzâm tàtʰuật kủʔa ɣiêsabên vwa kòn ɲiềʔu zừŋ ấʔi tʰì bìɲiên saw dặŋ ɣiôzam cởtăj mìɲ cạʔi cốn nóʔi vớʔi ʔɛcasiə zằŋ ʔɛcasiə kó mưʔu fản ɣiêhu lấʔi kuŋ mìɲ cúŋ ɲằm ɣiôzam ɣiữʔa haj vaj tʰấʔu ŋaŋ cáʔitim ŋườʔi ŋã suốŋ cɔŋ sɛ mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ɣiêhu nóʔi vớʔi bícka kwan tướŋ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm liệŋ cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ kủʔa nabốt ŋườʔi ɣícêên xá ɲớ lạʔi kiə ŋươʔi dồŋ kỡʔi ŋựʔa tʰeo săw ʔaháp ca tʰì Ðứkzê kó fán ŋườʔi lờʔi dɔán nàʔi kwảtʰật hômkwa dã tʰấʔi hwiết kủʔa nabốt kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kũŋ báʔɔ ŋươʔi lạʔi tạʔi cáɲ nơʔi dồŋzuộŋ nàʔi bởʔi kó dó hãʔi dɛm liệŋ cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ nàʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán xi ʔɛcasiə vwa zuda tʰấʔi việk nàʔi cạʔi cốn lốʔi lầʔu ɲưŋzê duổʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi biểʔu zằŋ kũŋ hãʔi dáɲ cết cên sɛ nữʔa họ dáɲ ŋườʔi tạʔi nơʔi zốk ɣuzơ ɣần ɣíplêʔam Ðʔɔạn ʔɛcasiə cốn dến mêɣidô cết tạʔi dó kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi dể tʰâʔi ŋườʔi cên káʔi sɛ cở ɣiêzusalɛm côn cɔŋ ŋườʔi cuŋ kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi tạʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa ʔɛcasiə lênŋôʔi vwa zuda ɲằm tʰứ mườʔimột dờʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp ɣiêhu dến tạʔi ɣícêên ɣiôsabên hăj ɣiồʔi fấn mìɲ caŋdiểm dầʔu dứŋ côŋ nơʔi kửʔasổ ɣiêhu di kwa kửʔa tʰàɲ nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔisim zi ɣiết cúʔa mìɲ bìɲiên căŋ ɣiêhu ŋướk hướŋ kửʔasổ nóʔi zằŋ cên kaw kiə ʔaj tʰuộk ʔaj haj kwan hɔạn ŋó za hướŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kêʔu cúŋ zằŋ vậʔi hãʔi suốŋ dất cúŋ nàŋ suốŋ dất hwiết lạʔi cên tườŋ cên ŋựʔa zồʔi ŋựʔa ɣiàʔidạp nàŋ zướʔi cơn ɣiêhu vàʔɔ ʔuốŋ sɔŋ dɔạn nóʔi zằŋ vậʔi hãʔi di sɛm dờn xốnnạn lɔ côn kɔŋáʔi kủʔa vwa vậʔi kák tôʔitớ di dặŋ côn nàŋ ɲưŋ cúŋ cỉ kòn tʰấʔi káʔi haj cơn lòŋ bàntăj nàŋ tʰôʔi cúŋ cởvề cɔ củ mìɲ hăj diềʔu dó ɣiêhu nóʔi Ấʔilà lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi tʰisêbɛ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fán zằŋ có tʰịt ɣiêsabên tʰấʔi nàŋ ɲư fân cên mặtdất cɔŋ zuộŋ ɣícêên dến dỗʔi ŋườʔita xôŋtʰể nóʔi zằŋ nàʔi ɣiêsabên vả tạʔi samazi kó bảʔi mươʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaháp ɣiêhu tʰơ ɣởʔi dến kák dầʔumụk kủʔa ɣícêên tạʔi samazi tứklà kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kák ɣiáʔɔsư kủʔa ɲữŋ kɔncaj ʔaháp zằŋ tạʔi nơʔi kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa củ kák ŋươʔi lạʔi kó sɛ ŋựʔa biɲxí tʰàɲ kiênkố Ấʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk tʰơ nầʔi hãʔi cọn cɔŋ kák kɔncaj củ mìɲ ʔaj ŋườʔi ɲất kó tàʔinăŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi cên ŋôʔi kủʔa ca ŋườʔi zồʔi cɛɲ ciến ɲà củ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cúŋ sợhãʔi nóʔi zằŋ haj vwa xôŋ tʰế dứŋ nổʔi cướk ŋườʔi kòn cúŋta cốŋkự vớʔi ŋườʔi saw nổʔi kwan kaj dền kwan kaj tʰàɲ kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kák ɣiáʔɔsư kủʔa kák kɔncaj ʔaháp saj nóʔi vớʔi ɣiêhu zằŋ cúŋtôʔi tôʔitớ ôŋ cúŋtôʔi mọʔi diềʔu ôŋ biểʔu cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ cọn ʔaj vwa ôŋ xá diềʔu ɣì tʰeo ôŋ cɔ fảʔi ŋườʔi tʰơ cɔ cúŋ tʰứ ɲì zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi tʰuộk xứŋ ŋɛ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ tʰì xá kắt dầʔu ɲữŋ kɔncaj củ kák ŋươʔi zồʔi ŋàʔimaj tạʔi ɣiờ nàʔi hãʔi dếnkùŋ nơʔi ɣícêên vả kák kɔncaj kủʔa vwa bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu tạʔi ɲà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ kủʔa tʰàɲ lɔ ɣiáʔɔzụk cúŋnó cúŋ vừʔa dượk bứk tʰơ ấʔi di dɔạn dể tʰủkấp cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰùŋ ɣởʔi dến cɔ ɣiêhu tạʔi ɣícêên kó sứɣiả dến báʔɔ cɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋườʔita kó dɛm dến tʰủkấp kák kɔncaj kủʔa vwa ɣiêhu dáp hãʔi cất haj dốŋ tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ cɔdến sáŋmaj sáŋmaj ŋườʔi di za dứŋ cướk kả zânsự nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kôŋbìɲ kìʔa dã fảnŋịc củ kó ɣiết ŋườʔi ɲưŋ kòn kák nàʔi ʔaj dã ɣiết vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ɲìn zằŋ cɔŋ kák lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán ɲà ʔaháp cẳŋ kó lờʔi nàʔɔ suốŋ dất Ðứkzê dã diềʔu ŋàʔi kậʔi miệŋ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fán za ɣiêhu kũŋ ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn lạʔi cɔŋ ɲà ʔaháp ɣícêên kák dạʔitʰần kák bạɲữʔu tʰiết ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả kủʔa ŋườʔi cẳŋ dể kòn lạʔi ʔaj Ðʔɔạn ɣiêhu dứŋzậʔi di dến samazi xi ŋườʔi dến ɣần còʔi cănciên zọk dườŋ ɣặp kák ʔɛɲɛm ʔɛcasiə vwa zuda tʰì nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔaj cúŋnó dáp cúŋtôʔi ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ʔɛcasiə di suốŋ càʔɔ kák kɔncaj kủʔa vwa kủʔa hɔàŋậʔu ɣiêhu cwiền lịɲ zằŋ hãʔi bắtsốŋ cúŋnó ŋườʔita bắtsốŋ cúŋnó mươʔi haj ŋườʔi zồʔi ɣiết ɣần ɣiếŋ kủʔa còʔi cănciên ŋườʔita cẳŋ dể sốŋ ʔaj Ðʔi xỏʔi dó ɣiêhu ɣặp ɣiônadáp kɔncaj zêkáp dươŋ di dến dón ŋườʔi ŋườʔi càʔɔ ɣiônadáp nóʔi zằŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi kó cơn tʰàɲ kùŋ tôʔi ɲư lòŋ tôʔi dã cơn tʰàɲ vớʔi ŋươʔi căŋ ɣiônadáp dáp zằŋ fảʔi cơn tʰàɲ ɣiêhu tʰếtʰì nếʔu cơn tʰàɲ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj cɔ tôʔi ɣiônadáp ɣiơ tăj cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiêhu biểʔu ŋườʔi sɛ vớʔi mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dếnkùŋ tôʔi sɛm lòŋ sốtsắŋ tôʔi dốʔivớʔi Ðứkzê vậʔi ɣiêhu zẫn ŋườʔi sɛ mìɲ xi dã vàʔɔ samazi zồʔi ŋườʔi ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn lạʔi kủʔa ɲà ʔaháp tạʔi samazi dến dỗʔi dã ziệt sạc ɲà ấʔi ʔiɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ vậʔi ɣiêhu ɲóm hếttʰảʔi zânsự nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ʔaháp hầʔu việk baɛɲ ɣiêhu hầʔu việk ɲiềʔu vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ɲóm lạʔi cɔ kák tiênci kủʔa baɛɲ kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi tʰầʔicả ŋườʔi cớ tʰiếʔu ʔaj kó zâŋ kủʔa cɔ baɛɲ hễ ʔaj xôŋ dến xôŋ sốŋ vả ɣiêhu zùŋ mưʔucí twan ziệt kák hầʔu việk tʰần baɛɲ ɣiêhu lạʔi za lịɲ zằŋ hãʔi zaw cọŋtʰể dể kúŋ tʰờ tʰần baɛɲ ŋườʔi zaw ấʔi ɣiêhu saj ɲữŋ sứɣiả di xắp sứ ʔisơzaên dòʔi hếttʰảʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa baɛɲ dến cúŋ dềʔu dến cẳŋ kó tʰiếʔu ʔaj cúŋ vàʔɔ miễʔu tʰần baɛɲ miễʔu dầʔi cật dầʔu nàʔi dến dầʔu kiə ɣiêhu nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ɣiữ áʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi fát kák áʔɔ cɔ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa baɛɲ kẻ ấʔi fát áʔɔ cɔ cúŋnó ɣiêhu ɣiônadáp kɔncaj kủʔa zêkáp vàʔɔ cɔŋ miễʔu tʰần baɛɲ nóʔi vớʔi kák tôʔitớ kủʔa baɛɲ zằŋ hãʔi sɛm cɔ hɔặk dâʔi kó tôʔitớ nàʔɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê căŋ cỉ fảʔi kó ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa baɛɲ dó tʰôʔi cúŋ vàʔɔ dặŋ zâŋ kák kủʔa tʰiêʔu vả ɣiêhu dã fụk mươʔi ŋườʔi zìɲ ŋɔàʔi miễʔu zặn biểʔu zằŋ ví kó ʔaj cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi dặŋ mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa dể cɔ tʰɔát xỏʔi tʰế cɔ mạŋ sốŋ xi dã zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu sɔŋ ɣiêhu nóʔi vớʔi kwân kák kwan tướŋ zằŋ hãʔi vàʔɔ ɣiết cúŋnó cớ dể ʔaj dượk za vậʔi cúŋ ɣiết bằŋ lưỡʔi ɣươm Ðʔɔạn kwân kák kwan tướŋ tʰâʔi za ŋɔàʔi lậtdật vàʔɔ tʰàɲ kủʔa miễʔu baɛɲ cúŋ kất ɲữŋ cụ tʰờ xỏʔi miễʔu dốt di dập hìɲtượŋ baɛɲ kùŋ fá zỡ dền tʰàɲ sí hãʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj ɲưvậʔi ɣiêhu cừziệt tʰần baɛɲ xỏʔi ʔisơzaên sɔŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ tộʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát tứk tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi ŋĩʔalà ŋườʔi kòn dể lạʔi kák vàŋ tạʔi bêtên tạʔi Ðʔan Ðứkzê fán vớʔi ɣiêhu zằŋ bởʔivì ŋươʔi dã zất fảʔi sử kôŋbìɲ cướk dãʔi ɲà ʔaháp tʰuận kɔncaj ŋươʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ʔisơzaên cɔdến dờʔi tʰứtư ɲưŋzê xôŋ hếtlòŋ kẩntʰận tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi cẳŋ tộʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam tứk tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi cɔŋ lúk ấʔi Ðứkzê xởʔi ɣiảm dịʔafận ʔisơzaên xiến cɔ hasaên dáɲ cúŋ cên kák ɣiớʔihạn ʔisơzaên ciếm lấʔi kả ɣiôdɛɲ cạʔi dến fíʔa dôŋ tứklà kả sứ ɣalaát dất kủʔa cifáʔi ɣát zubên manasɛ tʰàɲ ʔazô ʔɛ cên xɛ ʔaï cɔdến kả sứ ɣalaát sứ basan kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiêhu kák kôŋviệk ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn tạʔi samazi ɣiôʔɛca kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ɣiêhu kaicị ʔisơzaên haimươʔitám tạʔi samazi xi ʔatʰali kủʔa ʔɛcasiə tʰấʔi kɔncaj mìɲ dã cết zồʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɣiết hếttʰảʔi zòŋ vwa ɲưŋzô kɔŋáʔi kủʔa vwa ɣiôzam cị ʔɛcasiə cộm ɣiôác kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɛcasiə xỏʔi vòŋ kák vươŋtử ʔatʰali twan ɣiết zồʔi dể ŋườʔi cɔŋ fòŋ ŋủ vớʔi nuôʔi ŋườʔi ɣiấʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi ʔatʰali vìvậʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ ɣiết ŋườʔiở vớʔi ɣiôsêba tạʔi nơʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ sáʔu kòn ʔatʰali kaicị cên sứ năm tʰứbảʔi ɣiêhôzada vờʔi kák kwan kaj hàŋ căm kwân kɛɲ ɲữŋ kwân dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi ướk kùŋ cúŋ cúŋ tʰề tạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi cỉ kɔncaj kủʔa vwa cɔ cúŋ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cwiền lịɲ cɔ cúŋ zằŋ nàʔi diềʔu kák ŋươʔi mộtfầnba cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi dến fiên ŋàʔi sabát ɣiữ kuŋ vwa mộtfầnba kɛɲ kửʔa suzơ kòn mộtfầnba nơʔi kửʔa săw kák kwân kák ŋươʔi ɣiữ kuŋdiện kản xôŋ cɔ ʔaj vàʔɔ lạʔi hajfầnba cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fiên ŋàʔi sabát ɣần vwa kɛɲzữ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ vwa mỗʔi ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí mìɲ nơʔi tăj ʔaj vàʔɔ cɔŋ hàŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰì hãʔi ɣiết di hễ vwa di zadi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kák kwan kaj tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada mỗʔi ŋườʔi lãɲ ɲữŋ tʰủhạ mìɲ hɔặk ŋườʔi dến fiên ŋàʔi sabát hăjlà ŋườʔi fiên cɔŋ ŋàʔi sabát di dến tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada tʰầʔi fát cɔ kák kwan kaj ɲữŋ ɣiáʔɔ xiên tʰuộk vwa Ðʔa tạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê kák kwân mỗʔi ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí nơʔi tăj tʰeo dền tʰờ bàntʰờ ɣók cɔdến ɣók bắk kủʔa dền tʰờ ɣiêhôzada dɛm vươŋtử za dộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cên dầʔu ŋườʔi caw luậtfáp cɔ ŋườʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi vwa sứk zầʔu cɔ hếttʰảʔi dềʔu vỗtăj zằŋ vwa xi ʔatʰali ŋɛ tiếŋ kwân tiếŋ zânsự dếnkùŋ zânsự tạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê bà sɛm tʰấʔi vwa dứŋ cên tòʔa ɲư tʰườŋ kó kák kwan kaj kák tʰổʔi dứŋ ɣần ŋườʔi kả zânsự kủʔa sứ dềʔu vuimừŋ tʰổʔi ʔatʰali sé áʔɔ mìɲ zằŋ fản ŋụʔi fản ŋụʔi ɲưŋ tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada cwiền lịɲ cɔ ɲữŋ kwan kaj dạʔɔkwân zằŋ hãʔi ɣiết bằŋ ɣươm vì tʰầʔi dã zạʔi zằŋ cớ ɣiết nàŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔita dườŋ cɔ di cở vàʔɔ kuŋ vwa bởʔi nơʔi vàʔɔ kửʔa ŋựʔa tạʔi dó ɣiết ɣiêhôzada zawướk tạʔi ɣiữʔa Ðứkzê vwa zânsự hầʔu cɔ zân ʔisơzaên zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi kũŋ zawướk ɣiữʔa vwa zânsự kả zânsự kủʔa sứ dềʔu di dến miễʔu baɛɲ fá zỡ di dập bàntʰờ hìɲtượŋ kủʔa baɛɲ ɣiết matʰan tʰầʔi baɛɲ tạʔi cướk bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn tʰầʔi kất ŋườʔi kɛɲzữ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi ŋườʔi dɛm tʰeo mìɲ ɲữŋ kwan kaj kơ biɲ kazít kwân kả zânsự kủʔa sứ cúŋ tʰỉɲ vwa dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê suốŋ di vàʔɔ dền vwa bởʔi nơʔi kửʔa kủʔa kwân ɣiôác ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi vwa kả zânsự cɔŋ sứ dềʔu vuimừŋ tʰàɲ dượk bìɲ tịɲ ŋườʔita dã ɣiết ʔatʰali bằŋ ɣươm tạʔi cɔŋ kuŋ vwa ɣiôác dượk bảʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi năm tʰứbảʔi dờʔi ɣiêhu ɣiôác lênŋôʔi vwa kaicị mươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi sibiə kwê bê ʔɛsêba ɣiôác diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê cọn lúk ɣiêhôzada tʰầʔi zạʔizỗ ŋườʔi sɔŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kất kák nơʔi kaw di zânsự sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw ɣiôác nóʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi zằŋ fàm bạk zɔ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ tʰườŋ dɛm vàʔɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tứk bạk mỗʔi ŋườʔi dượk dɛm bạk cuộk mạŋ lạʔi tùʔi ɣiá dã dịɲ cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi bạk mỗʔi ŋườʔi lạk dɛm dến zâŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰầʔi fảʔi tʰâʔu kák bạk ấʔi nơʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mìɲ kwɛnbiết zồʔi cỗ nàʔɔ cɔŋ dền kó tʰìfảʔi zùŋ bạk ấʔi sửʔasaŋ lạʔi vả dến tʰứ haimươʔi dờʔi vwa ɣiôác ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cưʔa kó sửʔasaŋ dền tʰờ vwa ɣiô ác dòʔi tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada ɲữŋ tʰầʔi xák nóʔi zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi xôŋ sửʔasaŋ nơʔi dền tʰờ từ zàʔi săw cớ ɲận lấʔi bạk kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mìɲ kwɛnbiết nữʔa xá fát bạk ấʔi za dặŋ zùŋ sửʔasaŋ kák nơʔi kủʔa dền tʰờ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ưŋ xôŋ tʰâʔu bạk nơʔi zânsự nữʔa xôŋ lãɲ sửʔasaŋ kák nơʔi kủʔa dền tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada lấʔi káʔi zươŋ sɔj cên zồʔi dể ɣần bàntʰờ fíʔa hữʔu kửʔa vàʔɔ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɛɲzữ kửʔa dền tʰờ dềʔu dɛm dể cɔŋ zươŋ ấʔi hếttʰảʔi bạk ŋườʔita dɛm zâŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê xi tʰấʔi kó ɲiềʔu cɔŋ zươŋ tʰơ kủʔa vwa tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm di lấʔi bạk kó cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê za dếm dɛm kất Ðʔɔạn haj ŋườʔi zaw bạk dã dếm dó vàʔɔ tăj ɲữŋ dốkkôŋ lɔ kɔjsók kuộk sửʔasaŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi cả cɔ tʰợmộk tʰợsâʔi cɔ tʰợhồ tʰợ dẽʔɔ dá dềʔu kôŋviệk sửʔasaŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi zùŋ bạk ấʔi mwa ɣỗ dá zùŋ sửʔasaŋ kák nơʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cả fí kuộk sửʔasaŋ ấʔi sɔŋ ŋườʔita xôŋ zùŋ bạk dã dɛm zâŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cén bạk hɔặk zaw cậʔu hăj xí zụŋ ɣì bằŋ vàŋ hɔặk bằŋ bạk ŋườʔita fát bạk ấʔi cɔ ɲữŋ tʰợ lɔ kôŋviệk zùŋ sửʔasaŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔita cẳŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lãɲ bạk dặŋ fát cɔ kák tʰợ fảʔi tíɲsổ bởʔivì kác tʰàɲtʰựk tiềnbạk kủʔa cuộk mắk lỗʔi tiềnbạk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi tʰì cẳŋ kó dɛm vàʔɔ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê bạk ấʔi dểzàɲ cɔ tʰầʔi cɔŋ lúk dó hasaên vwa sizi dến sâmfạm dất ɣát cɔán lấʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tíɲ sâmfạm ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiôác vwa zuda dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ vớʔi kák tʰáɲ kủʔa mìɲ hếttʰảʔi vàŋ cɔŋ xɔtàŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ Ðứkzê kuŋ vwa ɣởʔi zâŋ cɔ hasaên vwa sizi kớ ấʔi hasaên di xỏʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôác mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda kák tôʔitớ ɣiôác zấʔi lɔạn ŋịc kùŋ ŋườʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi milô cên kɔn dườŋ di suốŋ sila ɣiôsaka kɔncaj sômê haj tôʔitớ ŋườʔi dềʔu dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi kùŋ kák
