tổfụ ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa zồʔi ʔamasiə kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ haimươʔi dờʔi ɣiôác tʰì ɣiôʔɛca kɔncaj ɣiêhu lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔibảʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê bắtcướk tʰeo kák tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tứk tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ tộʔi ấʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋzân ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj hasaên vwa sizi bêɲadát kɔncaj hasaên cọn cɔŋ lúk dó ɣiôʔɛca kầʔusin Ðứkzê Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi ŋườʔi bởʔivì ŋàʔi tʰấʔi vwa sizi zân ʔisơzaên kác nàʔɔ Ðứkzê cɔ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu zân ʔisơzaên dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi zướʔi tăj zân sizi dượk lạʔi cɔŋ cạʔi mìɲ ɲư cướk zầʔu vậʔi cúŋ xôŋ tộʔi kủʔa ɲà ɣiêzôbôʔam tộʔi ŋườʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi cúŋ kứ fạmtộʔi dó dến dỗʔi hìɲtượŋ kòn dứŋ tạʔi samazi cɔŋ kả kơ biɲ kủʔa ɣiôʔɛca Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cỉ cừʔa lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nămmươʔi líɲ mườʔi kỗ sɛ mườʔi ŋàn líɲ vwa sizi kó ziệt kwân ʔisơzaên ŋiền cúŋ ɲư bụʔi cɔŋ dạp lúʔa kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôʔɛca ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm mạɲzạn ŋườʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôʔɛca ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi samazi ɣiôác kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ bamươʔi bảʔi dờʔi ɣiôác vwa zuda tʰì ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔisáʔu ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê xôŋ tộʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi kứ tʰeo kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôác mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm tʰểnàʔɔ ŋừʔi dáɲ ɣiặk kùŋ ʔamasiə vwa zuda mạɲzạn ŋườʔi làmsaw tʰảʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôác ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi zồʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam ŋườʔi ɣiôác dượk côn tạʔi samazi cuŋ vớʔi kák vwa ʔisơzaên dăw bịɲ tạʔi bịɲ ấʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi cết ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên dến tʰăm ŋườʔi xók cướk ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ca tôʔi ca tôʔi sɛ líɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kuŋ ɣiôác lấʔi kuŋ lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔisơzaên zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi tăj ŋươʔi ɣiươŋ kuŋ vwa ɣiươŋ kuŋ zồʔi dặt tăj mìɲ cên tăj vwa nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi kửʔasổ za lạʔi nóʔi hãʔi ŋườʔi bấʔizờ zằŋ Ấʔilà kâʔi tʰắŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê tứklà kâʔi tʰắŋ zân sizi ŋươʔi dáɲ zân sizi tạʔi ʔafék dến dỗʔi twiệtziệt cúŋnó zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi ɣiôác lấʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dập suốŋ dất ɣiôác dập zồʔi ŋừŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nổʔizận nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ nếʔu vwa dã dập sáʔu tʰì mớʔi dáɲ zân sizi cɔdến twiệt ɲưŋ zàʔi vwa dáɲ zân sizi tʰôʔi kwadờʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi Ðầʔu săw kó dɔàn kwân môáp twan vàʔɔ sứ vả sảʔiza kó côn ŋườʔi tʰấʔi dɔàn kwân ấʔi dến liệŋ tʰâʔi vàʔɔ kẻ cết vừʔa dụŋ hàʔicốt tʰì sốŋ lạʔi dứŋzậʔi cọn dờʔi ɣiôʔɛca hasaên vwa sizi kó zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋÐứkzê cɔ cúŋ lấʔilòŋ tʰươŋsót dɔáʔi sɛm kớ lờʔi zawướk kủʔa ŋàʔi dã vớʔi zaham ʔisák zakốp ŋàʔi xôŋ tậnziệt cúŋ xôŋ cúŋ xỏʔi cướk ŋàʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj hasaên vwa sizi băŋà bêɲadát kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca lấʔi lạʔi xỏʔi tăj bêɲadát kɔncaj hasaên kák tʰàɲ bêɲadát dã dáɲ lấʔidượk kủʔa ɣiôʔɛca ca ŋườʔi ɣiôác dáɲ bêɲadát xôʔifụk kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên năm tʰứhaj dờʔi ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ʔamasiə kɔncaj ɣiôác vwa zuda lênŋôʔi ŋườʔi dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi tứkvị vwa kaicị haimươʔi cín tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi ɣiêhwadan kwê ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê sɔŋ cẳŋ ɲư Ðʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔilàm tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu kủʔa ɣiôác ca mìɲ dã zầʔu vậʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ zỡ kák nơʔi kaw di zânsự kứ sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw ấʔi vừʔa xi nướk ŋườʔi dượk vữŋcắk ŋườʔi sửtử ɲữŋ tôʔitớ dã ɣiết vwa ca mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ sửtử kɔnkáʔi kủʔa ɲơn ấʔi ʔi tʰeo lờʔi dã cép cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ cɔŋ dó Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ŋườʔita xôŋ ɣiết ca tʰế cɔ kɔn kũŋ cẳŋ ɣiết kɔn tʰế cɔ ca mỗʔi ŋườʔi cết tộʔilỗʔi ziêŋ mìɲ ʔamasiə ɣiết kwân dôm tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ muốʔi lấʔi tʰàɲ sêla dặt ɣiốktʰɛn hãʔi kòn dến ŋàʔinăj Ðʔɔạn ʔamasiə saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca cáʔu ɣiêhu vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến dể cúŋta cɛɲ ciến ɲăw ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên saj cảlờʔi lạʔi vớʔi ʔamasiə vwa zuda zằŋ kâʔi ɣaj tạʔi liban saj nóʔi vớʔi kâʔi hươŋ kũŋ liban zằŋ hãʔi ɣả kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi kɔncaj ɲưŋ kó tʰúzừŋ kủʔa liban di ŋaŋ kwa ɣiàʔidạp kâʔi ɣaj ấʔi zướʔi cơn ŋươʔi dã dáɲ zân dôm lòŋ ŋươʔi dầʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ xá hưởŋ viɲhiển lạʔi cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi kớsaw ŋươʔi ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ mắk tajvạ xiến cɔ ŋươʔi zuda hưhạʔi ʔamasiə xôŋ ŋɛ ɣiôác vậʔi ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên di zồʔi ŋườʔi ʔamasiə vwa zda zawciến ɲăw tạʔi bếtsêmết cɔŋ sứ zuda kwâŋiw da cạʔi cốn mỗʔi ŋườʔi cạʔi mìɲ tạʔibết sêmết ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên ʔamasiə vwa zuda kɔncaj ɣiôác cáʔu ʔɛcasiə dɔạn di dến ɣiêzusalɛm fá vác tʰàɲ kửʔa zaim cɔdến kửʔa ɣók xúk zàʔi bốncăm tʰướk ŋườʔi dɔạt lấʔi ɲữŋ vàŋ bạk mọʔi xí zụŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzɛ ɲữŋ bửʔu kủʔa dền vwa ŋườʔi kũŋ lấʔi kầm zồʔi cởvề samazi kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôác ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm mạɲzạn ŋườʔi kuộk ciếncận kủʔa ŋườʔi vớʔi ʔamasiə vwa zuda dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôác ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn tạʔi samazi zồʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi ʔamasiə kɔncaj ɣiôác vwa zuda kòn sốŋ mườʔilăm săw xi ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca vwa ʔisơzaên dã băŋà kák cwiện xák kủʔa ʔamasiə dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda tạʔizê zusalɛm kó fảnŋịc vớʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cốn dến laki ɲưŋ ŋườʔita saj zượt tʰeo ŋườʔi tạʔi dó Ðʔɔạn kó ŋườʔi cở tʰâʔi ŋườʔi cên ŋựʔa dến ɣiêzusalɛm côn ŋườʔi cuŋ kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi tạʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa kả zân zuda ʔasaziə vwa tʰế cɔ ʔamasiə ca ŋườʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi dã mườʔisáʔu săw xi vwa ca ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔi lạʔi sâʔi xôʔifụk tʰàɲ ấʔi zướʔi kwiền zuda năm tʰứ mườʔilăm dờʔi ʔamasiə kɔncaj ɣiôác vwa zuda tʰì ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj ɣiôác lênŋôʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi ŋườʔi kaicị mươʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê cẳŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi ŋườʔi xôʔifụk bờkõʔi ʔisơzaên nơʔi ɣiáp hamát cɔdến dồŋbằŋ tʰeo ɲư lờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fán bởʔi miệŋ tiênci ɣiôna tôʔitớ ŋàʔi kɔncaj ʔamitaj tạʔi ɣátʰêfɛ vả Ðứkzê dã tʰấʔi ʔisơzaên zannan zất kăjdắŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kòn ʔaj tựzɔ hɔặk nữʔa kũŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj tiếpkứʔu ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê xôŋ kó fán zằŋ ŋàʔi sóʔa zɛɲ ʔisơzaên xỏʔi zướʔi cờʔi kậʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj ɣiôác ɣiảʔicứʔu kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi tʰểnàʔɔ ŋườʔi ciếncận xôʔifụk lạʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên Ðʔa mác hamát cướk dã fụk zuda mọʔi việk ấʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiêzôbôʔam ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi kák vwa ʔisơzaên zồʔi sɛcazi kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ haimươʔibảʔi dờʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ʔasaziə kɔncaj ʔamasiə vwa zuda vwa ŋườʔi dượk mườʔisáʔu tuổʔi xi lênŋôʔi kaicị nămmươʔi haj tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi ɣiêkôliə kwê ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê kứ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu kủʔa ʔamasiə ca ŋườʔi dã tʰếmà ŋườʔi xôŋ zỡ kák nơʔi kaw di zânsự kứ kúŋtế sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa cɔ vwa xiến bịɲ fuŋ cɔdến ŋàʔi ŋườʔi cết ŋườʔi fảʔi zút cɔŋ ɲàziêŋ ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj vwa kaikwản dền vwa sétdɔán zânsự kủʔa sứ kák cwiện xák kủʔa ʔasaziə ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda ʔasaziə ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn kùŋ tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ bamươʔi támdờʔi ʔasaziə vwa zuda sɛcazi kɔncaj ɣiêzôbôʔam vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi ŋườʔi kaicị sáʔu tʰáŋ ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư kák tổfụ mìɲ dã ŋườʔi xôŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi vả salum kɔncaj zabɛ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ŋườʔi dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi cướk zânsự dɔạn vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi kák cwiện xák kủʔa sɛcazi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɲưvậʔi ứŋŋiệm lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán cɔ ɣiêhu zằŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ʔisơzaên cɔdến dờʔi tʰứtư tʰật vậʔi ấʔilà diềʔu dã sảʔi dến năm tʰứ bamươʔi cín dờʔi siə vwa zuda salum kɔncaj zabɛ vwa kaicị tʰáŋ tạʔi samazi mênahɛm kɔncaj ɣadi tiệt di samazi ɣiết ŋườʔi di Ðʔɔạn mêhahɛm vwa tʰế cɔ kák cwiện xák kủʔa salum ŋườʔi fản ŋụʔi làmsaw dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên bấʔizờ mênahɛm di xỏʔi tiệtsa dáɲ típsắk kả zânsự cɔŋ xắp dịʔahạt cuŋkwɛɲ bởʔivì tʰàɲ ấʔi xôŋ xứŋ mởkửʔa cɔ nênŋườʔi dáɲ bụŋ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi dànbà kó ŋén tạʔi dó năm tʰứ bamươʔi cín dờʔi ʔasaziə vwa zuda tʰì mênahɛm kɔncaj ɣadi vwa ʔisơzaên kaicị mườʔi tạʔi samazi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê cọn dờʔi cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi kák tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi fun vwa ʔasizi lɔán dến cɔŋ sứ mênahɛm cɔ ŋườʔi mộtŋàn lâŋ bạk dể ŋườʔi ɣiúpdỡ cɔ nướk mìɲ dặŋ vữŋvàŋ cɔŋ tăj ŋườʔi mênahɛm tʰâʔu lấʔi tiềnbạk ʔi nơʔi zân ʔisơzaên tứk nơʔi ɲữn ŋườʔi kó tàʔisản ɲiềʔu kứ mỗʔi ŋườʔi nămmươʔi siếk bạk dặŋ cɔ vwa ʔasizi Ðʔɔạn vwa ʔasizi cởvề cẳŋ lâʔu tạʔi sứ kák cwiện xák kủʔa mênahɛm ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên mênahɛm ʔaŋiấk vớʔi kák tổfụ ŋườʔi fêkahiə kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ nămmươʔi dờʔi ʔasaziə vwa zuda tʰì fêkahiə kɔncaj mênahɛm vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi kaicị haj ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê xôŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə kwan tổŋbiɲ ŋườʔi fảnŋịc ŋườʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi tạʔi samazi cɔŋ tʰàɲlũʔi kủʔa dền vwa vớʔi ʔaï tɣốp ʔazi ŋườʔi kó nămmươʔi ŋườʔi ɣalaát tʰeo mìɲ vậʔi ŋườʔi ɣiết fêkahiə kaicị tʰế cɔ kák cwiện xák kủʔa fêkahiə ɲữŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên năm tʰứ nămmươʔi haj dờʔi ʔasaziə vwa zuda tʰì fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi kaicị haimươʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê xôŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tộʔi dã ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi cɔŋ dờʔi fêka vwa ʔisơzaên tiếklafilêsɛ vwa ʔasizi lɔán dến ciếm lấʔi ʔizôn ʔabênbếtmaka zanôák kêdɛ hátsɔ ɣalaát ɣalilê kả dịʔafận néptali dɔạn dɛm zânsự kák ấʔi saŋ ʔasizi kɔncaj mưʔu fản fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi zồʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ɲằm tʰứ haimươʔi dờʔi ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj siə kák cwiện xák kủʔa fêka ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên năm tʰứhaj dờʔi fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj siə vwa zuda lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi tứkvị kaicị mườʔisáʔu tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ɣiêzusa kɔŋáʔi sadốk ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê kứ tʰeo cọn mọʔi diềʔu siə ca ŋườʔi dã zầʔu vậʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ zỡ kák nơʔi kaw zânsự kứ kúŋtế sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw dó Ấʔilà ɣiôtʰam sâʔicất kửʔa tʰượŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ Ðứkzê kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôtʰam ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda cɔŋ lúk dó Ðứkzê xởʔi xiến zêsin vwa sizi fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə dến dáɲ zuda ɣiôtʰam ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn tạʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa ŋườʔi ʔɛca kɔncaj ŋườʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi năm tʰứ mườʔibảʔi dờʔi fêka kɔn ca zêmaliə tʰì ʔɛca kɔncaj ɣiôtʰam vwa zuda vwa ʔɛca dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔisáʔu tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi cẳŋ diềʔu tʰiện cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi ɲư Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi dã ɲưŋ ŋườʔi di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên tʰậmcí bắtcướk tʰeo ɣươŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên dưʔa kɔncaj mìɲ kwa lửʔa ŋườʔi kũŋ kúŋtế sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw cên ɣò zướʔi kâʔi zậm bấʔizờ zôsin vwa sizi fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə vwa ʔisơzaên dềʔu di dặŋ dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm vâʔi ʔɛca ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰắŋ ŋườʔi dượk Ấʔi ɲằm lúk dó zêsin vwa sizi ŋườʔi duổʔi zân zuda xỏʔi zân sizi dến dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ʔɛca saj sứɣiả dến tiếklafilêsɛ vwa ʔasizi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ tôʔi tôʔitớ vwa kɔncaj vwa hãʔi di dến ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tăj vwa sizi vwa ʔisơzaên dã zấʔi kùŋ tôʔi ʔɛca lấʔi bạk vàŋ kó cɔŋ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê cɔŋ xɔ dền vwa ɣởʔi dɛm kủʔa cɔ vwa ʔasizi vwa ʔasizi ɲậm diềʔu ʔɛca sin di dáɲ Ðʔa mác ciếm lấʔi dɛm zânkư saŋ kizơ ɣiết zêsin ʔɛca di dến Ðʔa mác dặŋ dón tiếklafilêsɛ vwa ʔasizi ʔɛca tʰấʔi káʔi bàntʰờ tạʔi Ðʔa mác ɣởʔi kiểʔumẫʔu hìɲ bàntʰờ ấʔi tùʔi tʰeo kác cếtạʔɔ cɔ tʰầʔi ʔuzi tʰầʔi ʔuzi cế káʔi bàntʰờ ʔi tʰeo kiểʔu vwa ʔɛca Ðʔa mác dã ɣởʔi dến tʰầʔi ʔuzi cế sɔŋ bàntʰờ ấʔi cướk xi vwa cởvề xi vwa Ðʔa mác cởvề tʰấʔi bàntʰờ lạʔi ɣần zâŋ kủʔa cên ŋườʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj mìɲ dổ za kwán hwiết kủʔa tʰù tạʔi cên dó kòn bàntʰờ bằŋ dồŋ cướk Ðứkzê tʰì ŋườʔi kất xỏʔi cỗ tạʔi cướk dền tʰờ ɣiữʔa bàntʰờ mớʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê zồʔi dể bàntʰờ kủʔa ŋườʔi fíʔa bắk Ðʔɔạn vwa ʔɛca cwiền lịɲ cɔ tʰầʔi ʔuzi zằŋ ŋườʔi sôŋ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu buổʔisáŋ kủʔa căj buổʔi ciềʔu kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kủʔa vwa lạʔi sôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj kủʔa kả zânsự cɔŋ sứ kũŋ dổ za tạʔi cên kwán kủʔa tướʔi kả hwiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kả hwiết kák kɔn siɲ xák kòn bàntʰờ bằŋ dồŋ zùŋ kầʔu cúʔa tʰầʔi ʔuzi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu vwa ʔɛca cwiền zạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi vảlạʔi vwa ʔɛca zỡ kák miếŋ cám kủʔa ɲữŋ táŋ kất ɲữŋ cậʔu dặt cên lạʔi káʔi bằŋ dồŋ suốŋ xỏʔi nâŋ zồʔi dɛm dể cên dá vì kớ vwa ʔasizi ŋườʔi kũŋ dổʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê káʔi kửʔa zùŋ ŋàʔi sabát ŋườʔita dã sâʔi cɔŋ dền kửʔa ŋɔàʔi dểzàɲ cɔ vwa kák cwiện xák kủʔa ʔɛca ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda Ðʔɔạn ʔɛca ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa sêciə kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi năm tʰứ mườʔihaj dờʔi ʔɛca vwa zuda tʰì kɔncaj vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi samazi ŋườʔi kaicị cín ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê sɔŋ cẳŋ bằŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên cướk ŋườʔi sɛɲmanasa vwa ʔasizi di dáɲ ŋườʔi tʰầnfụk sɛɲmanasa dóŋ tʰuế cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ vwa ʔasizi tʰấʔi twan mưʔu fản kó saj sứɣiả dến sô vwa zíptô xôŋ tʰuế cɔ vwa ʔasizi ɲư ŋườʔi hằŋ dã vwa ʔasizi ŋườʔi siềŋ lạʔi hạŋụk Ðʔɔạn vwa ʔasizi di sâmciếm kả sứ dến vâʔi samazi cɔŋ năm tʰứ cín dờʔi vwa ʔasizi lấʔi samazi dɛm zân ʔisơzaên saŋ kwa ʔasizi tạʔi cala cên cabɔ sôŋ kủʔa ɣôsan kùŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ nướk mêdi vả zân ʔisơzaên dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa Ðấŋ dã zút za xỏʔi sứ zíptô xỏʔi tăj kủʔa fazaôn vwa zíptô cúŋ dã kíɲ tʰờ kák tʰần xák tʰeo tʰóʔitụk kủʔa kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên tʰeo Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên dã dịɲ zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ việk cáɲ ŋịc kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋ sâʔizựŋ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw cɔŋ xắp kák tʰàɲ tʰáp vọŋkɛɲ cɔdến tʰàɲ kiênkố zựŋ ɲữŋ cụ tʰờ cên kák nỗŋ kaw zướʔi ɲữŋ kâʔi zậm tạʔi cên kák nơʔi kaw cúŋ sôŋ hươŋ ʔiɲư kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk fạm ɲữŋ việk zanák cọkzận Ðứkzê cúŋ hầʔu việk ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ Ðứkzê dã kấm cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰờ cúŋnó sɔŋÐứkzê kậʔi miệŋ kák dấŋ tiênci ɲữŋ xwiên ʔisơzaên zuda zằŋ xá dườŋ ák kủʔa kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣìŋiữ diềʔu zăn tùʔi tʰeo kák mạŋ lịɲ kậʔi ɲữŋ tiênci tôʔitớ cwiền cɔ tổfụ kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ cúŋ xôŋ ŋɛ kứŋkổ mìɲ ʔiɲư kák tổfụ kủʔa cúŋ xôŋ kó lòŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋ xiɲ kák zawướk ŋàʔi dã kùŋ tổfụ ɲữŋ lờʔi cứŋ ŋàʔi dã fán vớʔi cúŋ di tʰeo kák tʰần hưxôŋ cởtʰàɲ hưxôŋ bắtcướk kák zântộk cuŋkwɛɲ mìɲ Ðứkzê dã kấm tʰeo ɣươŋ kủʔa cúŋnó cúŋ xiɲ hếttʰảʔi ɣiớʔi mạɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ dúk lấʔi haj tượŋ kɔn kùŋ tʰầntượŋ ʔasêza tʰờ lạʔi hếttʰảʔi kơ biɲ cên cờʔi tʰờ fượŋ baɛɲ cúŋ kũŋ dưʔa kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kwa lửʔa zùŋ tàtʰuật bóʔi xwa cwiên diềʔu zữ cướk Ðứkzê dể cọkzận ŋàʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi Ðứkzê zất nổʔi ɣiậnzữ kùŋzân ʔisơzaên swa dùʔa cúŋ xỏʔi cướk ŋàʔi cỉ kòn lạʔi cifáʔi zuda tʰôʔi cíɲzu da kũŋ xôŋ vâŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi kủʔa di tʰeo ɲữŋ ʔisơzaên dã tʰếtʰì Ðứkzê kả zòŋzõʔi ʔisơzaên xốnxổ fó vàʔɔ tăj kák kẻkướp ɣiựt cɔdến fảʔi lưʔudàʔi kác sa ŋàʔi ʔisơzaên dã fânzẽ ɲà Ðʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát vwa ŋườʔi kwiến zụ ʔisơzaên bộʔiŋịc Ðứkzê xiến cɔ fạmtộʔi zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu di cɔŋ hếttʰảʔi tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam dã fạm cẳŋ cút nàʔɔ cɔdến ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dàʔi duổʔi xỏʔi cướk ŋàʔi ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán bởʔi miệŋ kủʔa kák tiênci tôʔitớ ŋàʔi vậʔi ʔisơzaên kất xỏʔi sứ mìɲ lưʔudàʔi kwa ʔasizi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj vwa ʔasizi dɛm ŋườʔiở babilôn kutʰa ʔava hamát sêfạtvaim dặt cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa samazi tʰế cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cúŋ ciếm lấʔi nướk samazi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ xi cúŋ bắtdầʔu cúŋụ tạʔi dó tʰì xôŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê saj dến ɣiết mấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋ ŋườʔita nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔasizi zằŋ kák zân vwa dã dɛm kwa dặt cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa samazi xôŋ tʰờ fượŋ tʰần kủʔa sứ vìvậʔi tʰần dó kó saj dến ɣiết tạʔi xôŋ tʰờ lạʔi tʰần kủʔa sứ vậʔi vwa ʔasizi cwiền lịɲ zằŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák ŋươʔi dã dó dɛm kwa dâʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi lấʔi ŋườʔi zẫn tạʔi cɔŋ sứ dó dặŋ zạʔi tʰờ lạʔi tʰần kủʔa sứ Ấʔi vậʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cúŋ dã samazi dɛm di cởvề tạʔi bêtên zạʔizỗ zânsự fảʔi tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê làmsaw sɔŋ mỗʔi zântộk dềʔu tạʔɔ tʰần ziêŋ cɔ mìɲ dặt cɔŋ ɲữŋ cùʔa miễʔu tạʔi cên kák nơʔi kaw zân samazi dã zựŋ tứk zântộk nàʔɔ dặt tʰần mìɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ nấʔi zânba bilôn tạʔɔ hìɲtượŋ sukốtbênốt zân kút tạʔɔ hìɲtượŋ nẹtɣɛɲ zân hamát tạʔɔ hìɲtượŋ ʔasima zân ʔavim tạʔɔ hìɲtượŋ nípka tạtták zân sêfạtvaim tʰiêʔu kɔnkáʔi mìɲ cɔŋ lửʔa cɔ ʔɛcamêlék ʔanamêlék haj tʰần kủʔa zân sêfạtvaim cúŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cọn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ mìɲ tʰầʔi kák nơʔi kaw ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ấʔi cúŋ zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tạʔi cɔŋ cùʔa miễʔu kủʔa kák nơʔi kaw dó kák zântộk ấʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê sɔŋ kũŋ hầʔu việk kák tʰần mìɲ tʰeo tʰóʔitụk kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk zờʔi za xỏʔi dó ŋàʔinăj cúŋ hãʔi kòn tʰeo tʰóʔitụk kũ mìɲ cúŋ xôŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê cẳŋ vâŋ ɣiữ hɔặk tʰóʔitụk hɔặk luậtfáp hăjlà diềʔu zăn cwiền cɔ kɔncáʔu zakốp ŋàʔi dặt ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê dã zawướk vớʔi cúŋ cwiền zạʔi cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ kíɲ kák tʰần xák cớ tʰờ lạʔi hầʔu việk cúŋnó dừŋ cúŋnó ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi xá kíɲ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ zùŋ dạʔi năŋ káɲtăj ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za dɛm kák ŋươʔi za xỏʔi zíptô Ðấŋ dó kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kíɲ tʰờ lạʔi zâŋ kủʔa cɔ kák diềʔu zăn kwitắk mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi cép cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xá ɣìŋiữ tʰeo dờʔidờʔi cớ kíɲ kák tʰần xák kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kwên zawướk vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ kíɲ kák tʰần xák ɲưŋ xá kíɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj kák tʰùŋịc zầʔu vậʔi kák zântộk ấʔi xôŋ ŋɛ tʰeo ɲưŋ kòn tʰeo tʰóʔitụk kũ kủʔa mìɲ ɲưvậʔi kák zântộk ấʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê kũŋ hầʔu việk ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ cạm kủʔa mìɲ tổfụ cúŋnó tʰếnàʔɔ tʰì kɔnkáʔi cáʔucắt cúŋnó kũŋ hãʔi kòn tʰếấʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj năm tʰứba dờʔi kɔncaj vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì sêciə kɔncaj ʔɛca vwa zuda vwa ŋườʔi dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi vwa kaicị haimươʔi cín tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi ʔabi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sɛcazi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi dã ŋườʔi fáhủʔi kák nơʔi kaw dập ɲữŋ cụ tʰờ dáɲ kák sêza ɣãʔi kɔn zắn dồŋ môʔisɛ dã bởʔivì cɔdến xi ấʔi zân ʔisơzaên sôŋ hươŋ cɔ ŋườʔita ɣọʔi hìɲ zắn ấʔilà nêhutan sêciə ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ kák vwa săw ŋườʔi hɔặk cɔŋ ɲữŋ vwa cướk ŋườʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cíʔu Ðứkzê xôŋ sâʔi ŋàʔi sɔŋ ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ môʔisɛ Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi di ɣì dềʔu dượk tʰàɲtựʔu ŋườʔi zấʔi ŋịc vớʔi vwa ʔasizi xôŋ fụk vwa ấʔi nữʔa ŋườʔi dáɲ sứ zân filitin cɔdến ɣasa dịʔahạt cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ tʰáp vọŋkɛɲ dến tʰàɲ kiênkố sảʔiza tʰứtư dờʔi sêciə ɲằm tʰứbảʔi dờʔi kɔncaj vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì sɛɲmana vwa ʔasizi di dáɲ samazi vâʔi kuốʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi ấʔi vậʔi ɲằm tʰứsáʔu dờʔi sêciə tʰứ cín dờʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì samazi ciếm lấʔi vwa ʔasizi dɛm zân ʔisơzaên kwa ʔasizi dặt tạʔi cala cên cabɔ sôŋ sứ ɣôsan kùŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa mêdi ấʔi cúŋ xôŋ kó vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi fán kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ɲưŋ bộʔi zawướk ŋàʔi xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ cẳŋ tʰeo kák diềʔu môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cwiền cɔ năm tʰứ mườʔibốn dờʔi sêciə sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi dến dáɲ kák tʰàɲ kiênkố kủʔa zuda lấʔi sêciə vwa zuda saj dến laki nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔasizi zằŋ tôʔi fạm lỗʔi kầʔu vwa lìʔa xỏʔi nướk tôʔi vwa dòʔi tôʔi diềʔu ɣì tôʔi cịʔu vwa ʔasizi sêciə vwa zuda fảʔi cả bɛcăm lâŋ bạk bamươʔi lâŋ vàŋ sêciə cɔ ŋườʔi kák bạk cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê cɔŋ xɔtàŋ kủʔa kuŋ vwa bấʔizờ sêciə ɣỡ vàŋ kủʔa kák kửʔa kột dền tʰờ Ðứkzê cíɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi dã kẩn vàʔɔ zồʔi cɔ vwa ʔasizi sɔŋ vwa ʔasizi laki saj tạttan zápsazi zápsakê dɛm tʰeo dạʔɔ biɲ mạɲ dến ɣiêzusalɛm dáɲ vwa sêciə cúŋ di ɣiêzusalɛm zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi kốŋ ʔaw cên dườŋ zuộŋ tʰợ Ðʔɔạn cúŋ sin nóʔicwiện vớʔi vwa liəkim kɔncaj hiɲkiə kwan kaj dền sépna tʰơ ɣiô ʔa kɔn kủʔa ʔasáp kwan tʰáʔi dềʔu di za dến cúŋ zápsakê nóʔi kùŋ zằŋ ta sin kák ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi sêciə zằŋ vwa ʔasizi vwa nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi ɲờkậʔi ʔaj zườŋ ấʔi ŋươʔi kó nóʔi cỉ ɲữŋ lờʔi hưxôŋ dó tʰôʔi zằŋ ta kó mưʔukế sứkmạɲ dặŋ cɛɲ ciến vậʔi ŋươʔi dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi ʔaj zấʔi lɔạn kùŋ ta tʰấʔi zõ diềʔu dó ŋươʔi ɲờkậʔi nơʔi zíptô tʰật ɲư nươŋ vàʔɔ kâʔi sậʔi ɣãʔi ʔaj nươŋ zựʔa dâm vàʔɔ tăj sɔj lủŋ ŋaŋ kwa fàm ʔaj ɲờkậʔi fazaôn vwa zíptô tʰì dềʔu ɲưtʰế kólẽ kák ŋươʔi nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kák nơʔi kaw bàntʰờ kủʔa ŋàʔi sêciə kó fáhủʔi cwiền cɔ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xá tʰờ fượŋ cúʔa tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cướk bàntʰờ nàʔi căŋ tʰếtʰì ŋươʔi hãʔi dáɲkuộk vớʔi củ vwa ʔasizi zaw cɔ ŋươʔi haj ŋàn kɔn ŋựʔa nếʔu ŋươʔi dượk kwân dể kỡʔi cúŋnó Ấʔi cẳŋ dặŋ tʰì ŋươʔi làmsaw dáɲduổʔi kwan tướŋ ɲỏ kủʔa củ dặŋ ŋươʔi kậʔi nơʔi zíptô dặŋ sɛ kwân saw há cẳŋ fảʔi tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê lɔán kwa dâʔi dặŋ fáhủʔi saw Ðứkzê tʰật kó fán vớʔi zằŋ hãʔi di dáɲ sứ nàʔi fáhủʔi liəkim kɔncaj hiɲkiə sépna ɣiô ʔa nóʔi vớʔi zápsakê zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi kák tôʔitớ ôŋ bằŋ tiếŋ sizi cúŋtôʔi hiểʔu tʰứ tiếŋ ấʔi cớ nóʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi bằŋ tiếŋ zuda vàʔɔ taj zânsự cên vác tʰàɲ zápsakê dáp lạʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ há kó fảʔi kùŋ củ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi củ saj nóʔi kák lờʔi nàʔi saw ŋườʔi cẳŋ saj dếnkùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dứŋ cên vác tʰàɲ dể vớʔi ŋươʔi fẩn mìɲ ʔuốŋ nướktiểʔu mìɲ saw Ðʔɔạn zápsakê dứŋ tạʔi dó kấttiếŋ bằŋ tiếŋ zuda zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi vwa ʔasizi vwa nóʔi vwa nóʔi ɲưvầʔi cớ dể cɔ sêciə lườŋɣạt kák ŋươʔi xôŋtàʔinàʔɔ ɣiảʔi kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj kũŋ cớ dể ŋườʔi zỗ kák ŋươʔi tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ Ðứkzê ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta tʰàɲ nàʔi cẳŋ vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa vwa ʔasizi dâʔu cớ ŋɛ sêciə vwa ʔasizi nóʔi ɲưvầʔi xá hòʔa vớʔi hàŋdầʔu mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi dượk hwakwả kủʔa ɲɔ kủʔa kâʔi mìɲ kùŋ ʔuốŋ nướk ɣiếŋ mìɲ cɔdến cừŋ tớʔi zẫn kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ sứ ɣiốŋ ɲư sứ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tứklà sứ kó lúʔa zượʔu báɲ ɲɔ sứ sɛɲ zầʔu livɛ mậtɔŋ ɲưtʰế kák ŋươʔi sốŋ xôŋ cết dâʔu vậʔi cớ ŋɛ sêciə ɣạt kák ŋươʔi xi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta ɲữŋ tʰần kủʔa kák zântộk xák kó ɣiảʔicứʔu sứ mìɲ xỏʔi tăj vwa ʔasizi căŋ tʰần kủʔa hamát tʰần kủʔa ʔaï dâʔu tʰần kủʔa sêfạtvaim tʰần kủʔa hêna tʰần kủʔa ʔiva dâʔu kák tʰần dó kó ɣiảʔicứʔu samazi xỏʔi tăj căŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰần kủʔa nướk kó tʰần nàʔɔ dã ɣiảʔicứʔu sứ xỏʔi tăj căŋ Ðứkzê kó tʰế ɣiảʔicứʔu ɣiêzusalɛm saw ɲưŋ zânsự làmtʰiɲ xôŋ dáp lạʔi lờʔi vwa kó cwiền lịɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ cảlờʔi liəkim kɔncaj hiɲkiə kwan kaj dền tʰơ sépna kwan tʰáʔi ɣiô ʔa kɔncaj ʔasáp cởvề sêciə kwầnáʔɔ sé zác tʰuật cɔ ŋườʔi mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa zápsakê hăj dượk ấʔi vwa sêciə sé zác kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ mặk áʔɔ baw di vàʔɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi saj liəki kwan kaj dền sépna tʰơ hữŋ tʰầʔi ɣià mặk baw dến saj tʰầʔi tiênci kɔncaj ʔamốt cúŋ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ sêciə nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi tainạn sửʔa fạt ôzɛɲ dờn dã dến ŋwiệt ɲưŋ tʰiếʔu sứk dẻ kɔn kólẽ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ dã ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa zápsakê vwa ʔasizi củ dã saj dến dặŋ fỉbáŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ kwởfạt kák lờʔi ŋàʔi dã ŋɛ vậʔi sin hãʔi kầʔuŋwiện ɣiùm cɔ ɲữŋ kòn sốŋ kák tôʔitớ vwa sêciə di dến saj ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xá dáp vớʔi củ mìɲ tʰếnàʔi Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi cớ sợhãʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi kák ŋươʔi dã ŋɛ kák tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa ʔasizi zùŋ fạm dến ta xiến tʰần dếnkùŋ cɔ ŋɛ tiếŋ dồn cởvề sứ mìɲ tạʔi dó zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết xizáp cởvề vwa ʔasizi tʰấʔi vwa dươŋ vâʔi lípna kó hăj zằŋ củ mìɲ dã lìʔa xỏʔi laki vwa ŋɛnóʔi tiệtʰaka vwa tʰiôbi zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi dã kéʔɔ za dặŋ zawciến vớʔi ôŋ bởʔi kớ dó sancêzíp lạʔi saj sứɣiả dến sêciə zặn zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi ɲưvầʔi vớʔi sêciə vwa zuda zằŋ cớ dể cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ ŋươʔi ɲờkậʔi fỉɲ ɣạt ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêzusalɛm cẳŋ vàʔɔ tăj vwa ʔasizi kìʔa ŋườʔi dã hăj ɲữŋ việk kák vwa ʔasizi dã cɔ kák sứ ziệt di hếttʰảʔi kòn ŋươʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi nàʔɔ kák tʰần kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk tổfụ dã twiệtziệt kó ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋ căŋ kák tʰần kủʔa ɣôsa hazan zếtsép zân dɛn tạʔi têlasa vwa ha vwa ʔaï vwa tʰàɲ sêfạtvaim vwa hêna vwa ʔiva dềʔu dâʔu sêciə dặŋ tʰơ nơʔi tăj kák sứɣiả dọk Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi di dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰơ za cướk Ðứkzê sêciə kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê zằŋ Ôʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi ŋự ɣiữʔa kák cê zubin cỉ mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák nướk tʰếzan cíɲŋàʔi dã cờʔi dất hỡʔiÐứkzê hãʔi ŋiêŋ taj ŋàʔi ŋɛ hỡʔiÐứkzê hãʔi ŋàʔi za sɛm kầʔucúʔa hãʔi ŋɛ kák lờʔi sancêzíp saj nóʔi dặŋ fỉbáŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi kwảtʰật kák vwa ʔasizi dã ziệt kák zântộk fáhwaŋ dịʔafận cúŋnó kák tʰần cúŋnó vàʔɔ lửʔa ɲưŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tʰần cẳŋkwa kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋườʔita za bằŋ ɣỗ bằŋ dá cúŋ hủʔiziệt kák tʰần ấʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ôʔi hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi tăj sancêzíp hầʔu cɔ nướk cên dất zằŋ cỉ mộtmìɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj kɔncaj ʔamốt saj nóʔi vớʔi sêciə zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi ta kó ŋɛ lờʔi ŋươʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ việk sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi nàʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ siôn xiɲzể cêkườʔi ŋươʔi kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dã lắkdầʔu tʰeo ŋươʔi ŋươʔi fỉbáŋ sỉɲụk ʔaj kấttiếŋ kùŋ ʔaj tʰật ŋươʔi dã cừŋ kɔn ŋịc vớʔi Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi dã ɲờ kák sứɣiả mìɲ ɲạʔɔbáŋ cúʔa zằŋ ta dɛm ɲiềʔu sɛ cót núʔi dến dỉɲ zất sa kủʔa liban dốn ɲữŋ kăj hươŋ kaw kâʔi tòŋ ɲất kủʔa dến kõʔi sa tứk zừŋ zậm kủʔa ta dã dàʔɔ ɣiếŋ ʔuốŋ nướk kủʔa dất zướʔi cơn kạn sôŋ zíptô sự nàʔi dã lâʔu việk nàʔi dã dịɲ tʰờʔi kổ ŋươʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ dến saw bâʔizờ xiến cɔ dó sảʔi dến dể cɔ ŋươʔi fáhwaŋ kák tʰàɲ kiênkố za dốŋ vìvậʔi zânsự kủʔa kák tʰàɲ ấʔi dềʔu ʔiếʔuduốʔi sợhãʔi hổtʰẹn cúŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔicỏ sɛɲ ŋɔàʔi dồŋ tỉɲư kâʔicỏ cên nók ɲà xáknàʔɔ lúʔamì dã héʔɔ cướk xi kọŋ cưʔa tʰàɲ nơʔi ŋươʔi ŋồʔi lúk ŋươʔi di za di vàʔɔ ɣiận zạʔi ŋươʔi dốʔi kùŋ dã bởʔi ŋươʔi ɣiận zạʔi kùŋ lờʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔu dến taj sỏ káʔi vòŋ nơʔi mũʔi ŋươʔi dể xớp nơʔi môʔi miếŋ ŋươʔi Ðʔɔạn xiến ŋươʔi cởvề tʰeo kɔn dườŋ ŋươʔi dã di dến hỡʔi sêciə ɲờ zấʔuhiệʔu nàʔi ŋươʔi ɲìn zằŋ lờʔi nàʔi ứŋŋiệm năm năj kák ŋươʔi ɣiốŋ zớt suốŋ sɛɲ za tʰứ ɲì mọk ɲưŋ tʰứba kák ŋươʔi zeo ɣặt cồŋ ɲɔ ăncáʔi hễ ɣiốŋ ɣì tʰɔát xỏʔi kòn lạʔi kủʔa zântộk zuda zướʔi câm zễ suốŋ cên bôŋ cáʔi vì kó fần lạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm za tʰɔát xỏʔi núʔi siôn dến lòŋ sốtsắŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê việk ấʔi bởʔi kớ dó Ðứkzê fán vwa ʔasizi ɲưvầʔi nó xôŋ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ nàʔi cẳŋ sạ cɔŋ kũŋ cẳŋ kéʔɔ dến ɣiơ xiên cướk cẳŋ dắp lũʔi ŋịc Ðứkzê fán nó cởvề tʰeo kɔn dườŋ dã di dến xôŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ nàʔi vì tạʔi kớ Ðʔa tôʔitớ biɲ vựk tʰàɲ nàʔi dặŋ kứʔu cɔŋ dêm dó kó tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê di dến cɔŋ ziɲ ʔasizi ɣiết mộtcăm mươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi tạʔi dó sáŋ ŋàʔimaj ŋườʔita tʰứkzậʔi tʰấʔi kwân ấʔi kìʔa cỉ tʰâʔi dó tʰôʔi sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi cởvề tạʔi ninivɛ một ŋàʔiciə ŋườʔi tʰờ lạʔi tạʔi cɔŋ cùʔa nícók tʰần kủʔa mìɲ tʰì ʔɛcamêlék sazếtsɛ ɣiết ŋườʔi bằŋ ɣươm dɔạn cúŋnó cốn cɔŋ sứ ʔazazát sạtʰadôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk dó sêciə bịɲ nặŋ ɣần cết tiênci saj kɔncaj ʔamốt dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi cốʔi lạʔi cɔ ɲàŋươʔi ŋươʔi tʰák cẳŋ sốŋ dượk dâʔu sêciə sâʔi mìɲ vàʔɔ fíʔa vác kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê zằŋ ÔʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã lấʔi tʰàɲtʰật lòŋ cọn làɲ di cướk cúʔa tʰeo diềʔu tốtlàɲ tạʔi cướk ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn sêciə xók zất tʰảmtʰiết saj cưʔa di xỏʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi cởlạʔi nóʔi vớʔi sêciə vwa kủʔa zânsự zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa tổfụ ŋươʔi fán ɲưvầʔi ta kó ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện ŋươʔi tʰấʔi nướkmắt kủʔa ŋươʔi nàʔi cữʔa làɲ cɔ ŋươʔi dến ŋàʔi tʰứba ŋươʔi di dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ta tʰêm tuổʔi ŋươʔi mườʔilăm ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi tʰàɲ nàʔi xỏʔi tăj vwa ʔasizi vì kớ Ðʔa tôʔitớ biɲ vựk tʰàɲ nàʔi saj biểʔu hãʔi lấʔi káʔi báɲcáʔi ŋườʔita lấʔi dắp cên ʔuŋ tʰì vwa dượk làɲ vả sêciə dã hỏʔi saj zằŋ bởʔi zấʔu nàʔɔ tôʔi fảʔi ɲìn zằŋ Ðứkzê cữʔa làɲ cɔ tôʔi dến ŋàʔi tʰứba tôʔi dượk di dền kủʔa ŋàʔi saj dáp nàʔi zấʔu Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi dặŋ làmcứŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔi tʰàɲ diềʔu ŋàʔi dã fán za ŋươʔi bóŋ tớʔi cướk mườʔi dộ hăjlà luj lạʔi mườʔi dộ căŋ sêciə dáp bóŋ tớʔi cướk mườʔi dộ tʰì cẳŋ xó ɣì xôŋ tʰà luj lạʔi săw mườʔi dộ tʰì tʰầʔi tiênci saj kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dɛm bóŋ dã ɣiọʔi cên cắk ảɲ ʔɛca luj lạʔi mườʔi dộ mườʔi dộ dã suốŋ zồʔi cɔŋ lúk dó bêzôdákbaladan kɔncaj baladan vwa babilôn ɣởʔi tʰơ cɔ sêciə ŋườʔi dã hăj zằŋ sêciə dăw sêciə ŋɛ lờʔi kák sứɣiả tâʔu tʰì vuimừŋ zẫn cúŋ viếŋ dền nơʔi cứʔa kák kwí bạk vàŋ tʰuốk tʰơm zầʔu kwí lạʔi cɔ sɛm cạʔi kơxí mọʔi cɔŋ xɔtàŋ mìɲ cẳŋ kó ci cɔŋ dền hɔặk cɔŋ nướk sêciə xôŋ cɔ cúŋ sɛm tʰấʔi tiênci saj di dến vwa sêciə hỏʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ kák ŋườʔi dó nóʔi ci sứ nàʔɔ dến sêciə dáp cúŋ dến sứ sa babilôn saj vwa cɔ cúŋ sɛm ci cɔŋ dền kủʔa vwa sêciə dáp cúŋ kó tʰấʔi mọʔi cɔŋ dền cẳŋ ɣì cɔŋ kák xɔtàŋ cẳŋ cỉ cɔ cúŋ sɛm saj nóʔi vớʔi sêciə zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰìɣiờ dến xi mọʔi cɔŋ dền vwa mọʔi kák tổfụ vwa dã cấtcứʔa cɔŋ xɔtàŋ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj dềʔu dɛm kwa babilôn Ðứkzê fán sẽ cẳŋ kòn ci lạʔi lạʔi ɲữŋ dứʔa kɔncaj kủʔa vwa zɔ nơʔi vwa sɛɲ za zẫn di hɔạnkwan cɔŋ dền vwa babilôn sêciə dáp vớʔi saj zằŋ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi dã nóʔi tʰiện ŋườʔi Ítnữʔa cɔŋ dờʔi tôʔi kódiềʔu bìɲiên vữŋvàŋ căŋ kák cwiện xák kủʔa sêciə mạɲzạn ŋườʔi kuộk sâʔi hồcứʔanướk kiɲ zẫn nướk vàʔɔ cɔŋ tʰàɲ dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda sêciə ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ manasɛ kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi manasɛ dượk mườʔihaj tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị nămmươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi hépsiba ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo tʰờ fượŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi sửʔa sâʔi lạʔi kák nơʔi kaw sêciə ca ŋườʔi fáhủʔi bàntʰờ cɔ baɛɲ zựŋ hìɲtượŋ ʔasêza ɣiốŋ ɲư kủʔa ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên dã kúŋ tʰờ tɔàn kơ biɲ cên cờʔi hầʔu việk ŋườʔi kũŋ bàntʰờ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kó fán dền tʰờ zằŋ Ấʔi tạʔi nơʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dể zɛɲ ŋự ŋườʔi sâʔi ɲữŋ bàntʰờ cɔ tɔàn kơ biɲ cên cờʔi tạʔi nơʔi haj hàɲlaŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi dưʔa kɔncaj mìɲ kwa lửʔa tậptàɲ fép tʰiênvăn việk bóʔi diềm ɲữŋ dồŋkốt tʰầʔibóʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê kwácừŋ cọkzận ŋàʔi hɔàʔi kòn hìɲtượŋ ʔasêza ŋườʔi dã tʰì ŋườʔi zựŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê kó fán vớʔi Ðʔa salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ Ấʔi cɔŋ dền nàʔi cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲ dã cọn cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặt zɛɲ ŋự dờʔidờʔi nếʔu ʔisơzaên lɔ ɣìŋiữ mọʔi diềʔu dã fán zạʔi mọʔi luậtfáp môʔisɛ tôʔitớ dã cwiền cɔ cúŋnó tʰì cẳŋ dể zân ʔisơzaên di siêʔu lạk ŋɔàʔi sứ dã cɔ tổfụ cúŋnó ɲưŋ cúŋnó xôŋ ŋɛ cúŋnó manasɛ kwiến zụ zanák kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã twiệtziệt xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê kậʔi kák tiênci tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fán zằŋ vìma nasɛ vwa zuda dã fạm ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk ấʔi kó ák mọʔi diềʔu zân ʔamôzít dã cướk ŋườʔi kùŋ kwiến zụ zuda fạmtộʔi vớʔi hìɲtượŋ kớ dó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi kìʔa ɣiáŋ cên ɣiêzusalɛm cên zuda ɲữŋ tajhọʔa kảtʰể dến dỗʔi fàm ʔaj ŋɛnóʔi dến fảʔi lùŋbùŋ taj ta ɣiáŋ cên ɣiêzusalɛm zâʔi dɔ samazi kăn ɲà kủʔa ʔaháp ta sóʔa sạc ɣiêzusalɛm ɲư ŋườʔita cùʔi zửʔa káʔi zĩʔa zồʔi suốŋ săw xi zửʔa sɔŋ ta fần kòn lạʔi sảnŋiệp fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj tʰùŋịc cúŋnó cúŋnó cởtʰàɲ hóʔa tàʔi miếŋ mồʔi kủʔa cúŋnó ɲữŋ diềʔu ák cướk cọkzận ŋàʔi tổfụ cúŋnó za xỏʔi zíptô cɔdến ŋàʔinăj manasɛ kũŋ dổ ɲiềʔu hwiết vôtộʔi za dến dỗʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋập dầʔu nàʔi dến dầʔu kiə lạʔi fụ tʰêm ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi ŋườʔi fạm ɣâʔi cɔ zuda fạmtộʔi nữʔa diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê kák cwiện xák kủʔa manasɛ ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi tộʔi ŋườʔi dã fạm dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda manasɛ ʔaŋiấk vớʔi tổfụ ŋườʔi dượk côn cɔŋ kủʔa dền ŋườʔi tứk cɔŋ ʔusa ʔamôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi xi ʔamôn vwa tuổʔi dượk haimươʔihaj ŋườʔi kaicị haj tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi mêsulêmết kɔŋáʔi kủʔa hazút cáʔu kủʔa ɣiôba ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư manasɛ ca ŋườʔi dã ŋườʔi di tʰeo ʔi dườŋ kủʔa ca ŋườʔi hầʔu việk hìɲtượŋ ca ŋườʔi dã hầʔu việk kwì lạʔi cướk cúŋnó ŋườʔi lìʔabỏ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ xôŋ di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê vả ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa ʔamôn mưʔu fản ŋườʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dền vwa ɲưŋ zân kủʔa sứ ɣiết hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ fảnŋịc vwa ʔamôn ɣiôsi ʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi kák cwiện xák kủʔa ʔamôn kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda ŋườʔi dượk côn cɔŋ ŋườʔi nơʔi ʔusa zồʔi ɣiôsi ʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔi xizô ʔa vwa dượk tuổʔi ŋườʔi kaicị bamươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi ɣiêdida kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔadaza cáʔu bôkát ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê di tʰeo cọn kɔn dườŋ kủʔa Ðʔa tổfụ mìɲ xôŋ tác hɔặk hữʔu hɔặk năm tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi ɣiôsi ʔa vwa saj tʰơ safan kɔncaj ʔasaliə cáʔu mêsulam dến dền Ðứkzê zặn zằŋ hãʔi di tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm hiɲkiə dếm bạk dã dɛm dến cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tứklà bạk kák ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa dền tʰờ dã tʰâʔu lấʔi nơʔi zânsự dɔạn hãʔi zaw bạk ấʔi cɔ ɲữŋ kɔjsók việk dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê dể zaw lạʔi cɔ tʰợ sửʔasaŋ kák nơʔi kủʔa dền tʰờ tứk tʰợmộk tʰợ sâʔicất tʰợhồ zùŋ mwa ɣỗ dá dẽʔɔ dặŋ dền lạʔi sɔŋ cớ tíɲsổ bạk zaw nơʔi tăj cúŋ cúŋ tʰàɲtʰựk tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm hiɲkiə nóʔi vớʔi tʰơ safan zằŋ tôʔi dã dượk kwiển luậtfáp cɔŋ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê hiɲkiə caw kwiển sác dó cɔ safan ŋườʔi dọk Ðʔɔạn tʰơ safan dến vwa tʰuật lạʔi diềʔu nàʔi zằŋ kák tôʔitớ vwa dã dóŋ bạk dặŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ dã zaw nơʔi tăj kák ŋườʔi lɔ kɔjsók kôŋviệk dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰơ safan lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm hiɲkiə kó caw cɔ tôʔi kwiển sác dɔạn safan dọk sác dó cướk vwa vwa vừʔa ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa sác luậtfáp sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ Ðʔɔạn vwa cwiền lịɲ cɔ tʰầʔi hiɲkiə cɔ ʔahica kɔncaj safan cɔ ʔaï kbồ kɔncaj micaza dầʔitớ kủʔa vwa zằŋ hãʔi dicầʔu Ðứkzê cɔ cɔ zânsự cɔ kả zuda kák lờʔi kủʔa sác mớʔi dượk vì kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋ cúŋta tʰậtlà lớnlaw tạʔi tổfụ cúŋta xôŋ kó ŋɛ tʰeo kák lờʔi kủʔa sác nàʔi xôŋ tʰeo diềʔu dã dã cwiền fán cɔ cúŋta vậʔi tʰầʔi hiɲkiə ʔahicam ʔaï kbồ safan ʔasaza di tiênci hunda kủʔa salum ŋườʔi ɣiữ áʔɔ kɔncaj kủʔa tiếkva cáʔu kủʔa hạtʰa ŋườʔiở tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ kwận tʰứ ɲì cúŋ nóʔicwiện vớʔi nàŋ nàŋ nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên nóʔi ɲưvầʔi hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi saj kák ŋươʔi dến zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ta zẫn tajhọʔa cên cỗ nàʔi cên zânkư hɔàntʰàɲ mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa sác vwa zuda dã dọk bởʔivì zân zuda dã lìʔabỏ dốt hươŋ cɔ kák tʰần xák cọkzận kák kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj cúŋnó kơn ɣiận nổʔi kùŋ cỗ nàʔi xôŋ ŋuôʔi kòn vwa zuda dã saj kák ŋườʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê tʰì hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ về kák lờʔi ŋườʔi dã ŋɛ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi xi ŋươʔi ŋɛ lờʔi fán ŋịc kùŋ cỗ nàʔi ŋịc kùŋ zânkư zằŋ cỗ nàʔi fáhwaŋ zânkư cởtʰàɲ zủʔasả tʰì ŋươʔi kó lòŋ mềmmạʔi hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê sé kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ xóklók cướk bởʔivậʔi cɔnên kũŋ kó ŋɛ ŋươʔi kìʔa tʰâʔu ŋươʔi kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk tʰâʔu vàʔɔ nơʔi ŋươʔi kác bìɲan ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu tajhọʔa tɔàn ɣiáŋ suốŋ cên cỗ nàʔi cúŋ tâʔu lạʔi cɔ vwa ɲữŋ lờʔi ấʔi vwa saj ŋườʔi ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔɔạn vwa di dền tʰờ Ðứkzê kó hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda kả zânkư ɣiêzusalɛm ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dấŋ tiênci kùŋ kả zânsự ɲỏ dềʔu di tʰeo ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dọk cɔ cúŋ ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa sác zawướk ŋườʔita dã dượk cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê vwa dứŋ cên tòʔa zawướk cướk Ðứkzê hứʔa di tʰeo Ðứkzê hếtlòŋ ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn cứŋkớ kủʔa ŋàʔi hɔàntʰàɲ lờʔi zawướk dã cép cɔŋ sác nàʔi kả zânsự dềʔu ưŋ lờʔi zawướk ấʔi vwa cwiền lịɲ cɔ tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm hiɲkiə cɔ mấʔi tʰầʔi fó kák ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa dền tʰờ kất xỏʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ xíɣiớʔi ŋườʔita dặŋ kúŋ tʰờ baɛɲ kả kơ biɲ cên cờʔi ŋườʔi bảʔɔ tʰiêʔu kák dó ŋɔàʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ sếcôn zồʔi dɛm cɔ dến bêtên ŋườʔi kũŋ duổʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả kủʔa kák tʰần ɲữŋ vwa zuda dã dặŋ sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰàɲ zuda tạʔi kák nơʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ɣiêzusalɛm kũŋ duổʔi di ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả zâŋ hươŋ cɔ baɛɲ cɔ mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ huỳɲ dạʔɔ kả kơ biɲ cên cờʔi ŋườʔi kất hìɲtượŋ xỏʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê dɛm za ŋɔàʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dến xɛ sếcôn tʰiêʔudốt tạʔi dó ŋiền za cɔ zồʔi zảʔi cɔ ấʔi cên kủʔa tʰườŋzân ŋườʔi lạʔi fá ɲữŋ fòŋ kủʔa zan cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê nơʔi dó ŋườʔi zệt ɲữŋ cạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kũŋ dòʔi dến hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák tʰàɲ zuda ôʔuế ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw cúŋnó kó sôŋ hươŋ ɣêba cɔdến bê ʔɛsêba lạʔi fá ɲữŋ bàntʰờ tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ tứk tạʔi kửʔa ɣiôsuê kwan kaj tʰàɲ fíʔa xi vàʔɔ kửʔa tʰàɲ sɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã tʰầʔi kák nơʔi kaw tʰì cẳŋ dượk dến bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm sɔŋ báɲ xôŋ mɛn vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ ôʔuế tôfết tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ kɔnkáʔi hinôm hầʔu cɔ zàʔi săw xôŋ ʔaj dượk dưʔa kɔncaj hăjlà kɔŋáʔi mìɲ kwa lửʔa cɔ mɔlók ŋườʔi cừbỏ ɲữŋ kɔn ŋựʔa kák vwa zuda zâŋ cɔ mặtcờʔi nơʔi kửʔa vàʔɔ dền Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi kôŋdườŋ kủʔa kwan hɔạn nêtʰanmêlék cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ kòn ɲữŋ sɛ kủʔa mặtcờʔi tʰì ŋườʔi tʰiêʔudốt vwa ɣiô ʔa kũŋ fá ɲữŋ bàntʰờ kák vwa zuda dã kất cên nók ɲàlầʔu kủʔa vwa ʔɛca lạʔi ɲữŋ bàntʰờ manasɛ kó zựŋ cɔŋ haj hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ Ðứkzê tʰì ŋườʔi dập kất xỏʔi cỗ zảʔi bụʔi cɔŋ xɛ sếcôn vwa kũŋ ôʔuế ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw tạʔi cướk ɣiêzusalɛm fíʔa hữʔu núʔi tàtịc ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw salômôn vwa ʔisơzaên dã kất dể kùŋ tʰờ tʰầntượŋ kwáʔiɣở kủʔa zân sidôn kêmốt tʰầntượŋ kwáʔiɣở kủʔa zân môáp miɲkô tʰầntượŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa zân ʔammôn ŋườʔi ɣãʔi kák cụ tʰờ dáɲdổ kák hìɲtượŋ cất dầʔi hàʔicốt tạʔicỗ dã dứŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi fá bàntʰờ tạʔi bêtên nơʔi kaw ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát dã tứklà ŋườʔi dó ɣâʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi ŋườʔi fá bàntʰờ ấʔi tʰiêʔudốt nơʔi kaw kán ŋiền tʰàɲza cɔ bụʔi kũŋ tʰiêʔudốt tượŋ ɣiôsi ʔa sâʔi lạʔi cợt tʰấʔi ɲữŋ cên núʔi ŋườʔi saj lấʔi hàʔicốt cɔŋ ɲữŋ ấʔi zồʔi tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ cɔ bàntʰờ ôʔuế ʔiɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã báʔɔkáʔɔ cướk Ðʔɔạn vwa hỏʔi zằŋ biə tʰấʔi dó ci kák ŋườʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi dáp zằŋ Ấʔilà kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zuda dến báʔɔkáʔɔ cướk ɲữŋ việk vwa dã cɔ bàntʰờ tạʔi bêtên ŋườʔi hãʔi dể hàʔicốt ấʔi bìɲiên cớ ʔaj zờʔi di vậʔi cúŋ cẳŋ zờʔi hàʔicốt kủʔa ŋườʔi kùŋ hàʔicốt kủʔa dấŋ tiênci samazi za ɣiôsi ʔa kũŋ zỡ hếttʰảʔi cùʔa miễʔu kủʔa kák nơʔi kaw tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ samazi kák vwa ʔisơzaên dã dặŋ cọkzận Ðứkzê fáhủʔi kák ɲà dó ɲư dã cɔŋ bêtên ŋườʔi ɣiết tạʔi cên bàntʰờ ɲữŋ tʰầʔicả kủʔa kák nơʔi kaw tʰiêʔu hàʔicốt cên Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm vwa cwiền lịɲ cɔ kả zânsự zằŋ hãʔi ɣiữ vượt kwa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tùʔi tʰeo kák lờʔi dã cép cɔŋ sác zawướk cɔŋ lúk kák kwan sét dã sétdɔán ʔisơzaên hɔặk cɔŋ dờʔi kák vwa ʔisơzaên vwa zuda tʰật cẳŋ kó ɣiữ vượt kwa nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư vượt kwa ɣiữ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲằm tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi vwa ɣiôsi ʔa ɣiôsi ʔa kũŋ cừziệt ɲữŋ dồŋkốt tʰầʔibóʔi ɲữŋ tʰê zafim hìɲtượŋ kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ɣớmɣiếk tʰấʔi cɔŋ sứ zuda tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ tʰeo kák lờʔi luậtfáp dã cép cɔŋ sác tʰầʔi hiɲkiə dã dặŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cướkzô ʔa cẳŋ kó vwa nàʔɔ hếtlòŋ hếtsứk mìɲ cíʔu Ðứkzê tʰeo cọnvẹn luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ săw ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó tʰấʔi ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi nữʔa zầʔu vậʔi Ðứkzê xôŋ ŋuôʔi kơn ɣiận nóŋ mạɲ ŋàʔi nổʔi kùŋ zuda kớ kák tộʔi cọŋ kủʔa manasɛ cêʔucọk ŋàʔi vả Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ta kất zuda xỏʔi ɲư dã kất ʔisơzaên di cừbỏ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm dã cọn dền tʰờ fán zằŋ zɛɲ ŋự tạʔi dó kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiôsi ʔa ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔilàm diềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda cɔŋ dờʔi ɣiôsi ʔa fazaôn nêkô vwa zíptô di sôŋ fơzát dáɲ vwa ʔasizi ɣiôsi ʔa di ŋữ ŋườʔi ɲưŋfa zaôn vừʔa xi ɣặp ŋườʔi ɣiết di tạʔi mêɣidô từmê ɣidô kák tôʔitớ cở tʰâʔi ŋườʔi cên sɛ ɣiêzusalɛm zồʔi côn ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi zân kủʔa sứ cọn ɣiôʔɛca kɔncaj ɣiôsi ʔa sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ca ŋườʔi ɣiôʔɛca dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị batʰáŋ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi hamuta kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ɣiêzêmi lípna ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo cọn ɣươŋ kủʔa kák tổfụ mìɲ dã fazaôn nêkô zam ŋườʔi tạʔi zípla cɔŋ sứ hamát hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi xôŋ kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm nữʔa lạʔi ŋườʔi sứ tiếnkốŋ mộtcăm lạŋ bạk lâŋ vàŋ Ðʔɔạn fazaôn nêkô liəkim kɔncaj ɣiôsi ʔa vwa tʰế cɔ ɣiôsi ʔa ca ŋườʔi kảʔi ŋườʔi ɣiêhôzakim kòŋiô ʔɛca fu tạʔi zíptô ŋườʔi kwadờʔi tạʔi dó ɣiêhôzakim cɔ fazaôn ɲữŋ bạk vàŋ ấʔi ɲưŋ dể lɔ cɔ kó fazaôn dòʔi tʰì ŋườʔi fảʔi dáɲ tʰuế zân kủʔa sứ ŋườʔi dịɲ tʰuế vàŋbạk mỗʔi ŋườʔi fảʔi ɣiữ dóŋ dɔạn ŋườʔi zaw cɔ fazaôn nêkô ɣiêhôzakim dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔimột tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi sêbụtda kɔŋáʔi fêdaza zuma ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo cọn ɣươŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ dã cɔŋ dờʔi ɣiêhôzakim cịvì nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn sâm lấʔi sứ ɣiêhôzakim tʰầnfụk ŋườʔi cɔŋ zồʔi ŋườʔi dổʔi fảnŋịc vớʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkzê xiến ɲữŋ kwân kɛɲdê kwân sizi kwân môáp kwân kủʔa zân ʔammôn dến dấʔu dịc kùŋ zuda dể hủʔi hạʔi zuda tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ kák tiênci tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fán za tajhọʔa nàʔi sảʔi dến cɔ zuda bởʔi mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê dặŋ kất nướk zuda xỏʔi cướk mìɲ kớ kák tộʔilỗʔi manasɛ tʰeo kák diềʔu ŋườʔi dã lạʔi kũŋ tạʔi kớ hwiết vôtộʔi ŋườʔi dổ za ŋườʔi dã cɔ ɣiêzusalɛm dầʔi hwiết vôtộʔi tʰì Ðứkzê xôŋ xứŋ tʰatʰứ ŋườʔi kák cwiện xák kủʔa ɣiêhôzakim ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ kák vwa zuda ɣiêhôzakim ʔaŋiấk kùŋ kák tổfụ mìɲ ɣiêhôzakin kɔncaj ŋườʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi vả vwa zíptô xôŋ zám za xỏʔi sứ mìɲ nữʔa bởʔivì vwa babilôn dã ciếm lấʔi sứ tʰuộk vwa zíptô xɛ zíptô cɔdến sôŋ fơzát ɣiêhôzakin dượk mườʔitám tuổʔi xi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị batʰáŋ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mẹ ŋườʔi nêhuta kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔɛânnatʰan ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiêhôzakin diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo cọn kák ɣươŋ kủʔa ca mìɲ cɔŋ lúk dó kák kwânlíɲ nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn di vâʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn kũŋ dến cướk tʰàɲ cɔŋ lúk kák kwânlíɲ ŋườʔi vâʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêhôzakin vwa zuda kùŋ mìɲ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ kák kwan tướŋ kák hɔạnkwan mìɲ di za dầʔuhàŋ vwa babilôn vwa ba bilôn ŋườʔi ɲằm tʰứ ciềʔu mìɲ ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán ŋườʔi lấʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ bửʔu kủʔa dền Ðứkzê ɲữŋ bửʔu kủʔa vwa dập kák xí zụŋ bằŋ vàŋ salômôn vwa ʔisơzaên dã cɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi zẫn di kả zân ɣiêzusalɛm hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ ɲữŋ líɲciến mạɲmẽ ŋườʔi lạʔi kũŋ hếttʰảʔi kák tʰợmộk tʰợzèn cỉ kòn lạʔi ɲữŋ tʰườŋzân kủʔa sứ vậʔi ŋườʔi dɛm ɣiêhôzakin dến babilôn lạʔi dɛm dến babilôn tʰáʔihậʔu hɔàŋậʔu kák hɔạnkwan ɲữŋ ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ kủʔa sứ vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ciếnsĩ bảʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi kảtʰảʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kó tàʔi ciếncận ɲữŋ ŋườʔi vwa babilôn kwa babilôn fu vwa ba bilôn matʰaniə kậʔu kủʔa ɣiêhôzakin vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi dổʔi cɔ sêdêkiə sêdêkiə dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔimột tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm mệ ŋườʔi hamuta kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ɣiêzêmi lípna ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo cọn kák ɣươŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôzakin bởʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ cên ɣiêzusalɛm zuda ɲữŋ tajhọʔa nàʔi cɔdến dỗʔi ŋàʔi cừbỏ cúŋnó xỏʔi cướk ŋàʔi sêdêkiə fảnŋịc vwa babilôn năm tʰứ cín dờʔi sêdêkiə ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ mườʔi nêbukátnếtsa vwa bilôn kùŋ kả dạʔɔkwân ŋườʔi dến dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi cạʔi cướk tʰàɲ dắp lũʔi vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ sự vâʔi tʰàɲ lâʔuzàʔi cɔdến tʰứ mườʔimột dờʔi sêdêkiə ŋàʔi mồŋ cín tʰáŋ kó dóʔicém cɔŋ tʰàɲ zânsự xôŋ kó báɲ bấʔizờ kwân kɛɲdê lủŋ nơʔi vác tườŋ tʰàɲ dɔạn hếttʰảʔi kwânlíɲ dươŋ bandêm dềʔu cạʔi cốn bởʔi kửʔasổ ɣiữʔa haj vác tʰàɲ ɣần vwa Ðườŋ xicwân kɛɲdê vâʔi tʰàɲ tʰì vwa cạʔi cốn tʰeo dườŋ dồŋbằŋ Ðạʔɔ kwân kɛɲdê duổʔi tʰeo vwa tʰeo ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ ɣiêzicô kả kơ biɲ ŋườʔi dềʔu lạk ŋườʔi kwânkɛɲ dê vwa zẫn dến vwa babilôn zípla tạʔi dó cúŋnó sétdɔán ŋườʔi cúŋnó ɣiết kák kɔncaj sêdêkiə cướk ŋườʔi dɔạn cúŋnó mók sêdêkiə siềŋ ŋườʔi bằŋ síc dồŋ zồʔi zẫn ŋườʔi dến babilôn ŋàʔi mồŋ bảʔi tʰáŋ tʰứ mườʔi cín dờʔi nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn kwan tʰịvệ nêbusazadan tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa babilôn dến ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi tʰiêʔudốt dền tʰờ Ðứkzê kuŋ kủʔa vwa mọʔi ɲà cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰiêʔudốt kák ɲà kủʔa ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ Ðʔɔạn dạʔɔkwân kɛɲdê vâŋ lịɲ kwan tʰịvệ fá dổ vác tʰàɲ cuŋkwɛɲ ɣiêzusalɛm kwan tʰịvệ nêbusazadan zânkư kòn lạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ vớʔi ɲữŋ hàŋdầʔu vwa babilôn dám zân kòn lạʔi xák zẫn di fu kwan tʰịvệ cỉ cừʔa lạʔi cɔŋ sứ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ dặŋ cồŋ ɲɔ làmzuộŋ kwânkɛɲ dê dập ɲữŋ cụ dồŋ táŋ dồŋ káʔi bằŋ dồŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê zồʔi dɛm dồŋ ấʔi babilôn cúŋnó kũŋ dɛm di ɲữŋ nồʔi dồŋ zaw cén hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ xí zụŋ bằŋ dồŋ zùŋ vàʔɔ việk tʰờ fượŋ lạʔi kwan tʰịvệ ấʔi dɛm di ɲữŋ hươŋ cậʔu kák bằŋ vàŋ bạk kòn haj kâʔi cụ káʔi dồŋ kák miếŋ táŋ salômôn dã cɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì xôŋtʰể kân dượk dồŋ kủʔa kák ấʔi mỗʔi kâʔi cụ kó mườʔitám tʰướk kaw kó baw kwɛɲ lướʔi cáʔi lựʔu kũŋ bằŋ dồŋ kâʔi tʰứ ɲì caŋsứk lướʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi cướk kwan tʰịvệ tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm sêzaza tʰầʔi fó sôfôni ŋườʔi kɛɲzữ kửʔa dền tʰờ lạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ hɔạnkwan kɔj kák ciếnsĩ ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák kậntʰần vwa tʰơ kủʔa kwan tổŋbiɲ lɔ ciêʔumộ biɲlíɲ kủʔa sứ vớʔi sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa sứ kũŋ cɔŋ tʰàɲ kwan tʰịvệ nêbusazadan zẫn hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dến vwa babilôn tạʔi zípla vwa ba bilôn xiến ɣiết cúŋnó tạʔi zípla cɔŋ sứ hamát ɲưvậʔi zân zuda dɛm di xỏʔi sứ mìɲ kòn zânsự nêbukátnếtsa dã cừʔa lạʔi cɔŋ sứ zuda tʰì vwa babilôn dặt ɣêdaliə kɔncaj ʔahicam cáʔu safan kwan tổŋdốk xi kák kwan tướŋ tứklà Íc kɔncaj nêtʰaniə ɣiôhanan kɔncaj kazêát sêzaza kɔncaj tɛɲumết nêtôfát zaasaniə kɔncaj kủʔa makatʰít ɲữŋ kwânlíɲ d ʔu hăj z ŋ vwa babilôn dã dặt ɣêdaliə kwan tổŋdốk tʰì di dến ŋườʔi tạʔi mícba ɣêdiəliə tʰề vớʔi cúŋ vớʔi kwânlíɲ kủʔa cúŋ zằŋ cớ ɲữŋ tôʔitớ kủʔa kɛɲdê hãʔi cɔŋ sứ tʰầnfụk vwa babilôn tʰì kák ŋươʔi dượk bìɲan ɲưŋ tʰáŋ bảʔi Íc kɔncaj nêtʰaniə cáʔu zòŋzõʔi vwa dến tạʔi mícba kó mườʔi ŋườʔi di tʰeo dáɲ ɣêdaliə ɣiết ŋườʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi kɛɲdê vớʔi ŋườʔi kả zânsự ɲỏ dến ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ cổʔi zậʔi di dến sứ zíptô bởʔivì ŋườʔi kɛɲdê báʔɔtʰù năm tʰứ bamươʔi bảʔi xi ɣiêhôzakin vwa zuda fảʔi zam ŋàʔi haimươʔibảʔi tʰáŋ mườʔihaj viɲmêzôdák vwa babilôn dầʔu tứkvị tʰa cɔ ɣiêhôzakin vwa zuda za xỏʔi ŋụk ŋườʔi nóʔi vớʔi ɣiêhôzakin lờʔi hòʔɛɲã dặt ŋôʔi ŋườʔi kaw ŋôʔi kák vwa dồŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi babilôn ŋườʔi biểʔu áʔɔ kủʔa ɣiêhôzakin cɔ ŋườʔi dồŋ vớʔi mìɲ cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi vwa hằŋ ŋàʔi lɔ fú kấp lươŋtʰựk cɔ ŋườʔi ʔadam sɛɲ sết sết sɛɲ sɛɲ kênan kênan sɛɲ mahalalɛ mahalalɛ sɛɲ ɣiêzệt ɣiêzệt sɛɲ hênók hênók sɛɲ mêtusêla mêtusêla sɛɲ lêmék lêmék sɛɲ nô nô sɛɲ sɛm cam zafết kɔncaj kủʔa zafết ɣômɛ maɣốk madaj zavan tubɛɲ mêsiếk tiza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣômɛ Ác Ðʔi fát tôɣama kɔncaj kủʔa zavan tazêsi kíttim zôdanim kɔncaj kủʔa cam kúk míczaim fút kanaan kɔncaj kủʔa kúk sêba havila sápta zaêma sêba dan kúk siɲ nimzốt ŋườʔi xởʔidầʔu ʔɛɲhùŋ cên mặtdất míczaim siɲ ludim ʔanamin lêhabim náptuhim fácusim kácluhim bởʔi dó sɛɲ za filitin káptôzim kanaan sɛɲ za sidôn cưởŋnam hếc kùŋ zɛbusít ʔamôzít ɣizêɣasít hêvít ʔazêkít sinít ʔavadít sêmazít hamatít kɔncaj kủʔa sɛm ʔasuzơ ʔakáksát lút ʔazam ʔuùtsơ hulơ ɣêtɛ mêsiếk ʔabáksát sɛɲ sêlác sêlác sɛɲ hêbɛ hêbɛ sɛɲ dượk haj kɔncaj kɔn kêʔu bêlét bởʔivì cɔŋ dờʔi ŋườʔi dó dất dã ciə za kòn kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔɛm ɣiốktan ɣiốktan sɛɲ ʔamôdát sêlép hasamavết ɣiêzác hadôzam ʔusa Ðʔiếk bɛɲ ʔabimaên sêba fiə havila ɣiôbáp hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiốktan sɛm sɛɲ ʔabáksát ʔabáksát sɛɲ sêlác sêlác sɛɲ hêbɛ hêbɛ sɛɲ bêlék bêlék sɛɲ zêhu zêhu sɛɲ sêzúk sêzúk sɛɲ nakô nakô sɛɲ tʰazê tʰazê sɛɲ zam kũŋ ɣọʔilà zaham kɔncaj kủʔa zaham ʔisák Íc nầʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa cúŋ kɔnkả kủʔa Íc nêbazốt dến kêda mibôsam mícma Ðʔu masa hadát tʰêma ɣiêhu nafíc kếtma kák kɔncaj kủʔa Íc kêtuza vợɲỏ kủʔa zaham sɛɲ kák kɔncaj simzam ɣiốksan mêdan madiən zícbák suác ɣiốksan sɛɲ sêba dan kɔncaj kủʔa madiən fa fɛ hanók ʔabida ʔɛânda ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu kɔncáʔu kủʔa kêtuza zaham sɛɲ za ʔisák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisák săw ʔisơzaên kɔncaj kủʔa săw lifa zê ʔuên ɣiêúk zalam kôza kɔncaj kủʔa lifa tʰêman sêfi ɣatʰam kêna tʰimna ʔamalék kɔncaj kủʔa zê ʔuên nahát sêzác samma mícsa kɔncaj kủʔa sê ʔizơ lôtʰan sôbɛɲ sibêôn ʔana Ðʔi sɛ Ðʔi kɔncaj kủʔa lôtʰan hôzi hôman kòn tʰimna ʔɛmɣáʔi lôtʰan kɔncaj kủʔa sôbɛɲ ʔaliən manahát bɛɲ sêfi kɔncaj kủʔa sibêôn ʔajza ʔana kɔncaj kủʔa ʔana Ðʔi kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔi hamzan Ếc zícan kêzan kɔncaj kủʔa sɛ biɲhan savan zaakan kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔi ʔuùtsơ ʔazan xi cướk zân ʔisơzaên cưʔa kó vwa kaicị tʰì dâʔi zɛɲ kák vwa cịvì sứ dôm bêla kɔncaj bê tʰàɲ Ðʔin vwa bê băŋ ɣiôbáp kɔncaj sêzác ŋườʔi bốca vwa ɣiô băŋ husam ŋườʔi sứ tʰêman vwa hu băŋ hadát kɔncaj bêdát cíɲ vwa nầʔi dáɲ dượk zân madiən tạʔi dồŋ môáp tʰàɲ ʔavít vwa ha dát băŋ samla ŋườʔi mazêka vwa sam băŋ săwlơ ŋườʔi zêhôbốt cên sôŋ vwa săw băŋ baɛɲhanan kɔncaj ʔaï kbồ vwa ba ʔɛɲhanan băŋ hadát tʰàɲ fa ʔi kòn ŋườʔi mêhêtabêên kɔŋáʔi kủʔa mácết cáʔu ŋɔạʔi mêsaháp vwa ha dát băŋ kák cưởŋtộk sứ dôm cưởŋtộk tʰimna cưởŋtộk ʔali ʔa cưởŋtộk ɣiêtết cưởŋtộk cưởŋtộk cưởŋtộk finôn cưởŋtộk kêna cưởŋtộk tʰêman cưởŋtộk mépsa cưởŋtộk mákdiên cưởŋtộk ʔizam kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa dôm kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên zubên simêôn lêvi zuda ʔisaka sabulôn Ðʔan ɣiôsép bêŋiəmin néptali ɣát ʔasɛ kɔncaj kủʔa zuda zơ sêla ba ŋườʔi nầʔi zuda sɛɲ za bởʔi kɔŋáʔi su ʔa ŋườʔi kanaan zơ kɔnkả kủʔa zuda zữ cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiết di tama zâʔu kủʔa zuda sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi fêzết sêzác tổŋkộŋ kák kɔn kủʔa zuda dượk ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa fêzết hếcôn hamun kɔncaj kủʔa sêzác simzi tʰan hêman kɛɲkôn Ðʔa za kộŋ ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa kạtmi ʔaka tứk zốʔilɔạn cɔŋ ʔisơzaên fạm dến ŋiêmkấm kɔncaj kủʔa tʰan ʔasaziə kɔncaj hếcôn sɛɲ za ɣiêzákmêʔɛn zam kêlubaj zam sɛɲ za ʔaminadáp ʔaminadáp sɛɲ nahasôn kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda nahasôn sɛɲ sɛɲma sɛɲma sɛɲ bô bô sɛɲ sɛɲ ʔisaj ʔisaj sɛɲ kɔn dầʔulòŋ kɔntʰứ ɲì ʔabinadáp tʰứba simê ʔa tʰứtư natʰanaên tʰứnăm zadaj tʰứsáʔu sɛm tʰứbảʔi Ðʔa kònsê zuza ʔabiɣain cịʔɛm kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi sêzuza kó kɔn ʔabisaj ɣiôáp ʔasaên ʔabiɣain sɛɲ ʔamasa ca kủʔa ʔamasa ɣiêtʰɛ ŋườʔi Íc kalép kɔn kủʔa hếcôn lấʔi ʔasuba vớʔi ɣiêziốt zồʔi sɛɲ kɔn ɣiêsɛ sôbáp ʔaï tdôn ʔasuba kwadờʔi tʰì kalép lấʔi fơzát nàŋ sɛɲ huzơ cɔ ŋườʔi huzơ sɛɲ ʔuzi ʔuzi sɛɲ za bếtsalêên săw xi ấʔi hếcôn dã dượk sáʔu mươʔi tuổʔi kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa maki ca kủʔa ɣalaát ŋườʔi kùŋ nàŋ nàŋ sɛɲ dượk sêɣúp sêɣúp sɛɲ zajzơ ŋườʔi nầʔi dượk haimươʔi tʰàɲ cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát zâŋɛ suzơ zân sizi ciếm lấʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ zajzơ kênát vớʔi kák hươŋtʰôn kủʔa dịʔahạt kộŋ sáʔu mươʔi tʰàɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu kɔncáʔu maki ca ɣalaát săw xi hếcôn kwadờʔi tạʔi kalép zatʰa zồʔi tʰì ŋườʔi ʔabiza sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔasuzơ ca kủʔa tʰêkô ʔa ɣiêzákmêên kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa hếcôn sɛɲ zam kɔn dầʔulòŋ dến buna zɛn sɛm ʔahiza ɣiêzákmêên lạʔi lấʔi xák ʔataza kủʔa kɔncaj kủʔa zam kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ɣiêzákmêên maác zamin kɛ kɔncaj kủʔa samaj zada kɔncaj kủʔa samaj nadáp ʔabisu tên kủʔa ʔabisu ʔabihaj nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔaï kban môlít kɔncaj kủʔa nadáp sêlɛ baim ɲưŋsê lɛ kwadờʔi xôŋ kó kɔn kɔncaj kủʔa baim zisi kɔncaj kủʔa zisi sêsan kɔncaj kủʔa sêsan ʔaï klaj kɔncaj kủʔa zada ʔɛm samaj ɣiêtʰɛ ɣiônatʰan ɣiêtʰɛ kwadờʔi xôŋ kó kɔn kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiônatʰan fêlết sasa Ấʔilà kɔncáʔu ɣiêzákmêên vả sêsan xôŋ kɔncaj sɔŋ kó kɔŋáʔi kũŋ kó dứʔa tôʔitớ zíptô zaza sêsan ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ nàŋ sɛɲ ʔaï ttaj cɔ ŋườʔi ʔaï ttaj sɛɲ natʰan natʰan sɛɲ sabát sabát sɛɲ sɛɲ sɛɲ ɣiêhu ɣiêhu sɛɲ ʔasaziə ʔasaziə sɛɲ hêlết hêlết sɛɲ lasa lasa sɛɲ sítmaj sítmaj sɛɲ salum salum sɛɲ ɣiêkamiə ɣiêkamiə sɛɲ kɔncaj kalép ʔɛm kủʔa ɣiêzákmêên kɔnkả kủʔa mêsa tứk tổfụ kủʔa síp ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa mazêsa tổfụ kủʔa hếpzôn kɔncaj kủʔa hếpzôn kôza tápbwa zêkɛm sêma sêma sɛɲ zɛcam tổfụ kủʔa ɣiôkêʔam kòn zêkɛm sɛɲ samaj kɔncaj kủʔa samaj maôn maôn tổfụ kủʔa bếtswa fa hầʔu kủʔa kalép ʔɛɲ hazan mộtsa ɣasɛ hazan sɛɲ ɣasɛ kɔncaj kủʔa zadaj zêɣɛm ɣiôtʰan ɣêsan fêlết fa saáp hầʔu kủʔa kalép maaka sɛɲ sêbɛ tizana nàŋ kũŋ sɛɲ saáp tổfụ kủʔa mátmana sêva tổfụ kủʔa mákbêna tổfụ kủʔa ɣibê ʔa kɔŋáʔi kalép ʔaï ksa Ðâʔi ɲữŋ kɔncáʔu kủʔa kalép sôbɛɲ kɔncaj kủʔa huzơ kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zata tổfụ kủʔa kiziátzêʔazim sɛɲma tổfụ kủʔa bếtlêhɛm hazép tổfụ kủʔa bếtɣadɛ sôbɛɲ tổfụ kủʔa kiziátzêʔazim kó kɔncaj ŋườʔi sɛɲ hazô nửʔa fần zân mênuhốt kák zòŋ kủʔa kiziátzêʔazim zícít futít sumatít míczaít kũŋ bởʔi ɲữŋ zòŋ ấʔi kó zân sôzatít zân Ếc tawlít kɔncáʔu kủʔa sɛɲma bếtlêhɛm ŋườʔi nêtôfatít ŋườʔi ʔaï cốtbếtzôáp nửʔa fần zân manahatít ŋườʔi sôzít lạʔi kák họhàŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰôŋ ɣiáʔɔ zabết tizatít simatít sukatít Ấʔilà zân kênít sɛɲ za bởʔi hamát kủʔa ɲà zêkáp nầʔi ɲữŋ kɔncaj Ðʔa sɛɲ tạʔi hếpzôn kɔn cưởŋnam ʔamnôn bởʔi ʔahinôʔam ŋườʔi ɣícêên kɔntʰứ ɲì Ðʔa bởʔi ʔabiɣain ŋườʔi kạtmên tʰứba kɔncaj kủʔa maaka kɔŋáʔi kủʔa tɛɲmaj vwa dất ɣêsuzơ tʰứtư ʔadôniza kɔncaj kủʔa haɣít tʰứnăm sêfati ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabitɛɲ tʰứsáʔu zícêʔam kɔn kủʔa Ék Ðʔa sáʔu kɔncaj nầʔi sɛɲ tạʔi hếpzôn dó Ðʔa cịvì bảʔi sáʔu tʰáŋ kòn tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔa cịvì bamươʔi Ðâʔi ɲữŋ kɔncaj Ðʔa sɛɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm simê ʔa sôbáp natʰan salômôn kộŋ dượk ŋườʔi dềʔu kɔn kủʔa bátswa kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔamiên lạʔi kó zba ʔɛlisama lifêlết nôɣa nêfết zafiə lizada lifêlết kộŋ dượk cín ŋườʔi Ấʔilà ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa cẳŋ kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɲữŋ kuŋfi tama cịʔɛm kủʔa cúŋ kɔncaj salômôn zôbôʔam kɔncaj zôbôʔam ʔabiza kɔncaj ʔabiza ʔasa kɔncaj ʔasa ɣiôsafát kɔncaj ɣiôsafát ɣiôzam kɔncaj ɣiôzam ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ʔɛcasiə ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôác ʔamasiə kɔncaj ʔamasiə ʔasaziə kɔncaj ʔasaziə ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj ɣiôtʰam ʔɛca kɔncaj ʔɛca sêciə kɔncaj sêciə manasɛ kɔncaj manasɛ ʔamôn kɔncaj ʔamôn ɣiôsi ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsi ʔa kɔn cưởŋnam ɣiôhanan kɔntʰứ ɲì ɣiêhôzakim tʰứba sêdɛciə tʰứtư salum kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêhôzakim ɣiêcôniə sêdêkiə kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêcôniə tứk ŋườʔi lưʔudàʔi salatʰiên mɛɲkizam fêdaza sênasa ɣiêkamiə hôsama nêdabiə kɔncaj kủʔa fêdaza sôzôbabên simê ʔi kɔncaj kủʔa sôzôbabên mêsulam hananiə kòn sêlômít cịʔɛm kủʔa cúŋ lạʔi kó hasuba bêzêkiə hasadiə zusáfêzết kộŋ ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa hananiə fêlatiə saj lạʔi kó kɔncáʔu badiə kɔncáʔu sêkaniə kɔncaj kủʔa sêkaniə sêmaza ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa sêmaza háttúk ziɣɛɲ baziə nêʔaziə safát kộŋ dượk sáʔu ŋườʔi kɔn kủʔa nêʔaziə liôênaj sêciə ʔazixam kộŋ dượk ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa liôênaj hôdaviə liəsíp fêlaza ʔakúp ɣiôhanan laza ʔanani kộŋ dượk bảʔi ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa zuda fêzết hếcôn kạtmi huzơ sôbɛɲ zêʔaza kɔncaj sôbɛɲ sɛɲ zahát zahát sɛɲ ʔahumaj lahát Ấʔilà kák họhàŋ kủʔa zân sôzatít Ðâʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔabi ɣícêên zítma ziba ʔɛmɣáʔi hasêlêbôni lạʔi kó fênuên tổfụ kủʔa ɣêdô sɛ tổfụ kủʔa husa Ấʔilà kɔncáʔu kủʔa huzơ kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa zata tổfụ kủʔa bếtlêhɛm ʔasuzơ tổfụ kủʔa tʰêkô ʔa lấʔi haj hêlê ʔa naaza naaza sɛɲ ʔahusam hêfɛ tʰêmêni ʔaháctʰazi Ấʔilà kák kɔncaj kủʔa naaza kɔncaj kủʔa hêlê ʔa sêzết sôha hakốt sɛɲ ʔanúp hátsôbêba zòŋ ʔahahên kɔn hazum zabê dượk tôncọŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi dặt zabê nóʔi zằŋ ta sɛɲ cɔŋ dăwdớn zabê xấn ŋwiện vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên zằŋ cớci cúʔa fướk cɔ tôʔi bờkõʔi tôʔi zộŋlớn ŋwiện tăj cúʔa fù ɣiúp tôʔi ɣiữ tôʔi dượk xỏʔi zữ hầʔu cɔ tôʔi cẳŋ buồnzầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ʔiɲư ŋườʔi kầʔuŋwiện kêlúp ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa suha sɛɲ mêhiə tổfụ kủʔa sɛɲ ɲà zafa fasê ʔa têhina kủʔa zân tʰàɲ nahác Ấʔilà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zêka kɔncaj kủʔa kêna ʔɔátniên sêzaza kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɔátniên hatʰát mêônôtʰaj sɛɲ ʔɔùpza sêzaza sɛɲ ɣiôáp tổfụ kủʔa kák ŋườʔiở cũŋ tʰợmộk dềʔu tʰợmộk kák kɔncaj kủʔa kalép cáʔu kủʔa ɣiêfunê ʔizu naam kùŋ ɲữŋ kɔncaj kủʔa kêna kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêhalêlɛ síp sifa tʰiziə ʔasazên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɛsơza ɣiêtʰɛ mêzết fɛ zalôn vợ kủʔa mêzết sɛɲ miziəm samaj zítbák tổfụ kủʔa Ếc ʔa vợ ŋườʔi zân zuda sɛɲ ɣiêzệt tổfụ kủʔa ɣêdô hêbɛ tổfụ kủʔa sôkô ɣiêkutiên tổfụ kủʔa sanô ʔa Ấʔilà kɔncáʔu kủʔa bitʰiə kɔŋáʔi kủʔa fazaôn mêzết kướʔi lấʔi kɔncaj kủʔa hôdiə cịʔɛm naham ca kủʔa kêhila ŋườʔi ɣạkmít Ếc ʔa ŋườʔi makatʰít kɔncaj kủʔa simôn ʔammôn zina bêɲanan tilôn kɔncaj kủʔa zisi sôhết bênsôhết kɔncáʔu sêla kɔncaj zuda zơ tổfụ kủʔa lêka laêda tổfụ kủʔa mazêsa kák họhàŋ zòŋzõʔi Ác ʔa zệt vảʔi ɣaj lạʔi kó ɣiôkim ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kôsêba ɣiôác sazáp ŋườʔi kaicị dất môáp kùŋ zasubilêcɛm Ấʔilà diềʔu kổtíc ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi tʰợ ɣốm tạʔi nêtaim ɣêdêza cúŋ ɣần vwa kôŋviệk ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa simêôn nêmuên zamin zazíp sêza săwlơ salum kɔncaj kủʔa săwlơ mípsam kɔncaj kủʔa salum mícma kɔncaj kủʔa mípsam kɔncaj kủʔa mícma hammuên kɔncaj kủʔa saku simê ʔi kònsi ʔi kó mườʔisáʔu kɔncaj sáʔu kɔŋáʔi sɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi xôŋ dôŋ kɔn kả họhàŋ cúŋ sáɲ vớʔi ŋườʔi zuda tʰì cúŋ tạʔi bê ʔɛsêba tạʔi môlada tạʔi hasaswa tạʔi bila tạʔi sɛm tạʔi tôlát lạʔi tạʔi bêtuên họtma siếklák tạʔi bếtmakabốt hátsasusim bếtbizê tạʔi saazaim Ấʔilà kák tʰàɲ kủʔa cúŋ cɔdến dờʔi vwa Ðʔa cúŋ kũŋ kó hươŋtʰôn ʔain zimmôn tôkɛn ʔasan kùŋ kák tʰônấp fíʔa kủʔa kák hươŋtʰôn nầʔi cɔdến baɛɲ Ấʔilà cỗ za fổ kủʔa cúŋ lạʔi mêsôbáp zamlék ɣiôsa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamasiə ɣiôên ɣiêhu kɔncaj ɣiôsơbiə cáʔu sêzaza cắt ʔasiên lạʔi kó liôênaj zakôba ɣiêsôhajza ʔasaza ʔadiên ɣiêsimiên bênaza sisa kɔncaj kủʔa sifi cáʔu kủʔa ʔalôn cắt kủʔa ɣiêdaza cít kủʔa simzi kɔncaj kủʔa sêmaza ɲữŋ ŋườʔi từŋ nầʔi cưởŋtộk cɔŋ mìɲ tôŋtộk cúŋ tʰì tʰêm zất ɲiềʔu cúŋ saŋ kwa ɣêdô dến fíʔa dôŋ kủʔa cũŋ dể dồŋkỏ cɔ dɔàn súkvật mìɲ cúŋ tʰấʔi dồŋkỏ tươʔitốt kòn dất tʰì zộŋzãʔi ʔiênlặŋ bìɲan xi cướk zòŋzõʔi cam dó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã cướkdâʔi cɔŋ dờʔi sêciə vwa nướk zuda kéʔɔ dến dáɲ kák cạʔi kwân kủʔa cúŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi maônít dó twiệt ciếm lấʔi dất tʰăj vàʔɔ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj bởʔivì tạʔi dó kó dồŋkỏ dể nuôʔi bầʔi súkvật kủʔa cɔŋ zòŋ simêôn kó nămcăm ŋườʔi dến núʔi sê ʔizơ kák kwan kaj fêlatiə nêʔaziə zêfaza ʔusiên ấʔilà kák kɔncaj kủʔa zisi cúŋ dáɲ ŋườʔi ʔamalék kòn lạʔi zồʔi dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj vả zubên kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ʔisơzaên ôʔuế ɣiườŋ kủʔa ca mìɲ kwiền cưởŋ nửʔa cifáʔi mênasɛ dượk ɣôlan dất basan vớʔi dịʔahạt Ác tazốt vớʔi dịʔahạt bởʔi cifáʔi ʔisaka dượk kêdɛ vớʔi dịʔahạt zamốt vớʔi dịʔahạt ʔanɛm vớʔi dịʔahạt bởʔi cifáʔi ʔasɛ dượk masɛɲ vớʔi dịʔahạt dôn vớʔi dịʔahạt hukô vớʔi dịʔahạt zêhốp vớʔi dịʔahạt bởʔi cifáʔi néptali dượk kêdɛ cɔŋ ɣalilê vớʔi dịʔahạt hammôn vớʔi dịʔahạt kiziətaim vớʔi dịʔahạt kɔncáʔu mêzazi kòn lạʔi bởʔi cifáʔi sabulôn dượk zimônô vớʔi dịʔahạt tʰabô vớʔi dịʔahạt kòn kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa dôŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣiêzicô bởʔi cifáʔi zubên dượk bếtsɛ cɔŋ zừŋ vớʔi dịʔahạt zasa vớʔi dịʔahạt kêdêmốt vớʔi dịʔahạt mêfát vớʔi dịʔahạt bởʔi cifáʔi ɣát dượk zamốt dất ɣalaát vớʔi dịʔahạt mahanaim vớʔi dịʔahạt hếtbôn vớʔi dịʔahạt zaêsɛ vớʔi dịʔahạt kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisaka tʰôla fu ʔa zasúp simzôn ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa tʰôla ʔusi zêfaza ɣiêziên ɣiákmaj zípsam samuên dềʔu cưởŋ cɔŋ tôŋtộk tʰôla ŋườʔi ʔɛɲhùŋ mạɲzạn cɔŋ zòŋzõʔi dờʔi Ðʔa kɔnkáʔi dượk haj haj ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusi zícahiə kɔncaj kủʔa zícahiə micaên ʔɔbadiə ɣiôên zisiza kả cakɔn ŋườʔi dềʔu cưởŋtộk vớʔi kó ɲữŋ dộʔi biɲ za cận kứ tʰeo tôŋtộk tʰếhệ kủʔa cúŋ dượk sáʔu ŋàn kwân bởʔivì cúŋ kó ɲiềʔu ɲiềʔu kɔn lạʔi ʔɛɲɛm cúŋ cɔŋ zòŋ ʔisaka ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲhùŋ mạɲzạn tʰeo za fổ dượk bảʔi ŋàn kɔncaj kủʔa bêŋiəmin bêla bêkɛ ɣiêdiəên ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa bêla ʔusi ʔusiên ɣiêzimốt ʔizi ŋườʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu cưởŋtộk ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kɔncáʔu tʰeo za fổ dượk haj haj ŋàn bamươʔi ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa bêkɛ sêmiza ɣiôác liêsɛ liôênaj zi ɣiêzêmốt ʔabiza ʔanatốt ʔalêmết ɲữŋ ấʔilà kɔncaj bêkɛ dềʔu cưởŋtộk ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kɔncáʔu tʰeo za fổ kủʔa cúŋ dượk haj haj căm ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêdiəên biɲhan sêfufan huzam Ðâʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu cưởŋtộk kủʔa zân ɣêba zân ấʔi fu zẫn dến dất manahát naaman ʔahiza ɣêza dềʔu fu ŋườʔi sɛɲ za ʔusa ʔahihút ʔɛca ʔɛca sɛɲ ɣiêhôʔada ɣiêhôʔada sɛɲ ʔalêmết simzi simzi sɛɲ mộtsa mộtsa sɛɲ binê ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa binê ʔa zafa zafa sɛɲ lêʔasa lêʔasa sɛɲ ʔasên ʔasên kó sáʔu kɔncaj ʔazixam bốkku Íc sêʔaziə badiə hanan hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasên kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ʔasên ʔulam kɔn cưởŋnam ɣiêúk tʰứ ɲì tʰứba lifêlết kɔncaj kủʔa ʔulam dềʔu ʔɛɲhùŋ mạɲzạn kó tàʔi ɣiỏʔi cúŋ kó kɔn cáʔu zất dôŋ mộtcăm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi dềʔu kɔncáʔu kủʔa bêŋiəmin Ấʔi vậʔi kả zân ʔisơzaên dượk vàʔɔsổ tʰeo kák za fổ kìʔa dã ɣicép vàʔɔ sác lượk kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên zâŋiw da tạʔi tộʔilỗʔi dɛm kwa nướk babilôn săw xi babilôn cởvề kák ŋườʔiở dầʔutiên ʔakúp tɛɲmôn ʔahiman ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa cúŋ salum làmdầʔu cɔdến bâʔizờ kɛɲ kửʔa dôŋ kủʔa vwa kòn sưʔa dềʔu ɣiữ kửʔa cạʔi ŋườʔi lêvi salum kɔncaj kôzê cáʔu kủʔa biəsáp cắt kủʔa kôza ʔɛɲɛm tôŋtộk mìɲ ấʔilà zân kôzê lɔ kɔjsók fụkzịc kɛɲzữ kák kửʔa dền sưʔa tổfụ cúŋ kaikwản cạʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiữ kửʔa tạʔi sưʔafi ʔa kɔncaj lêʔasa kwan kaj cúŋ Ðứkzê vớʔi ŋườʔi sɛcazi kɔncaj mêsêlêmiə ɣiữ kửʔa hộʔi mạk ɲữŋ nầʔi dã dượk lựʔɛcọn hầʔu kɛɲzữ kák kửʔa dượk haj căm mườʔihaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔita cép za fổ tʰeo kák hươŋ vwa Ðʔa samuên dấŋ dã mấʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi cɔŋ cứk kủʔa Ấʔi vậʔi cúŋ kɔncáʔu kủʔa cúŋ dềʔu tʰeo tʰứ kɔj ɣiữ kák kửʔa dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tứklà dền kák ɣiữ kửʔa dặt fíʔa dền dôŋ tâʔi bắk kák ʔɛɲɛm cúŋ cɔŋ kák làŋ mìɲ fảʔi dến từŋ tʰeo fiên tʰứ ɣiúpdỡ kòn ŋườʔi lêvi cưởŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kɛɲ kửʔa hằŋ ɣiữ cứk mìɲ kɔjsók kák fòŋ xuŋtʰàɲ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bandêm cúŋ suŋkwɛɲ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kɛɲzữ dến mỗʔi buổʔi sáŋsớm cúŋ lạʔi lɔ mởkửʔa za cɔŋ cúŋ kũŋ kó mấʔi ŋườʔi dượk cứk ɣiữ dồ xí zụŋ kák dồ ấʔi dɛm za dɛm ʔi tʰeo lạʔi kó xák dượk kắt kɔjsók dồdạk kák xí zụŋ tạʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ kùŋ lɔ ɣiữ zượʔu zầʔu ɲũhươŋ kák tʰuốk tʰơm kó mấʔi cɔŋ kɔncaj ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cế kák tʰứ hươŋwa kònma titʰiə ŋườʔi lêvi kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa salum tʰuộk zòŋ kôzê kɔjsók việklàm báɲzán cɔŋ cảʔɔ mấʔi cɔŋ vòŋ ʔɛɲɛm cúŋ zòŋ kêhát dượk cứk kɔj việklàm báɲ cầntʰiết dến ŋàʔi tʰìfảʔi cɔ Ðâʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó cứk hátsướŋ dềʔu cưởŋtộk cɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ kák fòŋ kủʔa dền fụk ŋàʔi dêm dượk kák kôŋviệk xák ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu cưởŋtộk kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi tʰeo zòŋzõʔi tạʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiê ʔiên tổfụ kủʔa ɣabaôn tạʔi tʰàɲ ɣabaôn ŋườʔi maaka kɔn cưởŋnam kủʔa ŋườʔi dôn lạʔi sɛɲ suzơ kíc bɛɲ nêzơ nadáp ɣêdô ʔahi sɛcazi míclô míclô sɛɲ simêʔam cúŋ kũŋ dồŋ kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm dốʔimặt ɲăw nêzơ sɛɲ kíc kíc sɛɲ săwlơ săwlơ sɛɲ ɣiônatʰan mɛɲkiswa ʔabinadáp Ếc baɛɲ kɔncaj ɣiônatʰan mêzibɛɲ mêzibɛɲ sɛɲ mica kɔncaj kủʔa mica fitʰôn mêlék tazê ʔa ʔɛca ʔɛca sɛɲ zaêza zaêza sɛɲ ʔalêmết Ác simzi simzi sɛɲ mộtsa mộtsa sɛɲ binê ʔa kɔncaj binê ʔa zêfaza zêfaza sɛɲ lêʔasa lêʔasa sɛɲ ʔasên ʔasên kó sáʔu ŋườʔi kɔncaj ʔazixam bốkzu Íc sêʔaziə badiə hanan ấʔi dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasên vả zân filitin cɛɲ ciến vớʔi ʔisơzaên zân ʔisơzaên cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk zân filitin kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi bịtʰươŋ cết cên núʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa zânfi duổʔi tʰeo săwlơ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dáɲ ɣiết kák kɔncaj ấʔi ɣiônatʰan ʔabinadáp mɛɲkiswa kơn ɣiặk zất kịcliệt cɔ săwlơ tʰiệt kựkxổ xi líɲ kầm kuŋ dến ŋườʔi ŋườʔi bịtʰươŋ săwlơ bảʔɔ vák biɲxí hầʔu mìɲ zằŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣươm kủʔa ŋươʔi dâm ɣiết kẻʔɔ cẳŋ cịʔu kắt kiə dến sảnŋiệp sɔŋ vák biɲxí ŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ vâŋ mạŋ lấʔilàm sợhãʔi săwlơ kầm lấʔi ɣươm mìɲ kúʔi tʰúk vàʔɔ ŋựk xi vák biɲxí tʰấʔi săwlơ cết zồʔi tʰì kũŋ lấʔi ɣươm kúʔi tʰúk vàʔɔ ŋựk mìɲ vậʔi săwlơ kɔncaj ŋườʔi kả ɲà ŋườʔi dềʔu dồŋ ɲăw cết xi zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ tʰấʔi dạʔɔ biɲ cạʔi cốn săwlơ kùŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã cết zồʔi tʰì tʰàɲ mìɲ cốn di zân filitin dến cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ ấʔi ŋàʔi hômsăw zân filitin dến bóklột ɲữŋ tửcận tʰấʔi săwlơ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋã cết cên núʔi ɣiɲbô ʔa cúŋ bóklột tʰâʔi săwlơ cém dầʔu ŋườʔi kất lấʔi biɲxí ŋườʔi zồʔi saj di xắp sứ filitin dể báʔɔ cɔ kák tʰầntượŋ zânsự cúŋ dể biɲxí kủʔa ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ miễʔu kák tʰần kủʔa cúŋnó kòn dầʔu ŋườʔi tʰì dóŋ diɲ ceo cɔŋ cùʔa Ðʔa ɣôn xi zânkư zabɛ ɣalaát ŋɛ ɲữŋ diềʔu zân filitin dã cɔ săwlơ tʰì ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dềʔu kảmdộŋ di kướp lấʔi sák vwa săwlơ sák kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dɛm zabɛ côn hàʔicốt kủʔa zướʔi kâʔi tʰôŋ tạʔi zabɛ dɔạn kiêŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi Ấʔi vậʔi vwa săwlơ cết tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ dã fạm kùŋ Ðứkzê cẳŋ kó vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi lạʔi dã kầʔu hỏʔi bóŋ cẳŋ kó kầʔu hỏʔi Ðứkzê vậʔi kớ ấʔi ŋàʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi zờʔi nướk ŋườʔi cɔ Ðʔa kɔncaj ʔisaj lúk ấʔi kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu ɲóm dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi hếpzôn nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa cúŋtôʔi sươŋtʰịt kủʔa ôŋ xi cướk zầʔu săwlơ kòn kaicị cúŋtôʔi tʰì ôŋ dã zẫn zân ʔisơzaên vàʔɔ za ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ kó fán kùŋ ôŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi cănnuôʔi zân ʔisơzaên kwan tướŋ cúŋnó Ấʔi vậʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ vwa hếpzôn Ðʔa zawướk vớʔi cúŋ tạʔi hếpzôn cướk Ðứkzê dɔạn cúŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ Ðʔa vwa cên ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi samuên fán za vậʔi Ðʔa kả zân ʔisơzaên di tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ấʔilà ɣiêbu dó kó ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít zân kủʔa sứ zânkư ɣiêbu nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ vàʔɔ dâʔi zầʔu vậʔi Ðʔa ciếm lấʔi dồnlũʔi siôn lấʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ hễ ʔaj dáɲ zân ɣiêbusít cướcết dượk cưởŋ tướŋ vậʔi ɣiôáp kɔncaj sêzuza di dáɲ cướcết dượk kwan cưởŋ Ðʔa cɔŋ dồn vậʔi ɣọʔilà tʰàɲ Ðʔa ŋườʔi sâʔi tườŋ tʰàɲ fíʔa milô cɔdến xắp cuŋkwɛɲ kòn fần tʰàɲ zư lạʔi tʰì ɣiôáp sửʔasaŋ Ðʔa kàŋŋàʔicàŋ kườŋ tʰạɲ Ðứkzê kwân kùŋ ŋườʔi Ðâʔi ɲữŋ tướŋ kák líɲ mạɲzạn kủʔa Ðʔa dã fụɣiúp ŋườʔi dượk ŋôʔi nướk kùŋvớʔi kả ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi vwa ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán ʔisơzaên nầʔi kák líɲ mạɲzạn kủʔa Ðʔa zasôbêʔam kɔncaj kủʔa hákmôni làmdầʔu kák tướŋ ấʔilà ŋườʔi zùŋ ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ ɣiết bɛcăm ŋườʔi cɔŋ săw ŋườʔi kó lêʔasa kɔncaj kủʔa dô ʔahô ʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi nầʔi kùŋ Ðʔa nơʔi fadamim xicwân filitin ɲóm lạʔi dặŋ zawciến dó kó dám zuộŋ mạcɲa zânsự dềʔu cạʔi cốn xỏʔi zân filitin kòn dềʔu dứŋ cɔŋ zuộŋ biɲ vựk dáɲ zân filitin Ðứkzê xiến cɔ dặŋ tʰắŋ cận zất cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔilàm tướŋ kó ŋườʔi di suốŋ haŋ dá ʔadulam dếnkùŋ Ðʔa kòn dộʔi kwân filitin dóŋ cạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ zêfaim lúk ấʔi Ðʔa cɔŋ dồn kó fòŋ biɲ kủʔa zân filitin bếtlêhɛm Ðʔa ướkaw zằŋ tʰanôʔi cớ ɣì ʔaj cɔ nướk ʔuốŋ kủʔa ɣiếŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ bếtlêhɛm vậʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi sôŋ ŋaŋ kwa cạʔi filitin múk nướk cɔŋ ɣiếŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ bếtlêhɛm dɛm cɔ Ðʔa ʔuốŋ sɔŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ cịʔu ʔuốŋ zảʔi nướk ấʔi za cướk Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ kầʔucúʔa ɣiữ lấʔi tôʔi dừŋ dể tôʔi nầʔi tôʔi xôŋ ʔuốŋ hwiết kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi dã liềʔu tʰân mìɲ dặŋ dɛm nướk dến vì kớ ấʔi nênŋườʔi xôŋ cịʔu ʔuốŋ Ấʔilà kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dó dã lạʔi kó ʔabisaj ʔɛm kủʔa ɣiôáp làmdầʔu cɔŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi zùŋ ɣiáʔɔ mìɲ ɣiết bɛcăm ŋườʔi nổʔizɛɲ tiếŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ấʔi ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ dượk cưởŋ kủʔa sɔŋ cẳŋ bằŋ ŋườʔi cướk lạʔi kó bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada kápsêên ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dã ɲiềʔu kôŋviệk kảtʰể ŋườʔi dã ɣiết haj ŋườʔi môáp mạɲbạʔɔ cɔŋ twiết ŋườʔi suốŋ káʔi ɣiết kɔn ŋàʔi kũŋ dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi zíptô kaw tʰướk ŋườʔi zíptô kầm nơʔi tăj kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ bằŋ cụk máʔi zệt kòn bênaza suốŋ dón ŋườʔi kầm kâʔi ɣậʔi zút lấʔi ɣiáʔɔ xỏʔi tăj ŋườʔi zíptô zùŋ ɣiáʔɔ ɣiết Ấʔilà
