kôŋviệk bênaza kɔncaj ɣiêhôzada dã dượk nổʔizɛɲ tiếŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi dượk saŋcọŋ sɔŋ cẳŋ bằŋ ŋườʔi cướk Ðʔa ɲận ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ŋị mìɲ lạʔi kó kák ŋườʔi mạɲzạn cɔŋ dộʔi biɲ ʔasaên ʔɛm kủʔa ɣiôáp ʔɛânkanan kɔncaj kủʔa dô bếtlêhɛm samốt ŋườʔi hazôn hêlết ŋườʔi faôn ʔiza kɔncaj kủʔa ʔicết tʰêkô ʔa ʔabiêsɛ ʔanatốt sibêkaj husa ʔilaj ʔahô ʔa mahazaj nêtôfa hêlết kɔncaj kủʔa baana nêtôfa ʔitaj kɔncaj zibaj ɣibê ʔa tʰàɲ kủʔa kɔnkáʔi bêŋiəmin bênaza fizatʰôn huzaj nahalêɣaác ʔabiên ʔazaba Ác bahuzim liákba saɛɲbôn bênêhasɛm ɣisôn ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj saɣê haza ʔahizam kɔncaj saka haza lifa kɔncaj ʔuzơ hêfɛ mêkêza ʔahiza falôn hếcô kạtmên naazaj kɔncaj ʔɛbaj ɣiôên ʔɛm kủʔa natʰan mibêha kɔncaj kủʔa haɣơzi sêlék ŋườʔi ʔammôn nahazaj bêêzốt vák biɲxí kủʔa ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza ʔiza ɣiêtʰɛ ɣazép kũŋ ɣiêtʰɛ ʔuzi ŋườʔi hêtít sabát kɔncaj ʔaï klaj ʔadina kɔncaj kủʔa sisa ŋườʔi zubên cưởŋ zòŋ zubên kó bamươʔi biɲ ciến vớʔi ŋườʔi hanan kɔncaj kủʔa maaka ɣiôsafát mêtʰɛn ʔusiə Ác tazốt sama ɣiêhiên kɔncaj kủʔa hôtam ʔazô ʔɛ ɣiêdiəên kɔncaj kủʔa simzi ɣiôha ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔizân tʰisít liɛn mahavim ɣiêzibaj ɣiôsaviə kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɛânnaam ɣítma ŋườʔi môáp zaasiên ŋườʔi mếtsôba cɔŋ xi Ðʔa cáɲ xỏʔi săwlơ kɔncaj kủʔa kíc tʰìkó mấʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi siếklạk ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi cɔŋ kơn ɣiặk cúŋ dềʔu kó tàʔi ɣiươŋ kuŋ ɣiỏʔi zùŋ zâʔi ɣióŋ liệŋ dá kầm kuŋ hɔặk bằŋ tăj hữʔu hăjlà bằŋ tăj kả dềʔu tʰuộk zòŋ săwlơ cifáʔi bêŋiəmin nầʔi ʔahiêsɛ làmdầʔu ɣiôác kɔncaj kủʔa sêma ɣibê ʔa ɣiêsiên fêlết kɔncaj kủʔa Ác bêkaza ɣiêhu ʔanatốt ɣítmajza ɣabaôn mạɲzạn cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi kiə làmdầʔu lạʔi kó ɣiêzêmi zahasiên ɣiôhanan ɣiôsabát ɣêdêza lusaj ɣiêzimốt bêʔaliə sêmazi ʔa sêfati ʔa hazốp ʔɛânkana zisiza ʔasazên ɣiôêsɛ zasôbêʔam ŋườʔi kôzê ɣiôêla sêbadiə kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzôham ɣêdô cɔŋ cifáʔi ɣát kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tớʔi kùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi nơʔi dồn cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ mạɲmẽ kó tàʔi ciếncận kầm xiên kầm ɣiáʔɔ ziệnmạʔɔ ɲư lɛɲlẹ ɲư hɔàŋ zươŋ cên núʔi sɛ làmdầʔu badiə tʰứ ɲì tʰứbảʔi mícmanan tʰứtư ɣiêzêmi tʰứnăm ʔaï ttaj tʰứsáʔu tʰứbảʔi ɣiôhanan tʰứ ʔɛânsabát tʰứ cín ɣiêzêmi tʰứ mườʔi mákbanaj tʰứ mườʔimột cúŋ dềʔu kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣát kwan kaj kơ biɲ ɲỏ kaj mộtcăm ŋườʔi kaj mộtŋàn ŋườʔi Ấʔilà ɲữŋ di kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ tʰáŋzêŋ lúk nướk ŋập haj duổʔi kák zânsự tạʔi cũŋ hɔặk fíʔa dôŋ hăj fíʔa tâʔi lạʔi kó ŋườʔi tʰuộk bêŋiəmin zuda kũŋ di tớʔi kùŋ Ðʔa cɔŋ dồn ŋườʔi Ðʔa za dónzướk cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ kác hòʔabìɲ dể hùʔa ɣiúp tʰì lòŋ kùŋ kák ŋươʔi víbằŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰầm mưʔu lừʔa cɔ tʰùŋịc ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ sɛmsét dɔán fạt tăj xôŋ kó fạm diềʔu lỗʔi nàʔɔ xi ấʔi kó ʔamasaj làmdầʔu cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk tʰáɲliɲ kảmdộŋ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔiÐʔa cúŋtôʔi dềʔu ôŋ hỡʔi kɔncaj ʔisaj cúŋtôʔi biɲ ôŋ ŋwiện ôŋ dượk bìɲiên bìɲiên ŋwiện ɣiúpdỡ ôŋ kũŋ dượk bìɲiên bởʔivì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôŋ fò cợ ôŋ Ðʔa ɲận kák ŋươʔi ấʔi dặt tướŋ kũŋ kó mấʔi ŋườʔi tʰuộk mênasɛ dến tʰeo Ðʔa xi ŋườʔi kùŋ kwân filitin di zawciến kùŋ săwlơ sɔŋ cẳŋ ɣiúpdỡ kwân filitin kák kwan cưởŋ filitin ɲăw zằŋ sợ ʔɛ cởvề kùŋ săwlơ củ ŋwi cɔ dầʔu cúŋta căŋ xi ŋườʔi cởvề siếklạk kó mấʔi ŋườʔi bởʔi mênasɛ dến tʰeo ŋườʔi ɣiôsabát silêtʰaj dềʔu kwan kaj ŋàn kwân cɔŋ cifáʔi mênasɛ ɲữŋ nầʔi fụɣiúp Ðʔa dốʔidịc vớʔi kwân ɣiặk kướp bởʔivì cúŋ dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kwan tướŋ dộʔi biɲ hằŋ ŋàʔi kó ŋườʔi dếnkùŋ Ðʔa dặŋ ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi cɔdến xi tʰàɲdộʔi kwân ɲư dộʔi kwân kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðâʔi kák kwânlíɲ dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tạʔi hếpzôn dặŋ cɔ nướk săwlơ tʰuộk ŋườʔi tʰeo ɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ kɔncáʔu zuda kó sáʔu ŋàn támcăm ŋườʔi dềʔu kầm xiên kầm ɣiáʔɔ sắmsửʔa cɛɲ ciến bởʔi kɔncáʔu simêôn kó bảʔi ŋàn mộtcăm ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dềʔu za cận dượk bởʔi kɔncáʔu lêvi kó ŋàn sáʔu căm ɣiêhôzada kaikwản ɲà ʔazôn vớʔi ŋườʔi kó ŋàn bảʔicăm ŋườʔi lạʔi kó sadốk caicẻ mạɲzạn vớʔi ŋườʔi kó haimươʔihaj cưởŋ kủʔa ɲà ca ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu bêŋiəmin ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa săwlơ dượk ŋàn ŋườʔi dến bấʔizờ fầnlớn cúŋnó kòn dươŋ tʰeo ɲà săwlơ về kɔncáʔu zaim kó dượk haj támcăm ŋườʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kó zɛɲtiếŋ cɔŋ ɲà ca mìɲ về nửʔa cifáʔi mênasɛ kó ŋàn ŋườʔi ʔainấʔi dềʔu từŋ dến dặŋ Ðʔa vwa về kɔncáʔu ʔisaka kó ɲữŋ hiểʔubiết tʰìɣiờ việk zân ʔisơzaên cúŋnó haj căm cưởŋtộk kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm cúŋ kũŋ vâŋ lịɲ cúŋ vềsa kó ŋườʔi hăj bàʔi cận kầm kák tʰứ biɲxí zựbị dặŋ zawciến hàŋŋũ cỉɲtề kó mộtlòŋmộtzạ vềnép kó mộtŋàn kwan kaj vớʔi bảʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi kầm xiên kầm ɣiáʔɔ tʰeo mìɲ vềÐʔan kó haj ŋàn săw căm ŋườʔi kó tàʔi zàn cận về ʔasɛ kó ŋườʔi hăj kéʔɔ za ciɲciến kó tàʔi zàn cận kòn zubên ɣát nửʔa cifáʔi mênasɛ kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kó mườʔihaj ŋườʔi kầm kák tʰứ biɲxí za cận ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi líɲciến kó tàʔi bàʔi cận dềʔu lấʔi lòŋtʰàɲ kéʔɔ dến hếpzôn dặŋ Ðʔa vwa cên kả ʔisơzaên kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xák cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kũŋ dềʔu mộtlòŋmộtzạ Ðʔa vwa cúŋ lạʔi vớʔi vwa Ðʔa ŋàʔi ănuốŋ ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa cúŋ dã cɔ kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở lânkận cɔdến dất ʔisaka sabulôn néptali dềʔu dɛm cở bằŋ lửʔa lạkdà kɔn kɔn nàʔɔ báɲmì cáʔi ɲɔ xô zượʔu zầʔu kùŋ zẫn ciên dến zất ɲiềʔu bởʔivì kó vujvẻ nơʔi ʔisơzaên Ðʔa hộʔiŋị vớʔi kwan tướŋ ŋàn kwân kwan tướŋ căm kwân kùŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi lấʔi dềʔu nầʔi tốtlàɲ nếʔu nầʔi zɔ nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dến tʰì hãʔi saj ŋườʔi di xắp mọʔi nơʔi dếnkùŋ ʔɛɲɛm cúŋta kòn lạʔi xắp sứ ʔisơzaên dếnkùŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ dịʔahạt cúŋ dể ɲóm cúŋ lạʔi kùŋ zồʔi cúŋta fảʔi tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ cúŋta cɔŋ dờʔi săwlơ cúŋta xôŋ kó dến cướk zawướk kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu nóʔi zằŋ ɲưvậʔi kả zânsự lấʔi lờʔi ấʔi tốtlàɲ Ðʔa ɲóm kả ʔisơzaên sihɔ xɛ zíptô cɔ dếnnơʔi nàʔɔ hamát dể zướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kiziátzêʔazim Ðʔa kả ʔisơzaên dồŋ di baala tạʔi kiziátzêʔazim tʰuộk zuda dặŋ zướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứklà Ðứkzê ŋự ɣiữʔa cêzubin nơʔi kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi cúŋ zướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲà ʔabinadáp dể cên káʔi kộ mớʔi kòn ʔusa ʔahi tʰì zắt kộ Ðʔa kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu hếtsứk vuicơʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sướŋka zùŋ dờn kầm dờn cốŋ ɲỏ cập cỏʔa vuimừŋ xi cúŋ dến dạp lúʔa kủʔa kidôn ʔusa ɣiơ tăj za lấʔi bởʔivì cợt bướk kơn tʰịɲnộ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋ ʔusa ŋàʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó ɣiơ tăj za cên ŋườʔi cết tạʔi dó cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðʔa cẳŋ vừʔaý Ðứkzê dã hàɲhạ ʔusa ŋườʔi ɣọʔi nơʔi ấʔilà bêzết ʔusa hãʔi kòn ɣọʔi vậʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi Ðʔa lấʔilàm sợhãʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nóʔi zằŋ ta zướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vàʔɔ ɲà saw dượk vậʔi Ðʔa xôŋ tʰỉɲ ɲà mìɲ tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ɲưŋ bởʔi dɛm dể vàʔɔ ɲà dôm ŋườʔi ɣát hòm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi batʰáŋ cɔŋ ɲà dôm Ðứkzê fướk cɔ ɲà dôm mọʔi tʰuộk ŋườʔi hizam vwa tizơ saj sứɣiả dến Ðʔa kùŋ ɣởʔi ɣỗ hươŋ tʰợhồ tʰợmộk dặŋ kất cɔ ŋườʔi káʔi kuŋ Ðʔa ɲìn zằŋ Ðứkzê dã vữŋ mìɲ vwa cên ʔisơzaên kớ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi nướk ŋườʔi dượk hưŋvượŋ tʰêm tạʔizê zusalɛm Ðʔa lạʔi kòn lấʔi xák sɛɲ ɲữŋ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi nầʔi kák kɔnkáʔi ŋườʔi sɛɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm samwa sôháp natʰan salômôn zba liswa ʔɛânbêlết nôɣa nêfết zafiə bêêŋiəda lifêlết xi zân filitin hăj zằŋ Ðʔa dã dượk sứk zầʔu vwa cên kả ʔisơzaên tʰì hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi filitin dềʔu di dặŋ ŋườʔi Ðʔa hăj dềʔu dó di za dón cúŋnó vả zân filitin dã lɔán dến càn za cɔŋ cũŋ zêfaim Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi fảʔi di dáɲ zân filitin căŋ cúʔa fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi căŋ Ðứkzê dáp lờʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj ŋươʔi ŋàʔi fi kéʔɔ baɛɲfêzátsim zồʔi tạʔi dó Ðʔa dáɲ cúŋnó dɔạn Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó zùŋ tăj dã dáɲfá kơn tʰịɲnộ ɲư nướk fá vậʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋườʔita ɣọʔi cỗ dó baɛɲfêzátsim ŋườʔifi kák tʰầntượŋ mìɲ tạʔi dó Ðʔa cwiền tʰiêʔu cɔŋ lửʔa ŋườʔifi lạʔi bủʔa xắp cɔŋ cũŋ Ðʔa kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nữʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ di tʰeo cúŋnó hãʔi di vòŋ cúŋnó zồʔi dến dáɲ cúŋnó tạʔi nơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ kâʔi zâʔu vừʔa xi ŋươʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ bướkdi cên ŋọn kâʔi zâʔu bấʔizờ ŋươʔi kéʔɔ za cận Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi za cướk ŋươʔi dặŋ dáɲ dạʔɔkwân filitin Ðʔa ʔiɲư lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán zặn dáɲduổʔi dạʔɔkwân filitin ɣabaôn cɔdến ɣêsɛ zɛɲ kủʔa Ðʔa dồn za cɔŋ xắp kák nướk Ðứkzê xiến cɔ kák zântộk dềʔu kíɲ Ðʔa Ðʔa kất cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ kuŋdiện tạʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa sắmsửʔa nơʔi cɔ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ zựŋ ɲà cạʔi cɔ ấʔi xi ấʔi Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ ŋɔạʔicừ ŋườʔi lêvi cẳŋ ʔaj sứŋdáŋ xiêŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hầʔu việk ŋàʔi Ðʔa ɲóm kả ʔisơzaên tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi ŋườʔi dã sắmsửʔa cɔ Ðʔa kũŋ hộʔi lạʔi kák kɔncáʔu ʔazôn ŋườʔi lêvi zòŋ kêhát kó ʔuziên cưởŋtộk kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk haj căm haimươʔi ŋườʔi zòŋ mêzazi kó ʔasaza cưởŋtộk kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk haj căm haimươʔi ŋườʔi zòŋ ɣẹtsôn kó ɣiôên cưởŋtộk kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi ŋườʔi zòŋ lisafan kó sêmaza cưởŋtộk kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk haj căm ŋườʔi zòŋ hếpzôn kó cưởŋtộk kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk mươʔi ŋườʔi zòŋ ʔusiên kó ʔaminadáp cưởŋtộk kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk mộtcăm mườʔihaj ŋườʔi Ðʔa ɣọʔi tʰầʔi sadốk ʔabiətʰa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi tứk ʔuziên ʔasaza ɣiôên sêmaza ʔaminadáp bảʔɔ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi tộkcưởŋ kủʔa cifáʔi lêvi vậʔi hãʔi kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi zọn mìɲ cɔ tʰáɲ sạc zồʔi xiêŋ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dếnnơʔi dã cɔ vì tạʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi xôŋ tʰeo dã dịɲ kầʔu Ðứkzê ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dã hàɲhạ cúŋta vậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi zọn mìɲ cɔ tʰáɲ sạc dặŋ tʰỉɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kák kɔncáʔu lêvi zùŋ dòn xiêŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên vaj mìɲ ʔiɲư môʔisɛ dã zạʔibảʔɔ tùʔi lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔa cwiền cɔ kák cưởŋtộk ŋườʔi lêvi hãʔi kắt cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hátsướŋ kầm kák tʰứ ɲạkxí ốŋkwiển dờn kầm cập cỏʔa dể kấttiếŋ vuimừŋ vaŋ zền ŋườʔilê kắt hêman kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôên ʔasáp kɔncaj kủʔa bêzêkiə tʰuộk cɔŋ zòŋọ ŋườʔi lạʔi zòŋ mêzazi ʔɛɲɛm tʰì dặt tʰan kɔncaj kủʔa kusaza cuŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi ấʔi lạʔi ɲữŋ ʔɛɲɛm zòŋ tʰứ sɛcazi bên zasiên sêmizamốt ɣiêhiên ʔuni bênaza maasêza dôm ɣiê ʔiên ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hátsướŋ hêman ʔasáp tʰan zùŋ ɲữŋ cập cỏʔa dồŋ dặŋ vaŋ zầʔi sɛcazi ʔasiên sêmizamốt ɣiêhiên ʔuni maasêza bênaza zùŋ ốŋkwiển tʰổʔi tʰeo diệʔu ʔalamốt kònma titʰiə lifêlê mícnêza dôm ɣiê ʔiên ʔasasiə dềʔu zùŋ dờn kầm dáɲ tʰeo ɣiọŋ sêminít dặŋ zẫn tiếŋ kênaniə cưởŋtộk ŋườʔi lêvi kaj việk kasướŋ zạʔi ŋườʔi ɣiỏʔi ŋề ấʔi kòn bêzêkiə ʔɛânkana ɣiữ kửʔa cướk zawướk sêbaniə ɣiôsafát nêtʰanêên ʔamasaj sɛcazi bênaza liêsɛ tứklà ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dềʔu tʰổʔi cướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dôm ɣiêhiza ɣiữ kửʔa cướk zawướk vậʔi Ðʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa ʔisơzaên kák kwan tướŋ ŋàn kwân dềʔu di tʰỉɲ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲà kủʔa dôm kác vuimừŋ xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fùcợ ŋườʔi lêvi xiêŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì ŋườʔita bảʔi kɔn dựk bảʔi kɔnciên dựk Ðʔa kák ŋườʔi lêvi xiêŋ kahát kênaniə làmdầʔu ɲữŋ dềʔu mặk áʔɔ vảʔi ɣaj Ðʔa kũŋ mặk cên mìɲ káʔi fót bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj ɲưvậʔi kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu tʰỉɲ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê kótiếŋ vuimừŋ tiếŋ kòʔi tiếŋ cập cỏʔa vaŋ zầʔi ɣiọŋ dờn kầm dờn xi zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dến tʰàɲ Ðʔa tʰì micɛɲ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa săwlơ ŋó ŋaŋ kwa kửʔasổ tʰấʔi vwa Ðʔa ɲảʔiɲót vuicơʔi tʰì cɔŋ lòŋ xiɲbỉ ŋườʔi cúŋ tʰỉɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể cɔŋ cạʔi kủʔa Ðʔa dã zựŋ cɔ dɔạn zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa bìɲan tạʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiÐʔa dã zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa bìɲan sɔŋ ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê cúk fướk cɔ zânsự dɔạn fânfát cɔ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kả mỗʔi ŋườʔi báɲ miếŋ tʰịt káʔi báɲ ɲɔ xô ŋươʔi mấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi hầʔu việk cướk kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋợʔixɛn kảmtạ katụŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ʔasáp cáɲ sɛcazi fó zồʔi tʰì ɣiê ʔiên sêmizamốt ɣiêhiên matitʰiə bênaza dôm ɣiê ʔiên dềʔu kầm ɲạkxí dờn kầm dờn kòn ʔasáp nổʔi cập cỏʔa vaŋ bênaza tʰầʔi zahasiên dềʔu hằŋ tʰổʔi cướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðʔa caw nơʔi tăj ʔasáp ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi bàʔi nầʔi dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ ŋàʔi và dồn kôŋviệk ŋàʔi za ɣiữʔa kák zântộk hãʔi kahát cɔ ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi swiɣẫm kák kôŋviệk mầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi hãʔi lấʔi zɛɲ tʰáɲ ŋàʔi viɲ fàm ʔaj kầʔu Ðứkzê xá vujlòŋ fảʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê sứkmạɲ ŋàʔi fảʔi ŋàʔi hỡʔi zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dầʔitớ ŋàʔi hỡʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa zakốp ŋàʔi cọn hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi kôŋviệk mầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi dã ɲữŋ fép ŋàʔi lờʔi sétdɔán kủʔa miệŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta sự sétdɔán ŋàʔi za xắp tʰếzan xá ɲớdờʔi dờʔi zawướk ŋàʔi và mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi dã dịɲ cɔ ŋàn dờʔi tứk zawướk ŋàʔi dã kùŋ zaham và lờʔi tʰề ŋàʔi dã tʰề kùŋ ʔisák lạʔi kwiếtdịɲ cɔ zakốp diềʔulệ cɔ ʔisơzaên zawướk dờʔidờʔi zằŋ ta cɔ ŋươʔi sứ kanaan là fần kơŋiệp ŋươʔi xi ấʔi kák ŋươʔi cỉ ŋườʔi hènmọn làmxác cɔŋ sứ cảʔi zân nầʔi kwa zân kiə từ nướk nầʔi dến nướk xák ŋàʔi xôŋ cɔ ʔaj cúŋ ŋàʔi các fạt kák vwa kớ mà zằŋ cớ dụŋ dến ɲữŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔuta Ðừŋ hạʔi cɔ kák tiênci hỡʔi ŋườʔi xắp tʰếzan xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔiŋàʔi hãʔi za cửŋ kứʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔŋ kák nướk hãʔi tʰuật viɲhiển kủʔa ŋàʔi tạʔi muônzân xá ɲữŋ kôŋviệk mầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi vìÐứkzê zất dáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðáŋ kíɲ kák tʰần vì kák tʰần kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk hìɲtượŋ kònÐứkzê zựŋ kák từŋ cờʔi cướk ŋàʔi kó viɲhiển waiŋi tạʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi ŋự kó kwiềnnăŋ vujvẻ hỡʔi kák zòŋ kủʔa muônzân xá Ðứkzê viɲhiển kwiềnnăŋ xá Ðứkzê viɲhiển sétdɔán zɛɲ ŋàʔi Ðʔɛm dến cướk ŋàʔi hãʔi mặk lấʔi caŋsứk tʰáɲ xiết tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê hỡʔi xắp tʰiêɲạ xá zunsợ cướk ŋàʔi tʰếɣiớʔi kũŋ dượk vữŋbền xôŋ saw lăjdộŋ kák từŋ cờʔi hãʔi vuimừŋ cáʔidất xá lạk kòn cɔŋ kák nướk ŋườʔita dáŋ nóʔi Ðứkzê kwảncị biển mọʔi cɔŋ fảʔi zộʔi tiếŋ Ðồŋ nộʔi cɔŋ dềʔu xá vujvẻ bấʔizờ kák kâʔicốʔi cɔŋ zừŋ mừŋzỡ cướk Ðứkzê vìŋàʔi dến dặŋ sétdɔán tʰếzan hãʔi kảmtạ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɲântừ sự tʰươŋsót ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi hãʔi nóʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ cửŋ kứʔu cúŋtôʔi sin hãʔi kứʔuzỗʔi cúŋtôʔi hiệp cúŋtôʔi lạʔi ɣiảʔitʰɔát xỏʔi kák nướk cúŋtôʔi kảmtạ zɛɲ tʰáɲ cúʔa và ɲờ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa lấʔilàm dượk viɲ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên từ dờʔidờʔi cɔdến dờʔidờʔi kả zânsự dềʔu dáp zằŋ ʔamɛn ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê vậʔi Ðʔa dặt ʔasáp ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi tạʔi dó cướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ mỗʔi ŋàʔi fụk cướk làmviệk ŋàʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi kũŋ dặt dôm ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔilàm ɣiữ kửʔa dượk sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi dôm kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêdutʰun kùŋ hôsa lạʔi dặt tʰầʔi kả sadốk ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cướk dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi nơʔi kaw cɔŋ ɣabaôn dặŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi cên bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tùʔi tʰeo kák diềʔu cép cɔŋ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã cwiền zạʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên vớʔi cúŋ kó dặt hênam ɣiêdutʰun ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã dượk cọn xák ɣọʔi từŋ zɛɲ dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi kòn hêman ɣiêdutʰun kầm ɲữŋ cập cỏʔa dể vaŋ zầʔi kùŋ kák ɲạkxí zùŋ bàʔi kahát kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêdutʰun tʰì dứŋ tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa kả zânsự dềʔu di mỗʔi ŋườʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ kòn Ðʔa cởvề dặŋ cúk fướk cɔ ɲà ŋườʔi xiÐʔa cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ nóʔi vớʔi tiênci natʰan zằŋ nầʔi cɔŋ ɲà bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ kòn zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê zướʔi ɲữŋ bứk natʰan tâʔu vớʔi Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi tʰeo diềʔu cɔŋ lòŋ vwa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ vwa sảʔi cɔŋ dêm dó kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ natʰan zằŋ hãʔi di nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi cớ kất dền cɔ xi zẫn ʔisơzaên xỏʔi zíptô cɔdến ŋàʔinăj xôŋ cɔŋ dền nàʔɔ ɲưŋ cạʔi nầʔi dến cạʔi kiə ɲà nầʔi dến ɲà fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ dồŋ divề kả ʔisơzaên kó fán bảʔɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák kwan sét ʔisơzaên tứk ŋườʔi cwiềnbảʔɔ căn zân zằŋ saw kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kất cɔ káʔi dền bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ bâʔizờ ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ ɲư Ðứkzê kủʔa kwân fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã lấʔi ŋươʔi cuồŋ ciên săw ɲữŋ kɔnciên dặŋ ŋươʔi vwɛcúʔa cên zân ʔisơzaên fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi dã di kùŋ ŋươʔi cừziệt kák tʰùŋịc xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi dượk zɛɲ ɲư zɛɲ kủʔa kawcọŋ cên dất ta cốn cɔ zân ʔisơzaên vuncồŋ cúŋ dể cúŋ nơʔi mìɲ xôŋ kòn xuấʔizốʔi kɔn lɔàʔi ák cẳŋ bạʔihɔạʔi cúŋ ɲư xi cướk nữʔa ɲư ŋàʔi dã kwan sét cên zân ʔisơzaên xiến kák tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi fụk zướʔi ŋươʔi lạʔi báʔɔ cɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê kất cɔ ŋươʔi káʔi ɲà sảʔi xi kák ŋàʔi ŋươʔi dã ŋươʔi fảʔi kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ŋươʔi dặŋ ŋươʔi cɔ nướk ŋườʔi vữŋcắk ŋườʔi ấʔi kất cɔ káʔi dền cɔ ŋôʔi nướk ŋườʔi vữŋbền dến dờʔidờʔi ta cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dó kɔn ɲântừ cẳŋ kất xỏʔi ŋườʔi dâʔu ɲư dã kất xỏʔi cướk ŋươʔi sɔŋ ŋườʔi dờʔidờʔi tạʔi cɔŋ ɲà tạʔi cɔŋ nướk kòn ŋôʔi nướk ŋườʔi dượk vữŋcắk cɔdến mãʔimãʔi natʰan tʰeo kák lờʔi nầʔi mặk tʰị nầʔi tâʔu lạʔi vớʔi Ðʔa vwa Ðʔa vàʔɔ ŋồʔi cướk Ðứkzê tʰưʔa zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi tôʔi ʔaj ɲà tôʔi ɣì cúʔa dɛm tôʔi dến dâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi dó cúʔa lấʔilàm ɲỏmọn tʰăj ɲưŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi cúʔa kó hứʔa cɔ ɲà kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa cɔŋ buổʔi tươŋlaj dến lâʔuzàʔi kó dɔáʔi sɛm tôʔi tʰeo hàŋ ŋườʔi kaicị cúʔa cɔ dầʔitớ ŋàʔi dượk saŋcọŋ ɲưtʰế tʰì Ðʔa kòn nóʔiɣì dượk nữʔa cúʔa dầʔitớ cúʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi dã tʰeo lòŋ mìɲ kák việk nầʔi cɔ dầʔitớ kủʔa ŋàʔi dặŋ bàʔi za kák kảtʰể nầʔi ÔʔiÐứkzê cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋàʔi kứ tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu taj cúŋtôʔi dã ŋɛ ŋɔạʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cớ tʰì cên tʰếzan kó zântộk nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa zântộk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi di cuộk lạʔi zân ziêŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi saw ɲờ kảtʰể dáŋ kíɲ dáŋsợ cúʔa dượk zɛɲ zất duổʔi kák zântộk xỏʔi cướk zân kủʔa cúʔa zân cúʔa dã cuộk lạʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô vì zân ʔisơzaên cúʔa dã xiến tʰàɲ zân ziêŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi dến dờʔidờʔi kòn Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi cởnên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa bâʔizờ Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋwiện lờʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ɲà dượk ứŋŋiệm dến dờʔidờʔi kầʔu cúʔa ʔiɲư ŋàʔi dã fán ŋwiện diềʔu ấʔi dượk tônviɲ dờʔidờʔi dể ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê kwân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên kòn ɲà Ðʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk dứŋ vữŋ cướk cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi cúʔa kó bàʔitỏ cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa zằŋ cúʔa káʔi ɲà cɔ ŋườʔi bởʔi dó cɔnên tôʔitớ cúʔa zám kầʔuŋwiện cướk cúʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa diềʔu làɲ nầʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa tʰếtʰì năj kầʔusin cúʔa fướk ɲà tôʔitớ cúʔa hầʔu cɔ hằŋ kòn cướk cúʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi fướk cɔ tʰì dượk fướk dến dờʔidờʔi săw việk ấʔi Ðʔa dáɲ zân filitin fụk cúŋnó dɔạt lấʔi xỏʔi tăj cúŋnó tʰàɲ ɣát kák hươŋtʰôn ŋườʔi kũŋ dáɲ môáp zân môáp fụkzịc Ðʔa tiếnkốŋ cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔa dáɲ hadazêsɛ vwa sôba tạʔi hamát xi ŋườʔi dươŋ di nướk mìɲ cên sôŋ fơzát Ðʔa ciếm lấʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi mộtŋàn kỗ sɛ bảʔi ŋàn líɲ haj líɲ Ðʔa kắt ɲượŋ kủʔa kák ŋựʔa kéʔɔ sɛ zwi cừʔa lạʔi mộtcăm kɔn zânsi zi Ðʔa mác dến kứʔuzúp hadazêsɛ vwa sôba Ðʔa ɣiết cúŋ haj haj ŋàn ŋườʔi Ðʔa dồn cɔŋ sizi kủʔa Ðʔa mác zân sizi fụkzịc ŋườʔi dɛm tʰuế cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔa di dến dâʔu tʰì Ðứkzê kũŋ xiến cɔ ŋườʔi dượk tʰắŋ Ðʔa dɔạt ɲữŋ xiên vàŋ kủʔa kák dầʔitớ hadazêsɛ zồʔi dɛm ɣiêzusalɛm từti kun haj tʰàɲ kủʔa hadazêsɛ Ðʔa lạʔi dɔạt lấʔi ɲiềʔu dồŋ salômôn zùŋ káʔi dồŋ kák cụ cậʔu bằŋ dồŋ xitô vwa hamát hăj zằŋ Ðʔa dã dáɲ kả dộʔi biɲ kủʔa hadazêsɛ vwa sôba tʰì saj hadôzam kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến càʔɔmừŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðʔa bởʔi ŋườʔi dã ciɲciến vớʔi hadazêsɛ dã dáɲ ŋườʔi hadazêsɛ tôhu tʰườŋ dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi ɲăw tôhu kũŋ ɣởʔi dến kák tʰứ cậʔu bằŋ vàŋ bạk dồŋ kák dồ ấʔi Ðʔa kũŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê vớʔi bạk vàŋ ŋườʔi dã dɔạt lấʔi dɛm kák zântộk tứk dôm môáp zân ʔammôn zân filitin zân ʔamalék vảlạʔi ʔabisaj kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza dáɲ ɣiết tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ muốʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi dôm ŋườʔi dặt dồn tạʔi dôm kả zân dôm dềʔu fảʔi fụkzịc Ðʔa Ðʔa di dến dâʔu tʰì Ðứkzê kũŋ xiến cɔ ŋườʔi dượk tʰắŋ Ðʔa vwa cên kả ʔisơzaên lấʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ kôŋbìɲ sử vớʔi zânsự kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza tʰốŋlãɲ dộʔi biɲ ɣiôsafát kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahilút kwan tʰáʔi sadốk kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahitúp ʔabimêlék kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabiətʰa tʰầʔi savêsa kwan kýlụk bênaza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêhôzada kaikwản ŋườʔi kêzêtʰít ŋườʔi fêlêtʰít kòn kák kɔncaj Ðʔa dềʔu kwan dạʔitʰần ɣần vwa săw kák việk dó nahác vwa zân ʔammôn băŋà kɔncaj ŋườʔi ŋườʔilàm vwa Ðʔa nóʔi ta cɔ hanun kɔncaj kủʔa nahác ca ŋườʔi dã cɔ Ðʔa saj ɲữŋ sứɣiả dến ʔanủʔi ŋườʔi ca ŋườʔi dã băŋà vậʔi kák dầʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa dếnkùŋ hanun tạʔi cɔŋ sứ zân ʔammôn dặŋ ʔanủʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ kák kwan cưởŋ zân ʔammôn tâʔu vớʔi hanun zằŋ vwa kó tưởŋ zằŋ Ðʔa saj ɲữŋ ʔanủʔi dếnkùŋ vwa tônkíɲ tʰân fụ vwa saw kák dầʔitớ dếnkùŋ vwa cẳŋ fảʔi dể casét zɔtʰám sứ hầʔu cɔ hủʔi fá saw hanun kák tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðʔa bảʔɔ kạʔɔ zâʔu di kắt áʔɔ cặŋ fânnửʔa cɔdến lưŋ zồʔi duổʔi kó ŋườʔi di tʰuật cɔ Ðʔa hăj việk kák ŋươʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi saj di dón kák ŋươʔi ấʔi sấʔuhổ vwa bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi tạʔi ɣiêzicô cɔdến xi zâʔu kák ŋươʔi dã mọk bấʔizờ cởvề xi zân ʔammôn tʰấʔi Ðʔa lấʔi ɣớmɣiếk tʰì hanun zân ʔammôn saj ŋườʔi dɛm mộtŋàn lâŋ bạk dặŋ di dến mêsôbôtami ʔazammaaka sôba cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ sɛcộ kwân cúŋ cɔ mìɲ bavạɲaj ŋàn kỗ sɛ vwa sứ maaka vớʔi zân ŋườʔi kéʔɔ dến dóŋ tạʔi cướk mêdêba zânam kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ɲóm lạʔi dặŋ za cận Ðʔa hăj diềʔu dó saj ɣiôáp kả dạʔɔ biɲ dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn zânam kéʔɔ za zàn cận nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kòn kák vwa dã dến fùcợ dềʔu dóŋ ziêŋ za cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ xizô tʰấʔi kwântʰù dã bàʔi cận dằŋ cướk dằŋ săw mìɲ cọn ɲữŋ mạɲzạn cɔŋ dộʔi kwân ʔisơzaên zàn cận dốʔi kùŋ kwân sizi kwânlíɲ kòn lạʔi ŋườʔi fú cɔ ʔabisaj ʔɛm mìɲ cúŋ bàʔi cận dốʔivớʔi zân ʔammôn ŋườʔi nóʔi nếʔu kwân sizi mạɲ ʔɛɲ ʔɛm ɣiúpdỡ ʔɛɲ kòn nếʔu kwân ʔammôn mạɲ ʔɛm ʔɛɲ ɣiúpdỡ ʔɛm xá vữŋlòŋ bềncí hãʔi zân kák tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲư kác dạʔicượŋfu ŋwiện Ðứkzê tʰeo ŋàʔi lấʔilàm vậʔi ɣiôáp kwânlíɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu dến ɣần dốʔi kùŋ kwân sizi dặŋ zawciến kwân sizi cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk ŋườʔi xicwân ʔammôn tʰấʔi kwân sizi dã cạʔi cốn tʰì kũŋ cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk ʔabisaj ʔɛm ɣiôáp cở vàʔɔ tʰàɲ ɣiôáp cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm xicwân sizi tʰấʔi mìɲ tʰwa cướk ʔisơzaên saj sứɣiả dến bởʔi zân sizi kiə sôŋ za kó sôfák kwan tướŋ kủʔa dộʔi biɲ hadazêsɛ kwản lãɲ cúŋnó Ðʔa hăj diềʔu dó ɲóm kả ʔisơzaên saŋ kwa sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ dếnkùŋ kwân sizi zàn cận ŋịc kùŋ cúŋnó vậʔi xi Ðʔa dã bàʔi cận dốʔivớʔi zân sizi tʰì cúŋnó dáɲ lạʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kwânsi zi cạʔi cốn xỏʔi cướk ʔisơzaên Ðʔa ɣiết kủʔa kwân sizi bảʔi ŋàn líɲ kầm sɛ líɲ kũŋ ɣiết sôfák kwan tổŋbiɲ xi kák dầʔitớ kủʔa hadazêsɛ tʰấʔi cúŋ bạʔi cướk ʔisơzaên hòʔa kùŋ Ðʔa fụkzịc ŋườʔi săw zân sizi cẳŋ kòn tiếpkứʔu zân ʔammôn nữʔa kwa mớʔi lúk kák vwa tʰườŋ za dáɲ ɣiặk ɣiôáp kầm dộʔi biɲ kéʔɔ za fáhwaŋ sứ zân ʔammôn ŋườʔi dến vâʔi tʰàɲ zápba kòn Ðʔa tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiôáp dáɲ zápba fáhủʔi Ðʔa lấʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên kủʔa vwa zân ʔammôn xỏʔi dầʔu ŋườʔi kân dượk lâŋ vàŋ cên kó ɲữŋ ŋọk báʔu lấʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên ấʔi dộʔi cên dầʔu Ðʔa lạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi lấʔi za zất ɲiềʔu kủʔa kướp kòn zânsự cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi dɛm za kắt sẻ za hɔặk bằŋ kưʔa hɔặk bằŋ bừʔa hăjlà bằŋ zìʔu Ðʔa ɲưvậʔi cɔ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa zân ʔammôn Ðʔɔạn Ðʔa kả kwânlíɲ dềʔu cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm săw việk dó sảʔi kó ciɲciến vớʔi zân filitin tạʔi ɣêsɛ xi ấʔi sibêkaj ŋườʔi husatít dáɲ ɣiết sípbaj tʰuộk cɔŋ zòŋ xổŋlồ cúŋ swi fụk lạʔi kòn ɣiặkzã vớʔi zân filitin nữʔa ʔɛâɲanan kɔncaj kủʔa zajzơ dáɲ ɣiết lákmi ʔɛm kủʔa ɣôliát ŋườʔi ɣát káʔi kán ɣiáʔɔ ŋườʔilớn ɲư kâʔi cụk kủʔa tʰợ zệt lạʔi kòn cận dáɲ nữʔa tạʔi ɣát dó kó ŋườʔi tướŋtá kaw kó mỗʔi tăj sáʔu ŋón mỗʔi cân sáʔu ŋón hếttʰảʔi haimươʔi ŋón kũŋ tʰuộk zòŋ xổŋlồ hắn sỉɲụk ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj kủʔa simê ʔa ʔɛm kủʔa Ðʔa dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi ɲữŋ dó dềʔu tʰuộk zòŋ xổŋlồ tạʔi ɣát cúŋ dềʔu tăj Ðʔa tăj kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi ɣiết di satan zấʔi hạʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên ɣiụk Ðʔa lấʔi ʔisơzaên Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôáp kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự zằŋ hãʔi di lấʔi zânsự bê ʔɛsêba cɔdến Ðʔan zồʔi dɛm tâʔu lạʔi cɔ dể ɣiôáp tʰưʔa ŋwiệnÐứkzê za tʰêm zânsự ŋàʔi ɲiềʔu ɣấp căm dã kó Ôʔi vwɛcúʔa tôʔi hếttʰảʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ fảʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi saw kớsaw cúʔa tôʔi zạʔibảʔɔ diềʔu dó ɲơn saw cúʔa tôʔi ɣâʔi tộʔilỗʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ lờʔi kủʔa vwa tʰắŋ lờʔi kủʔa ɣiôáp vìvậʔi ɣiôáp za di xắp ʔisơzaên zồʔi cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiôáp dɛm tâʔu cɔ vwa tổŋsố zân cɔŋ kả ʔisơzaên dượk mộtcăm mườʔi ŋườʔi kầm ɣươm cɔŋ kả zuda dượk mươʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi kầm ɣươm ɲưŋzô kó kaj ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin lờʔi kủʔa vwa lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó cẳŋ dẹplòŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi hàɲ hạʔi ʔisơzaên Ðʔa tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi diềʔu dó tʰậtlà fạmtộʔi ɲưŋ bâʔizờ sin cúʔa hãʔi bỏkwa tộʔiák kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa di tôʔi kó kác ŋuzạʔi Ðứkzê fán vớʔi ɣát dấŋ kủʔa Ðʔa zằŋ hãʔi di nóʔi kùŋ Ðʔa Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi ta dịɲ cɔ ŋươʔi tajvạ hãʔi cọn lấʔi dể ɣiáŋ cên ŋươʔi ɣát dếnkùŋ Ðʔa tʰưʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi cọn mặký ŋươʔi hɔặk dóʔicém hɔặk tʰwa batʰáŋ tạʔi cướk kừʔudịc ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣươm kủʔa tʰùŋịc fáhạʔi hăjlà ŋàʔi ɣươm kủʔa Ðứkzê tứklà ônzịc cɔŋ sứ kó tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê hủʔiziệt cɔŋ xắp bờkõʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi dịɲ lấʔi diềʔu nàʔɔ tôʔi fảʔi tâʔu lạʔi kùŋ Ðấŋ dã saj tôʔi Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi ɣát zằŋ ta hɔạnnạn ta sin vàʔɔ tăj Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót kủʔa ŋàʔi zất cớ dể vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa lɔàʔi ŋườʔita Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ ônzịc nơʔi ʔisơzaên kó bảʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ŋã cết Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj tʰiênsứ dến ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ hủʔiziệt dươŋ xi hủʔiziệt Ðứkzê sɛm tʰấʔi Ðứkzê sɛm tʰấʔi tiếk việk tajvạ nầʔi nóʔi vớʔi tʰiênsứ di hủʔiziệt zằŋ tʰôʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi zút tăj ŋươʔi lạʔi bấʔizờ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dứŋ ɣần dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔɔï ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít Ðʔa ŋướk tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê dứŋ ɣiữʔa lừŋ cờʔi tăikầm ɣươm dưʔa za cên ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dươŋ mặk baw ɣaj mìɲ suốŋ dất Ðʔa tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ há cẳŋ fảʔi tôʔi dã cwiền lấʔi zân saw Ấʔilà tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi diềʔu ák kòn kák kɔnciên kiə dã làmci ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin tăj cúʔa hãʔi dáɲ hạʔi tôʔi ɲà ca tôʔi ɲưŋ cớ ɣiáŋ ônzịc cên zânsự kủʔa cúʔa hàɲ hạʔi xi ấʔi tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê bảʔɔ ɣát nóʔi vớʔi Ðʔa fảʔi di zựŋ bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔɔï ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít Ðʔa di tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ɣát dã ɲânzɛɲ Ðứkzê nóʔi za ʔɔï sâʔi lạʔi tʰấʔi tʰiênsứ kɔncaj ŋườʔiở vớʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu mìɲ di vả bấʔizờ ʔɔï dươŋ dạp lúʔa Ðʔa di dến ʔɔï ʔɔï ɲìn tʰấʔi Ðʔa za xỏʔi dạp lúʔa mìɲ suốŋ dất cướk Ðʔa lạʔi Ðʔa bảʔɔ ʔɔï zằŋ hãʔi ɲượŋ cɔ cỗ dạp lúʔa dể kất tạʔi dó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi ɲượŋ cɔ tʰật ɣiá bạk hầʔu tajvạ ŋừŋ lạʔi cɔŋ zânsự ʔɔï tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðʔa zằŋ vwa hãʔi ɲận lấʔi sin vwɛcúʔa tôʔi hãʔi diềʔu ɣì ŋườʔi lấʔilàm kìʔa tôʔi zâŋ cɔ vwa zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kộ dạp lúʔa zùŋ kủʔi kòn lúʔa dể zùŋ kủʔa căj tôʔi zâŋ cɔ kả vwa Ðʔa nóʔi kùŋ ʔɔï zằŋ xôŋ tʰật mwa tʰeo ɣiá bạk tʰật cẳŋ lấʔi ɣì kủʔa ŋươʔi zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kũŋ xôŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cẳŋ ci kả Ấʔi vậʔi Ðʔa mwa káʔi cỗ ấʔi cả cɔ ʔɔï ɣiá bằŋ siếk kân nặŋ sáʔu căm siếk tạʔi dó Ðʔa kất bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa bìɲan kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dáp lờʔi ŋườʔi bằŋ lửʔa cờʔizáŋ suốŋ cên bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu Ðứkzê zạʔibảʔɔ tʰiênsứ tʰiênsứ sỏ ɣươm mìɲ vàʔɔ cɔŋ lúk dó Ðʔa tʰấʔi Ðứkzê dã ɲậm lờʔi mìɲ tạʔi cɔŋ dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔɔï ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít tʰì ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa tạʔi dó vì káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê môʔisɛ dã cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ káʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔŋ lúk dó dềʔu nơʔi kaw tạʔi ɣabaôn Ðʔa xôŋ zám di dến cướk bàntʰờ ấʔi dặŋ kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bởʔivì ŋườʔi kiɲhãʔi ɣươm kủʔa tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔa nóʔi Ấʔi dâʔi dền kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dâʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðʔa tʰờ lạʔi ɲóm kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔŋ sứ ʔisơzaên zồʔi ŋườʔi xiến cợ dụk dá dặŋ ɲữŋ dá dụk hầʔu kất káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðʔa kũŋ zựbị ɲiềʔu dườŋ diɲ káɲ kửʔa mấʔu kửʔa kùŋ ɲiềʔu dồŋ xôŋtʰể kân dượk ɣỗ hươŋ zân sidôn zân tizơ cở zất ɲiềʔu ɣỗ hươŋ dến cɔ vwa Ðʔa Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ salômôn kɔncaj hãʔi kòn tʰơấʔu nɔnnớt káʔi dền kất cɔ Ðứkzê fảʔi zất ŋwiŋa kó zɛɲtiếŋ zựkzỡ cɔŋ kák nướk vìvậʔi zựbị dồ kần zùŋ cɔ tʰếtʰì Ðʔa zựbị zất ɲiềʔu dồ cướk xi ŋườʔi kwadờʔi bấʔizờ Ðʔa ɣọʔi salômôn kɔncaj mìɲ cwiền zặn ŋườʔi kất káʔi dền cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi salômôn zằŋ hỡʔi kɔn kó sâʔicất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưŋ kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi dã dổ hwiết za ɲiềʔu dáɲ ɲữŋ ɣiặk lớnlaw vậʔi ŋươʔi dã dổ hwiết za ɲiềʔu cên dất tạʔi cướk nênŋườʔi cẳŋ kất dền cɔ zɛɲ kìʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi sɛɲ za ŋườʔi tʰáʔibìɲ bìɲan cɔ kơn tʰịɲnộ fíʔa cẳŋ xuấʔizốʔi salômôn cɔŋ dờʔi tʰáʔibìɲ ʔan tịɲ cɔ ʔisơzaên nó kất dền cɔ zɛɲ kɔncaj ca ŋôʔi nướk cên ʔisơzaên dượk bềnvữŋ dờʔidờʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi kɔncaj ŋwiện Ðứkzê kùŋ kɔn cɔ kɔn dượk hɛɲtʰôŋ kɔn kất káʔi dền cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kɔn tʰeo ɲư lờʔi ŋàʔi dã fán việk kɔn ŋwiệnÐứkzê cɔ kɔn xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ xiến cɔ kɔn kaicị cên ʔisơzaên dể kɔn ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kɔn nếʔu kɔn kảmtạ tʰeo kák luậtfáp mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê dã fán zặn môʔisɛ cwiền cɔ ʔisơzaên tʰì kɔn dượk hɛɲtʰôŋ xá vữŋlòŋ bềncí cớ cớ kiɲhãʔi ci năj dã cịʔu hɔạnnạn sắmsửʔa cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê mườʔi lâŋ vàŋ mộtcăm lâŋ bạk kòn dồŋ tʰì xôŋtʰể kân dượk ɲiềʔu kwá lạʔi zựbị ɣỗ dá kɔn kũŋ tʰêm vàʔɔ dó vảlạʔi kɔn kó ɲiềʔu ɲânkôŋ tʰợ dụk dá tʰợhồ tʰợmộk dủ ŋườʔi tʰạʔɔ kák tʰứ kôŋviệk vàŋ bạk dồŋ tʰì hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi Ðứkzê kùŋ kɔn Ðʔa kũŋ cwiền zặn kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɣiúpdỡ salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kùŋ kák ŋươʔi saw ŋàʔi cẳŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi dượk bìɲan fíʔa saw vìŋàʔi dã fó zân kủʔa sứ vàʔɔ tăj sứ dã swi fụk cướk Ðứkzê cướk zânsự ŋàʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi hếtlòŋ kầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi sâʔicất dền tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể zướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê kák xí zụŋ kủʔa dền tʰáɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà twan kất cɔ zɛɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔa dã ɣià kawtuổʔi salômôn kɔncaj mìɲ vwa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi ɲóm kák kwan cưởŋ ʔisơzaên kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔita lấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi bamươʔi tuổʔi cởlên kủʔa kứ dếm từŋ ŋườʔi dượk ŋàn cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi ấʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi dượk kắt kaikwản kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkzê sáʔu ŋàn ŋườʔi dềʔu kwan dốklý kwan sét kòn ŋàn ŋườʔi dềʔu kɛɲ kửʔa ŋàn ŋườʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê bằŋ ɲạkxí kủʔa Ðʔa dã dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðʔa fân từŋ tʰứ tʰeo kɔncaj lêvi ɣẹtsôn kêhát mêzazi về kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn kó laêdan simê ʔi kɔncaj kủʔa laêdan ɣiêhiên cưởŋ sêtʰam ɣiôên ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa simê ʔi sêlômít hasiên hazan ŋườʔi kák cưởŋ kủʔa tôŋtộk laêdan kɔncaj kủʔa simê ʔi zahát sina ɣiêúk bêzi ʔa Ấʔilà kɔncaj kủʔa simê ʔi zahát cưởŋ kòn sisa kɔntʰứ ɲưŋ ɣiêúk bêzi ʔa xôŋ kó kɔncáʔu ɲiềʔu xi lấʔi tʰì cúŋ ɲư ɲà kɔncaj kêhát ʔamzam zítsêha hếpzôn ʔusiên ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamzam ʔazôn môʔisɛ ʔazôn kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi dượk fânbiệt za dể ziêŋ za kák cí tʰáɲ dờʔidờʔi sôŋ hươŋ hầʔu việk cướk Ðứkzê kùŋ ɲânzɛɲ ŋàʔi cúk fướk cɔ kòn môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dềʔu dượk vàʔɔ cifáʔi lêvi kɔncaj kủʔa môʔisɛ ɣẹtsôn liêsɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣẹtsôn sêbuên cưởŋ kɔncaj kủʔa liêsɛ zêhabiə cưởŋ liêsɛ xôŋ kó kɔncaj nàʔɔ xák ɲưŋ kɔncaj kủʔa zêhabiə ɲiềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa zítsêha sêlômít cưởŋ kɔncaj kủʔa hếpzôn ɣiêziza cưởŋ ʔamaziə tʰứ ɲì zahasiên tʰứba ɣiêkamêʔam tʰứtư kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusiên mica cưởŋ zisiza kɔntʰứ kɔncaj kủʔa mêzazi mákli musi kɔncaj kủʔa mákli lêʔasa kíc lêʔasa cết xôŋ kó kɔncaj cỉ kó kɔŋáʔi tʰôʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa kíc ʔɛɲɛm cúŋnó kướʔi cúŋnó kɔncaj kủʔa musi mákli dɛ ɣiêzêmốt ŋườʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa lêvi tʰeo tôŋtộk kủʔa tứklà cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dượk kaj từŋ zɛɲ từŋ ŋườʔi haimươʔi tuổʔi hầʔu việk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê vìÐʔa nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó bìɲan cɔ zânsự ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ŋự tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dờʔidờʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kũŋ cẳŋ kòn kần xiêŋvák dền hăjlà kák xí zụŋ kôŋviệk dền nữʔa vì tʰeo lờʔi cốʔi kủʔa Ðʔa ŋườʔita zân lêvi haimươʔi tuổʔi cứk kủʔa cúŋ kɔncáʔu ʔazôn dặŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkzê kɛɲzữ hàɲlaŋ kák fòŋ ɣiữ tiɲ sạc kák tʰáɲ kɔj kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi lɔ báɲ cầntʰiết zùŋ kủʔa căj báɲcáŋ xôŋ mɛn dồ nướŋ cên dồ cộn vớʔi zầʔu kák dồ dể lườŋ dể dɔ mỗʔi buổʔi buổʔi ciềʔu fảʔi dứŋ tạʔi dó kảmtạ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê kòn mỗʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ ŋàʔi cọŋtʰể tʰìfảʔi ɣiúp zâŋ tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰườŋ zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰeo dã dịɲ cɔŋ kủʔa ấʔi cúŋ kũŋ lɔ kɔjsók hộʔi mạk nơʔi tʰáɲ kùŋ ɣiúpdỡ kɔncáʔu ʔazôn ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dặŋ hầʔu việk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê nầʔi tʰứ kủʔa kɔncáʔu ʔazôn kɔncaj kủʔa ʔazôn nadáp ʔabihu lêʔasa ʔitʰama nadáp ʔabihu cết cướk ca kủʔa cúŋ xôŋ kó kɔn lêʔasa ʔitʰama cứk tʰầʔi Ðʔa xiến sadốk kɔncáʔu lêʔasa ʔahimêlék kɔncáʔu ʔitʰama fânban tʰứ cɔ cúŋ tùʔi tʰeo cứkviệk cúŋ cɔŋ kɔnkáʔi lêʔasa kó ɲiềʔu cưởŋtộk cɔŋ kɔncáʔu ʔitʰama fânban tʰứ ɲư kɔncáʔu lêʔasa kó mườʔisáʔu cưởŋtộk ŋườʔita bắttʰăm fân cúŋ từŋ tʰứ hɔặk ŋườʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi kiə kák cưởŋ kủʔa nơʔi tʰáɲ kák cưởŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dềʔu tʰuộk cɔŋ kɔncáʔu lêʔasa cɔŋ kɔncáʔu ʔitʰama sêmaza kɔncaj kủʔa natʰanaên ŋườʔi kýlụk tʰuộk cɔŋ cifáʔi lêvi cúŋ vàʔɔsổ tạʔi cướk vwa cướk kák kwan cưởŋ cướk tʰầʔi sadốk ʔahimêlék kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabiətʰa cướk kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ kɔncáʔu lêʔasa bắttʰăm lấʔi họhàŋ zồʔi cɔŋ kɔncáʔu ʔitʰama kũŋ bắttʰăm lấʔi họhàŋ káʔi tʰứ ɲứt cúŋ ɲằm ɣiêhôzazíp káʔi tʰăm tʰứ ɲì ɲằm ɣiêdaêza káʔi tʰăm tʰứba ɲằm hazim káʔi tʰăm tʰứtư ɲằm sêôzim káʔi tʰăm tʰứnăm ɲằm mɛɲkiə káʔi tʰăm tʰứsáʔu ɲằm miəmin káʔi tʰăm tʰứbảʔi ɲằm kốt káʔi tʰăm tʰứ ɲằm ʔabiza káʔi tʰăm tʰứ cín ɲằm ɣiêswa káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔi ɲằm sêkaniə káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔimột ɲằm liəsíp káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔihaj ɲằm zakim káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔiba ɲằm húpba káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔibốn ɲằm ɣiêsêbáp káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔilăm ɲằm biɲɣa káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔisáʔu ɲằm ʔimê káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔibảʔi ɲằm hêsiə káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔitám ɲằm fisết káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔi cín ɲằm fêtahiə káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm sêciên káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm zakin káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔihaj ɲằm ɣamun káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm laza káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm maasiə Ấʔi dó tʰứ kủʔa cúŋ cɔŋ cứkviệk mìɲ dặŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa ʔazôn tổfụ cúŋ dã cwiền cɔ ʔiɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fán zặn ŋườʔi nầʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa lêvi kòn lạʔi kɔncáʔu ʔamzam kó subaên kɔncáʔu subaên kó ɣiêdiə về kɔncáʔu zêhabiə kó zisiza cưởŋ cɔŋ kɔncáʔu zítsêha kó sêlômốt kɔncáʔu sêlômốt kó zahát về kɔncáʔu hếpzôn kó ɣiêziza kɔn cưởŋ ʔamaziə tʰứ ɲì zahasiên tʰứba zakamêʔam tʰứtư về kɔncáʔu ʔusiên kó mica kɔncáʔu mica kó samiə ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa mica zítʰiza kɔncáʔu zítʰiza kó sɛcazi kɔncaj mêzazi mákli musi kɔncaj zaasiza bênô kɔncáʔu kủʔa mêzazi bênô sôham sákkwa ʔibêzi dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa zaasiza kɔncaj kủʔa mákli lêʔasa ŋườʔi xôŋ kó kɔncaj về kɔncáʔu kíc kó ɣiêzákmêên kɔncaj kủʔa musi mákli dɛ ɣiêzimốt Ấʔi dó kɔncáʔu lêvi tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk kủʔa cúŋ cúŋ kũŋɲư ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kɔncáʔu ʔazôn bắttʰăm tạʔi cướk vwa Ðʔa sadốk ʔahimêlék kùŋ cướk kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kák cưởŋtộk kũŋ fảʔi bắttʰăm ɲư kák ʔɛmút mìɲ Ðʔa kák kwan tướŋ dộʔi biɲ kũŋ dể ziêŋ za mấʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔasáp hêman ɣiêdutʰun hầʔu fụkzịc lấʔi dờn kầm dờn cập cỏʔa dặŋ nóʔi tiênci ŋườʔi fụk tʰeo cứk kủʔa ɲư săw nầʔi về kɔncaj ʔasáp kó sákkwa ɣiôsép nêtʰaniə ʔasazêla dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasáp zướʔi tăj ʔasáp kaikwản vâŋ tʰeo cỉ kủʔa vwa kasướŋ về kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêdutʰun kó ɣêdaliə simê ʔi sáʔu ŋườʔi dềʔu zướʔi kwiền kaikwản kủʔa ca cúŋ ɣiêdutʰun zùŋ dờn kầm nóʔi tiênci kảmtạ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê về kɔncaj kủʔa hêman kó búkkiza matʰaniə ʔusiên sêbuên ɣiêzimốt hananiə hanani liətʰa ɣidɛɲtʰi zômamti sɛ ɣiốtbêkasa malôtʰi hôtʰiə mahasiốt ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa hêman tʰổʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hêman vâŋ mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dấŋ kủʔa vwa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ hêman dượk mườʔibốn kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dềʔu zướʔi kwiền kaikwản kủʔa ca mìɲ ʔasáp ɣiêdutʰun hêman dể ka sướŋ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê vớʔi cập cỏʔa dờn dờn kầm fụk tạʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa vwa cúŋ vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kó họktập cɔŋ ŋề kahát cɔ Ðứkzê tứklà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋtʰạʔɔ dượk haj căm mươʔi ŋườʔi cúŋ dềʔu bắttʰăm tʰứ mìɲ ŋườʔilớn ɲư ɲỏ ŋườʔi tʰôŋtʰạʔɔ ɲư họktập káʔi tʰăm tʰứ ɲứt ɲằm cɔ ɣiôsép zòŋ ʔasáp káʔi tʰăm tʰứ ɲì ɲằm ɣêdaliə ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm kɔncaj ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứba ɲằm sákkwa kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứtư ɲằm zítsêzi kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứnăm ɲằm nêtʰaniə kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứsáʔu ɲằm búkkiza kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứbảʔi ɲằm ɣiêsazêla kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ ɲằm saj kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ cín ɲằm matʰaniə kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔi ɲằm simê ʔi kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔimột ɲằm ʔasazên kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔihaj ɲằm hasabiə kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔiba ɲằm subaên kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔibốn ɲằm matitʰiə kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔilăm ɲằm ɣiêzêmốt kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰừ mườʔisáʔu ɲằm hananiə kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔibảʔi ɲằm ɣiốtbêkasa kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔitám ɲằm hanani kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ mườʔi cín ɲằm malôtʰi kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm lizata kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm hôtʰiə kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔihaj ɲằm ɣidɛɲtʰi kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm mahasiốt kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi káʔi tʰăm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm zômanti sɛ kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kộŋ dượk mườʔihaj ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tʰứ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa ɲư săw nầʔi zòŋ kôzê kó mêsêlêmiə kɔncaj kủʔa kôzê cáʔu kủʔa ʔasáp mêsêlêmiə kó ɲữŋ kɔncaj sɛcazi kɔn cưởŋ ɣiêdiəên tʰứ ɲì sêbadiə tʰứba ɣiátniên tʰứtư tʰứnăm ɣiôhanan tʰứsáʔu liôênaj tʰứbảʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa dôm sêmaza kɔn cưởŋ ɣiêhôsabát tʰứ ɲì ɣiô ʔa tʰứba saka tʰứtư nêtanên tʰứnăm ʔamiên tʰứsáʔu ʔisaka tʰứbảʔi fê ʔulêtaj tʰứ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fướk cɔ dôm sêmaza kɔncaj dôm kũŋ sɛɲ ɲữŋ kɔncaj kó kwiền kaikwản tôŋtộk mìɲ cúŋ dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kák kɔncaj kủʔa sêmaza ʔɔátni zêfaên ʔɛânsabát ʔɛɲɛm sêmakiə dềʔu mạɲzạn kák ŋườʔi dó kɔncáʔu kủʔa dôm vớʔi kák kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn tʰạʔɔ cứkviệk mìɲ kộŋ dượk sáʔu mươʔi haj ŋườʔi tʰuộk zòŋ dôm mêsêlêmiə kó ɲữŋ kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kộŋ dượk mườʔitám ŋườʔi hôsa tʰuộk cɔŋ zòŋ mêzazi kũŋ kó ɲữŋ kɔncaj simzi cưởŋ zầʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ fảʔi sɛɲ za dầʔulòŋ ca ŋườʔi ŋườʔilàm kɔn cưởŋ hiɲkiə tʰứ ɲì têbaliə tʰứba sɛcazi tʰứtư hếttʰảʔi kɔncaj ʔɛɲ kủʔa hôsa dượk mườʔiba ŋườʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi cưởŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ ɣiữ kửʔa tʰeo tʰứ hầʔu việk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ʔiɲư ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ vậʔi cúŋ tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ bắttʰăm mỗʔi kửʔa ɲỏ ɲư ŋườʔilớn káʔi tʰăm kửʔa dôŋ cúŋ ɲằm sêlêmiə Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔita bỏtʰăm kửʔa bắk tʰăm ấʔi cúŋ ɲằm sɛcazi kɔncaj sêlêmiə mưʔusĩ tʰôŋ sáŋ káʔi tʰăm kửʔa cúŋ ɲằm dôm kòn kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kɛɲzữ xɔ lươŋ fạn súpbim hôsa bắttʰăm dượk kửʔa tâʔi ɣần kửʔa salêkết nơʔi kɔn dườŋ di zốk fiên kɛɲ dốʔivớʔi ɲăw mỗʔi ŋàʔi kửʔa dôŋ kó sáʔu ŋườʔi lêvi kửʔa bắk ŋườʔi kửʔa ŋườʔi nơʔi xɔ lươŋ fạn mỗʔi kửʔa haj ŋườʔi tạʔibạt fíʔa tâʔi kũŋ kó kɛɲzữ cên kɔn dườŋ kó ŋườʔi tạʔi cíɲ bạtba kó haj ŋườʔi tʰứ kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa dềʔu kɔncáʔu kôzê kɔncáʔu mêzazi cɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi kó ʔahiza kwảnlý xuŋ tʰàɲ kák tʰáɲ kɔncáʔu laêdan tʰuộk zòŋzõʔi ɣẹtsôn cưởŋ cɔŋ tôŋtộk kủʔa laêdan kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn ɣiêhiêli kák kɔncaj ɣiêhiêli sêtʰam ɣiôên ʔɛm ŋườʔi dượk kắt kwảnlý xuŋtʰàɲ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê cɔŋ zòŋ ʔamzam zòŋ zítsêha zòŋ hếpzôn zòŋ ʔusiên kó sêbuên kɔncáʔu ɣẹtsôn kɔncaj kủʔa môʔisɛ kwan kaikwản xuŋtʰàɲ lạʔi kó ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa liêsɛ zêhabiə kɔncaj liêsɛ saj kɔncaj zêhabiə ɣiôzam kɔncaj saj siếkzi kɔncaj ɣiôzam sêlômít kɔncaj siếkzi sêlômít nầʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dềʔu kwảnlý kák tʰáɲ vwa Ðʔa kák cưởŋtộk kwan tướŋ kaj ŋàn kwân kaj căm kwân kùŋ kák tướŋ dộʔi biɲ dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cúŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ ɲữŋ kủʔakảʔi dã dɔạt lấʔi xi ciếncận dặŋ zùŋ sâʔi sửʔa dền Ðứkzê lạʔi kák samuên dấŋ săwlơ kɔncaj kủʔa kíc nɛ kɔncaj kủʔa nêzơ ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ kùŋ kák xôŋ kứ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dềʔu zướʔi tăj sêlômít kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔicwảnlý cɔŋ zòŋ zítsêha kó kênaniə kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dượk kwan cưởŋ kwan sét dặŋ kaikwản kák việk ŋɔàʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ zòŋ hếpzôn kó hasabiə ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dượk mộtŋàn bảʔicăm kwảnlý zân ʔisơzaên kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ fíʔa tâʔi kɔjsók kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkzê hầʔuhạ vwa cɔŋ zòŋ hếpzôn kó ɣiêziza cưởŋ Ðươŋ tʰứ mươʔi dờʔi Ðʔa ŋườʔita kaj zòŋọ hếpzôn tùʔi tôŋtộk kủʔa cúŋ tʰấʔi ɣiữʔa vòŋ cúŋ tạʔi zaêsɛ cɔŋ sứ ɣalaát kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kák ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ɣiêziza dềʔu tăj mạɲzạn dượk haj ŋàn bảʔicăm ŋườʔi cưởŋtộk vwa Ðʔa cúŋ cên ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi ɣát cên nửʔa cifáʔi mênasɛ dặŋ kaicị kák việk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi việk kủʔa vwa Ðâʔi kủʔa ɲữŋ cưởŋtộk kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên tứk kák kwan tướŋ kaj ŋàn ŋườʔi kaj căm ŋườʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cúŋ fụk vwa kaikwản kák tʰứ kwɛɲnăm mỗʔi tʰáŋ tʰăj ɲăw di zadi vàʔɔ mỗʔi tʰứ dượk haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ kủʔa tʰứ ɲứt tʰáŋzêŋ zasôbêʔam kɔncaj kủʔa sápdiên cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ŋườʔi tʰuộk zòŋ fêzết làmdầʔu kák kwan tướŋ tʰáŋzêŋ ban cưởŋ kủʔa tʰáŋ haj daj ŋườʔi ʔahôha míclô kwan cáɲ cɔŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ kủʔa tʰứba tʰáŋ bênaza kɔncaj kủʔa tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi bênaza nầʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn cɔŋ bamươʔi ŋườʔi kiə làmdầʔu bamươʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi ʔammisadáp kɔncaj ŋườʔi kũŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứtư tʰáŋ ʔasaên ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ɣiôáp sêbadiə kɔncaj ŋườʔi tiếptʰeo ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứnăm tʰáŋ samêhút ŋườʔi ɣíca cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứsáʔu tʰáŋ sáʔu ʔiza kɔncaj ʔicɛ tʰêkô ʔa cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứbảʔi tʰáŋ bảʔi hêlết ŋườʔi cifáʔi zaim falôn cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứ tʰáŋ sibêkaj husa tʰuộk zòŋ sêzác cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứ cín tʰáŋ cín ʔabiêsɛ ŋườʔi cifáʔi bêŋiəmin ʔanatốt cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứ mườʔi tʰáŋ mườʔi mahazaj zòŋ sêzác nêtôfa cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứ mườʔimột tʰáŋ mườʔimột bênaza ŋườʔi cifáʔi zaim fizatʰôn cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi ban cưởŋ tʰứ mườʔihaj tʰáŋcạp hiêndaj zòŋ ʔɔátniên nêtôfa cɔŋ ŋườʔi kó haj ŋàn ŋườʔi Ðâʔi kák ŋườʔi kaikwản kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên liêsɛ kɔncaj siếkzi kaikwản ŋườʔi zubên ŋườʔi kaikwản ŋườʔi simêôn sêfatiə kɔncaj maaka ŋườʔi kaikwản cifáʔi lêvi hasabiə kɔncaj kủʔa kêmuên kòn sadốk kaikwản kɔncáʔu ʔazôn ŋườʔi kaikwản zuda ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa Ðʔa ŋườʔi kaikwản ʔisaka zi kɔncaj kủʔa micaên ŋườʔi kaikwản sabulôn zítmahiə kɔncaj kủʔa badiə ŋườʔi kaikwản néptali ɣiêzimốt kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaziên ŋườʔi kaikwản kɔncáʔu zaim kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasasiə ŋườʔi kaikwản nửʔa cifáʔi mênasɛ ɣiôên kɔncaj fêdaza ŋườʔi kaikwản nửʔa cifáʔi mênasɛ tạʔi sứ ɣalaát zdô kɔncaj kủʔa sɛcazi ŋườʔi kaikwản bêŋiəmin zaasiên kɔncaj nɛ ŋườʔi kaikwản Ðʔan ʔasazên kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzôham Ấʔi dó kák cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên Ðʔa xôŋ lấʔi zân ʔisơzaên haimươʔi tuổʔi suốŋ bởʔivì Ðứkzê kó hứʔa zằŋ tăŋ ʔisơzaên dôŋ ɲư saw cên cờʔi ɣiôáp kɔncaj kủʔa sêzuza xởʔi lấʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ sɔŋ dượk kớ việk dó kó kơn tʰịɲnộ ɣiáŋọʔa cên ʔisơzaên ấʔi xôŋ ɲập vàʔɔ kủʔa vwa Ðʔa Ác kɔncaj ʔadiên kaj kák xuŋtʰàɲ kủʔa vwa ɣiônatʰan kɔncaj ʔusiza kaj kák xuŋtʰàɲ dồŋzuộŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲfố cɔŋ ɲữŋ làŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ dồn zi kɔncaj kêlúp kaj kák lɔ làmzuộŋ kàʔi dất simzi ŋườʔi zama kɔjsók kák ɲɔ kòn sápdi ŋườʔi sêfam kɔjsók xɔ zượʔu cɔŋ ɲɔ bɛɲhanan ŋườʔi ɣêdɛ kɔjsók kák kâʔi livɛ kâʔi suŋ mọk cɔŋ sứ dồŋbằŋ kòn ɣiôác kɔjsók kák xɔ zầʔu sítcaj ŋườʔi sazôn kòn safát kɔncaj laj kɔjsók kák bầʔi cɔŋ cũŋ biɲ ŋườʔi Íc kɔjsók kák lạkdà ɣiêdiə ŋườʔi mêzônốt kɔjsók kák lừʔa káʔi zasít ŋườʔi haɣazít kɔjsók kák bầʔi ciên kák ŋườʔi dó dềʔu kaikwản kák sảnŋiệp kủʔa vwa Ðʔa ɣiônatʰan kậʔu kủʔa Ðʔa mưʔusĩ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ kwan kýlụk kòn ɣiêhiên kɔncaj kủʔa hákmôni ɣiáʔɔsư kák vươŋtử ʔahitôfên mưʔusĩ kủʔa vwa husaj ŋườʔi ʔaï bạɲữʔu kủʔa vwa săw ʔahitôfên kó ɣiêhôzada kɔncaj kủʔa bênaza ʔabiətʰa ɣiôáp kwan tướŋ dộʔi biɲ kủʔa vwa Ðʔa lạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm hếttʰảʔi kák kwan cưởŋ ʔisơzaên kák tộkcưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi kák cưởŋ fụk vwa kák kwan tướŋ kaj ŋàn kwân căm kwân kák kaikwản sảnŋiệp kủʔa vwa kủʔa kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi vớʔi kák hɔạnkwan ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn vwa Ðʔa dứŋzậʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm zânsự hãʔi ŋɛ ta dã kó sâʔicất káʔi dền ʔanŋỉ cɔ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ káʔi cân kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta dã tʰờ lạʔi cɔ dặŋ kất ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán vớʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cớ kất dền cɔ zɛɲ ŋườʔi tăj ciếnsĩ dã dổ hwiết za ɲiềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó cọn cɔŋ kả ɲà ca vwa ʔisơzaên dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi dã cọn zuda cưởŋ cɔŋ ɲà zuda cọn ɲà kủʔa ca ŋàʔi vujlòŋ cọn vwa cên kả ʔisơzaên vả Ðứkzê kó cɔ ɲiềʔu kɔncaj cɔŋ kák kɔncaj ấʔi ŋàʔi dã cọn salômôn kɔncaj dặt ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi nướk Ðứkzê dặŋ kaicị ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi fán vớʔi zằŋ salômôn kɔncaj kủʔa ŋươʔi kất káʔi dền kák hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dã cọn kɔncaj ca nếʔu ŋườʔi bềnlòŋ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn ɲư ŋàʔinăj tʰì cɔ nướk ŋườʔi dượk bềnvữŋ dờʔidờʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ tạʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dươŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta lắŋtaj ŋɛ sin kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiữɣìn kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dể kák ŋươʔi ɲận lấʔi sứ tốttươʔi nầʔi dể lạʔi cɔ kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi kơŋiệp dờʔidờʔi kòn ŋươʔi salômôn kɔncaj hãʔi ɲậnbiết Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca hếtlòŋ vuj fụk ŋàʔi Ðứkzê zòsét tấmlòŋ fânbiệt kák ýtưởŋ nếʔu kɔn ŋàʔi ŋàʔi cɔ kɔn ɣặp ɲưŋ nếʔu kɔn lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kɔn dờʔidờʔi bâʔizờ xá kẩntʰận Ðứkzê dã cọn kɔn dặŋ sâʔicất káʔi dền zùŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi xá mạɲzạn bấʔizờ Ðʔa caw cɔ salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi káʔi kiểʔu kửʔa dền tʰờ kák xuŋtʰàɲ lầʔu ɣák fòŋ cɔŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ tʰiân lạʔi cỉ kák kiểʔu ŋườʔi ɲờ tʰáɲliɲ kảmdộŋ dượk kák hàɲ laŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê kák fòŋ fíʔa ɲữŋ xuŋtʰàɲ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák xɔ dể tʰáɲ tʰứ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kák kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkzê kák tʰứ xí zụŋ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê kũŋ cỉ kiểʔu kân kák xí zụŋ bằŋ vàŋ zùŋ mỗʔi tʰứ kôŋviệk kák xí zụŋ bằŋ bạk vớʔi kân zùŋ mỗʔi tʰứ kôŋviệk lạʔi cỉsố kân ɲữŋ cân dèn bằŋ vàŋ ɲữŋ tʰếp dènvàŋ kủʔa tʰeo kân nổʔi kủʔa mỗʔi cân tʰếp kân ɲữŋ cân dèn bằŋ bạk tʰeo kân nổʔi kủʔa mỗʔi cân tʰếp tùʔi kác zùŋ kủʔa mỗʔi cân dèn ŋườʔi kũŋ cỉsố kân kák dể báɲ cầntʰiết bạk ɲữŋ bằŋ bạk cỉ kiểʔu nỉʔa cậʔu li bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cén vàŋ kân kủʔa mỗʔi káʔi ɲữŋ cén bạk kân kủʔa mỗʔi káʔi lạʔi cỉ kiểʔu bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ bằŋ vàŋ tʰét kó kân kiểʔu sɛ kák cê zubin káɲ za cɛ cên zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê Ðʔa nóʔi zằŋ kiểʔumẫʔu kák kôŋviệk nầʔi ɲờ tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê cép za xiến cɔ hiểʔubiết vậʔi Ðʔa lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi salômôn kɔncaj mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí cớ cớ kiɲhãʔi ci ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ca kùŋ kɔn ŋàʔi cẳŋ kɔn kũŋ cẳŋ lìʔa xỏʔi kɔn cɔdến cừŋ kák kôŋviệk kất dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dượk sɔŋ kìʔa kó kák tʰứ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dặŋ kák kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi kòn kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi vuj tʰôŋtʰạʔɔ kák ŋề dặŋ ɣiúp mọʔi tʰứ kôŋviệk kák kwan cưởŋ kả zânsự dềʔu vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa kɔn Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ zằŋ salômôn kɔncaj cỉ mộtmìɲ kɔn dó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cọn hãʔi kòn cẻ tuổʔi nɔn kôŋviệk lạʔi lớnlaw káʔi dền dó cẳŋ fảʔi cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi dâʔu cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ta dã hếtsứk cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nàʔɔ vàŋ zùŋ dồ làmbằŋ vàŋ nàʔɔ bạk zùŋ dồ làmbằŋ bạk nàʔɔ dồŋ zùŋ dồ làmbằŋ dồŋ nàʔɔ zùŋ dồ làmbằŋ nàʔɔ ɣỗ zùŋ dồ làmbằŋ ɣỗ lạʔi ɲữŋ ŋọkbíc ŋọk dể xảm ŋọk ciếʔu sáŋ ŋọk dủ kák màʔu kák tʰứ dá kwí kùŋ dá kẩmtʰạc cắŋ zất ɲiềʔu lạʔi lòŋ ʔiêʔumến dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɔạʔicừ dã cɔ dền tʰáɲ kũŋ zâŋ cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák dồ bằŋ vàŋ bằŋ bạk tʰuộk ziêŋ tứklà ŋàn lâŋ vàŋ fiə bảʔi ŋàn lâŋ bạk tʰét dặŋ zùŋ bọk kák vác dền vàŋ zùŋ kák việklàm bởʔi tăj ŋườʔi tʰợ vậʔi ŋàʔinăj ʔaj ŋườʔi vujlòŋ zâŋ mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê bấʔizờ kák cưởŋtộk kák cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên kák kwan tướŋ kaj ŋàn ŋườʔi căm ŋườʔi kák kɔjsók kôŋviệk kủʔa vwa vujlòŋ zâŋ kôŋviệk dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàn lâŋ vàŋ mườʔi ŋàn da ziếk mườʔi ŋàn lâŋ bạk mườʔitám ŋàn lâŋ dồŋ cămŋàn lâŋ fàm ʔaj kó dá kwí tʰì zaw cɔ ɣiêhiên zòŋ ɣẹtsôn dể zâŋ vàʔɔ xɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê zânsự lấʔilàm vuimừŋ diềʔu mìɲ cọn lòŋ vuj zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê vwa Ðʔa kũŋ lấʔilàm vuimừŋ tạʔi cướk kả hộʔi cúŋ Ðʔa cúk Ðứkzê zằŋ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tổfụ cúŋtôʔi ôʔi dáŋ cúk ŋàʔi cɔdến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê kawkả kwiềnnăŋ viɲkwaŋ tɔàntʰắŋ waiŋi dáŋ kwi ŋàʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi zướʔi dất dềʔu tʰuộk ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi nướk tʰuộk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dượk kaw cúʔatể kủʔa hɔặk ɣiàʔukó hɔặk viɲkwaŋ dềʔu zɔ cúʔa dến cúʔa kwảncị cên kwiềnnăŋ tʰếlựk nơʔi tăj cúʔa tăj cúʔa xiến cɔ dượk tôncọŋ sứkmạɲ cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi bâʔizờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ôʔi cúŋtôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ viɲhiển kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi ʔaj zânsự tôʔi ɣì cúŋtôʔi kó sứk zâŋ kác vujlòŋ ɲưvậʔi vì mọʔi dềʔu zɔ nơʔi cúʔa dến ɲữŋ cúŋtôʔi dã zâŋ cɔ cúʔa cẳŋkwa dã tʰuộk cúʔa vì cúŋtôʔi tạʔi cướk cúʔa ởdậʔu ɲư kák tổfụ cúŋtôʔi kák ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi tạʔi cên dất xáknàʔɔ káʔi bóŋ xôŋ mɔŋ lâʔu dượk hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ôʔi kák nầʔi cúŋtôʔi dã sắmsửʔa dể kất dền cɔ zɛɲ tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa dềʔu zɔ nơʔi tăj cúʔa dến tʰảʔi dềʔu tʰuộk cúʔa ÔʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi zằŋ cúʔa zòsét lòŋ ŋườʔita cúʔa vujvẻ ŋăitʰẳŋ về fần tôʔi tôʔi kứ tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi vujlòŋ zâŋ kák nầʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi lấʔilàm vuimừŋ tʰấʔi zânsự cúʔa dâʔi kũŋ kó zâŋ cɔ cúʔa kác vujlòŋ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham kủʔa ʔisák kủʔa ʔisơzaên tổfụ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi cɔ zânsự cúʔa ɣiữ ấʔi cɔŋ lòŋ cɔ lòŋ cúŋ ciềʔu tʰeo cúʔa sincúʔa hãʔi cɔ salômôn kɔncaj tôʔi mộtlòŋ cọnvẹn dể ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn cứŋkớ kủʔa cúʔa kùŋ cɔ kák kôŋviệk nầʔi sâʔicất káʔi dền tôʔi dã sắmsửʔa tʰờ lạʔi cɔ Ðʔa nóʔi vớʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi cúk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ ciếncận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ kúʔi dầʔu suốŋ tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi vwa kwaŋàʔi săw cúŋ zâŋ ɲữŋ cɔ Ðứkzê zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê mộtŋàn kɔn dựk mộtŋàn kɔnciên dựk mộtŋàn kɔnciên kɔn kùŋ kák kwán kặp tʰeo ɲiềʔu kủʔa xák kả zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi cúŋ ănuốŋ zất vuimừŋ tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê cúŋ tʰứ ɲì salômôn kɔncaj Ðʔa vwa ɲơn Ðứkzê sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔilàm vwɛcúʔa sadốk tʰầʔi bấʔizờ salômôn ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê vwa tʰế cɔ Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dượk hưŋ tʰạɲ kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ ŋườʔi kák kwan cưởŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn vớʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa vwa Ðʔa dềʔu fụktùŋ vwa salômôn Ðứkzê xiến cɔ salômôn dượk zất kɔicọŋ tạʔi cướk kả ʔisơzaên cɔ ŋườʔi dượk waiŋiêm dến dỗʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó vwa nàʔɔ cướk ŋườʔi dượk ɲưvậʔi Ðʔa kɔncaj ʔisaj kaicị cên kả ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi kaicị cên ʔisơzaên mươʔi tạʔi hếpzôn ŋườʔi kaicị bảʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi kaicị bamươʔi ŋườʔi băŋà tuổʔi kaw tʰỏʔaŋwiện dờʔi mìɲ ɣiàʔukó viɲhiển salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi kák kôŋviệk kủʔa vwa Ðʔa dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kủʔa samuên dấŋ cɔŋ sác kủʔa natʰan dấŋ tiênci cɔŋ sác kủʔa ɣát dấŋ kuộk cịvì ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi kák việk sảʔiza cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên cɔ kák nướk xák dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ kák sác ấʔi salômôn kɔncaj Ðʔa dượk vữŋbền cɔŋ nướk mìɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔiở kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔ ŋườʔi zất tʰạɲ vượŋ salômôn cwiềnbảʔɔ kả ʔisơzaên kák kwan tướŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi căm ŋườʔi kák kwan sét hếttʰảʔi kák cưởŋ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋtộk fảʔi dến dɔạn salômôn kả hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu di nơʔi kaw tạʔi ɣabaôn dó kó hộʔi mạk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ ɲưŋ Ðʔa dã zướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kiziátzêʔazim dếnnơʔi ŋườʔi dã zọn cɔ ŋườʔi dã zựŋ cɔ ấʔi káʔi cạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm vả cướk dền kủʔa Ðứkzê kó bàntʰờ dồŋ bếtsalêên kɔncaj ʔuzi cáʔu huzơ dã salômôn hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu dếnnơʔi dó salômôn dặt cướk Ðứkzê tạʔi hộʔi mạk zâŋ mộtŋàn kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ ấʔi cáɲ dêm ấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dếnkùŋ salômôn fán zằŋ ŋươʔi cɔ diềʔu ɣì hãʔi sin di salômôn tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ cúʔa dã zộŋ cɔ Ðʔa ca tôʔi dã dặt tôʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bâʔizờ ŋwiện cɔ lờʔi cúʔa hứʔa kùŋ Ðʔa ca tôʔi dượk ứŋŋiệm cúʔa dã tôʔi vwa zânsự nàʔi dôŋ ɲư bụʔi dất vậʔi sin cúʔa cɔ tôʔi xônŋwan citʰứk dể tôʔi zavàʔɔ cướk zânsự nàʔi ʔaj zễ sétdɔán dượk zân kủʔa cúʔa zất dôŋ zườŋ kiə Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán vớʔi salômôn zằŋ ta dã ŋươʔi vwa zânsự ŋươʔi kó lòŋ ɲưvậʔi xôŋ kó kầʔusin ɣiàʔukó kủʔakảʔi tônviɲ hăjlà mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ ɣɛŋét ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó sin sốŋ ɲưŋ lạʔi kầʔusin xônŋwan citʰứk cɔ mìɲ dể sétdɔán zânsự dã xônŋwan citʰứk cɔ ŋươʔi lạʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ɣiàʔukó kủʔakảʔi tônviɲ dến dỗʔi kák vwa cướk ŋươʔi xôŋ kó ɲưvậʔi săw ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó vwa nàʔɔ dượk ɲưtʰế Ðʔɔạn salômôn nơʔi kaw tạʔi ɣabaôn cướk hộʔi mạk cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi kaicị ʔisơzaên salômôn ɲóm ɲữŋ sɛ líɲ dượk mộtŋàn bốncăm kỗ sɛ mườʔihaj ŋàn líɲ ŋườʔi dể cɔŋ tʰàɲ cứʔa sɛ ɣần nơʔi vwa tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm vwa cɔ bạk vàŋ cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm za tʰườŋ ɲư dá sỏʔi kâʔi hươŋ ɲiềʔu ɲư kâʔi suŋ nơʔi dồŋbằŋ kòn ŋựʔa kủʔa salômôn dềʔu zíptô za kák kɔnbuôn kủʔa vwa di lãɲ mwa từŋ bầʔi mỗʔi bầʔi tʰeo ɣiá ɲấtdịɲ ŋườʔita sứ zíptô mwa dɛm káʔi sɛ ɣiá sáʔu căm siếk bạk kòn kɔn ŋựʔa ɣiá mộtcăm nămmươʔi siếk kák vwa zân hêtít vwa sizi kũŋ tʰeo ɣiá ấʔi ɲờ ɲữŋ kɔnbuôn kủʔa vwa mwa vả salômôn dịɲ kất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ Ðứkzê káʔi kuŋ cɔ nướk mìɲ salômôn lựʔa bảʔi ŋườʔi bưŋ ɣáɲ ŋườʔi tʰợ dẽʔɔ dá cên núʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi dốkkôŋ salômôn saj dến hizam vwa tizơ nóʔi zằŋ vwa dã hậʔudãʔi Ðʔa ca tôʔi kuŋkấp kâʔi hươŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dặŋ kất káʔi kuŋ dể ŋườʔiở sin vwa kũŋ hãʔi dãʔi tôʔi ɲưtʰế nàʔi tôʔi twan kất dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dền ấʔi ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ ŋàʔi dặŋ sôŋ ɲũhươŋ cướk ŋàʔi bàʔi báɲ cầntʰiết zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu buổʔisáŋ buổʔi ciềʔu hɔặk cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ hăjlà cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi dịɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dềʔu dó dịɲ cɔ ʔisơzaên dến dờʔidờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kawsaŋ kwa kák tʰần káʔi dền tôʔi twan kất ŋwiŋa cớ tʰì ʔaj kó sứk sâʔicất cɔ cúʔa káʔi dền cờʔi dến dỗʔi cờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi kòn cẳŋ cứʔa ŋàʔi dượk tʰăj vậʔi tôʔi ʔaj kất dượkmộtkáʔi dền cɔ cúʔa kất cẳŋkwa dể sôŋ hươŋ tạʔi cướk ŋàʔi dó tʰôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ vwa hãʔi saj dếnkùŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi ɣiỏʔi ŋề cế dồ vàŋ bạk dồŋ tʰạʔɔ zệt bằŋ cỉ dỏ sɛɲ kùŋ cạmcổ dủ ŋề dể làmviệk vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tàʔizỏʔi tôʔi tạʔi zuda ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔa ca tôʔi dã kũŋ hãʔi lấʔi liban ɣỗ hươŋ ɣỗ tòŋ ɣỗ bạcdàn hươŋ ɣởʔi dến cɔ tôʔi tôʔi zằŋ kák tôʔitớ vwa dềʔu tʰạʔɔ dốn kâʔi cên liban nàʔi kák tôʔitớ tôʔi kũŋ ɣiúpdỡ kák tôʔitớ vwa dặŋ lɔ dốn sắmsửʔa kâʔiɣỗ cɔ ɲiềʔu káʔi dền tôʔi twan kất ŋwiŋa tôʔi kấp cɔ kák tôʔitớ vwa ɲữŋ dốn kâʔi haj kô zơ lúʔa miếŋ zĩʔa zồʔi haj kô zơ lúk mạc haj zượʔu haj zầʔu hizam vwa tizơ tʰơ ɣởʔi cɔ salômôn zằŋ vì kớ Ðứkzê ʔiêʔutʰươŋ zânsự mìɲ ŋàʔi dã vwa vwa cên cúŋ hizam lạʔi nóʔi ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðấŋ zựŋ cờʔidất ŋàʔi dã cɔ vwa Ðʔa kɔncaj xônŋwan zẽ zặt tʰôŋmiɲ dể kất káʔi dền cɔ ŋàʔi káʔi kuŋ cɔ nướk ŋườʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi saj dến cɔ vwa ŋườʔi xéʔɔ kó cí tʰôŋ sáŋ huzamabi kɔncaj kủʔa ŋườʔi dờn cifáʔi Ðʔan ca ŋườʔi zân tizơ ŋườʔi ɣiỏʔi ŋề cế dồ vàŋ bạk dồŋ dá ɣỗ tʰạʔɔ zệt cỉ sɛɲ dỏ kùŋ cỉ ɣaj cắŋ sɛ kũŋ kák tʰứ cạmcổ tạʔɔ za dủ tʰứ sảʔɔ ŋườʔita biểʔu nó làmviệk vớʔi ɲữŋ tʰợ xéʔɔ kủʔa tʰânfụ vwa Ðʔa cúʔa tôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ sin cúʔa tôʔi hãʔi ɣởʔi cɔ kák tôʔitớ cúʔa lúʔa lúʔamạc zầʔu zượʔu cúʔa tôʔi dã nóʔi dến kòn cúŋtôʔi dốn ɣỗ tạʔi cên liban tʰeo bawɲiêʔu vwa kần zùŋ zồʔi tʰàɲ dɛm za dến zafô dɔạn vwa cở ɣiêzusalɛm salômôn diểm sɔát kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔicwốk cɔŋ nướk ʔisơzaên tùʔi tʰeo Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi dã diểm sɔát tʰấʔi dượk mườʔilăm ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi cɔŋ dó ŋườʔi dặt bảʔi ŋườʔilàm xiêŋ ɣáɲ ŋườʔi dẽʔɔ dá cên núʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi dốkkôŋ dặŋ sajxiến zâncúŋ làmviệk salômôn xởʔi kất dền Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cên núʔi môzi ʔa nơʔi Ðứkzê dã za kùŋ Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi tạʔi cên cỗ Ðʔa dã zọn tứklà cɔŋ dạp lúʔa kủʔa ʔɔï ŋườʔi ɣiêbusít salômôn xởʔi sâʔicất ɲằm ŋàʔi mồŋ haj tʰáŋ haj tʰứtư dờʔi ŋườʔi cịvì nầʔi salômôn dã dặŋ kất dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zàʔi tʰeo tʰướk sưʔa sáʔu mươʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ haimươʔi tʰướk hiên kửʔa fíʔa cướk zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk ʔiɲư ŋaŋ kủʔa dền vậʔi kaw mộtcăm haimươʔi tʰướk ŋườʔi bọk cɔŋ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ káʔi vác dền ŋườʔi bằŋ ɣỗ hươŋ bọk vàŋzòŋ cạm hìɲ kâʔi càlà zâʔisíc cên ŋườʔi dền bằŋ dá kwí dặŋ caŋsứk vàŋ vàŋ fạtvaim ŋườʔi lạʔi bọk vàŋ káʔi dền ŋạc kửʔa vác kửʔa kủʔa dền kòn cên vác tʰì cạm hìɲ cê zubin ŋườʔi kũŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk ʔiɲư ŋaŋ kủʔa dền ŋaŋ kũŋ haimươʔi tʰướk ŋườʔi bọk nơʔi ấʔi bằŋ vàŋzòŋ vàŋ zùŋ kọŋ dặŋ sáʔu căm lâŋ ɲữŋ diɲ vàŋ kân nặŋ nămmươʔi siếk ŋườʔi kũŋ bọk vàŋ kák fòŋ kaw tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ ŋườʔilàm haj cê zubin kứ fép cổ tượŋ zồʔi bọk vàŋ bốn káɲ kủʔa haj cê zubin zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk káɲ nàʔi kủʔa cê zubin hữʔu zàʔi tʰướk dụŋ dến vác dền kòn káɲ kiə kũŋ zàʔi tʰướk dụŋ káɲ kủʔa cê zubin káɲ nàʔi kủʔa cê zubin zàʔi tʰướk dụŋ dến vác dền kòn káɲ kiə kũŋ zàʔi tʰướk tiếpzáp vớʔi káɲ cê zubin hữʔu kák káɲ kủʔa haj cê zubên dềʔu za kọŋ zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk haj cê zubin dứŋ tʰẳŋ cơn ŋảɲ hướŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ŋườʔi lạʔi cế bứk bằŋ cỉ màʔu sɛɲ màʔu màʔu dỏ kùŋ cỉ ɣaj sɛ zồʔi cên tʰêʔu hìɲ cê zubin Ðằŋ cướk dền ŋườʔi sâʔi haj kâʔi cụ kaw bamươʔi tʰướk dầʔu cụ cên cót haj cụ dượk tʰướk ŋườʔi lạʔi zâʔisíc ɣiốŋ ɲư zâʔisíc cɔŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ dể cên cót cụ zồʔi mộtcăm cáʔi lựʔu ɣắn nơʔi zâʔisíc ấʔi ŋườʔi zựŋ haj cụ dó cướk dền tʰờ kâʔi nầʔi hữʔu kâʔi kiə dặt kâʔi hữʔu zakin kâʔi bôác ŋườʔi lạʔi káʔi bàntʰờ dồŋ zàʔi haimươʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ haimươʔi tʰướk kaw mườʔi tʰướk ŋườʔilàm káʔi dúk nàʔi kwa kiə dượk mườʔi tʰướk còn kaw tʰướk sợʔi zâʔi bamươʔi tʰướk cuŋkwɛɲ zướʔi vòŋ cuŋkwɛɲ kó hìɲ ɣiốŋ kɔn mỗʔi tʰướk mườʔi kɔn haj hàŋ dúk vớʔi biển dể cên mườʔihaj tượŋ kɔn kɔn sâʔi hướŋ bắk kɔn sâʔi hướŋ tâʔi kɔn sâʔi hướŋ kɔn sâʔi hướŋ dôŋ cên kák kɔn ấʔi tʰân săw cúŋnó dềʔu kwăj vàʔɔ cɔŋ bềzàʔi ɣaŋ ɲư káʔi cén hwa cứʔa dượk ŋàn ŋườʔi kũŋ mườʔi káʔi tʰùŋ dể káʔi hữʔu káʔi dặŋ zửʔa tạʔi dó ŋườʔita zửʔa cɔŋ dó ɣì tʰuộk kủʔa tʰiêʔu kòn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dềʔu tắmzửʔa cɔŋ dúk ŋườʔilàm mườʔi káʔi cơn dèn bằŋ vàŋ tʰeo kiểʔu dã dịɲ zồʔi dể cɔŋ dền tʰờ káʔi hữʔu káʔi lạʔi dóŋ mườʔi káʔi dể cɔŋ dền tʰờ káʔi hữʔu káʔi zồʔi mộtcăm káʔi cậʔu bằŋ vàŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ hàɲlaŋ cɔ tʰầʔi káʔi zộŋ kák kửʔa kủʔa zồʔi bọk dồŋ kák káɲ kửʔa ấʔi ŋườʔi dể káʔi hữʔu dền hướŋ dôŋ fíʔa huzam lạʔi ɲữŋ bìɲ cɔ cậʔu huzam sɔŋ kôŋviệk ŋườʔi dã salômôn cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứk haj kâʔi cụ cên cót cụ haj káʔi dầʔu cụ cên cót cụ haj lướʔi baw haj káʔi bầʔu kủʔa dầʔu cụ cên cót cụ bốncăm cáʔi lựʔu ɣắn vàʔɔ haj lướʔi mỗʔi kó haj hàŋ cáʔi lựʔu dặŋ baw haj káʔi bầʔu kủʔa dầʔu cụ cên cót cụ ŋườʔi kũŋ táŋ káʔi tʰùŋ cên táŋ dúk káʔi mườʔihaj kɔn zướʔi cế ɲữŋ bìɲ cɔ nỉʔa kák dồlề huzamabi salômôn kák dồ dó bằŋ dồŋ cơn láŋ dặŋ zùŋ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê vwa cwiền dúk kák dồ ấʔi nơʔi dồŋbằŋ ɣiôdɛɲ zướʔi dấtsét ɣiữʔa sukốt sêzêda vwa sa cế kák dồ ấʔi tʰật ɲiềʔu kòn kân kủʔa dồŋ tʰì ŋườʔita xôŋ salômôn hếttʰảʔi kák dồlề cɔŋ dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bàntʰờ vàŋ ɲữŋ káʔi zùŋ báɲ cầntʰiết cơn dèn káʔi tʰếp bằŋ vàŋzòŋ dặŋ tʰắp cướk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ tʰeo dã dịɲ kũŋ kák hwa tʰếp nỉʔa bằŋ vàŋzòŋ ɲữŋ zaw cậʔu cén hươŋ kũŋ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ nơʔi vàʔɔ dền kák káɲ kửʔa dền cɔŋ kủʔa nơʔi cí tʰáɲ kùŋ kák káɲ kửʔa kủʔa dền tʰờ kũŋ dềʔu bằŋ vàŋ Ấʔi vậʔi kák kôŋviệk salômôn cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dềʔu sɔŋ zồʔi salômôn dɛm dến ɲữŋ Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ tứklà bạk vàŋ kák xí zụŋ dể vàʔɔ xɔ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi salômôn ɲóm tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi kák cưởŋtộk zân ʔisơzaên kák cưởŋ kủʔa kák cifáʔi kák cưởŋtộk zân ʔisơzaên dặŋ zướk zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰàɲ Ðʔa siôn mọʔi ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi dếnkùŋ vwa ɲằm tʰáŋ bảʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ʔisơzaên dềʔu dến ŋườʔi lêvi xiêŋ di ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu dɛm káʔi hộʔi mạk kák xí zụŋ tʰáɲ cɔŋ cạʔi vwa sa kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên dã ɲóm lạʔi vớʔi vwa dềʔu dứŋ cướk zâŋ ɲữŋ ciên kủʔa ɲiềʔu xôŋtʰể dếm dượk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dɛm zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê vàʔɔ nơʔi zọn cɔ tứk cɔŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ kủʔa dền zướʔi káɲ cê zubin haj cê zubin káɲ za cên cỗ cɛ dòn xiêŋ xiêŋ tʰì zàʔi dầʔu dòn tʰấʔi za ŋɔàʔi cướk nơʔi cí tʰáɲ ɲưŋ ŋɔàʔi dền tʰì cẳŋ tʰấʔi dó cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ kó ɣì cɔŋ cừ za haj bảŋ luậtfáp môʔisɛ dã dể vàʔɔ tạʔi hôzếp xi Ðứkzê zawướk vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên lúk cúŋ za xỏʔi zíptô xi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi za xỏʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ fàm tʰầʔi dó dềʔu dã zọn mìɲ za tʰáɲ sạc cưʔa ɣiữ tʰeo tʰứ nàʔɔ kák ŋườʔi kahát cɔŋ zân lêvi tứk ʔasáp hênan ɣiêdutʰun kùŋ kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm dươŋ mặk kwầnáʔɔ bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj kầm cập cỏʔa dờn dờn kầm dềʔu dứŋ fíʔa dôŋ bàntʰờ vớʔi mộtcăm haimươʔi tʰầʔi tʰổʔi sảʔi xi tʰổʔi kahát dồŋ tʰiɲ hòʔa ɲăw ɲư ŋườʔi xɛnŋợʔi kảmtạ Ðứkzê xi cổʔi tiếŋ cập cỏʔa ɲạkxí xɛnŋợʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ ŋàʔi từtʰiện lòŋ tʰươŋsót ŋàʔi hằŋ kó dờʔidờʔi tʰì dền kủʔa Ðứkzê mâʔi dầʔi dến dỗʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi mâʔi xôŋtʰể dứŋ dó hầʔu việk dượk viɲhiển kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bấʔizờ salômôn nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã fán zằŋ ŋàʔi ŋự cɔŋ nơʔi tốʔi tʰẳm ɲưŋ tôʔi dã kất káʔi dền cɔ cúʔa cúŋụ nơʔi cɔ cúʔa dờʔidờʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa sâʔi lạʔi cúk fướk cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên dềʔu dứŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðấŋ dã fán hứʔa vớʔi Ðʔa ca tôʔi năj lấʔi tăj ŋàʔi cɔ tʰàɲ lờʔi hứʔa ấʔi ŋàʔi zằŋ từ ŋàʔi dɛm zân za xỏʔi sứ zíptô cưʔa cọn tʰàɲ nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặŋ kất káʔi dền dể dặt zɛɲ tạʔi dó kũŋ cẳŋ cọn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vwɛcúʔa cên zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ dã cọn ɣiêzusalɛm dể dặt zɛɲ tạʔi dó cọn Ðʔa dặŋ kaicị zân ʔisơzaên vả Ðʔa ca tôʔi dã zắp lòŋ sâʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲưŋÐứkzê fán vớʔi Ðʔa ca tôʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kó zắp lòŋ kất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ ấʔi tʰật fảʔi zầʔu vậʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ kất dền ấʔi sɔŋ kɔncaj ŋươʔi sɛɲ za kất káʔi dền cɔ zɛɲ Ðứkzê dã ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi fán xiến tôʔi cɔ Ðʔa ca tôʔi lênŋôʔi cịvì ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã hứʔa tôʔi kó kất dền cɔ zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tạʔi dền ấʔi dã dặt káʔi dựŋ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi vớʔi zân ʔisơzaên salômôn dươŋ dứŋ cướk bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê dốʔimặt kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ɣiơ tăj mìɲ za ŋườʔi dã dóŋ káʔi bằŋ dồŋ zàʔi tʰướk ŋaŋ tʰướk kaw tʰướk dể tạʔi ɣiữʔa hàɲlaŋ ŋườʔi dứŋ tạʔi dó kwì ɣốʔi suốŋ cướk kả hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên ɣiơ tăj cên cờʔi zằŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cên cờʔi zướʔi dất cẳŋ kó tʰần nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư cúʔa cúʔa ɣìŋiữ lờʔi zawướk lòŋ ɲơn dốʔivớʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa hếtlòŋ di cướk cúʔa dốʔivớʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi cúʔa kó ɣìŋiữ lờʔi cúʔa dã hứʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰật diềʔu ɣì miệŋ cúʔa fán tʰì tăj cúʔa dã cɔ hɔàntʰàɲ ʔiɲư dã kó ŋàʔinăj vậʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ôʔi cúʔa dã hứʔa kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðʔa ca tôʔi zằŋ víbằŋ kɔncáʔu ŋươʔi kẩntʰận dườŋlốʔi mìɲ ɣiữ tʰeo kák luậtfáp ʔiɲư ŋươʔi dã tʰì cướk ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ʔisơzaên năj kầʔusin cúʔa hãʔi ɣiữɣìn lờʔi hứʔa ấʔi hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋwiện lờʔi cúʔa dã hứʔa kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk ứŋŋiệm mà ci kó tʰật zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋự cuŋ vớʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi cên dất kìʔa cờʔi cɔdến dỗʔi cờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi kòn cẳŋ kó tʰế cứʔa cúʔa dượk tʰăj fươŋci káʔi dền nầʔi tôʔi dã kất zầʔu vậʔi hỡʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi dɔáʔi tʰươŋ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu xẩn ŋwiện kủʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa kầʔu cướk cúʔa ŋwiện cúʔa ŋàʔi dêm dɔáʔi sɛm ɲà nàʔi ɲà nàʔi cúʔa dã fán zằŋ dặt zɛɲ cúʔa tạʔi dó xi tôʔitớ cúʔa hướŋ nơʔi nàʔi kầʔuŋwiện sin cúʔa zủ ŋɛ fàm diềʔu ɣì tôʔitớ cúʔa zân ʔisơzaên kầʔuxẩn cɔŋ xi hướŋ nơʔi nàʔi sin cúʔa hãʔi zủ ŋɛ ɲậm lờʔi tʰatʰứ cɔ nếʔu ʔaj fạmtộʔi kùŋ lânkận mìɲ ŋườʔita fảʔi tʰề nếʔu dến tʰề cướk bàntʰờ kủʔa cúʔa tạʔi cɔŋ dền nàʔi tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi ŋɛ tʰihàɲ sétdɔán tôʔitớ cúʔa báʔɔ cả ák tùʔi việk xiến tộʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu sưŋ kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰưởŋ ŋườʔi tùʔi kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi nếʔu zân ʔisơzɛên kủʔa cúʔa fạmtộʔi vớʔi cúʔa kwân tʰùŋịc dáɲ dượk cúŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ cúʔa ɲậnbiết zɛɲ ŋàʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin cướk cúʔa cɔŋ dền nàʔi tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi zủ ŋɛ tʰa tộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa xiến cởvề sứ cúʔa dã cɔ cɔ tổfụ kủʔa xi kák từŋ cờʔi dóŋ cặt xôŋ kó mưʔa bởʔivì zân ʔisơzaên dã fạmtộʔi vớʔi cúʔa nếʔu săw xi cúʔa dã dɔán fạt hướŋ nơʔi nàʔi kầʔuŋwiện ɲậnbiết zɛɲ cúʔa cở tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi zủ ŋɛ tʰa tộʔi cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi xi ŋàʔi dã zạʔi cɔ cúŋ kɔn dườŋ làɲ cúŋ fảʔi di tʰeo ɣiáŋ mưʔa suốŋ cên dất cúʔa dã cɔ zân ŋàʔi sảnŋiệp nếʔu cɔŋ sứ kó kơn dóʔicém ônzịc dạʔihạn tɛn kàʔɔkàʔɔ hăjlà câʔucấʔu hɔặk tʰùŋịc vâʔihãm kák tʰàɲ cɔŋ dịʔafận kó tajvạ ɣì bịɲ ɣì víbằŋ kó ŋườʔi hɔặk kả zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa dã ɲậnbiết tajvạ dăwdớn kủʔa mìɲ ɣiơ tăj za hướŋ ɲà nàʔi kầʔuŋwiện xẩn sin diềʔu ɣì tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi nơʔi ŋự kủʔa cúʔa hãʔi zủ ŋɛ tʰatʰứ cɔ báʔɔ lạʔi cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi tùʔi tʰeo kôŋviệk cúʔa tʰôŋ lòŋ kủʔa tʰật cỉ mộtmìɲ cúʔa dượklòŋ kủʔa kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dể xiến cúŋ kíɲ cúʔa di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi kủʔa cúʔa cọn dờʔi cúŋ sốŋ cên dất cúʔa dã cɔ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi vảlạʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa ɲưŋ zɛɲ cúʔa káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za kủʔa ŋàʔi sứ sa di dến hướŋ dền nàʔi kầʔuŋwiện tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi nơʔi ŋự kủʔa cúʔa hầʔu cɔ muônzân cên dất ɲậnbiết zɛɲ cúʔa kíɲ ŋàʔi ɲư zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa cúʔa zằŋ káʔi dền nàʔi tôʔi dã sâʔicất dượk ɣọʔi bằŋ zɛɲ cúʔa xi zânsự cúʔa za ciếncɛɲ vớʔi
