tʰùŋịc mìɲ tʰeo dườŋ nàʔɔ cúʔa saj di nếʔu cúŋ kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ cúʔa sâʔi hướŋ tʰàɲ nầʔi cúʔa dã cọn dền nầʔi tôʔi dã sâʔicất cɔ zɛɲ cúʔa tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi hãʔi zủ ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa cúŋ biɲ vựk cɔ nếʔu zân ʔisơzaên fạmtộʔi vớʔi cúʔa cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ fạmtộʔi cúʔa nổʔizận fó cúŋ cɔ tʰùŋịc tʰùŋịc fu zẫn dến sứ sa hăj ɣần nếʔu cɔŋ sứ zẫn dến fu swiŋĩ lạʔi kầʔuxẩn cúʔa zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó fạmtộʔi diềʔu zanák kưsử kác zữtợn nếʔu tạʔi cɔŋ sứ tʰùŋịc dã zẫn dến fu hếtlòŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ cúʔa kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ ŋàʔi hướŋ sứ cúʔa dã cɔ tổfụ tʰàɲ cúʔa dã cọn dền tôʔi dã sâʔicất cɔ zɛɲ cúʔa tʰì sin cúʔa cên cờʔi nơʔi ŋự kủʔa cúʔa hãʔi zủ ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện nàʔisin kủʔa cúŋ biɲ vựk tʰatʰứ tộʔi zânsự kủʔa cúʔa dã fạm kùŋ ŋàʔi vậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi bâʔizờ kầʔusin cúʔa dɔáʔi tʰươŋ lắŋtaj ŋɛ fàm lờʔi nàʔɔ kầʔuŋwiện cɔŋ nơʔi nàʔi nầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dể cúʔa kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi dượk vàʔɔ nơʔi ʔanŋỉ ŋàʔi lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋwiện ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cúʔa dượk mặk kứʔuzỗʔi kák tʰáɲ dồ cúʔa dượk mừŋzỡ cɔŋ ɲơn ŋàʔi hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin cớ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa cúʔa xá ɲớ lạʔi kák ɲântừ kủʔa cúʔa dốʔivớʔi Ðʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi xisa kầʔuŋwiện sɔŋ lửʔa cờʔizáŋ suốŋ dốt kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák hisiɲ viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔizẫʔi cɔŋ dền ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cẳŋ vàʔɔ dượk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê viɲkwaŋ Ðứkzê dầʔizẫʔi dền kủʔa ŋàʔi hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu tʰấʔi lửʔa viɲkwaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ suốŋ dền suốŋ dất cên tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê kảmtạ ŋàʔi zằŋ cúʔa ɲântừ tʰươŋsót kủʔa ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi bấʔizờ vwa kả zânsự zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê vwa sa zâŋ haj haj ŋàn kɔn mườʔihaj kɔnciên dựk zồʔi vwa kả zânsự dềʔu xáɲtʰàɲ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi hầʔu việk tʰeo cứkfận mìɲ kòn ŋườʔi lêvi tʰì kầm ɲạkxí kủʔa Ðứkzê vwa Ðʔa dã dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi bởʔivì lòŋ ɲântừ cúʔa kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi cướk cúŋ kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu dứŋ salômôn ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cỗ cíɲ ɣiữʔa hàɲ làŋ cướk dền Ðứkzê tạʔi dó ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù bởʔi káʔi bàntʰờ dồŋ salômôn dã xôŋ dựŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa căj dượk cɔŋ xi ấʔi salômôn kả ʔisơzaên dến fíʔa hamát cɔ tớʔi xɛ zíptô ɲóm lạʔi tʰàɲ hộʔi zất dôŋdảʔɔ dềʔu zự cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kwaŋàʔi tʰứ ŋườʔita ɣiữ cọŋtʰể zự xáɲtʰàɲ bàntʰờ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi mừŋ tʰườŋ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi haimươʔi batʰáŋ bảʔi ŋườʔi cɔ zânsự cởvề cạʔi mìɲ lòŋ dềʔu vujvẻ mừŋzỡ ɲântừ Ðứkzê dã cɔ Ðʔa cɔ salômôn cɔ ʔisơzaên zânsự kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲưvậʔi salômôn sɔŋ dền Ðứkzê kuŋ vwa fàm kôŋviệk ɣì salômôn zắp lòŋ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê cɔŋ kuŋ vwa dềʔu sɔŋ kả bandêm Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ salômôn zằŋ ta kó ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện ŋươʔi dã cọn nơʔi nàʔi ɲà nếʔu dóŋ kák từŋ cờʔi lạʔi xôŋ cɔ mưʔa suốŋ xiến kàʔɔkàʔɔ fáhạʔi tʰổsản ɣiáŋ ônzịc ɣiữʔa zânsự ɲượkbằŋ zânsự zân ɣọʔi bằŋ zɛɲ hạmìɲ suốŋ kầʔuŋwiện cởlạʔi kɔn dườŋ tʰì cên cờʔi ŋɛ tʰatʰứ tộʔi cúŋnó kứʔu sứ xỏʔi tajvạ bấʔizờ dɔáʔi sɛm taj lắŋŋɛ lờʔi nàʔɔ kầʔuŋwiện tạʔi nơʔi nàʔi bâʔizờ dã cọn xiến cɔ káʔi ɲà nàʔi za tʰáɲ hầʔu cɔ zɛɲ ŋự dó dờʔidờʔi kùŋ lòŋ dó kòn ŋươʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi xứŋ di cướk ɲư Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi dã tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu fán zạʔi ŋươʔi ɣìŋiữ ɣiớʔi mạŋ tʰì ŋôʔi nướk ŋươʔi dượk bềnvữŋ ʔi tʰeo lờʔi ướk dã vớʔi Ðʔa ca ŋươʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu ŋườʔi kwảncị ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi bộʔiŋịc kák ɣiớʔi mạŋ dã dặt cướk kák ŋươʔi di hầʔu việk ɲữŋ tʰần tʰờ lạʔi cúŋnó tʰì zứt ɲổ kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi dất dã cɔ kák ŋươʔi kòn káʔi ɲà nàʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ zɛɲ di cɔ kâʔu tụkŋữ việk ɲạʔɔ kườʔi ɣiữʔa kák zântộk káʔi ɲà nàʔi zẫʔu kaw zườŋ nàʔɔ ʔaj di kwa ɣần kũŋ lấʔilàm nóʔi zằŋ kớsaw Ðứkzê kó sử sứ nàʔi dền nàʔi ɲưtʰế tʰì ŋườʔita dáp zằŋ bởʔivì lìʔabỏ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ Ðấŋ dã zẫn za xỏʔi sứ zíptô dewduổʔi tʰeo kák tʰần tʰờ lạʔi hầʔu việk cúŋnó ŋàʔi dã ɣiáŋ cên kák tajvạ nàʔi kuốʔi haimươʔi săw xi salômôn dã sâʔicất sɔŋ káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê káʔi kuŋ mìɲ tʰì salômôn kũŋ sửʔa sâʔi lạʔi kák tʰàɲ vwa huzam dã ɲườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi xiến cɔ zân ʔisơzaên dó salômôn di dến hamátsôba tʰắŋ dượk ŋườʔi sâʔi tʰàɲ tátmốt cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ sâʔi kák tʰàɲ zùŋ xɔtàŋ tạʔi sứ hamát ŋườʔi kũŋ sâʔi bếtʰôzôn cên bếtʰôzôn zướʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kó vác tườŋ kửʔa tʰɛn xóʔa lạʔi sâʔi tʰàɲ balát kák tʰàɲ xɔtàŋ kủʔa salômôn kák tʰàɲ dể cứʔa sɛ kák tʰàɲ cɔ líɲ ŋườʔiở fàm diềʔu ɣì salômôn ướkaw sâʔicất hɔặk tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cên liban hăjlà cɔŋ xắp sứ fụk zướʔi kwiền ŋườʔi tʰì dềʔu sâʔicất kả hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn sốŋsót lạʔi cɔŋ zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân fêzêsít zân hêvít zân ɣiêbusít xôŋ tʰuộk ʔisơzaên tứklà ɲữŋ kɔncáʔu cúŋnó hãʔi kòn lạʔi cɔŋ sứ zân ʔisơzaên xôŋ ziệt tʰì cɔŋ cúŋnó salômôn sâʔu cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ɲưŋ zân ʔisơzaên salômôn xôŋ ʔaj sâʔu kwânlíɲ kwan tướŋ kwan kaj sɛ líɲ k ʔa ŋư ʔi kòn kwan cưởŋ kủʔa salômôn dặt dể kwảndốk zânsự kôŋviệk haj căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi salômôn saj zướk kôŋcúʔa fazaôn tʰàɲ Ðʔa kuŋ ŋườʔi dã kất cɔ nàŋ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ vợ cẳŋ cɔŋ kuŋ Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên nơʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê dến tʰì dã tʰáɲ zồʔi bấʔizờ salômôn zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi cên bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva ŋườʔi dã sâʔi cướk kửʔa lạʔi tùʔi tʰeo kủʔa môʔisɛ ŋườʔi zâŋ mỗʔi ŋàʔi kủʔa fảʔi zâŋ kùŋ cɔŋ kák ŋàʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ hằŋ ɲằm cọŋtʰể tứk báɲ xôŋ mɛn kák lềʔu tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ cwiền kủʔa Ðʔa ca mìɲ ŋườʔi fândịɲ tʰứ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔŋ fần việk ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ cứksự dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa hầʔu việk tạʔi cướk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kứ kôŋviệk ŋàʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi tạʔi mỗʔi kửʔa kũŋ dặt ɣiữ kửʔa kứ tʰeo fiên mìɲ Ðʔa ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cwiền lịɲ ɲưvậʔi fàm diềʔu ɣì vwa dã fán zạʔi hữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi hɔặk xɔtàŋ hăjlà việk xák tʰì cẳŋ cút nàʔɔ vả kák tàʔiliệʔu salômôn zùŋ việk kất dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dềʔu dã sắmsửʔa ŋàʔi dặt cɔdến xi kôŋviệk sɔŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kất sɔŋ ɲưvậʔi xi ấʔi salômôn di dến siôŋêbɛ tạʔi cên cɔŋ sứ dôm huzam bởʔi tăj kák tôʔitớ mìɲ ɣởʔi dến cɔ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tàʔu kák tʰủʔitʰủ tʰạʔɔ ŋề di cúŋ di vớʔi kák tôʔitớ kủʔa salômôn dến fiə lấʔi tạʔi dó bốncăm nămmươʔi lâŋ vàŋ cở cɔ vwa salômôn xi nữvươŋ nướk sêba ŋɛ dồn zɛɲtiếŋ kủʔa salômôn di dến ɣiêzusalɛm lấʔi ɲữŋ kâʔudố tʰử ŋườʔi kó hầʔuhạ tʰeo zất dôŋ kó ɲữŋ lạkdà cở tʰuốk tʰơm zất ɲiềʔu vàŋ dá kwí dếnkùŋ salômôn nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu kó cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ salômôn dáp kák kâʔuhỏʔi kủʔa cẳŋ kâʔu nàʔɔ kwá cɔ salômôn ŋườʔi xôŋ ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa nổʔi cɔ xi nữvươŋ sêba tʰấʔi xônŋwan kủʔa salômôn kuŋdiện ŋườʔi dã sâʔicất ɲữŋ cên ŋườʔi ɲàkửʔa kák tôʔitớ tʰứtự kôŋviệk kủʔa kák kwan dồ mặk kủʔa kák kwan cướk tửʔu áʔɔsốŋ kủʔa kùŋ kák kủʔa tʰiêʔu ŋườʔi zâŋ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê tʰì mấtvíʔa nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu tôʔi ŋɛnóʔi cɔŋ sứ tôʔi kák lờʔinóʔi xônŋwan kủʔa vwa tʰì tʰật sɔŋ cướk xi tôʔi cưʔa dến dâʔi cưʔa tʰấʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu nàʔi tʰì tôʔi cẳŋ lờʔi kìʔa ŋườʔita cẳŋ tʰuật cɔ tôʔi ŋɛ dến fânnửʔa xônŋwan lớnlaw kủʔa vwa vwa tʰật cổʔi tiếŋ dồn tôʔi dã ŋɛ kák kwầntʰần kủʔa vwa tʰật kó fướk tʰăj kák tôʔitớ vwa hằŋ dứŋ cầʔu cướk vwa ŋɛ xônŋwan kủʔa vwa tʰật kó fướk tʰăj Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn tʰăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa ŋàʔi vuitʰíc vwa dặt vwa ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi dặŋ vwa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa bởʔivì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa vwa ʔiêʔumến ʔisơzaên dặŋ cɔ cúŋ vữŋbền dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi dã vwa vwa cên cúŋ dể tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ kôŋbìɲ Ðʔɔạn zâŋ cɔ vwa mộtcăm haimươʔi lâŋ vàŋ zất ɲiềʔu tʰuốk tʰơm kùŋ dá kwí cẳŋ kó tʰuốk tʰơm nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư tʰuốk tʰơm kủʔa nữvươŋ nướk sêba zâŋ cɔ vwa salômôn kák tôʔitớ kủʔa huzam tôʔitớ kủʔa salômôn fiə cở vàŋ dến kũŋ kó cở ɣỗ bạcdàn hươŋ dá kwí vwa zùŋ ɣỗ bạcdàn hươŋ ấʔi káʔi tʰaŋ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ kuŋdiện vwa kùŋ ɲữŋ dờn kầm dờn cɔ kɔɲát cướk xi cɔŋ nướk zuda ŋườʔita cẳŋ tʰấʔi kó ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi vwa sa tặŋ cɔ nữvươŋ nướk sêba mọʔi dồ ướkaw sin ɣấp ɲiềʔu dồ dã dɛm zâŋ cɔ vwa Ðʔɔạn kák dầʔitớ cởvề sứ mìɲ vàŋ vwa salômôn ɲận dượk mỗʔi kân dến sáʔu căm bảʔi mươʔi lâŋ xôŋ vàŋ kák ɲà zɔŋ dɛm vàʔɔ kùŋ vàŋ bạk kák vwa ʔazabi kwan tổŋcấn kủʔa sứ dɛm cɔ salômôn salômôn haj căm káʔi xiên bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát kứ mỗʔi káʔi zùŋ sáʔu căm siếk vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát bɛcăm káʔi xiên ɲỏ bằŋ vàŋ dáɲ ɣiát kứ mỗʔi káʔi zùŋ bɛcăm siếk vàŋ dɔạn vwa dể kák xiên ấʔi nơʔi kuŋ zừŋ liban vwa kũŋ káʔi ŋaj bằŋ ŋà bọk vàŋzòŋ káʔi ŋaj kó sáʔu nấk káʔi bằŋ vàŋ vớʔi káʔi ŋaj kũŋ kó tʰɛɲ nâŋ tăj nàʔi kiə kủʔa cỗ ŋồʔi ɣần tʰɛɲ nâŋ tăj kó haj kɔn lạʔi kó mườʔihaj kɔn dứŋ cên sáʔu nấk hữʔu cẳŋ kó nướk nàʔɔ ŋaj ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi kák dồzùŋ dể ʔuốŋ kủʔa vwa salômôn dềʔu bằŋ vàŋ ɲữŋ xí zụŋ kủʔa kuŋ zừŋ liban kũŋ dềʔu bằŋ vàŋzòŋ cɔŋ dờʔi salômôn cẳŋ bạk zaɣì vwa kó dɔàn tàʔu saŋ tazêsi vớʔi kák tôʔitớ kủʔa hizam mỗʔi dɔàn tàʔu tazêsi cở dến vàŋ bạk ŋàvɔj kɔnxỉ kɔn kôŋ Ấʔi vậʔi vwa salômôn cổʔi kák vwa cên dất xônŋwan kák vwa cên dất dềʔu kầʔu tʰấʔi salômôn dặŋ ŋɛ xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dể cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi kứ hằŋ tʰeo dịɲ cúŋ dềʔu dɛm dến mìɲ tiếnkốŋ nàʔɔ ɲữŋ xí zụŋ bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ nàʔɔ áʔɔsốŋ biɲxí nàʔɔ tʰuốk tʰơm ŋựʔa vwa sa kó dượk ŋàn tàʔu ŋựʔa sɛ kùŋ haj ŋàn líɲ dể cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ cứʔa sɛ ɣần vwa tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi kwảncị cên kák vwa sôŋkáʔi cɔdến sứ filitin cɔdến bờkõʔi zíptô tạʔizê zusalɛm vwa cɔ bạk za tʰườŋ ɲư dá sỏʔi kâʔi hươŋ ɲiềʔu ɲư kâʔi suŋ mọk nơʔi dồŋbằŋ kó ŋườʔi dɛm cɔ salômôn ɲữŋ ŋựʔa sứ zíptô kák nướk dến salômôn kwadờʔi kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa salômôn dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác cwiện natʰan dấŋ tiênci cɔŋ sác tiênci kủʔa ʔahiza ŋườʔi silô kùŋ cɔŋ sác zị tượŋ kủʔa ɣiêdô dấŋ việk ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát salômôn cịvì cên kả ʔisơzaên cɔŋ mươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm salômôn ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðʔa ca ŋườʔi zôbôʔam kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi zôbôʔam di dến sicɛm kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu dã tớʔi sicɛm dặŋ ŋườʔilàm vwa xizê zôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát hăj diềʔu dó tʰì kòn zíptô nơʔi ŋườʔi dã cốn dể tʰɔát xỏʔi salômôn ŋườʔi zíptô cởvề ŋườʔita saj di ɣọʔi ŋườʔi dɔạn ɣiêzôbôʔam kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu dến tâʔu vớʔi zôbôʔam zằŋ tʰânfụ vwa dã ɣán ác nặŋ cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi ɣiảm ɲẹ fụkzịc xóɲọk nàʔi káʔi ác nặŋnề tʰânfụ vwa dã ɣán cên cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi fụk vwa ŋườʔi dáp vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ xỏʔi ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ zânsự luj vwa zô bôʔam ŋị kùŋ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dã cầʔu cướk salômôn ca ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk salômôn kòn sốŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔ fảʔi cảlờʔi vớʔi zânsự nàʔi làmsaw kák cưởŋlãʔɔ tʰưʔa lạʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ nếʔu vwa dãʔi zânsự nàʔi vujlòŋ kùŋ cúŋnó lấʔi lờʔi hiềnlàɲ nóʔi vớʔi cúŋnó cúŋnó tôʔitớ vwa mãʔimãʔi sɔŋzô bôʔam cẳŋ tʰeo mưʔu kủʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dã cɔ mìɲ hộʔiŋị vớʔi kák ŋườʔi caicẻ dã dồŋ sɛɲ cưởŋ vớʔi mìɲ cầʔu cướk mìɲ zằŋ zânsự nàʔi dã tâʔu vớʔi zằŋ hãʔi ɣiảm ɲẹ káʔi ác tʰânfụ vwa dã ɣán cɔ cúŋtôʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ fảʔi dáp vớʔi cúŋnó làmsaw kák ɣã caicẻ dồŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ zânsự dã tʰưʔa vớʔi vwa zằŋ tʰânfụ vwa xiến cɔ ác cúŋtôʔi nặŋnề vwa hãʔi cɔ za ɲẹ vwa fảʔi dáp lạʔi kùŋ cúŋ ɲưvầʔi ŋóntăj lưŋ kủʔa ca vậʔi bâʔizờ ca dã ɣán káʔi ác nặŋ cên kák ŋươʔi cɔ ác kák ŋươʔi tʰêm nặŋ ca dã sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj kòn sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj bòkạp ŋàʔi tʰứba ɣiêzôbôʔam kả zânsự dềʔu dếnkùŋ zôbôʔam ʔiɲư vwa dã biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰứba vwa zô bôʔam dáp vớʔi zânsự kác sẳŋ sớm mưʔu kủʔa kák cưởŋlãʔɔ dã tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ɲữŋ caicẻ dáp kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ca xiến cɔ ác kák ŋươʔi nặŋnề cɔ ác kák ŋươʔi tʰêm nặŋ ca sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj sửʔa fạt kák ŋươʔi bằŋ zɔj bòkạp ɲưvậʔi vwa xôŋ ŋɛ lờʔi zânsự ấʔilà bởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zẫn dến hầʔu cɔ Ðứkzê ứŋŋiệm lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi dã ɲờ ʔahiza ŋườʔi silô fán kùŋ ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa nêbát xi kả ʔisơzaên tʰấʔi vwa xôŋ ŋɛ lờʔi dáp kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ cúŋta kó fần ɣì vớʔi Ðʔa cúŋta cẳŋ kó kơŋiệp ɣì vớʔi kɔncaj ʔisaj hỡʔi ʔisơzaên mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi cởvề cạʔi mìɲ di Ðʔa zàʔi xá kɔicừŋ ɲà kủʔa ŋươʔi kả ʔisơzaên cởvề cạʔi mìɲ ɲưŋ kòn zân ʔisơzaên tạʔi kák tʰàɲ zuda tʰì zôbôʔam kaicị cên cúŋ bấʔizờ vwa zôbôʔam saj hadôzam ŋườʔi kaikwản việk kốŋ tʰuế dến kùŋzân ʔisơzaên sɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên dá ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi cết vwa zô bôʔam lậtdật sɛ cốn ɣiêzusalɛm Ấʔi vậʔi ʔisơzaên fảnŋịc kùŋ ɲà Ðʔa cɔdến ŋàʔinăj zôbôʔam cởvề tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ɲóm ɲà zuda ɲà bêŋiəmin dượk mườʔitám ciếnsĩ kéncọn twan dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi ʔisơzaên dể dɛm nướk zôbôʔam lạʔi ɲưŋ kó lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê fán kùŋ sêmaza ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi zôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa salômôn vwa zuda vớʔi kả ʔisơzaên cɔŋ zuda kùŋ bêŋiəmin zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ di ciɲciến vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ việk nàʔi tạʔi sảʔi dến cúŋ ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê cởvề xôŋ di dáɲ ɣiêzôbôʔam zôbôʔam tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm sâʔi kák tʰàɲ cɔŋ dất zuda dồnlũʔi ŋườʔi sâʔi bếtlêhɛm tʰêkô ʔa bếtsuzơ sôkô ʔadulam ɣát mazêsa síp ʔadôzaim laki ʔasêka sôzê ʔa ʔazalôn hếpzôn ɲữŋ tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ cɔŋ dất zuda dất bêŋiəmin ŋườʔilàm cɔ kák dồnlũʔi ấʔi vữŋcắk dặt ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ dó cứʔa lươŋtʰựk zầʔu zượʔu kòn cɔŋ mỗʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔi xiên ɣiáʔɔ cɔ kák tʰàɲ ấʔi zất bềnvữŋ Ðấtzu da dất bêŋiəmin dềʔu tʰuộk ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ xắp sứ ʔisơzaên dềʔu kák dếnkùŋ zôbôʔam kák ŋườʔi lêvi lìʔabỏ dịʔahạt kák tʰàɲ mìɲ sảnŋiệp mìɲ dến dất zuda tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm bởʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi duổʔi di xôŋ cɔ cứk tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê nữʔa ɣiêzôbôʔam ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔ kák nơʔi kaw cɔ kák hìɲtượŋ zê dựk kɔn ŋườʔi dã lạʔi cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên fàm ʔaj zắp lòŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰì dềʔu tʰeo ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dến ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ cɔŋ cúŋ cɔ nướk zuda vữŋcắk ɣiúpdỡ zôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa salômôn cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ cɔŋ ấʔi cúŋ di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa Ðʔa salômôn zôbôʔam lấʔi mahalát kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ɣiêzimốt cáʔu kủʔa Ðʔa lạʔi kướʔi ʔabihaj kɔŋáʔi cáʔu kủʔa ʔisaj nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ kɔncaj ɣiêúk sêmaziə saham săw nàŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi kướʔi maaka kɔŋáʔi nàŋ sɛɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔabiza tʰaj sisa sêlômít vả zôbôʔam ʔiêʔumến maaka kɔŋáʔi kák hậʔu fi xák ŋườʔi kó lấʔi mườʔitám hɔàŋậʔu sáʔu mươʔi kuŋfi sɛɲ za haimươʔitám kɔncaj sáʔu mươʔi kɔŋáʔi zôbôʔam ʔabiza kɔncaj maaka cưởŋ tʰáʔitử ɣiữʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ŋườʔi twan kɔn ấʔi vwa zôbôʔam kưsử kác xônŋwan fân kák kɔncaj mìɲ diở xắp cɔŋ kõʔi zuda bêŋiəmin nơʔi kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kấp cɔ cúŋ lươŋtʰựk zưzật kướʔi ɲiềʔu cɔ sảʔi xi nướk kủʔa zôbôʔam vừʔa dượk vữŋbền ŋườʔi dượk kườŋ tʰạɲ tʰì ŋườʔi kả ʔisơzaên luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê vì cúŋ kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê sảʔiza cɔŋ tʰứnăm dờʔi vwa zôbôʔam sisắk vwa zíptô kéʔɔ dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm kó zẫn tʰeo mộtŋàn haj căm kỗ sɛ sáʔu líɲ lạʔi kó zân libi zân suzi zân tʰiôbi zíptô kéʔɔ vớʔi ŋườʔi xôŋtʰể dếm dặŋ sisắk ciếm lấʔi kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ tʰuộk zuda zồʔi dến ɣiêzusalɛm tiênci sêmaza dếnkùŋ zôbôʔam kák làmdầʔu zuda dươŋ ɲóm tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dể cốn xỏʔi sisắk nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi dã kũŋ dã kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ tăj sisắk bấʔizờ kák làmdầʔu kủʔa ʔisơzaên vwa dềʔu hạmìɲ suốŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê kôŋbìɲ xiÐứkzê tʰấʔi cúŋ hạmìɲ suốŋ tʰìkó lờʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ sêmaza zằŋ cúŋnó dã hạmìɲ suốŋ xôŋ hủʔiziệt cúŋnó sɔŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋ mộtcút kơn ɣiận cẳŋ kậʔi tăj sisắk dổ za cên ɣiêzusalɛm sɔŋ cúŋnó fụkzịc hầʔu cɔbiết fụk fụkzịc nướk xák kó fânbiệt tʰểnàʔɔ sisắk vwa zíptô kéʔɔ dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm dɔạt lấʔi kák bửʔu kủʔa dền Ðứkzê kuŋ vwa ŋườʔi dɔạt lấʔi hếttʰảʔi kũŋ dɔạt lấʔi ɲữŋ xiên bằŋ vàŋ salômôn dã vwa zô bôʔam ɲữŋ xiên bằŋ dồŋ tʰế cɔ zaw nơʔi tăj kák kwan cáɲ tʰịvệ kɛɲzữ kửʔa kủʔa kuŋdiện vwa hễ xi nàʔɔ vwa vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰì kák kwan tʰịvệ kầm xiên dến dɔạn dɛm lạʔi vàʔɔ fòŋ kủʔa kwan tʰịvệ xi vwa hạmìɲ suốŋ kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê láɲ xỏʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ ziệt hếttʰảʔi lạʔi cɔŋ zuda kòn kó làɲ Ấʔi vậʔi vwa zôbôʔam cɔ mìɲ za bềnvữŋ cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm cịvì vả xi zôbôʔam lênŋôʔi tuổʔi dã mươʔi ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔibảʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tứklà tʰàɲ Ðứkzê dã cọn cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặŋ dặt zɛɲ ŋàʔi tạʔi dó kòn ŋườʔi naama ŋườʔi dànbà ʔammôn zôbôʔam diềʔu ák xôŋ zắp lòŋ kầʔu Ðứkzê kák kôŋviệk kủʔa zôbôʔam dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác cwiện kủʔa sêmaza dấŋ tiênci cɔŋ sác ʔidô dấŋ za fổ zôbôʔam ɣiêzôbôʔam hằŋ dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi ɲăw zôbôʔam ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ʔabiza kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi năm tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi vwa ɣiêzôbôʔam ʔabiza lênŋôʔi vwa zuda ŋườʔi kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi micaza kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔuziên ɣibê ʔa ʔabiza ɣiêzôbôʔam dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi ɲăw ʔabiza za cận vớʔi dạʔɔ ciếnsĩ mươʔi ŋườʔi kéncọn kòn ɣiêzôbôʔam zàn cận dốʔivớʔi ŋườʔi kó mươʔi ŋườʔi kéncọn líɲciến mạɲzạn ʔabiza dứŋ cên núʔi sêmazaim cɔŋ núʔi zaim nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔizê zôbôʔam kả ʔisơzaên xá ŋɛ bởʔi zawướk bằŋ muốʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã nướk ʔisơzaên cɔ Ðʔa cɔ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dến dờʔidờʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ saw zẫʔuvậʔi ɣiêzôbôʔam kɔncaj nêbát tôʔitớ kủʔa salômôn kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa cổʔi zậʔi fảnŋịc kùŋ cúʔa mìɲ ɲữŋ zudãŋ dồ fàm dềʔu lạʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi cúŋnó mìɲ za mạɲ ŋịc vớʔi zôbôʔam kɔncaj kủʔa salômôn kòn zôbôʔam tʰì cẻ tuổʔi ɲátɣan xôŋ cốŋkự nổʔi cúŋnó vậʔi bâʔizờ kák ŋươʔi tưởŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cốŋkự nổʔi nướk kủʔa Ðứkzê dã cɔ kák kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa kák ŋươʔi dɔàn dôŋ kó dɛm tʰeo kɔn vàŋ ɣiêzôbôʔam dã dúk tʰần kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó duổʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kɔncáʔu ʔazôn ŋườʔi lêvi saw kák ŋươʔi kó tʰeo fɔŋtụk kủʔa kák zân ŋɔạʔi lấʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔ mìɲ fàm ʔaj dến dɛm kɔn dựk bảʔi kɔnciên dựk dặŋ zâŋ tʰì dượk tʰầʔi kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰần hưxôŋ ɲưŋ fần cúŋta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta cúŋta cẳŋ kó lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔazôn dềʔu fụk Ðứkzê kák ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiữ fần việk kủʔa mỗʔi buổʔi sớmmaj buổʔi ciềʔu cúŋ sôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰuốk tʰơm cɔ Ðứkzê cúŋ kũŋ báɲ cầntʰiết cên sạcsẽ tʰắp kák dèn kủʔa cơn dènvàŋ dể cáʔi mỗʔi buổʔi ciềʔutốʔi cúŋta vâŋ ɣiữ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kòn kák ŋươʔi lạʔi di nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ cúŋta làmdầʔu cúŋta ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi kầm ɲữŋ tiếŋvaŋ dặŋ tʰổʔi ŋịc kùŋ kák ŋươʔi hỡʔi kɔnkáʔi ʔisơzaên cớ cɛɲ ciến kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰắŋ dượk dâʔu ɲưŋzê zôbôʔam cwiền biɲfụk di vòŋ dặŋ dến fíʔa săw cúŋ vậʔi kwân ʔisơzaên dằŋ cướk kwân zuda kòn biɲfụk dằŋ săw zuda sâʔi ŋó lạʔi kìʔa ɣiặk dã kó fíʔa cướk fíʔa săw kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứk ɣiê ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰổʔi bấʔizờ ŋườʔi zuda kêʔula tʰì Ðứkzê dáɲ ɣiêzôbôʔam kả ʔisơzaên tạʔi cướk ʔabiza zân zuda zân ʔisơzaên cạʔi cốn cướk zân zuda Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj zân zuda ʔabiza kwânlíɲ ŋườʔilàm cɔ cúŋ tʰwa cận kảtʰể kó nămmươʔi tiɲbiɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên bịtʰươŋ ŋã cết ɲưvậʔi cɔŋ lúk ấʔi zân ʔisơzaên sỉɲụk kòn zân zuda dượk tʰắŋ cúŋ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ʔabiza duổʔi tʰeo ɣiêzôbôʔam ciếm lấʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ bêtên kák hươŋtʰôn ɣiêsana kák hươŋtʰôn zôn kák hươŋtʰôn cɔŋ lúk ʔabiza kòn sốŋ ɣiêzôbôʔam cẳŋ dượk kườŋ tʰạɲ lạʔi Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi cết kòn ʔabiza dượk kườŋ tʰạɲ kướʔi mườʔibốn ŋườʔi sɛɲ dượk haimươʔihaj kɔncaj mườʔisáʔu kɔŋáʔi kák kôŋsự xák kủʔa ʔabiza ɲữŋ việklàm lờʔinóʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác cwiện kủʔa tiênci ʔidô ʔabiza ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa ʔasa kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi cɔŋ dờʔi ŋườʔi sứ dượk hòʔabìɲ mườʔi ʔasa diềʔu tʰiện ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kất kák bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰần ŋɔạʔibaŋ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw dập kák cụ tʰờ dáɲdổ ɲữŋ tượŋ ʔasêza ŋườʔi xwiên zuda fảʔi kầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ cúŋ kùŋ tʰeo luậtfáp diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ cừbỏ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw cụ tʰờ mặtcờʔi xỏʔi kák tʰàɲ kủʔa zuda nướk dượk bằŋan cướk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi sâʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ cɔŋ dất zuda cɔŋ mấʔi dó sứ hòʔabìɲ xôŋ kó ciếncận bởʔi Ðứkzê dã cɔ ŋườʔi dượk ʔanŋỉ ŋườʔi bảʔɔ zân zuda zằŋ ta hãʔi sâʔicất kák tʰàɲ nàʔi dắp vác tườŋ cuŋkwɛɲ zựŋ tʰáp kửʔa tʰɛn dươŋ lúk sứ hãʔi kòn tʰuộk cúŋta cúŋta kó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta cúŋta kó dượk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dã cɔ cúŋta bìɲan fíʔa cúŋ sâʔicất dượk tʰàɲkôŋ ʔasa tʰắŋ kwân tʰiôbi ʔasa kó dạʔɔ biɲ bamươʔi ŋườʔi zuda kầm xiên ɣiáʔɔ haimươʔitám ŋườʔiŋườʔi bêŋiəmin kầm tʰuẫn ɣiươŋ kuŋ hếttʰảʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn sêzác ŋườʔi tʰiôbi kéʔɔ dạʔɔ biɲ mộtcăm ŋườʔi bɛcăm kỗ sɛ za dáɲ ŋườʔi zuda di dến mazêsa ʔasa za dón ŋườʔi zàn cận tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ sêfata ɣần mazêsa ʔasa kầʔuxẩn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ zằŋ lạʔiÐứkzê cừ za cúʔa cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi ʔiếʔu tʰắŋ dượk ŋườʔi mạɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi ɣiúpdỡ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi nươŋkậʔi nơʔi cúʔa ấʔilà ɲơn zɛɲ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi dến dốʔidịc kùŋ dɔàn kwân nàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cớ dể lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰắŋ cúʔa Ðứkzê dáɲ zân tʰiôbi tạʔi cướk zân zuda vwa ʔasa kwân tʰiôbi cạʔi cốn ʔasa kwânlíɲ tʰeo ŋườʔi dềʔu duổʔi cúŋ cɔdến ɣêza kwân tʰiôbi ŋã cết ɲiềʔu dến dỗʔi cẳŋ kòn ɣượŋ lạʔi dượk cúŋ tʰwa cướk Ðứkzê dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋườʔizu da dɔạt dượk kủʔa ɣiặk zất ɲiềʔu kũŋ dáɲ kák tʰàɲ cuŋkwɛɲ ɣêza kiɲ xiếp kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên kák tʰàɲ dó zồʔi kwânlíɲ ʔasa kướp lấʔi hếttʰảʔi kủʔakảʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ ấʔi cɔŋ kó kủʔakảʔi zất ɲiềʔu lạʔi kũŋ dáɲfá kák cuồŋ súkvật dɛm di zất ɲiềʔu ciên lạkdà dɔạn cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm tʰầnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ ʔasaziə kɔncaj kủʔa dết ŋườʔi di za dón ʔasa nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ʔasa kả zuda bêŋiəmin hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰeo Ðứkzê cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰì Ðứkzê vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cừŋ nấʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ɣặp ŋàʔi dượk nếʔu kák ŋươʔi lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi tʰì ŋàʔi lìʔabỏ kák ŋươʔi lâʔu ŋàʔi ʔisơzaên xôŋ kó cúʔa tʰật xôŋ kó tʰầʔi zạʔizỗ kũŋ cẳŋ kó luậtfáp sɔŋ cɔŋ lúk xốnxó cúŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kầʔu ŋàʔi tʰì lạʔi ɣặp ŋàʔi dặŋ cɔŋ xi ấʔi zân kủʔa sứ fảʔi zốʔilɔạn ɲiềʔu za vàʔɔ xôŋ dượk bằŋ ʔiên nướk nầʔi ɣiàʔidạp nướk kiə tʰàɲ nàʔi ɣiàʔi dạʔɔ tʰàɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi dủ tʰứ xổ cɔ cúŋ zốʔilɔạn sɔŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi mạɲ lòŋ tăj kák ŋươʔi cớ ɲát việk kák ŋươʔi dượk fầntʰưởŋ xi ʔasa dã ŋɛ kák lờʔi nàʔi lờʔi tiênci kủʔa tiênci dết tʰì ɣiụk lòŋ mạɲmẽ cừbỏ ɲữŋ tʰầntượŋ ɣớmɣiếk xỏʔi kả dất zuda bêŋiəmin kùŋ xỏʔi kák tʰàɲ ŋườʔi dã dɔạt lấʔi cên núʔi zaim ŋườʔi lạʔi káʔi bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cướk kửʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin xác tʰuộk cifáʔi zaim manasɛ simêôn kiềʔu ŋụ vớʔi cúŋ kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên xi tʰấʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔasa kùŋ ŋườʔi tʰì dềʔu dằŋ ŋườʔi tʰáŋ mườʔilăm dờʔi ʔasa cúŋ ɲóm tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲằm ŋàʔi ấʔi lấʔi cɔŋ kák súkvật mìɲ dã dɔạt dượk zẫn bảʔicăm kɔn dựk bảʔi ŋàn kɔnciên Ðứkzê cúŋ twan ướk ɲăw hếtlòŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ ʔaj xôŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰì sửtử ɲỏ hăj hăj cúŋ kấttiếŋ tʰề kùŋ Ðứkzê zeo mừŋ tʰổʔi tʰổʔi kòʔi kảzu da dềʔu vuimừŋ lờʔi tʰề ấʔi cúŋ hếtlòŋ fát tʰề kầʔu Ðứkzê zồʔi cúŋ ɣặp ŋàʔi dặŋ Ðứkzê cɔ cúŋ dượk bìɲan fíʔa vảlạʔi maaka vwa ʔasa cứk tʰáʔihậʔu kủʔa dáɲdổ hìɲtượŋ ấʔi ŋiền di zồʔi tʰiêʔudốt cɔŋ cũŋ sếcôn sɔŋ kák nơʔi kaw xôŋ fá zỡ xỏʔi ʔisơzaên zầʔu vậʔi lòŋ ʔasa cọn làɲ kả dờʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dɛm vàʔɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê kák tʰáɲ kủʔa ca ŋườʔi ɲữŋ cíɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ hɔặk vàŋ hɔặk bạk hăjlà ɲữŋ xí zụŋ cẳŋ kó ɣiặkzã cɔdến tʰứ bamươʔi dờʔi ʔasa năm tʰứ bamươʔi sáʔu dờʔi ʔasa baêba vwa ʔisơzaên di dáɲ zuda kất dồnlũʔi zama dể cɔ zânsự kủʔa ʔasa vwa zuda xôŋ zavàʔɔ dượk xi ấʔi ʔasa lấʔi bạk vàŋ cɔŋ xɔ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê cɔŋ xɔ kủʔa kuŋ vwa ɣởʔi dến bêɲadát vwa sizi tạʔi Ðʔa mác zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi zawướk vớʔi ɲăw ʔiɲư tʰânfụ kủʔa tôʔi tʰânfụ kủʔa ôŋ dã kìʔa tôʔi ɣởʔi zâŋ cɔ ôŋ bạk vàŋ hãʔi di hủʔi ướk kủʔa ôŋ vớʔi baêba vwa ʔisơzaên dể ŋườʔi sa xỏʔi tôʔi bêɲadát ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi vwa ʔasa saj kák tướŋ dạʔɔ biɲ mìɲ di dáɲ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ciếm lấʔi ʔizôn Ðʔan ʔabênmaim kùŋ kák tʰàɲ xɔtàŋ kủʔa dất néptali sảʔi xi baêba hăj diềʔu dó tʰôʔi sâʔi dồn zama bãʔicôŋ việk vwa ʔasa ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda cúŋ lấʔi dɛm di dá ɣỗ baêba dã zùŋ sâʔicất zama zồʔi ʔasa zùŋ dồ ấʔi sâʔicất ɣêba mícba cɔŋ xi ấʔi dấŋ hanani dếnkùŋ ʔasa vwa zuda nóʔi zằŋ bởʔivì vwa nươŋkậʔi vwa sizi xôŋ nươŋkậʔi nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ôŋ dạʔɔkwân vwa sizi dã tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj ôŋ zân tʰiôbi zân libi cẳŋ fảʔi dạʔɔkwân dôŋ saw sɛ líɲ cẳŋ fảʔi ɲiềʔu zẫʔuvậʔi bởʔi vwa ɲờkậʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ tăj vwa vì kɔn kủʔa Ðứkzê sɔjsét xắp tʰếzan dặŋ ɣiúpsứk cɔ nàʔɔ kó lòŋ cọn tʰàɲ dốʔivớʔi ŋàʔi cɔŋ việk nàʔi vwa kó kưsử kác zạʔizột nàʔi săw vwa kó ɣiặkzã ʔasa nổʔizận dấŋ dɛm kầmtù ŋườʔi tạʔi việk ấʔi vwa tứkzận ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk dó ʔasa kũŋ mấʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa zânsự nầʔi kák kôŋviệk kủʔa ʔasa dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa zuda ʔisơzaên năm tʰứ bamươʔi cín dờʔi ʔasa cịvì ʔasa dăw cơn dến dỗʔi nặŋ cɔŋ kơn bịɲ ŋườʔi xôŋ Ðứkzê ɲưŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔitʰuốk ʔasa ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ ŋườʔi băŋà tʰứ mươʔi dờʔi ŋườʔi cịvì ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi nơʔi cíɲ ŋườʔi dã dàʔɔ cɔ mìɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa dể ŋườʔi cên káʔi ɣiườŋ dầʔi tʰuốk tʰơm cế tʰeo fép hòʔa hươŋ dɔạn ŋườʔita sôŋ hươŋ cɔ ŋườʔi zất ɲiềʔu ɣiôsafát kɔncaj ʔasa kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔilàm cɔ nướk mìɲ za mạɲ dể ŋịc kùŋ ʔisơzaên dặt ɲữŋ kơ biɲ nơʔi kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kủʔa zuda dồn cɔŋ sứ zuda cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ zaim ʔasa ca ŋườʔi dã ciếm lấʔi Ðứkzê kùŋ ɣiôsafát ŋườʔi di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi dầʔutiên kủʔa Ðʔa tổfụ mìɲ xôŋ kầʔu tʰần baɛɲ ɲưŋ kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ ɣiữ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi cớ cẳŋ ɲư ʔisơzaên vìvậʔi Ðứkzê xiến nướk vữŋcắk cɔŋ tăj ŋườʔi kả zuda zâŋ cɔ ɣiôsafát ŋườʔi dượk kủʔakảʔi ɲiềʔu viɲhiển ŋườʔi vữŋlòŋ tʰeo kák dườŋlốʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi fá zỡ kák nơʔi kaw ɲữŋ tʰầntượŋ ʔasêza xỏʔi zuda năm tʰứba dờʔi ɣiôsafát cịvì ŋườʔi saj kák tôʔitớ mìɲ bêɲaj badiə sɛcazi natʰanaên micaza di zạʔizỗ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ sứ zuda kó mấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi di vớʔi sêmaza nêtʰaniə sêbadiə ʔasaên sêmizamốt ɣiônatʰan ʔadôniza tôbiza tôbadôniza lạʔi kó ɣiôzam haj tʰầʔi kũŋ dinữʔa cúŋ kó dɛm tʰeo mìɲ sác luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê di vòŋ kák tʰàɲ sứ zuda zạʔizỗ zânsự Ðứkzê xiến kák nướk fíʔa kủʔa zuda kiɲhãʔi cẳŋ zám ciɲciến vớʔi ɣiôsafát kó zân filitin dɛm zâŋ cɔ ɣiôsafát ɲữŋ bạk kốŋ tʰuế ŋườʔi ʔa zạp kũŋ zẫn dến cɔ ŋườʔi ɲữŋ bầʔi súkvật bảʔi ŋàn bảʔicăm kɔnciên dựk bảʔi ŋàn bảʔicăm kɔn zê dựk ɣiôsafát kàŋŋàʔicàŋ kườŋ dạʔi cɔdến tộtbựk ŋườʔi sâʔicất cɔŋ sứ zuda ɲữŋ dềndàʔi tʰàɲ xɔtàŋ ŋườʔi kó ɲiềʔu kôŋviệk cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ zuda tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kó ɲữŋ líɲciến mạɲzạn Ðâʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi tùʔi tʰeo ɲà tổfụ zuda kó ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ ŋàn ŋườʔi làmdầʔu ŋườʔi lãɲ bamươʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi kó ɣiôhanan làmdầʔu ŋườʔi lãɲ haimươʔitám ŋườʔi mạɲzạn săw ŋườʔi nàʔi kó ʔamasiə kɔncaj kủʔa siếkzi ŋườʔi vujlòŋ zâŋ mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê ŋườʔi lãɲ haimươʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn vềbên zamin kó liəda ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ŋườʔi lãɲ haimươʔi kwân kầm kuŋ xiên ŋườʔi kó ɣiêhôsabát ŋườʔi lãɲ mườʔitám biɲ dềʔu sắmsửʔa za cận ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiúpviệk vwa cừ za ɲữŋ ŋườʔi vwa dặt cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ xắp sứ zuda ɣiôsafát dã dượk ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi viɲhiển sujza kùŋ ʔaháp kác mộtvàʔi ŋườʔi di suốŋ ʔaháp tạʔi samazi ʔaháp ɣiết ɲiềʔu ciên ănmừŋ ɣiôsafát zânsự tʰeo ŋườʔi zồʔi xwiên ŋườʔi di dáɲ zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôsafát vwa zuda zằŋ vwa dếnkùŋ tôʔi dáɲ zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát căŋ ŋườʔi dáp tôʔi kũŋɲư vwa zânsự tôʔi kũŋɲư zânsự vwa tôʔi kùŋ vwa di ciɲciến ɣiôsafát lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa ʔisơzaên zằŋ tôʔi sin vwa hãʔi kần Ðứkzê cướk dã vwa ʔisơzaên ɲóm kák tiênci bốncăm ŋườʔi hỏʔi zằŋ cúŋta kó dáɲ zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát hăjlà cẳŋ cúŋ dáp zằŋ hãʔi di Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj vwa ɲưŋzô safát zằŋ dâʔi kòn kó dấŋ tiênci nàʔɔ xák kủʔa Ðứkzê dể cúŋta hỏʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi căŋ vwa ʔisơzaên dáp vớʔi ɣiôsafát zằŋ kòn kó ŋườʔi micê kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêmla ɲờ ŋườʔi ấʔi kótʰể kầʔu Ðứkzê ɲưŋ tôʔi ɣét ŋườʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ nóʔi tiênci làɲ tôʔi zữ ɣiôsafát nóʔi sin vwa cớ nóʔi ɲưvậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ɣọʔi hɔạnkwan dến bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi dòʔi micê kɔncaj ɣiêmla dến lậptứk vả vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôsafát vwa zuda mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu mặk dồ ciềʔufụk dươŋ ŋồʔi cên ŋaj mìɲ nơʔi dạp lúʔa tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ samazi kòn hếttʰảʔi kák tiênci nóʔi tiênci cướk haj vwa sêdêkiə kɔncaj kênana lấʔi ɲữŋ sừŋ bằŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi vớʔi kák sừŋ nầʔi vwa báŋ zân sizi cɔdến xi ziệt cúŋnó kák tiênci dềʔu nóʔi mộtkác zằŋ hãʔi di dáɲ zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát vwa dượk tʰắŋ Ðứkzê fá tʰàɲ ấʔi vàʔɔ tăj vwa vả sứɣiả dã di dòʔi micê nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ nầʔi ɲữŋ tiênci dềʔu dồŋ tʰiɲ báʔɔkáʔɔ làɲ cɔ vwa vậʔi tôʔi sin ôŋ kũŋ hãʔi lấʔi lờʔi ɲư lờʔi kủʔa báʔɔkáʔɔ diềʔu làɲ ɲưŋmi cê dáp zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê hằŋ sốŋ ɣì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán zặn tʰì nóʔi cɔ xi ŋườʔi dã dếnkùŋ vwa vwa hỏʔi zằŋ hỡʔimi cê cúŋta kó dáɲ zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát hăjlà cẳŋ di ŋườʔi dáp hãʔi di vwa dượk tʰắŋ cúŋnó fó vàʔɔ tăj haj vwa vwa nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ biếtbaw dã lấʔi lờʔi tʰề buộk ŋươʔi ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê nóʔi cơn tʰật vớʔi micê dáp tôʔi tʰấʔi kả ʔisơzaên lạk cên kák núʔi ɲư bầʔi ciên xôŋ kó ŋườʔi căn Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ɲữŋ ấʔi xôŋ kó củ ʔainấʔi hãʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ bìɲan vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôsafát zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ nóʔi tiênci diềʔu làɲ việk tôʔi diềʔu zữ saw micê lạʔi vậʔi hãʔi ɲɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê tôʔi tʰấʔi Ðứkzê ŋự cên ŋôʔi ŋàʔi kòn kả dạʔɔ biɲ cên cờʔi dứŋ cầʔu hữʔu Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ʔaj di zụ ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên dể ŋườʔi di zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát ŋã cết dó zồʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi kác nàʔi nóʔi kác xák bấʔizờ kó tʰần di za dứŋ cướk Ðứkzê tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi di zụ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi zụ làmsaw tʰần tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ tôʔi di za tʰần nóʔizốʔi cɔŋ miệŋ kák tiênci kủʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán fảʔi ŋươʔi zụ ŋườʔi dượk hãʔi di ɲư lờʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi sɛm Ðứkzê dã dặt tʰần nóʔizốʔi cɔŋ miệŋ kák tiênci kủʔa vwa Ðứkzê dã fán ɣiáŋọʔa cên vwa sêdêkiə kɔncaj kủʔa kênana di dến ɣần micê nơʔi zằŋ tʰầnÐứkzê kó xỏʔi di ŋả nàʔɔ dặŋ mácbảʔɔ cɔ ŋươʔi micê dáp kìʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi cạʔi fòŋ nàʔi kwa fòŋ kiə dặŋ láɲ tʰì biếtdiềʔu dó vwa ʔisơzaên cwiền lịɲ zằŋ hãʔi micê zẫn dến ʔamôn kwan kaj tʰàɲ cɔ ɣiôác kɔncaj kủʔa vwa zồʔi hãʔi nóʔi vwa bảʔɔ ɲưvầʔi hãʔi ŋườʔi nàʔi lấʔi báɲ nướk xổ nuôʔi cɔdến xi cởvề bìɲan micê nóʔi nếʔu vwa cởvề bìɲan Ðứkzê xôŋ kó kậʔi tôʔi fán ŋườʔi lạʔi nóʔi hỡʔi cúŋ zân hếttʰảʔi hãʔi ŋɛ diềʔu dó vậʔi vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiôsafát vwa zuda dồŋ di zamốt tạʔi ɣa vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi vớʔi ɣiôsafát zằŋ tôʔi kảʔizạŋ ănmặk zồʔiza cận kòn vwa hãʔi mặk áʔɔsốŋ vwa vwa ʔisơzaên ănmặk kảʔizạŋ zồʔi haj ŋườʔi di za cận vả vwa sizi kó cwiền lịɲ cɔ kák kwan kaj sɛ mìɲ zằŋ cớ dáɲ ʔaj hɔặk ɲỏ hăj ɲưŋ cỉ mộtmìɲ vwa ʔisơzaên tʰôʔi sảʔi xi kák kwan kaj sɛ tʰấʔi ɣiôsafát tʰì nóʔi zằŋ Ấʔilà vwa ʔisơzaên cúŋ sâʔi lạʔi dặŋ dáɲ ŋườʔi ɣiôsafát kêʔula Ðứkzê tiếpkứʔu ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến cúŋ zaŋ sa xỏʔi ŋườʔi vậʔi sảʔi xi kák kwan kaj sɛ tʰấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi vwa ʔisơzaên tʰì tʰốʔi lạʔi cẳŋ duổʔi tʰeo nữʔa bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi tìɲkờ ɣiươŋ kuŋ vwa ʔisơzaên cúŋ ɲằm vwa nơʔi mốʔi ɣiáp dâʔu lạʔi ʔaháp nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi dáɲ sɛ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi kwăj kươŋ lạʔi dɛm za xỏʔi hàŋ kwân bịtʰươŋ nặŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tʰếcận kàŋ tʰêm zữzộʔi sɔŋ vwa ʔisơzaên dứŋ cên sɛ mìɲ dốʔimặt kùŋzân sizi cɔdến buổʔi ciềʔu ŋườʔi cết vàʔɔ lốʔi mặtcờʔi ɣiôsafát vwa zuda cởvề bìɲan nơʔi kuŋ mìɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiêhu kɔncaj kủʔa hanani dấŋ di za dón vwa ɣiôsafát nóʔi zằŋ vwa ɣiúpdỡ huŋák tʰươŋmến ɣɛŋét Ðứkzê saw bởʔi kớ dó kó kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê dến cên vwa ɲưŋ cɔŋ vwa kódiềʔu làɲ vwa kó cừziệt xỏʔi sứ ɲữŋ tʰần ʔasêza zắp lòŋ kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiôsafát tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi lạʔi di za sɔát zânsự bê ʔɛsêba cɔdến núʔi zaim zẫnzắt cúŋ cởvề kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi kwan sét cɔŋ xắp nướk tạʔi kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kủʔa zuda tʰàɲ nàʔɔ kũŋ kó zồʔi ŋườʔi bảʔɔ kák kwan sét zằŋ hãʔi kẩntʰận việk kák ŋườʔilàm cẳŋ fảʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kák ŋươʔi sétdɔán dâʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kùŋ kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ việk sétdɔán vậʔi bâʔizờ fảʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê xá kẩntʰận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta cẳŋ cáʔifép kôŋbìɲ cẳŋ tʰiênvị ŋườʔi cẳŋ ɲận kủʔa hốʔilộ lạʔizô safát kũŋ cọn mấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰầʔi cưởŋtộk kủʔa ʔisơzaên dặt tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ Ðứkzê dɔán sét fânsử việk kiệnkáʔɔ cúŋ dềʔu cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi zạʔi biểʔu cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê lấʔilòŋ cọn làɲ cuŋtín ɲưvậʔi hễ kó ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ dɛm dến cướk kák ŋươʔi việk cɛɲtụŋ nàʔɔ hɔặk dổ hwiết hɔặk fạm diềʔu zăn ɣiớʔi mạŋ fáp dộ tʰì kák ŋươʔi fảʔi zạʔibảʔɔ cớ fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ʔɛ kó kơn ɣiận ŋịc kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲưvậʔi xôŋ ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ mắk tộʔi nầʔi tʰầʔi kả ʔamaziə kwảnlý ɲữŋ việk tʰuộk Ðứkzê sêbadiə kɔncaj Íc cưởŋtộk cifáʔi zuda kwảnlý ɲữŋ việk tʰuộk vwa cướk kák ŋươʔi kũŋ kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi kwan kaj kák ŋươʔi xák làmviệk kác kan dởm Ðứkzê kùŋ ŋườʔi tʰiện săw kák việk nàʔi sảʔi kó zân môáp zân ʔammôn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mawnít kùŋ kéʔɔ dến dặŋ dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi ɣiôsafát bấʔizờ kó ŋườʔi dến tʰuật cɔ ɣiôsafát zằŋ kó dám kwân zất dôŋ kiə kủʔa nướk sizi dến dáɲ vwa kìʔa cúŋ dươŋ tạʔi hátsátsɔntʰama kũŋ ɣọʔilà ʔɛâŋêdi ɣiôsafát sợhãʔi zaw xắp sứ zuda fảʔi kiêŋ ŋàʔi zuda ɲóm lạʔi dặŋ kầʔu Ðứkzê kứʔuzúp ŋườʔita kák tʰàɲ zuda dềʔu dến dặŋ kầʔu Ðứkzê ɣiôsafát dứŋ cɔŋ hộʔi cúŋ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm tạʔi cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê cướk hàɲlaŋ mớʔi kầʔuŋwiện zằŋ lạʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ fảʔi cúʔa cên kák từŋ cờʔi saw há cẳŋ fảʔi Ðấŋ kwảncị muônzân nướk saw nơʔi tăj cúʔa kó kwiềntʰế năŋlựk cẳŋ ʔaj cốŋcả cúʔa cɔ nổʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ fảʔi dã duổʔi zân sứ nàʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi sứ ấʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi zaham bạɲữʔu cúʔa sảnŋiệp dờʔidờʔi saw cúŋ dã dó dã kất cɔ zɛɲ cúʔa dền tʰáɲ zằŋ nếʔu tajhọʔa ɣiáŋ cên cúŋtôʔi hɔặk ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ hɔặk dɔán fạt hɔặk zịchạc hăjlà kơn dóʔicém tʰì cúŋtôʔi dứŋ cướk dền nàʔi cướk cúʔa zɛɲ cúʔa cɔŋ dền nàʔi kêʔukầʔu cúʔa cɔŋ zannan cúŋtôʔi tʰì cúʔa zủ ŋɛ ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ cɔŋ lúk zân ʔisơzaên sứ zíptô cúʔa kó kấm lɔán dến sứ zân ʔammôn zân môáp ŋườʔiở núʔi sê ʔizơ zân ʔisơzaên sâʔi xỏʔi cúŋnó xôŋ ziệt cúŋnó di kìʔa cúŋnó báʔɔ lạʔi cúŋtôʔi zườŋ nàʔɔ dến twan duổʔi cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi sảnŋiệp cúʔa dã cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɲận lấʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ôʔi cớ tʰì ŋàʔi xôŋ sétdɔán cúŋnó saw vì nơʔi cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ kòn sứklựk ɣì dốʔidịc kùŋ dám kwân dôŋdảʔɔ nàʔi dươŋ dến dáɲ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ xôŋ biếtdiềʔu ɣì mìɲ fảʔi ɲưŋ kɔn cúŋtôʔi ŋửʔa côŋ cúʔa kảzu da dềʔu dứŋ tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê vớʔi kák dứʔa ɲỏ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ bấʔizờ tạʔi ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ tʰầnÐứkzê kảmdộŋ zahasiên kɔncaj sɛcazi cáʔu bênaza cắt ɣiêhiên cít matʰaniə ŋườʔi lêvi tʰuộk zòŋ ʔasáp fán zằŋ hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi zuda zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm kùŋ vwa ɣiôsafát hãʔi ŋɛ Ðứkzê fán cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲưvầʔi cớ cớ kiɲhãʔi bởʔi kớ dám kwân dôŋdảʔɔ nàʔi cận ɣiặk nàʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dâʔu kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔimaj hãʔi di suốŋ dón cúŋnó kìʔa cúŋnó di zốk sít kák ŋươʔi ɣặp cúŋnó nơʔi dầʔu cũŋ cướk dồŋ vắŋ ɣiêzuên cɔŋ cận nàʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kần ɣì cɛɲ ciến hãʔi zàn za dứŋ ʔiênlặŋ sɛm tʰấʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê kùŋ kák ŋươʔi hỡʔizu da ɣiêzusalɛm cớ cớ kiɲhãʔi ŋàʔimaj hãʔi di za dón cúŋnó Ðứkzê kùŋ kák ŋươʔi ɣiôsafát kúʔi suốŋ dất kả zuda zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm dềʔu suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê tʰờ lạʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔilê zòŋ kêhát zòŋ kôzê dềʔu dứŋzậʔi kấttiếŋ xɛnŋợʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên buổʔi sớmmaj cúŋ dềʔu cổʔi zậʔi tʰật kéʔɔ za dồŋ vắŋ tʰêkô ʔa dươŋ lúk cúŋ di ɣiôsafát dứŋ tạʔi dó nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi zuda zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm hãʔi ŋɛ xá tinkậʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi vữŋcắk hãʔi kák dấŋ tiênci ŋàʔi tʰì kák ŋươʔi dượk măimắn xi ŋườʔi dã ŋị vớʔi zânsự ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kasướŋ cɔ Ðứkzê mặk áʔɔ tʰáɲ di za cướk kơ biɲ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa zằŋ hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót ŋàʔi hằŋ kó dờʔidờʔi Ðươŋ lúk cúŋ xởʔi kahát ŋợʔixɛn tʰì Ðứkzê dặt fụkbiɲ sôŋ vàʔɔ zân ʔammôn zân môáp ɲữŋ núʔi sê ʔizơ dã dến dáɲ zuda kák zân ấʔi dềʔu bạʔi zânam zân môáp zấʔi dáɲ zân núʔi sê ʔizơ dặŋ ziệt cúŋnó di xi dã ziệt zân sê ʔizơ zồʔi tʰì cúŋ lạʔi cở ɣiết ɲăw xi zân zuda dến tʰápkɛɲ nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ ɲìn dến dám kwân dôŋdảʔɔ tʰì tʰấʔi ɲữŋ tʰâʔi sãʔi cên dất cẳŋ kó ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi dượk ɣiôsafát zânsự ŋườʔi dến kướp lấʔi tàʔi kủʔa cúŋ tʰấʔi kó ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi sákcết dồ kwíbáʔu kướp lấʔi cɔdến cừŋ dɛm di xôŋ dặŋ kướp lấʔi tàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi zất ɲiềʔu kwaŋàʔi tʰứtư ɲóm tạʔi cũŋ bêzaka dặt cỗ dó cũŋ bêzaka cɔdến ŋàʔinăj hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kùŋ ɣiôsafát di dầʔu cướk cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm kác vujvẻ Ðứkzê dã cɔ cúŋ vuimừŋ kớ kwân tʰùŋịc mìɲ dáɲbạʔi cúŋ ɣảʔi dờn kầm dờn tʰổʔi sáʔɔ cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm dến dền kủʔa Ðứkzê xi kák nướk tʰiêɲạ ŋɛ Ðứkzê dã dáɲ bạʔicwân tʰùŋịc kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰì lấʔilàm kiɲhãʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vậʔi nướk kủʔa ɣiôsafát dượk hòʔabìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ʔanŋỉ vậʔi ɣiôsafát vwa nướk zuda xi lênŋôʔi tʰì tuổʔi dượk bamươʔi ŋườʔi kaicị haimươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ʔasuba kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sili ŋườʔi di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ʔasa ca ŋườʔi xôŋ lìʔabỏ diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk Ðứkzê sɔŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cừbỏ kák nơʔi kaw zânsự cưʔa zốk lòŋ kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ɣiôsafát dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu cép tɔŋ cwiện ɣiêhu kɔncaj hanani cwiện ấʔi dã dɛm vàʔɔ sác kák vwa ʔisơzaên săw việk dó ɣiôsafát vwa zuda kếtzaw vớʔi ʔɛcasiə vwa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi nàʔi zất zanák haj vwa hộʔi ɲăw dặŋ dóŋ tàʔu di tazêsi dóŋ tàʔu tạʔi siôŋêbɛ xi ấʔi liêsɛ kɔncaj dava mazêsa nóʔi tiênci vwa ɣiôsafát zằŋ bởʔivì vwa kếtzaw vớʔi ʔɛcasiə Ðứkzê dã hủʔi fá kôŋviệk vwa ɲữŋ tàʔu xôŋ di tazêsi dượk ɣiôsafát ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa vớʔi tổfụ ŋườʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kó kák ʔɛm zuột tứklà ɲữŋ kɔncaj ɣiôsafát ʔasaziə ɣiêhiên sɛcazi ʔasaziə ʔu micaên sêfati ʔa kák ŋườʔi nàʔi dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsafát vwa ʔisơzaên vwa ca kó cɔ cúŋ ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi bằŋ bạk vàŋ ɲữŋ bửʔu vớʔi kák tʰàɲ vữŋbền cɔŋ sứ zuda ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ŋôʔi nướk cɔ ɣiôzam bởʔivì ŋườʔi kɔn cưởŋ xizô zam lênŋôʔi nướk ca mìɲ cɔ mìɲ mạɲmẽ lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết kák ʔɛm mìɲ mấʔi ŋườʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɣiôzam dượk bamươʔi haj tuổʔi xi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi di cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên tʰeo diềʔu ɲà ʔaháp dã ŋườʔi kó kướʔi kɔŋáʔi ʔaháp ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê ɲưŋ Ðứkzê dã zawướk vớʔi Ðʔa bởʔi ŋàʔi dã hứʔa zằŋ ŋọn dèn cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ ziệt ɲà Ðʔa cɔŋ dờʔi ɣiôzam dôm fảnŋịc kùŋ zuda vwa cɔ mìɲ ɣiôzam vớʔi kák kwan tướŋ kák sɛ kủʔa mìɲ bandêm cổʔi zậʔi kéʔɔ za dáɲ dôm dã vâʔi fủ mìɲ kák kwan kaj sɛ sɔŋ dôm zấʔi ŋịc xôŋ fụk zướʔi tăj zuda cɔdến ŋàʔinăj kũŋ cɔŋ lúk ấʔi lípna fảnŋịc xôŋ fụk zướʔi tăj ɣiôzam nữʔa bởʔivì ŋườʔi dã lìʔabỏ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw cɔŋ kák núʔi zuda suj cɔ zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰôŋzâm xiến cɔ zân zuda lầmlạk Ðấŋ tiênci ɣởʔi tʰơ cɔ ɣiôzam nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa tổfụ ôŋ dã fán ɲưvầʔi bởʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ɣiôsafát ca ŋươʔi lạʔi kũŋ cẳŋ di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ʔasa vwa zuda ɲưŋ dã di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên suj cɔ ŋườʔi zuda zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰôŋzâm ʔiɲư ɲà ʔaháp dã làmvậʔi kũŋ dã ɣiết kák ʔɛm ŋươʔi ɲà ca kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋươʔi nàʔi Ðứkzê ɣiáŋọʔa cên zânsự ŋươʔi cên kɔnkáʔi ŋươʔi cên kák ŋươʔi kùŋ cên kák tàʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi kòn cíɲ mìɲ ŋươʔi bịɲ cɔŋ ɣanzuột kàŋŋàʔicàŋ nặŋ cɔdến dỗʔi ɣanzuột zớt za vảlạʔi Ðứkzê xêʔu lòŋ zân filitin zân ʔa zạp ɣần zân tʰiôbi ŋịc vớʔi ɣiôzam cúŋ kéʔɔ dáɲ zuda vàʔɔ cɔŋ kả sứ dɔạt lấʔi kák tàʔi tʰấʔi cɔŋ kuŋdiện vwa kák vươŋtử kùŋ hậʔu fi kủʔa ŋườʔi di fu dếnnỗʔi cừ za ɣiôʔɛca kɔncaj ŋườʔi tʰì cẳŋ kòn lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kɔncaj nàʔɔ săw kák việk ấʔi Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi ŋườʔi xiến cɔ bịɲ bấtcị cɔŋ zuột ŋàʔi kwa tʰáŋ sảʔi kuốʔi tʰứ ɲì tʰì zuộtɣan ɣiôzam bịɲ zớt za ŋườʔi cết kác dăwdớn zữtợn zânsự xôŋ sôŋ tʰuốk tʰơm cɔ ŋườʔi ɲư dã sôŋ cɔ tổfụ ŋườʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi tʰì tuổʔi dượk bamươʔi haj ŋườʔi kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi kwadờʔi cẳŋ ʔaj tiếk ŋườʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa sɔŋ cẳŋ fảʔi tạʔi kák vwa zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôzam vwa tʰăjvì ŋườʔi dạʔɔkwân dến vớʔi zân ʔa zạp sôŋ vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân dã ɣiết kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi Ấʔi vậʔi ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ɣiôzam vwa zuda lênŋôʔi vwa ʔɛcasiə dượk haimươʔihaj tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi tứkvị ŋườʔi kaicị tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ʔatʰali kɔŋáʔi kủʔa zi ŋườʔi kũŋ di tʰeo kák dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ɲà ʔaháp ŋườʔi bàʔi mưʔu ɣiụk ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák ŋườʔilàm ɲữŋ diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê ɲư ɲà ʔaháp dã săw xi vwa ca kwadờʔi ɲà ʔaháp bàʔi mưʔu cɔ ŋườʔi ɣâʔi cɔ ŋườʔi bạʔihɔạʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰeo mưʔucướk kủʔa cúŋ di vớʔi ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp vwa ʔisơzaên dến zamốt tạʔi ɣalaát dặŋ cɛɲ ciến kùŋ hasaên vwa sizi zânsi zi cɔ ɣiôzam bịtʰươŋ ŋườʔi cởvề ɣícêên dặŋ cữʔa làɲ kák zấʔu tʰươŋ ŋườʔi dã tạʔi zama xi dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi hasaên vwa sizi ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj ɣiôzam vwa zuda di suốŋ ɣícêên dặŋ tʰăm bịɲ ɣiôzam kɔncaj ʔaháp việk ʔɛcasiə di dếnkùŋ ɣiôzam bởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣâʔi cɔ ŋườʔi bạʔihɔạʔi xi ŋườʔi dến nơʔi kùŋ ɣiôzam kéʔɔ za dáɲ ɣiêhu kɔncaj nimsi ŋườʔi Ðứkzê dã sứk zầʔu cɔ dặŋ cừziệt ɲà ʔaháp sảʔi dươŋ xi ɣiêhu cừziệt ɲà ʔaháp lạʔi ɣặp dượk kák kwan cưởŋ zuda kák kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm ʔɛcasiə fụk ŋườʔi tʰì ɣiết cúŋnó di ŋườʔi kũŋ ʔɛcasiə dươŋ tạʔi samazi ŋườʔita ŋườʔi zẫn dếnkùŋ ɣiêhu zồʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi di dɔạn côn ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ hắn kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsafát tứk ŋườʔi hếtlòŋ kầʔu Ðứkzê cɔŋ ɲà ʔɛcasiə cẳŋ kòn ʔaj kótʰể ɣiữ kwiền kaicị nướk dượk vả xi ʔatʰali kủʔa ʔɛcasiə tʰấʔi kɔncaj mìɲ dã cết cổʔi zậʔi ziệt kả zòŋzốŋ vwa zuda ɲưŋzô kɔŋáʔi kủʔa vwa bồŋ cộm ɣiôác kɔncaj kủʔa ʔɛcasiə dɛm xỏʔi vòŋ kák kɔncaj kwa ŋườʔita twan ɣiết zồʔi dể cɔŋ fòŋ ŋủ ɲưvậʔi ɣiôsabát kɔŋáʔi kủʔa vwa ɣiôzam tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada ɣiấʔu ɣiôác xỏʔi cướkmắt ʔatʰali ʔatʰali xôŋ ɣiết dượk ɣiôsabát ʔɛmɣáʔi kủʔa ʔɛcasiə ɣiôác ẩŋiấʔu vớʔi cɔŋ sáʔu tạʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn ʔatʰali kaicị cên sứ năm tʰứbảʔi ɣiêhôzada cɔ mìɲ mạɲ vờʔi kák kwan tướŋ kaj căm ŋườʔi ʔɛcasiə kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzôham Íc kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôhanan ʔasaziə kɔncaj kủʔa maasêza kɔncaj kủʔa ʔadaza lisafát kɔncaj kủʔa siếkzi zawướk vớʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi di xắp sứ zuda kák tʰàɲ zuda ɲóm ŋườʔi lêvi kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ʔisơzaên zồʔi dềʔu dến ɣiêzusalɛm kả hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu zawướk vớʔi vwa tạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiêhôzada nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ nầʔi kɔncaj kủʔa vwa kaicị tʰeo lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán kɔncáʔu Ðʔa nầʔi diềʔu kák ŋươʔi mộtfầnba cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi tứk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dến fiên cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɣiữ kửʔa mộtfầnba vàʔɔ cɔŋ kuŋ vwa mộtfầnba nơʔi kửʔa ɣiêsốt kòn kả zânsự nơʔi hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê cớ dể ʔaj vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋɔạʔicừ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák ŋườʔi lêvi fụk vàʔɔ bởʔivì tʰáɲ sạc kả zânsự ɣiữ mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔilê vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ vwa ʔaj vàʔɔ dền tʰờ tʰì ɣiết kák ŋươʔi xá tʰeo hầʔu vwa xi ŋườʔi di zadi vàʔɔ ŋườʔilê kả zuda dềʔu tʰeo lờʔi tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada dã zặn bảʔɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu lãɲ tʰủhạ mìɲ hɔặk ɲữŋ vàʔɔ fiên ŋàʔi hăjlà fiên ŋàʔi tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada xôŋ cɔ kák fiên dổʔi tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada fát cɔ kák kwan tướŋ kaj căm ŋườʔi ɲữŋ ɣiáʔɔ xiên ɲỏ kủʔa vwa Ðʔa dể cɔŋ dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi xiến zâncúŋ ʔainấʔi kầm biɲxí mìɲ hàŋ dứŋ cuŋkwɛɲ vwa zàʔi tʰeo bàntʰờ dền hữʔu dền cɔdến dền Ðʔɔạn cúŋ dɛm vươŋtử za dộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cên dầʔu ŋườʔi caw luậtfáp cɔ ŋườʔi zồʔi ŋườʔilàm vwa ɣiêhôzada kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi sứk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa xi ʔatʰali ŋɛ tiếŋ zânsự cạʔi cúktụŋ vwa tʰì di dếnkùŋ zânsự tạʔi cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê bà sɛm tʰấʔi vwa dứŋ cên káʔi tạʔi kửʔa vàʔɔ kák kwan tướŋ tʰổʔi dứŋ ɣần vwa kòn kả zânsự kủʔa sứ dềʔu vuimừŋ tʰổʔi lạʔi kó ɲữŋ kasướŋ ɣảʔi ɲạkxí ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔatʰali sé áʔɔ mìɲ zằŋ fản ŋụʔi fản ŋụʔi tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada dòʔi za kák kwan tướŋ kaj căm ŋườʔi dượk dặt tʰốŋ kwảndạʔɔ kwân biểʔu zằŋ hãʔi zẫn za ŋɔàʔi xỏʔi hàŋ kwân ʔaj tʰeo xá ɣiết bằŋ ɣươm tʰầʔi dã zạʔi zằŋ cớ ɣiết tạʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cúŋ dườŋ cɔ cở vàʔɔ kuŋ vwa bởʔi nơʔi kửʔa ŋựʔa vàʔɔ zồʔi cúŋ ɣiết tạʔi dó ɣiêhôzada zawướk vớʔi kả zânsự vớʔi vwa dể cúŋ zânsự kủʔa Ðứkzê kả zânsự dềʔu di dến miễʔu baɛɲ fá zỡ dập bàntʰờ hìɲtượŋ zồʔi ɣiết matʰan tʰầʔi kủʔa baɛɲ tạʔi cướk bàntʰờ ciếʔu tʰeo tʰứ Ðʔa dã dịɲ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiêhôzada zaw kák cứksự dền Ðứkzê vàʔɔ tăj ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dặŋ zân ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ ɣiêhôva kác kahát vuimừŋ ʔi tʰeo dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ tʰeo Ðʔa dã dịɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ dặt ɲữŋ kɛɲ kửʔa nơʔi kák kửʔa dền Ðứkzê hầʔu cɔ ʔaj ôʔuế ɣì dềʔu cẳŋ dượk vàʔɔ dó ŋườʔi lãɲ lấʔi ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ kaj căm ŋườʔi tướkvị ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân kùŋ kả zânsự kủʔa sứ zướk vwa dền Ðứkzê suốŋ di vàʔɔ kuŋ vwa bởʔi kửʔa cên zồʔi dặt vwa ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi nướk hếttʰảʔi zânsự kủʔa sứ dềʔu vuimừŋ tʰàɲ dượk bìɲ tịɲ vả cúŋ dã ɣiết ʔatʰali bằŋ ɣươm ɣiôác dượk bảʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi sibiə kwê bê ʔɛsêba ɣiôác diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê cọn dờʔi tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada ɣiêhôzada kướʔi haj cɔ ɣiôác ŋườʔi sɛɲ dượk ɲữŋ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi săw việk nàʔi ɣiôác kó dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲóm ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi di xắp kák tʰàɲ zuda tʰâʔu lấʔi tiềnbạk kủʔa kả ʔisơzaên dể hằŋ lạʔi káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi xá làmviệk nàʔi cɔ măw sɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi cì vwa vờʔi tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm ɣiêhôzada bảʔɔ zằŋ kớsaw ŋườʔi lêvi zuda ɣiêzusalɛm dɛm tʰuế môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê dã dịɲ cɔ hộʔi cúŋ ʔisơzaên fảʔi zâŋ cɔ cạʔi cứŋkớ vì ʔatʰali ŋườʔi dộkák kiə kák kɔncaj nàŋ dã fáhủʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó dã zâŋ kák tʰáɲ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê cɔ tʰần baɛɲ vwa cwiền zạʔi ŋườʔita dóŋ káʔi dể fíʔa ŋɔàʔi kửʔa dền Ðứkzê zồʔi ŋườʔita zaw cɔ xắp sứ zuda tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ʔainấʔi fảʔi dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰuế môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dịɲ ʔisơzaên tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ hếttʰảʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kả zânsự dềʔu vuimừŋ dɛm bạk dến vàʔɔ cɔŋ cɔdến dầʔi xi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰấʔi cɔŋ dựŋ ɲiềʔu bạk dɛm zaw cɔ vwa kiểmsɔát tʰơ vwa ŋườʔi kủʔa tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm dềʔu dến cút za zồʔi dɛm dể lạʔi cỗ kũ mỗʔi ŋàʔi ɲưvậʔi tʰâʔu dượk zất hiềʔu bạk vwa ɣiêhôzada zaw bạk ấʔi cɔ ɲữŋ kɔjsók kôŋviệk cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê tʰợ dẽʔɔ dá tʰợmộk dặŋ dền Ðứkzê kũŋ ɲữŋ tʰợ tʰợ dồŋ dặŋ sửʔa lạʔi dền Ðứkzê vậʔi kák tʰợ kôŋviệk ɲờ tăj việk dượk tʰàɲ cúŋ lạʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲư kũ cɔ vữŋcắk xi dã sɔŋ cúŋ dɛm bạk kòn zư lạʔi dến cướk vwa ɣiêhôzada ŋườʔita zùŋ bạk ấʔi ɲữŋ dồ dền Ðứkzê tứk ɲữŋ dồzùŋ việk fụŋsự kuộk ɲữŋ cén ɲữŋ xí zụŋ bằŋ vàŋ bằŋ bạk cọn dờʔi ɣiêhôzada ŋườʔita hằŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tạʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê vả ɣiêhôzada dã cởvề ɣià tuổʔi zất kaw zồʔi kwadờʔi lúk ŋườʔi tʰák dượk mộtcăm bamươʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa cuŋ vớʔi kák vwa ŋườʔi kó kôŋlaw cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kó hầʔu việk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dền kủʔa ŋàʔi săw xi ɣiêhôzada dã kwadờʔi kák kwan cưởŋ zuda dến cầʔu lạʔi vwa vwa ŋɛ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa cúŋ lìʔabỏ dền Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ fụk ɲữŋ tʰần ʔasêza kák hìɲtượŋ tạʔi kớ tộʔilỗʔi ấʔi kó kơn ɣiận kủʔa cúʔa ŋịc kùŋ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm Ðứkzê saj kák dấŋ tiênci dếnkùŋ cúŋ dể zắt cúŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cúŋ xôŋ cịʔu ŋɛ tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ sɛcazi kɔncaj kủʔa tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada ŋườʔi dứŋzậʔi cướk zânsự nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán ɲưvầʔi kớsaw kák ŋươʔi fạm kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ măimắn dượk dã lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kũŋ dã lìʔabỏ kák ŋươʔi cúŋ fảnŋịc vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰeo lịɲ vwa dá ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê Ấʔi vậʔi vwa ɣiôác xôŋ ɲớ dến ɲântừ kủʔa ɣiêhôzada ca kủʔa ʔɛcasiə dã cɔ mìɲ ɲưŋ ɣiết kɔncaj ŋườʔi di xi ŋườʔi cết tʰìkó nóʔi zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê sɛmsét báʔɔ lạʔi cɔ sảʔi xi dến kuốʔi tʰì dạʔɔ biɲ sizi kéʔɔ dáɲ ɣiôác cúŋnó lɔán dến zuda ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiết kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân zồʔi ɣởʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa kướp cɔ vwa tạʔi Ðʔa mác Ðạʔɔ biɲ sizi kéʔɔ dến kó ŋườʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fó dạʔɔ biɲ zất dôŋ vàʔɔ tăj cúŋnó bởʔivì dã lìʔabỏ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ ɲưvậʔi zân sizi sử hìɲfạt cɔ ɣiôác xi cúŋ dã di zồʔi cúŋ dể ŋườʔiở lạʔi dăw nặŋ kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi fảnŋịc kùŋ ŋườʔi kớ hwiết kủʔa kɔncaj tʰầʔi ɣiêhôzada ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi cên ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi cết ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa sɔŋ xôŋ fảʔi cɔŋ kák vwa nầʔi ɲữŋ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ŋườʔi sabát kɔncaj kủʔa simêát dờn ʔammôn ɣiôsabát kɔncaj simzít dờn môáp kòn việk kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kốŋ tʰuế ŋườʔi fảʔi kuộk dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰảʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác cwiện kák vwa ʔamasiə kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ʔamasiə dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị haimươʔi cín tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ɣiôʔadan kwê ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê sɔŋ lòŋ xôŋ dượk cọn làɲ sảʔi xi nướk ŋườʔi dượk vữŋcắk tʰì ŋườʔi sửtử ɲữŋ dầʔitớ dã ɣiết ca mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ sửtử kák kɔncaj cúŋ tʰeo diềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ ɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn zằŋ ca cẳŋ fảʔi cết kɔn kɔn kũŋ cẳŋ fảʔi cết ca sɔŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi cết tộʔi mìɲ ʔamasiə ɲóm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda kứ tʰeo họhàŋ kủʔa tổfụ zuda bêŋiəmin ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ kaj ŋàn ŋườʔi kaj căm ŋườʔi lạʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi haimươʔi tuổʔi kọŋ dượk bamươʔi ŋườʔi kéncọn za cận dượk kùŋ kó tàʔi kầm ɣiáʔɔ xiên ŋườʔi kũŋ mườʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ɣiá mộtcăm lâŋ bạk ɲưŋ kó ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi vwa dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên cớ kéʔɔ di vớʔi vwa Ðứkzê cẳŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kùŋ kák kɔncáʔu zaim kòn nếʔu vwa di tʰì hãʔi didi xá cɔ mìɲ mạɲmẽ ciɲciến di Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến vwa ŋã cướk kwântʰù Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó kwiền ɣiúp cɔ tʰắŋ kũŋ kó kwiền cɔ bạʔi ʔamasiə nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ kòn mộtcăm lâŋ bạk kiə dã fát cɔ dạʔɔ biɲ ʔisơzaên tʰìfảʔi làmsaw ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp Ðứkzê kótʰể cɔ vwa ɲiềʔu ấʔi vậʔi ʔamasiə fânzẽ dạʔɔ biɲ dã zaim dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi cɔ cúŋ cởvề ɲà tạʔi kớ ấʔi cúŋ ɣiận zuda cởvề ɲà lấʔilàm nóŋzận fừŋ ʔamasiə zạnzĩ kéʔɔ zânsự mìɲ dến cũŋ muốʔi dáɲ ŋườʔi kủʔa zân sê ʔizơ zâŋiw da bắtsốŋ ŋườʔi dɛm cúŋnó cên cót dá zồʔi cên cót dá sô cúŋnó suốŋ tʰảʔi dềʔu ɣiập cết kòn dạʔɔ biɲ ʔamasiə xiến cởvề xôŋ cɔ di za cận vớʔi mìɲ tʰì sôŋ vàʔɔ kák tʰàɲ zuda samazi cɔdến bếtʰôzôn dáɲ ɣiết ŋàn ŋườʔi tạʔi dó kướp lấʔi ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi xi dáɲ dượk zân dôm cởvề tʰì dɛm kák tʰần kủʔa zân sê ʔizơ tʰần kủʔa mìɲ kwì lạʔi cướk cúŋnó dốt hươŋ cɔ vìvậʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋ ʔamasiə ŋàʔi saj dấŋ tiênci dến nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ kớsaw ŋươʔi dicầʔu kák tʰần xôŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu dượk zântộk tʰờ lạʔi cúŋnó xỏʔi tăj ŋươʔi sảʔi xi dấŋ tiênci tâʔu vớʔi vwa tʰì vwa bảʔɔ ŋườʔi zằŋ ta ŋươʔi mưʔusĩ cɔ vwa saw hãʔi tʰôʔi di kẻʔɔ dáɲ ŋươʔi căŋ Ðấŋ tiênci tʰôʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã kwiếtdịɲ hủʔiziệt vwa bởʔivì vwa dã diềʔu ấʔi xôŋ ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi ʔamasiə vwa zuda mưʔu ŋị zồʔi tʰì saj dến ɣiôác kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca cáʔu ɣiêhu vwa ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến dể cúŋta tʰấʔi ɲăw ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên saj dến ʔamasiə vwa zuda nóʔi zằŋ kâʔi ɣaj liban kó saj dến nóʔi vớʔi kâʔi hươŋ liban zằŋ hãʔi ɣả kɔŋáʔi ŋươʔi cɔ kɔncaj sɔŋ kó kɔn tʰú dồŋ liban di ŋaŋ kwa ɣiàʔidạp kâʔi ɣaj di ŋươʔi nóʔi nầʔi dã dáɲ dôm lòŋ ŋươʔi lạʔi tựkaw xwej bâʔizờ xá cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi kớsaw cɔ mìɲ mắk họʔa xiến cɔ ŋươʔi zuda fảʔi saŋã ʔamasiə xôŋ ŋɛ lờʔi diềʔu dó zɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj tʰùŋịc bởʔivì cúŋ kó kák tʰần kủʔa dôm ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên kéʔɔ ŋườʔi ʔamasiə vwa zuda tʰấʔi ɲăw tạʔi bếtsêmết cɔŋ sứ zuda kwâŋiw da kwân ʔisơzaên dáɲduổʔi cạʔi cốn ʔaj cạʔi nấʔi tạʔibết ɣiôác vwa ʔisơzaên ʔamasiə vwa zuda kɔncaj ɣiôác cáʔu ɣiôʔɛca diệʔu ŋườʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dɔạn ŋườʔi fá kửʔa ɣók xúk zàʔi bốncăm tʰướk ŋườʔi lấʔi vàŋ bạk ɲữŋ xí zụŋ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó dôm kɔj ɣiữ kùŋ kák bửʔu kủʔa kuŋ vwa ŋườʔi kũŋ kầm zồʔi cởvề samazi ʔamasiə kɔncaj ɣiôác vwa zudam kòn sốŋ mườʔilăm nữʔa săw xi ɣiôʔɛca vwa ʔisơzaên dã băŋà kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ʔamasiə dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa zuda ʔisơzaên vả xi ʔamasiə sâʔi Ðứkzê săw tʰìkó ŋườʔi fảnŋịc kùŋ ŋườʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi cạʔi cốn dến laki sɔŋ ŋườʔita saj duổʔi tʰeo ŋườʔi dến laki ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi dó Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔita kó cở tʰâʔi ŋườʔi cên ŋựʔa côn ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ zuda cuŋ kùŋ kák tổfụ ŋườʔi kả zân zuda dềʔu siə vwa tʰế cɔ ʔamasiə ca ŋườʔi tuổʔi ŋườʔi dượk mườʔisáʔu săw xi vwa ca dã ʔaŋiấk vớʔi kák tổfụ ŋườʔi sâʔicất xôʔifụk cɔ zuda siə dượk mườʔisáʔu tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị nămmươʔi haj tạʔi ɣiêzusalam ŋườʔi ɣiêkôliə kwê ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu ʔamasiə ca ŋườʔi dã cɔŋ dờʔi sɛcazi ŋườʔi tʰôŋiểʔu kák zị tượŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰì siə zắp lòŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi bawlâʔu tʰì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến cɔ ŋườʔi dặŋ măimắn bấʔilâʔu ŋườʔi kéʔɔ za ciếncɛɲ vớʔi zân filitin dáɲdổ tườŋ tʰàɲ ɣát tườŋ tʰàɲ ɣiápnê tườŋ tʰàɲ Ác dốt ŋườʔi sâʔicất ɲữŋ tʰàɲ cɔŋ dịʔahạt Ác dốt tạʔi dất ŋườʔi filitin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi dượk tʰắŋ zân filitin zân ʔa zạp tạʔi ɣuzơbaɛɲ zân maôn zânam kũŋ tiếnkốŋ cɔ siə zɛɲtiếŋ ŋườʔi dồn dến kõʔi zíptô ŋườʔi dã cởnên zất kườŋ tʰạɲ siə kũŋ sâʔi ɲữŋ tʰáp tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cên kửʔa ɣók cên kửʔa cũŋ cên ɣók tườŋ cɔ vữŋcắk ŋườʔi kũŋ kất ɲữŋ tʰáʔɔ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ dàʔɔ ɲiềʔu ɣiếŋ kó ɲiềʔu súkvật cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ cên dồŋ kaw kũŋ kó ɲữŋ ŋườʔi làmzuộŋ cồŋ ɲɔ cên núʔi tạʔi kạtmên ŋườʔi tʰíc việk kɛɲnôŋ siə kó dạʔɔ biɲ dặn di ciɲciến kéʔɔ za cận tùʔi tʰơ ɣiêhiên kwan ɣiámtʰị maasêza dã kó hananiə dạʔitʰần kủʔa vwa kaikwản cọn kák cưởŋtộk tứklà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn haj ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi cúŋ kwản lãɲ dạʔɔ biɲ bamươʔi bảʔi ŋàn sáʔu căm ŋườʔi dềʔu hăj dáɲ ɣiặk kác mạɲzạn hầʔu ɣiúp vwa dốʔidịc vớʔi kừʔudịc siə sắmsửʔa cɔ kả dạʔɔ biɲ ɲữŋ xiên ɣiáʔɔ ɣiáp kuŋ ɲữŋ dá càɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi xiến tăj cếtạʔɔ ɲữŋ máʔi zùŋ dặt cên kák tʰáp cên cót dồnlũʔi dặŋ dá zɛɲtiếŋ ŋườʔi dồn za fươŋ sa bởʔivì ŋườʔi dượk cúʔa ɣiúpdỡ kác lạtʰườŋ cɔdến cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ sɔŋ xi ŋườʔi dượk cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dến dỗʔi ák fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền tʰờ Ðứkzê sôŋ hươŋ cên bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ tʰầʔi ʔasaziə vàʔɔ săw ŋườʔi kó mươʔi tʰầʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dồŋ di tʰeo cúŋ kản kự vwa siə zằŋ hỡʔi vwa cẳŋ fảʔi fần vwa sôŋ hươŋ cɔ Ðứkzê dâʔu fần kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu ʔazôn dã dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dặŋ sôŋ hươŋ vậʔi hãʔi di za xỏʔi dền tʰáɲ vwa dã fạmtộʔi lạʔi việk nàʔi Ðứkzê cẳŋ cɔ vwa dượk viɲhiển dâʔu siə nổʔizận ŋườʔi kầm nơʔi tăj káʔi bìɲ hươŋ twan sôŋ hươŋ daŋ xi ŋườʔi nổʔizận kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi fuŋ nổʔi nơʔi cán ŋườʔi cướk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣần bàntʰờ sôŋ hươŋ ʔasaziə tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm hếttʰảʔi tʰầʔi xák ŋó sɛm ŋườʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi bịɲ fuŋ nơʔi cán duổʔi ŋườʔi za xỏʔi dó cíɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ lậtdật za Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi ŋườʔi siə bịɲ fuŋ cɔdến ŋàʔi băŋà fuŋ fảʔi ởziêŋ za cɔŋ ɲà xák cẳŋ kòn dượk vàʔɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê nữʔa ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj ŋườʔi kwảnlý kuŋ vwa sétdɔán zânsự kủʔa nướk Ðấŋ tiênci saj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamốt dã biêncép kák kôŋsự xák kủʔa siə dầʔu dến kuốʔi siə ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ ŋườʔi ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cuŋ vớʔi tổfụ ŋườʔi tạʔi zuộŋ lăŋtẩm kủʔa kák vwa ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi fuŋ ɣiôtʰam kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiôtʰam dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔisáʔu tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ɣiêzusa kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sadốk ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu siə ca ŋườʔi dã sɔŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ vàʔɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê kòn zânsự lạʔi kàŋ luôŋtuồŋ nữʔa ŋườʔi sâʔi kửʔa cên kủʔa dền Ðứkzê sâʔi ɲiềʔu cên tườŋ tʰàɲ fên ŋườʔi kũŋ sâʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ cɔŋ núʔi zuda dềndàʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ tʰáp cên zừŋ ŋườʔi dáɲ ɣiặk vớʔi vwa zân ʔammôn tʰắŋ dượk cúŋ cɔŋ dó zân ʔammôn cɔ ŋườʔi mộtcăm lâŋ bạk kô zơ lúʔa kô zơ lúk mạc cɔŋ tʰứ ɲì tʰứba zân ʔammôn kũŋ tiếnkốŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi vậʔi ɣiôtʰam cởnên kườŋ tʰạɲ bởʔivì ŋườʔi di dườŋ cáɲ dáŋ cướk Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ɣiôtʰam hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ciếncận dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa ʔisơzaên zuda ŋườʔi dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔisáʔu tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ʔaŋiấk kùŋ mìɲ ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa dɔạn ʔɛca kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ʔɛca dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔisáʔu tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cẳŋ diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi dã ɲưŋ ŋườʔi di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi kủʔa kák vwa ʔisơzaên lạʔi kũŋ ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ dúk cɔ tʰần baɛɲ dốt hươŋ cɔŋ cũŋ kɔn hinôm tʰiêʔu kɔnkáʔi mìɲ nơʔi lửʔa tʰeo ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔidơzaên ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa sôŋ hươŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw cên kák ɣò nổŋ zướʔi kák kâʔi zậm vìvậʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi fó ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tăj vwa sizi kwân sizi dáɲ dượk ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ŋườʔi zất ɲiềʔu fu zẫn Ðʔa mác ŋườʔi kũŋ fó vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔ ŋườʔi fảʔi tʰấtcận kảtʰể vả fêka kɔncaj kủʔa zêmaliə ɣiết cɔŋ ŋàʔi mườʔihaj ŋườʔi zuda tʰảʔi dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn bởʔivì cúŋ dã lìʔabỏ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ siếkzi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dất zaim ɣiết maasêza kɔncaj vwa ʔazixam kwan kaj kuŋ vwa ʔɛânkana kwan tểtướŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ haimươʔi fu kả dờn kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kũŋ kướp lấʔi ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi dɛm samazi tạʔi dó kó dấŋ tiênci kủʔa Ðứkzê dết di za dón dạʔɔ biɲ daŋ cởvề samazi nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi bởʔivì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi nổʔizận kùŋ zuda ŋàʔi dã fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɣiết cúŋ cɔŋ kơn kămzận zữ kwá dến dỗʔi tʰấʔu dến cờʔi bâʔizờ kák ŋươʔi lạʔi twan fụk kák ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tôʔi caj ɣáʔi cɔ kák ŋưʔi saw kòn kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi saw vậʔi bâʔizờ xá ŋɛ cɔ ɲữŋ fu kák ŋươʔi dã cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ kák ŋươʔi xi ấʔi kó mấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân zaim ʔasaziə kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôhanan bêzêkiə kɔncaj kủʔa sêciə kɔncaj kủʔa salum ʔamasa kɔncaj kủʔa hátlaj dềʔu dứŋzậʔi ŋịc kùŋ ɲữŋ di dáɲ ɣiặk cởvề zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ dɛm ɲữŋ fu vàʔɔ dâʔi kák ŋươʔi twan diềʔu ɣâʔi cɔ cúŋta mắk tộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê dặŋ za tʰêm vàʔɔ tộʔi ák kủʔa cúŋta tộʔilỗʔi cúŋta tʰật cúʔa nổʔizận fừŋfừŋ kùŋ ʔisơzaên kwânlíɲ tʰả kák fu kủʔakảʔi tạʔi cướk kák kwan cưởŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã cướkdâʔi cổʔi zậʔi zẫn kák fu za lấʔi kủʔa kướp mặk cɔ kák ŋườʔi cɔŋ cầncuồŋ cúŋ mặk kwầnáʔɔ maŋ ɣiàʔi cɔ cɔ ʔuốŋ sứk zầʔu cɔ kùŋ dể ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔiếʔuduốʔi kỡʔi lừʔa zồʔi dưʔa kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ dến ɣiêzicô tʰàɲ kâʔi càlà dɔạn cúŋ cởvề samazi cɔŋ lúk dó vwa ʔɛca saj dicầʔu vwa ʔasizi tiếpkứʔu mìɲ vì zân dôm dã cởlạʔi dáɲ zuda zẫn ɲữŋ fu zânfi kũŋ sôŋ vàʔɔ kák tʰàɲ tạʔi sứ dồŋbằŋ tạʔi sứ zuda ciếm lấʔi bếtsêmết ʔazalôn ɣêdêzốt sôkô kák làŋ dịʔahạt tʰimna kák làŋ dịʔahạt ɣimsô kák làŋ dịʔahạt zồʔi cúŋnó tạʔi kák nơʔi ấʔi bởʔi kớ ʔɛca vwa zuda Ðứkzê kó zuda suốŋ ʔɛca dã suj cɔ zân zuda buôŋtuồŋ fạmtộʔi nặŋ kùŋ Ðứkzê tiếklát fimnêsɛ vwa ʔasizi dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi sɔŋ cẳŋ tiếpkứʔu cút nàʔɔ ʔɛca tʰâʔu lấʔi ɲữŋ dồ nơʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ kuŋ vwa cɔŋ ɲà kák kwan cưởŋ zồʔi zaw ấʔi cɔ vwa ʔasizi sɔŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋ tiếpkứʔu cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn vwa ʔɛca lạʔi kàŋ fạmtộʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋườʔi kúŋtế kák tʰần kủʔa zân Ðʔa mác zân dã dáɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ bởʔivì kák tʰần kủʔa vwa sizi dã fùcợ kúŋtế kák tʰần ấʔi hầʔu cɔ kák tʰần ấʔi kũŋ fùcợ nữʔa sɔŋlɛ cúŋnó ɣâʔi cɔ vwa kả ʔisơzaên fảʔi saŋã ʔɛca ɣóp lấʔi kák xí zụŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dập za dóŋ kák kửʔa dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dɔạn lấʔi cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ bàntʰờ cɔŋ mỗʔi nơʔi só ɣók kủʔa tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ sứ zuda ŋườʔi zựŋ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw dặŋ sôŋ hươŋ cɔ kák tʰần xák cọkzận ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi vả kák cwiện xák kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰóʔi kác ŋườʔi dầʔu dến kuốʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa zuda ʔisơzaên ʔɛca ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm sɔŋ xôŋ dể ŋườʔi nơʔi lăŋtẩm kák vwa ʔisơzaên sêciə kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi sêciə dượk haj tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị haimươʔi cín tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi ʔabiza kɔŋáʔi kủʔa sɛcazi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê ʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi dã tʰáŋzêŋ dầʔu ŋườʔi cịvì ŋườʔi kák kửʔa dền kủʔa Ðứkzê sửʔasaŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi dòʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dến cúŋ lạʔi tạʔi nơʔi fố fíʔa dôŋ bảʔɔ zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi lêvi hãʔi ŋɛ bâʔizờ xá zọn mìɲ za tʰáɲ zọn dền kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ tʰáɲ sạc kùŋ kất ɲữŋ diềʔu zơzáʔi xỏʔi nơʔi dền tʰáɲ di vì kák tổfụ cúŋta dã fạmtộʔi diềʔu ák cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi ŋảɲ xỏʔi nơʔi ŋự kủʔa Ðứkzê sâʔi lưŋ lạʔi ŋàʔi cúŋ lạʔi dóŋ kák kửʔa kák dèn xôŋ sôŋ hươŋ xôŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tạʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê kủʔa ʔisơzaên vìvậʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên zuda ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔi fó cúŋ vàʔɔ xổsở bạʔihɔạʔi cêbaj ʔiɲư kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi mìɲ nầʔi kớ ấʔi kák tổfụ ɣươm ŋã cết kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi fảʔi zẫn di fu bâʔizờ kó zawướk kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dể kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi lìʔa xỏʔi cúŋta hỡʔi kák kɔn cớ cì nữʔa Ðứkzê kó cọn kák ŋươʔi dầʔitớ ŋàʔi dể dứŋ cướk ŋàʔi hầʔu việk sôŋ hươŋ cɔ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi cổʔi zậʔi zòŋ kêát kó mahát kɔn kủʔa ʔamasaj ɣiôên kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasaziə zòŋ mêzazi kó kíc kɔncaj di ʔasaziə kɔncaj ɣiêhalêlɛ zòŋ ɣẹtsôn kó ɣiô ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa simma dɛn kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiô ʔa zòŋ lítsafan kó simzi ɣiê ʔiên zòŋ ʔasáp kó sɛcazi matʰaniə zòŋ hêman kó ɣiêhiên simê ʔi zòŋ ɣiêdutʰun kó sêmaza ʔusiên cúŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ lạʔi zọn mìɲ cɔ sạc zồʔi kứ tʰeo lịɲ vwa cwiền zạʔi lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê di vàʔɔ sạc dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰầʔi di vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dặŋ zọn cɔ sạc fàm diềʔu ɣì zơzáʔi tʰấʔi cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê lấʔi liệŋ za ŋɔàʔi nơʔi hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền zồʔi ŋườʔi lêvi lấʔi dɛm kwăŋ ŋɔàʔi tạʔi cɔŋ xɛ sếcôn ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋzêŋ cúŋ xởʔi việk zọn dền cɔ sạc kwaŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ ấʔi cúŋ dếnnơʔi kửʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ ŋàʔi zọn dền kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ sạc kwaŋàʔi mườʔisáʔu tʰáŋzêŋ kôŋviệk sɔŋ cúŋ vàʔɔ kuŋ vwa sêciə nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã zọn sạc kả dền Ðứkzê bàntʰờ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kák dồzùŋ káʔi báɲ cầntʰiết kák dồzùŋ lạʔi ɲữŋ xí zụŋ vwa ʔɛca kwăŋ cɔŋ dờʔi ŋườʔi cịvì lúk ŋườʔi fạmtộʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi dã sắpsửʔa lạʔi zọn za sạc kìʔa cướk bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê vwa sêciə zậʔi ɲóm kák kwan cưởŋ cɔŋ tʰàɲ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê dɛm tʰeo bảʔi kɔn dựk bảʔi kɔnciên dựk bảʔi kɔnciên kɔn bảʔi kɔn zê dựk dặŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi cɔ nướk cɔ dền tʰáɲ cɔ zuda vwa biểʔu ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔazôn zâŋ kák kɔn siɲ ấʔi cên bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê cúŋ ɣiết kák kɔn dựk tʰầʔi hứŋ lấʔi hwiết zảʔi cên bàntʰờ zồʔi ɣiết kák kɔnciên dựk zảʔi hwiết cên bàntʰờ cúŋ kũŋ ɣiết kák kɔnciên kɔn zảʔi hwiết cên bàntʰờ Ðʔɔạn cúŋ dɛm kák kɔn zê dựk zùŋ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi lạʔi ɣần tạʔi cướk vwa hộʔi cúŋ dặt tăj mìɲ cên cúŋnó zồʔi tʰầʔi ɣiết cúŋnó hứŋ lấʔi hwiết zảʔi cên bàntʰờ dặŋ cuộk tộʔi cɔ kả ʔisơzaên vwa kó zạʔi zằŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa cuộk tộʔi fảʔi zâŋ kả ʔisơzaên vwa dặt ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê kầm cập cỏʔa dờn kầm dờn tùʔi tʰeo dịɲ kủʔa Ðʔa kủʔa ɣát dấŋ kủʔa vwa kủʔa tiênci natʰan dịɲ ấʔi zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê kậʔi kák tiênci ŋàʔi zạʔi biểʔu kák ŋườʔi lêvi dứŋ kầm ɲạkxí kủʔa Ðʔa kòn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kầm kòʔi sêciə cwiền zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dươŋ lúk xởʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tʰì xởʔi bàʔi ka xɛnŋợʔi Ðứkzê kó kòʔi tʰổʔi ɲạkxí kủʔa Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên họʔa tʰêm kả hộʔi cúŋ tʰờ lạʔi ŋườʔi kahát dềʔu tʰổʔi dềʔu tʰổʔi cɔdến dã sôŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu dɔạn xi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu sɔŋ vwa kák ŋườʔiở vớʔi vwa kúʔi suốŋ tʰờ lạʔi vảlạʔi vwa sêciə kák kwan cưởŋ biểʔu ŋườʔi lêvi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê bằŋ lờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa kủʔa ʔasáp dấŋ cúŋ ŋợʔixɛn kác vuimừŋ zồʔi kúʔi dầʔu suốŋ tʰờ lạʔi sêciə kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ bâʔizờ kák ŋươʔi dã mìɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê vậʔi hãʔi dến ɣần dɛm ɲữŋ hisiɲ kủʔa kảmtạ vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê hộʔi cúŋ zẫn dến ɲữŋ hisiɲ kủʔa kảmtạ kòn nàʔɔ vujlòŋ tʰì dɛm zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu số kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hộʔi cúŋ dɛm dến bảʔi mươʔi kɔn dựk mộtcăm kɔnciên dựk haj căm kɔnciên kɔn zùŋ kák tʰú dó kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê kũŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ sáʔu căm kɔn dựk ŋàn kɔn cừʔu sɔŋ tʰầʔi cỉ kó kwá xôŋ dủ za kák kɔn siɲ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu vìvậʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiúpdỡ cɔdến xi sɔŋ kôŋviệk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dã zọn mìɲ tʰáɲ sạc ŋườʔi lêvi kó lòŋtʰàɲ zọn mìɲ tʰáɲ sạc ɲữŋ tʰầʔi lạʔi kũŋ kó ɲiềʔu kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù kwán kặp tʰeo mỗʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu vậʔi kuộk cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê dã lạʔi zồʔi sêciə kả zânsự dềʔu vuimừŋ diềʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã sắmsửʔa cɔ zânsự bởʔi kôŋviệk ấʔi tʰìɲlìɲ tʰàɲ sêciə saj dến kả ʔisơzaên zuda kũŋ tʰơ cɔ ŋườʔi zaim ŋườʔi manasɛ dòʔi cúŋ tớʔi dền Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dặŋ ɣiữ vượt kwa cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên vwa kák kwan cưởŋ kùŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ ɣiêzusalɛm hộʔiŋị ɲăw dịɲ zự vượt kwa cɔŋ tʰáŋ haj cúŋ xôŋtʰể zự cɔŋ lúk ấʔi bởʔi tʰầʔi zọn mìɲ tʰáɲ sạc xôŋ dủ zânsự cưʔa ɲóm lạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm vwa kả hộʔi cúŋ dềʔu lấʔi việk ấʔi fảʔi ɲấtdịɲ zaw cwiền xắp sứ ʔisơzaên bê ʔɛsêba cɔdến Ðʔan xiến ŋườʔita dến zự vượt kwa kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lâʔunăj cúŋ xôŋ kó zự ấʔi ɲư dã cép cɔŋ vậʔi kák cạm vâŋ mạŋ dɛm tʰơ kủʔa vwa kủʔa kák kwan cưởŋ di xắp sứ ʔisơzaên sứ zuda tʰơ zằŋ hỡʔi kɔncáʔu ʔisơzaên hãʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham kủʔa ʔisák kủʔa ʔisơzaên hầʔu cɔ ŋàʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ kòn lạʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj kák vwa ʔasizi cớ ɣiốŋ ɲư tổfụ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ dến dỗʔi ŋàʔi fó cúŋ vàʔɔ bạʔi ɲư kák ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi bâʔizờ cớ kứŋkổ ɲư tổfụ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiơ tăj mìɲ za cɔ Ðứkzê vàʔɔ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dờʔidờʔi hầʔu việk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dể kơn ɣiận fừŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi sâʔi xỏʔi kák ŋươʔi vì nếʔu kák ŋươʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê tʰì ʔɛɲɛm kɔnkáʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dượk cướk ɲữŋ fu dượk cởvề cɔŋ sứ nàʔi bởʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kó lòŋ ɲântừ hăj tʰươŋsót xôŋ sâʔi xỏʔi kák ŋươʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ ŋàʔi kák cạm tʰàɲ nàʔi kwa tʰàɲ kiə cɔŋ xắp sứ zaim manasɛ cɔdến
