dất sanulôn sɔŋ ŋườʔita cêkườʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ cúŋ zầʔu vậʔi kũŋ kó mấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔasɛ manasɛ sabulôn cịʔu hạmìɲ suốŋ dến ɣiêzusalɛm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ kảmdộŋ ŋườʔi zuda dồŋlòŋ vâŋ mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa vwa kák kwan cưởŋ dã cwiền za tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰáŋ haj kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ɲóm lạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm hộʔi zất dôŋdảʔɔ dặŋ ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn cúŋ cổʔi zậʔi kất kák bàntʰờ cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm ɲữŋ bìɲ dốt hươŋ zồʔi dɛm liệŋ cɔŋ xɛ sếcôn ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋ haj ŋườʔita ɣiết kɔn siɲ vượt kwa kòn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰì lấʔilàm hổtʰẹn zọn mìɲ tʰɛɲsạc dɛm ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê cúŋ dềʔu dứŋ cɔŋ cỗ mìɲ tʰeo tʰườŋlệ dã dịɲ cɔŋ luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɲận lấʔi hwiết nơʔi tăj ŋườʔi lêvi zảʔi za cɔŋ hộʔi cúŋ kòn ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cưʔa zọn mìɲ tʰɛɲsạc vìvậʔi ŋườʔi lêvi fảʔi ɣiết zâŋ kɔn siɲ vượt kwa tʰế cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ tʰɛɲsạc dể tʰɛɲsạc cɔ Ðứkzê vì cɔŋ zânsự ɲấtlà cɔŋ zân zaim manasɛ ʔisaka sabulôn kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi xôŋ zọn mìɲ tʰɛɲsạc lạʔi vượt kwa cẳŋ tʰeo dã cép sêciə kó kầʔuŋwiện cɔ cúŋ zằŋ ŋwiệnÐứkzê Ðấŋ ɲântừ tʰa tộʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã hếtlòŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mặkzầʔu xôŋ tʰeo tẩʔiuế kủʔa dền tʰáɲ zọn mìɲ cɔ tʰɛɲsạc Ðứkzê zủ ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa sêciə cữʔa làɲ cɔ zânsự ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kác vujvẻ ŋườʔi lêvi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋàʔi nàʔi saŋ ŋàʔiciə zùŋ ɲạkxí mừŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê sêciə nóʔi ʔanủʔi lòŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi tʰôŋ sáŋ hiểʔubiết kuộk tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkzê cúŋ cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰù kảmtạ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ kả hộʔi cúŋ kwiếtdịɲ ɣiữ tʰêm bảʔi ŋàʔi zồʔi cúŋ vujvẻ ɣiữ tʰêm bảʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa vì sêciə vwa zuda dã cɔ hộʔi cúŋ mộtŋàn kɔn dựk bảʔi ŋàn kɔnciên kák kwan cưởŋ kũŋ cɔ hộʔi cúŋ mộtŋàn kɔn dựk mườʔi ŋàn kɔnciên lạʔi kó ɲiềʔu tʰầʔi zọn mìɲ za tʰɛɲsạc kả hộʔi cúŋ zuda vớʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi hộʔi cúŋ dến ʔisơzaên kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ tʰì kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi tʰì kiềʔu ŋụ cɔŋ sứ zuda tʰảʔi dềʔu vuimừŋ Ấʔi vậʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kó vuimừŋ kảtʰể dờʔi salômôn kɔncaj Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm cẳŋ kó ɣì ɲưvậʔi Ðʔɔạn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dứŋzậʔi cúk fướk cɔ zânsự tiếŋ kủʔa cúŋ dượk ɲậm lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện cúŋ tʰấʔu dếnnơʔi ŋự tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê cên kák từŋ cờʔi xi kák việk ấʔi dã sɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kómặt tạʔi dó di za kák tʰàɲ zuda dập ɲữŋ cụ tʰờ dáɲdổ kák tʰần ʔasêza fá zỡ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw kák bàntʰờ cɔŋ xắp dất zuda bêŋiəmin zaim manasɛ cɔdến xi dã fáhủʔi hếttʰảʔi Ðʔɔạn hếttʰảʔi zân ʔisơzaên ʔainấʔi dềʔu cởvề tʰàɲ mìɲ nơʔi sảnŋiệp mìɲ sêciə lạʔi kák tʰứ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi tùʔi tʰeo fần việk kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kủʔa tʰù dặŋ fụŋsự kảmtạ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa tạʔi nơʔi kák kửʔa cạʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi kũŋ dịɲ fần vwa fảʔi lấʔi cɔŋ tàʔisản mìɲ dặŋ zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu buổʔi sớmmaj buổʔi ciềʔu kùŋ zùŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ cɔŋ kák nàʔi cọŋtʰể ʔiɲư dã cép cɔŋ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi kũŋ cwiền cɔ zânsự tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm fảʔi kuŋkấp fần kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi hầʔu cɔ cúŋ cwiện lɔ ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê xi cỉzụ kủʔa vwa mớʔi cwiền za tʰì zân ʔisơzaên dɛm dến zất ɲiềʔu dầʔu mùʔa ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu ɲữŋ tʰổsản xák cúŋ dɛm dến fần mườʔi kủʔa mọʔi tʰật zất ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi zuda cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ sứ zuda kũŋ dềʔu dɛm dến fần mườʔi ciên kùŋ fần mườʔi kák dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋ zồʔi dể za từŋ dốŋ tʰáŋ tʰứba cúŋ xởʔi ɣɔm lạʔi từŋ dốŋ kwa dến tʰáŋ bảʔi mớʔi sɔŋ xi sêciə kák kwan cưởŋ dến tʰấʔi kák dốŋ ấʔi tʰì ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê cúk fướk cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kủʔa ŋàʔi sêciə hỏʔitʰăm ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tíc ɲữŋ dốŋ ấʔi ʔasaziə tʰầʔi kả zòŋ sadốk tʰưʔa lạʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ từ xi zânsự xởʔi dɛm vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê tʰì cúŋtôʔi kóăn dượk dầʔidủ kòn zư lạʔi ɲiềʔu Ðứkzê dã fướk cɔ zânsự ŋàʔi kòn sốɲiềʔu nàʔi ấʔilà fần zư lạʔi sêciə cwiền zọnzẹp kák fòŋ cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê ŋườʔita zọnzẹp zồʔi dɛm vàʔɔ kác ŋăitʰẳŋ kák tʰuế fần mườʔi kák tʰáɲ kônaniə ŋườʔi lêvi kaikwản ɲữŋ ấʔi simê ʔi ʔɛm ŋườʔi fó kòn ɣiêhiên ʔasasiə nahát ʔasaên ɣiêzimốt ɣiôsabát ɣítmakiə mahát bênaza dềʔu kɔjsók zướʔi kwiền kônaniə simê ʔi ʔɛm ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa vwa sêciə ʔasaziə ŋườʔi kaicị dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kôzê kɔncaj kủʔa zimna ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiữ kửʔa fíʔa dôŋ dượk dặt kaikwản kák lạk zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặŋ fânfát kák zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ zất tʰáɲ zướʔi tăj ŋườʔi kó dɛn miŋiəmin ɣiêswa sêmaza ʔamaziə sêkaniə cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ tʰầʔi dặŋ fânfát ấʔi kác kôŋbìɲ cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ hɔặk ɲỏ hăj tʰaw tʰứ kủʔa ŋɔạʔicừ ɲữŋ diɲ dã vàʔɔ za fổ tuổʔi tứk ɲữŋ tʰeo tʰứ mìɲ vàʔɔ dền Ðứkzê dặŋ fụŋsự cɔŋ cứk mìɲ làmviệk ŋàʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi lạʔi fânfát cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dã tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ ɣi vàʔɔ za fổ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi haimươʔi tuổʔi tùʔi tʰeo cứkfận tʰứ kủʔa kùŋ fânfát cɔ hếttʰảʔi kɔnɲỏ kủʔa kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi tứk kả hộʔi cúŋ ɣi vàʔɔ za fổ cúŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ ziêŋ za dặŋ tʰáɲ kòn kɔncáʔu ʔazôn tứklà ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ zảʔizák nơʔi dịʔahạt kák tʰàɲ kủʔa tʰìkó dặt cɔŋ mỗʔi tʰàɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣọʔi từŋ dặŋ fânfát fần cɔ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔ ɲữŋ cɔŋ vòŋ ŋườʔi lêvi dã ɣi vàʔɔ za fổ cɔŋ xắp zuda sêciə ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔilàm ɲữŋ diềʔu làɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ cơn tʰàɲ tạʔi cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák việk ŋườʔilàm hɔặk kwảnlý fụkzịc nơʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hɔặk tʰeo luậtfáp hăjlà diềʔu zăn dặŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi hếtlòŋ dượk hɛɲtʰôŋ săw kák việk nàʔi tʰàɲ nàʔi tʰì sancêzíp lɔán dến cɔŋ sứ zuda vâʔi kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kó lấʔi xi sêciə tʰấʔi sancêzíp dã dến twan dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì ŋườʔi hộʔiŋị vớʔi kák kwan cưởŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn dặŋ ŋăn nướk suốʔi ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi zânsự ɲóm lạʔi dôŋ cận kák suốʔi kák xɛ cảʔi ɣiữ sứ zằŋ làmɣì dể cɔ vwa ʔasizi dến tʰấʔi kó nướk ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi kandảm sâʔidắp vác tʰàɲ dã lủŋ sâʔi dến tʰáp zồʔi lạʔi sâʔi káʔi vác xák fíʔa ŋɔàʔi ŋườʔilàm cɔ vữŋcắk milô cɔŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa cế ɲiềʔu kâʔi law kùŋ xiên ŋườʔi ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ cên zânsự zồʔi cúŋ lạʔi ɣần mìɲ tạʔi fố kửʔa tʰàɲ nóʔi dộŋlòŋ cúŋ zằŋ xá vữŋlòŋ bềncí cớ cớ kiɲhãʔi cướk vwa ʔasizi dám kwân dôŋdảʔɔ tʰeo ŋườʔi kó Ðấŋ kùŋ cúŋta tʰắŋ vớʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi cỉ káɲtăj sáktʰịt kòn vớʔi cúŋta kó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta dặŋ ɣiúpdỡ ciếncɛɲ tʰế cɔ cúŋta zânsự nươŋkậʔi nơʔi lờʔi kủʔa sêciə vwa zuda săw việk ấʔi sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi vớʔi kả dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi hãʔi kòn vâʔi laki kó saj kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi dến sêciə zân zuda tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm nóʔi zằŋ sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi nóʔi ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi nươŋkậʔi diềʔu ɣì cịʔu ởvậʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ɲưtʰế sêciə nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta xỏʔi tăj vwa ʔasizi ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi zỗzàɲ kák ŋươʔi dặŋ fó kák ŋươʔi dóʔixát cɔ cết hăjsaw cớ tʰì cẳŋ fảʔi cíɲ sêciə nàʔi dã kất ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw bàntʰờ kủʔa ŋàʔi zồʔi biểʔu zân zuda ɣiêzusalɛm zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xá tʰờ lạʔi cướk bàntʰờ cỉ sôŋ hươŋ tạʔi cên dó tʰôʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ biếtdiềʔu tổfụ dã cɔ kák zân tʰiêɲạ saw kák tʰần kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk tʰiêɲạ ɣiảʔicứʔu sứ cúŋnó dượk xỏʔi tăj nộʔi cɔŋ kák tʰần kủʔa ɲữŋ zântộk tổfụ dã ziệt di kó tʰần nàʔɔ ɣiảʔicứʔu zân mìɲ cɔ xỏʔi tăj căŋ zễ kó mộtmìɲ tʰần kák ŋươʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi dượk xỏʔi tăj cớ vậʔi bâʔizờ cớ dể sêciə fỉɲ ɣạt xwiên zụ kák ŋươʔi ɲưtʰế kák ŋươʔi cớ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kó tʰần kủʔa zân nàʔɔ nướk nàʔɔ ɣiảʔicứʔu zân mìɲ dượk xỏʔi tăj hăjlà xỏʔi tăj tổfụ huốŋci Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi tăj kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi lạʔi kòn nóʔi ŋịc kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰật ŋịc kùŋ sêciə tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰơ sỉɲụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên nóʔi fạm dến ŋàʔi zằŋ hễ tʰần kủʔa kák zântộk tʰiêɲạ cẳŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu zân mìɲ xỏʔi tăj tʰếnàʔɔ tʰì tʰần kủʔa sêciə kũŋ cẳŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu dượk zânsự ŋườʔi xỏʔi tăj tʰếấʔi cúŋ nóʔi bằŋ tiếŋ zuda cɔ zân ɣiêzusalam cên vác tʰàɲ dặŋ cɔ cúŋ hɔảŋ dể lấʔi tʰàɲ cúŋ lạʔi nóʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ɣiêzusalɛm ɲưtʰể kák tʰần kủʔa zân tʰiêɲạ dềʔu kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋườʔita za vwa sêciə tiênci saj kɔncaj ʔamốt kầʔuŋwiện việk nàʔi kêʔula tʰấʔu dến cờʔi Ðứkzê saj tʰiênsứ ziệt ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kák kwan cưởŋ kák kwan tướŋ cɔŋ cạʔi kwân kủʔa vwa ʔasizi ŋườʔi cởvề cɔŋ sứ mìɲ hổtʰẹn xi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ miễʔu tʰần mìɲ kó ɲữŋ bởʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi sɛɲ za dềʔu lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi dó ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê kứʔu sêciə zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm xỏʔi tăj sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi xỏʔi tăj mọʔi ŋườʔi xák kùŋ fùhộ cɔ cúŋ kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi dɛm ɲữŋ dến zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲữŋ kwíbáʔu cɔ sêciə vwa zuda xi ấʔi săw ŋườʔi dượk kaw cướk kák nướk cɔŋ lúk ấʔi sêciə dăw hòŋ cết ŋườʔi kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán kùŋ ŋườʔi cɔ ŋườʔi zấʔu ɲưŋ sêciə cẳŋ báʔɔdáp lạʔi cúʔa ŋườʔi dã lãɲ lòŋ ŋườʔi tựkaw kó kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa cúʔa nổʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi kùŋ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm sɔŋ sêciə tựkaw cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ suốŋ ŋườʔi zânkư ɣiêzusalɛm kũŋ vậʔi cɔŋ dờʔi sêciə kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê xôŋ ɣiáŋ cên cúŋ sêciə dượk zất ɣiàʔu zất saŋ ŋườʔi kất ɲữŋ xɔ dể cử bạk vàŋ dá kwí tʰuốk tʰơm xiên kák tʰứ xíɣiớʔi tốtdẹp ɲữŋ dặŋ cứʔa ŋũkốk zượʔu zầʔu ɲữŋ cuồŋ dể ɲốt kák tʰứ tʰúvật bầʔi ciên bầʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ sâʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ kó ɲiềʔu bầʔi ciên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋườʔi zất ɲiềʔu kủʔakảʔi Ấʔilà sêciə nàʔi ŋuồn cên kủʔa nướk ɣihôn zẫn cảʔi ŋầm zướʔi dất kwa fíʔa tâʔi kủʔa tʰàɲ Ðʔa cɔŋ mọʔi việk sêciə dượk hɛɲtʰôŋ sɔŋ xi sứɣiả vwa babilôn saj dến ŋườʔi dặŋ hỏʔitʰăm zấʔu dã sảʔiza cɔŋ sứ tʰì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lìʔabỏ ŋườʔi dặŋ tʰử ŋườʔi dể cɔbiết mọʔi diềʔu cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa sêciə ɲữŋ việk tʰiện kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác zị tượŋ kủʔa saj dấŋ tiênci kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamốt cɔŋ sác kák vwa zuda ʔisơzaên sêciə ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ ŋườʔita côn ŋườʔi cɔŋ lăŋtẩm kaw kủʔa kɔncáʔu Ðʔa kả zuda ɣiêzusalɛm dềʔu tônkíɲ ŋườʔi lúk ŋườʔi tʰák manasɛ kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi manasɛ dượk mườʔihaj tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị nămmươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk Ðứkzê tʰeo ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã duổʔi xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi kất lạʔi kák nơʔi kaw sêciə ca ŋườʔi dã fá zỡ zựŋ ɲữŋ bàntʰờ cɔ baɛɲ kák tượŋ ʔasêza tʰờ lạʔi kả kơ biɲ cên cờʔi hầʔu việk cúŋnó ŋườʔi sâʔi ɲữŋ bàntʰờ tạʔi cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê nơʔi ấʔi Ðứkzê dã fán zằŋ zɛɲ ŋự nơʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dờʔidờʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ ɲữŋ bàntʰờ cɔ kák kơ biɲ cên cờʔi tạʔi cɔŋ haj hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dến Ðứkzê dưʔa kɔnkáʔi mìɲ kwa lửʔa tạʔi cɔŋ cũŋ kɔn hinôm ŋườʔi sɛmbóʔi cú zùŋ fáptʰuật tʰeo ɲữŋ kầʔu vɔŋ tʰầʔi fùtʰủʔi ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák tʰáʔicwá tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê dặŋ cọkzận ŋàʔi ŋườʔi dặt hìɲtượŋ cạm mìɲ dã cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dền ấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó fán vớʔi Ðʔa salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi zằŋ cɔŋ dền nàʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲ dã cọn cɔŋ kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên dặt zɛɲ dờʔidờʔi nếʔu ʔisơzaên ɣìŋiữ tʰeo kák luậtfáp diềʔu zăn mạŋ lịɲ dã kậʔi môʔisɛ fán zạʔi cúŋnó tʰì cẳŋ kất cơn kủʔa cúŋnó xỏʔi dất dã cɔ tổfụ cúŋnó manasɛ kwiến zụ zuda zânsự ɣiêzusalɛm dến dỗʔi cúŋ diềʔu ák kák zântộk Ðứkzê dã hủʔiziệt xỏʔi cướk zân ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê fán bảʔɔ manasɛ zânsự ŋườʔi sɔŋ cúŋ xôŋ củý dến vì kớ ấʔi Ðứkzê xiến kák kwan tướŋ dạʔɔ biɲ kủʔa vwa ʔasizi dến dáɲ cúŋ kák kwan ấʔi dóŋ kùm manasɛ siềŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi zồʔi zẫn babilôn xi ŋườʔi hɔạnnạn kầʔuxẩn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi manasɛ kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɲậm ŋườʔi zủ ŋɛ lờʔi nàʔisin kủʔa ŋườʔi zẫn ŋườʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ nướk ŋườʔi xi ấʔi manasɛ ɲìn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi săw việk ấʔi ŋườʔi sâʔi vác ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa fíʔa tâʔi ɣihôn cɔŋ cũŋ d lốʔi vàʔɔ kửʔa ká cuŋkwɛɲ fên sâʔi zất kaw zồʔi ŋườʔi dặt ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ sứ zuda ŋườʔi kất xỏʔi dền Ðứkzê ɲữŋ tʰần ŋɔạʔibaŋ hìɲtượŋ bàntʰờ ŋườʔi dã sâʔi cên núʔi kủʔa dền Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zồʔi kwăŋ za ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi sửʔasaŋ bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê zâŋ kủʔa bìɲan kủʔa tʰù tạʔi dó ŋườʔi cwiền zạʔi zân zuda fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên zầʔu vậʔi zânsự kòn cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa mìɲ tʰôʔi kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa manasɛ lờʔi ŋườʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi kák lờʔi kủʔa dấŋ ɲânzɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán vớʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa ʔisơzaên bàʔi kầʔuŋwiện ŋườʔi làmsaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲậm lờʔi ŋườʔi kák tộʔilỗʔi zanák ŋườʔi dã fạm ɲữŋ cỗ ŋườʔi nơʔi kaw zựŋ tʰần ʔasêza tượŋ cạm cướk xi ŋườʔi cưʔa hạmìɲ suốŋ kìʔa tʰảʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ cwiện hôsaj manasɛ ʔaŋiấk kùŋ tổfụ mìɲ dượk côn cɔŋ kuŋdiện ŋườʔi ʔamôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ʔamôn dượk haimươʔihaj tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị haj tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ʔiɲư manasɛ ca ŋườʔi dã kúŋtế cɔ kák tượŋ cạm manasɛ ca ŋườʔi dã hầʔu việk cúŋnó ŋườʔi xôŋ hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê ɲư manasɛ ca ŋườʔi dã ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kàŋ tʰêm fạmtộʔi kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi mưʔu fản ɣiết ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ kuŋdiện ŋườʔi kòn zânsự kủʔa sứ lạʔi ɣiết kák dã mưʔu fản ɣiết vwa ʔamôn zồʔi ɣiôsi ʔa kɔncaj ŋườʔi vwa tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiôsi ʔa dượk tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa kaicị bamươʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu tʰiện cướk Ðứkzê di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ kủʔa Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi xôŋ sâʔi hữʔu hăjlà năm tʰứ támdờʔi ŋườʔi cịvì xi ŋườʔi hãʔi kòn cẻ tuổʔi tʰì ŋườʔi xởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi tʰứ mườʔihaj ŋườʔi xởʔi zọn sạc zuda ɣiêzusalɛm cừbỏ ɲữŋ nơʔi kaw tʰần ʔasêza tượŋ cạm tượŋ dúk cướk vwa ŋườʔita fá zỡ kák bàntʰờ baɛɲ dáɲdổ ɲữŋ cụ tʰờ mặtcờʔi cên kaw bàntʰờ ấʔi kòn tʰần ʔasêza tượŋ cạm tượŋ dúk tʰì ɣãʔi ŋiền za zồʔi zảʔi cên kủʔa ɲữŋ dã kúŋtế ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰiêʔu hàʔicốt kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tạʔi cên bàntʰờ kák tʰần ấʔi zọn sạc zuda ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa manasɛ kủʔa zaim kủʔa simêôn cɔdến néptali xắp cuŋkwɛɲ kák nơʔi dổnát ŋườʔi fá zỡ kák bàntʰờ ŋiền za bụʔi ɲữŋ tʰần ʔasêza tượŋ cạm tượŋ dúk dáɲdổ kák cụ tʰờ mặtcờʔi cɔŋ xắp sứ ʔisơzaên zồʔi ŋườʔi cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm năm tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi ŋườʔi cịvì săw xi dã zọn sạc sứ dền tʰờ zồʔi tʰì ŋườʔi saj safan kɔncaj ʔasaliə maasêza kwan kaj tʰàɲ ɣiô ʔa kɔncaj ɣiôʔɛca kwan tʰáʔi dặŋ sửʔasaŋ dền kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi di dếnkùŋ hiɲkiə tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm zaw cɔ ŋườʔi tiềnbạk dã dɛm vàʔɔ dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứk tiềnbạk ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiữ kửʔa dã ɲận nơʔi tăj ŋườʔi manasɛ ŋườʔi zaim nơʔi ɲữŋ kòn lạʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kùŋ ɲận nơʔi kả zuda bêŋiəmin ɲữŋ zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm cúŋ zaw bạk ấʔi nơʔi tăj ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kɔjsók kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkzê fát cɔ kák tʰợ dặŋ sửʔasaŋ dền tʰờ tứk zaw cɔ kák ɲà tʰuộk dền kák vwa zuda dã fáhủʔi kák tʰợ ấʔi dềʔu kôŋviệk kác tʰàɲtâm kẻ kwảndốk kák tʰợ ấʔilà zahát badiə haj ŋườʔi lêvi tʰuộk zòŋ mêzazi sɛcazi mêsulam zòŋ kêhát kùŋ mấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xák dáɲ ɲạkxí ɣiỏʔi cúŋ kũŋ kwảndốk xiêŋ ɣáɲ kɔjsók ɲữŋ ŋườʔilàm dủ mọʔi tʰứ kôŋviệk kòn ɲữŋ kýlụk kwan kaj kɛɲ kửʔa dềʔu ŋườʔi lêvi xi ŋườʔita dɛm bạk dã dɛm vàʔɔ dền Ðứkzê za tʰì hiɲkiə tʰầʔi dượk kuốn sác luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê cwiền lạʔi bởʔi môʔisɛ hiɲkiə kấttiếŋ nóʔi vớʔi tʰơ safan zằŋ ta kó dượk kuốn sác luậtfáp cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê zồʔihiɲ kiə zaw sác ấʔi cɔ safan safan dɛm sác dó cɔ vwa zồʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ mọʔi việk zaw nơʔi tăj kák tôʔitớ vwa tʰì họdươŋ cúŋ dã lấʔi bạk dượk cɔŋ dền Ðứkzê za dã zaw nơʔi tăj kák dốkkôŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔilàm kôŋviệk tʰơ safan lạʔi tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ tʰầʔi hiɲkiə kó caw cɔ tôʔi kuốn sác safan dọk tạʔi cướk vwa sảʔi xi vwa ŋɛ kák lờʔi luậtfáp zồʔi tʰì sé áʔɔ mìɲ vwa cwiền lịɲ cɔ hiɲkiə ʔahicam kɔncaj kủʔa safan dôn kɔncaj kủʔa mica safan tʰơ ʔasaza kwan kậntʰần vwa zằŋ hãʔi kák ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi zuda kòn lạʔi dicầʔu Ðứkzê kák lờʔi fán kủʔa sác nàʔi dã lạʔi dượk kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê dã ɣiáŋ cên cúŋta tʰật tʰăj bởʔi kák tổfụ xôŋ ɣìŋiữ lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðứkzê cẳŋ tʰeo kák diềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác nàʔi hiɲkiə kák vwa saj di dến hunda tiênci kủʔa salum ŋườʔi ɣiữ áʔɔ kɔncaj kủʔa tôkát cáʔu háca tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ kwận tʰứ ɲì cúŋ nóʔi vớʔi tʰeo kák lờʔi vwa dã fán bà nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơ zên fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi dã saj kák ŋươʔi dếnkùŋ zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi nầʔi xiến kák tajvạ ɣiáŋ cên cỗ nàʔi cên zân cỗ nàʔi tứklà kák zủʔasả cép cɔŋ sác ŋườʔita dã dọk cướk vwa zuda bởʔivì cúŋ dã lìʔabỏ sôŋ hươŋ cɔ kák tʰần lấʔi kák kôŋviệk tăj cúŋnó cọkzận kơn tʰạɲ dổ za cên cỗ nàʔi xôŋ ŋuôʔi kòn vwa zuda dã saj kák ŋươʔi dicầʔu Ðứkzê kák ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưvầʔi về kák lờʔi ŋươʔi dã ŋɛ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi xi ŋươʔi ŋɛ lờʔi fán ŋịc kùŋ cỗ nàʔi ŋịc kùŋ zânkư tʰì ŋươʔi kó lòŋ mềmmạʔi hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk sé áʔɔ ŋươʔi xóklók tạʔi cướk bởʔivậʔi cɔnên kũŋ kó ŋɛ ŋươʔi kìʔa xiến ŋươʔi kùŋ tổfụ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dượk côn bìɲan ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi kák tajvạ twan ɣiáŋ suốŋ cên cốn nàʔi kùŋ cên zânkư cúŋ tâʔu lạʔi cɔ vwa ɲữŋ lờʔi ấʔi vwa saj ŋườʔi ɲóm kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔɔạn vwa di dền Ðứkzê kó hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi zuda zânkư ɣiêzusalɛm ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kả zânsự ɲỏ dến dềʔu di tʰeo ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dọk cɔ cúŋ ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa sác zawướk dã dượk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkzê vwa dứŋ tạʔicỗ mìɲ zawướk cướk Ðứkzê hứʔa di tʰeo Ðứkzê hếtlòŋ ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn cứŋkớ kủʔa ŋàʔi dặŋ cọn lờʔi zawướk zawướk dã cép cɔŋ sác ấʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ xiến ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở ɣiêzusalɛm bêŋiəmin ưŋ tʰeo zawướk ấʔi vậʔi zânkư ɣiêzusalɛm dềʔu tʰeo zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ ɣiôsi ʔa kất hếttʰảʔi ɣớmɣiếk xỏʔi kák sứ tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên buộk hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở sứ ʔisơzaên fảʔi fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cọn dờʔi ɣiôsi ʔa cúŋ hằŋ tʰeo ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ cẳŋ lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi ɣiôsi ʔa ɣiữ vượt kwa cɔ Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋzêŋ ɣiết kɔn siɲ vượt kwa ŋườʔi kắt ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɣiữ cứkfận mìɲ xwiên ɣiụk cúŋ việk kủʔa dền Ðứkzê ŋườʔi fán kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi zạʔizỗ kả ʔisơzaên dã mìɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê zằŋ hãʔi dể tʰáɲ tạʔi cɔŋ dền salômôn kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên dã sâʔicất kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kòn xiêŋ ấʔi cên vaj bâʔizờ hãʔi fụk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi ɣiúpviệk cɔ ʔisơzaên zânsự kủʔa ŋàʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tùʔi tôŋtộk tʰứ kák ŋươʔi zọn mìɲ cɔ ciếʔu tʰeo Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã cép Ðʔɔạn hạʔi dứŋ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ tʰeo tʰứtự tôŋtộk kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰeo tʰứtự tôŋtộk kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi zân ʔisơzaên tʰeo tʰứtự tôŋtộk kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣiết kɔn siɲ vượt kwa mìɲ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ sắmsửʔa vượt kwa tʰế cɔ ʔɛɲɛm kák ŋươʔi dể ʔiɲư lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kậʔi môʔisɛ fán ɣiôsi ʔa cɔ zânsự ɲữŋ súkvật ɲỏ ciên kɔn zê kɔn kùŋ ŋàn kɔn dựk zùŋ cọn vượt kwa cɔ kák ŋườʔi kómặt tạʔi dó kák tʰú dó dềʔu nơʔi kủʔa vwa kák kwan cưởŋ kũŋ dềʔu dàɲlòŋ súkvật cɔ zânsự kấp cɔ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi hiɲkiə sɛcazi ɣiêhiên kák ŋườʔi kwảndốk dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kấp cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi haj ŋàn sáʔu căm kɔnciên bɛcăm kɔn dể zùŋ vượt kwa kônaniə sêmaza natʰanaên kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi hasabiə ɣiê ʔiên ɣiôsabát kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu kấp cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ŋàn kɔnciên nămcăm kɔn dể zùŋ vượt kwa vậʔi việk dã sắpdặt zồʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dềʔu dứŋ tạʔicỗ mìɲ ŋườʔi kứ tʰeo tʰứ mìɲ ʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa vwa ŋườʔilê ɣiết kɔn siɲ vượt kwa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɲận lấʔi hwiết nơʔi tăj cúŋ zảʔi za kòn ŋườʔi lêvi tʰì za kɔn siɲ cúŋ dể ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ziêŋ za dặŋ fânfát cɔ zânsự tʰeo tʰứtự tôŋtộk kủʔa dể zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê tùʔi tʰeo diềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác kủʔa môʔisɛ kũŋ ɲưvậʔi kák kɔn dựk cúŋ tʰeo dịɲ kwăj tʰịt kɔn siɲ vượt kwa kòn ɲữŋ tʰáɲ tʰì nấʔu cɔŋ káʔi nồʔi káʔi vạk káʔi cảʔɔ zồʔi hốʔihả dɛm fânfát cɔ kả zânsự kế săw cúŋ lɔ sắmsửʔa zùŋ cɔ mìɲ cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu ʔazôn dềʔu mắk việk zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi vìvậʔi ŋườʔi lêvi sắmsửʔa zùŋ cɔ mìɲ cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔazôn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kahát kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔasáp dềʔu tạʔicỗ mìɲ tùʔi tʰeo kủʔa Ðʔa ʔasáp hêman ɣiêdutʰun dấŋ kủʔa vwa dã dịɲ kák ŋườʔi kɛɲ kửʔa dềʔu tạʔi mỗʔi kửʔa xôŋ kần zờʔi xỏʔi việk mìɲ ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi sắmsửʔa zùŋ cɔ nộʔi ŋàʔi dó kák kuộk tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkzê dã sắpdặt zồʔi dể ɣiữ vượt kwa zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cên bàntʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa vwa ɣiôsi ʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên kómặt tạʔi dó dềʔu ɣiữ vượt kwa cɔŋ lúk ấʔi ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi từ dờʔi tiênci samuên cɔŋ ʔisơzaên ŋườʔita xôŋ kó ɣiữ vượt kwa ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó vwa nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák vwa ʔisơzaên ɣiữ vượt kwa ɣiốŋ ɲư vượt kwa ɣiôsi ʔa vớʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kả zân zuda ʔisơzaên kómặt tạʔi dó dã ɣiữ ŋườʔita ɣiữ vượt kwa nàʔi ɲằm tʰứ mườʔi támdờʔi ɣiôsi ʔa cịvì săw kák việk ấʔi xi ɣiôsi ʔa dã sửʔasaŋ dền tʰờ zồʔi tʰì nêkô vwa zíptô di dáɲ kạtkêmít cên sôŋ fơzát ɣiôsi ʔa kéʔɔ za dón ŋườʔi nêkô saj dến nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hỡʔi vwa zuda vớʔi ŋươʔi kódiềʔu ɣì căŋ ŋàʔinăj cẳŋ dến dặŋ dáɲ ŋươʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ za dáɲ ɲà tʰùŋịc nướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán biểʔu xá vộʔivàŋ vậʔi hãʔi tʰôʔi cớ cốŋkự Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ kùŋ ʔɛ ŋàʔi hủʔiziệt ŋươʔi căŋ zầʔu vậʔi ɣiôsi ʔa cẳŋ xứŋ tʰốʔi lạʔi cẳŋ cịʔu ŋɛ lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kậʔi nêkô fán za ɲưŋ lạʔi ănmặk ɣiảzạŋ dặŋ dốʔidịc kùŋ ŋườʔi dến dáɲ ɣiặk tạʔi cũŋ mêɣidô kák líɲ kầm kuŋ ɲằm vwa ɣiôsi ʔa vwa nóʔi vớʔi dầʔitớ mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi dɛm za xỏʔi dâʔi bịtʰươŋ nặŋ kák dầʔitớ ŋườʔi dɛm ŋườʔi xỏʔi sɛ dể ŋườʔi cɔŋ káʔi sɛ tʰứ ɲì ŋườʔi kó zồʔi dɛm ŋườʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi tʰák dượk côn tạʔi cɔŋ kủʔa tổfụ ŋườʔi kảzu da ɣiêzusalɛm dềʔu tʰươŋ xók ŋườʔi ɣiêzêmi dặt bàʔi ʔaj ka ɣiôsi ʔa lạʔi kák kasướŋ hãʔi kòn ɣiôsi ʔa cɔŋ bàʔi ʔaj ka kủʔa mìɲ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj ŋườʔita diềʔu dó ɲư tʰườŋlệ cɔŋ ʔisơzaên kìʔa kák cwiện ấʔi dã cép cɔŋ sác ʔaj ka kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ɣiôsi ʔa ɲữŋ việk tʰiện ŋườʔilàm kứ tʰeo diềʔu dã cép cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê kák ŋườʔi dầʔu dến kuốʔi kìʔa dã ɣicép cɔŋ sác kák vwa ʔisơ zên zuda zânsự kủʔa sứ ɣiôʔɛca kɔncaj ɣiôsi ʔa vwa tʰăjvì ca ŋườʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalam ɣiôʔɛca dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi lênŋôʔi vwa kaicị batʰáŋ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm vwa zíptô cuất ŋôʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm sứ mộtcăm lâŋ bạk lâŋ vàŋ Ðʔɔạn vwa zíptô liəkim ʔɛm ɣiôʔɛca vwa kủʔa zuda ɣiêzusalɛm dổʔi ŋườʔi za ɣiêhôzakim nêkô ɣiôʔɛca ʔɛɲ kủʔa ɣiêhôzakim dɛm ŋườʔi sứ zíptô ɣiêhôzakim dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa ŋườʔi kaicị mườʔimột tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm diềʔu ák cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn di dáɲ ŋườʔi siềŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi zẫn ŋườʔi kwa babilôn nêbukátnếtsa kũŋ dɔạt lấʔi dɛm babilôn ɲữŋ xí zụŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkzê zồʔi dể vàʔɔ cɔŋ miễʔu ŋườʔi tạʔi babilôn kák kôŋviệk xák kủʔa ɣiêhôzakim ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk ŋườʔi dã dã dượk cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu cép cɔŋ sác kák vwa ʔisơzaên zuda ɣiêhôzakin kɔncaj ŋườʔi kaicị tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiêhôzakin dượk mườʔitám tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa kaicị batʰáŋ mườʔi ŋàʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák tạʔi cướk Ðứkzê saŋ dầʔu vwa nêbukátnếtsa saj ŋườʔi zẫn babilôn kùŋ dɔạt lấʔi dɛm kák tốtdẹp kủʔa dền Ðứkzê zồʔi sêdêkiə ʔɛm ŋườʔi vwa zuda ɣiêzusalɛm sêdêkiə dượk haimươʔi tuổʔi xi ŋườʔi lênŋôʔi vwa kaicị mườʔimột tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔilàm diềʔu ák cướk ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi xôŋ hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk ɣiêzêmi dấŋ tiênci vâŋ mạŋ Ðứkzê xwiênbảʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ vwa nêbukátnếtsa vwa dã buộk ŋườʔi cỉ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰề sɔŋ ŋườʔi lạʔi kứŋkổ zắn lòŋ xôŋ xứŋ cởvề kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kả zânsự dềʔu tʰeo ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa kák zân ŋɔạʔibaŋ fạmtộʔi lỗʔi ɲiềʔu kwádỗʔi cɔ ôʔuế dền kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã ziêŋ za tʰáɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ cúŋ kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót zânsự dền kủʔa ŋàʔi hằŋ saj sứɣiả dếnkùŋ cúŋ ɲưŋ cúŋ ɲạʔɔbáŋ sứɣiả kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiɲbỉ kák lờʔi fán ŋàʔi kườʔi ɲạʔɔ ɲữŋ tiênci kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔdến dỗʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋzân ŋàʔi cẳŋ kòn fươŋ cữʔa dượk vìvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến vwa zân kɛɲdê dáɲ cúŋ ŋườʔi zùŋ ɣươm ɣiết ɲữŋ caicẻ kủʔa cúŋ tạʔi dền tʰáɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰươŋsót dến hɔặk caicẻ dồŋciɲ ɣiàkả hăjlà dầʔu bạk ŋàʔi fó hếttʰảʔi vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa vwa kɛɲdê kák xí zụŋ ɲỏ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák bửʔu kủʔa vwa kủʔa kák kwan cưởŋ vwa kảtʰảʔi dềʔu dɛm kwa babilôn cúŋ dốt dền Ðứkcúʔɛcơʔi dáɲdổ vác tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm lấʔi lửʔa dốt kák kuŋdiện fáhủʔi kák xí zụŋ tốtdẹp kủʔa fàm ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi ɣươm tʰì ŋườʔi dɛm kwa babilôn cúŋ tôʔimọʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cɔ kɔncaj ŋườʔi cɔdến dờʔi nướk fɛzơsơ hưŋxởʔi dể cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã kậʔi miệŋ ɣiêzêmi fán za tứk cɔdến xi sứ dượk hưởŋ kák kủʔa cọn lúk sứ bỏhwaŋ tʰì zườŋɲư ɣiữ cɔdến xi bảʔi mươʔi năm tʰứ ɲất dờʔi sizu vwa fɛzơsơ cịvì Ðứkzê ʔa cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi dã kậʔi miệŋ ɣiêzêmi fán za kảmdộŋ lòŋ sizu vwa fɛzơsơ zaw cwiền cɔŋ xắp nướk mìɲ kũŋ za ciếʔucỉ zằŋ sizu vwa fɛzơsơ nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ kák nướk tʰếzan biểʔu sâʔicất cɔ ŋàʔi káʔi dền tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fàm ʔaj tʰuộk zânsự ŋàʔi hãʔi cởlên ɣiêzusalɛm ŋwiện ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ấʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi năm tʰứ ɲứt dờʔi sizu vwa nướk fɛzơsơ cịvì Ðứkzê cɔ ứŋŋiệm lờʔi ŋàʔi dã kậʔi miệŋ ɣiêzêmi fán za ŋàʔi kảmdộŋ lòŋ sizu vwa fɛzơsơ twiêncwiền cɔŋ xắp nướk mìɲ kũŋ za sắkcỉ zằŋ sizu vwa fɛzơsơ nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kák nướk tʰếzan cɔ cáɲ ŋàʔi kó biểʔu sâʔicất cɔ ŋàʔi dền tʰờ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi fàm ʔaj tʰuộk zânsự ŋàʔi xá cởlên ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ sứ zuda dặŋ kất lạʔi dền tʰờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋự tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi hễ zân zuda kòn lạʔi mặkzầʔu dâʔu tʰì zân kủʔa nơʔi fảʔi cợ bằŋ bạk vàŋ kủʔakảʔi súkvật xôŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa lạk dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm bấʔizờ ɲữŋ cưởŋtộk kủʔa zuda bêŋiəmin ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kảtʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kảmdộŋ lòŋ kó di sâʔicất dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cổʔi zậʔi kák ŋườʔi lânkận cúŋ dềʔu cợ cúŋ cɔ ɲữŋ bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ kủʔakảʔi súkvật ɲữŋ kwíbáʔu kák kủʔa lạk xák vwa si zu kũŋ cả lạʔi ɲữŋ xí zụŋ kủʔa dền tʰờ Ðứkzê nêbukátnếtsa dã dɛm di xỏʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dể cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa tʰần ŋườʔi sizu vwa fɛzơsơ cwiền mícêdát ŋườʔi tʰủkwỹ lấʔi kák xí zụŋ ấʔi za dếm zaw cɔ sếtbasa kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zuda nầʔi kủʔa kák xí zụŋ ấʔi bamươʔi káʔi cậʔu vàŋ ŋàn káʔi cậʔu bạk haimươʔi cín kɔn zaw bamươʔi kák cén vàŋ bốncăm mườʔi káʔi cén bạk tʰứhạŋ ɲì mộtŋàn káʔi xí zụŋ xák hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ xí zụŋ bằŋ vàŋ bạk ŋàn bốncăm káʔi xi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi fu babilôn dượk zẫn ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì sếtbasa dɛm hếttʰảʔi ấʔi cɔŋ kɔncáʔu kák zân tỉɲ zuda nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn zẫn kwa babilôn nầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dàʔi dó cởlên ɣiêzusalɛm sứ zuda mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ kó sôzôbabên ɣiêswa nêhêmi sêzaza zêêlaza mạkdôcê biɲsan mítbạt biếtvaj zêhum baana zẫnzắt vậʔi nầʔi zựŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên họfa zốt haj ŋàn mộtcăm bảʔi mươʔi haj sêfati ʔa bɛcăm bảʔi mươʔi haj ʔazác bảʔicăm bảʔi mươʔi fahátmôáp kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣiêswa ɣiôáp haj ŋàn támcăm mườʔihaj mộtŋàn haj căm nămmươʔi sáttu cín căm mươʔi sákkaj bảʔicăm sáʔu mươʔi bani sáʔu căm mươʔi haj bêbaj sáʔu căm haimươʔi ʔaɣát mộtŋàn haj căm haimươʔihaj ʔadônicam sáʔu căm sáʔu mươʔi sáʔu biếtvaj haj ŋàn nămmươʔi sáʔu ʔadin bốncăm nămmươʔi ʔatɛ zakwiến sêciə cín mươʔi bếtsaj bɛcăm haimươʔi ɣiôza mộtcăm mườʔihaj hasum haj căm haimươʔi ɣiba cín mươʔi bếtlêhɛm mộtcăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi nêtôfa nămmươʔi sáʔu ŋườʔi ʔanatốt mộtcăm haimươʔitám ŋườʔi Ác mươʔi haj ŋườʔi kiziátazim kêfi ʔa bêêzốt bảʔicăm mươʔi ŋườʔi zama ɣêza sáʔu căm haimươʔi ŋườʔi mícba mộtcăm haj haimươʔihaj ŋườʔi bêtên ʔahi haj căm haimươʔi nêbô nămmươʔi haj mákbi mộtcăm nămmươʔi sáʔu xák mộtŋàn haj căm nămmươʔi hazim bɛcăm haimươʔi lôdơ hadít bảʔicăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi ɣiêzicô bɛcăm mươʔi sêna ŋàn sáʔu căm bamươʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɣiêdaza tʰuộk cifáʔi ɣiêswa cín căm bảʔi mươʔi ʔimê mộtŋàn mươʔi haj fasuzơ mộtŋàn haj căm mươʔi bảʔi hazim mộtŋàn mườʔibảʔi kák ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiêswa kátmiên kɔncáʔu kủʔa hôdaviə bảʔi mươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kahát ʔasáp mộtcăm haimươʔitám kák kɔncáʔu ɣiữ kửʔa kɔncáʔu salum kɔncáʔu ʔatɛ kɔncáʔu tɛɲmôn kɔncáʔu ʔakúp kɔncáʔu hatita kɔncáʔu sôbaj kộŋ hếttʰảʔi mộtcăm bamươʔi cín ŋườʔi kẻ fụkzịc cɔŋ dền tʰờ kɔncáʔu siha kɔncáʔu hasufa kɔncáʔu tabaốt kɔncáʔu kêzốt kɔncáʔu siəha kɔncáʔu badôn kɔncáʔu lêbana kɔncáʔu haɣaba kɔncáʔu ʔakúp kɔncáʔu haɣáp kɔncáʔu samlaj kɔncáʔu hanan kɔncáʔu ɣidên kɔncáʔu ɣɛca kɔncáʔu zêʔaza kɔncáʔu zêsin kɔncáʔu nêkôda kɔncáʔu ɣasam kɔncáʔu ʔusa kɔncáʔu fasê ʔa kɔncáʔu bêsaj kɔncáʔu ʔasêna kɔncáʔu mê ʔunim kɔncáʔu nêfusim kɔncáʔu bákbúk kɔncáʔu hakufa kɔncáʔu hazwa kɔncáʔu balút kɔncáʔu mêhida kɔncáʔu hạtsa kɔncáʔu bạtkô kɔncáʔu sisêza kɔncáʔu tʰamák kɔncáʔu nêsiə kɔncáʔu hatifa kɔncáʔu kủʔa kák tôʔitớ salômôn kɔncáʔu sôtaj kɔncáʔu sôfêzết kɔncáʔu fêzuda kɔncáʔu zaala kɔncáʔu kôn kɔncáʔu ɣidên kɔncáʔu sêfati ʔa kɔncáʔu háttiɲ kɔncáʔu bôkêzếtʰasêbaim kɔncáʔu ʔami tổŋkộŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi fụkzịc cɔŋ dền tʰờ kák kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɲữŋ tôʔitớ salômôn dềʔu bɛcăm cín mươʔi haj ŋườʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở tênmêla têɲạtsa kêzúpadan ʔimê cởlên xôŋtʰể nóʔi zõ zatộk fổhệ mìɲ dặŋ cỉ zằŋ mìɲ tʰuộk zòŋzõʔi ʔisơzaên hăj căŋ kɔncáʔu laza kɔncáʔu tôbiza kɔncáʔu nêkôda dềʔu sáʔu căm nămmươʔi haj ŋườʔi cɔŋ zòŋzõʔi tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu habaza kɔncáʔu hakốt kɔncáʔu bạtsilaj ŋườʔi ấʔi kó kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bạtsilaj ɣalaát dượk ɣọʔi bằŋ ấʔi kák ŋườʔi ấʔi za fổ mìɲ ɲưŋ cẳŋ dặŋ ŋườʔita ôʔuế cuất xỏʔi cứk kwan tổŋdốk kấm cúŋ ɲữŋ cí tʰáɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kó tʰầʔi kậʔi ʔuzim tʰumim kầʔu hỏʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ dếm dượk haj ŋàn bɛcăm sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ ɲữŋ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi cúŋnó bảʔi ŋàn bɛcăm bamươʔi bảʔi kũŋ kó haj căm ŋườʔi kahát tʰeo kùŋ nữʔa cúŋ kó bảʔicăm bamươʔi sáʔu kɔn ŋựʔa haj căm mươʔi kɔn bốncăm bamươʔi kɔn lạkdà sáʔu ŋàn bảʔicăm haimươʔi kɔn lừʔa kó ɲiềʔu cưởŋtộk xi dã dến dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa lạk cɔ ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dể sâʔicất lạʔi cỗ kũ tùʔi tʰeo sứk mìɲ cúŋ zâŋ vàʔɔ xɔ kủʔa kuộk sâʔicất dến sáʔu mươʔi ŋàn da ziếk vàŋ ŋàn bạk mộtcăm áʔɔ tʰấʔi vậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi mấʔi ŋườʔizân ŋườʔi kahát ɣiữ kửʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi fụkzịc cɔŋ dền tʰờ kả zân ʔisơzaên tʰảʔi dềʔu cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ tʰáŋ bảʔi xi zân ʔisơzaên dã cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ zồʔi tʰì zânsự lạʔi ɲư ŋườʔiở tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm bấʔizờ ɣiêswa kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsadák kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi tʰầʔi vớʔi sôzôbabên kɔncaj saɛɲtʰiên kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dềʔu cổʔi zậʔi sâʔicất bàntʰờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔisơzaên dặŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tạʔi dó tʰeo ɲư dã cép cɔŋ luậtfáp môʔisɛ ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi cúŋ sợhãʔi zân kủʔa sứ lạʔi bàntʰờ cên kũ zâŋ tạʔi dó kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê tứklà kủʔa tʰiêʔu buổʔi buổʔi ciềʔu cúŋ kũŋ ɣiữ lềʔu ʔiɲư dã cép zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ŋàʔi nầʔi ŋàʔiciə tʰeo dã dịɲ cɔ mỗʔi ŋàʔi săw ấʔi cúŋ zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa căŋnɔn kák ŋàʔi cọŋtʰể za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê lạʔi zâŋ kák kủʔa kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi lạk zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê từ ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ bảʔi cúŋ xởʔi zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê cúŋ fânkấp tiềnbạk cɔ tʰợ dẽʔɔ dá cɔ tʰợmộk ɲữŋ lươŋtʰựk zượʔu zầʔu cɔ zân sidôn zân tizơ dặŋ saj dɛm ɣỗ hươŋ liban dến zafô tùʔi tʰeo ciếʔu kủʔa sizu vwa fɛzơsơ năm tʰứhaj tʰáŋ haj săw xi cúŋ dến dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm sôzôbabên kɔncaj kủʔa saɛɲtʰiên ɣiêswa kɔn kủʔa ɣiôsadák vớʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm xák kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kùŋ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi fu dượk cởvề ɣiêzusalɛm dềʔu xởʔi kôŋviệk sâʔicất dền tʰờ cúŋ dặt ŋườʔi lêvi haimươʔi tuổʔi dặŋ kaikwản kôŋviệk sâʔicất dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê bấʔizờ ɣiêswa kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kátmiên kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi kɔncáʔu hôdaviə kɔncáʔu hênadát ŋườʔi lêvi vớʔi kɔncaj ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa dềʔu cổʔi zậʔi dồŋ ɲăw ɲư kwảndốk ɲữŋ ŋườʔi làmviệk cɔŋ ɲà kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xi kák tʰợsâʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰìkó ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dứŋ dó mặk áʔɔ kầm kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi kɔncáʔu ʔasáp dềʔu kầm cập cỏʔa dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ʔiɲư kák fép kủʔa Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên dã za cúŋ kahát dốʔidáp ŋợʔixɛn kảmtạ Ðứkzê zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tốtlàɲ lòŋ tʰươŋsót kủʔa ŋàʔi dốʔivớʔi ʔisơzaên kòn dến dờʔidờʔi kả zânsự dềʔu kêʔu zeo tiếŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê bởʔivì ŋườʔita sâʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲiềʔu tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cưởŋtộk tứklà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiàkả dã tʰấʔi dền tʰờ cướk xók tiếŋ cɔŋ xi ŋườʔita sâʔi kủʔa dền mớʔi tạʔi cướk mìɲ kũŋ kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi xák lạʔi tiếŋ vuimừŋ ŋườʔita xó fânbiệt tiếŋ vuimừŋ vớʔi tiếŋ xóklók zânsự lớntiếŋ tiếŋ ấʔi vẳŋ vẳŋ ŋɛ sa xi kák tʰùŋịc kủʔa zuda bêŋiəmin hăj zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã fu dượk sâʔicất dền tʰờ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên di dến sôzôbabên kák cưởŋtộk nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dồŋ sâʔicất vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cúŋtôʔi kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm kũŋɲư ʔɛɲɛm cúŋtôʔi dã zâŋ cɔ ŋàʔi dờʔi sahadôn vwa ʔasizi dɛm cúŋtôʔi dâʔi ɲưŋsô zôbabên ɣiêswa kák cưởŋtộk xák kủʔa ʔisơzaên dáp vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ dượk fần cuŋ vớʔi cúŋta dặŋ sâʔicất dền tʰờ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta sɔŋ cúŋta cỉ mộtmìɲ cúŋta kất dền cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ʔiɲư sizu vwa fɛzơsơ dã cwiềnbảʔɔ cúŋta bấʔizờ zân kủʔa sứ suj cɔ zân zuda ŋãlòŋ ɲát cɔŋ xi sâʔicất cọn dờʔi sizu vwa fɛzơsơ cɔdến dờʔi Ðʔa ziút vwa fɛzơsơ cịvì cúŋ dɛm hốʔilộ cɔ ɲữŋ mưʔusĩ cốŋ vớʔi zân zuda dặŋ fá việk lɔtwan ɲằm dờʔi ʔasuêzu vừʔa bắtdầʔu lênŋôʔi tʰì cúŋ káʔi cạŋ káʔɔ zân zuda zânkư ɣiêzusalɛm kwadờʔi ʔaï ttasétsɛ tʰì bítlam mícêdát tabêên dồŋliêʔu kủʔa cúŋ biểʔu tấʔu ʔaï ttasétsɛ vwa fɛzơsơ káʔi biểʔu ấʔi bằŋ cữ ʔazam zịc za tiếŋ ʔazam lạʔizê tểtướŋ simsaj tʰơ dồŋ biểʔu ŋịc kùŋ ɣiêzusalɛm tấʔu vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ ɲưvầʔi zêhum tểtướŋ simsaj tʰơ kák dồŋliêʔu kủʔa tứklà ŋườʔi Ðʔi ŋườʔi ʔafạtsatʰít ŋườʔi tạtbêlít ŋườʔi ʔafạtsít ŋườʔi ʔaï ŋườʔi babilôn ŋườʔi susan ŋườʔi ŋườʔi zânsự xák kawcọŋ vaŋ dã dɛm kwa xiến cɔŋ tʰàɲ samazi cɔŋ kák xák fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ nầʔi saw lạʔi kủʔa bứk biểʔu cúŋ ɣởʔi tấʔu vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ kák tôʔitớ vwa fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ kíɲ tấʔu vwa ʔatasétsɛ tâʔu vwa hăj zõzàŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda dã nơʔi vwa dến cúŋtôʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dươŋ lạʔi tʰàɲ fảnŋịc huŋák ấʔi cúŋnó dã sâʔi lạʔi vác tʰàɲ kák cɔsɔŋ zồʔi vậʔi ŋwiện vwa zõzàŋ víbằŋ tʰàɲ nầʔi dượk kất lạʔi vác tườŋ dượk sâʔi zân cẳŋ tiếnkốŋ tʰuế hɔặk dóŋ tiềnmãʔilộ zồʔi săw cắk ɣâʔi tajhọʔa cɔ vwa vả cúŋtôʔi muốʔi kủʔa dền vwa cẳŋ cứŋkiến việk ɣâʔi tʰiệtʰạʔi cɔ vwa ɲưvậʔi cúŋtôʔi saj sứɣiả dến tâʔu zõ kùŋ vwa dặŋ ŋườʔita caxảʔɔ cɔŋ kák tổfụ kủʔa vwa tʰấʔi cɔŋ sác dó zằŋ káʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi káʔi tʰàɲ fảnŋịc ɣâʔi tʰiệtʰạʔi cɔ kák vwa nướk tʰuở sưʔa ŋườʔita hăj làmlɔạn dó bởʔi kớ ấʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi dã fáhwaŋ cúŋtôʔi tâʔu káʔɔ vwa hăj zằŋ nếʔu tʰàɲ nầʔi dượk kất lạʔi vác tườŋ dượk sâʔi lạʔi kớ ấʔi dất fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ cẳŋ kòn fụk vwa nữʔa vwa ɣiáŋ ciếʔu cɔ tểtướŋ zêhum cɔ tʰơ simsaj cɔ kák dồŋliêʔu kủʔa tạʔi samazi cɔŋ kák xák fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ zằŋ ŋwiện kák ŋươʔi bìɲiên bứk biểʔu kák ŋươʔi zâŋ tấʔu dã dọk za tỏtườŋ cướk kứ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ ŋườʔita dã caxảʔɔ tʰấʔi zằŋ dờʔi sưʔa káʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi kó zấʔi lɔạn vớʔi kák vwa cɔŋ dó hằŋ kó fảnŋịc việk ŋụʔi dảŋ lạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dã kó ɲữŋ vwa zất kwiềntʰế kwản kả sứ kiə sôŋ ŋườʔita tiếnkốŋ tʰuế dóŋ tiềnmãʔilộ cɔ kák vwa dó vìvậʔi kák ŋươʔi hãʔi cwiền lịɲ ŋănkản ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó kất lạʔi káʔi tʰàɲ nầʔi cɔdến cừŋ ciếʔucỉ việk dó xá kẩntʰận nấʔi ʔɛ kák vwa tʰiệtʰạʔi tʰêm căŋ vừʔa xi dã dọk ciếʔu kủʔa vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ cướk zêhum tʰơ simsaj kák dồŋliêʔu tʰì cúŋ dồŋ lậtdật di dến zân zuda tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lấʔi năŋlựk kườŋkwiền xiến ŋưŋ kôŋviệk vậʔi kôŋviệk sâʔicất ɲà kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dìɲ cɔdến tʰứhaj dờʔi Ðʔa ziút vwa fɛzơsơ cịvì vả tiênci ʔaɣê tiênci sɛcazi kɔn kủʔa ʔidô ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên nóʔi tiênci cɔ kák ŋườʔi zuda tạʔi sứ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm sôzôbabên kɔncaj kủʔa saɛɲtʰiên ɣiêswa kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsadák cổʔi zậʔi xởʔi kất dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kó kák tiênci kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiúpdỡ cɔŋ lúk dó táttênaj kwan tổŋdốk kủʔa sứ fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ sêtabôsênaj kák dồŋliêʔu dến zân zuda nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ ɲưvầʔi ʔaj lịɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi kất káʔi dền nầʔi sâʔi vác tʰàɲ nầʔi cúŋta nóʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sâʔicất káʔi dền nầʔi kɔn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋ dɔáʔi sɛm kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zân zuda xôŋ ŋănkấm cúŋ kôŋviệk dàɲlòŋ dɛm việk ấʔi tâʔu lạʔi vwa Ðʔa ziút dợʔi dến xi vwa ɣiáŋ ciếʔu ấʔi nầʔi sawlụk biểʔu táttênaj kwan tổŋdốk kủʔa sứ fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ sêtabôsênaj kák dồŋliêʔu ŋườʔi tứk ŋườʔi ʔafạtsák nầʔi sôŋ tấʔu vwa Ðʔa ziút ɲư lờʔi săw nầʔi cúk vwa Ðʔa ziút tʰáʔibìɲ mọʔi cúŋtôʔi vwa hăj zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó di cɔŋ tỉɲ zuda dến dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất tʰấʔi ŋườʔi zuda sâʔicất káʔi dền tʰờ ấʔi bằŋ dá ŋwiên xốʔi ɲà dã ɣák ŋaŋ kwa vác zồʔi kôŋviệk kác kỹlưỡŋ tấntớʔi cɔŋ tăj cúŋtôʔi kó hỏʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ấʔi zằŋ ʔaj lịɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi sâʔicất káʔi dền nầʔi sâʔi vác tʰàɲ nầʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ hỏʔi zɛɲtáɲ dặŋ tâʔu cɔ vwa kák kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kwản cúŋ cúŋ dáp lờʔi ɲưvầʔi cúŋtôʔi tôʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔatể kủʔa cờʔi dất cúŋtôʔi daŋ sâʔicất lạʔi káʔi dền tʰờ dã lâʔu cướkdâʔi kó vwa saŋcọŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔ hɔàntʰàɲ sɔŋ kák tổfụ cúŋtôʔi cọkzận Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilôn ŋườʔi kɛɲdê vwa ấʔi fáhủʔi dền nầʔi zânsự dɛm kwa babilôn ɲưŋ dờʔi sizu vwa babilôn cịvì vwa sizu cwiền lịɲ kất lạʔi káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa si zu kũŋ zút za xỏʔi dền tʰờ babilôn ɲữŋ cậʔu vàŋ bạk kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nêbukátnếtsa dã dɔạt lấʔi xỏʔi dền tʰờ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dɛm cɔŋ dền tʰờ babilôn sizu zaw kák ấʔi cɔ zɛɲ sếtbasa ŋườʔi kwan tổŋdốk nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi kák xí zụŋ nầʔi di dể cɔŋ dền tʰờ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dể sâʔicất lạʔi ɲà kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cỗ kũ bấʔizờ sếtbasa nầʔi dến dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lúk dó dến zàʔi ŋườʔita dươŋ sâʔicất sɔŋ cưʔa hɔàntʰàɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu dẹp vwa sin hãʔi caxảʔɔ cɔŋ xɔ vwa tạʔi babilôn sɛm tʰử tʰật sizu kó za ciếʔucỉ sâʔicất lạʔi káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm căŋ Ðʔɔạn kầʔu vwa ɣiáŋ ciếʔu zạʔi cúŋtôʔi vwa việk ấʔi vwa Ðʔa ziút cwiền caxảʔɔ cɔŋ tàŋ tʰơ nơʔi cứʔa kák bửʔu tạʔi babilôn ŋườʔita dượk cɔŋ dồn Ék tạʔi tỉɲ mêdi kuốn ɣiấʔi cên dó kó zitíc ɲưvầʔi năm tʰứ ɲứt dờʔi sizu vwa sizu za ciếʔucỉ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zằŋ xá sâʔicất lạʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặŋ nơʔi zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa kák fảʔi cɔ vữŋbền tʰờ sáʔu mươʔi tʰướk kaw sáʔu mươʔi tʰướk zàʔi kó hàŋ dá ŋwiên xốʔi hàŋ dòntăj ɣỗ mớʔi kòn fí tʰìfảʔi kấpfát cɔŋ ɲàvwa lạʔi kák xí zụŋ bằŋ vàŋ bạk kủʔa ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nêbukátnếtsa dã lấʔi cɔŋ dền tʰờ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm dɛm kwa babilôn tʰìfảʔi cả lạʔi dɛm cɔŋ dền tʰờ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm xí zụŋ nầʔi cɔŋ cỗ nấʔi ŋươʔi fảʔi dể tạʔicỗ kũ cɔŋ ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi táttênaj tổŋdốk kủʔa sứ kiə sôŋ sêtabôsênaj kák dồŋliêʔu ŋườʔiở ʔafạtsák kiə sôŋ hãʔi zan za xá dể cɔ kwan kaj kủʔa ŋườʔi zuda ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa cúŋ sâʔicất lạʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi nơʔi kũ nầʔi za lịɲ cwiền kák ŋươʔi fảʔi làmɣì dốʔivớʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ zân zuda dặŋ ɣiúpviệk kất lạʔi káʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi lấʔi tʰuếxóʔa tʰâʔu kiə sôŋ vộʔi kấpfát kák cifí cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó dể kôŋviệk cẳŋ zứt cừŋ fàm ci kầnkíp hɔặk dựk ciên dựk hăjlà ciên kɔn dể zùŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi hɔặk lúʔamì muốʔi zượʔu hăjlà zầʔu tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm xá zaw cɔ mỗʔi ŋàʔi cớ tʰiếʔu hầʔu cɔ zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa kó mùʔi tʰơm cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi kầʔuŋwiện cɔ sɛɲ mạŋ kủʔa vwa kủʔa kák vươŋtử ta kũŋ cwiền lịɲ zằŋ nếʔu ʔaj kảʔi ciếʔucỉ nầʔi tʰì xá zút kâʔi dòntăj cɔŋ ɲà ấʔi zồʔi ceo tạʔi dó kớ tộʔi ấʔi cɔ ɲà tʰàɲza cỗ dổ zák ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ dã xiến zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋự cɔŋ dền tʰờ ấʔi hủʔiziệt vwa nàʔɔ zântộk nàʔɔ zám ɣiơ tăj za kảʔi ciếʔu nàʔi dặŋ fáhủʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ta Ðʔa ziút ciếʔucỉ nầʔi xá tʰeo kác kầnmẫn táttênaj kwan tổŋdốk kủʔa sứ fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ sêtabôsênaj kák dồŋliêʔu kầnmẫn tʰeo ciếʔucỉ vwa Ðʔa ziút dã saj dến Ấʔi vậʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa zân zuda bắttăj kất lạʔi dền tʰờ kôŋviệk dượk măimắn ʔi lờʔi tiênci kủʔa tiênci ʔaɣê kủʔa sɛcazi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔidô vậʔi cúŋ sɔŋ kôŋviệk kất dền tʰờ tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰeo ciếʔucỉ kủʔa sizu Ðʔa ziút ʔaï ttasétsɛ vwa nướk fɛzơsơ ŋàʔi tʰứba tʰáŋ ʔada ɲằm tʰứsáʔu dờʔi vwa Ðʔa ziút káʔi dền nầʔi dượk sâʔicất sɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xák dã fu dượk dềʔu ɣiữ xáɲtʰàɲ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kác vuimừŋ về xáɲtʰàɲ dền tʰờ nầʔi cúŋ zâŋ mộtcăm kɔn dựk haj căm kɔnciên dựk bốncăm kɔnciên kɔn tùʔi tʰeo kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên cúŋ zâŋ mườʔihaj kɔn zê dựk kủʔa cuộk tộʔi cɔ kả zân ʔisơzaên cúŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák ŋườʔi lêvi tùʔi tʰeo tʰứ kủʔa dặŋ fụk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ʔiɲư dã cép cɔŋ sác môʔisɛ Ðʔɔạn ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋzêŋ kák ŋườʔi dã fu dượk zự vượt kwa vì ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kảtʰảʔi dã zọn mìɲ cɔ tʰɛɲsạc xôŋ cừ ʔaj zồʔi cúŋ hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi dã fu dượk cởvề ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cíɲ mìɲ ɣiết kɔn siɲ zùŋ vượt kwa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên dã fu dượk vượt kwa vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã ciəzẽ za ôʔuế kủʔa kák zântộk cɔŋ sứ dó dến tʰeo zân ʔisơzaên dặŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi cúŋ ɣiữ báɲ xôŋ mɛn kác vujvẻ Ðứkzê dã cɔ lòŋ cúŋ dượk xɔáʔilạk kó kảmdộŋ lòŋ vwa ʔasizi dɔáʔi sɛm cúŋ dặŋ ɣiúpdỡ cɔŋ kuộk sâʔicất dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔisơzaên săw kák việk ấʔi ɲằm dờʔi ʔaï ttasétsɛ vwa fɛzơsơ kó ʔɛsơza kɔncaj sêzaza sêzaza kɔncaj kủʔa hiɲkiə hiɲkiə kɔncaj kủʔa salum salum kɔncaj kủʔa sadốk sadốk kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahitúp ʔahitúp kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamaziə ʔamaziə kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasaziə ʔasaziə kɔncaj kủʔa mêzazốt mêzazốt kɔncaj kủʔa sêzahiza sêzahiza kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusi ʔusi kɔncaj kủʔa buki buki kɔncaj kủʔa ʔabiswa ʔabiswa kɔncaj kủʔa finê ʔa finê ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa lêʔasa lêʔasa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔazôn tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm ʔɛsơza nầʔi babilôn di ŋườʔi tʰạʔɔ luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã cwiền cɔ vì tăj kủʔa Ðứkzê fùcợ ŋườʔi vwa cɔ ŋườʔi mọʔi diềʔu ŋườʔi sin ɲằm tʰứbảʔi dờʔi vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ kó mấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kahát ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa ŋườʔi nêtʰimin dềʔu di kùŋ ŋườʔi cởlên ɣiêzusalɛm tʰáŋ tʰứbảʔi dờʔi vwa ấʔi ʔɛsơza dến tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm vả ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋzêŋ ŋườʔiở babilôn xởʔihàɲ zồʔiza ɲờ tăj ɲân làɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fùcợ ŋườʔi dến ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ tʰứnăm vì ʔɛsơza dã dịɲ cí casét luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiữ tʰeo zạʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ luậtfáp ɣiớʔi mạŋ nầʔi saw lạʔi ciếʔucỉ vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ zaw cɔ ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi tʰạʔɔ cɔŋ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cwiền cɔ ʔisơzaên vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ vwa kủʔa kák vwa ɣởʔi tʰơ cɔ ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi tʰạʔɔ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi ŋwiện ŋươʔi dượk cọn bìɲan ta za ciếʔu cỉdịɲ zằŋ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ nướk tʰuộk zân ʔisơzaên tʰầʔicả ŋườʔi lêvi di dến ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì hãʔi di cuŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi ta bảʔi mưʔu tʰần saj ŋươʔi di casét zuda ɣiêzusalɛm ciếʔu tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kó cɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dɛm tʰeo mìɲ vàŋ bạk vwa kák mưʔu tʰần lạk zâŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó nơʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kák bạk vàŋ ŋươʔi kó dượk cɔŋ tỉɲ babilôn ɲữŋ lạk kủʔa zânsự kùŋ tʰầʔi zâŋ cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋươʔi hãʔi zùŋ bạk nầʔi kầnmẫn mwa ɲữŋ dựk ciên dựk ciên kɔn kủʔa căj kủʔa kwán kặp tʰeo zồʔi zâŋ cên bàntʰờ nơʔi dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋườʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kòn bạk vàŋ zư lạʔi zùŋ việkɣì fảʔi xá tʰeo ŋươʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi cɔ tʰuận cỉ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi về kák xí zụŋ dã zaw cɔ ŋươʔi dể zùŋ vàʔɔkuộk tʰờ fượŋ cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi dể tạʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kòn kák ɣì xák ŋươʔi kần zùŋ cifí dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi xá lấʔi kák ấʔi nơʔi xɔtàŋ vwa vậʔi vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ za ciếʔucỉ cwiền cɔ kák kwan kaj xɔ fíʔa kiə sôŋ zằŋ ɣì ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi tʰạʔɔ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi kầʔu kùŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xá kầnmẫn kuŋkấp cɔ dến mộtcăm lâŋ bạk mộtcăm baw lúʔa mộtcăm tʰùŋ zượʔu mộtcăm tʰùŋ zầʔu muốʔi xôŋ fàm diềʔu ɣì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi cwiền zạʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa ŋàʔi xá cɔ kầnmẫn ʔɛ tajhọʔa ɣiáŋ cên nướk cên vwa cên kák vươŋtử căŋ lạʔi cwiền cɔ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ cẳŋ dượk fép tʰâʔu tʰuế hăjlà tiềnmãʔilộ nơʔi tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kahát ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa ŋườʔi nêtʰinim hăjlà nơʔi ɲữŋ tôʔitớ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn ŋươʔi hỡʔi ʔɛsơza tùʔi tʰeo xônŋwan kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã kó cɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi hãʔi ɲữŋ kwan fủ kwan ɲữŋ tʰạʔɔ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dể cúŋ sétdɔán kả zânsự kiə sôŋ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cẳŋ luậtfáp kák ŋươʔi xá zạʔi cɔ nếʔu kó ʔaj xôŋ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi kủʔa vwa tʰì kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dɔán fạt hɔặk sửtử hɔặk lưʔudàʔi hɔặk tịcbiên zatàʔi hăjlà kầmtù ʔɛsơza nóʔi zằŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn tʰăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi dã kảm lòŋ vwa twan caŋdiểm dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm xiến cɔ tôʔi dượk cướk vwa kùŋ cướk kák mưʔu tʰần kák kwan cưởŋ kó kwiền kủʔa vwa vậʔi tôʔi hứŋcí tăj ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi fùcợ tôʔi tôʔi ciêʔu kák cưởŋtộk ʔisơzaên dặŋ dồŋ di vớʔi tôʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋtộk za fổ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi babilôn di vớʔi cɔŋ dờʔi vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ cịvì về kɔncáʔu finê ʔa kó ɣẹtsôn kɔncáʔu ʔitʰama kó Ðʔa kɔncáʔu Ðʔa kó háttúk kɔncáʔu sêkaniə kɔncáʔu fazốt kó sɛcazi ɲữŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰeo za fổ dượk mộtcăm nămmươʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu fahátmôáp kó liôênaj kɔ caj kủʔa sêzahiɣaj vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk haj căm diɲ kɔncáʔu sɛcaniə kó kɔncaj zahasiên vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk bɛcăm diɲ kɔncáʔu ʔadin kó kɔncaj ɣiônatʰan vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk nămmươʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu kó saj kɔncaj ʔatʰaliə vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk bảʔi mươʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu sêfati ʔa kó sêbadiə kɔncaj micaên vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk mươʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu ɣiôáp kó diə kɔncaj ɣiêhiên vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk haj căm mướʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu sêlômít kó kɔncaj ɣiôsifiə vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk mộtcăm sáʔu mươʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu bêbaj kó sɛcazi kɔncaj kủʔa bêbaj vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk haimươʔitám diɲ kɔncáʔu ʔaɣát kó ɣiôhaham kɔncaj kủʔa hakatan vớʔi ŋườʔi dượk mộtcăm mườʔi diɲ ɲưŋ tʰuộk kɔncáʔu ʔadônicam dến săw cúŋ lifêlết ɣiêhiên samaza vớʔi dượk sáʔu mươʔi diɲ kɔncáʔu biếtvaj kó ʔutaj kùŋ sápbút vớʔi dượk bảʔi mươʔi diɲ ta ɲóm cúŋ ɣần sôŋ cảʔi ʔahava zồʔi cúŋta cạʔi tạʔi dó ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn sɛmsét zânsự tʰầʔi sɔŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi lêvi nàʔɔ ta saj ɣọʔi kák cưởŋtộk liêsɛ ʔaziên sêmaza natʰan zazíp ʔɛânnatʰan natʰan sɛcazi mêsulam ɣiôzazíp ʔɛânnatʰan tʰầʔi ɣiáʔɔsư ta saj kák ŋườʔi ấʔi di dến cưởŋtộk ʔidô tạʔi kasifiə biểʔu fảʔi zạʔi ʔidô kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi tứk ŋườʔi nêtʰinim tạʔi kasifiə fảʔi zẫn dếnkùŋ cúŋta ɲữŋ ɣiúpviệk nơʔi dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta vì ɲờ tăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta fùcợ kák ŋườʔi ấʔi zẫn dếnkùŋ cúŋta ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰuộk zòŋ mácli hậʔu kủʔa lêvi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔisơzaên sêzêbiə kák kɔncaj kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dượk mườʔitám lạʔi dượk hasabiə saj tʰuộk zòŋ mêzazi kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi haimươʔi kòn cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nêtʰinim Ðʔa kák kwan cưởŋ dã dặt ɣiúpviệk ŋườʔi lêvi tʰìkó dượk haj căm haimươʔi ŋườʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu ɣọʔi díczɛɲ tạʔi dó ɣần sôŋ ʔahava cwiền kiêŋkữ dể cúŋ hạmìɲ suốŋ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kầʔusin ŋàʔi cỉ cɔbiết dườŋ cáɲ dáŋ cúŋta kɔnkáʔi cúŋta tàʔisản mìɲ fảʔi di vảlạʔi lấʔilàm tʰẹn cẳŋ zám sin vwa dạʔɔkwân líɲ kỵbiɲ vựk cúŋta xỏʔi tʰùŋịc cɔŋ lúk di dườŋ cúŋta kó nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ tăj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi fùcợ mọʔi nàʔɔ ŋàʔi ɲưŋ kwiềnnăŋ tʰạɲ ŋàʔi xáŋkự ɲũŋ nàʔɔ lìʔabỏ ŋàʔi Ấʔi vậʔi cúŋta kiêŋkữ kầʔusin ŋàʔi diềʔu ấʔi ŋàʔi ɲậm lờʔi cúŋta cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cọn mườʔihaj ŋườʔi cưởŋ sêzêbiə hasabiə mườʔi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm dɔạn kân cɔ cúŋ kák bạk vàŋ ɲữŋ xí zụŋ vwa kák mưʔu tʰần kák kwan cưởŋ vwa kùŋ kả zân ʔisơzaên kómặt tạʔi dó dã zâŋ cɔ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta vậʔi kân zaw cɔ sáʔu căm nămmươʔi lâŋ bạk xí zụŋ bằŋ bạk ɣiá mộtcăm lâŋ mộtcăm lâŋ vàŋ haimươʔi káʔi cén bằŋ vàŋ ɣiá mộtŋàn da ziếk haj káʔi cậʔu vằŋ dồŋ bóŋláŋ ɲứt kũŋ kwí ɲư vàŋ zồʔi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ cáɲ kák ŋươʔi dã dượk ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê kák xí zụŋ nầʔi kũŋ tʰáɲ bạk vàŋ nầʔi lạk zâŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi xá ɣìŋiữ kỹlưỡŋ cɔdến cừŋ kák ŋươʔi kân lạʔi cướk ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kả ŋườʔi lêvi kùŋ cướk kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ʔisơzaên tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ xɔ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkzê vậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi săw xi dã kiểmsɔát lạʔi kân nặŋ kủʔa bạk vàŋ ɲữŋ xí zụŋ zồʔi tʰâʔu ɲận dặn dɛm dến ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ŋàʔi mườʔihaj tʰáŋzêŋ cúŋta sôŋ ʔahava xởʔihàɲ dặŋ di dến ɣiêzusalɛm tăj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta fùcợ cúŋta ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta xỏʔi tăj tʰùŋịc xỏʔi zìɲ fụk zọk dườŋ Ðʔɔạn cúŋta dến ɣiêzusalɛm tạʔi dó ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰứtư cúŋta kân lạʔi bạk vàŋ ɲữŋ xí zụŋ cɔŋ dền tʰờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi zaw cɔ mêzêmốt kɔncaj ʔuzi tʰầʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi kó lêʔasa kɔncaj kủʔa finê ʔa ɣiôsabáp kɔncaj ɣiêswa nôʔadiə kɔncaj binnuj ŋườʔi lêvi kứ tʰeo kân kân nặŋ dềʔu biêncép cɔŋ ấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã fu dượk cởvề zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên bằŋ mườʔihaj kɔn dựk kả ʔisơzaên cín mươʔi sáʔu kɔnciên dựk bảʔi mươʔi bảʔi kɔnciên kɔn mườʔihaj kɔn zê dựk dể kủʔa cuộk tộʔi kảtʰảʔi dềʔu zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu cɔ Ðứkzê cúŋ zaw ciếʔu c kủʔa vwa cɔ kák kwan cấn cɔ kák kwan kaj kủʔa vwa fíʔa nầʔi sôŋ ɣiúpdỡ zânsự việk dền tʰờ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi săw kák việk dó kák kwan cưởŋ dến ɣần nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cẳŋ kó fânzẽ vớʔi kák zântộk kủʔa sứ nầʔi bắtcướk tʰeo ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa zân kanaan zân hêvít zân fêzêsít zân ɣiêbusít zân ʔammôn zân môáp zân zíptô zân ʔamôzít vì cúŋ kó lấʔi ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa mìɲ kɔncaj mìɲ zòŋzõʔi tʰáɲ dã fa ɲưvậʔi vớʔi zântộk kủʔa kák sứ nầʔi tʰật kák cưởŋ kwan kaj dầʔu fạmtộʔi zườŋ ấʔi xi ŋɛ kák lờʔi ấʔi sé áʔɔ cɔŋ áʔɔtơʔi mìɲ ɲổ tók dầʔu lôŋ zâʔu zồʔi ŋồʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi vâŋ kỉɲ kák lờʔi fán Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dềʔu lạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ sợhãʔi tộʔi cọŋ kủʔa kák ŋườʔi dã fu dượk kó fạm kòn ŋồʔi kiɲ hɔảŋ cɔdến xi zâŋ kủʔa buổʔi ciềʔu ɣiờ zâŋ kủʔa buổʔi ciềʔu dứŋzậʔi xỏʔi nơʔi xổɲụk mìɲ áʔɔ cɔŋ áʔɔtơʔi sé zác kwì ɣốʔi suốŋ ɣiơ tăj za hướŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰưʔa vớʔi ŋàʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi hổtʰẹn cẳŋ zám ŋướk ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi zanák cúŋtôʔi dã tʰêm ɲiềʔu kwá dầʔu cúŋtôʔi tộʔi cúŋtôʔi kawlớn cờʔi từ ŋàʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cúŋtôʔi dã kựk kùŋ fạmtộʔi kớ tộʔiák mìɲ cúŋtôʔi kák vwa cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cúŋtôʔi dềʔu fó vàʔɔ tăj kák vwa ɲữŋ sứ ɣươm fu kướp ɣiựt sỉɲụk ʔiɲư diềʔu dó dã kó ŋàʔinăj sɔŋ bâʔizờ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi dể fần zư lạʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi káʔi diɲ cɔŋ cỗ tʰáɲ nầʔi hầʔu cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi sɔj sáŋ kɔn cúŋtôʔi xiến cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɣiữʔa mìɲ dượk zấʔi mộtcút vì cúŋtôʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi xôŋ cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi dã xiến cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk cướk kák vwa fɛzơsơ hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi zấʔi dặŋ kất dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi cúŋtôʔi sâʔi lạʔi ɲữŋ nơʔi kủʔa kùŋ cɔ cúŋtôʔi nơʔi tạʔi cɔŋ sứ zuda tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm bâʔizờ hỡʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ôʔi săw ɲữŋ diềʔu dó cúŋtôʔi nóʔi làmsaw vì cúŋtôʔi dã lìʔabỏ diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi dã kậʔi kák tiênci tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fán zạʔi cúŋtôʔi zằŋ sứ kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ dặŋ ɲận lấʔi dó sứ ôʔuế tạʔi ôʔuế kủʔa kák zântộk tạʔi ɣớmɣiếk kủʔa cúŋnó dã cɔ sứ ấʔi dầʔizẫʔi dầʔu nầʔi cí dầʔu kiə vìvậʔi cɔnên cớ ɣả kɔŋáʔi kák ŋươʔi cɔ kɔncaj cúŋnó dừŋ kướʔi kɔŋáʔi cɔ kɔncaj kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cớ tʰạɲ lợʔi hɔặk bìɲan kủʔa cúŋnó dể kák ŋươʔi cởnên mạɲzạn hwalợʔi kủʔa sứ dể lạʔi cɔ kák kɔncaj mìɲ kơŋiệp dờʔidờʔi vả săw ɲữŋ tajhọʔa dã ɣiáŋ cên cúŋtôʔi tạʔi kák hàɲ ák tộʔi cọŋ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi màlạʔi hỡʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ôʔi tʰật cúʔa cẳŋ kó fạt cúŋtôʔi cɔ dáŋ ɲư tộʔi cúŋtôʔi dã cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk fần lạʔi zườŋ nầʔi vậʔi kólẽnàʔɔ cúŋtôʔi lạʔi fạm kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa cúʔa nữʔa vớʔi kák zântộk ɲữŋ ɣớmɣiếk nầʔi saw vậʔitʰì kơn tʰạɲ cúʔa cẳŋ nổʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi tiêʔuziệt cúŋtôʔi dến dỗʔi cẳŋ kòn fần lạʔi kũŋ xôŋ ʔaj tʰɔát xỏʔi hăjsaw hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ôʔi cúʔa kôŋbìɲ kòn cúŋtôʔi cỉ ŋườʔi dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi ɲư dã tʰấʔi ŋàʔinăj nầʔi cúŋtôʔi cướk cúʔa mắk tộʔilỗʔi ɲiềʔu ɲân dó cẳŋ ʔaj kó tʰế dứŋ nổʔi cướk ŋàʔi cɔŋ lúk ʔɛsơza kầʔuŋwiện ɲưvậʔi vừʔa xók vừʔa sưŋtộʔi mìɲ suốŋ cướk dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰìkó dám zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi zất dôŋ ɲóm suŋkwɛɲ ŋườʔi cúŋ kũŋ xók sêkaniə kɔncaj ɣiêhiên cáʔu kủʔa nóʔi kùŋ ʔɛsơza zằŋ cúŋta fạmtộʔi vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kướʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi tʰuộk kák zântộk kủʔa sứ ɲưŋ zầʔu dã làmvậʔi hãʔi kòn hivọŋ cɔ zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi zawướk vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta duổʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kiə kák kɔnkáʔi kủʔa dã sɛɲ za ʔiɲư lờʔi cỉɣiáʔɔ kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi kủʔa kák ŋườʔi kó lòŋ kíɲ diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta xá diềʔu ấʔi tʰeo luậtfáp Ôŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi việk ầʔi kɛɲệ dến ôŋ cúŋtôʔi ɣiúpdỡ xá kandảm ʔɛsơza dứŋzậʔi xiến ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kả ŋườʔi lêvi kả ʔisơzaên tʰề zằŋ mìɲ tʰeo lờʔi ấʔi cúŋ tʰề xi ʔɛsơza dã cổʔi zậʔi xỏʔi cướk dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi di vàʔɔ fòŋ kủʔa ɣiôhanan kɔncaj liəsíp ŋườʔi vàʔɔ dó xôŋ báɲ kũŋ xôŋ ʔuốŋ nướk bởʔi ŋườʔi lấʔilàm buồntʰảm kớ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa zân dã fu dượk cởvề ŋườʔita zaw cwiền xắp sứ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm biểʔu kák zân dã fu dượk cởvề ɲóm tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ ŋàʔi ʔaj xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa kák kwan cưởŋ cưởŋlãʔɔ dến tʰì kák tàʔisản ŋườʔi ấʔi tịc fɔŋ cíɲ ŋườʔi cuất xỏʔi hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa zân dã fu dượk cởvề cɔŋ ŋàʔi kák ŋườʔi kủʔa zuda bêŋiəmin dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲằm ŋàʔi haimươʔi tʰáŋ cín kả zânsự dềʔu ŋồʔi tạʔi fố dằŋ cướk dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zúŋ việk ấʔi kơn mưʔa Ðʔɔạn ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi dứŋzậʔi nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dã fạmtộʔi kướʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ bâʔizờ xá sưŋtộʔi lỗʔi mìɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa tổfụ kák ŋươʔi dềʔu dẹp ŋàʔi hãʔi fânkác xỏʔi kák zântộk kủʔa sứ xỏʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ kả hộʔi cúŋ dáp lớntiếŋ zằŋ fảʔi diềʔu ôŋ dã nóʔi cúŋtôʔi fảʔi tʰeo sɔŋ zânsự dôŋ ɲầm mùʔa mưʔa cúŋtôʔi xôŋ kó tʰểnàʔɔ dứŋ ŋɔàʔi lạʔi diềʔu nầʔi cẳŋ fảʔi việk kủʔa hɔặk haj ŋàʔi cɔŋ việk nầʔi cúŋtôʔi dã fạmtộʔi ɲiềʔu vậʔi sin kák kwan cưởŋ cúŋtôʔi hãʔi dứŋ dó dặŋ cɔ kả hộʔi cúŋ fàm ʔaj cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ cúŋtôʔi dã kướʔi lấʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ fảʔi dến tʰeo ɲứt dịɲ vớʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kwan sét kủʔa tʰàɲ dặŋ sắpdặt việk nàʔi cɔdến cừŋ dã ŋuôʔi kơn ɣiậnzữ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cỉɣiô natʰan kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasaên zasiza kɔncaj tiếkva fản kảʔi lờʔi dịɲ nầʔi mêsulam kùŋ sápbêtaj ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu ɣiúp cɔ vậʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã fu dượk cởvề tʰeo diềʔu dã ɲứ dịɲ ŋườʔita cọn ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi mấʔi cưởŋtộk tùʔi tʰeo tôŋtộk mìɲ hếttʰảʔi dềʔu ɣọʔi díczɛɲ ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ mườʔi cúŋ ŋồʔi dặŋ casét việk nầʔi ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋzêŋ cúŋ dã casét sɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔŋ zòŋ tʰầʔi kũŋ kó tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã kướʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔŋ kɔncáʔu ɣiêswa cít kủʔa ɣiôsadák cɔŋ vòŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi kó maasêza liêsɛ zazíp ɣêdaliə cúŋ hứʔa duổʔi mìɲ zâŋ kɔnciên dựk kủʔa cuộk lỗʔi mìɲ cɔŋ kɔncáʔu ʔimê kó hanani sêbabiə cɔŋ kɔncáʔu hazim kó maasêza sêmaza ɣiêhiên ʔusiə cɔŋ kɔncáʔu fasuzơ kó liôênaj maasêza Íc natʰanaên ɣiôsabát lêʔasa cɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi kó ɣiôsabát simê ʔi kêlaza kũŋ ɣọʔilà kêlita fêtahiə zuda liêsɛ cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi kahát kó liəsíp cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa kó salum têlɛm ʔuzi cɔŋ zân ʔisơzaên cɔŋ kɔncáʔu fazốt kó zamiə ʔisiə mɛɲkiza mizamin lêʔasa mɛɲkiza mizamin lêʔasa mɛɲkiza bênaza cɔŋ kɔncáʔu kó máttaniə sɛcazi ɣiêhiên di ɣiêzêmốt cɔŋ kɔncáʔu sáttu kó liəsíp máttaniə ɣiêzêmốt sabát ʔasisa cɔŋ kɔncáʔu bêbaj kó ɣiôhanan hananiə sápbaj laj cɔŋ kɔncáʔu bani kó mêsulam malúk ʔadaza zasút sêʔɛɲ zamốt cɔŋ kɔncáʔu fahátmôáp kó kêlɛɲ bênaza maasêza máttaniə bếtsalêên binnuj manasɛ cɔŋ kɔncáʔu hazim kó liêsɛ zisiza mɛɲkiza sêmaza simêôn bêŋiəmin malúk sêmazi ʔa cɔŋ kɔncáʔu hasum kó mátnaj máttata sabát lifêlết ɣiêzêmaj manasɛ simê ʔi cɔŋ kɔncáʔu bani kó maêdaj ʔamzam ʔuên bênnaza bêdiə kêluhu vaniə mêzêmốt liəsíp máttaniə máttênaj zaasaj bani binnuj simê ʔi sêlêmiə natʰan ʔadaza máknátbaj sazaj sazaj ʔasazên sêlêmiə sêmaziə salum ʔamaziə ɣiôsép cɔŋ kɔncáʔu nêbô kó ɣiê ʔiên matitʰiə sabát sêbina ɣiátdaj ɣiôên bênaza hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi dã kướʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ kũŋ kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ ấʔi kó dã sɛɲ dẻ kɔn lờʔi kủʔa nêhêmi kɔncaj hakaliə năm tʰứ haimươʔi ɲằm tʰáŋ kítlơ sảʔi xi tôʔi dươŋ tạʔi kiɲdô susơ kó ŋườʔi cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi hanani vớʔi vàʔi ŋườʔi zuda dến tôʔi hỏʔitʰăm cúŋ zân zuda dã dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi tứk ɲữŋ dã fu kòn lạʔi hỏʔi ɲữŋ việk ɣiêzusalɛm kák ŋườʔi ấʔi nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ ɲữŋ fu kòn lạʔi cɔŋ tỉɲ tainạn sỉɲụk kòn vác tʰàɲ kủʔa ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì kák kửʔa dã lửʔa cáʔi xi tôʔi ŋɛ kák lờʔi ấʔi ŋồʔi xók kưtaŋ mấʔi ŋàʔi tôʔi kữ kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkcúʔa kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi zằŋ Ôʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔa kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi tứk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kựkdạʔi dáŋ kiɲ hăj ɣiữ lờʔi zawướk lòŋ ɲântừ kùŋ nàʔɔ kíɲmến ŋàʔi vâŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi tôʔi sin cúʔa hãʔi dɔáʔi dến taj cúʔa lắŋŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa dầʔitớ cúʔa tôʔi lúk nàʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi dêm kầʔuŋwiện zân ʔisơzaên kák tôʔitớ cúʔa tạʔi cướk cúʔa sưŋ ɲữŋ tộʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên cúŋtôʔi dã fạm vớʔi ŋàʔi và lạʔi tôʔi ɲà kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi kũŋ kó fạmtộʔi cúŋtôʔi kó zất ák ŋịc kùŋ cúʔa xôŋ vâŋ ɣiữ diềʔu zăn ɣiớʔi mạŋ kủʔa cúʔa dã fán zạʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ cúʔa sincúʔa hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi lờʔi cúʔa dã fán zạʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ cúʔa zằŋ nếʔu kák ŋươʔi fạmtộʔi zảʔi kák ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa kák zântộk kòn nếʔu kák ŋươʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ ɣìŋiữ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa zầʔu xi lạk kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kuốʔi cờʔi kũŋ dó ciêʔutập cúŋnó zẫn cúŋnó dếnnơʔi dã cọn dặŋ cɔ zɛɲ ŋự tạʔi dó vả cúŋ kák tôʔitớ zânsự kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa dã kậʔi kwiềnnăŋ tăj mạɲmẽ cuộk lạʔi cúʔa ôʔi lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa kák tôʔitớ ŋàʔi vujlòŋ kíɲ zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋàʔinăj sin cúʔa hãʔi cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk măimắn cɔ dượk ɲântừ cướk ŋườʔi nàʔi vả bấʔizờ tôʔi kwan tửʔu cáɲ kủʔa vwa Ðươŋ tʰứ haimươʔi dờʔi vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ tʰáŋ nisan zượʔu cướk ŋườʔi tôʔi lấʔi zượʔu zâŋ cɔ vwa cướk tôʔi xôŋ kó buồnzầʔu tạʔi cướk ŋườʔi vwa nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ ɲơn saw ŋươʔi mặtmàʔi zầʔu ŋươʔi xôŋ kó bịɲ Ðʔiềʔu dó cỉ buồnzầʔu cɔŋ lòŋ tʰôʔi bấʔizờ tôʔi lấʔilàm sợhãʔi nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ ŋwiện vwa lẽnàʔɔ tôʔi xôŋ xi káʔi tʰàɲ nơʔi kó kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi fáhwaŋ kák kửʔa tʰàɲ lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt vwa hỏʔi tôʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kầʔusin káʔi ɣì tôʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi zồʔi tâʔu vớʔi vwa zằŋ nếʔu vwa tʰấʔi diềʔu dó tốtlàɲ nếʔu tôʔitớ vwa dượk cướk vwa sin vwa hãʔi saj tôʔi zuda dến tʰàɲ kó kủʔa tổfụ tôʔi dể tôʔi sâʔicất tʰàɲ ấʔi lạʔi Ðươŋ xi ấʔi hɔàŋậʔu kũŋ ŋồʔi bênkạɲ vwa vwa hỏʔi tôʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi di dườŋ lâʔu cừŋ bawɲiêʔu xi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi cởvề vậʔi vwa dẹplòŋ saj tôʔi di tôʔi dịɲ ɲựt cɔ ŋườʔi tôʔi kũŋ tʰưʔa vớʔi vwa zằŋ nếʔu diềʔu nàʔi dượk dẹplòŋ vwa sin vwa hãʔi caw cɔ tôʔi ɲữŋ bứk tʰơ cwiền kák kwa tổŋcấn kiə sôŋ cɔfép tôʔi di ŋaŋ kwa cɔdến xi tôʔi tớʔi zuda lạʔi ciếʔucỉ cɔ ʔasáp ɣiữ zừŋ vwa cwiền ŋườʔi cɔ tôʔi ɣỗ xuôn kửʔa kủʔa tʰàɲ diện ɣiáp vớʔi dền vác tʰàɲ kùŋ ɲà tôʔi fảʔi vàʔɔ vwa cɔ tôʔi kák diềʔu dó tùʔi tʰeo tăj ɲơn làɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi vậʔi tôʔi dếnkùŋ kák kwan tổŋcấn kiə sôŋ vàʔɔ caw cɔ ɲữŋ bứk tʰơ kủʔa vwa vả vwa kó saj ɲữŋ kwan tướŋ kwân di vớʔi tôʔi xisan ŋườʔi hôzôn tôbiza tôʔitớ ʔammôn hăj diềʔu dó tʰì lấʔilàm bấtbìɲ kó ŋườʔi dến dặŋ hưŋ tʰạɲ kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên vậʔi tôʔi dến ɣiêzusalɛm tạʔi dó ŋàʔi tôʔi mấʔi ŋườʔi kùŋ tʰeo tôʔi cổʔi zậʔi bandêm tôʔi cẳŋ cɔ ʔaj hăjbiết ɣì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã xiến lòŋ tôʔi twan ɣiêzusalɛm lạʔi ŋɔàʔi kɔn tʰú tôʔi kỡʔi tʰì cẳŋ kó kɔn tʰú nàʔɔ xák vớʔi tôʔi bandêm tôʔi za nơʔi kửʔa cũŋ dốʔi ŋaŋ suốʔi kɔn có zừŋ dến kửʔa fân sɛmsét kák vác tʰàɲ kủʔa ɣiêzusalɛm kák kửʔa lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt Ðʔɔạn tôʔi di kwa kửʔa ɣiếŋ dếnnơʔi ʔaw kủʔa vwa sɔŋ xôŋ kó nơʔi nàʔɔ dặŋ cɔ kɔn tʰú tôʔi kỡʔi di ŋaŋ kwa dượk kế dó bandêm tôʔi dườŋ xɛ di sɛmsét vác tʰàɲ zồʔi tôʔi tʰốʔi lạʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi kửʔa cũŋ cởvề vả kák kwan cưởŋ xôŋ hiểʔu tôʔi di dâʔu nàʔɔ zõ tôʔi làmɣì dến cừŋ ấʔi tôʔi cưʔa za cɔ ŋườʔi zuda hɔặk cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi hɔặk cɔ kwiền kwí hɔặk cɔ kwan cưởŋ hăjlà cɔ kák ŋườʔi xák lɔ kôŋviệk dượk ɣì dến tôʔi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi sɛm tìɲkảɲ xổ kủʔa cúŋta dươŋ dâʔi ɣiêzusalɛm fáhwaŋ kák kửʔa lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt hãʔi dến sâʔicất kák vác tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm lạʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋta cẳŋ kòn sỉɲụk nữʔa tôʔi kũŋ tʰuật cɔ cúŋ làmsaw tăj ɲơn kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dã ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi kák lờʔi vwa dã nóʔi kùŋ tôʔi cúŋ nóʔi hè hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi sâʔi sửʔa lạʔi vậʔi cúŋ dượk vữŋcắk cɔŋ ɲứt dịɲ kôŋviệk tốtlàɲ nàʔi sanbalát ŋườʔi hôzôn tôbiza tôʔitớ ʔammôn ɣêsɛm ŋườʔi ʔa zạp dượk hăj việk dó ɲạʔɔbáŋ xiɲbỉ cúŋtôʔi cúŋnó nóʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi làmci dó kák ŋươʔi kó fảnŋịc vwa saw tôʔi dáp vớʔi cúŋnó zằŋ Ðứkcúʔa kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi cɔ cúŋta hɛɲtʰôŋ vìvậʔi cúŋta tôʔitớ ŋàʔi cổʔi zậʔi sâʔi sửʔa lạʔi ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó fần hɔặk fép hɔặk cɔŋ ɣiêzasalɛm sửʔa kák vác tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm lạʔi liəsíp tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm cổʔi zậʔi vớʔi kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi sâʔicất káʔi kửʔa ciên cúŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ dặt haj káɲ kửʔa cúŋ ziêŋ za tʰáɲ cɔdến tʰáp mê ʔa cɔdến tʰáp hananêên kế liəsíp ŋườʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzicô sâʔicất cúŋ saku kɔncaj kủʔa ʔimzi sâʔicất kɔncáʔu kủʔa sêna sâʔicất kửʔa ká cúŋ dặt xuôn ca káɲ cốt vớʔi tʰɛn kế cúŋ mêzêmốt kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusi cáʔu kủʔa hakốt lɔ sửʔa sâʔi kế cúŋ mêsulam kɔncaj bêzêkiə cáʔu mêsêsalêên kế cúŋ sadốk kɔncaj baana kế cúŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi têkô ʔa sɔŋ kák ŋườʔi tướkvị cẳŋ ɣévaj vàʔɔ kôŋviệk kủʔa cúʔa mìɲ ɣiêzada kɔncaj kủʔa fasê ʔa mêsulam kɔncaj kủʔa bêsôdiə sửʔa sâʔi káʔi kửʔa kũ lạʔi cúŋ ca káɲ cốt tʰɛn kế cúŋ mêlatiə ŋườʔi ɣabaôn zadôn ŋườʔi mêzônốt kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣabaôn ŋườʔi mícba tʰuộk dịʔahạt kủʔa kwan tổŋcấn kiə sôŋ dềʔu kế cúŋ ʔusiên kɔncaj hạtʰaza cɔŋ tʰợ vàŋ ŋườʔi hananiə ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰợ hòʔa hươŋ sửʔa sâʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔ vữŋbền dến vác zộŋ kế zêfaza kɔncaj kủʔa huzơ kwảnlý fânnửʔa kwận ɣiêzusalɛm kế ɣiêzada kɔncaj hazumáp nơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ vớʔi ɲà ŋườʔi kế ŋườʔi háttúk kɔncaj kủʔa hasápniə mɛɲkiza kɔncaj kủʔa fahátmôáp fần xák káʔi tʰáp kế cúŋ salum kɔncaj kủʔa halôhɛ kwảnlý fânnửʔa kwận ɣiêzusalɛm kák kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu hanun zânkư sanô ʔa sửʔa káʔi kửʔa cũŋ cúŋ sâʔicất ca káɲ kửʔa cốt tʰɛn kũŋ sâʔi mộtŋàn tʰướk vác ŋăn cɔdến kửʔa fân mɛɲkiza kɔncaj zêkáp kwảnlý kwận bếtʰátkêzɛn sửʔa káʔi kửʔa fân ŋườʔi sâʔicất ca káɲ kửʔa cốt tʰɛn salun kɔncaj kủʔa kôɲôsɛ kwảnlý kwận mícba sửʔa káʔi kửʔa ɣiếŋ ŋườʔi sâʔicất ca káɲ kửʔa cốt tʰɛn kũŋ sâʔi vác ŋăn kủʔa ʔaw silô ɣấn vwa cɔdến káʔi tʰaŋ tʰàɲ Ðʔa cở suốŋ kế ŋườʔi nêhêmi kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahúk kwảnlý fânnửʔa kwận bếtsuzơ sửʔa sâʔi vác cɔdến ŋaŋ kák lăŋtẩm Ðʔa cɔdến ʔaw dã dàʔɔ cɔdến ɲà kủʔa kák zõŋ kế ŋườʔi zêhum kɔncaj bani ŋườʔi lêvi kế ŋườʔi hasabiə kwảnlý fânnửʔa kwận kê ʔila fần kwận mìɲ kế ŋườʔi kó ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa bavaj kɔncaj kủʔa hênadát kwảnlý fânnửʔa kwận kê ʔila kế ŋườʔi sɛ kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôsuê kwảnlý mícba fần xák dốʔi ŋaŋ zốk di xi biɲxí ɣók tʰàɲ săw ŋườʔi kó bazúk kɔncaj kủʔa sápbaj lấʔilòŋ sốtsắŋ fần xák ɣók tʰàɲ cɔdến kửʔa vàʔɔ ɲà liəsíp tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm săw ŋườʔi kó mêzêmốt kɔncaj ʔusi cáʔu hakốt sửʔa fần xák kửʔa vàʔɔ ɲà liəsíp cɔdến kuốʔi ɲà ŋườʔi săw ŋườʔi kó ɲữŋ tʰầʔi dồŋbằŋ ɣiôdɛɲ kế cúŋ bêŋiəmin hasúp fần dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲà mìɲ kế cúŋ ʔasaziə kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasêza cáʔu ʔananiə fíʔa ɲà mìɲ kế ŋườʔi binnuj kɔncaj kủʔa hênadát sửʔa fần xák ɲà ʔasaziə cɔ dếnnơʔi kạɲ cɔdến ɣók tʰàɲ falɛɲ kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasaj sửʔa nơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ɣók tʰàɲ nơʔi tʰáp kaw za kủʔa dền vwa dụŋ ɣiáp káʔi ŋụk kế ŋườʔi dó kó fêdaza kɔncaj kủʔa fazốt vả ŋườʔi nêtʰinim tạʔi fên cɔ dếnnơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ kửʔa nướk fíʔa dôŋ tʰáp za kế ŋườʔi ấʔi kó ŋườʔi tʰêkô ʔa sửʔa fần xák dốʔi ŋaŋ tʰáp za cɔ vác fên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi sửʔa nơʔi fíʔa cên kửʔa ŋựʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi sửʔa fần dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲà kủʔa mìɲ săw cúŋ sadốk kɔncaj ʔimê sửʔa nơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲà mìɲ kế săw ŋườʔi kó sêmaza kɔncaj sêkaniə ɣiữ kửʔa dôŋ kế ŋườʔi hananiə kɔncaj kủʔa sêlêmiə hanun kɔn tʰứsáʔu kủʔa saláp sửʔa fần xák kế cúŋ mêsalum kɔncaj kủʔa bêzêkiə sửʔa nơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲà mìɲ kế ŋườʔi mɛɲkiza ŋườʔi cɔŋ tʰợ vàŋ sửʔa cɔdến ɲà kủʔa ŋườʔi nêtʰinim tăj dốʔi ŋaŋ kửʔa mifơ kát cɔ dếnnơʔi zốk kủʔa ɣók tʰàɲ kòn ɲữŋ tʰợ vàŋ tăj dềʔu sửʔa fần ɣiữʔa nơʔi ɣók tʰàɲ kửʔa ciên xisan hăj zằŋ cúŋtôʔi sâʔi sửʔa vác tʰàɲ lạʔi tʰì lấʔilàm ɣiậnzữ ɲạʔɔbáŋ ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi nóʔi cướk ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi dạʔɔkwân samazi zằŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda ʔiếʔu ɲượk ấʔi làmɣì cớ tʰì ŋườʔita dể cɔ cúŋnó làmlụŋ saw cúŋnó zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi cúŋnó sɔŋ saw dã cáʔi tʰiêʔu zồʔi cúŋnó kótʰể zɔ dốŋ bụʔi dất lấʔi tʰàɲ dá lạʔi dượk saw tôbiza ŋườʔi ʔammôn bênkạɲ ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ vảlạʔi káʔi vác bằŋ dá ɲữŋ ấʔi sâʔicất kiə nếʔu kó kɔn cồn dó dáɲ suốŋ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ôʔi hãʔi ŋɛ cúŋtôʔi xiɲzể sin hãʔi dổ lạʔi cúŋnó cên dầʔu kủʔa hãʔi fó cúŋnó mồʔi cɔŋ sứ ŋườʔita fu kiə cớ cɛlấp zanák kủʔa cúŋnó dừŋ sóʔa tộʔilỗʔi cúŋnó sạc xỏʔi cướk cúʔa cướk kák tʰợ sâʔicất cúŋnó kó cọk cúʔa ɣiận vậʔi cúŋtôʔi sâʔicất vác tʰàɲ lạʔi tɔàn vác tʰàɲ dềʔu zíɲ ɲăw dến fânnửʔa kaw zânsự cwiên tʰàɲ kôŋviệk sảʔi xi sanbalát tôbizam ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔa zạp zân ʔammôn zân Ác dốt hăj zằŋ việk vác tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tấntớʔi kák nơʔi lũŋ hầʔu làɲ tʰì cúŋnó lấʔilàm ɣiậnzữ ɲăw hếttʰảʔi dặŋ dến dáɲ ɣiêzusalɛm cɔ zốʔilɔạn ɲưŋ cúŋtôʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi dêm kɛɲzữ ŋườʔizu da nóʔi kòn ɲiềʔu dồ sứklựk kủʔa xiêŋ záɲ dã ʔiếʔu cúŋta xôŋ tʰế sâʔicất vác tʰàɲ dượk kák tʰùŋịc cúŋtôʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋnó xôŋ hăj xôŋ tʰấʔi diềʔu dó cɔdến cừŋ cúŋta dến ɣiữʔa cúŋnó ɣiết cúŋnó di cɔ cúŋnó ŋưŋ kôŋ sɔŋ zân zuda ɣiữʔa dến mườʔi báʔɔkáʔɔ cúŋtôʔi zằŋ tʰùŋịc bởʔi bốnfươŋ cạʔi dến tôʔi ɲữŋ dồn cɔŋ kák nơʔi tʰấp fíʔa săw vác tʰàɲ tạʔi ɲữŋ nơʔi cốŋcảʔi tôʔi dặt zânsự từŋ họhàŋ tạʔi dó kó kầm ɣươm ɣiáʔɔ kuŋ tôʔi sɛmsét cổʔi zậʔi nóʔi vớʔi kák ŋườʔi tướkvị kwan tướŋ zânsự kòn lạʔi zằŋ cớ cúŋ xá dáɲ kiɲ hãʔi ciếndấʔu cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ cɔ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ ɲà kủʔa mìɲ xi kák tʰùŋịc cúŋtôʔi hăj zằŋ cúŋtôʔi dã dượk báʔɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó bạʔi mưʔu kủʔa cúŋnó tʰì hếttʰảʔi cúŋtôʔi dềʔu cởlạʔi nơʔi
