vác tʰàɲ ʔainấʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ từ ŋàʔi dó fânnửʔa dầʔitớ tôʔi kôŋviệk kòn fânnửʔa kiə kầm kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ xiên kuŋ ɣiáp kák kwan cưởŋ dềʔu dứŋ săw kả ɲà zuda ɲữŋ sâʔi sửʔa vác tʰàɲ ɲữŋ xiêŋ ɣáɲ ɲữŋ cất tăj tʰì kôŋviệk kòn tăj tʰì kầm biɲxí mìɲ ɲữŋ sâʔi sửʔa ʔainấʔi dềʔu kó kâʔi ɣươm mìɲ deo nơʔi lưŋ zồʔi sâʔi sửʔa kòn tʰổʔi tʰì tôʔi tôʔi nóʔi vớʔi kák ŋườʔi tướkvị kák kwan cưởŋ zânsự kòn lạʔi zằŋ kôŋviệk tʰì zàʔi kòn cúŋta zảʔizák cên vác ŋườʔi nàʔi kác sa ŋườʔi kiə tạʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tʰì hãʔi ɲóm lạʔi kùŋ cúŋta dó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋta ciếndấʔu cɔ cúŋta cúŋtôʔi kôŋviệk ɲưvậʔi fânnửʔa kầm kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ lúk zạŋdôŋ cɔdến xi saw mọk cɔŋ lúk ấʔi tôʔi kũŋ nóʔi vớʔi zânsự zằŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi kùŋ tôʔitớ mìɲ ŋủ dêm cúŋ fòŋ ɣiữ banŋàʔi kôŋviệk nàʔɔ tôʔi nàʔɔ ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi nàʔɔ kák ŋườʔi dầʔitớ tôʔi nàʔɔ ɲữŋ líɲ kɛɲ tʰeo tôʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj kởʔi áʔɔ mìɲ za mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu deo biɲxí nơʔi hữʔu mìɲ xi ấʔi kótiếŋ kêʔula kủʔa zânsự ŋườʔi zuda ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kó ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi dôŋdảʔɔ cúŋtôʔi fảʔi kó lúʔamì dể cɔ sốŋ kũŋ kó ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cɔŋ xi dóʔicém cúŋtôʔi kầm zuộŋ ɲɔ ɲà cúŋtôʔi hầʔu cɔ kó lúʔamì lạʔi kó ŋườʔi xák nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi kó kầm zuộŋ ɲɔ cúŋtôʔi văj bạk dặŋ dóŋ tʰuế cɔ vwa vả tʰân kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ɲư kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm cúŋtôʔi kák kɔncaj cúŋtôʔi xáknàʔɔ kák kɔncaj nàʔi cúŋtôʔi fảʔi kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi tôʔimọʔi dã kó dứʔa kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi tôʔimọʔi zồʔi xôŋ kòn tʰuộk nơʔi kwiền tăj cúŋtôʔi cuộk lạʔi dồŋzuộŋ ɲɔ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰuộk xák xi tôʔi ŋɛ kák lờʔi nàʔi tiếŋ kêʔula kủʔa lấʔilàm ɣiận lòŋ tôʔi bàntíɲ diềʔu dó kãʔilẫʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tướkvị kák kwan cưởŋ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi buộk lờʔi cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tôʔi ɲóm lạʔi hộʔi dôŋdảʔɔ dốʔiŋịc cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ kứ tʰeo kwiền cúŋta kó cuộk lạʔi ʔɛɲɛm cúŋta ŋườʔi zuda dã cɔ kák zântộk kák ŋươʔi lạʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ saw cớ tʰì cɔ cúŋta saw cúŋ làmtʰiɲ cẳŋ nóʔi ci nữʔa tôʔi lạʔi nóʔi Ðʔiềʔu ʔɛɲɛm cẳŋ dượk ʔɛɲɛm cẳŋ dáŋlẽ kác kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔɛ sỉɲụk ɣiữʔa kák zântộk tʰùŋịc kủʔa cúŋta saw tôʔi ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi kák dầʔitớ tôʔi kũŋ kó cɔ văimượn bạk lúʔamì vậʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi sin ʔɛɲɛm hãʔi káʔi ănlờʔi nàʔi tôʔi sin ʔɛɲɛm cáɲ ŋàʔinăj hãʔi cả lạʔi cɔ dồŋzuộŋ ɲɔ livɛ ɲàkửʔa kủʔa kùŋ lờʔi fầncăm bạk lúʔamì zượʔu zầʔu ʔɛɲɛm dã cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi cả lạʔi xôŋ dòʔi ci cúŋtôʔi ɲưvậʔi ʔi ôŋ dã nóʔi tôʔidòʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cúŋ tʰề fảʔi tʰeo ɲư lờʔi hứʔa dó tôʔi kũŋ ɣiũ áʔɔ tôʔi zằŋ fàm ʔaj xôŋ ɣiữ tʰeo lờʔi hứʔa nàʔi ŋwiện Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi ɣiũ xỏʔi ɲà xỏʔi hwalợʔi kủʔa kôŋlaw ŋwiện ɣiũ sạc xôŋ ɲưvậʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ dồŋ nóʔi ʔamɛn cúŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn zânsự dềʔu tʰeo lờʔi hứʔa ấʔi vảlạʔi ŋàʔi tôʔi dượk tổŋcấn cɔŋ sứ zuda tứk tʰứ haimươʔi cɔdến tʰứ bamươʔi haj dờʔi vwa ʔaï ttasétsɛ kộŋ cɔŋ mườʔihaj tôʔi hɔặk ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi cẳŋ lươŋ lộk tʰườŋ kấp cɔ kwan tổŋcấn ɲưŋ kák kwan tổŋcấn dã dến ɲậm cướk tôʔi zânsự kấpzưỡŋ lấʔi cɔ mìɲ lượŋ tʰựk zượʔu cừ za mươʔi siếk bạk dến dỗʔi kák dầʔitớ kũŋ cên zânsự nữʔa ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ kó ɲưvậʔi kớ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi tôʔi kũŋ ɣiữ bềnvữŋ cɔŋ kôŋviệk sâʔi sửʔa vác nàʔi cẳŋ kó mwa dồŋzuộŋ nàʔɔ kák dầʔitớ tôʔi dềʔu hộʔi lạʔi dó dặŋ kôŋviệk nơʔi tôʔi kũŋ kó mộtcăm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi zuda kwan cưởŋ ŋɔạʔicừ ɲữŋ ɣiữʔa kák zântộk cuŋkwɛɲ cúŋtôʔi di dến vả ŋườʔita zọn cɔ mỗʔi ŋàʔimột kɔn sáʔu kɔnciên cọnlựʔa ŋườʔita kũŋ zọn ɲữŋ ɣà mỗʔi mườʔi ŋàʔi dủ kák tʰứ zượʔu zất ɲiềʔu zầʔu ɲưvậʔi tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ dòʔi lươŋ lộk kủʔa fần tổŋcấn kôŋ zịc lấʔilàm nặŋnề cɔ zânsự nàʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi ŋwiện cúʔa ɲớ lạʔi tôʔi kák diềʔu tôʔi dã cɔ zânsự nàʔi cɔ tôʔi sảʔi xi sanbalát tôbiza ɣêsɛm ŋườʔi ʔa zạp kák tʰùŋịc cúŋtôʔi xák hăj zằŋ tôʔi dã sâʔi sửʔa vác tʰàɲ zồʔi xôŋ kòn nơʔi lũŋ nàʔɔ nữʔa zầʔu cɔdến lúk ấʔi tôʔi cưʔa ca káɲ kửʔa tʰì sanbalát ɣêsɛm saj dến nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến ɣặp ɲăw cɔŋ làŋ nàʔɔ tạʔi cũŋ ɲưŋ cúŋ kó hạʔi tôʔi tôʔi saj sứɣiả dến nóʔi kùŋ cúŋ zằŋ ta mắk kôŋviệk suốŋ xôŋ dặŋ lẽnàʔɔ dể kôŋviệk zứt cɔŋ xi dặŋ di suốŋ vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cúŋ saj nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi ɲưvậʔi sɔŋ tôʔi dáp lạʔi vớʔi cúŋ kũŋ ʔi ɲăw lần tʰứnăm sanbalát saj tôʔitớ ŋườʔi kũŋɲư kác kũ kó kầm tʰơ xôŋ nơʔi tăj cɔŋ tʰơ kó zằŋ cɔŋ kák zântộk ŋườʔita ŋɛ dồn ɣátmu nóʔi zằŋ Ôŋ ŋườʔi zuda twan ɲăw zấʔi lɔạn tạʔi kớ ấʔi ôŋ mớʔi sâʔi sửʔa vác tʰàɲ kứ tʰeo lờʔi dồn dó ôŋ vwa kủʔa cúŋ lạʔi ôŋ kó ɲữŋ tiênci dặŋ cwiền ɣiảŋ ôŋ tạʔi cɔŋ ɣiêzusalɛm zằŋ kó vwa cɔŋ sứ zuda bâʔizờ ŋườʔita cắk tâʔu cɔ vwa ŋɛ kũŋ kák việk ấʔi vậʔi hãʔi dến dể cúŋta ŋịluận vớʔi ɲăw tôʔi saj nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔita zằŋ ɲữŋ diềʔu ŋươʔi nóʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj cút nàʔɔ ɲưŋ cáɲ cɔŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi kó dặt za vì cúŋnó ɲát cɔ cúŋtôʔi hếttʰảʔi dềʔu sợhãʔi cúŋnó zằŋ tăj kủʔa cúŋnó mỏʔimệt xôŋ kôŋviệk nữʔa vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi cúʔa hãʔi cɔ tăj tôʔi mạɲmẽ Ðʔɔạn tôʔi di dến ɲà kủʔa sêmaza kɔncaj kủʔa laza cáʔu kủʔa mêhêtabêên ŋườʔi ấʔi dã zút dó ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi ɣặp ɲăw tạʔi cɔŋ ɲà kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cáɲ ɣiữʔa dền tʰờ zồʔi cúŋta dóŋ kák kửʔa dền tʰờ lạʔi cúŋnó dến ɣiết ôŋ ấʔi lúk bandêm cúŋnó twan dến ɣiết ôŋ tôʔi nóʔi ŋườʔi ɲư tôʔi dâʔi cạʔi cốn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɲư tôʔi dâʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ dền tʰờ màlạʔi dượk sốŋ saw tôʔi xôŋ vàʔɔ dâʔu tôʔi ɲìn cẳŋ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó saj ŋườʔi dến ŋườʔi nóʔi lờʔi tiênci dó ŋịc vớʔi tôʔi tôbiza sanbalát dã ŋườʔi vậʔi vì tạʔi dó ŋườʔi dượk cả tiềnkôŋ dặŋ xiến tôʔi sợhãʔi zụ tôʔi fạmtộʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋnó kó kớ dồn tiếŋ sấʔusa sỉɲụk tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi ɲớ tôbiza sanbalát tùʔi tʰeo kák kôŋviệk nàʔi haj ŋườʔi dã sin kũŋ ɲớ dến nôʔadiə tiênci kák tiênci xák dã cɔ tôʔi sợhãʔi vậʔi ŋàʔi haimươʔi tʰáŋ vác tʰàɲ sửʔa sɔŋ nămmươʔi haj ŋàʔi xi ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc cúŋtôʔi hăj dượk diềʔu dó tʰì kák zântộk cuŋkwɛɲ cúŋtôʔi dềʔu sợhãʔi lấʔilàm ŋãlòŋ cúŋnó ɲìn zằŋ kôŋviệk nàʔi tʰàɲ dượk bởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi kũŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi kó kák ŋườʔi tướkvị kủʔa sứ zuda ɣởʔi tʰơtừ cɔ tôbiza tôbiza dáp tʰơ ɣởʔi lạʔi cɔ cúŋ vì tạʔi zuda kó ɲiềʔu dã tʰề vớʔi ŋườʔi bởʔi ŋườʔi zể kủʔa sêkaniə kɔncaj kủʔa ʔaza ɣiôhanan kɔncaj ŋườʔi dã kướʔi kɔŋáʔi kủʔa mêsulam kɔncaj kủʔa bêzêkiə cúŋ kũŋ nóʔi cướk tôʔi ɲữŋ việk tốtlàɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi cúŋ họk lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kák lờʔi kủʔa tôʔi kòntô biza ɣởʔi tʰơ dể cɔ tôʔi sợhãʔi xi vác tʰàɲ dã sâʔi sɔŋ tôʔi dã ca kák káɲ kửʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiữ kửʔa kahát ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ cứkviệk kủʔa tʰì tôʔi zawfó việk kaicị ɣiêzusalɛm cɔ hanani ʔɛm tôʔi cɔ hananiə kwan kuŋ ŋườʔi cuŋtín kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲiềʔu xák tôʔi zặn cúŋ zằŋ cớ kák kửʔa ɣiêzusalɛm cướk xi mặtcờʔi nắŋnóŋ ŋườʔita fảʔi dóŋ káɲ kửʔa ɣàʔi tʰɛn lạʔi cɔŋ lúk ɣiữ kửʔa kòn tạʔi dó lạʔi fảʔi dặt ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ɣiêzusalɛm tʰeo fiên kɛɲzữ mỗʔi ŋườʔi dứŋ kɛɲ nơʔi dốʔi ŋaŋ ɲà mìɲ vả tʰàɲ tʰì zộŋzãʔi lớnlaw kòn zânsự cɔŋ lạʔi ɲà mớʔi tʰì cưʔa kó kất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kó kảmdộŋ lòŋ tôʔi ciêʔutập ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tướkvị kák kwan cưởŋ zânsự dặŋ dɛm cúŋ vàʔɔsổ từŋ za fổ tôʔi kó dặŋ kuốn za fổ kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã cởlên dầʔu cɔŋ dó tôʔi tʰấʔi kó ɣi zằŋ nàʔi kák ŋườʔi tỉɲ zuda nơʔi fu dượk cởlên tứk ɲữŋ tʰuộk cɔŋ nêbukanếtsa zẫn cúŋ cởlạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm sứ zuda ʔainấʔi dềʔu tʰàɲ mìɲ cúŋ cởvề vớʔi sôzôbabên ɣiêswa nêhêmi ʔasaziə zaamiə nahamani mạkdôcê biɲsan mícbêzết biếtvaj bêhum baana nầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên về kɔncáʔu fazốt haj ŋàn mộtcăm bảʔi mươʔi haj ŋườʔi kɔncáʔu sêfatiə bɛcăm bảʔi mươʔi haj ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ʔaza sáʔu căm nămmươʔi haj ŋườʔi về kɔ cáʔu fahátmôáp kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣiêswa ɣiôáp kó haj ŋàn támcăm mườʔitám ŋườʔi về kɔ cáʔu mộtŋàn haj căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu sáttu támcăm mươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu sákkaj bảʔicăm sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu binnuj sáʔu căm mươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu bêbaj sáʔu căm haimươʔitám ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ʔaɣát haj ŋàn bɛcăm haimươʔihaj ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ʔadônicam sáʔu căm sáʔu mươʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu biếtvaj haj ŋàn sáʔu mươʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ʔadin sáʔu căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi kɔncáʔu ʔatɛ zòŋzõʔi sêciə kó cín mươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu hasum bɛcăm haimươʔitám ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu bếtsaj bɛcăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu hazíp mộtcăm mườʔihaj ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ɣabaôn cín mươʔi ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi bếtlêhɛm nêtôfa mộtcăm mươʔi ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔanatốt mộtcăm haimươʔitám ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi bếtamavết mươʔi haj ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kiziátzêêzốt bảʔicăm mươʔi ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zama ɣêba sáʔu căm haimươʔi ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mícma mộtcăm haimươʔihaj ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi bêtên ʔahi mộtcăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nêbô xák nămmươʔi haj ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu xák mộtŋàn haj căm nămmươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu hazim bɛcăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ɣiêzicô bɛcăm mươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu kủʔa lôdơ kủʔa hasít kủʔa bảʔicăm haimươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu sêna ŋàn cín căm bamươʔi ŋườʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi về kɔncáʔu ɣiêdaza ɲà ɣiêswa cín căm bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu ʔimê mộtŋàn nămmươʔi haj ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu fazusơ mộtŋàn haj căm mươʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi về kɔncáʔu hazim mộtŋàn mườʔibảʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔilê kɔncáʔu kủʔa ɣiêswa kủʔa kátmiên zòŋzõʔi hôdêva bảʔi mươʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi kahát về kɔncáʔu ʔasáp mộtcăm mươʔi ŋườʔi kẻ ɣiữ kửʔa về kɔncáʔu salum kɔncáʔu ʔatɛ kɔncáʔu tɛɲmôn kɔncáʔu ʔakúp kɔncáʔu hatila kɔncáʔu sôbaj mộtcăm bamươʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔinê tʰinim kɔncáʔu siha kɔncáʔu hasufa kɔncáʔu tabaốt kɔncáʔu kêzốt kɔncáʔu siə kɔncáʔu fadôn kɔncáʔu lêbana kɔncáʔu haɣaba kɔncáʔu sɛɲmaj kɔncáʔu hanan kɔncáʔu ɣidên kɔncáʔu ɣaha kɔncáʔu zêʔaza kɔncáʔu zêsin kɔncáʔu nêkôda kɔncáʔu ɣasam kɔncáʔu ʔusa kɔncáʔu fasê ʔa kɔncáʔu bêsaj kɔncáʔu mê ʔunim kɔncáʔu nêfisênim kɔncáʔu bákbúk kɔncáʔu hakufa kɔncáʔu hazwa kɔncáʔu báttít kɔncáʔu mêhida kɔncáʔu hạtsa kɔncáʔu bạtkô kɔncáʔu sisêza kɔncáʔu tʰamák kɔncáʔu nêsiə kɔncáʔu hatifa zòŋzõʔi kák dầʔitớ kủʔa salômôn kɔncáʔu sôtaj kɔncáʔu sôfêzết kɔncáʔu fêzida kɔncáʔu zaala kɔncáʔu kôn kɔncáʔu ɣidên kɔncáʔu sêfatiə kɔncáʔu háttiɲ kɔncáʔu fôkếzết hátsêbaim kɔncáʔu ʔamɔn tổŋkộŋ kák ŋườʔi nêtʰinim kɔncáʔu kák dầʔitớ kủʔa salômôn bɛcăm cín mươʔi haj ŋườʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở tênmêla têɲạtsa kêzúp ʔadôn ʔimê di ɲưŋ cúŋnó xôŋtʰể cỉ za ɲà kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ ɣốkɣák kủʔa hɔặk tʰuộk ʔisơzaên hăj căŋ kɔncáʔu laza kɔncáʔu tôbiza kɔncáʔu nêkôda dềʔu sáʔu căm mươʔi haj ŋườʔi về ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu habaza kɔncáʔu hakốt kɔncáʔu bạtsilaj ŋườʔi lấʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa bạtsilaj ŋườʔi ɣalaát dượk ɣọʔi bằŋ kủʔa kák ŋườʔi ấʔi za fổ mìɲ ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi cừ za cứk cɔ ôʔuế kwan tổŋcấn kấm cúŋ ɲữŋ cí tʰáɲ cɔdến cừŋ kó tʰầʔi zấʔi zùŋ ʔuzim tʰunim kầʔu hỏʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kả hộʔi cúŋ lạʔi dượk haj ŋàn bɛcăm sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲữŋ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi kủʔa zân dượk bảʔi ŋàn bɛcăm mơʔi bảʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ kó haj căm mươʔi cúŋ kó bảʔicăm bamươʔi sáʔu kɔn ŋựʔa haj căm mươʔi kɔn bốncăm bamươʔi kɔn lạkdà sáʔu ŋàn bảʔicăm haimươʔi kɔn lừʔa kó mấʔi cưởŋtộk dɛm kủʔa kuŋtiến dặŋ ɣiúp kôŋviệk kwan tổŋcấn zâŋ cɔ xɔ mộtŋàn da ziếk vàŋ nămmươʔi káʔi cậʔu nămcăm bamươʔi káʔi áʔɔ tʰầʔi kó mấʔi cưởŋtộk zâŋ vàʔɔ xɔ tạʔɔták haj da ziếk vàŋ haj ŋàn haj căm bạk kòn zânsự xák zâŋ dượk haj da ziếk vàŋ haj ŋàn bạk sáʔu mươʔi bảʔi káʔi áʔɔ tʰầʔi Ấʔi vậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiữ kửʔa kahát mấʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zân ŋườʔi nêtʰinim kùŋ kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa mìɲ xi tʰáŋ bảʔi dến tʰì zân ʔisơzaên dềʔu cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa mìɲ bấʔizờ zânsự dềʔu ɲóm ɲưtʰể ŋườʔi tạʔi fố cướk kửʔa nướk cúŋ nóʔi vớʔi ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi tʰôŋ ɣiáʔɔ sin ŋườʔi dɛm kwiển sác luậtfáp kủʔa môʔisɛ Ðứkzê dã cwiền zạʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi mồŋ tʰáŋ bảʔi tʰầʔi ʔɛsơza dɛm luậtfáp dến cướk hộʔi cúŋ ŋườʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó tʰôŋ sáŋ ŋɛ hiểʔu dượk ŋườʔi dứŋ tạʔi fố cướk kửʔa nướk dọk cɔŋ kwiển ấʔi zạŋdôŋ cɔdến cưʔa kómặt kák ŋườʔi kùŋ ɲữŋ kótʰể hiểʔu dượk kả zânsự lắŋtaj ŋɛ dọk sác luậtfáp tʰầʔi tʰôŋ ɣiáʔɔ ʔɛsơza dứŋ cên káʔi bằŋ ɣỗ ŋườʔita ɲơn zịp ấʔi matitʰiə sêma ʔanaza ʔuzi hiɲkiə maasêza dứŋ ɣần ŋườʔiở hữʔu kòn ŋườʔi tʰìkó fêdaza misaên mɛɲkiza hasum hácbadana sɛcazi mêsulam ʔɛsơza zở sác za cướk kả zânsự ŋườʔi dứŋ kaw cúŋ xi ŋườʔi zở sác za tʰì zânsự dềʔu dứŋzậʔi ʔɛsơza ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kawkả kả zânsự ɣiơ tăj dáp lạʔi zằŋ ʔamɛn ʔamɛn zồʔi cúŋ kúʔi dầʔu suốŋ dất tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê ɣiêswa bani sêzêbiə ɣiôsabát hanan bêlaza ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu ɣiảʔi cɔ zânsự hiểʔu luậtfáp zânsự dứŋ tạʔicỗ mìɲ họ dọk zõzàŋ cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zồʔi ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa za cɔ ŋườʔita hiểʔu lờʔi dọk nêhêmi kwan tổŋcấn ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi tʰầʔi tʰôŋ ɣiáʔɔ kùŋ ŋườʔi lêvi zạʔizỗ zânsự nóʔi vớʔi kả ʔisơzaên zằŋ ŋàʔinăj tʰáɲ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cớ dểtaŋ kũŋ dừŋ xóklók vì kả zânsự dềʔu xók xi ŋɛ dọk kák luậtfáp nêhêmi nóʔi vớʔi cúŋ zằŋ hãʔi di ɣì béʔɔ ʔuốŋ dồ ɣì ŋọt hãʔi ɣởʔi fần cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ kó sắmsửʔa ɣì ŋàʔinăj tʰáɲ ziêŋ za cɔ cúʔa kủʔa cúŋta cớ buồntʰảm vujvẻ kủʔa Ðứkzê sứklựk kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔ kả zânsự dềʔu dượk ʔiênổn zằŋ xá di ŋàʔinăj tʰáɲ dừŋ sầʔutʰảm ci kả zânsự di dặŋ ʔuốŋ ɣởʔi cɔ ɲữŋ fần kùŋ vujvẻ cúŋ kó hiểʔu kák lờʔi ŋườʔita dã cwiền zạʔi cɔ mìɲ kwaŋàʔi tʰứhaj kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa kả zânsự ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi ʔɛsơza ŋườʔi tʰôŋ ɣiáʔɔ dặŋ cúý ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa luậtfáp cúŋ tʰấʔi kó cép cɔŋ luậtfáp zằŋ Ðứkzê kậʔi môʔisɛ fán zằŋ zân ʔisơzaên fảʔi cɔŋ ɲà lềʔu dươŋ lúk tʰáŋ bảʔi cúŋ fảʔi cwiền cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋɛ zằŋ hãʔi di cɔŋ núʔi ɲữŋ ɲáɲ livɛ livɛ zừŋ ɲữŋ ɲáɲ kâʔi ɲữŋ tầʔu ɲữŋ ɲáɲ kâʔi zậm dặŋ ɲữŋ ɲà lềʔu ʔiɲư dã cép zânsự di za dɛm kák ấʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu ɲà lềʔu cên nók ɲà mìɲ ŋɔàʔi mìɲ cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi fố kủʔa kửʔa nướk nơʔi fố kủʔa kửʔa zaim kả hộʔi cúŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ fu dượk cởvề kất ɲữŋ ɲà lềʔu cɔŋ dó từ dờʔi ɣiôsuê kɔncaj kủʔa nun cɔdến ŋàʔi ấʔi zân ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó làmɣì ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi bèn kó zất vuimừŋ mỗʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dầʔu cɔdến ŋàʔi cót ŋườʔi dọk cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋ bảʔi ŋàʔi kòn kwaŋàʔi tʰứ kó cọŋtʰể tùʔi tʰeo ŋàʔi haimươʔi tʰáŋ ấʔi zân ʔisơzaên ɲóm lạʔi kữ mặk baw fủ bụʔi dất zòŋ ʔisơzaên ciəzẽ kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi dứŋzậʔi sưŋtộʔi lỗʔi mìɲ zanák kủʔa tổfụ mìɲ cúŋ dứŋzậʔi tạʔicỗ mìɲ dọk cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ lâʔu dến fần ŋàʔi cɔŋ mộtfầntư xák cúŋ sưŋtộʔi tʰờ lạʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa bấʔizờ ɣiêswa bani kátmiên sêbaniə bunni sêzêbiə bani kênani dứŋzậʔi tạʔi cên ŋườʔi lêvi kêʔukầʔu lớntiếŋ kùŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ xi ấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiêswa kátmiên bani hasápniə sêzêbiə hôdiə sêbaniə fêtahiə nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dứŋzậʔi ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi Ðấŋ hằŋ kó dờʔidờʔiciếpkiếp Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ viɲhiển kủʔa ŋàʔi cổʔi kaw kák cúktụŋ kák lờʔi xɛnŋợʔi Ôʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ cúʔa Ðứkzê kómộtxôŋaj cúʔa dã zựŋ kák từŋ cờʔi cờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi kùŋ tɔàn kơ biɲ kủʔa cáʔidất kák cên zướʔi cúʔa bảʔɔtồn ɲữŋ ấʔi kơ biɲ kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi dềʔu tʰờ lạʔi cúʔa cúʔa ôʔi cúʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cọn zam dɛm ŋườʔi za xỏʔi ʔusơ kủʔa zân kɛɲdê cɔ ŋườʔi zaham cúʔa tʰấʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi cuŋtʰàɲ tạʔi cướk cúʔa cúʔa zawướk vớʔi ŋườʔi dặŋ cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi sứ kủʔa zân kanaan zân hêtít zân ʔamôzít zân fêzêsít zân ɣiêbusít zân ɣizêɣasít cúʔa kó ứŋŋiệm lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa kôŋbìɲ cúʔa kó tʰấʔi xốnxổ kủʔa tổfụ cúŋtôʔi tạʔi zíptô kó ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔula kủʔa cúŋ tạʔi biển dỏ ɲữŋ zấʔu fép nơʔi fazaôn nơʔi dầʔitớ ŋườʔi nơʔi tɔàn zânsự kủʔa nướk ŋườʔi cúʔa zằŋ kó dốʔidãʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi kác kiêʔukăŋ cúʔa kó nổʔizɛɲ cúʔa ɲưtʰể ŋàʔinăj cúʔa kó fânzẽ cướk cúŋnó dể cúŋnó di ŋaŋ kwa ɣiữʔa cên dất xô kòn ɲữŋ duổʔi tʰeo cúʔa zướʔi vựk sâʔu ɲư dá cɔŋ nướklớn banŋàʔi cúʔa zẫnzắt cúŋ bằŋ cụ mâʔi bandêm bằŋ cụ lửʔa dể ciếʔu sáŋ cɔ cúŋ cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ fảʔi di tʰeo cúʔa kũŋ ɣiáŋ tạʔi cên núʔi sinaj fán vớʔi cúŋ cên cờʔi cɔ cúŋ ɲữŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ fáp dộ cơn tʰật ɲữŋ kwitắk kùŋ diềʔu zăn tốtlàɲ cúʔa xiến cɔ cúŋ ŋàʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa kậʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ kủʔa cúʔa cwiền cɔ cúŋ ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn kwitắk luậtfáp từ kák từŋ cờʔi cúʔa cɔ cúŋ báɲ dặŋ dóʔi xiến dá cảʔi za nướk cɔ cúŋ ʔuốŋ xát fán biểʔu cúŋ vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ cúʔa dã tʰề cɔ cúŋ ɲưŋ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi kưsử kác kiêʔuhãɲ kứŋkổ mìɲ xôŋ ŋɛ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa cúʔa cẳŋ xứŋ vâŋ tʰeo xôŋ ɲớ dến kák fép cúʔa dã ɣiữʔa cúŋ ɲưŋ cúŋ kứŋkổ mìɲ cɔŋ bộʔiŋịc mìɲ kắt làmdầʔu dặŋ cởvề nơʔi kủʔa ɲưŋcúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰatʰứ hăj tʰươŋsót cậm nóŋzận zư dầʔi ɲântừ cúʔa xôŋ kó lìʔabỏ cúŋ zẫʔu xi cúŋ kɔn kɔn dựk zằŋ nấʔi tʰần dã zẫn kák ŋươʔi xỏʔi zíptô cọk cɔ cúʔa ɣiận ɲiềʔu tʰì cúʔa tʰươŋsót kủʔa cúʔa xôŋ lìʔabỏ cúŋ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cụ mâʔi zẫn dườŋ banŋàʔi xôŋ lìʔa xỏʔi cên cúŋ hɔặk cụ lửʔa lúk bandêm ciếʔu sáŋ cỉ cɔ cúŋ kɔn dườŋ cúŋ fảʔi di cúʔa kũŋ cɔ cúŋ tʰầnliɲ lươŋtʰiện kủʔa cúʔa dể zạʔizỗ cɔ cúŋ xôŋ từcốʔi cɔ miệŋ cúŋ cɔ cúŋ nướk dặŋ ʔuốŋ xát fảʔi cúʔa nuôʔizưỡŋ cúŋ mươʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cúŋ cẳŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn ci kả kwầnáʔɔ cúŋ xôŋ kũ zác cơn cúŋ cẳŋ fù vảlạʔi cúʔa cɔ cúŋ ɲữŋ nướk zântộk fânfát nướk ấʔi cɔ cúŋ cúŋ ɲận dượk nướk kủʔa sihôn tứk nướk kủʔa vwa hếtbôn nướk kủʔa ʔɔùk vwa basan cúʔa kũŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu kɔncáʔu cúŋ dôŋ ɲư saw cên cờʔi dưʔa cúŋ vàʔɔ sứ cúʔa dã fán kùŋ tổfụ cúŋ zằŋ cúŋ vàʔɔ dó dặŋ ɲận lấʔi sứ ấʔi ậʔi kɔncáʔu cúŋ vàʔɔ ɲận lấʔi sứ cúʔa fụk cướk kák zân kủʔa sứ zân kanaan fó zân ấʔi ɲữŋ vwa cúŋnó kùŋ kák zântộk kủʔa sứ vàʔɔ tăj dặŋ dãʔi kák zân ấʔi tʰeo mìɲ họ ciếm lấʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ zuộŋdất mầʔumỡ dượk ɲữŋ ɲà dầʔi kák tốtlàɲ ɲưŋ ɣiếŋ dàʔɔ ɲɔ livɛ kâʔi cáʔi zất ɲiềʔu cúŋ dượk nɔnê béʔɔ vujlòŋ cɔŋ ɲântừ lớnlaw kủʔa cúʔa zầʔu vậʔi cúŋ cẳŋ vâŋ tʰeo fảnŋịc vớʔi cúʔa luậtfáp cúʔa săw lưŋ ɣiết kák dấŋ tiênci kủʔa cúʔa ŋườʔi làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ dặŋ dɛm cởlạʔi kùŋ cúʔa sɔŋ cúŋ lạʔi cọkzận cúʔa ɲiềʔu tʰăj vìvậʔi cúʔa fó vàʔɔ tăj kừʔudịc kủʔa cúŋnó cɔŋ tʰờʔi hɔạnnạn cúŋ kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa tʰì kák từŋ cờʔi cúʔa kó ŋɛ dến tʰeo lòŋ ɲântừ lớnlaw kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa cɔ ɲữŋ dấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu dể kứʔu cúŋ xỏʔi tăj kừʔudịc mìɲ ɲưŋ xi cúŋ dượk ʔan tịɲ xởʔi lạʔi diềʔu ák cướk cúʔa vìvậʔi cúʔa cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj tʰùŋịc dể kwản cúŋ sɔŋ xi cúŋ cởlạʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa tʰì cúʔa cên cờʔi ŋɛ dến lòŋ tʰươŋsót cúʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋ ɲiềʔu cúʔa kũŋ làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ cúŋ dể zẫnzắt cúŋ cởlạʔi luậtfáp kủʔa ŋàʔi zầʔu vậʔi cúŋ kưsử kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ xôŋ ŋɛ kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa fạm dến kủʔa cúʔa nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vâŋ tʰeo dượk sốŋ cúŋ cấpɲất kứŋkổ mìɲ xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tʰeo cúʔa zuŋtʰứ cúŋ ɲiềʔu kậʔi tʰầnliɲ kák tiênci kủʔa cúʔa làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ cúŋ ɲưŋ cúŋ xôŋ lắŋtaj ŋɛ cúʔa fó cúŋ vàʔɔ tăj zântộk kủʔa kák sứ sɔŋ lòŋ tʰươŋsót lớnlaw kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa xôŋ kó tậnziệt cúŋ kũŋ xôŋ lìʔabỏ cúŋ cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj tʰươŋsót ɲơn vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất zất kwiềnnăŋ dáŋsợ sin cớ kɔj ɲỏmọn cướk cúʔa kák việk dăwdớn kựkɲọk dã ɣiáŋ cên cúŋtôʔi cên kák vwa kák kwan cưởŋ cên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kák tiênci cên tổfụ cúŋtôʔi cên hếttʰảʔi zânsự kủʔa cúʔa dờʔi kák vwa ʔasizi cɔdến ŋàʔinăj cɔŋ mọʔi việk dã sảʔi dến cɔ cúŋtôʔi cúʔa kôŋbìɲ cúʔa tʰihàɲ kác cơn tʰật kòn cúŋtôʔi lạʔi kác huŋák kák vwa cúŋtôʔi kák kwan cưởŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ kó ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp kủʔa cúʔa kũŋ cẳŋ ŋɛ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn cứŋkớ cúʔa fán zạʔi ŋịc kùŋ cúŋ tạʔi cɔŋ sứ kủʔa cúŋ ɣiữʔa dềʔu làɲ zưzật cúʔa dã cɔ cúŋ tạʔi cɔŋ dất zộŋzãʔi màʔumỡ cúʔa dã dặt cướk cúŋ cúŋ xôŋ fụk cúʔa cẳŋ cở kák kôŋviệk ák kủʔa kìʔa ŋàʔinăj cúŋtôʔi tôʔimọʔi nàʔi cúŋtôʔi tôʔi cɔŋ sứ dể bôŋ cáʔi tʰổsản tốttươʔi kủʔa sứ sɛɲ za ɲiềʔu tʰổsản cɔ kák vwa cúʔa dã cên cúŋtôʔi tạʔi kớ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi kák vwa ấʔi kũŋ mìɲ cên tʰântʰể cúŋtôʔi kák súkvật kủʔa cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi dươŋ hɔạnnạn zầʔu kák nàʔi cúŋtôʔi zawướk cắkcắn cúŋtôʔi ɣicép kák kwan cưởŋ ŋườʔi lêvi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi dóŋ cɔ nầʔi kủʔa kák ŋườʔi kó dóŋzấʔu mìɲ cɔŋ zawướk ấʔi nêhêmi kwan tổŋcấn kɔncaj kủʔa hakaliə sêdêkiə sêzaza ʔasaziə ɣiêzêmi fasuzơ ʔamaziə mɛɲkiza háttút sêbaniə malúk hazim mêzêmốt diə Ðʔa ɣinêtʰôn bazúk mêsulam ʔabiza mizamin maasiə biɲɣaj sêmaza ấʔilà ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiêswa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasaniə binnuj kɔncaj kủʔa hênadát kátmiên kák ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa sêbaniə hôziza kêlita bêlaza hanan micê zêhốp hasabiə sákkwa sêzêbiə sêbaniə hôdiə bani bêninu kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự fazốt fabamôáp sáttu bani buni ʔaɣát bêbaj ʔadôniza biếtvaj ʔadin ʔatɛ sêciə ʔasuzơ hôdiə hasum bếtsaj hazíp ʔanatốt nibaj mákbiác mêsulam hêsiə mêsêsabêên sa ốk zadwa fêlatiə hanan ʔanaza hananiə hasúp halôhết bila sôbék zêhum hasápna maasêza ʔahiza hanan ʔanan malúk hazim baana zânsự kòn lạʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi kɛɲzữ kửʔa kahát ŋườʔi nêtʰinim kák ŋườʔi dã ciəzẽ kùŋ kák zântộk kủʔa sứ dặŋ tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kủʔa tứk kák ŋườʔi kó citʰứk tʰôŋ sáŋ dềʔu tʰeo kák ʔɛɲɛm kák tướkvị kủʔa mìɲ tʰề hứʔa di tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kậʔi môʔisɛ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi cɔ ɣìŋiữ tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê cúʔa cúŋtôʔi kùŋ féptắk kủʔa ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi hứʔa xôŋ ɣả kák kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi cɔ zântộk kủʔa sứ cẳŋ kướʔi kɔŋáʔi cúŋnó cɔ kɔncaj cúŋtôʔi lạʔi hứʔa zằŋ nếʔu cɔŋ ŋàʔi hăj ŋàʔi tʰáɲ nàʔɔ zân kủʔa sứ dɛm hɔặk ɲữŋ hóʔavật hɔặk kák tʰứ lươŋtʰựk dặŋ cɔ tʰì cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ mwa kwa tʰứbảʔi cúŋtôʔi dể cɔ dất hwaŋ cẳŋ dòʔi nàʔɔ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ dịɲ lấʔilệ buộk cúŋtôʔi mỗʔi zâŋ mộtfầnba siếk zùŋ kák kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi báɲ cầntʰiết kủʔa căj tʰườŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ kủʔa zâŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi mồŋ cɔŋ kák ŋàʔi cọŋtʰể lạʔi zùŋ kák tʰáɲ kủʔa cuộk tộʔi cɔ zân ʔisơzaên kák kôŋviệk cɔŋ dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi zânsự xák bắttʰăm việk zâŋ kủʔilửʔa dặŋ mỗʔi tʰeo ɲấtdịɲ tùʔi ɲà tổfụ mìɲ dɛm ɲữŋ kủʔi dến dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi hầʔu cɔ dốt cên bàntʰờ kủʔa ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ʔiɲư dã cép cɔŋ luậtfáp vậʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ dịɲ mỗʔi dɛm dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa dất cúŋtôʔi kák tʰứ cáʔi dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa kák kâʔi cúŋtôʔi dến dền kủʔa Ðứkzê lạʔi ciếʔu tʰeo luậtfáp dɛm kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ vòŋ kák kɔncaj cúŋtôʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa súkvật cúŋtôʔi hɔặk ciên hăj dến dền tʰờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi zaw cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi hầʔu việk cɔŋ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ hứʔa dɛm kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa ɲồʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi kủʔa ɣiơ bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa kák tʰứ kâʔi zượʔu mớʔi zầʔu zaw cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔŋ kák xɔtàŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kòn fần mườʔi huêlợʔi dất kủʔa cúŋtôʔi tʰì dɛm cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰâʔu lấʔi fần mườʔi cɔŋ tʰổsản kủʔa zuộŋdất kák tʰàɲ cúŋtôʔi tʰầʔi kɔncáʔu kủʔa ʔazôn di vớʔi ŋườʔi lêvi xi tʰâʔu lấʔi tʰuế fần mườʔi zồʔi dɛm fần mườʔi kủʔa cɔŋ tʰuế fần mườʔi ấʔi dến dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dể tạʔi nơʔi fòŋ kủʔa xɔtàŋ vì zân ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi lêvi dɛm kák kủʔa ɣiơ bằŋ lúʔamì zượʔu zầʔu mớʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲữŋ fòŋ ấʔi nơʔi kó kák xí zụŋ kủʔa dền tʰáɲ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi hầʔu việk kɛɲ kửʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kahát vậʔi cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ lìʔabỏ dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dâʔu kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự dềʔu tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm kòn zânsự xák tʰì bắttʰăm dể cɔ cɔŋ mườʔi ŋườʔi kủʔa cúŋ dến tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲ tʰáɲ cín ŋườʔi kiə tʰì cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ xák zânsự cúk fướk cɔ kák ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tìɲŋwiện tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm vả dâʔi ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ hàŋ tỉɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲưŋ cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ zuda ʔainấʔi dềʔu cɔŋ dất mìɲ tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa mìɲ ấʔilà zân ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔi nêtʰinim kɔncáʔu kủʔa kák tôʔitớ salômôn kó mấʔi ŋườʔi zuda ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm về ŋườʔi zuda kó ʔatʰaza kɔncaj kủʔa ʔusiə cáʔu kủʔa sɛcazi cắt kủʔa ʔamaziə cít kủʔa sêfatiə sêfatiə kɔncaj kủʔa mahalalên tʰuộk zòŋzõʔi fêzết lạʔi kó maasêza kɔncaj kủʔa bazúk cáʔu kủʔa kôɲôsê cắt kủʔa hasaza cít kủʔa ʔadaza ʔadaza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôzazíp cáʔu kủʔa sɛcazi zòŋzõʔi silôni kák kɔncáʔu kủʔa fêzết tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm bốncăm sáʔu mươʔi ŋườʔi mạɲzạn về ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin kó salu kɔncaj kủʔa mêsulam cáʔu kủʔa ɣiôết cắt kủʔa fêdaza cít kủʔa kôlaza kôlaza kɔncaj kủʔa maasêza cáʔu kủʔa ʔitʰiên cắt kủʔa saj săw ŋườʔi kó ɣápbaj salaj kùŋ cín căm haimươʔitám ŋườʔi ɣiôên kɔncaj kủʔa siếkzi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cúŋ kòn zuda kɔncaj kủʔa hasênwa fó kwản tʰàɲ cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kó ɣiêdaza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôzazíp zakin sêzaza kɔncaj kủʔa hiɲkiə cáʔu kủʔa mêsulam cít kủʔa mêzazốt mêzazốt kɔncaj kủʔa ʔahitúp kwảnlý dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm kôŋviệk kủʔa dền támcăm haimươʔihaj ŋườʔi lạʔi kó ʔadaza kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêzôham cáʔu kủʔa fêlaliə cắt kủʔa ʔamsi cít kủʔa sɛcazi sɛcazi kɔncaj kủʔa fasuzơ cáʔu kủʔa mɛɲkiza kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm dềʔu cưởŋtộk haj căm mươʔi haj ŋườʔi kũŋ kó ʔamasaj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasazên cáʔu kủʔa ʔaï ksaj cắt kủʔa mêsilêmốt cít kủʔa ʔimê kák ʔɛɲɛm dềʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kandảm dượk mộtcăm haimươʔitám ŋườʔi sápdiên kɔncaj kủʔa ɣêdôlim kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cúŋ cɔŋ ŋườʔi lêvi kó sêmaza kɔncaj kủʔa hasúp cáʔu kủʔa ʔazixam cắt kủʔa hasabiə cít kủʔa bunni cɔŋ kák cưởŋtộk ŋườʔi lêvi kó sabêtʰaj ɣiôsabát dượk kắt kɔjsók kôŋviệk ŋɔàʔi kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn máttaniə kɔncaj kủʔa micê làmdầʔu việk lờʔi xɛnŋợʔi cɔŋ lúk kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ bákbici ŋườʔi tʰứ ɲì cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ da kɔncaj kủʔa samwa cáʔu kủʔa sápdi cắt kủʔa ɣiêdutʰun hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi lêvi cɔŋ tʰàɲ tʰáɲ dượk haj căm mươʔi ŋườʔi ɲữŋ kɛɲzữ kửʔa ʔakúp tɛɲmôn kák ʔɛɲɛm dượk mộtcăm bảʔi mươʔi haj ŋườʔi kák ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên xák ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dềʔu cɔŋ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa sứ zuda mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ kơŋiệp mìɲ ŋườʔinê tʰinim dềʔu tạʔi fên siha ɣítba kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi nêtʰinim ʔusi kɔncaj kủʔa bani cáʔu kủʔa hasabiə cắt kủʔa máttaniə cít kủʔa micê zòŋzõʔi ʔaháp kahát dượk dặt kaj ci ŋườʔi lêvi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lɔ kôŋviệk kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vì kó lịɲ vwa cwiền việk kủʔa cúŋ kó fần lươŋ dịɲ kấp cɔ ɲữŋ kahát ŋàʔi nàʔɔ kần zùŋ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi fêtʰahiə kɔncaj kủʔa mêsêsabêên zòŋ sêza kɔn kủʔa zuda ɣiúp vwa kaicị mọʔi việk zân kòn kák hươŋtʰôn dồŋzuộŋ kủʔa kó mấʔi ŋườʔi zuda tạʔi kiziátazaba cɔŋ kák làŋ tạʔi Ðʔi kák làŋ tạʔi ɣiêkápsêên kák làŋ tạʔi ɣiêswa môlada bếtfêlê hátsaswɛɲ bê ʔɛsêba cɔŋ kák làŋ tạʔi siếklạk mêkôna cɔŋ kák làŋ tạʔi ʔɛânzimmôn sôza ɣiạtmút tạʔi sanô ʔa ʔadulam kák làŋ tạʔi cɔŋ laki kák dồŋzuộŋ cɔŋ ʔasêka kák làŋ vậʔi cúŋ bê ʔɛsêba cɔdến cũŋ hinnôm ŋườʔibên zamin kũŋ ɣêba cɔdến mícma ʔaza bêtên kák làŋ tạʔi ʔanatốt nốp ʔataniə hátsɔ zama ɣitʰaim hadít sêbôʔim nêbalát lôdơ tứklà cũŋ kủʔa kák tʰợ từ cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi lêvi kó mấʔi zuda vớʔi bêŋiəmin Ðâʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi tʰeo sôzôbabên kɔncaj kủʔa salatʰiên ɣiêswa di sêzaza ɣiêzêmi ʔɛsơza ʔamaziə malúk hatúk sêkaniə zêhum mêzêmốt ʔidô ɣinêtʰôʔi ʔabiza mizamin maadiə biɲɣa sêmaza ɣiôzazíp ɣiêdaza salu ʔamók hiɲkiə ɣiêdaza kwan cưởŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa cɔŋ dờʔi ɣiêswa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi lêvi ɣiêswa binnuj kátmêên sêzêbiə zuda máttainiə ŋườʔi vớʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kɔjsók việk xɛnŋợʔi lạʔi kó bákbukiə ʔuni kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tʰăjdổʔi fiên ɲăw cɔŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ ɣiêswa sɛɲ ɣiôzakim ɣiôzakim sɛɲ liəsíp liəsíp sɛɲ ɣiôzada ɣiôzada sɛɲ ɣiônatʰan ɣiônatʰan sɛɲ zadwa nầʔi cưởŋtộk kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi cɔŋ dờʔi ɣiôzakim ɣiêzêmi hananiə ʔɛsơza mêsulam ʔamaziə ɣiôhanan mêluki ɣiônatʰan sêbaniə ɣiôsép hazim mêzazốt hênkaj vɛ ʔidô sɛcazi ɣinêtʰôn ʔabiza siếkzi miŋiəmin môdadiə fiɲtaj biɲɣa samwa sêmaza ɣiônatʰan ɣiôzazíp máttênaj ɣiêdaza ʔusi salaj kalaj ʔamók bɛ hiɲkiə hasabiə ɣiêdaza nêtʰanêên về ŋườʔi lêvi kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa dã vàʔɔsổ cɔŋ dờʔi kủʔa liəsíp ɣiôzada ɣiôhanan zadwa kòn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰì vàʔɔsổ cɔŋ dờʔi Ðʔa ziút nướk fɛzơsơ kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi kó ɣi vàʔɔ sác cɔdến dờʔi ɣiôhanan kɔncaj kủʔa liəsíp kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi hasabiə sêzêbiə ɣiêswa kɔncaj kủʔa kátmiên kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi ứŋdốʔi ɲăw từŋ từŋ tʰứ dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn kảmtạ tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ kủʔa Ðʔa ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi máttaniə bákbukiə badiə mêsulam tɛɲmôn ʔakúp kɛɲzữ kửʔa ɣiữ kák xɔ kửʔa tʰàɲ kák ŋườʔi nàʔi dờʔi ɣiôzakim kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêswa cáʔu ɣiôsadák dờʔi nêhêmi kwan tổŋcấn dờʔi ʔɛsơza tʰầʔi xi xáɲtʰàɲ kák vác tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì ŋườʔita saj ɣọʔi kák ŋườʔi lêvi xắp mọʔi nơʔi dặŋ dɛm cùŋ ɣiêzusalɛm dể zự xáɲtʰàɲ kác vujvẻ kótiếŋ xɛnŋợʔi kahát tʰeo cập cỏʔa dờn kầm dờn kák ŋườʔi kahát dềʔu lạʔi dồŋbằŋ suŋkwɛɲ ɣiêzusalɛm kák làŋ ŋườʔi nêtôfatít lạʔi bếtɣiɲɣɛɲ dồŋbằŋ ɣêba Ác ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kahát dã sâʔi cɔ mìɲ kák làŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi zọn mìɲ cɔ tʰáɲ sạc kũŋ zọn cɔ tʰáɲ sạc zânsự kák kửʔa vác tʰàɲ bấʔizờ tôʔi biểʔu kák kwan cưởŋ zuda cên vác tʰàɲ zồʔi fân haj kéʔɔ ɲăw di dể kảmtạ divề fíʔa hữʔu cên vác tʰàɲ tớʔi kửʔa fân săw cúŋ kó hôsaza fânnửʔa kák kwan cưởŋ zuda kùŋ ʔasaziə ʔɛsơza mêsulam zuda bêŋiəmin sêmaza ɣiêzêmi mấʔi kɔncaj kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kầm sɛcazi kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiônatʰan cáʔu kủʔa sêmaza cáʔu kủʔa máttaniə cít kủʔa micê micê kɔncaj kủʔa sákkwa cáʔu kủʔa ʔasáp kùŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi sêmaza ʔasazên mitalaj ɣilalaj maaj nêtʰanêên zuda hanani kầm ɲữŋ ɲạkxí kủʔa Ðʔa ŋườʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ʔɛsơza ŋườʔi diở dằŋ cướk cúŋ từ kửʔa suốʔi ŋăj cúŋ di tʰẳŋ kák nấk tʰàɲ Ðʔa tạʔi nơʔi dốk vác tʰàɲ cên dền Ðʔa dến kửʔa nướk fíʔa dôŋ kòn kảmtạ tʰứ ɲì di cên vác tʰàɲ dốʔi ŋaŋ lạʔi vớʔi tʰứ ɲất kòn tôʔi diở săw vớʔi fânnửʔa zânsự tʰáp kák lò cɔdến vác zộŋ di kwa cên kửʔa zaim ɣần kửʔa kũ kửʔa ká tʰáp hananêên tʰáp mê ʔa dến kửʔa ciên cúŋ zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi kửʔa ŋụk Ðʔɔạn haj kảmtạ zừŋ lạʔi cɔŋ dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi fânnửʔa kwan cưởŋ tʰeo tôʔi kũŋ làmvậʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kầm lêʔakim maasênaj miŋiəmin micê liôênaj sɛcazi hananiə lạʔi kó maasêza sêmaza lêʔasa ʔusi ɣiôhanan mɛɲkiza sɛ ɲữŋ kahát tiếŋ kó zícabiə zẫnzắt cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cúŋ zâŋ ɲữŋ kủʔa cọŋtʰể vujvẻ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã xiến cɔ cúŋ vuimừŋ xắp xởʔi kák ŋườʔi dờn kɔncẻ kũŋ vuimừŋ nữʔa vuimừŋ kủʔa tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm vaŋ za zất sa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita kɔjsók kák fóŋ xɔtàŋ kủʔa zâŋ ɣiơ kủʔa dầʔu mùʔa tʰuế fần mườʔi dặŋ tʰâʔu vàʔɔ tùʔi tʰeo dồŋ kủʔa kák tʰàɲ fần kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi luậtfáp dã cỉdịɲ zuda vuimừŋ ɲơn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi dứŋ hầʔu việk cúŋ vớʔi ɲữŋ kahát ɣiữ kửʔa dềʔu ɣiữ cácɲiệm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi việk zọn mìɲ tʰáɲ sạc tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðʔa salômôn kɔncaj ŋườʔi vì ŋàʔisưʔa dờʔi Ðʔa ʔasáp kó ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ kɔjsók ɲữŋ kahát kó bàʔi xɛnŋợʔi kảmtạ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ dờʔi sôzôbabên nêhêmi kả ʔisơzaên dềʔu kấp fần cɔ kahát ŋườʔi kɛɲzữ kửʔa ŋàʔi nàʔɔ kần zùŋ tʰeo ŋàʔi nấʔi kũŋ dể ziêŋ fần kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi ŋườʔi lêvi dể ziêŋ fần kủʔa kɔncáʔu ʔazôn cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita dọk sác môʔisɛ kó zânsự ŋɛ cɔŋ dó kó cép zằŋ ŋườʔi ʔammôn ŋườʔi môáp dờʔidờʔi xôŋ dượk vàʔɔ hộʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bởʔivì cúŋnó xôŋ dɛm báɲ nướk dến dón zân ʔisơzaên sɔŋ zùŋ bạk tʰỉɲ balaam dến zủʔasả zân ʔisơzaên ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dổʔi zủʔasả za fướk hạɲ sảʔi xi cúŋ dã ŋɛ luậtfáp zồʔi fânzẽ xỏʔi ʔisơzaên kák zân ŋɔạʔibaŋ vả cướk việk dó tʰầʔi liəsíp dã dượk kɔjsók kák fòŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi bàkɔn vớʔi tôbiza kó sắmsửʔa cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi káʔi fòŋ nơʔi cướk ŋườʔita zùŋ dể ɲữŋ kủʔa căj hươŋliệʔu xí zụŋ tʰuế fần mườʔi lúʔamì zượʔu mớʔi zầʔu tứk ɲữŋ tʰeo dã dịɲ cɔ ŋườʔi lêvi kahát ŋườʔi kɛɲzữ kửʔa vớʔi kủʔa zâŋ ɣiơ kủʔa tʰầʔi xi kák diềʔu dó sảʔi dến tʰì xôŋ kó tôʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ɲằm tʰứ bamươʔi haj dờʔi ʔaï ttasétsɛ vwa babilôn tôʔi mắk fảʔi cởvề kùŋ vwa kuốʔi ítlâʔu tôʔi kó sinfép vwa dặŋ di tôʔi dến ɣiêzusalɛm hiểʔu diềʔu ák liəsíp tôbiza dã za kó sắmsửʔa cɔ ŋườʔi káʔi fòŋ cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó lấʔilàm kựk kwăŋ za xỏʔi fòŋ ấʔi kák vậtzụŋ kủʔa ɲà tôbiza Ðʔɔạn tôʔi biểʔu ŋườʔita zọn káʔi fòŋ ấʔi cɔ sạcsẽ ấʔi tôʔi dɛm vàʔɔ lạʔi kák xí zụŋ kủʔa dền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa căj hươŋliệʔu tôʔi kũŋ hăj zằŋ ŋườʔita xôŋ kó kấp kák fần kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi cɔ vìvậʔi ɲữŋ kahát ŋườʔi lêvi hầʔu việk ʔainấʔi dềʔu dã cốn dồŋzuộŋ mìɲ tôʔi kwởcác kák kwan cưởŋ zằŋ kớsaw dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưvậʔi Ðʔɔạn tôʔi lạʔi cúŋ dặt cɔŋ cứk kũ mìɲ bấʔizờ kả zuda dềʔu dɛm dến cɔŋ xɔ tʰuế fần mườʔi lúʔamì zượʔu mớʔi zầʔu tôʔi dặt sêlêmiə tʰầʔi sadốk kýlụk fêdaza cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi lêvi kɔj kák xɔtàŋ kòn hanan kɔncaj kủʔa sákkwa cáʔu máttaniə fó kák ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk cuŋtʰàɲ bổnfận cúŋ fânfát cɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi kớ diềʔu nàʔi sin ɲớ dến tôʔi cớ bôʔi sóʔa kák việk tốtlàɲ tôʔi dã dền kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi diềʔu fảʔi ɣìŋiữ tạʔi dó về lúk dó tôʔi tʰấʔi cɔŋ zuda mấʔi ŋườʔi ɲɔ nơʔi máʔi zượʔu ɲằm ŋàʔi dɛm lúʔa mìɲ vàʔɔ cở cên lừʔa kũŋ cở zượʔu cáʔi ɲɔ cáʔi kák nặŋ dɛm ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi cúŋnó tʰựk ấʔi tôʔi kó làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ cúŋnó kũŋ kó ŋườʔi tizơ tạʔi dó dɛm ká kák tʰứ hàŋóʔa dến cɔ ŋườʔi zuda tạʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ ŋàʔi bấʔizờ tôʔi kwởcác kák ŋườʔi tướkvị zuda zằŋ việk sấʔusa kák ŋươʔi dâʔi ci cɔ ôʔuế ŋàʔi tổfụ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ dã ɲư vậʔisaw nên nỗʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ kó zẫn tajhọʔa kiə dến cên cúŋta cên tʰàɲ nàʔi kòn kák ŋươʔi ôʔuế ŋàʔi tăŋ tʰêm kơn tʰạɲ cɔ ʔisơzaên Ấʔi vậʔi xi kák kửʔa ɣiêzusalɛm xởʔi xuất cɔŋ bóŋtốʔi cướk ŋàʔi tôʔi cwiền ŋườʔita dóŋkửʔa lạʔi zặn biểʔu cúŋnó cỉ za săw ŋàʔi lạʔi kắtdặt mấʔi cɔŋ dầʔitớ tôʔi ɣiữ kửʔa dể xôŋ ʔaj ɣáɲ cở dồ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi vậʔi buônŋườʔi kák tʰứ hàŋóʔa mộtʰaj bandêm fảʔi ŋủ ŋɔàʔi tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm Ðʔɔạn tôʔi kwởcác cúŋnó zằŋ kớsaw kák ŋươʔi bandêm ŋủ tạʔi cướk vác tʰàɲ ɲưvậʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi kòn nữʔa tấtkả ca tăicên kák ŋươʔi từ lúk dó săw cúŋnó xôŋ kó dến ɲằm ŋàʔi nữʔa tôʔi zạʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi lêvi dến kɛɲzữ kák kửʔa dặŋ ŋàʔi za tʰáɲ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi tôʔi ɲớ dếndiềʔu dó sin tʰươŋsót tôʔi tùʔi ɲântừ lớnlaw kủʔa ŋàʔi kũŋ cɔŋ lúk dó tôʔi tʰấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda lấʔi dờn Ác dốt ʔammôn môáp kɔnkáʔi kủʔa cúŋnó nóʔi fần nửʔa tiếŋ Ác dốt xôŋ nóʔi tiếŋ zuda ɲưŋ nóʔi tùʔi tʰeo tiếŋ kủʔa zân nàʔi hăjlà zân kiə tôʔi kwởcác cúŋnó zủʔasả cúŋnó dáɲdập mộtvàʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋnó ɲổ tók cúŋnó biểʔu cúŋnó cỉ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰề zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ɣả kɔŋáʔi mìɲ cɔ kɔncaj hăjlà kướʔi kɔŋáʔi cɔ kɔncaj mìɲ hɔặk kướʔi cɔ cáɲ mìɲ kák ŋươʔi salômôn vwa ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kó fạmtộʔi cɔŋ diềʔu dó saw vả cɔŋ ɲiềʔu zântộk xôŋ kó vwa nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt ŋườʔilàm vwa cên kả ʔisơzaên zẫʔuvậʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ dờn ŋɔạʔibaŋ suj cɔ fạmtộʔi cúŋta ŋɛ tʰeo kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu ák nàʔi lấʔi ŋườʔi dờn ŋɔạʔibaŋ vifạm kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta saw kó cɔŋ kák kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiôzada cáʔu liəsíp tʰầʔi tʰượŋ fẩm zể kủʔa sanbalát ŋườʔi hôzôn kớ ấʔi tôʔi duổʔi xỏʔi tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin ɲớ lạʔi cúŋnó cúŋnó dã ôʔuế cứk zawướk kủʔa cứk kủʔa ŋườʔi lêvi ɲưvậʔi tôʔi zọn sạc cúŋ cɔ xỏʔi kák ŋɔạʔibaŋ dịɲ tʰứ cɔ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ŋườʔi lêvi mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cứkviệk mìɲ kũŋ xiến zânsự zâŋ kủʔi tʰeo ɲấtdịɲ kák tʰổsản dầʔu mùʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi ɲớ dến tôʔi cɔ tôʔi sảʔi cɔŋ dờʔi vwa ʔasuêzu tứk ʔasuêzu kiəmà kaicị cên mộtcăm haimươʔibảʔi tỉɲ dộ cɔdến tʰiôbi xi vwa ŋự ŋôʔi vươŋkwốk tạʔi susơ kiɲdô ŋườʔi ɲằm tʰứba dờʔi cịvì mìɲ ŋườʔi bàʔi za bữʔa tiệk ʔiến cɔ hếttʰảʔi kwan cưởŋ tʰần bộk mìɲ Ðạʔɔ biɲ nướk fɛzơsơ mêdi kák bựk saŋcọŋ kùŋ kák kwan kaj kủʔa hàŋ tỉɲ dềʔu cướk ŋườʔi cɔŋ ɲiềʔu ŋàʔi tứk cɔŋ mộtcăm mươʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔi bàʔitỏ ɣiàʔukó saŋcọŋ kủʔa nướk waiŋi zựkzỡ kủʔa ŋườʔi xi kák ŋàʔi dó dã kwa zồʔi vwa bàʔi dãʔi zânsự dươŋ kó tạʔi kiɲdô susơ hɔặk hăj ɲỏ kuộk ʔiếntiệk bảʔi ŋàʔi tạʔi nơʔi hàɲlaŋ kủʔa tʰượŋwiển tư kó ceo cướŋ sắk cắŋ sɛɲ kâʔi sɛɲ zɛcờʔi zùŋ zâʔi ɣaj màʔu cắŋ màʔu kột vàʔɔ vòŋ bạk cụ kẩmtʰạc kák ɣiườŋ bằŋ vàŋ bạk dặt cên kẩmtʰạc dỏ cắŋ ŋọk fụŋ kẩmtʰạc dɛn ŋườʔita dãʔi ʔuốŋ bằŋ cén vàŋ ɲữŋ cén ɲiềʔu tʰứ xákɲăw kó ŋự tửʔu zất ɲiềʔu cɔ sứŋdáŋ tʰeo bựk ɣiàʔusaŋ kủʔa vwa ŋườʔita ʔuốŋ zượʔu tùʔi tʰeo lịɲ cwiền cẳŋ ʔaj fảʔi ʔuốŋ vwa dã cwiền kák tʰần kuŋdiện hãʔi tùʔiý kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi hɔàŋậʔu vảtʰi kũŋ dãʔi bữʔa tiệk cɔ kák ŋườʔi tạʔi kuŋ vwa ʔasuêzu kwaŋàʔi tʰứbảʔi vwa ʔuốŋ zượʔu hứŋ lòŋ zồʔi cwiền cɔ mêhuman bíttʰa hạtbôna biếktʰa ʔabáktʰa sêtʰạt kạtkác tứk bảʔi hɔạnkwan hầʔu cựk vwa ʔasuêzu zẫn hɔàŋậʔu vảtʰi dến cướk vwa dộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu hɔàŋậʔu dặŋ zafết lịcsự kủʔa cɔ zânsự cɔ kák kwan cưởŋ sɛm tʰấʔi tướŋmạʔɔ zất tốtdẹp ɲưŋ hɔàŋậʔu vảtʰi xôŋ xứŋ dến tʰeo mạŋ kủʔa vwa cwiền bởʔi kák hɔạnkwan vwa nổʔi ɣiậnzữ fát nóŋ cɔŋ lòŋ vả tʰườŋxi vwa kó ɣì hỏʔi kák ŋườʔi zõ tʰôŋ fáp ɲữŋ kwan kếkận vwa kạtsêna sêtʰạt matʰa tazêsi mêzɛ mạtsêna mêmukan tứk bảʔi kwan cưởŋ kủʔa nướk fɛzơsơ mêdi tʰườŋ tʰấʔi vwa ŋồʔi bựk kaw ɲứt cɔŋ nướk bấʔizờ vwa hỏʔi cúŋ zằŋ hɔàŋậʔu vảtʰi cẳŋ kó vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa vwa ʔasuêzu kậʔi kák hɔạnkwan cwiền cɔ vậʔitʰì tʰeo luậtfáp cúŋta fảʔi sử tʰểnàʔɔ mêmukan tʰưʔa cướk vwa kák kwan cưởŋ zằŋ vảtʰi cẳŋɲữŋ mấtlòŋ vwa tʰôʔi ɲưŋ lạʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ zânsự cɔŋ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa ʔasuêzu việk nầʔi dồn za cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi xiến xiɲbỉ cồŋ mìɲ nóʔi zằŋ vwa ʔasuêzu kó biểʔu zẫn hɔàŋậʔu vảtʰi dến cướk vwa nàŋ xôŋ kó dến ŋàʔinăj kák kwan cưởŋ fɛzơsơ mêdi dã hăj việk hɔàŋậʔu dã kũŋ nóʔi mộtkác vớʔi cồŋ mìɲ zồʔi kó lắmdiềʔu xiɲbỉ kơn ɣiận nếʔu dẹp vwa xá ɣiáŋ ciếʔucỉ cép vàʔɔ cɔŋ sác luậtfáp kủʔa nướk fɛzơsơ mêdi cẳŋ hăj dổʔi dặŋ zằŋ vảtʰi cẳŋ kòn vàʔɔ dến cướk vwa ʔasuêzu nữʔa vwa xá hɔàŋậʔu kủʔa vảtʰi cɔ ŋườʔi xák nàŋ xi ciếʔucỉ kủʔa vwa dã dượk cwiền xắp cɔŋ nướk nướk tʰật zộŋlớn tʰì kák ŋườʔi fảʔi tônkíɲ cồŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ cɔdến ɲỏ lờʔi nầʔi dẹp vwa kák kwan cưởŋ vwa tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa mêmukan dã ciếʔu cɔ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa tʰeo cữ tiếŋ kủʔa mỗʔi tỉɲ mỗʔi zân bảʔɔ zằŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi dờn ôŋ fảʔi làmcủ ɲà mìɲ lấʔi tiếŋ sứ mìɲ zạʔi biểʔu săw kák việk ấʔi xi kơn tʰạɲ vwa ʔasuêzu dã ŋuôʔi lạʔi tʰì ŋườʔi ɲớ lạʔi vảtʰi việk nàŋ dã kùŋ dã cỉdịɲ cɔ nàŋ kák kậntʰần vwa tʰưʔa zằŋ xá cɔ vwa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ tốtdẹp sin vwa hãʔi sajxiến ɲữŋ kwan di xắp kák tỉɲ kủʔa nướk vwa ɲóm hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ tốtdẹp dến susơ kiɲdô zẫn vàʔɔ hậʔukuŋ zawfó cɔ hêɣaj hɔạnkwan kủʔa vwa tʰáʔizám ɲữŋ kuŋfi zồʔi fát cɔ cúŋ ɲữŋ hươŋ fẩm kần zùŋ cɔ tẩʔiuế kɔŋáʔi cẻ nàʔɔ dượk dẹplòŋ vwa xá hɔàŋậʔu tʰế cɔ vảtʰi lờʔi ấʔi dẹplòŋ vwa vwa ɲưvậʔi tạʔi kiɲdô susơ kó ŋườʔi zuda mạkdôcê kɔncaj kủʔa zajzơ cáʔu kủʔa simê ʔi cắt kủʔa kíc ŋườʔi bêŋiəmin ŋườʔi zẫn xỏʔi ɣiêzusalɛm vớʔi ɲữŋ fu dồŋ vớʔi ɣiêkôniə vwa zuda nêbukátnếtsa vwa babilô dã fu ŋườʔi bảʔɔzưỡŋ hadasa tứk sơtê kɔŋáʔi kủʔa kậʔu mìɲ nàŋ xôŋ kó camẹ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔunữ ấʔilà tốttươʔi hìɲzạŋ dẹpdẽ zuŋɲan vậʔi xi camẹ nàŋ dã kwadờʔi zồʔi mạkdôcê ɲận nàŋ kɔŋáʔi mìɲ sảʔiza xi mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa vwa ciếʔucỉ ŋườʔi dã dượk zõ xi kó ɲiềʔu kɔŋáʔi cẻ dã ɲóm tạʔi kiɲdô susơ zawfó cɔ hêɣaj cưởŋ kwản tʰì sơtê kũŋ dượk dɛm dến kuŋ vwa zawfó cɔ hêɣaj kwan tʰáʔizám kák kuŋfi kɔŋáʔi cẻ dó dẹplòŋ hêɣaj dượk cướk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi lậtdật hɔ nàŋ ɲữŋ hươŋ fẩm kần zùŋ tẩʔiuế ɲữŋ ɲựt zụŋ kủʔa nàŋ kuŋkấp cɔ nàŋ bảʔi kɔŋáʔi cọn lấʔi cɔŋ kuŋ vwa dɔạn hêɣaj zờʔi nàŋ vớʔi kák kɔŋáʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ káʔi fòŋ ɲứt kủʔa kuŋ fitần sơtê cẳŋ za zân mìɲ kwêhươŋ mìɲ mạkdôcê kó zặn nàŋ dừŋ cɔ ʔaj mỗʔi ŋàʔi mạkdôcê di zạʔɔ cơʔi cướk kủʔa kák kuŋ fitần dể cɔbiết sơtê kó bằŋ ʔiên căŋ nàŋ za tʰểnàʔɔ mỗʔi kɔŋáʔi cẻ ciếʔu tʰeo dịɲ zọn mìɲ cɔ tiɲ sạc cɔŋ mườʔihaj tʰáŋ sáʔu tʰáŋ zùŋ zầʔu zượk sáʔu tʰáŋ zùŋ tʰuốk tʰơm kùŋ ɲữŋ hươŋ fẩm kần zùŋ tẩʔiuế săw ấʔi dã zồʔi mỗʔi kɔŋáʔi cẻ tʰeo fiên tʰứ dếnkùŋ vwa ʔasuêzu họ vàʔɔ cầʔu vwa ɲưvầʔi fàm ɣì nàŋ dɛm tʰeo kuŋ fitần dến kuŋdiện vwa tʰì cɔ buổʔi tốʔi tʰì nàŋ dến kòn sớmmaj cởvề hầʔu kuŋ tʰứ ɲì kó saácɣa hɔạnkwan kủʔa vwa tʰáʔizám kák fitần kɔjsók nàŋ xôŋ vàʔɔ kuŋ vwa nữʔa nàŋ dẹp vwa dượk vwa dòʔi mìɲ xi fiên sơtê kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔabihaj kậʔu kủʔa mạkdôcê ŋườʔi dã ɲận nàŋ kɔn dã dến dể di vàʔɔ kùŋ vwa tʰì nàŋ cẳŋ kầʔusin ɣì ŋɔạʔicừ diềʔu hêɣaj hɔạnkwan vwa tʰáʔizam kák fitần dã dịɲ cɔ sơtê dượk cướk mọʔi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi nàŋ Ấʔi vậʔi ʔɛsơtê dượk dưʔa dếnkùŋ vwa ʔasuêzu cɔŋ kuŋ vwa ɲằm tʰáŋ mườʔi tʰáŋ têbết tʰứbảʔi dờʔi ŋườʔi cịvì vwa tʰươŋmến sơtê ɲiềʔu kák kuŋnữ xák nàŋ dượk cướk vwa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ vwa dộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cên dầʔu nàŋ nàŋ hɔàŋậʔu tʰế cɔ vảtʰi Ðʔɔạn vwa bàʔi tiệk dãʔi kák kwan cưởŋ tʰần bộk mìɲ tứk tiệk ʔiến kủʔa sơtê vwa zộŋ tʰa tʰuế cɔ kák tỉɲ tʰưởŋ sứŋdáŋ tʰeo bựk ɣiàʔusaŋ kủʔa vwa xi kák ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ lạʔi tʰứ ɲì tʰì mạkdôcê ŋồʔi nơʔi kửʔa vwa sơtê ʔiɲư lờʔi mạkdôcê dã zặn mìɲ xôŋ cɔ ʔaj kwêhươŋ tôŋtộk mìɲ sơtê tʰeo diềʔu mạkdôcê zặn nàŋ ɲư xi nàŋ kòn dượk bảʔɔzưỡŋ nơʔi ɲà ŋườʔi cɔŋ kák ŋàʔi dó mạkdôcê dươŋ ŋồʔi nơʔi kửʔa vwa kó haj hɔạnkwan kủʔa vwa cɔŋ ɣiữ kửʔa bíctʰan tʰêzết nổʔizận twan mưʔu ca tăj vàʔɔ vwa ʔasuêzu việk ấʔi tʰấʔu dến mạkdôcê ŋườʔi họk lạʔi cɔ hɔàŋậʔu sơtê sơtê ɲơn mạkdôcê tâʔu lạʔi cɔ vwa ŋườʔita ca hạc việk dó tʰấʔi kwảtʰật ɲưvậʔi zồʔi kả haj dềʔu ceo nơʔi kâʔi hìɲ dɔạn cép diềʔu dó cɔŋ sác tạʔi cướk vwa săw kák việk ấʔi vwa ʔasuêzu tʰăŋ cứk cɔ haman kɔncaj kủʔa hammêdatʰa ŋườʔi ʔaɣát nổʔizɛɲ ŋườʔi dặt ŋôʔi ŋườʔi cên kák kwan cưởŋ kuŋ vwa hếttʰảʔi tʰần bộk tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa vwa dềʔu kúʔi suốŋ lạʔi haman fần ŋườʔi vwa dã cwiềnbảʔɔ ɲưvậʔi ɲưŋmạk dôcê xôŋ kúʔi suốŋ kũŋ xôŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi kák tʰần bộk nơʔi kửʔa vwa nóʔi vớʔi mạkdôcê zằŋ kớsaw ôŋ fạm mạŋ vwa sảʔi cúŋ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi ŋàʔi nầʔi kwa ŋàʔiciə ŋườʔi cẳŋ xứŋ ŋɛ dến tʰì cúŋ káʔɔ cɔ haman hăj dặŋ tʰử sɛm sựtìɲ kủʔa mạkdôcê kó tʰắŋ căŋ ŋườʔi cɔ cúŋ zằŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi zuda xiha tʰấʔi mạkdôcê xôŋ kúʔi suốŋ xôŋ lạʔi mìɲ nổʔi ɣiậnzữ ŋườʔita dã họk cɔ haman mạkdôcê ŋườʔi zuda nênŋườʔi cɔ ca tăicên mộtmìɲ mạkdôcê ɲỏmọn ŋườʔi mưʔu ɣiết hếttʰảʔi zân zuda tôŋtộk kủʔa mạkdôcê cɔŋ tɔàn nướk ʔasuêzu tʰáŋzêŋ tʰáŋ nisan tʰứ mườʔihaj dờʔi vwa ʔasuêzu ŋườʔita fuzơ tứklà bỏtʰăm mỗʔi ŋàʔi mỗʔi tʰáŋ tạʔi cướk haman cɔdến tʰáŋ mườʔihaj tʰáŋ ʔada haman tâʔu vớʔi vwa ʔasuêzu zằŋ kó zântộk tảʔi zák za ɣiữʔa kák zântộk cɔŋ ɲữŋ tỉɲ kủʔa nướk vwa luậtfáp kủʔa cúŋnó xák luậtfáp kủʔa kák zân xák lạʔi cúŋnó kũŋ xôŋ tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa vwa zuŋ cúŋnó cẳŋ cɔ vwa nếʔu diềʔu dó vừʔaý vwa xá ɣiáŋ ciếʔucỉ cwiền twiệtziệt cúŋnó di zồʔi tôʔi kân mườʔi lâŋ bạk fó vàʔɔ tăj ɲữŋ kwan dốk dể dɛm vàʔɔ xɔ vwa vwa kỗʔi ciếk ɲẫn xỏʔi tăj mìɲ caw cɔ haman kɔncaj hammêdatʰa ŋườʔi ʔaɣát kừʔudịc zân zuda vwa nóʔi vớʔi haman zằŋ bạk dã cɔ ŋươʔi zânsự kũŋ fó cɔ ŋươʔi dể diềʔu ci mặký ŋươʔi tʰáŋzêŋ ŋàʔi mườʔiba tʰì dòʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰơ kủʔa vwa dến zồʔi tùʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu haman cwiền zặn ŋườʔita ɲơn zɛɲ ʔasuêzu ciếʔu cɔ kák kwan cấntʰủ kủʔa vwa cɔ kák kwan kaikwản mỗʔi tỉɲ cɔ kák cưởŋtộk kủʔa mỗʔi zântộk tỉɲ nàʔɔ zùŋ cữ nấʔi zântộk nàʔɔ tʰeo tʰổâm nấʔi dɔạn lấʔi ciếk ɲẫn kủʔa vwa dóŋ zồʔi cɔ ɣởʔi kák tʰơ bởʔi líɲ cạm cɔ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa dặŋ zạʔi biểʔu zằŋ ɲằm ŋàʔi mườʔiba tʰáŋ mườʔihaj tứklà tʰáŋ ʔada fảʔi cừziệt ɣiết cết cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân zuda cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔizà cẻ kɔnɲỏ hăjlà dờn kướp ɣiựt tàʔisản kủʔa cúŋnó cɔ ciếʔucỉ dượk twiênbố cɔŋ mỗʔi tỉɲ kó sawlụk dɛm zaw cɔ kák zântộk hầʔu cɔ cúŋ dềʔu sẵnsàŋ ŋàʔi dó kák líɲ cạm vâŋ lịɲ vwa vộʔivã di za ciếʔucỉ nầʔi kũŋ cwiền tạʔi kiɲdô susơ Ðʔɔạn vwa haman ŋồʔi lạʔi ʔuốŋ zượʔu kòn tʰàɲ susơ dềʔu hɔảŋ kiɲ vả xi mạkdôcê mọʔi diềʔu ấʔi sé áʔɔ mìɲ mặk káʔi baw fủ cɔ zồʔi di za ɣiữʔa tʰàɲ lấʔi tiếŋ kêʔu xók kác kăjdắŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ di dến cướk kửʔa vwa ʔaj mặk káʔi baw kấm xôŋ cɔ vàʔɔ kửʔa kủʔa vwa fàm cɔŋ mỗʔi tỉɲ nơʔi nàʔɔ mạŋ lịɲ vwa ciếʔucỉ ŋườʔi dã dến tʰì cɔŋ zân zuda kó sầʔutʰảm kiêŋkữ xóklók kêʔuvan lạʔi kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi baw cɔ ɣiườŋ mìɲ kák nàŋầʔu sơtê ɲữŋ hɔạnkwan dềʔu dến tʰuật lạʔi ấʔi cɔ hɔàŋậʔu buồnzầʔu ɣởʔi kwầnáʔɔ cɔ mạkdôcê mặk dể baw ɣaj xỏʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ ɲận bấʔizờ sơtê ɣọʔi hatʰák hɔạnkwan kủʔa vwa vwa dã dặt hầʔu cựk zồʔi biểʔu ŋườʔi di dến mạkdôcê hỏʔi cɔbiết kó việkɣì ɲân saw kó vậʔi hatʰák di za dến mạkdôcê tạʔi nơʔi fố tʰàɲ cướk kửʔa vwa mạkdôcê tʰuật lạʔi mọʔi diềʔu dã sảʔi dến mìɲ bạk haman dã hứʔa dóŋ vàʔɔ xɔ vwa dặŋ kó fép twiệtziệt zân zuda ŋườʔi kũŋ dưʔa cɔ hɔạnkwan sawlụk ciếʔucỉ dã cwiền za tạʔi susơ dặŋ twiệtziệt zân zuda dể hɔạnkwan cỉ cɔ sơtê sɛm kùŋ biểʔu ŋườʔi xwiên vàʔɔ kùŋ vwa cướk vwa nàʔisin vwa kầʔuxẩn ɣiùm cɔ zântộk mìɲ hatʰák cởvề tʰuật lạʔi cɔ sơtê mọʔi lờʔi kủʔa mạkdôcê bấʔizờ sơtê nóʔi vớʔi hatʰák saj ŋườʔi nóʔi lạʔi vớʔi mạkdôcê zằŋ kák tʰần bộk zâncúŋ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa dềʔu zằŋ ʔaj hăj vàʔɔ kùŋ vwa tạʔi nộʔi xôŋ dượk lịɲ vờʔi tʰì ʔaj dó tʰeo dã dịɲ fảʔi sửtử di dượk vwa ɣiơ kâʔi fủ vàŋ za tʰì mớʔi sốŋ ɲưŋ dã bamươʔi ŋàʔizàʔi tôʔi xôŋ dượk vờʔi vàʔɔ kuŋ vwa ŋườʔita tʰuật lạʔi cɔ mạkdôcê kák lờʔi kủʔa sơtê mạkdôcɛ biểʔu dáp lạʔi kùŋ sơtê zằŋ cớ tʰầm tưởŋ zằŋ cɔŋ kuŋ vwa ŋườʔi dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi fảʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi zuda xák nếʔu ŋươʔi làmtʰiɲ cɔŋ lúk nầʔi zân zuda dượk cợ ɣiảʔicứʔu bởʔi kác xák kòn ŋươʔi ɲà ca ŋươʔi dềʔu sɔŋ nàʔɔ ʔaj zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi kớ kơhộʔi lúk nầʔi ŋươʔi dượk hɔàŋậʔu saw bà sơtê biểʔu dáp lạʔi kùŋ mạkdôcê zằŋ hãʔi di ɲóm kák ŋườʔi zuda tạʔi susơ zồʔi hãʔi tôʔi kiêŋkữ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dêm cớ hăj ʔuốŋ ɣì tôʔi kák nàŋầʔu kủʔa tôʔi kũŋ kiêŋkữ nữʔa ɲưvậʔi tôʔi vàʔɔ kùŋ vwa việk cáʔi luậtfáp nếʔu tôʔi fảʔi cết tʰì tôʔi cết mạkdôcê di tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu sơtê dã zặn biểʔu mìɲ ŋàʔi tʰứba sơtê mặk dồ ciềʔu fụk za cầʔu dứŋ tạʔi nộʔi dốʔi cướk kuŋdiện vwa vwa dươŋ ŋự cên ŋôʔi tạʔi cɔŋ kuŋdiện cướk kửʔa dền vừʔa xi vwa tʰấʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê dứŋ cầʔu nơʔi nộʔi tʰì dượk cướk vwa vwa ɣiơ za cɔ sơtê kâʔi fủ vàŋ nơʔi tăj mìɲ bà sơtê lạʔi ɣần zờ kâʔi fủ vwa nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ hỡʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê ŋươʔi ci kầʔusin diềʔu ɣì zầʔu sin dến fânnửʔa nướk kũŋ cɔ ŋươʔi sơtê nóʔi nếʔu ɲiệm vwa sin vwa haman ŋàʔinăj hãʔi dến zự tiệk ʔiến tôʔi dã zọn cɔ vwa vwa bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi vờʔi haman dến dặŋ ʔiɲư hɔàŋậʔu dã nóʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa haman di dến zự tiệk ʔiến kủʔa sơtê dã zọn cɔŋ lúk zự tiệkzượʔu vwa hỏʔi sơtê zằŋ nàŋ sin diềʔu ɣì ɲậm cɔ nàŋ kầʔuxẩn việkɣì zầʔu dến fânnửʔa nướk kũŋ cɔ bà sơtê dáp zằŋ nầʔi diềʔu tôʔi kầʔusin tôʔi ướkaw nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk vwa nếʔu vwa lấʔilàm tʰiện ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi kầʔusin diềʔu tôʔi ʔawướk sin vwa haman hãʔi dến zự tiệk ʔiến tôʔi zọn zồʔi ŋàʔimaj tôʔi tʰeo lờʔi vwa zạʔi biểʔu cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó haman di za vujvẻ lòŋ ɲưŋ xi haman tʰấʔi mạkdôcê nơʔi kửʔa vwa xôŋ dứŋzậʔi kũŋ xôŋ cwiểndộŋ mìɲ dầʔizẫʔi lòŋ ɣiậnzữ mạkdôcê zẫʔuvậʔi haman ɣiận lạʔi cởvề ɲà mìɲ saj ŋườʔi ɣọʔi dến kák bạɲữʔu sêzết mìɲ haman tʰuật lạʔi cɔ cúŋ ɣiàʔukó saŋcọŋ mìɲ dôŋ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ mọʔi vwa cɔ mìɲ dượk saŋ kả tʰểnàʔɔ vwa kất mìɲ kaw kák kwan cưởŋ tʰần bộk kủʔa vwa haman kũŋ nóʔi cừ za mộtmìɲ hɔàŋậʔu sơtê cẳŋ vờʔi ʔaj kùŋ vwa dến zự tiệk ʔiến kủʔa dã zọn ŋàʔimaj lạʔi dượk mờʔi zự nơʔi ɲà ŋườʔi vớʔi vwa sɔŋ mọʔi diềʔu dó cẳŋ íc ɣì cɔ kả lâʔu cừŋ nàʔɔ tʰấʔi mạkdôcê ŋườʔi zuda ŋồʔi tạʔi kửʔa vwa sêzết ŋườʔi kák bạɲữʔu ŋườʔi dềʔu nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi biểʔu zựŋ mộk hìɲ kaw nămmươʔi tʰướk zồʔi sớmmaj hãʔi kầʔu vwa xiến cɔ ŋườʔita ceo mạkdôcê tạʔi dó dɔạn ôŋ hãʔi xɔáʔilạk di zự ʔiếntiệk kùŋ vwa Ðʔiềʔu dó lấʔilàm dẹplòŋ haman ŋườʔi cwiền zựŋ kâʔimộk hìɲ dó vwa xôŋ ŋủ dượk cwiền dɛm sác dọk tạʔi cướk vwa ŋườʔita tʰấʔi kó cép zằŋ mạkdôcê dã za mưʔu kủʔa bíctʰan tʰêzết haj hɔạnkwan kủʔa vwa cɔŋ ɣiữ kửʔa twan ca tăj vàʔɔ vwa ʔasuêzu vwa nóʔi vì kôŋsự ấʔi mạkdôcê kó dượk viɲhiển tướkvị ɣì căŋ kák ŋườʔi kậntʰần kủʔa vwa dáp zằŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ dượk ɣì vwa hỏʔi ʔaj nơʔi cuŋ vả haman dến ŋɔàʔi kủʔa kuŋ vwa dặŋ kầʔu vwa cwiền cewkổ mạkdôcê nơʔi mộk hìɲ ŋườʔi dã zựŋ cɔ mạkdôcê kák tʰần bộk kủʔa vwa tʰưʔa zằŋ kìʔa haman dứŋ nơʔi cuŋ vwa nóʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi vàʔɔ haman vàʔɔ vwa nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ fảʔi làmci cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vwa tôncọŋ haman ŋĩ tʰầm zằŋ vwa tôncọŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xák saw vậʔi haman tâʔu zằŋ hễ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vwa tôncọŋ xá dɛm cɔ áʔɔ ciềʔu kủʔa vwa mặk ŋựʔa kủʔa vwa kỡʔi dộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên vwa cên dầʔu ŋườʔi dó áʔɔ ciềʔu ŋựʔa tʰì hãʔi zaw vàʔɔ tăj kủʔa ciềʔutʰần tốʔi kủʔa vwa dể mặk cɔ ŋườʔi vwa tôncọŋ zẫn ŋườʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa zạʔɔ cơʔi kák dườŋfố kủʔa tʰàɲnộʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi vwa tôncọŋ dượk dãʔi ɲưvậʔi vwa nóʔi vớʔi haman zằŋ hãʔi măw măw dɛm áʔɔ ciềʔu ŋựʔa ʔiɲư lờʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi mặk cɔ mạkdôcê ŋườʔi zuda dươŋ ŋồʔi tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa vwa cớ bỏkwa ɣì mọʔi diềʔu ŋườʔi dã nóʔi haman lấʔi áʔɔ ciềʔu ŋựʔa mặk cɔ mạkdôcê zồʔi zẫn ŋườʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa zạʔɔ kwa kák dườŋfố kủʔa tʰàɲnộʔi cướk ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi vwa tôncọŋ dượk dãʔi ɲưvậʔi Ðʔɔạn mạkdôcê cởvề kửʔa vwa kòɲa lậtdật cởvề ɲà mìɲ tʰảm cùm dầʔu lạʔi haman tʰuật lạʔi cɔ sêzết mìɲ kák bạɲữʔu mìɲ hăj mọʔi diềʔu dã sảʔi dến cɔ mìɲ xi ấʔi kák ŋườʔi xônŋwan sêzết ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ôŋ dã xởʔi mòʔi bạʔi cướk mạkdôcê zồʔi nếʔu kwả tʰuộk zòŋzõʔi zuda tʰì ôŋ cẳŋ tʰắŋ dượk dâʔu ɲưŋ bạʔi kwả cướk ŋườʔi xi cúŋ kòn dươŋ nóʔicwiện vớʔi ŋườʔi kák hɔạnkwan kủʔa vwa dến lậtdật dưʔa haman dến zự tiệk ʔiến sơtê dã zọn vậʔi vwa haman dến zự tiệkzượʔu vớʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê ŋàʔi tʰứhaj cɔŋ xi zự tiệkzượʔu vwa kũŋ nóʔi vớʔi sơtê zằŋ hỡʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê ŋườʔi sin ɣì cɔ ŋươʔi kầʔu ɣì zầʔu cɔdến fânnửʔa nướk kũŋ cɔ hɔàŋậʔu sơtê tʰưʔa lạʔi zằŋ Ôʔi vwa nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk vwa nếʔu vwa vừʔaý sin vwa hãʔi ɲậm lờʔi kầʔuxẩn tôʔi mạŋ sốŋ cɔ tôʔi tʰeo nàʔisin tôʔi cɔ tôʔi zântộk tôʔi vì tôʔi zântộk tôʔi dã dể hủʔiziệt ɣiết cết cɔ di vả nếʔu cúŋtôʔi dể tôʔi dã nínlặŋ mặkzầʔu tʰùŋịc cẳŋ bồʔitʰườŋ tʰiệtʰạʔi cɔ vwa lạʔi dượk vwa ʔasuêzu nóʔi vớʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê zằŋ kẻ zám twan lòŋ ɲưvậʔi ʔaj dâʔu bà sơtê tʰưʔa kẻ kừʔutʰù ấʔilà haman dộkák kiə haman lấʔilàm xiếpvíʔa cướk vwa hɔàŋậʔu vwa nổʔi tʰạɲ dứŋzậʔi xỏʔi bữʔa tiệk di za nơʔi ŋự kòɲa tʰấʔi zõ vwa ɲấtdịɲ ɣiáŋọʔa cɔ mìɲ lạʔi nàʔi xẩn hɔàŋậʔu sơtê kứʔu sɛɲ mạŋ mìɲ xi vwa ŋɔàʔi ŋự cở vàʔɔ ɲà tiệk tʰì haman dã fụk zướʔi ɣếzàʔi nơʔi sơtê dươŋ ŋồʔi vwa nóʔi cɔŋ kuŋ tạʔi cướk kòn zám lăŋɲụk hɔàŋậʔu saw lờʔi vừʔa za xỏʔi miệŋ vwa ŋườʔita cɛ haman lạʔi hạtbôna hɔạnkwan cầʔucựk vwa zằŋ kìʔa kâʔimộk hìɲ kaw nămmươʔi tʰướk haman dã zựŋ tạʔi cɔŋ ɲà mìɲ cɔ mạkdôcê ŋườʔi dã nóʔi cuŋtín dể kứʔu vwa vwa zằŋ hãʔi ceo dó ŋườʔita ceo haman nơʔi mộk hìɲ dã zựŋ cɔ mạkdôcê zồʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa vwa ŋuôʔi di ŋàʔi dó vwa ʔasuêzu cɔ hɔàŋậʔu sơtê káʔi ɲà kủʔa haman ứciếp zân zuda kònmạk dôcê di vàʔɔ cướk vwa sơtê dã bàʔitỏ ŋườʔi tʰântʰuộk mìɲ vwa kổʔi ciếk ɲẫn ŋườʔi dã lấʔi nơʔi haman cɔ mạkdôcê bà sơtê dặt mạkdôcê cên ɲà haman bà sơtê lạʔi nóʔi cướk vwa fụk suốŋ zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi xóklók kầʔusin vwa ziệt mưʔu ák haman ŋườʔi ʔaɣát dã twan hạʔi zân zuda vwa dưʔa kâʔi fủ vàŋ za cɔ sơtê Ðʔɔạn cổʔi zậʔi dứŋ cướk vwa zằŋ nếʔu vừʔaý vwa nếʔu tôʔi dượk cướk vwa nếʔu vwa lấʔi việk ấʔi tiệníc tôʔi dượk dẹp vwa tʰì sin vwa hãʔi ciếʔu dặŋ bãʔi kák tʰơ mưʔumẹʔɔ kủʔa haman kɔncaj hammêdatʰa ŋườʔi ʔaɣát tʰư dặŋ cwiền ɣiết ɲữŋ zân zuda cɔŋ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa vì nỡnàʔɔ tôʔi tʰấʔi dượk tainạn sảʔi dến cɔ zântộk tôʔi lòŋ nàʔɔ sɛm dượk hủʔiziệt zòŋzõʔi tôʔi vwa ʔasuê nóʔi vớʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê mạkdôcê ŋườʔi zuda zằŋ nầʔi dã cɔ sơtê ɲà kủʔa haman kòn ŋườʔita dã sử ceo mộk hìɲ bởʔivì dã ca tăj za hạʔi ŋườʔi zuda vậʔi haj ŋươʔi kũŋ hãʔi ɲơn zɛɲ vwa zân zuda diềʔu ɣì vừʔaý haj ŋươʔi zồʔi lấʔi ciếk ɲẫn kủʔa vwa zấʔu vì ciếʔucỉ nàʔɔ ɲơn zɛɲ vwa zấʔu vớʔi ciếk ɲẫn kủʔa vwa xôŋtʰể bãʔi dượk bấʔizờ ɲằm tʰáŋ tʰáŋ sivan ŋàʔi haimươʔi ɲữŋ tʰầʔi tʰơ dượk ɣọʔi vàʔɔ ʔi tʰeo mọʔi diềʔu mạkdôcê zạʔi biểʔu cɔ zân zuda kák kwan cấntʰủ kák kwan kaikwản ɲữŋ dầʔu cưởŋ kủʔa kák tỉɲ dộ cɔdến tʰiôbi tứk mộtcăm haimươʔibảʔi tỉɲ cɔ tỉɲ nàʔɔ zùŋ cữ nấʔi cɔ zântộk nàʔɔ tʰeo tʰổâm nấʔi cɔ zân zuda tʰì tʰeo cữ tiếŋ kủʔa mạkdôcê ɲơn zɛɲ vwa ʔasuêzu zấʔu bằŋ ciếk ɲẫn kủʔa vwa zồʔi saj líɲ cạm dɛm tʰơ di kỡʔi ŋựʔa hăŋ ŋựʔa nòʔi bởʔi ŋựʔa dể ɣiốŋ sɛɲ za ciếʔucỉ ấʔi zằŋ vwa fép cɔ zân zuda cɔŋ kák tỉɲ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa nướk ʔasuêzu lạʔi nộʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi mườʔiba tʰáŋ mườʔihaj tứklà tʰáŋ ʔada dặŋ biɲ vựk sɛɲ mạŋ mìɲ twiệtziệt dáɲ ɣiết cɔ kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa zân kừʔudịc twan mìɲ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ kùŋ cɔfép dɔạt lấʔi tàʔisản kủʔa cúŋnó cɔ ciếʔucỉ dượk kôŋbố cɔŋ mỗʔi tỉɲ sawlụk ciếʔu dɛm zaw cɔ kák zântộk hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi zuda sẵnsàŋ ŋàʔi dó cảtʰù kák kừʔudịc mìɲ vậʔi ɲữŋ líɲ cạm kỡʔi ŋựʔa hăŋ ŋựʔa nòʔi vâŋ mạŋ vwa tʰúkzụk lậtdật di Ðʔɔạn ciếʔucỉ ấʔi dượk cwiền za cɔŋ kiɲdô susơ mạkdôcê cướk vwa cởza mặk dồ ciềʔufụk sɛɲ cắŋ dộʔi kák mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên bằŋ vàŋ mặk káʔi áʔɔzàʔi bằŋ ɣaj màʔu tʰàɲ susơ kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ về fần zân zuda tʰìkó sáŋsủʔa vujvẻ xɔáʔilạk viɲhiển cɔŋ mỗʔi tỉɲ mỗʔi tʰàɲ fàm nơʔi nàʔɔ kó mạŋ lịɲ ciếʔucỉ kủʔa vwa tʰấʔu dến tʰìkó vuimừŋ xɔáʔilạk cɔ zân zuda bữʔa tiệk ʔiến ŋàʔi kó ɲiềʔu cɔŋ kák zântộk kủʔa sứ ɲập lạʔi vớʔi zân zuda bởʔivì cúŋnó sợhãʔi zân zuda tʰáŋ mườʔihaj tʰáŋ ʔada ŋàʔi mườʔiba xi hầʔu ɣần ŋàʔizờ fảʔi tʰihàɲ mạŋ lịɲ ciếʔucỉ kủʔa vwa tứk ɲằm ŋàʔi ấʔi kừʔudịc zân zuda ɲưŋ việk dã dổʔi cáʔi di cáɲ kák ŋườʔi zuda dó lạʔi ɲữŋ ɣét mìɲ tʰì zân zuda lạʔi tạʔi kák tʰàɲ cɔŋ xắp kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa ʔasuêzu dặŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ ɲữŋ hạʔi mìɲ cẳŋ kó ʔaj cốŋcả nổʔi cúŋ bởʔivì kák zântộk sợhãʔi zân zuda kák dầʔu cưởŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tỉɲ kák kwan cấntʰủ kák kwan kaikwản kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kɔj việk vwa dềʔu ɣiúpdỡ zân zuda kíɲ mạkdôcê vìmạk dôcê kawcọŋ cɔŋ kuŋ vwa zɛɲtiếŋ ŋườʔi dồn za xắp kák tỉɲ bởʔi ŋườʔi mạkdôcê kàŋŋàʔicàŋ kawcọŋ zâŋiw da dáɲ kák tʰùŋịc mìɲ bằŋ mũʔi ɣươm ɣiết cết twiệtziệt cúŋnó fàm nàʔɔ ɣét tʰì dãʔi tʰeo mặký mìɲ tạʔi kiɲdô susơ zân zuda dáɲ ɣiết nămcăm ŋườʔi kũŋ ɣiết fạtsandatʰa Ðʔɛɲ fôŋ ʔabatʰa fôzatʰa ʔadaliə ʔazidatʰa fạtmasata ʔazisaj ʔazidaj vazêsatʰa tứklà mườʔi ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa haman cáʔu hammêdatʰa zân zuda ɲưŋ cúŋ xôŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ hóʔa tàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita dɛm cɔ vwa hăj ɲữŋ ɣiết cɔŋ kiɲdô susơ vwa nóʔi vớʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê zằŋ zâŋiw da dã ɣiết cết tạʔi cɔŋ kiɲdô susơ nămcăm ŋườʔi mườʔi ŋườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa haman tʰăj lạʔi cɔŋ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa cúŋ kòŋ dã làmci nữʔa bâʔizờ nàŋ sin ɣì tất cɔ nàŋ kòn kầʔu ci nữʔa cɔ bà sơtê tʰưʔa zằŋ nếʔu dẹp vwa sin hãʔi ɲậm cɔ ŋàʔimaj zân zuda tạʔi susơ kũŋ ɲư ciếʔucỉ ŋàʔinăj cɔfép ceo nơʔi mộk hìɲ mườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa haman vwa cwiền lịɲ ɲưvậʔi kó ciếʔucỉ cwiền za cɔŋ susơ ŋườʔita ceo mườʔi kɔncaj kủʔa haman zâŋiw da tạʔi susơ kũŋ lạʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáɲ kủʔa ʔada ɣiết bɛcăm ŋườʔi tạʔi susơ ɲưŋ cúŋ xôŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ hóʔa tàʔi ɲữŋ zân zuda xák cɔŋ kák tỉɲ vwa lạʔi biɲ vựk cɔ sɛɲ mạŋ mìɲ dáɲ tʰùŋịc mìɲ ɣiết bảʔi mươʔi ŋàn ŋườʔi ɣɛŋét mìɲ ɲưŋ xôŋ ca tăj vàʔɔ hóʔa tàʔi việk ấʔi sảʔiza ɲằm ŋàʔi mườʔiba tʰáŋ ʔada kòn ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáŋ ấʔi cúŋ ʔanŋỉ tʰàɲ ŋàʔi tiệk ʔiến vujvẻ ɲưŋ zân zuda tạʔi suzơ ɲóm cɔŋ ŋàʔi mườʔiba mườʔibốn kủʔa tʰáŋ ấʔi kòn ŋàʔi mườʔilăm tʰáŋ ấʔi cúŋ ʔanŋỉ tʰàɲ ŋàʔi tiệk ʔiến vujvẻ bởʔi kớ ấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda nơʔi kák hươŋtʰôn lấʔi ŋàʔi mườʔibốn tʰáɲ ʔada ŋàʔi vuimừŋ tiệk ʔiến ŋàʔi dể ɣởʔi cɔ ɲăw ɲữŋ mạkdôcê ɣicép kák diềʔu nầʔi ɣởʔi tʰơ cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân zuda cɔŋ kák tỉɲ kủʔa vwa ʔasuêzu hɔặk ɣần hăj sa dể xiến cɔ hằŋ ɣiữ ŋàʔi mườʔibốn mườʔilăm kủʔa tʰáŋ ʔada cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰáŋ ấʔi zân zuda dã tʰɔát xỏʔi tʰùŋịc mìɲ dượk bìɲan dăwdớn dổʔi za mừŋzỡ ŋàʔi buồntʰảm hóʔaza ŋàʔi lạʔi bảʔɔ tʰàɲ ŋàʔi tiệk ʔiến vuimừŋ ɣởʔi cɔ ɲăw ɲữŋ bốtʰí cɔ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ zâŋiw da ɲận tʰeo việk mìɲ dã xởʔi tʰeo diềʔu mạkdôcê dã ɣởʔi cɔ mìɲ haman kɔncaj hamêdatʰa zân ʔaɣát hếttʰảʔi zân zuda kó mưʔuhạʔi zân zuda dặŋ twiệtziệt di kó fuzơ ŋĩʔalà bỏtʰăm dể cừziệt fáhủʔi cúŋ di sɔŋ xi sơtê dến cướk vwa dể việk ấʔi tʰì vwa za ciếʔucỉ cwiềnbảʔɔ zằŋ kák mưʔu ák haman dã twan hạʔi zân zuda hãʔi dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu kủʔa ŋườʔita ceo vớʔi kák kɔncaj nơʔi mộk hìɲ bởʔi kớ dó ŋườʔita kứ tʰeo cữ fuzơ ɣọʔi kák ŋàʔi dó fuzim lạʔi kó lờʔi kủʔa tʰơ nầʔi kớ kák diềʔu cúŋ dã tʰấʔi kùŋ sảʔi dến cɔ mìɲ zân zuda ɲận dịɲ tʰườŋlệ cɔ mìɲ cɔ zòŋzốŋ mìɲ cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɲập vớʔi mìɲ mỗʔi fảʔi ɣiữ haj ŋàʔi nầʔi tùʔi káʔi tʰơ nầʔi tʰeo tʰì ɲứt dịɲ cẳŋ ʔaj lạʔi ŋườʔita fảʔi ɲớ lạʔi haj ŋàʔi ấʔi mỗʔi zatộk cɔŋ mỗʔi tỉɲ mỗʔi tʰàɲ fảʔi ɣiữ cảʔi kwa kák dờʔi cẳŋ dượk ŋàʔi fuzim nầʔi xỏʔi ɣiữʔa zân zuda cớ xỏʔi zòŋzõʔi hɔàŋậʔu sơtê kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ʔabihaj mạkdôcê ŋườʔi zuda lạʔi tʰơ tʰứ ɲì dặŋ xwiên zân zuda ɣìŋiữ fuzim ŋườʔi lấʔi lờʔi hòʔabìɲ cơn tʰật ɣởʔi tʰơ cɔ hếttʰảʔi zân zuda cɔŋ mộtcăm haimươʔibảʔi tỉɲ kủʔa nướk ʔasuêzu dặŋ làmcứŋ kwiếtdịɲ kák ŋàʔi fuzim ấʔi tʰeo tʰì ɲứt dịɲ ʔiɲư mạkdôcê ŋườʔi zuda hɔàŋậʔu sơtê dã zạʔi biểʔu cúŋ ʔiɲư cúŋ dã lấʔi cɔ mìɲ cɔ zòŋzõʔi mìɲ kiêŋ ʔaj xók lịɲ mạŋ kủʔa sơtê dịɲ việk ɣiữ kák ŋàʔi fuzim dɔạn diềʔu dó dượk cép vàʔɔ sác vwa ʔasuêzu sứ kák kùlaw kủʔa tʰuế kák kôŋsự kwiềntʰế năŋlựk ŋườʔi kả kawcọŋ kủʔa mạkdôcê vwa tʰăŋ cứk ŋườʔi làmsaw tʰảʔi dềʔu kó cép vàʔɔ sác kák vwa nướk mêdi fɛzơsơ vìmạk dôcê ŋườʔi zuda tểtướŋ kủʔa vwa ʔasuêzu cɔŋ vòŋ zân zuda ŋườʔi dượk tôncọŋ dẹplòŋ kák ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ việk tốtlàɲ cɔ zântộk mìɲ nóʔi hòʔabìɲ cɔ kả zòŋzõʔi mìɲ tạʔi cɔŋ sứ ʔuùtsơ kó ŋườʔi ɣióp ŋườʔi ấʔi cọnvẹn ŋăitʰẳŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi láɲ xỏʔi diềʔu ák ŋườʔi sɛɲ dượk bảʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi kó bảʔi ŋàn ciên ŋàn lạkdà nămcăm dôʔi nămcăm lừʔa káʔi tôʔitớ zất ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ấʔi cɔŋ kả zân Ðôŋ fươŋ kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi hăj di zự tiệk dãʔi tʰăj fiên ɲăw cɔŋ ɲà kủʔa mỗʔi ŋườʔi saj mờʔi cịʔɛmɣáʔi mìɲ ănuốŋ cuŋ vớʔi mìɲ sảʔi xi kák ŋàʔi ʔiếntiệk sɔŋ zồʔi ɣióp saj ŋườʔi di zọn kák kɔnkáʔi mìɲ cɔ tʰɛɲsạc tʰứkzậʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu tùʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ zễtʰườŋ kák kɔn kó fạmtộʔi cɔŋ lòŋ từcốʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ ɣióp hằŋ ɲưvậʔi vả ŋàʔiciə kák kɔncaj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến zamắt Ðứkzê satan kũŋ dến cɔŋ vòŋ cúŋ Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi satan zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu dến satan tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi cảʔi kwa dâʔidó cên dất zạʔɔ cơʔi tạʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi hỏʔi satan zằŋ ŋươʔi kó ɲìn tʰấʔi ɣióp tôʔitớ kủʔa căŋ nơʔi tʰếzan cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư cọnvẹn ŋăitʰẳŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi láɲ xỏʔi diềʔu ák satan tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ ɣióp kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi luốŋ kôŋ saw cúʔa cẳŋ zựŋ hàŋzàʔɔ biɲ vựk fíʔa ŋườʔi ɲà ŋườʔi mọʔi tʰuộk ŋườʔi saw cúʔa dã fướk cɔ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋườʔi cɔ kủʔakảʔi ŋườʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu cên dất ɲưŋ bâʔizờ hãʔi ɣiơ tăj cúʔa za cúʔa za dụŋ dến hạʔi kák ŋườʔi kó ŋườʔi fỉbáŋ cúʔa cướk Ðứkzê fán vớʔi satan zằŋ nầʔi kák ŋườʔi kó dềʔu fó cɔŋ tăj ŋườʔi ɲưŋ cớ ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ satan luj za xỏʔi Ðứkzê sảʔi ŋàʔiciə xi kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi dươŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu cɔŋ ɲà ʔɛɲkả cúŋnó sứɣiả dến báʔɔ cɔ ɣióp zằŋ bò dươŋ kàʔi lừʔa dươŋ bênkạɲ tʰì zân sêba sôŋ vàʔɔ cúŋnó dɔạt kướp di lấʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết kák tôʔitớ cỉ mộtmìɲ tôʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi dặŋ báʔɔ cɔ ôŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi kòn dươŋ nóʔi tʰì ŋườʔi xák dến báʔɔ zằŋ lửʔa kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔizáŋ suốŋ tʰiêʔudốt kák kɔnciên tôʔitớ tiêʔuhủʔi cúŋnó di cỉ mộtmìɲ tôʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi dặŋ báʔɔ cɔ ôŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi kòn dươŋ nóʔi tʰì xák cạʔi dến báʔɔ zằŋ zânkɛɲ dê fân dạʔɔ sôŋ vàʔɔ lạkdà kướpdɔạt di lấʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm ɣiết kák tôʔitớ cỉ mộtmìɲ tôʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi dặŋ báʔɔ cɔ ôŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi kòn dươŋ nóʔi tʰì xák cạʔi dến báʔɔ zằŋ kák kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ôŋ dươŋ ănuốŋ tạʔi nơʔi ɲà ʔɛɲkả kủʔa kìʔa ŋọn ɣió fíʔa kiə samạk tʰổʔi dến cɔ ɣók ɲà zuŋziɲ ɲà suốŋ dè cết kák ŋườʔi cẻ tuổʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ tôʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi dặŋ báʔɔ cɔ ôŋ ɣióp cổʔi zậʔi sé áʔɔ mìɲ kạʔɔ dầʔu dɔạn sấp mìɲ suốŋ dất tʰờ lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi cầncuồŋ xỏʔi lòŋ tôʔi kũŋ cầncuồŋ Ðứkzê dã cɔ Ðứkzê lạʔi kất di dáŋ ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ Ðứkzê cɔŋ mọʔi ấʔi ɣióp xôŋ fạmtộʔi cẳŋ nóʔi fạmtʰượŋ kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sảʔiza ŋàʔiciə kák kɔncaj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến zamắt Ðứkzê satan kũŋ kó dến cɔŋ vòŋ cúŋ dặŋ zamắt Ðứkzê Ðứkzê fán hỏʔi satan zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔu dến satan tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi cảʔi kwa dâʔidó cên dất zạʔɔ cơʔi tạʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán hỏʔi satan zằŋ ŋươʔi kó ɲìn tʰấʔi ɣióp tôʔitớ căŋ cên dất cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi cọnvẹn ŋăitʰẳŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi láɲ xỏʔi dềʔu ák lạʔiŋườʔi dỗ cɔŋ hɔàntɔàn mìɲ mặkzầʔu ŋươʔi kó ɣiụk fáhủʔi ŋườʔi vôkớ satan tʰưʔa lạʔi vớʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ lấʔi za dền za fàm ci ŋườʔi kó caw tʰế cɔ mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ ɲưŋ bâʔizờ sin cúʔa hãʔi ɣiơ tăj za dụŋ dến hạʔi sươŋtʰịt ŋườʔi ŋườʔi fỉbáŋ cúʔa cướk Ðứkzê fán vớʔi satan zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔiở cɔŋ tăj ŋươʔi ɲưŋ cỉ hãʔi ɣiữ mạŋ sốŋ ŋườʔi satan luj za cướk Ðứkzê hàɲ hạʔi ɣióp bịɲ ʔuŋdộk cơn cɔdến cót dầʔu ɣióp lấʔi miếŋ sàɲ dặŋ ɣãʔi mìɲ ŋồʔi cɔŋ dốŋ cɔ vợɣióp nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ʔuû ʔa Ôŋ hãʔi kòn dỗ cɔŋ hɔàntɔàn mìɲ saw hãʔi fỉbáŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cết di ŋườʔi dáp lạʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi nóʔi ɲư ŋườʔi dờn ŋumuộʔi ʔuû ʔa saw sự fướk tăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ cúŋta cúŋta lãɲ lấʔi kòn tajhọʔa tăj ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ cên cúŋta lạʔi cẳŋ lãɲ lấʔi saw cɔŋ mọʔi việk dó ɣióp xôŋ fạmtộʔi bởʔi môʔi miệŋ mìɲ vả xi bạɲữʔu kủʔa ɣióp lifa ŋườʔi tʰêman biɲdát ŋườʔi su ʔa sôfa ŋườʔi naama hăj dượk kák tainạn dã sảʔi dến cɔ ŋườʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi ɲăw sứ mìɲ di dến dặŋ ciə ʔanủʔi ŋườʔi ba bạɲữʔu sa ŋướk tʰì cẳŋ ɲậnbiết ŋườʔi kấttiếŋ xók mỗʔi ŋườʔi sé áʔɔ mìɲ bụʔi cờʔi vãʔi cên dầʔu mìɲ Ðʔɔạn ŋồʔi suốŋ dất vớʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ bảʔi ŋàʔidêm cẳŋ ʔaj nóʔi lờʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi dăwdớn ŋườʔilớn săw việk ấʔi ɣióp mởmiệŋ zủʔa ŋàʔi sɛɲ mìɲ ɣióp kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ ŋàʔi dã sɛɲ za xá di kòn dêm dã nóʔi zằŋ kó dượk tʰaj zựŋ kɔncaj hãʔi tiêʔuziệt di ŋwiện ŋàʔi ấʔi za tămtốʔi ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên kaw cớ tʰèm dến và áɲsáŋ dừŋ ciếʔu cên cớ ɣì tốʔităm bóŋ cết ɲìnɲận Áŋ mâʔi kéʔɔ fủ cên và ɲựt tʰựk cɔ kiɲ xiếp ŋwiện tốʔităm lấʔi dêm ấʔi cớ cɔ dồŋ lạk vớʔi kák ŋàʔi kủʔa Ðừŋ vàʔɔ kủʔa kák tʰáŋ fảʔi ŋwiện cɔ dêm ấʔi sɔnsẻ tiếŋ vuikườʔi cớ vaŋ za cɔŋ xɔảŋ ʔaj hăj zủʔasả ŋàʔi kó tàʔi cọk lêviətʰan zậʔi hãʔi zủʔasả ŋwiện saw cạŋvạŋ dêm ấʔi fảʔi tốʔităm nó mɔŋ áɲsáŋ áɲsáŋ lạʔi cẳŋ kó cớ cɔ tʰấʔi zạŋdôŋ za bởʔivì dêm ấʔi xôŋ kửʔa lòŋ hɔàʔitʰaj cẳŋ kó ɣiấʔu dăwdớn xỏʔi ɲân saw tôʔi cẳŋ cết cɔŋ tửkuŋ ɲân saw xôŋ tắtʰơʔi xi lọtlòŋ kớsaw haj dầʔuɣốʔi dỡ lấʔi tôʔi và dể cɔ tôʔi bằŋ cẳŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ tôʔi dã ʔan tịɲ Ðượk ŋủ ŋỉŋơʔi kùŋ kák vwa mưʔusĩ kủʔa tʰếzan kất mìɲ ɲữŋ lăŋtẩm hɔặk vớʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kó vàŋ và cất bạk dầʔi kuŋdiện mìɲ hɔặk tôʔi cẳŋ kó ɲư tʰaj sảʔɔ ɣiốŋ kák kɔncẻ xôŋ tʰấʔi áɲsáŋ dó huŋák tʰôʔi zàʔi zạk và kák ŋườʔi sứk dượk ʔanŋỉ dó ɲữŋ dồŋ ɲăw dượk bìɲ tịɲ xôŋ kòn ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa nữʔa tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi ɲỏ dềʔu kùŋ ɲăw và tôʔimọʔi dượk fóŋ xỏʔi ác củ mìɲ kớsaw áɲsáŋ cɔ hɔạnnạn và sɛɲ mạŋ cɔ kó lòŋ dầʔi dắŋkăj ŋườʔi ɲưtʰế mɔŋ cết màlạʔi xôŋ dượk cết kầʔu tʰák bửʔu ɣiấʔu xi ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk tʰì vujvẻ nứklòŋ mừŋzỡ tʰăj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ dườŋ mìɲ fảʔi tʰeo và Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vâʔibọk saw lạʔi dượk sốŋ vì cướk xi tôʔi dã tʰan siếk tiếŋ kêʔu vaŋ tôʔi tôʔi ɲư nướk vì việk tôʔi sợhãʔi dã tʰấʔu dến tôʔi Ðʔiềʔu tôʔi kiɲxủŋ lạʔi sảʔiza cɔ tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ dượk ʔanlạk cẳŋ dượk bìɲ tịɲ cẳŋ dượk ʔanŋỉ sɔŋ nỗʔi zốʔilɔạn dã dến bấʔizờ lifa ŋườʔi tʰêman dáp lờʔi zằŋ nếʔu ŋườʔita tʰử nóʔi vớʔi ôŋ ôŋ mấtlòŋ căŋ ɲưŋ ʔaj kầmzữ mìɲ xôŋ nóʔi saw dượk kìʔa ôŋ dã zạʔizỗ ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi và cɔ tăj ʔiếʔuduốʔi za mạɲmẽ kák lờʔinóʔi ôŋ dã dỡ siêʔu và dầʔuɣốʔi luŋlăj ôŋ dã cɔ vữŋbền ɲưŋ bâʔizờ tainạn sảʔi dến ôŋ ôŋ lạʔi ɣiận nó vàʔɔ ôŋ tʰì ôŋ zốʔi lòŋ Ôŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi nơʔi nươŋɲờ kủʔa ôŋ táɲ hạɲ hɔàntɔàn kủʔa ôŋ cẳŋ fảʔi côŋkậʔi kủʔa ôŋ saw Ôŋ hãʔi swisét lạʔi nàʔɔ bawzờ vôtộʔi Ðâʔu kó ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ lạʔi cừziệt tʰeo diềʔu tôʔi dã tʰấʔi ʔaj kàʔi zanák và zeo diềʔu xấʔi zốʔi tʰì lạʔi ɣặt lấʔi bởʔi hơʔi tʰở Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋ tạʔi hơʔi sịt ɣiận ŋàʔi tiêʔuhaw di tiếŋ ɣầm kủʔa ɣiọŋ dã êmlặŋ và nɛɲ kủʔa kák kɔn ɣãʔi sưtử mạɲbạʔɔ cết tʰiếʔu mồʔi và kák kɔn lạk kó lờʔi tʰấʔu dến tôʔi lỗ taj tôʔi văŋvẳŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ ấʔi bandêm dươŋ xi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋủmê lòŋ tôʔi switưởŋ tʰấʔi zị tượŋ sự kiɲxủŋ sợhãʔi sôŋ tôʔi xiến sươŋkốt tôʔi zunzẩʔi kó tʰần di ŋaŋ kwa cướk tôʔi kák lôŋ tók kủʔa tʰịt tôʔi sửŋ tʰần dứŋ dó tôʔi ɲìn xôŋ ŋườʔi kó hìɲzạŋ cướk tôʔi tôʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tʰầmtʰì ɲɔɲỏ zằŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi hăj cết kôŋbìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dượk cɔŋsạc Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa mìɲ saw kìʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ tinkậʔi kák tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰườŋ các diênzạʔi kủʔa tʰiênsứ ŋàʔi fươŋci ɲữŋ còʔi dấtsét dượk kất cên bụʔi kát bị cà ɲư lɔàʔi sâʔumọt ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ sáŋ dến ciềʔu cúŋ hằŋ dến cẳŋ kó ʔaj lưʔuý dến zâʔicằŋ kủʔa cúŋ cẳŋ zứt cɔŋ mìɲ saw cúŋ tʰák nàʔɔ dượk xônŋwan ci vậʔi hãʔi kêʔula kó ʔaj dáp lờʔi ôŋ căŋ Ôŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ dấŋ nàʔɔ cɔŋ kák tʰáɲ vì nổʔi sầʔutʰảm ɣiết ŋườʔi ŋumuộʔi sự dốkỵ cết dơnsơ tôʔi kó tʰấʔi ŋumuộʔi câm zễ za ɲưŋ tʰìɲlìɲ tôʔi zủʔasả cỗ kủʔa kɔnkáʔi xôŋ dượk ʔanɲiên bị cà tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi dóʔixát mùʔamàŋ dỗʔi dɔạt lấʔi ɣiữʔa bụʔi ɣaj và bẫʔi ɣàʔi zìɲ kủʔakảʔi vì hɔạnnạn cẳŋ fảʔi bụʔi kát sɛɲ za sự xốnxó cẳŋ zɔ dất nảʔi ɲưŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi sɛɲ za dể xốnxó ɲư lửʔa băj cớp xôŋ sɔŋ tôʔi tôʔi kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mà fó zwiênkớ tôʔi cɔ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kôŋviệk lớnlaw xôŋ saw zòsét dượk làm ɲữŋ kỳziệʔu xôŋtʰể dếm cɔ dặŋ ŋàʔi mưʔa suốŋ mặtdất cɔ nướk càn dồŋzuộŋ ɲắk kaw ɲữŋ suốŋ và kứʔu dỡ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi buồntʰảm cɔ dượk fướk hạɲ ŋàʔi bạʔi mưʔukế kủʔa ŋườʔi kwỉkwiệt xiến tăj cúŋnó cẳŋ sɔŋ dượkviệk twan dịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi xônŋwan cɔŋ cướk mók mưʔukế kủʔa kwỉkwáʔi hạʔi banŋàʔi cúŋnó ɣặp tốʔităm Ðươŋ lúk cưʔa cúŋ zờ di ɲư cɔŋ dêmtốʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔu ŋèʔɔ xỏʔi ɣươm kủʔa miệŋ cúŋnó và xỏʔi tăj kườŋbạʔɔ vậʔi ŋèʔɔ xốn kó côŋkậʔi kòn zanák ŋậmmiệŋ lạʔi ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwởcác lấʔi làmfướk tʰăj vậʔi cớ xiɲ sửʔa fạt kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ vìŋàʔi cɔ tʰươŋtíc zồʔi lạʔi zít cɔ ŋàʔi dáɲ hạʔi zồʔi tăj ŋàʔi cữʔa làɲ cɔ cɔŋ sáʔu kơn hɔạnnạn ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ kwa kơn tʰứbảʔi tajhạʔi kũŋ xôŋ dụŋ dến mìɲ cɔŋ kơn dóʔicém ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ xỏʔi cết và dươŋ lúk ɣiặkzã kứʔu xỏʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm Ôŋ dượk xỏʔi tajhạʔi kủʔa lưỡʔi kũŋ cẳŋ ci xi tajvạ sảʔi dến Ôŋ kườʔi tʰầm xi tʰấʔi fáhwaŋ dóʔicém kũŋ cẳŋ kák tʰúvật kủʔa dất vì ôŋ zawướk vớʔi dá dồŋzuộŋ và kák tʰúzừŋ hòʔatʰuận vớʔi ôŋ Ôŋ tʰấʔi cạʔi mìɲ dượk hòʔabìɲ Ðʔi viếŋ kák bầʔi mìɲ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ci tʰiếʔu kũŋ tʰấʔi zòŋzõʔi mìɲ ɲiềʔu và kɔncáʔu mìɲ dôŋ ɲư kỏ cên dất Ôŋ dượk tuổʔi kaw xi vàʔɔ cɔŋ fầnmộ ɲư lúʔa ŋườʔita ɣặt fảʔi tʰì nầʔi cúŋtôʔi kó sɛmsét diềʔu dó vậʔi hãʔi ŋɛ hãʔi dể íc cɔ mìɲ ɣióp dáp lạʔi zằŋ Ôʔi cớ ɣì nỗʔibuồn tôʔi ɲắk kân cɔ dúŋ và kák tainạn tôʔi dể cên kân tʰăŋbằŋ vì hiệŋiờ nặŋ kát nên tạʔi kớ ấʔi kák
