lờʔinóʔi dạʔi za bởʔivì kák kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cúŋ ɲằm tôʔi tâmhồn tôʔi ʔuốŋ nọkdộk kủʔa ấʔi sự kiɲ xiếp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zàn cận ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi cớ tʰì kɔn lừʔa zừŋ nàʔɔ kêʔula xi kó kỏ kòn nàʔɔ zốŋ xi kó lươŋtʰảʔɔ vật ci lạtlẽʔɔ ŋườʔita nàʔɔ cẳŋ muốʔi kòn cɔŋ lòŋcắŋ cứŋ ɣà dâʔu kó mùʔi laj ɣì vật ɣì liɲhồn tôʔi từcốʔi dá dến lạʔi cởnên tʰựk ɣớmɣê kủʔa tôʔi Ôʔi cớ ɣì lờʔi sởkầʔu tôʔi dượk tʰàɲ vàÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ tôʔi diềʔu tôʔi ʔawướk cớci Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dẹplòŋ kà tôʔi buôŋ tăj ŋàʔi za cừziệt tôʔi vậʔi tôʔi kòn dượk ʔanủʔi và cɔŋ kơn dăwdớn cẳŋ ɣiản tôʔi vuimừŋ bởʔivì xôŋ kó từcốʔi lờʔi fán kủʔa Ðấŋtʰáɲ sứklựk tôʔi nàʔɔ dủ dợʔi cɔ nỗʔi kuốʔicùŋ tôʔi zasaw tôʔi lạʔi ɲẫnɲịn dượk sứk tôʔi sứk dá saw tʰịt tôʔi zễ dồŋ cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi cẳŋ kó tiếpkứʔu xônŋwan kất xỏʔi tôʔi Ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ɲư vậʔisaw kẻ ɣần suj dáŋ dượk bạnbầʔu tʰươŋsót dến ʔɛ kẻʔɔ ŋườʔi kíɲ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi zốʔi ɣạt tôʔi ɲư zòŋ xɛ kạn nướk ɲư lòŋ xɛ cảʔi xô nó dụk kớ nướkdá kóɣiá twiết cɔŋ ɲưŋ cɔŋ xi ɣiựt suốŋ xɛ xô kạn lúk nắŋ ɣiọʔi lạʔi xỏʔi cỗ Ðʔɔàn xác di ŋaŋ kwa tác dườŋ Ðʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ samạk zồʔi cết Ðʔɔàn xác tʰêma nướk kák bộhàɲ sêba ɲờkậʔi ɲưŋ cúŋ mắkkỡ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi xi dến tạʔi xɛ fảʔi hổtʰẹn hiệnnăj kák kũŋ xôŋ zaɣì kák tʰấʔi dáŋ kiɲ xiếp zunsợ tôʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ sin kuŋkấp cɔ tôʔi cɔŋ tàʔisản kủʔa kák sin hãʔi lấʔi zâŋ cɔ tôʔi saw hɔặk kầʔu zằŋ sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tăj kừʔudịc và cuộk tôʔi xỏʔi tăj hãʔi zạʔizỗ tôʔi tôʔi nínlặŋ sin cỉ cɔ tôʔi hiểʔu tôʔi dã lầmlỗʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ lờʔi cáɲ cựk kó sứklựk zườŋ baw kòn lờʔi cácmók kủʔa kák nàʔɔ kó các dượk ɣì kák cácmók tiếŋnóʔi saw sɔŋ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋãlòŋ cỉ ɲư luồŋ ɣió kwảtʰật kák sôŋ mồkôʔi và dàʔɔ ɣàʔi bạɲữʔu mìɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ nếʔu kák hãʔi ŋó tôʔi tôʔi nàʔɔ zám nóʔizốʔi cướk kák dâʔu sin xá sétlạʔi cớ kó bấtkôŋ fảʔi hãʔi sétlạʔi zwiênkớ tôʔi kôŋbìɲ kódiềʔu bấtkôŋ nơʔi lưỡʔi tôʔi căŋ ổɣà tôʔi cẳŋ fânbiệt diềʔu ák saw ŋườʔiở tʰếzan cẳŋ kó ciếncận saw niên ɲựt ŋườʔi xôŋ fảʔi ɲư dờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ɲư ướkaw bóŋtốʔi ɲư ŋườʔi làmtʰuê côŋdợʔi tiềnlươŋ ɲưvậʔi tôʔi dã dượk kák tʰáŋ xốnxó và ɲữŋ dêm lawxổ fần dịɲ cɔ tôʔi xi tôʔi ŋủ tʰì tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ cừŋ nàʔɔ tôʔi tʰứkzậʔi bawzờ tốʔităm tôʔi kwá căncở cɔdến zạŋ ŋàʔi tʰịt tôʔi bawfủ ɣiòʔi tửʔa dất za tôʔi cảʔi za kák ŋàʔi tôʔi kwa măw tʰɔj zệt kửʔi tiêʔu di cẳŋ kó côŋkậʔi ɣì Ôʔi sin hãʔi ɲớ mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi cỉ bằŋ hơʔi tʰở mắt tôʔi cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi diềʔu fướk hạɲ nữʔa mắt dã tʰấʔi tôʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi tôʔi nữʔa mắtcúʔa dɔáʔi dến tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ kòn mâʔi za tʰểnàʔɔ kẻ suốŋ âmfủ xôŋ cởlên kũŋ tʰể ấʔi họ xôŋ cởvề ɲà mìɲ nữʔa và sứsở ŋườʔi cẳŋ kòn ŋườʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi tôʔi cẳŋ kầm miệŋ tôʔi cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi tôʔi nóʔi za cɔŋ kăjdắŋ kủʔa liɲhồn tôʔi tôʔi fànnàn tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi káʔi cɔŋ nênŋàʔi dặt kầmzữ tôʔi xi tôʔi nóʔi ɣiườŋ tôʔi ʔanủʔi tôʔi nệm tôʔi hɔạnnạn tôʔi ɲẹ bấʔizờ cúʔa zùŋ ciêmbaw cɔ tôʔi hɔảŋ kiɲ lấʔi zị tượŋ xiến cɔ tôʔi sợhãʔi dỗʔi liɲhồn tôʔi cọn ŋột hơʔi và cết kòn sốŋ nơʔi sươŋkốt nầʔi tôʔi cán sốŋ tôʔi cẳŋ sốŋ hɔàʔi sincúʔa dể tôʔi mộtmìɲ kák ŋàʔi tôʔi cỉ hưxôŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣì cúʔa kawcọŋ ɲân saw cúʔa lưʔuý dến ŋườʔi viếŋtʰăm ŋườʔi mỗʔi buổʔi và tʰửtʰác ŋườʔi mỗʔi lúk mỗʔi xi ɲơn saw cúʔa xôŋ sâʔi xỏʔi tôʔi cẳŋ dể cɔ tôʔi bằŋ tịɲ cɔdến xi nướkmiếŋ tôʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ ɣìŋiữ lɔàʔiŋườʔi nếʔu tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi kó làmɣì ŋịc cúʔa ɲân saw cúʔa dặt tôʔi biə dỗʔi mìɲ cở tʰáɲ ɣáɲ nặŋ cɔ mìɲ kớsaw cúʔa xôŋ tʰa tộʔi cɔ tôʔi kất lấʔi zanák xỏʔi tôʔi di vì bâʔizờ tôʔi cɔŋ bụʔi dất cúʔa tôʔi sɔŋ tôʔi xôŋ kòn nữʔa biɲdát ŋườʔi su ʔa dáp lờʔi zằŋ Ôŋ nóʔi kák diềʔu ấʔi dến bawzờ và lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ ôŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣió bãʔɔ dến cừŋ nàʔɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰiên dɔán Ðấŋ tɔànnăŋ cáʔifép kôŋbìɲ saw nếʔu kɔnkáʔi ôŋ kó fạmtộʔi kùŋ ŋàʔi tʰìŋàʔi dã fó cúŋnó vàʔɔ kwiền tộʔiák kủʔa cúŋnó nếʔu ôŋ kẩntʰận Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kầʔuxẩn kùŋ Ðấŋ tɔànnăŋ nếʔu ôŋ tʰɛɲsạc ŋăitʰẳŋ kwảtʰật bâʔizờ ŋàʔi tỉɲ tʰứk ôŋ và cɔ ɲà kôŋbìɲ ôŋ dượk hưŋ tʰạɲ zầʔu ôŋ ɲỏmọn tʰì săwzốt cọŋdạʔi sin hãʔi hỏʔi zòŋzõʔi dờʔi sưʔa xá cămcỉ tʰeo tìmtòʔi kủʔa kák vì cúŋta mớʔi kó hômkwa cẳŋ ɣì bởʔi kák ŋàʔi cúŋta cên dất xáknàʔɔ káʔi bóŋ cớ tʰì cúŋ cẳŋ zạʔi ôŋ nóʔicwiện vớʔi ôŋ và zɔ nơʔi lòŋ mìɲ dɛm za ɲữŋ lờʔilẽ saw sậʔi mọk nơʔi cẳŋ bưŋ bàʔu lák mọk xôŋ kó nướk saw xi kòn sɛɲtươʔi cưʔa fảʔi fát tʰì dã xô cướk kák tʰứ kỏ xák Ðườŋ lốʔi kwên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưvậʔi sự côŋkậʔi xôŋ kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi ŋườʔi nươŋɲờ cuất Ðʔiềʔu ŋườʔi tinkậʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư váŋ ɲện ŋườʔi ấʔi nươŋtựʔa vàʔɔ ɲà mìɲ sɔŋ ɲà xôŋ vữŋcắk ŋườʔi níʔu lấʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ dứŋ cịʔu nổʔi cướk mặtcờʔi sɛɲtươʔi ɲàɲ cɛfủ zễ kwấn cên dốŋ dá nó mọk sỉʔa za ɣiữʔa dá sỏʔi nếʔu ɲổ xỏʔi cỗ tʰì cỗ ấʔi từcốʔi zằŋ ta cẳŋ tʰấʔi ŋươʔi kìʔa ấʔilà vujsướŋ dườŋlốʔi sẽ kó lɔàʔi xák dất nảʔi za kìʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ ŋườʔi cọnvẹn kũŋ xôŋ ɣiúpdỡ huŋák sɔŋcúʔa kòn cɔ miệŋ ôŋ dượk dầʔi vuikườʔi và môʔi ôŋ càn za tiếŋ zeo mừŋ ɲữŋ ɣét ôŋ hổtʰẹn bawfủ và ɲà cạʔi kủʔa ák cẳŋ kòn ɣióp dáp lờʔi lạʔi zằŋ kwảtʰật tôʔi ấʔilà ɲưvậʔi ɲưŋ tʰếnàʔɔ cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi dượk kôŋbìɲ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nếʔu cɛɲbiện vớʔi ŋàʔi tʰì cɔŋ ŋàn lɔàʔiŋườʔi xôŋ tʰế dáp lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó lòŋ cí zất mạɲ sứk ʔaj kứŋkỏʔi vớʔi ŋàʔi màlạʔi dượk măimắn ŋàʔi zờʔi kák núʔi di Ðáɲ dổ cɔŋ kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi ɲưŋ núʔi cẳŋ dến ŋàʔi xiến dất zúŋdộŋ xỏʔi và kák cụ dềʔu cwiểnlăj ŋàʔi biểʔu mặtcờʔi cẳŋ mọk ŋàʔi dóŋ cên kák ŋôʔisaw mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi cảʔi kák từŋ cờʔi za và bướkdi cên kák ŋọn sóŋ ŋàʔi zựŋ sawbắkdẩʔu saw kàʔi saw zwa kùŋ ɲữŋ lầʔu kák kủʔa fươŋ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ việk lớnlaw xôŋ saw zòsét dượk ɲữŋ zấʔu cẳŋ siết cɔ dượk kìʔa ŋàʔi dã di kwa ɣần tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ tʰấʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi saŋŋaŋ cướk tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cẳŋ ɲìn tʰấʔi ŋàʔi kìʔa ŋàʔi lấʔi mồʔi ʔaj ŋăncở ŋàʔi dượk ʔaj nóʔi vớʔi ŋàʔi zằŋ cúʔa làmci vậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ hồʔi kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi ɲữŋ ɣiúpdỡ zaháp dềʔu kúʔi mìɲ suốŋ zướʔi ŋàʔi fươŋci tôʔi dáp lạʔi vớʔi ŋàʔi và cọn lờʔi cɛɲbiện kùŋ ŋàʔi zầʔu xi tôʔi kôŋbìɲ tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ zám dốʔi lạʔi kùŋ ŋàʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi kầʔusin kủʔa Ðấŋ fánsét tôʔi mặkzầʔu tôʔi kêʔukầʔu ŋàʔi dáp lờʔi tôʔi tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ zằŋ ŋàʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi vìŋàʔi cà tôʔi cɔŋ kơn ɣió bãʔɔ và tʰêm ɲiềʔu tíc cɔ tôʔi vôkớ ŋàʔi xôŋ dể cɔ tôʔi hơʔi ɲưŋŋàʔi xiến tôʔi nɔ dầʔi kăjdắŋ nếʔu sứklựk kìʔa ŋàʔi kwiềnnăŋ nếʔu nóʔi dɔán tʰì ŋàʔi zằŋ ʔaj zám káʔɔ zầʔu zằŋ tôʔi kôŋbìɲ miệŋ mìɲ cɔ mìɲ twi tôʔi cọnvẹn tôʔi za zantà zẫʔu tôʔi vôtộʔi tôʔi xôŋ dến mìɲ tôʔi tôʔi xiɲbỉ mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi Ák tʰiện tʰảʔi dềʔu ɲư ɲăw bởʔi kớ ấʔi tôʔi kó nóʔi ŋàʔi tiêʔuziệt ŋườʔi cọnvẹn kũŋɲư ŋườʔi zanák nếʔu tajhọʔa ɣiết cết tʰìɲlìɲ tʰìŋàʔi cêkườʔi tʰửtʰác kủʔa ŋườʔi vôtộʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj zanák nó cɛ ɲữŋ kwan sét kủʔa dất nếʔu cẳŋ fảʔi vậʔitʰì ʔaj kák ŋàʔi kủʔa tôʔi măw cạm nó cốn xôŋ tʰấʔi diềʔu fướk hạɲ nó sớt kwa măw ɲư tʰwiềnnan ɲư cim ưŋ sôŋ vàʔɔ mồʔi nếʔu tôʔi nóʔi tôʔi kwên tʰanfiền tôʔi bỏ buồntʰảm tôʔi lấʔilàm vuimừŋ tʰì tôʔi sợhãʔi kák diềʔu dăwdớn tôʔi biết zằŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ kầm tôʔi vôtộʔi fảʔi tôʔi dịɲtộʔi nên kớsaw tôʔi cɔ mìɲ mệtɲọk luốŋ kôŋ nếʔu tôʔi cɔŋ nướk twiết zửʔa tăj tôʔi vớʔi nướk cɔ tʰìŋàʔi lạʔi ɲận tôʔi cɔŋ dỗʔi kwầnáʔɔ tôʔi ɣớmɣê tôʔi vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ fảʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲư tôʔi tôʔi zám dốʔivớʔi ŋàʔi cúŋta kùŋ di cịʔu fánsét cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fânsử ɣiữʔa cúŋta tăj mìɲ cên haj cúŋta Ướk ɣì cúʔa zút zɔj ŋàʔi xỏʔi tôʔi xiến kiɲ xiếp kủʔa ŋàʔi cớ zốʔilɔạn tôʔi nữʔa bấʔizờ tôʔi nóʔi cẳŋ ŋàʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cẳŋ dượk ɲưvậʔi liɲhồn tôʔi dã cánŋán sốŋ tôʔi tôʔi buôŋtʰả lờʔi tʰantʰở kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi nóʔi kơn kăjdắŋ kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi tôʔi tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ sin cớ dɔán fạt tôʔi hãʔi cɔ tôʔi ɲân saw cúʔa cɛɲluận vớʔi tôʔi cúʔa dẹplòŋ dè xiɲbỉ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋàʔi và ciếʔu sáŋ cên mưʔucướk kủʔa ák saw cúʔa kó sáktʰịt cúʔa tʰấʔi ɲư ŋườʔi fàm tʰấʔi saw kák ŋàʔi kủʔa cúʔa ɲư ŋàʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kák kủʔa cúʔa ɲư lɔàʔiŋườʔi saw sawcúʔa ca hạc zanák tôʔi tìmkiếm tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi zầʔucúʔa tôʔi cẳŋ fảʔi zanák và xôŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔitʰɔát xỏʔi tăj cúʔa tăicúʔa dã zựŋ tôʔi ɣiọt cót mìɲ tôʔi ɲưŋ năj cúʔa lạʔi hủʔiziệt tôʔi sincúʔa ɲớ zằŋ cúʔa dã hìɲ tôʔi ɲư dồ ɣốm màcúʔa lạʔi lạʔi xiến tôʔi cở vàʔɔ cɔ bụʔi saw cúʔa cẳŋ kó zót tôʔi cảʔi ɲư sữʔa làm tôʔi za dặk ɲư báɲ sữʔa cúʔa dã mặk cɔ tôʔi za tʰịt lấʔi sươŋ ɣân dươŋ céʔɔ tôʔi cúʔa dã cɔ tôʔi mạŋ sốŋ diềʔu ɲântừ sựcúʔa dɔáʔihɔàʔi tôʔi dã ɣìŋiữ tôʔi zầʔu vậʔi cúʔa ɣiấʔu kák diềʔu nầʔi nơʔi lòŋ cúʔa tôʔi biếtdiềʔu ấʔi cɔŋ tưtưởŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi nếʔu tôʔi fạmtộʔi cúʔa sɛmsét tôʔi cẳŋ zuŋtʰa zanák tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi huŋák tʰì xốn cɔ tôʔi tʰăj kòn nếʔu tôʔi kôŋbìɲ tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ zám ŋướk dầʔu vì dã dầʔizẫʔi sỉɲụk tʰấʔi xổ tôʔi víbằŋ tôʔi ŋướk dầʔu kwả cúʔa tôʔi ɲư za nơʔi tôʔi kwiền ziệʔukỳ kủʔa ŋàʔi cúʔa dặt cứŋ mớʔi dốʔiŋịc tôʔi và za tʰêm ɣiận kùŋ tôʔi Ðʔăw dớn tʰì xốnxó tʰeo tôʔi ɲơn saw cúʔa dɛm tôʔi za xỏʔi lòŋ tôʔi fảʔici dã tắtʰơʔi tʰì cẳŋ kɔn nàʔɔ tʰấʔi tôʔi bằŋ vậʔi tôʔi ɲư dã xôŋ kó vì mớʔi lọtlòŋ dɛm dến kák ŋàʔi tôʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ítỏʔi saw vậʔi cúʔa ôʔi xá ŋưŋ zứt di hãʔi zờʔi xỏʔi tôʔi di dể tôʔi dượk ʔanủʔi mộtcút cướk xi tôʔi di dến sứ tốʔităm bóŋ cết xôŋ cởlạʔi tứk dất tốʔidɛn ɲư mựk là kó bóŋ cết cỉ kó hỗndộn tạʔi dó và áɲsáŋ xôŋ xák tốʔităm sôfa ŋườʔi naama dáp lạʔi zằŋ há cẳŋ dáp lạʔi lờʔinóʔi ɲiềʔu saw ŋườʔizà miệŋ dượk sưŋ kôŋbìɲ cớ tʰì kák lờʔi xwejxwaŋ kủʔa ôŋ xiến ŋườʔita saw xi ôŋ ɲạʔɔbáŋ xôŋ kó ʔaj ôŋ vì ôŋ tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ Ðạʔɔ tôʔi tʰɛɲtịɲ tôʔi xôŋ ɲơ cướk cúʔa cớ ɣì dẹplòŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán và mởmiệŋ ŋàʔi dáp lờʔi ŋịc kùŋ ôŋ Ướk ci ŋàʔi cỉ cɔ ôŋ kủʔa xônŋwan vìŋàʔi tʰôŋiểʔu bộʔifần vậʔi xá zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fạt ôŋ lạʔi xôŋ sứŋ vớʔi tộʔi zanák kủʔa ôŋ nếʔu ôŋ zòsét kótʰể hiểʔubiết dượk mầʔuɲiệm kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và tʰấʔu zõ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ saw sự ấʔi kaw bằŋ kák từŋ cờʔi vậʔi ôŋ làmɣì sâʔu âmfủ ôŋ hiểʔubiết saw dặŋ bề zàʔi ấʔi lạʔi kỡ cáʔidất và zộŋlớn biểnkả nếʔuÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi di ŋaŋ kwa ŋườʔita kầmtù và dòʔi ứŋ hầʔu dɔán sét tʰì ʔaj ŋăncở ŋàʔi dượk vìŋàʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiả hìɲ sɛm tʰấʔi tộʔiák lɔàʔiŋườʔi xôŋ kảmbiết dến ɲưŋ cừŋ nàʔɔ lừʔa kɔn zừŋ sɛɲ za ŋườʔi tʰì cừŋ nấʔi ŋườʔi hưxôŋ mớʔi cởnên tʰôŋ sáŋ vậʔi nếʔu zọn lòŋ cɔ sứŋdáŋ và ɣiơ tăj mìɲ za hướŋ cúʔa bằŋ kó tộʔiák cɔŋ tăj ôŋ ôŋ sa xỏʔi mìɲ cẳŋ dể bấtkôŋ cɔŋ cạʔi mìɲ bấʔizờ ôŋ ŋướk xôŋ ɣì tʰật dượk vữŋvàŋ cẳŋ ci Ôŋ kwên kák diềʔu hɔạnnạn mìɲ và ɲớ dến ɲư nướk dã cảʔi kwa Ðờʔi ôŋ sáŋsủʔa cưʔa zẫʔu năj tốʔităm săw hóʔaza ɲư buổʔisáŋ Ôŋ bìɲanvôsự kó côŋkậʔi Ôŋ tìmtòʔi zôʔi ŋỉŋơʔi ʔiêɲàn lạʔi ôŋ xôŋ ʔaj cɔ mìɲ sợhãʔi và ŋườʔi kủʔa ôŋ ɲưŋ huŋák hawmòn nó cẳŋ kó nơʔi và diềʔu côŋmɔŋ ấʔilà tắtʰơʔi ɣióp dáp lạʔi zằŋ hẳn ci kák ŋươʔi tʰậtlà ŋườʔi sự xônŋwan dồŋ cết vớʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ sɔŋ kũŋ kó tʰôŋ sáŋ ɲư kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ dâʔu màlạʔi ʔaj ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲữŋ việk ɲưtʰế ta dã kầʔuxẩn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp lờʔi cɔ năj tʰàɲza còkườʔi kủʔa bầʔubạn ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi cọnvẹn dã cởnên cêkườʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ʔanɲiên xiɲbỉ tajhọʔa tajhọʔa tʰườŋ ɣiáŋ cên nàʔɔ cợt cơn vấpŋã cạʔi kủʔa kẻkướp dượk măimắn ɲữŋ cọkzận Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi bìɲanvôsự và dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj mìɲ ɲiềʔu tàʔisản zưzật ɲưŋ xá hỏʔi lɔàʔi tʰú cúŋnó zạʔizỗ ŋươʔi hỏʔi kák cim cờʔi tʰì cúŋnó bảʔɔ cɔ ŋươʔi hɔặk nữʔa hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi dất ɣiảŋzạʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kòn ɲữŋ ká tʰuật zõ cɔ ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi nàʔi lɔàʔi nàʔɔ cẳŋ zằŋ tăj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã za ɲữŋ ấʔi cɔŋ tăj ŋàʔi kầm kủʔa mọʔi sốŋ và hơʔi tʰở kủʔa kả lɔàʔiŋườʔi lỗ taj cẳŋ sét lờʔinóʔi ɲư ổɣà ɲữŋ tʰựkvật saw ŋườʔizà kả kó xônŋwan kẻ hưởŋ cườŋtʰọ dượk diềʔu tʰôŋ sáŋ nơʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó xônŋwan kwiềnnăŋ mưʔu tʰôŋmiɲ diềʔu tʰuộk ŋàʔi kìʔa ŋàʔi fáhủʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi xôŋ kất lạʔi dượk ŋàʔi zamkầm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ ʔaj za cɔ nầʔi ŋàʔi ŋăn nướk lạʔi nướk xô kạn Ðʔɔạn ŋàʔi za dồʔi dất tạʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi kó kwiềnnăŋ xônŋwan kẻ lầmlạk cɔ lầmlạk dềʔu tʰuộk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi zẫn ɲữŋ bàʔi mưʔu xiến kák kwan sét za diênzạʔi ŋàʔi cóʔi cɔ kák vwa và tʰắt siềŋsíc nơʔi cơn ŋàʔi zẫn ɲữŋ tʰầʔi Ðáɲ dổ kák kườŋkwiền ŋàʔi kất lờʔi xỏʔi nóʔi tʰàɲ làm cɔ ɣiàkả cíxôn ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ diềʔu sỉɲụk cên saŋcọŋ tʰáʔɔ zâʔilưŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi mạɲbạʔɔ ŋàʔi bàʔitỏ ɲữŋ mầʔuɲiệm cɔŋ tămtốʔi và xiến bóŋ cết hóʔaza sáŋsủʔa ŋàʔi xiến kák zântộk hưŋ tʰạɲ zồʔi lạʔi fá ziệt di mởzộŋ ɣiớʔihạn cɔ kák nướk dɔạn tʰâʔu lạʔi ŋàʔi kất tʰôŋ sáŋ xỏʔi ɲữŋ cưởŋ kủʔa kák zântộk tʰếzan xiến cúŋ di zôŋzàʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ xôŋ dườŋlốʔi cúŋ zờ di cɔŋ tốʔităm xôŋ kó sáŋ vàŋàʔi cɔ di ŋảŋiêŋ ɲư săj nầʔi dã tʰấʔi kák diềʔu dó taj kó ŋɛ hiểʔu dến Ðʔiềʔu ɣì kák ŋươʔi kũŋ vớʔi ta cẳŋ kák ŋườʔi dâʔu sɔŋ tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ Ướkaw kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn kák ŋươʔi dúk zèn lờʔi zốʔicá tʰảʔi dềʔu tʰầʔitʰuốk xôŋ zaɣì cớci kák ŋươʔi nínlặŋ xônŋwan kủʔa kák ŋươʔi vậʔi hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa xá cămcỉ dốʔinạʔi kủʔa miệŋ kó fảʔi kák ŋươʔi zám nóʔi lờʔi bấtkôŋ vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ kák ŋươʔi nóʔi diềʔu zốʔicá ŋàʔi saw kák ŋươʔi tâʔivị Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và kãʔi cɔ ŋàʔi saw nếʔuŋàʔi zòsét lòŋ kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi vừʔaý diềʔu dó saw kák ŋươʔi fỉɲ ɣạt ŋàʔi ɲư fỉɲ ɣạt lɔàʔiŋườʔi saw kwảtʰật ŋàʔi các fạt kák ŋươʔi nếʔu kák ŋươʔi tâʔivị ŋườʔi cớ tʰì waiŋi ŋàʔi cẳŋ xiến kák ŋươʔi bốʔizốʔi saw sự hɔảŋ kiɲ ŋàʔi cẳŋ ɣiáŋ cên kák ŋươʔi câmŋôn kủʔa kák ŋươʔi cỉ ɲư câmŋôn lɔàʔi cɔ bụʔi ɲữŋ tʰàɲlũʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi tʰậtlà tʰàɲlũʔi dất vậʔi hãʔi di xá lìʔa xỏʔi dể mặkzầʔu sảʔi dến cɔ diềʔu ɣì kớsaw lấʔi zăŋ kắn tʰịt mìɲ và liềʔu sɛɲ mạŋ mìɲ zẫʔucúʔa ɣiết kũŋ kòn ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi ɲưŋ biɲ vựk táɲ hạɲ cướk ŋàʔi cáɲ diềʔu dó kứʔuzỗʔi vì vôdạʔɔ cẳŋ dượk dến cướk cúʔa hãʔi ŋɛ kỹkàŋ kák lờʔi lờʔi cần káʔɔ xá vàʔɔ taj kák ŋươʔi kìʔa dã bàʔitỏ việk káʔɔ tụŋ ta dượk sưŋ kôŋbìɲ kó ʔaj cɛɲluận vớʔi căŋ víbằŋ nínlặŋ kwả tắtʰơʔi kó haj diềʔu kầʔusin cúʔa cớ cɔ tôʔi tʰì tôʔi xôŋ mìɲ tôʔi xỏʔi cúʔa sincúʔa zút tăj cúʔa xỏʔi mìɲ tôʔi và hɔảŋ kiɲ kủʔa cúʔa cớ bốʔizốʔi tôʔi nữʔa Ðʔɔạn hãʔi ɣọʔi tôʔi tôʔi tʰưʔa lạʔi hɔặk tôʔi nóʔi tʰì cúʔa cảlờʔi cɔ tôʔi số zanák tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi bawɲiêʔu kầʔusin cúʔa cɔ tôʔi fạmluật tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi ɲân saw cúʔa ɣiấʔu cúʔa và kầmbằŋ tôʔi kừʔudịc cúʔa cúʔa xiến kiɲhãʔi ciếk ɣió dưʔa di và duổʔi tʰeo kộŋ zạ xô saw vìcúʔa cɔ tôʔi diềʔu kăjdắŋ và xiến cɔ tôʔi ɣáɲ kák tộʔi ákfạm lúk tʰɛɲniên cơn tôʔi cɔŋ siềŋ tỏʔa sét kák dườŋlốʔi tôʔi và ɣi zɛɲ hạŋ cuŋkwɛɲ bướk cơn tôʔi kòn tôʔi za ɲư mụk ɲư káʔi áʔɔ sâʔu kắn vậʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi bởʔi ŋườʔi sɛɲ za sốŋ ŋàʔi bị dầʔizẫʔi xốnxổ ŋườʔi sɛɲ za ɲư kỏ hwa zồʔi fát ŋườʔi cạʔi kwa ɲư bóŋ xôŋ lâʔuzàʔi zầʔu vậʔi cúʔa kòn dểmắt cên ŋườʔi ấʔi và xiến tôʔi dến cịʔu cúʔa sétdɔán saw ʔaj kótʰể ôʔuế lấʔi za dượk diềʔu tʰɛɲsạc cẳŋ ʔaj nếʔu ŋàʔi kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi dã dịɲ zồʔi nếʔu tʰáŋ ŋườʔiở nơʔi cúʔa vàcúʔa dã dịɲ ɣiớʔihạn cɔ ŋườʔi xôŋ kwa xỏʔi dượk tʰì sin cúʔa hãʔi sâʔi ŋàʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi dể ŋườʔi dặŋ ʔiênŋỉ cɔdến xi ŋàʔi mìɲ ɲư vậʔi vì kâʔicốʔi zẫʔu dốn kòn côŋkậʔi sẽ kòn mọk nữʔa xôŋ tʰôʔi nứk cồʔi zẫʔu zễ ɣià zướʔi dất tʰân cết cɔŋ bụʔi kát vừʔa kó hơʔinướk mọk cồʔi và dâm ɲàɲ ɲư kâʔi ɲưŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cết tʰì tạʔi dó lɔàʔiŋườʔi tắtʰơʔi tʰì dã di dâʔu nướk cảʔi di sôŋ kạn xô kũŋ vậʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi zồʔi xôŋ cổʔi zậʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰứkzậʔi cɔdến xixôŋ kòn kák từŋ cờʔi và cẳŋ ʔaj xiến cɔ ŋườʔi tỉɲ lạʔi xỏʔi ɣiấkŋủ mìɲ Ôʔi cớ ɣì cúʔa ɣiấʔu tôʔi nơʔi âmfủ cɛxuất tôʔi cɔdến xi kơn ɣiận cúʔa dã ŋuôʔi Ðịɲ cɔ tôʔi dɔạn ɲớ lạʔi tôʔi nếʔu lɔàʔiŋườʔi cết kó dượk sốŋ lạʔi căŋ cọn ŋàʔi ɣiặkzã tôʔi tôʔi dợʔicờ cɔdến cừŋ tôʔi dượk buôŋtʰả cúʔa ɣọʔi tôʔi tʰưʔa lạʔi cúʔa dɔáʔi dến kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj cúʔa ɲưŋ bâʔizờ cúʔa dếm kák bướk tôʔi cúʔa cẳŋ sɛmsét kák tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi saw kák tộʔifạm tôʔi niêmfɔŋ cɔŋ káʔi túʔi vàcúʔa kó tʰắt kák zanák tôʔi lạʔi sɔŋ núʔi tʰàɲza bụʔi và dá ɲắk zờʔi xỏʔi cổ nướk dá lụt côʔi bụʔi dất kũŋ mộttʰể ấʔi cúʔa hủʔi hivọŋ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi cúʔa dáɲ tʰắŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi dɔạn di kwa cúʔa dổʔi sắk duổʔi di kák kɔncaj ŋườʔi dượk tôncọŋ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dến cúŋ suốŋ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ dểý vàʔɔ tʰịt ŋườʔi cỉ dăwdớn mộtmìɲ ŋườʔi và liɲhồn ŋườʔi cỉ buồnzầʔu cíɲ mìɲ ŋườʔi tʰôʔi lifa ŋườʔi tʰêman dáp zằŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan dáp bằŋ lờʔi citʰứk hưxôŋ và fìɲ bụŋ mìɲ bằŋ ɣió dôŋ saw ŋườʔi kó lấʔi lờʔi vôíc cữʔa mìɲ zùŋ kâʔu ɣiảŋ vôzụŋ biɲ vựk saw tʰật ôŋ hủʔi diềʔu kíɲ Ðứk cứʔa cờʔi ŋăncở swiɣẫm cướk ŋàʔi vì zanák ôŋ zạʔizỗ cɔ miệŋ mìɲ nóʔi và ôŋ cọn lưỡʔi kủʔa kwỉkwiệt miệŋ ôŋ dịɲtộʔi cɔ ôŋ cớ cẳŋ fảʔi tôʔi và môʔi ôŋ làmcứŋ zốʔi ŋịc kùŋ ôŋ kó fảʔi ôŋ sɛɲ za dầʔu cướcết căŋ há dã dượk zựŋ cướk nɔn núʔi saw cớ tʰì ôŋ kó ŋɛ diềʔu bàndịɲ cɔŋ ɲiệm kủʔa Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi saw há cỉ mộtmìɲ ôŋ dượk xônŋwan Ôŋ ci cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ Ôŋ tʰôŋiểʔu ɣì cúŋtôʔi lạʔi xôŋ tʰôŋiểʔu ɣiữʔa vòŋ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ kó ŋườʔi tók bạk ɣiàkả Ðượk tuổʔi kaw ták ca kủʔa ôŋ sự ʔanủʔi kủʔa Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi lờʔi êmzịʔu nóʔi cɔ ôŋ ŋɛ há diềʔu ɲỏmọn cɔ ôŋ saw ɲân saw lòŋ ôŋ bứk tứk và ôŋ ŋó cớp lác kớ ɣì tâmtʰần ôŋ fảndốʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến ɲữŋ lờʔi zườŋ ấʔi za xỏʔi miệŋ ôŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ci màlạʔi tʰɛɲsạc kẻ zɔ ŋườʔi sɛɲ za ɣì màlạʔi kôŋbìɲ kìʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ tinkậʔi kák tʰáɲ dồ ŋàʔi dỗʔi kák từŋ cờʔi kũŋ cẳŋ cɔŋsạc cướk ŋàʔi tʰăj fươŋci ŋườʔi ɣớmɣiếk kẻ hăj ʔuốŋ zanák ɲư nướk tôʔi zạʔi ôŋ ôŋ hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi tôʔi tʰuật cɔ ôŋ diềʔu tôʔi dã tʰấʔi là diềʔu xônŋwan za tʰeo tổfụ mìɲ xôŋ ɣiấʔuzếm sứ dã dượk cɔ cúŋ tʰôʔi xôŋ kó ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ nàʔɔ dượk vàʔɔ ɣiữʔa cọn dờʔi ŋườʔi huŋák dăwdớn kựk lòŋ sốít dểzàɲ cɔ tiếŋ hɔảŋ kiɲ vaŋ nơʔi taj ŋườʔi Ðươŋ cừŋ lợʔi dặt fáhɔạʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi tưởŋ xôŋ za xỏʔi tămtốʔi dượk và kó ɣươm zìɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi di ŋườʔi di cỗ nầʔi kwa nơʔi dể báɲ zằŋ báɲ dâʔu ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋàʔi tămtốʔi dã mìɲ sự zannan buồntʰảm cɔ ŋườʔi kiɲhãʔi sôŋ vàʔɔ ŋườʔi ɲư vwa sẵnsàŋ ciɲciến vì ŋườʔi kó ɣiơ tăj cốŋkự Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và kưsử kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ vớʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ ŋườʔi zướʔi ɣu xiên ŋướk tʰẳŋ kổ sôŋ dến cúʔa vì ŋườʔi lấʔi fì béʔɔ cɛ mìɲ làm cɔ haj hôŋ mìɲ za ŋườʔi dã ɲữŋ tʰàɲ fáhɔạʔi ɲữŋ ɲà bỏhwaŋ ɣần cởnên dổ dốŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cởnên ɣiàʔu kủʔakảʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ lâʔu và sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi cẳŋ za cên dất ŋườʔi cẳŋ dượk za xỏʔi tốʔităm ŋọn lửʔa xôhéʔɔ cồʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi và ŋườʔi hơʔi tʰở miệŋ cúʔa dɛm di ŋươʔi cớ kậʔi hưxôŋ lừʔazốʔi vì hưxôŋ fầntʰưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi sự nầʔi cọnvẹn cướk ɲựt ŋườʔi cưʔa sảʔi dến kòn kák ɲàɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ sɛɲtươʔi ŋườʔi kwâʔi cáʔi kâʔisɛɲ mìɲ ɲư kâʔi ɲɔ ŋườʔilàm zụŋ hwa mìɲ ɲư kâʔi vɛ vì zòŋzõʔi vôdạʔɔ xôŋ sɛɲ lửʔa tiêʔuziệt ɲà cạʔi ăɲốʔilộ họ tʰọtʰaj ák sɛɲ zadiềʔu hạʔi lòŋ ɲữŋ cướk zan ɣióp dáp zằŋ ta tʰườŋ ŋɛ ɲiềʔu lờʔi ɣiảŋ ɲưvậʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi dềʔu ʔanủʔi bựkbộʔi kák lờʔi hưxôŋ nầʔi cẳŋ saw Ðʔiềʔu tʰúkzụk ŋươʔi dáp lờʔi ɣì ta kũŋ zễ nóʔi dượk ɲư kák ŋươʔi nóʔi nếʔu liɲhồn kák ŋươʔi tʰế cɔ liɲhồn tất kũŋ tʰêm lờʔi các kák ŋuơʔi và lắkdầʔu kák ŋươʔi ɲưŋ lấʔi miệŋ ɣiụk lòŋ kák ŋươʔi mạɲmẽ lờʔi ʔanủʔi kủʔa môʔi ɣiảm nơʔi dăwdớn kák ŋươʔi zẫʔu nóʔi dăwdớn xôŋ dượk twi nínlặŋ lìʔa xỏʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ bâʔizờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến mệtmỏʔi cúʔa dã tàɲạʔi ɲà kủʔa tôʔi cúʔa dã tôʔi dầʔi ɲănɲíʔu ấʔi làmcứŋ dốʔiŋịc kùŋ tôʔi sự ốmiếʔu tôʔi zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi káʔɔ tôʔi tạʔi ŋăj tôʔi cɔŋ kơn tʰạɲ ŋườʔi sé tôʔi tôʔi ŋườʔi ŋiến zăŋ ŋịc tôʔi kẻ kừʔudịc tôʔi cừŋ ŋó tôʔi cúŋ miệŋ ŋịc tôʔi vả tôʔi kác xiɲtʰị cúŋ ɲăw dáɲ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fó tôʔi cɔ vôdạʔɔ caw tôʔi vàʔɔ tăj zanák tôʔi sưʔa bìɲ tịɲ ŋàʔi tàɲạʔi tôʔi ŋàʔi kó kổ tôʔi tôʔi kũŋ dặt tôʔi biə cɔ ŋàʔi kák mũʔitên ŋàʔi vâʔi fủ tôʔi ŋàʔi lưŋ hôŋ tôʔi xôŋ tʰươŋtiếk tôʔi suốŋ dất ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi tʰươŋtíc nàʔi cên tʰươŋtíc kiə sôŋ vàʔɔ tôʔi ɲư mạɲbạʔɔ tôʔi dã măj káʔi baw cên za tôʔi tôʔi tôʔi suốŋ bụʔi dất mặt tôʔi sưŋ dỏ kớ xók bóŋ cết nơʔi tôʔi mặkzầʔu tạʔi cɔŋ tăj tôʔi xôŋ kó huŋzữ và lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi tiɲ sạc Ôʔi dất cớ hwiết Ướk ɣì tiếŋ tʰan kêʔu tôʔi xôŋ kó cỗ ŋưŋ lạʔi cáɲ ɣiờ nàʔi Ðấŋ cứŋ tôʔi cên cờʔi vàÐấŋ bảʔɔlãɲ cɔ tôʔi tạʔi nơʔi kaw kák bạɲữʔu tôʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ tôʔi tôʔi kòn hướŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xók Ðểŋàʔi fânsử ɣiữʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiữʔa kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dồŋlɔạʔi vì kòn fảʔi dến zồʔi tôʔi di kɔn dườŋ tôʔi cẳŋ cởlạʔi hơʔi tʰở tôʔi băj di kák ŋàʔi tôʔi hầʔuhết mồmả zàɲ cɔ tôʔi kẻ kườʔi ɲạʔɔ vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ tôʔi mắt tôʔi hằŋ nɔm sỉɲụk kủʔa cúŋnó sincúʔa cɔ tôʔi bằŋkớ hãʔi bảʔɔlãɲ tôʔi cúʔa vì ŋɔàʔi cúʔa ʔaj bảʔɔlãɲ cɔ tôʔi vìcúʔa xiến lòŋ cúŋ xôŋ tʰôŋ sáŋ nêncúʔa xôŋ kất cúŋ kaw ŋườʔi nàʔɔ bằŋữʔu mìɲ cɔ kướp mắt kủʔa kɔnkáʔi hawmòn ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó tôʔi cởnên tụkŋữ kủʔa zânsự cúŋ xạk ɲổ nơʔi tôʔi mắt tôʔi buồnzầʔu tứci tôʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu ɲư káʔi bóŋ kák ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ dềʔu lấʔilàm kòn ŋườʔi vôtộʔi nổʔizận kùŋ ák sɔŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ bềnvữŋ cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ và ŋườʔi kó tăj tiɲ sạcsẽ kàŋŋàʔicàŋ dượk mạɲzạn ɲưŋ hỡʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi xá lạʔinữʔa sɔŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kó ʔaj xônŋwan kák ŋàʔi tôʔi dã kwa kák mưʔu tôʔi tứk kák tʰiết kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi dã ziệt cúŋ lấʔi dêm cở ŋàʔi cướk tốʔităm cúŋ nóʔi zằŋ áɲsáŋ hầʔu ɣần nếʔu tôʔi côŋkậʔi âmfủ ɲà tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi dặt ɣiườŋ tôʔi tạʔi nơʔi tốʔităm ví tôʔi dã nóʔi vớʔi káʔi hwiệt zằŋ ŋươʔi ca vớʔi sâʔubọ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cịta vậʔitʰì côŋkậʔi tôʔi dâʔu sự côŋkậʔi tôʔi ʔaj tʰấʔi dượk xi tôʔi dượk ʔanŋỉ cɔŋ bụʔi dất tʰì côŋkậʔi di suốŋ kửʔa âmfủ biɲdát ŋườʔi su ʔa dáp zằŋ Ôŋ ɣàʔi bẫʔi bằŋ kák lờʔi mìɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ hãʔi swiŋĩ zồʔi cúŋtôʔi nóʔi ɲân saw cúŋtôʔi kɔj ɲư tʰúvật và ŋuzạʔi cướk ôŋ Ôŋ nổʔizận sẻ zạc mìɲ há ôŋ cáʔidất bỏhwaŋ và dá fảʔi zờʔi di xỏʔi cỗ saw tʰật áɲsáŋ ák di ŋọn lửʔa kủʔa xôŋ cóʔi nữʔa Áɲsáŋ tốʔi cɔŋ cạʔi ŋọn dèn kák bướk mạɲbạʔɔ kuồŋ di cáɲ kák mưʔucướk ŋườʔi dáɲdổ ŋườʔi vì cơn mìɲ vàʔɔ káʔi bẩʔi và di cên mảɲ lướʔi káʔi bẩʔi tʰắtlưŋ nơʔi ɣót cân và zò lướʔi kó sợʔi zâʔi xuất zướʔi dất và káʔi bẫʔi tạʔi cên dườŋ dể lấʔi từ fíʔa kiɲxủŋ cɔ bốʔizốʔi sôdẩʔi ŋườʔi dâʔidó buộk bướk ŋườʔi sứklựk dóʔixát za ʔiếʔu và tajhọʔa cựk bênkạɲ ŋườʔi kák ci tʰể tiêʔu tất kɔn dầʔulòŋ kủʔa cết tiêʔu hắn zút za xỏʔi ɲà cạʔi mìɲ nơʔi nươŋkậʔi Ðʔɔạn zẫn dến vwa kủʔa kiɲ xiếp kẻ cẳŋ tʰuộk cɔŋ cạʔi kòn ziêm sɛɲ zảʔi za cên cỗ kủʔa zướʔi tʰì zễ xôhéʔɔ cên lạʔi cặt ɲàɲ kỷniệm ziệt xỏʔi tʰếzan zɛɲ xôŋlưʔu lạʔi cên mặtdất hắn sô duổʔi xỏʔi áɲsáŋ vàʔɔ tốʔităm và ŋườʔita xucụk xỏʔi tʰếzan hắn cẳŋ kó kɔncáʔu ɣiữʔa zânsự mìɲ kũŋ xôŋ kó ʔaj kòn sốŋ tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi mìɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hậʔu sɛɲ lấʔilàm sữŋsờ ŋàʔi kủʔa ʔiɲư tiềnbốʔi dã lấʔilàm kiɲ xiếp kwảtʰật dó nơʔi kủʔa bấtkôŋ và ấʔilà cốn kủʔa ŋườʔi xôŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣióp dáp lờʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi lòŋ dến cừŋ nàʔɔ và lấʔi lờʔi ɣiảŋ xiến kựkɲọk dến bawzờ kìʔa dã mườʔi kák ŋươʔi kwởcác bạkdãʔi xôŋ mắkkỡ zầʔuta kó tʰật lầmlỗʔi tʰếnàʔɔ sự lỗʔi nơʔi nếʔu tʰật kák ŋươʔi tựkaw dốʔi kùŋ lấʔi sỉɲụk cácmók vậʔi hãʔi zằŋ ấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dáɲdổ và zaŋ lướʔi ŋàʔi cuŋkwɛɲ nầʔi tôʔi kêʔula huŋbạʔɔ sɔŋ tôʔi cẳŋ dặŋ ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu tiếpkứʔu xôŋ kó kôŋbìɲ cúʔa kó cận dườŋ tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ di kwa dượk ŋàʔi kó dể tămtốʔi cên dườŋlốʔi tôʔi ŋàʔi kó bóklột viɲkwaŋ tôʔi và kất mãʔɔ ciềʔu xỏʔi dầʔu tôʔi ŋàʔi kó dồʔitệ tôʔi tứfíʔa tôʔi di ŋàʔi zứt ɲổ côŋkậʔi tôʔi ɲư kâʔicốʔi ŋàʔi kũŋ nổʔi tʰạɲ kùŋ tôʔi kầm tôʔi kừʔudịc ŋàʔi kák dạʔɔ biɲ ŋàʔi dã kùŋ ɲăw kéʔɔ tớʔi dườŋ dể dến dáɲ tôʔi và dóŋ cuŋkwɛɲ cạʔi tôʔi ŋàʔi xiến kák ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi lìʔa sa tôʔi và ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kwɛnbiết tôʔi cởnên kák tʰântʰíc dềʔu lìʔabỏ tôʔi kák hữʔu tôʔi dã kwên tôʔi ɲữŋ cɔŋ ɲà tôʔi kák ɣáʔi tôʔi dãʔi tôʔi ɲư xác cướk cúŋ tôʔi dã cởtʰàɲ ŋườʔiŋɔàʔi tôʔi ɣọʔi tôʔitớ tôʔi xôŋ tʰưʔa zẫʔu tôʔi lấʔi miệŋ mìɲ nàʔisin kũŋ vậʔi hơʔi tʰở tôʔi ɣớmɣiếk cɔ tôʔi và kɔncaj kủʔa tôʔi ɣét lờʔi kầʔuxẩn tôʔi dỗʔi ɲữŋ dứʔa cẻ kũŋ xi tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi cổʔi zậʔi cúŋnó ɲạʔɔbáŋ tôʔi kák tʰântʰiết dềʔu ɣớm ɣét tôʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tôʔi tʰươŋmến dã cở ŋịc tôʔi sươŋkốt tôʔi vàʔɔ za tʰịt tôʔi tôʔi dã tʰɔát dượk cỉ kòn za bọk zăŋ tôʔi tʰôʔi hỡʔi kák bằŋữʔu tôʔi hãʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi hãʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi vì tăj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dáɲ tôʔi kớsaw kák tôʔi ɲư Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và cưʔa nɔnê tʰịt tôʔi saw Ôʔi cớci kák lờʔi tôʔi dã biêncép Ướk ɣì dượk ɣi cɔŋ kwiển sác cớ ɣì lấʔi kâʔi bằŋ cì mà xắk cên dá lưʔu dến dờʔidờʔi kòn tôʔi tôʔi zằŋ Ðấŋ kứʔucuộk tôʔi sốŋ lúk kuốʔicùŋ ŋàʔi dứŋ cên dất săw xi za tôʔi tứk sáktʰịt nầʔi dã bấʔizờ lɔàʔi sáktʰịt tôʔi sɛm tʰấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cáɲ tôʔi tʰấʔi ŋàʔi mắt tôʔi ɲìn sɛm ŋàʔi cớ cẳŋ fảʔi xák lòŋ tôʔi hawmòn cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi nếʔu kák nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta xuấʔi zầʔi ŋườʔi làmsaw và zằŋ kănŋwiên tajhọʔa tạʔi cɔŋ tôʔi xá mũʔi ɣươm vì ɣươm xíɣiớʔi huŋtàn fạt tôʔi zanák kák zằŋ kó fánsét sôfa ŋườʔi naama dáp zằŋ vì kớ ấʔi tưtưởŋ tôʔi cỉ zạʔi cɔ tôʔi lờʔi dáp và tạʔi lờʔi dó tâmtʰần tôʔi kảmdộŋ cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi tôʔi dã ŋɛ lờʔi cácmók hổtʰẹn tôʔi cíxôn tôʔi lấʔi tʰôŋmiɲ dáp lờʔi hãʔi zõ zằŋ dờʔi sưʔa từ xi lɔàʔiŋườʔi dượk dặt nơʔi tʰếzan tʰì tʰắŋ kủʔa ák xôŋ kó lâʔu và vuimừŋ kủʔa vôdạʔɔ cỉ lúk tʰôʔi zầʔu kiêʔukăŋ kất dến cờʔi zầʔu cɔ dầʔu dụŋ cí mâʔi tʰì tiêʔuziệt dờʔidờʔi ɲư fânbón ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã tʰấʔi hỏʔi zằŋ nó dâʔu nó băj di ɲư kơn ciêmbaw xôŋ ʔaj ɣặp lạʔi tʰật ɲư zị tượŋ bandêm kɔn dã tʰườŋ sɛm xôŋ tʰấʔi lạʔi nơʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kòn nữʔa kɔnkáʔi kầʔu ŋèʔɔ và tăj tʰườŋ lạʔi tàʔisản huŋbạʔɔ dã kướp ɣiựt tứci dầʔi sứklựk kủʔa buổʔi daŋ tʰì ɲưŋ cuŋ vớʔi cɔŋ bụʔi dất zẫʔu ák lấʔilàm ŋọtŋàʔɔ cɔ miệŋ zẫʔu zướʔi lưỡʔi zẫʔu cíʔu ák xôŋ ɲưŋ ɣiữ lạʔi cɔŋ miệŋ mìɲ tʰì tʰựk nơʔi kancàŋ và tʰàɲza zắn cɔŋ bụŋ nó kó kủʔakảʔi zồʔi lạʔi mửʔa za Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi tốŋ kủʔa ấʔi za xỏʔi bụŋ nó nọk zắn lưỡʔi kủʔa zắnlụk ɣiết nó cẳŋ tʰấʔi sôŋ zòŋcảʔi kùŋ sữʔa za nó fảʔi cả hwalợʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ xôŋ dượk fảʔi tʰườŋ lãʔi tùʔi tʰeo ɣiá xôŋ dượk hưởŋ kủʔa ấʔi vì kó ŋèʔɔ kướp lấʔi ɲàkửʔa xôŋ kó sâʔicất bởʔivì xôŋ ʔan tịɲ cɔŋ mìɲ nó cẳŋ dượk bảʔɔtʰủ ɣì kák diềʔu mìɲ ưʔatʰíc cẳŋ ci tʰɔát xỏʔi kủʔa cɔnên măimắn cẳŋ lâʔu Ðươŋ xi zưzật kùŋtúŋ kák ŋườʔi xốnxổ ca tăj vàʔɔ mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi saj tʰạɲ ŋàʔi hãmmìɲ Ðặŋ cɔ lòŋ dầʔizẫʔi ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cên mìɲ cáɲ cɔŋ lúk bữʔa nó cốn láɲ xỏʔi xíɣiớʔi kòn kâʔi kuŋ dồŋ sɔj lũŋ nó ɲổ za xỏʔi tʰân mũʔi ɣươm bóŋ ŋờʔi zút za xỏʔi ɣan kák kiɲ xiếp kả tốʔităm dã zàɲ bửʔu cɔ lửʔa ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰổʔi tʰiêʔudốt và kòn lạʔi cɔŋ cạʔi tiêʔuziệt di kák từŋ cờʔi bàʔitỏ zanák za và dất zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ hwalợʔi kủʔa ɲà dɛm di tàʔisản côʔi di cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰạɲ kủʔa cúʔa fần Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zàɲ cɔ huŋák và ấʔilà kơŋiệp ŋàʔi dịɲ cɔ ɣióp dáp zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ kỹkàŋ lờʔi ɣiảŋ tôʔi tʰì diềʔu dó tʰế cɔ ʔanủʔi kủʔa kák hãʔi ɲịnɲụk tôʔi dể tôʔi nóʔi săw xi tôʔi dã nóʔi kák hãʔi kứ ɲạʔɔbáŋ di kòn fần tôʔi tʰanvan tôʔi hướŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi saw ɲơn saw cí tôʔi xôŋ ɲịnɲụk hãʔi sɛmsét tôʔi lấʔilàm xá lấʔi tăj miệŋ mìɲ xi nàʔɔ tôʔi ɲớ lạʔi tôʔi kiɲhɔảŋ zởn ók kả tʰịt tôʔi kớsaw zanák sốŋ cởnên ɣiàkả kwiềntʰế kườŋ tʰạɲ zòŋzõʔi cúŋnó tʰàɲlập kó cúŋnó tʰấʔi và kɔncáʔu cướk ɲà kủʔa cúŋnó dượk bìɲiên xôŋ ɣì zɔj kủʔa Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi cẳŋ dáɲ mìɲ cúŋnó bò dựk cúŋnó sɛɲ sảɲ xôŋ tʰiếʔu bò káʔi sɛɲ dẻ xôŋ kó sảʔɔ cúŋnó cɔ kák dứʔa cẻ mìɲ di za ɲư bầʔi ciên và kɔnkáʔi ɣiỡn cơʔi ɲăw hát múʔa tʰeo tiếŋ cốŋ ɲỏ dờn kầm và vuimừŋ tʰeo tiếŋ sáʔɔ cúŋnó măimắn cảʔi kwa kák ŋàʔi dờʔi mìɲ zồʔi bỗŋcốk suốŋ âmfủ cúŋnó nóʔi vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi lìʔa sa cúŋtôʔi vì cúŋtôʔi xôŋ dạʔɔ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ ci cúŋtôʔi fảʔi fụk ŋàʔi nếʔu cúŋtôʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi tʰì dượk íc ɣì kìʔa măimắn cúŋnó cẳŋ nơʔi tăj cúŋnó kák mưʔucướk ák kác sa tôʔi káʔi dèn ák tajhọʔa ɣiáŋ cên cúŋnó và cɔŋ kơn tʰạɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fânfát dăwdớn cɔ cúŋnó Ðʔiềʔu dó kó tʰườŋ sảʔi dến saw há năŋ sảʔiza cúŋnó fảʔi ɲư zơm cướk ɣió ɲư cấʔu bãʔɔ kất di saw kák nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zàɲ hìɲfạt huŋák cɔ kɔnkáʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xá báʔɔ cɔ cíɲ mìɲ dể xá cíɲ kɔn sɛm tʰấʔi diềʔu hɔạʔi mìɲ và ʔuốŋ dượk tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ vì xi ŋàʔi dịɲ cɔ dã zồʔi nó nàʔɔ ci dến zakwiến săw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sétdɔán ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kaw vậʔi ŋườʔita zạʔi citʰứk cɔ ŋàʔi saw kẻ nầʔi tʰák ɣiữʔɛcừŋ mạɲmẽ Ðượk tʰɛɲɲàn bìɲan mọʔi haj bìɲ ŋườʔi dầʔi sữʔa và tủʔi sươŋ ŋườʔi ɲuần dượm kẻ xák lạʔi cết ɣiữʔɛcừŋ kăjdắŋ liɲhồn cẳŋ dượk diềʔu fướk hạɲ ɣì kả haj dềʔu cuŋ cɔŋ bụʔi dất ɣiòʔi sâʔu cɛlấp nầʔi tôʔi ýtưởŋ kák twan zùŋ dặŋ tàɲạʔi tôʔi vì kák nóʔi zằŋ ɲà kườŋbạʔɔ dâʔu cạʔi ák nơʔi nàʔɔ cớ tʰì kák cẳŋ hỏʔi xáckwadườŋ saw há cẳŋ ɲờ cứŋkớ kủʔa ɲìn zằŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi tajhọʔa huŋák dượk xỏʔi và cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰạɲ dượk tʰɔát tạʔi cướk ʔaj zám các táɲ hạɲ ʔaj báʔɔứŋ diềʔu dã nó dượk dưʔa dến hwiệt và ŋườʔita kɛɲzữ fầnmộ kák kụk dất kủʔa cũŋ lấʔilàm êmzịʔu cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu di nɔj tʰeo và di cướk tʰì vậʔi saw kák ʔanủʔi tôʔi vôíc zườŋ ấʔi vì ɲữŋ kâʔu dáp kủʔa kák cỉ kòn bấtcuŋ tʰôʔi lifa ŋườʔi tʰêman dáp zằŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kó íclợʔi ci cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan cỉ íclợʔi cɔ cíɲ mìɲ mìɲ tʰôʔi zầʔu ôŋ kôŋbìɲ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ kó vuj ci căŋ táɲ hạɲ ôŋ cọnvẹn ấʔi dượk íclợʔi ɣì cɔ ŋàʔi saw kó fảʔi ŋàʔi ôŋ ŋàʔi các fạt và sétdɔán ôŋ căŋ sự zữ kủʔa ôŋ cẳŋ fảʔi saw kák tộʔiák ôŋ xôŋ fảʔi vôkùŋ vì ôŋ dã lấʔi kủʔa kầm kủʔa ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ vôkớ và kwầnáʔɔ kủʔa cầncuồŋ Ôŋ xôŋ cɔ xát sin nướk ʔuốŋ cẳŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dóʔi báɲ kòn ŋườʔi kườŋ tʰạɲ dất tʰuộk ŋườʔi ʔaj dượk dã tạʔi dó Ôŋ kó duổʔi ɣóʔabụʔa di tăjxôŋ bẻ ɣãʔi nơʔi nươŋɲờ kủʔa mồkôʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi ôŋ bẫʔi bawvâʔi và kiɲxủŋ tʰìɲlìɲ ôŋ zốʔi kựk hɔặk tốʔităm ŋănkản cɔ ôŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi và nướk càn cìmŋập ôŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kaw ɲư kák từŋ cờʔi kaw kiə saw hãʔi sɛm cót kák ŋôʔisaw kaw biếtbawɲiêʔu kòn ôŋ nóʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi biếtdiềʔu ɣì ŋàʔi kótʰể sétdɔán ŋaŋ kwa tămtốʔi dɛn kịc saw mâʔi cɛfủ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi ŋàʔi bướkdi cên bầʔu kák từŋ cờʔi Ôŋ ɣiữ tʰeo lốʔi sưʔa mà kák zanák dã di saw cúŋnó cuất ziệt cướk dịɲ káʔi zòŋ nướk dáɲ côʔi di cúŋnó nóʔi vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ cúʔa hãʔi lìʔa xỏʔi cúŋtôʔi lạʔi zằŋ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ dượk ɣì cɔ cúŋta zẫʔuvậʔi ŋàʔi kó cɔ ɲà dầʔi ŋwiện kák mưʔucướk ák hãʔi kác sa tôʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰấʔi diềʔu dó vuimừŋ kòn ŋườʔi vôtộʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ cúŋnó zằŋ kẻ zấʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi kwả ziệt và lạʔi kủʔa cúŋ lửʔa dã tʰiêʔudốt di Ấʔi vậʔi ôŋ hãʔi hòʔatʰuận vớʔi ŋàʔi hãʔi bìɲan ɲờ dó fướk hạɲ ɣiáŋ cɔ ôŋ hãʔi ɲận lãɲ luậtfáp nơʔi miệŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi và dể kák lờʔi ŋàʔi vàʔɔ lòŋ kủʔa mìɲ nếʔu ôŋ cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ ôŋ dượk lạʔi nếʔu ôŋ cừbỏ zanák xỏʔi cạʔi mìɲ ném bửʔu mìɲ vàʔɔ bụʔi dất và kwăŋ vàŋ fiə ɣiữʔa kák dá kủʔa xɛ tʰìÐấŋtɔàn năŋ bửʔu kủʔa ôŋ ŋàʔi bạk kwí cɔ ôŋ vì bấʔizờ ôŋ dượk vujsướŋ nơʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ và dượk ŋướk kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kầʔuxẩn kùŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ŋɛ lờʔi mìɲ và ôŋ cả sɔŋ lờʔi xẩn ŋwiện mìɲ nếʔu ôŋ ɲứt dịɲ việkɣì việk ấʔi cắk dượk tʰàɲ Áɲsáŋ cóʔi cên dườŋlốʔi mìɲ xi ŋườʔita ɣâʔi cɔ mìɲ suốŋ tʰì ôŋ nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cổʔi kòn xiêmɲườŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi dỗʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu kó tộʔi tʰật ấʔi ɲờ tʰɛɲsạc kủʔa tăj ôŋ dướk kứʔu ɣióp dáp zằŋ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj tʰan tôʔi hãʔi kòn kăjdắŋ tăj dè cên tôʔi nặŋ zênsiết tôʔi Ôʔi cớci tôʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ dượk cúʔa hầʔu cɔ di dến cướk tòʔa kủʔa ŋàʔi tôʔi ɣiãʔibàʔi zwiênkớ tôʔi cướk ŋàʔi và dầʔi miệŋ tôʔi ɲữŋ tôʔi kák lờʔi ŋàʔi dáp lạʔi cɔ tôʔi và hiểʔu diềʔu ŋàʔi fán kùŋ tôʔi cúʔa lấʔi kwiềnnăŋ lớnlaw ŋàʔi cɛɲluận vớʔi tôʔi saw xôŋ ŋàʔi cúý tôʔi tạʔi dó ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ vớʔi ŋàʔi và tôʔi dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi dɔán sét tôʔi dến mãʔimãʔi nầʔi tôʔi di tớʔi cướk ɲưŋ xôŋ kó ŋàʔi tạʔi dó tôʔi dilạʔi săw sɔŋ tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ ɲìn tʰấʔi ŋàʔi kwa fíʔa xi ŋàʔi dươŋ kôŋviệk dó sɔŋ tôʔi xôŋ fânbiệt ŋàʔi dượk ŋàʔi tạʔi fíʔa hữʔu tôʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi ŋàʔi ɲưŋcúʔa kɔn dườŋ tôʔi di xiŋàʔi dã tʰử zèn tôʔi tôʔi za ɲư vàŋ cơn tôʔi tʰeo bướk cúʔa tôʔi ɣiữ di tʰeo dườŋ ŋàʔi cẳŋ sajlệc tôʔi cẳŋ lìʔabỏ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa môʔi ŋàʔi vẫn vâŋ tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ ŋàʔi lòŋ tôʔi ɲưŋcúʔa dã ɲứt dịɲ ʔaj cɔ ŋàʔi dổʔi dượk Ðʔiềʔu ɣì lòŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi cɔ tʰàɲ Ðʔiềʔuŋàʔi dã ɲứt dịɲ cɔ tôʔi ŋàʔi cɔsɔŋ cɔŋ lòŋ ŋàʔi kòn kó lắmdiềʔu xák ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi tôʔi kiɲxủŋ cướk ŋàʔi xi nàʔɔ tôʔi tưởŋ dến sợhãʔi ŋàʔi vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi xiến lòŋ tôʔi bủnzủn Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cɔ tôʔi hɔảŋsợ vì tôʔi cẳŋ bởʔi tốʔităm kũŋ cẳŋ sợhãʔi ʔuám cɛfủ tôʔi ɲân Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ dã dịɲkỳ fạt ák kớsaw ŋàʔi xôŋ xiến ɲậnbiết ŋàʔi dượk tʰấʔi ŋàʔi ấʔi kó ŋườʔi zờʔi mộk ɣiớʔi ʔaên kắp bầʔi ciên zồʔi zẫn cɔ cúŋ kướp zẫn lừʔa kủʔa mồkôʔi lấʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa kủʔa kầm cúŋ xiến ŋèʔɔ lìʔabỏ dườŋ cáɲ dáŋ kẻ xốnkùŋ kủʔa tʰếzan dồŋ ɲăw di cáɲ kìʔa vừʔa sớmmaj cúŋ di za kôŋviệk mìɲ tìm lươŋtʰựk mìɲ ɲư lừʔa zừŋ nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ Ðồŋ vắŋ kấp tʰựkvật cɔ kɔnkáʔi cúŋnó cúŋnó tʰâʔu ɣóp zơm kỏ tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ mót cáʔi ɲɔ cɔŋ kủʔa ák cọn dêm cúŋnó cầncuồŋ xôŋ kwầnáʔɔ và cẳŋ kó dắp xỏʔi lạɲ cúŋnó zầm mưʔa núʔi xôŋ nơʔi dụt mìɲ vàʔɔ dá kó ŋườʔi kướp mồkôʔi ca kòn bắt tʰế cưŋ áʔɔ cên mìɲ ŋèʔɔ dỗʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ fảʔi di cần xôŋ áʔɔ vák ɲữŋ lúʔa dóʔi cúŋ zầʔu cɔŋ xɔ củ mìɲ cáʔi ɲɔ nơʔi tʰùŋ xát từ cɔŋ tʰàɲ nổʔi lêntiếŋ tʰởtʰan kủʔa ŋườʔita liɲhồn bịtʰươŋ kêʔuvan sɔŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ dến tộʔiák fạm tạʔi dó kũŋ kó xák tʰùŋịc vớʔi áɲsáŋ xôŋ dạʔɔ kủʔa áɲsáŋ và cẳŋ di cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ vừʔa zạŋ ŋàʔi ɣiết ŋườʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɣiết ŋèʔɔxổ túŋ kùŋ kòn bandêm ɲư kẻcộm mắt hàɲ zâm kũŋ côŋŋóŋ xi cậptốʔi mà nóʔi zằŋ cẳŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi tôʔi và cɛcín mìɲ Ðươŋ dêm tốʔităm cúŋnó xɔét ɲà banŋàʔi lạʔi zút cúŋnó cẳŋ áɲsáŋ buổʔisáŋ bóŋ cết cɔ cúŋnó tʰăitʰảʔi vì cúŋnó kiɲhãʔi bóŋ cết cúŋnó kwa cɔŋcóŋ ɲư ɲẹ côʔi nơʔi mặtnướk fần ŋiệp zủʔasả tạʔi cên dất cẳŋ kòn cởvề lốʔi ɲɔ nữʔa sự xôhạn nắŋ tiêʔutan nướk twiết di âmfủ kũŋ ɲưvậʔi cɔ ɲữŋ kó tộʔi lòŋ kwên cúŋnó di kák sâʔubọ ŋɔn cúŋnó ŋườʔita xôŋ kòn ɲớ nữʔa và zanák ɣẫʔi za ɲư kâʔicốʔi cúŋnó kướp ɣiựt ŋườʔi dờn sɔnsẻ xôŋ sɛɲ kɔn cẳŋ diềʔu làɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa sɔŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi lấʔi kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi bảʔɔtɔàn ŋườʔi tʰếlựk ŋàʔi dỡ côŋ dượk bảʔɔtồn mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ cúŋ vữŋvàŋ cúŋ nươŋkậʔi nơʔi ấʔi ɲưŋ kɔn ŋàʔi kɔicừŋ dườŋlốʔi kủʔa cúŋ cúŋ dượk kawcọŋ dɔạn ítlâʔu cẳŋ kòn nữʔa cúŋ ŋã suốŋ kất dɛm di ɲư mọʔi ŋườʔi xák họ kắt ɲư ŋọn ɣié lúʔa vậʔi nếʔu diềʔu dó cẳŋ vậʔi ʔaj tôʔi nóʔizốʔi và ziệt lờʔi ɣiảŋ tôʔi za hưxôŋ biɲdát ŋườʔi su ʔa dáp zằŋ kwiền kwảncị sợhãʔi tʰuộk cúʔa ŋàʔi xiến hòʔabìɲ cɔŋ kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa ŋàʔi ʔaj kaj dượk kủʔa dạʔɔ biɲ cúʔa kó ʔaj áɲsáŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ cóʔi dến saw làmsaw lɔàʔiŋườʔi dượk kôŋbìɲ cướk Ðứk cúʔa cờʔi kẻ nàʔɔ ŋườʔi sɛɲ za saw cɔ cɔŋsạc dượk kìʔa mặtcăŋ xôŋ ciếʔu sáŋ kák ŋôʔisaw cẳŋ tiɲ sạc tạʔi cướk ŋàʔi tʰăj fươŋci lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn sâʔu và kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn ɣiòʔi ɣióp kấttiếŋ dáp zằŋ ŋươʔi dã fùcợ xôŋ kwiền zườŋ nàʔɔ tiếpkứʔu káɲtăj cẳŋ sứklựk xwiên vôci và biếtbaw xôn sáŋ cơn tʰật ŋườʔi dã ɣiảŋ cɔ ʔaj liɲhồn kủʔa ʔaj bởʔi ŋườʔi za kẻ kwadờʔi zun zảʔi zướʔi nướklớn dó kũŋ vậʔi ʔaâm fủ bàʔi za cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và vựk sâʔu xôŋ cɛxuất cúʔa cảʔi bắk kựk za cên vùŋ cốŋ ceo cáʔidất cɔŋ xɔảŋxôŋ xôŋ ŋàʔi nướk cɔŋ kák áŋ mâʔi ŋàʔi mà áŋ mâʔi xôŋ za nướk ấʔi ŋàʔi cɛxuất kủʔa ŋaj ŋàʔi và cảʔi mâʔi ŋàʔi cên ŋàʔi dã vòŋcòn cên mặtnướk cɔdến nơʔi ɣiớʔi kựk kủʔa áɲsáŋ tốʔităm ɣiáp ɲăw ɲưŋ cụ kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi zúŋdộŋ và sữŋsờ xi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hămzọʔa ŋàʔi lấʔi kwiềnnăŋ mìɲ xiến zậʔi và ɲờ xônŋwan mìɲ dáɲ zaháp tʰầncúʔa diểmcaŋ kák từŋ cờʔi tăicúʔa dấm lũŋ zắn tʰɔảŋ kwa kìʔa ấʔi cỉ biêŋiớʔi kủʔa kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi ta dượk ŋɛ tiếŋnóʔi cúʔa sầmsì ɲỏ tʰăj ɲưŋ ʔaj hiểʔu zõ tiếŋ kủʔa kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi ɣióp nóʔi kaw mìɲ zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dɔạt lấʔi tôʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ xiến liɲhồn tôʔi kăjdắŋ tôʔi cỉ sɛɲ mạŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰề zằŋ hễ hơʔi tʰở tôʔi kòn mìɲ tôʔi và sɛɲ xí kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn cɔŋ mũʔi tôʔi kwả môʔi tôʔi cẳŋ nóʔi zanák lưỡʔi tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ ɣiảŋ zadiềʔu ɣiảzốʔi xi tôʔi dɔán sét xôŋtʰểnàʔɔ cɔ kák fảʔi cɔdến cết tôʔi cẳŋ tʰôʔi kwảkwiết zằŋ tôʔi cọnvẹn tôʔi ɣiữ cặt kôŋbìɲ mìɲ xôŋ zờʔi cọn dờʔi tôʔi lòŋ tôʔi cẳŋ káʔɔ các tôʔi Ướk ɣì kừʔudịc tôʔi sử ɲư ák và zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi kầm ɲư cáʔi kôŋbìɲ zầʔu ák dượk tàʔisản Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kất lấʔi liɲhồn di vậʔi côŋkậʔi áklà ɣì xi hɔạnnạn sảʔi dếnkùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa saw kó fảʔi dượk vujsướŋ mìɲ nơʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ và tʰườŋtʰườŋ kầʔuxẩn Ðứkcúʔa cờʔi saw tôʔi cỉ zạʔi cɔ kák việk tăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ ɣiấʔu kák kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ nầʔi cáɲ kák dã tʰấʔi diềʔu dó vậʔi ɲơn saw kòn kó ɲữŋ tưtưởŋ hưxôŋ kiə nàʔi fần Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dịɲ cɔ ák và kơŋiệp kủʔa kườŋbạʔɔ ɲận lãɲ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ nếʔu kɔnkáʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu ấʔi dể cɔ ɣươm ɣiết kòn zòŋzõʔi xôŋ cɔ nɔnê dượk kẻ kòn sốŋsót lạʔi kủʔa cết vùʔizập và ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa xôŋ tʰanxók zẫʔu kó tʰâʔu ɣóp bạk ɲư kát bụʔi sắmsửʔa kwầnáʔɔ ɲiềʔu ɲư tʰật sắmsửʔa sɔŋ zồʔiza ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ mặk lấʔi kòn bạk vôtộʔi ciə ɲăw ŋườʔi kất ɲà mìɲ ɲư sâʔu cùŋ ɲư còʔi ŋườʔi ɣiữ ɲɔ tʰườŋ kất hắn nằmsuốŋ ɣiàʔukó sɔŋ cẳŋ dượk nó kɔn za cẳŋ kòn nữʔa sự kiɲ xiếp tʰìɲlìɲ vàʔɔ ɲưtʰể nướk bãʔɔtố dɔạt lấʔi cɔŋ lúk bandêm ɣió dôŋ dɛm di một luồŋ zôŋ zứt di xỏʔi cổ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiáŋ tajvạ cên mìɲ cẳŋ tʰươŋsót lấʔi hắn zất cạʔi cốn xỏʔi tăj ŋàʔi ŋườʔita vỗtăj mừŋ việk và ɣió duổʔi xỏʔi cỗ kủʔa bạk kó dể ŋườʔita dàʔɔ lấʔi và vàŋ kó nơʔi ŋườʔita lwiện sắt nơʔi dất lấʔi za dúk cảʔi za lấʔidượk dồŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi tămtốʔi zòsét dến kùŋtột hòn dá nơʔi tốʔităm dɛn kịc ŋườʔita dàʔɔmỏ sa cỗ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cên tʰế tạʔi cɔŋ nơʔi vắŋvẻ xôŋ cơn ŋườʔi di dến cúŋ ceo dòŋ dưʔa sakác lɔàʔiŋườʔi sɛɲ za lươŋtʰựk kòn zướʔi zườŋɲư lửʔa saw kák dá cỗ kó ŋọkbíc ŋườʔita dượk vàŋ tạʔi dó cim mồʔi cẳŋ dườŋlốʔi nầʔi mắt cim ưŋ xôŋ za dượk tʰúzữ xôŋ bướk cên sưtử cẳŋ kó di ŋaŋ kwa dó lɔàʔiŋườʔi ca tăicên dá kứŋ Ðáɲ dổ kák núʔi nơʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dụk haŋ cɔŋ dá mắt dượk mọʔi bửʔu cɔŋ ŋườʔi ŋăn nướk sôŋ dể cẳŋ zịɲ za Ðʔɛm za sáŋ diềʔu ci kòn xônŋwan dượk dâʔu tạʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ kó tʰôŋ sáŋ ŋườʔita cẳŋ dượk ɣiácị nó xôŋ tạʔi cên dất kủʔa lɔàʔi sốŋ vựk sâʔu zằŋ nó cẳŋ kó cɔŋ tôʔi và zằŋ nó xôŋ kùŋ tôʔi cẳŋ zùŋ vàŋzòŋ dổʔi lấʔi dặŋ kũŋ xôŋ kân bạk mwa dượk ŋườʔita xôŋ dáɲzá vớʔi vàŋ fiə hɔặk vớʔi ŋọk hồŋ mãnãʔɔ hăjlà vớʔi ŋọkbíc cẳŋ sáɲ dượk vớʔi vàŋ hăjlà falê kũŋ xôŋ dổʔi dể lấʔi xí zụŋ bằŋ vàŋzòŋ kòn tʰủʔitiɲ tʰì cẳŋ kần nóʔi dến ɣiácị xônŋwan tʰật kaw câʔubáʔu ŋọk sắk vàŋ tʰi nàʔɔ sáɲ kùŋ dượk dâʔu kũŋ xôŋ dáɲzá vớʔi vàŋzòŋ vậʔitʰì xônŋwan dâʔu dến sự tʰôŋ sáŋ tạʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ nó ɣiấʔu xuất kák lɔàʔi sốŋ và cáɲ kák cim cờʔi cốn cầmluân cết nóʔi zằŋ lỗ taj cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛ tiếŋ dồn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰôŋiểʔu kɔn dườŋ và zõ cỗ kủʔa vìŋàʔi ɲìn tʰấʔu kák dầʔu tʰếzan và tʰấʔi zõ xắp tʰiêɲạ xiŋàʔi dịɲ sứk nặŋ cɔ ɣió dộlượŋ cɔ kák nướk Ðịɲ cɔ mưʔa và dườŋlốʔi cɔ cớp bấʔizờ ŋàʔi tʰấʔi xônŋwan bàʔitỏ za ŋàʔi zòsét nữʔa Ðʔɔạn fán vớʔi lɔàʔi ŋuờʔi zằŋ kíɲ cúʔa ấʔilà xônŋwan cáɲ xỏʔi diềʔu ák ấʔilà tʰôŋ sáŋ ɣióp kứ nóʔi kaw mìɲ zằŋ Ôʔi Ướk ɣì tôʔi dượk ɲư buổʔi cướk ɲư cɔŋ kák ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣìŋiữ tôʔi xi ŋọn duốk cúʔa sɔj cên dầʔu tôʔi và ɲờ áɲsáŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi bướk kwa tốʔităm cớci tôʔi dượk ɲư lúk kòn cáŋ xi tìɲ tʰiệt hữʔu kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn dɔáʔi dến cạʔi tôʔi xiÐấŋtɔàn năŋ kòn kùŋ tôʔi và kák kɔnkáʔi tôʔi vâʔi kwɛɲ tôʔi lúk tôʔi zửʔa cơn cɔŋ sữʔa và dá fun suốʔi zầʔu za cɔ tôʔi xi tôʔi di za dến kửʔa tʰàɲ sửʔasɔạn cỗ ŋồʔi mìɲ tạʔi fố cợ kák ɣã caicẻ tʰấʔi tôʔi di và kák ŋườʔi ɣiàkả dềʔu cổʔi zậʔi dứŋ ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ kiêŋ nóʔi và lấʔi tăj miệŋ tiếŋ ŋườʔi tướkvị níntʰiɲ và lưỡʔi zíɲ nơʔi ổɣà xi taj ʔaj ŋɛ tôʔi sưŋ tôʔi kó fướk mắt ʔaj tʰấʔi tôʔi làmcứŋ cɔ tôʔi Ấʔi tôʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xốnkùŋ kêʔukầʔu và mồkôʔi xôŋ ʔaj ɣiúpdỡ kẻ ɣần cết cúk fướk cɔ tôʔi và tôʔi cɔ lòŋ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa nứknở vuimừŋ tôʔi mặk lấʔi kôŋbìɲ cɛfủ tôʔi sự ŋăitʰẳŋ tôʔi xáknàʔɔ áʔɔ ŋɔàʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên tôʔi dã ɲư kɔn cɔ và ɲư cơn cɔ kwè tôʔi dã ca cɔ ŋèʔɔxó kòn zwiênkớ kủʔa tôʔi casét cɔ zõzàŋ tôʔi ɣẫʔi bấtkôŋ và zứt mồʔi ŋậm nơʔi zăŋ tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ ta tʰák cɔŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲiềʔu ɲư kát zễ zàʔi tʰeo nướk và kả dêm sươŋ dọŋ cên ɲàɲ viɲhiển mớʔimẻ vớʔi kuŋ dượk kứŋ mạɲ lạʔi cɔŋ tăj ŋườʔita lắŋtaj ŋɛ tôʔi cờdợʔi và làmtʰiɲ dặŋ ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi săw xi tôʔi nóʔi cúŋ xôŋ kòn dáp lạʔi lờʔi tôʔi nóʔi ɣộʔi ɲuần cên cúŋ ɲư sươŋ họ côŋdợʔi tôʔi ɲư côŋdợʔi mưʔa hả miệŋ za zườŋɲư hứŋ mưʔa tôʔi kườʔi vớʔi cúŋ xi cúŋ ŋãlòŋ họ cẳŋ zốʔi bìɲ tịɲ tôʔi dượk tôʔi cọn kɔn dườŋ cɔ cúŋ ŋồʔi làmdầʔu ɲư vwa tạʔi ɣiữʔa kwândộʔi xáknàʔɔ ʔanủʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi sầʔu sɔŋ bâʔizờ cẻ tuổʔi tôʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ tôʔi mà ca tôʔi dã xiɲ cẳŋ xứŋ dể cuŋ vớʔi có kủʔa bầʔi ciên tôʔi sứkmạɲ kủʔa dã hưhạʔi zồʔi vậʔi sứklựk tăj zùŋ íc ɣì cɔ tôʔi cúŋ tɔŋ dóʔicém tʰiếʔutʰốn di ɣậm kạp dất xô hók từ lâʔu dã bỏhwaŋ vắŋvẻ cúŋ háʔi zăwsam cɔŋ bụʔi kâʔi zễ kâʔi ɣiêŋ ɣiếŋ tʰựk cɔ cúŋ duổʔi di xỏʔi ɣiữʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋườʔita kêʔula cúŋ ɲư kêʔula kẻcộm cúŋ fảʔi cɔŋ cũŋ ɣớmɣê cɔŋ haŋ dất ɣiữʔa kák dá cúŋ cu tʰét ɣiữʔa bụʔi kâʔi nằm lộnlạʔɔ ɲăw zướʔi kák ɣaj cúŋ kɔnkáʔi ŋusuẩn ca cẳŋ tuổʔi họ duổʔi za xỏʔi sứ kòn bâʔizờ tôʔi cởnên lờʔi kahát kủʔa làm dề cɔ cwiệncò kủʔa họ ɣớmɣiếk tôʔi saláɲ tôʔi xôŋ kiêŋ ɲổ xạk nơʔi tôʔi bởʔivì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã zùn kâʔi kuŋ tôʔi sỉɲụk tôʔi cúŋ xớp xỏʔi cướk tôʔi káʔi nầʔi zấʔi nơʔi tăj hữʔu tôʔi cúŋ sôdẩʔi cơn tôʔi sửʔasɔạn cɔ tôʔicɔn dườŋ hiểmdộk kủʔa cúŋ cúŋ fáhủʔi dườŋlốʔi tôʔi ɣiúp vàʔɔ việk tàɲạʔi tôʔi sɔŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj dến tiếpkứʔu cúŋ cúŋ zɔ nơʔi lũŋ dến sôŋ vàʔɔ tôʔi ɣiữʔa dồʔi kák kiɲxủŋ tôʔi Ðʔuổʔi tʰeo saŋcọŋ tôʔi xáknàʔɔ ɣió mạɲ và fướk hạɲ tôʔi dã kwa ɲư dám mâʔi bâʔizờ liɲhồn tôʔi za cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi kák ŋàʔi zannan dã tôʔi sɔj sươŋkốt tôʔi zờʔi za xỏʔi tôʔi Ðʔăw dớn kắn zỉʔa tôʔi xôŋ ŋưŋŋỉ cút nàʔɔ vì kớ năŋlựk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi áʔɔ ŋɔàʔi tôʔi năŋlựk ấʔi ziết xí tôʔi lạʔi ɲư kổ áʔɔ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó tôʔi suốŋ tôʔi cởnên ɣiốŋ ɲư bụʔi cɔ tôʔi kêʔula kùŋ cúʔa sɔŋ cúʔa cẳŋ dáp lờʔi tôʔi dứŋ tạʔi dó cúʔa cỉ ŋó sɛm tôʔi cúʔa cởnên zữtợn dốʔivớʔi tôʔi lấʔi năŋlựk tăj cúʔa zượt duổʔi tôʔi cúʔa kất tôʔi cên káɲ ɣió xiến dɛm tôʔi di tiêʔuziệt tôʔi ɣiữʔa cận bãʔɔ vì tôʔi zằŋ cúʔa zẫn tôʔi dến cốn cết là nơʔi kủʔa kák ŋườʔi sốŋ sɔŋ cɔŋ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tàɲạʔi cẳŋ ɣiơ tăj zasaw hɔặk dươŋ kơn tainạn xôŋ kấttiếŋ kêʔula cớ tʰì tôʔi xôŋ xók tʰờʔitʰế xóxăn saw lòŋ tôʔi cẳŋ buồntʰảm ŋèʔɔxổ saw tôʔi dợʔicờ fướk hạɲ tajhọʔa sảʔi dến tôʔi côŋkậʔi áɲsáŋ tămtốʔi lạʔi tớʔi cɔ lòŋ tôʔi cằncọk xôŋ ʔanŋỉ kák ŋàʔi zannan sôŋ vàʔɔ tôʔi tôʔi di mìɲ mảʔi dɛn ɲưŋ cẳŋ fảʔi nắŋ tôʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ kêʔukầʔu tiếpkứʔu tôʔi cởtʰàɲ ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa có zừŋ và bầʔubạn kủʔa kɔn dàdiểʔu za tôʔi tʰàɲ dɛn zơʔi za xỏʔi mìɲ sươŋkốt tôʔi nóŋ cáʔi di vì kớ ấʔi tiếŋ dờn kầm tôʔi cởnên tiếŋ ʔaj và dờn tôʔi cỉ za tiếŋ tʰảmsầʔu tôʔi dã kó ướk vớʔi tôʔi vậʔi làmsaw tôʔi kòn zám ɲìn ŋườʔi dồŋciɲ vì fần zɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi và kơŋiệp zɔ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ nơʔi kaw dí ɣì há cẳŋ fảʔi tajhọʔa cɔ zanák và hưhạʔi cɔ làmzữ saw cớ tʰì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi dườŋlốʔi tôʔi và dếm kák bướk tôʔi saw nếʔu tôʔi kó kác zốʔicá và cơn tôʔi vộʔivàŋ tʰeo cướk zaŋiảʔɔ ŋwi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kân tôʔi cên kân tʰăŋbằŋ tʰìŋàʔi ɲìn tʰɛɲliêm kủʔa tôʔi nếʔu cơn tôʔi cở bướk kɔn dườŋ cáɲ dáŋ và lòŋ tôʔi di tʰeo kɔn tôʔi nếʔu kó ôʔuế ci zíɲ vàʔɔ tăj tôʔi ŋwiện tôʔi zeo kó xák ɣặtʰáʔi ŋwiện tʰổsản tôʔi ɲổ di nếʔu lòŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi kwiến zụ nếʔu tôʔi zìɲzập nơʔi kửʔa kủʔa lânkận tôʔi ŋwiện tôʔi sâʔi kốʔi cɔ ŋườʔi xák và xák cuŋ kùŋ nàŋ vì diềʔu ấʔi tộʔi cọŋ ɣớmɣê một tộʔiák dáŋ kwan sétdɔán fạt tộʔi ấʔilà ŋọn lửʔa tʰiêʔuhóʔa cɔdến cốn cầmluân tàɲạʔi kák kủʔakảʔi tôʔi dến tậnkùŋ nếʔu tôʔi kó xiɲ zwiênkớ kủʔa tôʔi caj ɣáʔi tôʔi lúk cúŋnó cɛɲluận vớʔi tôʔi tʰì tôʔi làmsaw xi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cổʔi zậʔi xiŋàʔi dến tʰẩm tôʔi tôʔi dáp saw Ðấŋ dã tạʔɔ tʰàɲ tôʔi cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi há cẳŋ kó zựŋ cúŋnó saw há cẳŋ fảʔi kũŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zựŋ cúŋta cɔŋ lòŋ saw nếʔu tôʔi từcốʔi diềʔu ŋèʔɔxổ ướkaw ɣâʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa hawmòn nếʔu tôʔi kóăn báɲ tôʔi mộtmìɲ và mồkôʔi cẳŋ kó dượk vớʔi tʰật lúk tôʔi kòn cẻ kùŋ vớʔi tôʔi ɲư kɔn vớʔi ca kòn ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa tôʔi dã nâŋdỡ xi tôʔi lọtlòŋ tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi kó tʰấʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰák xôŋ kwầnáʔɔ và ŋèʔɔ tʰiếʔu cẳŋ kó nếʔu lòŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ cúk fướk cɔ tôʔi và ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲờ lôŋ ciên tôʔi dượk nếʔu tôʔi kó ɣiơ tăj mồkôʔi bởʔivì tôʔi tʰấʔi kó fùcợ tôʔi cɔŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ ŋwiện cɔ vaj tôʔi zớt za xỏʔi nơʔi xák và káɲtăj tôʔi ɣẫʔi zứt zadi vì tajhọʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiáŋ suốŋ tôʔi kiɲ xiếp và cướk waiŋiêm ŋàʔi tôʔi nàʔɔ làmci dượk nếʔu tôʔi kó dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi vàŋ và nóʔi vớʔi vàŋzòŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi nươŋɲờ kủʔa nếʔu tôʔi vuimừŋ tàʔi tôʔi ɲiềʔu và tăj tôʔi dã dượk kủʔa nếʔu tôʔi kó tʰấʔi mặtcờʔi ciếʔu sáŋ và mặtcăŋ mọk sɔj nếʔu lòŋ tôʔi kó tʰầm mêhɔặk và miệŋ tôʔi ɣởʔi tăj tôʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ tộʔiák dáŋ kwan sét fạt vì nếʔu làmvậʔi tôʔi dã từcốʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên kaw kiə nếʔu tôʔi kó vuimừŋ kớ tàɲạʔi ɣét tôʔi và hứŋ lòŋ xi tajvạ ɣiáŋ cɔ cáʔilạʔi tôʔi xôŋ cɔfép miệŋ tôʔi fạmtộʔi mà lấʔi zủʔasả cùẻʔɔ ŋwiện hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ nếʔu kák ŋườʔiɲà tôʔi cẳŋ kó nóʔi ʔaj dượk ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ dượk nɔnê tʰịt súkvật ŋườʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ kó ŋủ dêm ŋɔàʔi dườŋ tôʔi mởkửʔa cɔ hàɲxác nếʔu tôʔi kó cɛ tộʔi mìɲ ɲư ʔadam mà ɣiấʔu zanák mìɲ cɔŋ lòŋ tạʔi tôʔi kiɲhãʔi cúŋ dôŋ và ʔɛsợ xi họhàŋ xiɲbỉ dổʔi ʔiênlặŋ cẳŋ zám bướk za xỏʔi kửʔa Ôʔi cớci kó ŋườʔi ŋɛ tôʔi nầʔi zấʔuhiệʔu tôʔi ŋwiệnÐấŋtɔàn năŋ dáp lờʔi tôʔi ŋwiện kừʔu ŋịc tôʔi cạŋtừ tôʔi kwả maŋ cạŋtừ ấʔi cên vaj mìɲ Ðộʔi cên dầʔu tôʔi ɲư mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên ʔaét tôʔi tʰuật cɔ kừʔudịc bướk tôʔi cướk ɲư vwɛcúʔa nếʔu dất tôʔi kêʔu káʔɔ tôʔi kák ɣiòŋ kàʔi xók vớʔi ɲăw nếʔu tôʔi xôŋ cảɣiá bạk làm xuấʔi xuất ŋwiêncủ cɔdến fảʔi cết ŋwiện ɣajɣók mọk tʰăj lúʔa và kỏ lùŋ tʰế cɔ lúʔamạc dâʔi hếtlờʔi kủʔa ɣióp bấʔizờ ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰôʔi dáp lờʔi vớʔi ɣióp ŋườʔi tʰấʔi mìɲ kôŋbìɲ kɔncaj kủʔa bazakêên ŋườʔi busi zòŋzõʔi zam lấʔilàm tứkzận ɣióp bởʔivì ŋườʔi tựsưŋ mìɲ kôŋbìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ nổʔizận kủʔa ɣióp bởʔivì cẳŋ dượk dáp lạʔi màlạʔi dịɲtộʔi cɔ ɣióp vả kó dợʔi ɣióp sɔŋ dặŋ nóʔi vớʔi ɣióp bởʔivì kák ŋườʔi dó dềʔu lớntuổʔi mìɲ vậʔi xi tʰấʔi cẳŋ kòn kâʔu cảlờʔi ci nơʔi miệŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kiə nữʔa kơn tʰạɲ ŋườʔi fừŋ kɔncaj bazakêên ŋườʔi busi kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi daŋ cẻ kòn kák ʔɛɲ ôŋzà vìvậʔi tôʔi ɲát xôŋ zám cɔ kák ʔɛɲ ýtưởŋ tôʔi tôʔi ŋĩ zằŋ ʔaj dã sốŋ lâʔu ŋàʔi nóʔi số kaw zạʔi xônŋwan ɲưŋ kó tʰầnliɲ cɔŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi và hơʔi tʰở kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cɔ cúŋ xôn sáŋ ŋườʔi tôncọŋ cẳŋ fảʔi xônŋwan bựk lãʔɔtʰàɲ cẳŋ tʰôŋiểʔu kôŋbìɲ bởʔi kớ ấʔi tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi fần tôʔi kũŋ za ýtưởŋ kủʔa tôʔi kìʔa tôʔi dã cờdợʔi ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa fô ʔɛɲ lắŋtaj ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kák ʔɛɲ cɔdến xi kák ʔɛɲ dã casét dềʔu cɔsɔŋ tʰật tôʔi kó cămcỉ ŋɛ kák ʔɛɲ tʰấʔi cẳŋ ʔaj cɔŋ kák ʔɛɲ tʰắŋ ɣióp hɔặk lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dượk cớ nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta dượk xônŋwan Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰắŋ ŋườʔi dượk lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ dặŋ vả ɣióp xôŋ kó cɛɲluận vớʔi tôʔi vậʔi tôʔi cẳŋ zùŋ lờʔi kák ʔɛɲ dáp lạʔiŋườʔi họ sửŋsốt xôŋ dáp ci nữʔa kạnlờʔi tiếŋ zồʔi tôʔi fảʔi cờdợʔi nóʔi xôŋ kòn ci cảlờʔi ɣì nữʔa saw tʰeo fiên tôʔi kũŋ dáp lờʔi cớ tôʔi kũŋ za ýtưởŋ mìɲ cớ vì tôʔi dã dầʔizẫʔi lờʔinóʔi cí cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi kảm ɣiụk tôʔi nóʔi nầʔi lòŋ tôʔi ɲư zượʔu cưʔa xuj nó ɣần za ɲư bầʔu zượʔu mớʔi tôʔi nóʔi dượk ɲẹɲàŋ tôʔi môʔi miệŋ za dáp lờʔi tôʔi cẳŋ ʔaj xôŋ zwa nịɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vì tôʔi cẳŋ zwa nịɲ nếʔu zwa nịɲ Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa tôʔi cừziệt tôʔi tứktʰì ɲưŋ vậʔi hỡʔi ɣióp sin hãʔi ŋɛ kák ziễntʰwiết tôʔi xá lắŋtaj ŋɛ kák lờʔinóʔi tôʔi kìʔa tôʔi dã mởmiệŋ za lưỡʔi tôʔi nóʔi cɔŋ họŋ tôʔi kák lờʔi tôʔi nóʔi ciếʔu tʰeo cáɲ cựk kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi Ðʔiềʔu tôʔi lưỡʔi tôʔi nóʔi kác tʰàɲtʰựk tʰầnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã sáŋtạʔɔ tôʔi hơʔi tʰở kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cɔ tôʔi sốŋ nếʔu dáp dượk hãʔi dáp lạʔi cɔ tôʔi hãʔi dứŋzậʔi bàʔi za lờʔi kủʔa ôŋ tạʔi cướk tôʔi hãʔi sɛm dốʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi vớʔi ôŋ kó xák ci tôʔi kũŋ bởʔi dất za sự waiŋi tôʔi nàʔɔ cɔ ôŋ kiɲ xiếp và kwiềntʰế tôʔi cẳŋ dè ôŋ kwả ôŋ kó nóʔi dến taj tôʔi tôʔi dã ŋɛ tiếŋ lờʔi kủʔa ôŋ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi cɔŋsạc xôŋ kó vifạm tôʔi vôtộʔi cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi cẳŋ kó zanák ɣì zầʔu vậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zịp dốʔidịc tôʔi kầm tôʔi ɲư tʰùŋịc ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ziết cơn tôʔi vàʔɔ kùm và kɔicừŋ dườŋlốʔi tôʔi nầʔi tôʔi dáp vớʔi ôŋ zằŋ cɔŋ kák lờʔi ấʔi ôŋ nóʔi vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲơn saw ôŋ cɛɲluận vớʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ bàʔi ɣiãʔi diềʔu nàʔɔ ŋàʔi vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán hɔặk haj ɲưŋ ŋườʔita xôŋ dểý dến ŋàʔi fán cɔŋ ciêmbaw cɔŋ zị tượŋ bandêm lúk ŋườʔita ŋủmê nằm ŋủ cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ bấʔizờ ŋàʔi taj lɔàʔiŋườʔi niêmfɔŋ lờʔi ɣiáʔɔhuấn ŋàʔi zạʔi cɔ hầʔu cɔ cở lɔàʔi ŋuờʔi xỏʔi diềʔu twan và ɣiấʔu táɲ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kứʔu liɲhồn xỏʔi káʔi hwiệt và mạŋ sốŋ xỏʔi ɣươm ɣiết lɔàʔiŋườʔi cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ dăwdớn sửʔa fạt và sươŋkốt ŋườʔi hàŋ cɛɲ cạm ɲăw mãʔimãʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk tʰựk và liɲhồn ŋườʔi ɣét ɲữŋ dồăn tʰịt ŋườʔi tiêʔuhaw xôŋ kòn tʰấʔi nữʔa và sươŋ ŋườʔi cướk cẳŋ tʰấʔi dượk za liɲhồn ŋườʔi dến ɣần káʔi và sốŋ ŋườʔi síc lạʔi ɣiết nếʔu cɔŋ mộtŋàn tʰiênsứ kó tʰiênsứ cwiền ɣiảʔi cɔ ŋườʔi cỉ zạʔi ŋườʔi biếtdiềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ cɔ ŋườʔi ʔaétÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋườʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi suốŋ káʔi ta dã dặŋ ɣiá cuộk zồʔi ŋườʔi dượk tʰẳŋ za tʰịt ɲư buổʔi tʰơấʔu ŋườʔi cởlạʔi ŋàʔi daŋ tʰì ŋườʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɔáʔi tʰươŋ ŋườʔi xiến ŋườʔi vuimừŋ sɛm tʰấʔi ŋàʔi vàŋàʔi cả lạʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn ŋườʔi dó cướk lɔàʔiŋườʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi hɔạʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ sɔŋ cẳŋ kóíc ɣì cɔ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi suốŋ và sốŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi áɲsáŋ kìʔa kák việk ấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi haj hɔặk Ðặŋ xiến liɲhồn ŋườʔi cởlạʔi xỏʔi káʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi dượk áɲsáŋ sốŋ ciếʔu vàʔɔ cɔ hỡʔizóp hãʔi cămcỉ ŋɛ tôʔi xá làmtʰiɲ tʰì tôʔi nóʔi nếʔu ôŋ kódiềʔu ɣì nóʔi hãʔi dáp lạʔi tôʔi xá nóʔi tôʔi sưŋ ôŋ kôŋbìɲ bằŋ cẳŋ hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi hãʔi làmtʰiɲ tʰì tôʔi zạʔi cɔ ôŋ xônŋwan lạʔi kấttiếŋ nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi xônŋwan hãʔi ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔinóʔi tôʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ tôʔi vì taj tʰử ɲữŋ lờʔinóʔi ɲư ổɣà lấʔi dồăn cúŋta hãʔi cọn cɔ mìɲ diềʔu fảʔi cuŋ ɲăw ɲìn việk tốtlàɲ vìɣióp kó nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã kất dɔán tôʔi twi tôʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋườʔita cɔ tôʔi nóʔizốʔi zẫʔu tôʔi xôŋ fạmtộʔi tʰươŋtíc tôʔi xôŋ cữʔa làɲ dượk ʔaj ŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣióp ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ lờʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ ɲưtʰể nướk ŋườʔi vớʔi huŋ ŋiệt và dồŋ di vớʔi ŋườʔi zanák vì ŋườʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ cẳŋ íclợʔi ci cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi tìmkiếm diềʔu vuitʰíc mìɲ nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vìvậʔi hỡʔi ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ hàɲ ák Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ xôŋbawzờ huŋ ŋiệt ŋàʔi báʔɔứŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi tùʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ xiến mỗʔi ŋườʔi dượk lạʔi ciếʔu tʰeo táɲ hạɲ mìɲ kwảtʰật Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ ák Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cẳŋ cáʔifép kôŋbìɲ ʔaj zaw cɔ ŋàʔi các ɲậm kɔjsók cáʔidất ʔaj dặt ŋàʔi kaicị tɔàn tʰếzan nếʔuŋàʔi cỉ lɔ tưởŋ dến cíɲ mìɲ ŋàʔi tʰâʔu lạʔi mìɲ tʰầnliɲ hơʔi tʰở kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰì kák lɔàʔi sáktʰịt cắk cết cuŋ ɲăw và lɔàʔiŋườʔi cở vàʔɔ bụʔi dất nếʔu ôŋ kó tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi ŋɛ diềʔu nầʔi xá lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ lờʔinóʔi kủʔa tôʔi cớ tʰì ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣét kôŋbìɲ dượk kaicị saw Ôŋ zám cɔ Ðấŋ kôŋbìɲ kawkả há kó nóʔi vớʔi vwa zằŋ sấʔusa hăjlà nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi tướkvị zằŋ kẻ ákŋiệp mầʔi fươŋci Ðấŋ cẳŋ ɲữŋ vươŋtử cẳŋ sɛm ɣiàʔu cọŋ ŋèʔɔ bởʔi cúŋ hếttʰảʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋàʔi cɔŋ ɣiâʔifút ɣiữʔa bandêm cúŋ dềʔu cết bátáɲ siêʔu kwa di kák kườŋkwiền kất di xôŋ fảʔi bởʔi tăj lɔàʔiŋườʔi vì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sɛmsét dườŋlốʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋàʔi nɔm kák bướk cẳŋ kó tốʔităm nàʔɔ cɔ ák mìɲ dượk xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fánsét lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰì cẳŋ kần xiến dến cướk ŋàʔi haj dặŋ casét ŋàʔi hủʔi fá kườŋkwiền xôŋ kần ca sɔát zồʔi xák tʰế vàʔɔ cɔ bởʔivì cúʔa kák kôŋviệk cúŋ Ðáɲ dổ cúŋ bandêm cúŋ ziệt di cúʔa hàɲ hạʔi ɲư ŋườʔi ák kó xák sɛm tʰấʔi bởʔivì cúŋ kó sâʔi tʰeo cúʔa xôŋ dến kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi cúŋ cɔ tiếŋ ŋèʔɔ tʰấʔu dến cúʔa vàcúʔa ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔula kủʔa zancuân xiŋàʔi cɔ bìɲan ʔaj cɔ zốʔilɔạn xiŋàʔi mìɲ ʔaj kótʰể tʰấʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɲưvậʔi hɔặk cɔ zântộk nàʔɔ hɔặk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hầʔu ŋăncở zanák kaicị và xôŋ ʔaj ɣàʔi bẫʔi cɔ zânsự vì kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ bawzờ nóʔi vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi dã maŋ cịʔu sửʔa fạt tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ ák nữʔa Ðʔiềʔu ci tôʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi sin cúʔa cỉ zạʔi cɔ tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi kó ák tôʔi cẳŋ lạʔinữʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứ tʰeo ýtưởŋ ôŋ báʔɔứŋ ôŋ saw vì ôŋ kó báʔɔứŋ kủʔa cúʔa ôŋ fảʔi cọnlựʔa lấʔi cớ cẳŋ fảʔi tôʔi vậʔi diềʔu ôŋ hãʔi nóʔi di ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ mỗʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan dươŋ ŋɛ tôʔi sẽ nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ ɣióp nóʔi kác xôŋ hiểʔubiết và lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰiếʔu tʰôŋ sáŋ tôʔi ŋwiện cɔ ɣióp tʰửtʰác dếnkùŋ bởʔivì ŋườʔi kó dáp lờʔi ɲư ák ŋườʔi kó tʰêm fảnŋịc vàʔɔ tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ vỗtăj mìɲ tạʔi ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi và kàŋ tʰêm lờʔinóʔi ŋịc Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi nóʔi zằŋ Ôŋ dã nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kôŋbìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi nóʔi tôʔi dặŋ lờʔi ɣì ɲượkbằŋ cẳŋ fạm tôʔi tôʔi dượk íc căŋ cớ tʰì ôŋ tưởŋ lờʔi ấʔi kólý saw tôʔi dáp lạʔi ôŋ và kák bạɲữʔu kủʔa ôŋ nữʔa hãʔi ŋướk sɛm kák từŋ cờʔi hãʔi kɔj áŋ mâʔi kaw ôŋ nếʔu ôŋ dã fạm tôʔi kó hạʔi ci cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ nếʔu kák vifạm ôŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu kó kan ɣì vớʔi ŋàʔi nếʔu ôŋ kôŋbìɲ ôŋ ɣì cɔ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi lãɲ diềʔu ɣì bởʔi tăj kủʔa ôŋ sự zanák kủʔa ôŋ kótʰể hạʔi ŋườʔi dồŋlɔạʔi ôŋ và kôŋbìɲ ôŋ kótʰể íc cɔ kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi tạʔi ɲiềʔu ŋườʔita kêʔuwan bởʔi tăj kó kườŋkwiền ápcế kêʔukứʔu ɲưŋ xôŋ ʔaj hỏʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa kủʔa tôʔi dâʔu ŋàʔi xiến cɔ ŋườʔita vuimừŋ cɔŋ bandêm zạʔizỗ cúŋtôʔi dượk tʰôŋ sáŋ kák lɔàʔi tʰú cên dất và cɔ cởnên xônŋwan kák lɔàʔi cim cờʔi ŋườʔita kêʔula sɔŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ dáp lờʔi vì kớ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa zanák kwảtʰật lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện ɣiả Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ zủ ŋɛ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cẳŋ tʰèm dɔáʔi dến huốŋci xi ôŋ nóʔi zằŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi ŋàʔi sự káʔɔ tụŋ dã dɛm dến cướk ŋàʔi ôŋ dợʔi ŋàʔi sétdɔán bâʔizờ kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi cưʔa ɣiáŋ fạt và ŋàʔi xôŋ dến kiêʔuhãɲ cɔ nêŋióp mởmiệŋ za diềʔu hưxôŋ và nóʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu lờʔi vôci nóʔi zằŋ sin hãʔi ɲịn tôʔi mộtcút tôʔi cỉ cɔ ôŋ vì tôʔi kòn ɲữŋ lờʔi biɲ vựk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dɛm dến sa diềʔu tôʔi hiểʔubiết và sưŋ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa tôʔi kwả kák lờʔi tôʔi cẳŋ fảʔi ɣiảzốʔi Ðấŋ cọnvẹn citʰứk dươŋ kùŋ ôŋ kìʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó kwiềnnăŋ xôŋ xiɲbỉ ʔaj cí ŋàʔi zất zộŋlớn ŋàʔi cẳŋ bảʔɔtồn mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa zanák ɲưŋ sử dɔán kôŋbìɲ cɔ xổ ŋàʔi cẳŋ sâʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sɔŋŋàʔi xiến dồŋ ŋồʔi kùŋ kák vwa cên ŋôʔi mãʔimãʔi và dượk kawcọŋ nếʔu fảʔi maŋ siềŋsíc và zâʔi zancuân vướŋ tʰìŋàʔi cỉ cɔ kôŋviệk mìɲ dã kák tộʔilỗʔi táɲ hạɲ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa ŋàʔi kũŋ taj kủʔa cúŋ cɔ ŋɛ lờʔi sửʔa zạʔi xwiên cởlạʔi diềʔu zanák nếʔu cúŋ vâŋ ŋɛ fụk ŋàʔi tʰì kák ŋàʔi cúŋ dượk măimắn và ɲữŋ cúŋ dượk vujsướŋ ɲưŋ nếʔu xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tʰeo ɣươm ɣiết và cết xôŋ hiểʔubiết ɣì lòŋ ɣiả hìɲtíc cứʔa tʰạɲ xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi siềŋ cúŋ cúŋ cẳŋ kêʔukứʔu cúŋ cết dươŋ buổʔi tʰɛɲsuân Ðờʔi cúŋ cɔŋ zanzâm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zùŋ hɔạnnạn kứʔu hɔạnnạn và ɲờ taj kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋàʔi kũŋ cắk dã zụ ôŋ xỏʔi hɔạnnạn ôŋ nơʔi xɔảŋxɔát cẳŋ kòn kựk lòŋ kòn kák zọn nơʔi ôŋ dềʔu dượk dầʔi béʔɔ ɲưŋ ôŋ dầʔizẫʔi ŋịluận kủʔa ák sự sétdɔán hìɲfạt cắk ôŋ cớ dể kơn ɣiận ɣiụk ôŋ cốŋkự kùŋ sửʔa fạt Ðừŋ lầmlạk kớ ɣiá bộʔi tʰườŋ kwá cớ tʰì ɣiàʔukó ôŋ kák tʰếlựk kủʔa ôŋ kótʰể kứʔu ôŋ xỏʔi hɔạnnạn saw cớ ướkaw dêmtốʔi là lúk zântộk kất di xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ xá ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ cớ sâʔi tộʔiák vì ấʔilà diềʔu ôŋ ưʔa cọn hɔạnnạn kìʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zùŋ kwiềnnăŋ làmviệk kác kawkả kó ɣiáʔɔsư nàʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋàʔi căŋ ʔaj kó cỉ zạʔi cɔ ŋàʔi kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi và ʔaj nóʔi zằŋ cúʔa kó kwấʔi hãʔi ɲớ ŋợʔixɛn kák kôŋviệk cúʔa mà lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰườŋ kó katụŋ mọʔi ŋuờʔi dềʔu dã ŋɔạn sɛm kôŋviệk ấʔi và lɔàʔiŋườʔi sa ɲìn tʰấʔi fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kựkdạʔi cúŋta xôŋ dượk ŋàʔi số kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰọ xôŋ ʔaj siết dượk vìŋàʔi tʰâʔu kák ɣiọt nướk zồʔi ɣiọt nướk ấʔi hóʔaza mưʔa mâʔi dổ mưʔa ấʔi za nó ɣiọt suốŋ zất ɲiềʔu cên lɔàʔiŋườʔi ʔaj kótʰể hiểʔu dượk kác mâʔi ɣiăŋ za và tiếŋ lôʔidìɲ kủʔa ɲà cạʔi ŋàʔi kìʔa cúʔa bủʔa áɲsáŋ za cuŋkwɛɲ ŋàʔi và cɛlấp dáʔi vì ɲờ ɲữŋ diềʔu ấʔi ŋàʔi sétdɔán kák zântộk ŋàʔi cɔ lươŋtʰựk ɲiềʔu ŋàʔi ɣiấʔu cɔŋ tăj ŋàʔi và cwiền fảʔi dáɲ nơʔi nàʔɔ tiếŋ báʔɔkáʔɔ việk ŋàʔi và cíɲ súkvật kũŋ dɔán diềm zôŋ mưʔa ɣần dến fảʔi cáʔitim tôʔi zunsợ dó nó ɲảʔi dộŋ zờʔi xỏʔi cỗ xá ŋɛ xá ŋɛ ɣiọŋ vaŋ zầʔi kủʔa tiếŋ ŋàʔi và tiếŋ za xỏʔi miệŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi xiến zộʔi zướʔi kák từŋ cờʔi và cớpɲɔáŋ ŋàʔi ciếʔu dếnkùŋ cáʔidất kế kótiếŋ ŋàʔi fát tiếŋ waiŋi zền za và xi nổʔitiếŋ ŋàʔi tʰì xôŋ kầmzữ cớpɲɔáŋ lạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fát tiếŋ zền za ŋàʔi ɲữŋ kôŋviệk lớnlaw cúŋta hiểʔu xôŋ nổʔi vìŋàʔi fán vớʔi twiết zằŋ hãʔi suốŋ dất và kũŋ fán vậʔi cɔ cận mưʔamâʔi mưʔa ŋàʔi niêmfɔŋ tăj kủʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi ŋàʔi dã zựŋ dượk kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋàʔi xi ấʔi kák tʰúvật zừŋ zút cɔŋ haŋ và cɔŋ kủʔa cúŋnó từ kák lầʔu kák fươŋ bãʔɔ tớʔi và ɣió bắk zẫn lạɲlẽʔɔ dến nướkdá tʰàɲza bởʔi hơʔi tʰở kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bề zộŋ kủʔa nướk dôŋdặk lạʔi ŋàʔi cứʔa nướk cɔŋ mâʔi và ɣiăŋ za kák mâʔi cớpɲɔáŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲờŋàʔi zẫnzắt băj xắp tứfươŋ Ðặŋ sɔŋ kôŋviệk ŋàʔi fán biểʔu cên xắp cáʔidất ŋàʔi saj mâʔi hɔặk dể ɣiáŋọʔa hɔặk dể tướʔi dất hɔặk dể cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi hỡʔizóp hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi nầʔi xá dứŋ ʔiên swiŋĩ kák việk ziệʔukỳ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ôŋ kó kác nàʔɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sắpdặt kák việk ấʔi căŋ kác nàʔɔ ŋàʔi ciếʔu lòʔa cớpɲɔáŋ kủʔa mâʔi ŋàʔi căŋ Ôŋ kó mâʔi kân bìɲ saw căŋ kó hiểʔu kôŋviệk ziệʔukỳ kủʔa Ðấŋ kó cí cọnvẹn saw căŋ kó kớsaw kwầnáʔɔ ôŋ nóŋ xiŋàʔi lấʔi ɣió cɔ cáʔidất dượk ʔan tịɲ Ôŋ kó tʰế cảʔi bầʔucờʔi za vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ nó vữŋcắk ɲư kíɲ dúk hãʔi zạʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi biếtdiềʔu cúŋtôʔi fảʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ ŋàʔi vì tạʔi zốtnát cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ bàʔi lờʔi ɣì vớʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔita tʰuật vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi tʰưʔa vớʔi ŋàʔi saw nếʔu ʔaj nóʔi vớʔi ŋàʔi kwả di bâʔizờ ŋườʔita xôŋ tʰấʔi sáŋ cóʔilòʔa dã cɔŋ mâʔi ɲưŋ ɣió tʰổʔi kwa sô mâʔi di cờʔi cɔŋcẻʔɔ lạʔi záŋ vàŋ fươŋ bắk dến nơʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kó waiŋiêm dáŋsợ tʰăj luận Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ xôŋ tʰấʔi dến ŋàʔi dượk ŋàʔi zất kwiềnnăŋ zất cáɲ cựk kôŋbìɲ kựkdiểm xôŋ ʔaj bởʔi kớ ấʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ dɔáʔi dến nàʔɔ tưởŋ mìɲ kó lòŋ xônŋwan bấʔizờ ɣiữʔa kơn ɣió cốt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáp kùŋ ɣióp zằŋ kẻ nầʔi ʔaj zám zùŋ kák lờʔi xôŋ citʰứk mà cɔ kák mưʔu dịɲ xá tʰắtlưŋ ŋườʔi ɲư zõŋ ta hỏʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cỉ zạʔi cɔ xi dặt cáʔidất tʰì ŋươʔi dâʔu nếʔu ŋươʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi tỏbàʔi di ʔaj dã dịɲ dộlượŋ và ɣiăŋ zâʔimựk cên ŋươʔi kó căŋ nền dặt cên ci ʔaj kó cồŋ dá ɣók kủʔa cɔŋ xi ấʔi kák saw maj dồŋ hòʔa ɲăw và kák kɔncaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ vảlạʔi xi kất za xỏʔi lòŋ dất ʔaj dã lấʔi kák kửʔa ŋăn dóŋ lạʔi xi ấʔi cɔ mâʔi áʔɔsốŋ lấʔi tămtốʔi xăn kủʔa ta dịɲ ɣiớʔihạn cɔ tʰɛncốt kửʔa kủʔa mà zằŋ mầʔi dến dâʔi cớ xôŋ di sa nữʔa kák sóŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ mầʔi fảʔi zừŋ lạʔi tạʔi dâʔi từ xi ŋươʔi sɛɲ ŋươʔi kó sajxiến buổʔisáŋ và fândịɲ cỗ cɔ hừŋ dôŋ ciếʔu dến cáʔidất và duổʔi zảʔi zanák xỏʔi căŋ cáʔidất biếɲìɲ ɲư dấtsét zướʔi zấʔuấn và mọʔi za căwzồʔi ɲư bằŋ áʔɔ sự sáŋ dã kất xỏʔi ák káɲtăj cúŋnó ɣiơ dã ɣãʔi zồʔi cớ tʰì ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔu dến ŋuồn kủʔa saw há kó bướk zướʔi dáʔi kủʔa vựk sâʔu căŋ kửʔa âmfủ kó bàʔi za cướk ŋươʔi cớ kó tʰấʔi kák kửʔa kủʔa bóŋ cết căŋ lằn ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔu dếnnơʔi xwan xɔát miɲmôŋ kủʔa dất căŋ nếʔu ŋươʔi kák diềʔu dó hãʔi nóʔi di kɔn dườŋzẫn dếnnơʔi kủʔa áɲsáŋ dâʔu kòn nơʔi kủʔa tốʔităm tʰì dâʔu cớ tʰì ŋươʔi kó tʰế zẫn lạʔi vàʔɔ dịʔazớʔi saw kó kák dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ɲà căŋ xôŋ saj ŋườʔi vì ŋươʔi dã sɛɲ cướk xi ấʔi số ŋàʔi ŋươʔi lấʔilàm ɲiềʔu tʰăj ŋươʔi kó vàʔɔ kák xɔ twiết căŋ kó tʰấʔi nơʔi cứʔa mưʔadá mà dã dểzàɲ cɔ tʰì hɔạnnạn cɔ ŋàʔi ciếncận ɣiặkzã căŋ Áɲsáŋ fân za bởʔi dườŋ nàʔɔ và ɣió dôŋ tʰeo lốʔi nàʔɔ tʰổʔi za cên dất ʔaj dàʔɔ kíɲ cɔ nướk mưʔa cảʔi fóŋ dườŋ cɔ cớpɲɔáŋ kủʔa mưʔa suốŋ dất bỏhwaŋ và cên dồŋ vắŋ xôŋ kó ŋườʔiở Ðặŋ tướʔi dất hwaŋvu mɔŋ kwạɲ và cɔ kák cồʔi kâʔicỏ mọk mưʔa kó ca căŋ ʔaj sɛɲ kák ɣiọt sươŋ za nướkdá za bởʔi lòŋ kủʔa ʔaj ʔaj dẻ za sươŋmók kủʔa cờʔi nướk dôŋ lạʔi ɲư dá zồʔi và vựk sâʔu cởtʰàɲ kứŋ ŋươʔi kó tʰế ziết kák zâʔicằŋ saw zwa lạʔi và tác kák siềŋ saw kầʔi za căŋ ŋươʔi kó tʰế cɔ kák kuŋ huỳɲ dạʔɔ za tʰeo tʰì và zẫn dườŋ cɔ bắk dẩʔu vớʔi kák saw tʰeo căŋ ŋườʔi kó kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi saw kótʰể củkwiền zướʔi dất căŋ ŋươʔi kó tʰế kấttiếŋ mìɲ kùŋ mâʔi xiến cɔ mưʔa suốŋ tʰân ŋươʔi căŋ ŋươʔi kó tʰế tʰả cớpɲɔáŋ za di dáp vớʔi ŋươʔi zằŋ tʰưʔa cúŋtôʔi dâʔi ʔaj kó dặt xônŋwan cɔŋ lòŋ và tʰôŋ sáŋ cɔ cínãʔɔ ʔaj ɲờ xônŋwan dếm dượk kák mâʔi xi bụʔi dất cảʔi ɲư lɔàʔi za và kák kụk dất zíɲ lạʔi ɲăw ʔaj ŋiêŋ dổ ɲữŋ bìɲ nướk kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi xi mẹkɔn fụk nơʔi haŋ xi zìɲ cɔŋ bụʔi zậm há kó fảʔi ŋươʔi mồʔi cɔ káʔi và cɔ kɔn dóʔi dượk nɔ saw ʔaj dồăn cɔ kwạ xi kɔnɲỏ kêʔula kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và băj di dâʔidó xôŋ dồăn ŋươʔi kó tʰì nàʔɔ zê zừŋ dẻ căŋ kó sɛmsét mùʔa nàʔɔ naj káʔi dẻ căŋ ŋươʔi kó tíɲ tʰáŋ kótʰaj và dẻ căŋ nó ŋồʔicồmhỗm dẻ kɔnɲỏ za và dượk ɣiảʔi xỏʔi dăwdớn kủʔa kák kɔnɲỏ cởnên mạɲmẽ cɔŋ dồŋnộʔi Ðʔɔạn lìʔa mìɲ cẳŋ kòn cởlạʔi nữʔa ʔaj dể cɔ kɔn lừʔa zừŋ cạʔi tʰɔŋzɔŋ ʔaj kó cóʔi cɔ kɔn lừʔa lẹlàŋ kiə ta dã cɔ dồŋ vắŋ ɲà và zuộŋ nơʔi nó xiɲ cê tiếŋ ồnàʔɔ kủʔa tʰịtʰàɲ xôŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa kɔj zắt xắp kák núʔi dồŋkỏ kủʔa nó mọʔi sɛɲtươʔi cớ tʰì kɔn làmviệk cɔ ŋươʔi căŋ nó cịʔu ɣần máŋ kỏ ŋươʔi cớ ŋươʔi kótʰể lấʔi zâʔi kột nơʔi ɣiòŋ kàʔi saw nó cịʔu tʰeo săw ŋươʔi bừʔa cũŋ căŋ ŋươʔi ɲờkậʔi sứk ɲiềʔu saw ŋươʔi zaw kôŋlaw mìɲ cɔ căŋ cờ tʰì ŋươʔi kậʔi dɛm ŋũkốk và ɲờ ɣɔm lúʔamì lạʔi cɔŋ ŋươʔi cim lạkdà dập káɲ vuimừŋ ɲưŋ káɲ lôŋ ấʔi kó tʰươŋiêʔu saw vì dể cứŋ mìɲ zướʔi dất vùʔi nóŋ cứŋ ấʔi nơʔi bụʔi kát kwên zằŋ kólẽ cơn ŋườʔi bướk hɔặk kɔn tʰú dồŋ ɣiàʔidạp di căŋ nó xắkxổ vớʔi kɔn zườŋɲư xôŋ tʰuộk sự lawxổ luốŋ kôŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ lɔ kăm dến vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kất xônŋwan xỏʔi xôŋ fânciə tʰôŋ sáŋ cɔ xi dập káɲ băj bèn ɲạʔɔbáŋ ŋựʔa ŋườʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa kó fảʔi ŋươʔi sứklựk cɔ ŋựʔa và fủ kổ lôŋ ɣáʔi zuŋ zuŋ căŋ há kó fảʔi ŋươʔi xiến ɲảʔi búŋ ɲư kàʔɔkàʔɔ căŋ tiếŋ kêʔu kó waj kủʔa tʰật dáŋsợ nó dàʔɔ dất cɔŋ cũŋ vuimừŋ sứklựk mìɲ nó sôŋ tớʔi dón kwân kầm biɲxí nó xiɲ cê cẳŋ ɣê diềʔu ci cướk ŋọn ɣươm xôŋ sâʔi cở cên vaŋ tiếŋ ɣùʔi ɣiáʔɔ law sáŋ ɣiớʔi nó zậm vừʔa ɲảʔi vừʔa xi tʰổʔi cẳŋ kầm mìɲ lạʔi dượk vừʔa xi ŋɛ tʰổʔi hi hi từ sa dáɲhơʔi mùʔi ɣiặk ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa kák kwan tướŋ tiếŋ zeo kủʔa ciếnsĩ kó fảʔi ɲờ xôn ŋươʔi kɔn ziềʔu vùŋ băj di và káɲ hướŋ kó fảʔi tʰeo lịɲ ŋươʔi cim ưŋ kất và dóŋ tạʔi nơʔi kaw nó cɔŋ bàntʰạc dậʔu cên cótvót dá tạʔi cên dỉɲ núʔi xôŋ ʔaj dượk từ dó zìɲ mồʔi mắt tʰấʔi mồʔi sa kák kɔnɲỏ hwiết và nơʔi nàʔɔ kó sákcết tʰì kó tạʔi dó Ðứkzê kòn dáp lạʔi cɔ ɣióp zằŋ kẻ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ cɛɲluận kùŋ ŋàʔi saw kẻ kãʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi dáp diềʔu dó di ɣióp tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ zaɣì dáp ci vớʔi cúʔa tôʔi dặt tăj cɛ miệŋ tôʔi tôʔi dã nóʔi sɔŋ cẳŋ kòn dáp lạʔi fảʔi tôʔi dã nóʔi haj ɲưŋ xôŋ nóʔi tʰêm ɣì nữʔa từ ɣiữʔa cận ɣió cốt Ðứkzê dáp kùŋ ɣióp zằŋ hãʔi tʰắtlưŋ ŋươʔi ɲư zõŋ ta hỏʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cỉ zạʔi cɔ ŋươʔi kó fế dɔán saw kó dịɲtộʔi cɔ dặŋ sưŋ mìɲ kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi kó káɲtăj ɲư kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ kótʰể fát tiếŋ zền ɲư ŋàʔi saw vậʔi bâʔizờ ŋươʔi hãʔi caŋdiểm mìɲ bằŋ kawsaŋ waiŋi mặk lấʔi tôncọŋ viɲhiển xá za ɣiận hɔảŋốt kủʔa ŋươʔi hãʔi liếk sɛm kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dáɲ di hãʔi liếk kɔj kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dáɲ di xá cà huŋbạʔɔ tạʔicỗ hãʔi ɣiấʔu cúŋnó cuŋ ɲăw cɔŋ bụʔi dất và cɔŋ cốn kíndáʔɔ bấʔizờ kũŋ xɛnŋợʔi ŋươʔi vì tăj hữʔu ŋươʔi cửŋ kứʔu ŋươʔi dượk nầʔi kɔncâʔu nướk dã zựŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi nó kỏ ɲư kɔn hãʔi sɛm sứk nơʔi lưŋ mãɲlựk cɔŋ ɣân hôŋ nó kɔŋ duôʔi ɲư kâʔi hươŋ ɣân dùʔi céʔɔ sỏ zế kák sươŋ ɲư ốŋ dồŋ tứci ɲư kâʔi nó kôŋviệk xéʔɔ ɲứt kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ zựŋ zaw cɔ kâʔi ɣươm kủʔa kák núʔinɔn sɛɲ dồŋkỏ cɔ là nơʔi kák tʰú dồŋ cơʔi ɣiỡn nó ŋủ zướʔi bôŋ sɛn cɔŋ bụʔi sậʔi nơʔi bưŋ bôŋ sɛn cɛ bóŋ cɔ và kâʔi liễʔu kủʔa zạc vâʔi kwɛɲ kìʔa sôŋ càn zữtợn ɲưŋ xôŋ sợhãʔi ɣì zầʔu sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ bủʔa miệŋ kũŋ vữŋvàŋ ʔaj dượk cướk ʔaj cɔŋ lướʔi zồʔi sɔj mũʔi ŋươʔi kótʰể kâʔu sấʔu vớʔi lưỡʔicâʔu và zùŋ zâʔi sỏ lưỡʔi căŋ kótʰể sỏ mâʔi kwa mũʔi và sɔj bằŋ káʔi mók nó kầʔu ɲiềʔu kùŋ ŋươʔi và nóʔi vớʔi ŋươʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi êmáʔi saw nó zawướk vớʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi tôʔimọʔi dờʔidờʔi cớ ŋươʔi cơʔi ɣiỡn vớʔi ɲư vớʔi kɔn cim kột cɔ kák kɔŋáʔi ɲỏ mìɲ cơʔi hăjsaw bọn tʰợ kâʔu xôŋ fânfát cɔ kák láʔibuôn căŋ ŋươʔi kótʰể lấʔi káʔi dọk dâm dầʔi za zùŋ law fóŋ ká ɣăm dầʔi dầʔu căŋ hãʔi tʰử ca tăj ŋươʔi cên mìɲ về săw xá ɲớ việk cɛɲdấʔu cớ hạʔi ʔaj nữʔa kìʔa côŋ dượk cỉ tʰấʔi tướŋ zạŋ ŋườʔita zụŋzờʔi di cẳŋ ʔaj dủ ɣan zám cêʔucọk vậʔi ʔaj dứŋ cướk cɔ nổʔi ʔaj cɔ cướk dã fảʔi cả lạʔi cɔ fàm cɔ zướʔi cờʔi dềʔu tʰuộk ta nóʔi kák ci tʰể về sứklựk tốtdẹp kủʔa hìɲcạŋ kó ʔaj dượk áʔɔcɔàŋ kủʔa xôŋ kó ʔaj vàʔɔ cɔŋ dôʔi kủʔa dượk căŋ ʔaj mởkửʔa họŋ za sự kiɲxủŋ vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ zăŋ nó kó wajhùŋ kớ kák hàŋ xiên kủʔa bằŋ tʰẳŋ zíɲ xằn ɲăw ɲư dượk niêmfɔŋ káʔi nầʔi dụŋ vớʔi káʔi xák dỗʔi ɣió cẳŋ kwa dượk káʔi nầʔi hàŋ lạʔi vớʔi káʔi kiə zíɲ vớʔi ɲăw
