xôŋ zờʔizã sự ɲảʔimũʔi nóʔi ɣiăŋ áɲsáŋ za haj kɔn xáknàʔɔ kủʔa zạŋdôŋ ɲữŋ ŋọn lửʔa ɲɔáŋ miệŋ và kák dám lửʔa fun za từ mũʔi xóʔi băj za ɲư kủʔa nồʔi sôʔi kó cụm sậʔi zướʔi hơʔi tʰở hừŋ cáʔi tʰan một ŋọn lửʔa za miệŋ cɔŋ kổ kó mãɲlựk và kiɲ xiếp ɲảʔimúʔa cướk kák ʔiếm tʰịt zíɲ cắn ɲăw nó ɲư dúk cên tʰân xôŋ cwiểndộŋ cáʔitim kứŋ ɲư dá kứŋ xáknàʔɔ tʰớt kốʔi zướʔi xi cổʔi zậʔi kák ʔɛɲhùŋ dềʔu zunsợ vì kiɲhãʔi cạʔi cốn di xi ŋườʔita lấʔi ɣươm dâm ɣươm cẳŋ hiệʔu ci zẫʔucɔ ɣiáʔɔ káʔi zọk hăjlà law fóŋ kũŋ vậʔi nó kɔj xáknàʔɔ zơm kỏ và dồŋ ɲưtʰể kâʔi mụk mũʔitên xôŋ cɔ cạʔi cốn càɲ vớʔi xáknàʔɔ kâʔi zạ nó kũŋ sɛm ɣậʔi ɲư zạ kườʔi ɲạʔɔ tiếŋ vɔvɔ kủʔa kâʔi ɣiáʔɔ zướʔi bụŋ kó ɲữŋ miểŋ ɲọn nó zườŋɲư cươŋ bừʔa cên dất nó cɔ vựk sâʔu sôʔi ɲư káʔi nồʔi xiến cởtʰàɲ ɲư zầʔu sứk và lạʔi săw dườŋ kàʔi di sáŋsủʔa ŋườʔita kólẽ tưởŋ zằŋ vựk sâʔu tók bạk tạʔi tʰế tʰượŋ cẳŋ kó ci ɣiốŋ ɲư nó dượk zựŋ dể xôŋ ɣì nó ɲìn sɛm kák kawlớn nó vwa kủʔa kák lɔàʔi tʰú kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ɣióp tʰưʔa vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ tôʔi zằŋ cúʔa kótʰể dượk mọʔi cẳŋ kó cỉ nàʔɔ cúʔa lấʔi làmxó kẻ nầʔi ʔaj xôŋ hiểʔubiết ɣì lạʔi zám cɛ cỉ kủʔa cúʔa fảʔi tôʔi dã nóʔi ɲữŋ diềʔu tôʔi xôŋ hiểʔu dến tứk kák lạlùŋ kwá cɔ tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ tʰôŋ hỡʔicúʔa sin hãʔi ŋɛ tôʔi nóʔi tôʔi hỏʔi cúʔa cúʔa cỉ zạʔi cɔ tôʔi cướk taj tôʔi kó ŋɛ dồn cúʔa ɲưŋ bâʔizờ tôʔi dã tʰấʔi ŋàʔi vìvậʔi tôʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣê tôʔi và cɔŋ cɔ bụʔi sảʔi săw xi Ðứkzê dã fán kák lờʔi ấʔi vớʔi ɣióp tʰì ŋàʔi fán kùŋ lifa ŋườʔi tʰêman zằŋ kơn tʰạɲ nổʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi haj bạɲữʔu ŋươʔi bởʔivì kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó nóʔi kác sứŋdáŋ ʔiɲư ɣióp tôʔitớ dã nóʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi bảʔi kɔn dựk bảʔi kɔnciên dựk di dến ɣióp tôʔitớ kák ŋươʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu zồʔi ɣióp tôʔitớ kầʔuŋwiện cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲậm lờʔi ŋườʔi kẻʔɔ ʔɛ dãʔi kák ŋươʔi tùʔi tʰeo ŋumuộʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ kó nóʔi kác sứŋdáŋ ɲư ɣióp tôʔitớ dã nóʔi vậʔi lifa ŋườʔi tʰêman biɲdát ŋườʔi su ʔa sôfa ŋườʔi naama di tʰeo diềʔu Ðứkzê dã fán zặn mìɲ zồʔi Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi kủʔa ɣióp vậʔi xi ɣióp dã kầʔuŋwiện cɔ bạɲữʔu mìɲ zồʔi Ðứkzê dɛm ŋườʔi za xỏʔi kảɲ xốn ŋườʔi lạʔi cɔ ɣióp bằŋ ɣấp haj kák tàʔisản ŋườʔi dã kó cướk hếttʰảʔi ʔɛɲɛm ŋườʔi cịʔɛm ŋườʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kwɛnbiết ɣióp cướk dềʔu dến tʰăm bữʔa vớʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi cúŋ ciə ʔanủʔi ŋườʔi kák tajhọʔa Ðứkzê dã xiến ɣiáŋ cên ŋườʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu cɔ ɣióp bạk káʔi vòŋ vàŋ ɲưvậʔi Ðứkzê fướk cɔ buổʔi ɣià kủʔa ɣióp ɲiềʔu lúk daŋ tʰì ŋườʔi dượk mườʔibốn ŋàn ciên sáʔu ŋàn lạkdà mộtŋàn dôʔi mộtŋàn lừʔa káʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ kó bảʔi kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi ŋườʔi dặt cɔ kɔŋáʔi ɣiêmima kɔntʰứ ɲì kêsiə kɔntʰứ kêzɛɲakúk cɔŋ tɔàn sứ cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ lịcsự bằŋ kɔŋáʔi kủʔa ɣióp ca kủʔa cɔ fần kơŋiệp cɔŋ ʔɛɲɛm săw việk ấʔi ɣióp kòn sốŋ mộtcăm mươʔi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi kák kɔncaj cáʔu cít mìɲ dến dờʔi tʰứtư zồʔizóp kwadờʔi tuổʔi kaw ták fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cẳŋ tʰeo mưʔukế kủʔa zữ cẳŋ dứŋ cɔŋ dườŋ tộʔi ɲơn xôŋ ŋồʔi cỗ kủʔa ɲạʔɔbáŋ sɔŋ lấʔilàm vujvẻ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê và swiɣẫm luậtfáp ấʔi ŋàʔi dêm ŋườʔi ấʔi ɲư kâʔicồŋ ɣần zòŋ nướk sɛɲ bôŋ cáʔi tʰeo tʰì lá kũŋ cẳŋ héʔɔ mọʔi ŋườʔilàm dềʔu tʰạɲ vượŋ kẻ ák cẳŋ ɲưvậʔi dâʔu ɲưŋ cúŋnó xáknàʔɔ zơmzák ɣió tʰổʔi băj di bởʔi kớ ấʔi ák cẳŋ dứŋ nổʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dɔán sét tộʔi ɲơn kũŋ xôŋ dượk vàʔɔ hộʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ vìÐứkzê dườŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sɔŋdườŋ ák zồʔi ziệtvɔŋ ɲơn saw kák ŋɔạʔibaŋ náʔɔlɔạn và ɲữŋ zântộk twan mưʔucướk hưxôŋ kák vwa tʰếzan nổʔizậʔi kák kwan cưởŋ ŋị kùŋ ɲăw ŋịcÐứkzê ŋịc Ðấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi lòʔitóʔi kủʔa haj ŋườʔi và kwăŋ sa siềŋsíc kủʔa Ðấŋ ŋự cên cờʔi kườʔi cúʔa ɲạʔɔbáŋ cúŋnó bấʔizờ ŋàʔi nổʔi tʰạɲ fán kùŋ cúŋnó zùŋ kơn ɣiậnzữ mìɲ xuấʔi xỏʔa cúŋnó zằŋ zầʔu vậʔi dã vwa cênsi núʔi tʰáɲ ta ɣiảŋ za mạŋ lịɲ Ðứkzê fán kùŋ zằŋ ŋươʔi kɔn ŋàʔinăj dã sɛɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi kầʔu cɔ kɔn kák ŋɔạʔibaŋ kơŋiệp và kák dầʔu kùŋ dất kủʔakảʔi kɔn zùŋ kâʔi ɣậʔi dập cúŋnó kɔn cúŋnó xáknàʔɔ bìɲ ɣốm vìvậʔi hỡʔi kák vwa hãʔi xônŋwan hỡʔi kák kwan sét tʰếzan hãʔi cịʔu zạʔizỗ xá hầʔu việk Ðứkzê kác kíɲ và mừŋzỡ kác zunzẩʔi hãʔi kɔn ʔɛ ŋườʔi nổʔizận và kák ŋươʔi cɔŋ dườŋ căŋ vì kơn tʰạɲ ŋườʔi hòŋ nổʔi fàm nàʔɔ nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋườʔi kó fướk tʰăj Ðứkzê ôʔi kừʔudịc tôʔi dã tʰêm ɲiềʔu zườŋ baw lắm zấʔi kùŋ tôʔi tʰăj biếtbaw nóʔi liɲhồn tôʔi zằŋ nơʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ kó kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ ɲưŋ hỡʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi káʔi xiên cởcɛ tôʔi ŋàʔi viɲhiển tôʔi Ðấŋ cɔ tôʔi ŋướk dầʔu tôʔi lấʔi tiếŋ tôʔi kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê từ núʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi dáp lờʔi tôʔi tôʔi nằmsuốŋ ŋủ tôʔi tỉɲ tʰứk Ðứkzê nâŋdỡ tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ naw ŋườʔi vâʔi tôʔi xắp hỡʔiÐứkzê hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi vìcúʔa dã kák tʰùŋịc tôʔi và ɣãʔi zăŋ ák sự kứʔuzỗʔi tʰuộk Ðứkzê ŋwiện fướk ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ cên zânsự ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kôŋbìɲ tôʔi xi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu sin hãʔi dáp lờʔi tôʔi xi tôʔi zancuân ŋàʔi dể tôʔi cɔŋ nơʔi zộŋzãʔi sin hãʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi hỡʔi kák kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi viɲhiển sỉɲụk cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi ưʔa diềʔu hưxôŋ và zốʔicá cɔdến bawzờ fảʔibiết zằŋ Ðứkzê dã dể ziêŋ cɔ mìɲ ŋườʔi ɲơn dứk xi kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kák ŋươʔi xá ʔɛsợ cớ fạmtộʔi cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ hãʔi swiɣẫm cɔŋ lòŋ làmtʰiɲ hãʔi zâŋ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa và dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi nóʔi ʔaj cɔ cúŋta tʰấʔi fướk hỡʔiÐứkzê sin sɔj cên cúŋtôʔi sáŋ ŋàʔi cúʔa xiến lòŋ tôʔi vuimừŋ ɲiềʔu cúŋnó zầʔu xi cúŋnó kó lúʔamì zượʔuɲɔ zưzật hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi ŋủ bìɲan vì cỉ mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi dượk ʔiênổn hỡʔiÐứkzê sin lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi sɛmsét swiɣẫm tôʔi hỡʔivwa tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi sin hãʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔu kủʔa tôʔi vì tôʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ cúʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi buổʔisáŋ ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi buổʔisáŋ tôʔi cìɲbàʔi zwiênkớ tôʔi cướk ŋàʔi côŋdợʔi vìcúʔa cẳŋ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bằŋlòŋ zữ kẻ ák xôŋ dượk kùŋ cúʔa kẻ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ cẳŋ dứŋ nổʔi cướk cúʔa cúʔa ɣét hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ák cúʔa hủʔiziệt kák nóʔizốʔi Ðứkzê ɣớmɣiếk ŋườʔi dổ hwiết zanlận kòn tôʔi ɲờ ɲơn zưzật kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi vàʔɔ ɲà cúʔa lấʔilòŋ kíɲ cúʔa tʰờ lạʔi cướk dền tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê ɲơn tʰùŋịc tôʔi sin lấʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi zẫnzắt tôʔi và bằŋ dườŋ ŋàʔi cướk tôʔi vì nơʔi miệŋ cúŋnó cẳŋ kó tʰàɲ lòŋ cúŋnó cỉ zantà họŋ cúŋnó hwiệt za lưỡʔi cúŋnó dầʔizẫʔi diềʔu zwa nịɲ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin hãʔi cừŋcị cúŋnó ŋwiện saŋã cɔŋ mưʔucướk mìɲ hãʔi sô duổʔi tộʔiák zất ɲiềʔu kủʔa vì dã fảnŋịc kùŋ cúʔa ɲưŋ fàm ʔaj nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi cúʔa xɔáʔilạk kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ dến mãʔimãʔi vìcúʔa bảʔɔhộ kák ŋườʔi ấʔi kẻ nàʔɔ áʔimộ zɛɲ cúʔakũŋ nứklòŋ mừŋzỡ nơʔi cúʔa vì hỡʔi Ðứkzê cíɲ ŋàʔi fướk cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ lấʔi vâʔi fủ ŋườʔi xáknàʔɔ bằŋ káʔi xiên Ðứkzê ôʔi sin cớ nổʔi tʰạɲ các tôʔi cớ sửʔa fạt tôʔi cɔŋ xi ŋàʔi ɣiận fừŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin tʰươŋsót tôʔi tôʔi ʔiếʔu lạʔiÐứkzê sin cữʔa tôʔi sươŋkốt tôʔi zunzẩʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi kũŋ bốʔizốʔi kwádỗʔi kònŋàʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ lạʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cởlạʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi lòŋ ɲơn ŋàʔi vì cɔŋ cết cẳŋ kòn ɲớ dến cúʔa nữʔa nơʔi âmfủ ʔaj kảmtạ cúʔa tôʔi sứk tʰantʰở mỗʔi dêm tôʔi côʔi ɣiườŋ tôʔi zầm vớʔi nướkmắt mắt tôʔi hawmòn buồntʰảm làŋ kớ kừʔudịc tôʔi hỡʔi ák kiə xá lìʔa sa hếttʰảʔi vìÐứkzê dã ŋɛ tiếŋ xóklók Ðứkzê dã ŋɛ nàʔisin ŋàʔi ɲậnlờʔi kầʔuŋwiện hếttʰảʔi tʰùŋịc tôʔi hổtʰẹn bốʔizốʔi cúŋnó luj lạʔi vộʔivàŋ kỡ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi sin hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi zượt duổʔi tôʔi tʰɔát ɣiảʔi tôʔi kẻʔɔ tʰùŋịc sé tôʔi ɲư kɔn và fân tôʔi mảɲ xôŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ɲượkbằŋ tôʔi dã diềʔu ấʔi và kó zanák nơʔi tăj tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi dã cả ák cɔ ŋườʔiở hòʔahảʔɔ kùŋ tôʔi và kướp tôʔi vôkớ tʰì dáŋ cɔ tʰùŋịc duổʔi tʰeo tôʔi ɣiàʔidạp mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi zướʔi dất và zạp viɲhiển tôʔi suốŋ bụʔi dất hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi nổʔi tʰạɲ cổʔi zậʔi hãʔi zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ɣiận hɔảŋ kủʔa tôʔi xá tỉɲ tʰứk ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi ŋàʔi dã cwiền dịɲ dɔán sét zồʔi hộʔi kák zântộk vâʔi fủ fíʔa ŋàʔi kònŋàʔi cúŋ fảʔi cởlên kaw Ðứkzê dɔán sét kák zân hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi dɔán sét tôʔi tʰeo kôŋbìɲ tôʔi và tʰeo tʰɛɲliêm nơʔi lòŋ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kôŋbìɲ Ðấŋ zòsét lòŋzạ lɔàʔiŋườʔi sin hãʔi xiến kùŋtận zanák zữ sɔŋ hãʔi cɔ vữŋvàŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi káʔi xiên tôʔi ŋàʔi Ðấŋ kứʔuzỗʔi ɲữŋ kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwan kôŋbìɲ tʰậtlà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi nổʔizận kùŋ ák nếʔu ák xôŋ hốʔicảʔi tʰì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi màʔi ɣươm ŋàʔi dã ɣiươŋ kuŋ cựk cɔ kũŋ dã sắmsửʔa xíɣiớʔi cết và ɲữŋ ŋàʔi fừŋ lửʔa kìʔa zữ dươŋ dẻ zanák tʰật dã hɔàʔitʰaj xuấʔi xỏʔa sɛɲ diềʔu zốʔicá nó dàʔɔ sâʔu ɲưŋ lạʔi vàʔɔ dã dàʔɔ sự xuấʔi xỏʔa dã dổ lạʔi cên dầʔu và huŋăŋ ɣiáŋ cên cán tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ʔi tʰeo kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi và katụŋ zɛɲ Ðứkzê Ðấŋcí kaw hỡʔiÐứkzê cúʔa cúŋtôʔi zɛɲcúʔa dượk saŋ kả cên xắp cáʔidất biếtbaw sự waiŋi cúʔa za cên kák từŋ cờʔi ɲơn kák kừʔudịc cúʔa cúʔa zɔ miệŋ cẻtʰơ ɲữŋ kɔn dươŋ mà năŋlựk ŋàʔi Ðặŋ cɔ ŋườʔi tʰùŋịc báʔɔtʰù fảʔi nínlặŋ xi tôʔi ɲìn sɛm kák từŋ cờʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋóntăj cúʔa mặtcăŋ kák ŋôʔisaw cúʔa dã dặt lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣì cúʔa ɲớ dến kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi ci cúʔa tʰămviếŋ cúʔa ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mộtcút Ðộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi viɲhiển saŋcọŋ cúʔa cɔ ŋườʔi kwiền kaicị kôŋviệk tăj cúʔa xiến fụk zướʔi cơn ŋườʔi kả lɔàʔi ciên lɔàʔi dỗʔi kák tʰúzừŋ cim cờʔi ká kùŋ fàm ɣì lộʔi di kák lốʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê cúʔa cúŋtôʔi zɛɲcúʔa dượk saŋ kả cên xắp cáʔidất biếtbaw tôʔi hếtlòŋ kảmtạ Ðứkzê tỏ za kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ cí kaw tôʔi vujvẻ nơʔi ŋàʔi và katụŋ zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi xi tʰùŋịc tôʔi luj bướk cúŋnó vấpŋã cướk cúʔa vìcúʔa biɲ vựk kwiềnlợʔi zwiênkớ tôʔi cúʔa ŋồʔi tòʔa dɔán sét kôŋbìɲ cúʔa dã kwởcác kák nướk hủʔiziệt ák sóʔa sạc zɛɲ cúŋnó dờʔidờʔi kẻtʰù ŋịc dã dếnkùŋ hủʔiziệt dờʔidờʔi kòn kák tʰàɲ cúʔa dã fá dổ zầʔu kũŋ dã zồʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê ŋồʔi kaicị dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi dã zựbị ŋôʔi mìɲ dể dɔán sét ŋàʔi lấʔi kôŋbìɲ dɔán sét tʰếzan zùŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ sử kák zântộk Ðứkzê nơʔi náʔu kaw cɔ một nơʔi náʔu kaw cɔŋ tʰì zancuân hỡʔiÐứkzê fàm ʔaj zɛɲ ŋàʔi dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi vìŋàʔi cẳŋ nàʔɔ ŋàʔi xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðấŋ ŋự tạʔi siôn hãʔi báʔɔkáʔɔ ɣiữʔa kák zânkôŋ việk tốʔicaw kủʔa ŋàʔi vìÐấŋ báʔɔtʰù hwiết ɲớ lạʔi xốnkùŋ cẳŋ kwên tiếŋ kêʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi sin tʰươŋsót tôʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ dɛm tôʔi xỏʔi kửʔa cết hãʔi sɛm zannan tôʔi mắk fảʔi tạʔi ɣét tôʔi hầʔu cɔ tạʔi kửʔa kɔŋáʔi siôn tôʔi za mọʔi ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa và mừŋzỡ kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi kák zân dã suốŋ cɔŋ cúŋnó dã dàʔɔ cơn kủʔa cúŋnó mắk vàʔɔ lướʔi cúŋnó dã ɣàʔi Ðứkzê tʰihàɲ dɔán sét mìɲ ŋàʔi za kẻ ák kôŋviệk tăj mìɲ cở lấʔi kẻ ák sô suốŋ âmfủ và kák zân kwên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ vậʔi ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn xôŋ kwên và xốnkùŋ cẳŋ tʰấtvọŋ mãʔimãʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi cớ cɔ ŋườʔidờʔi dượk tʰắŋ ŋwiện kák zân dɔán sét cướk ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cɔ cúŋnó sợhãʔi ŋwiện kák zân mìɲ cẳŋkwa ŋườʔi fàm Ðứkzê ôʔi kớ ŋàʔi dứŋ sa lúk zancuân tạʔisaw ŋàʔi mìɲ di kẻ ák lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ zượt tʰeo ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ ŋwiện cúŋnó fảʔi mắk cɔŋ mưʔucướk mìɲ dã twan vì ák xwej lòŋ zụk mìɲ kẻ tʰam kủʔa Ðứkzê xiɲzể ŋàʔi kẻ ák kiêʔuŋạʔɔ zằŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ hạchỏʔi cẳŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kìʔa tưtưởŋ kủʔa kák dườŋ dềʔu măimắn sự dɔán sét kủʔa cúʔa kaw kwá cẳŋ tʰấʔi dượk hắn cê hếttʰảʔi tʰùŋịc mìɲ hắn ŋĩ zằŋ ta cẳŋ lăjdộŋ ta xôŋ tajhọʔa ɣì dến dờʔidờʔi miệŋ dầʔi ŋwiềnzủʔa ɣiảzốʔi zanlận zướʔi lưỡʔi cỉ kó xuấʔi xỏʔa zanák hắn ŋồʔi nơʔi zìɲzập kủʔa làŋ ɣiết vôtộʔi cɔŋ nơʔi ẩnxuất kɔn zòm hàɲ ŋườʔi xốnxổ hắn fụk cɔŋ nơʔi kíndáʔɔ ɲư cɔŋ haŋ hắn zìɲzập dặŋ ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ xi kéʔɔ xốnkùŋ vàʔɔ lướʔi mìɲ tʰì dã dượk zồʔi hắn cùm kúʔi suốŋ kẻ xốnxổ vàʔɔ vấʔu hắn ŋĩ zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwên zồʔi ŋàʔi dã xôŋ sɛmsét Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi ɣiơ tăj ŋàʔi cớ kwên xốnkùŋ vì kớsaw ák xiɲzể Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và ŋĩ zằŋ cúʔa cẳŋ hạchỏʔi cúʔa dã tʰấʔi zồʔi cúʔa sɛmsét bạʔɔtàn dộcạʔi lấʔi cíɲ tăj cúʔa báʔɔ cả lạʔi kòn xốnxổ fó mìɲ cɔ cúʔa cúʔa Ðấŋ ɣiúpdỡ mồkôʔi hãʔi ɣãʔi káɲtăj ák và ca zanák kủʔa zữ cɔdến xôŋ kòn tʰấʔi ɣì nữʔa Ðứkzê vwa dến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ kák ŋɔạʔibaŋ ziệt xỏʔi dất kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi dã ŋɛ lờʔi ướkaw kủʔa xiến lòŋ dượk vữŋbền kũŋ dã lắŋtaj ŋɛ Ðặŋ sét kôŋbìɲ việk mồkôʔi ŋườʔi hầʔu cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi bởʔi dất za xôŋ kòn cɔ sợhãʔi nữʔa tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi Ðứkzê saw kák ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ liɲhồn hãʔi cốn núʔi ŋươʔi ɲư kɔn cim vì kìʔa ák ɣươŋ kuŋ ca mìɲ cên zâʔi Ðặŋ cɔŋ tốʔităm kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ nếʔu kák fá dổ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ làmsaw Ðứkzê ŋự cɔŋ dền tʰáɲ ŋàʔi ŋôʔiŋàʔi cên cờʔi kɔn ŋàʔi ɲìn sɛm mí ŋàʔi zò kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi Ðứkzê tʰử ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ lòŋ ŋàʔi ɣét ŋườʔi ák ưʔa huŋbạʔɔ ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ sốʔi cên ák ɲữŋ bẫʔi lửʔa ziêm một ŋọn ɣió fỏŋ fần kủʔa cúŋnó vìÐứkzê kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi ʔiêʔu kôŋbìɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ɲìn sɛmmặt ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin kứʔu cúŋtôʔi ŋườʔi ɲơn dứk xôŋ kòn nữʔa và tʰàɲ dã xỏʔi ɣiữʔa kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi cúŋ dềʔu zùŋ lờʔi zốʔicá nóʔi ɲăw lấʔi môʔi zwa nịɲ hajlòŋ mà còcwiện ɲăw Ðứkzê ziệt hếttʰảʔi kák môʔi zwa nịɲ và lưỡʔi hăj nóʔi kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ tứklà nóʔi zằŋ ɲờ lưỡʔi mìɲ cúŋta dượk tʰắŋ môʔi cúŋta tʰuộk cúŋta ʔaj cúʔa kủʔa cúŋta ɲơn ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn zênsiết Ðứkzê fán bâʔizờ cổʔi zậʔi ŋườʔi tạʔi nơʔi ʔiênổn nơʔi ŋườʔi mɔŋmuốn kák lờʔi Ðứkzê lờʔi cɔŋsạc zườŋɲư bạk dã tʰét cɔŋ nồʔi zót bằŋ ɣốm lwiện dến bảʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ kák ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ hằŋ bảʔɔtồn cɔ xỏʔi zòŋzõʔi nầʔi xi dượk dɛm kaw ɣiữʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰì ák di zạʔɔ kwɛɲ tứfíʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi hằŋ kwên tôʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋàʔi kùŋ tôʔi cɔdến bawzờ tôʔi fảʔi lɔlắŋ nơʔi liɲhồn tôʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi buồntʰảm nơʔi lòŋ tôʔi cɔdến bawzờ kẻtʰù ŋịc tôʔi cổʔi tôʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi sin hãʔi sɛmsét ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi và cɔ tôʔi dượk sáŋ kẻʔɔ tôʔi fảʔi ŋủ cết căŋ kẻtʰù ŋịc ʔi zằŋ ta dã tʰắŋ và kừʔudịc mừŋzỡ xi tôʔi siêʔu ɲưŋ tôʔi dã tinkậʔi nơʔi ɲơn cúʔa lòŋ tôʔi xɔáʔilạk kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã cɔ tôʔi kẻ ŋuzạʔi nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ cẳŋ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó dềʔu bạʔihɔạʔi dã ɲữŋ việk ɣớmɣiếk cẳŋ kó ʔaj dềʔu làɲ Ðứkzê cên cờʔi ŋó suốŋ kák kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi Ðặŋ sɛm tʰử kó ʔaj xônŋwan tìmkiếm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ cúŋnó tʰăitʰảʔi dềʔu bộʔiŋịc kùŋ ɲăw cởnên ôʔuế cẳŋ kó ʔaj diềʔu làɲ zầʔu ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋ kák ák cẳŋ hiểʔubiết saw cúŋnó zân xáknàʔɔ báɲ kũŋ cẳŋ kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê cúŋnó kơn kiɲ xiếp vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiữʔa zòŋzõʔi kôŋbìɲ kák ŋươʔi bạʔi mưʔu xốnkùŋ bởʔivì Ðứkzê nơʔi nươŋnáʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi Ôʔi cớci siôn kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã dến xiÐứkzê dɛm ɲữŋ fu kủʔa zânsự ŋàʔi tʰìza kốp mừŋzỡ ʔisơzaên vujvẻ hỡʔiÐứkzê ʔaj ŋụ cɔŋ dền ŋàʔi ʔaj cên núʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi Ấʔilà di tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ diềʔu kôŋbìɲ và nóʔi cântʰật cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ kẻ nàʔɔ kó lưỡʔi xôŋ nóʔi hàɲ cẳŋ hạʔi cɔ bạɲữʔu mìɲ xôŋ zeo sỉɲụk cɔ lânkận mìɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xiɲzể zanák ɲưŋ tôncọŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê kẻ nàʔɔ tʰề ŋwiện zầʔu fảʔi tổɲạʔi kũŋ xôŋ dổʔizờʔi ɣì ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xôŋ cɔ văj lấʔi lờʔi cẳŋ lãɲ hốʔilộ dặŋ hạʔi ŋườʔi vôtộʔi kẻ nàʔɔ kák diềʔu ấʔi xôŋ zúŋdộŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi fùhộ tôʔi tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi cúʔa tôʔi dã nóʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ ŋàʔi cúʔa tôʔi cừŋàʔi za tôʔi xôŋ kó fướk ɣì xák tôʔi lấʔilàm tʰíc mọʔi dàŋ kák ŋườʔi tʰáɲ cên dất ɲữŋ bựk kawcọŋ sự buồnzầʔu kủʔa ɲữŋ zâŋ kủʔa cɔ tʰần xák tʰêm ɲiềʔu tôʔi xôŋ zâŋ kwán bằŋ hwiết kủʔa cúŋnó kũŋ xôŋ sưŋ cúŋnó cên môʔi tôʔi Ðứkzê fần kơŋiệp káʔi cén kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ fần tôʔi tôʔi măj dượk fần kơŋiệp cɔŋ nơʔi tốtlàɲ fảʔi tôʔi kó dượk kơŋiệp dẹpdẽ tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðấŋ xwiênbảʔɔ tôʔi bandêm lòŋ tôʔi kũŋ zạʔizỗ tôʔi tôʔi hằŋ dể Ðứkzê dứŋ cướk tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ zúŋdộŋ ŋàʔi hữʔu tôʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi lòŋ tôʔi vujvẻ liɲhồn tôʔi nứk mừŋzỡ sák tôʔi kũŋ ŋỉ ʔiênổn vìcúʔa cẳŋ liɲhồn tôʔi cɔŋ âmfủ kũŋ xôŋ dể ŋườʔi tʰáɲ cúʔa tʰấʔi cúʔa cỉ cɔ tôʔi kɔn dườŋ sốŋ cướk cúʔa kó cọn xɔáʔilạk tạʔi hữʔu cúʔa kódiềʔu vujsướŋ vôkùŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi ŋɛ kôŋcáɲ dểý tiếŋ kêʔu kủʔa tôʔi sin hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi za bởʔi môʔi xôŋ ɣiảzốʔi ŋwiện kwiềnlợʔi tôʔi za cướk cúʔa kầʔumắt cúʔa sɛmsét ŋăitʰẳŋ cúʔa dã zò lòŋ tôʔi viếŋ tôʔi lúk bandêm kó tʰử tôʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ɣì tôʔi dã kwidịɲ miệŋ tôʔi xôŋ fạmtộʔi kòn kôŋviệk lɔàʔiŋườʔi tôʔi ɲờ lờʔi môʔi cúʔa fán ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ xỏʔi kák kɔn dườŋ kủʔa huŋbạʔɔ bướk tôʔi vữŋcắk cɔŋ kák lốʔi kủʔa cúʔa cơn tôʔi xôŋ siêʔu hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ cúʔa cúʔa ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi sincúʔa ŋiêŋ taj kwa ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ zùŋ tăj hữʔu kứʔu nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi xỏʔi ɲữŋ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ sin hãʔi za ɲơn lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi kầʔucúʔa bảʔɔhộ tôʔi ɲư kɔnŋươʔi kủʔa hãʔi tôʔi zướʔi bóŋ káɲ kủʔa cúʔa cɔ xỏʔi ák tôʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc vâʔi fủ tôʔi cúŋnó lòŋ mìɲ lạʔi miệŋ cúŋnó nóʔi kác kiêʔukăŋ cúŋnó vâʔi fủ cúŋtôʔi mỗʔi bướk mắt cúŋnó zòm hàɲ dặŋ cɔ cúŋtôʔi saŋã nó ɣiốŋ ɲư mồʔi ɲư ŋồʔi zìɲ cɔŋ nơʔi xuất tịc hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cờ zậʔi di dón dáɲdổ hãʔi zùŋ ɣươm ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi ák hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi zùŋ tăj ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi tứk xỏʔi ŋườʔi tʰếzan mà kó fần fướk mìɲ cɔŋ dờʔi bâʔizờ ŋàʔi cɔ bụŋ cúŋnó dầʔizẫʔi báʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi cúŋnó sɛɲ kɔn tʰỏʔaŋwiện và dể lạʔi fần kủʔa kòn zư cɔ kɔncáʔu mìɲ kòn tôʔi ɲờ kôŋbìɲ tôʔi dượk tʰấʔi cúʔa xi tôʔi tỉɲ tʰứk tôʔi tʰỏʔaŋwiện ɲìn sɛm hìɲzáŋ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi năŋlựk tôʔi tôʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dá tôʔi dồnlũʔi tôʔi Ðấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dá tôʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ ŋàʔi kũŋ káʔi xiên tôʔi sừŋ kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi nơʔi náʔu kaw kủʔa tôʔi Ðứkzê dáŋ dượk ŋợʔixɛn tôʔi kêʔukầʔu ŋàʔi ʔaét dượk ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi kák tʰùŋịc tôʔi kák zâʔi cết dã vươŋvấn tôʔi lụt zanák cảʔi kuộn cɔ tôʔi sợhãʔi ɲưŋ zâʔi âmfủ dã lấʔi tôʔi lướʔi cết tôʔi cɔŋ kơn zancuân tôʔi kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê tôʔi kêʔukầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tạʔi dền ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi và tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa tôʔi tʰấʔu dến taj ŋàʔi bấʔizờ dất dộŋ zuŋ nền kák núʔi kũŋ lăicwiển và zúŋdộŋ ŋàʔi nổʔizận xóʔi băj za mũʔi ŋàʔi ŋọn lửʔa hựk fát za miệŋ ŋàʔi làm cɔ tʰan cáʔi dỏ ŋàʔi ŋiêŋ lệc kák từŋ cờʔi ŋự suốŋ zướʔi cơn ŋàʔi kó vùŋ dɛnkịt ŋàʔi kỡʔi cê zubin băj ŋàʔi liệŋ cên káɲ kủʔa ɣió ŋàʔi ɲờ tốʔităm nơʔi mìɲ zùŋ kák vùŋ nướk tốʔidɛn mâʔi kủʔa cờʔi mà bủʔa suŋkwɛɲ mìɲ ŋàʔi zườŋɲư káʔi cạʔi từ zựkzỡ cướk ŋàʔi ŋaŋ kwa kák mâʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi kó fát za mưʔadá tʰan hựk lửʔa Ðứkzê cên kák từŋ cờʔi Ðấŋcí kaw cɔ vaŋ zân tiếŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi kó mưʔadá tʰan hựk lửʔa ŋàʔi cɔ lạk kwân tʰùŋịc tôʔi fát cớpɲɔáŋ ɲiềʔu xiến cúŋnó lạk dườŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê bởʔi lờʔi hămhɛ kủʔa ŋàʔi bởʔi ɣió sịt za xỏʔi mũʔi ŋàʔi Ðáʔi za và kák tʰếzan bàʔitỏ từcên kaw ŋàʔi ɣiơ tăj za tôʔi zút tôʔi za xỏʔi nướk sâʔu ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc kó sứklựk xỏʔi ɣét tôʔi cúŋnó mạɲ tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi zancuân cúŋnó sôŋ vàʔɔ tôʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê nâŋdỡ tôʔi ŋàʔi dɛm tôʔi za nơʔi zộŋzãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi ŋàʔi ưʔatʰíc tôʔi Ðứkzê dã tʰưởŋ tôʔi tùʔi kôŋbìɲ tôʔi báʔɔ tôʔi tʰeo tʰɛɲsạc kủʔa tăj tôʔi vì tôʔi dã ɣiữ tʰeo kák dườŋlốʔi Ðứkzê cẳŋ kó ák sâʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi vì kák mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi dềʔu cướk tôʔi kòn ŋàʔi tôʔi nàʔɔ dâʔu tôʔi kũŋ cọnvẹn vớʔi ŋàʔi ɣiữ lấʔi mìɲ xỏʔi ák vìvậʔi Ðứkzê dã báʔɔ tôʔi tùʔi kôŋbìɲ tôʔi tʰưởŋ tôʔi tʰeo tʰáɲ sạc kủʔa tăj tôʔi cướk ŋàʔi kẻ tʰươŋsót cúʔa tʰươŋsót lạʔi Ðốʔi kùŋ cọnvẹn cúʔa mìɲ cọnvẹn lạʔi Ðốʔi kùŋ tʰɛɲsạc cúʔa mìɲ tʰɛɲsạc lạʔi kòn dốʔi kùŋ cáʔi ŋịc cúʔa mìɲ ɲặt ɲiệm lạʔi vìcúʔa kứʔu zân xốnxổ ɲưŋ tựkaw suốŋ cúʔa tʰắp ŋọn dèn tôʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi sɔj sáŋ nơʔi tốʔităm tôʔi ɲờŋàʔi tôʔi sôŋ ŋaŋ kwa dạʔɔ biɲ kậʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi xỏʔi tườŋ tʰàɲ kònÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi cọnvẹn lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã dượk lwiện cɔ sạc ŋàʔi káʔi xiên cɔ ɲữŋ nàʔɔ nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi cừÐứkzê ʔaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɔạʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ʔaj dá Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰắtlưŋ tôʔi bằŋ năŋlựk và bằŋ dườŋ tôʔi ŋàʔi cɔ cơn tôʔi ɲư cơn kɔn naj káʔi và dể tôʔi dứŋ cên kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi tăj tôʔi dáɲ ɣiặk dỗʔi káɲtăj tôʔi ɣiươŋ nổʔi kuŋ dồŋ cúʔa kũŋ dã cɔ tôʔi kứʔuzỗʔi xiên tăj hữʔu cúʔa nâŋdỡ tôʔi và cúʔa dã tôʔi saŋcọŋ cúʔa mởzộŋ dườŋ zướʔi bướk tôʔi cơn tôʔi xôŋ siêʔu tôʔi zượt duổʔi tʰùŋịc tôʔi tʰeo cỉ cởvề săw xi dã tậnziệt cúŋnó tôʔi dâm lủŋ cúŋnó dếnnỗʔi cúŋnó xôŋ tʰế zậʔi lạʔi dượk cúŋnó saŋã zướʔi cơn tôʔi vìcúʔa dã tʰắtlưŋ tôʔi bằŋ sứklựk dể ciến xiến zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi sếp zệp zướʔi tôʔi cúʔa kũŋ xiến tʰùŋịc sâʔi lưŋ kùŋ tôʔi kòn ɲữŋ ɣét tôʔi tôʔi dã ziệt cúŋnó zồʔi cúŋnó kêʔu ɲưŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj kứʔu cɔ cúŋnó kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê sɔŋ ŋàʔi xôŋ dáp lạʔi bấʔizờ tôʔi dáɲ cúŋnó za ɲỏ ɲư bụʔi ɣió tʰổʔi di tôʔi cúŋnó za ɲư ŋɔàʔi dườŋ cúʔa dã kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi cɛɲzàɲ kủʔa zânsự lập tôʔi làmdầʔu kák nướk một zântộk tôʔi xôŋ kwɛnbiết hầʔu việk tôʔi vừʔa xi ŋɛnóʔi tôʔi cúŋnó fụk tôʔi kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ ɣiảbộ vâŋ tʰeo tôʔi kák ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ Ðʔi za xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ kác zunsợ Ðứkzê hằŋ sốŋ dáŋ ŋợʔixɛn dá tôʔi ŋwiệnÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi dượk kaw tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi báʔɔán cɔ tôʔi xiến kák zân swi fụk tôʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc tôʔi tʰậtcúʔa nâŋ tôʔi kaw zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi và kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi huŋbạʔɔ vìvậʔi hỡʔi Ðứkzê tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa kák zân và katụŋ zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cɔ vwa ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu lớnlaw và cɔ dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi tứklà cɔ Ðʔa cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi dến dờʔidờʔi kák từŋ cờʔi zaw cwiền viɲhiển kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bầʔucờʔi ɣiảʔi kôŋviệk tăj ŋàʔi ŋàʔi nầʔi ɣiảŋ cɔ ŋàʔiciə nầʔi citʰứk cɔ dêm cẳŋ kótiếŋ cẳŋ kó lờʔinóʔi kũŋ xôŋ ʔaj ŋɛ tiếŋ kủʔa cúŋnó zâʔi zɔ cúŋnó bủʔa xắp cáʔidất và lờʔinóʔi cúŋnó cwiền dến kựk dịʔa nơʔi cúŋnó ŋàʔi dã dóŋ cạʔi cɔ mặtcờʔi mặtcờʔi xáknàʔɔ ŋườʔi tânlaŋ za xỏʔi fòŋ cúk vuimừŋ cạʔidwa ɲư ŋườʔi zõŋ mặtcờʔi za fươŋ cờʔi nầʔi cạʔi vòŋ ɣiáp dến fươŋ cờʔi kiə cẳŋ ci cáɲ xỏʔi hơʔi nóŋmặt cờʔi dượk luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê cọnvẹn liɲhồn lạʔi sự cứŋkớ Ðứkzê cắkcắn cɔ ŋuzạʔi cởnên xônŋwan ɣiềŋmốʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋăitʰẳŋ cɔ lòŋ vuimừŋ Ðʔiềʔu zăn kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋsạc cɔ sáŋsủʔa sự kíɲ Ðứkzê cɔŋsạc hằŋ kòn dến dờʔidờʔi kák mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê cântʰật tʰảʔi dềʔu kôŋbìɲ kả kák diềʔu ấʔi kwí vàŋ tʰật báʔu vàŋzòŋ lạʔi ŋọt nướkŋọt kủʔa tàŋ ʔɔŋ kák diềʔu ấʔi zạʔi cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk tʰôŋiểʔu ʔaj ɣìŋiữ lấʔi dượk fần fươŋ tʰăj ʔaj dượk kák sajlầm mìɲ sincúʔa tʰa kák lỗʔi tôʔi xôŋ sincúʔa ɣiữ tôʔitớ cúʔa xỏʔi kốý fạmtộʔi ŋwiện tộʔi ấʔi xôŋ kaicị tôʔi tʰì tôʔi xôŋ cỗ các dượk xôŋ fạmtộʔi cọŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê dá tôʔi Ðấŋ kứʔucuộk tôʔi ŋwiện lờʔinóʔi kủʔa miệŋ tôʔi sự swiɣẫm kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi dượk dẹp ŋàʔi ŋwiệnÐứkzê dáp lờʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi zancuân ŋwiện zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp cɛcở ŋươʔi từ nơʔi tʰáɲ saj ɣiúpdỡ ŋươʔi và siôn nâŋdỡ ŋươʔi ŋwiệnŋàʔi ɲớ dến kák ŋươʔi và ɲậm ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu ŋươʔi kầʔusin ŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi lòŋ ŋươʔi ướkaw làm tʰàɲ kák diềʔu twantíɲ kủʔa ŋươʔi cúŋtôʔi vuimừŋ kứʔuzỗʔi ŋươʔi và ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi zựŋ kák ŋọn kờ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ŋwiệnÐứkzê tʰàɲ kák diềʔu ŋườʔi sởkầʔu zàʔi tôʔi Ðứkzê kứʔu dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi từ cên cờʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi cảlờʔi ŋườʔi ɲờ kwiềnnăŋ kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa tăj hữʔu ŋàʔi kẻ nầʔi ɲờkậʔi sɛcộ xák ɲờkậʔi ŋựʔa ɲưŋ cúŋtôʔi ɲờkậʔi zɛɲ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kák ấʔi xòm suốŋ saŋã kòn cúŋtôʔi cổʔi zậʔi dứŋ ŋăj hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi kứʔu ŋwiệnvwa ɲậm lờʔi cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi kêʔukầʔu hỡʔiÐứkzê ɲơn năŋlựk ŋàʔi vwa vuimừŋ tạʔi kứʔuzỗʔi ŋàʔi ŋườʔi xɔáʔilạk biếtbaw cúʔa dã cɔ ŋườʔi diềʔu lòŋ ŋườʔi ướkaw xôŋ từcốʔi ɣì môʔi ŋườʔi kầʔusin vìcúʔa lấʔi fướk làɲ dónzướk ŋườʔi Ðộʔi cên dầʔu ŋườʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu bằŋ vòŋ zòŋ ŋườʔi kầʔusin kùŋ cúʔa sốŋ cúʔa cɔ ŋườʔi dỗʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋàʔi lâʔuzàʔi dể vôkùŋ ɲờ ɣiảʔicứʔu kủʔa cúʔa ŋườʔi dượk viɲhiển tʰăj cúʔa cɔ ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ waiŋi cúʔa dặt ŋườʔilàm fướk dến mãʔimãʔi xiến ŋườʔi dầʔizẫʔi vuimừŋ cướk cúʔa vì vwa tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê ɲờ ɲơn kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw ŋườʔi xôŋ zúŋdộŋ tăicúʔa dượk kák tʰùŋịc cúʔa tăj hữʔu cúʔa dượk ɲữŋ ɣét ŋàʔi cɔŋ lúk cúʔa nổʔizận cúʔa cɔ cúŋnó ɲư lửʔa hừŋ Ðứkzê cúŋnó cɔŋ xi nổʔi tʰạɲ và lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt di cúʔa ziệt kɔncáʔu cúŋnó xỏʔi mặtdất và zòŋzõʔi xỏʔi ɣiữʔa kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi vì cúŋnó dã twan hạʔi cúʔa sɛɲ mưʔukế cúŋnó xôŋ tʰế tʰàɲ dượk cúʔa xiến cúŋnó sâʔi lưŋ sửʔa zâʔicuŋ cúʔa lẩʔi cúŋnó hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋwiện ŋàʔi dượk kaw cɔŋ năŋlựk ŋàʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi kahát ŋợʔixɛn kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi saw ŋàʔi lìʔabỏ tôʔi ɲơn saw ŋàʔi dứŋ sa xôŋ ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ lờʔi zênsiết tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu banŋàʔi ɲưŋ cúʔa cẳŋ dáp lạʔi bandêm kũŋ vậʔi sɔŋ tôʔi nàʔɔ kó dượk ʔanŋỉ dâʔu kòncúʔa tʰáɲ ŋàʔi Ðấŋ ŋự ɣiữʔa xɛnŋợʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tổfụ cúŋtôʔi ɲờkậʔi nơʔi cúʔa họ ɲờkậʔi cúʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ họ kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa dượk ɣiảʔicứʔu họ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi cúʔa xôŋ hổtʰẹn ɲưŋ tôʔi kɔn cùŋ cớ cẳŋ fảʔi ŋườʔi dâʔu là diềʔu ôɲụk kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi xiɲzể kủʔa zânsự hễ nàʔɔ tʰấʔi tôʔi dềʔu ɲạʔɔ kườʔi tôʔi cề môʔi lắkdầʔu zằŋ ŋườʔi fú tʰák mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi xá ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi ŋàʔi xá ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi ŋàʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋườʔi fảʔi ấʔilà cúʔa zút tôʔi xỏʔi lòŋ xiến tôʔi tinkậʔi xi cên kủʔa tôʔi từ cɔŋ tửkuŋ tôʔi dã dượk zaw cɔ cúʔa cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi xi tôʔi lọtlòŋ sin cớ dứŋ sa tôʔi zancuân hầʔu ɣần cẳŋ kó ʔaj tiếpkứʔu cɔ kó ɲiềʔu dựk baw kwɛɲ tôʔi ɲữŋ dựk huŋ mạɲ kủʔa basan vâʔi fủ tôʔi cúŋnó miệŋ za kùŋ tôʔi xáknàʔɔ hăj kắnsé ɣầm tôʔi dổ za ɲư nướk kák sươŋkốt tôʔi dềʔu zờʔizã cáʔitim tôʔi ɲư tan za cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi sứklựk tôʔi xô ɲư miếŋ ɣốm và lưỡʔi tôʔi zíɲ nơʔi ổɣà cúʔa dã dể tôʔi cɔŋ bụʔi cɔ cết vì ɲữŋ có baw kwɛɲ tôʔi một huŋák vâʔi fủ tôʔi cúŋnó dâm lủŋ tăj cơn tôʔi tôʔi dếm dượk kák sươŋ tôʔi cúŋnó sɛm ŋó cơn tôʔi cúŋnó ciə ɲăw áʔɔsốŋ tôʔi bắttʰăm áʔɔzàʔi tôʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi cớ dứŋ sa tôʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ kứʔu tôʔi ôʔi hãʔi măw măw dến ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi ɣươm và mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi xỏʔi lɔàʔi có hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi họŋ từ kák sừŋ kủʔa câʔu zừŋ cúʔa dã ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi tôʔi zaw cwiền zɛɲ cúʔa cɔ ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi và ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúŋ hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hếttʰảʔi zòŋzõʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi vìŋàʔi xôŋ xiɲbỉ cẳŋ ɣớmɣiếk hɔạnnạn kủʔa xốnxổ kũŋ xôŋ ɣiấʔu ŋàʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ xi ŋườʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ ŋàʔi tʰì ɲậm lờʔi sự ŋợʔixɛn kủʔa tôʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa hộʔi zɔ cúʔa za tôʔi cả sɔŋ hứʔa ŋwiện tôʔi cướk ɲữŋ kíɲ cúʔa kẻ dượk nɔnê ɲữŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi ŋwiện lòŋ kák ŋươʔi dượk sốŋ dờʔidờʔi bốnfươŋ tʰếzan ɲớ cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê kák họhàŋ muônzân tʰờ lạʔi cướk ŋàʔi vì nướk tʰuộk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kaicị cên muônzân hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔi ɣiàʔukó tʰếzan kũŋ tʰờ lạʔi mọʔi cởlạʔi bụʔi dất ɲữŋ xôŋ tʰế bảʔɔtồn mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ sẽ kwì suốŋ cướk ŋàʔi một zòŋzõʔi hầʔu việk ŋàʔi ŋườʔita zòŋzõʔi ấʔilà zòŋzõʔi kủʔa cúʔa zòŋzõʔi ấʔi dến zaw cwiền kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰuật cɔ zântộk sɛɲ za zằŋ Ðứkzê dã làmviệk ấʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ căn ɣiữ tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn ɣì ŋàʔi xiến tôʔi ʔanŋỉ nơʔi dồŋkỏ sɛɲtươʔi zẫn tôʔi dến nướk bìɲ tịɲ ŋàʔi lạʔi liɲhồn tôʔi zẫn tôʔi vàʔɔ kák lốʔi kôŋbìɲ kớ zɛɲ ŋàʔi zầʔu xi tôʔi di cɔŋ cũŋ bóŋ cết tôʔi cẳŋ tajhọʔa nàʔɔ cúʔa kùŋ tôʔi kâʔi cượŋ kâʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa cúʔa ʔanủʔi tôʔi cúʔa zọn cɔ tôʔi cướk tʰùŋịc tôʔi cúʔa sứk zầʔu cɔ dầʔu tôʔi cén tôʔi dầʔi càn kwảtʰật cọn dờʔi tôʔi fướk hạɲ tʰươŋsót tʰeo tôʔi tôʔi cɔŋ ɲà Ðứkzê cɔdến lâʔuzàʔi cên dất tʰếzan ɲữŋ cɔŋ dó dềʔu tʰuộk Ðứkzê vìŋàʔi dã dất cên kák và dặt vữŋ cên kák nướklớn ʔaj dượk núʔi Ðứkzê ʔaj dượk dứŋ nổʔi cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ấʔilà ŋườʔi kó tăj cɔŋsạc lòŋ tʰɛɲxiết cẳŋ hướŋ liɲhồn mìɲ hưxôŋ kũŋ cẳŋ tʰề ŋwiện ɣiảzốʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk fướk nơʔi Ðứkzê và kôŋbìɲ nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi ŋườʔi Ấʔilà zòŋzõʔi kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê tứklà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp hỡʔi kák kửʔa hãʔi kất dầʔu hỡʔi kák kửʔa dờʔidờʔi hãʔi kaw tʰìvwa viɲhiển vàʔɔ vwa viɲhiển nầʔi ʔaj Ấʔilà Ðứkzê kó sứklựk kwiềnnăŋ Ðứkzê mạɲzạn cɔŋ ciếncận hỡʔi kák kửʔa hãʔi kất dầʔu hỡʔi kák kửʔa dờʔidờʔi hãʔi kaw tʰì vwa viɲhiển vàʔɔ vwa viɲhiển nầʔi ʔaj Ấʔilà Ðứkzê kwân cíɲŋàʔi vwa viɲhiển hỡʔiÐứkzê liɲhồn tôʔi hướŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi tôʔi dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi ŋwiện tôʔi cớ hổtʰẹn cớ dể tʰùŋịc tôʔi tʰắŋ tôʔi tʰật cẳŋ ʔaj côŋkậʔi ŋàʔi màlạʔi hổtʰẹn kòn ɲữŋ zancá vôkớ cúŋnó hổtʰẹn hỡʔiÐứkzê sin cɔ tôʔi kák dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi và zạʔizỗ tôʔi kák nẻʔɔ dàŋ ŋàʔi sin hãʔi zẫn tôʔi cɔŋ tʰật kủʔa ŋàʔi zạʔizỗ tôʔi vìŋàʔi tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa buổʔi daŋ tʰì tôʔi hɔặk kák vifạm tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɲớ dến tôʔi tùʔi tʰeo tʰươŋsót lòŋ ɲơn kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê tʰiện ŋăitʰẳŋ bởʔi kớ ấʔi ŋàʔi cỉ zạʔi kɔn dườŋ cɔ kó tộʔi ŋàʔi zẫn kác cáɲ cựk cỉ zạʔi kɔn dườŋ ŋàʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ɲumì kák dườŋlốʔi Ðứkzê dềʔu ɲơn cơn tʰật cɔ nàʔɔ ɣiữɣìn zawướk cứŋkớ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi ɲơn zɛɲ ŋàʔi sin hãʔi tʰa tộʔiák tôʔi cọŋ ʔaj ŋườʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi cỉ zạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi kɔn dườŋ mìɲ fảʔi cọn liɲhồn ŋườʔi dượk nơʔi bìɲan và kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi dượk dất sảnŋiệp Ðứkzê tʰiết kùŋ ŋườʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi tỏ cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi zawướk kủʔa ŋàʔi mắt tôʔi hằŋ ŋưỡŋvọŋ Ðứkzê vìŋàʔi sở cơn tôʔi za xỏʔi lướʔi kầʔusin cúʔa hãʔi dɔáʔi sɛm tôʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi vì tôʔi mộtmìɲ xốnxổ sự bốʔizốʔi nơʔi lòŋ tôʔi dã tʰêm ɲiềʔu sincúʔa kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi hɔạnnạn xá sɛmsét xốnxổ kựkɲọk tôʔi và tʰa kák tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi hãʔi sɛmsét tʰùŋịc tôʔi cúŋnó ɲiềʔu cúŋnó ɣét tôʔi kác huŋbạʔɔ sincúʔa hãʔi ɣiữ liɲhồn tôʔi kẻʔɔ nếʔu ŋàʔi làmtʰiɲ vớʔi tôʔi tôʔi fảʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲữŋ suốŋ hwiệt căŋ xi tôʔi ɣiơ tăj hướŋ nơʔi cí tʰáɲ cúʔa kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa sin hãʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ xẩnkầʔu kủʔa tôʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê ôʔi tôʔi tinkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi tôʔi nóʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kỳ mạŋ tôʔi nơʔi tăj cúʔa sin ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tăj tʰùŋịc xỏʔi tăj tôʔi kầʔusin sɔj sáŋ cúʔa cên tôʔitớ cúʔa lấʔi ɲơn cúʔa kứʔuvớt tôʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋwiện tôʔi xôŋ hổtʰẹn tôʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi ŋwiện ák fảʔi sấʔuhổ nínlặŋ nơʔi âmfủ ŋwiện kák môʔi zốʔicá hăj lấʔi lờʔi sấksượk kiêʔuŋạʔɔ xiɲbỉ nóʔi ŋịc ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ bị kâm di sự ɲơn cúʔa màcúʔa dã zàɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kíɲ cúʔa và tʰihàɲ cướk kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi cɔ ɲữŋ nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi cúʔa tʰật lớnlaw tʰăj cúʔa ɣiấʔu tạʔi nơʔi cướk cúʔa kác sa mưʔukế kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi cúʔa cɛxuất cɔŋ káʔi lềʔu kác sa càɲ ɣiàɲ kủʔa lưỡʔi Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰăj vì tạʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ vữŋbền ŋàʔi dã cɔ tôʔi ɲơn lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔŋ kơn bốʔizốʔi tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi cuất xỏʔi cướk cúʔa ɲưŋ xi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa cúʔa ŋɛ tiếŋ nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔi hỡʔi kák tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê hãʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ɣìŋiữ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰàɲ ɲưŋ báʔɔ kác nặŋnề kiêʔuŋạʔɔ hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê hãʔi vữŋlòŋ bềncí fướk tʰăj cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk tʰa vifạm mìɲ Ðượk xỏʔalấp tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ fướk tʰăj cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ Ðứkzê xôŋ zanák cɔ và cɔŋ lòŋ xôŋ kó ɣiảzốʔi xi tôʔi nínlặŋ kák sươŋkốt tôʔi tiêʔu và tôʔi zênsiết cọn ŋàʔi vì ŋàʔi dêm tăj cúʔa dè nặŋ cên tôʔi nướk tʰân tôʔi tiêʔuhaw ɲư bởʔi xôhạn mùʔahè tôʔi dã tʰútộʔi kùŋ cúʔa xôŋ ɣiấʔu zanák tôʔi tôʔi nóʔi tôʔi sưŋ kák vifạm tôʔi kùŋ Ðứkzê kòncúʔa tʰa tộʔiák kủʔa tôʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi fàm ŋườʔi ɲơn dứk dềʔu kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ cúʔa cɔŋ xi kótʰể ɣặp ŋàʔi kwảtʰật cɔŋ lúk kó nướk za tʰì cẳŋ dến ŋườʔi cúʔa nơʔi tôʔi cúʔa bảʔɔhộ tôʔi xỏʔi zancuân cúʔa lấʔi bàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu vâʔi fủ tôʔi ta zạʔizỗ ŋươʔi cỉ cɔ ŋươʔi kɔn dườŋ fảʔi di mắt cămcú ŋươʔi xwiên zạʔi ŋươʔi cớ ɲư kɔn ŋựʔa kɔn vôci fảʔi zùŋ xớp zâʔi kươŋ mớʔi kầm cúŋnó dượk bằŋ cẳŋ cúŋnó xôŋ dến ɣần ŋươʔi kẻ ák kó ɲiềʔu nỗʔi dăwdớn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê ɲơn vâʔi fủ ŋườʔi ấʔi hỡʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hãʔi vujvẻ nơʔi Ðứkzê kák ŋườʔi kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ hãʔi zeo mừŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hãʔi vujvẻ nơʔi Ðứkzê sự ŋợʔixɛn dáŋ cɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ hãʔi zùŋ dờn kầm kảmtạ Ðứkzê hãʔi zùŋ dờn sắk mườʔi zâʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi xá cɔ ŋàʔi bàʔi ka mớʔi và xéʔɔ ɣảʔi ɲạkxí vớʔi tiếŋ vuimừŋ vì lờʔi Ðứkzê ŋăitʰẳŋ kák việk ŋàʔi dềʔu kác tʰàɲ ŋàʔi cuộŋ kôŋbìɲ cáɲ cựk dầʔizẫʔi ɲơn kủʔa Ðứkzê kák từŋ cờʔi dượk bởʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê kả kơ biɲ cờʔi bởʔi hơʔi tʰở kủʔa miệŋ ŋàʔi kó ŋàʔi tʰâʔu kák nướkbiển lạʔi tʰàɲ ɲư dốŋ và cử ɲữŋ nướk sâʔu cɔŋ cỗ cứʔa xắp tʰiêɲạ xá kíɲ Ðứkzê kák zân tʰếzan hãʔi kiɲxủŋ ŋàʔi vìŋàʔi fán tʰì việk kó ŋàʔi biểʔu tʰì dứŋ vữŋbền Ðứkzê bạʔi mưʔu kák nướk xiến ɲữŋ tưtưởŋ kák zântộk za hưxôŋ mưʔu kủʔa Ðứkzê dượk vữŋ dờʔidờʔi ýtưởŋ kủʔa lòŋ ŋàʔi kòn dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə nướk nàʔɔ kó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ zântộk nàʔɔ dượk ŋàʔi cọn kơŋiệp mìɲ kó fướk tʰăj Ðứkzê cên cờʔi ŋó suốŋ ɲìn tʰấʔi hếttʰảʔi kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋàʔi ŋó suốŋ nơʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi sɛmsét hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở tʰếzan ŋàʔi lòŋ kủʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi sɛmsét mọʔi việk kủʔa cúŋnó cẳŋ kó vwa nàʔɔ biɲ dôŋ dượk kứʔu ŋườʔi mạɲzạn kũŋ xôŋ bởʔi sứklựk lớnlaw dượk ɣiảʔitʰɔát ɲờ ŋựʔa cɔ dượk kứʔu ấʔilà vôíc nó cẳŋ bởʔi sứkmạɲ kủʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu dượk ʔaj kìʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê dɔáʔi sɛm ŋườʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi kố dến ŋườʔi côŋkậʔi ɲơn ŋàʔi Ðặŋ kứʔu liɲhồn xỏʔi cết và bảʔɔtồn mạŋ sốŋ cɔŋ kơn dóʔicém liɲhồn cúŋtôʔi côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi cợ káʔi xiên kủʔa cúŋtôʔi lòŋ cúŋtôʔi vujvẻ nơʔi ŋàʔi vì cúŋtôʔi dã dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi zɛɲ tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋwiện ɲơn ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ cên cúŋtôʔi ʔi tʰeo cúŋtôʔi dã côŋkậʔi tôʔi cúktụŋ Ðứkzê sự xɛnŋợʔi ŋàʔi hằŋ nơʔi miệŋ tôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi xwej mìɲ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋɛ vuimừŋ hãʔi kùŋ tôʔi tôncọŋ Ðứkzê cúŋta hãʔi kùŋ ɲăw kaw zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi tôʔi dã kầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dáp lạʔi tôʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi kák dềʔu sợhãʔi cúŋ ŋửʔa côŋ cúʔa tʰì dượk cóʔi sáŋ mặt cẳŋ hổtʰẹn kẻ xốnkùŋ nầʔi kó kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi kák diềʔu zancuân tʰiênsứ Ðứkzê dóŋ lạʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ɲữŋ kíɲ ŋàʔi và ɣiảʔicứʔu xá tʰử sɛm Ðứkzê tốtlàɲ zườŋ baw fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi hỡʔi kák tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê hãʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi vì nàʔɔ kíɲ ŋàʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn ɣì sưtử tʰiếʔu dóʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kầʔu Ðứkzê cẳŋ tʰiếʔu kủʔa ɣì hỡʔi kák kɔn hãʔi dến ŋɛ ta zạʔi kák kɔn kíɲ Ðứkzê ʔaj ŋườʔi ưʔatʰíc sốŋ ŋàʔi lâʔuzàʔi dể hưởŋ fướk làɲ xá ɣiữ lưỡʔi mìɲ xỏʔi lờʔi ák và môʔi mìɲ xỏʔi nóʔi zốʔi ɣạt hãʔi cáɲ ák diềʔu làɲ hãʔi hòʔabìɲ dewduổʔi ấʔi mắtÐứkzê dɔáʔi sɛm ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ lỗ taj ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa mặtÐứkzê ŋịc kùŋ ák Ðặŋ ziệt cúŋnó xỏʔi dất ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋɛ và ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi kák zancuân Ðứkzê ɣần ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ dăwtʰươŋ và kứʔu nàʔɔ kó tʰốŋ hốʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲiềʔu tajhọʔa ɲưŋÐứkzê kứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi ŋàʔi ɣiữ hếttʰảʔi sươŋkốt ŋườʔi cẳŋ káʔi nàʔɔ ɣãʔi sự zữ ɣiết ák ɲữŋ ɣét ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dịɲtộʔi Ðứkzê cuộk liɲhồn kủʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi fàm ʔaj nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ dịɲtộʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi kãʔicọ kùŋ kãʔicọ tôʔi hãʔi ciɲciến vớʔi ciɲciến kùŋ tôʔi sin hãʔi kầm lấʔi xiên ɲỏ cổʔizậʔi dặŋ ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi sin hãʔi zút ɣiáʔɔ kản dườŋ nàʔɔ zượt tʰeo tôʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ liɲhồn tôʔi ta kứʔuzỗʔi ŋươʔi ŋwiện ɣiết mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi fảʔi hổtʰẹn sỉɲụk Ướk ɣì twan hạʔi tôʔi fảʔi luj lạʔi kỡ ŋwiện cúŋnó ɲư cấʔu ɣió tʰổʔi dùʔa kầʔusin tʰiênsứ Ðứkzê duổʔi cúŋnó di ŋwiện dườŋ cúŋnó fảʔi tốʔimịt cơn cợt kầʔu tʰiênsứ Ðứkzê duổʔi tʰeo cúŋnó vì vôkớ cúŋnó ɣàʔi lướʔi cɔ tôʔi và vôkớ dàʔɔ káʔi cɔ liɲhồn tôʔi ŋwiện tajhọʔa xôŋ ŋờ dến Ướk ɣì lướʔi ɣàʔi lạʔi ŋwiện vàʔɔ dó ziệt di liɲhồn tôʔi vujvẻ nơʔi Ðứkzê mừŋzỡ kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi kák sươŋkốt tôʔi nóʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ xỏʔi mạɲ ŋườʔi kứʔu ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn xỏʔi dứʔa kướp vậʔi kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋàʔi căŋ ɲữŋ cứŋ zan ấʔi zấʔi cahỏʔi ɲữŋ việk tôʔi xôŋ dến cúŋnó lấʔi zữ cả làɲ liɲhồn tôʔi suộʔi kòn tôʔi xi cúŋnó dăw tôʔi mặk lấʔi baw kiêŋ liɲhồn tôʔi lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi cở vàʔɔ ŋựk tôʔi tôʔi kưsử zườŋɲư bạɲữʔu hăjlà ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi tôʔi di kúʔi suốŋ ɲư tʰanxók mìɲ ɲưŋ cɔŋ lúk tôʔi zannan cúŋnó ɲóm lạʔi vuimừŋ ɲữŋ káʔɔ zan dềʔu ɲóm lạʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi sɔŋ tôʔi cẳŋ cúŋnó kấʔusé tôʔi xôŋ ŋừŋ cúŋnó ŋiến zăŋ ŋịc tôʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ ák hăj ɲạʔɔbáŋ cúʔa ôʔi cúʔa cịʔu sɛm diềʔu ấʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ sin hãʔi kứʔuvớt liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi fá kủʔa cúŋnó và zút mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi xỏʔi tôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa cɔŋ hộʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa zân dôŋ kầʔusin cớ cɔ ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc tôʔi vôkớ mừŋzỡ tôʔi kũŋ dừŋ dể kák ɣét tôʔi vôkớ ɲeo kɔn vì cúŋnó cẳŋ nóʔi lờʔi hòʔabìɲ ɲưŋ twan fỉɲ ɣạt kák ŋườʔi hiềɲòʔa cɔŋ sứ cúŋnó miệŋ hɔát za ŋịc tôʔi mà zằŋ ha dã tʰấʔi diềʔu dó zồʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi dã tʰấʔi diềʔu ấʔi sin cớ làmtʰiɲ cúʔa ôʔi cớ zan sa tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa tôʔi hãʔi tỉɲ tʰứk hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dể fánsét tôʔi kôŋbìɲ và biɲ vựk tôʔi zwiênkớ tôʔi hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi hãʔi dɔán sét tôʔi tùʔi kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa cớ dể cúŋnó vuimừŋ kớ tôʔi cớ dể cúŋnó nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ kìʔa diềʔu cúŋta ướkaw dó hɔặk nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta dã cọn zồʔi fàm nàʔɔ vuimừŋ tajhọʔa tôʔi ŋwiện dềʔu hổtʰẹn kỡ fàm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zấʔi kùŋ tôʔi kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ŋwiện dềʔu bawfủ sấʔuhổ sỉɲụk kòn ʔaj biɲ zwiênkớ kôŋbìɲ tôʔi ŋwiện dềʔu zeo mừŋ ŋwiện tʰườŋ nóʔi xôŋ ŋớt Ðáŋ tôncọŋ Ðứkzê tʰăj làÐấŋ vuj cɔ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi dượk măimắn vậʔi lưỡʔi tôʔi tʰuật kôŋbìɲ cúʔa và cọn ŋàʔi ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa sự vifạm kủʔa ák nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi zằŋ cẳŋ kó kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cướkmắt vì xwej mìɲ zằŋ tộʔiák mìɲ cẳŋ za xôŋ ɣét kák lờʔi miệŋ zanák zốʔi ɣạt nó dã tʰôʔi xônŋwan làmlàɲ nó twan ák tạʔi cên ɣiườŋ nó dứŋ cên kɔn dườŋ cẳŋ tʰiện nó kũŋ xôŋ ɣớmɣiếk zữ hỡʔiÐứkzê ɲơn ŋàʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi sự tʰàɲ ŋàʔi dến kák mâʔi sự kôŋbìɲ cúʔa ɣiốŋ ɲư núʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sự dɔán sét cúʔa xák nảʔɔ vựk zất sâʔu hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi bảʔɔtồn lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰúvật hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲơn cúʔa kwí biếtbaw kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ zướʔi bóŋ káɲ kủʔa cúʔa họ ɲờ zưzật kủʔa ɲà cúʔa dượk tʰỏʔaŋwiện cúʔa cɔ ʔuốŋ nướk sôŋ fướk lạk kủʔa cúʔa vì ŋuồn sốŋ nơʔi cúʔa cɔŋ áɲsáŋ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi tʰấʔi sáŋ kầʔucúʔa kứ cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cúʔa và kôŋbìɲ cúʔa cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ sin cớ dể cơn kiêʔuŋạʔɔ tʰeo tôʔi kũŋ dừŋ cɔ tăj ák sô duổʔi tôʔi sa tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi ák saŋã cúŋnó sô ɲàʔɔ xôŋtʰể cổʔi zậʔi dượk cớ fiềnlòŋ kớ làmzữ kũŋ dừŋ ɣɛntị tậptàɲ zanák vì cẳŋ bawlâʔu cúŋnó fát ɲư kỏ và fảʔi héʔɔ ɲư kỏ tươʔi sɛɲ hãʔi tinkậʔi Ðứkzê diềʔu làɲ xá cɔŋ sứ nuôʔi mìɲ bằŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi kũŋ hãʔi xɔáʔilạk nơʔi Ðứkzê tʰìŋàʔi cɔ ŋươʔi diềʔu lòŋ mìɲ ʔawướk hãʔi fótʰák dườŋlốʔi mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê và ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi tʰì ŋàʔi tʰàɲ việk ấʔi ŋàʔi xiến kôŋbìɲ ŋươʔi za ɲư áɲsáŋ và za dɔán ŋươʔi ɲư cáɲ ŋọ hãʔi ʔiên tịɲ cướk Ðứkzê cờdợʔi ŋàʔi cớ fiềnlòŋ kớ dượk măimắn cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ mìɲ hɔặk kớ ŋườʔilàm tʰàɲ ɲữŋ mưʔu ák hãʔi zẹp ɣiận ɣiận hɔảŋ cớ fiềnlòŋ diềʔu dó cỉ ɣâʔi za việk ák vì ɲữŋ ák ziệt kòn nàʔɔ côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê dượk dất kơŋiệp mộtcút nữʔa ák xôŋ kòn ŋươʔi sɛmsét cỗ tʰật xôŋ kòn nữʔa sɔŋ ŋườʔi ɲận dượk dất kơŋiệp và dượk xɔáʔilạk bìɲiên zưzật kẻ ák lậpmưʔu ŋịc ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và ŋiến zăŋ kùŋ ŋườʔi cúʔa cêkườʔi vì tʰấʔi ŋàʔi fạt hầʔu dến kẻ ák dã zút ɣươm ɣiươŋ kuŋ mìɲ Ðặŋ dáɲdổ ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn Ðặŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi di tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ ɣươm cúŋnó dâm vàʔɔ lòŋ cúŋnó và kuŋ cúŋnó ɣãʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ twi kòn zưzật kủʔa ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ák vì káɲtăj ák ɣãʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê nâŋdỡ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi cọnvẹn và kơŋiệp ŋườʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi cɔŋ tʰì sấʔusa xôŋ hổtʰẹn cɔŋ ŋàʔi dóʔicém dượk nɔnê kòn ák ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc Ðứkzê ɲư ciên kɔn cúŋnó fảʔi dốt tiêʔu di ɲư xóʔi kẻ ák xôŋ cả lạʔi kòn ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔ vì ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fướk cɔ ɲận dượk dất kòn ŋàʔi zủʔasả ziệt di Ðứkzê dịɲliệʔu kák bướk kủʔa ŋườʔi vàŋàʔi tʰíc dườŋlốʔi ŋườʔi zầʔu ŋườʔi kùŋ xôŋ sảʔi zàʔi vìÐứkzê lấʔi tăj ŋàʔi nâŋdỡ ŋườʔi cướk tôʔi cẻ zàʔi dã ɣià ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hăjlà zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi di ănmàʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi tʰươŋsót cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi dượk fướk hãʔi cáɲ diềʔu zữ diềʔu làɲ tʰì dượk dờʔidờʔi vìÐứkzê cuộŋ kôŋbìɲ xôŋ ŋườʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi dượk ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ dờʔidờʔi kòn zòŋzõʔi zữ ziệt di ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲận dượk dất và tạʔi dó dờʔidờʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sưŋ diềʔu xônŋwan và lưỡʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi cáɲ cựk luậtfáp Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋườʔiở cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi bướk ŋườʔi xôŋ siêʔu kẻ ák zìɲzập ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và ɣiết ŋườʔi Ðứkzê xôŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ tăj kũŋ cẳŋ dịɲtộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi xi ŋườʔi dɔán sét hãʔi côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê ɣiữ tʰeo dườŋ ŋàʔi tʰìŋàʔi nâŋ ŋươʔi xiến dể ɲận dượk dất xi ák ziệt di tʰì ŋươʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu ấʔi tôʔi từŋ tʰấʔi ák kó tʰếlựk cảʔi za ɲư kâʔi sɛɲtươʔi mọk nơʔi kốtʰổ sɔŋ kó ŋườʔi di kwa kìʔa cẳŋ kòn nữʔa tôʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ ɣặp hãʔi cămcú ŋườʔi cọnvẹn ɲìn sɛm ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ vì kuốʔicùŋ ŋườʔi hòʔabìɲ kó fướk kòn kák vifạm kùŋ ɲăw hủʔihɔạʔi sự tươŋlaj ák ziệt di ɲưŋ kứʔuzỗʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ zɔ Ðứkzê dến ŋàʔi dồnlũʔi kủʔa cɔŋ tʰì zancuân Ðứkzê ɣiúpdỡ ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋàʔi ɣiảʔi xỏʔi ák kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ bởʔivì dã nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin cớ nổʔi tʰạɲ kwởcác tôʔi kũŋ dừŋ nóŋzận sửʔa fạt tôʔi vì kák mũʔitên cúʔa ɣắm mìɲ tôʔi và tăj cúʔa dè nặŋ cên tôʔi bởʔi kơn ɣiận cúʔa tʰịt tôʔi cẳŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ làɲ tạʔi kớ tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi sươŋkốt tôʔi cẳŋ dượk ʔanŋỉ vì zanák tôʔi kwa dầʔu tôʔi nó nặŋ kwá cɔ tôʔi xáknàʔɔ ɣáɲ nặŋ tạʔi kớ xờzạʔi tôʔi kák vếttʰươŋ tôʔi tʰốʔitʰa cảʔi tôʔi dăwdớn xòm kúp suốŋ cọn ŋàʔi tôʔi di buồntʰảm vì kó lửʔa hừŋ tʰiêʔudốt kật tôʔi và tʰịt tôʔi cẳŋ nơʔi nàʔɔ làɲ tôʔi mệtɲọk zêm ɲiềʔu kwá tôʔi kớ lòŋ tôʔi bồncồn cúʔa ôʔi kák ʔawướk tôʔi dềʔu cướk cúʔa sự zênsiết tôʔi cẳŋ ɣiấʔu cúʔa lòŋ tôʔi hồʔihộp sứk tôʔi di sự sáŋmắt tôʔi kũŋ tʰiếʔu nữʔa kák ŋườʔitʰươŋ tôʔi ɲữŋ tôʔi dềʔu dứŋ sa tôʔi kòn bàkɔn tôʔi kác sa tôʔi ɲữŋ ɣiết mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi ɣàʔi bẫʔi tôʔi kẻ hạʔi tôʔi nóʔi diềʔu zữ và cọn ŋàʔi twan fỉɲ ɣạt ɲưŋ tôʔi ɲư diếk xôŋ ŋɛ ci ɲư ŋườʔi kâm xôŋ mởmiệŋ tôʔi dã cởnên ɲư ŋườʔi xôŋ ŋɛ ɲư ŋườʔi cẳŋ kó lờʔi dốʔi lạʔi cɔŋ miệŋ mìɲ vì Ðứkzê ôʔi tôʔi dể lòŋ côŋkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi hỡʔicúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi cúʔa dáp lạʔi vì tôʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ ŋwiện cúŋnó cớ mừŋzỡ kớ tôʔi xi cơn tôʔi siêʔu cúŋnó zấʔi kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi ɣần saŋã nỗʔi dăwdớn cướk tôʔi vì tôʔi sưŋ zanák tôʔi za tôʔi buồnzầʔu tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi ɲưŋ tʰùŋịc tôʔi kòn sốŋ mạɲ kák ɣét tôʔi vôkớ tʰì ɲiềʔu kòn ɲữŋ lấʔi zữ cả làɲ kũŋ kừʔudịc tôʔi bởʔivì tôʔi tʰeo diềʔu làɲ Ðứkzê ôʔi sin cớ lìʔabỏ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin cớ kác sa tôʔi cúʔa ôʔi cúʔa kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi hãʔi măw măw dến cợ tôʔi tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi ɣiữ kák dườŋlốʔi tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ dúŋ lưỡʔi mìɲ fạmtộʔi Ðʔaŋ xi ák cướk tôʔi tôʔi lấʔi xớp ɣiữ miệŋ tôʔi lạʔi tôʔi kâm xôŋ lờʔinóʔi dỗʔi lờʔi làɲ kũŋ xôŋ za xỏʔi miệŋ kòn nỗʔi dăwdớn tôʔi cọk lòŋ tôʔi nóŋnảʔi cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi Ðươŋ xi tôʔi swiɣẫm lửʔa cáʔi bấʔizờ lưỡʔi tôʔi nóʔi hãʔiÐứkzê sin cɔ tôʔi kuốʔicùŋ tôʔi và kák ŋàʔi tôʔi tʰểnàʔɔ sin cɔ tôʔi mìɲ mỏŋmảɲ baw kìʔa cúʔa xiến ŋàʔizờ tôʔi zàʔi bằŋ bàntăj và dờʔi tôʔi ɲưxôŋ xôŋ dượk cúʔa fảʔi mỗʔi ŋườʔi zầʔu dứŋ vữŋ cỉ hưxôŋ kwảtʰật mỗʔi ŋườʔi bướkdi xáknàʔɔ ɲư bóŋ ʔainấʔi dềʔu zốʔi dộŋ luốŋ kôŋ ŋườʔi cấtcứʔa kủʔakảʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ ʔaj tʰâʔu lấʔi hỡʔicúʔa bâʔizờ tôʔi côŋdợʔi ɣì sự côŋdợʔi tôʔi nơʔi cúʔa sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi kák vifạm tôʔi cớ tôʔi ɲuốkɲơ kủʔa ŋuzạʔi tôʔi kâm cẳŋ mởmiệŋ za bởʔivì cúʔa dã ấʔi sin kất xỏʔi tôʔi các fạt kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi tiêʔuhaw bởʔi tăj cúʔa dáɲ fạt xicúʔa các fạt lɔàʔiŋườʔi kớ zanák tʰìcúʔa hawmòn dẹpdẽ xáknàʔɔ ɲư kɔn sùŋ tʰật mọʔi ŋườʔi cỉ hưxôŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa tôʔi sin cớ nínlặŋ nướkmắt tôʔi vì tôʔi ŋườʔi nơʔi ɲà cúʔa kẻ xák ŋụ ɲư kák tổfụ tôʔi cúʔa ôʔi sin hãʔi zuŋtʰứ tôʔi dể tôʔi hồʔisứk lạʔi cướk xi tôʔi di xôŋ kòn nữʔa tôʔi ɲịnɲụk côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ŋiêŋ kwa ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi kũŋ dɛm tôʔi xỏʔi ɣớmɣê xỏʔi vũŋ ŋàʔi dặt cơn tôʔi cên dá và cɔ bướk tôʔi vữŋbền ŋàʔi dể nơʔi miệŋ tôʔi bàʔi mớʔi tứklà ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi lắm ŋườʔi tʰấʔi diềʔu dó và ɲờkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dể lòŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê cẳŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ hɔặk sâʔi tʰeo zốʔicá hỡʔiÐứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kôŋviệk lạlùŋ cúʔa dã và ɲữŋ tưtưởŋ kủʔa cúʔa hướŋ kùŋ cúŋtôʔi tʰậtlà ɲiềʔu xôŋtʰể sắpdặt cướk cúʔa nếʔu tôʔi cwiền kák việk ấʔi za nóʔi dến tʰật lấʔilàm ɲiềʔu kwá xôŋ dếm dượk cúʔa xôŋ tʰíc dẹp hisiɲ hɔặk kủʔa căj cúʔa dã taj tôʔi cúʔa xôŋ kó dòʔi kủʔa tʰiêʔu hăjlà kủʔa cuộk tộʔi bấʔizờ tôʔi nóʔi nầʔi tôʔi dến cɔŋ kwiển sác dã kó cép tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi lấʔilàm vuimừŋ tʰeo cúʔa luậtfáp cúʔa cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi cɔŋ hộʔi tôʔi dã cwiền tinvuj kôŋbìɲ kìʔa tôʔi cẳŋ kó ŋậmmiệŋ lạʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi biếtdiềʔu dó tôʔi cẳŋ ɣiấʔu kôŋbìɲ cúʔa nơʔi lòŋ tôʔi tôʔi dã cwiền za tʰàɲ kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi nàʔɔ kó ɣiấʔu hộʔi ɲơn cơn tʰật kủʔa cúʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi dốʔi kùŋ tôʔi cớ xép lòŋ tʰươŋsót kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋwiện ɲơn cơn tʰật kủʔa ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ tôʔi vì tajhọʔa dã vâʔi kwɛɲ tôʔi kák zanák tôʔi dã tʰeo tôʔi nỗʔi xôŋtʰể ŋướk dượk nó ɲiềʔu tók cên dầʔu tôʔi lòŋ tôʔi dã tʰấtkiɲ Ðứkzê ôʔi sin sẵnlòŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê hãʔi măw măw ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi fàm nàʔɔ ɣiết mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi ŋwiện cúŋnó kỡ hổtʰẹn kả fàm nàʔɔ vujvẻ tʰiệtʰạʔi tôʔi ŋwiện cúŋnó fảʔi luj lạʔi sỉɲụk kák nóʔi tôʔi ha ŋwiện cúŋnó sữŋsờ kớ sỉɲụk kủʔa cúŋnó ŋwiện hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ kầʔu cúʔa Ðượk vujvẻ xɔáʔilạk nơʔi cúʔa ŋwiện ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔiêʔumến kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa hằŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dáŋ dạʔi tʰăj kòn tôʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn zầʔu vậʔi cúʔa tưởŋ dến tôʔi cúʔa cợ tôʔi Ðấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin cớ cễ fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dɔáʔi dến xốnkùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi tajhọʔa Ðứkzê ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi Ðứkzê ɣìŋiữ ŋườʔi bảʔɔtồn mạŋ sốŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dượk fướk cên dất vàŋàʔi cắk xôŋ fó ŋườʔi cɔ kủʔa tʰùŋịc ŋườʔi Ðứkzê nâŋdỡ ŋườʔi tạʔi cên ɣiườŋ zũ cɔŋ xi ŋườʔi dăw bịɲ cúʔa kảʔi zọn kả ɣiườŋ ŋườʔi tôʔi dã nóʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin tʰươŋsót tôʔi cữʔa làɲ liɲhồn tôʔi tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc tôʔi cúk tôʔi diềʔu ák zằŋ nó cết cừŋ nàʔɔ zɛɲ ziệt xi nàʔɔ nếʔu kó ŋườʔi dến tʰăm tôʔi nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi zốʔicá lòŋ cứʔa cɔ zanák zồʔi di za ŋɔàʔi nóʔi lạʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ɣét tôʔi dềʔu sầmsì ŋịc tôʔi cúŋnó twan mưʔuhạʔi tôʔi một tʰứ bịɲ ák zíɲ deo cên mìɲ kìʔa bâʔizờ zồʔi cẳŋ cổʔi zậʔi nữʔa dỗʔi ŋườʔi bạntʰân tôʔi mà lòŋ tôʔi tinkậʔi dã báɲ tôʔi kũŋ ɣiơ ɣót ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi nâŋdỡ tôʔi tʰi tôʔi báʔɔ cả cúŋnó nếʔu tʰùŋịc xôŋ tʰắŋ tôʔi ɲờ dó tôʔi ɲậnbiết cúʔa dẹplòŋ tôʔi sɔŋ ɲơn tʰɛɲliêm tôʔi cúʔa nâŋdỡ tôʔi lập tôʔi dứŋ vữŋ cướk cúʔa dờʔidờʔi Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên từ cướk vôkùŋ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi ʔamɛn ʔamɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi mơướk cúʔa ɲư kɔn naj káʔi tʰèmxát xɛ nướk liɲhồn tôʔi xátxaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ tôʔi dến zamắt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cừŋ nàʔɔ Ðươŋ xi ŋườʔita hằŋ hỏʔi tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dâʔu tʰì nướkmắt dồăn tôʔi ŋàʔi dêm sưʔa tôʔi di kùŋ dɔàn cúŋ zẫn dến ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kótiếŋ zeo mừŋ xɛnŋợʔi một dɔàn dôŋ ɣiữ zàʔi tôʔi ɲớ lạʔi diềʔu ấʔi lòŋ buồntʰảm hỡʔi liɲhồn vìsaw ŋươʔi ŋã bồncồn cɔŋ mìɲ hãʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi nữʔa vì ɲờ ŋàʔi dượk kứʔuzỗʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi ŋã cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi nên sứ ɣiôdɛɲ từ núʔi hẹtmôn ɣò mítsê ʔa tôʔi ɲớ dến cúʔa vựk ɣọʔi vựk tʰeo tiếŋ àʔɔàʔɔ kủʔa tʰák nướk cúʔa kák sóŋ nướklớn kủʔa cúʔa dã ŋập tôʔi zầʔu vậʔi banŋàʔi Ðứkzê sajxiến ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn bandêm bàʔi ŋàʔi kùŋ tôʔi tứklà bàʔi kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi tôʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dá tôʔi zằŋ kớsaw cúʔa kwên tôʔi ɲơn saw tôʔi fảʔi buồntʰảm vì kớ tʰùŋịc tôʔi cɔŋ xi ɲữŋ kừʔudịc tôʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi hỏʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dâʔu tʰì cúŋnó sỉɲụk tôʔi xáknàʔɔ ɣãʔi sươŋkốt tôʔi hỡʔi liɲhồn kớsaw ŋươʔi ŋã bồncồn cɔŋ mìɲ hãʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn xɛnŋợʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa ŋàʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi dɔán sét tôʔi biɲ vựk zwiênkớ tôʔi dốʔi kùŋ zân vôdạʔɔ hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi ŋươʔi zốʔi ɣạt cẳŋ kôŋbìɲ vì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi cúʔa sứklựk tôʔi kớsaw cúʔa dã tôʔi ɲơn saw tôʔi fảʔi buồntʰảm vì kớ tʰùŋịc tôʔi kầʔucúʔa fát áɲsáŋ cơn tʰật kủʔa cúʔa za nó zẫn tôʔi dưʔa tôʔi dến núʔi tʰáɲ nơʔi kủʔa cúʔa bấʔizờ tôʔi di dến bàntʰờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứk dếnkùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất vuimừŋ kủʔa tôʔi hỡʔicúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi lấʔi dờn kầm ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa hỡʔi liɲhồn kớsaw ŋươʔi ŋã bồncồn cɔŋ mìɲ hãʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi nữʔa ŋàʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰuật lạʔi kôŋviệk cúʔa dã cɔŋ dờʔi buổʔi ŋàʔisưʔa cúʔa zùŋ tăj mìɲ duổʔi kák zântộk za sɔŋ lạʔi tàʔibồʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi cúʔa xổ cɔ kák zân ɲưŋ lạʔi cɔ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi za vì cẳŋ ɲờ tʰɛɲ ɣươm mìɲ dượk sứ kũŋ cẳŋ ɲờ káɲtăj mìɲ dượk kứʔu bèn ɲờ tăj hữʔu cúʔa káɲtăj cúʔa sáŋ cúʔa vìcúʔa cɔ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa vwatôʔi kầʔucúʔa lịɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu zakốp ɲờcúʔa cúŋtôʔi sô dổ kừʔudịc cúŋtôʔi ɲơn zɛɲ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi ɣiàʔidạp ɲữŋ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ cúŋtôʔi vì tôʔi cẳŋ ɲờkậʔi kuŋ tôʔi tʰɛɲ ɣươm tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kứʔu tôʔi dâʔu ɲưŋcúʔa dã kứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi kừʔudịc cúŋtôʔi làm ɲữŋ ɣɛŋét cúŋtôʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi dã xwej mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi kảmtạ zɛɲ cúʔa dến dờʔidờʔi sɔŋ năj cúʔa dã cúŋtôʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɲuốkɲơ cúʔa cẳŋ kòn di za kùŋ dạʔɔ biɲ cúŋtôʔi nữʔa cúʔa xiến cúŋtôʔi luj lạʔi cướk kừʔudịc và ɣét cúŋtôʔi kướp lấʔi kủʔa cɔ mìɲ cúʔa dã fó cúŋtôʔi xáknàʔɔ ciên dịɲ dồăn và dã lạk cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ kák nướk cúʔa dã zânsự cúʔa xôŋ ɣiá ci và dáŋzá cúŋnó cẳŋ kaw cúʔa cúŋtôʔi tʰàɲ ôɲụk cɔ lânkận cúŋtôʔi làm dồ ɲạʔɔbáŋ cêkườʔi cɔ ɲữŋ suŋkwɛɲ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi tụkŋữ ɣiữʔa kák nướk cɔŋ kák zân ʔaj tʰấʔi cúŋtôʔi lắkdầʔu kả ŋàʔi sỉɲụk cướk tôʔi sự hổŋươʔi bawfủ tôʔi tạʔi tiếŋ sỉɲụk mắŋ cưởʔi và kớ tʰùŋịc báʔɔtʰù mọʔi dềʔu ấʔi dã sảʔi dến cɔ cúŋtôʔi sɔŋ cúŋtôʔi nàʔɔ kwên cúʔa kũŋ xôŋ bộʔiŋịc zawướk kủʔa cúʔa lòŋ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ tʰốʔi lạʔi bướk cúŋtôʔi kũŋ xôŋ cở xỏʔi lốʔi cúʔa zầʔu vậʔi cúʔa dã cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ cỗ có zừŋ bawfủ cúŋtôʔi bằŋ bóŋ cết nếʔu cúŋtôʔi kó kwên zɛɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi hɔặk ɣiơ tăj mìɲ hướŋ tʰần Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ hỏʔi ca saw vìŋàʔi tʰấʔi kủʔa lòŋ tʰật cúʔa hằŋ ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi ɣiết cúŋtôʔi ɲư kɔnciên zàɲ cɔ kạʔɔ hỡʔicúʔa hãʔi tỉɲ tʰứk ɲơn saw cúʔa ŋủ hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi cớ cúŋtôʔi kớsaw cúʔa ɣiấʔu di kwên nỗʔi hɔạnnạn cúŋtôʔi vì liɲhồn cúŋtôʔi fụk zướʔi bụʔi cɔ tʰântʰể cúŋtôʔi zíɲ vàʔɔ dất sincúʔa hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi ɣiúpdỡ cúŋta hãʔi ɲơn cúʔa cuộk cúŋtôʔi lòŋ tôʔi dầʔi càn ɲữŋ lờʔi tôʔi nóʔi diềʔu tôʔi vịɲ cɔ vwa lưỡʔi tôʔi ɲư ŋòʔi kủʔa kó tàʔi ŋàʔi siɲdẹp hếttʰảʔi kɔncaj lɔàʔiŋườʔi ʔaân diển càn za nơʔi môʔi ŋàʔi vìvậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fướk cɔ ŋàʔi dến dờʔidờʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ mạɲzạn hãʔi daj ɣươm nơʔi hôŋ là viɲhiển waiŋi kủʔa ŋàʔi vì kớ cơn tʰật kôŋbìɲ hãʔi lấʔi waiŋi ŋàʔi kỡʔi sɛ tớʔi kác tʰắŋ cận tăj hữʔu ŋàʔi zạʔi cɔ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ việk dáŋ kíɲ kák mũʔitên ŋàʔi ɲọn bắn tʰấʔu tʰùŋịc vwa kák zân dềʔu ŋã zướʔi ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋôʔi cúʔa kòn mãʔi dờʔi kwadờʔi kiə biɲkwiền nướk cúʔa biɲkwiền ŋăitʰẳŋ cúʔa ưʔa kôŋbìɲ ɣét diềʔu zanák cɔnên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa cúʔa dã sứk zầʔu cɔ cúʔabằŋ zầʔu vujvẻ cổʔi dồŋlɔạʔi cúʔa kák áʔɔsốŋ ŋàʔi băj mùʔi tʰơm zượk cầmhươŋ ɲụk kwế từ cɔŋ dền ŋà kótiếŋ ɲạkxí bằŋ zâʔi vujvẻ ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋườʔi kwí kủʔa ŋàʔi kó kák kôŋcúʔa hɔàŋậʔu dứŋ hữʔu ŋàʔi caŋsứk vàŋ fiə hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi hãʔi ŋɛ hãʔi swiŋĩ hãʔi lắŋ tôʔi xá kwên zânsự ɲàkửʔa ca kủʔa kɔn tʰì vwa ɲansắk kɔn vìŋàʔi cúʔa kɔn hãʔi tônkíɲ ŋàʔi kɔŋáʔi tizơ dɛm dến và ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣiàʔusaŋ cɔŋ zân dến kầʔu kɔn kôŋcúʔa cɔŋ dền dượk zất viɲhiển Áʔɔsốŋ nàŋ dềʔu tʰêʔuzệt bằŋ vàŋ nàŋ mặk áʔɔ ɣấm zamắt vwa kák dồŋciɲ di tʰeo nàŋ dượk dưʔa dến ŋàʔi họ dượk zẫn dến kó vujvẻ xɔáʔilạk mà vàʔɔ dền vwa kák kɔncaj ŋàʔi tʰăj cɔ tổfụ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kwan cưởŋ cɔŋ xắp tʰếzan tôʔi cɔ zɛɲ ŋàʔi dượk ɲắk lạʔi cɔŋ kák dờʔi vì kớ ấʔi kák zântộk kảmtạ ŋàʔi dờʔidờʔi xôŋ tʰôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi nươŋnáʔu sứklựk kủʔa cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi ɣiúpdỡ cɔŋ kơn zancuân vìvậʔi cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ zầʔu dất biếnkảʔi núʔi lăjdộŋ kwăŋ vàʔɔ lòŋ zầʔu nướkbiển sôʔi và kák núʔi zúŋdộŋ kớ cwiển zậʔi kủʔa kó ŋọn sôŋ zòŋ nướk vuj tʰàɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi là nơʔi tʰáɲ cỗ kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiữʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi xôŋ zúŋdộŋ vừʔa zạŋdôŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiúpdỡ kák zân náʔɔlɔạn kák nướk zúŋdộŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fát tiếŋ dất cảʔi Ðứkzê kwân kùŋ cúŋtôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔiza kốp nơʔi nươŋnáʔu kủʔa cúŋtôʔi hãʔi dến ɲìn sɛm kák kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkzê sự fá ŋàʔi dã cên dất zườŋ nàʔɔ ŋàʔi zẹp ʔiên ɣiặk cɔdến dầʔu kùŋ cáʔidất bẻ ɣảʔi kák kuŋ cặt kák ɣiáʔɔ za từŋ miếŋ và dốt sɛ nơʔi lửʔa hãʔi ʔiênlặŋ zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ta dượk kaw cɔŋ kák nướk kũŋ dượk kaw cên dất Ðứkzê kwân kùŋ cúŋtôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔiza kốp nơʔi nươŋnáʔu kủʔa cúŋtôʔi hỡʔi kák zân hãʔi vỗtăj hãʔi lấʔi tiếŋ tʰắŋ cận zeo mừŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vìÐứkzê cí kaw tʰật dáŋ kiɲ ŋàʔi vwa cên kả cáʔidất ŋàʔi xiến kák zân swi fụk cúŋtôʔi và kák nướk fụk zướʔi cơn cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi cọn kơŋiệp cɔ cúŋtôʔi là viɲhiển kủʔa zakốp ŋàʔi ʔiêʔumến Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋự kótiếŋ zeo mừŋ Ðứkzê tʰăŋ kótiếŋ tʰổʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xá di hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn vwa cúŋtôʔi xá di vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwa kủʔa kả cáʔidất hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn kác tʰôŋiểʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kaicị kák nướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋự ŋôʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi vwa kák zân dềʔu ɲóm ɲăw lạʔi Ðặŋ zân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zaham vì kák xiên kủʔa dất dềʔu tʰuộk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi dượk cí kaw Ðứkzê zất dáŋ dượk ŋợʔixɛn cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta tạʔi cên núʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi núʔisi dẹpdẽ nổʔi fíʔa bắk kiɲdô kủʔa vwa kawkả và vujvẻ kủʔa kả tʰếzan cɔŋ ɲữŋ dền kák tʰàɲ ấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã mìɲ za ɲư nơʔi nươŋnáʔu vì kìʔa kák vwa dã kùŋ ɲăw di kwa họ tʰấʔi dến sữŋsờ bốʔizốʔi zồʔi măw măw cạʔi cốn tạʔi nơʔi dó zunzẩʔi họ dăwdớn xáknàʔɔ dờn sɛɲ dẻ cúʔa zùŋ ŋọn ɣió dôŋ Ðáɲ kák tầʔu tazêsi Ðʔiềʔu cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛnóʔi tʰì dã tʰấʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân tứklà cɔŋ tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi vữŋcắk dờʔidờʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa dền tʰờ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi kó tưởŋ dến ɲơn kủʔa cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi zɛɲ cúʔa tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa tʰể ấʔi cɔdến kák dầʔu kùŋ cáʔidất tăj hữʔu cúʔa dầʔizẫʔi kôŋbìɲ vì kớ dɔán sét kủʔa cúʔa ŋwiện núʔi siôn vujvẻ kák kɔŋáʔi zuda mừŋzỡ hãʔi di suŋkwɛɲ siôn hãʔi zạʔɔ vòŋ tʰàɲ kák ŋọn tʰáp hãʔi căm sɛm kák dồnlũʔi sɛmsét kák dền hầʔu cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰuật lạʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi dến vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ ŋàʔi zẫn cúŋtôʔi cɔdến cết hỡʔi kák zân hãʔi ŋɛ diềʔu nầʔi hỡʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋườʔiở tʰếzan xá lắŋtaj ŋɛ bấtluận ŋườʔi hạlưʔu hăjlà tʰượŋlưʔu ŋườʔi ɣiàʔukó kũŋɲư ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔnàn miệŋ tôʔi nóʔi lờʔi xônŋwan sự swiɣẫm lòŋ tôʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ tôʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi câmŋôn tôʔi lấʔi dờn kầm ɣiảʔi kâʔudố tôʔi vì kớsaw tôʔi fảʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi tajhọʔa xi zanák kủʔa ɲữŋ ciếm tôʔi vâʔi fủ tôʔi cúŋnó ɲờkậʔi nơʔi tàʔisản mìɲ fôcươŋ kủʔakảʔi zưzật mìɲ cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cuộk dượk ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ hɔặk dóŋ ɣiá cuộk ŋườʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi dượk sốŋ mãʔimãʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi vì ɣiá cuộk mạŋ sốŋ tʰật kwá ŋườʔi xôŋtʰể dượk dến dờʔidờʔi vì ŋườʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan cết kẻ diênkuồŋ ŋườʔi ŋuzạʔi kũŋ cết ɲư ɲăw lạʔi tàʔisản mìɲ cɔ xák tưtưởŋ cɔŋ cúŋnó zằŋ ɲà mìɲ kòn mãʔimãʔi và cỗ mìɲ kó dờʔi nầʔi kwadờʔi kiə cúŋnó kũŋ lấʔi cíɲ mìɲ dặt cɔ dất zuộŋ mìɲ ɲưŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi zầʔu dượk saŋcọŋ cẳŋ kòn mãʔi nó ɣiốŋ ɲư tʰúvật fảʔi kɔn dườŋ nầʔi cúŋnó ɣiữ tʰeo ấʔilà ŋuzạʔi kủʔa cúŋnó zầʔu vậʔi ɲữŋ dến săw ưŋ lờʔi kủʔa cúŋnó dịɲ suốŋ âmfủ ɲư bầʔi ciên sự cết căn ɣiữ cúŋnó sáŋ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ kwản cúŋnó sự dẹpdẽ cúŋnó tiêʔuziệt cɔŋ âmfủ hầʔu cɔ cúŋnó cẳŋ kòn nơʔi nàʔɔ nữʔa ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cuộk liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi kwiền âmfủ vìŋàʔi tiếpzướk tôʔi cớ xi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cởnên ɣiàʔukó lúk viɲhiển ɲà ŋườʔi ấʔi tăŋ vì xi ŋườʔi cết cẳŋ dɛm di ɣì dượk sự viɲhiển ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋ tʰeo ŋườʔi suốŋ dâʔu zẫʔucɔ dươŋ lúk sốŋ ŋườʔi cúk fướk cɔ liɲhồn mìɲ vả ŋườʔita xɛnŋợʔi mìɲ nếʔu mìɲ íclợʔi cɔ mìɲ tʰì ŋườʔi di dến zòŋzõʔi tổfụ mìɲ họ cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi áɲsáŋ nữʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hưởŋ saŋcọŋ xôŋ hiểʔubiết ɣì ɣiốŋ ɲư tʰúvật fảʔi Ðấŋ kwiềnnăŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán ɣọʔi tʰiêɲạ từ hướŋ mặtcờʔi mọk cɔdến hướŋ mặtcờʔi từsi tốtdẹp tɔànvẹn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã sáŋ cóʔi za Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi dến xôŋ nínlặŋ dâʔu cướk ŋàʔi kó dám lửʔa cáʔi tʰiêʔu cuŋkwɛɲ ŋàʔi cận bãʔɔ zữzộʔi ŋàʔi kêʔu kák từŋ cờʔi cên kaw và dất zướʔi dặŋ dɔán sét zânsự ŋàʔi hãʔi ɲóm lạʔi kùŋ kák ŋườʔi tʰáɲ là ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dã zùŋ kủʔa zawướk kùŋ kák từŋ cờʔi zaw cwiền kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi vì cíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwan sét hỡʔi zân hãʔi ŋɛ nóʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ŋɛ làmcứŋ ŋịc ŋươʔi ta Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ta cẳŋcác ŋươʔi kớ kák kủʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kwở ŋươʔi tạʔi ɲữŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu hằŋ cướk ta xôŋ dựk nơʔi ɲàŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ lấʔi zê dựk cɔŋ bầʔi ŋươʔi vì hếttʰảʔi tʰúzừŋ dềʔu tʰuộk kák bầʔi súkvật tạʔi cên ŋàn núʔi kũŋ vậʔi ta kák cim kủʔa núʔi mọʔi hăj dộŋ cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ tʰuộk nếʔu dóʔi cẳŋ nóʔi cɔ ŋươʔi hăj vì tʰếzan cɔŋ dềʔu tʰuộk ta tʰịt dựk hăjlà ʔuốŋ hwiết zê dựk saw hãʔi zâŋ kảmtạ kủʔa cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và cả hứʔa ŋwiện ŋươʔi cɔ Ðấŋcí kaw cɔŋ ŋàʔi zancuân hãʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ ta ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi ŋươʔi ŋợʔixɛn ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán kùŋ ák zằŋ ɲơn saw ŋươʔi tʰuật lạʔi kák vì kớ ɣì miệŋ ŋươʔi nóʔi zawướk tʰật ŋươʔi ɣét sửʔa zạʔi bỏ săw lưŋ ŋươʔi kák lờʔi fán xi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ăncộm ưŋ lòŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi dã ciə fần kùŋ ŋɔạʔitìɲ ŋươʔi tʰả miệŋ mìɲ nóʔisấʔu buôŋ lưỡʔi mìɲ tʰêʔuzệt zốʔi ɣạt ŋươʔi ŋồʔi nóʔicwiện hàɲ ʔɛɲɛm ŋươʔi ɣièm cê kɔncaj kủʔa ŋươʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi dã kɔn nínlặŋ ŋươʔi tưởŋ zằŋ tʰật ʔiɲư ŋươʔi ɲưŋ các fạt tônviɲ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ di tʰeo dườŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ ta cɔ tʰấʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi tùʔi lòŋ ɲơn kủʔa cúʔa sin hãʔi sóʔa kák vifạm tôʔi tʰeo zất kủʔa cúʔa sin hãʔi zửʔa tôʔi cɔ sạc cọʔi zanák và tôʔi dượk tʰɛɲxiết tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi vì tôʔi ɲậnbiết kák vifạm tôʔi tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi hằŋ cướk tôʔi tôʔi dã fạmtộʔi kùŋ cúʔa cỉ kùŋ mộtmìɲ cúʔa tʰôʔi và diềʔu ák cướk cúʔa hầʔu cɔ cúʔa dượk sưŋ kôŋbìɲ xi cúʔa fán và dượk tʰɛɲsạc xi cúʔa sétdɔán kìʔa tôʔi sɛɲ za cɔŋ zanák mẹ tôʔi dã hɔàʔitʰaj tôʔi cɔŋ tộʔilỗʔi nầʔi cúʔa cơn tʰật nơʔi cɔŋ cúʔa cɔ tôʔi dượk xônŋwan cɔŋ nơʔi kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi sin hãʔi lấʔi cùm kiɲzớʔi tẩʔi sạc tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi tʰì tôʔi dượk tiɲ sạc kầʔucúʔa hãʔi zửʔa tôʔi tʰì tôʔi cắŋ twiết hãʔi cɔ tôʔi ŋɛ vujvẻ mừŋzỡ kák sươŋkốt cúʔa dã ɣãʔi dượk xɔáʔilạk sincúʔa ŋảɲ xỏʔi kák tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi và sóʔa hếttʰảʔi zanák tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi zựŋ cɔŋ tôʔi mộtlòŋ cɔŋsạc và cɔ mớʔi lạʔi cɔŋ tôʔi tʰầnliɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ sin cớ tôʔi xỏʔi cướk cúʔa kũŋ dừŋ kất xỏʔi tôʔi tʰáɲliɲcúʔa sin hãʔi lạʔi cɔ tôʔi vujvẻ kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa zùŋ tʰầnliɲ sẵnlòŋ nâŋdỡ tôʔi bấʔizờ ŋợʔixɛn kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa sin tôʔi zồʔi miệŋ tôʔi cwiền za ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa vìcúʔa xôŋ ưʔatʰíc kủʔa bằŋ vậʔi tôʔi cắk dã zâŋ kủʔa tʰiêʔu kũŋ xôŋ dẹplòŋ cúʔa kủʔa dẹplòŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ấʔilà tâmtʰần dăwtʰươŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi lòŋ dăwtʰươŋ tʰốŋ hốʔi cúʔa xôŋ xiɲzể dâʔu kầʔusin cúʔa hãʔi làmlàɲ cɔ siôn tùʔiý ŋàʔi làɲ tʰíc nóʔizốʔi nóʔi kôŋbìɲ hỡʔi lưỡʔi zốʔicá ŋươʔi ưʔa kák lờʔi tàɲạʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ fáhạʔi ŋươʔi dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi ŋươʔi zứt ŋươʔi xỏʔi cạʔi ŋươʔi và ɲổ ŋươʔi xỏʔi dất sốŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰấʔi và kườʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ kìʔa ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲờ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sứklựk mìɲ sɔŋ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ɣiàʔukó mìɲ làm cɔ mìɲ xẩnkầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi cẳŋ kó kiɲ xiếp cúŋnó kơn kiɲ xiếp vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi zảʔizắk kốt hàʔi kủʔa dóŋ dốʔiŋịc ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dã cɔ cúŋnó hổtʰẹn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó Ôʔi cớci siôn kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã dến xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɛm kák fu kủʔa zânsự ŋàʔi tʰìza kốp mừŋzỡ ʔisơzaên vujvẻ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi lấʔi zɛɲ cúʔa kứʔu tôʔi zùŋ kwiềnnăŋ cúʔa sét tôʔi kôŋbìɲ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ kák lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ tôʔi vì ŋườʔi zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi ŋườʔi huŋbạʔɔ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi cúŋnó xôŋ dể Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dứŋ cướk mìɲ nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cợ tôʔi cúʔa Ðấŋ nâŋdỡ liɲhồn tôʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi mọʔi mỗʔi zancuân mắt tôʔi tʰấʔi báʔɔ cả cɔ tʰùŋịc tôʔi lạʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin hãʔi lắŋ tôʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi cớ cúʔa cɔ xỏʔi ŋɛ lờʔi nàʔisin tôʔi sin hãʔi ŋɛ dáp lạʔi tôʔi tôʔi sốnsaŋ tʰantʰở zênsiết bởʔi tiếŋ tʰùŋịc bởʔi ák vì cúŋnó tʰêm ák cên mìɲ tôʔi bắtbớ tôʔi kác ɣiậnzữ lòŋ tôʔi zất dăwdớn cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi sự kiɲ xiếp cết dã lấʔi tôʔi nỗʔi zunzẩʔi dã ɣiáŋ cên tôʔi sự hɔảŋốt dã fủ lấʔi tôʔi tôʔi kó nóʔi Ôʔi cớci tôʔi kó káɲ ɲư kâʔu ʔaét băj di dượk ʔiênlặŋ fảʔi tôʔi cốn di sa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ tôʔi lậtdật cạʔi dụt xỏʔi ɣió zữ và xỏʔi zôŋtố hỡʔicúʔa hãʔi cúŋnó xiến cɔ lộnsộn tiếŋ cúŋnó vì tôʔi tʰấʔi huŋbạʔɔ cɛɲzàɲ cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋàʔi dêm cúŋnó di vòŋ kwɛɲ cên vác tʰàɲ sự ák diềʔu xuấʔi xỏʔa ɣiữʔa tʰàɲ sự zantà kũŋ ɣiữʔa tʰàɲ Ðʔiềʔu ɣiả ŋụʔi xôŋ lìʔa zânsự ŋàʔi Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin kứʔu tôʔi vì ɲữŋ nướk dã tʰấʔu dến liɲhồn tôʔi tôʔi cɔŋ sâʔu nơʔi xôŋ dụŋ kẳŋ tôʔi cìm cɔŋ nướk sâʔu zòŋ nướk ŋập tôʔi tôʔi kuốŋọŋ tôʔi xô mắt tôʔi hawmòn dươŋ xi côŋdợʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ɲữŋ ɣɛŋét tôʔi vôkớ ɲiềʔu tók dầʔu tôʔi ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc tôʔi vôkớ hạʔi tôʔi tʰật mạɲ tôʔi fảʔi bồʔizưỡŋ diềʔu tôʔi xôŋ kướp ɣiựt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi cúʔa ŋuzạʔi tôʔi kák tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi xôŋ ɣiấʔu cúʔa dượk hỡʔicúʔazê kwân ŋwiện ɲữŋ côŋdợʔi cúʔa cớ hổtʰẹn kớ tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ôʔi ŋwiện nàʔɔ kầʔu cúʔa cớ sỉɲụk tạʔi việk tôʔi Ấʔi cúʔa tôʔi dã maŋ ɲuốkɲơ và hổtʰẹn bawfủ tôʔi tôʔi dã cởnên cɔ ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi một ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔibaŋ cɔ kák kɔncaj tôʔi vì sốtsắŋ dền cúʔa tiêʔu tôʔi sự sỉɲụk kủʔa sỉɲụk cúʔa dã dổ cên tôʔi tôʔi xók ɲịn dể liɲhồn tôʔi tʰì diềʔu dó kũŋ cở sỉɲụk tôʔi tôʔi lấʔi baw ɣaj mặk áʔɔsốŋ bèn cởnên kâʔu tụkŋữ cɔ cúŋnó ɲữŋ ŋồʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ còcwiện tôʔi tôʔi dề kâʔu kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ zượʔu ɲưŋÐứkzê ơʔi tôʔi ɲờ zịp mà kầʔuŋwiện kùŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰeo tʰươŋsót kủʔa cúʔa và tʰeo tʰật kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa sin hãʔi dáp lạʔi tôʔi sin hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi vũŋ kẻʔɔ tôʔi căŋ ŋwiện tôʔi dượk ɣiảʔitʰɔát xỏʔi ɲữŋ ɣét tôʔi xỏʔi nướk sâʔu ŋwiện zòŋ nướk xôŋ ŋập tôʔi vựk sâʔu cớ ɲận tôʔi hầm xôŋ miệŋ lạʔi cên tôʔi Ðứkzê xiến sin hãʔi dáp lạʔi tôʔi ɲơn ŋàʔi tùʔi tʰươŋsót kủʔa ŋàʔi sin hãʔi sâʔi lạʔi kùŋ tôʔi sincúʔa cớ ɣiấʔu kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa tôʔi dươŋ zancuân hãʔi măw măw dáp lạʔi tôʔi kầʔusin cúʔa dến ɣần liɲhồn tôʔi cuộk vì kớ tʰùŋịc tôʔi sin hãʔi kứʔucuộk tôʔi cúʔa sỉɲụk hổtʰẹn ɲuốt ɲơ kủʔa tôʔi kák kừʔudịc tôʔi dềʔu cướk cúʔa sự sỉɲụk dăwtʰươŋ lòŋ tôʔi tôʔi dầʔi xổ ɲọk tôʔi côŋdợʔi kó ŋườʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi ɲưŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj tôʔi mɔŋ ɲờ ŋườʔi ʔanủʔi sɔŋ nàʔɔ kó ɣặp cúŋnó dắŋ tʰựk tôʔi và cɔ tôʔi ʔuốŋ ɣiấm cɔŋ xi xát ŋwiện tiệk cướk cúŋnó cởnên káʔi bẫʔi xi cúŋnó dượk bìɲan ŋwiện lạʔi cởnên káʔi lướʔi ŋwiện cúŋnó tốʔi xôŋ kòn tʰấʔi và hãʔi cɔ lưŋ cúŋnó hằŋ zun hãʔi dổ kơn tʰạɲ cúʔa cên cúŋnó xiến ɣiậnzữ cúʔa tʰeo ŋwiện cỗ cúŋnó bỏhwaŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj cɔŋ cạʔi cúŋnó nữʔa vì cúŋnó cúʔa dã dáɲ và tʰuật lạʔi dăwdớn kủʔa ŋườʔi cúʔa dã cɔ bịtʰươŋ kầʔusin cúʔa hãʔi za tộʔiák vàʔɔ tộʔiák cúŋnó cớ cɔ cúŋnó vàʔɔ cɔŋ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa ŋwiện cúŋnó sóʔa xỏʔi sác sốŋ xôŋ dượk ɣi cuŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kòn tôʔi xốnkùŋ dăwdớn cuộk lạʔi sẽ zeo mừŋ xi tôʔi katụŋ cúʔa kả ŋàʔi lưỡʔi tôʔi kũŋ nóʔi lạʔi kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa vì ɲữŋ hạʔi tôʔi dã kỡ hổtʰẹn kả hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin cɔ vwa sétdɔán kủʔa cúʔa và cɔ vươŋtử kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋườʔi dɔán sét zânsự cúʔa kác kôŋbìɲ sử xốnkùŋ kác ŋăitʰẳŋ ɲơn kôŋbìɲ kák núʔi ɣò nỗŋ sẽ dɛm bìɲan dến cɔ zânsự ŋườʔi dɔán sét xốnkùŋ kủʔa zân kứʔu kɔnkáʔi ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn cà hễ mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ kòn kó bawlâʔu tʰì cúŋnó kíɲ cúʔa bấʔilâʔu cɔdến muôndờʔi vwa ɣiáŋ suốŋ ɲư mưʔa cên kỏ mớʔi fát xáknàʔɔ ɣiọt kủʔa cận mưʔa tướʔi dất vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi vwa ấʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hưŋ tʰạɲ kũŋ kó bìɲan zưzật cɔdến cừŋ mặtcăŋ xôŋ kòn ŋườʔi kwản nầʔi tớʔi kiə từ sôŋ cɔ dếnkùŋ cáʔidất ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở dồŋ vắŋ kúʔi lạʔi cướk ŋườʔi kòn kák tʰùŋịc ŋườʔi bụʔi dất kák vwa tazêsi ɲữŋ kùlaw kốŋ tʰuế cɔ ŋườʔi vwa sa vwa sêba kốŋlễ cɔ ŋườʔi fảʔi hếttʰảʔi kák vwa mìɲ suốŋ cướk ŋườʔi kák nướk fụk ŋườʔi vì ŋườʔi ɣiảʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn xi kêʔukầʔu và kứʔu ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ xôŋ kó ʔaj ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi tʰươŋsót xốnkùŋ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn và kứʔu liɲhồn kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn ŋườʔi cuộk liɲhồn xỏʔi huŋbạʔɔ kũŋ sɛm hwiết kwíbáʔu ŋườʔi dượk sốŋ tʰiêɲạ zâŋ vàŋ saba cɔ ŋườʔi ŋườʔita kầʔuŋwiện cɔ ŋườʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi cúk fướk cɔ ŋườʔi sẽ kó zưzật ŋũkốk cên dất cên dỉɲ kák núʔi bôŋ cáʔi làʔɔsàʔɔ ɲư liban kòn ŋườʔiở tʰàɲtʰị hưŋ tʰạɲ ɲư kỏ kủʔa dất zɛɲ ŋườʔi kòn mãʔimãʔi hễ mặtcờʔi kòn dến cừŋ nàʔɔ zɛɲ ŋườʔi nɔj tʰeo cừŋ nầʔi ŋườʔita ɲơn zɛɲ ŋườʔi cúk fướk ɲăw kák nướk dềʔu sưŋ ŋườʔi kó fướk Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cỉ miɲ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ lạlùŋ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ viɲhiển ŋàʔi dến dờʔidờʔi ŋwiện xắp cáʔidất dượk dầʔi viɲhiển kủʔa ŋàʔi ʔamɛn ʔamɛn cuŋ kák bàʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa Ðʔa kɔncaj ʔisaj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰật dãʔi ʔisơzaên kác tốtlàɲ tứklà ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ cɔŋsạc kòn fần tôʔi cơn tôʔi dã ɣần suýt cút bướk tôʔi fảʔi cợt vì xi tôʔi tʰấʔi hưŋ
