tʰạɲ kủʔa ák tʰìkó lòŋ ɣɛɲɣét kiêʔuŋạʔɔ vì cɔŋ kơn cết cúŋnó cẳŋ dăwdớn sứklựk kủʔa cúŋnó zɛɲzự cúŋnó cẳŋ xổ ɲư ŋườʔi xák kũŋ xôŋ tajhọʔa ɲư ŋườʔidờʔi bởʔi kớ ấʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kâʔi cɔ kổ cúŋnó sự huŋbạʔɔ bawfủ cúŋnó ɲư káʔi áʔɔ mắt cúŋnó za cɔŋ tưtưởŋ lòŋ cúŋnó càn za cúŋnó ɲạʔɔbáŋ nóʔi kác huŋák cúŋnó nóʔi kác kawkỳ miệŋ tʰì nóʔi hàɲ tʰiên tʰượŋ kòn lưỡʔi lạʔi faw tʰếzan vì kớ ấʔi zânsự ŋàʔi sâʔi hướŋ dó và cúŋnó ʔuốŋ nướk kạncén cúŋnó zằŋ làmsaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dượk há kó citʰứk nơʔi Ðấŋcí kaw saw kìʔa ɲữŋ ák cúŋnó bìɲanvôsự kủʔakảʔi cúŋnó tʰêm tôʔi dã cɔ lòŋ tôʔi tiɲ sạc và zửʔa tăj tôʔi cɔŋ vôtộʔi việk ấʔi tʰật lấʔilàm luốŋ kôŋ vì hằŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi fảʔi zannan mỗʔi buổʔimaj tôʔi sửʔa fạt nếʔu tôʔi kó nóʔi zằŋ ta nóʔi ɲưvậʔi ʔaét tôʔi dã fạm cuŋ kùŋ zòŋzõʔi kɔnkáʔi cúʔa xi tôʔi swiɣẫm dể hiểʔubiết diềʔu ấʔi bèn tʰấʔi việk kựkɲọk kwá cɔ tôʔi cɔdến xi tôʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi swi lượŋ kuốʔicùŋ kủʔa cúŋnó cúʔa tʰật dặt cúŋnó tạʔi nơʔi cơn cợt xiến cɔ cúŋnó ʔuû ʔa kìʔa cúŋnó hủʔiziệt cɔŋ cúŋnó kiɲ xiếp fảʔi tiêʔuhaw cọʔi hỡʔicúʔa ŋườʔita xiɲzể ciêmbaw xi tỉɲ tʰứk tʰểnàʔɔ cúʔa xi tỉɲ tʰứk kũŋ xiɲzể hìɲzáŋ cúŋnó tʰể ấʔi xi lòŋ tôʔi cwasót và zạ tôʔi sônsaw tʰì bấʔizờ tôʔi ŋumuộʔi cẳŋ hiểʔubiết ɣì cướk cúʔa tôʔi xáknàʔɔ tʰúvật vậʔi sɔŋ tôʔi kứ kùŋ cúʔa cúʔa dã lấʔi tăj hữʔu tôʔi cúʔa zùŋ xwiên zạʔi zẫnzắt tôʔi zồʔi săw tiếpzướk tôʔi cɔŋ viɲhiển cên cờʔi tôʔi kó ʔaj cừ za cúʔa kòn zướʔi dất tôʔi cẳŋ ướkaw ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xák cúʔa tʰịt lòŋ tôʔi tiêʔuhaw ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sứklựk kủʔa lòŋ tôʔi fần tôʔi dến dờʔidờʔi vì kìʔa ɲữŋ sa cúʔa cúʔa hủʔiziệt hếttʰảʔi nàʔɔ tʰôŋzâm sâʔi cúʔa ɲưŋ lấʔilàm tʰăj cɔ tôʔi dến ɣần Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ɲờ cúʔazê nơʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ Ðặŋ tʰuật lạʔi tʰảʔi kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi vìsaw cúʔa cúŋtôʔi ɲơn saw kơn ɣiận cúʔa nổʔi fừŋ kùŋ bầʔi ciên kủʔa dồŋkỏ cúʔa sin hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi hộʔi cúʔa cúʔa dã dượk xi sưʔa và cuộk lạʔi dặŋ fần kơŋiệp kủʔa cúʔa kũŋ hãʔi ɲớ núʔi siôn nơʔi cúʔa dã kầʔusin cúʔa dưʔa bướk dến kák nơʔi dờʔidờʔi kẻtʰù ŋịc dã fá cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kák kừʔudịc cúʔa dã ɣầm ɣiữʔa hộʔi cúʔa cúŋnó zựŋ kờ cúŋnó dể zấʔuhiệʔu cúŋnó ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣiơ zìʔu cɔŋ dám zừŋ zậm kiə bâʔizờ cúŋnó zùŋ zìʔu búʔa hếttʰảʔi cạm cổ cúŋnó dã lấʔi lửʔa dốt nơʔi tʰáɲ cúʔa làm cɔ cỗ zɛɲ cúʔa za fàm dến dất cúŋnó nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi hủʔi fá cuŋ kả hếttʰảʔi di cúŋnó dã dốt kák ɲà hộʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ sứ cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi kák ŋọn kờ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ kòn dấŋ tiênci nữʔa và ɣiữʔa cúŋtôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó ʔaj dến cừŋ nàʔɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi kừʔudịc nóʔi sỉɲụk cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kẻtʰù ŋịc fạm zɛɲ cúʔa hɔàʔi saw sawcúʔa zứt tăj lạʔi tứklà tăj hữʔu cúʔa xá zút za xỏʔi lòŋ tiêʔuziệt cúŋnó di zầʔu vậʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vwatôʔi sưʔa vẫn kứʔuzỗʔi cên xắp cáʔidất cúʔa dã zùŋ kwiềnnăŋ cúʔa zẽ za bẻ ɣãʔi dầʔu kwáʔivật cɔŋ nướk cúʔa cà dầʔu viətʰan ban tʰựkvật cɔ zân dồŋ vắŋ cúʔa xiến suốʔi xɛ fun nướk và cɔ xô kák sôŋ ŋàʔi tʰuộk cúʔa dêm kũŋ vậʔi cúʔa dã sắmsửʔa mặtcăŋ mặtcờʔi cúʔa dã dặt kák bờkõʔi kủʔa dất và mùʔahè mùʔadôŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɲớ zằŋ tʰùŋịc dã sỉɲụk và zân ŋuzạʔi dã fạm dến zɛɲ ŋàʔi sin cớ fó cɔ tʰúzữ liɲhồn kâʔu dất kủʔa cúʔa kũŋ dừŋ kwên hɔàʔi xốnkùŋ kủʔa cúʔa sincúʔa dɔáʔi dến zawướk vì kák nơʔi tốʔităm kủʔa dất dềʔu dầʔizẫʔi huŋbạʔɔ ŋườʔi cớ cởvề hổtʰẹn ŋwiện xốnkùŋ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi biɲ vựk zwiênkớ cúʔa hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi tʰểnàʔɔ ŋuzạʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi sỉɲụk cúʔa sin cớ kwên tiếŋ kừʔudịc cúʔa sự ồnàʔɔ kủʔa zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ cúʔa tʰấʔu xôŋ ŋớt hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi kảmtạ zɛɲ cúʔa ɣần ŋườʔita tʰuật lạʔi kôŋviệk lạlùŋ kủʔa cúʔa xi dến tʰìɣiờ dã dịɲ tʰì dɔán sét kác ŋăitʰẳŋ vớʔi zân cên dất dềʔu cảʔi kòn dã zựŋ kák cụ tôʔi nóʔi kùŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ zằŋ cớ kác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ lạʔi nóʔi vớʔi ák zằŋ cớ ŋướk sừŋ cớ ŋướk sừŋ kák ŋươʔi kaw kũŋ dừŋ kứŋkổ nóʔi kác kỳxôʔi vì cẳŋ fảʔi fươŋ dôŋ fươŋ tâʔi hăjlà fươŋ kó kaw dến bèn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɔán sét ŋàʔi nầʔi suốŋ ɲắk kiə vì cɔŋ tăj Ðứkzê kó káʔi cén sôʔi zượʔu cén dầʔi zượʔu fa ŋàʔi zót za tʰật hếttʰảʔi ák nơʔi tʰếzan kặn zượʔu ấʔi và ʔuốŋ sɔŋ tôʔi tʰuật lạʔi kák diềʔu dó kũŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp tôʔi cặt hếttʰảʔi kák sừŋ ák kòn kák sừŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk ŋướk cɔŋzu da ŋườʔita Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zɛɲŋàʔi tạʔi ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi salɛm và nơʔi ŋàʔi tạʔi siôn tạʔi nơʔi ấʔi ŋàʔi dã ɣãʔi kuŋ káʔi xiên tʰɛɲ ɣươm xíɣiớʔi ciến cúʔa zựkzỡ waj viɲ hơn kák núʔi kướp ɣiựt kák ɣanzạ dã kướp họ ŋủ cɔŋ ɣiấk mìɲ cẳŋ ŋườʔi mạɲzạn nàʔɔ dượk káɲtăj mìɲ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp xi cúʔa kwởcác sɛ ŋựʔa ŋủmê cíɲ mìɲ cúʔa tʰậtlà dáŋsợ kơn ɣiận cúʔa vừʔa nổʔi ʔaj dứŋ nổʔi cướk cúʔa từ cên cờʔi cúʔa cwiền dɔán ŋữ xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cổʔi zậʔi dɔán sét ɣiảʔicứʔu kák ŋườʔi cên dất tʰì dất sợhãʔi ʔiênlặŋ kơn ɣiận lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa kòn ɣiận zư lạʔi cúʔa ŋăncở hãʔi hứʔa ŋwiện cả sɔŋ cɔ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi nàʔɔ suŋkwɛɲ ŋàʔi xá dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðấŋ dáŋ kíɲ ŋàʔi ziệt xí kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa kák kwan cưởŋ Ðốʔi kùŋ kák vwa tʰếzan ŋàʔi dáŋ kiɲ dáŋsợ tôʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fát tiếŋ hướŋ kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ cɔŋŋàʔi zancuân tôʔi kầʔu cúʔa bandêm tăj tôʔi ɣiơ tʰẳŋ xôŋ mỏʔi liɲhồn tôʔi xôŋ cịʔu ʔanủʔi tôʔi ɲớ dến Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bồncồn tʰantʰở tʰầnliɲ tôʔi mỏʔi cúʔa ɣiữ tôʔi za tôʔi bốʔizốʔi xôŋ nóʔi dượk tôʔi swiŋĩ ŋàʔisưʔa vì kák dã kwa bandêm tôʔi ɲắk lạʔi bàʔi tôʔi tôʔi swiɣẫm cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi và tʰầnliɲ tôʔi tìmtòʔi kỹkàŋ cúʔa dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi cẳŋ kòn nữʔa saw sự ɲơn ŋàʔi zứt dến mãʔimãʔi lờʔi hứʔa kủʔa ŋàʔi xôŋ tʰàɲ dờʔidờʔi saw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwên saw cɔŋ kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi kó xép lòŋ tʰươŋsót tôʔi nóʔi Ðâʔi tậtŋwiền tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi ɲớ lạʔi kák tăj hữʔu kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw tôʔi ɲắk lạʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲớ dến kák fép kủʔa ŋàʔi xi sưʔa kũŋ ŋẫmŋĩ mọʔi kôŋták cúʔa swiɣẫm ɲữŋ việklàm kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cwiểndộŋ cúʔa cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ kó tʰần nàʔɔ bằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi căŋ cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj làmfép cɔbiết kwiềnnăŋ cúʔa ɣiữʔa kák zân cúʔa zùŋ káɲtăj mìɲ cuộk zânsự cúʔa tứklà kɔncaj kủʔa zakốp kủʔa ɣiôsép hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák nướk dã tʰấʔi cúʔa kák nướk dã tʰấʔi cúʔa ɲữŋ vựk sâʔu kũŋ zúŋdộŋ kák mâʔi dổ za nướk bầʔucờʔi vaŋ za tiếŋ và kák cúʔa băj dâʔidó tiếŋ cúʔa cɔŋ ɣió cốt cớpɲɔáŋ sɔj sáŋ tʰếzan cwiểndộŋ zuŋziɲ cwiểndộŋ cúʔa cɔŋ kák lốʔi cúʔa cɔŋ nướk sâʔu kòn kák zấʔu bướk cúʔa xôŋ ʔaj dến cúʔa kậʔi tăj môʔisɛ ʔazôn mà zẫnzắt zânsự ŋàʔi ɲư dɔàn ciên hỡʔi zânsự hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ luậtfáp hãʔi ŋiêŋ taj kwa ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ ta mởmiệŋ za nóʔi tʰízụ bàʔi za ɲữŋ kâʔudố kủʔa dờʔi sưʔa mà cúŋta dã ŋɛ và tổfụ cúŋta dã tʰuật lạʔi cɔ cúŋta cúŋta cẳŋ ɣiấʔu kák diềʔu ấʔi kùŋ kɔncáʔu bèn tʰuật lạʔi cɔ zòŋzõʔi hậʔu laj ɲữŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi kôŋviệk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi dã ŋàʔi dã cứŋkớ nơʔi zakốp Ðịɲ luậtfáp cɔŋ ʔisơzaên cwiền zặn tổfụ cúŋta fảʔi zạʔi lạʔi cɔ kɔncáʔu mìɲ hầʔu cɔ zòŋzõʔi hậʔu laj tứklà kɔnkáʔi sɛɲ Ðượk ɲữŋ diềʔu dó zồʔi fiên cúŋnó cwiền lạʔi cɔ kɔncáʔu mìɲ hầʔu cɔ cúŋnó dể lòŋ côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ kwên kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi sɔŋ ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ ɲư tổfụ mìɲ cẳŋ zọn lòŋ cɔ cáɲ dáŋ kó tâmtʰần xôŋ cuŋtín kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kɔncáʔu zaim kầm biɲxí ɣiươŋ kuŋ kó sâʔi lưŋ lạʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ciếncận cúŋnó xôŋ ɣìŋiữ zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kũŋ xôŋ cịʔu di tʰeo luậtfáp ŋàʔi kwên ɲữŋ việklàm kủʔa ŋàʔi và kák kôŋták lạlùŋ ŋàʔi dã cɔ cúŋnó tʰấʔi tạʔi cɔŋ sứ zíptô nơʔi dồŋbằŋ sôʔan ŋàʔi ɲữŋ fép cướk tổfụ cúŋnó ŋàʔi zẽ za cɔ di ŋaŋ kwa xiến nướk zựŋ ɲư dốŋ ŋàʔi zẫnzắt banŋàʔi bằŋ áŋ mâʔi cọn dêm bằŋ áɲsáŋ lửʔa ŋàʔi bửʔa dá za cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ban cɔ ʔuốŋ nướk ɲiềʔu ɲư vựk sâʔu za ŋàʔi kũŋ xiến suốʔi dá fun za và cɔ nướk cảʔi za ɲư sôŋ zầʔu vậʔi kứ fạmtộʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi fảnŋịc kùŋ Ðấŋcí kaw cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cɔŋ lòŋ tʰử Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mà kầʔusin dồăn tʰeo tìɲzụk mìɲ họ nóʔi ŋịc kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mà zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kótʰể zọn nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ saw kìʔa ŋàʔi dã dập dá nướk fun za zòŋcảʔi càn ŋàʔi kũŋ kótʰể báɲ saw ŋàʔi sắmsửʔa tʰịt cɔ zân ŋàʔi vìvậʔi Ðứkzê kó ŋɛ nổʔizận kó lửʔa cáʔi ŋịc kùŋ zakốp sự ɣiận nổʔi kùŋ ʔisơzaên bởʔivì cúŋnó xôŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ cẳŋ ɲờkậʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi zầʔu vậʔi ŋàʔi xiến kák từŋ mâʔi cên kaw và kák kửʔa cên cờʔi cɔ mưʔa suốŋ cên dặŋ và cɔ lúʔamì cên cờʔi ŋườʔita báɲ kủʔa mạɲzạn ŋàʔi ɣởʔi cɔ dồăn zɛɲzự ŋàʔi xiến ɣió dôŋ tʰổʔi cên cờʔi ɲờ kwiềnnăŋ mìɲ ŋàʔi zẫn ɣió ŋàʔi xiến mưʔa tʰịt cên cúŋnó ɲư bụʔi cɔ và cim kó káɲ kũŋ ɲiềʔu ɲư kát ŋàʔi kák dó suốŋ ɣiữʔa cạʔi kwân xắp suŋkwɛɲ nơʔi cúŋnó ɲưvậʔi cúŋnó dượk nɔnê cán ŋàʔi cɔ cúŋnó diềʔu cúŋnó ướkaw cúŋnó cưʔa sâʔi xỏʔi diềʔu mìɲ ướkaw vật tʰựk hãʔi kòn cɔŋ miệŋ cúŋnó bèn kó kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nổʔi kùŋ cúŋnó ɣiết ɲữŋ béʔɔ Ðáɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi caicẻ kủʔa ʔisơzaên mặkzầʔu kák ấʔi cúŋnó kòn fạmtộʔi xôŋ kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi vì kớ ấʔi ŋàʔi cɔ kák ŋàʔi cúŋnó za hưxôŋ zùŋ kiɲ xiếp tiêʔu kák cúŋnó xiŋàʔi dáɲ ɣiết cúŋnó cúŋnó kầʔu hỏʔi ŋàʔi cởlạʔi kầʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kác sốtsắŋ cúŋnó ɲớ lạʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dá kủʔa mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔicí kaw Ðấŋ kứʔucuộk mìɲ ɲưŋ cúŋnó lấʔi miệŋ zwa nịɲ ŋàʔi zùŋ lưỡʔi mìɲ nóʔizốʔi vớʔi ŋàʔi vì lòŋ cúŋnó cẳŋ xắnxít kùŋ ŋàʔi cúŋnó kũŋ xôŋ cuŋtín cɔŋ zawướk ŋàʔi ɲưŋŋàʔi lòŋ tʰươŋsót tʰa tộʔiák cɔ cẳŋ hủʔiziệt cúŋnó tʰật ɲiềʔu xi ŋàʔi sâʔi kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi xỏʔi cẳŋ nổʔizận dến kựkkỳ ŋàʔi ɲớ lạʔi cúŋnó cẳŋkwa sáktʰịt mộtʰơʔi tʰở kwa zồʔi xôŋ cởlạʔi biếtmấʔi cúŋnó fảnŋịc kùŋ ŋàʔi nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ và làmfiền ŋàʔi cɔŋ cỗ vắŋvẻ cúŋnó lạʔi tʰử Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cêʔucọk Ðấŋ tʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên cúŋnó xôŋ ɲớ lạʔi tăj kủʔa ŋàʔi hɔặk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋnó xỏʔi tʰểnàʔɔ ŋàʔi dặt kák zấʔu mìɲ tạʔi zíptô và ɲữŋ fép mìɲ cɔŋ dồŋ sôʔan Ðổʔi za hwiết kák sôŋ và kák zòŋ nướk cúŋnó dến dỗʔi xôŋ tʰế ʔuốŋ dượk ŋàʔi saj muỗʔi kắn và ếc hạʔi cúŋnó kũŋ fó hwalợʔi cúŋnó cɔ câʔucấʔu nộp bôŋ cáʔi kôŋlaw cɔ kàʔɔkàʔɔ ŋàʔi fá ɲɔ cúŋnó bằŋ mưʔadá hủʔi kâʔi suŋ bằŋ twiết ɣiá kũŋ fó câʔubò cúŋnó cɔ mưʔadá và bầʔi ciên cɔ ŋàʔi tʰả ŋịc cúŋnó kơn ɣiậnzữ ŋàʔi sự tʰạɲ nóŋ zancuân tứklà tajhọʔa ŋàʔi lốʔi cɔ kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cẳŋ zɔŋ tʰứ liɲhồn xỏʔi cết bèn fó mạŋ sốŋ cúŋnó cɔ zịchạc kũŋ dáɲ ɣiết mọʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ zíptô tứklà kườŋ cáŋ sɛɲ dầʔu cɔŋ kák cạʔi cam Ðʔɔạnŋàʔi dɛm zânsự ŋàʔi za ɲư kɔnciên zẫnzắt cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɲư bầʔi ciên ŋàʔi zẫn cúŋnó bìɲanvôsự cúŋnó cẳŋ ci kòn lạʔi ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc ŋàʔi dưʔa dến bờkõʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi tứk dến núʔi tăj hữʔu ŋàʔi dã dượk ŋàʔi kũŋ duổʔi kák zân xỏʔi cướk cúŋnó bắttʰăm ciə sứ sảnŋiệp cɔ xiến kák cifáʔi ʔisơzaên cɔŋ cạʔi kủʔa kák zân ấʔi zầʔu vậʔi cúŋnó tʰử fảnŋịc Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔicí kaw xôŋ ɣiữ kák cứŋkớ kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲưŋ cở lòŋ bấtcuŋ ɲư kák tổfụ mìɲ cúŋnó sịʔa ɲư kâʔi kuŋ sajlệc ɲơn kák nơʔi kaw cúŋnó cọkzận ŋàʔi ɣiụkŋàʔi fânbì tạʔi ɲữŋ tượŋ cạm xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋɛ diềʔu ấʔi nổʔizận ɣớmɣiếk ʔisơzaên kwádỗʔi nỗʔi dền tạʔi silô tứklà cạʔi ŋàʔi dã zựŋ ɣiữʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi fó sứklựk ŋàʔi zẫn và viɲhiển ŋàʔi vàʔɔ tăj kừʔudịc ŋàʔi kũŋ fó zânsự ŋàʔi cɔ tʰɛɲ ɣươm và nổʔizận kùŋ kơŋiệp mìɲ lửʔa tʰiêʔu ɲữŋ ɣã caicẻ kòn kák dồŋciɲ xôŋ kó ʔaj ŋiɲ tʰú ɲữŋ tʰầʔi ɣươm saŋã sɔŋ kák ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa xôŋ tʰanxók bấʔizờ cúʔa tỉɲ tʰứk ɲư ŋườʔi xỏʔi ɣiấkŋủ xáknàʔɔ mạɲzạn zeo kớ zượʔu ŋàʔi dáɲ ɲữŋ kừʔudịc luj lạʔi làm cɔ cúŋnó sỉɲụk dờʔidờʔi vảlạʔi ŋàʔi từcốʔi cạʔi ɣiôsép kũŋ cẳŋ cọn cifáʔi zaim bèn cọn cifáʔi zuda là núʔi siôn ŋàʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋàʔi sâʔi dền tʰáɲ ŋàʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư nơʔi zất kaw xáknàʔɔ cáʔidất ŋàʔi dã sáŋlập dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi kũŋ cọn Ðʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi bắt ŋườʔi kák cuồŋ ciên ŋàʔi dɛm ŋườʔi xỏʔi kák ciên cɔ Ðặŋ ŋườʔi căn ɣiữ zakốp zânsự ŋàʔi và ʔisơzaên kơŋiệp ŋàʔi ɲưvậʔi ŋườʔi căn ɣiữ tʰeo tʰɛɲliêm lòŋ ŋườʔi và lấʔi xônxéʔɔ tăj mìɲ zẫnzắt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi zân ŋɔạʔi dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ sảnŋiệp cúʔa làm ôʔuế dền tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa và cɔ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰàɲza dốŋ cúŋnó dã fó tʰâʔi kák tôʔitớ cúʔalàm dồăn cɔ lɔàʔi cim cờʔi kũŋ dã fó tʰịt kủʔa kák tʰáɲ cúʔa cɔ muôŋtʰú kủʔa dất cúŋnó dổ hwiết za ɲư nướk cuŋkwɛɲ ɣiêzusalɛm cẳŋ kó ʔaj côn cúŋtôʔi dã cởnên sỉɲụk cɔ lânkận mìɲ vật ɲạʔɔbáŋ dồ cêkườʔi cɔ ɲữŋ cuŋkwɛɲ cúŋtôʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋàʔi ɣiận dờʔidờʔi saw sự fânbì cúʔa cáʔi ɲư lửʔa sin hãʔi dổ ɣiận cúʔa cên kák zân xôŋ cúʔa và cên kák nướk xôŋ kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ cúʔa vì cúŋnó dã zakốp và fáhwaŋ cỗ ŋườʔi sincúʔa cớ ɲớ lạʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi kák tộʔiák kủʔa tổfụ cúŋtôʔi ŋwiện tʰươŋsót cúʔa măw măw dến dónzướk cúŋtôʔi vì cúŋtôʔi lấʔilàm xốnxổ vôhồʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi cúŋtôʔi viɲhiển kủʔa zɛɲ cúʔa sin hãʔi ɣiúpdỡ cúŋtôʔi ɲơn zɛɲ cúʔa sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi tʰa tộʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi vì kớsaw kák zân nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó dâʔu ŋwiện báʔɔtʰù hwiết tôʔitớ cúʔa dã dổ za Ðượk ɣiữʔa kák zân cướk cúŋtôʔi ŋwiện tiếŋ tʰantʰở fu tʰấʔu dến cướk cúʔa tùʔi kwiềnnăŋ lớnlaw kủʔa cúʔa sin hãʔi bảʔɔhộ ɲữŋ dã dịɲ fảʔi cết hỡʔicúʔa sỉɲụk lânkận cúŋtôʔi dã cɔ cúʔa sin hãʔi báʔɔ cả ấʔi ɣấp bằŋ bảʔi cɔŋ lòŋ cúŋnó kòn cúŋtôʔi zânsự cúʔa bầʔi ciên kủʔa dồŋkỏ cúʔa cúŋtôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa mãʔimãʔi từ dờʔi nầʔi kwadờʔi kiə cúŋtôʔi cwiền za ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa hỡʔiÐấŋ căn ɣiữ ʔisơzaên hỡʔi Ðấŋ zẫnzắt zakốp ɲư bầʔi ciên hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ hỡʔiÐấŋ ŋự cên cê zubin hãʔi sáŋ zựkzỡ ŋàʔi za cướk zaim bêŋiəmin manasɛ sin hãʔi ɣiụkzã năŋlựk ŋàʔi và dến kứʔu cúŋtôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi sin hãʔi dɛm cúŋtôʔi lạʔi và cɔ cúʔa sáŋ cóʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi dượk kứʔu hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân cúʔa ɣiận lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa zân cúʔa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ cúʔa dã nuôʔi cúŋnó bằŋ báɲ ɣiọt và cɔ cúŋnó ʔuốŋ nướkmắt dầʔi dấʔu cúʔa cúŋtôʔi tʰàɲ biə cɛɲ kạɲ cɔ lânkận cúŋtôʔi và tʰùŋịc kùŋ ɲăw kườʔi ɲạʔɔ cúŋtôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân sin hãʔi dɛm cúŋtôʔi lạʔi và cɔ cúʔa sáŋ cóʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi dượk kứʔu từ zíptô cúʔa dã zờʔi saŋ kâʔi ɲɔ cúʔa duổʔi kák zân za zồʔi cồŋ kâʔi ấʔi kũŋ sở dất cɔ nó câm zễ dầʔi dất kák núʔi bóŋ cɛfủ và kák ɲàɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi hươŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ɲàɲ zɛ za dến và cồʔi dến sôŋ vì kớsaw cúʔa fá hàŋzàʔɔ cɔ kák di kwa lảʔi heo zừŋ kắn fá và kák tʰú dồŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân ôʔi sin hãʔi cởlạʔi từ cên cờʔi hãʔi ŋó suốŋ dɔáʔi sɛm tʰămviếŋ kâʔi ɲɔ nầʔi là ɲɔ tăj hữʔu cúʔa dã cồŋ và cồʔi cúʔa dã cọn cɔ mìɲ kâʔi ɲɔ ấʔi lửʔa cáʔi cặt vì kớ kwởcác kủʔa cúʔa cúŋnó fảʔi ŋwiện tăj cúʔa fùhộ ŋườʔi kủʔa tăj hữʔu cúʔa tứklà kɔnŋườʔi cúʔa dã cọn cɔ mìɲ zồʔi cúŋtôʔi xôŋ lìʔa xỏʔi cúʔa nữʔa sin hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk sốŋ lạʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ cúʔa hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân sin hãʔi dɛm cúŋtôʔi lạʔi làm cɔ cúʔa sáŋ cóʔi tʰì cúŋtôʔi dượk kứʔu hãʔi zeo cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi sứklựk cúŋta hãʔi kấttiếŋ vujvẻ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp hãʔi hátsướŋ nổʔitiếŋ cốŋkơm kầm êmzịʔu vớʔi dờn hãʔi tʰổʔi xi căŋnɔn lúk căŋ zầm ɲằm kák ŋàʔi cúŋta vì ấʔilà cɔ ʔisơzaên một zɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp ŋàʔi dềʔu ấʔi cứŋkớ nơʔi ɣiôsép lúkŋàʔi za dáɲ sứ zíptô là nơʔi tôʔi ŋɛ tʰứ tiếŋ tôʔi cẳŋ hiểʔu ta dã kất ɣáɲ nặŋ xỏʔi vaj ŋườʔi tăj ŋườʔi dượk buôŋ xỏʔi káʔi ɣiỏ cɔŋ kơn zancuân ŋươʔi kêʔukầʔu ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi lạʔi ŋươʔi nơʔi kíndáʔɔ kủʔa và kũŋ tʰửtʰác ŋươʔi nơʔi nướk mêziba hỡʔi zânsự hãʔi ŋɛ làmcứŋ cɔ ŋươʔi ʔisơzaên cớci ŋươʔi xứŋ ŋɛ ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó tʰần nàʔɔ ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ tʰờ lạʔi tʰần ŋɔạʔi ta ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðấŋ dã dɛm ŋươʔi xỏʔi sứ zíptô hãʔi hɔák miệŋ ŋươʔi za tʰì dầʔizẫʔi ɲưŋ zânsự xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ ʔisơzaên xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo vìvậʔi buôŋ cúŋnó di tʰeo kứŋ lòŋ cúŋnó cúŋnó di tʰeo mưʔukế ziêŋ cúŋnó Ôʔi cớci zân xứŋ ŋɛ cớci ʔisơzaên cịʔu di cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi tʰì cẳŋ bawlâʔu swi fụk kák tʰùŋịc cúŋnó cởtăj ŋịc ɲữŋ kừʔudịc cúŋnó ɲữŋ ɣɛŋét Ðứkzê swi fụk ŋàʔi sɔŋ zân kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ta lấʔi màʔumỡ ŋũkốk nuôʔi và cɔ ŋươʔi dượk nɔnê bằŋ mậtɔŋ nơʔi dá Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dứŋ cɔŋ hộʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi dɔán sét ɣiữʔa kák tʰần kák ŋươʔi dɔán sét cẳŋ kôŋbìɲ và tâʔivị ák cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ hãʔi dɔán sét xốnkùŋ ŋươʔi mồkôʔi hãʔi sử kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi buồnzầʔu túŋ ŋặt xá kứʔuvớt xốnkùŋ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn ɣiảʔi xỏʔi tăj ák cúŋnó xôŋ ci kũŋ cẳŋ hiểʔu ci cúŋnó di kwa dilạʔi cɔŋ tốʔităm kák cáʔidất dềʔu zúŋdộŋ ta dã nóʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰần hếttʰảʔi dềʔu kɔncaj kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw zầʔu vậʔi kák ŋươʔi cết ɲư lɔàʔiŋườʔi saŋã ɲư kwan cưởŋ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dɔán sét tʰếzan vìcúʔa dượk muônzân kơŋiệp Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin cớ làmtʰiɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ôʔi sin cớ nínlặŋ cớ dứŋ ʔiên vì kìʔa kák tʰùŋịc cúʔa náʔɔlɔạn và ɲữŋ ɣét cúʔa ŋướk dầʔu cúŋnó twan mưʔu dộcạʔi zânsự cúʔa bàn ŋị ɲăw ŋịc ɲữŋ cúʔa cɛzấʔu cúŋnó nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến twiệtziệt cúŋnó dếnnỗʔi xôŋ kòn nướk hầʔu cɔ zɛɲ ʔisơzaên xôŋ kòn dượk nữʔa vì cúŋnó mộtlòŋ ŋị ɲăw lập zawướk ŋịc kùŋ cúʔa kák cạʔi dôm ŋườʔi Íc môáp ŋườʔi haɣazít ɣêbɛɲ ʔammôn ʔamalék ŋườʔifi vớʔi zân tizơ ʔasizi kũŋ vớʔi cúŋnó mà ɣiúpdỡ kơkấʔu lót hãʔi dãʔi cúŋnó ɲư madiən ɲưsi sêza ɲư zabin tạʔi xɛ kisôn là tạʔi ʔɛân zơ cởtʰàɲ fân cɔ dất hãʔi cɔ kák ŋườʔi tướkvị cúŋnó ɣiốŋ ɲư zép sêép và hếttʰảʔi kwan cưởŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư sêbác sɛɲmuna vì cúŋnó nóʔi zằŋ ta hãʔi ciếm lấʔilàm kủʔa kák nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi hãʔi cɔ cúŋnó ɣiốŋ ɲư bụʔi ɣió kuộn tợ ɲư zơmzạ cướk ɣió lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt zừŋ lửʔa ŋọn cáʔi núʔi tʰểnàʔɔ hãʔi lấʔi cận bãʔɔ cúʔa duổʔi zượt cúŋnó và zùŋ zôŋtố cúʔa xiến cúŋnó kiɲ xiếp tʰể ấʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cúŋnó dầʔi ɲuốkɲơ cúŋnó kầʔu zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋwiện cúŋnó hổtʰẹn tʰấtkiɲ dến dờʔidờʔi ŋwiện cúŋnó hổŋươʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋnó zằŋ cỉ mộtmìɲ cúʔa zɛɲ Ðứkzê làÐấŋcí kaw cên xắp cáʔidất hỡʔiÐứkzê kwân nơʔi kưcú ŋàʔi dáŋ tʰươŋ tʰăj liɲhồn tôʔi mɔŋướk dến dỗʔi hawmòn hàɲlaŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê lòŋ tʰịt tôʔi kêʔula Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê kwân vwatôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi kɔn cimsẻ dã dượk nơʔi và cim dượk dặŋ dẻ kɔn tứklà bàntʰờ kủʔa cúʔa fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà cúʔa họ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa xôŋ ŋớt fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk sứklựk cɔŋ cúʔa và kó lòŋ hướŋ dườŋzẫn dến siôn Ðươŋ xi di kwa cũŋ xóklók họ cũŋ ấʔi cởnên nơʔi kó mạc mưʔa kũŋ fủ fướk cɔ họ di tớʔi sứklựk tʰêm ʔainấʔi dềʔu zamắt Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tạʔi siôn hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân sin hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp ơʔi sin hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi káʔi xiên kủʔa cúŋtôʔi hãʔi sɛmsét Ðʔɔáʔi dến kủʔa dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa cúʔa vì ŋàʔi cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ cúʔa dáŋ mộtŋàn ŋàʔi xák tʰà tôʔi ɣiữ kửʔa cɔŋ ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi hơn cɔŋ cạʔi zữ vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mặtcờʔi káʔi xiên Ðứkzê diển viɲhiển ŋàʔi cẳŋ từcốʔi diềʔu tốtlàɲ ɣì cɔ ʔaj ŋăitʰẳŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê kwân fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi dã cɔ sứ ŋàʔi Ðʔɛm ɲữŋ fu kủʔa zakốp cởvề cúʔa dã tʰa zanák cɔ zânsự cúʔa và xỏʔalấp mọʔi tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa dã tʰâʔu lạʔi ɣiậnzữ cúʔa ŋuôʔi nóŋnảʔi tʰạɲ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi cúŋtôʔi sin hãʔi dɛm cúŋta cởlạʔi và zứt tứkzận cúŋtôʔi cúʔa ɣiận cúŋtôʔi mãʔimãʔi kơn tʰạɲ cúʔa kòn dờʔidờʔi saw cúʔa cẳŋ xứŋ cɔ cúŋtôʔi sốŋ lạʔi hầʔu cɔ zân cúʔa vujvẻ nơʔi cúʔa saw hỡʔiÐứkzê sin cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰấʔi ɲơn ŋàʔi và cɔ cúŋta kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi tôʔi ŋɛ diềʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fán vìŋàʔi fán bìɲan cɔ zânsự cɔ ŋườʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲưŋ cớ cởlạʔi ŋuzạʔi nữʔa sự kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰật ɣần ɲữŋ kíɲ ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ viɲhiển dượk cɔŋ sứ cúŋta sự tʰươŋsót cơn tʰật dã ɣặp ɲăw sự kôŋbìɲ bìɲan dã ɲăw sự cơn tʰật mộŋ zướʔi dất sự kôŋbìɲ cên cờʔi ŋó suốŋ fảʔi Ðứkzê sứ cúŋta sɛɲ hwalợʔi sự kôŋbìɲ di cướk ŋàʔi làm cɔ zấʔu cơn ŋàʔi tʰàɲ kɔn dườŋ dáŋ tʰeo Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi ŋiêŋ taj kwa ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi vì tôʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn sin bảʔɔhộ liɲhồn tôʔi tôʔi ɲơn dứk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin hãʔi kứʔu tôʔitớ cúʔa ɲờkậʔi nơʔi cúʔa cúʔa ôʔi sin tʰươŋsót tôʔi vì hằŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu cúʔa sin hãʔi vujvẻ liɲhồn tôʔitớ cúʔa vì cúʔa ôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi ŋưỡŋvọŋ cúʔa cúʔa ôʔi cúʔa tʰiện tʰatʰứ cɔ ban ɲơn zưzật cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi lắŋtaj lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi zủ ŋɛ tiếŋ nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi zancuân tôʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ cúʔa vìcúʔa ɲậm lờʔi tôʔi cúʔa ôʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák tʰần xôŋ kó ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư cúʔa kũŋ cẳŋ kó kôŋviệk ɣì ɣiốŋ ɲư kôŋviệk cúʔa hếttʰảʔi kák zân cúʔa dã zựŋ sẽ dến tʰờ lạʔi cướk cúʔa và viɲzɛɲ cúʔa vìcúʔa zất ɲữŋ lạlùŋ cỉ mộtmìɲ cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cỉ zạʔi cɔ tôʔi dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi tʰì tôʔi di tʰeo cơn tʰật kủʔa ŋàʔi sin xiến tôʔi mộtlòŋ kíɲ zɛɲ ŋàʔi hỡʔicúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi hếtlòŋ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa tônviɲ zɛɲ cúʔa dến mãʔimãʔi vì ɲơn cúʔa dốʔi kùŋ tôʔi zất vàcúʔa dã ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi âmfủ sâʔu hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲữŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dã zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tôʔi một ŋườʔi huŋbạʔɔ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ dể cúʔa dứŋ cướk mìɲ ɲưŋ cúʔa ơʔi cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hăj tʰươŋsót cậm nóŋzận kó ɲơn cơn tʰật zưzật Ôʔi kầʔu cúʔa dɔáʔi sɛm tôʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi sin hãʔi sứklựk cúʔa cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa và kứʔu kɔncaj kủʔa kɔndòʔi cúʔa sincúʔa za zấʔuhiệʔu cỉ cúʔa dốʔi kùŋ tôʔi hầʔu cɔ ɣét tôʔi dượk tʰấʔi zấʔu ấʔi hổtʰẹn vì Ðứkzê ơʔi cáɲ ŋàʔi dã ɣiúpdỡ ʔanủʔi tôʔi káʔi ŋàʔi dã dặt cên kák núʔi tʰáɲ Ðứkzê cuộŋ kák kửʔa siôn hơn ɲữŋ nơʔi kủʔa zakốp tʰàɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dượk nóʔi ɲữŋ viɲhiển ŋươʔi ta nóʔi dến zaháp babilôn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ kwɛnbiết kìʔa filitin tizơ vớʔi tʰiôbi kẻ nầʔi dã sɛɲ za tạʔi siôn fảʔi ŋườʔita nóʔi siôn zằŋ kẻ nầʔi kiə dã sɛɲ za tạʔi dó cíɲÐấŋcí kaw vữŋ siôn xiÐứkzê kák zân vàʔɔsổ tʰì ŋàʔi zằŋ kẻ nầʔi dã sɛɲ tạʔi siôn ɲữŋ hátsướŋ ɲữŋ ɲảʔimúʔa nóʔi zằŋ kák suốʔi tôʔi dềʔu cɔŋ ŋươʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi ŋàʔi dêm tôʔi kêʔukầʔu cướk cúʔa ŋwiện lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi tʰấʔu dến cướk cúʔa sin hãʔi ŋiêŋ taj kwa ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa tôʔi vì liɲhồn tôʔi dầʔizẫʔi hɔạnnạn mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi hầʔu ɣần âmfủ tôʔi vàʔɔ ɲữŋ di suốŋ hwiệt tôʔi xáknàʔɔ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiúpdỡ bị ɣiữʔa cết ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲữŋ ɣiết cɔŋ màcúʔa xôŋ kòn ɲớ dến là cuất xỏʔi tăj cúʔa cúʔa dã dể tôʔi nơʔi kựk sâʔu tạʔi cốn tốʔităm cɔŋ vựk tʰẳm kơn ɣiận cúʔa dè nặŋ cên tôʔi cúʔa zùŋ kák sóŋ cúʔa tôʔi kựkɲọk cúʔa xiến ɲữŋ kwɛnbiết tôʔi lìʔa sa tôʔi làm tôʔi tʰàɲ ɣớmɣiếk cɔ tôʔi kấmkố xôŋ za dượk mắt tôʔi hawmòn hɔạnnạn Ðứkzê ơʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi và ɣiơ tăj hướŋ kùŋ ŋàʔi cúʔa cết làmfép saw ɲữŋ kwadờʔi cổʔi zậʔi dặŋ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa sự ɲơn cúʔa dượk cwiền za cɔŋ saw hɔặk tʰàɲ cúʔa dượk ɣiảŋ cɔŋ vựk sâʔu kák fép cúʔa dượk cɔŋ nơʔi tốʔităm saw và kôŋbìɲ cúʔa dượk zõ cɔŋ sứ kwên kòn tôʔi Ðứkzê ơʔi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ ŋàʔi vừʔa sáŋ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi tʰấʔu dến cướk ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi vìsaw ŋàʔi liɲhồn tôʔi và ɣiấʔu ŋàʔi kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi hɔạnnạn hòŋ cết buổʔi tʰơấʔu tôʔi maŋ kiɲ xiếp cúʔa hɔảŋồn sự ɣiậnzữ cúʔa côʔi cák tôʔi sự hãʔihùŋ cúʔa dã cừziệt tôʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi kák diềʔu ấʔi vâʔi kwɛɲ tôʔi ɲư nướk kùŋ ɲăw bawfủ tôʔi cúʔa xiến kák bậʔu lìʔa sa tôʔi kũŋ dã kwɛnbiết tôʔi nơʔi tốʔităm tôʔi hátsướŋ ɲơn kủʔa Ðứkzê từ dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə miệŋ tôʔi cwiền za tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi vì tôʔi dã nóʔi sự tʰươŋsót dượk dến dờʔidờʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi ŋàʔi cɔ vữŋbền tʰàɲ ŋàʔi ta dã zawướk kùŋ dượk cọn kủʔa ta dã tʰề kùŋ Ðʔa tôʔitớ zằŋ ta zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dến mãʔimãʔi và zựŋ ŋôʔi ŋươʔi cɔ vữŋbền dến dờʔidờʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê kák từŋ cờʔi ŋợʔixɛn fép ŋàʔi sự tʰàɲ ŋàʔi kũŋ dượk ŋợʔixɛn cɔŋ hộʔi kák tʰáɲ vì cên kák từŋ cờʔi ʔaj sáɲ dượk vớʔi Ðứkzê cɔŋ ɲữŋ kɔncaj mạɲzạn ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰật zất dáŋsợ cɔŋ hộʔi kák tʰáɲ Ðáŋ hãʔihùŋ dứŋ cầʔu cuŋkwɛɲ ŋàʔi hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwân ʔaj kó kwiềnnăŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư cúʔa sự tʰàɲ cúʔa cuŋkwɛɲ cúʔa cúʔa kaicị kiêʔukăŋ kủʔa xi sóŋ nổʔi cúʔa cɔ ʔiênlặŋ cúʔa dã cà zaháp xáknàʔɔ dáɲ cết ɲờ káɲtăj mạɲmẽ cúʔa cúʔa dã lạk ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc cúʔa kák từŋ cờʔi tʰuộk cúʔa dất kũŋ tʰuộk cúʔa cúʔa dã sáŋlập tʰếzan mọʔi cứʔa fươŋ bắk fươŋ kũŋ bởʔi cúʔa zựŋ tʰa hẹtmôn dềʔu vuimừŋ zɛɲ cúʔa cúʔa kó káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ bàntăj cúʔa kó sứkmạɲ tăj hữʔu cúʔa ɣiơ kaw sự kôŋbìɲ cáɲ cựk kủʔa ŋôʔi cúʔa sự ɲơn cơn tʰật di cướk cúʔa fướk cɔ zân nàʔɔ tiếŋ vuimừŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê bướkdi cɔŋ áɲsáŋ kủʔa cúʔa hằŋ ŋàʔi vuimừŋ zɛɲ cúʔa Ðượk ɲắk kaw kôŋbìɲ cúʔa vìcúʔa viɲhiển sứklựk kủʔa ɲờ cúʔa sừŋ cúŋtôʔi dượk ŋướk kaw vìÐứkzê káʔi xiên kủʔa cúŋtôʔi Ðấŋ tʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên vwa cúŋtôʔi bấʔizờ cɔŋ zị tượŋ cúʔa kó fán kùŋ ŋườʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa mà zằŋ ta dã dặt ŋườʔi mạɲzạn cợ ɲắk kaw dấŋ lựʔɛcọn cɔŋ zânsự ta dã ɣặp Ðʔa tôʔitớ sứk cɔ ŋườʔi bằŋ zầʔu tʰáɲ tăj nâŋdỡ ŋườʔi káɲtăj cɔ ŋườʔi mạɲmẽ kẻtʰù ŋịc cẳŋ hiếpdáp ŋươʔi kɔn ák kũŋ xôŋ xổsở ŋườʔi dượk ta dáɲdổ kừʔudịc ŋườʔi tạʔi cướk ŋườʔi và kũŋ dáɲ hạʔi ɲữŋ ɣét ŋườʔi sɔŋ tʰàɲ ɲơn kùŋ ŋườʔi ɲơn zɛɲ sừŋ ŋườʔi dượk ŋướk ta kũŋ dặt tăj ŋườʔi cên và tăj hữʔu ŋườʔi cên kák sôŋ ŋườʔi kêʔu kũŋ zằŋ cúʔa ca tôʔi làÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dá kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi lạʔi kũŋ ŋườʔi tʰàɲ kɔn cưởŋnam vwa kaw kák vwa cên dất ta zàɲ ɣiữ cɔ ŋườʔi ɲơn dến dờʔidờʔi lập kùŋ ŋườʔi zawướk cɔ vữŋbền ta kũŋ cɔ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi và ŋôʔi ŋườʔi kòn lâʔuzàʔi bằŋ kák ŋàʔi kủʔa cờʔi nếʔu kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi luậtfáp xôŋ di tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ nếʔu cúŋnó bộʔiŋịc cẳŋ ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn kủʔa tʰì zùŋ zɔj dáɲ fạt vifạm cúŋnó và lấʔi tʰươŋtíc fạt zanák kủʔa cúŋnó ɲưŋ cẳŋ kất lấʔi ɲơn xỏʔi ŋườʔi và tʰàɲ kũŋ cẳŋ ta xôŋ bộʔi zawướk kũŋ cẳŋ dổʔi lờʔi dã za xỏʔi môʔi miệŋ ta dã cỉ tʰáɲ tʰề kũŋ xôŋ nóʔizốʔi vớʔi Ðʔa zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi và ŋôʔi ŋườʔi kòn lâʔu ɲư mặtcờʔi cướk ŋôʔi ấʔi dượk vữŋbền mãʔimãʔi ɲư mặtcăŋ ɲư dấŋ cứŋ tʰàɲ tạʔi cên cờʔi vậʔi sɔŋcúʔa lạʔi xiɲbỉ ŋườʔi nổʔizận kùŋ dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa dã ɣớmɣê zawướk tôʔitớ cúʔa và kwăŋ mãʔɔ ciềʔu ŋườʔi suốŋ bụʔi dất za fàm cúʔa dã dáɲdổ kák zàʔɔ ŋườʔi fá ɲữŋ dồnlũʔi ŋườʔi za hếttʰảʔi nàʔɔ di kwa kướp ɣiựt ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã cởnên sỉɲụk cɔ lânkận mìɲ cúʔa dã ɲắk tăj kừʔudịc ŋườʔi kaw làm cɔ ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc ŋườʔi vujvẻ fảʔi cúʔa cɔ lưỡʔi ɣươm ŋườʔi tʰốʔi lạʔi cẳŋ kó ɣiúpdỡ ŋườʔi dứŋ nổʔi cɔŋ kơn ciếncận cúʔa dã cɔ zựkzỡ ŋườʔi di ném ŋôʔi ŋườʔi suốŋ dất xiến kák ŋàʔi dươŋtʰì ŋườʔi za và bawfủ ŋườʔi bằŋ sỉɲụk Ðứkzê ôʔi ŋàʔi mìɲ hɔàʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cáʔi ɲư lửʔa cɔdến bawzờ Ôʔicúʔa sin ɲớ lạʔi tʰìɣiờ tôʔi ŋắn zườŋ nàʔɔ cúʔa zựŋ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi hưxôŋ zườŋ baw ʔaj ŋườʔi sốŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi cết ʔaj kứʔu liɲhồn mìɲ xỏʔi kwiền âmfủ hỡʔicúʔa ɲơn sưʔa cúʔa cɔŋ tʰàɲ mìɲ tʰề kùŋ Ðʔa bâʔizờ dâʔu cúʔa ôʔi sin ɲớ lạʔi sỉɲụk kủʔa kák tôʔitớ cúʔa tôʔi maŋ cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi sỉɲụk kủʔa kák zân hỡʔiÐứkzê tứklà sỉɲụk ɲữŋ tʰùŋịc cúʔaÐã zùŋ dể sỉɲụk kák bướk dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa cúʔa Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê dến dờʔidờʔi ʔamɛn ʔamɛn lạʔicúʔa dờʔi nầʔi kwadờʔi kiə cúʔa nơʔi kủʔa cúŋtôʔi cướk xi núʔinɔn cưʔa sɛɲ za tʰếzan cưʔa zựŋ từ cướk vôkùŋ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa xiến lɔàʔiŋườʔi cở vàʔɔ bụʔi cɔ và fán zằŋ hỡʔi kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi hãʔi cởlạʔi vì mộtŋàn cướkmắt cúʔaxák nàʔɔ ŋàʔi hômkwa dã kwa zồʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kɛɲ kủʔa dêm cúʔa cúŋnó côʔi di ɲư nướk cảʔi kuồnkuộn cúŋnó xáknàʔɔ ɣiấkŋủ banmaj ɲư kâʔicỏ sɛɲtươʔi sáŋ ŋàʔi kỏ bôŋ tốttươʔi buổʔi ciềʔu ŋườʔita kắt héʔɔ tʰật cúŋtôʔi hawmòn kơn ɣiận kủʔa cúʔa bị bốʔizốʔi bởʔi tʰạɲ cúʔa cúʔa dã dặt zanák cúŋtôʔi cướk cúʔa ɲữŋ tộʔilỗʔi kíndáʔɔ cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ áɲsáŋ cúʔa bởʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa cúʔa kák ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi dềʔu kwa di năm cúŋtôʔi nơʔi hơʔi tʰở tuổʔiták kủʔa cúŋtôʔi dến dượk bảʔi mươʔi kòn nếʔu mạɲxỏʔɛ tʰì dến mươʔi sɔŋ kiêʔukăŋ kủʔa bấtkwá lawxổ buồntʰảm vì dờʔisốŋ cóŋ kwa zồʔi cúŋtôʔi băj di ʔaj sứk ɣiận kủʔa cúʔa túʔi tʰeo kíɲ sứŋdáŋ cɔ cúʔa ʔaj sứk nóŋ cúʔa kầʔusin cúʔa zạʔi cúŋtôʔi dếm kák ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượklòŋ xônŋwan Ðứkzê ơʔi sin hãʔi cởlạʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ sin dổʔi lòŋ việk kák tôʔitớ cúʔa Ôʔi sin cúʔa cɔ cúŋtôʔi buổʔisáŋ dượk tʰỏʔa zạ ɲơn cúʔa tʰì cọn dờʔi cúŋtôʔi mừŋ vujvẻ sincúʔa cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk vuimừŋ tùʔi tʰeo kák ŋàʔi cúʔa cɔ cúŋtôʔi hɔạnnạn và tùʔi tʰeo ɲữŋ cúŋtôʔi dã tʰấʔi tajhọʔa ŋwiện kôŋviệk cúʔa za cɔ kák tôʔitớ cúʔa và viɲhiển cúʔa sáŋ cên kɔnkáʔi ŋwiện cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ɣiáŋ cên cúŋtôʔi kầʔucúʔa cɔ vữŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj cúŋtôʔi fảʔi sin cɔ vữŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj cúŋtôʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ nơʔi kíndáʔɔ kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw sẽ dượk hằŋ zướʔi bóŋ kủʔa Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ tôʔi nóʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ ŋàʔi nơʔi nươŋnáʔu tôʔi dồnlũʔi tôʔi kũŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi tinkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi xỏʔi bẫʔi cim và xỏʔi zịclệ dộk hạʔi ŋàʔi lấʔi lôŋ ŋàʔi cɛcở ŋươʔi và zướʔi káɲ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi dượk nươŋnáʔu mìɲ sự cơn tʰật ŋàʔi káʔi xiên káʔi kan kủʔa ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ hɔặk kiɲ xiếp bandêm hɔặk băj banŋàʔi hɔặk zịclệ lâʔi za cɔŋ tốʔităm hăjlà ziệt fáhɔạʔi dươŋ lúk cưʔa sẽ kó ŋàn ŋườʔi saŋã ŋươʔi và ŋườʔi saŋã hữʔu ŋươʔi sɔŋ tajhọʔa cẳŋ dến ɣần ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cỉn lấʔi mìɲ ɲìn sɛm và tʰấʔi báʔɔ cả cɔ ák bướk ŋươʔi dã ɲờ Ðứkzê nơʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ vàÐấŋcí kaw nơʔi mìɲ nên cẳŋ kó tajhọʔa ɣì sảʔi dến ŋươʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kó dịc nàʔɔ tớʔi ɣần cạʔi ŋươʔi vìŋàʔi lịɲ cɔ tʰiênsứ ŋàʔi bảʔɔ ɣìŋiữ ŋươʔi cɔŋ kák dườŋlốʔi ŋươʔi tʰiênsứ nâŋ ŋươʔi cên bàntăj mìɲ ʔɛ cơn ŋươʔi ɲằm dá căŋ ŋươʔi bướkdi cên zắn hổmaŋ kòn kɔn zắn ŋươʔi ɣiàʔidạp zướʔi cơn bởʔivì ŋườʔi cíʔu ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi ta dặt ŋườʔi nơʔi kaw bướk ŋườʔi zɛɲ ŋườʔi kêʔukầʔu dáp lờʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ zancuân kùŋ ŋườʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi tônviɲ ŋươʔi ta cɔ ŋườʔi tʰỏʔa lòŋ sốŋ lâʔu và cỉ cɔ ŋườʔi tʰấʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa hỡʔiÐấŋcí kaw lấʔilàm ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê và katụŋ zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi buổʔisáŋ za ɲơn cúʔa và bandêm cwiền za tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi cên ɲạkxí mườʔi zâʔi cên dờn kầm họʔa tʰiɲ vớʔi dờn vì hỡʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã cɔ tôʔi vujvẻ ʔi kôŋviệk ŋàʔi tôʔi mừŋzỡ kák việk tăj ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê kôŋviệk ŋàʔi biếtbaw tưtưởŋ ŋàʔi zất sâʔusắk ŋườʔi ʔumê xôŋ dượk kẻ ŋuzạʔi kũŋ cẳŋ hiểʔu dến xi ŋườʔi zữ mọk ɲư kỏ và ɲữŋ ák dượk hưŋ tʰạɲ Ấʔi dể cúŋnó ziệt dờʔidờʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkzê ơʔi ŋàʔi dượk kaw mãʔimãʔi vì hỡʔi Ðứkzê kìʔa tʰùŋịc ŋàʔi kìʔa tʰùŋịc ŋàʔi hếttʰảʔi ák dềʔu lạk ɲưŋcúʔa cɔ sừŋ tôʔi ŋướk kaw ɲư sừŋ kɔn tôʔi dượk sứk bằŋ zầʔu mớʔi mắt tôʔi kũŋ vuj tʰấʔi tʰùŋịc tôʔi fạt và taj tôʔi vuj ŋɛ ák zấʔi ŋịc tôʔi báʔɔ lạʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ mọk ɲư kâʔi lớn ɲư kâʔi hươŋ cên liban ɲữŋ dượk cồŋ cɔŋ ɲà Ðứkzê sẽ cổ bôŋ cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta zầʔu dến buổʔi ɣià bạk kòn sɛɲ bôŋ cáʔi Ðượk tʰạɲ mậʔu sɛɲtươʔi hầʔu cɔ za Ðứkzê ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋàʔi dá tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi cẳŋ kó bấtŋĩʔa Ðứkzê kaicị ŋàʔi mặk waiŋi Ðứkzê mặk mìɲ bằŋ sứklựk tʰắtlưŋ bằŋ ấʔi tʰếzan kũŋ dượk vữŋbền xôŋ tʰế zúŋdộŋ ŋôʔicúʔa dã vữŋ tʰờʔi kổ cúʔa hằŋ kó cướk vôkùŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê nướklớn dã nổʔi xiến nướklớn dã kấttiếŋ nướklớn dã nổʔi kák sóŋ ồnàʔɔ Ðứkzê nơʔi kaw kó kwiềnnăŋ hơn tiếŋ nướklớn hơn kák sóŋ mạɲ kủʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê kák cứŋkớ ŋàʔi zất cắkcắn sự tʰáɲ xiết sứŋdáŋ cɔ ɲà ŋàʔi dến dờʔidờʔi hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi báʔɔtʰù tʰuộk ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi báʔɔtʰù tʰuộk ŋàʔi sin hãʔi sáŋ zựkzỡ cúʔa za hỡʔi kwan sét tʰếzan hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi báʔɔ cả sứŋdáŋ cɔ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ hỡʔiÐứkzê ák dượk tʰắŋ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ cúŋnó buôŋ lờʔinóʔi kác sấksượk ɲữŋ ák dềʔu fô mìɲ hãʔiÐứkzê cúŋnó cà zânsự ŋàʔi làm xổsở cɔ kơŋiệp ŋàʔi cúŋnó ɣiết ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa xác và cết ɲữŋ mồkôʔi cúŋnó zằŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ tʰấʔi dâʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp cẳŋ dểý vàʔɔ hỡʔi ŋườʔi ʔumê cɔŋ zân xá sɛmsét hỡʔi ŋuzạʔi bawzờ kák ŋươʔi mớʔi xônŋwan Ðấŋ dã ɣắn taj cẳŋ ŋɛ saw Ðấŋ dã kɔn cẳŋ tʰấʔi Ðấŋ sửʔa fạt kák nướk cẳŋ fạt saw Ấʔilà Ðấŋ zạʔi citʰứk cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ tưtưởŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cỉ hưxôŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋàʔi sửʔa fạt và zạʔi luậtfáp ŋàʔi cɔ cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk ʔanŋỉ cɔŋ ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn cɔdến xi dã dàʔɔ sɔŋ cɔ ɲữŋ ák vìÐứkzê xôŋ lìʔa zânsự ŋàʔi kũŋ cẳŋ kơŋiệp ŋàʔi vì dɔán sét cởvề kôŋbìɲ fàm nàʔɔ kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰeo ʔaj tôʔi zấʔi ŋịc zữ ʔaj dứŋ biɲ vựk tôʔi dốʔi kùŋ ák nếʔuÐứkzê xôŋ ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi Ítnữʔa liɲhồn tôʔi dã nơʔi nínlặŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê xi tôʔi nóʔi cơn tôʔi cợt tʰì ɲơn ŋàʔi nâŋdỡ tôʔi xi tưtưởŋ cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi tʰì ʔanủʔi ŋàʔi vujvẻ liɲhồn tôʔi ŋôʔi ák ɲờ luậtfáp twan tʰiệtʰạʔi há zawtʰôŋ vớʔi cúʔa saw cúŋnó ɲăw lạʔi ŋịc liɲhồn ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và dịɲtộʔi cɔ hwiết vôtộʔi ɲưŋÐứkzê nơʔi ẩnnáʔu kaw kủʔa tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi dá tứk nơʔi tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ ŋàʔi cɔ zanák cúŋnó dổ lạʔi cên cúŋnó và ziệt cúŋnó cɔŋ huŋzữ cúŋnó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ziệt cúŋnó hãʔi dến hátsướŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kấttiếŋ mừŋzỡ cɔ dá kứʔuzỗʔi cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi hãʔi lấʔi lờʔi kảmtạ dến cướk cúʔa vuimừŋ tʰơka cɔ ŋàʔi vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zất làvwa kawkả cêɲết kák tʰần kák vựk sâʔu kủʔa dất dềʔu nơʔi tăj ŋàʔi ɲữŋ dỉɲ núʔi kũŋ tʰuộk ŋàʔi biển tʰuộk ŋàʔi cíɲ ŋàʔi dã kòn dất xô tăj ŋàʔi kũŋ dã hãʔi dến kúʔi suốŋ tʰờ lạʔi xá kwì ɣốʔi suốŋ cướk Ðứkzê Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa cúŋtôʔi vìŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi zân kủʔa dồŋkỏ ŋàʔi và ciên tăj ŋàʔi zìʔuzắt ŋàʔinăj nếʔu kák ŋươʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ ŋàʔi cớ kứŋ lòŋ ɲư tạʔi mêziba ɲư ɲằm ŋàʔi masa cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ là nơʔi tổfụ kák ŋươʔi tʰử zò và tʰấʔi kôŋviệk cɔŋ mươʔi ɣớmɣiếk zòŋzõʔi nầʔi ta fán zằŋ Ấʔilà zân kó lòŋ lầmlạk cẳŋ từŋ dườŋlốʔi ɲơn dó nổʔizận tʰề zằŋ cúŋnó cẳŋ vàʔɔ ʔiênŋỉ hãʔi bàʔi ka mớʔi cɔ Ðứkzê hỡʔi kả cáʔidất xá hátsướŋ cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi hátsướŋ cɔ Ðứkzê cúktụŋ zɛɲ ŋàʔi từŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi cwiền za kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi hãʔi tʰuật viɲhiển ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa kák nướk cwiền kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa kák zân vìɣiê zất dáŋ dượk ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi dáŋ kíɲ kák tʰần vì ɲữŋ tʰần kủʔa kák zân dềʔu hìɲtượŋ kònÐứkzê dã zựŋ kák từŋ cờʔi sự tônviɲ waiŋi cướk ŋàʔi sự năŋlựk hwamỹ nơʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi hỡʔi kák họhàŋ kủʔa muônzân Ðáŋ viɲhiển năŋlựk cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi tônviɲ sứŋdáŋ cɔ zɛɲ Ðứkzê hãʔi dɛm vàʔɔ cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi mặk caŋsứk tʰáɲ tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê hỡʔi kả cáʔidất xá zunsợ cướk ŋàʔi hãʔi nóʔi ɣiữʔa kák nướk zằŋ Ðứkzê kaicị tʰếzan kũŋ dượk vữŋbền xôŋ tʰế zúŋdộŋ ŋàʔi lấʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ sétdɔán kák zân ŋwiện kák từŋ cờʔi vujvẻ dất mừŋzỡ ŋwiện mọʔi cɔŋ nổʔitiếŋ ŋwiện dồŋzuộŋ mọʔi cɔŋ dó dềʔu bấʔizờ ɲữŋ kâʔicốʔi cɔŋ zừŋ dềʔu mừŋzỡ cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dến ŋàʔi dến dặŋ dɔán sét tʰếzan ŋàʔi lấʔi kôŋbìɲ dɔán sét tʰếzan zùŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ dɔán sét muônzân Ðứkzê kaicị dất hãʔi mừŋzỡ kák kùlaw xá vujvẻ mâʔi tốʔităm cuŋkwɛɲ ŋàʔi sự kôŋbìɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ kủʔa ŋôʔi ŋàʔi lửʔa băj di cướk ŋàʔi tʰiêʔudốt kừʔudịc sự cớpɲɔáŋ ŋàʔi sɔj sáŋ tʰếzan cáʔidất tʰấʔi zúŋdộŋ kák núʔi cảʔi ɲư cướk Ðứkzê cướk cúʔa kủʔa xắp tʰếzan kák từŋ cờʔi cwiền za kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi muônzân dã tʰấʔi viɲhiển ŋàʔi ŋwiện hếttʰảʔi hầʔu việk tượŋ cạm và xwej mìɲ kák hìɲtượŋ dềʔu hổtʰẹn hỡʔi kák tʰần xá tʰờ lạʔi Ðứkzê hỡʔiÐứkzê siôn ŋɛ vujvẻ và kák kɔŋáʔi zuda dềʔu nứklòŋ mừŋzỡ vì kớ dɔán sét kủʔa ŋàʔi vì Ðứkzê ơʔi ŋàʔi Ðấŋcí kaw cổʔi kaw kả cáʔidất ŋàʔi dượk kaw twiệt kák tʰần hỡʔi ɲữŋ ʔiêʔumến Ðứkzê hãʔi ɣét ák ŋàʔi bảʔɔhộ liɲhồn kủʔa kák tʰáɲ ŋàʔi và ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi tăj zữ Áɲsáŋ dượk bủʔa za cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và vujvẻ cɔ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hỡʔi vuimừŋ nơʔi Ðứkzê kảmtạ tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi hãʔi cɔ Ðứkzê bàʔi ka mớʔi vìŋàʔi dã ɲữŋ lạlùŋ tăj hữʔu káɲtăj tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi dã ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dã cɔbiết kứʔuzỗʔi ŋàʔi và za kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi cướk kák nướk ŋàʔi dã ɲớ lạʔi ɲơn tʰàɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi dốʔi kùŋ ɲà ʔisơzaên kák dầʔu dất dã tʰấʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi hỡʔi kả cáʔidất hãʔi kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ cɔ Ðứkzê nứktiếŋ vujvẻ ŋợʔixɛn xá zùŋ dờn kầm ɣiọŋ ka mà ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hãʔi lấʔi kòʔi tiếŋ mà zeo mừŋ cướk vwa tứklà Ðứkzê ŋwiện cɔŋ tʰếzan kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cɔŋ tʰếzan dềʔu nổʔitiếŋ ồnàʔɔ ŋwiện kák sôŋ vỗtăj núʔinɔn kùŋ ɲăw vuimừŋ cướk Ðứkzê vìŋàʔi dến dặŋ dɔán sét tʰếzan ŋàʔi lấʔi kôŋbìɲ dɔán sét tʰếzan zùŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ dɔán sét muônzân Ðứkzê kaicị kák zân hãʔi zunsợ ŋàʔi ŋự cên kák cê zubin cáʔidất xá zúŋdộŋ tạʔisi Ðứkzê tʰăj ŋàʔi kaw hếttʰảʔi kák zân ŋwiện cúŋ ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ zất dáŋsợ kủʔa cúʔa ŋàʔi tʰáɲ vwa kó kwiềnnăŋ kũŋ ʔiêʔumến kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi vữŋbền ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰihàɲ dɔán sét kôŋbìɲ cɔŋ zakốp hãʔi kaw ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi và tʰờ lạʔi cướk cơn ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰáɲ cɔŋ vòŋ kák tʰầʔi ŋàʔi kó môʔisɛ ʔazôn cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋườʔi kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ ŋàʔi kó samuên họ dã kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dáp lạʔi cɔ ŋàʔi cɔŋ cụ mâʔi fán vớʔi họ ɣiữ kák cứŋkớ ŋàʔi và ŋàʔi cɔ hãʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cúʔa dã dáp lờʔi cɔ cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã tʰatʰứ cɔ zẫʔucúʔa báʔɔ cả kôŋviệk kủʔa hãʔi kaw ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi và tʰờ lạʔi cên núʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta tʰáɲ hỡʔi kả cáʔidất hãʔi kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ cɔ Ðứkzê xá hầʔu việk Ðứkzê kác vuimừŋ hãʔi hátsướŋ dến cướk ŋàʔi fảʔibiết zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cíɲŋàʔi dã zựŋ cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi tʰuộk ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi zânsự ŋàʔi bầʔi ciên kủʔa dồŋkỏ ŋàʔi hãʔi kảmtạ vàʔɔ kák kửʔa ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn vàʔɔ hàɲlaŋ ŋàʔi xá kảmtạ ŋàʔi cúktụŋ zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi vìÐứkzê tʰiện ɲơn ŋàʔi hằŋ kó mãʔimãʔi và tʰàɲ ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi tôʔi hátsướŋ ɲơn kôŋbìɲ hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi tôʔi kác xônŋwan cɔŋ dườŋ cọnvẹn cúʔa cừŋ nàʔɔ dếnkùŋ tôʔi tôʔi lấʔilòŋ cọnvẹn cɔŋ ɲà tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ dể diềʔu ɣì dêmạt cướk tôʔi tôʔi ɣét kôŋviệk cuŋ việk ấʔi xôŋ zíɲ vàʔɔ tôʔi lòŋ zantà lìʔa xỏʔi tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ ák tôʔi ziệt nóʔi hàɲ ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ kòn nàʔɔ kó tựkaw lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ tôʔi cẳŋ cịʔu cɔ nổʔi mắt tôʔi căm sɛm ŋườʔi cuŋtín cɔŋ sứ hầʔu cɔ cuŋ vớʔi tôʔi ʔaj di tʰeo dườŋ cọnvẹn nấʔi hầʔu việk tôʔi kẻ nàʔɔ fỉɲ ɣạt cẳŋ dượk cɔŋ ɲà tôʔi ŋườʔi nóʔizốʔi xôŋ dứŋ nổʔi cướk tôʔi mỗʔi buổʔimaj tôʔi ziệt hếttʰảʔi zữ cɔŋ sứ Ðặŋ cuất mọʔi ák xỏʔi tʰàɲ Ðứkzê hỡʔiÐứkzê sin ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi ŋwiện tiếŋ tôʔi tʰấʔu dến ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi zancuân sin cớ ɣiấʔu ŋàʔi kùŋ tôʔi sin hãʔi ŋiêŋ taj kwa ŋɛ tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu sin măw măw dáp lạʔi tôʔi vì kák ŋàʔi tôʔi ɲư xóʔi sươŋkốt tôʔi cáʔi dốt ɲư tʰan lửʔa lòŋ tôʔi dáɲdập xôhéʔɔ ɲư kỏ vì tôʔi kwên vì kớ tiếŋ tʰan kủʔa tôʔi sươŋkốt tôʔi vàʔɔ tʰịt tôʔi tôʔi cở ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn càŋ nơʔi zừŋ vắŋ xáknàʔɔ cim mèʔɔ cốn bỏhwaŋ tôʔi tʰawtʰứk tôʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư cimsẻ hiwkwạɲ cên máʔi ɲà hằŋ ŋàʔi tʰùŋịc sỉɲụk tôʔi kẻ nổʔizận hɔảŋ tôʔi zủʔasả tôʔi ɲơn nóŋ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi dã bụʔi cɔ xáknàʔɔ báɲ và lấʔi ɣiọt fa dồ ʔuốŋ tôʔi vìcúʔa kó nâŋ tôʔi kaw zồʔi kwăŋ tôʔi suốŋ tʰấp kák ŋàʔi tôʔi ɲư bóŋ ŋã zàʔi za tôʔi xôhéʔɔ xáknàʔɔ kỏ ɲưŋ Ðứkzê ơʔi ŋàʔi hằŋ kó mãʔimãʔi kỷniệm ŋàʔi lưʔu dờʔi nầʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə cúʔa cổʔi dậʔi lấʔilòŋ tʰươŋsót siôn nầʔi cɔ siôn vì tʰìɣiờ dịɲ dã dến zồʔi kák tôʔitớ cúʔa ʔiêʔucuộŋ dá siôn và kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót bụʔi dất bấʔizờ muônzân zɛɲ Ðứkzê và hếttʰảʔi vwa tʰếzan viɲhiển ŋàʔi xiÐứkzê lạʔi siôn tʰìŋàʔi za cɔŋ viɲhiển ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa xốnkùŋ cẳŋ xiɲzể lờʔi nàʔisin kủʔa Ðʔiềʔu dó ɣi dể cɔ dờʔi tươŋlaj một zânsự dượk zựŋ săw ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê vì nơʔi tʰáɲ kaw ŋàʔi dã ŋó suốŋ từ cên cờʔi ŋàʔi sɛmsét tʰếzan Ðặŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ zênsiết kủʔa và ɣiảʔifóŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dịɲ fảʔi cết hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔita cwiền za zɛɲ Ðứkzê cɔŋ siôn và ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cɔŋ lúk muônzân ɲóm lạʔi vớʔi kák nướk dặŋ hầʔu việk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã sứklựk tôʔi za ʔiếʔu ɣiữʔa dườŋ xiến kák ŋàʔi tôʔi za tôʔi tâʔu zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi kák cúʔa kòn dến muôndờʔi sin cớ kất lấʔi tôʔi ɣiữʔɛcừŋ kák ŋàʔi tôʔi tʰuở sưʔa cúʔa cáʔidất kák từŋ cờʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj cúʔa cờʔidất hɔạʔi sɔŋ cúʔa hằŋ kòn cờʔidất kũ ɲư áʔɔsốŋ cúʔa dổʔi cờʔidất ɲư káʔi áʔɔ tʰăj sɔŋcúʔa xôŋ biếnkảʔi kák cúʔa xôŋ kùŋ kɔncáʔu tôʔitớ cúʔa kòn kó zòŋzõʔi dượk vữŋ cướk cúʔa hỡʔi liɲhồn xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê mọʔi diềʔu ɣì cɔŋ hãʔi katụŋ zɛɲ tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔi liɲhồn hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê cớ kwên kák kủʔa ŋàʔi Ấʔilà ŋàʔi tʰatʰứ kák tộʔiák ŋươʔi cữʔa làɲ mọʔi bịɲ ŋươʔi kứʔucuộk mạŋ sốŋ ŋươʔi xỏʔi cốn lấʔi ɲơn tʰươŋsót mãʔɔ ciềʔu dộʔi cɔ ŋươʔi ŋàʔi cɔ miệŋ ŋươʔi dượk tʰỏʔa kák ŋɔn tuổʔi daŋ tʰì kủʔa ŋươʔi cởlạʔi ɲư kủʔa cim fụŋ hɔàŋ Ðứkzê tʰihàɲ kôŋbìɲ và ŋăitʰẳŋ cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi ŋàʔi bàʔitỏ cɔ môʔisɛ dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi và cɔ ʔisơzaên kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi Ðứkzê kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót hăj cậm nóŋzận dầʔi ɲơn ŋàʔi xôŋ tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ ɣiữ lòŋ ɣiận dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi xôŋ dãʔi cúŋtôʔi tʰeo tộʔilỗʔi cúŋtôʔi kũŋ xôŋ báʔɔ cả cúŋtôʔi tùʔi zanák kủʔa cúŋtôʔi vì kák từŋ cờʔi kaw cên dất bawɲiêʔu tʰì ɲơn ŋàʔi kàŋ cɔ nàʔɔ kíɲ ŋàʔi bấʔiɲiêʔu fươŋ dôŋ sakác fươŋ tâʔi bawɲiêʔu tʰìŋàʔi dã dɛm vifạm cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi sa cúŋtôʔi bấʔiɲiêʔu Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót kíɲ ŋàʔi xáknàʔɔ ca tʰươŋsót kɔnkáʔi mìɲ vậʔi vìŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi bởʔi ɣiốŋ ɣì ŋàʔi ɲớ lạʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi bằŋ bụʔi dất Ðờʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲư kâʔicỏ ŋườʔi sɛɲ cưởŋ xáknàʔɔ bôŋ hwa nơʔi dồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi cên bôŋ hwa kìʔa cẳŋ kòn cỗ xôŋ kòn ɲìn nữʔa sɔŋ ɲơn Ðứkzê hằŋ kó dờʔidờʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi và kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi zàɲ cɔ cắt cít kủʔa tứklà cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiữ zawướk ŋàʔi và ɲớ lạʔi kák ɣiềŋmốʔi ŋàʔi dặŋ tʰeo Ðứkzê dã ŋôʔi ŋàʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi nướkŋàʔi kaicị cên hỡʔi kák tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê là kák dấŋ kó sứklựk tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi hăj vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ ŋàʔi xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hỡʔi kả kơ biɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê là tôʔitớ ŋàʔi tʰeo cỉ ŋàʔi hãʔi katụŋ Ðứkzê hỡʔi kák kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔŋ mọʔi nơʔi nướk ŋàʔi xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hỡʔi liɲhồn hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hỡʔi liɲhồn xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi cúʔa tʰật mặk saŋcọŋ waiŋi cúʔa bawfủ mìɲ bằŋ áɲsáŋ xáknàʔɔ bằŋ káʔi áʔɔ ɣiươŋ kák từŋ cờʔi za ɲư káʔi cạʔi ŋàʔi cấp kák dòntăj kủʔa fòŋ kaw ŋàʔi cɔŋ kák nướk zùŋ mâʔi sɛ ŋàʔi và di bướk cên káɲ ɣió ŋàʔi zùŋ ɣió ŋàʔi ŋọn lửʔa tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi sáŋlập dất cên kák xôŋ zúŋdộŋ dến dờʔidờʔi cúʔa lấʔi vựk sâʔu bawfủ dất ɲư bằŋ káʔi áʔɔ nướk tʰì kaw kák núʔi cúʔa hămzọʔa nướk ɣiựt lạʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ cúʔa nướk lậtdật cạʔi cốn núʔi cũŋ sâʔu suốŋ cốn cúʔa dã dịɲ cɔ cúʔa dịɲ cơn cɔ nướk dể nướk xôŋ kwa xỏʔi xôŋ kòn cởlạʔi ŋập dất nữʔa ŋàʔi xiến kák suốʔi fun za cɔŋ cũŋ nó cảʔi ɣiữʔa kák núʔi ɲờ kák suốʔi ấʔi hếttʰảʔi lɔàʔi tʰú dồŋ dượk ʔuốŋ kák lừʔa zừŋ ɣiảʔixát tạʔi dó cim cờʔi dềʔu kák suốʔi ấʔi cổʔi tiếŋ ɣiữʔa ɲáɲ kâʔi từ fòŋ kaw mìɲ ŋàʔi tướʔi kák núʔi dượk dầʔizẫʔi bôŋ cáʔi kôŋviệk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi cɔ kỏ dâm cɔ súkvật kâʔicốʔi zùŋ cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi và xiến tʰựkvật sɛɲ za nơʔi dất zượʔuɲɔ xiến hứŋcí lɔàʔiŋườʔi và zầʔu dể zùŋ mặtmàʔi sáŋ zỡ kùŋ báɲ dể tʰêm sứk cɔ lòŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kâʔicốʔi Ðứkzê dượk dầʔi ɲựʔa tứklà kâʔi hươŋ tạʔi liban ŋàʔi dã cồŋ là nơʔi lɔàʔi cim dóŋ kòn kɔnkò zùŋ kâʔi tùŋ cỗ kủʔa kák núʔi kaw nơʔi kủʔa zê zừŋ hòn dá cỗ kủʔa cuộtdồŋ ŋàʔi dã mặtcăŋ dể cỉ tʰì mặtcờʔi ɣiờ cúʔa tốʔităm dêm dến xi ấʔi kák tʰúzừŋ di za ɲữŋ ɣầm miếŋ mồʔi và kầʔusin Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dồăn cúŋnó mặtcờʔi mọk cúŋnó zút nằm cɔŋ haŋ cúŋnó bấʔizờ lɔàʔiŋườʔi di za dến kôŋviệk mìɲ và cɔdến ciềʔutốʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê kôŋviệk ŋàʔi ɲiềʔu biếtbaw ŋàʔi dã hếttʰảʔi kác xônŋwan cáʔidất dầʔizẫʔi tàʔisản ŋàʔi kòn zộŋ mọʔi nầʔi dó sɛɲ dộŋ lɔàʔi ɲỏ tạʔi dó tàʔutʰwiền di kwalạʔi kũŋ kó viətʰan cúʔa dã dặŋ ɣiỡn cơʔi nơʔi dó hếttʰảʔi lɔàʔi nầʔi côŋdợʔi cúʔa hầʔu cɔ cúʔa dồăn cɔ cúŋnó tʰeo ɣiờ cúʔa cɔ cúŋnó cúŋnó ɲận lấʔi cúʔa tăj za cúŋnó dượk nɔnê cúʔa ɣiấʔu cúŋnó bốʔizốʔi cúʔa lấʔi hơʔi tʰở cúŋnó lạʔi cúŋnó cết cởvề bụʔi dất cúʔa saj tʰầncúʔa za cúŋnó dượk zựŋ cúʔa cɔ mặtdất za mớʔi ŋwiện viɲhiển Ðứkzê kòn dến mãʔimãʔi ŋwiệnÐứkzê vujvẻ kôŋviệk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɲìn dất dất zúŋdộŋ ŋàʔi zờ dến núʔi núʔi xóʔi hễ tôʔi sốŋ bawlâʔu tôʔi hátsướŋ cɔ Ðứkzê bấʔilâʔu hễ tôʔi kòn cừŋ nàʔɔ tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi cừŋ nấʔi ŋwiện swiɣẫm tôʔi dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi vujvẻ nơʔi Ðứkzê ŋwiện tộʔi ɲơn ziệt xỏʔi dất và ák cẳŋ kòn nữʔa hỡʔi liɲhồn hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê halêluza hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi xá cwiền za ɣiữʔa kák zân ɲữŋ kôŋviệk ŋàʔi hãʔi hãʔi cɔ ŋàʔi ɲữŋ bàʔi ka xá nóʔi kák việk lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi hãʔi xwej mìɲ zɛɲ tʰáɲ ŋàʔi ŋwiện lòŋ nàʔɔ kầʔu Ðứkzê dượk xɔáʔilạk hãʔi kầʔu Ðứkzê kwiền fép ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋàʔi hỡʔi zòŋzõʔi zaham tôʔitớ ŋàʔi hỡʔi kɔncáʔu zakốp ŋàʔi cọn hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi ɲữŋ việk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi dã kák zấʔu dɔán ŋữ miệŋ ŋàʔi dã fán ŋàʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi sự dɔán sét ŋàʔi xắp cáʔidất ŋàʔi ɲớ dến zawướk ŋàʔi hồʔitưởŋ lờʔi fán zặn ŋàʔi cɔdến ŋàn dờʔi tứklà zawướk ŋàʔi dã vớʔi zaham tʰề kùŋ ʔisák Ðịɲ cɔ zakốp và cɔ ʔisơzaên zawướk dờʔidờʔi mà zằŋ ta cɔ ŋươʔi sứ kanaan là fần sảnŋiệp kák ŋươʔi lúk ấʔi cỉ ŋườʔi xôŋ dôŋdảʔɔ làmxác cɔŋ sứ Ðʔi zân nầʔi dến zân kiə từ nướk nầʔi kwa nướk xák ŋàʔi xôŋ cɔ ʔaj ŋàʔi các kák vwa kớ mà zằŋ Ðừŋ dụŋ dến cịʔu sứk zầʔuta cớ hạʔi kák dấŋ tiênci ŋàʔi xiến kơn dóʔicém ɣiáŋ cɔŋ sứ và kất kả lươŋtʰựk ŋàʔi saj ŋườʔi di cướk ʔisơzaên làɣiô tôʔimọʔi ŋườʔita kột cơn ŋườʔi vàʔɔ kùm làm cɔ ŋườʔi kòŋ siềŋ cɔdến ŋàʔi diềʔu ŋườʔi dã nóʔi dượk ứŋŋiệm lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê zèn tʰử ŋườʔi vwa saj tʰa ɣiôsép Ðấŋ kaicị kák zân ɣiảʔi tʰa ŋườʔi vwa ŋườʔilàm kwảŋiə làm kwan kaicị hếttʰảʔi tàʔisản mìɲ Ðặŋ mặký ŋườʔi cóʔibuộk kwầntʰần và lấʔi xônŋwan zạʔizỗ kák cưởŋlãʔɔ bấʔizờ ʔisơzaên kũŋ vàʔɔ zíptô zakốp ŋụ tạʔi cɔŋ sứ cam Ðứkzê cɔ zânsự ŋàʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu xiến mạɲmẽ Ðʔɔạnŋàʔi dổʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi zíptô dặŋ cúŋnó ɣét zânsự ŋàʔi lập mưʔuhạʔi kák tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi saj môʔisɛ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi và ʔazôn ŋàʔi dã cọn cɔŋ sứ cam tạʔi ɣiữʔa zíptô haj ŋườʔilàm kák zấʔu fép kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ suốŋ tốʔităm za kòn xôŋ bộʔiŋịc lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dổʔi nướk cúŋnó za máʔu và ɣiết cết ká kủʔa cúŋnó cúŋnó sɛɲ ếc ɲiềʔu lúkɲúk cɔdến cɔŋ fòŋ kuŋtʰất vwa kũŋ kó ŋàʔi fán kó zuồʔi mòŋ băj dến và muỗʔi cɔŋ kák bờkõʔi cúŋnó tʰăjvì mưʔa ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ mưʔadá và lửʔa ŋọn cɔŋ kả sứ ŋàʔi kũŋ hạʔi ɲɔ kâʔi bẻ ɣãʔi kâʔicốʔi tạʔi bờkõʔi cúŋnó ŋàʔi fán kó câʔucấʔu và kàʔɔkàʔɔ băj dến kắnsả hếttʰảʔi kâʔicỏ cɔŋ sứ và fáhạʔi bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa dất cúŋnó ŋàʔi kũŋ dáɲ ɣiết hếttʰảʔi kɔn dầʔulòŋ cɔŋ sứ tứklà kả kườŋ cáŋ sɛɲ dầʔu kủʔa cúŋnó Ðʔɔạnŋàʔi zẫn ʔisơzaên za kó kầm bạk vàŋ cẳŋ ʔaj ʔiếʔu cɔŋ kák cifáʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi zíptô vujvẻ xi dến ʔisơzaên di za vì kơn kiɲxủŋ bởʔi ʔisơzaên dã ɣiáŋ cên cúŋnó ŋàʔi bủʔa mâʔi za dể cɛcở và bandêm kó lửʔa sɔj sáŋ cúŋnó kầʔusin ŋàʔi xiến ɲữŋ kɔn kút dến và lấʔi báɲ cờʔi cɔ cúŋnó nɔnê ŋàʔi xaj dá nướk fun za cảʔi ŋaŋ kwa nơʔi xô xáknàʔɔ káʔi sôŋ vìŋàʔi ɲớ lạʔi lờʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi và hồʔitưởŋ zaham tôʔitớ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi zẫn zân ŋàʔi za kác zắt ŋàʔi cọn za vớʔi bàʔi tʰắŋ cận ŋàʔi cɔ dất kủʔa ɲiềʔu nướk họ ɲận dượk kôŋlaw kủʔa kák zân hầʔu cɔ ɣìŋiữ kák ŋàʔi và vâŋ tʰeo ɲữŋ luậtfáp ŋàʔi halêluza halêluza hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰiện sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ʔaj kótʰể tʰuật kák kôŋviệk kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê cwiền za ŋợʔixɛn kủʔa ŋàʔi fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣìŋiữ dwan cáɲ và tʰeo kôŋbìɲ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi tôʔi tùʔi ŋàʔi cɔ zânsự ŋàʔi hãʔi lấʔi kứʔuzỗʔi dến viếŋ tôʔi hầʔu cɔ tôʔi tʰấʔi tʰớʔi tʰạɲ kủʔa dượk ŋàʔi cọn hưởŋ vujvẻ kủʔa zânsự ŋàʔi và dượk xwej mìɲ vớʔi kơŋiệp ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi tổfụ cúŋtôʔi dã fạmtộʔi cúŋtôʔi kó fạm zantà kác huŋák tạʔi zíptô tổfụ cúŋtôʔi xôŋ cămcỉ kák fép cúʔa kũŋ cẳŋ ɲớ lạʔi ɲơn zưzật kủʔa cúʔa ɲưŋ lạʔi fảnŋịc tứklà biển dỏ zầʔu vậʔi ŋàʔi kứʔu kớ zɛɲ ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ bàʔi za kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kwở biển dỏ xô ŋàʔi zần ʔisơzaên di ŋaŋ kwa vựk sâʔu ɲư ŋaŋ dồŋ vắŋ ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi tăj ɣɛŋét cuộk xỏʔi tăj tʰùŋịc nướk cụp fủ ɲữŋ cẳŋ kòn lạʔi ŋườʔi bấʔizờ mớʔi lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi bèn ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi họ lạʔi mãʔimãʔi kwên kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi xôŋ cờdợʔi lờʔi cỉɣiáʔɔ ŋàʔi ɲưŋ kó lòŋ tʰam zụk kwádỗʔi tạʔi cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ và tʰử Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nơʔi vắŋvẻ ŋàʔi cɔ cúŋnó diềʔu cúŋnó kầʔusin ɲưŋ saj bịɲ tổɲạʔi liɲhồn cúŋnó cɔŋ cạʔi kwân ɣɛɲɣét môʔisɛ và ʔazôn ŋườʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê za Ðʔa tʰan và ʔabizan kó lửʔa fát cáʔi cɔŋ hộʔi cúŋnó ŋọn lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt ɲữŋ ák tổfụ tôʔi tạʔi hôzếp tʰờ lạʔi cướk hìɲ dúk họ dổʔi viɲhiển mìɲ za hìɲzạŋ kɔn kỏ họ kwên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ kứʔuzỗʔi mìɲ và dã kó kôŋviệk lớnlaw zíptô ɲữŋ việk cɔŋ sứ cam và kák diềʔu dáŋ kiɲhãʔi biển dỏ vìvậʔi ŋàʔi fán zằŋ ziệt cúŋnó di ɲưŋmôʔi sɛ ŋàʔi cọn dứŋ nơʔi ciệtʰạ cướk ŋàʔi Ðặŋ kaŋián kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi ʔɛ ŋàʔi hủʔiziệt căŋ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi xiɲbỉ sứ tốtdẹp xôŋ lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa sɔŋ nóʔi cɔŋ cạʔi mìɲ xôŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ Ðứkzê vìvậʔi ŋàʔi tʰề kùŋ cúŋnó zằŋ sẽ cúŋnó saŋã cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ xiến zòŋzõʔi saŋã ɣiữʔa nướk và lạk cɔŋ kák sứ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ kúŋ tʰờ baɛɲfêzô ʔaên kủʔa kúŋ cết ɲưvậʔi cọkzận Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲữŋ việklàm kủʔa và ônzịc fát za ɣiữʔa bấʔizờ finê ʔa cổʔi zậʔi dɔán sét và ônzịc ŋừŋ lạʔi từ dờʔi nầʔi kwadờʔi kiə việk dó cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ tổfụ cúŋtôʔi kũŋ cọkzận ŋàʔi tạʔi ŋàʔi mê ziba nên kớ kó tajhọʔa sảʔi dến cɔ môʔisɛ Ấʔi cọk zốʔi cí ŋườʔi nênŋườʔi nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi họ xôŋ hủʔiziệt kák zân ʔiɲư Ðứkzê dã fán zặn ɲưŋ lạʔi fa vớʔi kák zân tập tʰeo kôŋviệk cúŋnó và hầʔu việk hìɲtượŋ cúŋnó là diềʔu ɣâʔi káʔi bẫʔi cɔ mìɲ họ kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ mà kúŋtế makwỉ làm dổ hwiết vôtộʔi za tứklà hwiết kủʔa kɔncaj kɔŋáʔi mìɲ mà kúŋtế cɔ hìɲtượŋ sứ kanaan nên sứ ôʔuế bởʔi hwiết ấʔi ɲưvậʔi cɔ mìɲ ôʔuế kôŋviệk mìɲ lấʔi mìɲ tʰôŋzâm ɲơn dó kơn ɣiận Ðứkzê nổʔi kùŋzân ŋàʔi ŋàʔi ɣớmɣiếk kơŋiệp mìɲ ŋàʔi fó vàʔɔ tăj kák ŋɔạʔibaŋ ɲữŋ ɣɛŋét kaicị cên kẻtʰù ŋịc kũŋ tổfụ cúŋta họ fụk zướʔi tăj cúŋnó ɲiềʔu cúʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu tổfụ cúŋta ɲưŋ fiềnlòŋ ŋàʔi bởʔi và tộʔiák kủʔa zầʔu vậʔi xi ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa ŋàʔi dɔáʔi sɛm cɔŋ kơn zancuân ɲớ lạʔi zawướk mìɲ và tʰươŋsót tùʔi ɲơn zưzật kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kũŋ cɔ dượk bên ɲữŋ fu hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi sin hãʔi kứʔu cúŋtôʔi ɲóm cúŋtôʔi ɣiữʔa kák nướk hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi kảmtạ zɛɲ tʰáɲ cúʔa và xwej mìɲ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên từ cướk vôkùŋ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi mãʔimãʔi kả zânsự xá nóʔi ʔamɛn halêluza hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰiện sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi kák ŋườʔi Ðứkzê dã cuộk xỏʔi tăj hãʔi nóʔi dềʔu dó tứklà kák ŋườʔi ŋàʔi dã lạʔi kák sứ từ fươŋ dôŋ fươŋ tâʔi fươŋ bắk fươŋ họ lưʔulạk nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ hiwkwạɲ xôŋ tʰàɲ dượk họ dóʔixát liɲhồn naw cɔŋ mìɲ bấʔizờ cɔŋ kơn zancuân kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi dềʔu zannan zẫn tʰeo dườŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ Ðặŋ di dến tʰàɲ dượk ŋwiện ŋườʔita ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ɲơn ŋàʔi và kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi vìŋàʔi cɔ lòŋ xawxát dượk tʰỏʔatʰíc xiến cɔ dóʔi dượk dầʔizẫʔi ɲữŋ cɔŋ tốʔităm bóŋ cết bị xốnxổ síc bắtbuộk bởʔivì dã bộʔiŋịc lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi và xiɲzể xwiên zạʔi kủʔa Ðấŋcí kaw ɲơn dó ŋàʔi lấʔi lawxổ lòŋ suốŋ họ vấpŋã xôŋ ʔaj ɣiúpdỡ bấʔizờ cɔŋ kơn zancuân kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi diềʔu zannan zút xỏʔi tốʔităm bóŋ cết kũŋ ɣãʔi siềŋ kủʔa ŋwiện ŋườʔita ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ɲơn ŋàʔi và kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi vìŋàʔi dã fá kửʔa dồŋ và ɣãʔi kák sɔŋ kẻ ŋuzạʔi xốnxổ vì vifạm zanák mìɲ lòŋ cúŋnó ɣớmɣê kák tʰứ dồăn họ dến ɣần kửʔa cết bấʔizờ cɔŋ kơn zancuân kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi diềʔu zannan ŋàʔi za lịɲ cữʔa làɲ zút xỏʔi káʔi hwiệt ŋwiện ŋườʔita ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ɲơn ŋàʔi và kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋwiện cúŋ zâŋ kủʔa tʰù lấʔi bàʔi vuimừŋ tʰuật kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi kó ŋườʔi di suốŋ tàʔu cɔŋ và làmviệk nơʔi nướk kả kẻ ấʔi tʰấʔi kôŋviệk Ðứkzê sɛm fép ŋàʔi cɔŋ nướk sâʔu ŋàʔi biểʔu kó cận ɣió bãʔɔ nổʔi kák sóŋ Ðưʔa kaw dến kák từŋ cờʔi zồʔi suốŋ tớʔi vựk sâʔu lòŋ tiêʔutan xốnxổ họ cɔáŋváŋ siêʔu ɲư ŋườʔi săj sự xônŋwan dềʔu bấʔizờ cɔŋ kơn zancuân kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi diềʔu zannan ŋàʔi ŋừŋ bãʔɔ dổʔi za bìɲ tịɲ và sóŋ êmlặŋ họ vuimừŋ sóŋ êmlặŋ cúʔa zẫn vàʔɔ ướkaw ŋwiện ŋườʔita ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ɲơn ŋàʔi và kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ ŋàʔi cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋườʔita kũŋ hãʔi kaw ŋàʔi cɔŋ hộʔi zânsự và ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi tạʔi nơʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ ŋàʔi dổʔi sôŋ za dồŋ vắŋ suốʔi nướk tʰàɲ dất xô và dất màʔumỡ za dất vì kớ zanák kủʔa zân tạʔi dó ŋàʔi dồŋ vắŋ tʰàɲ ʔaw nướk xô za ɲữŋ suốʔi nướk ŋàʔi cɔ ɲữŋ dóʔi dượk lạʔi dó họ sâʔi tʰàɲ dặŋ họ zeo zuộŋ cồŋ ɲɔ zuộŋ ɲɔ sɛɲ bôŋ cáʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi fướk cɔ dến dỗʔi sɛɲ ɲiềʔu tʰêm ŋàʔi xôŋ dể cɔ súkvật hawhớt họ lạʔi fảʔi kựk lòŋ vì zannan buồnzầʔu ŋàʔi dổ ɲuốkɲơ cên vwɛcúʔa xiến fảʔi lưʔulạk cɔŋ nơʔi vắŋvẻ xôŋ dườŋ ɲưŋŋàʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn xỏʔi hɔạnnạn làm cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi dượk zakwiến dôŋ ɲư bầʔi ciên kák ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰấʔi diềʔu ấʔi vujvẻ kòn kák ák dềʔu fảʔi ŋậmmiệŋ lạʔi fàm nàʔɔ xônŋwan cúý diềʔu nầʔi và swiɣẫm ɲơn kủʔa Ðứkzê hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi lòŋ tôʔi vữŋcắk tôʔi fảʔi liɲhồn tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn hỡʔi kầmsắt hãʔi tỉɲ tʰứk cíɲ mìɲ tôʔi tỉɲ tʰứk tʰật hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi kảmtạ ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa kák zân hát ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi cɔŋ kák nướk vì ɲơn cúʔa kaw kák từŋ cờʔi sự cơn tʰật cúʔa dến kák mâʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋwiện cúʔa dượk kaw kák từŋ cờʔi ŋwiện viɲhiển cúʔa cổʔi kaw kả cáʔidất sin hãʔi lấʔi tăj hữʔu cúʔa kứʔuzỗʔi hãʔi dáp lờʔi cúŋtôʔi hầʔu cɔ ʔiêʔuzấʔu kủʔa cúʔa dượk ɣiảʔitʰɔát Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã fán cɔŋ tʰáɲ ŋàʔi zằŋ ta ta ciə sicɛm dɔ cũŋ sukốt ɣalaát tʰuộk manasɛ kũŋ vậʔi zaim dồnlũʔi kủʔa dầʔu zuda kâʔi fủ môáp káʔi cậʔu nơʔi tắmzửʔa ta sáŋ zép cên dôm ta kấttiếŋ zeo mừŋ dất filitin ʔaj dưʔa tôʔi vàʔɔ tʰàɲ vữŋbền ʔaj zẫn tôʔi dến dôm hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cẳŋ fảʔi cúʔa Ðấŋ dã cúŋtôʔi saw hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa xôŋ kòn za cận vớʔi dạʔɔ biɲ cúŋtôʔi nữʔa sincúʔa ɣiúpdỡ cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi zancuân vì ɣiúpdỡ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi hưxôŋ ɲờÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ việk kảtʰể vì cíɲ ŋàʔi ɣiàʔidạp kák kừʔudịc cúŋtôʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn sin cớ nínlặŋ vì miệŋ ák miệŋ zanlận hả za ŋịc tôʔi cúŋnó nóʔi ŋịc tôʔi bằŋ lưỡʔi láʔɔsượk vâʔi fủ tôʔi bằŋ lờʔi ɣɛŋét và cɛɲdấʔu vớʔi tôʔi vôkớ vì tìɲtʰươŋ kủʔa tôʔi cúŋnó lạʔi cở kừʔudịc tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cỉ cwiên lòŋ kầʔuŋwiện cúŋnó lấʔi zữ cả làɲ lấʔi ɣét báʔɔ tʰươŋ hãʔi dặt ák kaicị cɔ kừʔudịc dứŋ hữʔu xi dɔán sét ŋwiện za kó tộʔi và lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện ɲư tộʔilỗʔi ŋwiện kák ŋàʔi za ŋwiện xák ciếm lấʔi cứkfận di ŋwiện kɔnkáʔi fảʔi mồkôʔi và ɣóʔabụʔa ŋwiện kɔnkáʔi hwaŋdàŋ ănmàʔi fảʔi di sin sa xỏʔi ɲà hwaŋ kủʔa cúŋnó ŋwiện củnợ tʰủ mọʔi kó kẻ ŋɔạʔi kướp lấʔi huêlợʔi kôŋlaw ŋwiện cẳŋ ʔaj cɔ xôŋ ʔaj kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót kɔn mồkôʔi ŋwiện zòŋzõʔi ziệt di tên cúŋnó sóʔa cɔŋ dờʔi săw ŋwiện zanák tổfụ ɲắk lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê ŋwiện tộʔilỗʔi xôŋ bôʔi dượk ŋwiện kák tộʔiák ấʔi hằŋ cướk Ðứkzê Ðểŋàʔi kất cúŋnó xỏʔi dất bởʔivì ŋườʔi xôŋ ɲớ sɔŋ ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn và kó lòŋ dăwtʰươŋ dặŋ ɣiết di nó ưʔa zủʔasả zủʔasả vàʔɔ kũŋ xôŋ tʰíc cúk fướk fướk kác sa nó kũŋ mặk mìɲ bằŋ zủʔasả xáknàʔɔ bằŋ káʔi áʔɔ sự zủʔasả cun tʰấm vàʔɔ tʰân ɲư nướk vô sươŋkốt ɲư zầʔu ŋwiện zủʔasả ɲư káʔi áʔɔ dể dắp mìɲ ɲư káʔi daj dể tʰắtlưŋ Ðứkzê báʔɔ cả ɲưvậʔi cɔ kừʔudịc tôʔi và cɔ ɲữŋ nóʔi hàɲ liɲhồn tôʔi ɲưŋ hỡʔi cúʔazê ɲơn zɛɲ cúʔa sin hãʔi hậʔudãʔi tôʔi vì ɲơn cúʔa sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi vì tôʔi xốnkùŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn lòŋ tôʔi dăwtʰươŋ cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi tôʔi kwadờʔi ɲư bóŋ ŋã zàʔi bị duổʔi dâʔi duổʔi dó xáknàʔɔ kàʔɔkàʔɔ ɣốʔi tôʔi zun ʔiếʔu kiêŋ tʰịt tôʔi za xôŋ kòn nữʔa tôʔi kũŋ tʰàɲsự sỉɲụk cɔ cúŋnó hễ cúŋnó tʰấʔi tôʔi lắkdầʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ôʔi sin ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi kứʔu tôʔi tʰeo ɲơn cúʔa hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔita zằŋ ấʔi dâʔi tăj cúʔa cíɲŋàʔi Ðứkzê ơʔi dã diềʔu dó cúŋnó tʰì zủʔasả ɲưŋ cúʔa lạʔi fướk xi cúŋnó zấʔi hổtʰẹn kòn tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk vujvẻ ŋwiện kừʔudịc tôʔi fảʔi mặk mìɲ bằŋ sỉɲụk bawfủ mìɲ bằŋ hổtʰẹn xáknàʔɔ bằŋ káʔi áʔɔ bấʔizờ miệŋ tôʔi hếtsứk kảmtạ Ðứkzê ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi ɣiữʔa dɔàn dôŋ vìŋàʔi dứŋ hữʔu ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn Ðặŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi dɔán sét liɲhồn ŋườʔi Ðứkzê fán kùŋ cúʔa tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi ŋồʔi hữʔu cɔdến cừŋ dặt tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi cơn cɔ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê siôn saj dến kâʔi fủ năŋlựk ŋươʔi hãʔi kaicị ɣiữʔa kák tʰùŋịc ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi kwiềntʰế cúʔa zân cúʔa tìɲŋwiện lạʔi dến ɲữŋ cẻ tuổʔi ŋươʔi mặk caŋsứk tʰáɲ kũŋ dếnkùŋ ŋươʔi ɲư ɣiọt sươŋ bởʔi lòŋ zạŋdôŋ za Ðứkzê dã tʰề xôŋ dổʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi tʰầʔi dờʔidờʔi tùʔi tʰeo mêncisêdék cúʔa hữʔu ŋươʔi sẽ cà kák vwa cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi nổʔizận ŋàʔi dɔán sét kák nướk xắpnơʔi dầʔi sákcết kũŋ cà làmdầʔu kủʔa nướklớn ŋàʔi ʔuốŋ nướk xɛ cɔŋ dườŋ và ɲơn dó ŋướk dầʔu halêluza tôʔi hếtlòŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê cɔŋ dám ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ tạʔi hộʔi cúŋ kôŋviệk Ðứkzê dềʔu lớnlaw fàm ʔaj ưʔatʰíc ca dến kôŋviệk ŋàʔi kó viɲhiển waiŋi sự kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi kôŋviệk lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê hăj kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót ban tʰựk cɔ kíɲ ŋàʔi và ɲớ lạʔi zawướk mìɲ ŋàʔi dã cɔ zânsự ŋàʔi kwiềnnăŋ kôŋviệk ŋàʔi Ðặŋ cɔ sảnŋiệp kủʔa kák nướk kôŋviệk tăj ŋàʔi cơn tʰật kôŋbìɲ kák ɣiềŋmốʔi ŋàʔi dềʔu cắkcắn Ðượk vữŋbền dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ tʰeo cơn tʰật ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋàʔi dã saj kứʔucuộk zân ŋàʔi cwiền zawướk ŋàʔi dến dờʔidờʔi zɛɲŋàʔi tʰáɲ dáŋ kíɲ sự kíɲ Ðứkzê xởʔidầʔu xônŋwan fàm nàʔɔ ɣiữ tʰeo diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi kó cí hiểʔu sự ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi halêluza fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kíɲ Ðứkzê zất ưʔatʰíc diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi kườŋ tʰạɲ cên dất zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ dượk fướk kủʔakảʔi ɣiàʔukó dềʔu cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi và kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi Áɲsáŋ sɔj nơʔi tốʔităm cɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋườʔi hăj kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót kôŋbìɲ fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔhăj cɔ xi ŋườʔi dượk dɔán sét kác cáɲ cựk ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ lăjdộŋ kỷniệm ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ káʔi huŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi vữŋbền tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê lòŋ ŋườʔi kiêndịɲ cẳŋ ci cɔdến xi ŋườʔi tʰấʔi kák kừʔudịc mìɲ báʔɔ ŋườʔi vảʔi tiềntàʔi bốtʰí tʰiếʔutʰốn sự kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi sừŋ ŋườʔi dượk ŋướk kác viɲhiển kẻ ák tʰấʔi tứkzận ŋiến zăŋ tiêʔu sự ướkaw kủʔa ák di halêluza hỡʔi kák tôʔitớ Ðứkzê hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ Ðứkzê Ðáŋ cúktụŋ zɛɲ Ðứkzê từ bâʔizờ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi từ nơʔi mặtcờʔi mọk cɔ dếnnơʔi mặtcờʔi xá ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ Ðứkzê Ðứkzê kaw kák zân sự viɲhiển ŋàʔi kaw kák từŋ cờʔi ʔaj ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋôʔiŋàʔi cên kaw ŋàʔi hạmìɲ suốŋ Ðặŋ sɛmsét cờʔi dất ŋàʔi nâŋdỡ ŋườʔi xốnkùŋ xỏʔi bụʔi cɔ kất tʰiếʔutʰốn xỏʔi dốŋ fân Ðặŋ dể ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cuŋ vớʔi kák kwan cưởŋ tứk vớʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zânsự ŋàʔi ŋàʔi xiến dờn sɔnsẻ cɔŋ ɲà làm vujvẻ kủʔa ɲữŋ kɔnkáʔi halêluza xi ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi zíptô ɲà ɣiảʔidáp lìʔabỏ zân nóʔi tiếŋ tʰìzu da cởnên dền tʰáɲ ŋàʔi và ʔisơzaên tʰàɲ nướk ŋàʔi biển tʰấʔi ấʔi cạʔi cốn sôŋzô dɛɲ cảʔi cởlạʔi săw núʔi ɲảʔi ɲư ciên dựk nổŋ ɲảʔi xáknàʔɔ ciên kɔn ɲơn sɔ ŋươʔi cạʔi cốn ɣiôdɛɲ kớ ɣì ŋươʔi cảʔi cởlạʔi săw núʔi ɲơn saw ŋươʔi ɲảʔi ɲư ciên dựk nổŋ cớ ɣì ŋươʔi ɲảʔi ɲư ciên kɔn hỡʔi dất hãʔi zunzẩʔi cướk cúʔa cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp làÐấŋ dá za ʔaw nướk Ðổʔi dá kứŋ tʰàɲ ŋuồn nướk hỡʔiÐứkzê ɲơn ɲơn cơn tʰật ŋàʔi sự viɲhiển cớ cúŋtôʔi cớ cúŋtôʔi bèn dáŋ zɛɲ ŋàʔi vìsaw kák ŋɔạʔibaŋ nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋnó dâʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi cên kák từŋ cờʔi fàm diềʔu ɣì vừʔaý ŋàʔi tʰì ŋàʔi dã hìɲtượŋ cúŋnó bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ là kôŋviệk tăj ŋườʔita za hìɲtượŋ kó miệŋ xôŋ nóʔi kó cẳŋ tʰấʔi kó taj xôŋ ŋɛ kó mũʔi cẳŋ ŋửʔi kó tăj ɲưŋ xôŋ zờzẫm kó cơn nàʔɔ bướkdi kuốŋọŋ cẳŋ za tiếŋ nàʔɔ fàm nàʔɔ hìɲtượŋ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi Ðềʔu ɣiốŋ ɲư hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi ɲờkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi cợ káʔi xiên kủʔa hỡʔi ɲà ʔazôn hãʔi ɲờkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi cợ káʔi xiên kủʔa hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê hãʔi ɲờkậʔi nơʔi ɣiêhôva ŋàʔi cợ káʔi xiên kủʔa Ðứkzê dã ɲớ dến cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi fướk ban fướk cɔ ɲà ʔisơzaên kũŋ fướk cɔ ɲà ʔazôn ŋàʔi fướk cɔ ɲữŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê hɔặk ɲỏ hăj dềʔu kũŋ vậʔi ŋwiệnÐứkzê za tʰêm fướk ŋàʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔ kɔncáʔu kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ zựŋ cờʔidất fướk cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák từŋ cờʔi tʰuộk Ðứkzê ɲưŋŋàʔi dã dất cɔ kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kẻ cết hɔặk suốŋ kõʔi nínlặŋ cẳŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cúŋtôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê từ bâʔizờ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi halêluza tôʔi ʔiêʔumến Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi và lờʔi nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi cọn dờʔi tôʔi bởʔivì ŋàʔi kó ŋiêŋ taj kwa tôʔi zâʔi cết vươŋvấn tôʔi sự dăwdớn âmfủ tôʔi tôʔi ɣặp zancuân sầʔu xổ ɲưŋ tôʔi kêʔukầʔu zɛɲ Ðứkzê zằŋ Ðứkzê ôʔi kầʔusin ŋàʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi Ðứkzê hăj kôŋbìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót Ðứkzê bảʔɔhộ ŋườʔi tʰậttʰà tôʔi xốnxổ ŋàʔi kứʔu tôʔi hỡʔi liɲhồn hãʔi cởvề nơʔi ʔanŋỉ ŋươʔi vìÐứkzê dã hậʔudãʔi ŋươʔi cúʔa dã ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi cết mắt tôʔi xỏʔi ɣiọt và cơn tôʔi xỏʔi vấpŋã tôʔi di cướk Ðứkzê cɔŋ dất sốŋ tôʔi tôʔi nóʔi tôʔi dã buồntʰảm cɔŋ kơn bốʔizốʔi tôʔi nóʔi zằŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu nóʔizốʔi tôʔi lấʔi ɣì báʔɔdáp Ðứkzê về kák làɲ ŋàʔi dã cɔ tôʔi tôʔi kầm káʔi cén kứʔuzỗʔi mà kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ Ðứkzê tôʔi cả sɔŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák tôʔi hứʔa ŋwiện tạʔi cướk kả zânsự ŋàʔi sự cết kủʔa kák ŋườʔi tʰáɲ là kwíbáʔu cướk Ðứkzê hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi tʰậtlà tôʔitớ ŋàʔi tôʔi tôʔitớ ŋàʔi kɔncaj kɔndòʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dã lòʔitóʔi tôʔi tôʔi zâŋ kủʔa tʰù cɔ cúʔa và kầʔuxẩn zɛɲ Ðứkzê tôʔi cả sɔŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kák tôʔi hứʔa ŋwiện tạʔi cướk kả zânsự ŋàʔi cɔŋ hàɲlaŋ kủʔa ɲà Ðứkzê ɣiữʔa ɣiêzusalɛm halêluza hỡʔi kák nướk hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hỡʔi kák zân xá katụŋ ŋàʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi zất cɔ cúŋta sự cơn tʰật Ðứkzê cɔdến dờʔidờʔi halêluza hãʔi kảmtạ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰiện sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋwiện ʔisơzaên nóʔi zằŋ sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋwiện ɲà ʔazôn nóʔi zằŋ sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋwiện ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê nóʔi zằŋ sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi cɔŋ zancuân tôʔi kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê Ðứkzê dáp lờʔi tôʔi dể tôʔi nơʔi zộŋzãʔi Ðứkzê biɲ vựk tôʔi tôʔi cẳŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi làmci tôʔi Ðứkzê biɲ vựk tôʔi tʰuộk cɔŋ ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi ɲơn dó tôʔi vuj tʰấʔi ɣét tôʔi báʔɔ tʰà nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi Ðứkzê kòn tinkậʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰà nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi Ðứkzê kòn tinkậʔi vwɛcúʔa kák nướk dã vâʔi tôʔi tôʔi hủʔiziệt cúŋnó ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê cúŋnó dã vâʔi tôʔi fảʔi dã vâʔi tôʔi tôʔi hủʔiziệt cúŋnó ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê họ vâʔi tôʔi xáknàʔɔ dɔàn ʔɔŋ họ ɲư ŋọn lửʔa ɣaj tôʔi hủʔiziệt cúŋnó ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê ŋươʔi kó sô mạɲ dặŋ cɔ ŋã ɲưŋzê ɣiúpdỡ Ðứkzê sứklựk bàʔi ka kủʔa ŋàʔi cởnên kứʔuzỗʔi cɔŋ cạʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kótiếŋ vuimừŋ kứʔuzỗʔi tăj hữʔu Ðứkzê làmviệk kảtʰể tôʔi cẳŋ cết dâʔu ɲưŋ dượk sốŋ tʰuật lạʔi ɲữŋ kôŋviệk Ðứkzê Ðứkzê dã sửʔa fạt tôʔi kác ŋiêmcaŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ fó tôʔi vàʔɔ cết ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi kák kửʔa kôŋbìɲ tôʔi vàʔɔ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðâʔi kửʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲữŋ ŋươʔi kôŋbìɲ vàʔɔ dó tôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa cúʔa dã dáp lờʔi tôʔi cởnên kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ tôʔi hòn dá tʰợsâʔi lɔạʔi za cởnên kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ tôʔi hòn dá tʰợsâʔi lɔạʔi za cởnên dá dầʔu ɣók ɲà Ðʔiềʔu ấʔilà việk Ðứkzê một lạlùŋ cướk cúŋtôʔi nầʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cúŋtôʔi mừŋzỡ vujvẻ cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin hãʔi kứʔu Ðứkzê ơʔi sin cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk tʰớʔi tʰạɲ Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn dấŋ ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê dến từ nơʔi ɲà Ðứkzê cúŋtôʔi dã cúktụŋ ŋườʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋàʔi dã cɔ cúŋtôʔi áɲsáŋ hãʔi kột bằŋ zâʔi kɔn siɲ vàʔɔ kák sừŋ bàntʰờ cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa cúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi kaw cúʔa hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰiện sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi fướk cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cọnvẹn cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ Ðʔi tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê fướk cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɣìŋiữ cứŋkớ ŋàʔi và hếtlòŋ kầʔu ŋàʔi họ xôŋ cáʔifép kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ di cɔŋ kák lốʔi ŋàʔi cúʔa dã cwiền cɔ cúŋtôʔi kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi kẩntʰận ɣiữ lấʔi cớci dườŋlốʔi tôʔi dượk vữŋcắk tôʔi ɣiữ kák cúʔa xi tôʔi cămcỉ kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa tʰì cẳŋ hổtʰẹn xi tôʔi họk kák dɔán ŋữ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa tʰì tôʔi lấʔilòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa tôʔi ɣiữ kák cúʔa sin cớ tôʔi cọn ŋươʔi cẻ tuổʔi fảʔi làmsaw cɔ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ dượk cɔŋsạc fảʔi kẩntʰận tʰeo lờʔi cúʔa tôʔi hếtlòŋ kầʔu cúʔa cớ dể tôʔi lạk kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa tôʔi dã ɣiấʔu lờʔi cúʔa cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ fạmtộʔi kùŋ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê dáŋ ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi sin zạʔi tôʔi kák ŋàʔi tôʔi lấʔi môʔi tʰuật lạʔi kák mạŋ lịɲ miệŋ cúʔa fán za tôʔi vuimừŋ dườŋ cứŋkớ cúʔa ɲưtʰể vuimừŋ kủʔakảʔi tôʔi swiɣẫm ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa căm sɛm dườŋlốʔi kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi ưʔatʰíc cúʔa sẽ cẳŋ kwên lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa sincúʔa làɲ cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa dể tôʔi dượk sốŋ tʰì tôʔi ɣiữ lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa sincúʔa tôʔi dể tôʔi tʰấʔi sự lạlùŋ cɔŋ luậtfáp kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi ŋườʔi xác cên dất sin cớ ɣiấʔu tôʔi kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa liɲhồn tôʔi hawmòn mɔŋướk kák mạŋ lịɲ cúʔa cúʔa kwởcác kiêʔuŋạʔɔ là dáŋ zủʔasả hăj lầmlạk kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa sin xỏʔi tôʔi sỉɲụk xiɲzể vì tôʔi ɣìŋiữ kák cứŋkớ kủʔa cúʔa vwɛcúʔa kũŋ ŋồʔi ŋịluận ŋịc tôʔi sɔŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa swiɣẫm cúʔa kák cứŋkớ cúʔa lạk tôʔi tứklà ɲữŋ mưʔusĩ tôʔi liɲhồn tôʔi zíɲ vàʔɔ bụʔi dất sin hãʔi xiến tôʔi sốŋ lạʔi tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi cúʔa tôʔi dã vớʔi cúʔa dườŋlốʔi tôʔi cúʔa dáp lờʔi tôʔi sin hãʔi zạʔi tôʔi kák cúʔa kầʔucúʔa cɔ tôʔi hiểʔubiết kɔn dườŋ ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa tʰì tôʔi swiɣẫm kák kôŋviệk lạlùŋ kủʔa cúʔa liɲhồn tôʔi ưʔusầʔu cảʔi ɣiọt sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi vữŋbền tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi cúʔa sin hãʔi zaŋ sa tôʔicɔn dườŋ zốʔicá làmơn cɔ tôʔi luậtfáp cúʔa tôʔi dã cọn kɔn dườŋ tʰàɲ mạŋ lịɲ cúʔa cướk tôʔi tôʔi cíʔu kák cứŋkớ cúʔa Ðứkzê ôʔi sin cớ cɔ tôʔi hổtʰẹn xicúʔa mởzộŋ lòŋ tôʔi tʰì tôʔi cạʔi tʰeo kɔn dườŋ diềʔu zăn cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê sin cỉ zạʔi tôʔicɔn dườŋ cúʔa tʰì tôʔi ɣiữ lấʔi cɔdến kuốʔicùŋ sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ tʰì tôʔi vâŋ tʰeo luậtfáp cúʔa ʔaét hếtlòŋ ɣìŋiữ lấʔi sin hãʔi xiến tôʔi di cɔŋ dườŋ diềʔu zăn cúʔa vì tôʔi lấʔilàm vujvẻ tạʔi dó sin hãʔi xiến lòŋ tôʔi hướŋ cứŋkớ cúʔa cớ dừŋ hướŋ tʰamlam sin sâʔi tôʔi xỏʔi sɛm ɲữŋ hưxôŋ làm tôʔi dượk sốŋ cɔŋ kák dườŋlốʔi cúʔa sincúʔa ứŋŋiệm lờʔi cúʔa cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa tứklà kíɲ cúʔa sin hãʔi kất xỏʔi tôʔi sỉɲụk tôʔi vì mạŋ lịɲ cúʔa tốtlàɲ kìʔa tôʔi mɔŋướk kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa sin hãʔi xiến
