tôʔi dượk sốŋ cɔŋ kôŋbìɲ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋwiện ɲơn ŋàʔi dếnkùŋ tôʔi tứklà kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi tùʔi lờʔi fán ŋàʔi vậʔi tôʔi kó tʰế dáp lạʔi kùŋ sỉɲụk tôʔi vì tôʔi tinkậʔi nơʔi lờʔi cúʔa sin cớ kất hếtlờʔi cơn tʰật xỏʔi miệŋ tôʔi vì tôʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi mạŋ lịɲ cúʔa tôʔi hằŋ ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp cúʔɛcɔ dến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ tôʔi kũŋ bướkdi tʰɔŋzɔŋ vì dã kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa kũŋ nóʔi cứŋkớ cúʔa cướk kák vwa xôŋ fảʔi kỡ cút nàʔɔ tôʔi vujvẻ diềʔu zăn cúʔa là diềʔu zăn tôʔi ʔiêʔumến tôʔi kũŋ ɣiơ tăj hướŋ diềʔu zăn cúʔa tôʔi ʔiêʔumến và swiɣẫm kák cúʔa sincúʔa ɲớ lạʔi lờʔi cúʔa fán cɔ tôʔitớ cúʔa vìcúʔa xiến tôʔi côŋkậʔi lờʔicúʔa cɔ tôʔi dượk sốŋ lạʔi Ấʔilà ʔanủʔi tôʔi cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn kẻ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ɲạʔɔbáŋ tôʔi ɲiềʔu kwá ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ sâʔi luậtfáp cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi dã ɲớ lạʔi mạŋ lịɲ ŋàʔi xi sưʔa nên tôʔi dượk ʔanủʔi ɲơn ák luậtfáp cúʔa kơn ɣiận nóŋnảʔi tôʔi kák cúʔa bàʔi tôʔi tạʔi ɲà tôʔi làmxác hỡʔiÐứkzê bandêm tôʔi ɲớ lạʔi zɛɲ ŋàʔi kũŋ ɣìŋiữ luậtfáp ŋàʔi fần tôʔi dã dượk là tôʔi kó ɣìŋiữ kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê fần kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi dã nóʔi ɣìŋiữ lờʔi cúʔa tôʔi dã hếtlòŋ kầʔuxẩn cúʔa sin hãʔi tʰươŋsót tôʔi tùʔi lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi tưtưởŋ dườŋlốʔi tôʔi bèn cở bướk tôʔi cứŋkớ cúʔa tôʔi lậtdật xôŋ cậmcễ mà ɣìŋiữ kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa zâʔi ák dã vươŋvấn tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ kwên luậtfáp cúʔa ɲơn kák mạŋ lịɲ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi tʰứk zậʔi ɣiữʔa dêm dặŋ kảmtạ cúʔa tôʔi bạɲữʔu kủʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi kíɲ cúʔa và kủʔa mọʔi ɣiữ tʰeo kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê dất dượk dầʔizẫʔi ɲơn ŋàʔi sin hãʔi zạʔi tôʔi kák ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi dã hậʔudãʔi tôʔitớ ŋàʔi tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi sin hãʔi zạʔi tôʔi lẽfảʔi hiểʔubiết vì tôʔi kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa cướk xi cưʔa hɔạnnạn tʰì tôʔi lầmlạk ɲưŋ bâʔizờ tôʔi ɣìŋiữ lờʔi cúʔa cúʔa tʰiện hăj làmlàɲ sin hãʔi zạʔi tôʔi kák cúʔa kẻ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dã dặt lờʔi nóʔizốʔi hạʔi tôʔi tôʔi hếtlòŋ ɣìŋiữ ɣiềŋmốʔi kủʔa cúʔa lòŋ cúŋnó zàʔi ɲư kòn tôʔi ưʔatʰíc luậtfáp kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi dã hɔạnnạn tʰật lấʔilàm fảʔi hầʔu cɔ họk tʰeo kủʔa cúʔa luậtfáp kủʔa miệŋ cúʔa fán kwí cɔ tôʔi hơn hằŋ ŋàn dồŋ vàŋ bạk bàntăj cúʔa dã tôʔi hìɲ tôʔi sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi cí hiểʔu dể tôʔi họk diềʔu zăn cúʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kíɲ cúʔa tʰấʔi tôʔi vujvẻ vì tôʔi côŋkậʔi lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi zằŋ sétdɔán kủʔa ŋàʔi kôŋbìɲ và ấʔilà bởʔi tʰàɲ ŋàʔi cɔ tôʔi xổ cúʔa ơʔi ŋwiện ɲơn cúʔa ʔanủʔi tôʔi ʔiɲư cúʔa dã fán kùŋ tôʔitớ cúʔa ŋwiện tʰươŋsót cúʔa dếnkùŋ tôʔi dể tôʔi dượk sốŋ vì luậtfáp cúʔa diềʔu tôʔi ưʔatʰíc ŋwiện kiêʔuŋạʔɔ hổtʰẹn cúŋnó zùŋ ɣiảzốʔi dáɲdổ tôʔi sɔŋ tôʔi swiɣẫm kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa ŋwiện ɲữŋ kíɲ cúʔɛcở lạʔi kùŋ tôʔi tʰì cứŋkớ kủʔa cúʔa ŋwiện lòŋ tôʔi dượk cọnvẹn cɔŋ kák cúʔa hầʔu cɔ tôʔi xôŋ hổtʰẹn liɲhồn tôʔi hawmòn mɔŋướk kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa sɔŋ tôʔi côŋkậʔi lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa mắt tôʔi hawmòn mɔŋướk lờʔi cúʔa tôʔi nóʔi bawzờ cúʔa ʔanủʔi tôʔi vì tôʔi cởtʰàɲ ɲư bầʔu za xóʔi dóŋ dɛn ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ kwên kák cúʔa số kák ŋàʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa dượk bawɲiêʔu cừŋ nàʔɔ cúʔa dɔán sét ɲữŋ tôʔi kẻ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dã dàʔɔ hạʔi tôʔi là việk cẳŋ tʰeo luậtfáp kủʔa cúʔa kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa tʰàɲ tʰiêɲạ zùŋ ɣiảzốʔi tôʔi sin cúʔa ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi tʰiếʔudiềʔu cúŋnó ziệt tôʔi xỏʔi mặtdất ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ lìʔabỏ kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi dượk sốŋ tùʔi tʰeo ɲơn cúʔa tʰì tôʔi ɣìŋiữ cứŋkớ kủʔa miệŋ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê lờʔi ŋàʔi dượk vữŋ dờʔidờʔi cên cờʔi sự tʰàɲ cúʔa kòn dờʔi nầʔi dến dờʔi kiə cúʔa dã cáʔidất dất kòn vữŋbền tùʔi tʰeo mạŋ lịɲ cúʔa kák diềʔu dó kòn vữŋ dến ŋàʔinăj vì dềʔu hầʔu việk cúʔa nên luậtfáp cúʔa xôŋ tôʔi ưʔatʰíc ʔaét tôʔi dã ziệtvɔŋ cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn tôʔi cẳŋ kwên ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa vì ɲờ dó cúʔa cɔ tôʔi dượk sốŋ tôʔi tʰuộk cúʔa sin hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi vì tôʔi kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa ɲữŋ ák zìɲ ɣiết tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi cămcỉ kák cứŋkớ cúʔa tôʔi dã tʰấʔi kùŋtận kủʔa mọʔi cọnvẹn sɔŋ luậtfáp cúʔa lấʔilàm zộŋ tʰăj tôʔi ʔiêʔumến luậtfáp cúʔa biếtbaw cọn ŋàʔi tôʔi swiɣẫm luậtfáp ấʔi kák diềʔu zăn cúʔa cɔ tôʔi xônŋwan tʰùŋịc tôʔi vì kák diềʔu zăn ấʔi kùŋ tôʔi tôʔi kó cí hiểʔu hếttʰảʔi zạʔi tôʔi vì tôʔi swiɣẫm kák cứŋkớ cúʔa tôʔi tʰôŋiểʔu ɣiàkả vì kó ɣìŋiữ kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa tôʔi ɣiữ cơn tôʔi xỏʔi mọʔi dườŋ ɣìŋiữ lờʔi sáŋ vìvậʔi tôʔi ɣét mọʔi dườŋ ɣiảzốʔi lờʔicúʔa ŋọn dèn cɔ cơn tôʔi Áɲsáŋ cɔ dườŋlốʔi tôʔi tôʔi dã tʰề ɣìŋiữ mạŋ lịɲ kôŋbìɲ kủʔa cúʔa và kũŋ dã tʰeo tʰề sốŋ cớ dể tôʔi hổtʰẹn côŋkậʔi tôʔi sin hãʔi nâŋdỡ tôʔi tʰì tôʔi dượk bìɲanvôsự kũŋ tʰườŋtʰườŋ cămcỉ kák kủʔa cúʔa cúʔa từcốʔi ɲữŋ lầmlạk cúʔa vì kủʔa cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi ɣần kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi cơn tʰật kứ tʰeo cứŋkớ cúʔatôʔi dã lâʔu zằŋ cúʔa kák diềʔu zăn ấʔi dến dờʔidờʔi sin hãʔi sɛm nỗʔi xổ luậtfáp cúʔa dượk bìɲiên cẳŋ kó ɣì ɣâʔi cɔ saŋã hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi kó côŋkậʔi nơʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi và tʰeo kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi liɲhồn tôʔi dã ɣìŋiữ cứŋkớ cúʔa tôʔi ʔiêʔumến cứŋkớ ấʔi ɲiềʔu tôʔi kó ɣìŋiữ ɣiềŋmốʔi cứŋkớ cúʔa bởʔivì dườŋlốʔi tôʔi dềʔu cướk cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋwiện tiếŋ kêʔu kủʔa tôʔi tʰấʔu dến ŋàʔi sin hỡʔi cɔ tôʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi cúʔa ŋwiện lờʔi kầʔuxẩn tôʔi tʰấʔu dến cướk cúʔa sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi tùʔi tʰeo lờʔi cúʔa ŋwiện môʔi miệŋ tôʔi dồn za ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa vìcúʔa zạʔi tôʔi kák cúʔa ŋwiện lưỡʔi tôʔi hátsướŋ lờʔi cúʔa vì hếttʰảʔi diềʔu zăn cúʔa kôŋbìɲ ŋwiện tăj cúʔa ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi vì tôʔi cọn kák ɣiềŋmốʔi cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi mɔŋướk kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa cúʔa luậtfáp cúʔa tôʔi ưʔatʰíc ŋwiện liɲhồn tôʔi dượk sốŋ tʰì ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa ŋwiện mạŋ lịɲ cúʔa ɣiúpdỡ tôʔi tôʔi siêʔu lạk xáknàʔɔ kɔnciên sin hãʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa vì tôʔi xôŋ kwên diềʔu zăn kủʔa cúʔa cɔŋ kơn zancuân tôʔi kêʔukầʔu Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dáp lờʔi tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi mọʔi zốʔicá xỏʔi lưỡʔi fỉɲ ɣạt lưỡʔi fỉɲ ɣạt ŋườʔita cɔ ŋươʔi ci tʰêm cɔ ŋươʔi diềʔu ɣì nữʔa ʔaét ɲọn kủʔa zõŋ và tʰan dỏ hựk kủʔa kâʔi ɣiêŋ ɣiếŋ xốnnạn cɔ tôʔi tôʔi ŋụ cɔŋ mêsiếk và zướʔi kák cạʔi kêda lâʔu liɲhồn tôʔi cuŋ vớʔi ɣét hòʔabìɲ tôʔi hòʔabìɲ ɲưŋ xi tôʔi nóʔi dến cúŋnó ɣiặkzã tôʔi ŋướk cên núʔi sự cợ tôʔi dến dâʔu sự cợ tôʔi dến Ðứkzê làÐấŋ dã zựŋ cờʔi dất ŋàʔi xôŋ dể cɔ cơn ŋươʔi siêʔu Ðấŋ ɣìŋiữ ŋươʔi xôŋ buồnŋủ Ðấŋ ɣìŋiữ ʔisơzaên xôŋ ɲắp kũŋ xôŋ buồnŋủ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ ɣìŋiữ ŋươʔi Ðứkzê bóŋ cɛ hữʔu ŋươʔi mặtcờʔi xôŋ ɣiọʔi ŋươʔi lúk banŋàʔi mặtcăŋ kũŋ xôŋ hạʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ bandêm Ðứkzê ɣìŋiữ ŋươʔi xỏʔi mọʔi tajhọʔa ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ liɲhồn ŋươʔi Ðứkzê ɣìŋiữ ŋươʔi xi za xi vàʔɔ từ năj cɔdến dờʔidờʔi tôʔi vuimừŋ xi ŋườʔita nóʔi vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ ta hãʔi di dến ɲà Ðứkzê hỡʔizê zusalɛm cơn cúŋta zừŋ lạʔi cɔŋ kák kửʔa ŋươʔi ɣiêzusalɛm káʔi tʰàɲ Ðượk kất vữŋbền ɲăw cỉɲ kák cifáʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê nơʔi ấʔi tùʔi tʰeo tʰườŋlệ cwiền cɔ ʔisơzaên vì tạʔi dó kó kák ŋôʔi dɔán sét tứklà kák ŋôʔi ɲà Ðʔa hãʔi kầʔu hòʔabìɲ cɔ ɣiêzusalɛm fàm nàʔɔ ʔiêʔumến ŋươʔi dượk tʰớʔi tʰạɲ ŋwiện hòʔabìɲ cɔŋ vác tườŋ ŋươʔi sự tʰớʔi tʰạɲ cɔŋ kák kuŋ ŋươʔi vì kớ ʔɛɲɛm bậʔu ta nóʔi zằŋ ŋwiện hòʔabìɲ cɔŋ ŋươʔi ɲơn ɲà ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ta kầʔu fướk cɔ ŋươʔi tôʔi ŋướk hướŋ kùŋ ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐấŋ ŋự cên kák từŋ cờʔi mắt tôʔitớ côŋ nơʔi tăj ôŋ củ mìɲ mắt kɔndòʔi côŋ nơʔi tăj củ mìɲ tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì cúŋtôʔi ŋưỡŋvọŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi tʰể ấʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋàʔi tʰươŋsót cúŋtôʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin tʰươŋsót cúŋtôʔi sin tʰươŋsót cúŋtôʔi vì cúŋtôʔi kwá cán xiɲzể liɲhồn cúŋtôʔi kwá cán sự ɲạʔɔbáŋ kủʔa ʔan zật xiɲzể kủʔa kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ʔisơzaên dáŋ nóʔi nếʔuÐứkzê cẳŋ biɲ vựk cúŋta xi lɔàʔiŋườʔi zấʔi ŋịc cúŋta xi kơn ɣiận nổʔi kùŋ cúŋta nếʔuÐứkzê xôŋ biɲ vựk cúŋta ʔaét cúŋnó dã nuốtsốŋ cúŋta zồʔi nướk cắt dáɲ cìm cúŋta zòŋ càn kwa ŋập liɲhồn cúŋta và ɲữŋ sóŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ côʔi cák liɲhồn cúŋta zồʔi Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰăj ŋàʔi xôŋ fó cúŋta mồʔi cɔ zăŋ cúŋnó liɲhồn cúŋta tʰɔát xỏʔi ɲư cim tʰɔát xỏʔi zập dáɲ cim zập dã zứt cúŋta tʰɔát xỏʔi sự cợ cúŋta cɔŋ zɛɲ Ðứkzê làÐấŋ dã zựŋ cờʔi dất ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tinkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê xáknàʔɔ núʔi siôn xôŋ zúŋdộŋ hằŋ kòn dến dờʔidờʔi kák núʔi vâʔi kwɛɲ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰểnàʔɔ Ðứkzê vâʔi fủ zânsự ŋàʔi tʰể ấʔi từ zàʔi cɔdến dờʔidờʔi vì kâʔi ɣậʔi ák xôŋ dượk dặt cên sảnŋiệp ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ xôŋ dưʔa tăj za zanák hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi diềʔu làɲ cɔ ŋườʔi làɲ và cɔ kó lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ kòn ɲữŋ cở di tʰeo dườŋkɔŋ kwẹʔɔ Ðứkzê zẫn cúŋnó di za cuŋ vớʔi ák ŋwiện bìɲan ɣiáŋ cên ʔisơzaên xiÐứkzê zẫn kák fu kủʔa siôn tʰì cúŋtôʔi xáknàʔɔ ciêmbaw bấʔizờ miệŋ cúŋtôʔi dầʔi vuj kườʔi lưỡʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ bàʔi mừŋzỡ cɔŋ kák zân ŋɔạʔi ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã cɔ ɲữŋ việk Ðứkzê dã cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ việk ɲơn dó cúŋtôʔi vuimừŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin zẫn fu cúŋtôʔi ɲư kák suốʔi cảʔi nướk lạʔi kẻ nàʔɔ zeo ɣiốŋ ɣiọt sẽ ɣặtʰáʔi kác vuimừŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vừʔa di vừʔa xók dɛm ɣiốŋ za zảʔi ʔaét cởvề kác vuimừŋ maŋ lúʔa mìɲ nếʔuÐứkzê xôŋ kất ɲà tʰì ɲữŋ tʰợ sâʔicất ʔuổŋ kôŋ ɲượkbằŋ Ðứkzê xôŋ kɔj ɣiữ tʰàɲ tʰì ŋườʔi kɛɲ tʰứk kɛɲ luốŋ kôŋ ʔuổŋ kôŋ tʰăj cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰứkzậʔi di ŋủ cễ và báɲ lawxổ cúʔa kũŋ ɣiấkŋủ cɔ ŋàʔi ʔiêʔumến bằŋ vậʔi kìʔa kɔnkáʔi kơŋiệp bởʔi Ðứkzê za bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa tửkuŋ fầntʰưởŋ kɔncaj sɛɲ cɔŋ buổʔi daŋ tʰì xáknàʔɔ mũʔitên nơʔi tăj zõŋ fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dầʔi ɣùʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi xôŋ hổtʰẹn xi nóʔinăŋ vớʔi tʰùŋịc mìɲ tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kíɲ Ðứkzê Ðʔi cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi vì ŋươʔi hưởŋ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj mìɲ Ðượk fướk măimắn vợ ŋươʔi cɔŋ ɲàŋươʔi sẽ ɲư kâʔi ɲɔ tʰạɲ mậʔu kɔnkáʔi ŋươʔi cuŋkwɛɲ ŋươʔi xáknàʔɔ ɲữŋ cồʔi livɛ kìʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kíɲ Ðứkzê sẽ dượk fướk ɲưvậʔi ŋwiệnÐứkzê siôn fướk cɔ ŋươʔi ŋwiện cọn dờʔi mìɲ ŋươʔi dượk tʰấʔi fướk làɲ kủʔa ɣiêzusalɛm ŋwiện ŋươʔi dượk tʰấʔi kɔncáʔu mìɲ ŋwiện bìɲan ɣiáŋ cên ʔisơzaên từ xi tôʔi kòn tʰơấʔu cúŋnó tʰườŋ tôʔi ʔisơzaên dáŋ nóʔi từ xi tôʔi kòn tʰơấʔu cúŋnó tʰườŋ tôʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰắŋ tôʔi dượk kák nôŋfu kàʔi cên lưŋ tôʔi sẻ dườŋ kàʔi mìɲ zàʔi tʰeo cên dó Ðứkzê kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi dã cặt ɲữŋ zâʔi ák ŋwiện ɲữŋ ɣét siôn bị hổtʰẹn luj lạʔi săw ŋwiện cúŋnó ɲư kỏ nơʔi nók ɲà xôhéʔɔ cướk xi ɲổ ŋươʔi ɣặt xôŋ dầʔi tăj mìɲ kẻ xôŋ ɣɔm dầʔi mìɲ ɲữŋ lạʔi kwa kũŋ xôŋ nóʔi ŋwiện fướk Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên kák ŋươʔi cúŋta ɲơn zɛɲ Ðứkzê cúk fướk cɔ kák ŋươʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi nơʔi sâʔu tʰẩm tôʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi cúʔa ôʔi sin ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi ŋwiện tôʔi cúʔa lắŋŋɛ tiếŋ nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê nếʔu ŋàʔi kốcấp zanák tʰì cúʔa ôʔi ʔaj kòn sốŋ ɲưŋcúʔa kó lòŋ tʰatʰứ cɔ ŋườʔita kíɲ cúʔa tôʔi côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê liɲhồn tôʔi côŋdợʔi ŋàʔi tôʔi côŋdợʔi lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi liɲhồn tôʔi côŋdợʔi cúʔahơn ŋườʔi líɲ kɛɲ côŋdợʔi sáŋ tʰật ŋườʔi líɲ kɛɲ côŋdợʔi sáŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê vìÐứkzê kó lòŋ ɲơn nơʔiŋàʔi kó kứʔuzỗʔi ɲiềʔu cáɲŋàʔi cuộk ʔisơzaên xỏʔi kák zanák ŋườʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê lòŋ tôʔi xôŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ mắt tôʔi xôŋ tựkaw tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ tìmtòʔi ɲữŋ việk hɔặk ɲữŋ việk kawkỳ kwá cɔ tôʔi tôʔi dã cɔ liɲhồn tôʔi êmzịʔu ʔan tịɲ ɲư kɔncẻ zứt sữʔa mìɲ liɲhồn cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi kũŋɲư kɔncẻ zứt sữʔa vậʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên hãʔi côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê từ bấʔizờ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin ɲớ lạʔi Ðʔa và kák xổ kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰểnàʔɔ ŋườʔi tʰề kùŋ Ðứkzê và hứʔa ŋwiện vớʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ kủʔa zakốp tôʔi xôŋ vàʔɔ cạʔi mìɲ cẳŋ ɣiườŋ tôʔi ŋỉ xôŋ cɔ tôʔi ŋủ kũŋ xôŋ cɔ tôʔi ŋỉ ɲọk cɔdến cừŋ tôʔi dượk cỗ cɔ Ðứkzê một nơʔi cɔ Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ kủʔa zakốp kìʔa cúŋtôʔi kó ŋɛnóʔi zawướk tạʔi fơzát kó dặŋ ấʔi cɔŋ dồŋbằŋ za ʔa cúŋtôʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi ŋàʔi tʰờ lạʔi cướk cơn ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dặŋ vàʔɔ nơʔi ʔanŋỉ ŋàʔi vớʔi năŋlựk ŋàʔi ŋwiện tʰầʔi cúʔa dượk mặk kôŋbìɲ kẻ tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa zeo mừŋ vì kớ Ðʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa sin cớ sôdẩʔi dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa cúʔa Ðứkzê dã tʰề kwiết vớʔi Ðʔa ŋàʔi kũŋ cẳŋ bộʔi zằŋ ta dặt cên ŋôʔi ŋươʔi kɔnŋươʔi sɛɲ za nếʔu kɔnkáʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữ zawướk và ɲữŋ cứŋkớ zạʔi cɔ cúŋnó tʰì kɔnkáʔi cúŋnó kũŋ ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi ŋươʔi dến dờʔidờʔi vìÐứkzê dã côn siôn ŋàʔi ướk siôn nơʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðâʔi nơʔi ʔanŋỉ dờʔidờʔi ta ŋụ dâʔi kó ướkaw ɲưtʰế ta fướk cɔ lươŋtʰựk siôn dượk zưzật cɔ ɲữŋ ŋèʔɔ kủʔa tʰàɲ ấʔi dượk báɲ nɔnê ta kũŋ mặk kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ tʰầʔi tʰàɲ ấʔi và kák tʰáɲ zeo mừŋ tạʔi dó xiến sừŋ Ðʔa dâm cồʔi ta dã sắmsửʔa ŋọn dèn cɔ dấŋ cịʔu sứk zầʔu kủʔa ta lấʔi hổtʰẹn mặk cɔ tʰùŋịc ŋườʔi kòn mãʔɔ ciềʔu ŋườʔi zựkzỡ cên dầʔu ŋườʔi kìʔa ʔɛɲɛm hòʔatʰuận ɲăw tʰật tốtdẹp tʰăj Ấʔi xáknàʔɔ zầʔu kwíɣiá dổ za cên dầʔu cảʔi suốŋ zâʔu tứk zâʔu kủʔa ʔazôn cảʔi dến côn áʔɔ ŋườʔi lạʔi xáknàʔɔ sươŋmók hẹtmôn sa suốŋ kák núʔi siôn vì tạʔi dó Ðứkzê dã fướk tứklà sốŋ cɔdến dờʔidờʔi hỡʔi kák tôʔitớ Ðứkzê bandêm dứŋ tạʔi ɲà ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hãʔi ɣiơ tăj hướŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ và ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋwiệnÐứkzê Ðấŋ zựŋ cờʔidất từsi fướk cɔ ŋươʔi halêluza hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ Ðứkzê hỡʔi kák tôʔitớ Ðứkzê là dứŋ cɔŋ ɲà Ðứkzê tạʔi hàɲlaŋ kủʔa ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê Ðứkzê tʰiện xá ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ ŋàʔi ấʔilà vuj vìÐứkzê dã cọn zakốp cɔ mìɲ lấʔi ʔisơzaên kơŋiệp zằŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi tôʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê cúʔa cúŋtôʔi cổʔi kaw kák tʰần Ðʔiềʔu nàʔɔ dẹp Ðứkzê ŋàʔi diềʔu ấʔi hɔặk cên cờʔi zướʔi dất cɔŋ hăjlà cɔŋ kák vựk sâʔu ŋàʔi xiến mâʔi băj nơʔi kùŋ dầʔu dất làm cớp ɲɔáŋ tʰeo mưʔa xiến ɣió za kák xɔtàŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dáɲ ɣiết kák kɔn dầʔulòŋ sứ zíptô từ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cɔdến lɔàʔi tʰúvật saj dến ɣiữʔa zíptô ɲữŋ zấʔu fép hạʔifa zaôn hếttʰảʔi kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi kũŋ dáɲbạʔi zântộk và ɣiết kák vwa mạɲmẽ từ sihôn vwa zân ʔamôzít ʔɔùk vwa basan và hếttʰảʔi vwa sứ kanaan ŋàʔi sứ cúŋnó sảnŋiệp cɔ ʔisơzaên zânsự ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê zɛɲ ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi kỷniệm ŋàʔi cảʔi kwadờʔi nầʔi dến dờʔi kiə vìÐứkzê dɔán sét zânsự ŋàʔi và dổʔi việk ɲữŋ tôʔitớ ŋàʔi hìɲtượŋ kủʔa kák zân bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ là kôŋviệk tăj lɔàʔiŋườʔi za hìɲtượŋ kó miệŋ xôŋ nóʔi kó cẳŋ tʰấʔi kó taj xôŋ ŋɛ và miệŋ xôŋ hơʔi tʰở fàm nàʔɔ hìɲtượŋ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi Ðềʔu ɣiốŋ ɲư hỡʔi ɲà ʔisơzaên hãʔi cúktụŋ Ðứkzê hỡʔi ɲà ʔazôn hãʔi cúktụŋ Ðứkzê hỡʔi ɲà lêvi hãʔi cúktụŋ Ðứkzê hỡʔi kák ŋườʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê xá cúktụŋ Ðứkzê Ðáŋ siôn cúktụŋ Ðứkzê làÐấŋ ŋự tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm halêluza hãʔi kảmtạ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi tʰiện sự ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi hãʔi kảmtạ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák tʰần vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi hãʔi kảmtạ cúʔa kủʔa cúʔa vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi cỉ mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi kák fép lớnlaw vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi dã ɲờ xôn sáŋ zựŋ kák từŋ cờʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi cươŋ dất za cên kák nướk vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi zựŋ ɲữŋ sáŋ vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi mặtcờʔi dặŋ kaicị banŋàʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi mặtcăŋ kák ŋôʔisaw dặŋ kaicị bandêm vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi dã dáɲ ɣiết kák kɔn dầʔulòŋ sứ zíptô vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi Ðʔɛm ʔisơzaên za xỏʔi ɣiữʔa cúŋnó vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi zùŋ káɲtăj kwiềnnăŋ ɣiơ tʰẳŋ za vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi fân biển dỏ za haj vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi xiến ʔisơzaên di kwa ɣiữʔa ấʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi sôfa zaôn kả dạʔɔ biɲ ŋườʔi suốŋ biển dỏ vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi zẫn zânsự ŋàʔi kwa dồŋ vắŋ vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi Ðáɲ bạʔi kák vwa vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi Ðáɲ ɣiết ɲữŋ vwa kó zɛɲ vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi tứklà vwa zân ʔamôzít vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi vàʔɔùk vwa basan vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi sứ cúŋnó sảnŋiệp vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi tứk sảnŋiệp cɔ ʔisơzaên tôʔitớ ŋàʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi ɲớ dến bựk cúŋtôʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi kừʔudịc vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ŋàʔi kũŋ dồăn cɔ mọʔi lɔàʔi sáktʰịt vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi hãʔi kảmtạ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi vì ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi cúŋtôʔi dươŋ ŋồʔi cên sôŋ babilôn bèn ɲớ lạʔi siôn xók cúŋtôʔi ceo dờn kầm cúŋtôʔi cên kâʔi zươŋliễʔu kủʔa sôŋ ấʔi vì dó ɲữŋ cúŋtôʔi fu kó biểʔu cúŋtôʔi hátsướŋ kẻkướp ɣiựt cúŋtôʔi kó dòʔi cúŋtôʔi mừŋ zằŋ hãʔi cɔ cúŋta bàʔi ka kủʔa siôn cên dất ŋɔạʔibaŋ cúŋtôʔi làmsaw dượk bàʔi ka kủʔa Ðứkzê hỡʔizê zusalɛm nếʔu kwên ŋươʔi ŋwiện tăj hữʔu kwên tàʔinăŋ di nếʔu xôŋ ɲớ dến ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰíc ɣiêzusalɛm sự vujvẻ ɲất kủʔa ŋwiện lưỡʔi zíɲ nơʔi ổɣà hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɲớ lạʔi kák kɔnkáʔi dôm cɔŋ ŋàʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cúŋnó nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi hủʔihɔạʔi hãʔi hủʔihɔạʔi cɔdến di kɔŋáʔi babilôn fảʔi ziệt fướk cɔ ŋườʔi báʔɔ cả ŋươʔi tùʔi tʰeo diềʔu ák ŋươʔi dã cɔ cúŋta fướk cɔ ŋườʔi kɔnɲỏ ŋươʔi Ðʔɛm cà cúŋnó nơʔi dá tôʔi hếtlòŋ kảmtạ cúʔa hát ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa cướk kák tʰần tôʔi tʰờ lạʔi hướŋ dền tʰáɲ kủʔa cúʔa kảmtạ zɛɲ cúʔa ɲơn cơn tʰật kủʔa cúʔa vìcúʔa dã cɔ lờʔi cúʔa dượk kaw hơn kả zɛɲ tʰiɲ cúʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu cúʔa dáp lạʔi ɣiụk lòŋ tôʔi mạɲmẽ hỡʔiÐứkzê kák vwa tʰếzan kảmtạ ŋàʔi vì dã ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ ŋàʔi fảʔi hátsướŋ dườŋlốʔi Ðứkzê vì viɲhiển Ðứkzê tʰăj zầʔuÐứkzê kawkả tʰì kũŋ dɔáʔi dến ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ŋàʔi ɲậnbiết sa zẫʔu tôʔi di ɣiữʔa zancuân cúʔa cɔ tôʔi dượk sốŋ ɣiơ tăj cúʔa za cốŋcả kơn ɣiận kủʔa tʰùŋịc tôʔi và tăj hữʔu cúʔa kứʔu tôʔi Ðứkzê sɔŋ việk tʰuộk tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ɲơn ŋàʔi kòn dến dờʔidờʔi sin cớ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi dã zòsét tôʔi tôʔi cúʔa xi tôʔi ŋồʔi lúk tôʔi dứŋzậʔi từ sa cúʔa hiểʔubiết ýtưởŋ tôʔi cúʔa sétnét nẻʔɔ dàŋ ŋủ tôʔi kwɛnbiết kák dườŋlốʔi tôʔi vì lờʔi cưʔa cên lưỡʔi tôʔi kìʔa hỡʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã cọn zồʔi cúʔa bawfủ tôʔi fíʔa săw fíʔa cướk tăj cúʔa cên mìɲ tôʔi sự citʰứk zườŋ ấʔi tʰật ziệʔukỳ kwá cɔ tôʔi kaw dến dổʔi tôʔi xôŋ vớʔi tôʔi di dâʔu sa tʰầncúʔa tôʔi cốn dâʔu xỏʔi cúʔa nếʔu tôʔi cờʔi cúʔa tạʔi dó ví tôʔi zướʔi fủ kìʔa cúʔa kũŋ kó dó ɲượkbằŋ tôʔi lấʔi káɲ hừŋ dôŋ băj kwa tạʔi kuốʔicùŋ tạʔi dó tăj cúʔa kũŋ zẫnzắt tôʔi tăj hữʔu cúʔa ɣiữ tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi nóʔi sự tốʔităm cắk cɛxuất tôʔi Áɲsáŋ cuŋkwɛɲ tôʔi cởnên dêmtốʔi tʰì cíɲsự tốʔităm xôŋtʰể ɣiấʔu ci xỏʔi cúʔa bandêm sɔj sáŋ ɲư banŋàʔi và tốʔităm kũŋɲư áɲsáŋ cɔ cúʔa vì cíɲ cúʔa tâmtʰần tôʔi zệt tʰàɲ tôʔi cɔŋ lòŋ tôʔi tôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa tôʔi dượk zựŋ kác dáŋsợ lạlùŋ kôŋviệk cúʔa tʰật lạlùŋ lòŋ tôʔi zõ xi tôʔi dượk zựŋ cɔŋ nơʔi cịʔu kác sảʔɔ lạʔi nơʔi tʰấp kủʔa dất tʰì kák sươŋkốt tôʔi xôŋ ɣiấʔu dượk cúʔa mắtcúʔa dã tʰấʔi tʰểcất vôhìɲ kủʔa tôʔi số kák ŋàʔi dịɲ cɔ tôʔi vàʔɔsổ cúʔa cướk xi cưʔa kó ŋàʔi cɔŋ kák ŋàʔi ấʔi hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák tưtưởŋ cúʔa kwíbáʔu cɔ tôʔi tʰăj số kák tưtưởŋ ấʔi tʰật tʰăj nếʔu tôʔi dếm kák tưtưởŋ ấʔi tʰì ɲiềʔu kát xi tôʔi tỉɲ tʰứk tôʔi kòn kuŋ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúʔa ɣiết ák hỡʔi ŋườʔi hwiết hãʔi di xỏʔi cúŋnó nóʔi ŋịc cúʔa kác fớm fỉɲ kẻtʰù ŋịc cúʔa lấʔi zɛɲ cúʔa cơʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi cẳŋ ɣét ɲữŋ ɣét cúʔa há cẳŋ ɣớmɣiếk ɲữŋ zấʔi ŋịc cúʔa saw tôʔi ɣét cúŋnó tʰậtlà ɣét kầm cúŋnó bằŋ tʰùŋịc tôʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ơʔi sin hãʔi casét tôʔi lòŋ tôʔi hãʔi tʰửtʰác tôʔi tưtưởŋ tôʔi sin sɛm tʰử tôʔi kó lốʔi ák nàʔɔ căŋ sin zắt tôʔi vàʔɔ kɔn dườŋ dờʔidờʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi ák bảʔɔhộ tôʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi huŋbạʔɔ là twan mưʔu ák nơʔi lòŋ hằŋ ŋàʔi cúŋnó lạʔi dặŋ cɛɲ ciến cúŋnó màʔi ɲọn lưỡʔi mìɲ ɲư zắn kó nọkdộk zắn cɔŋ môʔi mìɲ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɣiữ tôʔi xỏʔi tăj ák bảʔɔhộ tôʔi xỏʔi ŋườʔi huŋbạʔɔ là twan mưʔu bướk tôʔi vấpŋã ɲữŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dã ɣàʔi bẫʔi căŋ zâʔi cɔ tôʔi ɣiươŋ lướʔi zọk zàʔi tʰeo dườŋ cúŋnó kũŋ dặtvòŋ ɣàʔi tôʔi tôʔi tʰưʔa kùŋ Ðứkzê zằŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔi hỡʔicúʔazê sứklựk kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi cúʔa cɛcở dầʔu tôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ciếncận hỡʔiÐứkzê sin cớ ứŋ hɔàn ướkaw ák cớ ɣiúp tʰàɲ mưʔukế ʔɛ tựkaw căŋ ŋwiện zanák kủʔa môʔi ɲữŋ vâʔi tôʔi bawfủ dầʔu cúŋnó ŋwiện tʰan lửʔa dỏ dổ cên cúŋnó ŋwiện cúŋnó kwăŋ vàʔɔ lửʔa cɔŋ nướk sâʔu cẳŋ kất zậʔi dượk nữʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó lưỡʔi zancá cẳŋ dượk vữŋ cɔŋ sứ tajhọʔa duổʔi tʰeo huŋbạʔɔ dặŋ dáɲdổ tôʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê biɲ vựk zwiênkớ xổ Ðʔɔán sét kôŋbìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔutʰốn ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kảmtạ zɛɲ cúʔa ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ cướk cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi dã kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi sin măw măw dếnkùŋ tôʔi xi tôʔi kêʔukầʔu ŋàʔi sin hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi ŋwiện lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi tʰấʔu dến cướk cúʔa ɲư hươŋ ŋwiện ɣiơ tăj tôʔi dượk ɣiốŋ ɲư kủʔa buổʔi ciềʔu hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ɣiữ miệŋ tôʔi và kɛɲ kửʔa môʔi tôʔi sin cớ dể lòŋ tôʔi hướŋ diềʔu ɣì sấʔusa Ðặŋ làmviệk ák vớʔi ák ŋwiện tôʔi xôŋ ŋɔn kủʔa cúŋnó ŋwiện ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dáɲ tôʔi ấʔilà ŋwiện ŋườʔi sửʔa zạʔi tôʔi ấʔi xáknàʔɔ zầʔu cên dầʔu Ðầʔu tôʔi xôŋ từcốʔi vì zẫʔu cɔŋ xi cúŋnó ák tôʔi kứ kầʔuŋwiện kák kwan sét cúŋnó suốŋ dá họ ŋɛ lờʔi tôʔi lờʔi tôʔi êmzịʔu hàʔicốt cúŋtôʔi zảʔizák nơʔi kửʔa âmfủ xáknàʔɔ xi ŋườʔita kàʔi zuộŋ tác dất za cúʔazê ôʔi tôʔi ŋưỡŋvọŋ cúʔa tôʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi cúʔa sin cớ lìʔabỏ liɲhồn tôʔi kầʔucúʔa ɣiữ tôʔi xỏʔi bẫʔi cúŋnó dã ɣàʔi tôʔi và xỏʔi vòŋ ák ŋwiện ák vàʔɔ cáɲ lướʔi kòn tôʔi tʰì dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi tôʔi kấttiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kùŋ Ðứkzê tôʔi kấttiếŋ kầʔuxẩn Ðứkzê cướk ŋàʔi tôʔi dổ tʰantʰở tôʔi bàʔitỏ zannan tôʔi xi naw cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi tʰìcúʔa dã nẻʔɔ dàŋ tôʔi cên kɔn dườŋ tôʔi di cúŋnó ɣàʔi kaj bẫʔi sincúʔa ɲìn fíʔa hữʔu tôʔi kɔj cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɲậnbiết tôʔi tôʔi kũŋ xôŋ kó nơʔi nàʔɔ dể nươŋnáʔu mìɲ cẳŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hỏʔitʰăm liɲhồn tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi kêʔukầʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi mà zằŋ ŋàʔi nơʔi nươŋnáʔu kủʔa tôʔi fần tôʔi cɔŋ dất sốŋ sincúʔa lắŋŋɛ tiếŋ tôʔi vì tôʔi xốnxổ vôkùŋ sin hãʔi kứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tôʔi vì cúŋnó mạɲ tôʔi sin hãʔi zút liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi ŋụk xám tôʔi kảmtạ zɛɲ cúʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ vâʔi kwɛɲ tôʔi bởʔivì cúʔa cɔ tôʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện tôʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ nàʔisin kủʔa tôʔi ɲơn tʰàɲ kôŋbìɲ cúʔa sin hãʔi dáp lạʔi tôʔi sin cớ dɔán sét tôʔitớ cúʔa vì cướk cúʔa cẳŋ ŋườʔi sốŋ nàʔɔ dượk sưŋ kôŋbìɲ kẻtʰù ŋịc dã duổʔi tʰeo liɲhồn tôʔi ɣiàʔidạp mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi zướʔi dất nó cɔ tôʔi fảʔi nơʔi tốʔităm xáknàʔɔ dã cết lâʔu zồʔi vìvậʔi tʰầnliɲ tôʔi naw tấmlòŋ sầʔunãʔɔ cɔŋ mìɲ tôʔi tôʔi ɲớ lạʔi kák ŋàʔisưʔa tưởŋ dến mọʔi việk cúʔa dã và swiɣẫm kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj cúʔa tôʔi ɣiơ tăj hướŋ cúʔa lòŋ tôʔi xátxaw cúʔa ɲư dất xôxan vậʔi Ðứkzê ôʔi sin măw măw dáp lờʔi tôʔi tʰầnliɲ tôʔi naw sin cớ ɣiấʔu cúʔa kùŋ tôʔi ʔɛ tôʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư suốŋ hwiệt căŋ vừʔa buổʔisáŋ sin cɔ tôʔi ŋɛ ɲơn cúʔa vì tôʔi dể lòŋ côŋkậʔi nơʔi cúʔa sin cỉ cɔ tôʔi kɔn dườŋ fảʔi di vì liɲhồn tôʔi ŋưỡŋvọŋ cúʔa hỡʔiÐứkzê sin ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi xỏʔi tʰùŋịc tôʔi cạʔi nươŋnáʔu mìɲ nơʔi ŋàʔi sin zạʔi tôʔi tʰeo cúʔa vìcúʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ŋwiệntʰần tốtlàɲ kủʔa cúʔa dến tôʔi vàʔɔ dất bằŋ tʰẳŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê kớ zɛɲ ŋàʔi sin hãʔi cɔ tôʔi dượk sốŋ ɲờ kôŋbìɲ ŋàʔi sin hãʔi zút liɲhồn tôʔi xỏʔi zancuân ɲờ ɲơn cúʔa sin hãʔi ziệt tʰùŋịc tôʔi và hủʔihɔạʔi ɲữŋ tôʔi vì tôʔi tôʔitớ cúʔa Ðáŋ ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê tʰăj dá tôʔi ŋàʔi zạʔi tăj tôʔi dáɲ ɣiặk tập ŋóntăj tôʔi cɛɲdấʔu ŋàʔi ɲơn tôʔi dồnlũʔi tôʔi nơʔi ẩnnáʔu kaw kủʔa tôʔi Ðấŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi kũŋ káʔi xiên tôʔi nơʔi tôʔi ɲư bóŋbăj kwa hỡʔiÐứkzê sin hãʔi kák từŋ cờʔi ɣiáŋ suốŋ Ðụŋ dến núʔi tʰì núʔi sôŋ xóʔi sin hãʔi fát cớpɲɔáŋ lạk tʰùŋịc bắn cúʔa cɔ cúŋnó lạk dườŋ kầʔucúʔa hãʔi ɣiơ tăj za cên kaw ɣiảʔicứʔu tôʔi tôʔi xỏʔi nướk sâʔu kùŋ xỏʔi tăj ŋɔạʔibaŋ miệŋ cúŋnó buôŋ diềʔu zốʔi ɣạt tăj hữʔu cúŋnó tăj hữʔu láʔɔsượk hỡʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi hátsướŋ cɔ cúʔa bàʔi ka mớʔi lấʔi dờn kầm mườʔi zâʔi ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa cúʔa kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ kák vwa ɣiảʔicứʔu Ðʔa tôʔitớ cúʔa xỏʔi tʰɛɲ ɣươm tàɲạʔi sin ɣiảʔi tôʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj ŋɔạʔibaŋ miệŋ cúŋnó buôŋ diềʔu zốʔi ɣạt tăj hữʔu cúŋnó tăj hữʔu láʔɔsượk ŋwiện kák kɔncaj cúŋtôʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi dươŋ mọk mạɲmẽ ŋwiện kák kɔŋáʔi cúŋtôʔi ɲư dá ɣók ɲà cạm tʰeo lốʔi kiểʔu kủʔa dền ŋwiện xɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk dầʔizẫʔi kó dủ kák tʰứ lươŋtʰựk ŋwiện ciên cúŋtôʔi sɛɲ hằŋ ŋàn hằŋ cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ cúŋtôʔi ŋwiện káʔi cúŋtôʔi sɛɲ dẻ ɲiềʔu ŋwiện cớ kó ciệtʰạ za sôŋ dáɲ hăjlà tiếŋ hãʔi cɔŋ kák hàŋfố cúŋtôʔi fướk cɔ zân nàʔɔ dượk kwaŋkảɲ ɲưvậʔi fướk cɔ zân nàʔɔ kó ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ hỡʔivwa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi kaw ŋàʔi cúktụŋ zɛɲ ŋàʔi dến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ hằŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi cúktụŋ cúʔa ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ cúʔa dến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ Ðứkzê dáŋ ŋợʔixɛn tʰăj sự kawkả ŋàʔi xôŋtʰể zòsét dượk zòŋzõʔi nầʔi katụŋ kôŋviệk cúʔa cɔ zòŋzõʔi kiə và zaw cwiền việk kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa cúʔa tôʔi swiɣẫm tônviɲ waiŋi zựkzỡ kủʔa cúʔa và kôŋviệk lạlùŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋườʔita nóʔi za năŋlựk việk dáŋ kiɲ kủʔa cúʔa kòn tôʔi zaw cwiền kawkả kủʔa cúʔa ŋườʔita cwiền za ɲơn kủʔa cúʔa và kôŋbìɲ cúʔa Ðứkzê hăj kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót cậm nóŋzận dầʔi ɲơn Ðứkzê làmlàɲ cɔ ŋườʔi sự ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ cên kák ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê kák kôŋviệk ŋàʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi kũŋ cúktụŋ ŋàʔi họ nóʔi viɲhiển nướk cúʔa tʰuật lạʔi kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa cúʔa Ðặŋ za cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi việk kwiềnnăŋ kủʔa cúʔa và viɲhiển waiŋi kủʔa nướk ŋàʔi nướkcúʔa nướk kó dờʔidờʔi kwiền kaicị kủʔa cúʔa kòn dến muôndờʔi Ðứkzê nâŋdỡ mọʔi ŋườʔi saŋã và sửʔa ŋăj lạʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi kɔŋ xɔm kɔn dềʔu ŋửʔa côŋ cúʔa cúʔa cɔ cúŋ dồăn tùʔi tʰeo tʰì cúʔa tăj za làm cɔ tʰỏʔaŋwiện mọʔi lɔàʔi sốŋ Ðứkzê kôŋbìɲ cɔŋ mọʔi dườŋ ŋàʔi hăj cɔŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk ŋàʔi Ðứkzê ɣần mọʔi ŋườʔi kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi tứk ɣần mọʔi ŋườʔi kó lòŋ tʰàɲtʰựk kầʔuxẩn ŋàʔi ŋàʔi tʰỏʔaŋwiện mọʔi ŋườʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi kũŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔukầʔu kủʔa ɣiảʔicứʔu cɔ Ðứkzê bảʔɔhộ ɲữŋ ʔiêʔumến ŋàʔi sɔŋ hủʔiziệt ɲữŋ ák miệŋ tôʔi dồn za ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê ŋwiện kả lɔàʔi sáktʰịt cúktụŋ zɛɲ tʰáɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi cɔdến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ halêluza hỡʔi liɲhồn hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê cọn dờʔisốŋ tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hễ tôʔi kòn sốŋ cừŋ nàʔɔ tôʔi hátsướŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi cừŋ nấʔi cớ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi kák vwɛcúʔa kũŋ dừŋ ɲờkậʔi nơʔi kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi nơʔi xôŋ kó cợ hơʔi tʰở di lɔàʔiŋườʔi cởvề bụʔi dất mìɲ cɔŋ cáɲ ŋàʔi dó kák mưʔumô di fướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp ɣiúpdỡ mìɲ lòŋ côŋkậʔi nơʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ ŋàʔi Ðấŋ zựŋ cờʔidất biển mọʔi cɔŋ dó ŋàʔi ɣiữ lòŋ tʰàɲtʰựk dờʔidờʔi Ðʔɔán sét kôŋbìɲ cɔ và báɲ cɔ ŋườʔi dóʔi Ðứkzê ɣiảʔifóŋ ŋườʔi Ðứkzê cɔ ŋườʔi duj Ðứkzê sửʔa ŋăj lạʔi ɲữŋ kɔŋ xɔm Ðứkzê ʔiêʔumến ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ Ðứkzê bảʔɔhộ xác nâŋdỡ mồkôʔi ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa ɲưŋŋàʔi kɔŋ kwẹʔɔ kɔn dườŋ ák Ðứkzê kaicị dờʔidờʔi siôn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vwa dến muôndờʔi halêluza xá ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê diềʔu hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta việk tốtlàɲ sự ŋợʔixɛn lễŋi Ðứkzê sâʔicất ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔi lạʔi ɲữŋ lạk kủʔa ʔisơzaên cữʔa làɲ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ dăwtʰươŋ và kủʔa ŋàʔi dếm kák vìsaw ɣọʔi từŋ hếttʰảʔi kák ấʔi cúʔa cúŋtôʔi tʰật kó kwiềnnăŋ kảtʰể sự tʰôŋ sáŋ ŋàʔi vôkùŋ Ðứkzê nâŋdỡ ŋườʔi xiêmɲườŋ Ðáɲ dổ ák suốŋ dất hãʔi kảmtạ cɔ Ðứkzê ɣảʔi dờn kầm ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋàʔi baw kák từŋ cờʔi bằŋ mâʔi sắmsửʔa mưʔa cɔ dất làm cɔ kỏ mọk cên núʔi ban dồăn cɔ tʰúvật và cɔ kwạ kɔn kêʔuzêʔu ŋàʔi cẳŋ dẹplòŋ sứk kủʔa ŋựʔa kũŋ xôŋ tʰíc cơn kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi bèn dẹplòŋ ŋườʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi và côŋdợʔi ɲơn kủʔa ŋàʔi hỡʔizê zusalɛm hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê siôn hãʔi katụŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi vìŋàʔi dã cɔ tʰɛn kửʔa ŋươʔi vữŋcắk ban fướk cɔ kɔnkáʔi ŋươʔi ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ɣiáŋ bìɲan cɔŋ bờkõʔi ŋươʔi làm cɔ ŋươʔi dượk dầʔizẫʔi lúʔa ɲứt ŋàʔi za lịɲ mìɲ cên dất lờʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi cạʔi zất măw ŋàʔi cɔ mưʔatwiết ɲư lôŋ ciên zảʔi sươŋ mốk cắŋ xáknàʔɔ cɔ ŋàʔi ɣiá từŋ miếŋ ʔaj cịʔu nổʔi dượk lạɲlẽʔɔ kủʔa ŋàʔi ŋàʔi za lịɲ cɔ twiết ɣiá za xiến ɣió tʰổʔi nướk cảʔi ŋàʔi cwiền lờʔi mìɲ cɔ zakốp luậtlệ mạŋ lịɲ mìɲ cɔ ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi cẳŋ làmvậʔi cɔ zân nàʔɔ xák cúŋnó xôŋ kó mạŋ lịɲ kủʔa ŋàʔi halêluza halêluza từ kák từŋ cờʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi cɔŋ nơʔi kawkả hỡʔi hếttʰảʔi kák tʰiênsứ ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hỡʔi kả kơ biɲ ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hỡʔi mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hỡʔi hếttʰảʔi ŋôʔisaw sáŋ hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hỡʔi cờʔi kủʔa kák từŋ cờʔi hỡʔi nướk cên kák từŋ cờʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi kảtʰảʔi xá ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ Ðứkzê vìŋàʔi za lịɲ tʰảʔi dượk zựŋ ŋàʔi cɔ vữŋ kák ấʔi dến dờʔidờʔi vôkùŋ kũŋ dã dịɲ mạŋ xôŋ kó ʔaj vifạm mạŋ ấʔi hỡʔi kák kwáʔivật kủʔa ɲữŋ vựk sâʔu hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê nơʔi dất hỡʔi lửʔa mưʔadá twiết hơʔinướk ɣió bãʔɔ vâŋ tʰeo mạŋ ŋàʔi kák núʔi mọʔi nổŋ kâʔi cáʔi mọʔi kâʔi hươŋ tʰúzừŋ kák lɔàʔi súkvật lɔàʔi kôncùŋ lɔàʔi cim ɲữŋ vwa tʰếzan kák zântộk kôŋầʔu kả kwan sét kủʔa tʰếzan ɣã caicẻ ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ ŋườʔizà kả kùŋ kɔnɲỏ kảtʰảʔi xá ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ Ðứkzê vì cỉ zɛɲ ŋàʔi dượk kawkả sự viɲhiển ŋàʔi cổʔi kaw cáʔidất kák từŋ cờʔi ŋàʔi dã kất káʔi sừŋ kủʔa zânsự ŋàʔi là ŋợʔixɛn kủʔa kák tʰáɲ ŋàʔi tứk kủʔa dến ʔisơzaên là zân ɣần ŋàʔi halêluza halêluza hãʔi hátsướŋ cɔ Ðứkzê bàʔi ka mớʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi cɔŋ hộʔi kák tʰáɲ ŋàʔi ŋwiện ʔisơzaên mừŋzỡ nơʔi Ðấŋ dã zựŋ mìɲ ŋwiện kɔnkáʔi siôn vujvẻ nơʔi vwa mìɲ ŋwiện cúŋnó ɲảʔimúʔa ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ ŋàʔi zùŋ cốŋ kơn dờn kầm ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi vìÐứkzê dẹplòŋ zânsự ŋàʔi ŋàʔi lấʔi kứʔuzỗʔi caŋsứk cɔ ŋườʔi xiêmɲườŋ ŋwiện kák tʰáɲ ŋàʔi mừŋzỡ viɲhiển hát vujvẻ tạʔi cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ sự ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔŋ miệŋ tʰɛɲ ɣươm haj lưỡʔi cɔŋ tăj Ðặŋ báʔɔtʰù kák nướk hàɲ fạt kák zân Ðặŋ cóʔi kák vwa cúŋnó bằŋ siềŋ và dóŋ căŋ kák tướkvị cúŋnó tʰihàɲ cɔ cúŋnó dã cép kák tʰáɲ ŋàʔi dượk viɲhiển ấʔi halêluza halêluza hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi cên bầʔucờʔi kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi kák việk kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi tùʔi tʰeo waiŋi kảtʰể kủʔa ŋàʔi hãʔi tʰổʔi ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi ɣảʔi dờn dờn kầm katụŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi dáɲ cốŋkơm ɲảʔimúʔa ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi hãʔi ɣảʔi ɲạkxí bằŋ zâʔi tʰổʔi sáʔɔ katụŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi zùŋ cập cỏʔa zộʔi tiếŋ mã kêʔu zền ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi fàm ci tʰở hãʔi ŋợʔixɛn Ðứkzê halêluza câmŋôn kủʔa salômôn kɔncaj Ðʔa vwa ʔisơzaên Ðặŋ xiến cɔ ŋườʔita hiểʔubiết xônŋwan diềʔu xwiên zạʔi kùŋ fânbiệt kák lờʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ ɲận lãɲ diềʔu zạʔizỗ tʰeo xônŋwan sự kôŋbìɲ dɔán cáɲ cựk hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi ŋuzốt dượk xônxéʔɔ ɣã caicẻ dượk citʰứk zẽ zặt kẻ xôn ŋɛ tʰêm họkvấn ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ dượk zộŋ mưʔucí hiểʔubiết câmŋôn tʰízụ và lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan kùŋ kâʔudố ɲiệm kủʔa sự kíɲ Ðứkzê xởʔidầʔu citʰứk kòn ŋumuộʔi xiɲbỉ xônŋwan lờʔi xwiên zạʔi hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi kủʔa ca cớ féptắk kủʔa mẹkɔn vì ấʔi ɲư zâʔi hwa cên dầʔu kɔn ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲữŋ vòŋ deo kwɛɲ kổ kủʔa kɔn hỡʔi kɔn nếʔu tộʔi ɲơn tʰế kwiến zụ kɔn cớ xứŋ tʰeo nếʔu cúŋnó nóʔi hãʔi dếnkùŋ cúŋta fụk zìɲ dổ hwiết ŋườʔi núp dợʔi hạʔi vôkớ cẳŋ tộʔi cúŋta nuốtsốŋ cúŋnó ɲư âmfủ và kòn ŋwiênvẹn ɲư suốŋ cúŋta dượk kák tʰứ kủʔa báʔu cất dầʔi ɲà cúŋta ɲữŋ kủʔa kướp hãʔi lấʔi fần ŋươʔi vớʔi cúŋta cúŋta kảtʰảʔi kó túʔi bạk tʰôʔi hỡʔi kɔn dừŋ di dườŋ kùŋ cúŋnó hãʔi kầmzữ cơn kɔn cớ vàʔɔ lốʔi kủʔa vì cơn cúŋnó cạʔi dến ák lậtdật dổ hwiết za vì ɣiăŋ lướʔi za cướk kák lɔàʔi kó káɲ lấʔilàm luốŋ kôŋ tʰăj cáɲ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰật fụk mưʔu dổ hwiết mìɲ za và zìɲ hạʔi mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ dườŋ kủʔa ɲữŋ tʰam lợʔi bấtŋĩʔa lợʔi ɲưtʰể dɔạt lấʔi mạŋ sốŋ kủʔa dượk sự xônŋwan ŋɔàʔi dườŋ kấttiếŋ zộʔi za nơʔi fố cợ xônŋwan kêʔula dầʔu dườŋ zộn zựk ồnàʔɔ tạʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ nộʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ ŋườʔi fán lờʔi mìɲ za mà zằŋ hỡʔi ŋuzốt kák ŋươʔi ŋuzạʔi cɔdến bawzờ kẻ ɲạʔɔbáŋ ưʔa ɲạʔɔbáŋ và zạʔizột ɣét citʰứk cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ɲân các kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi xá cởlạʔi kìʔa dổ tʰầnliɲ cên kák ŋươʔi ta cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa bởʔivì kêʔuɣọʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ ta ɣiơ tăj za lạʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj củý ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi dã hếtlờʔi xwiên zạʔi xôŋ cịʔulờʔi kwởcác nên cɔŋ lúk kák ŋươʔi tainạn kũŋ cêkườʔi xi sợhãʔi ɣiáŋ cɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ xi sợhãʔi kák ŋươʔi sảʔi dến tʰìɲlìɲ ɲư ɣió bãʔɔ tainạn sôŋ vàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi ɲư kơn cốt và ŋặtŋèʔɔ xốn kựk ɣiáŋ cên kák ŋươʔi bấʔizờ cúŋnó kêʔukầʔu kùŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ dáp lờʔi sáŋsớm cúŋnó ɲưŋ xôŋ ɣặp dượk Ấʔi bởʔivì cúŋnó ɣét hiểʔubiết xôŋ cọn lấʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê kũŋ xôŋ tʰeo xwiên zạʔi và cêbaj kák lờʔi kwởcác vìvậʔi cúŋnó bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa dườŋlốʔi mìɲ và dượk nɔnê mưʔucướk kủʔa mìɲ ziêŋ vì bộʔiŋịc kủʔa ŋuzốt ɣiết cúŋnó và ʔiênổn kủʔa zạʔizột hạʔi cɔ cúŋnó ɲưŋ ʔaj xứŋ ŋɛ ʔanɲiên Ðượk bìɲ tịɲ xôŋ tajhọʔa nàʔɔ hỡʔi kɔn nếʔu kɔn tiếpɲận lờʔi zàɲ ɣiữ mạŋ lịɲ nơʔi lòŋ kɔn lắŋtaj ŋɛ xônŋwan và cwiên lòŋ kɔn tʰôŋ sáŋ fảʔi nếʔu kɔn kêʔukầʔu fân và kấttiếŋ kầʔusin tʰôŋ sáŋ nếʔu kɔn ɲư tiềnbạk và ɲư bửʔu bấʔizờ kɔn hiểʔubiết kíɲ Ðứkzê và dượk diềʔu citʰứk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vìÐứkzê cɔ xônŋwan miệŋ ŋàʔi zadiềʔu citʰứk tʰôŋ sáŋ ŋàʔi zàɲ kứʔuzỗʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋàʔi tʰuẫn dỡ kủʔa ŋườʔilàm tʰeo dwancíɲ fùhộ kák lốʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và ɣiữɣìn dườŋ kủʔa tʰáɲ dồ ŋàʔi bấʔizờ kɔn hiểʔubiết kôŋbìɲ dɔán sự cáɲ cựk kák nẻʔɔ làɲ vì xônŋwan vàʔɔ cɔŋ lòŋ kɔn và liɲhồn kɔn lấʔi hiểʔubiết vuitʰíc sự zẽ zặt kɔjsók kɔn sự tʰôŋ sáŋ ɣìŋiữ kɔn kứʔu kɔn xỏʔi dườŋ zữ xỏʔi nóʔi việk zantà và xỏʔi dườŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ mà di tʰeo kák lốʔi tốʔităm là ŋườʔi vuj zạ làmzữ Ưʔatʰíc zantà kủʔa ák cúŋnó kɔŋ vạʔi cɔŋ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ và lầmlạk cɔŋ kák nẻʔɔ mìɲ lạʔi xônŋwan kứʔu kɔn xỏʔi zâmfụ là ŋườʔi dờn nóʔi lờʔi zwa nịɲ nàŋ lìʔabỏ kủʔa buổʔi daŋ tʰì và kwên zawướk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ vì ɲà siêʔu kwa cết và kɔn dườŋ zẫn dến cốn tʰák cẳŋ ʔaj di dến nàŋ cởvề hɔặk dượk tớʔi kák lốʔi sốŋ sự xônŋwan xiến kɔn di cɔŋ dườŋ ŋườʔi tʰiện và ɣìŋiữ kák lốʔi kủʔa kôŋbìɲ vì ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ dượk cên dất và ŋườʔi cọnvẹn kòn dó ɲưŋ zanák cuất xỏʔi dất và bấtcuŋ ɲổ zứt xỏʔi dó hỡʔi kɔn cớ kwên xwiên zạʔi lòŋ kɔn xá ɣiữ kák mạŋ lịɲ vì tʰêm cɔ kɔn lâʔu ŋàʔi số mạŋ sốŋ bìɲan sự ɲơn cơn tʰật cớ dể lìʔabỏ kɔn hãʔi deo vàʔɔ kổ ɣi nơʔi biə lòŋ kɔn ɲưvậʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kɔn dượk kó xônŋwan tʰật hãʔi hếtlòŋ tinkậʔi Ðứkzê cớ nươŋkậʔi nơʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ kủʔa kɔn fàm cɔŋ kák việklàm kủʔa kɔn xá ɲậnbiết ŋàʔi tʰìŋàʔi cỉzẫn kák nẻʔɔ kủʔa kɔn cớ xônŋwan tʰeo mìɲ hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê lìʔa xỏʔi ák ɲưvậʔi kuốŋ zốn kɔn dượk mạɲxỏʔɛ và sươŋkốt kɔn dượk hãʔi lấʔi tàʔi huêlợʔi dầʔu mùʔa kủʔa kɔn mà tônviɲ Ðứkzê vậʔi kák vựʔa kɔn dầʔi zưzật và ɲữŋ tʰùŋ kủʔa kɔn càn zượʔu mớʔi hỡʔi kɔn cớ xiɲ diềʔu sửʔa fạt kủʔa Ðứkzê cớ lòŋ xi ŋàʔi kwởcác vìÐứkzê ʔiêʔutʰươŋ ʔaj tʰì các fạt nấʔi ɲư ŋườʔi ca dốʔi kùŋ kɔncaj ʔiêʔuzấʔu mìɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dặŋ xônŋwan và dượk tʰôŋ sáŋ kó fướk tʰăj vì tʰà dượk dượk tiềnbạk hwalợʔi sɛɲ za vàŋzòŋ sự xônŋwan kwíbáʔu câʔuŋọk cẳŋ bửʔu nàʔɔ kɔn ưʔatʰíc sáɲ dượk tăj hữʔu kầm cườŋtʰọ kòn cɔŋ tăj kó ɣiàʔukó viɲhiển kák nẻʔɔ nẻʔɔ xɔáʔilạk và kák lốʔi kả diềʔu bìɲan nó kâʔi sốŋ cɔ ʔaj lấʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kầmzữ dềʔu dượk fướk hạɲ Ðứkzê zùŋ xônŋwan cáʔidất ɲờ tʰôŋ sáŋ sắpdặt kák từŋ cờʔi zɔ hiểʔubiết ŋàʔi kák vựk sâʔu za và mâʔi dặt za sươŋmók hỡʔi kɔn xá ɣìŋiữ xônŋwan tʰật zẽ zặt cớ dể lìʔa sa kɔn tʰì sốŋ kủʔa liɲhồn kɔn và ɲư dồ caŋsứk cɔ kổ kɔn kɔn bướkdi vữŋvàŋ cɔŋ dườŋ kɔn và cơn kɔn xôŋ vấpŋã xi kɔn cẳŋ kódiềʔu sợhãʔi fảʔi kɔn dượk ŋủ ŋɔŋiấk cớ kiɲ xiếp sảʔi dến tʰìɲlìɲ kũŋ dừŋ kiɲhãʔi lúk tàɲạʔi ɣiáŋ cên ák vìÐứkzê nơʔi nươŋkậʔi kủʔa kɔn ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ cơn kɔn xỏʔi mắk bẫʔi cớ từcốʔi làmlàɲ cɔ nàʔɔ sứŋdáŋ miễnlà tăj kɔn kó kwiền diềʔu ấʔi ɲượkbằŋ kɔn kó tạʔi nơʔi kɔn lânkận kầʔusin tʰìcớ nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi di cởlạʔi ŋàʔimaj cɔ ŋươʔi cớ mưʔuhạʔi lânkận kɔn vì ŋườʔi bìɲiên kɔn nếʔuxôŋ kó diềʔu hạʔi cɔ kɔn cớ cɛɲzàɲ vôkớ vớʔi ʔaj cớ fânbì vớʔi huŋzữ kũŋ dừŋ cọn lốʔi nàʔɔ kủʔa vìÐứkzê ɣớmɣiếk zantà ɲưŋ tìɲ bậʔu kùŋ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ sự zủʔasả kủʔa Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên ɲà ák sɔŋŋàʔi fướk cɔ cỗ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kwảtʰật ŋàʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ hăj ɲạʔɔbáŋ ɲưŋŋàʔi cɔ ŋườʔi xiêmɲườŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan hưởŋ dượk viɲhiển kòn tʰăŋ kủʔa ŋuzạʔi zadiềʔu hổtʰẹn hỡʔi kák kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ca xá củý vàʔɔ hầʔu cɔbiết tʰôŋ sáŋ vì cɔ kák kɔnmột dạʔɔlý tốtlàɲ cớ lìʔabỏ lờʔi zạʔizỗ kủʔa xi kòn tʰơấʔu kɔncaj kủʔa ca một dứʔa kɔnmột kủʔa ʔiêʔumến ca kó zạʔi zằŋ lòŋ kɔn xá ɣiɲớ kák lờʔi hãʔi ɣìŋiữ mạŋ lịɲ tʰì kɔn dượk sốŋ xá kầʔu lấʔi xônŋwan xá kầʔu lấʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ cớ kwên cớ sâʔi kák lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ Ðừŋ lìʔabỏ xônŋwan ŋườʔi ɣìŋiữ kɔn hãʔi ʔiêʔumến ŋườʔi tʰì ŋườʔi fùhộ kɔn sự xônŋwan diềʔu kần ɲứt vậʔi xá kầʔu lấʔi xônŋwan hãʔi zùŋ kủʔa kɔn dã dượk mwa tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi tặŋ xônŋwan tʰì xônŋwan tʰăŋ kɔn làm cɔ kɔn dượk viɲhiển xi kɔn hɔàʔiniệm dến sự xônŋwan dộʔi cên dầʔu kɔnmột zâʔi hwamĩ và cɔ kɔnmột mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên viɲkwaŋ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ tiếpɲận kák lờʔi tʰì nămtʰáŋ kủʔa dờʔi kɔn dượk tʰêm ɲiềʔu ta dã zạʔizỗ kɔn dườŋ xônŋwan zẫn kɔn di cɔŋ kák lốʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ xi kɔn di bướk cơn kɔn xôŋ ŋậpŋừŋ và xi kɔncạʔi kɔn xôŋ vấpŋã hãʔi cắk diềʔu xwiên zạʔi cớ buôŋ za xá ɣìŋiữ sốŋ kủʔa kɔn cớ vàʔɔ cɔŋ lốʔi huŋzữ và dừŋ di dườŋ zanák hãʔi cáɲ dườŋ ấʔi cớ di ŋaŋ kwa hãʔi sâʔi xỏʔi kứ di tʰẳŋ vì nếʔu cúŋnó xôŋ diềʔu ák tʰì ŋủ xôŋ dặŋ bằŋ cưʔa ɣâʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fạm tʰì ɣiấkŋủ kất xỏʔi cúŋnó vì cúŋnó báɲ kủʔa zanák và ʔuốŋ zượʔu kủʔa huŋăŋ ɲưŋ kɔn dườŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư sáŋ ciếʔu zạŋ kàŋ sáŋ tʰêm cɔdến ɣiữʔa cưʔa kòn nẻʔɔ zanák ɲư tămtốʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ mìɲ vấpŋã dâʔu hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi cămcỉ kák lờʔi xá ŋiêŋ taiŋɛ ɲữŋ bàʔi ɣiảŋtʰwiết kák lờʔi ấʔi cớ dể sa xỏʔi kɔn hãʔi ɣiữ lấʔi nơʔi lòŋ kɔn vì lờʔi ấʔilà sốŋ cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk và xỏʔɛmạɲ cɔ tɔàn tʰântʰể kủʔa xá kẩntʰận ɣiữ tấmlòŋ kủʔa kɔn vì kák ŋuồn sốŋ zɔ nơʔi za kɔn hãʔi zẹp za zantà kủʔa miệŋ và kác sa kɔn ɣiảzốʔi kủʔa môʔi mắt kɔn hãʔi ŋó ŋăj cướk và kɔn xá sɛm tʰẳŋ cướk kɔn hãʔi bằŋ káʔi nẻʔɔ kủʔa cơn kɔn di và cɔ vữŋvàŋ kák dườŋlốʔi kɔn cớ sâʔi kwa hữʔu hăj hãʔi zờʔi cơn kɔn xỏʔi ák hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi cămcỉ xônŋwan xá ŋiêŋ taj kwa ŋɛ lờʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ kɔn ɣìŋiữ zẽ zặt và môʔi kɔn bảʔɔtồn citʰứk vì môʔi zâmfụ dặt za và miệŋ zịʔu zầʔu ɲưŋ zốt lạʔi dắŋ ɲư ŋảʔicứʔu bén ɲư ɣươm haj lưỡʔi cơn suốŋ cốn cết bướk dụŋ dến âmfủ nó xôŋ dặŋ kɔn dườŋ bằŋ tʰẳŋ kủʔa sốŋ kák lốʔi lầmlạk sɔŋ cẳŋ dến vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi kák kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ cớ lìʔabỏ kák lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ hãʔi zờʔi dườŋ kɔn kác sa xỏʔi Ðừŋ lạʔi ɣần kửʔɛɲà ʔɛ kɔn caw zɛɲzự mìɲ cɔ xák và nămtuổʔi kɔn cɔ huŋbạʔɔ ʔɛ ŋườʔi dượk nɔnê hóʔa tàʔi kɔn và kôŋlaw kɔn ɲà ŋɔạʔi kẻʔɔ dến kuốʔicùŋ kɔn fảʔi zênsiết vì tʰịt tʰântʰể kɔn dã hawmòn zồʔi kɔn nóʔi zằŋ kớsaw tôʔi ɣét lờʔi xwiên zạʔi và lòŋ tôʔi xiɲbỉ kwởcác ɲơn saw tôʔi xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo tiếŋ ɣiáʔɔsư tôʔi và cẳŋ ŋiêŋ taj kwa lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi zạʔizỗ tôʔi tạʔi ɣiữʔa zânsự hộʔi cúŋ tôʔi tʰiếʔudiềʔu vàʔɔ kák tʰứ tajhọʔa hãʔi ʔuốŋ nướk kɔn cứʔa và nướk cảʔi cɔŋ ɣiếŋ kɔn kák ŋuồn kủʔa kɔn càn za ŋɔàʔi dườŋ và kák suốʔi kủʔa kɔn nơʔi fố cợ saw nó xá mộtmìɲ kɔn cớ tʰôŋzụŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi ŋwiện ŋuồn mạc kɔn dượk fướk kɔn hãʔi lấʔilàm vuitʰíc nơʔi vợkɔn kướʔi buổʔi daŋ tʰì ɲư naj káʔi dáŋ tʰươŋ hɔàŋ zươŋ kó zwiên ŋwiện nươŋlɔŋ nàŋ tʰỏʔa lòŋ kɔn và áʔitìɲ nàŋ xiến cɔ kɔn săimê mãʔimãʔi hỡʔi kɔn lẽnàʔɔ kɔn ŋườʔi zâmfụ và nâŋniw lòŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi vì kák dườŋ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi cướk Ðứkzê ŋàʔi bằŋ kák lốʔi kủʔa kẻ huŋzữ zanák mìɲ fảʔi và zâʔi tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ buộk lấʔi nó cết tʰiếʔu lờʔi xwiên zạʔi và lầmlạk ŋuzạʔi kwá hỡʔi kɔn nếʔu kɔn kó bảʔɔlãɲ cɔ lânkận mìɲ nếʔu kɔn zaw tăj mìɲ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi tʰì kɔn dã lờʔi miệŋ mìɲ cóʔibuộk mắk fảʔi lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ kɔn hỡʔi kɔn bởʔivì kɔn dã vàʔɔ tăj lânkận kɔn hỡʔi diềʔu nầʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu mìɲ kɔn hãʔi di hạmìɲ suốŋ nàʔisin ŋườʔi lânkận kɔn cớ dể cɔ haj kɔn ŋủ hɔặk kɔn cợp lạʔi hỡʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu mìɲ xỏʔi ŋườʔi ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj tʰợsăn ɲư kɔn cim tʰɔát xỏʔi tăj dáɲ zập hỡʔi biếŋɲák hãʔi di dến lɔàʔi xá sɛmsét kác họk xônŋwan twi xôŋ kó hɔặk kwan tướŋ hăj kwan kaj dốk hăjlà kwan cấn tʰì kũŋ sắmsửʔa lươŋ fạn mìɲ cɔŋ lúk mùʔahè và tʰâʔu cử tʰựk cɔŋ xi mùʔa ɣặt hỡʔi biếŋɲák ŋươʔi cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ bawzờ ŋươʔi ŋủ tʰứkzậʔi ŋủ mộtcút cợp mộtcút xwɛɲtăj mộtcút tʰì ŋèʔɔxổ kủʔa ŋươʔi dến ɲư di zảʔɔ và tʰiếʔutʰốn kủʔa ŋươʔi tớʔi ɲư ŋườʔi kầm biɲxí ŋườʔi nàʔɔ di dừŋ kó miệŋ ɣiảzốʔi là vôlɔạʔi ŋườʔi zanák hắn liếk kɔn zùŋ cơn mìɲ bàʔi và lấʔi ŋóntăj mìɲ za zấʔu cɔŋ lòŋ kó zantà nó twan mưʔu ák và zeo cɛɲ kạɲ bớʔi kớ ấʔi tajhọʔa sảʔi dến tʰìɲlìɲ bỗŋ cúk bạʔihɔạʔi xôŋ fươŋ tʰế cữʔa dượk kó sáʔu diềʔu Ðứkzê ɣét và bảʔi diềʔu ŋàʔi lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk kɔn kiêʔuŋạʔɔ lưỡʔi zốʔicá tăj dổ hwiết vôtộʔi lòŋ twan ɲữŋ mưʔu ák cơn vộʔivàŋ cạʔi dến zữ kẻ làmcứŋ zan nóʔi diềʔu zốʔi kùŋ zeo cɛɲ kạɲ cɔŋ vòŋ ʔɛɲɛm hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ɣiữ lờʔi zănbảʔɔ kủʔa ca cớ lìʔabỏ kák féptắk kủʔa mẹkɔn xá ɣitạk nơʔi lòŋ kɔn và deo nơʔi kổ kɔn xi kɔn di kák lờʔi dó zẫnzắt kɔn lúk kɔn ŋủ ɣìŋiữ kɔn và xi kɔn tʰúkdẩʔi tʰì còcwiện vớʔi kɔn vì diềʔu zăn káʔi dèn luậtfáp áɲsáŋ và kwởcác xwiên zạʔi kɔn dườŋ sốŋ Ðặŋ ɣiữ kɔn xỏʔi ŋườʔi dờn ákŋiệp và xỏʔi lưỡʔi zwa nịɲ kủʔa zâmfụ lòŋ kɔn cớ tʰam sắk Ðừŋ dể mìɲ mắk fảʔi vì tạʔi kó ŋườʔi nôŋnổʔi cỉ kòn miếŋ báɲ tʰôʔi ŋườʔi zâmfụ lừʔa liɲhồn kwíbáʔu há kó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dể lửʔa cɔŋ lòŋ mìɲ mà áʔɔ ŋườʔi lạʔi cẳŋ cáʔi saw há kó ʔaj di cên tʰan lửʔa hựk mà cơn mìɲ lạʔi cẳŋ fồŋ căŋ kẻ nàʔɔ di tớʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ kũŋ vậʔi fàm ʔaj dụŋ dến nàŋ cẳŋ dượk xỏʔi fạt ŋườʔita cẳŋ xiɲ zị kẻcộm nếʔu ănkắp dặŋ fỉ lòŋ mìɲ xi dóʔixát hễ cắk fảʔi tʰườŋ bồʔi ɣấp bảʔi nó tàʔisản kủʔa ɲà kẻ nàʔɔ fạmtộʔi ŋɔạʔitìɲ vớʔi ŋườʔi dờn cí ʔaj ɲưvậʔi xiến cɔ liɲhồn mìɲ ŋườʔi ấʔi tʰươŋtíc xiɲbỉ sự sỉɲụk ŋườʔi cẳŋ bôʔi di vì ɣɛŋét diềʔu ɣiậnzữ kủʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi báʔɔtʰù ŋườʔi xôŋ zuŋtʰứ ŋườʔi cẳŋ ɲận ɣiá dềntộʔi nàʔɔ mặkzầʔu kɔn zatăŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kũŋ xôŋ dặŋ fỉ dâʔu hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ɣiữ kák lờʔi và ɣiấʔu nơʔi lòŋ kák mạŋ lịɲ xá tuântʰủ kák mạŋ lịɲ tʰì kɔn dượk sốŋ và ɣìŋiữ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi ɲư ŋươʔi kủʔa kɔn hãʔi kột nơʔi ŋóntăj kɔn ɣi cên biə lòŋ kɔn hãʔi nóʔi vớʔi xônŋwan zằŋ ŋươʔi cịʔɛm và sưŋ tʰôŋ sáŋ bằŋữʔu kɔn ɣìŋiữ kɔn xỏʔi zâmfụ xỏʔi dờn bàŋɔạʔi hăj nóʔi lờʔi zwa nịɲ vì tạʔi kửʔasổ ɲà ta ɲìn ŋaŋ kwa sɔŋ võŋ bèn tʰấʔi cɔŋ ŋuzốt ɣiữʔa vòŋ ŋườʔi tʰiếʔuniên kó ɣã caicẻ xôŋ cí hiểʔu Ðʔi kwa ŋɔàʔi dườŋ ɣần ɣók ɲà dờn ấʔi ŋườʔi di dườŋzẫn dến ɲà nàŋ hɔặk cɔŋ lúk cạŋvạŋ xi zốt ŋàʔi hɔặk ɣiữʔa bandêm xi tốʔităm kìʔa ŋườʔi dờn ấʔi di za zướk caŋdiểm ɲư kɔn lòŋ dầʔi mưʔukế nàŋ nóʔi ʔɔmsòm xôŋ tʰìn haj cơn nàŋ cẳŋ cɔŋ ɲà xi ŋɔàʔi dườŋ lúk nơʔi fố cợ zìɲzập tạʔi kák ɣók nàŋ caicẻ ấʔi mặt caj màʔi dá nóʔi kùŋ càŋ zằŋ tôʔi kókủʔa tʰù tạʔi ɲà tôʔi ŋàʔinăj tôʔi dã cả sɔŋ kák lờʔi xấn ŋwiện tôʔi bởʔi kớ dó tôʔi za dón ʔɛɲ Ðặŋ tʰấʔi ʔɛɲ tôʔi dã dượk tôʔi kó cảʔi cên ɣiườŋ tôʔi ɲữŋ bằŋ cỉ zíptô dủ sắk lấʔi zượk hộʔi kwế mà sôŋ tʰơm cỗ tôʔi hãʔi dến cúŋta tʰânáʔi cɔdến sáŋ vujsướŋ ɲăw lwiếnáʔi vì cồŋ tôʔi xôŋ kó ɲà ŋườʔi cẩʔi di sa suôʔi Ðʔɛm túʔi bạk tʰeo tăj ŋườʔi zằm mớʔi cởvề ɲà nàŋ zùŋ lờʔi êmzịʔu kwiến zụ làm saŋã lờʔi zwa nịɲ kủʔa môʔi miệŋ mìɲ hắn di tʰeo nàŋ ɲư kɔn dến kạʔɔ ɲư ŋuzạʔi kùm zẫn di cịʔu hìɲfạt cɔdến xi mũʔitên sɔj ŋaŋ kwa ɣan ɲư kɔn cim băj ʔa vàʔɔ lướʔi mà xôŋ zằŋ zập sốŋ mìɲ vậʔi bâʔizờ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ xá cămcỉ kák lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ lòŋ kɔn cớ sâʔi vàʔɔ kɔn dườŋ dờn ấʔi cớ di lạk cɔŋ kák lốʔi nàŋ vì nàŋ ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi tʰươŋtíc saŋã và nàŋ ɣiết tʰật zất ɲiềʔu tʰăj ɲà nàŋ kɔn dườŋ kủʔa âmfủ zẫn suốŋ kák fòŋ kủʔa cết sự xônŋwan cẳŋ kêʔu saw sự tʰôŋ sáŋ xôŋ vaŋ tiếŋ mìɲ za sự xônŋwan dứŋ cên cót kák nơʔi kaw ŋɔàʔi dườŋ tạʔi kák ŋã ɣần kửʔa tʰàɲ tạʔi nơʔi vàʔɔ tʰàɲ cỗ dôŋ cɔŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ xônŋwan zằŋ hỡʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kêʔuɣọʔi kák ŋươʔi và tiếŋ hướŋ kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi hỡʔi ŋumuộʔi hãʔi hiểʔu xônxéʔɔ hỡʔi zạʔizột lòŋ ŋươʔi xá tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi ŋɛ nóʔi diềʔu tốtlàɲ ta môʔi za zạʔi diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ vì miệŋ nóʔi cântʰật kòn môʔi ɣét zanák kák lờʔi miệŋ diềʔu sưŋ kôŋbìɲ cɔŋ cẳŋ kódiềʔu ci kɔŋ vạʔi hɔặk zantà tʰảʔi dềʔu zõzàŋ cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hiểʔubiết và ŋăitʰẳŋ cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk citʰứk xá ɲận xwiên zạʔi cớ lãɲ tiềnbạk tʰà lãɲsự citʰứk vàŋ cọnlựʔa vì xônŋwan kóɣiá câʔuŋọk và kák mìɲ ưʔatʰíc cẳŋ sáɲ bằŋ dặŋ ta xônŋwan dồŋ vớʔi tʰôŋmiɲ và dượk hiểʔubiết zẽ zặt sự kíɲ Ðứkzê ấʔilà ɣét diềʔu ák ta ɣét kiêʔuŋạʔɔ sấksượk kɔn dườŋ ák miệŋ zantà mưʔu tʰôŋtʰạʔɔ dềʔu tʰuộk ta tʰôŋ sáŋ năŋlựk tʰuộk ɲờ kák vwa kaicị và ɲữŋ kwan cưởŋ dịɲ kôŋbìɲ ɲờ kák kwan cưởŋ ŋườʔi tướkvị và kák kwan sét tʰếzan dềʔu kwản ta ʔiêʔumến ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔiêʔumến fàm ʔaj ɣặp sự ɣiàʔukó tôncọŋ kủʔakảʔi lâʔu kôŋbìɲ dềʔu nơʔi bôŋ cáʔi vàŋ dến dỗʔi vàŋzòŋ hwalợʔi kủʔa kwí bạk kaw ta di cɔŋ kɔn dườŋ kôŋbìɲ ɣiữʔa kák lốʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ Ðặŋ cɔ ʔiêʔumến hưởŋ dượk kủʔakảʔi tʰật và cɔ dầʔizẫʔi kák xɔtàŋ kủʔa cɔŋ buổʔi Ðứkzê xởʔi kuộk tạʔɔhóʔa và tʰờʔi tʰáʔicổ cướk xi cưʔa zựŋ tʰì ŋàʔi dã kó ta dã dượk cướk vôkùŋ từ xi ŋwiên tʰỉ cướk xi zựŋ cáʔidất lúk cưʔa kó vựk sâʔu cưʔa kó ŋuồn cảʔi nướk ɲiềʔu tʰì dã sɛɲ za zồʔi cướk xi núʔinɔn cưʔa và kák ɣò nổŋ cưʔa kó cướk xi Ðứkzê cưʔa kó zựŋ dất dồŋzuộŋ và cɔ bụʔi dầʔutiên kủʔa tʰếzan tʰì dã sɛɲ za zồʔi xiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák từŋ cờʔi và dặt káʔi vòŋ cên vựk sâʔu tʰìkó dó xiŋàʔi cɔ kiênkố kák từŋ mâʔi cên kaw xiến kák ŋuồn vựk sâʔu vữŋcắk Ðịɲ bờkõʔi cɔ nướk xôŋ càn fạm diềʔu zăn kủʔa ŋàʔi và xi ŋàʔi cáʔidất tʰì ŋàʔi tʰợ káʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi xɔáʔilạk ŋàʔi và tʰườŋtʰườŋ vujvẻ cướk ŋàʔi ta lấʔilàm vujvẻ cỗ kó ŋườʔiở cên cáʔidất kủʔa ŋàʔi và vuitʰíc nơʔi kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ kák kɔn ơʔi hãʔi ŋɛ ʔaj ɣiữ dạʔɔ lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj xá ŋɛ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi xônŋwan cớ từcốʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋɛ lờʔi hằŋ ŋàʔi tỉɲ tʰứk tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa và cờdợʔi kák cụ kửʔa lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj vì ʔaj dượk tʰì ɣặp sốŋ và dượk kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưŋ ʔaj fạm dến hạʔi cɔ liɲhồn mìɲ kòn nàʔɔ ɣét ưʔatʰíc cết sự xônŋwan dã sâʔizựŋ ɲà mìɲ tạk tʰàɲ bảʔi kâʔi cụ kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣiết kák kɔn tʰú mìɲ fa zượʔuɲɔ mìɲ và zọn tiệk mìɲ zồʔi ŋườʔi dã saj kák ɣáʔi mìɲ di cên kák nơʔi kaw kủʔa tʰàɲ ŋườʔi zằŋ ʔaj ŋuzốt hãʔi zút vàʔɔ dấʔi vớʔi tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu xônŋwan nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến báɲ kủʔa và ʔuốŋ zượʔu dã fa xá ŋâʔizạʔi di tʰì dượk sốŋ hãʔi di tʰeo kɔn dườŋ tʰôŋ sáŋ ʔaj các zạʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ mắk fảʔi diềʔu sỉɲụk ʔaj kwở huŋák diếm cớ các ɲạʔɔbáŋ ʔɛ ɣét kɔn hãʔi các ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰì ŋườʔi ʔiêʔumến kɔn hãʔi xwiêŋiáʔɔ ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰì ŋườʔi dượk xônŋwan xá zạʔizỗ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰì ŋườʔi tʰêm citʰứk nữʔa kíɲ Ðứkzê ấʔilà xởʔidầʔu xônŋwan sự ɲìn Ðấŋtʰáɲ dó tʰôŋ sáŋ vì ɲờ kák ŋàʔi kɔn dượk tʰêm ɲiềʔu và kák nămtuổʔi kɔn dặŋ zatăŋ nếʔu kɔn xônŋwan tʰì kóíc cɔ cíɲ mìɲ kɔn nếʔu kɔn ɲạʔɔbáŋ mộtmìɲ kɔn fảʔi ɣáɲ lấʔi diênkuồŋ hăj lalốʔi nàŋ ŋumuộʔi cẳŋ ci kả nàŋ ŋồʔi nơʔi kửʔɛɲà mìɲ cên káʔi ɣế tạʔi nơʔi kaw kủʔa tʰàɲ Ðặŋ kêʔuɣọʔi ɲữŋ di dườŋ tứk ɲữŋ di tʰẳŋ dườŋ mìɲ zằŋ ʔaj ŋuzốt hãʔi zút vàʔɔ dâʔi và nàŋ nóʔi vớʔi tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu zằŋ nướk ănkắp lấʔilàm ŋọtŋàʔɔ báɲ ănvụŋ ŋɔn tʰăj ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ zằŋ cết dó và ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xác kủʔa nàŋ dềʔu zướʔi cốn sâʔu kủʔa âmfủ kɔncaj xônŋwan vuj ca mìɲ ɲưŋ dứʔa ŋumuộʔi ɣâʔi cɔ kủʔa fiŋĩʔa cẳŋ dượk íc ci sɔŋ kôŋbìɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi cết Ðứkzê xôŋ dể liɲhồn ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cịʔu dóʔixát ɲưŋŋàʔi sô duổʔi ướkaw kủʔa ák di kẻ làmviệk tăj biếŋɲák cởnên ŋèʔɔhèn kòn tăj siêŋnăŋ cɔ dượk ɣiàʔukó ʔaj tʰâʔu cử cɔŋ mùʔahè kɔncaj xônŋwan sɔŋ ŋủ lúk mùʔa ɣặt kɔncaj ɣâʔi cɔ sỉɲụk kó fướk làɲ ɣiáŋ cên dầʔu kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ miệŋ ák ɣiấʔu kườŋbạʔɔ kỷniệm ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk xɛnŋợʔi sɔŋ zanák zụk di ŋườʔi kó lòŋ xônŋwan ɲận ɲữŋ diềʔu zăn ɲưŋ kó miệŋ ŋumuộʔi fảʔi saŋã ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ di vữŋcắk kòn kɔŋ vạʔi dườŋlốʔi mìɲ cúŋ kẻ nàʔɔ ɲeo cɔ ưʔusầʔu kòn ʔaj kó miệŋ ŋumuộʔi saŋã miệŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋuồn sốŋ ɲưŋ miệŋ huŋák ɣiấʔu kườŋbạʔɔ sự ɣɛŋét suj diềʔu kãʔilộn sɔŋ lòŋ tʰươŋiêʔu kák tộʔifạm cên môʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ kó xônŋwan ɲưŋ zɔjvọt zàɲ cɔ lưŋ tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu ŋườʔi xônŋwan zàɲ dể citʰứk ɲưŋ tạʔi kớ miệŋ ŋumuộʔi bạʔihɔạʔi hòŋ dến tàʔisản ɣiàʔukó káʔi tʰàɲ kiênkố kủʔa ŋườʔi sɔŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi xốnxổ ŋèʔɔnàn kủʔa lawxổ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hướŋ sốŋ kòn hwalợʔi huŋák ciềʔu tộʔilỗʔi kẻ ŋɛ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi cɔŋ dườŋ sốŋ ɲưŋ ʔaj kwên kwởcác fảʔi lầmlạk ŋườʔi ɣiấʔu ɣɛŋét kó môʔi zốʔi ɣiả và ʔaj zảʔi diềʔu nóʔi hàɲ ŋuzạʔi hễ lờʔi vifạm nàʔɔ kó tʰiếʔu ɲưŋ ʔaj kầmzữ miệŋ mìɲ xônŋwan lưỡʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư bạk kaw kòn lòŋ huŋák xôŋ zaɣì môʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ nuôʔizạʔi ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi ɲưŋ ŋuzạʔi cết tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu fướk làɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê cɔ ɣiàʔukó ŋàʔi cẳŋ tʰêm dăwlòŋ ɣì vàʔɔ kẻ tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu kɔj ák ɲưcơʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ tʰíc xônŋwan Ðʔiềʔu ɣì huŋák sảʔi dến cɔ ɲưŋ kôŋbìɲ dượk ɲưý mìɲ ướkaw xi ɣió cốt tʰổʔi kwa huŋák xôŋ kòn nữʔa sɔŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kòn dến dờʔidờʔi ɲư ɣiấm ɣê zăŋ ɲư xóʔi kăj kẻ biếŋɲák dốʔivớʔi ŋườʔi sajxiến vậʔi sự kíɲ Ðứkzê za tʰêm ŋàʔitʰáŋ kòn nămtuổʔi ák ɣiảm di sự côŋmɔŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣiáp vujvẻ kòn côŋdợʔi kủʔa ák di kɔn dườŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲư dồnlũʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ɲưŋ bạʔihɔạʔi cɔ ák ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cẳŋ zúŋdộŋ sɔŋ ák xôŋ dượk cên dất miệŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sɛɲ xônŋwan zwi lưỡʔi kủʔa zantà cuất môʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ biếtdiềʔu dẹp ɲưŋ miệŋ huŋák cỉ nóʔi zantà kâʔi kân ɣiả lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê ɲưŋ cáʔi kân dúŋ dượk dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi xi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ dến sỉɲụk kũŋ dến nữʔa ɲưŋ xônŋwan vớʔi ŋườʔi xiêmɲượŋ sự tʰɛɲliêm kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ zẫnzắt kòn zantà kủʔa bấtcuŋ hủʔiziệt cúŋnó cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰạɲ tàʔisản cẳŋ íc ci kả zwi kôŋbìɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu xỏʔi cết sự kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi cọnvẹn bằŋ dườŋlốʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ huŋák zanák mìɲ saŋã sự kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu sɔŋ bấtcuŋ mắk cɔŋ zanák kủʔa mìɲ xi ák cết côŋmɔŋ và côŋdợʔi kủʔa kườŋbạʔɔ zwiệt ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk kứʔu xỏʔi hɔạnnạn zồʔi huŋák vàʔɔ dó tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi kẻ ák lấʔi lờʔinóʔi tàɲạʔi ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ kòn kák ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲờ citʰứk dượk kứʔu xỏʔi kả tʰàɲ dềʔu vujvẻ măimắn kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ xi ák kótiếŋ zeo mừŋ ɲờ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ cúk fướk cɔ tʰàɲ dượk kawcọŋ sɔŋ tạʔi miệŋ ák dáɲdổ kẻ nàʔɔ xiɲzể ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xôn sáŋ làmtʰiɲ kẻ di tʰèʔɔ lẻʔɔ zadiềʔu kíndáʔɔ kòn ʔaj kó lòŋ cuŋtín ɣiữ kôŋviệk zânsự saŋã tạʔi xôŋ cáɲcị sɔŋ nếʔu kó ɲiềʔu mưʔusĩ dượk ʔiênổn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ bảʔɔlãɲ cɔ ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi hạʔi ɲưŋ ʔaj ɣét kuộk bảʔɔlãɲ dượk bìɲanvôsự ŋườʔi dờn kó zwiên dượk tôncọŋ kòn ŋườʔi dờn ôŋ huŋbạʔɔ dượk tàʔisản ŋườʔi ɲơn làmlàɲ cɔ liɲhồn mìɲ kòn huŋbạʔɔ suj xổkựk cɔ tʰịt mìɲ kẻ zữ dượk kôŋ ɣiá ɣiả sɔŋ ʔaj zeo dềʔu kôŋbìɲ hưởŋ fầntʰưởŋ cắkcắn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ vữŋlòŋ kôŋbìɲ dượk dến sốŋ kòn tʰeo ák ɣâʔisự cết cɔ mìɲ kẻ kó lòŋ zantà lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê ɲưŋ ʔaj kó táɲ hạɲ cọnvẹn dượk dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi kwảtʰật zanák cẳŋ xỏʔi hìɲfạt sɔŋ zòŋzõʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk kứʔu xỏʔi một ŋườʔi dờn dẹpdẽ tʰiếʔu zẽ zặt xáknàʔɔ vòŋ vàŋ deo nơʔi mũʔi sự ʔawướk kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cỉ diềʔu tʰiện kòn diềʔu ák côŋdợʔi ấʔilà kơn tʰạɲ kó ŋườʔi zảʔi kủʔa mìɲ za lạʔi kàŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu kũŋ kó ŋườʔi cắtlót kwá bựk ɲưŋ cỉ dượk tʰiếʔutʰốn lòŋ zộŋzãʔi dượk nɔnê kòn ʔaj ɲuần ɣộʔi cíɲ ŋườʔi dượk ɲuần ɣộʔi kẻ nàʔɔ kầmzữ lúʔa tʰók zânsự zủʔasả sɔŋ cúk fướk ɣiáŋ cên dầʔu ŋườʔi za ʔaj kầʔu tʰiện diển ɲưŋ ʔaj kầʔu diềʔu ák ák sảʔi dến cɔ kẻ nàʔɔ tinkậʔi nơʔi kủʔakảʔi mìɲ siêʔu ŋã kòn ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk sɛɲtươʔi ɲư kâʔi ʔaj xuấʔizốʔi ɲà mìɲ dượk ɣió kơŋiệp kòn diênkuồŋ cởnên tôʔitớ cɔ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ xônŋwan kếtkwả kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi sốŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan kó tàʔi dượk liɲhồn ŋườʔita kìʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk báʔɔdáp nơʔi tʰế tʰượŋ fươŋci huŋák kó tộʔi ʔaj ưʔa diềʔu sửʔa fạt ưʔa citʰứk ɲưŋ ɣét kwởcác ŋâʔizạʔi ŋườʔi làɲ dượk kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲưŋÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dịɲtộʔi cɔ ŋườʔi twan mưʔu ák lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ fảʔi huŋák dượk vữŋbền sɔŋ zễ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cẳŋ lăjdộŋ ŋườʔi dờn ɲơn dứk mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cɔ cồŋ nàŋ kòn sấʔuhổ xáknàʔɔ mụk cɔŋ sươŋkốt ŋườʔi tưtưởŋ ŋườʔi ŋĩʔa cỉ kôŋbìɲ sɔŋ mưʔu ák dềʔu ɣiảzốʔi kák lờʔi huŋák zìɲzập dổ hwiết za sɔŋ miệŋ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋườʔi xỏʔi Ðáɲ dổ huŋák tʰì cẳŋ kòn nữʔa ɲưŋ ɲà ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kòn dứŋ vữŋ ŋườʔita dượk xɛnŋợʔi tùʔi tʰeo xôn sáŋ mìɲ kòn kó lòŋ vạʔi xiɲzể tʰà ŋườʔiở bựk kó tôʔitớ kòn màlạʔi tʰiếʔu ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kɔjsók sốŋ kủʔa súkvật mìɲ kòn lòŋ tʰươŋsót kủʔa zữ xáknàʔɔ huŋbạʔɔ ʔaj kàʔi dất mìɲ dượk tʰựk zưzật kòn ʔaj tʰeo biếŋɲák tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu kẻ huŋák tʰamlam kủʔa hɔạc tàʔi sɔŋ zễ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sɛɲ bôŋ cáʔi cɔŋ vifạm kủʔa môʔi miệŋ kó káʔi bẫʔi tàɲạʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi hɔạnnạn ɲờ bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa môʔi miệŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi dượk nɔ dầʔi fướk và ŋườʔita dượk báʔɔ lạʔi tùʔi tʰeo việk tăj mìɲ dã Ðườŋ lốʔi kủʔa ŋumuộʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰeo kòn ŋườʔi xônŋwan ŋɛ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi sự ɣiậnzữ kủʔa ŋumuộʔi za tứktʰì kòn ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ cɛlấp sỉɲụk mìɲ kẻ nàʔɔ nóʔi tʰật zaw cwiền kôŋbìɲ sɔŋ làmcứŋ zan fô ɣiảzốʔi lờʔi vôdộ dâm sɔj xáknàʔɔ ɣươm ɲưŋ lưỡʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰuốk hăj môʔi cântʰật dượk dỗ dờʔidờʔi sɔŋ lưỡʔi ɣiảzốʔi cỉ kòn lúk tʰôʔi sự fỉɲ ɣạt cɔŋ lòŋ twan mưʔuhạʔi ɲưŋ vujvẻ tʰuộk ŋườʔi xwiênlơn hòʔabìɲ cẳŋ tajhọʔa nàʔɔ sảʔi dến cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sɔŋ huŋák dầʔi dăwdớn môʔi miệŋ nóʔizốʔi ɣiả lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê sɔŋ ʔaj cuŋtʰàɲ dượk dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ ɣiấʔu diềʔu mìɲ kòn lòŋ ŋumuộʔi sưŋ za diênzạʔi mìɲ tăj ŋườʔi siêŋnăŋ kaicị ɲưŋ tăj biếŋɲák fảʔi fụkzịc sự buồnzầʔu nơʔi lòŋ ŋườʔilàm cɔ naw ɲưŋ lờʔi làɲ xiến lòŋ vujvẻ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ zẫn dườŋ cɔ lânkận mìɲ kòn kák nẻʔɔ zữ sajlạk cúŋ kẻ biếŋɲák xôŋ ciên nướŋ tʰịt mìɲ dã sɔŋ ŋườʔi siêŋnăŋ dượk tàʔi kwíbáʔu kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi sự sốŋ nơʔi dườŋ kôŋbìɲ cên lốʔi xôŋ kó cết kɔn xônŋwan ŋɛ xwiên zạʔi kủʔa ca sɔŋ ɲạʔɔbáŋ xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ lờʔi kwởcác ɲờ bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa miệŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi hưởŋ lấʔi làɲ kòn liɲhồn zanák diềʔu kườŋbạʔɔ kẻ kɛɲzữ miệŋ mìɲ ɣiữ dượk mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ ɲưŋ môʔi kwá bạʔihɔạʔi lòŋ biếŋɲák mɔŋướk cẳŋ kó ci kòn lòŋ ŋườʔi siêŋnăŋ dượk nɔnê ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣét lờʔi zốʔicá sɔŋ huŋák dáŋ ɣớmɣê hổtʰẹn sự kôŋbìɲ bảʔɔhộ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ɲưŋ zanák dáɲdổ fạmtộʔi kó ɣiàʔu cẳŋ kó ɣì kũŋ kó ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ lạʔi kó kủʔakảʔi ɲiềʔu ɣiá cuộk mạŋ sốŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ấʔilà kủʔakảʔi mìɲ kòn ŋèʔɔ cẳŋ ŋɛ lờʔi hămzọʔa sự sáŋ kủʔa làɲ sɔj zạŋ ŋờʔi ɲưŋ dèn ák lạʔi di sự kiêʔuŋạʔɔ cỉ sɛɲ zadiềʔu kãʔilộn kòn xônŋwan vớʔi ŋườʔi cịʔulờʔi xwiên zạʔi hɔạc tàʔi fảʔi haw kòn ʔaj lấʔi tăj tʰâʔu ɣóp dượk tʰêm kủʔa ɲiềʔu sự côŋkậʔi cì xiến lòŋ dăwdớn ɲưŋ xi ướkaw dượk tʰàɲ tʰì ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi sốŋ kẻ nàʔɔ xiɲ lờʔi zạʔi bạʔi kòn ʔaj kíɲ ɣiớʔi mạŋ nấʔi dượk tʰưởŋ sự zạʔizỗ kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan ŋuồn sốŋ Ðặŋ xiến ŋườʔita cáɲ xỏʔi bẫʔi cết sự tʰôŋ sáŋ tʰật dượk diển sɔŋ kɔn dườŋ fạmtộʔi lấʔilàm xốn kựk tʰăj fàm ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ làmviệk kứ tʰeo hiểʔubiết ɲưŋ ŋumuộʔi bàʔitỏ za diênzạʔi mìɲ sứɣiả zanák vàʔɔ tajhọʔa kòn xâmsaj cuŋtín xáknàʔɔ tʰuốk hăj ʔaj cốʔi xwiên zạʔi ŋèʔɔxổ sỉɲụk ɲưŋ nàʔɔ ɲận tiếplờʔi kwởcác dượk tôncọŋ sự ướkaw dượk tʰàɲ lấʔilàm êmzịʔu cɔ liɲhồn kòn lìʔabỏ diềʔu zữ kwảlà ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ŋumuộʔi ʔaj zawtiếp vớʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan cởnên xônŋwan ɲưŋ vớʔi diênzạʔi tàɲạʔi tajhọʔa duổʔi tʰeo kó tộʔi kòn fướk làɲ fầntʰưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi làɲ lưʔucwiền zasản cɔ kɔncáʔu mìɲ sɔŋ kủʔakảʔi kó tộʔi zàɲ cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cỗ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xajfá sɛɲ ɲiềʔu lươŋtʰựk ɲưŋ kó tiêʔu tạʔi tʰiếʔu kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kiêŋ zɔjvọt ɣét kɔncaj mìɲ sɔŋ ʔaj tʰươŋ kɔn kần lɔ sửʔa cị ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔ fỉ zạ mìɲ kòn bụŋ ák dóʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan sâʔicất ɲà mìɲ sɔŋ ŋuzạʔi lấʔi tăj mìɲ fáhủʔi di ʔaj di tʰeo ŋăitʰẳŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê kòn ʔaj vạʔi xiɲbỉ ŋàʔi cɔŋ miệŋ ŋuzạʔi kó kâʔi zɔj dáɲ fạt kiêʔuŋạʔɔ sɔŋ môʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan ɣiữ lấʔi ŋườʔi Ðâʔu xôŋ kó dó máŋ kỏ cốŋxôŋ ɲưŋ ɲiềʔu hwalợʔi zɔ nơʔi sứk dựk za ŋườʔi cứŋ cuŋtʰàɲ xôŋ nóʔizốʔi kòn làmcứŋ zan buôŋ lờʔi zốʔicá kẻ ɲạʔɔbáŋ xônŋwan xôŋ ɣặp sɔŋ citʰứk lấʔilàm zễ cɔ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ hãʔi zan sa xỏʔi ŋumuộʔi kɔn cẳŋ dượk môʔi xônŋwan nơʔi sự cí kủʔa ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ ấʔilà hiểʔu zõ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ ɲưŋ diênkuồŋ kủʔa ŋumuộʔi fỉɲ ɣạt kẻ ŋuzạʔi bỉbáŋ tộʔilỗʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ kó dượk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lòŋ ɲìn kăjdắŋ kủʔa lòŋ một ŋườʔi ŋɔạʔi xôŋ ciə vuj vớʔi dượk ɲà zanák dáɲdổ sɔŋ cạʔi ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ dượk hưŋ tʰạɲ kó kɔn dườŋ kɔj zườŋ cáɲ dáŋ cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲưŋ dến kuốʔicùŋ tʰàɲza nẻʔɔ cết zầʔu cɔŋ lúk kườʔicợt lòŋ buồntʰảm và kuốʔicùŋ vuj ấʔilà diềʔu sầʔunãʔɔ lòŋ nàʔɔ lìʔa sa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dượk nɔnê kếtkwả kủʔa mìɲ kòn ŋườʔi làɲ ɲờ cíɲ mìɲ dượk tʰỏʔaŋwiện kẻ ŋuzốt mọʔi lờʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ sɛmsét kák bướk mìɲ ŋườʔi xônŋwan cáɲ xỏʔi diềʔu ák sɔŋ ŋumuộʔi sấksượk kó lòŋ kậʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi nóŋnảʔi diên zạʔi và twan mưʔu ák ɣét kẻ ŋumuộʔi dượk diênzạʔi kơŋiệp sɔŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan dượk dộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên bằŋ citʰứk ŋườʔi ák fụk cướk ŋườʔi tʰiện và zữ kúʔi lạʔi ŋɔàʔi kửʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxó zầʔu láŋzềŋ kũŋ ɣétbỏ ɲưŋ bằŋữʔu kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu tʰì ɲiềʔu tʰăj ʔaj xiɲbỉ lânkận mìɲ fạmtộʔi kòn ʔaj tʰươŋsót ŋườʔi xốnxó lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj kẻ twan mưʔu ák cẳŋ lầmlạk saw kòn ɲơn cântʰật tʰuộk ŋườʔi twan mưʔu tʰiện cɔŋ kák tʰứ kôŋviệk dềʔu kó íclợʔi ɲưŋ miệŋ nóʔi ɲiềʔu cỉzẫn dến tʰiếʔutʰốn ɣiàʔukó mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cɔ ŋườʔi xônŋwan kòn diênkuồŋ kủʔa ŋâʔizạʔi cỉ diênkuồŋ kẻ làmcứŋ cơn tʰật ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn ŋườʔita sɔŋ nàʔɔ nóʔizốʔi ɣâʔisự fỉɲ ɣạt cɔŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê kó nơʔi nươŋkậʔi vữŋcắk và kɔnkáʔi ŋàʔi dượk nơʔi sự kíɲ Ðứkzê ŋuồn sốŋ Ðặŋ xiến ŋườʔita cáɲ xỏʔi bẫʔi cết zânsự dôŋdảʔɔ ấʔilà viɲhiển kủʔa vwa kòn zânsự ấʔi xiến cɔ kwan tướŋ bạʔi kẻ nàʔɔ cậm nóŋzận kó tʰôŋ sáŋ ɲưŋ ʔaj hăj nóŋnảʔi diênkuồŋ lòŋ bìɲ tịɲ sốŋ kủʔa tʰântʰể kòn ɣɛŋét dồ mụk kủʔa sươŋkốt kẻ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ làmɲụk Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa mìɲ kòn ʔaj tʰươŋsót ŋườʔi bầnkùŋ tôncọŋ ŋàʔi kẻ ák dáɲdổ cɔŋ zanák mìɲ ɲưŋ kôŋbìɲ kó nơʔi nươŋkậʔi zầʔu cɔŋ xi cết sự xônŋwan tạʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ kòn diềʔu cɔŋ lòŋ ŋumuộʔi dượk za sự kôŋbìɲ cɔ nướk kawcọŋ sɔŋ tộʔilỗʔi hổtʰẹn cɔ kák zântộk vwa cɔ tôʔitớ nàʔɔ xôn sáŋ ɲưŋ kơn tʰạɲ vwa nổʔi ŋịc kùŋ ɣâʔisự hổtʰẹn lờʔi dáp ɲẹ ŋuôʔi kơn ɣiận kòn lờʔi sẳŋ sớm cêʔu tʰạɲ tʰêm lưỡʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan cwiền za citʰứk kác fảʔi ɲưŋ miệŋ ŋumuộʔi cỉ buôŋ diềʔu diênkuồŋ kɔn Ðứkzê xắp mọʔi nơʔi sɛmsét zanák ŋườʔi lươŋtʰiện lưỡʔi hiềnlàɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi sốŋ sɔŋ lưỡʔi zantà cɔ tâmtʰần kẻ ŋuzạʔi xiɲ xwiên zạʔi kủʔa ca mìɲ kòn ʔaj ɣiữ tʰeo lờʔi kwởcác cởnên xônxéʔɔ cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kó ɲiềʔu kwí sɔŋ cɔŋ huêlợʔi zanák kódiềʔu zốʔilɔạn môʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan zảʔi citʰứk za ɲưŋ lòŋ ŋumuộʔi cẳŋ ɲưvậʔi kủʔa zanák lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê sɔŋ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ dượk dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi Ðườŋ lốʔi ák lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê ɲưŋŋàʔi tʰươŋmến ŋườʔi nàʔɔ tʰeo kôŋbìɲ sự hìɲfạt nặŋnề zàɲ cɔ cáɲ và ɣét lờʔi kwởcác cết ʔaâm fủ cốn cầmluân kòn cướk Ðứkzê tʰăj fươŋci lòŋ kủʔa kɔnkáʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kẻ ɲạʔɔbáŋ xôŋ ưʔa ŋườʔita kwởcác mìɲ hắn xôŋ dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan lòŋ xɔáʔilạk cɔ mặtmàʔi vujvẻ ɲưŋ tạʔi lòŋ cí naw lòŋ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ citʰứk kòn miệŋ ŋumuộʔi nuôʔi lấʔi mìɲ bằŋ diênkuồŋ kák ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn dềʔu zɛɲiểm sɔŋ lòŋ vuimừŋ zự ʔiếntiệk tʰà kó kủʔa kíɲ Ðứkzê kòn tàʔisản ɲiềʔu bốʔizốʔi kặp tʰeo tʰà zăw tʰươŋiêʔu ɲăw kòn béʔɔ vớʔi ɣɛɲɣét kặp tʰeo ŋườʔi hăj ɣiận ɣâʔi diềʔu dáɲlộn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cậm nóŋzận ŋuôʔi kơn cɛɲkãʔi Ðườŋ biếŋɲák ɲư hàŋzàʔɔ ɣaj kòn nẻʔɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ dượk bằŋ kɔn xônŋwan vujvẻ ca kòn dứʔa ŋumuộʔi xiɲbỉ mìɲ kẻ tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu lấʔi diênzạʔi vuj sɔŋ ŋườʔi xôn sáŋ sửʔa dườŋ mìɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ zồʔi di Ðâʔu xôŋ kó ŋịluận dó mưʔu dàɲ fảʔi fế ɲưŋ ɲờ kó ɲiềʔu mưʔusĩ mưʔu dịɲ dượk tʰàɲ miệŋ hăj dáp ɣiỏʔi xiến ŋườʔi vujvẻ và lờʔinóʔi fảʔi tʰì lấʔilàm biếtbaw kɔn dườŋ sốŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan zẫn cên cáɲ xỏʔi âmfủ zướʔi tʰấp Ðứkzê dáɲdổ ɲà kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ɲưŋŋàʔi vữŋcắk kák mộk ɣiớʔi kủʔa ɣóʔabụʔa kák mưʔu ák lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê sɔŋ lờʔi tʰɛɲsạc dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi ŋườʔi tʰam lợʔi zốʔilɔạn ɲà mìɲ kòn ʔaj ɣét kủʔa hốʔilộ dượk sốŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ swiŋĩ lờʔi fảʔi dáp ɲưŋ miệŋ ák buôŋ zadiềʔu zữ Ðứkzê sakác ák ɲưŋŋàʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ sự sáŋ kɔn xiến lòŋ vujvẻ và tinlàɲ cɔ sươŋkốt dượk béʔɔtốt kẻ nàʔɔ ŋɛ lờʔi kwởcác kủʔa sốŋ sẽ dượk ɣiữʔa kák ŋườʔi xônŋwan ʔaj từcốʔi xwiên zạʔi xiɲbỉ liɲhồn mìɲ ɲưŋ ʔaj ŋɛ lờʔi kwởcác dượk tʰôŋ sáŋ sự kíɲ Ðứkzê zạʔizỗ diềʔu xônŋwan và xiêmɲượŋ di cướk tôncọŋ việk twan liệʔu kủʔa lòŋ tʰuộk lɔàʔiŋườʔi kòn dáp lờʔi kủʔa lưỡʔi zɔ Ðứkzê dến kák dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi dềʔu cɔŋsạc tʰeo mìɲ sɔŋÐứkzê kânɲắk káʔi lòŋ hãʔi fó kák việk mìɲ cɔ Ðứkzê tʰì ɲữŋ mưʔu mìɲ dượk tʰàɲkôŋ Ðứkzê dã zựŋ dể zùŋ cɔ ŋàʔi dỗʔi ák kũŋ vậʔi dểzàɲ cɔ ŋàʔi tajhọʔa fàm ʔaj kó lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê kwảtʰật cẳŋ dượk xỏʔi fạt ɲờ ɲơn cơn tʰật tộʔilỗʔi dượk cuộk và bởʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê ŋườʔita sâʔi diềʔu ák xi táɲ hạɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dẹplòŋ Ðứkzê tʰìŋàʔi kũŋ xiến kák tʰùŋịc ŋườʔiở hòʔatʰuận vớʔi ŋườʔi tʰà kủʔa kó kôŋbìɲ hơn ɲiềʔu hwalợʔi vớʔi bấtŋĩʔa kặp tʰeo lòŋ ŋườʔi twan dịɲ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ sɔŋÐứkzê cỉzẫn kák bướk kủʔa ŋườʔi lờʔi kủʔa cúʔa môʔi vwa miệŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ sajlầm xi sétdɔán cáʔi kân kân kôŋbìɲ tʰuộk Ðứkzê kák cáʔi kân cɔŋ baw kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋàʔi làm zanák ấʔilà diềʔu ɣớmɣiếk cɔ vwɛcúʔa vì ɲờ kôŋbìɲ ŋôʔi nướk dượk vữŋbền môʔi miệŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ vujvẻ cɔ kák vwa họ ưʔa nóʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa vwa xáknàʔɔ sứɣiả cết ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan cɔ ŋuôʔi di ɲờ sắk vwa sáŋsủʔa dượk sốŋ ʔaân diển ŋườʔi xáknàʔɔ áŋ mâʔi zẫn mưʔa Ðượk xônŋwan tʰật kwí vàŋzòŋ biếtmấʔi Ðượk tʰôŋ sáŋ dáŋ cuộŋ bạk biếtbaw Ðạʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ ấʔilà lìʔabỏ ák ʔaj kɛɲzữ táɲ mìɲ ɣiữ lấʔi liɲhồn mìɲ sự kiêʔuŋạʔɔ di cướk bạʔihɔạʔi tʰeo săw và táɲ tựkaw di cướk saŋã tʰà xiêmɲượŋ vớʔi ŋườʔi ɲumì kòn ciə kủʔa kướp kùŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ʔaj ɣiữ tʰeo dạʔɔlý dượk íc và ʔaj côŋkậʔi nơʔi Ðứkzê lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj ʔaj kó lòŋ xônŋwan dượk ɣọʔilà tʰôŋ sáŋ lờʔi zịʔuzàŋ za tʰêm citʰứk ŋườʔi kó dượk tʰôŋ sáŋ tứk kó dượk ŋuồn sốŋ ɲưŋ diênzạʔi kủʔa ŋumuộʔi ấʔilà sửʔa fạt kủʔa lòŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan zạʔizỗ miệŋ mìɲ và tʰêm họktʰứk nơʔi môʔi kủʔa mìɲ lờʔi làɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư tàŋ ʔɔŋ ŋɔnŋọt cɔ xỏʔɛmạɲ cɔ sươŋkốt kó kɔn dườŋ kɔj zườŋ cáɲ dáŋ cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲưŋ kuốʔicùŋ tʰàɲza káʔi nẻʔɔ cết sự dóʔi kủʔa lawxổ ɣiúp làmviệk cɔ ŋườʔi bởʔivì miệŋ ŋườʔi tʰúkzụk ŋườʔi tʰằŋ diếm twan mưʔuhạʔi ŋườʔita và cên môʔi kó ɲư ŋọn lửʔa hừŋ kẻ zantà zeo diềʔu cɛɲ kạɲ và tʰèʔɔ lẻʔɔ fânzẽ ɲữŋ tʰiếtkốt kẻ kườŋbạʔɔ kwiến zụ bậʔu mìɲ và zẫn ŋườʔi vàʔɔ kɔn dườŋxôŋ kẻ nàʔɔ ɲắmmắt dặŋ twan liệʔu dềʔu zantà và nàʔɔ môʔi mìɲ dềʔu tʰàɲ việk ák tók bạk mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên viɲhiển miễnlà tʰấʔi cɔŋ dườŋ kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi cậm nóŋzận tʰắŋ ŋườʔi zõŋ và ʔaj kaicị lòŋ mìɲ tʰắŋ ciếm lấʔi tʰàɲ ŋườʔita tʰăm cɔŋ áʔɔ sɔŋ ɲứt dịɲ zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê dến tʰà miếŋ báɲ xô hòʔatʰuận kòn ɲà dầʔi tʰịt lạʔi kãʔilộn ɲăw tôʔitớ xôn sáŋ kwảncị kɔncaj sấʔuhổ và dượk hưởŋ fần kơŋiệp ɣiữʔa kák ʔɛɲɛm nồʔi zót dể lwiện bạk dể lwiện vàŋ ɲưŋÐứkzê tʰử lòŋ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi kẻ ák cămcỉ môʔi zanák kẻ hăj nóʔizốʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ lưỡʔi dộk ʔaj ɲạʔɔbáŋ ŋườʔi bầnkùŋ sỉɲụk Ðấŋ tạʔɔhóʔa mìɲ ʔaj vuimừŋ tajhọʔa cẳŋ dượk tʰɔát xỏʔi fạt mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên kủʔa ôŋzà ấʔilà kɔncáʔu kòn viɲhiển kủʔa kɔnkáʔi ấʔilà ôŋca lờʔi tốtlàɲ xôŋ sứŋ vớʔi ŋu môʔi miệŋ ɣiảzốʔi lạʔi kàŋ sứŋ cɔ vwɛcúʔa tʰăj kủʔa hốʔilộ ɣiốŋ ɲư ŋọk kwí cướk ʔaj dượk zầʔu sâʔi cở fíʔa nàʔɔ kũŋ dượk măimắn kẻ nàʔɔ ɣiấʔu tộʔilỗʔi kầʔu diềʔu tìɲáʔi kòn ʔaj ɲắk lạʔi diềʔu ɣì ciəzẽ bậʔu tʰiếtkốt lờʔi kwởcác tʰấm sâʔu vàʔɔ ŋườʔi xônŋwan hơn căm zɔj dáɲ vàʔɔ ŋumuộʔi kẻzan ák cỉ diềʔu fảnŋịc vìvậʔi saj sứɣiả zữtợn di dáɲ tʰà ŋườʔita ɣặp ɣấʔu káʔi kướp kɔn hơn ɣặp ŋâʔizạʔi tʰeo diênkuồŋ tajhọʔa xôŋ lìʔa xỏʔi ɲà kủʔa lấʔi ák cả tʰiện xởʔidầʔu cɛɲ kạɲ ấʔi ɲư ŋườʔita mởdườŋ nướk cảʔi vậʔi xá tʰôʔi kãʔilẫʔi cướk xi dáɲlộn ʔaj sưŋ áklà kôŋbìɲ nàʔɔ cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kả haj diềʔu lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê kẻ ŋumuộʔi tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu tʰếtʰì bạk cɔŋ tăj mwa xônŋwan ci bằŋữʔu tʰươŋmến ɲăw và ʔɛɲɛm sɛɲ za dể ɣiúpdỡ cɔŋ lúk hɔạnnạn kẻ ŋumuộʔi zaw tăj cịʔu bảʔɔlãɲ cướk lânkận mìɲ ʔaj ưʔa cɛɲ kạɲ ưʔa tộʔilỗʔi ʔaj sâʔicất kửʔamìɲ kaw diềʔu kẻ nàʔɔ kó lòŋ vàʔivò xôŋ dượk fướk hạɲ và ʔaj kó lưỡʔi zantà vàʔɔ tajhạʔi ʔaj sɛɲ kɔn ŋumuộʔi kó buồnzầʔu kòn ca kủʔa ŋâʔizạʔi cẳŋ dượk vujvẻ lòŋ vuimừŋ fươŋtʰuốk hăj kòn cí naw sươŋkốt xôhéʔɔ ŋườʔi zanák lãɲ ɲẹm kủʔa hốʔilộ Ðặŋ sajlệc kák lốʔi sétdɔán kó xônŋwan cướk ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ sɔŋ kɔn ŋumuộʔi nơʔi dịʔakựk kɔn ŋumuộʔi diềʔu buồnzầʔu cɔ ca và kăjdắŋ cɔ dã sɛɲ dẻ lấʔilàm cẳŋ fạtvạ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hăjlà dáɲ ŋườʔi tướkvị kớ lòŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kiêŋ lờʔinóʔi mìɲ kó citʰứk kòn ŋườʔi kó táɲ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ xi nínlặŋ zầʔu ŋườʔi ŋuzạʔi kũŋ dượk kầmbằŋ xônŋwan kòn nàʔɔ ŋậm môʔi miệŋ mìɲ lạʔi dượk tʰôŋ sáŋ kẻ nàʔɔ ởziêŋ kác diềʔu cíɲ mìɲ ưʔatʰíc nó kãʔicọ vớʔi ɲữŋ xônŋwan tʰật kẻ ŋumuộʔi xôŋ ưʔatʰíc tʰôŋ sáŋ ɲưŋ cỉ lòŋ dượk bàʔitỏ za xi zanák dến xiɲbỉ kũŋ dến nữʔa và sỉɲụk dến vớʔi diềʔu ɲuốkɲa lờʔinóʔi kủʔa miệŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư nướk sâʔu ŋuồn xônŋwan xáknàʔɔ káʔi xɛ nướk cảʔi lấʔilàm cẳŋ ák Ðặŋ lườŋɣạt ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔŋ việk sétdɔán môʔi ŋumuộʔi vàʔɔkuộk cɛɲ kạɲ và miệŋ ciềʔu dáɲdập miệŋ ŋumuộʔi bạʔihɔạʔi kủʔa môʔi kaj bẫʔi ɣàʔi liɲhồn kủʔa lờʔi tʰèʔɔ lẻʔɔ ɲư tʰựk ŋɔn và tʰấʔu dến zuộtɣan kẻ tʰả côʔi cɔŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ kũŋ ʔɛɲɛm kủʔa fáhạʔi zɛɲÐứkzê ŋọn tʰáp kiênkố kẻ kôŋbìɲ cạʔi dến dó ɣặp dượk nơʔi cú kaw tàʔi ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu ấʔilà káʔi tʰàɲ kiênkố kủʔa ŋườʔi cɔŋ ýtưởŋ ŋườʔi cɔ ɲư bứk tườŋ kaw cướk xi bạʔihɔạʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi tựkaw sɔŋ xiêmɲượŋ di cướk tôncọŋ cảlờʔi cướk xi ŋɛ Ấʔilà diênzạʔi hổtʰẹn cɔ ʔaj làmvậʔi tâmtʰần ŋườʔi nâŋdỡ bịɲ hɔạn mìɲ ɲưŋ cí naw ʔaj cịʔu saw nổʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ dượk citʰứk và taj ŋườʔi xônŋwan hiểʔubiết
