kủʔa kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zẹp dườŋ cɔ ŋườʔi và zẫn ŋườʔi dến cướk saŋcọŋ ŋườʔi káʔɔ ŋɛ ɲư fảʔi sɔŋ dàŋ kiə dến casét ŋườʔi sự bắttʰăm zẹp diềʔu cɛɲtụŋ và fânzẽ ɲữŋ kó kwiềntʰế một ʔɛɲɛm mếclòŋ lấʔi làmxó dượklòŋ lạʔi ciếm tʰủ káʔi tʰàɲ kiênkố sự cɛɲzàɲ zườŋ ấʔi xáknàʔɔ ɲữŋ cốt kửʔa dền bụŋ ŋườʔi dượk nɔnê bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa miệŋ mìɲ huêlợʔi môʔi miệŋ mìɲ cɔ ŋườʔi nɔdủ sốŋcết nơʔi kwiền kủʔa lưỡʔi kẻ áʔimộ bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa ʔaj dượk ŋườʔi tứk dượk diềʔu fướk và hưởŋ dượk diển kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ zùŋ lờʔi kầʔusin kòn ɣiàʔu dáp lạʔi kác sẳŋ sớm ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dượk ɲiềʔu bằŋữʔu hạʔi cɔ mìɲ ɲưŋ kó cíʔu ʔɛɲɛm zuột tʰà ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ tʰɛɲliêm kòn môʔi miệŋ zantà ŋâʔizạʔi lòŋ tʰiếʔu citʰứk ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi diềʔu hăj vả nàʔɔ vộʔi bướk fạm sự ŋuzạʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cɔ hưhỏŋ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ và lòŋ ŋườʔi ʔɔán Ðứkzê sự ɣiàʔukó ɲiềʔu bậʔu kòn xóxăn zầʔu kũŋ lìʔabỏ cứŋ zan nàʔɔ cẳŋ fạt và buôŋ diềʔu ɣiảzốʔi xôŋ saw tʰɔát xỏʔi kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi zộŋzãʔi và mỗʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu bằŋữʔu kủʔa hăj hếttʰảʔi ʔɛɲɛm zuột kủʔa ŋèʔɔ dềʔu ɣét ŋườʔi fươŋci bậʔu lìʔa sa xỏʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi lờʔi duổʔi tʰeo cúŋ cúŋ cẳŋ kòn dó nữʔa ʔaj kó dượk xônŋwan tʰươŋmến liɲhồn mìɲ kòn ʔaj ɣiữ lấʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ dượk fướk hạɲ cứŋ zan cẳŋ tʰɔát xỏʔi fạt và buôŋ lờʔi ɣiảzốʔi ʔaên suŋsướŋ cẳŋ sứŋ cɔ ŋumuộʔi fươŋci tôʔimọʔi kaicị kák hɔàŋtử sự xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi xiến cɔ ŋườʔi cậm nóŋzận và ŋườʔi lấʔilàm zɛɲzự bỏkwa tộʔifạm vwa tʰạɲ xáknàʔɔ ɣầm tʰét kòn zịc ŋườʔi ɲư sươŋmók suốŋ cên dồŋkỏ kɔncaj ŋumuộʔi tajhọʔa cɔ ca và cɛɲkãʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi máŋsốʔi hằŋ cảʔi ɲàkửʔa tàʔisản kơŋiệp kủʔa tổfụ dể lạʔi kòn ŋườʔi xônŋwan zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê dến sự biếŋɲák cɔ ŋủmê và liɲhồn cễnảʔi dóʔixát ʔaj ɣìŋiữ diềʔu zăn ɣìŋiữ lấʔi liɲhồn mìɲ ɲưŋ nàʔɔ xôŋ kɔicừŋ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ tʰák ʔaj tʰươŋsót ŋèʔɔ tứk cɔ Ðứkzê văimượn ŋàʔi báʔɔ lạʔi việk làɲ ấʔi cɔ ŋườʔi hãʔi sửʔa fạt kɔnŋươʔi cɔŋ lúk kòn côŋkậʔi ɲưŋ cớ twan lòŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi hăj nóŋzận zữtợn fảʔi maŋ hìɲ vì nếʔu kɔn ɣiảʔicứʔu fảʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu lạʔinữʔa hăj ŋɛ lờʔi xwiên zạʔi tiếpɲận ɣiáʔɔ hốʔi kɔn dượk xônŋwan cɔŋ lúk kuốʔicùŋ cɔŋ lòŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kó ɲiềʔu mưʔukế sɔŋ cỉ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰàɲ dượk lòŋ ɲơn kủʔa ŋườʔilàm cɔ ŋườʔita ʔiêʔucuộŋ mìɲ và ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ nóʔizốʔi sự kíɲ Ðứkzê zẫn dến sốŋ làm cɔ ŋườʔita dượk tʰỏʔaŋwiện xôŋ tajhọʔa dến kẻ biếŋɲák tʰò tăj mìɲ cɔŋ zĩʔa zồʔi xôŋ tʰèm dɛm miệŋ mìɲ nữʔa hãʔi dáɲ ɲạʔɔbáŋ tʰì ŋườʔi ŋuzạʔi cởnên xônxéʔɔ xá sửʔa zạʔi ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ ŋườʔi hiểʔu diềʔu citʰứk kẻ hãmhạʔi ca mìɲ sô duổʔi mìɲ là kɔncaj ɣâʔi hổŋươʔi ciêʔu sỉɲụk hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi tʰôʔi ŋɛ xwiên zạʔi xiến cɔ kɔn lầmlạk kác sa kák lờʔi citʰứk cứŋ zantà ɲạʔɔbáŋ kôŋbìɲ và miệŋ zữ tộʔiák sự sétdɔán zựbị cɔ ɲạʔɔbáŋ và zɔjvọt sắmsửʔa cɔ lưŋ ŋumuộʔi zượʔu xiến ŋườʔita ɲạʔɔbáŋ dồ ʔuốŋ săj cɔ hỗnláʔɔ fàm ʔaj zùŋ kwádộ cẳŋ fảʔi xônŋwan sự waj xiếp kủʔa vwa ɣiốŋ ɲư ɣầm ʔaj cọkzận ŋườʔi fạm dến mạŋ sốŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiữmìɲ xỏʔi cɛɲ kạɲ ấʔilà tônviɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi cỉ diênkuồŋ vàʔɔ dó tʰôʔi vì kó mùʔadôŋ biếŋɲák cẳŋ kàʔi zuộŋ kwa mùʔa ɣặt sin ɲưŋ cẳŋ dượk ɣì mưʔukế cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔita ɲư nướk sâʔu ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ múk lấʔi tạʔi dó fầnɲiềʔu ŋườʔi xwejxwaŋ ɲơn mìɲ ɲưŋ ʔaj dượk ŋườʔi cuŋtʰàɲ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kác tʰɛɲliêm ɲữŋ kɔncáʔu ŋườʔi lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj vwa ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi sétdɔán lấʔi mìɲ dáɲ kák diềʔu ák ʔaj kótʰể nóʔi ta dã lwiện sạc lòŋ mìɲ ta dã cɔŋsạc tộʔi zồʔi haj tʰứ cáʔi kân haj tʰứ lườŋ kả haj dềʔu ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê kôŋviệk kɔncẻ hɔặk cɔŋsạc hɔặk cáɲ dáŋ kũŋ dềʔu táɲ za taj dể ŋɛ dể tʰấʔi Ðứkzê dã za kả haj cớ ưʔa ŋủ ʔɛ cɔ ŋườʔi cởnên ŋèʔɔxổ căŋ hãʔi za tʰì dượk nɔnê báɲ kẻ mwa nóʔi zằŋ xôŋ xôŋ Ðʔɔạn di xwejxwaŋ mìɲ kó vàŋ ɲiềʔu câʔuŋọk sɔŋ miệŋ kó citʰứk bửʔu kwíɣiá hãʔi kầm lấʔi áʔɔ kó bảʔɔlãɲ cɔ ŋườʔi xák hãʔi buộk kủʔa kầm bởʔi dáp tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi dờn báɲ ɲờ zốʔi ɣạt dượk lấʔilàm ŋɔnŋọt cɔ ŋườʔi ɲưŋ săw miệŋ ŋườʔi dầʔi ɲờ kák mưʔukế dượk dịɲ vữŋvàŋ hãʔi dáɲ ɣiặk kác xônxéʔɔ kẻ nàʔɔ di tʰèʔɔ lẻʔɔ bầʔi diềʔu kíndáʔɔ vậʔi cớ zawtʰôŋ vớʔi hăj môʔi kwá ŋọn dèn kủʔa zủʔa camẹ mìɲ sẽ ɣiữʔa vùŋ tămtốʔi sảnŋiệp mìɲ dượk vộʔivã lúk bandầʔu và kuốʔicùŋ cẳŋ dặŋ fướk cớ nóʔi ta cả ák hãʔi cờdợʔi Ðứkzê ŋàʔi kứʔuzỗʔi kɔn cáʔi kân haj tʰứ lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ Ðứkzê và kâʔi kân ɣiả nàʔɔ fảʔi tốtlàɲ kák bướk kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê ɲứt dịɲ vậʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi hiểʔu dườŋlốʔi mìɲ saw dượk nóʔi kác zằŋ vậʔi nầʔi tʰáɲ và săw xi dã xấn ŋwiện zồʔi mớʔi swisét dến ấʔi kwả káʔi bẫʔi cɔ ŋườʔita vwa xônŋwan ák và xiến báɲ sɛlăn kán cúŋnó liɲ táɲ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ŋọn dèn kủʔa Ðứkzê zò tʰấʔu kák nơʔi kủʔa lòŋ sự ɲântừ cơn tʰật bảʔɔhộ vwa ŋườʔi lấʔilòŋ ɲântừ nâŋdỡ ŋôʔi nướk mìɲ sứklựk kủʔa ɣã caicẻ viɲhiển kủʔa ŋườʔi kòn tók bạk tôncọŋ kủʔa ôŋzà ɲữŋ tʰươŋtíc zấʔu cɔ sạc diềʔu ák và zɔjvọt tʰấm vàʔɔ nơʔi kíndáʔɔ kủʔa lòŋ lòŋ kủʔa vwa cɔŋ tăj Ðứkzê xáknàʔɔ zòŋ nướk cảʔi ŋàʔi ŋiêŋ lệc nàʔɔ tùʔiý ŋàʔi kák dườŋlốʔi kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi dềʔu cáɲ dáŋ tʰeo sɔŋÐứkzê kânɲắk káʔi lòŋ làm tʰeo kôŋbìɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ Ðượk dẹplòŋ Ðứkzê kủʔa mặt tựkaw lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ và ŋọn dèn kủʔa ák dềʔu tộʔilỗʔi kák ýtưởŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kầnmẫn zẫn dến zưzật kòn ɲữŋ xờzạʔi cỉ cạʔi dếndiềʔu tʰiếʔutʰốn tàʔi ɲờ zùŋ lưỡʔi zốʔi ɣạt dượk Ấʔilà diềʔu hưxôŋ măw kủʔa cết sự kườŋbạʔɔ kủʔa ák dùʔa cúŋnó di vì cúŋnó xôŋ xứŋ diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ kɔn dườŋ kủʔa ɣáɲ tộʔi kwɛɲ kwẹʔɔ kòn kôŋviệk cɔŋsạc ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰà nơʔi só nók ɲà hơn cuŋ ɲà vớʔi ŋườʔi dờn hăj cɛɲ kạɲ lòŋ zữ ʔawướk diềʔu ák kẻ lânkận xôŋ dượk cướk xi ɲạʔɔbáŋ fạt ŋườʔi ŋuzạʔi cởnên xônŋwan xi xwiên zạʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan ŋườʔi ɲận lãɲsự citʰứk kó Ðấŋ kôŋbìɲ sɛmsét kỹkàŋ ɲà ák Ðấŋ ấʔi sô ɲữŋ ák vàʔɔ tajhọʔa ʔaj bưŋ taj xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kêʔula kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ ŋườʔi dó kũŋ kêʔula cẳŋ kó ʔaj dáp lạʔi kủʔa zâŋ kínɲiệm ŋuôʔi kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa hốʔilộ dút vàʔɔ lòŋ ŋất kơn ɣiậnzữ làm diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ ấʔilà việk vujvẻ cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ ɣâʔi bạʔihɔạʔi cɔ zanák ŋườʔi lầmlạk sa dườŋ xôn sáŋ sẽ vớʔi hộʔi cết ʔaj vuicơʔi ŋèʔɔxó kòn ʔaj ưʔa zượʔu vớʔi zầʔu cẳŋ làmzàʔu kẻ áklà ɣiá cuộk ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và zốʔi ɣạt tʰế cỗ cɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰà nơʔi vắŋvẻ hơn vớʔi ŋườʔi dờn hăj cɛɲ kạɲ nóŋzận kó bửʔu zầʔu cɔŋ ɲà ŋườʔi xônŋwan ɲưŋ ŋumuộʔi di ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kầʔu kôŋbìɲ ɲơn dượk sốŋ kôŋbìɲ tôncọŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰàɲ zõŋ Ðáɲ sứklựk nươŋkậʔi ʔaj ɣiữ lấʔi miệŋ lưỡʔi mìɲ ɣiữ liɲhồn mìɲ xỏʔi hɔạnnạn ɲạʔɔbáŋ ấʔilà kủʔa ŋườʔi kiêʔukăŋ kaw kác nó kưsử kác sấksượk tʰeo táɲ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa sự ướkaw kủʔa biếŋɲák ɣiết cết bởʔivì haj tăj xôŋ xứŋ làmviệk kó ŋườʔi cót ŋàʔi kwá ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cɔ xôŋ cắtlót kủʔa kủʔa áklà ɣớmɣiếk fươŋci dɛm dến kó ák tưởŋ cứŋ zốʔi ɣiả di ɲưŋ ŋườʔi hăj ŋɛ tʰeo nóʔi dượk mãʔimãʔi kẻ ák caj màʔi dá kòn ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ vữŋ dườŋlốʔi mìɲ cẳŋ kó xônŋwan nàʔɔ tʰôŋmiɲ nàʔɔ hăjlà mưʔukế nàʔɔ mà cốŋ dịc Ðứkzê dượk ŋựʔa sắmsửʔa ŋàʔi cɛɲ ciến ɲưŋ tʰắŋ cận tʰuộk Ðứkzê zɛɲtiếŋ kòn tiềnkủʔa ɲiềʔu và ơnŋĩʔa kwí bạk vàŋ kẻ ɣiàʔu ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ dềʔu ɣặp ɲăw Ðứkzê dã zựŋ kả haj ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰấʔi dềʔu tajvạ mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋumuộʔi kứ di mắk fảʔi fầntʰưởŋ kủʔa xiêmɲượŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê Ấʔilà ɣiàʔukó tôncọŋ mạŋ sốŋ cɔŋ dườŋ zantà kó ɣaj côŋ káʔi bẫʔi ʔaj ɣìŋiữ liɲhồn mìɲ kác sa hãʔi zạʔi cɔ cẻtʰơ kɔn dườŋ fảʔi tʰeo zầʔu xi cởvề ɣià kũŋ xôŋ lìʔa xỏʔi dó ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu kwản ŋèʔɔ kẻ nàʔɔ tôʔitớ kủʔa cɔ kẻ nàʔɔ zaw bấtkôŋ ɣặt diềʔu tajhọʔa và kâʔi zɔj tʰạɲ ɣãʔi di ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó từtʰiện dượk fướk vì ŋườʔi báɲ mìɲ cɔ ŋèʔɔxó hãʔi duổʔi ɲạʔɔbáŋ za tʰì kãʔilẫʔi kũŋ di Ðʔiềʔu cɛɲ kạɲ sỉɲụk ʔaj áʔimộ lòŋ tʰáɲ sạc và kó zwiên nơʔi môʔi miệŋ mìɲ dượk vwa ŋĩʔa mắt kủʔa Ðứkzê kɔj ɣiữ ŋườʔi kó citʰứk ɲưŋŋàʔi dáɲdổ lờʔi zantà kẻ biếŋɲák nóʔi kó kɔn ŋɔàʔi dó tôʔi ɣiết tạʔi ɣiữʔa dườŋ miệŋ kủʔa zâmfụ káʔi sâʔu ʔaj Ðứkzê ɣiận saŋã vàʔɔ dó sự ŋuzạʔi buộk vàʔɔ lòŋ kɔncẻ sɔŋ zɔj zăn fạt cɔ ấʔi lìʔa sa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ŋèʔɔ cɔ ɣiàʔukó và ʔaj kɔ ɣiàʔukó cỉ cɔ ŋườʔi vàʔɔ tʰiếʔutʰốn hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi xônŋwan xá cwiên lòŋ kɔn citʰứk vì nếʔu kɔn ɣìŋiữ cɔŋ lòŋ kɔn lập cuŋ ɲăw cên môʔi miệŋ kɔn tʰì ấʔi tʰật tốtdẹp ŋàʔinăj dã zạʔi cɔ kɔn hiểʔubiết kák diềʔu dó kɔn kó lòŋ tinkậʔi Ðứkzê ta cẳŋ kó cép cɔ kɔn ɲữŋ diềʔu mưʔu citʰứk saw cɔ kɔn kwảkwiết kủʔa lờʔi cânlý hầʔu cɔ kɔn lấʔi lờʔi tʰật dáp lạʔi vớʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi saj kɔn cớ bóklột ŋèʔɔ bởʔivì ŋèʔɔ kũŋ dừŋ ŋườʔi xốnxổ nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ vìÐứkzê biɲ vựk zwiênkớ kủʔa và dɔạt lấʔi sốŋ kủʔa kó kướp cớ vớʔi ŋườʔi hăj ɣiận cớ zawtế kùŋ kườŋbạʔɔ ʔɛ kɔn tʰeo dườŋlốʔi và liɲhồn kɔn bẫʔi hãmhạʔi căŋ cớ dồŋbọn kùŋ ɲữŋ zaw tăj ɲăw hɔặk kùŋ bảʔɔlãɲ nếʔu kɔn xôŋ kó ɣì cả kớsaw kɔn cúŋ dɔạt lấʔi káʔi ɣiườŋ kɔn di cớ zờʔi di kák mộk ɣiớʔi kũ mà tổfụ kɔn dã zựŋ kɔn kó tʰấʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ siêŋnăŋ cɔŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ căŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi dứŋ cướk kák vwa cớ cẳŋ fảʔi cướk ŋườʔi dâʔu xi kɔn ŋồʔi bữʔa vớʔi kwan cưởŋ hãʔi sét ŋườʔiở cướk kɔn nếʔu kɔn kó láʔu xá dể kɔn zaw nơʔi họŋ kɔn cớ tʰèm ŋɔn kủʔa ŋườʔi vì tʰựk fỉɲ ɣạt kɔn cớ cịʔu dặŋ làmzàʔu xá tʰôʔi ɲờkậʔi xônŋwan ziêŋ kủʔa kɔn kɔn liếk vàʔɔ ɣiàʔukó saw nó dã cẳŋ kòn nữʔa zồʔi vì kwả kó mọk káɲ và băj cên cờʔi ɲư cim ưŋ vậʔi cớ báɲ kủʔa kó zanák và dừŋ tʰam ɲữŋ ŋɔn kủʔa vì tưởŋ cɔŋ lòŋ tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì kwả tʰể ấʔi hắn nóʔi vớʔi kɔn zằŋ hãʔi ănuốŋ di ɲưŋ cɔŋ lòŋ cẳŋ kùŋ kɔn miếŋ kɔn dã kɔn mửʔa za và ɲữŋ lờʔi hòʔa kủʔa kɔn cớ nóʔi vàʔɔ taj ŋumuộʔi vì xiɲzể xônŋwan kủʔa kák lờʔi kɔn cớ zờʔi di mộk ɣiớʔi kũ Ðừŋ vàʔɔ cɔŋ dồŋzuộŋ kủʔa mồkôʔi vìÐấŋ kứʔucuộk kủʔa kwiềnnăŋ sẽ biɲ vựk káʔɔ tụŋ kủʔa cúŋnó ŋịc vớʔi kɔn hãʔi cwiên lòŋ xwiên zạʔi và lắŋtaj ŋɛ kák lờʔi citʰứk cớ tʰa sửʔa fạt cẻtʰơ zầʔu dáɲ bằŋ zɔjvọt cẳŋ cết dâʔu xi kɔn dáɲ bằŋ zɔjvọt ʔaét ɣiảʔicứʔu liɲhồn xỏʔi âmfủ hỡʔi kɔn nếʔu lòŋ kɔn xônŋwan tʰì lòŋ kũŋ dượk vuimừŋ fảʔi cáɲ zuộtɣan xi miệŋ kɔn nóʔi diềʔu ŋăitʰẳŋ lòŋ kɔn cớ fânbì vớʔi huŋák ɲưŋ hằŋ ŋàʔi hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê vì kwả kó tʰưởŋ tʰiện và côŋdợʔi kủʔa kɔn cẳŋ tʰàɲza luốŋ kôŋ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ŋɛ cởnên xônŋwan xá zẫn lòŋ kɔn vàʔɔ dườŋ cáɲ cớ dồŋbọn kùŋ ɲữŋ zượʔu hɔặk vớʔi ɲữŋ láʔu vì zượʔu láʔu cởnên ŋèʔɔ kòn ŋủ mặk záczướʔi hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi ca dã sɛɲ za kɔn cớ xiɲbỉ mẹkɔn xi ŋườʔi cởnên ɣiàʔiếʔu hãʔi mwa cânlý sự xônŋwan xwiên zạʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ cớ di ca ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kó vujvẻ và ŋườʔi nàʔɔ sɛɲ kɔn xônŋwan xɔáʔilạk nơʔi Ướk ɣì ca mẹkɔn dượk và ŋườʔi dã sɛɲ kɔn lấʔilàm vuimừŋ hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi zâŋ lòŋ kɔn cɔ ca và kɔn xá ưŋ dẹp dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ca vì káʔi sâʔu và zâmfụ káʔi nàŋ dứŋ zìɲ ɲư kẻcộm làm cɔ tʰêm ɲiềʔu zantà cɔŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ʔaj hɔạnnạn ʔaj fảʔi buồntʰảm ʔaj kó cɛɲ kạɲ ʔaj tʰan siết ʔaj tʰươŋtíc vôkớ ʔaj kó kɔn dỏ tất ɲữŋ cễ zượʔu Ðʔi nếʔu tʰứ zượʔu fa cớ sɛm ŋó zượʔu xi dỏ hồŋ lúk ciếʔu saw cɔŋ li và cảʔi zễzàŋ zốt lạʔi kắn ɲư zắn cít ɲư zắnlụk haj kɔn ɲìn ŋườʔi zâmfụ và lòŋ kɔn nóʔi diềʔu zantà tʰật kɔn ɲư ŋườʔi ɣiữʔa dáʔi xáknàʔɔ cên cót kột vậʔi kɔn nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔita dập tôʔi ɲưŋ tôʔi xôŋ dăw ŋườʔita dáɲ tôʔi sɔŋ tôʔi xôŋ ŋɛ xi tôʔi tỉɲ zậʔi tôʔi cởlạʔi ʔuốŋ nữʔa cớ ɣɛɲɣét ák Ðừŋ ướkaw kùŋ cúŋnó vì lòŋ cúŋnó twan diềʔu hủʔi fá và môʔi nóʔi za tổɲạʔi ɲờ xônŋwan kửʔɛɲà dượk sâʔicất và dượk vữŋvàŋ bởʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ ɲờ citʰứk kák fòŋ dềʔu dượk dầʔidủ kák tʰứ tàʔi kwíbáʔu dẹpdẽ ŋườʔi xônŋwan kó sứkmạɲ và ŋườʔi citʰứk za tʰêm năŋlựk vì kɔn fảʔi ɲờ mưʔu xôn dáɲ ɣiặk Ðâʔu kó ɲiềʔu mưʔusĩ tʰì dặŋ tɔàntʰắŋ sự xônŋwan lấʔilàm kawsa kwá cɔ ŋuzạʔi nó xôŋ mởmiệŋ za nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ kẻ nàʔɔ twan diềʔu ák ŋườʔita ɣọʔi zaŋiảʔɔ tưtưởŋ ŋuzạʔi tộʔilỗʔi kẻ ɲạʔɔbáŋ lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi nếʔu kɔn ŋãlòŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn tʰì sứklựk kɔn ɲỏmọn tʰăj hãʔi ɣiảʔicứʔu dùʔa dến cết và cớ cốʔi zỗʔi cɔ ŋườʔi di siêʔu tớʔi cốn hìɲ xổ nếʔu kɔn nóʔi cúŋtôʔi cẳŋ ɣì dến tʰìÐấŋ kânɲắk lòŋ ŋườʔita cẳŋ sɛmsét diềʔu ấʔi saw vàÐấŋ ɣìŋiữ liɲhồn kɔn xôŋ dến cớ tʰì ŋàʔi cẳŋ báʔɔ cɔ mỗʔi ŋườʔi tùʔi tʰeo kôŋviệk làmsaw hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi ŋɔnlàɲ tàŋ ʔɔŋ lấʔilàm ŋọtŋàʔɔ cɔ ổɣà kɔn kɔn xônŋwan nơʔi liɲhồn kɔn kũŋ ɲưvậʔi nếʔu kɔn dã dượk xônŋwan kó fầntʰưởŋ và côŋdợʔi kủʔa kɔn cẳŋ fảʔi tʰàɲ luốŋ kôŋ hỡʔi ák cớ zìɲzập ɲà ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ Ðừŋ fá cỗ ŋĩ ŋơʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi vì ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ zầʔu saŋã bảʔi kũŋ cổʔi zậʔi kòn huŋák tajvạ dáɲdổ xi tʰùŋịc kɔn saŋã cớ vuimừŋ lúk dáɲdổ lòŋ kɔn dừŋ kẻʔɔ ʔɛ Ðứkzê tʰấʔi diềʔu dó cẳŋ dẹplòŋ bèn kất kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi xỏʔi căŋ cớ nổʔizận kớ ák kũŋ dừŋ ɣɛɲɣét ɲữŋ ŋườʔi huŋzữ vì zanák xôŋ dượk tʰiện báʔɔ và dèn huŋzữ di hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê tônkíɲ vwa cớ hộʔi kùŋ fảnŋịc vì tajhọʔa kủʔa cúŋ sảʔi dến tʰìɲlìɲ và ʔaj fáhạʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi kiə ɲữŋ ŋônŋữ nầʔi kũŋ zɔ xônŋwan dến cɔŋ việk sétdɔán ŋườʔi ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi tốtlàɲ kẻ nàʔɔ nóʔi vớʔi ák zằŋ ŋươʔi kôŋbìɲ sẽ zântộk zủʔasả kák nướk lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk mìɲ kòn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kwởcác ák dượk dẹplòŋ và fướk làɲ ɣiáŋ cên ʔaj dáp lờʔi cáɲ dáŋ tất ɲư nơʔi môʔi miệŋ vậʔi hãʔi sửʔasaŋ kôŋviệk ŋɔàʔi kủʔa kɔn và tạʔi cɔŋ zuộŋ kɔn zồʔi săw hãʔi kất ɲà kủʔa kɔn cớ làmcứŋ vôkớ ŋịc lânkận mìɲ kɔn lấʔi môʔi miệŋ mìɲ fỉɲ ɣạt saw cớ nóʔi tôʔi cɔ ɲư dã cɔ tôʔi tôʔi báʔɔ ŋườʔi tùʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa ŋườʔi ta kó di ŋaŋ kwa ɣần zuộŋ biếŋɲák và ɣần ɲɔ kủʔa ŋumuộʔi tʰấʔi kâʔi mọk xắp kùŋ ɣajɣók cɛxuất mặtdất và tườŋ dá kủʔa dã fá zồʔi ta ɲìn sɛm dểý vàʔɔ dó ta tʰấʔi ɲận dượk zạʔizỗ ŋủ mộtcút cợp mộtcút xwɛɲtăj ŋủ mộtcút tʰì ŋèʔɔ kủʔa kɔn dến ɲư di zạʔɔ và tʰiếʔutʰốn kủʔa kɔn tớʔi ɲư kầm biɲxí Ðâʔi kũŋ ɲữŋ câmŋôn kủʔa salômôn kák ŋườʔi kủʔa sêciə vwa zuda saw ɣiấʔu việk nàʔɔ ấʔilà viɲhiển kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưŋ zòsét diềʔu nàʔɔ ấʔilà viɲhiển kủʔa kák vwa ŋườʔita xôŋtʰể zò kaw kủʔa từŋ cờʔi bề sâʔu kủʔa dất hăjlà lòŋ kủʔa kák vwa hãʔi lấʔi kứk xỏʔi bạk tʰì tʰợbạk dượk xí zụŋ hãʔi cừ ák xỏʔi cướk vwa tʰì ŋôʔi ŋườʔi ɲờ kôŋbìɲ dượk bềnvữŋ cớ fô mìɲ cướk vwa và dừŋ ŋồʔi tạʔicỗ kủʔa ŋườʔi kawcọŋ vì tʰà ŋườʔita nóʔi kùŋ kɔn zằŋ hãʔi dâʔi hơn ŋườʔita kɔn suốŋ cướk vwɛcúʔa kɔn dã tʰấʔi cớ vộʔi ɣâʔi zadiềʔu cɛɲtụŋ ʔɛ zốtkuộk xi lânkận kɔn dã kɔn hổtʰẹn kɔn cẳŋ làmci hãʔi dốʔinạʔi zwiênkớ kɔn vớʔi cáɲ lânkận kɔn sɔŋ cớ kíndáʔɔ kủʔa xák ʔɛ xi ŋườʔi ŋɛ diềʔu ấʔi các kɔn và sỉɲụk kɔn xôŋ bôʔi căŋ lờʔinóʔi fảʔi tʰì xáknàʔɔ cáʔi bìɲbát bằŋ vàŋ kó kẩn bạk ŋườʔi xônŋwan kwởcác taj hăj ŋɛ xáknàʔɔ káʔi vòŋ vàŋ dồ caŋsứk bằŋ vàŋzòŋ vậʔi sứɣiả cuŋtín vớʔi ŋườʔi saj di ɣiốŋ ɲư twiết cɔŋ ŋàʔimùʔa ɣặt vì ŋườʔi sứk liɲhồn kủʔa củ mìɲ kẻ nàʔɔ xwejxwaŋ ɣiảzốʔi mìɲ tợ ɲư kó mâʔi kó ɣió xôŋ mưʔa hằŋ cậm nóŋzận mớʔi xwiên dượklòŋ kủʔa kwan cưởŋ kòn lưỡʔi zịʔu ɣãʔi kák sươŋ nếʔu kɔn dượk hãʔi vừʔafảʔi kẻʔɔ xi nɔ cán kɔn mửʔa za căŋ cớ năŋ bướk cơn dến ɲà lânkận kɔn ʔɛ ŋườʔi cán kɔn cở lòŋ ɣét kɔn căŋ kẻ nàʔɔ dốʔicứŋ ɣiảzốʔi cɔ ŋườʔi lânkận mìɲ xáknàʔɔ káʔi búʔa kâʔi ɣươm mũʔitên ɲọn tinkậʔi bấtcuŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn ɣiốŋ ɲư zăŋ ɣãʔi tỉɲư cơn cẹʔɔ di ʔaj cɔ lòŋ buồntʰảm ŋɛ xáknàʔɔ áʔɔ mìɲ xi ŋàʔi lạɲ và ɲư ɣiấm dổ cên ziêmtiêʔu vậʔi nếʔu tʰùŋịc kɔn kó dóʔi hãʔi cɔ nếʔu kó xát hãʔi cɔ ʔuốŋ vì ɲưvậʔi kɔn cất tʰan cáʔi dỏ cên dầʔu vàÐứkzê báʔɔ lạʔi cɔ kɔn ɣió bắk sɛɲ za mưʔa kòn lưỡʔi nóʔi hàɲ kác kíndáʔɔ ɣâʔi cɔ mặtmàʔi ɣiậnzữ tʰà ɣók cên máʔi ɲà hơn cuŋ ɲà vớʔi ŋườʔi dờn hăj cɛɲ kạɲ tinlàɲ sứ sa dến ɣiốŋ ɲư nướk cɔ ŋườʔi xátxaw ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ siêʔu cướk zanák xáknàʔɔ suốʔi nướk zấʔi dụk ŋuồn nướk ʔaên ɲiềʔu kwá lấʔilàm cẳŋ và kầʔu viɲhiển cɔ mìɲ ấʔi ɣâʔisự tổɲạʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ cẳŋ cế cị lòŋ mìɲ xáknàʔɔ káʔi tʰàɲ xôŋ kó vác ŋăn sự viɲhiển xôŋ sứŋ cɔ ŋumuộʔi ɲư twiết cɔŋ mùʔa ɲư mưʔa cɔŋ mùʔa ɣặt ɲư cimsẻ băj di dâʔidó ɲư kɔn liệŋ di lờʔi zủʔasả vôkớ kũŋ vậʔi cẳŋ sảʔi dến zɔj zùŋ cɔ ŋựʔa tʰiết dể cɔ lừʔa kòn zɔjvọt zàɲ cɔ lưŋ ŋumuộʔi cớ dáp vớʔi ŋusi tùʔi ŋuzạʔi ʔɛ kɔŋiốŋ ɲư căŋ hãʔi dáp vớʔi ŋusi tùʔi ŋuzạʔi kẻʔɔ xônŋwan tʰeo căŋ kẻ nàʔɔ kậʔi ŋumuộʔi dɛm báʔɔ cặt cơn mìɲ ʔuốŋ lấʔi tổɲạʔi ʔɔáŋ cơn ŋườʔi kwè dòŋ dưʔa dụŋ kâʔu câmŋôn cɔŋ miệŋ ŋuzạʔi kũŋ vậʔi tôncọŋ ŋumuộʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kụk ŋọk vàʔɔ cɔŋ dốŋ dá kâʔu câmŋôn nơʔi miệŋ ŋumuộʔi xáknàʔɔ káʔi ɣaj dâm vàʔɔ tăj ŋườʔi săj zượʔu ʔaj ŋườʔi ŋumuộʔi xác di kwa dườŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư líɲ sạ tʰươŋ mọʔi ŋườʔi kẻ ŋumuộʔi lạʔi việk ŋuzạʔi mìɲ xáknàʔɔ kɔn có dã mửʔa za zồʔi lạʔi kɔn kó tʰấʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ xônŋwan tʰeo căŋ kòn kó côŋkậʔi cɔ ŋumuộʔi cɔ kẻ biếŋɲák nóʔi kó kɔn ŋɔàʔi dườŋ một kɔn cɔŋ dườŋfố kẻ biếŋɲák cở cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ xáknàʔɔ kửʔa sâʔi cên kẻ biếŋɲák tʰò tăj mìɲ vàʔɔ cɔŋ zĩʔa lấʔilàm mệtɲọk dɛm miệŋ kẻ biếŋɲák ŋĩ mìɲ xônŋwan hơn bảʔi ŋườʔi dáp lạʔi kác kólý kẻ nàʔɔ di kwa dườŋ nổʔizận kuộk kãʔilẫʔi xôŋ kan dến mìɲ xáknàʔɔ kɔn có nơʔi vàɲ taj ŋườʔi nàʔɔ fỉɲ ɣạt lânkận mìɲ zồʔi nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi cơʔi xáknàʔɔ diênkuồŋ tʰan lửʔa kâʔi cết lửʔa tạʔi tʰiếʔu kủʔi xi cẳŋ kó ʔaj tʰèʔɔ lẻʔɔ kuộk cɛɲ kạɲ ŋuôʔi tʰan cụm cɔ tʰan dỏ kủʔi dể cụm lửʔa ŋườʔi hăj cɛɲ kạɲ suj nóŋ kãʔicọ kũŋ vậʔi lờʔi tʰèʔɔ lẻʔɔ ɣiốŋ ɲư tʰựk ŋɔn vàʔɔ tʰấʔu dến ɣanzuột môʔi miệŋ sốtsắŋ lòŋ dộkák xáknàʔɔ bìɲ ɣốm bọk vàŋbạk fa kẻ nàʔɔ ɣɛŋét zùŋ môʔi miệŋ nóʔi ɣiảdò ɲưŋ cɔŋ lòŋ nuôʔi zanlận xi nóʔi ŋọtɲạt tʰìcớ vì cɔŋ lòŋ kó bảʔi ɣớmɣiếk zầʔu ɣɛŋét ẩŋiấʔu cɔŋ tuồŋ ɣiảbộ sự zanák za nơʔi hộʔi cúŋ ʔaj dàʔɔ suốŋ dó kẻ nàʔɔ dá dá cở dè lạʔi lưỡʔi ɣiảzốʔi ɣét ɲữŋ dã cà và miệŋ zwa nịɲ ɣâʔi diềʔu bạʔihɔạʔi cớ xwejxwaŋ ŋàʔimaj vì kɔn cẳŋ ŋàʔimaj sɛɲ zadiềʔu ɣì hãʔi dể cɔ xák xɛnŋợʔi kɔn miệŋ kɔn cẳŋ cɔ ŋườʔiŋɔàʔi kɔn môʔi kɔn dừŋ tʰì nặŋ kát kũŋ nặŋ ɲưŋ kơn tứkzận kủʔa ŋuzạʔi kòn nặŋ kả haj sự kămɣan huŋzữ kơn ɣiận ɲư nướk càn za ɲưŋ ʔaj dứŋ nổʔi cướk ɣɛŋét một lờʔi kwởcác tỏtườŋ hơn tʰươŋiêʔu ɣiấʔu bạɲữʔu cɔ tʰươŋtíc ấʔi bởʔi lòŋtʰàɲ kòn kủʔa ɣɛŋét lấʔilàm ɣiả ŋụʔi kẻ nɔnê ɣiàʔidạp tàŋ zướʔi cơn mìɲ sɔŋ diềʔu ɣì dắŋ kũŋ lấʔilàm ŋọt cɔ dóʔixát kẻ lưʔulạk sakác nơʔi kủʔa mìɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư cim băj dâʔidó xỏʔi vậʔi zầʔu tʰuốk tʰơm xwanxɔáʔi liɲhồn lờʔi xwiên zɔ lòŋ bạɲữʔu za kũŋ êmzịʔu zườŋ ấʔi cớ lìʔa mìɲ hăjlà kủʔa ca mìɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn cớ di dến ɲà ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ một ŋườʔi sómzềŋ ɣần kòn ʔɛɲɛm sa hỡʔi kɔn xá xônŋwan vujlòŋ ca ca kó tʰế dáp lạʔi kùŋ nàʔɔ sỉɲụk ca ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ tʰấʔi cướk tajhạʔi lɔ mìɲ kòn ŋumuộʔi kứ di kwa fảʔi maŋ lấʔi tajvạ hãʔi lấʔi áʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi dã bảʔɔlãɲ cɔ xá buộk ŋườʔi kủʔa kầm ŋườʔi dã dáp tʰế cɔ ŋườʔi zâmfụ kẻ nàʔɔ cổʔi zậʔi cúk fướk lớntiếŋ cɔ bạɲữʔu mìɲ ŋườʔita diềʔu dó zủʔasả một máŋsốʔi ɣiột cɔŋ ŋàʔi mưʔa và ŋườʔi dờn hăj cɛɲ kạɲ kả haj dềʔu ʔiɲư ɲăw ʔaj ŋăn ɣiữ nàŋ xáknàʔɔ ŋăn ɣiữ ɣió và ɲư tăj hữʔu kầm lấʔi zầʔu vậʔi sắt màʔi ɲọn kũŋ vậʔi ŋườʔi bổzưỡŋ ziệnmạʔɔ bạɲữʔu mìɲ ʔaj sănsók kâʔi ăncáʔi và nàʔɔ hầʔu củ mìɲ dượk tôncọŋ mặt zọʔi cɔŋ nướk tʰếnàʔɔ lòŋ ŋườʔi dốʔivớʔi ŋườʔi kũŋ tʰếấʔi kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ cán kũŋɲư âmfủ vựk sâʔu xôŋ dầʔi vậʔi lò tʰử bạk zót tʰử vàŋ kòn xɛnŋợʔi tʰử lɔàʔiŋườʔi zầʔu kɔn zùŋ cầʔi ɣiã ɣiã ŋuzạʔi cɔŋ kốʔi cuŋ vớʔi ɣạʔɔ tʰì diênzạʔi kũŋ xôŋ lìʔa xỏʔi hãʔi zán kảɲ cạŋ bầʔi ciên kɔn và lɔ sănsók kák dɔàn kủʔa kɔn vì ɣiàʔukó xôŋ lưʔutồn mãʔimãʔi và ciềʔu tʰiên kòn dến dờʔidờʔi saw kỏ xô dã di kỏ nɔn mọk za và ŋườʔita tʰâʔu ɲập zăwkỏ núʔi lôŋ ciên kɔn zùŋ áʔɔsốŋ cɔ kɔn ɣiá zê dựk zùŋ mwa dồŋzuộŋ sữʔa zê kó dủ dồăn cɔ kɔn cɔ ŋườʔiɲà kɔn dặŋ nuôʔi lấʔi kák kɔndòʔi kủʔa kɔn kẻ ák cạʔi cốn zầʔu xôŋ ʔaj duổʔi tʰeo ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ mãɲ zõŋ ɲư tạʔi sứ fạm tộʔiák kó vwɛcúʔa ɲiềʔu ɲưŋ ɲờ ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ kó cí hiểʔubiết sự vữŋvàŋ kủʔa nướk kɔn lâʔuzàʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xóxăn xáknàʔɔ cận mưʔa kwét sạc tʰựkvật kẻ luậtfáp ŋợʔixɛn ák kòn ŋườʔi ɣiữ luậtfáp ciếndấʔu kùŋ cúŋnó kẻ buôŋ mìɲ vàʔɔ ák cẳŋ hiểʔu kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ ʔaj kầʔu Ðứkzê hiểʔubiết mọʔi tʰà ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ kác tʰɛɲliêm kòn ɣiàʔukó tʰeo dườŋ vạʔi ʔaj ɣiữ luậtfáp kɔncaj xônŋwan kòn ʔaj vớʔi hwaŋdàŋ hổŋươʔi cɔ ca mìɲ kẻ nàʔɔ ɲờ lờʔi ănlờʔi kwá fép cɔ kủʔakảʔi mìɲ tʰêm tất cứʔa dểzàɲ kủʔa ấʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ tʰươŋsót ŋèʔɔxổ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ sâʔi taj xôŋ xứŋ ŋɛ luậtfáp lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện ŋườʔi ấʔi kũŋ ɣớmɣiếk kẻ nàʔɔ cɔ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ lầmlạk cɔŋ dườŋ sấʔusa cáɲ dó vàʔɔ kủʔa mìɲ dã dàʔɔ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi cọnvẹn dượk hưởŋ fần fướk làɲ ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu ŋĩ mìɲ xônŋwan ɲưŋ ŋèʔɔ kó tʰôŋ sáŋ zòsét ŋườʔi xi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰắŋ tʰìkó viɲhiển kòn lúk zanák zấʔi tʰì ŋườʔita dềʔu di cốn ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiấʔu tộʔilỗʔi mìɲ xôŋ dượk măimắn ɲưŋ ʔaj sưŋ za lìʔabỏ dượk tʰươŋsót ŋườʔi nàʔɔ hằŋ kíɲ lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj kòn ʔaj kứŋ lòŋ mìɲ vàʔɔ tainạn một vwa zanák kaicị zân ŋèʔɔxổ xáknàʔɔ ɣầm ɣấʔu duổʔi tʰeo mồʔi kwan cưởŋ tʰiếʔu cí hiểʔu kũŋ ŋườʔita ɲiềʔu ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ɣét dượk cườŋtʰọ kẻ mắk tộʔi dổ hwiết kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ sẽ cốn dến cớ kó ʔaj ŋănkản ʔaj kác ŋăitʰẳŋ dượk kứʔuzỗʔi kòn ʔaj di tʰeo haj lốʔi kác kɔŋ vạʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ haj lốʔi ấʔi kẻ nàʔɔ kàʔi zuộŋ mìɲ báɲ nɔnê kòn ʔaj tʰeo biếŋɲák dượk dầʔi ŋèʔɔxổ ŋườʔi tʰàɲtʰựk dượk fướk làɲ ɲiềʔu kòn nàʔɔ vộʔi cɔ ɣiàʔu cẳŋ xỏʔi fạt tâʔivị ŋườʔi lấʔilàm cẳŋ zầʔu miếŋ báɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ fạmtộʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó tʰam vộʔi kủʔakảʔi cẳŋ zằŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn vàʔɔ mìɲ ʔaj kwởcác ŋườʔi nàʔɔ săw dượk hơn lấʔi lưỡʔi zwa nịɲ kẻ nàʔɔ ănkắp kủʔa ca hăj mìɲ và nóʔi zằŋ cẳŋ fảʔi fạmtộʔi dâʔu kẻ ấʔi dồŋ vớʔi fáfác ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kó lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ɣiụk cɛɲ kạɲ ɲưŋ nàʔɔ tinkậʔi Ðứkzê dượk nɔnê kẻ nàʔɔ tinkậʔi nơʔi lòŋ mìɲ ŋumuộʔi kòn ʔaj kác xônŋwan dượk kứʔuzỗʔi ʔaj cɔ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xôŋ tʰiếʔutʰốn kòn ʔaj sâʔi xỏʔi di ɲiềʔu zủʔasả xi ák zấʔi ŋườʔita dềʔu cốn ɲưŋ xi cúŋnó di ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kwởcác tʰườŋ lạʔi kứŋkổ mìɲ sẽ bạʔihɔạʔi tʰìɲlìɲ xôŋ fươŋ kứʔucữʔa xi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰêm ɲiềʔu tʰì zânsự vuimừŋ ɲưŋ xi ák kaicị zânsự lạʔi zênsiết ŋườʔi ưʔa xônŋwan cɔ ca mìɲ dượk vujvẻ kòn vớʔi ŋườʔi fá kủʔakảʔi mìɲ vwa ɲờ kôŋbìɲ nướk mìɲ vữŋbền ɲưŋ ʔaj lãɲ kủʔa hốʔilộ hủʔihɔạʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zwa nịɲ lânkận mìɲ ɣiăŋ lướʔi cướk bướk ŋườʔi cɔŋ tộʔilỗʔi kủʔa ák kó káʔi bẫʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ kahát mừŋzỡ ŋườʔi kôŋ bìɲsét cɔbiết zwiênkớ kủʔa ŋèʔɔxổ kòn ák xôŋ kó cí hiểʔu dể dến kẻ ɲạʔɔbáŋ câm lửʔa cɔ tʰàɲ tʰiêʔu cáʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan ŋuôʔi kơn ɣiận nếʔu ŋườʔi xônŋwan cɛɲluận vớʔi ŋumuộʔi zầʔu ŋườʔi ɣiận hăj kườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ ʔan hòʔa dượk kẻ dổ hwiết ɣét ŋườʔi cọnvẹn ɲưŋ ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ bảʔɔtồn mạŋ sốŋ ŋườʔi kẻ ŋumuộʔi za nóŋzận mìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan ŋuôʔi kầmzữ lạʔi nếʔu vwa lắŋtaj ŋɛ lờʔi ɣiảzốʔi tʰì kák tôʔitớ ŋườʔi cởnên zanák kẻ ŋèʔɔxổ ŋườʔi dềʔu ɣặp ɲăw Ðứkzê sáŋmắt cɔ kả haj vwa nàʔɔ tʰeo cơn tʰật sétdɔán ŋèʔɔxổ ŋôʔi ŋườʔi dượk vữŋbền dờʔidờʔi zɔjvọt kwởcác cɔ xônŋwan kòn kɔncẻ fóŋtúŋ kỡ cɔ mìɲ xi ák tʰêm tʰì tộʔilỗʔi kũŋ tʰêm ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ tʰấʔi saŋã cúŋnó hãʔi sửʔa fạt kɔnŋườʔi tʰì ʔan tịɲ cɔ ŋườʔi và cɔ liɲhồn ŋườʔi dượk xɔáʔilạk Ðâʔu tʰiếʔu mặk tʰị zânsự fóŋ ɲưŋ ʔaj ɣiữɣìn luậtfáp lấʔilàm kó fướk tʰăj cẳŋ fảʔi bởʔi lờʔinóʔi sửʔa cị làmtộʔi vì zầʔu hiểʔubiết kũŋ xôŋ vâŋ tʰeo kɔn kó tʰấʔi cɔŋ lờʔinóʔi mìɲ căŋ một ŋumuộʔi kòn kó côŋkậʔi ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zuŋzưỡŋ tôʔitớ mìɲ tʰuở ɲỏ ŋàʔisăw tʰấʔi tʰàɲ kɔncaj kủʔa ɲà ŋườʔi hăj ɣiận ɣâʔi zadiềʔu cɛɲ kạɲ và kămɣan fạmtộʔi ɲiềʔu tʰăj sự kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋườʔi suốŋ ɲưŋ ʔaj kó lòŋ xiêmɲượŋ dượk tônviɲ kẻ nàʔɔ ciə fần vớʔi tăj ăncộm ɣét liɲhồn mìɲ nó ŋɛ lờʔi tʰế xôŋ diềʔu ɣì za sự lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɣàʔi bẫʔi ɲưŋ ʔaj ɲờkậʔi Ðứkzê dượk ʔiênổn ɲiềʔu kầʔu vwa sɔŋ dɔán kủʔa ŋườʔi nàʔɔ zɔ nơʔi Ðứkzê dến kẻzan lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ và ŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ lấʔilàm ɣớmɣiếk cɔ zanák lờʔi kủʔa ʔaɣuzơ kɔncaj zakê câmŋôn ŋườʔi ấʔi nóʔi za cɔ ʔitʰiên ʔukɛɲ kwảtʰật ŋumuộʔi ʔaj ta xôŋ kó tʰôŋ sáŋ bằŋ ŋườʔi ta xôŋ họk dượk xônŋwan và cẳŋ kó dượk citʰứk kủʔa Ðấŋtʰáɲ ʔaj dã cờʔi zồʔi lạʔi suốŋ ʔaj dã ɣóp ɣió cɔŋ lòŋ tăj mìɲ ʔaj dã bọk nướk cɔŋ áʔɔ mìɲ ʔaj kák ɣiớʔihạn kủʔa dất zɛɲ ŋườʔi ci kɔncaj ŋườʔi ɣì nếʔu ŋườʔi hãʔi nóʔi di kák lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dềʔu dã tʰét lwiện ŋàʔi káʔi tʰuẫn dỡ cɔ ŋườʔi nươŋkậʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi cớ tʰêm ci vàʔɔ kák lờʔi ŋàʔi ʔɛŋàʔi kwởcác ŋươʔi ŋươʔi kầm nóʔizốʔi căŋ tôʔi kó kầʔu cúʔa haj diềʔu sin cớ từcốʔi cướk xi tôʔi tʰák sin zan sa xỏʔi tôʔi lườŋɣạt lờʔi zốʔicá cớ cɔ tôʔi ŋèʔɔxổ hɔặk ɣiàʔusaŋ hãʔi nuôʔi tôʔi dủ tʰựk kần zùŋ ʔɛ xi dủ tôʔi từcốʔi cúʔa mà zằŋ Ðứkzê ʔaj và lạʔi kẻʔɔ ʔɛ tôʔi ŋèʔɔxổ cộmkắp và ôzɛɲ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi căŋ cớ faw tôʔitớ cɔ củ ʔɛ zủʔasả ŋươʔi ŋươʔi mắk tộʔi căŋ kó zòŋzõʔi zủʔasả ca mìɲ kũŋ xôŋ cúk fướk cɔ mìɲ kó zòŋzõʔi tưtưởŋ mìɲ tʰáɲ sạc sɔŋ cưʔa dượk zửʔa sạc ɲơ mìɲ kó zòŋzõʔi kiêʔuhãɲ tʰăj mí ɣiươŋ kaw zườŋ nàʔɔ kó zòŋzõʔi nɛɲ ɣươm hàmzăŋ ɲư zaw Ðặŋ kắnsé ɲữŋ ŋườʔi xóxăn xỏʔi dất và ɲữŋ ŋèʔɔxổ xỏʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kɔn dỉʔa kó haj kɔŋáʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cɔ hãʔi cɔ kó cẳŋ nɔdủ và diềʔu cẳŋ nóʔi zằŋ tʰôʔi dủ tứklà âmfủ ŋườʔi dờn sɔnsẻ xôŋ nɔdủ nướk và lửʔa cẳŋ nóʔi zồʔi kɔn ɲạʔɔbáŋ ca mìɲ xiɲ vâŋ lờʔi dốʔivớʔi mìɲ kák kɔn kwạ kủʔa cũŋ mók ấʔi và kák cim ưŋ kɔn di kó việk lấʔilàm ziệʔukỳ cɔ và diềʔu cẳŋ dượk là dườŋ cim ưŋ băj cên cờʔi lốʔi kɔn zắn cên dá lằn tàʔu cạʔi ɣiữʔa và dườŋ ŋườʔi zawhợp vớʔi ŋườʔi táɲ ŋườʔi kũŋ vậʔi nàŋ zồʔi nàŋ lăw miệŋ và nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi kó fạm tộʔiák dâʔu kó cɔ cáʔidất zúŋdộŋ và diềʔu cẳŋ cịʔu nổʔi dượk là tôʔitớ xi dượk tứkvị vwa kẻ ŋumuộʔi xi dượk nɔnê dồăn ŋườʔi dờn dáŋ ɣét xi lấʔi cồŋ và kɔndòʔi xi kếŋiệp củ mìɲ kó ɲỏmọn cên cáʔidất sɔŋ zất xônŋwan kɔn zầʔu lɔạʔi ʔiếʔuhèn lɔ tʰựk mìɲ cɔŋ mùʔa kɔn tʰỏ zừŋ zầʔu lɔạʔi xôŋ sứklựk Ðóŋ kư mìɲ cɔŋ dá lɔàʔi kàʔɔkàʔɔ zầʔu xôŋ kó vwɛcúʔa băj za kó từŋ dám kɔn tʰằnlằn ŋườʔita lấʔi tăj dượk vẫn cɔŋ dền vwa kó diệʔu di tốtdẹp và nướk bướk sɛm saŋcọŋ sưtử mạɲ cɔŋ kák lɔàʔi cẳŋ luj lạʔi cướk lɔàʔi nàʔɔ kả kɔn ŋựʔa hăŋ tʰắŋ kɔn zê dựk và vwa xôŋ ʔaj dốʔidịc dượk nếʔu ŋườʔi kó ŋuzạʔi tựkaw kiêʔuŋạʔɔ và nếʔu ŋườʔi kó ák tưởŋ hãʔi dặt tăj cɛ miệŋ mìɲ vì sữʔa za sữʔa và dáɲdập mũʔi cɔ fun máʔu kũŋ vậʔi cêʔu cọn ɣiận sɛɲ zadiềʔu cɛɲ kạɲ lờʔi kủʔa vwa lêmuên kák câmŋôn ŋườʔi zạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi hỡʔi kɔn nóʔiɣì hỡʔi kɔn kủʔa tʰaj fảʔi nóʔi ci hỡʔi kɔn kủʔa xấn ŋwiện nóʔi diềʔu ɣì vớʔi kɔn cớ fó sứklựk kɔn cɔ ŋườʔi dờn Ðừŋ tʰeo kɔn dườŋ ɣâʔi cɔ vwɛcúʔa bạʔihɔạʔi hỡʔilê cẳŋ sứŋ cɔ kák vwa cẳŋ sứŋ cɔ kák vwa ʔuốŋ zượʔu hăjlà cɔ kák kwan cưởŋ nóʔi zằŋ vật ʔuốŋ săj dâʔu ʔɛ cúŋ ʔuốŋ kwên luậtfáp và sétdɔán kủʔa ŋườʔi xốnxổ căŋ hãʔi ʔuốŋ săj cɔ ŋườʔi ɣần cết và zượʔu cɔ ŋườʔi kó lòŋ kăjdắŋ họ hãʔi ʔuốŋ kwên nỗʔi ŋèʔɔxổ mìɲ cẳŋ ɲớ dếndiềʔu kựkɲọk kủʔa mìɲ nữʔa hãʔi mởmiệŋ mìɲ biɲ kâm và zwiênkớ kủʔa kák ŋườʔi dể xá mởmiệŋ kɔn sétdɔán kác kôŋbìɲ và fânsử fảʔi ŋĩʔa cɔ ŋườʔi buồntʰảm ŋèʔɔnàn một ŋườʔi tàʔidứk ʔaj dượk ɣiácị nàŋ cổʔi câʔuŋọk lòŋ ŋườʔi cồŋ tinkậʔi nơʔi nàŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ tʰiếʔu huêlợʔi cọn dờʔi nàŋ cɔ cồŋ dượk íclợʔi cớ cẳŋ tổɲạʔi nàŋ lɔ lôŋ ciên ɣaj sợʔi lạk lấʔi tăj mìɲ kôŋviệk nàŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư kák ciếk tàʔu cỗ sa cở báɲ mìɲ nàŋ tʰứkzậʔi xi cờʔi kòn tốʔi fát tʰựk cɔ ŋườʔiɲà mìɲ và kắt kôŋviệk cɔ kák ɣáʔi mìɲ nàŋ tưởŋ dến dồŋzuộŋ mwa dượk ɲờ hwalợʔi kủʔa haj tăj mìɲ nàŋ cồŋ ɲɔ nàŋ tʰắtlưŋ bằŋ sứklựk và haj káɲtăj mìɲ za mạɲmẽ nàŋ kảmtʰấʔi kôŋviệk mìɲ dượk íclợʔi bandêm dèn nàŋ cẳŋ nàŋ dặt tăj vàʔɔ kɔnkwăj và kák ŋóntăj nàŋ kầm kɔnkúʔi nàŋ dưʔa tăj za ɣiúp xóxăn ɣiơ tăj mìɲ ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔxổ nàŋ xôŋ ŋườʔiɲà mìɲ ɣiá twiết vì kả ɲà dềʔu mặk áʔɔ bằŋ lôŋ ciên dỏ nàŋ lấʔi ɲữŋ căn Áʔɔsốŋ nàŋ dềʔu bằŋ vảʔi ɣaj màʔu dỏ diềʔu tạʔi nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ cồŋ nàŋ dượk cúŋ xi ŋồʔi cuŋ vớʔi kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa sứ nàŋ cế áʔɔlót kũŋ zaw daj lưŋ cɔ kɔnbuôn nàŋ mặk lấʔi sứklựk wajfɔŋ và xi tưởŋ dến buổʔi săw vuikườʔi nàŋ mởmiệŋ za kác xônŋwan féptắk ɲơn nơʔi lưỡʔi nàŋ nàŋ kɔjsók dườŋlốʔi kủʔa ɲà mìɲ xôŋ báɲ kủʔa biếŋɲák kɔnkáʔi nàŋ cổʔi zậʔi cúk nàŋ dượk fướk cồŋ nàŋ kũŋ cổʔi zậʔi xɛnŋợʔi nàŋ zằŋ kó ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi kɔŋáʔi làmlụŋ kác tàʔidứk ɲưŋ nàŋ cổʔi hếttʰảʔi zwiên ɣiảzốʔi sắk lạʔi hưxôŋ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ kíɲ Ðứkzê dượk xɛnŋợʔi hãʔi cɔ nàŋ bôŋ cáʔi kủʔa tăj nàŋ xá dể kák kôŋviệk nàŋ ŋợʔixɛn nàŋ tạʔi cɔŋ kửʔa tʰàɲ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi cwiềndạʔɔ kɔncaj kủʔa Ðʔa vwa tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋườʔi cwiềndạʔɔ nóʔi hưxôŋ kủʔa hưxôŋ hưxôŋ kủʔa hưxôŋ tʰảʔi dềʔu hưxôŋ kák việk lawxổ lɔàʔiŋườʔi za zướʔi mặtcờʔi tʰì dượk íclợʔi ci Ðờʔi nầʔi kwa dờʔi xák dến ɲưŋ dất kứ kòn mặtcờʔi mọk mặtcờʔi lậtdật cởvề nơʔi mọk ɣió tʰổʔi hướŋ sâʔi kwa hướŋ bắk sâʔi di lạʔi xôŋ ŋừŋ zồʔi cởvề vòŋ kũ mọʔi sôŋ dềʔu dổ vàʔɔ sɔŋ xôŋ dầʔi nơʔi sôŋ tʰườŋ cảʔi vàʔɔ lạʔi cảʔi dó nữʔa muôn tʰảʔi dềʔu lawxổ lɔàʔiŋườʔi xôŋ tʰế nóʔi za dượk xôŋ cán ŋó taj cẳŋ ɲàm ŋɛ Ðʔiềʔu ci dã kó ấʔilà diềʔu kó diềʔu ɣì dã ấʔilà diềʔu nữʔa cẳŋ kódiềʔu ɣì mớʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi nếʔu kó ci ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi sɛm káʔi nầʔi mớʔi ấʔi tʰật dã kó zồʔi cɔŋ kák tʰờʔi dờʔi cướk ŋườʔita cẳŋ ɲớ kák dờʔi cướk kák dờʔi săw ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dến săw kũŋ cẳŋ ɲớ dến nữʔa ta ŋườʔi cwiềndạʔɔ dã vwa ʔisơzaên tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ta cwiên lòŋ lấʔi xônŋwan caxảʔɔ mọʔi việklàm za zướʔi cờʔi ấʔilà việk lawxổ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã zaw cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi dể lɔ ta dã sɛm tʰấʔi mọʔi việklàm za zướʔi mặtcờʔi kìʔa tʰảʔi dềʔu hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi vật ci dã kɔŋ vẹʔɔ xôŋtʰể ŋăj lạʔi dượk ɣì tʰiếʔu xôŋtʰể dếm dượk ta nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ nầʔi dã dượk xônŋwan hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cướk tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰật lòŋ dã tʰấʔi ɲiềʔu xônŋwan citʰứk ta kũŋ cwiên lòŋ họk xônŋwan ŋuzạʔi diênkuồŋ ɲìn biếtdiềʔu dó kũŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi vì nếʔu xônŋwan ɲiềʔu fiềnnãʔɔ kũŋ ɲiềʔu ʔaj tʰêm citʰứk tʰêm dăwdớn ta lạʔi nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ hè hãʔi tʰử diềʔu vujsướŋ xɔáʔilạk kìʔa diềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ ta nóʔi kườʔi diên vujsướŋ làmci ta ŋĩ cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ fảʔi ʔuốŋ zượʔu dể cɔ tʰân mìɲ vujsướŋ xônŋwan kòn zẫnzắt lòŋ lạʔi ŋĩ fảʔi kầm lấʔi diênzạʔi cɔdến xi sɛm tʰử diềʔu ɣì cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi zướʔi cờʔi cọn dờʔi mìɲ sốŋ ta ɲữŋ kôŋviệk kảtʰể kất ɲà cɔ mìɲ cồŋ ɲɔ cɔ mìɲ cɔ mìɲ kâʔi cáʔi hwa cồŋ kâʔi cáʔi dủ tʰứ dó dàʔɔ hồcứʔanướk dặŋ tướʔi zừŋ nơʔi kâʔicốʔi ta mwa ɲữŋ tôʔi caj ɣáʔi lạʔi kó ɲiềʔu dầʔitớ sɛɲ za cɔŋ ɲà ta kó bầʔi ciên ɲiềʔu hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cướk tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ta kũŋ tʰâʔu cứʔa bạk vàŋ ɲữŋ báʔu kủʔa kák vwa kák tỉɲ ta lɔ cɔ mìɲ ɲữŋ kɔɲát caj ɣáʔi kùŋ xɔáʔilạk kủʔa kɔncaj lɔàʔiŋườʔi tứklà ɲiềʔu hầʔu ɲưvậʔi cởnên kawcọŋ hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cướk tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zầʔu vậʔi xônŋwan kòn kùŋ ta cẳŋ diềʔu ɣì mìɲ ướkaw kũŋ cẳŋ kấm diềʔu ɣì lòŋ mìɲ ưʔatʰíc lòŋ vujvẻ mọʔi kôŋlaw kủʔa dó fần dã dượk cɔŋ mọʔi kôŋlaw Ðʔɔạn sɛmsét kák kôŋviệk tăj mìɲ dã lawxổ mìɲ dã cịʔu dể kìʔa mọʔi diềʔu dó hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi cẳŋ kó íclợʔi ɣì zướʔi mặtcờʔi ta sâʔi lạʔi dặŋ sɛmsét xônŋwan ŋuzạʔi diênkuồŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dến săw vwa kótʰể làmɣì bấtkwá diềʔu ŋườʔi xák dã lâʔu zồʔi vả tʰấʔi xônŋwan ŋuzạʔi kũŋɲư áɲsáŋ tốʔităm ŋườʔi xônŋwan kó kɔn cɔŋ dầʔu mìɲ kòn ŋumuộʔi bướkdi cɔŋ tốʔităm zầʔu vậʔi ɲìn tʰấʔi haj dàŋ kùŋ ɣặp sốfận săw nên kó nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ sự sảʔi dến cɔ zạʔi sảʔi dến cɔ kũŋ vậʔi vậʔi kó ɲiềʔu xônŋwan ɲư tʰếmà làmci ta lạʔi nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ Ðʔiềʔu dó hưxôŋ nữʔa vàʔi ŋườʔita cẳŋ ɲớ ŋườʔi xônŋwan dến dờʔidờʔi kũŋɲư cẳŋ ɲớ ŋumuộʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔisăw kảtʰảʔi dềʔu kwên lâʔu fảʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan cết kũŋɲư diênkuồŋ vậʔi ɣét dờʔisốŋ mọʔi việklàm za zướʔi mặtcờʔi kựkɲọk cɔ tʰảʔi dềʔu hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi ta kũŋ ɣét mọʔi kôŋlaw dã zướʔi mặtcờʔi fảʔi dể lạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi săw mìɲ vả ʔaj zằŋ ŋườʔi ấʔi xônŋwan hăjlà ŋuzạʔi zầʔu tʰếnàʔɔ kaikwản mọʔi việk dã lấʔi lawxổ xônŋwan zướʔi mặtcờʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ bởʔi kớ ấʔi cở lòŋ tʰấtvọŋ mọʔi kôŋviệk dã lawxổ zướʔi mặtcờʔi vì kó ŋườʔilàm kôŋviệk mìɲ kác xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ tàʔizỏʔi zồʔi fảʔi dể lạʔi kơŋiệp cɔ cẳŋ lawxổ dến Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ tainạn vậʔi íc ci cɔ ŋườʔi lawxổ kựk lòŋ làmviệk zướʔi mặtcờʔi vì kák ŋàʔi ŋườʔi cỉ dăwdớn kôŋlaw ŋườʔi tʰàɲza buồnzầʔu dến dỗʔi bandêm lòŋ ŋườʔi kũŋ cẳŋ dượk ʔanŋỉ Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ cẳŋ ɣì cɔ ŋườʔi ʔuốŋ xiến liɲhồn mìɲ hưởŋ fướk kủʔa lawxổ mìɲ ta sɛm tʰấʔi diềʔu dó kũŋ bởʔi tăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dến vì ʔaj ŋườʔi dượk hưởŋ vujsướŋ bởʔiÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ vujvẻ cɔ nàʔɔ dẹplòŋ ŋàʔi ɲưŋ ŋàʔi xiến cɔ kó tộʔi fảʔi lawxổ tʰâʔu ɣóp cấtcứʔa dể zồʔi cɔ ŋườʔi dẹplòŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi fàm ɣì kó tʰì mọʔi việk zướʔi cờʔi kó dịɲ kó sɛɲ za kó cết kó cồŋ kó ɲổ dã cồŋ kó ɣiết kó cữʔa làɲ kó fá zỡ kó sâʔicất kó xók kó kườʔi kó tʰanvãn kó ɲảʔimúʔa kó dá kó ɲóm dá lạʔi kó kó cẳŋ kó kó kó ɣiữ lấʔi kó kó sé zác kó măj kó nínlặŋ kó nóʔi za kó ʔiêʔu kó ɣét kó dáɲ ɣiặk kó hòʔabìɲ kẻ làmviệk kó dượk íclợʔi ɣì lawxổ mìɲ căŋ ta dã tʰấʔi kôŋviệk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi zùŋ zèn lấʔi mìɲ fàm Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dềʔu tốtlàɲ cɔŋ tʰì lạʔi ŋàʔi xiến cɔ dờʔidờʔi nơʔi lòŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi zầʔu vậʔi kôŋviệk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi bandầʔu dến kuốʔicùŋ ŋườʔi xôŋ tʰế hiểʔu dượk vậʔi ɲìn cẳŋ kódiềʔu ɣì cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi vujvẻ làmlàɲ cọn dờʔi mìɲ lạʔi ʔainấʔi fảʔi ʔuốŋ hưởŋ lấʔi fướk kủʔa kôŋlaw mìɲ ấʔi kũŋ cɔ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ta zằŋ mọʔi việk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kòn kó dờʔidờʔi ŋườʔita cẳŋ tʰêm ɣì dượk kũŋ xôŋ ci dặŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲưtʰế dể lɔàʔiŋườʔi kíɲ cướk ŋàʔi Ðʔiềʔu ci kó dã kó ŋàʔisưʔa diềʔu ci sảʔi dến dã sảʔi dến lâʔu zồʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi việkɣì dã kwa ta lạʔi kòn tʰấʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi cɔŋ nơʔi kôŋ dàŋ kó zanák tạʔi cốn kôŋbìɲ kó bấtŋĩʔa ta nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɔán sét kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi zanák dó kó dịɲ cɔ mọʔi mọʔi việk ta lạʔi nóʔi cɔŋ lòŋ zằŋ fảʔi ɲưvậʔi bởʔivì Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰửtʰác kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi cỉ cɔ cúŋ zằŋ xôŋ ɣì lɔàʔi tʰú vì việk sảʔi dến cɔ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi làmsaw tʰì sảʔi dến cɔ lɔàʔi tʰú kũŋ vậʔi sảʔi dến cɔ haj lɔàʔi ɣiốŋ vớʔi ɲăw sự cết kủʔa lɔàʔi nầʔi kũŋɲư cết kủʔa lɔàʔi kiə haj lɔàʔi dềʔu tʰở tʰứ hơʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ ɣì lɔàʔi tʰú tʰảʔi dềʔu hưxôŋ kảtʰảʔi dềʔu kwi vàʔɔ cỗ kảtʰảʔi zɔ bụʔi dất za kảtʰảʔi cởvề bụʔi dất ʔaj hɔặk tʰần kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰăŋ hɔặk kủʔa lɔàʔi tʰú suốŋ zướʔi dất tʰếtʰì tʰấʔi cẳŋ ci cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi vujvẻ cɔŋ kôŋviệk mìɲ ấʔilà fần mìɲ ʔaj dɛm mìɲ cởlạʔi dặŋ sɛm tʰấʔi diềʔu sảʔiza săw mìɲ ta sâʔi lạʔi sɛmsét mọʔi za zướʔi mặtcờʔi kìʔa nướkmắt kủʔa sɔŋ xôŋ ʔaj ʔanủʔi kẻ kó kwiền fép sɔŋ xôŋ ʔaj ʔanủʔi cɔ vậʔi xɛn ɲữŋ cết dã lâʔu zồʔi sướŋ kòn sốŋ kòn cưʔa dượk sɛɲ za cưʔa tʰấʔi ɲữŋ zanák za zướʔi mặtcờʔi cɔ kó fướk haj dằŋ kiə ta kũŋ tʰấʔi mọʔi kôŋlaw mọʔi ŋề xéʔɔ diềʔu ɣâʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nầʔi xák ɣɛɲɣét ɲăw Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi kẻ ŋumuộʔi xwɛɲtăj lấʔi tʰịt mìɲ tʰà dầʔi mộtlòŋ bàntăj bìɲan dầʔi kả haj lawxổ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi ta sâʔi lạʔi sɛm tʰấʔi hưxôŋ zướʔi mặtcờʔi nầʔi ŋườʔi kôdộk cẳŋ kó ʔaj hɔặk kɔncaj hăjlà ʔɛɲɛm zầʔu vậʔi lawxổ xôŋ tʰôʔi xôŋ cán kủʔakảʔi xôŋ ŋĩ zằŋ vậʔi lawxổ liɲhồn ɲịn kák fướk ʔaj Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ tʰậtlà kôŋviệk kựkɲọk haj ŋườʔi haj dượk kôŋ ɣiá kôŋviệk mìɲ nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔi saŋã tʰì ŋườʔi kiə dỡ mìɲ ɲưŋ xốn tʰăj cɔ mộtmìɲ saŋã xôŋ kó ʔaj dỡ mìɲ kũŋ vậʔi nếʔu haj ŋườʔi ŋủ cuŋ tʰì kòn mộtmìɲ tʰì làmsaw dượk lạʔi nếʔu mộtmìɲ ŋườʔi xák tʰắŋ tʰì haj ŋườʔi kó tʰế cốŋkự sợʔi zâʔi dáɲ taw lấʔi làmxó dứt một cẻ tuổʔi ŋèʔɔ xôn ôŋ vwa ɣiàkả zạʔi cẳŋ kòn ŋɛ lờʔi xwiênkan vì cẻ za xỏʔi ŋụk xám dặŋ vwa zầʔu sɛɲ za ŋèʔɔ cɔŋ nướk mìɲ ta tʰấʔi mọʔi ŋườʔi sốŋ didi lạʔi lạʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi dềʔu tʰeo cẻ ấʔi ŋườʔi cɔ vwa kiə zân fụk zướʔi kwiền ŋườʔi tʰật dôŋ zầʔu vậʔi ɲữŋ dến săw cẳŋ vuitʰíc ŋườʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi xi ŋườʔi vàʔɔ ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hãʔi ɣiữ cừŋ cơn mìɲ tʰà lạʔi ɣần ŋɛ zâŋ kủʔa ŋumuộʔi xôŋ hiểʔubiết mìɲ ák cớ vộʔi mởmiệŋ za lòŋ ŋươʔi cớ lậtdật nóʔi lờʔi cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cên cờʔi kòn ŋươʔi zướʔi dất vậʔi ŋươʔi xá lờʔi hễ ɲiềʔu lɔlắŋ sɛɲ za ciêmbaw kòn ɲiềʔu lờʔi tʰì sɛɲ za ŋuzạʔi xi ŋươʔi xấn hứʔa ɣì vớʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cớ cậm hɔàn ŋwiện ŋàʔi cẳŋ vuitʰíc zạʔi vậʔi xá cả diềʔu ɣì ŋươʔi hứʔa tʰà dừŋ xấn hứʔa xấn hứʔa màlạʔi xôŋ cả Ðừŋ cɔ miệŋ ŋươʔi cɔ sáktʰịt mìɲ fạmtộʔi cớ nóʔi cướk sứɣiả kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zằŋ ấʔilà lầmlỗʔi saw cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nổʔizận lờʔinóʔi ŋươʔi ŋàʔi kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj ŋươʔi Ðâʔu kó ciêmbaw ɲiềʔu lờʔi kwá dó kũŋ kó hưxôŋ ɲiềʔu sɔŋ ŋươʔi hãʔi kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xi ŋươʔi tʰấʔi cɔŋ sứ kó ŋèʔɔ hɔặk tʰấʔi fạm dến cáɲ cựk cáʔifép kôŋbìɲ tʰìcớ lấʔilàm kó kaw kaw kɔicừŋ lạʔi kòn kó Ðấŋ kaw hơnnữʔa sɔŋ vwa hăj kàʔicấʔi zuộŋ ấʔi íclợʔi cɔ sứ mọʔi kẻ tʰam tiềnbạk cẳŋ cán lắk tiềnbạk kủʔakảʔi cẳŋ cán hwalợʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ hễ kủʔakảʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu cừŋ nàʔɔ kũŋ tʰêm ɲiềʔu cừŋ nấʔi củ kủʔakảʔi dượk íc ɣì sɛm tʰấʔi cướk căŋ ɣiấkŋủ kủʔa ŋườʔi làmviệk ŋɔn mặkzầʔu ŋườʔi hăj ɲiềʔu ɲưŋ cán lắk cɔ ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu xôŋ ŋủ dượk kó tainạn zữ dã tʰấʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi ấʔilà kủʔakảʔi ŋườʔi củ zàɲ cứʔa lạʔi cở hạʔi cɔ mìɲ hɔặk kớ tajhọʔa ɣì kả kủʔakảʔi nầʔi fảʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi củ sɛɲ kɔncaj tʰì dể lạʔi cɔ haj tăjxôŋ mìɲ za xỏʔi lòŋ cầncuồŋ tʰểnàʔɔ cởvề tʰể ấʔi kák huêlợʔi kủʔa lawxổ mìɲ cẳŋ kó vậʔi ɣì tăj mìɲ dɛm tʰeo dượk Ðʔiềʔu nầʔi kũŋ tainạn ŋườʔi zadờʔi tʰểnàʔɔ fảʔi cởvề tʰể ấʔi vậʔi cịʔu lawxổ dặŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi kó íclợʔi ɣì căŋ lạʔi cọn dờʔi mìɲ cɔŋ tốʔităm fảʔi ɲiềʔu buồnzầʔu dăwdớn fiềnnãʔɔ kìʔa dã ɲìn tʰấʔi zằŋ ʔuốŋ hưởŋ fảʔi kủʔa lawxổ mìɲ zướʔi mặtcờʔi cọn cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ấʔi tʰậtlà hăj dó fần mìɲ hễÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ ɣiàʔukó kủʔakảʔi cɔ ŋườʔi kó tʰế lấʔi ɲận lãɲ fần vujvẻ cɔŋ kôŋlaw kủʔa mìɲ ấʔilà cɔ kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲân ŋườʔi ɲớ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi kủʔa dờʔi mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ứŋdáp ŋườʔi bằŋ vuimừŋ cɔŋ lòŋ ŋườʔi kó tainạn xák dã tʰấʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi tʰườŋ nặŋnề cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kìʔa kó ŋườʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã cɔ ɣiàʔukó kủʔakảʔi saŋcọŋ dến dỗʔi mọʔi sựlòŋ ŋườʔi ướkaw cẳŋ tʰiếʔuɣì ɲưŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xôŋ cɔ ŋườʔi kótʰể lấʔi ŋườʔi xák dượk Ấʔilà hưxôŋ tainạn kựkxổ nếʔu ŋườʔi sɛɲ căm kɔncaj sốŋ ɲiềʔu cɔdến kawniên cườŋtʰọ lòŋ cẳŋ dượk hưởŋ fướk cết cẳŋ dượk côn nóʔi dứʔa kɔn sảʔɔ kòn ŋườʔi ấʔi dứʔa kɔn sảʔɔ za hưxôŋ lạʔi cởvề tốʔităm ʔuám vùʔi nó xôŋ tʰấʔi mặtcờʔi kũŋ xôŋ dến kó dượk fần ʔanŋỉ ŋườʔi kiə ŋườʔi zầʔu sốŋ dến haj ŋàn xôŋ hưởŋ dượk cút fướk nàʔɔ kuốʔicùŋ kảtʰảʔi cẳŋ cuŋ cỗ saw mọʔi lawxổ kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi miệŋ mìɲ sɔŋ xôŋ dượk tʰỏʔaŋwiện ŋườʔi xônŋwan ci ŋumuộʔi ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ dạʔɔ cướk ŋườʔita nàʔɔ kóíc ci sự ɣì tʰấʔi bằŋ tʰam buôŋtuồŋ diềʔu dó lạʔi hưxôŋ tʰeo luồŋ ɣió tʰổʔi fàm diềʔu ɣì kó cướk tʰì dã dượk dặt lâʔu zồʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi za tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì dã cướk zồʔi ŋườʔi xôŋtʰể kãʔi cả vớʔi Ðấŋ mạɲ mìɲ kó ɲiềʔu diềʔu za tʰêm hưxôŋ vậʔi ŋườʔita dượk íc ci cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi kủʔa dờʔi hưxôŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi cảʔi kwa ɲư bóŋ ʔaj biếtdiềʔu ɣì íc cɔ mìɲ vì ʔaj kótʰể nóʔi cướk cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ diềʔu sảʔiza săw mìɲ zướʔi mặtcờʔi zɛɲtiếŋ zầʔu kwíɣiá ŋàʔi cết ŋàʔi sɛɲ Ðʔi dến ɲà taŋcế dến ɲà ʔiếntiệk tạʔi dó tʰấʔi kuốʔicùŋ kủʔa mọʔi ŋườʔi ŋườʔi sốŋ dể vàʔɔ lòŋ buồnzầʔu vujvẻ ɲờ lòŋ dượk vuj lòŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan cɔŋ ɲà taŋcế kòn lòŋ ŋumuộʔi tạʔi ɲà vujsướŋ tʰà ŋɛ lờʔi kwởcác kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan kòn kâʔu kủʔa ŋumuộʔi vì tiếŋ kườʔi kủʔa ŋumuộʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư tiếŋ ɣaj ɲọn zướʔi nồʔi Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ fảʔi sác tʰủ tiềntàʔi cɔ xôn za ŋu kủʔa hốʔilộ xiến cɔ hưhạʔi lòŋ kuốʔicùŋ kủʔa việk xởʔidầʔu lòŋ kiênɲẫn lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ cớ vộʔi ɣiận ɣiận cɔŋ lòŋ ŋumuộʔi cớ nóʔi zằŋ ɲơn saw ŋàʔicướk ŋàʔi bâʔizờ vì hỏʔi vậʔilà cẳŋ xôn sự xônŋwan kũŋ bằŋ kơŋiệp kóíc cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰấʔi mặtcờʔi vì xônŋwan cɛ tʰân kũŋɲư tiềnbạk cɛ tʰân vậʔi ɲưŋ xônŋwan tʰắŋ ɣiữ mạŋ sốŋ cɔ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dã dượk hãʔi sɛmsét kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣì ŋàʔi dã dáɲ kɔŋ ʔaj kótʰể ŋăj lạʔi dượk cɔŋ ŋàʔi tʰớʔi tʰạɲ hãʔi vuimừŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi tainạn hăj kɔicừŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dặt ŋàʔi nầʔi dốʔivớʔi ŋàʔiciə hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔidờʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi cướk dặŋ diềʔu sảʔiza săw mìɲ cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi hưxôŋ kủʔa dã tʰấʔi kả diềʔu nầʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ twi kôŋbìɲ kũŋ fảʔi huŋák twi huŋák lạʔi dượk cườŋtʰọ cớ kôŋbìɲ kwá kũŋ dừŋ za mìɲ xônŋwan kwá kớsaw tʰiệtʰạʔi cɔ mìɲ kũŋ cớ huŋăŋ kwá dừŋ ɲư ŋumuộʔi kớsaw ŋươʔi cết cướk dịɲ ŋươʔi ɣiữ dượk diềʔu nầʔi ấʔilà màlạʔi kũŋ dừŋ nớʔităj xỏʔi diềʔu kiə ʔaj kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cáɲ xỏʔi mọʔi diềʔu dó sự xônŋwan xiến cɔ ŋườʔi xôn kó sứkmạɲ mườʔi kaicị cɔŋ tʰàɲ tʰật cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ cên dất diềʔu tʰiện xôŋ fạmtộʔi cớ dể lòŋ mọʔi lờʔi ŋườʔita nóʔi ʔɛ ŋươʔi ŋɛ tôʔitớ mìɲ cưởʔi zủʔa mìɲ căŋ vì tʰườŋxi lòŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ mìɲ dã zủʔa xák ta dã lấʔi xônŋwan ŋiệm sét mọʔi ấʔi nóʔi zằŋ ta xônŋwan ɲưŋ xônŋwan kác sa vả diềʔu ci sa kwá diềʔu ci sâʔu tʰẩm ʔaj kótʰể dượk ta lạʔi hếtlòŋ cwiên lɔ cɔ hiểʔubiết sétnét xônŋwan cáɲ lạʔi cɔbiết zằŋ zanák zạʔizột zạʔizột diênkuồŋ ta tʰấʔi diềʔu kăjdắŋ cết ấʔilà ŋườʔi dờn kó lòŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư lướʔi bẫʔi tăj ɲư zâʔi tóʔi ʔaj dẹplòŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tʰɔát xỏʔi kòn kó tộʔi lấʔi kẻ cwiềndạʔɔ nóʔi săw xi sɛmsét từŋ diềʔu từŋ dặŋ cáɲ tʰì nầʔi diềʔu dượk ấʔilà lòŋ hãʔi kòn cưʔa za cɔŋ mộtŋàn ŋườʔi dờn ôŋta dã dượk ŋườʔi kòn cɔŋ kảtʰảʔi ŋườʔi dờn cẳŋ dượk ʔaj ɲưŋ nầʔi diềʔu dượk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã zựŋ nênŋườʔi ŋăitʰẳŋ sɔŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kó za mưʔukế ʔaj sáɲ dượk vớʔi ŋườʔi xônŋwan ʔaj ɣiảʔiŋĩʔa kák sự xônŋwan cɔ sáŋsủʔa ŋườʔi dổʔi sắk ŋiêmcaŋ di ta xwiên zằŋ vì kớ lờʔi tʰề kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi xá ɣìŋiữ mạŋ vwa cớ vộʔi luj za xỏʔi cướk ŋườʔi dừŋ ɣì màʔi cɔŋ ák vwa diềʔu ci dẹplòŋ mìɲ vảlạʔi lờʔi vwa kó kwiền ʔaj zám nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi làmci ʔaj tʰeo lịɲ ŋườʔi tʰì cẳŋ tainạn lòŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan tʰì tʰế fép vì twi lɔàʔiŋườʔi tainạn bốʔizốʔi ɲiềʔu fàm ɣì kũŋ kó tʰì tʰế fép vì ŋườʔi cẳŋ biếtdiềʔu ci sảʔi dến ʔaj kó tʰế nóʔi cướk dượk kák việk dượk sảʔiza làmsaw cẳŋ kó ʔaj kaicị dượk sɛɲ xí dể kầm sɛɲ xí lạʔi lạʔi cẳŋ ʔaj kó kwiền ŋàʔi cết cɔŋ xi cɛɲ ciến cẳŋ kó miễntʰứ zanák nàʔɔ kứʔu dượk za ta kó tʰấʔi kák diềʔu dó cwiên lòŋ swiŋĩ mọʔi việklàm za zướʔi mặtcờʔi kóxi ŋườʔi nầʔi kaicị cên ŋườʔi kiəmà tajhạʔi cɔ ŋườʔi ấʔi ta kùŋ tʰấʔi ɲữŋ zanák kwadờʔi dượk côn bìɲiên kòn ɲữŋ ŋườʔi làmlàɲ lạʔi fảʔi lìʔa xỏʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ ŋườʔi dồŋ tʰàɲ kwên di Ấʔi kũŋ hưxôŋ bởʔi cẳŋ tʰihàɲ ŋăj fạt ɲữŋ việk ák lòŋ kɔn lɔàʔiŋườʔi cwiên diềʔu ák vì kó tộʔi ák mộtcăm dượk cườŋtʰọ zầʔu vậʔi zằŋ kíɲ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi săw zất dượk fướk ɲưŋ ák cẳŋ dượk fướk kũŋ xôŋ dượk sốŋ lâʔu dờʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư bóŋ kwa ấʔi ʔi xôŋ kíɲ cướk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi lạʔi kòn kó hưxôŋ xák cên tʰếzan ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ dãʔi tʰeo kôŋviệk ák ák lạʔi dượk dãʔi tʰeo kôŋviệk ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ta nóʔi zằŋ diềʔu dó kũŋ hưxôŋ ta xɛn vuimừŋ bởʔivì zướʔi mặtcờʔi cẳŋ kódiềʔu ɣì cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ʔuốŋ vujsướŋ ấʔilà diềʔu kòn lạʔi cɔ mìɲ kôŋlaw cọn cɔŋ kák ŋàʔi kủʔa dờʔi mìɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ mìɲ zướʔi mặtcờʔi xi cwiên lòŋ dể họk xônŋwan dể hiểʔu mọʔi việklàm za cên dất tʰì tʰấʔi kó ŋườʔi ŋàʔi dêm xôŋ cɔ ŋủ kũŋ tʰấʔi mọʔi kôŋviệk Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hiểʔubiết ŋườʔita xôŋtʰể zò dượk mọʔi việklàm za zướʔi mặtcờʔi zầʔu cịʔu kựkɲọk ŋần nàʔɔ dặŋ kũŋ cẳŋ dượk zầʔu cɔ ŋườʔi xônŋwan tưởŋ zằŋ cắk tʰì kũŋ cẳŋ dượk nầʔi kák việk xák dã swiŋĩ cwiên lòŋ hiểʔu zõzàŋ tʰấʔi ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ xônŋwan vớʔi việklàm kủʔa dềʔu cɔŋ tăj Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hɔặk ʔiêʔu hăjlà ɣét lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ zõ tʰảʔi dềʔu tʰuộk kuộk tươŋlaj mọʔi sảʔi dến cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi ɲư ɲăw ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hăjlà huŋák ŋườʔi hiềnlàɲ tʰɛɲsạc ŋườʔi zâŋ kủʔa hăjlà ŋườʔi xôŋ zâŋ ŋườʔi tʰiện hăjlà kó tộʔi fát tʰề hăjlà ŋườʔi lờʔi tʰề kảtʰảʔi dềʔu dồŋ hưởŋ sốfận tainạn zướʔi mặtcờʔi ấʔilà mọʔi ŋườʔi dồŋ ɣặp sốfận lòŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi dầʔizẫʔi huŋák diênkuồŋ cɔán cɔŋ lòŋ họdươŋ xi sốŋ zồʔi divề kùŋ cết một ŋườʔiở cɔŋ hộʔi sốŋ kòn kó côŋmɔŋ kɔn có sốŋ cết kẻ sốŋ mìɲ cết ɲưŋ cết cẳŋ ci cẳŋ dượk fầntʰưởŋ ɣì dã kwên di sự ʔiêʔu ɣét ɣɛɲ ɣỗ kủʔa tʰảʔi dềʔu tiêʔu lâʔu cẳŋ kòn kó fầnnàʔɔ mọʔi diềʔu za zướʔi mặtcờʔi hãʔi di báɲ kác vuimừŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu kác Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã ɲận kák kôŋviệk ŋươʔi xá hằŋ mặk áʔɔ cắŋ cớ tʰiếʔu zầʔu tʰơm cên dầʔu ŋươʔi cọn kák ŋàʔi kủʔa dờʔi hưxôŋ ŋươʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cɔ ŋươʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi hãʔi vujvẻ kùŋ ʔiêʔuzấʔu dó fần kủʔa ŋươʔi cɔŋ dờʔi nầʔi diềʔu ŋươʔi dượk bởʔi kôŋlaw mìɲ zướʔi mặtcờʔi mọʔi việk tăj ŋươʔi dượk hãʔi hếtsứk mìɲ zướʔi âmfủ nơʔi ŋươʔi di dến cẳŋ kó việklàm cẳŋ kó mưʔukế kũŋ cẳŋ kó citʰứk hăjlà xônŋwan ta sâʔi lạʔi tʰấʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi kó lẹlàŋ cẳŋ dượk kuộk cạʔidwa ŋườʔi mạɲ sứk cẳŋ dượk tʰắŋ cận xônŋwan xôŋ dặŋ báɲ tʰôŋ sáŋ cẳŋ hưởŋ kủʔakảʔi ŋườʔi xônxéʔɔ cẳŋ dượk tʰờʔitʰế kơhộʔi sảʔi dến cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi lạʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi cẳŋ hiểʔubiết tʰờʔitʰế kủʔa mìɲ ɲư ká mắk lướʔi cỉ fảʔi bẫʔi zò tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì lɔàʔiŋườʔi kũŋ vấnvươŋ cɔŋ tʰờʔi tajhọʔa sảʔi dến tʰìɲlìɲ tʰể ấʔi ta kũŋ dã tʰấʔi xônŋwan nầʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi tʰật lấʔilàm kảtʰể kó tʰàɲ ɲỏ kiə dượk zânsự vwa kườŋ tʰạɲ dến vâʔihãm dắp ɲữŋ lũʔi kawlớn kùŋ vả cɔŋ tʰàɲ ấʔi kó ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xôn zùŋ xônŋwan mìɲ ɣiảʔicứʔu tʰàɲ ấʔi sɔŋ săw xôŋ ʔaj ɲớ dến ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ dó ta nóʔi zằŋ sự xônŋwan sứkmạɲ ɲưŋmà xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋèʔɔ xiɲzể lờʔinóʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi xôŋ ʔaj ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan dượk ŋɛ tạʔi nơʔi êmlặŋ kòn tiếŋ kủʔa kaicị cɔŋ dám zạʔizột sự xônŋwan dồ biɲxí ɲưŋ cỉ ŋườʔi kó tộʔi fáhủʔi dượk ɲiềʔu làɲ kɔn zuồʔi cết cɔ tʰúʔi zầʔu tʰơm kủʔa tʰợ hòʔa hươŋ kũŋ vậʔi mộtcút diênzạʔi ɲẹ zɛɲ ŋườʔi xônŋwan saŋcọŋ cáʔitim kủʔa ŋườʔi xôn hữʔu kòn cáʔitim kủʔa zạʔi lạʔi xi zạʔi di dườŋ zõ za tʰiếʔu lẽfảʔi nóʔi cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ mìɲ zạʔi nếʔu ŋườʔi kaikwản nổʔizận kùŋ ŋươʔi cớ lìʔa xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ mềmmạʔi ŋănŋừʔa dượk tộʔilỗʔi kó tainạn dã tʰấʔi zướʔi mặtcờʔi ɲư lỗʔilầm zɔ kwan cưởŋ fạm ấʔilà ŋumuộʔi dượk dặt nơʔi kaw kòn ŋườʔi ɣiàʔu lạʔi ŋồʔi cỗ tʰấp ta dã tʰấʔi tôʔitớ di ŋựʔa kòn kwan cưởŋ di ɲư tôʔitớ vậʔi kẻ nàʔɔ dàʔɔ suốŋ dó kòn fá vác tườŋ fảʔi zắn kắn ʔaj dã xỏʔi cỗ bịtʰươŋ bửʔa kủʔi kóxi fảʔi hiểmŋèʔɔ káʔi zìʔu xôŋ màʔi lưỡʔi lạʔi fảʔi zán sứk kòŋ ɲiềʔu ɲưŋ xônŋwan kóíc dặŋ zẫnzắt nếʔu zắn kắn cướk xi cú tʰì tʰầʔi cú cẳŋ íc ɣì lờʔi kủʔa miệŋ ŋườʔi xônŋwan kó ɲưŋ môʔi kủʔa xờzạʔi lạʔi lấʔi lờʔinóʔi kủʔa miệŋ xởʔidầʔu ŋượkdãʔi kuốʔicùŋ diênkuồŋ ŋwihiểm kẻ ŋumuộʔi hăj nóʔi ɲiềʔu lờʔi zầʔu vậʔi ŋườʔita cẳŋ biếtdiềʔu sảʔi dến ʔaj za dượk cɔ kó săw mìɲ kôŋlaw ŋumuộʔi cɔ mệtɲọk cúŋnó cẳŋ fảʔi dườŋ nàʔɔ dặŋ di dến tʰàɲ hỡʔi sứ xốn tʰăj cɔ mầʔi xi kó vwa kòn tʰơấʔu kák kwan cưởŋ mầʔi lúk buổʔisáŋ hỡʔi sứ fướk cɔ mầʔi xi kó vwa zòŋ kawsaŋ kák kwan cưởŋ mầʔi ăntʰeo ɣiờ sứŋdáŋ dể sứk lạʔi cớ cẳŋ fảʔi dể dắmsăj tạʔi tăj làmbiếŋ zườŋ ɲà tăj ɲák ɲớn ɲà zột ŋườʔita bàʔi tiệk dặŋ vuicơʔi zượʔu xiến cɔ dờʔi vuj kó tiềnbạk tʰì ứŋ cɔ mọʔi zầʔu cɔŋ tưtưởŋ ŋươʔi kũŋ cớ ŋwiềnzủʔa vwa zầʔu cɔŋ fòŋ ŋủ ŋươʔi kũŋ cớ zủʔasả ɣiàʔukó cim cờʔi dến za tiếŋ ŋươʔi lɔàʔi kó káɲ tʰuật việk za hãʔi liệŋ báɲ ŋươʔi nơʔi mặtnướk xỏʔi lâʔu ŋàʔi ŋươʔi lạʔi hãʔi fânfát cɔ bảʔi hɔặk cɔ ŋườʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ tainạn nàʔɔ sảʔiza cên dất xi mâʔi dầʔi nướk mưʔa suốŋ dất xi kâʔi ŋã hướŋ hăj hướŋ bắk ŋã cỗ nàʔɔ fảʔi cỗ dó ʔaj sɛm ɣió xôŋ zeo ʔaj sɛm mâʔi xôŋ ɣặt ŋườʔi xôŋ dườŋ kủʔa ɣió di kũŋ xôŋ sươŋkốt kếtkấʔu cɔŋ bụŋ dờn maŋ tʰaj tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì kũŋ mộttʰể ấʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ hiểʔubiết kôŋviệk kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ vừʔa sáŋsớm xá zeo ɣiốŋ ŋươʔi buổʔi ciềʔu cớ ŋỉtăj ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ ɣiốŋ nàʔɔ mọk hɔặk ɣiốŋ nầʔi hɔặk ɣiốŋ kiə hɔặk kả haj dềʔu za Áɲsáŋ tʰậtlà êmzịʔu kɔn mắttʰấʔi mặtcờʔi lấʔilàm vuitʰíc nếʔu ŋườʔi dượk sốŋ lâʔu tʰì xá vujvẻ cɔŋ cọn kák ấʔi sɔŋ kũŋ cớ kwên ɲữŋ ŋàʔi tốʔităm ɲữŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi ɲiềʔu fàm việkɣì sảʔi dến dềʔu hưxôŋ hỡʔi cẻ kiə hãʔi vuimừŋ cɔŋ buổʔi tʰiếʔuniên xá dɛmlòŋ cɔŋ xi kòn tʰơấʔu hãʔi di tʰeo dườŋlốʔi lòŋ mìɲ ɲìn sɛm mìɲ ưʔatʰíc ɲưŋ fảʔibiết zằŋ mọʔi việk ấʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dòʔi ŋươʔi dến dɔán sét vậʔi xá ɣiảʔisầʔu xỏʔi lòŋ ŋươʔi kất diềʔu tajhạʔi xỏʔi sáktʰịt ŋươʔi lúk tʰiếʔuniên tʰì suânsɛɲ hưxôŋ tʰôʔi cɔŋ buổʔi kòn tʰơấʔu hãʔi tưởŋɲớ Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa ŋươʔi cướk xi ŋườʔi ŋàʔi zannan cưʔa dến cướk xi ɲữŋ tớʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ ta xôŋ lấʔilàm vujlòŋ cướk xi áɲsáŋ mặtcờʔi mặtcăŋ kák ŋôʔisaw cưʔa tốʔităm mâʔi cưʔa lạʔi dến săw kơn mưʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi ấʔi ɣiữ ɲà zunzẩʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲ sứk kɔŋ xɔm săj kốʔi ŋừŋ lạʔi bởʔivì ɲiềʔu côŋ sɛm kwa kửʔasổ dã làŋ haj káɲ kửʔa dườŋ dóŋ lạʔi tiếŋ săj lúk ấʔi ŋườʔita ŋɛ tiếŋ cim kêʔu cờ zậʔi tiếŋ kɔŋáʔi dềʔu hơʔi lạʔi ŋườʔita kaw hãʔihùŋ lúk di dườŋ lúk ấʔi kâʔi hạɲ cổ bôŋ kàʔɔkàʔɔ cởnên nặŋ ướkaw cẳŋ kòn nữʔa bấʔizờ ŋườʔi di dếnnơʔi dờʔidờʔi kủʔa mìɲ kòn ɲữŋ taŋcế dềʔu di vòŋkwɛɲ kák dườŋfố lạʔi hãʔi tưởŋɲớ Ðấŋtạʔɔ hóʔa cướk xi zâʔi bạk dất cén vàŋ cướk xi za suốʔi báɲsɛ ɣãʔi za cên ɣiếŋ bụʔi cɔ cở vàʔɔ dất ʔiɲư ŋwiên kũ tʰầnliɲ cởvề nơʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ dã kẻ cwiềndạʔɔ nóʔi hưxôŋ kủʔa hưxôŋ mọʔi dềʔu hưxôŋ vảlạʔi bởʔivì cwiềndạʔɔ ŋườʔi xônŋwan kũŋ kứ zạʔi citʰứk cɔ zânsự ŋườʔi dã kânɲắk ca sɔát sắpdặt tʰứtự ɲiềʔu kâʔu câmŋôn kẻ cwiềndạʔɔ kó cwiên lɔ ɲữŋ kâʔu tốtdẹp kák lờʔi dã za dềʔu cáɲ cựk cơn tʰật lờʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan ɣiốŋ ɲư dót cọn kák kâʔu câmŋôn xáknàʔɔ diɲ dóŋ cặt zɔ dấŋ cănciên cwiền za lạʔi hỡʔi kɔn hãʔi cịʔu zạʔi ŋườʔita cép ɲiềʔu sác cẳŋ kùŋ kòn họk kwá tʰật mệtɲọk cɔ sáktʰịt cúŋta hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa lýtʰwiết nầʔi xá kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɣiữ kák diềʔu zăn ŋàʔi ấʔilà cọn fậnsự kủʔa ŋươʔi vìÐứkcúʔɛcờʔi dɛm dɔán sét kák kôŋviệk dến dỗʔi việk kínɲiệm hɔặk tʰiện hɔặk ák kũŋ vậʔi ɲã ka cɔŋ kák bàʔi ka salômôn dã ŋwiện ŋườʔi tôʔi bằŋ káʔi kủʔa miệŋ ŋườʔi vì áʔitìɲ càŋ ŋɔn zượʔu zầʔu càŋ kó mùʔi tʰơmtʰɔ zɛɲ càŋ tʰơm ɲư zầʔu dổ za bởʔi kớ ấʔi kák ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ ʔiêʔumến càŋ hãʔi kéʔɔ tôʔi cúŋtôʔi cạʔi tʰeo càŋ vwa dã zẫn tôʔi vàʔɔ fòŋ ŋàʔi cúŋtôʔi vuimừŋ xɔáʔilạk nơʔi càŋ cúŋtôʔi nóʔi dến áʔitìɲ càŋ zượʔu kák ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ ʔiêʔumến càŋ kác cáɲ cựk hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tôʔi dɛn sɔŋ siɲdẹp ɲư kák cạʔi kêda ɲư cáŋ kủʔa salômôn cớ zòm sɛm tôʔi bởʔivì tôʔi dɛn mặtcờʔi dã ɣiọʔi tôʔi kák kɔncaj kủʔa tôʔi ɣiận tôʔi dặt tôʔi kɔj ɣiữ ɲɔ kòn ɲɔ ziêŋ kủʔa tôʔi tôʔi xôŋ kɔj ɣiữ hỡʔi ŋườʔi lòŋ tôʔi ʔiêʔumến hãʔi cɔ tôʔi càŋ căn bầʔi dâʔu ban cưʔa cɔ ŋỉ tạʔi nơʔi nàʔɔ vì kớsaw tôʔi fảʔi ɲư ŋườʔi cɛ bầʔi kủʔa kák càŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔidẹp cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi nếʔu ŋươʔi cẳŋ hãʔi za tʰeo zấʔu kủʔa bầʔi và căn kák zê kɔn mìɲ ɣần cạʔi cănciên hỡʔi tìɲ sáɲ mìɲ ɲư ŋựʔa káʔi kủʔa sɛ fazaôn Ðôʔi mìɲ dẹp vớʔi dồ caŋsứk kổ mìɲ siɲ vớʔi câncâʔu cúŋtôʔi cɔ mìɲ cwiền vàŋ kó vảʔi bạk cɔŋ xi vwa ŋự kam tòŋ hươŋ tôʔi sôŋ mùʔi tʰơm za lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư hwa zượk cɔ tôʔi nằm ɣiữʔa nươŋlɔŋ tôʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư cùm hwa fụŋ cɔ tôʔi cɔŋ ɲɔ ʔɛâŋêdi hỡʔi tìɲ mìɲ tʰɛɲlịc tʰăj mìɲ tʰɛɲlịc tʰăj kɔn mìɲ ɲư kủʔa kâʔu hỡʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi càŋ siɲ tʰật tʰăj lạʔi ɣiườŋ kủʔa cúŋta sɛɲsɛɲ zườŋ ɲà cúŋta bằŋ ɣổ hươŋ ván máʔi cúŋta bằŋ kâʔi tòŋ ta hwa tườŋvi kủʔa sazôn bôŋ kủʔa cũŋ bạn tìɲ ɣiữʔa dám kɔŋáʔi ɲư bôŋ ɣiữʔa ɣaj ɣốk lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɣiữʔa dám kɔncaj ɲư kâʔi bìɲbát ɣiữʔa ɲữŋ kâʔi zừŋ tôʔi vujlòŋ ŋồʔi zướʔi bóŋ ŋườʔi cáʔi ŋườʔi ŋọtŋàʔɔ cɔ ổɣà tôʔi ŋườʔi dưʔa tôʔi vàʔɔ fòŋ ʔiếntiệk ŋọn kờŋườʔi fất cên tôʔi ấʔilà áʔitìɲ hãʔi lấʔi báɲ ɲɔ nâŋdỡ lòŋ tôʔi zùŋ cáʔi bìɲbát sứk tôʔi lạʔi vì tôʔi kó bịɲ bởʔi áʔitìɲ tăj ŋườʔi zướʔi dầʔu tôʔi kòn tăj hữʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi tôʔi hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm épnàʔi kák ŋươʔi bởʔi ɲữŋ kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ hăjlà kɔn naj dồŋnộʔi cớ kiɲdộŋ cớ tỉɲ tʰứk áʔitìɲ cɔdến xi Ấʔilà tiếŋ kủʔa lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi kìʔa ŋườʔi dến ɲảʔi kwa kák núʔi vượt kwa kák ɣò lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ hăjlà kɔn naj kìʔa ŋườʔi dứŋ săw tườŋ cúŋtôʔi sɛm ŋaŋ kwa kửʔasổ ŋó ŋaŋ kwa cấnsɔŋ lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi nóʔicwiện vớʔi tôʔi zằŋ hỡʔi tìɲ ŋườʔidẹp kủʔa ơʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dến vì kìʔa mùʔadôŋ dã kwa mưʔa dã zứt zồʔi bóŋ hwa za cên dất màʔu hátsướŋ dã dếnnơʔi và tiếŋ cim ku ŋɛ cɔŋ sứ kâʔi dươŋ cín cáʔi sɛɲtươʔi kủʔa và ɲɔ cổ hwa nứk mùʔi hươŋ hỡʔi tìɲ ŋườʔidẹp kủʔa ơʔi hãʔi cổʔi zậʔi dến hỡʔi cim kâʔu cɔŋ hók dá tạʔi cốn dụt kủʔa nơʔi hãʔi cɔ sɛm mặtmũʔi mìɲ cɔ ŋɛ tiếŋ mìɲ vì tiếŋ mìɲ êmzịʔu mặtmũʔi mìɲ kó zwiên hãʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ kɔn cồn ɲữŋ kɔn cồn ɲỏ fáhạʔi ɲɔ vì ɲɔ cúŋtôʔi dươŋ cổ bôŋ lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi tʰuộk tôʔi tôʔi tʰuộk ŋườʔi ŋườʔi căn bầʔi mìɲ ɣiữʔa dám bôŋ cɔdến hừŋ dôŋ za và bóŋtốʔi di hỡʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi hãʔi cởvề xá ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ hăjlà kɔn naj cên núʔi bêtʰẹt bandêm tạʔi cên ɣiườŋ mìɲ tôʔi tìɲ ŋườʔi lòŋ tôʔi ʔiêʔuzấʔu tôʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ ɣặp tôʔi nóʔi ta cổʔi zậʔi bâʔizờ zạʔɔ kwɛɲ tʰàɲ cảʔi kwa kák dườŋfố kák ŋã Ðặŋ ŋườʔi lòŋ tôʔi ʔiêʔuzấʔu tôʔitìm ŋườʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ ɣặp ɲữŋ kɛɲ vòŋkwɛɲ tʰàɲ kó ɣặp tôʔi tôʔi hỏʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi kó tʰấʔi ŋườʔi lòŋ ʔiêʔumến căŋ tôʔi vừʔa di xỏʔi cúŋ sasa tʰì ɣặp ŋườʔi lòŋ tôʔi ʔiêʔumến bèn lấʔi ŋườʔi xôŋ xứŋ buôŋ za cɔdến xi dưʔa ŋườʔi ɲà tôʔi vàʔɔ fòŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi dã tʰaj zựŋ tôʔi hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm épnàʔi kák ŋươʔi bởʔi ɲữŋ hɔàŋ zươŋ hăjlà kɔn naj dồŋnộʔi cớ kiɲdộŋ cớ tỉɲ tʰứk áʔitìɲ cɔdến xi ŋườʔi kiə ʔaj dồŋ vắŋ di ɣiốŋ ɲư cụ xóʔi sôŋ zượk ɲũhươŋ vớʔi dủ tʰứ hươŋ kủʔa kɔnbuôn kìʔa kiệʔu kủʔa salômôn kó sáʔu mươʔi zõŋ cɔŋ zõŋ ʔisơzaên vâʔi cuŋkwɛɲ tʰảʔi dềʔu kầm ɣươm tʰạʔɔ dáɲ ɣiặk ʔainấʔi dềʔu kó ɣươm nơʔi dùʔi mìɲ vì sợhãʔi bandêm vwa sa cɔ mìɲ káʔi kiệʔu bằŋ ɣỗ liban ŋườʔilàm kák cụ bằŋ bạk nơʔi zựʔa lưŋ bằŋ vàŋ cỗ ŋồʔi bằŋ màʔu diềʔu kòn ɣiữʔa bằŋ áʔitìɲ kủʔa kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi siôn hãʔi za sɛm vwa salômôn Ðộʔi mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên ŋườʔi dã dộʔi cên dầʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dịɲ tʰân cɔŋ ŋàʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi vujvẻ hỡʔi tìɲ nầʔi mìɲ dẹpdẽ tʰăj mìɲ dẹpdẽ tʰăj mắt mìɲ cɔŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔu tók mìɲ xáknàʔɔ bầʔi zê nơʔi ciền núʔi ɣalaát zăŋ mìɲ ɲưtʰể bầʔi ciên mớʔi lôŋ từ ʔaw tắmzửʔa di tʰảʔi dềʔu sɛɲ dôʔi xôŋ kɔn nàʔɔ sɔnsẻ môʔi mìɲ sợʔi cỉ hồŋ miệŋ mìɲ kó zwiên tʰăj má mìɲ cɔŋ ɲư nửʔa kwả lựʔu kổ mìɲ ɲư tʰáp Ðʔa sâʔicất dể ceo biɲxí ŋàn káʔi xiên kủʔa tăj ʔɛɲhùŋ haj nươŋlɔŋ mìɲ ɲư kặp kɔn sɛɲ dôʔi kủʔa hɔàŋ zươŋ tʰả ɣiữʔa dám hwa ta di núʔi zượk dồʔi ɲũhươŋ cɔdến xi hừŋ dôŋ za và bóŋtốʔi di hỡʔi mìɲ siɲdẹp mọʔi nơʔi mìɲ cẳŋ kó ɣì kả hỡʔi fụ hãʔi kùŋ dến liban hãʔi kùŋ dến liban xá ɲìn sɛm cót ʔamana từ dỉɲ saniə hẹtmôn từ haŋ từ núʔi kɔn hỡʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi fụ ơʔi mìɲ dã kướp lấʔilòŋ vì káʔi liếk vòŋ câncâʔu nơʔi kổ mìɲ mìɲ dã kướp lấʔilòŋ hỡʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi fụ ơʔi áʔitìɲ mìɲ dẹp zườŋ nàʔɔ áʔitìɲ mìɲ ŋɔn zượʔu và mùʔi tʰơm kủʔa zầʔu mìɲ kák tʰứk hươŋ hỡʔi fụ môʔi mìɲ ɲỏ mậtɔŋ suốŋ zướʔi lưỡʔi mìɲ kó mậtɔŋ sữʔa hơʔi tʰơm kủʔa kwầnáʔɔ mìɲ ɲư hơʔi tʰơm kủʔa liban ʔɛmɣáʔi fụ dóŋ là ŋuồn nướk xóʔa lạʔi suốʔi niêmfɔŋ kâʔi mìɲ vườndịʔadàŋ kó tʰạclựʔu cáʔi ŋɔn hwa fụŋ kâʔi kam tòŋ kam tòŋ hồŋwa sươŋbồ ɲụk kwế kùŋ mọʔi tʰứk kâʔi kó mùʔi tʰơm một zượk hộʔi vớʔi kák hươŋliệʔu kó zɛɲ mìɲ mạc nướk cɔŋ là ɣiếŋ nướk sốŋ zòŋ nướk cảʔi liban hỡʔi ɣió bắk hãʔi nổʔizậʔi hỡʔi ɣió hãʔi tʰổʔi dến hãʔi tʰổʔi cɔŋ tôʔi hầʔu cɔ kák mùʔi tʰơm băj za ŋwiện lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ ŋườʔi và ăncáʔi ŋɔnŋọt kủʔa ŋườʔi hỡʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi fụ ơʔi dã vàʔɔ cɔŋ zồʔi ta kó háʔi zượk hươŋliệʔu ʔaên tàŋ mậtɔŋ vớʔi mậtɔŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu vớʔi sữʔa hỡʔi kák hãʔi hỡʔi kák áʔihữʔu xá ʔuốŋ cɔ ɲiềʔu tôʔi ŋủ ɲưŋ lòŋ tôʔi tỉɲ tʰứk Ấʔilà tiếŋ kủʔa lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɣõkửʔa zằŋ hỡʔi ʔɛmɣáʔi tìɲ cim kâʔu tɔàɲảʔɔ kủʔa ơʔi hãʔi mởkửʔa cɔ vì dầʔu dầʔi sươŋmók lọn tók tʰấm ɣiọt bandêm tôʔi dã kổʔi áʔɔ ŋɔàʔi zồʔi làmsaw mặk lạʔi tôʔi dã zửʔa cơn zồʔi lẽnàʔɔ lạʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi tʰò tăj vàʔɔ kửʔa lòŋzạ tôʔi kảmdộŋ kớ ŋườʔi tôʔi cổʔi zậʔi dặŋ mởkửʔa cɔ lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi tăj tôʔi ɲỏɣiọt zượk và ŋóntăj tôʔi cảʔi zượk zòŋ cên cốt kửʔa tôʔi mởkửʔa cɔ lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɲưŋ ŋườʔi dã láɲ di xỏʔi zồʔi Ðươŋ xi ŋườʔi nóʔi lòŋ tôʔi mấtvíʔa tôʔi ŋườʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ kó ɣặp tôʔi ɣọʔi ŋườʔi sɔŋ ŋườʔi cẳŋ dáp kẻ kɛɲ kwɛɲ tʰàɲ ɣặp tôʔi Ðáɲ tôʔi tôʔi bịtʰươŋ kák kɛɲzữ vác tʰàɲ kất lấʔi xỏʔi tôʔi hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm épnàʔi kák ŋươʔi nếʔu ɣặp lươŋ ɲơn xá nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ ta kó bịɲ áʔitìɲ hỡʔi ŋườʔi siɲdẹp cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi lươŋ ɲơn kủʔa cị kó ɣì lươŋ ɲơn xák lươŋ ɲơn kủʔa cị kó ɣì lươŋ ɲơn xák mà cị épnàʔi cúŋtôʔi zườŋ ấʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi cắŋ dỏ ɲứt cɔŋ ŋườʔi Ðầʔu ŋườʔi bằŋ vàŋ tʰật zòŋ lọn tók ŋườʔi kwăn dɛn ɲư kwạ mắt ŋườʔi ɲư cim kâʔu ɣần suốʔi nướk tắm sạc cɔŋ sửʔa dượk ɲận xảm kỹkàŋ ɣòmá ŋườʔi ɲư vuôŋ dất hươŋwa tợ xóm kỏ tʰơmŋát môʔi ŋườʔi tỉɲư hwa cảʔi zượk zòŋ tăj ŋườʔi ɲư ốŋ còn vàŋ kó ɲận huỳɲ ŋọk tʰân mìɲ ŋườʔi xáknàʔɔ ŋà bóŋláŋ kẩn ŋọk sɛɲ haj cơn ŋườʔi ɣiốŋ cụ kẩmtʰạc cắŋ cên táɲ vàŋzòŋ tướŋmạʔɔ ŋườʔi ɲư nóʔi liban siɲ ɲư kâʔi hươŋ miệŋ ŋườʔi zất êmzịʔu tʰật tɔàntʰể kác ŋườʔi dáŋ ʔiêʔudươŋ hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi ɲưvậʔi bạn tìɲ tôʔi zườŋ ấʔi hỡʔi ŋườʔi siɲdẹp cɔŋ kák ŋườʔi lươŋ ɲơn kủʔa cị di dâʔu lươŋ ɲơn kủʔa cị sâʔi hướŋ nàʔɔ cúŋtôʔi kùŋ di ŋườʔi vớʔi cị lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi di suốŋ ŋườʔi nơʔi vuôŋ dất hươŋwa Ðặŋ căn cɔŋ và hwa tôʔi tʰuộk lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi và lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi tʰuộk tôʔi ŋườʔi căn bầʔi mìɲ ɣiữʔa dám hwa hỡʔi tìɲ mìɲ siɲdẹp tʰư tʰiệt kó zwiên ɲư ɣiêzusalɛm Ðáŋ xáknàʔɔ dạʔɔkwân ɣiươŋ kờsí hãʔi sâʔi mìɲ xỏʔi vì cɔ bốʔizốʔi tók mìɲ xáknàʔɔ dɔàn zê cên ciền núʔi ɣalaát zăŋ mìɲ ɲư bầʔi ciên káʔi từ nơʔi tắmzửʔa mớʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu sɛɲ dôʔi xôŋ kɔn nàʔɔ sɔnsẻ má mìɲ cɔŋ mộtnửʔa kwả lựʔu kó sáʔu mươʔi hɔàŋậʔu mươʔi kuŋfi và ɲiềʔu kɔndòʔi cim kâʔu ŋườʔi tɔàɲảʔɔ vốn kó kɔnmột kủʔa mìɲ kẻ kéncọn kủʔa ŋườʔi dã sɛɲ dẻ mìɲ kák kɔŋáʔi dềʔu tʰấʔi nàŋ sưŋ nàŋ kó fướk dỗʔi ɲữŋ hɔàŋậʔu kuŋfi kũŋ dềʔu xɛnŋợʔi nàŋ ŋườʔi nầʔi ʔaj za ɲư zạŋdôŋ ɲư mặtcăŋ tiɲ sạc ɲư mặtcờʔi Ðáŋ xáknàʔɔ dạʔɔkwân ɣiươŋ kờsí tôʔi di suốŋ hạc dàʔɔ Ðặŋ sɛm kâʔicỏ sɛɲtươʔi kủʔa cũŋ Ðặŋ tʰử kɔj ɲɔ dã dọt tʰạclựʔu hwa cưʔa xôŋ ŋờ lòŋ tôʔi zẫnzắt tôʔi cên kák sɛ kủʔa zânsự tôʔi kó tìɲŋwiện hỡʔisu hãʔi cởvề hãʔi cởvề xá cởvề cởvề hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi sɛm tʰấʔi ŋườʔi vìsaw kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ŋườʔi sulamít ɲư tʰấʔi ɲảʔimúʔa kủʔa mahanaim hỡʔi kôŋcúʔa cơn nàŋ maŋ ɣiàʔi siɲdẹp biếtbaw vòŋ nàŋ xáknàʔɔ câncâʔu kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj tʰợ xéʔɔ zún nàŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư káʔi li còn zượʔu tʰơm xôŋ kó tʰiếʔu bụŋ nàŋ zườŋ dốŋ lúʔamạc kó hwa sắpdặt haj nươŋlɔŋ nàŋ ɲư haj kɔn sɛɲ dôʔi kủʔa kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ kổ nàŋ ɲư káʔi tʰápŋà mắt nàŋ xáknàʔɔ kák ʔaw tạʔi hếtbôn kửʔa bácabim mũʔi nàŋ ɲư ŋọn tʰáp liban ŋó hướŋ Ðʔa mác zầʔu cên mìɲ nàŋ xáknàʔɔ núʔi kạtmên và tók dầʔu nàŋ ɲư sắk tíʔa một vwa tók nàŋ hỡʔi áʔitìɲ mìɲ siɲdẹp tʰăj hạp zườŋ baw xiến cɔ ŋườʔita dượk xɔáʔicí hìɲzuŋ mìɲ ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi càlà và nươŋlɔŋ mìɲ cùm ta nóʔi zằŋ ta cèʔɔ kâʔi càlà vin lấʔi kák tàʔu ŋwiên haj nươŋlɔŋ mìɲ ɲư cùm ɲɔ mùʔi tʰơm mũʔi mìɲ ɲư cáʔi bìɲbát và ổɣà mìɲ ɲư zượʔu ŋɔn cảʔi vàʔɔ zễzàŋ cɔ lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi và nơʔi môʔi nàʔɔ ŋủ tôʔi tʰuộk lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi sự ướkaw ŋườʔi hướŋ tôʔi hỡʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi hãʔi dến cúŋta di za ŋɔàʔi dồŋ dêm nơʔi hươŋtʰôn vừʔa sớmmaj cúŋta tʰứkzậʔi Ðʔi dến ɲɔ dặŋ sɛm tʰể ɲɔ kó dọt hwa kó cổ tʰạclựʔu kó bôŋ căŋ tạʔi dó tôʔi áʔitìɲ tôʔi cɔ càŋ cáʔi fɔŋ ɣià sôŋ mùʔi tʰơm và tạʔi kửʔa cúŋta kó ɲữŋ tʰứ cáʔi ŋɔn mớʔi kũ hỡʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi tôʔi dã dểzàɲ cáʔi ấʔi cɔ càŋ cớci càŋ ʔɛɲɛm tôʔi kẻ dã kủʔa tôʔi nếʔu tôʔi ɣặp càŋ ŋɔàʔi ʔaét tôʔi càŋ xôŋ ʔaj xiɲbỉ tôʔi dượk tôʔi zẫn càŋ vàʔɔ ɲà tôʔi tạʔi dó càŋ zạʔizỗ tôʔi tôʔi cɔ càŋ ʔuốŋ zượʔu tʰơm nướkŋọt kủʔa cáʔi tʰạclựʔu tôʔi tăj ŋườʔi zướʔi dầʔu tôʔi kòn tăj hữʔu ŋườʔi lấʔi tôʔi hỡʔi kák kɔŋáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm épnàʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ kiɲdộŋ cớ tỉɲ tʰứk áʔitìɲ cɔdến xi ŋườʔi nầʔi ʔaj dồŋ vắŋ di nươŋ zựʔa lươŋ ɲơn kủʔa nàŋ ta dã dáɲtʰứk mìɲ tạʔi zướʔi kâʔi bìɲbát dó dăwdớn sɛɲ mìɲ za dó ŋườʔi dã sɛɲ dẻ mìɲ kơn lawxổ hãʔi dể tôʔi ɲư káʔi ấʔi nơʔi lòŋ càŋ ɲư káʔi cên káɲtăj càŋ vì áʔitìɲ mạɲ ɲư cết lòŋ ɣɛn huŋzữ ɲư âmfủ sự nóŋ nóŋ kủʔa lửʔa tʰật ŋọn lửʔa kủʔa Ðứkzê nướk ɲiềʔu xôŋ tướʔi dượk áʔitìɲ kák sôŋ cẳŋ ɲận cìm dượk nếʔu ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dɛm tàʔisản ɲà mìɲ Ðặŋ mwa lấʔi áʔitìɲ ʔaét ŋườʔita xiɲzể dếndiềʔu cúŋtôʔi kó ʔɛmɣáʔi ɲỏ cưʔa kó nươŋlɔŋ fảʔi làmɣì cɔ ʔɛmɣáʔi cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋườʔita hỏʔi nếʔu vác tʰàɲ cúŋtôʔi sâʔi tʰáp bạk cên nếʔu káʔi kửʔa cúŋtôʔi dóŋ lạʔi bằŋ hươŋ tôʔi tườŋ tʰàɲ haj nươŋlɔŋ tôʔi ɲư ɲữŋ ŋọn tʰáp bấʔizờ tôʔi cướkmắt ŋườʔi ɲư dã dượk bìɲan salômôn kó ɲɔ tạʔi baɛɲ hamôn ŋườʔi zaw ấʔi cɔ kɛɲzữ mỗʔi ŋườʔi ấʔi fảʔi dɛm mộtŋàn miếŋ bạk hwalợʔi vườn ɲɔ kủʔa tôʔi cướk tôʔi hỡʔisa mộtŋàn miếŋ bạk fần ôŋ kòn haj căm ɲữŋ ɣiữ hwalợʔi hỡʔi cɔŋ kák dềʔu lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ nàŋ sin hỡʔi cɔ ŋɛ tiếŋ nàŋ hỡʔi lươŋ ɲơn tôʔi hãʔi vộʔi dến xá ɣiốŋ ɲư kɔn hɔàŋ zươŋ hăjlà ɲư kɔn naj kɔn cên kák núʔi tʰuốk tʰơm về dờʔi siə ɣiôtʰam ʔɛca sêciə kák vwa nướk zuda tʰì saj kɔncaj ʔamốt kó tʰấʔi nướk zuda tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm hỡʔi kák từŋ cờʔi hãʔi ŋɛ hỡʔi dất hãʔi lắŋtaj Ðứkzê kó fán zằŋ ta dã nuôʔinấŋ kɔnkáʔi cưởŋ zưỡŋ cúŋnó sɔŋ cúŋnó zấʔi lɔạn ŋịc kùŋ bò củ mìɲ lừʔa máŋ kủʔa củ sɔŋ ʔisơzaên cẳŋ hiểʔubiết zân cẳŋ swiŋĩ Ôʔi nướk mắk tộʔi zân maŋ lỗʔi nặŋnề tôŋ ɣiốŋ dộk zữ kɔnkáʔi bậʔibạ kiə cúŋnó dã lìʔabỏ Ðứkzê xiɲ Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã cởnên salạ luj di kák ŋươʔi saw kòn kứ ŋịc dể lạʔi dáɲ nữʔa Ðầʔu dềʔu dăwdớn kả lòŋ dềʔu mònmỏʔi kả từ cơn cɔdến dỉɲ dầʔu cẳŋ kó cỗ nàʔɔ làɲ zặt ɲữŋ vếttʰươŋ sưŋ kùŋ mớʔi cưʔa zịt cưʔa kwấn kũŋ cưʔa bôʔi zầʔu cɔ sứ kák ŋươʔi nơʔi hwaŋvu tʰàɲ kák ŋươʔi lửʔa tʰiêʔuhủʔi zân ŋɔạʔi dấtdaj kák ŋươʔi cướk kák ŋươʔi hwaŋvu ɲư zân ŋɔạʔi fátán kɔnkáʔi siôn lạʔi ɲư lềʔu ɲɔ ɲư còʔi zuộŋ zưʔa ɲư tʰàɲ vâʔi víbằŋ Ðứkzê kwân cẳŋ dể cúŋta kòn lạʔi cútdỉɲ tʰì cúŋta ɣiốŋ tʰàɲ sôdôm ɲư tʰàɲ ɣômôzơ vậʔi hỡʔi kák kwan cưởŋ sôdôm hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê hỡʔi zân ɣômôzơ hãʔi dể taj vàʔɔ luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta Ðứkzê fán muônvàn kủʔa kák ŋươʔi nàʔɔ kó kɛɲệ ɣì dến ta dã cáncê kủʔa tʰiêʔu bằŋ ciên dựk kủʔa kɔn ta cẳŋ dẹplòŋ hwiết kủʔa dựk ciên kɔn zê dựk dâʔu xi kák ŋươʔi dến cầʔu cướk ʔaj xiến kák ŋươʔi ɣiàʔidạp hàɲlaŋ tʰôʔi dừŋ zâŋ kủʔa căj vôíc cɔ nữʔa ta ɣớm ɣét mùʔi hươŋ ŋàʔi căŋ mớʔi ŋàʔi kùŋ zaw ɲóm hộʔi cẳŋ xứŋ cịʔu tộʔiák hộʔi nơʔi cọŋtʰể tʰật lòŋ ɣét ɲữŋ ŋàʔi căŋ mớʔi kák ŋươʔi nặŋnề cɔ lấʔilàm ɣáɲ lấʔi vậʔi xi kák ŋươʔi ɣiơ tăj tʰì cɛ xỏʔi kák ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi kầʔuŋwiện zườn zà cẳŋ tʰèm ŋɛ tăj kák ŋươʔi dầʔi ɲữŋ máʔu hãʔi zửʔa di hãʔi cɔ sạc hãʔi cáɲ ɲữŋ việk ák xỏʔi cướkmắt Ðừŋ làmzữ nữʔa hãʔi họk làmlàɲ kôŋbìɲ hãʔi dỡdần kôŋbìɲ cɔ mồkôʔi biɲ vựk kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa Ðứkzê fán bâʔizờ hãʔi dến cɔ cúŋta kùŋ ɲăw zầʔu tộʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲư hồŋdiềʔu cởnên cắŋ ɲư twiết zầʔu dỏ ɲư sɔn cởnên cắŋ ɲư lôŋ ciên nếʔu kák ŋươʔi sẵnlòŋ vâŋ lờʔi dượk ɲứt kủʔa dất ɲượkbằŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ xứŋ ŋịc bởʔi ɣươm miệŋ Ðứkzê dã fán Ôʔi tʰàɲ cuŋŋĩʔa dã hóʔaza dầʔi cáɲ cựk ɣiờ dầʔi ɲữŋ ɣiết ŋườʔi bạk ŋươʔi tʰàɲ kặn zượʔu ŋươʔi fa nướk kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa zân ŋươʔi dồ fảnŋịc vớʔi kẻcộm mỗʔi ŋườʔi cɔŋ cúŋ dềʔu ưʔa kủʔa hốʔilộ dewduổʔi tʰeo tàʔi lợʔi cẳŋ kôŋbìɲ cɔ mồkôʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ɣóʔabụʔa cẳŋ dếnkùŋ cúŋnó vậʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân Ðấŋkwiền năŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi Ôʔi dượk tʰỏʔa lòŋ dốʔi dịɲ báʔɔ cả kừʔutʰù ta lạʔi ca tăicên ŋươʔi sạc káʔu kặn ŋươʔi cất fa kủʔa ŋươʔi ta kák kwan sét kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲư ŋàʔicướk kák mưʔusĩ kủʔa ŋươʔi ɲư lúk dầʔu zồʔi săw ŋườʔita sưŋ ŋươʔi tʰàɲ kôŋbìɲ cuŋŋĩʔa siôn dượk cuộk bởʔi cáɲ cựk kòn nàʔɔ cởlạʔi dó tʰì dượk cuộk bởʔi kôŋbìɲ sɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋịc mắk tộʔi kùŋ hủʔiziệt kòn Ðứkzê ziệtvɔŋ vậʔi kák ŋươʔi hổtʰẹn ɲữŋ kâʔi tʰôŋ mìɲ ưʔa mắkkỡ ɲữŋ mìɲ dã cọn vì kák ŋươʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư kâʔi tʰôŋ xô ɲư xôŋ nướk ŋườʔi mạɲ ɲư ɣaj việklàm kủʔa ɲư dóm lửʔa kả haj kùŋ ɲăw cáʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj ɣiập lờʔi saj kɔncaj ʔamốt dã tʰấʔi zuda ɣiêzusalɛm sẽ sảʔiza cɔŋ ɲữŋ ŋàʔi săwzốt núʔi kủʔa ɲà Ðứkzê dượk vữŋ cên dỉɲ kák núʔi kaw kák dồʔi mọʔi nướk dổ dó ɲiềʔu zântộk dến nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi dến cúŋta hãʔi núʔi Ðứkzê nơʔi ɲà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa zakốp ŋàʔi zạʔi cúŋta dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi cúŋta di cɔŋ kák nẻʔɔ ŋàʔi vì luậtfáp za siôn lờʔi Ðứkzê za ɣiêzusalɛm ŋàʔi fánsét cɔŋ kák nướk dɔándịɲ ɲiềʔu zân bấʔizờ lấʔi ɣươm zèn lưỡʔi kàʔi lấʔi ɣiáʔɔ zèn lưỡʔiliềm nướk nầʔi cẳŋ kòn ɣiá ɣươm ŋịc kùŋ nướk xák ŋườʔita cẳŋ kòn ciếncɛɲ hỡʔi ɲà zakốp hãʔi dến cúŋta hãʔi bướkdi cɔŋ sáŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê tʰậtcúʔa dã zân ŋàʔi ɲà zakốp dầʔizẫʔi tụk fươŋ dôŋ bóʔi xwa ɲư ŋườʔi filitin lạʔi zawướk vớʔi kɔnkáʔi zân ŋɔạʔi sứ dầʔi bạk vàŋ kủʔakảʔi vôkùŋ sứ dầʔi ɲữŋ ŋữʔa sɛcộ sứ cancứʔa ɲữŋ hìɲtượŋ tʰờ lạʔi dồ tăj mìɲ za dồ ŋóntăj mìɲ tạʔɔ kẻ xuất ŋườʔi saŋ hạmìɲ vậʔi cúʔa dừŋ tʰa ŋươʔi xá vàʔɔ nơʔi vầŋ dá mìɲ cɔŋ bụʔi dất dặŋ cáɲ xỏʔi kiɲ xiếp Ðứkzê cóʔi sáŋ kủʔa wiŋiêm ŋàʔi kɔn ŋó kaw kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi tʰấp suốŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa ŋườʔita di cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cỉ Ðứkzê tôncọŋ vì kó ŋàʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân dến cên mọʔi kiêʔukăŋ ŋạʔɔmạn tựkaw suốŋ lạʔi dến cên mọʔi kâʔi zẽ kủʔa basan kùŋ cên mọʔi núʔi kaw mọʔi dồʔi kả cên mọʔi tʰáp kaw mọʔi vác tʰàɲ vữŋbền cên mọʔi tàʔubè kủʔa tazêsi mọʔi ci dẹpmắt sự tựkaw kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi zằn suốŋ kậʔi mìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔita di cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cỉ Ðứkzê tôncọŋ bấʔizờ kák tʰầntượŋ kwa di ŋườʔita vàʔɔ cɔŋ haŋ dá cɔŋ dất dặŋ cáɲ xỏʔi kiɲ xiếp Ðứkzê cóʔi sáŋ kủʔa wiŋiêm ŋàʔi xi ŋàʔi zấʔi dặŋ zúŋdộŋ dất kác mạɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita cɔ cuột cɔ zơʔi ɲữŋ tʰầntượŋ bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ za cɔ mìɲ tʰờ lạʔi vàʔɔ cɔŋ haŋ dá cɔŋ dá dặŋ cáɲ xỏʔi kiɲ xiếp Ðứkzê cóʔi sáŋ kủʔa
