wiŋiêm ŋàʔi xi ŋàʔi zấʔi dặŋ zúŋdộŋ dất kác mạɲ cớ kậʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi lɔàʔi kó hơʔi tʰở cɔŋ mũʔi nàʔɔ kó dáŋkể ɣì dâʔu nầʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân kất lấʔi cóʔi ɣậʔi xỏʔi ɣiêzusalɛm zuda tứklà kả báɲ kậʔi kả nướk ɲờ ŋàʔi kất lấʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲmẽ ciếnsĩ kwan sét dấŋ tiênci tʰầʔibóʔi cưởŋlãʔɔ kaj dộʔi zòŋ kwífáʔi mưʔusĩ lươŋ kôŋ tʰuậtsĩ ta cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi caicẻ kwan cưởŋ kɔnnít kaicị zânsự ɲăw ŋườʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi lânkận vớʔi lânkận kɔnnít ɣiàkả ŋườʔi ŋườʔi tôncọŋ xi ŋườʔi ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ tạʔi ɲà ca nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi kó áʔɔcɔàŋ hãʔi làmdầʔu cúŋta bạʔihɔạʔi nầʔi hãʔi tʰuộk zướʔi tăj ŋươʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi kiə lêntiếŋ dáp zằŋ xôŋ xôŋ tʰầʔi cữʔa làɲ cɔŋ ɲà xôŋ kó báɲ kũŋ xôŋ kó áʔɔ cớ kwan kaj zânsự ɣiêzusalɛm fảʔi ŋiêŋ zuda siêʔu dổ lờʔinóʔi việklàm kủʔa ŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê cêʔucọk kɔn kủʔa wiŋiêm ŋàʔi bộmặt làmcứŋ ŋịc kùŋ mìɲ bêʔu tộʔi zõzàŋ ɲư tʰàɲ sôdôm cẳŋ ɣiấʔu cút nàʔɔ xốn tʰăj cɔ liɲhồn dã hạʔi cɔ mìɲ hãʔi zaw cɔ kôŋbìɲ dượk fướk ăncáʔi kủʔa việklàm mìɲ xốn cɔ huŋák maŋ họʔa vì tʰâʔu lạʔi việk tăj mìɲ za zân kɔnnít dờn kaicị hỡʔi zân zẫn ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sajlạk fáhɔạʔi dườŋlốʔi ŋươʔi Ðứkzê zấʔi dặŋ ŋàʔi dứŋ sétdɔán kák zân Ðứkzê sétdɔán kák cưởŋlãʔɔ kủʔa zân ŋàʔi vớʔi kák kwan cưởŋ Ấʔi cíɲ kák ŋươʔi dã ɲɔ kủʔa kướpbók ŋèʔɔ dươŋ cɔŋ ɲà kák ŋươʔi kák ŋươʔi kó ɣì dè zân ɣiàʔivò ŋèʔɔxó cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân fán vậʔi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán zằŋ vì ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi siôn kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ŋóŋ kổ bướk tớʔi liếk cêʔuŋươʔi vừʔa di õŋẹʔɔ vừʔa xwa dộŋ tiếŋ zướʔi cơn cúʔa cɔ dỉɲ dầʔu kɔŋáʔi siôn dóŋ vảʔi Ðứkzê cuồŋ cúŋnó cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cúʔa kất ɲữŋ vòŋ mắtká caŋsứk di káʔi lướʔi káʔi kàʔi hwataj swiến mãʔɔ cwiền mắtká lưŋ hươŋ bùʔa deo kàzá xwen deo mũʔi áʔɔ áʔɔlá zộŋ áʔɔcɔàŋ túʔi ɲỏ ɣươŋ tăj vảʔi mỏŋ xăn dầʔu cɛ sẽ kó mùʔi hôʔihám tʰăjvì tʰơmtʰɔ zâʔi tóʔi tʰăjvì lưŋ dầʔi sóʔi tʰăjvì tók kwăn baw ɣaj kwấn mìɲ tʰăjvì áʔɔzàʔi fấpfớʔi zấʔu fỏŋ tʰăjvì sắkdẹp líɲciến ŋươʔi ŋã zướʔi ɣươm ɲữŋ ʔɛɲhùŋ ŋươʔi tửcận kák kửʔa tʰanxók tʰảmsầʔu vắŋvẻ ŋồʔi cên dất cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó bảʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋtôʔi báɲ kủʔa mìɲ mặk áʔɔ kủʔa mìɲ cỉ sin cɔfép cúŋtôʔi maŋ zɛɲ ŋươʔi hãʔi kất sấʔuhổ kủʔa cúŋtôʔi di cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cồʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dồ caŋsứk viɲhiển kủʔa ɲữŋ lạʔi cɔŋ ʔisơzaên zướʔi dất tốtdẹp cɔ cúŋnó fàm ɲữŋ kòn lạʔi siôn ɲữŋ lạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tứklà ɲữŋ ɣiêzusalɛm dượk cép vàʔɔsổ ŋườʔi sốŋ tʰì dượk sưŋ tʰáɲ xi cúʔa dɛm tʰầnkôŋ bìɲ kùŋ tʰần tʰiêʔudốt zửʔa ôʔuế kủʔa ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi siôn tẩʔi sạc hwiết ɣiêzusalɛm xỏʔi ɣiữʔa cên xắpnơʔi núʔi siôn cên xắp kák hộʔi Ðứkzê zựŋ dám mâʔi bọk xóʔi cɔŋ banŋàʔi ŋọn lửʔa sɔj sáŋ cɔŋ bandêm vì káʔi cɛ kả viɲhiển kó cạʔi bóŋmát cáɲ nắŋ banŋàʔi zùŋ nơʔi cổ dụp cɔ xỏʔi ɣiótápmưʔasa ta cɔ zất ʔiêʔuzấʔu bàʔi ka kủʔa ʔiêʔuzấʔu việk ɲɔ ŋườʔi bạn zất ʔiêʔuzấʔu kó ɲɔ cên ɣò dất ŋườʔi xajfá za kất ɲữŋ dá cồŋ ɲữŋ ɣốk ɲɔ siɲ zựŋ káʔi tʰáp ɣiữʔa dàʔɔ nơʔi zượʔu vả ŋườʔi mɔŋ zằŋ sɛɲ cáʔi ɲɔ ɲưŋ lạʔi sɛɲ cáʔi ɲɔ hwaŋ hỡʔi zân ɣiêzusalɛm kùŋ ŋườʔi zuda vậʔitʰì bâʔizờ sin kák ŋươʔi hãʔi dɔán sét ɣiữʔa vớʔi ɲɔ kódiềʔu ci cɔ ɲɔ xôŋ cɔ căŋ kớsaw xi mɔŋ sɛɲ cáʔi ɲɔ tʰì lạʔi sɛɲ cáʔi ɲɔ hwaŋ vậʔi nầʔi bảʔɔ kák ŋươʔi diềʔu dịɲ cɔ ɲɔ ta fázàʔɔ kắn tườŋ suốŋ ɣiàʔidạp ta dể hwaŋ lɔạn cẳŋ tỉʔa sửʔa cẳŋ vunsớʔi ɲưŋ tạʔi dó mọk ɲữŋ ɣaj ɣốk cà cuôm lạʔi cwiền cɔ mâʔi dừŋ mưʔa suốŋ cên nữʔa vả ɲɔ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân ấʔilà ɲà ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kủʔa zuda tứklà kâʔi ŋàʔi ưʔatʰíc ŋàʔi côŋ dượk kôŋcíɲ nầʔi kó bạʔɔŋượk côŋ dượk kôŋbìɲ nầʔi kótiếŋ kêʔula xốn tʰăj cɔ ɲữŋ tʰêm ɲà vàʔɔ ɲà tʰêm zuộŋ vàʔɔ zuộŋ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ cẳŋ kòn cỗ nữʔa kák ŋươʔi mộtmìɲ ɣiữʔa sứ Ðứkzê kwân kó fán vàʔɔ taj tôʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi nầʔi tʰật ɲiềʔu ɲà bỏhwaŋ ɲữŋ ɲà ấʔi dẹp cẳŋ kó ŋườʔiở Ấʔi vậʔi mườʔi mẫʔu ɲɔ cỉ sɛɲ dượk zượʔu mɛ ɣiốŋ cỉ dượk fa xốn tʰăj cɔ zậʔi dặŋ zượʔu cầʔi dến bandêm fát nóŋ zượʔu cɔŋ tiệk ʔiến kó ɲữŋ dờn kầm dờn cốŋkơm ốŋ sáʔɔ zượʔu nữʔa ɲữŋ cẳŋ tʰiết dến kôŋviệk Ðứkzê cẳŋ sɛmsét kôŋcìɲ kủʔa tăj ŋàʔi vậʔi zân fảʔi fu xôŋ hiểʔubiết saŋ cịʔu dóʔi cúŋ zân cịʔu xát vậʔi kủʔa âmfủ dã zộŋ tʰêm miệŋ vôŋần viɲhiển zân cúŋnó saŋcọŋ dềʔu suốŋ dó kẻ xuất tôncọŋ tʰấfèn kɔn ŋườʔi kawŋạʔɔ suốŋ sɔŋ Ðứkzê kwân kaw cɔŋ kôŋcíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋtʰáɲ tʰáɲ cɔŋ kôŋbìɲ bấʔizờ ɲữŋ ciên kɔn kỏ ɲư cɔŋ dồŋkỏ mìɲ ŋườʔi ŋụkư zuộŋ hwaŋ kủʔa ɣiàʔu xốn tʰăj cɔ lấʔi zốʔicá zâʔi kéʔɔ zanák tʰeo săw ɲư zùŋ dỏʔi sɛcéʔɔ tộʔilỗʔi nóʔi sin vộʔivã kôŋviệk ŋàʔi hầʔu cɔ cúŋtôʔi tʰấʔi ŋwiền sin mưʔu kủʔa Ðấŋtʰáɲ ʔisơzaên hãʔi lạʔi ɣần hãʔi tớʔi dến cɔ cúŋtôʔi dượk xốn tʰăj cɔ ɣọʔi zữ làɲ ɣọʔi làɲ zữ lấʔi tốʔi sáŋ lấʔi sáŋ tốʔi vậʔi ci kăj cở cɔ ŋọt ci ŋọt cở cɔ kăj xốn tʰăj cɔ cíɲ mìɲ kɔj mìɲ xônŋwan mìɲ sétdɔán mìɲ tʰôŋ sáŋ xốn tʰăj cɔ mạɲ ʔuốŋ zượʔu kó sứklựk dặŋ fa kák tʰứk ʔuốŋ hăj săj hốʔilộ sưŋ kó tộʔi kôŋbìɲ kướp lấʔi kôŋbìɲ kủʔa ŋườʔi ŋĩʔa vậʔi ɲư lửʔa dốt ɣốk zạ zơm cáʔi tʰiêʔu cɔŋ ŋọn lửʔa tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì zễ kùŋ mụknát hwa kùŋ băj di ɲư bụʔi dất tʰể ấʔi dã luậtfáp kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân xiɲ lờʔi kủʔa Ðấŋtʰáɲ ʔisơzaên ɲơn dó kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê fừŋ ŋịc kùŋzân ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dã ɣiơ tăj ŋịc kùŋ dáɲ núʔinɔn dềʔu zúŋdộŋ sákcết cúŋnó ɲư fân ŋaŋŋửʔa ɣiữʔa dườŋ zầʔu vậʔi kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cẳŋ láɲ xỏʔi ɲưŋ tăj ŋàʔi kòn ɣiơ za ŋàʔi zựŋ kờ hướŋ kák zântộk sakác suýt ɣọʔi nơʔi dầʔu kùŋ dất nầʔi lậtdật cạʔi dến măw cɔŋ dám xôŋ ŋườʔi nàʔɔ mỏʔimệt cẳŋ ʔaj cẳŋ ʔaj ŋủɣật hɔặk ŋủmê xôŋ ʔaj kó zâʔilưŋ tʰáʔɔ za hɔặk zâʔi ɣiàʔi dứt tên kủʔa dã ɲọn kuŋ dã ɣiươŋ ŋựʔa kứŋ zườŋ dá báɲsɛ ɲư ɣiólốk tiếŋ ɣầm xáknàʔɔ káʔi zốŋ ɲư kɔn cúŋnó zốŋ mồʔi dɛm di xôŋ ʔaj kứʔu dượk cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kótiếŋ ɣầm ŋịc kùŋ xáknàʔɔ tiếŋ sóŋ nếʔu ŋườʔita vàʔɔ sứ cỉ tʰấʔi tốʔităm xốnnạn sáŋ cɛ tốʔi bướk kák còm mâʔi về vwa siə băŋ tôʔi tʰấʔi cúʔa ŋồʔi cên ŋôʔi kawsaŋ áʔɔ kủʔa ŋàʔi dầʔizẫʔi dền tʰờ ɲữŋ zafin dứŋ cên ŋàʔi mỗʔi zafin kó sáʔu káɲ haj káʔi cɛ haj káʔi cɛ cơn haj káʔi zùŋ dể băj kák zafin kùŋ ɲăw kêʔu zằŋ tʰáɲ tʰăj tʰáɲ tʰăj tʰáɲ tʰăj Ðứkzê kwân xắp dất dầʔizẫʔi viɲhiển ŋàʔi ɲơn tiếŋ kêʔu dó kák ŋạc kửʔa zúŋdộŋ dền dầʔi ɲữŋ xóʔi bấʔizờ tôʔi nóʔi xốnnạn cɔ tôʔi sɔŋdờʔi tôʔi zồʔi vì tôʔi ŋườʔi kó môʔi zơzáʔi ɣiữʔa zân kó môʔi zơzáʔi bởʔi tôʔi dã tʰấʔi vwa tứklà Ðứkzê kwân bấʔizờ zafin băj dến tôʔi tăikầm tʰan lửʔa dỏ dã zùŋ ɣắp nơʔi bàntʰờ dể cên miệŋ nóʔi zằŋ nầʔi káʔi nầʔi dã cạm dến môʔi ŋươʔi lỗʔi ŋươʔi dượk zồʔi tộʔi ŋươʔi dượk tʰa zồʔi Ðʔɔạn tôʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ cúʔa fán zằŋ ta saj ʔaj di ʔaj di cɔ cúŋta tôʔi tʰưʔa zằŋ kó tôʔi dâʔi sin hãʔi saj tôʔi ŋàʔi fán Ðʔi di nóʔi vớʔi zân nầʔi zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi ŋɛ ɲưŋ cẳŋ hiểʔu ci hãʔi sɛm ɲưŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi ci hãʔi cɔ zân ấʔi béʔɔ lòŋ nặŋtaj ɲắmmắt ʔɛ zằŋ tʰấʔi dượk taj ŋɛ dượk lòŋ hiểʔu dượk cởlạʔi dượk cữʔa làɲ căŋ tôʔi lạʔi nóʔi lạʔicúʔa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ ŋàʔi dáp zằŋ cɔdến cừŋ kák tʰàɲ hwaŋvu xôŋ kó zân ɲà xôŋ kó ŋườʔi dất dã hwaŋvu kả cɔdến cừŋ Ðứkzê zờʔi zân di sa cɔŋ sứ zất tiêʔudiềʔu ɣiảsử kòn lạʔi fần mườʔi zânkư tạʔi dó lạʔi tʰiêʔu ɲưŋ ɲư xi ŋườʔita kâʔi tʰôŋ kâʔi zẽ cừʔa ɣốk lạʔi tʰì kũŋ vậʔi ɣiốŋ tʰáɲ ɣốk kủʔa về dờʔi ʔɛca kɔncaj ɣiôtʰam cáʔu siə vwa nướk zuda sảʔi kó zêsin vwa sứ sizi fêka kɔncaj zêmaliə vwa ʔisơzaên dáɲ tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm ɲưŋ xôŋ tʰắŋ dượk kó ŋườʔi váʔɔ dó cɔ ɲà Ðʔa zằŋ sizi miɲ kùŋ zaim bấʔizờ ʔɛca zânsự ŋườʔi cɔŋ lòŋ kiɲdộŋ ɲư kâʔi cên zừŋ ɣió zăj Ðứkzê fán kùŋ saj zằŋ ŋươʔi kùŋ kɔncaj ŋươʔi sêʔazazúp hãʔi di dón ʔɛca tạʔi nơʔi kuốʔi kốŋ ʔaw cên cên dườŋkáʔi zuộŋ tʰợ nóʔi kùŋ ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi kẩntʰận ʔiênlặŋ dừŋ ci lòŋ ŋươʔi cớ bủnzủn kớ haj duôʔi duốk kó xóʔi tứklà kơn ɣiậnzữ kủʔa zêsin sizi kủʔa kɔncaj zêmaliə vìsi zi vớʔi zaim kɔncaj kủʔa zêmaliə dồŋ mưʔuhạʔi ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta hãʔi ŋịc kùŋ zuda xuấʔizốʔi fá tʰàɲ vwa ɣiữʔa tứklà kɔncaj kủʔa tabêên cúʔa Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi sự ŋăm dɛ ấʔi xôŋ tʰàɲ diềʔu dó xôŋ sảʔiza vì dầʔu kủʔa sizi Ðʔa mác dầʔu kủʔa Ðʔa mác zêsin kòn cɔŋ sáʔu mươʔi zaim hủʔiziệt xôŋ dượk zân nữʔa Ðầʔu kủʔa zaim samazi dầʔu samazi kɔncaj kủʔa zêmaliə nếʔu kák ŋươʔi xôŋ cắk xôŋ dứŋ vữŋ dượk Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ ʔɛca zằŋ hãʔi sin ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi diềm hɔặk zướʔi vựk sâʔu hɔặk cên cờʔi kaw ʔɛca tʰưʔa zằŋ tôʔi cẳŋ sin tôʔi kũŋ cẳŋ tʰử Ðứkzê saj nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ɲà Ðʔa hãʔi ŋɛ kák ŋươʔi cɔ làmfiền ŋườʔita ɲỏmọn làmfiền Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi nữʔa saw vậʔi cíɲ cúʔa diềm cɔ kák ŋươʔi nầʔi ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ cịʔu tʰaj sɛɲ za caj dặt cên ʔɛmmanuên kɔncẻ ấʔi sữʔa cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ diềʔu zữ cọn diềʔu làɲ vả cướk xi kɔncẻ diềʔu zữ cọn diềʔu làɲ tʰì nướk kủʔa haj vwa ŋươʔi dươŋ ɣét bỏhwaŋ Ðứkzê ɣiáŋ cên ŋươʔi zân ŋươʔi ɲà cɔ ŋươʔi bởʔi vwa ʔasizi ɲữŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi zaim lìʔabỏ zuda cưʔa từŋ kó ɣiốŋ ɲưvậʔi sảʔiza cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê ɣọʔi ɲữŋ zuồʔi kuốʔi kák sôŋ zíptô ɲữŋ ʔɔŋ sứ ʔasizi haj ɣiốŋ dó dến dậʔu cɔŋ kák nơʔi cũŋ hwaŋ lɔạn cɔŋ kák vầŋ dá cên zàʔɔ ɣaj kùŋ kák dồŋkỏ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê zùŋ zawkạʔɔ tʰuê tạʔi kiə sôŋ ŋĩʔalà vwa ʔasizi kạʔɔ dầʔu kùŋ lôŋ cơn kả zâʔu nữʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó mỗʔi ŋườʔi kótʰể nuôʔi kɔn káʔi haj kɔnciên bởʔi kó sữʔa zưzật tʰì ŋườʔi sữʔa fàm ʔaj kòn lạʔi ɣiữʔa sứ tʰì nuôʔi mìɲ bằŋ sữʔa sảʔiza cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó fàm cỗ dất cồŋ dượk mộtŋàn ɣốk ɲɔ dáŋzá mộtŋàn siếk bạk mọk dầʔi ɲữŋ ɣaj ɣốk cà cuôm ŋườʔita dɛm kuŋ dến dó kả sứ cỉ ɣaj ɣốk cà cuôm vậʔi kũŋ xôŋ ʔaj dến cên kák ɣò nơʔi mìɲ dã kàʔicuốk nữʔa ɣaj ɣốk cà cuôm ɲưŋ cɔ kỏ tạʔi dó ciên ɣiàʔidạp Ðứkzê fán kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi káʔi bảŋ zộŋ cên bằŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi zằŋ mahɛsalahátbát tôʔi dɛm tʰeo ɲữŋ làmcứŋ dáŋ tứklà ʔuzi tʰầʔi sɛcazi kɔncaj kủʔa ɣiêbêzêkiə Ðʔɔạn tôʔi dến ɲà tiênci ŋườʔi cịʔu tʰaj sɛɲ kɔncaj Ðứkzê fán kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ hãʔi dặt mahɛsalahátbát vì cướk xi kɔncẻ kêʔu ca ơʔi ơʔi tʰì ŋườʔita kất lấʔi ɣiàʔukó Ðʔa mác kủʔa kướp samazi cướk vwa ʔasizi Ðứkzê lạʔi fán kùŋ tôʔi zằŋ vì zân nầʔi dã xiɲ kák zòŋ nướk silô cảʔi zịʔu ưʔatʰíc zêsin kùŋ kɔncaj kủʔa zêmaliə vì kớ dó nầʔi cúʔa xiến nướk sôŋ mạɲ ɲiềʔu dến cên tứklà vwa ʔasizi kả waj viɲ ŋườʔi zấʔi xắp cên lòŋsôŋ xỏʔa kák bựk cảʔi vàʔɔ zuda cànlan cảʔi sóʔi ŋập cɔdến kổ hỡʔi ʔɛmmanuên káɲ za cɛ kả sứ ŋươʔi hỡʔi kák zân hãʔi kêʔula hỡʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi zân kák fươŋ sa hãʔi lắŋtaj hãʔi lưŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi twan mưʔu kùŋ ɲăw hưxôŋ hãʔi nóʔi lờʔi kák ŋươʔi xôŋ dứŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kùŋ cúŋta vìÐứkzê zùŋ tăj mạɲ fán kùŋ zạʔi dừŋ nɔj tʰeo dườŋ zân ấʔi zằŋ xi zân nầʔi nóʔi zằŋ kết dảŋ tʰì kák ŋươʔi cớ nóʔi zằŋ kết dảŋ cớ diềʔu dừŋ kiɲhãʔi hãʔi Ðứkzê kwân tʰáɲ kák ŋươʔi cỉ ŋàʔi kiɲhãʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi nơʔi tʰáɲ ɲưŋ kũŋ dá vấpŋã vầŋ dó vướŋmắk cɔ kả haj ɲà ʔisơzaên bẫʔi kùŋ lướʔi cɔ zânkư tʰàɲ ɣiêzusalɛm vậʔi ɲiềʔu ŋườʔi cɔŋ cơn ɣiập vàʔɔ lướʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi ɣóʔi lờʔi cứŋ nầʔi niêmfɔŋ luậtfáp nầʔi cɔŋ môndồ tôʔi côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ ŋàʔi xỏʔi ɲà zakốp tôʔi ŋóŋcôŋ ŋàʔi nầʔi tôʔi dâʔi vớʔi kɔnkáʔi Ðứkzê dã cɔ tôʔi zấʔu diềm cɔŋ ʔisơzaên bởʔi Ðứkzê kwân ŋự cên núʔi siôn nếʔu kó ʔajbảʔɔ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi kầʔu hỏʔi dồŋbóŋ tʰầʔibóʔi nóʔi zúʔi zít líʔulɔ tʰì hãʔi dáp zằŋ một zântộk cẳŋ kầʔu hỏʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ saw há lạʔi ŋườʔi sốŋ hỏʔi cết saw hãʔi tʰeo luậtfáp lờʔi cứŋ nếʔu zân cẳŋ nóʔi ɲưvậʔi cắk cẳŋ kó zạŋdôŋ cɔ nó di lưʔulạk cên dất xốnxổ dóʔixát cɔŋ kơn dóʔi bựkmìɲ ŋwiềnzủʔa vwa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ nó ŋướk sɛm cên kaw zồʔi kúʔi sɛm zướʔi dất cỉ tʰấʔi hɔạnnạn cỉ tʰấʔi bóŋ buồnzầʔu duổʔi vàʔɔ nơʔi tốʔităm ɲưŋ cɔ ŋườʔi dã cịʔu buồnzầʔu tʰì xôŋ kó cɔŋ dờʔi sưʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã dất sabulôn dất néptali suốŋ ɲưŋ cɔŋ săw ŋàʔi dã cɔ dất ɣần tứklà nơʔi kiə sôŋ ɣiôdɛɲ cɔŋ sứ ɣalilê kủʔa zân ŋɔạʔi dượk viɲhiển zân di cɔŋ nơʔi tốʔităm dã tʰấʔi sáŋ sáŋ dã ciếʔu cên ɲữŋ sứ tʰuộk bóŋ kủʔa cết cúʔa dã cɔ zân nầʔi tʰêm ɲiềʔu tʰêm vuj cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi dềʔu vuimừŋ cướk cúʔa ɲư vuimừŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔimùʔa ɣặt ɲư ŋườʔita zeo vuj cɔŋ lúk ciə kủʔa kướp vìcúʔa dã káʔi ác maŋ káʔi zɔj dáɲ cên vaj káʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa ɲư cɔŋ ŋàʔi kủʔa madiən kả ɣiàʔizép kủʔa dáɲ ɣiặk cɔŋ xi zawciến kùŋ kả áʔɔsốŋ vấʔi máʔu dềʔu zùŋ dể dốt dồ cụm lửʔa vì kó kɔncẻ sɛɲ cɔ cúŋta tứklà kɔncaj cɔ cúŋta kwiền kaicị nấʔi cên vaj ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dượk sưŋ Ðấŋlạ lùŋ Ðấŋmưʔu Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔicwiền năŋ caÐờʔi dờʔi cúʔabìɲ ʔan kwiền kaicị bìɲan kủʔa ŋàʔi kứ tʰêm mãʔi xôŋ tʰôʔi cên ŋôʔi Ðʔa cên nướk ŋàʔi dặŋ cɔ nướk bềnvữŋ cɔŋ cáɲ cựk kôŋbìɲ năj cɔdến dờʔidờʔi tʰật lòŋ sốtsắŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân ấʔi cúʔa dã ɣiáŋ lờʔi cɔŋ zakốp lờʔi ấʔi dổ suốŋ cên ʔisơzaên kả zân biếtdiềʔu dó tứklà zaim kùŋ zânkư samazi dɛmlòŋ kiêʔukăŋ tʰị nóʔi zằŋ ɣạc dã dổ ɲưŋ cúŋta sâʔi bằŋ dá dẽʔɔ kâʔi suŋ dã dốn ɲưŋ cúŋta tʰăj bằŋ kâʔi hươŋ bác vậʔi Ðứkzê xiến dốʔidịc zêsin zấʔi ŋịc kùŋzân xíc cọk kừʔutʰù zân sizi dằŋ cướk zân filitin dằŋ săw miệŋ ʔisơzaên zầʔu vậʔi kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cẳŋ láɲ xỏʔi ɲưŋ tăj ŋàʔi kòn ɣiơ za ɲưŋmà zânsự cẳŋ sâʔi Ðấŋ dáɲ mìɲ cẳŋ Ðứkzê kwân cɔnên cỉ cɔŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê zứt dầʔu duôʔi kâʔi kâʔi lák kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðầʔu tứklà cưởŋlãʔɔ tôncọŋ duôʔi tứklà ŋườʔi tiênci zạʔi nóʔizốʔi ɲữŋ zắt zân nầʔi cɔ sajlạk kòn ɲữŋ cịʔu zắt ziệt vậʔi cúʔa cẳŋ dẹplòŋ caicẻ kủʔa cẳŋ tʰươŋsót dến mồkôʔi ɣóʔabụʔa cút nàʔɔ dềʔu xiɲ zanák miệŋ nàʔɔ kũŋ nóʔi diềʔu kàn zỡ zầʔu vậʔi kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi cẳŋ láɲ xỏʔi ɲưŋ tăj ŋàʔi kòn ɣiơ za vì huŋák hừŋ ɲư lửʔa tʰiêʔu cáʔi ɣaj ɣốk cà cuôm dốt kák nơʔi zậm cɔŋ zừŋ cụ xóʔi kuộn tʰiêʔudốt bởʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân zânsự cởnên mồʔi kủʔa lửʔa cẳŋ ʔaj tʰươŋtiếk ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ kó kẻkướp hữʔu kứ dóʔi kó cẳŋ dượk nɔ ʔainấʔi tʰịt mìɲ cíɲ káɲtăj mìɲ manasɛ ŋịc kùŋ zaim zaim ŋịc kùŋ manasɛ kả haj dềʔu ŋịc kùŋ zuda zầʔu vậʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa Ðứkzê cẳŋ láɲ xỏʔi ɲưŋ tăj ŋàʔi kòn ɣiơ za kốn tʰăj cɔ ɲữŋ xôŋ kôŋbìɲ cɔ ɲữŋ cép lờʔi cáʔi kất kôŋbìɲ xỏʔi ŋèʔɔ kướp lẽfảʔi kủʔa xốnxó cɔŋ zân lấʔi ɣóʔabụʔa miếŋ mồʔi mồkôʔi kủʔa kướp tớʔi ŋàʔi tʰăm fạt xi họʔa hɔạn sa dến kák ŋươʔi tʰểnàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi cốn dếnkùŋ ʔaj dể kầʔukứʔu dể viɲhiển mìɲ nơʔi nàʔɔ cúŋnó cỉ kó xɔm lưŋ zướʔi ɲữŋ fu ŋã zướʔi ɲữŋ ɣiết zầʔu vậʔi kơn ɣiận kủʔa cúʔa cẳŋ láɲ xỏʔi ɲưŋ tăj ŋàʔi kòn ɣiơ za hỡʔi ʔasizi káʔi zɔj kủʔa tʰạɲ káʔi ɣậʔi kầm cɔŋ tăj tứkzận kủʔa vậʔi ta saj ŋịc kùŋ nướk cẳŋ kíɲ xiến di dáɲ zân nổʔizận dể kướp lấʔi bóklột ɣiàʔidạp cúŋnó ɲư ŋɔàʔi dườŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ kó tʰế cɔŋ lòŋ cẳŋ ŋĩ ɲưvậʔi lạʔi tʰíc fáhạʔi hủʔiziệt ɲiềʔu zân vì nóʔi zằŋ kák kwan cưởŋ kủʔa cẳŋ fảʔi dềʔu vwa saw há lạʔi kanô cẳŋ ɲư kạtkêmít hamát cẳŋ ɲư ʔaï samazi cẳŋ ɲư Ðʔa mác saw ɲư tăj dã tớʔi dến kák nướk kủʔa tʰầntượŋ tượŋ cạm kủʔa lạʔi kủʔa ɣiêzusalɛm samazi nữʔa tʰì cẳŋ cɔ ɣiêzusalɛm tʰầntượŋ kũŋɲư dã cɔ samazi tʰầntượŋ saw nên sảʔiza xi cúʔa dã sɔŋ kả việk cên núʔi siôn tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm tʰì cíɲ hàɲ fạt ɲữŋ bôŋ cáʔi bởʔi lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ viɲhiển kủʔa kɔn ŋó kaw kủʔa vwa ʔasizi vì ŋườʔi nóʔi zằŋ ta dã diềʔu dó bởʔi sứkmạɲ kủʔa tăj bởʔi xônŋwan tʰôŋmiɲ ta dã zờʔidổʔi ɣiớʔihạn kák zân dã kướp kủʔa kwí ɲư ŋườʔi mạɲ dã cɔ ɲữŋ dươŋ ŋồʔi fảʔi suốŋ tăj dã dượk kủʔakảʔi kák zân ɲư cim kả dất ɲư cứŋ dã cẳŋ kó ʔaj dập káɲ hăjlà kêʔu káʔi zìʔu lạʔi xwej mìɲ kùŋ ŋườʔi kầm zìʔu káʔi kưʔa lạʔi zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ kầm kưʔa tʰế kũŋɲư káʔi zɔj vậndộŋ ɣiơ zɔj káʔi ɣậʔi nâŋdỡ káɲtăj kầm ɣậʔi vậʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲ kủʔa cởnên ɣầʔimòn zướʔi viɲhiển dốt cáʔi ɲư lửʔa tʰiêʔudốt sự sáŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên cởnên lửʔa Ðấŋtʰáɲ cởnên ŋọn dèn cỉ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dốt tiêʔu ɣaj ɣốk cà cuôm lạʔi tʰiêʔuhủʔi viɲhwa kủʔa zừŋ kâʔi zuộŋ màʔumỡ kák liɲhồn tʰântʰể ɲư kầm kờsí ŋất di vậʔi bấʔizờ ɲữŋ kâʔi cên zừŋ kòn lạʔi cẳŋlà baw dứʔa békɔn kótʰể cép lấʔidượk cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zân kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋườʔi tʰɔát kủʔa ɲà zakốp xôŋ kậʔi dáɲ mìɲ nữʔa ɲưŋ tʰật lòŋ kậʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên mộtsố zân tứklà zân kủʔa zakốp cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kwiềnnăŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên zầʔu zân ŋươʔi ɲư kát cỉ fần lạʔi cởlạʔi sự hủʔiziệt dã dịɲ bởʔivì kôŋbìɲ càn xắp vìcúʔa Ðứkzê kwân dã dịɲ cọn hủʔiziệt cɔŋ xắp dất vậʔi kó lờʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân fán ɲưvầʔi hỡʔi zân ŋươʔi tạʔi siôn cớ ŋườʔi ʔasizi zầʔu lấʔi zɔj dáɲ ŋươʔi ɣiá ɣậʔi cên ŋươʔi tʰeo kác ŋườʔi zíptô vì kòn ítlâʔu nữʔa ɣiận kák ŋươʔi kơn tʰạɲ cở ŋịc kùŋzân ấʔi dặŋ hủʔiziệt bấʔizờ Ðứkzê kwân ɣiá zɔj cên ɲư ŋàʔi dã dáɲ ɣiết ŋườʔi madiən nơʔi vầŋ dá hôzếp lạʔi ɣiơ ɣậʔi cên ɣiơ ɲư dã cɔŋ sứ zíptô cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣáɲ nặŋ kất xỏʔi vaj ŋươʔi ác kất xỏʔi kổ ŋươʔi ác ɣãʔi béʔɔ nó di dến ʔazát cảʔi kwa miɣơzôn dể dồdạk tạʔi mícma cúŋnó kwa ảʔi dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi ɣêba zama zunsợ ɣibê ʔa kủʔa săwlơ cạʔi cốn hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi ɣalim hãʔi kấttiếŋ kêʔu tɔ hỡʔi ŋườʔi laít hãʔi ɣé taj ŋɛ tʰươŋ tʰăj cɔ ŋườʔi ʔanatốt mátmêna cốncáɲ zânkư ɣêbim cỗ cíɲ ŋàʔi dó cúŋnó dóŋ tạʔi nóp vuŋ tăj ŋịc kùŋ núʔi kủʔa kɔŋáʔi siôn ŋịc kùŋ dồʔi kủʔa ɣiêzusalɛm nầʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân zùŋ waj mạɲ dốn kák ɲáɲ kâʔi ɲữŋ kawlớn dềʔu cặt ɲữŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ suốŋ ŋàʔi zùŋ cặt ɲữŋ bụʔi zậm cên zừŋ liban ŋã suốŋ bởʔi ŋườʔi mạɲ sứk kó cồʔi ɣốk ʔisaj ɲàɲ zễ za cáʔi tʰần kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋự cên ŋàʔi tứklà tʰần xônŋwan tʰôŋ sáŋ tʰần mưʔutwan mạɲ sứk tʰần hiểʔubiết kíɲ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi lấʔi kíɲ Ðứkzê vuj cẳŋ fánsét tʰeo mìɲ tʰấʔi cẳŋ kứ taiŋɛ dɔándịɲ ɲưŋŋàʔi zùŋ kôŋbìɲ sétdɔán ŋèʔɔ sử ŋăitʰẳŋ cɔ ɲumì cên dất ŋàʔi dáɲ tʰếzan bằŋ káʔi ɣậʔi kủʔa mìɲ mìɲ lấʔi hơʔi tʰở nơʔi môʔi ɣiết ák sự kôŋbìɲ zâʔi tʰắtlưŋ kủʔa ŋàʔi tʰàɲ zâʔi zàŋ hôŋ bấʔizờ muôŋ sóʔi vớʔi ciên kɔn vớʔi zê kɔn kɔn kɔn vớʔi nuôʔi kùŋ cuŋ cỗ dứʔa kɔncẻ zắt cúŋnó di bò káʔi vớʔi ɣấʔu kák kɔnɲỏ cúŋnó cuŋ kỏ xô ɲư cẻkɔn dươŋ cơʔi zắn hổmaŋ cẻkɔn tʰôʔi tʰò tăj vàʔɔ haŋ zắnlụk nó cẳŋ hạʔi cẳŋ ɣiết ʔaj cɔŋ kả núʔi tʰáɲ kủʔa tʰếzan dầʔizẫʔi hiểʔubiết Ðứkzê ɲư kák zòŋ nướk cɛlấp sảʔiza cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó zễ ʔisaj dứŋ kờ cɔ muônzân kák nướk dềʔu dến ŋàʔi nơʔi ʔanŋỉ kủʔa ŋàʔi dượk viɲhiển cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cúʔa kòn dặt tăj nữʔa dặŋ cuộk zân kủʔa ŋàʔi tứklà lạʔi bởʔi ʔasizi zíptô fɛcô kút sinê ʔa hamát kùŋ kák kùlaw cúʔa zựŋ kâʔi kờ cɔ kák nướk ɲóm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ʔisơzaên duổʔi tʰâʔu ɲữŋ ŋườʔi zuda lưʔulạk ɣók dất bấʔizờ ɣɛn tươŋ kủʔa zaim xuấʔizốʔi zuda cừ di zaim xôŋ ɣɛŋét zuda nữʔa zuda xôŋ xuấʔizốʔi zaim nữʔa cúŋnó băj cên vaj dến filitin fíʔa tâʔi kùŋ ɲăw kướp ɣiựt kɔnkáʔi fươŋ dôŋ ca tăicên dôm môáp kɔnkáʔi ʔammôn vâŋ fụk Ðứkzê kạn ɣiảʔi zíptô vuŋ tăicên sôŋkáʔi bởʔi ɣió cáʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi dáɲ ciə za bảʔi suốʔi xiến ŋườʔita kótʰể di kwa xôŋ zép vậʔi kó dườŋkáʔi cɔ zân kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲữŋ lạʔi bởʔi ʔasizi kũŋɲư dã kó dườŋkáʔi cɔ ʔisơzaên cɔŋ ŋàʔi za xỏʔi sứ zíptô vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi kảmtạ cúʔa cúʔa ɣiận tôʔi ɲưŋ kơn ɣiận cúʔa dã làɲ xỏʔi cúʔa ʔiênủʔi tôʔi nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi tôʔi tinkậʔi xôŋ sợhãʔi vìÐứkzê cíɲ Ðứkzê sứkmạɲ kủʔa tôʔi lờʔi katụŋ kủʔa tôʔi ŋàʔi dã kứʔuzỗʔi tôʔi vậʔi kák ŋươʔi vujvẻ múk nướk nơʔi kák ŋuồn kứʔu cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kák ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi kảmtạ Ðứkzê hãʔi kêʔukầʔu zɛɲ ŋàʔi hãʔi zaw mọʔi việk kủʔa ŋàʔi za cɔŋ kák zântộk hãʔi sưŋzɛɲ ŋàʔi tôncọŋ hãʔi katụŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi dã ɲữŋ kôŋviệk zựkzỡ fô cɔ tʰếzan dềʔu hỡʔi zânkư siôn hãʔi kêʔu tɔtiếŋ vìÐấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên tôncọŋ ɣiữʔa ŋươʔi ɣáɲ nặŋ babilôn saj kɔncaj ʔamốt dã tʰấʔi hãʔi zựŋ kờ cên núʔi cọʔi hãʔi kấttiếŋ kêʔu cúŋnó lấʔi tăj ŋɔắt cɔ ŋườʔita vàʔɔ kák kửʔa ŋườʔi saŋcọŋ cíɲ dã cwiền lịɲ cɔ dã ziêŋ za dã ɣọʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi mạɲmẽ kủʔa dến tʰạɲ vuimừŋ kớ kawcọŋ kủʔa kótiếŋ sônsaw kủʔa dɔàn cên kák núʔi zườŋɲư tiếŋ sônsaw kủʔa zân dôŋ Ấʔilà tiếŋ áʔɔ kák nướk kủʔa kák zântộk ɲóm lạʔi Ðứkzê kwân diểm sɔát dạʔɔkwân mìɲ dể za cận cíɲÐứkzê ɲữŋ xíɣiớʔi kủʔa tʰạɲ ŋàʔi dến fươŋ sa nơʔi zất sa cên cờʔi dể hủʔiziệt kả dất kák ŋươʔi xá tʰanxók vì ŋàʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê dã ɣần ŋàʔi dó dến ɲư kơn tạʔi dến bởʔi Ðấŋtɔàn năŋ vậʔi mọʔi tăj dềʔu ʔiếʔuduốʔi lòŋ ŋườʔi dềʔu cảʔi cúŋ dềʔu kiɲhɔàŋ dăwdớn tʰảmsầʔu lấʔi kwặntʰắt ɲư dờn dươŋ dẻ hắk hắk hãʔi ɲìn ɲăw ɲư ŋọn lửʔa nầʔi ŋàʔi Ðứkzê dến ŋàʔi huŋzữ kó tʰạɲ nóŋzận dể dất nầʔi hwaŋvu ziệt ɲữŋ kó tộʔi xỏʔi dó vì kák ŋôʔisaw kák dám saw cên cờʔi mọk tʰì tốʔi mặtcăŋ xôŋ sɔj sáŋ dâʔu ta fạt tʰếzan dộkák fạt zữ tộʔilỗʔi cúŋnó cɔ kiêʔu kiêʔu tựkaw kủʔa bạʔɔŋượk ta cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kó vàŋ kwí tʰật cɔ lɔàʔiŋườʔi kó vàŋzòŋ sứ fiə vậʔi xiến kák tầŋ cờʔi zuŋziɲ dất zăj dộŋ lìʔa xỏʔi cỗ mìɲ kơn tʰạɲ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân cɔŋ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi nổʔi ɣiậnzữ bấʔizờ ʔainấʔi ɲư kɔn hươʔu duổʔi ɲư bầʔi ciên xôŋ ŋườʔi ɲóm lạʔi cởlạʔi kùŋzân mìɲ cốn sứ mìɲ kẻ nàʔɔ ŋườʔita ɣặp dượk dâm nàʔɔ ŋã zướʔi lưỡʔi ɣươm kɔncẻ dập cết cướkmắt ɲà kướp zâm nầʔi suj ŋườʔi mêdi ŋịc kùŋ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dó cẳŋ kwí bạk cẳŋ tʰíc vàŋ zùŋ kuŋ dập ɣiập caicẻ cẳŋ tʰươŋsót dến tʰaj cɔŋ lòŋ cẳŋ tiếk cẻkɔn babilôn viɲhiển kák nướk hwamĩ kủʔa lòŋ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ ŋườʔi kɛɲdê ɣiốŋ ɲư sôdôm ɣômôzơ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dã lậtdổ nó cẳŋ kó ŋườʔiở nữʔa cảʔidờʔi saŋ dờʔi kiə xôŋ ʔaj dó ŋườʔi ʔa zạp xôŋ dóŋ cạʔi tạʔi dó ɲữŋ căn kũŋ cẳŋ kầm bầʔi mìɲ dó sɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰúzừŋ dến ɲàkửʔa dầʔi ɲữŋ cim kú cim dã cɔán cỗ mìɲ zê dựk lấʔilàm nơʔi ɲảʔiɲót sàʔilaŋ sủʔa cɔŋ kuŋdiện kó zừŋ cu cɔŋ dềndàʔi vujsướŋ kỳ dã ɣần dến ŋàʔi xôŋ dượk zàʔi nữʔa tʰật Ðứkzê tʰươŋsót zakốp kòn lựʔɛcọn ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi cúŋnó lạʔi cɔŋ sứ cúŋụ fụ cúŋnó kùŋ ɲà zakốp kák zân dɛm cởvề sứ ɲà ʔisơzaên dượk cúŋnó tôʔi caj ɣáʔi cɔŋ dất Ðứkzê cúŋnó fu ɲữŋ dã mìɲ fu kwảncị dã mìɲ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi ýŋĩ xỏʔi kơn buồnbựk bốʔizốʔi fụkzịc nặŋnề ŋườʔita dã ŋươʔi tʰì ŋươʔi zùŋ lờʔi tʰízụ nầʔi nóʔi vwa babilôn zằŋ saw bạʔɔŋượk dã di tʰàɲ ứciếp dã zứt di Ðứkzê dã ɣậʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi ák cượŋ kủʔa kaicị Ấʔilà dã ɲơn ɣiận dáɲ kák zântộk xôŋ tʰôʔi zùŋ tʰạɲ kaicị kák nướk zùŋ cẳŋ ʔaj ŋăn lạʔi năj kả dất dượk ʔiênŋỉ bìɲtĩɲ cổʔi ɣiọŋ mừŋ zầʔu dến kâʔi tùŋ kâʔi bác liban kũŋ ɲơn kớ ŋươʔi vuimừŋ nóʔi zằŋ từ xi ŋươʔi ŋã suốŋ zồʔi xôŋ ʔaj cèʔɔ dể dốn nữʔa nơʔi âmfủ sâʔu tʰămtʰẳm dã zúŋdộŋ kớ ŋươʔi dặŋ zướk ŋươʔi dến nó dã ŋươʔi dáɲtʰứk kák tứklà ɲữŋ kẻkả cên dất dã cɔ vwa kák nướk dứŋzậʔi xỏʔi ŋaj mìɲ hếttʰảʔi cúŋnó kấttiếŋ nóʔi kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ kìʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ ʔiếʔuduốʔi ɲư cúŋta kìʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ cở ɣiốŋ ɲư cúŋta sự saŋcọŋ vớʔi tiếŋ dờn kầm kủʔa ŋươʔi dềʔu suốŋ nơʔi âmfủ một zòʔi cɔ ŋươʔi sâʔubọ tʰì hỡʔi saw maj kɔncaj kủʔa sáŋsớm kiə saw ŋươʔi cờʔi suốŋ hỡʔi ɣiàʔidạp kák nướk kiə ŋươʔi cặt suốŋ dất tʰểnàʔɔ ŋươʔi bụŋbảʔɔzạ zằŋ ta cờʔi ɲắk ŋaj cên kák ŋôʔisaw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ta ŋồʔi cên núʔi hộʔi kuốʔicùŋ fươŋ bắk ta cên kaw ɲữŋ dám mâʔi za mìɲ bằŋ Ðấŋzấtkaw ɲưŋ ŋươʔi fảʔi suốŋ nơʔi âmfủ vàʔɔ nơʔi vựk tʰẳm ɲữŋ tʰấʔi ŋươʔi ŋó căm ŋươʔi ɲìn ŋươʔi kác zằŋ kó fảʔi ŋườʔi nầʔi dã zuŋziɲ dất zăj dộŋ kák nướk cɔ tʰếzan tʰàɲdồŋ vắŋ lậtdổ kák tʰàɲ cẳŋ buôŋtʰa ɲà mìɲ dó căŋ hếttʰảʔi vwa kák nướk dềʔu ŋủ nơʔi lăŋtẩm mìɲ kác viɲhiển ɲưŋ ŋươʔi tʰì sa xỏʔi ɲư ɲáɲ kâʔi tʰúʔi ɲư áʔɔ ŋườʔi ɣiết ɣươm dâm sô suốŋ cɔŋ ɲữŋ dá nơʔi xáknàʔɔ tʰâʔi cết ɣiàʔidạp zướʔi cơn ŋươʔi xôŋ dượk hộʔi kùŋ kák vwa cɔŋ lăŋ ŋươʔi dã ziệt nướk mìɲ ɣiết zân mìɲ zòŋzõʔi huŋák xôŋ dượk sưŋ dến zɛɲ nữʔa hãʔi cémzết cɔ kɔncáʔu tộʔiák kủʔa tổfụ hầʔu cɔ xôŋ zấʔi nữʔa dặŋ dượk dất kơŋiệp tʰàɲ xắp tʰếzan Ðứkzê kwân fán ta zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ cúŋnó ta tiêʔuziệt babilôn zân lạʔi ka dến kɔn cáʔu nữʔa Ðứkzê fán vậʔi ta cɔ dất tʰuộk kɔn ɲiếm za ʔaw nướk zùŋ cuổʔi hủʔiziệt kwét Ðứkzê kwân fán vậʔi Ðứkzê kwân dã tʰề zằŋ cắk tʰật dã dịɲ sảʔi dến diềʔu dã twan dứŋ vữŋ ta dáɲfá ŋườʔi ʔasizi cɔŋ dất ɣiàʔidạp cên núʔi Ác kổʔi xỏʔi cúŋnó ɣáɲ kất xỏʔi vaj cúŋnó cỉ dã dịɲ ŋịc kùŋ kả dất dó tăj dã ɣiá cên hếttʰảʔi kák nướk vìÐứkzê kwân dã twan dịɲ tʰì ʔaj bãʔi di dượk tăiŋàʔi dã zaŋ za tʰì ʔaj zăj lạʔi dượk ɲằm vwa ʔɛca băŋ ɣáɲ nặŋ nầʔi dã dượk zaw za hỡʔi kả dất filitin cớ vuimừŋ bởʔi kớ zɔj dáɲ ŋươʔi dã ɣãʔi ɣiốŋ zắn sɛɲ za tʰuồŋluồŋ tʰuồŋluồŋ sɛɲ za zắnlửʔa băj bấʔi ɣi kɔnkả kủʔa ŋèʔɔ dượk dồăn túŋ ʔiênổn ɲưŋ xiến zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi cết dóʔi tʰuộk ŋươʔi kón lạʔi ɣiết hỡʔi kửʔa hãʔi tʰanxók hỡʔi tʰàɲ hãʔi kêʔula hỡʔi kả dất filitin hếttʰảʔi hãʔi dềʔu cảʔi vì kó luồŋ xóʔi fươŋ bắk dến cẳŋ ʔaj lìʔa xỏʔi hàŋŋũ mìɲ lấʔi ci cảlờʔi cɔ sứɣiả kủʔa nướk nầʔi cảlờʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê dã siôn sầʔu xổ cɔŋ zân ŋàʔi dượk ẩnnáʔu cɔŋ ɣáɲ nặŋ môáp Ðươŋ bandêm ʔamôáp tànfá ziệt fảʔi cɔŋ bandêm kiệtmô tànfá ziệt kìʔa cúŋ nơʔi miếʔu kák tʰần dến Ðʔi cên kák nơʔi kaw xók zânmô tʰanvãn nêbô mêdêba mọʔi dầʔu dềʔu sóʔi mọʔi zâʔu dềʔu kắt tʰảʔi dềʔu tʰắt baw ɣaj cɔŋ kák dườŋfố tʰảʔi dềʔu xóklók ɲiềʔu nướkmắt cên nók ɲà nơʔi cợ hếtbôn lêʔalê kêʔula tiếŋ ŋɛ tʰấʔu dến zahát vậʔi liɲ ciến kủʔa môáp dềʔu tʰanxók cɔŋ tâmtʰần zunzẩʔi lòŋ ŋậmŋùʔi môáp saŋ cốncạʔi dến swa dến látsêlisiə vì vừʔa cèʔɔ dèʔɔ luhít vừʔa xók bạʔihɔạʔi kêʔuvan cên kɔn dườŋ hôzônaim kák zòŋ nướk nimzim kạn kỏ xô kỏ nɔn cẳŋ kó xôŋ kòn sɛɲ nàʔɔ vậʔi ɲữŋ kủʔakảʔi dã dượk ɲữŋ dồ báʔu dã cứʔa dềʔu maŋ saŋ xɛ liêʔu tiếŋ kêʔu xók tʰảmtʰươŋ ŋɛ xắp cuŋkwɛɲ bờkõʔi môáp tiếŋ tʰấʔu dến laim dến bê ʔɛ sôŋŋòʔi Ðʔi dầʔi ɲữŋ máʔu kòn tʰêm tajvạ cɔ Ðʔi saj duổʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi nôáp tʰɔát ɲữŋ kòn lạʔi cɔŋ sứ hãʔi ɣởʔi ciên kɔn fảʔi zâŋ cɔ kwan kaicị dất nầʔi sêla saŋ dồŋ vắŋ dến núʔi kủʔa kɔŋáʔi siôn kák kɔŋáʔi môáp tạʔi dò ʔaï ɣiốŋ ɲư cim băj tánlɔạn ɲư lứʔa cim kɔn kwăŋ za ŋɔàʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi lậpmưʔu hãʔi kôŋbìɲ daŋ lúk ɣiữʔa cưʔa hãʔi fủ bóŋ ŋươʔi ɲư bandêm hãʔi cɛzấʔu duổʔi cớ bươʔi mók cốncáɲ hãʔi cɔfép ɲữŋ duổʔi kủʔa cúŋụ nơʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi nơʔi ẩnnáʔu cɔ môáp xỏʔi tàɲạʔi vì kẻkướp ɣiựt dã tàɲạʔi dã ɣiàʔi dạʔi dã ziệt xỏʔi dất nầʔi Ấʔi vậʔi ŋôʔi bởʔi ɲơn cɔŋ cạʔi Ðʔa kó Ðấŋ lấʔi tʰật ŋồʔi dɔán sét ŋăitʰẳŋ vộʔivàŋ kôŋbìɲ cúŋta kó ŋɛ kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa môáp kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kũŋ ŋɛ sấksượk kiêʔukăŋ ɣiậnzữ xwejxwaŋ kủʔa vôíc vậʔi môáp tʰanxók môáp ʔainấʔi dềʔu tʰanxók kák ŋươʔi hãʔi xók hãʔi tʰởtʰan báɲcáʔi ɲɔ kủʔa kiệtʰazêsết vì zuộŋnươŋ kủʔa hếtbôn kâʔi ɲɔ kủʔa sípma dềʔu mònmỏʔi ŋàʔicướk ɣiàŋ za tớʔi zaêsɛ za tớʔi dồŋ vắŋ cồʔi tượk dâmza tớʔi kiə bâʔizờ vwɛcúʔa kák nướk dã ɣãʔi ɲáɲ vậʔi kâʔi ɲɔ kủʔa sípma xóklók ɲư zaêsɛ hỡʔihết hỡʔi lêʔalê tướʔi nướkmắt cên kák ŋươʔi dươŋ lúk cáʔimùʔa màʔu ɣặt tʰì kótiếŋ zeo kủʔa ɣiặk sảʔi dến sự vuimừŋ dã kất xỏʔi zuộŋ cɔŋ ɲɔ cẳŋ kòn zeo vuj dạp zượʔu cẳŋ kòn dạp cɔŋ tʰùŋ dã zứt tiếŋ zeo vuj cɔnên lòŋ môáp kêʔu vaŋ ɲư dờn kầm zuột kiệtʰêzɛ kũŋ vậʔi vì zầʔu môáp cịʔu mệtɲọk dặŋ di dếnnơʔi kaw zầʔu vàʔɔ cɔŋ nơʔi tʰáɲ mìɲ dể kầʔuŋwiện kũŋ cẳŋ dượk ɲậm Ấʔilà lờʔi swa kiə Ðứkzê dã fán môáp bâʔizờ tʰì Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi cɔŋ ɲư viɲhiển kủʔa môáp vớʔi kả dɔàn zân dôŋ kủʔa xiɲ kòn lạʔi xôŋ kểza ɣì ɣáɲ nặŋ Ðʔa mác nầʔi Ðʔa mác cừ za xôŋ tʰàɲ nữʔa cởnên dốŋ dổnát kák tʰàɲ ʔazô ʔɛ bỏhwaŋ cỗ cɔ bầʔi ciên ŋỉ cẳŋ ʔaj kiɲdộŋ lũʔi kủʔa zaim cẳŋ kòn ŋôʔi nướk kủʔa Ðʔa mác zân kủʔa sizi kũŋ vậʔi xáknàʔɔ viɲhiển kủʔa kɔnkáʔi ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê kwân fán vậʔi sảʔiza cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó viɲhiển kủʔa zakốp ɣiảm di sáktʰịt dổʔi za ɣầʔiốm sẽ sảʔiza ɲư kɔn ɣặt kák ŋọn lúʔa zồʔi zùŋ káɲtăj kắt lấʔi bôŋ lạʔi ɲư ɲữŋ ɣié lúʔa dượk nơʔi cũŋ zêfaim vậʔi ɲưŋ kòn lạʔi ɲưlà kủʔa xáknàʔɔ xi ŋườʔita zuŋ kâʔi livɛ kòn haj cáʔi cên cót ɲáɲ zất kaw hɔặk cáʔi cên ɲữŋ ɲàɲ sa kủʔa kâʔi saj cíʔu ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita ŋó Ðấŋ tạʔɔ mìɲ côŋ tʰẳŋ dến Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên họ xôŋ kòn sâʔi kák bàntʰờ kôŋviệk kủʔa tăj mìɲ xôŋ kòn ŋó kák dồvật bởʔi ŋóntăj mìɲ cế za hɔặk kák tượŋ hɔặk kák cụ mặtcờʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kủʔa ɣiốŋ ɲư ɲữŋ nơʔi dổnát hɔặk cɔŋ zừŋ hɔặk cên dỉɲ núʔi ɲữŋ nơʔi dã bỏhwaŋ cướk kɔnkáʔi ʔisơzaên sứ nầʔi bỏhwaŋ vậʔi vì ŋươʔi dã kwên Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kứʔu ŋươʔi cẳŋ ɲớ dến vầŋ dá sứkmạɲ ŋươʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi cồŋ kâʔi lạʔi cồŋ ɲữŋ ɣốk ɲɔ xák ɣiốŋ Ðʔaŋ ŋàʔi ŋươʔi cồŋ tʰì zàʔɔzậʔu vừʔa lúk banmaj cɔ ɣiốŋ hwa ɲưŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi buồnbựk zầʔuzĩ tʰì mùʔamàŋ záʔɔ Ôʔi kák zân dôŋdảʔɔ sônsaw zườŋ nàʔɔ xáknàʔɔ ɲư ɣầm kák zântộk cạʔi sôŋ tớʔi ɲư ɲiềʔu nướk dổ mạɲ tʰật kák zântộk cạʔi sôŋ tớʔi ɲư ɲiềʔu nướk dổ ạk ɲưŋ ŋàʔi kwởcác tʰì dềʔu cốn sa dùʔa di ɲư zơmzák cên núʔi xi ɣió tʰổʔi ɲư luồŋ bụʔi ɣặp kơn bãʔɔ Ðươŋ buổʔi ciềʔu nầʔi kó sợhãʔi cướk xi banmaj dã tʰàɲza hưxôŋ Ấʔilà fần kủʔa dã bóklột cúŋta sốfận sảʔi dến cɔ kẻkướp cúŋta vậʔi Ôʔi dất dập káɲ àʔɔàʔɔ kiə dất kiə kák sôŋ kủʔa kút saj kỡʔi tʰwiền bằŋ lăw di cên mặtnướk hỡʔi kák sứɣiả ɲặmlẹ kiə hãʔi di dến nướk ŋườʔi kaw za dến zân dáŋ kíɲ xi nướk cở di dến zân hăj kân lườŋ ɣiàʔidạp nướk kó ɲữŋ sôŋ ciə dất hỡʔi kák ŋươʔi hếttʰảʔi zân tʰiêɲạ cên dất kiə vừʔa xi kờ zựŋ cên núʔi hãʔi sɛm vừʔa xi tʰổʔi hãʔi ŋɛ vả Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ ɲưvầʔi ta ʔiênlặŋ cỗ ŋự sɛm ɲư áɲ nắŋ sáŋsủʔa ɲư mâʔi ŋút cɔŋ nắŋ mùʔa ɣặt ɲưŋ cướk ŋàʔi ɣặt xi mùʔa hwa dã kuốʔi hwa ɲɔ tʰàɲ cáʔi hầʔu cín tʰì ŋàʔi zùŋ kắt ɲữŋ ɲáɲ tỉʔa ɲữŋ ɲáɲ zậm cúŋnó kùŋ ɲăw lạʔi cɔ cim tʰịt cɔŋ núʔi cɔ kả tʰúvật cên dất zùŋ kwa mùʔadôŋ cɔŋ lúk dó zân ŋườʔi kaw za tứklà zân dáŋ kiɲsợ xi nướk cở di zân hăj kân lườŋ ɣiàʔidạp nướk kó ɲữŋ sôŋ ciə dất cíɲ zân ấʔi dɛm zâŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kwân cɔŋ nơʔi zɛɲ Ðứkzê kwân ŋự núʔi siôn ɣáɲ nặŋ zíptô nầʔi Ðứkzê kỡʔi dám mâʔi măw dến zíptô kák tʰầntượŋ kủʔa zíptô dềʔu zunzẩʔi cướk ŋàʔi lòŋ zíptô cảʔi ɣiữʔa ta suj ŋườʔi zíptô dáɲ ŋườʔi zíptô ʔɛɲɛm ŋịc kùŋ ʔɛɲɛm lânkận ŋịc kùŋ lânkận tʰàɲ ŋịc kùŋ tʰàɲ nướk ŋịc kùŋ nướk tâmtʰần zíptô lụnbạʔi ɣiữʔa fá mưʔucướk bấʔizờ cúŋnó kầʔu hỏʔi kák tʰầntượŋ kùŋ tʰuậtsĩ kêʔu kùŋ tʰầʔibóʔi ta fó zân zíptô cɔŋ tăj cúʔa huŋzữ vwa bạʔɔŋượk kaicị cúŋnó cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân fán vậʔi nướkbiển sôŋ kạn xô kák sôŋ cởnên hôʔitʰốʔi ŋòʔi zạc zặk suốŋ xan di sậʔi lăw dềʔu cết héʔɔ kák dồŋkỏ sôŋ nilơ kùŋ hếttʰảʔi dồŋzuộŋ dã zeo kủʔa dềʔu héʔɔ xô tʰổʔi di xôŋ kòn nữʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dáɲká tʰanvãn mọʔi buôŋ kâʔu nơʔi sôŋ nilơ dềʔu zênsiết tʰả lướʔi cên kák zòŋ nướk dềʔu âʔusầʔu ɲữŋ vảʔi ɣaj ɲữŋ zệt vảʔi cắŋ dềʔu sấʔuhổ kák cụ kủʔa zíptô dềʔu ɣãʔi hếttʰảʔi tʰợtʰầʔi dềʔu kó lòŋ lɔ kák kwan cưởŋ sôʔan zất dầndộn mưʔusĩ zất xônŋwan kủʔa fazaôn cỉ bàʔi za ɲữŋ zạʔixờ saw kák ŋươʔi nóʔi kùŋ fazaôn zằŋ tôʔi kɔn kák bậk hiềnciết kɔn kák vwa dờʔi sưʔa vậʔitʰì kák bậk hiềnciết ŋươʔi dâʔu kák ấʔi hãʔi cɔ ŋươʔi di kák bậk ấʔi Ðứkzê kwân dã dịɲ ɣì zíptô kák kwan cưởŋ sôʔan dã zạʔizột kák kwan cưởŋ nốp lừʔazốʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔilàm dá ɣók kủʔa kák cifáʔi zíptô dã cɔ lầmlạk Ðứkzê dã sɛn cáʔiŋượk vàʔɔ ɣiữʔa cúŋnó cɔ zíptô sajlầm cɔŋ mọʔi việk ɲư ŋườʔi săj vừʔa mửʔa vừʔa di siêʔu cẳŋ kó việkɣì dầʔu duôʔi kâʔi kâʔi lăw za dượk cɔ zíptô kả cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi zíptô ɣiốŋ ɲư dờn tʰấʔi tăj Ðứkzê kwân vuŋ cên mìɲ tʰì zunzẩʔi sợhãʔi bấʔizờ dất zuda kiɲhɔàŋ cɔ zíptô xi ŋườʔita sưŋ ấʔi za cướk ʔaj tʰì nấʔi xiếp cỉ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân dã dịɲ ŋịc kùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tạʔi sứ zíptô kó tʰàɲ nóʔi tiếŋ kanaan cỉ Ðứkzê kwân tʰề cɔŋ dó kó tʰàɲ ɣọʔilà tʰàɲ hủʔiziệt cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kó bàntʰờ cɔ Ðứkzê ɣiữʔa sứ zíptô kó cụ cɔ Ðứkzê nơʔi bờkõʔi nóʔi Ấʔilà zấʔu cứŋ cɔ Ðứkzê kwân tạʔi sứ zíptô bởʔicưŋ cúŋ kêʔu dến Ðứkzê kứ bạʔɔŋượk ŋàʔi saj Ðấŋ kứʔu biɲ vựk dể ɣiảʔitʰɔát Ðứkzê cɔ zíptô ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔi zíptô Ðứkzê zâŋ hisiɲ kủʔa tʰờ fượŋ ŋàʔi lạʔi xấn ŋwiện kùŋ Ðứkzê hɔàn ŋwiện Ðứkzê dáɲ zíptô dáɲ zồʔi lạʔi cữʔa làɲ cởvề kùŋ Ðứkzê ŋàʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện cữʔa làɲ cɔ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kó kɔn dườŋkáʔi di zíptô dến ʔasizi ŋườʔi ʔasizi dến zíptô ŋườʔi zíptô dến ʔasizi ŋườʔi zíptô ŋườʔi ʔasizi dềʔu kùŋ ɲăw tʰờ fượŋ Ðứkzê cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ʔisơzaên kùŋ zíptô ʔasizi dặŋ ŋuồn fướk ɣiữʔa tʰiêɲạ Ðứkzê kwân dã cúk fướk cɔ zằŋ zíptô zân ʔasizi kôŋcìɲ kủʔa tăj ʔisơzaên zatàʔi dềʔu hãʔi dượk fướk ɲằm saɣôn vwa ʔasizi saj tatân dến Ác dốt vâʔi tʰàɲ ciếm lấʔi cɔŋ lúk dó Ðứkzê ɲờ kɔncaj ʔamốt saj fán zằŋ hãʔi di kổʔi baw ɣaj xỏʔi lưŋ ŋươʔi ɣiàʔi xỏʔi cơn ŋươʔi saj vâŋ lờʔi di cần cơn xôŋ Ðứkzê fán zằŋ ɲư dầʔitớ saj dã di cần cơn xôŋ cɔŋ làmzấʔu diềm cỉ zíptô tʰiôbi tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì ɲữŋ fu kủʔa zíptô lưʔu kủʔa tʰiôbi kả cẻ ɣià kũŋ vwa ʔasizi ɣiảʔi di cần cơn xôŋ bàʔi môŋ za tʰể ấʔi dể làmɲụk nướk zíptô bấʔizờ cúŋnó hổtʰẹn kớ tʰiôbi côŋkậʔi mìɲ zíptô viɲhiển mìɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣần nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa zântộk cúŋta dɛmlòŋ côŋkậʔi cạʔi dến kầʔukứʔu dể dượk ɣiảʔitʰɔát xỏʔi vwa ʔasizi tʰì năj dã cởnên tʰể ấʔi zồʔi cúŋta làmsaw cốn xỏʔi dượk ɣáɲ nặŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɣần nó dến dồŋ vắŋ dất dáŋ kiɲ xiếp xáknàʔɔ kơn ɣiólốk kwa cɔŋ fươŋ kó tʰấʔi hãʔihùŋ dã za cɔ tôʔi zanzốʔi zanzốʔi tàɲạʔi tàɲạʔi hỡʔi ŋườʔi hãʔi hỡʔi ŋườʔi mêdi hãʔi vâʔi di ta cɔ zứt mọʔi tiếŋ tʰantʰở vậʔi lưŋ dăw kwặntʰắt ɲư dờn daŋ sɛɲ dẻ dăwdớn cịʔu cɔ xôŋ tʰấʔi lòŋ mêmuộʔi zất xiếpsợ ciềʔuhôm ưʔatʰíc dã dổʔi za zunzẩʔi cɔ ŋườʔita dặt tiệk kắt kɛɲzữ ŋườʔita ʔuốŋ hỡʔi kák kwan cưởŋ hãʔi cờ zậʔi hãʔi tʰwa zầʔu cɔ káʔi tʰuẫn vìcúʔa fán kùŋ tôʔi ɲưvầʔi hãʔi di sắpdặt vọŋkɛɲ tʰấʔi việkɣì tʰì báʔɔ xi tʰấʔi kwânlíɲ kỡʔi ŋựʔa di từŋ kặp kó lừʔa kùŋ lạkdà từŋ bầʔi tʰì fảʔi cămcỉ ŋɛ Ðʔɔạn kêʔu ɲư zằŋ hỡʔicúʔa tôʔi dứŋ zìɲ nơʔi còʔi côŋ kả ŋàʔi dứŋ tạʔicỗ tôʔi kɛɲ kả dêm nầʔi kó kwânlíɲ kỡʔi ŋựʔa di từŋ kặp dến nó dáp zằŋ babilôn dổ suốŋ zồʔi dổ suốŋ zồʔi mọʔi hìɲtượŋ tʰần kủʔa dã cên dất zồʔi hỡʔi lúʔa dạp kủʔa tʰók cên kiə dã ŋɛ Ðứkzê kwân tứklà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên tʰì dã bảʔɔ cɔ ŋươʔi ɣáɲ nặŋ Ðʔu kó ŋườʔi sê ʔizơ kêʔu tôʔi zằŋ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kɛɲ dêm tʰểnàʔɔ hỡʔi ŋườʔi kɛɲ dêm tʰểnàʔɔ ŋườʔi kɛɲ dáp zằŋ buổʔisáŋ dến dêm kũŋ dến nếʔu hỏʔi tʰì hỏʔi di hãʔi cởlạʔi hãʔi dến ɣáɲ nặŋ ʔazabi hỡʔi dɔàn di dan ŋủ cɔŋ zừŋ sứ ʔazabi zânkư tʰêma dã dɛm nướk cɔ ɲữŋ xát dã dón ɲữŋ ŋườʔi cốn dặŋ cɔ báɲ vì cốn ɣươm cốn ciếncɛɲ kiɲ xiếp cúʔa dã fán kùŋ tôʔi ɲưvầʔi cɔŋ nữʔa ɲư kả viɲhiển kủʔa kêda hawmòn ɲữŋ kầm kuŋ mạɲmẽ kɔnkáʔi kủʔa kêda lạʔi cẳŋ bawlăm vìɣiê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã fán vậʔi ɣáɲ nặŋ cũŋ kủʔa tʰấʔi ŋươʔi kó ɣì màkả zân cèʔɔ nók ɲà ɲưvậʔi hỡʔi tʰàɲ sônsaw dầʔi ʔɔmsòm vujvẻ kiə kák cết kủʔa ŋươʔi cẳŋ fảʔi cết ɣươm kũŋ xôŋ fảʔi tửcận kák kwan kaicị kủʔa ŋươʔi tʰảʔi dềʔu kùŋ ɲăw cạʔi cốn cóʔi bởʔi ɲữŋ kầm kuŋ kòn cɔŋ zân ŋươʔi nàʔɔ cốn sa ŋườʔita tʰấʔi tʰì dã cóʔi vậʔi fán zằŋ kák ŋươʔi cớ ŋó xóklók tʰảmtʰiết Ðừŋ kác ʔiênủʔi hủʔiziệt kủʔa kɔŋáʔi zân vì ấʔilà ŋàʔi zốʔilɔạn ɣiàʔidạp kiɲhãʔi cɔŋ cũŋ kủʔa tʰấʔi dến bởʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân tườŋ tʰàɲ tiếŋ kêʔu dến núʔi deo ɣiỏ kó sɛ biɲlíɲ di tʰeo kizơ dể cần káʔi tʰuẫn kák nơʔi cũŋ dẹp ɲứt dầʔi ɲữŋ sɛcộ líɲ zàn cận tạʔi cướk kửʔa tʰàɲ màn cɛ zuda dã kất zồʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋươʔi côŋ xíɣiớʔi kủʔa ɲà zừŋ kák ŋươʔi tʰấʔi tʰàɲ Ðʔa ɲiềʔu nơʔi tʰâʔu cứʔa nướk ʔaw zướʔi lạʔi kák ŋươʔi dếm ɲàkửʔa ɣiêzusalɛm fá ɲữŋ ɲàkửʔa dể tườŋ tʰàɲ lạʔi dàʔɔ ɣiữʔa xɔảŋ haj tườŋ tʰàɲ dặŋ cứʔa nướk ʔaw kũ ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ côŋ Ðấŋ dó cẳŋ ɲìn sɛm Ðấŋ dã dịɲ dó sưʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân ɣọʔi kák ŋươʔi xóklók tʰởtʰan kạʔɔ dầʔu tʰắt baw ɣaj tʰếmà cɔŋ kák ŋươʔi kó vuimừŋ ŋườʔita ɣiết ciên tʰịt ʔuốŋ zượʔu hãʔi ănuốŋ di ŋàʔimaj cúŋta cết vả Ðứkzê kwân mìɲ cɔŋ taj tôʔi zằŋ tộʔi ấʔi cắk cẳŋ dượk tʰa cɔ kák ŋươʔi cɔdến ɣiờ kák ŋươʔi cết cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân fán vậʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân fán ɲưvầʔi ŋươʔi hãʔi di dến ɲà ɣiữ xɔ tứk sépna cứk ɣiám kuŋ bảʔɔ zằŋ ŋươʔi dâʔi làmɣì kó bàkɔn ci dâʔi ŋươʔi dã dụk tạʔi dâʔi hwiệt tʰật ŋườʔi dụk cɔ mìɲ hwiệt cên nơʔi kaw xiến dàʔɔ cɔ mìɲ cỗ cɔŋ vầŋ dá nầʔi Ðứkzê xáknàʔɔ sứkxỏʔɛ kwăŋ mạɲ ŋườʔi za nơʔi sa bọk cặt ŋươʔi ŋàʔi kwấn ŋươʔi ŋươʔi ɲư kwả bóŋ vàʔɔ sứ zộŋ xɔảŋxɔát tạʔi dó ŋươʔi cết sɛcộ saŋcọŋ kủʔa ŋươʔi kũŋ tʰeo dến dó ôʔi ŋươʔi làmɲụk cɔ ɲà củ mìɲ ta káccứk ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cuất xỏʔi ŋôʔi mìɲ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ɣọʔi dầʔitớ liəkim kɔncaj hiɲkiə lấʔi áʔɔ ŋươʔi mặk cɔ lấʔi daj ŋươʔi ɣiúpsứk lấʔi cáɲcị ŋươʔi caw cɔŋ tăj ca cɔ zânkư ɣiêzusalɛm cɔ ɲà zuda ta dɛm cìʔaxóʔa ɲà Ðʔa dể cên vaj xôŋ ʔaj dóŋ dượk dóŋ xôŋ ʔaj dượk ta dóŋ suốŋ ɲư diɲ dóŋ nơʔi vữŋcãʔi cởnên ŋôʔi viɲhiển cɔ ɲà ca mìɲ ŋườʔita ceo cên mọʔi viɲhiển kủʔa ɲà ca mìɲ kɔnkáʔi zòŋzõʔi hếttʰảʔi ɲữŋ dồ dựŋ béɲỏ nữʔa káʔi cén dến káʔi vɛ Ðứkzê kwân fán zằŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó káʔi diɲ dóŋ nơʔi vữŋcãʔi lỏŋ sệc dập zớt suốŋ ɣáɲ nặŋ ceo cên kắt dứt vìÐứkzê dã fán vậʔi ɣáɲ nặŋ tizơ hỡʔi tàʔubè tazêsi hãʔi tʰanxók dã hủʔi fá dếnnỗʔi cẳŋ kòn ɲàkửʔa nữʔa cẳŋ kòn lốʔi vàʔɔ nữʔa Ấʔilà diềʔu dã cɔ sứ kíttim hỡʔi zânkư nơʔi ɲữŋ láʔibuôn sidôn ɲữŋ cở dồhàŋ dến hãʔi nínlặŋ hột ɣiốŋ kủʔa sihɔ mùʔamàŋ kủʔa sôŋ nilơ tʰeo dườŋbiển cở dến ấʔilà fần lợʔi cợ kủʔa kák nướk hỡʔisi dôn hãʔi hổtʰẹn vì nơʔi dồnlũʔi kó nóʔi ɲưvầʔi ta cưʔa ởkữ cưʔa dẻ kɔn cưʔa nuôʔi caicẻ cưʔa nuôʔi ɣáʔi xi nầʔi dồn dến zíptô ŋườʔita ŋɛ tizơ cắk dăwtʰươŋ hãʔi zờʔi kwa tazêsi hỡʔi zân ɣần hãʔi tʰanxók Ðâʔi cẳŋ fảʔi tʰàɲ vujvẻ kủʔa kák ŋươʔi saw là tʰàɲ kó dờʔi tʰượŋkổ cơn dã cảʔi dếnnơʔi sa dặŋ cúŋụ tạʔi dó vậʔi ʔaj dã dịɲ ấʔi ŋịc kùŋ tizơ tʰàɲ dã fânfát mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên láʔibuôn hàŋ vươŋầʔu ŋườʔi mwabán tăj kwí cɔŋ tʰiêɲạ Ấʔilà Ðứkzê kwân dã dịɲ nầʔi dể zơzáʔi kiêʔuŋạʔɔ mọʔi viɲhiển làmɲụk mọʔi saŋcọŋ cɔŋ tʰếzan hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi tazêsi ŋươʔi xôŋ kòn cóʔibuộk nữʔa hãʔi di kwa xắp dịʔafận ŋươʔi ɲư sôŋ nilơ Ðứkzê dã zaŋ tăj ŋàʔi cên cɔ kák nướk zuŋdộŋ ŋàʔi dã mạŋ lịɲ kanaan fá dồnlũʔi ŋàʔi kó fán zằŋ hỡʔi kɔŋáʔi sidôn dồŋciɲ ứciếp kiə ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn kứ vuimừŋ nữʔa vậʔi hãʔi cờ zậʔi saŋ sứ kíttim tạʔi dó ŋươʔi kũŋ xôŋ dượk ʔanŋỉ dâʔu hãʔi sɛm sứ kủʔa ŋườʔi kɛɲdê xôŋ kó zân dó nữʔa ŋườʔi ʔasizi lấʔilàm cỗ cɔ tʰúzừŋ cúŋnó zựŋ tʰáp fá kuŋ dền za ɣòdốŋ hỡʔi tàʔubè tazêsi hãʔi tʰanxók vì dồnlũʔi kák ŋươʔi hủʔiziệt zồʔi cɔŋ lúk dó tʰàɲ tizơ ŋườʔita kwên di cɔŋ bảʔi mươʔi bằŋ dờʔi vwa mãn bảʔi mươʔi zồʔi tizơ ɣiốŋ ɲư bàʔi ka kủʔa hỡʔi dã kwên kiə hãʔi lấʔi dờn kầm zạʔɔ cơʔi tʰàɲfố xảʔi cɔhăj ka di ka lạʔi hầʔu cɔ ŋườʔita ɲớ dến mầʔi mãn bảʔi mươʔi zồʔi Ðứkzê tʰămviếŋ tʰàɲ tizơ lạʔi dượk lợʔi hàɲ zâm kùŋ mọʔi nướk cɔŋ tʰếzan cên mặtdất ɲưŋ hàŋóʔa lờʔilãʔi kủʔa tʰáɲ cɔ Ðứkzê xôŋ cứʔa kũŋ xôŋ dểzàɲ lạʔi vì lờʔilãʔi ấʔi fânfát cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cướk Ðứkzê dể dượk ănsuŋmặksướŋ nầʔi Ðứkzê cɔ dất cốŋxôŋ hwaŋvu ŋàʔi lậtdổ mặtdất lạk zânkư tʰầʔi ɲư cúŋ zân ôŋ củ ɲư dầʔitớ caj củ ɲư dầʔitớ ɣáʔi ɲư ŋườʔi mwa cɔ ɲư ŋườʔi lấʔi lợʔi ɲư ŋườʔi lợʔi ʔaj kũŋ dồŋ mộttʰể cên dất dềʔu cốŋxôŋ hwaŋvu kả Ðứkzê dã fán lờʔi ấʔi tʰảmtʰươŋ tồʔitàn tʰếzan lụnbạʔi tồʔitàn ɲữŋ zân kaw ɲứt cên dất hawmòn di zânkư ôʔuế dã fạm luậtfáp cáʔi diềʔu zăn zứt zawướk dờʔidờʔi vậʔi zủʔasả tʰiêʔu dất ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở cên mắk tộʔi vì kớ dó zân cên dất dốt cáʔi cỉ kòn ŋườʔi lạʔi zượʔu mớʔi tʰanvãn kâʔi ɲɔ héʔɔ mọʔi kó lòŋ vuj dềʔu tʰantʰở ɲữŋ dáɲ cốŋxôŋ dáɲ nữʔa tiếŋ mừŋzỡ zồʔi zọŋ vuj dờn kầm dã zứt cẳŋ kòn vừʔa ʔuốŋ zượʔu vừʔa nữʔa ɲữŋ tăj ɣiền zượʔu cɔ zượʔumạɲ kăjdắŋ tʰàɲ hwaŋ lɔạn dã dổnát ɲàkửʔa dềʔu dóŋ lạʔi xôŋ ʔaj vàʔɔ dượk ŋườʔita kêʔula cɔŋ dườŋfố kớ zượʔu mọʔi vuj dềʔu cởnên tămtốʔi mừŋzỡ cɔŋ sứ di dâʔu zồʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ vắŋvẻ kửʔa tʰàɲ fáhɔạʔi vì ɣiữʔa kák zân cên dất ɣiốŋ ɲư lúk ŋườʔita zuŋ kâʔi livɛ ɲư xi cáʔi ɲɔ săw mùʔa háʔi cáʔi ɲữŋ nầʔi kấttiếŋ kêʔu zaw nơʔi kêʔu lớntiếŋ vuimừŋ wiŋiêm Ðứkzê vậʔi hãʔi tônviɲ Ðứkzê cɔŋ fươŋ dôŋ hãʔi viɲzɛɲ Ðứkzê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên cɔŋ kák kùlaw cúŋta dã ŋɛ nơʔi dầʔu kùŋ dất zằŋ viɲhiển cɔ kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ tôʔi nóʔi tôʔi ɣầʔimòn tôʔi ɣầʔimòn ɲữŋ zanzốʔi zanzốʔi fảʔi zanzốʔi zanzốʔi hỡʔi zânkư cên dất kiɲhãʔi bẫʔi dến cên ŋươʔi kẻ nàʔɔ cốn xỏʔi tiếŋ kiɲhãʔi suốŋ nếʔu xỏʔi mắk vàʔɔ lướʔi vì kák kửʔasổ cên cờʔi dềʔu za kák zướʔi dất dềʔu zuŋziɲ dềʔu dất dềʔu dất dềʔu zúŋdộŋ lăjdộŋ ɲư ŋườʔi săj lỏŋcỏŋ ɲư káʔi võŋ tộʔilỗʔi cất cên nặŋcĩʔu dổ suốŋ xôŋ zậʔi dượk nữʔa sảʔiza cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê fạt kák kơ biɲ nơʔi kaw cên cờʔi fạt kák vwa tʰếzan cên dất họ ɲóm lạʔi kùŋ ɲăw kầm cɔŋ ɲư ɲốt cɔŋ ŋụk kác lâʔu ŋàʔi dềʔu fạt mặtcăŋ sấʔuhổ mặtcờʔi mắkkỡ Ðứkzê kwân cịvì cên núʔi siôn tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm viɲhiển cóʔilóʔi cướk kák cưởŋlãʔɔ hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi tôʔi tônsùŋ ŋàʔi tôʔi ŋợʔixɛn zɛɲ ŋàʔi ŋàʔi dã ɲữŋ mớʔilạ ɲữŋ mưʔu dã dịɲ sưʔa kác tʰàɲ cơn tʰật vìŋàʔi dã cɔ tʰàɲ cởnên ɣòdốŋ tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ cởnên nơʔi dổnát dàʔi kủʔa zân ŋɔạʔi cẳŋ fảʔi tʰàɲ nữʔa cẳŋ sâʔi lạʔi vậʔi zân kườŋ tʰạɲ tônviɲ ŋàʔi tʰàɲ kủʔa kák zântộk dáŋ kiɲhãʔi kíɲ ŋàʔi vìŋàʔi nơʔi bềnvữŋ cɔ ŋèʔɔ dồnlũʔi cɔ tʰiếʔutʰốn cɔŋ lúk xóxăn cỗ dụt cɔ xỏʔi bãʔɔ cỗ bóŋmát cɔ xỏʔi nắŋ xi ɲữŋ kườŋbạʔɔ tʰổʔi hơʔi za ɲư bãʔɔ sôŋ vàʔɔ tườŋ tʰàɲ ŋàʔi zứt ồnàʔɔ kủʔa zân ŋɔạʔi ɲư cừ xi nóŋ cɔŋ nơʔi dất ŋừŋ tiếŋ nừŋ kủʔa kườŋbạʔɔ ɲư hơʔi nắŋ di bởʔi bóŋ mâʔi Ðứkzê kwân cɔ mọʔi zântộk tạʔi cên núʔi nầʔi tiệk ʔiến dồ béʔɔ ziên zượʔu ŋɔn dồ béʔɔ kó tủʔi zượʔu ŋɔn lọk sạc tạʔi cên núʔi nầʔi ŋàʔi cừziệt kủʔa dồ dắp cên muônzân káʔi cɛfủ mọʔi zântộk ŋàʔi dã cết dến dờʔidờʔi cúʔazê lăw nướkmắt xỏʔi mọʔi cừbỏ sấʔuhổ kủʔa dến ŋàʔi xỏʔi kả tʰếzan Ðứkzê dã fán vậʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ŋườʔita nóʔi zằŋ kìʔa ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta cúŋta dã mɔŋdợʔi ŋàʔi ŋàʔi kứʔu cúŋta Ấʔilà Ðứkzê cúŋta nứklòŋ mừŋzỡ dồŋ vuj kứʔuzỗʔi kủʔa ŋàʔi vì tăj Ðứkzê dặt cên núʔi nầʔi ɲưŋ môáp ɣiàʔidạp cɔŋ nơʔi ɲư zơm ɣiàʔidạp cɔŋ ʔaw fân nó zaŋ tăicɔŋ dó ɲư ŋườʔi lộʔi bơʔi zaŋ tăj za dể lộʔi ɲưŋ Ðứkzê zằn kiêʔuŋạʔɔ suốŋ kất mọʔi kơmưʔu kủʔa tăj ŋàʔi lũʔi kaw kủʔa tườŋ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi suốŋ dáɲdổ suốŋ dất vàʔɔ cɔŋ bụʔibặm cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tạʔi sứ zuda ŋườʔita bàʔi nầʔi cúŋta kó tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ cúʔa lấʔi kứʔu tườŋ lũʔi hãʔi kák kửʔa cɔ zân kôŋbìɲ cuŋtín vàʔɔ dó ŋườʔi nàʔɔ dể cí mìɲ nươŋ zựʔa nơʔi ŋàʔi tʰì ŋàʔi ɣìŋiữ ŋườʔi cɔŋ bìɲiên cọnvẹn ŋườʔi ɲờkậʔi ŋàʔi hãʔi ɲờkậʔi Ðứkzê dờʔidờʔi Ðứkzê cíɲ Ðứkzê vầŋ dá kủʔa kák tʰờʔidạʔi ŋàʔi dã zằn ɲữŋ ŋườʔiở nơʔi kaw dã fá dổ tʰàɲ kawŋất suốŋ tớʔi dất vàʔɔ bụʔibặm ɣiàʔidạp zướʔi cơn cơn ŋèʔɔnàn tʰiếʔutʰốn bướk cên ŋiền Ðườŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ŋăitʰẳŋ ŋàʔi Ðấŋ ŋăitʰẳŋ bằŋ dườŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ hỡʔiÐứkzê tʰật cúŋtôʔi dứŋ cên dườŋ fánsét côŋdợʔi ŋàʔi zɛɲ ŋàʔi ɣiɲớ ŋàʔi ʔawướk kủʔa liɲhồn cúŋtôʔi Ðươŋ bandêm liɲhồn tôʔi dã ʔawướk ŋàʔi fảʔi tʰầnliɲ cɔŋ tôʔi tʰiếttʰa ŋàʔi xi ɲữŋ fánsét ŋàʔi za cên dất zânkư kủʔa tʰếzan dềʔu họk kôŋbìɲ kẻ ák zầʔu kó dượk kũŋ cẳŋ họk kôŋbìɲ sɔŋ diềʔu ák cɔŋ dất ŋăitʰẳŋ xôŋ ɲìn sɛm wiŋiêm kủʔa Ðứkzê hỡʔiÐứkzê tăj ŋàʔi dã ɣiá cúŋnó cẳŋ sɛm tʰấʔi sɔŋ cúŋnó tʰấʔi sấʔuhổ bởʔi kớ lòŋ sốtsắŋ ŋàʔi za zân mìɲ lửʔa dốt cáʔi tʰùŋịc ŋàʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi bìɲan cɔ cúŋtôʔi mọʔi diềʔu cúŋtôʔi ấʔilà ŋàʔi cɔ hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi ŋɔàʔi ŋàʔi từŋ kó củ xák kaicị cúŋtôʔi năj cúŋtôʔi cỉ kậʔi mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi kêʔukầʔu zɛɲ ŋàʔi họ dã cết xôŋ sốŋ nữʔa dã tʰàɲ xôŋ zậʔi nữʔa ŋàʔi dã fạt ziệt cɔdến ɣiɲớ ŋàʔi kũŋ za hưxôŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê ŋàʔi dã tʰêm zân nầʔi ŋàʔi dã tʰêm zân nầʔi ŋàʔi dã dượk viɲhiển dã mởmaŋ bờkõʔi dất nầʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê dã ŋàʔi cɔŋ lúk ŋặtŋèʔɔ kêʔukầʔu ŋàʔi xi ŋàʔi sửʔa fạt hỡʔiÐứkzê cúŋtôʔi cướk ŋàʔi xáknàʔɔ ɲư dờn kótʰaj ɣần dẻ daŋ dăwdớn kêʔuzêʔu kwặntʰắt cúŋtôʔi dã kómaŋ dã ởkữ dẻ za ɲư ɣió cẳŋ kứʔu cɔŋ cáʔidất kũŋ cẳŋ sɛɲ za zân cɔŋ tʰếzan ɲữŋ cết kủʔa ŋàʔi sốŋ ɲữŋ sákcết kủʔa tôʔi dềʔu cổʔi zậʔi hỡʔi cɔŋ bụʔi dất hãʔi tʰứkzậʔi hãʔi vì mók kủʔa ŋàʔi ɲư mók lúk hừŋ dôŋ dất buôŋ kák za xỏʔi hỡʔi zân hãʔi dến vàʔɔ buồŋ dóŋkửʔa lạʔi hãʔi mìɲ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kơn ɣiận dã kwa vì nầʔi Ðứkzê nơʔi ŋàʔi dặŋ fạt zânkư cên dất tộʔiák bấʔizờ dất tỏbàʔi hwiết za xôŋ cɛ dậʔi ɲữŋ dã ɣiết nữʔa cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê zùŋ ɣươm kứŋ mạɲ fạt viətʰan kɔn zắn lẹlàŋ fạt viətʰan kɔn zắn kɔŋkweo ŋàʔi ɣiết kɔn zướʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó kák ŋươʔi xá bàʔi nóʔi ɲɔ sɛɲ za zượʔuɲɔ Ấʔi cíɲ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ ɣiữ cốkcốk tướʔi ɣiữ dêmŋàʔi kẻʔɔ ŋườʔita fáhạʔi căŋ ta cẳŋ kămzận mặk ʔaj dɛm cà cuôm ɣaj ɣốk cốŋkự kùŋ ta di dáɲ cúŋnó dốt cuŋ cẳŋ ɣì bằŋ ɲờ sứk hòʔa vớʔi fảʔi hãʔi hòʔa vớʔi săw nầʔi zakốp dâm zễ ʔisơzaên hwa cắk za cáʔi dầʔi cên mặtdất Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi dáɲ ɲư dáɲ dã dáɲ saw nó ɣiết ɲư ɲữŋ ɣiết dã ɣiết saw Ấʔilà ŋàʔi dã cɛɲ ɲăw vớʔi kác cừŋdỗʔi zờʔi di cɔŋ ŋàʔi kó ɣió dôŋ dùʔa di bởʔi ɣió bãʔɔ kủʔa ŋàʔi vậʔi nầʔi kớ vìsaw tộʔi zakốp dượk tʰa nầʔi kwả kủʔa cừbỏ tộʔi di cɔ hếttʰảʔi dá kủʔa bàntʰờ za ɲư dó vôʔi kák hìɲtượŋ kák cụ mặtcờʔi xôŋ zựŋ nữʔa vì tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ dã cởnên tiêʔudiềʔu ɲàở dể hwaŋ zườŋɲư dồŋ vắŋ bò dến kỏ tạʔi dó ɲá ɲữŋ ɲáɲ kâʔi xi ɲáɲ xô dờn dến lấʔi ɲɛn lửʔa vì zân nầʔi xôŋ kó cíxôn Ðấŋ dã cẳŋ tʰươŋsót dến Ðấŋ tạʔɔ cẳŋ cɔ sảʔiza cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê luŋlăj lòŋ sôŋkáʔi cɔdến xɛ zíptô hỡʔi kɔnkáʔi ʔisơzaên kák ŋươʔi dềʔu từŋ ŋườʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó tʰổʔi bấʔizờ ɲữŋ tʰấtlạk cɔŋ sứ ʔasizi ɲữŋ dàʔi cɔŋ dất zíptô dến tʰờ lạʔi cướk Ðứkzê cên núʔi tʰáɲ tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm xốn tʰăj cɔ mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa ɲữŋ zượʔu zaim xốn tʰăj cɔ hwa cóŋ dồ caŋsứk dẹp ɲứt zân ấʔi dóŋ tạʔi nơʔi cũŋ màʔumỡ kủʔa ɲữŋ ŋườʔi săj zượʔu nầʔi nơʔi cúʔa kó ŋườʔi mạɲ kó kwiền ɣiốŋ ɲư kơn bãʔɔ mưʔadá ɲư cận ɣió fáhạʔi ɲư nướklớn ŋườʔi lấʔi tăj kả suốŋ dất mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên kiêʔuŋạʔɔ kủʔa ɲữŋ zượʔu zaim ɣiàʔidạp zướʔi cơn káʔi hwa cóŋ dồ caŋsứk dẹp ɲứt zân ấʔi dóŋ tạʔi nơʔi cũŋ màʔumỡ kũŋ ɣiốŋ ɲư cáʔi cín cướk mùʔahè ŋườʔita tʰấʔi vừʔamớʔi vàʔɔ tăj tʰì dã cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó Ðứkzê kwân cởnên mãʔɔ ciềʔu tʰiên cóʔi sáŋ mãʔɔ zựkzỡ kủʔa zân ŋàʔi cởnên tʰầnkôŋ cíɲ cɔ ŋồʔi cên tòʔa sétdɔán sứkmạɲ cɔ ɲữŋ duổʔi ɣiặk nơʔi kửʔa tʰàɲ sɔŋ ɲữŋ ấʔi kũŋ cɔáŋváŋ zượʔu siêʔu kák tʰứ zượʔumạɲ tʰầʔi dấŋ tiênci dềʔu cɔáŋváŋ zượʔumạɲ zượʔu di ɲơn kák tʰứ zượʔumạɲ sɔàŋ sɛm tʰấʔi tʰì kắtŋĩʔa saj sử tʰì vấpŋã mửʔa za ôʔuế dầʔi tiệk cẳŋ kó cỗ nàʔɔ sạc vậʔi ŋườʔi zạʔi xôn cɔ ʔaj xiến ʔaj hiểʔu zạʔizỗ mìɲ kó fảʔi zạʔi cɔ ɲữŋ cẻkɔn tʰôʔi mớʔi lìʔa xỏʔi căŋ vì vớʔi fảʔi ɣiềŋmốʔi tʰêm ɣiềŋmốʔi ɣiềŋmốʔi tʰêm ɣiềŋmốʔi hàŋ tʰêm hàŋ hàŋ tʰêm hàŋ mộtcút cỗ nầʔi mộtcút cỗ kiə vậʔi Ðứkzê zùŋ môʔi lưỡʔi xák fán kùŋzân nầʔi ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ zằŋ Ðâʔi nơʔi ʔiênŋỉ hãʔi dể mệtɲọk dượk ʔiênŋỉ nầʔi lúk cɔ kák ŋươʔi tʰếmà cẳŋ cịʔu ŋɛ lờʔiÐứkzê dốʔivớʔi ɣiềŋmốʔi tʰêm ɣiềŋmốʔi ɣiềŋmốʔi tʰêm ɣiềŋmốʔi hàŋ tʰêm hàŋ hàŋ tʰêm hàŋ mộtcút cỗ nầʔi mộtcút cỗ kiə hầʔu cɔ bướk tớʔi tʰì ŋã ɲàʔɔ ɣiập bẫʔi vậʔi hỡʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋạʔɔmạn kaicị zân nầʔi ɣiêzusalɛm hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê vì kák ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ cúŋta dã kếtướk vớʔi cết zawướk kùŋ nơʔi âmfủ xi tainạn hủʔiziệt cảʔi kwa cẳŋ cạm dến dâʔu cúŋta lấʔi nóʔizốʔi nơʔi nươŋnáʔu zanlận nơʔi mìɲ vậʔi cúʔazê fán ɲưvầʔi nầʔi dặt tạʔi siôn dá dể dá dã tʰửŋiệm dá ɣók kwíbáʔu bềnvữŋ ʔaj cẳŋ ɣấp zúk ta lấʔi cáɲ cựk zâʔi dɔ kôŋbìɲ cuẩnmựk mưʔa dó hủʔiziệt nơʔi ẩnnáʔu bằŋ nóʔizốʔi nướk ŋập cỗ nươŋnáʔu bấʔizờ ướk kák ŋườʔi vớʔi cết fế di ướk kák ŋươʔi zaw kùŋ nơʔi âmfủ xôŋ dứŋ dượk xi tainạn hủʔiziệt cảʔi kwa kák ŋươʔi dềʔu ɣiàʔidạp mỗʔi tainạn cảʔi kwa lấʔi kák ŋươʔi cảʔi kwa mọʔi buổʔi sớmmaj ŋàʔi dêm cỉ kó kíɲ cɔ kák ŋươʔi hiểʔubiết lờʔi zạʔi ấʔi ɣiườŋ ŋắn kwá xôŋtʰể zuỗʔi mìɲ kwá xôŋtʰể kwấn mìɲ vìÐứkzê zấʔi ɲư núʔi fêzasim ŋàʔi nổʔizận ɲư tạʔi cũŋ ɣabaôn dặŋ làmviệk ŋàʔi việk xáktʰườŋ làmkôŋ ŋàʔi kôŋ lạlùŋ vậʔi bâʔizờ dừŋ xiɲ nữʔa ʔɛ zâʔi tóʔi kàŋ buộk cặt kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ kó ŋɛ nơʔi cúʔa Ðứkzê kwân lịɲ cwiền hủʔiziệt kả dất hãʔi lắŋtaj ŋɛ tiếŋ hãʔi dểý ŋɛ lờʔi kẻ kàʔi dể zeo hằŋ ŋàʔi kứ kàʔi saw há cẳŋ dất bừʔa hăjsaw xi dã bôŋ bằŋ mặtdất zồʔi cẳŋ vảʔi tiểʔu hồʔi zeo dạʔihồʔi há cẳŋ tỉʔa lúʔamì nơʔi zãɲ mạcɲa nơʔi dã kắm zấʔu dạʔimạc cên Ấʔilà Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi zạʔi bảʔɔ kác fảʔi vì ŋườʔita cẳŋ zùŋ cáʔi ŋiền tiểʔu hồʔi kũŋ cẳŋ cɔ báɲ sɛlăn cên dạʔihồʔi ɲưŋ tiểʔu hồʔi tʰì dập bằŋ káʔi kwɛ dạʔihồʔi tʰì dập bằŋ káʔi ŋườʔita săj lúʔamì ɲữŋ cẳŋ dập zầʔu cɔ tʰók kwa zướʔi báɲsɛ hɔặk cơn ŋựʔa sɔŋ xôŋ ɣiập Ðʔiềʔu dó kũŋ za bởʔi Ðứkzê kwân mưʔu ŋàʔi lạlùŋ xônŋwan ŋàʔi tốtlàɲ xốn cɔ ʔaziên cɔ ʔaziên tʰàɲ Ðʔa dã dóŋ cạʔi năm lạʔi tʰêm cảʔi kwa kák bấʔizờ cɔ ʔaziên tʰắtŋặt tạʔi dó kó taŋcế tʰanvãn ɲưŋ kòn ʔaziên cɔ ta dóŋ cạʔi vâʔi ŋươʔi dồn ŋươʔi dắp lũʔi ŋịc kùŋ ŋươʔi ŋươʔi suốŋ nóʔi za zướʔi dất ɣiọŋ ŋươʔi zầmzĩ bụʔi dất za tiếŋ ŋươʔi xỏʔi dất ɣiốŋ tiếŋ dồŋbóŋ lờʔinóʔi ŋươʔi tʰỏtʰẻ za bụʔi dất ɲưŋ kẻtʰù ŋươʔi ɲư bụʔi ɲỏ kườŋbạʔɔ ɲư cấʔu băj di dó sảʔi dến tʰìɲlìɲ cỉ cɔŋ Ðứkzê kwân zùŋ dộŋdất tiếŋ ɣiólốk bãʔɔ ŋọn lửʔa tʰiêʔu tʰăm fạt ɲư ciêmbaw ɲư tʰấʔi cɔŋ bandêm tʰểnàʔɔ tʰì kwân cúŋ kủʔa mọʔi nướk dáɲ ʔaziên hếttʰảʔi dềʔu tʰàɲ dồnlũʔi ziết kũŋ tʰể ấʔi ɲư ŋườʔi dóʔi ciêmbaw tʰấʔi tʰứkzậʔi bụŋ cốŋ ɲư ŋườʔi xát ciêmbaw tʰấʔi ʔuốŋ tʰứkzậʔi ŋɛ cɔŋ mìɲ di xátxaw kả kwân cúŋ kủʔa mọʔi nướk dáɲ núʔi siôn xáknàʔɔ ɲưvậʔi hãʔi sữŋsờ kiɲhãʔi hãʔi kwáŋ lòʔa họ săj ɲưŋ xôŋ fảʔi zượʔu sɔàŋ ɲưŋ xôŋ fảʔi bởʔi zượʔumạɲ vìÐứkzê dã zảʔi tʰần ŋủmê xắp cên kák ŋươʔi dã kák ŋươʔi tứklà kák tiênci dã cùm dầʔu kák ŋươʔi tứklà kák vậʔi mọʔi tʰấʔi dốʔivớʔi kák ŋươʔi dã ɲư lờʔi kủʔa kwiển sác dóŋ dưʔa cɔ ŋườʔi dọk zằŋ sin dọk sác nầʔi tʰì cảlờʔi zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ dọk dượk sác nầʔi kó dóŋ hɔặk dưʔa cɔ ŋườʔi xôŋ dọk zằŋ sin dọk sác nầʔi tʰì zằŋ tôʔi xôŋ dọk cúʔa kó fán zằŋ vì zân nầʔi cỉ lấʔi miệŋ tớʔi ɣần lấʔi môʔi miếŋ lòŋ cúŋnó tʰì kác sa cúŋnó kíɲ cẳŋkwa diềʔu zăn kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi bởʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi zạʔi cɔ vì kớ dó kứ làmviệk lạlùŋ ɣiữʔa zân nầʔi zất dếnnỗʔi xônŋwan kủʔa ŋườʔi xônŋwan za hưxôŋ tʰôŋ sáŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi tʰôŋ sáŋ ɣiấʔu xốn tʰăj cɔ ɲữŋ ɣiấʔu mưʔu mìɲ kác tʰẳm sâʔu xỏʔi Ðứkzê làmviệk mìɲ cɔŋ só tốʔi nóʔi zằŋ ʔaj tʰấʔi ʔaj kák ŋươʔi tʰậtlà cáʔiŋượk kwá sɛm ŋườʔi tʰợ ɣốm ɲư dấtsét saw dượk nóʔi mìɲ zằŋ nó cẳŋ za káʔi bìɲ dượk nóʔi tạʔɔ mìɲ zằŋ nó cẳŋ kó cí hiểʔu dâʔu cẳŋ fảʔi kòn ítlâʔu nữʔa tʰì liban dổʔi làmzuộŋ zuộŋ dượk ɲư zừŋ zậm saw cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó diếk ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi cɔŋ sác kɔn kủʔa duj sɛm tʰấʔi tốʔităm ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ɲumì kũŋ dượk tʰêm vujvẻ cɔŋ Ðứkzê ɲữŋ ŋèʔɔxổ cɔŋ lɔàʔiŋườʔi ɲơn Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên mừŋzỡ vì ŋườʔi bạʔɔŋượk dã ziệt xiɲ dã di fàm ɲữŋ ɲơn zịp ák dã cừ tứk ɲữŋ lấʔi lờʔinóʔi dịɲtộʔi ŋườʔita ɣàʔi bẫʔi cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kiệnkáʔɔ cướk kửʔa lấʔi hưxôŋ xuất kôŋbìɲ vậʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã cuộk zaham kó fán ɲà zakốp ɲưvầʔi zakốp xôŋ kòn hổtʰẹn cẳŋ táʔi nữʔa ɲưŋ xi tʰấʔi kák kɔncaj mìɲ việk tăj za ɣiữʔa tʰì zɛɲ tʰáɲ tônsùŋ Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa zakốp kíɲ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ lòŋ sajlầm cởnên xôn sáŋ hăj ʔɔáncác dượk zạʔizỗ Ðứkzê fán xốn tʰăj cɔ kɔnkáʔi bộʔiŋịc lậpmưʔu cẳŋ bởʔi kếtướk cẳŋ kậʔi tʰần hầʔu cɔ tʰêm tộʔi cên tộʔi cúŋnó cưʔa hỏʔi miệŋ dã xởʔi di suốŋ zíptô dể kậʔi sứkmạɲ kủʔa fazaôn tʰêm sứk cɔ mìɲ zướʔi bóŋ zíptô cɔnên sứkmạɲ kủʔa fazaôn sỉɲụk kák ŋươʔi nơʔi ẩnnáʔu zướʔi bóŋ zíptô cởnên sấʔuhổ kák ŋươʔi kák kwan cưởŋ zân dã tớʔi sôʔan sứɣiả dã dến hanɛ hếttʰảʔi mắkkỡ zân kiə cẳŋ íc ci cɔ mìɲ cẳŋ kứʔuzúp kũŋ cẳŋ lợʔi sɔŋ cɔ maŋ hổmaŋ ɲuốk ɣáɲ nặŋ kák tʰúvật fươŋ cɔŋ sứ zannan xốnxổ sứ dó dến ɲữŋ dựk káʔi zắnlụk zắnlửʔa băj cúŋnó cở kủʔakảʔi mìɲ cên vaj lửʔa kɔn báʔu cên ɣu lạkdà dặŋ zâŋ cɔ zântộk cẳŋ íc ɣì dượk sự kứʔuzúp kủʔa ŋườʔi zíptô cẳŋkwa hưxôŋ vôíc dặt zaháp ŋồʔi ʔiên cẳŋ dộŋ bâʔizờ ŋươʔi hãʔi di cạm lờʔi nầʔi cên bảŋ ɲỏ cướk hãʔi cép vàʔɔ sác dể cwiền lạʔi dờʔi săw mãʔimãʔi xôŋ kùŋ zân nầʔi bộʔiŋịc kɔnkáʔi nóʔizốʔi kɔnkáʔi xôŋ ŋɛ luậtfáp Ðứkzê nóʔi vớʔi zằŋ Ðừŋ làmci nóʔi vớʔi tiênci zằŋ Ðừŋ nóʔi tiênci tʰật hãʔi nóʔi cɔ cúŋtôʔi ɲữŋ dềʔu vuitʰú hãʔi lấʔi ɲữŋ hwiễɲɔặk bảʔɔ cúŋtôʔi hãʔi lìʔa xỏʔi dườŋ xỏʔi lốʔi kất Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên xỏʔi cúŋtôʔi vậʔi Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi vì kák ŋươʔi xiɲ lờʔi nầʔi kậʔi diềʔu bạʔɔŋượk cáʔi ŋịc nươŋ ɲờ ɲữŋ ấʔi bởʔi kớ dó tộʔi kák ŋươʔi ɲư tườŋ lồʔi za cên kaw cỉ cɔŋ ɣiâʔifút tʰìɲlìɲ dổ suốŋ ŋàʔi dập ɲư káʔi bìɲ tʰợ ɣốm za za từŋ miếŋ cẳŋ tiếk ɣì dếnnỗʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ miếŋ cẳŋ dượk mảɲ nàʔɔ dể lấʔi lửʔa nơʔi hăjlà múk nướk nơʔi vả cúʔazê Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên kó fán ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi dượk zỗʔi tạʔi cởlạʔi ʔiênŋỉ kák ŋươʔi dượk sứkmạɲ tạʔi ʔiênlặŋ côŋkậʔi ɲưŋ kák ŋươʔi dã xôŋ tʰế kák ŋươʔi nóʔi zằŋ xôŋ cúŋtôʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa cạʔi cốn fảʔi kák ŋươʔi fảʔi cạʔi cốn cúŋtôʔi kỡʔi ŋựʔa cạʔi măw fảʔi ɲữŋ duổʔi tʰeo kák ŋươʔi kũŋ cạʔi măw một ŋườʔi zọʔa ŋàn ŋườʔi di cốn ŋườʔi zọʔa kák ŋươʔi dềʔu di cốn cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ kák ŋươʔi kòn lạʔi ɲư kâʔi vọʔi cên dỉɲ núʔi ɲư kờsí cên ɣò zầʔu vậʔi Ðứkzê kòn cờdợʔi dể cɔ kák ŋươʔi ŋàʔi dượk tʰươŋsót kák ŋươʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kôŋŋĩʔa fướk tʰăj cɔ mọʔi côŋdợʔi ŋàʔi vì zân nầʔi cɔŋ siôn nơʔi ɣiêzusalɛm ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn xóklók nữʔa xi ŋươʔi kêʔu ŋàʔi cắk mớʔi vừʔa ŋɛ ŋươʔi ŋàʔi ɲậm lờʔi zầʔucúʔa báɲ hɔạnnạn nướk xốnxó cɔ kák ŋươʔi kák tʰầʔizáʔɔ ŋươʔi cẳŋ lẩnxuất nữʔa ŋươʔi dượk tʰấʔi kák tʰầʔizáʔɔ ŋươʔi xi kák ŋươʔi sê kwa hữʔu hɔặk taj kák ŋươʔi ŋɛ kótiếŋ dằŋ săw mìɲ zằŋ nầʔi dườŋ dâʔi hãʔi nɔj tʰeo kák ŋươʔi lấʔi bạk bọk tượŋ cạm lấʔi vàŋ tʰếp tượŋ dúk kủʔa mìɲ ôʔuế za sa ɲư dồ zơbẩn bảʔɔ zằŋ hãʔi za xỏʔi dâʔi cúʔa xiến mưʔa suốŋ cên ɣiốŋ kák ŋươʔi zeo dất báɲ lươŋtʰựk dất sɛɲ màʔumỡ zưzật cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó súkvật kák ŋươʔi kỏ nơʔi dồŋ zộŋ bò lừʔa kɔn kàʔi zuộŋ tʰók ŋɔn ŋườʔita zê bằŋ mủŋ vớʔi niə ŋàʔi cémzết xi dồnlũʔi dổ suốŋ tʰì cên mọʔi núʔi kaw dồʔi kả kó ɲữŋ suốʔi nướk cảʔi sáŋ mặtcăŋ cóʔilóʔi ɲư sáŋ mặtcờʔi sáŋ mặtcờʔi bảʔi ɲư sáŋ kủʔa bảʔi ŋàʔi cɔŋ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê buộk zấʔu kủʔa zân ŋàʔi cữʔa làɲ vếttʰươŋ nầʔi zɛɲ Ðứkzê sa dến kơn ɣiận fừŋfừŋ ɲư xóʔi dậm băj môʔi dầʔi tʰạɲ lưỡʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư lửʔa hơʔi tʰở ŋàʔi xáknàʔɔ sôŋ nướk ŋập dến kổ ŋàʔi lấʔi káʔi sàŋ hủʔiziệt sáŋ kák nướk zùŋ káʔi xớp zẫn di lạk dườŋ xớp kák zân bấʔizờ kák ŋươʔi sướŋka ɲư cɔŋ dêm ɣiữ tʰáɲ kák ŋươʔi kó vuj cɔŋ lòŋ ɲư tʰổʔi sáʔɔ núʔi Ðứkzê dếnkùŋ vầŋ kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðứkzê cɔ ŋɛ tiếŋ waiŋiêm ŋàʔi ŋàʔi káɲtăj ŋăm dɛ kủʔa mìɲ za ɣiữʔa kơn ɣiận ŋàʔi ɲữŋ ŋọn lửʔa ɣió bãʔɔ mưʔadá vì ʔasizi ŋɛ tiếŋ Ðứkzê zunsợ ŋàʔi lấʔi zɔj dáɲ ʔasizi mỗʔi xi Ðứkzê lấʔi zɔj dịɲ dáɲ tʰì ŋườʔita ŋɛ tiếŋ cốŋ dờn kầm cɔŋ ɲữŋ cậnmạk Ðứkzê vuŋ káɲtăj cɛɲ ciến kùŋ vìtô fết dã sửʔasɔạn sưʔa cɔ cɔ vwa nó sâʔu zộŋ cên kó lửʔa kủʔi tʰật ɲiềʔu hơʔi tʰở kủʔa Ðứkzê ɲư suốʔi lưʔuhɔàŋ ɲúm xốn tʰăj cɔ ɲữŋ suốŋ zíptô dặŋ kầʔukứʔu ɲờ ɲữŋ ŋựʔa kậʔi ɲữŋ sɛ biɲ ɲiềʔu ɲữŋ líɲ mạɲ xôŋ ŋó Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên cẳŋ kầʔu Ðứkzê ɲưŋmà ŋàʔi kũŋ xôn sáŋ Ấʔi cíɲ ŋàʔi Ðấŋ ɣiáŋ tajvạ cẳŋ ănlờʔi mìɲ ŋàʔi zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ɲà zữ ŋịc kùŋ ɣiúp zanák vả ŋườʔi zíptô lɔàʔiŋườʔi xôŋ fảʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ɲữŋ ŋựʔa cỉ sáktʰịt xôŋ fảʔi tʰần xiÐứkzê zaŋ tăj za tứktʰì ɣiúp dượk ɣiúp ŋã kả haj dềʔu ziệt vìÐứkzê dã fán kùŋ ɲưvầʔi ɲư hɔặk kɔn dượk mồʔi ɣầm tʰét mặkzầʔu cănciên ɲóm lạʔi tʰàɲdɔàn kũŋ cẳŋ tʰấʔi kêʔu zùŋ tʰấʔi dộŋ dồŋ mộttʰể ấʔi Ðứkzê kwân suốŋ dặŋ dáɲ cận cên núʔi siôn cên dồʔi ɲư cim băj liệŋ tʰểnàʔɔ dồŋ mộttʰể ấʔi Ðứkzê kwân cɛcở kứʔuvớt cɔ kwa ɣìŋiữ cɔ hỡʔi kɔnkáʔi ʔisơzaên vậʔi hãʔi cởlạʔi kùŋ Ðấŋ kák ŋươʔi dã zấʔi lɔạn ŋịc kùŋ cɔŋ ŋàʔi dó ʔainấʔi tʰầntượŋ mìɲ bằŋ bạk bằŋ vàŋ dồ kák ŋươʔi dã zùŋ cíɲ tăj mìɲ fạmtộʔi ʔasizi ŋã zướʔi ɣươm cẳŋ fảʔi ɣươm kủʔa lɔàʔiŋườʔi káʔi ɣươm cẳŋ fảʔi ɣươm kủʔa ŋườʔita nó cốn xỏʔi ɣươm dó ɲữŋ caicẻ fảʔi cịʔu xổzịc vầŋ dá kwa di kiɲhãʔi kák kwan cưởŋ kíɲ kờsí Ðứkzê fán ɲưvậʔi tứklà Ðấŋ kó lửʔa tạʔi siôn kó tạʔi ɣiêzusalɛm nầʔi kó vwa lấʔi ŋĩʔa cịvì kák kwan cưởŋ lấʔi kôŋbìɲ kaicị sẽ kó ŋườʔi ɲư nơʔi ɣió cỗ cɛ bãʔɔtáp ɲư suốʔi nướk cɔŋ nơʔi dất xô ɲư bóŋ vầŋ dá cɔŋ sứ mònmỏʔi bấʔizờ kủʔa sɛm xôŋ taj kủʔa ŋɛ cămcỉ lòŋ kủʔa ŋườʔi hiểʔu xônŋwan lưỡʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi kàlăm nóʔi zễ zõ kẻ zạʔizột cẳŋ dượk sưŋ kawsaŋ ŋườʔi zít zóŋ cẳŋ dượk sưŋ zộŋzãʔi vì zạʔizột nóʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi zạʔizột lòŋ siêʔu zanzốʔi dặŋ fạm kák tộʔiák dặŋ nóʔi ɲữŋ sajlầm ŋịc kùŋ Ðứkzê dặŋ cɔ dóʔi cốŋ bụŋ xát dồ ʔuốŋ kẻ zít zóŋ zùŋ ɲữŋ xíɣiớʔi zantà twan ɲữŋ mưʔu zan lấʔi nóʔizốʔi dặŋ hạʔi ŋườʔi ɲumì hạʔi ŋèʔɔ zầʔu nóʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ ŋườʔi kawsaŋ cỉ ɲữŋ mưʔu kawsaŋ hằŋ kawsaŋ hỡʔi ɲữŋ dờn suŋsướŋ hãʔi zậʔi ŋɛ tiếŋ hỡʔi ɲữŋ kɔŋáʔi xôŋ hăj lɔ hãʔi dể taiŋɛ lờʔi cɔŋ mấʔi ŋàʔi nữʔa kák ŋươʔi xôŋ lɔlắŋ dềʔu zunzẩʔi mùʔa ɲɔ mùʔa ɣặt kũŋ xôŋ kó nữʔa suŋsướŋ hãʔi zunzẩʔi kɔŋáʔi xôŋ hăj lɔ hãʔi bốʔizốʔi hãʔi kổʔi áʔɔsốŋ hãʔi ởcần hãʔi tʰắtlưŋ bằŋ baw ɣaj cúŋnó dấm ŋựk dồŋdiền màʔumỡ kâʔi ɲɔ saicáʔi cà cuôm ɣaj ɣốk mọk cên dất zân kùŋ cên mọʔi ɲà cơʔi cɔŋ tʰàɲ vujvẻ vì kuŋdiện vắŋtɛɲ tʰàɲ dôŋdúk hwaŋ lɔạn dồʔi tʰáp năj cởnên sàʔɔhwiệt dến dờʔidờʔi cɔ ɲữŋ lừʔa zừŋ cɔán nơʔi ŋỉ ɲữŋ bầʔi tʰả cɔdến cừŋ tʰần nơʔi kaw dượk zảʔi suốŋ xắp cên cúŋta dồŋ vắŋ tʰàɲ zuộŋ zuộŋ dượk ɲư zừŋ zậm bấʔizờ sétdɔán nơʔi dồŋ vắŋ kôŋbìɲ cú nơʔi zuộŋ kôŋbìɲ sɛɲ za bìɲan cáʔi kủʔa kôŋbìɲ ʔiênlặŋ ʔan mãʔimãʔi zân cú cɔŋ cỗ bìɲan cɔŋ ɲà ʔiênổn nơʔi ŋỉ lặŋlẽ ɲưŋ mưʔadá dổ suốŋ cên zừŋ tʰàɲ kả suốŋ fướk tʰăj cɔ kák ŋươʔi zeo ɣiốŋ mọʔi zòŋ nướk tʰả cơn lửʔa di xốn tʰăj cɔ ŋươʔi cưʔa hạʔi hạʔi ŋườʔi cưʔa zốʔi zốʔi ŋườʔi xi ŋươʔi hạʔi ŋườʔi vừʔazồʔi cíɲ ŋươʔi hạʔi xi ŋươʔi zốʔi ŋườʔi vừʔazồʔi dến fiên ŋươʔi zốʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê hãʔi tʰươŋsót cúŋtôʔi cúŋtôʔi côŋdợʔi nơʔi cúʔa sin cúʔa káɲtăj cɔ cúŋtôʔi mỗʔi buổʔi sớmmaj ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋtôʔi cɔŋ kơn hɔạnnạn ŋɛ tiếŋ ồnàʔɔ kák zân dềʔu cốncáɲ xi cúʔa zấʔi kák nướk dềʔu kủʔakảʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰâʔu lạʔi ɲư kɔn sâʔu tʰâʔu lạʔi ŋườʔita dến cên ɲư kàʔɔkàʔɔ ɲảʔi tớʔi Ðứkzê kawcọŋ ŋàʔi nơʔi kaw ŋàʔi cɔ siôn dầʔizẫʔi kôŋbìɲ cáɲ cựk ŋàʔizờ kủʔa ŋươʔi dượk bềnvữŋ ɣiảʔicứʔu zưzật xônŋwan tʰôŋ kíɲ Ðứkzê câʔubáʔu kủʔa ŋươʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ mạɲbạʔɔ dươŋ kêʔuzêʔu ŋɔàʔi kák sứɣiả kầʔuhòʔa xóklók dắŋkăj Ðườŋ káʔi hwaŋ lɔạn ŋườʔita xôŋ kwa lạʔinữʔa kẻtʰù dã zứt lờʔi zawướk xiɲzể kák tʰàɲ cẳŋ tʰèm dến ɲơn zân daj tʰảmsầʔu hawmòn liban sấʔuhổ xôhéʔɔ sazôn ɣiốŋ ɲư nơʔi samạk basan kạtmên kâʔicốʔi diêʔutàn Ðứkzê fán bâʔizờ cỗʔi zậʔi bâʔizờ zấʔi mìɲ bâʔizờ kaw kák ŋươʔi kó ŋén zơmzạ dẻ za kỏ zák hơʔi kák ŋươʔi tʰở za tứklà lửʔa tʰiêʔu mìɲ kák zânsự ɲư vôʔi dươŋ sôʔinổʔi ɲư ɣaj dã cặt dốt cɔŋ lửʔa kák ŋươʔi sa hãʔi ŋɛ việk dã kòn kák ŋươʔi ɣần hãʔi ɲậnbiết năŋlựk ɲữŋ fạmtộʔi dã kiɲhãʔi cɔŋ siôn vôdạʔɔ dã zunzẩʔi ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta dượk vớʔi dám lửʔa tʰiêʔu ʔaj cɔŋ cúŋta dượk vớʔi tʰiêʔudốt dờʔidờʔi Ấʔilà bướk tʰeo kôŋbìɲ nóʔi za cáɲ cựk xiɲ lợʔi hɔạc tàʔi vuŋ tăj cẳŋ lấʔi kủʔa hốʔilộ bưŋ taj cẳŋ ŋɛ cwiện dổ hwiết cẳŋ tʰấʔi diềʔu ák kẻ dó cɔŋ nơʔi kaw kák vầŋ dá bềnvữŋ dồnlũʔi báɲ dượk cɔ nướk xôŋbawzờ tʰiếʔu mắt ŋươʔi ŋắm sɛm vwa cɔŋ tốtdẹp ŋàʔi tʰấʔi dất mởzộŋ lòŋ ŋươʔi swiŋẫm kiɲ xiếp cớ nàʔɔ dáɲ tʰuế dâʔu kẻ kầm kân dâʔu kẻ dến ɲữŋ dồnlũʔi dâʔu ŋươʔi cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi zân kườŋbạʔɔ nữʔa zân nóʔi tiếŋ líʔulɔ xó ŋɛ tiếŋ mọʔizợ xôŋ hiểʔu dượk hãʔi ɲìn sɛm siôn tʰàɲ kủʔa kák cọŋtʰể cúŋta mắt ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ɣiêzusalɛm cỗ ʔiênlặŋ cạʔi xôŋ zờʔi dinữʔa kák nọk cẳŋ ɲổ cẳŋ kó káʔi zâʔi nàʔɔ dứt vìÐứkzê dó vớʔi cúŋta cɔŋ waiŋi nơʔi kó sôŋŋòʔi zất zộŋ xôŋ tʰwiền cèʔɔ dilạʔi cẳŋ tàʔu kwa tʰật Ðứkzê kwan sét cúŋta Ðứkzê Ðấŋ cɔ cúŋta Ðứkzê vwa cúŋta cíɲ ŋàʔi kứʔu cúŋta ɲữŋ zâʔi kủʔa ŋươʔi dã kổʔi za xôŋtʰể cằŋ cơn kột ɣiươŋ dượk bấʔizờ ŋườʔita ciə kủʔa kướp kwè lấʔi fần kủʔa dó zânkư xôŋ nóʔi zằŋ tôʔi dăw kẻ cɔŋ dượk tʰa tộʔi hỡʔi kák nướk hãʔi dến ɣần ŋɛ hỡʔi kák zân hãʔi dểý mọʔi cɔŋ tʰếzan mọʔi sɛɲ za dó hãʔi dềʔu ŋɛ vìÐứkzê nổʔizận ŋịc kùŋ mọʔi nướk kơn tʰạɲ ŋàʔi ŋịc kùŋ kả dạʔɔ biɲ ŋàʔi dã zaw cɔ ziệtvɔŋ fó cɔ dáɲ ɣiết kẻ ɣiết cɔŋ cúŋnó fảʔi tʰâʔi cết băj mùʔi hôʔi kák núʔi dầmdìʔa ɲữŋ máʔu kả kơ biɲ cên cờʔi tanták kák từŋ cờʔi kuốn lạʔi ɲư kuốn sác kả kơ biɲ diêʔutàn ɲư ɲɔ zụŋ ɲư xô zơʔi suốŋ vì ɣươm dã ʔuốŋ dủ cên cờʔi nầʔi suốŋ cên dôm cên zân dã zủʔasả dể dɔán sét ɣươm kủʔa Ðứkzê dầʔi ɲữŋ máʔu vấʔi ɲữŋ máʔu kủʔa ciên kɔn zê dựk cáʔi kật kủʔa ciên dựk vì kó Ðứkzê bốca kó dáɲ ɣiết dất dôm ɲữŋ zừŋ dựk dềʔu ŋã suốŋ dất cúŋnó săj máʔu bụʔi cúŋnó dượm ɲuần vìÐứkzê kó ŋàʔi báʔɔtʰù kó báʔɔ cả kó siôn kák xɛ suốʔi dôm tʰàɲ ɲựʔa tʰôŋ bụʔi dất tʰàɲ lưʔuhɔàŋ dấtdaj cởnên ɲựʔa tʰôŋ dươŋ cáʔi ŋàʔidêm cẳŋ hằŋ băj ɲữŋ luồŋ xỏʔi dất hwaŋvu dờʔi kwadờʔi kiə dờʔidờʔi cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi di kwa bồnôŋ ɲím ciếm lấʔi dó cim kú cim kwạ dó cúʔa ɣiáŋ cên dó káʔi zâʔi lộnlạʔɔ tʰướk tʰăŋbằŋ cốŋxôŋ cúŋnó ɣọʔi kák saŋcọŋ dến ŋôʔi nướk xôŋ kó ʔaj hếttʰảʔi kák kwancọŋ dềʔu za hưxôŋ ɣaj ɣốk mọk cɔŋ lâʔudàʔi cà cuôm kỏ zák mọk cɔŋ dồnlũʔi Ấʔi haŋ kủʔa có dồŋ cỗ ŋỉ kủʔa cim dà tʰúzừŋ có zừŋ ɣặp ɲăw tạʔi dó zê dựk kêʔu ɲăw ʔiêʔukwáʔi bandêm lɔán cỗ nơʔi náʔu nươŋ ʔiênổn zắn zɔj tạʔi dó dẻ cứŋ cɔ ɲóm kɔn lạʔi zướʔi bóŋ mìɲ săw nữʔa ɲữŋ kùŋ ɲăw ɲóm tạʔi dó cốŋ máʔi tʰàɲ dôʔi hãʔi cɔŋ sác Ðứkzê dọk lấʔi cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰúvật ấʔi cẳŋ kɔn nàʔɔ tʰiếʔu cẳŋ kɔn nàʔɔlà xôŋ dủ dôʔi vì ấʔilà miệŋ Ðứkzê dã cwiền tʰầnŋàʔi dã ɲóm cúŋnó lạʔi cíɲcúʔa dã bắttʰăm cɔ cúŋnó tăj ŋàʔi zùŋ zâʔi ciə dất nầʔi cɔ ɲữŋ tʰúvật ấʔi dượk dất nầʔi dó dờʔi kwadờʔi kiə Ðồŋ vắŋ dất xôhạn vujvẻ nơʔi samạk mừŋzỡ cổ hwa ɲư bôŋ hườŋ nó cở hwa ɲiềʔu vuimừŋ kấttiếŋ sự viɲhiển kủʔa liban kùŋ tốtdẹp kủʔa kạtmên sazôn dượk cɔ cúŋ tʰấʔi viɲhiển Ðứkzê tốtdẹp kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta hãʔi cɔ mạɲ ɲữŋ tăj ʔiếʔuduốʔi cɔ vữŋ ɲữŋ ɣốʔi zun ʔɛn hãʔi bảʔɔ ɲữŋ kó lòŋ sợhãʔi zằŋ xá vữŋlòŋ dừŋ nữʔa Ðâʔi nầʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kák ŋươʔi lấʔi báʔɔtʰù dến tứklà báʔɔ cả kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cíɲŋàʔi dến kứʔu kák ŋươʔi bấʔizờ ɲữŋ ɲữŋ diếk zỗŋ taj bấʔizờ kwè ɲảʔi ɲư kɔn naj lưỡʔi kâm vì kó ɲữŋ zòŋ nướk càʔɔ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɲữŋ suốʔi cảʔi za cɔŋ nơʔi samạk kát nóŋ za zuộŋ xô tʰàɲ suốʔi nướk haŋ có dồŋ dã cởnên vùŋ sậʔi lăw tạʔi dó kó dườŋkáʔi lốʔi ɣọʔilà dườŋ tʰáɲ kẻ nàʔɔ ôʔuế xôŋ dượk di kwa sɔŋ zàɲ cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi dượk cuộk ʔaj di cɔŋ dườŋ dó zầʔu xờzạʔi kũŋ xôŋ lầmlạk cên dườŋ dó xôŋ kó xôŋ kó tʰúzữ nàʔɔ cẳŋ ʔaj ɣặp dó sɔŋ ɲữŋ dượk cuộk bướkdi dườŋ ấʔi ɲữŋ Ðứkzê dã cuộk kahát dến siôn vujvẻ vôkùŋ cên dầʔu họ dượk vujvẻ mừŋzỡ buồnbựk tʰanvãn cốn di năm tʰứ mườʔibốn dờʔi vwa sêciə tʰì sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi dến dáɲ kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ kủʔa zuda ciếm lấʔi Ðʔɔạn vwa ʔasizi saj zápsakê vớʔi dạʔɔ biɲ laki dến ɣiêzusalɛm ŋịc kùŋ vwa sêciə zápsakê dứŋ tạʔi kốŋ ʔaw cên nơʔi dườŋkáʔi zuộŋ tʰợ bấʔizờ liəkim kɔncaj kủʔa hiɲkiə cứk kuŋ ɣiám di vớʔi tʰơ sépna sửkwan ɣiô ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasáp dếnkùŋ ŋườʔi zápsakê nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ hãʔi tâʔu kùŋ vwa sêciə zằŋ Ðấŋ dạʔivươŋ tứklà vwa ʔasizi fán ɲưvầʔi sự côŋkậʔi ŋươʔi nươŋ zựʔa ɣì ta nóʔi zằŋ mưʔu sứk ŋươʔi zùŋ zawciến cỉ lờʔi vôíc tʰôʔi vậʔi ŋươʔi kậʔi ʔaj zám làmfản nầʔi ŋươʔi kậʔi zíptô ŋươʔi lấʔi kâʔi sậʔi dã ɣãʔi ấʔi ɣậʔi kâʔi ʔaj zựʔa vàʔɔ tʰì dâm fủŋ tăj fazaôn vwa zíptô dốʔivớʔi côŋkậʔi mìɲ kũŋ tʰể ấʔi kólẽ kák ŋươʔi bảʔɔ zằŋ cúŋta kậʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta ɲưŋ ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi Ðấŋ sêciə dã kák nơʔi kaw kák bàntʰờ ŋàʔi xi cwiền cɔ zuda ɣiêzusalɛm zằŋ kák ŋươʔi xá tʰờ lạʔi cướk bàntʰờ nầʔi hăjsaw vậʔi bâʔizờ hãʔi dưʔa kɔntin cɔ củ vwa ʔasizi nếʔu ŋươʔi dượk dủ líɲ tʰì kấp cɔ haj ŋàn kɔn ŋựʔa ɲưŋ tàʔi nàʔɔ ŋươʔi duổʔi dượk lấʔi kwan tướŋ zất cɔŋ kák tôʔitớ củ hăjsaw mà ŋươʔi kậʔi zíptô dể sɛ biɲ líɲ vảlạʔi xôŋ kó mạŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê dáɲ sứ nầʔi dể ziệt saw Ðứkzê dã fán kùŋ zằŋ hãʔi dáɲ sứ nầʔi ziệt di liəkim kùŋ sépna ɣiô ʔabảʔɔ zápsakê zằŋ sin nóʔi vớʔi tôʔitớ ôŋ bằŋ tiếŋ ʔazam cúŋtôʔi hiểʔu tiếŋ ấʔi sɔŋ dừŋ lấʔi tiếŋ zuda nóʔi kùŋ cúŋtôʔi cɔ zân nầʔi dươŋ cên tườŋ tʰàɲ ŋɛ zápsakê nóʔi củ saj cwiền mấʔi lờʔi dó nàʔɔ ɲữŋ cɔ củ ŋươʔi cɔ ŋươʔi há cẳŋ kũŋ cwiền cɔ ɲữŋ ŋườʔi ŋồʔi cên tườŋ tʰàɲ fảʔi kùŋvớʔi kák ŋươʔi fân ʔuốŋ tiểʔu mìɲ Ðʔɔạn zápsakê dứŋzậʔi zùŋ tiếŋ zuda nóʔi tɔ zằŋ hãʔi ŋɛ lờʔi fán kủʔa dạʔivươŋ vwa ʔasizi vwa fán ɲưvầʔi kák ŋươʔi cớ dể vwa sêciə lừʔazốʔi mìɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kótʰể kứʔu kák ŋươʔi kũŋ cớ dể vwa sêciə xwiên kák ŋươʔi côŋkậʔi Ðứkzê zằŋ Ðứkzê cắk kứʔu cúŋta tʰàɲ nầʔi cẳŋ fó vàʔɔ tʰăj vwa ʔasizi dâʔu cớ ŋɛ vwa sêciə vwa ʔasizi fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi hòʔa vớʔi za hàŋ di tʰì kák ŋươʔi ʔainấʔi dượk ăncáʔi ɲɔ cáʔi kủʔa mìɲ ʔuốŋ nướk ɣiếŋ mìɲ cɔ tớʔi cừŋ dến dặŋ dɛm kák ŋươʔi vàʔɔ sứ ɲư sứ kák ŋươʔi tứklà sứ kó mạcɲa zượʔu mớʔi lúʔamì ɲɔ vậʔi hãʔi ɣiữmìɲ kẻʔɔ vwa sêciə zỗzàɲ kák ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðứkzê ɣiảʔicứʔu cúŋta vậʔi cớ kák tʰần kủʔa kák nướk xák dã ɣiảʔicứʔu sứ xỏʔi tăj vwa ʔasizi dượk căŋ nàʔɔ kák tʰần kủʔa hamát kủʔa ʔaï dâʔu nàʔɔ kák tʰầʔi kủʔa sêfạtvaim dâʔu kák tʰần ấʔi dã kứʔu samazi za xỏʔi tăj cưʔa cɔŋ ɲữŋ tʰầʔi kủʔa kák sứ dó kó tʰầʔi nàʔɔlà tʰầʔi dã kứʔu sứ mìɲ za xỏʔi tăj màÐứkzê kótʰể kứʔu ɣiêzusalɛm xỏʔi tăj dượk cúŋ làmtʰiɲ cẳŋ dáp lạʔi lờʔi vwa kó cwiền lịɲ zằŋ kák ŋươʔi dừŋ dáp lạʔi liəkim kɔncaj kủʔa hiɲkiə cứk kuŋ ɣiám kùŋ tʰơ sépna sửkwan ɣiô ʔa kɔncaj kủʔa ʔasáp sé áʔɔ mìɲ za cởvề cầʔu vwa sêciə tʰuật lạʔi ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa zápsakê ŋɛ dó vwa sêciə sé áʔɔ mìɲ kwấn baw ɣaj vàʔɔ dền Ðứkzê Ðʔɔạn saj kwan kuŋ ɣiám liəkim tʰơ sépna kák cưởŋlãʔɔ cɔŋ hàŋ tʰầʔi dềʔu kwấn baw ɣaj dếnkùŋ dấŋ tiênci saj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamốt nóʔi vớʔi ŋườʔi zằŋ vwa sêciə fán ɲưvầʔi ŋàʔinăj ŋàʔi hɔạnnạn kwởfạt ɲuốk kɔn dã dến dẻ zồʔi ɲưŋ xôŋ kó sứk dẻ za kólẽ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ŋɛ ɲữŋ lờʔi kủʔa zápsakê củ vwa ʔasizi dã saj dến dể dố tʰác Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ kólẽ ŋàʔi kwởfạt tʰeo ɲư ɲữŋ lờʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi dã ŋɛ vậʔi sin hãʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi kòn lạʔi dâʔi kầʔuŋwiện kák tôʔitớ kủʔa vwa sêciə dếnkùŋ saj sajbảʔɔ zằŋ nầʔi lờʔi kák ŋươʔi tâʔu lạʔi kùŋ củ mìɲ Ðứkzê kó fán ɲưvầʔi cớ ɲữŋ lờʔi ŋươʔi dã ŋɛ lờʔi kủʔa tôʔitớ vwa ʔasizi zùŋ nóʔi fạm nầʔi dặt
