tʰầnliɲ cɔŋ zồʔi ŋɛ cởvề sứ mìɲ tạʔi dó cɔ ŋã zướʔi ɣươm vả xi zápsakê ŋɛ củ mìɲ vwa ʔasizi dã di xỏʔi laki cởvề cầʔu ŋườʔi ɣặp ŋườʔi dươŋ dáɲ tʰàɲ lípna bấʔizờ vwa ʔasizi kó ŋɛ báʔɔ tiệtʰaka vwa tʰiôbi zằŋ ŋườʔi kéʔɔ za dể dáɲ kùŋ vwa saj kák sứɣiả dếnkùŋ sêciə zặn zằŋ kák ŋươʔi hãʔi nóʔi kùŋ sêciə vwa zuda zằŋ vwa cớ dể cɔ mìɲ lừʔa bởʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mìɲ tinkậʔi nóʔi zằŋ ɣiêzusalɛm cẳŋ fó vàʔɔ tăj vwa ʔasizi dâʔu nầʔi vwa kó ŋɛ ɲữŋ kák vwa ʔasizi dã za kák nướk kák nướk ấʔi dã hủʔiziệt kả zồʔi kòn vwa vwa dượk kứʔu xỏʔi kák tʰần kủʔa kák nướk cúŋta dã ziệt tứklà kák tʰần kủʔa ɣôsan kủʔa cazan kủʔa zếtsép kủʔa kɔnkáʔi dɛn têlasa kó kứʔu dượk xôŋ cớ nàʔɔ vwa kủʔa hamát vwa kủʔa ʔaï kák vwa kủʔa tʰàɲ sêfạt vaim tʰàɲ hêma tʰàɲ ʔiva dâʔu sêciə dã ɲận tʰơ tạʔi tăj sứɣiả dọk zồʔi tʰì ɲà Ðứkzê tʰơ za cướk Ðứkzê kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê kwân Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðấŋ ŋự cên kák cê zubin cỉ mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa mọʔi nướk cên dất ŋàʔi dã zựŋ cờʔi dất hỡʔiÐứkzê sin ŋiêŋ taj ŋɛ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin sɛm sin ŋɛ mọʔi lờʔi sancêzíp dã xiến nóʔi kùŋ tôʔi dể dố tʰác Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê tʰật zằŋ kák vwa nướk ʔasizi dã hủʔiziệt kák nướk fáhạʔi dấtdaj kák tʰần cɔŋ lửʔa ɲưŋ ấʔi cẳŋ fảʔi kák tʰần việk kủʔa tăj ŋườʔita bằŋ ɣỗ bằŋ dá cɔnên dã hủʔiziệt di dượk hỡʔizê Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋtôʔi vậʔi bâʔizờ sin ŋàʔi kứʔu cúŋtôʔi xỏʔi tăj sancêzíp hầʔu cɔ mọʔi nướk cên dất dềʔu cỉ mộtmìɲ ŋàʔi Ðứkzê saj kɔncaj kủʔa ʔamốt xiến ŋườʔi tâʔu kùŋ vwa sêciə zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên fán ɲưvầʔi vì ŋươʔi dã kầʔusin ŋịc kùŋ sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi nầʔi lờʔi Ðứkzê dã fán ɣáʔi dồŋciɲ siôn xiɲzể ŋươʔi ɲạʔɔ kườʔi ŋươʔi ɣáʔi ɣiêzusalɛm lắkdầʔu săw ŋươʔi ŋươʔi dã dố tʰác nóʔi fạm dến ʔaj ŋươʔi dã kấttiếŋ ŋướk kaw ŋịc kùŋ ʔaj Ấʔilà ŋịc kùŋ Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi dã zùŋ kák tôʔitớ mìɲ dố tʰác cúʔa nóʔi zằŋ ta dɛm kỗ sɛ cên cót núʔi nơʔi satʰẳm kủʔa liban dốn ɲữŋ kâʔi bác zất kaw kâʔi tùŋ zất siɲ vàʔɔ dến cên dỉɲ zất kaw cɔŋ zừŋ kủʔa zuộŋ ta dã dàʔɔ dất ʔuốŋ nướk zùŋ cơn cɔ kạn mọʔi sôŋ zíptô ŋươʔi cẳŋ ŋɛ zằŋ dã dó lâʔu dã dịɲ dờʔi sưʔa hăjsaw hiệnnăj xiến sảʔiza hầʔu cɔ ŋươʔi fá kák tʰàɲ bềnvữŋ ɣòdốŋ dổnát ɲữŋ zânkư kák tʰàɲ ấʔi dã sứk xiếpsợ sấʔuhổ cởnên ɲư zăw ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kỏ sɛɲ ɲư kỏ cên máʔi ɲà ɲư lúʔamì cưʔa cồʔi dọt dã héʔɔ ta sɛm tʰấʔi ŋươʔi xi ŋồʔi xi za xi vàʔɔ xi náʔɔlɔạn ŋịc kùŋ vì ŋươʔi náʔɔlɔạn ŋịc kùŋ lờʔi sấksượk kủʔa ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔu dến taj ca káʔi xwen nơʔi mũʔi ŋươʔi káʔi xớp nơʔi miệŋ ŋươʔi xiến ŋươʔi tʰeo kɔn dườŋ mìɲ dã nɔj dến cởvề hỡʔi sêciə diềʔu nầʔi zấʔu năj hwalợʔi cíɲ zuộŋ sɛɲ za saŋnăm kòn lúʔa tựɲiên mọk xôŋ zeo ɣiốŋ ɲưŋ dến tʰứba hãʔi zeo ɣặt hãʔi cồŋ ɲɔ ăncáʔi cɔŋ ɲà zuda nàʔɔ cáɲ xỏʔi kòn lạʔi câm zễ mớʔi zướʔi za cáʔi cên vì kó zân za ɣiêzusalɛm mấʔi cốn xỏʔi za núʔi siôn lòŋ sốtsắŋ kủʔa Ðứkzê kwân diềʔu dó vậʔi Ðứkzê fán vwa ʔasizi ɲưvầʔi nó xôŋ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ nầʔi cẳŋ vàʔɔ mũʔi cên kũŋ cẳŋ zùŋ káʔi tʰuẫn ŋịc vớʔi cẳŋ dắp lũʔi kự lạʔi nó tʰeo kɔn dườŋ mìɲ dã nɔj dến cởvề xôŋ vàʔɔ tʰàɲ nầʔi dâʔu Ðứkzê fán vậʔi ta biɲ vựk tʰàɲ nầʔi dể ɣiảʔicứʔu kớ kớ Ðʔa tôʔitớ bấʔizờ tʰiênsứ kủʔa Ðứkzê vàʔɔ cạʔi kwân kủʔa ŋườʔi ʔasizi ɣiết mườʔitám ŋàn ŋườʔi sáŋ hômsăw ŋườʔita zậʔi tʰấʔi zặt ɲữŋ tʰâʔi cết sancêzíp vwa ʔasizi di cởvề tạʔi ninivɛ một ŋàʔiciə ŋườʔi dươŋ kwì lạʔi cɔŋ dền nícók tʰần kủʔa mìɲ tʰì kɔncaj ŋườʔi ʔɛcamêlék sazếtsɛ lấʔi ɣươm ɣiết ŋườʔi Ðʔɔạn haj ŋườʔi dó cốn cɔŋ sứ ʔazazát kɔncaj ŋườʔi sạtʰadôn cịvì tʰăj ŋườʔi cɔŋ lúk dó sêciə bịɲ hầʔu cết dấŋ tiênci saj kɔncaj ʔamốt dến cầʔu vwa tâʔu zằŋ Ðứkzê fán ɲưvầʔi hãʔi sắpdặt ɲàŋươʔi ŋươʔi hầʔu cết xôŋ sốŋ dượk nữʔa sêciə sâʔi vàʔɔ tườŋ kầʔuŋwiện Ðứkzê zằŋ hỡʔiÐứkzê sin ɲớ zằŋ tôʔi dã lấʔilòŋ cơn tʰật cọn làɲ di cướk cúʔa dã diềʔu làɲ cướk ŋàʔi Ðʔɔạn sêciə xók zầmzề bấʔizờ kó lờʔi Ðứkzê fán cɔ saj zằŋ hãʔi cởlạʔi nóʔi kùŋ sêciə zằŋ ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa Ðʔa ŋươʔi fán ɲưvầʔi ta dã ŋɛ lờʔi kầʔuŋwiện kủʔa ŋươʔi dã tʰấʔi nướkmắt ŋươʔi nầʔi tʰêm cɔ ŋươʔi mườʔilăm tuổʔi ta ɣiảʔicứʔu ŋươʔi kùŋ tʰàɲ nầʔi xỏʔi tăj vwa ʔasizi biɲ vựk tʰàɲ nầʔi nầʔi zấʔu Ðứkzê cɔ ŋươʔi dể ŋiệm Ðứkzê hɔàntʰàɲ lờʔi mìɲ dã fán cên cắk ảɲ ʔɛca cɔ bóŋ mặtcờʔi dươŋ di dã di kwá luj lạʔi mườʔi dộ vậʔitʰì cên cắk ảɲ bóŋ mặtcờʔi dã luj lạʔi mườʔi dộ dã di kwá zồʔi nầʔi lờʔi cép kủʔa sêciə vwa zuda xi dã bịɲ dượk làɲ bịɲ tôʔi từŋ nóʔi vậʔitʰì dươŋ xi ɣiữʔa cưʔa kủʔa dờʔi tôʔi tôʔi hầʔu vàʔɔ kửʔa âmfủ kòn mấʔi tʰừʔa kất tôʔi từŋ nóʔi tôʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi Ðứkzê nữʔa Ðứkzê cên dất ŋườʔi sốŋ tôʔi cẳŋ kòn tʰấʔi lɔàʔiŋườʔi kùŋ zânkư tʰếzan ɲà kủʔa tôʔi ciệt di zờʔi sa xỏʔi tôʔi ɲư káʔi cạʔi kủʔa ŋườʔi cănciên tôʔi kuốn dờʔi tôʔi ɲư tʰợ zệt kuốn vảʔi cúʔa kắt tôʔi xỏʔi xuŋkửʔi sáŋ dến tốʔi cúʔa zứt mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi tôʔi làmtʰiɲ cɔdến sáŋmaj ɲư ŋàʔi dã sé kả sươŋ tôʔi ɲư vậʔi từ sáŋ dến tốʔi cúʔa zứt mạŋ sốŋ tôʔi tôʔi zầmzì ɲư cim hạk cim ʔiến ɣù ɲư cim kâʔu tôʔi ɲìn cên kaw nỗʔi mỏʔi hỡʔiÐứkzê tôʔi dươŋ kơn sầʔu xổ sin ŋàʔi bảʔɔlãɲ tôʔi tôʔi kòn nóʔiɣì ŋàʔi dã fán kùŋ tôʔi tʰì ŋàʔi kũŋ dã tʰàɲ việk nầʔi cọn dờʔi tôʔi kác xiêmɲườŋ kớ cɔŋ lòŋ kăjdắŋ hỡʔicúʔa ŋườʔita dượk sốŋ ɲờ dó tʰầnliɲ tôʔi dượk sốŋ kũŋ ɲờ dó sincúʔa cữʔa làɲ tôʔi xiến tôʔi dượk sốŋ nầʔi zất kăjdắŋ kủʔa tôʔi dã cởnên bìɲan cúʔa dã ʔiêʔutʰươŋ liɲhồn tôʔi dɛm za xỏʔi cúʔa dã mọʔi tộʔilỗʔi tôʔi za săw lưŋ ŋàʔi nơʔi âmfủ cẳŋ ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi dượk cết cẳŋ tônviɲ ŋàʔi dượk ɲữŋ dã suốŋ zồʔi cẳŋ kòn côŋkậʔi tʰàɲtʰật kủʔa ŋàʔi nữʔa zwi sốŋ sốŋ mớʔi hăj tônviɲ ŋàʔi ɲư tôʔi ŋàʔinăj ca cɔ kɔnkáʔi mìɲ tʰàɲtʰật kủʔa ŋàʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ kứʔu tôʔi cọn dờʔi cúŋtôʔi dờn cɔŋ ɲà Ðứkzê vả saj kó nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi lấʔi káʔi báɲcáʔi dắp cên ʔuŋdộk vwa dượk làɲ sêciə dáp zằŋ kó zấʔu nàʔɔ cɔ zằŋ kòn dượk ɲà Ðứkzê nữʔa căŋ cɔŋ lúk dó vwa babilôn mêzôdákbaladan kɔn vwa baladan saj dưʔa tʰơ zâŋ sêciə ŋɛ ŋườʔi dăw dượk làɲ sêciə vuimừŋ kák sứtʰần tʰì cɔ sɛm cɔŋ kuŋdiện nơʔi dể ɲữŋ kủʔa kwí ɲư bạk vàŋ tʰuốk tʰơm zầʔu báʔu kùŋ xɔ xíɣiớʔi mọʔi dồ cɔŋ fủ xố mìɲ fàm ci cɔŋ kuŋ cɔŋ kả nướk mìɲ cẳŋ kó ɣì sêciə cẳŋ cɔ kák sứtʰần sɛm dến Ðấŋ tiênci saj dến cầʔu vwa sêciə hỏʔi zằŋ kák ŋườʔi dó nóʔi ci dâʔu dến tʰăm vwa sêciə dáp zằŋ họ dến fươŋ sa tứklà nướk babilôn saj zằŋ họ dã sɛm ɣì cɔŋ kuŋ vwa sêciə dáp zằŋ họ dã sɛm hếttʰảʔi mọʔi cɔŋ kuŋ cẳŋ kó ɣì cɔŋ fủ xố cẳŋ cỉ cɔ saj tâʔu kùŋ sêciə zằŋ sin ŋɛ lờʔi Ðứkzê kwân fán nầʔi ŋàʔi dến xi mọʔi cɔŋ kuŋ ŋươʔi mọʔi ŋươʔi dã cứʔa cɔŋ xɔ cɔdến ŋàʔinăj zờʔi saŋ babilôn cẳŋ kòn nàʔɔ Ðứkzê fán vậʔi kák kɔncaj ŋươʔi kɔncáʔu za ŋươʔi sɛɲ bởʔi ŋươʔi kũŋ kó dể kwan hɔạn cɔŋ kuŋ vwa babilôn sêciə dáp lạʔi kùŋ saj zằŋ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkzê ôŋ vừʔa tʰuật cɔ ŋɛ dó lạʔi zằŋ vì cɔŋ ŋàʔi kòn sốŋ dượk bìɲiên tʰật Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi fán zằŋ hãʔi ʔiênủʔi hãʔi ʔiênủʔi zân hãʔi nóʔi cɔ tʰấʔu lòŋ ɣiêzusalɛm zaw zằŋ cɛɲ ciến kủʔa dã cọn tộʔilỗʔi dã dượk tʰa dã cịʔu ɣấp haj tăj Ðứkzê kák tộʔi mìɲ kótiếŋ kêʔu zằŋ hãʔi mởdườŋ cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi bằŋ dườŋkáʔi cɔŋ dất hwaŋ cɔ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta mọʔi nơʔi sủŋ tʰấp dượk kaw mọʔi núʔi mọʔi ɣò suốŋ kák nơʔi ɣậpɣềɲ cɔ bằŋ kák nơʔi zốk tʰàɲ dồŋnộʔi bấʔizờ viɲhiển kủʔa Ðứkzê za mọʔi sáktʰịt dềʔu sɛm tʰấʔi miệŋ Ðứkzê dã fán vậʔi kótiếŋ zằŋ hãʔi kêʔu và kó dáp zằŋ tôʔi kêʔu tʰếnàʔɔ mọʔi sáktʰịt ɣiốŋ ɲư kỏ ɲansắk ɲư hwa ŋɔàʔi dồŋ kỏ xô hwa zụŋ hơʔi Ðứkzê tʰổʔi kwa fảʔi zân nầʔi xáknàʔɔ kỏ ấʔi kỏ xô hwa zụŋ ɲưŋ lờʔi kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi cúŋta kòn mãʔi dờʔidờʔi ʔaj zaw tinlàɲ cɔ siôn hãʔi cên núʔi kaw ʔaj zaw tinlàɲ cɔ ɣiêzusalɛm hãʔi zasứk kấttiếŋ hãʔi kấttiếŋ dừŋ hãʔi bảʔɔ kák tʰàɲ kủʔa zuda zằŋ Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa kák ŋươʔi dâʔi nầʔi cúʔazê lấʔi kwiềnnăŋ dến ŋàʔi zùŋ káɲtăj mìɲ kaicị nầʔi tʰưởŋ ŋàʔi nơʔi ŋàʔi báʔɔ cả ŋàʔi cướk ŋàʔi ŋàʔi căn bầʔi mìɲ ɲư ŋườʔi cănciên tʰâʔu kák kɔnciên kɔn vàʔɔ káɲtăj mìɲ vàʔɔ lòŋ zắt kák ciên káʔi dươŋ cɔ ʔaj dã lấʔilòŋ bàntăj lườŋ lấʔi ɣaŋ tăj dɔ kák từŋ cờʔi ʔaj dã lấʔi dấʔu dɔŋ bụʔi dất ʔaj dã zùŋ kân kân núʔi zùŋ tʰăŋbằŋ kân ɣò ʔaj lườŋ dượk tʰần kủʔa Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi mưʔusĩ ŋàʔi dặŋ zạʔi ŋàʔi diềʔu ɣì nàʔɔŋàʔi dã vớʔi ʔaj ʔaj dã zạʔi xôn cɔ ŋàʔi zạʔi ŋàʔi dườŋ kôŋŋĩʔa nàʔɔ ʔaj dã dɛm tʰôŋ zạʔi ŋàʔi cỉ cɔ ŋàʔi lốʔi xônŋwan kìʔa kák zântộk xáknàʔɔ ɣiọt nướk ɲỏ cɔŋ tʰùŋ ɲưlà mảʔi bụʔi zơʔi cên kân nầʔi ŋàʔi ɣiở kák kùlaw ɲư dồʔi ɲỏ zừŋli cẳŋ dủ dốt lửʔa ɲữŋ tʰúvật dó cẳŋ dủ kủʔa tʰiêʔu mọʔi zântộk cướk Ðứkzê tʰảʔi dềʔu ɲưxôŋ ŋàʔi sɛm ɲư cốŋxôŋ vậʔi vậʔitʰì kák ŋươʔi kótʰể Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi vớʔi ʔaj lấʔi ảɲ tượŋ nàʔɔ sɔsáɲ vớʔi ŋàʔi dượk xi ŋườʔi tʰợ dúk tượŋ tʰì tʰợbạk lấʔi vàŋ bọk dúk cɔ ɲữŋ káʔi zâʔicwiền bằŋ bạk kẻ ŋèʔɔ xôŋ zâŋ nổʔi dó tʰì cọn ɣỗ xôŋ mụk dượk tʰợ xéʔɔ dặŋ cổ tượŋ xôŋ lăj dổ kák ŋươʔi xôŋ saw vậʔitʰì kák ŋươʔi xôŋ ŋɛ saw ŋườʔita cưʔa zạʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi lúk bandầʔu kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ hiểʔu xi zựŋ dất Ấʔilà Ðấŋ ŋự cên vòŋ cáʔidất nầʔi kák zânkư cên dất ɲư kàʔɔkàʔɔ vậʔi cíɲŋàʔi Ðấŋ ɣiươŋ kák từŋ cờʔi za ɲư káʔi ɣiươŋ za ɲư cạʔi dể cíɲŋàʔi Ðấŋ tiêʔuziệt kák kwan cưởŋ cɔ kák kwan sét cên dất za hưxôŋ họ mớʔi cồŋ mớʔi zeo kâʔi mớʔi câm zễ cɔŋ dất hơʔi Ðứkzê tʰổʔi kwa tʰì xôhéʔɔ nầʔi ɣiólốk dùʔa di ɲư zơmzák Ðấŋtʰáɲ fán zằŋ vậʔitʰì kák ŋươʔi sáɲ kùŋ ʔaj ʔaj bằŋ hãʔi ŋướk kaw sɛm ʔaj dã tạʔɔ ɲữŋ nầʔi Ấʔilà Ðấŋ xiến kák kơ biɲ za tʰeo dặt hếttʰảʔi cẳŋ nàʔɔ tʰiếʔu sứkmạɲ ŋàʔi kwiềnnăŋ ŋàʔi zất kaw vậʔitʰì hỡʔi zakốp saw ŋươʔi nóʔi hãʔi ʔisơzaên saw ŋươʔi nóʔi ɲưvầʔi Ðườŋ tôʔi dã xuất xỏʔi Ðứkzê dɔán tôʔi kwa xỏʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi tôʔi ŋươʔi xôŋ saw xôŋ ŋɛ saw Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi hằŋ sốŋ Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã zựŋ kák dầʔu kùŋ dất cẳŋ mỏʔi cẳŋ xônŋwan ŋàʔi xôŋtʰể zò ŋàʔi sứkmạɲ cɔ ɲọkɲằn tʰêm lựklượŋ cɔ cẳŋ kó sứk ɲữŋ caicẻ kũŋ fảʔi mònmỏʔi mệtɲọk ŋườʔi caicáŋ kũŋ fảʔi vấpŋã ɲưŋ ʔaj côŋdợʔi Ðứkzê tʰì cắk dượk sứk mớʔi kấtkáɲ băj kaw ɲư cim ưŋ cạʔi xôŋ mệtɲọk di xôŋ mònmỏʔi hỡʔi kák kùlaw hãʔi nínlặŋ cướk kák zântộk hãʔi lấʔi sứk mớʔi hãʔi dến ɣần tʰì mớʔi nóʔi cúŋta hãʔi dến ɣần ɲăw dể sétdɔán ʔaj dã xiến ŋườʔi kiə zấʔi fươŋ dôŋ lấʔi kôŋbìɲ ɣọʔi ŋườʔi dến cơn mìɲ ŋàʔi fó kák zântộk cướk ŋườʔi xiến ŋườʔi kaicị kák vwa fó ɲư bụʔi cɔ ɣươm ŋườʔi ɣiốŋ ɲư zákzến ɣió tʰổʔi cɔ kuŋ ŋườʔi ŋườʔi duổʔi tʰeo cên kɔn dườŋ cưʔa dặt cơn zặm ʔaj dã tʰàɲtựʔu việk nầʔi Ấʔilà cíɲ Ðứkzê dầʔutiên kũŋ vớʔi kuốʔicùŋ kák kùlaw tʰấʔi tʰấtkiɲ kák dầʔu kùŋ dất dềʔu zunzẩʔi cúŋnó dềʔu dến ɣần ɲóm lạʔi ʔainấʔi ɣiúpdỡ lânkận mìɲ bảʔɔ ʔɛɲɛm mìɲ zằŋ hãʔi fấn cí tʰợmộk ɣiụk lòŋ tʰợ vàŋ zùŋ búʔa dáɲbóŋ ɣiụk lòŋ dáɲ dɛ việk zằŋ hàn dɔạn lấʔi diɲ dóŋ cɔ xỏʔi luŋlăj ɲưŋ hỡʔi ʔisơzaên ŋươʔi tôʔitớ kòn ŋươʔi zakốp dã cọn zòŋzốŋ kủʔa zaham dã kầm lấʔi ŋươʔi dầʔu kùŋ dất ɣọʔi ŋươʔi kák ɣók dất bảʔɔ ŋươʔi zằŋ ŋươʔi tôʔitớ dã lựʔa ŋươʔi cưʔa từŋ ŋươʔi Ðừŋ vớʔi ŋươʔi cớ kiɲ xiếp Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi ta sứk cɔ ŋươʔi fảʔi ɣiúpdỡ ŋươʔi lấʔi tăj hữʔu kôŋbìɲ nâŋdỡ ŋươʔi nầʔi ɲữŋ nổʔizận kùŋ ŋươʔi hổtʰẹn ɲuốkɲa ɲữŋ zấʔi ŋịc kùŋ ŋươʔi za hưxôŋ cết ɲữŋ kôŋkíc ŋươʔi ŋươʔi cẳŋ tʰấʔi ɲữŋ zawciến kùŋ ŋươʔi ziệt tʰàɲ xôŋ vì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi tăj hữʔu ŋươʔi fán kùŋ ŋươʔi zằŋ Ðừŋ ɣiúpdỡ ŋươʔi hỡʔi sâʔubọ zakốp kák ŋươʔi kủʔa zân ʔisơzaên dừŋ ci ɣiúp ŋươʔi Ðứkzê fán vậʔi tứklà Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên Ðấŋ cuộk ŋươʔi nầʔi lấʔi ŋươʔi káʔi bừʔa ɲọn tʰật mớʔi kó zăŋ ŋươʔi kák núʔi ŋiền ɲỏ za cɔ kák ɣò ɣiốŋ ɲư kám ŋươʔi zê ɣió dùʔa di ɣiólốk lạk ɲưŋ ŋươʔi vuimừŋ cɔŋ Ðứkzê xwej mìɲ cɔŋ Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên ɲữŋ ŋèʔɔnàn tʰiếʔutʰốn nướk xôŋ dượk lưỡʔi xô xát ɲưŋ Ðứkzê ɲậm lờʔi Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi kủʔa ʔisơzaên xôŋ lìʔabỏ dâʔu ta xiến sôŋ cảʔi za cên dỉɲ núʔi cọʔi suốʔi càʔɔ ɣiữʔa cũŋ ta samạk tʰàɲ ʔaw dất xô tʰàɲ ŋuồn nướk ta dặt cɔŋ dồŋ vắŋ ɲữŋ kâʔi hươŋ bác kâʔi tạʔɔ ɣiáp kâʔi kâʔi zầʔu ta cồŋ cuŋ nơʔi samạk ɲữŋ kâʔi tùŋ kâʔi kâʔi hɔàŋ zươŋ hầʔu cɔ mọʔi ŋườʔi sɛm tʰấʔi ŋẫmŋĩ kùŋ ɲăw hiểʔu zằŋ tăj Ðứkzê dã dó Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên dã zựŋ dó Ðứkzê fán hãʔi cìɲ dơn kák ŋươʔi vwa kủʔa zakốp fán hãʔi bàʔitỏ mạɲ kák ŋươʔi fảʔi hãʔi tʰuật lạʔi di hãʔi zaw cɔ cúŋta diềʔu sảʔi dến hãʔi za ɲữŋ diềʔu dã kó lúk cướk cɔ cúŋta dểý ŋiệm kuốʔicùŋ tʰếnàʔɔ hãʔi bảʔɔ cɔ cúŋta ɲữŋ hầʔu dến hãʔi zaw ɲữŋ việk sảʔi dến săw nầʔi cɔ cúŋta kák ŋươʔi tʰần kũŋ hãʔi suốŋ fướk hɔặk suốŋ họʔa di hầʔu cɔ cúŋta kùŋ ɲăw sɛm tʰấʔi lấʔilàm nầʔi kák ŋươʔi cẳŋ zaɣì kák ŋươʔi kũŋ vôíc lựʔɛcọn kák ŋươʔi dáŋ ɣớmɣiếk ta zấʔi ŋườʔi fươŋ bắk ŋườʔi dã dến ŋườʔi kêʔukầʔu zɛɲ fíʔa mặtcờʔi mọk ɣiẵm cên kák kwan cưởŋ ɲư ɣiẵm cên dất vôʔi xáknàʔɔ tʰự ɣốm ɲồʔi dấtsét ʔaj dã zadiềʔu dó lúk bandầʔu cɔ cúŋta ʔaj dã zaw za cướk dặŋ cúŋta nóʔi zằŋ ŋườʔi kôŋbìɲ ɲưŋ cẳŋ ʔaj zaw cẳŋ ʔaj báʔɔ cẳŋ ʔaj từŋ ŋɛ tiếŋ kák ŋươʔi Ấʔi cíɲ dã fán cướk ɲứt kùŋ siôn zằŋ nầʔi cúŋnó dâʔi ta saj báʔɔ tinlàɲ dến ɣiêzusalɛm ta sɛm zồʔi cẳŋ kó ʔaj cɔŋ dám kũŋ cẳŋ kó ŋườʔi mưʔusĩ dể xi hỏʔi kótʰể dáp lờʔi tʰật cỉ hếttʰảʔi kôŋviệk kũŋ tʰàɲ xôŋ tượŋ dúk kủʔa cẳŋkwa ɣió lộnlạʔɔ nầʔi dầʔitớ tadâʔi nâŋdỡ cọnlựʔa liɲhồn lấʔilàm dẹplòŋ ta dã dặt tʰần cên ŋườʔi ŋườʔi za kôŋbìɲ cɔ kák zân ŋɔạʔi ŋườʔi cẳŋ kêʔula cẳŋ lêntiếŋ cẳŋ dể ŋɔàʔi dườŋfố ŋɛ tiếŋ mìɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ kâʔi sậʔi dã ɣiập cẳŋ zụt dèn kòn hơʔi cáʔi ŋườʔi lấʔi tʰật za kôŋbìɲ ŋườʔi cẳŋ mònmỏʔi cẳŋ ŋãlòŋ cɔdến cừŋ nàʔɔ sɔŋ kôŋbìɲ cên dất kák kùlaw côŋdợʔi luậtfáp ŋườʔi ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi Ðấŋ dã zựŋ kák từŋ cờʔi ɣiươŋ za dã cảʔi dất vớʔi mọʔi za bởʔi dã hơʔi sốŋ cɔ zân cên tʰầnliɲ cɔ mọʔi lɔàʔi di cên kó fán ɲưvầʔi ta Ðứkzê dã kêʔuɣọʔi ŋươʔi cɔŋ kôŋbìɲ tăj ŋươʔi ɣiữ lấʔi ŋươʔi ta fó ŋươʔi zawướk kủʔa zân nầʔi sáŋ cɔ kák zân ŋɔạʔi dể cɔ za xỏʔi xám ŋồʔi cɔŋ tốʔităm za xỏʔi ŋụk ta Ðứkzê ấʔilà zɛɲ ta cẳŋ ɲườŋ viɲhiển cɔ dấŋ nàʔɔ xák kũŋ xôŋ ɲườŋ tôncọŋ cɔ ɲữŋ tượŋ cạm nầʔi ɲữŋ dầʔutiên dã ứŋŋiệm zồʔi năj lạʔi zaw cɔ kák ŋươʔi mớʔi cɔ kák ŋươʔi cướk xi za kák ŋươʔi di kùŋ mọʔi cɔŋ kák kùlaw kùŋ zânkư hãʔi bàʔi katụŋ mớʔi cɔ Ðứkzê hãʔi nơʔi dầʔu kùŋ dất ŋợʔixɛn ŋàʔi Ðồŋ vắŋ kùŋ kák tʰàɲ hãʔi kấttiếŋ kák làŋ kêda kũŋ vậʔi zânkư sêla hãʔi hãʔi kêʔu cên cót núʔi hãʔi zâŋ viɲhiển cɔ Ðứkzê zaw ŋợʔixɛn cúʔa cɔŋ kák kùlaw Ðứkzê za ɲư ŋườʔi mạɲzạn ɣiụk lòŋ sốtsắŋ ɲư ŋườʔi líɲciến kêʔula kwáttʰáʔɔ zasứk kự lạʔi tʰùŋịc mìɲ ta làmtʰiɲ dã lâʔu dã nínlặŋ dã kầm mìɲ ɲưŋ bâʔizờ zênla tʰở hàʔɔ ɲư dờn sɛɲ dẻ ta fáhwaŋ núʔi dồʔi cɔ kỏkâʔi xôhéʔɔ sôŋ tʰàɲ kùlaw cɔ ʔaw kạn ta xiến di cên kɔn dườŋ mìɲ xôŋ tʰuộk zắt bởʔi kák nẻʔɔ cẳŋ kwɛn dổʔi bóŋtốʔi cướk za áɲsáŋ nơʔi kɔŋ kwẹʔɔ za ŋăitʰẳŋ tʰật kák dó xôŋ lìʔabỏ cúŋnó dâʔu sɔŋ ɲữŋ kậʔi kák tượŋ cạm sưŋ kák tượŋ dúk zằŋ kák ŋàʔi tʰần cúŋtôʔi tʰì dềʔu ɣiựt lùʔi maŋ sấʔuhổ hỡʔi ɲữŋ diếk hãʔi ŋɛ kòn kák ŋươʔi hãʔi tʰấʔi ʔaj cẳŋ fảʔi dầʔitớ saw ʔaj diếk ɲư sứɣiả dã saj di ʔaj ɲư dã hòʔatʰuận kùŋ ʔaj ɲư dầʔitớ kủʔa Ðứkzê ŋươʔi tʰấʔi ɲiềʔu xôŋ ɣiữ ci ŋươʔi kó taj ŋỏ xôŋ ŋɛ ci Ðứkzê vujlòŋ kôŋbìɲ mìɲ cɔ luậtfáp kả sáŋ tôncọŋ ɲưŋ ấʔilà zân kướp ɣiựt hếttʰảʔi dềʔu mắk lướʔi cɔŋ haŋ zam cɔŋ ŋụk cúŋnó kủʔa kướp cẳŋ ʔaj ɣiảʔicứʔu mồʔi cẳŋ ʔaj nóʔi zằŋ hãʔi cả lạʔi cɔŋ vòŋ kák ŋươʔi ʔaj lắŋtaj ŋɛ diềʔu nầʔi ʔaj dểý dến ŋɛ sảʔi kó săw ʔaj dã fó zakốp cɔ kướpbók ʔisơzaên cɔ kwân cộmkướp há cẳŋ fảʔi Ðứkzê Ðấŋ cúŋta fạmtộʔi ŋịc kùŋ dườŋlốʔi ŋàʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ nɔj tʰeo luậtfáp ŋàʔi cúŋnó cẳŋ vâŋ ɣiữ cɔnên cúʔa dã cút kơn tʰạɲ ciếncɛɲ zữzộʔi cên lửʔa dốt xôŋ lửʔa tʰiêʔu cáʔi kũŋ cẳŋ lấʔilàm lɔ bâʔizờ hỡʔi zakốp Ðứkzê Ðấŋ dã zựŋ ŋươʔi hỡʔi ʔisơzaên ŋàʔi Ðấŋ dã tạʔɔ tʰàɲ ŋươʔi fán ɲưvầʔi Ðừŋ dã cuộk ŋươʔi ta dã lấʔi ŋươʔi ɣọʔi ŋươʔi ŋươʔi tʰuộk xi ŋươʔi kwa kák zòŋ nướk kùŋ xi ŋươʔi lộʔi kwa sôŋ cẳŋ cɛlấp xi ŋươʔi bướk kwa lửʔa cẳŋ cáʔi ŋọn lửʔa cẳŋ dốt ŋươʔi vì ɣiêhôva Ðứkcúʔɛcờʔi ŋươʔi Ðấŋtʰáɲ kủʔa ʔisơzaên kứʔucúʔa ŋươʔi ta zíptô làmzá cuộk ŋươʔi tʰiôbi sêba kủʔa tʰăj ŋươʔi vì dã kɔj ŋươʔi kwíbáʔu dáŋ cuộŋ dã ʔiêʔu ŋươʔi ɲữŋ ŋườʔi tʰế ŋươʔi kák zântộk tʰăj mạŋ sốŋ ŋươʔi Ðừŋ kùŋ ŋươʔi xiến zòŋzõʔi ŋươʔi dến fươŋ tâʔi ta bảʔɔ fươŋ bắk zằŋ hãʔi buôŋ za bảʔɔ fươŋ zằŋ cớ kầm lạʔi làmci hãʔi dɛm kák kɔncaj nơʔi sa dɛm kák kɔŋáʔi nơʔi dầʔu kùŋ dất tứklà ɲữŋ sưŋ bằŋ dã zựŋ viɲkwaŋ dã tạʔɔ tʰàɲ dã hãʔi dɛm zân nầʔi za zân kó duj ɲữŋ kó taj diếk
